text: Bazi redzidzo yepasi ratanga nzira itsva yekutsvaga makambani achari tengesera maSanitary Pads ekupa vasikana muzvikoro pamwe nekuchikafu chekupa vadzidzi pasi pechironga cheNational Schools Feeding Program. Mumagwaro ari kuburitswa mumapepa nhau, bazi iri rinoti makambani ese anoda kuri tengesera chikafu nemaSanitary Pads anofanira kuendesa magwarwo awo kumuzinda webazi iri muHarare musi wa13 mwedzi uno usati wasvika. Izvi zviri kuitwa mushure mekunge komiti yeparamende inoona nezvedzidzo yepasi, yaratidza kusafara nemafambisirwO kana matengerwe aiitwa zvinhu pasi pezvirongwa zvebazi iri. Komiti iyi yakaitawo chisungo chekuti bazi iri rinofanira kutsvaga makambani anoritengera chikafu nemaSanitary Pads pachishandiswa mutemo wehurumende wekutenga zvinhu. Sachigaro wekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvedzidzo yepasi, Amai Pricillar-Misiharabwi-Mushonga, vati zvave kuitwa nebazi redzidzo yepasi zvino ratidza kuti riri kutetera zvakataurwa nekomiti yavo. Vatiwo vano vimba kuti izvi zvichapedza matambudziko ange aripo. Ongororo yakaitwa nekomiti iyi zvichitevera gwaro rezvichemo rakaendeswa kuparamande nesangano reWomen of Zimbabwe Arise, yakaratidza kuti maSanitary Pads aiendeswa muzvikoro ainge ari yemhando yepasi. Imwe nhengo yekomiti iyi, VaJohnson Madhuku, vanoti nekuda kwaizvozvo, vana vechikoro vange vasiri kutora mSanitary Pads aya. Pachikafu hurumende yaingopa zvikoro hupfu kuti zvibike sadza asi pasina muriwo. Izvi zvazoita kuti vana vabhadhariswe mari yemuriwo, kutsvagiswa huni nezvimwe zvakaita semvura sezvo zvinhu izvi zvainge zvsiri pazvikoro. Semuenzaniso komiti iyi yakaona kuti zvimwe zvikoro zvakaita seBondamakara kwaMtoko zvainge zvatorega chirongwa cheSchools Feeding Program nekuti painge pasina huni nemvura. VaMadhuku vanoti komiti yavo inoda kuti zvikoro zvipihwe zviikafu zvisinganetsi kugadzira zvakaita semaheu uye vakatopa mienzaniso yezvikafu izvi kubazi rezvedzidzo. Mumwe mubereki, Amai Kelly Marimo, vanoti chirongwa cheSchools Feeding Program chakanaka chose asi vana havafaniri kupihwa sadza chete. Pabhajeti ra2021, bazi iri rakapihwa bhiriyoni nezana remamiriyoni emadhora emuno ekutenga chikafu chevana muzvikoro uye mazana mashanu emamiryoni emadhora emuno ekutenga maSanitary Pads. Hurumende yatanga chirongwa chekupa vana maSanitary Pads muzvikoro mushure mekuona kunetseka kwaita vaye vanobva kumhuri dzinoshaya. Nzara muzvikoro ndiyo yakaitawo kuti hurumende itange chirongwa chekupa vadzidzi chikafu kuti vakwanise kudzidza zvakanaka vasingachemi nzara. No media source currently available
title: Bazi reDzidzo Rotevera Zvarakaudzwa neParamende paNyaya yeKutenga Zvinhu Pasina Huori

text: Bato reMDC Alliance rinoti harisi kufara nemhirizhonga yakaitika kwaMutare uko kwarinoti mutungamiri webato iri, VaNelson Chamisa, vakaridzirwa pfuti. Bato iri rinoti chave kutodiwa inhaurirano pakati paVaChamisa nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, senzira yekupedza mhirizhonga iyi nemamwe matambudziko akatarisana nenyika. Mumwe wevatevedzeri vemutungamiri weMDC Alliance, VaTendai Biti, vaudza vatori venhau nhasi kuti havasi kufara nemhirizhonga yakaitika kwaMutare nezuro inonzi yakasiya motokari yaVaChamisa yaboorwa nemabara epfuti. Mhirizhonga yakaitika kwaMutare iyo yanzi naVaBiti yakakonzerwa nebato reZanu PF inouyawo vhiki rimwe chete mushure mekunge VaChamisa vakapwanyirwa mahwindo eimwe motokari yavo kwaCharumbira mudunhu reMasvingo nevari kunzi inhengo dzeZanu PF. VaBiti vati zvakaitika kwaMutare izvi zvaiva zvakanangana nekupfuudza hupenyu hwaVaChamisa. Zvataurwa naVaBiti izvi zvatsinhirwa nemutauriri weMDC Alliance, Muzvare Fadzayi Mahere. VaBiti vakurudzira sangano renyika dziri kuchamhembe kweAfrica reSouthern African Development Community, SADC, kuti rione kuti paitwa nhaurirano pakati paVaChamisa naVaMnangagwa kugadzirisa zviri kunetsa munyika. VaBiti vati nhaurirano idzi hadzifanire kuitwa pasi pegungano rePolitical Actors Dialogue vachiti gungano iri harina charinobatsira. Muzvare Mahere vatiwo nhaurirano pakati paVaMnangagwa naVaChamisa ndidzo dzinogona kupedza mhirizhonga iri kuitika munyika. Asi mutauriri wemutungamiri weMDC-T, VaLloyd Damba, vati matambudziko akatarisana nenyika haasi matambudziko anokwanisa kugadziriswa naVaMnangagwa naVaChamisa vari vaviri chete. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nevakafanobata chigaro chemutauriri weZanu PF, VaMike Bimha, sezvo vanga vachinzi vari mumusangano wePolitburo yebato ravo wanga uchiitirwa pamuzinda webato iri. Asi sachigaro weZanu PF Amai Oppah Muchinguri vati zviri kutaurwa neMDC Alliance izvi ndezvekuda kusvibisa zita reZanu PF pamberi penhumwa yeUnited Nations iri kushanya munyika parizvino. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika, VaRashweat Mukundu, vati mhirizhonga iri kuitwa neZanu PF iri kusiya zita renyika rakasviba panguva iyo nhumwa yeUnited Nations, Amai Alena Douhan, vari munyika vachiongorora nyaya dzekutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu pamwe nekuti zvirango zvakanganisa hupenyu hweveruzhinji zvakadii zvichitevera kukokwa kwavanonzi vakaitwa nemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa. Panyaya yenhaurirano, VaMukundu vati mamwe mapato ose ari muPolad haana basa sezvo mapato aya ane vanhu vashomanana. Asi MDCT inoti nhaurirano pakati paVaMnangagwa naVaMwonzora dzakatotanga zvichitevera kupindurwa kwakaitwa VaMwonzora tsamba yavakanyorera VaMnangagwa vachiti vanoda nhaurirano dzekugadzirisa matambudziko akatarisana nenyika akafanana nezvehupfumi, matongerwo enyika pamwe nenyaya dzesarudzo. No media source currently available
title: MDC Alliance Yoshushikana neMhirizhonga Iri Kuitirwa VaChamisa

text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano dzinoti veruzhinji vanofanirwa kuita zvepabonde vakazvidzivirira kuitira kuti vasabatwe nezvirwere zvepabonde, kana kuti Sexually Transmitted Diseases. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano, Dr Josephat Chiripanyanga, vanoti pane zvirwere zvakawanda zvepabonde zviri kuvhiringa vanhu vakawanda hutano hwavo. Vanoti zvirwere izvi zvinouya nenzira dzakasiyana siyana. Dr Chiripanyanga vanoti chirwere chegonoriya chave nehukasha hunonetsa kurapa mazuva ano. Dr Chiripanyanga vanoti kune chirwere chepabonde chinonzi chancroid. Chirwere ichi chinoita kunge kachigamba kakasonwa kumativi. Dr Chiripanyanga vanoti vanenge vaona kuti vane chirwere ichi, vanofanirwa kuenda kunoona vana chiremba kuitira kuti varapwe nekukurumidza. Dr Chiripanyanga vanoti munhu akaona akuita mhopo kunhengo yesikarudzi, zvinoreva kuti munhu anenge ava nechirwere chepabonde, nokudaro anofanirwa kuenda kuchipatara onoona vana chiremba kuti arapwe. Chiremba ava vanoti kana vanhu vachiita zvepabonde vanofanirwa kuzvidzivirira kuitira kuti vasabatwe nezvirwere zvepabonde. Vanotiwo vanosangana nevanhu vaviri, kana vatatu, pazuva, vanenge vaine zvirwere zvepabonde. Dr Chiripanyanga vanoti vanhu vanofanirwa kushandisa makondomu senzira yekudzivirira zvirwere izvi. Dr Chiripanyanga, avo vanoshanda paChinhoyi Medical Mall, vanoti kana munhu achinge abatwa nezvirwere zvepabonde, anofanirwa kuona vana chiremba nekukurumidza kuitira kuti abatsirwe chirwere chisati chakomba. Mumwe mudzimai anogara kuWestgate, Amai Tracy Mhangami, vanoti zvirwere zvepabonde zviri kuvhiringa hutano hwevanhukadzi vakawanda. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano dzinoti kana vanhu vachinge vatapurirana chirwere chepabonde, vanofanirwa kuenda vose kunoona chiremba, vorapwa pamwe chete. Ongororo yakaitwa nesangano reAVERT richishanda neUnited Nations muna 2017 yakaburitsa kuti munyika mune vanhu vanosvika miriyoni imwe chete nemazana matatu ezviuru vane HIV, uye zviuru mazana manomwe nemakumi mana, vari vanhukadzi.
title: Nyanzvi dzezveHutano Dzokurudzira Vanhu Kuzvidzivirira Kana Vachiita zvepaBonde

text: Mumwe mushandi mumwe chete akashaya vaviri vakakuwadzwa zvakaipisisa mushure metsaona inofungidzirwa kuti vakafema mweya une muchetura wecarbon monoxide. Izvi zvakaitika neSvondo mangwanani mumugodhi weShamva Gold Mine mudunhu reMashonaland Central. Mashoko atatambira anoti mushandi akashaya uyu ndiye aive mukuru wechikwata chaive pasi panguva yakaitika tsaona iyi. Zvinonzi pakadhuurwa matombo mune mumwe mwena pasi pemugodhi uyu neMugovera. Zvinonzi pazoenda chikwata ichi kubasa nemusi weSvondo vakasvikopinda mumugodhi uyu asi vashandi vepasi ava vakaramba kuenda kudivi rakanga radhuurwa matombo iri vachiti mukuru wavo, uyo akazoshaya uyu, atange aenda kunoona kana kwakanga kwave kushandika. Asi zvinonzi mushure mekunge vaona mukuru uyu asina kudzoka vakazodaidza vamwe vakateverako vakawana atove kushaya, vaviri ava vachibva vakuvadzwawo zvakare nemuchetura uyu zvekuti vari muchipatara pari zvino. Mumwe mushandi wepamugodhi uyu ataura neStudio 7, uyo ati anonzi Skinda Mwamba, anoti hupenyu hwevashandi huri munjodzi huru sezvo vasina mbatya dzekushandisa dzinokodzera uye mitemo yekudzivirira njodzi haisi kunyanyotevedzerwa. Mugodhi weShamva Gold Mine unonzi uri pasi pekambani yeMetallon Gold Zimbabwe. Tsaona iyi inodzora ndangariro yezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinodarika makumi maviri zvakafira mune mumwe mugodhi kuSouth Africa gore rapera mushure mekufemawo mweya une muchetura uyu. Taedza kubata mukuru anoona nezvevashandi anzi anonzi VaMadhume asi vadaira foni yavo vati vanga vari pane imwe nhare uye havana kuzodaira zvakare nhare yedu. Tatadzawo zvakare kubata sachigaro wevashandi vepamugodhi uyu, VaGedion Chirwa, asi nhare yavo yanga isingadairwi. Hurongwa hwekuradzikwa kwemushandi uyu hunonzi huchiri kugadzirwa nevemhuri yake. No media source currently available
title: Mushandi Anourayiwa neMuchetura kuMugodhi weShamva Gold Mine

text: Vana chiremba vanoti vari kuenderera mberi nekuramwa mabasa sezvo hurumende iri kukundikana kugadzirisa zvichemo zvavo. Vana chiremba ava vari kupika kuti havasi kuzodzokera kumabasa kudzamara zvichemo zvavo zvagadziriswa. Svondo rino rave retatu vana chiremba ava vachiramwa basa zvisineyi kuti hurumeende yakati vachange vasingapihwe mari dzavo dzemihoro panguva iyo vanenge vachiramwa mabasa. Vana chiremba ava vari kukurudzirawo gurukota rezvehutano, Dr. David Parirenyatwa, kuti vasiye basa sezvo vari kutadza kugadzirisa zviri kunetsa mubazi ravo. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rava Parirenyatwa. Asi mutauriri we Zimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association, Dr Mxolisi Ngwenya, vanoti vari kuyambira hurumende kuti isavhunditsira vanachiremba. No media source currently available
title: Vana Chiremba Vanoti Zviri Nani VaParirenyatwa Vasiye Basa

text: Mufundisi Gilbert Mzenzi Mabasa, vePentecostal Assemblies of Zimbabwe, vanoti vhangeri rehupfumi, kana kuti ‘Prosperity Gospel’, harisi shoko raJesu Kristu asi revanhu vanoshandisa zita raJesu kutora mari dzevanhu. Mufundisi Mabasa vaudza Studio 7 kuti, “Vhangeri rehupfumi rakafanana nemunhu akapfeka ‘hwigi’; hazvirevi kuti ukaisa bvudzi rekutenga mumusoro mako bvudzi iroro nderako.” No media source currently available
title: 'Vhangeri Rehupfumi Harisi Vhangeri raJesu Kristu' - Mufundisi Gilbert Mzenzi Mabasa

text: Vadzidzisi vanonzi varamba mari shomanana yavanga vanzi vapihwe nehurumende zvichiteverera nhaurirano dzakaitwa pakati pevarairidzi nehurumende nezuro. Mamwe masangano anomirira vadzidzisi ari pasi peFederation of Zimbabwe Educators Union, kana kuti FOZEU, anoti haasi kutambira mari shomanana yaavimbiswa nehurumende munhauarirano dzaakaita negurukota rezvedzidzo yepasi VaPaul Mavhima nezuro. Mutungamiri wesangano reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe iro riri pasi peFOZEU, VaTakavafira Zhou, vanoti hurumende yanga yati inoda kuva wedzera mari yavanotambira nezvikamu gumi kubva muzana asi vanoti mari iyi yakafanana nemutero wembwa. VaZhou vanoti vapa hurumende vhiki rimwe chete kugadzirisa zvirikunetsa kana kuti varairidzi voramwa mabasa. VaSifiso Ndlovu vesangano reZimta vanotiwo sangano ravo harisi kutambira zvataurwa nehurumende. Asi mutungamiri wesangano reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, kana kuti ARTUZ, VaObert Masaraure vati kunyange vambenge vakati nhengo dzesangano sangano ravo dzichange dzisiri pabasa panovhurwa zvikoro nhasi, nhengo dzesangano ravo dzichaenda kubasa asi dzichaswera dzichidziya mushana dzisingashande kudzamara hurumende yanzwa zvichemo zvavo. Zvichakadai, VaZhou vati seFOZEU vave kutarisira kuita musangano nemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa.VaMavhima varamba kutaura nezvenyaya iyi vachiti titaure nevePublic Service Commission vachiti harisi basa rehofisi yavo kutaura nezvemari dzevashandi vehurumende. Pakavharwa zvikoro mwedzi wapera vadzidzisi vakati havasi kuzodzokera kumabasa panovhurwa zvikoro nhasi. Asi zvichitevera nhaurirano dzanezuro idzi vanoti vave kupa hurumende mazuva manomwe ekuti inzwe zvichemo zvavo kana kuti voramwa mabasa. Varairidzi vanoti havasati vambowedzerwa mari kubva muna 2013 uye vanoti vanoda kuwedzerwa mari iyi nezvikamu zana kubva muzana vachiti hupenyu hwavawomera pamusoro pekupiwa mari dzekushanda vari kumaruwa (rural allowance) pamwe nemukana wekuenda kurivhi. No media source currently available
title: Vadzidzisi Vanoramba Mari Shoma iri Kuda Kuwedzerwa neHurumende

text: Sachigaro wevechidiki mubato reZanu-PF Youth League mudunhu reManicaland VaMubuso Chinguno vanoti vachatora nechisimba mapurazi evakuru vebato iri vakazvipa mapurazi akawandisa. Vanotiwo kambani inochera mangoda yeZimbabwe Consolidated Diamond Mining Company inofanira kupa mabasa kune vechidiki mudunhu iri. Vechidiki veZanu PF ava vanoti vachaita izvi zvakare kumakanzuru ekumaruwa asiri kuda kuvapa nzvimbo yekuvamba dzimba dzavo pachena. VaChinguno vachitaura pamusangano wevechidiki paBezerley Bridge nemusi weChipiri vakati nguva yakwana yekuti vechidiki mubato ravo reZanu PF avo vanoshandiswa munguva yesarudzo nemashefu vawanewo minda, pekugara pakanaka kungave kumaruwa kana kumaguta. Vatiwo vachatanga nekunonangana nepamuzinda wekambani yemangoda yeZimbabwe Consolidated Diamond Mining apo vachada kuno nzwisisa maitiro avanoita pakupinza vashandi basa nezvimwewo zvakadaro zvinoita kuti vasapa mabasa venharaunda. “Munoziva ano anosapulaya nyama kwaChiadzwa, anosapulaya mahovhorosi, that system must come to an end, we can’t continue like this, I am going to lead a revolution in this province to make sure mayouths are empowered, saka hatidi nyaya yeumbwende hatidi nyaya yevanotya, saka kana tati tsviyo chachaya maCdes handeyi,” VaMubuso vanodaro. VaChinguno vanoti vechidiki havafanirwi kutya kusungwa kana vachiita izvi sezvo vari kurwira kodzero dzavo sevanhu vakavimbiswa zvinhu zvisiri kuzadzikiswa nehutungamiriri hwavo. “Ose mawar veteran’s aya vakagara mujere kusanganisira even naPresident uye ma-ex-detainees vakagara mumajere kwe5-years to 10 years saka ngatisatye kusungwa kana tichifaitira empowerment yedu yatakavimbiswa nemukuru wedu President Mugabe.” Vanoenderera mberi vachiti, “Mayouths anofanirwa kuwana chouviri saka izvi ikodzero yedu, patakaronga One Million March mukuru wedu vaChipanga vakaudzwa nezvepromise yemastands saka isu ndiwo atiri kuti tave kuda manje.” VaChinguno vaenderera mberi vachiti vechidiki vachaita sezvavari kutaura izvi nekuda kwekuti vanoda kuti chidimbu chiri pakati pemakumi manomwe nezvishanu chevashandi vekambani yeZCDC vange vari vagari vedunhu reManicaland kunyanya nharaunda dzakapoteredza minda yemangoda. VaChinguno vanoti vanoda kuti kambani iyi ibatsire nezvinhu zvinosimudzira magariro evanhu venzvimbo iyi kwete kuita zvaiitwa nemamwe makambani akazomiswa kushanda kwaChiadzwa nehurumende. “Chekutanga isusu tiri kuti ZCDC haifanirwi kuita mamistakes akaitwa nanaMbada saka isusu senew company tiri kutarisira kuti 75 percent yevashandi vekambani iyi vange vari vana vekuno uye neManicaland.” VaChinguno vanoenderera mberi vachiti, “Tinoda zvakare kuti vaite social responsibility yekuvakira vagari maclinics uye kupa mishonga yacho, kugadzira maroads uye kuvaka zvikoro kwete zveMbada yaiita zvebhora.” VaChinguno vanoti sevechidiki vachaita toyi-toyi mumakanzuru, pakambani yeZCDC, uye nekuminda yevakuru senzira yekutaridza nyunyuto yavo nekusafamba kuri kuita zvinhu mubato ravo pamwe chete nehurumende. Pamusoro pekunoita toyi-toyi vechidiki muZanu PF vakurudzirwa naVaChinguno kukwikwidza musarudzo dzichaitwa mugore ra2018 muzvigaro zvehukanzura, dare reparamende nezvimwe senzira imwe yekubvisa vatungamiriri vanovakanganwa kana vavhoterwa muzvigaro. “Isusu tinovaitira toyi toyi tichivaimbira nguva dzose pasarudzo tichiti vavhoterwe asi kana zvapera tinoona tave kubatwa sematissue paper anodiwa chete kana munhu achida kuzvibatsira, asi kana izvi zvapera roraswa kure, saka isusu pakuaddressa izvozvo semayouth ngatiise mayouth edu ward by ward timirewo musarudzo tivavhotonere tiisewo vedu muzvigaro kuti nyaya iyi ipere.” VaChinguno vanodaro. Mutauriri weMDC mudunhu reManicaland VaTrevor Saruwaka vanoti chiitiko ichi chinofanirwa kunge chichiitwa nevechidiki vose kwete vebato rimwe chete rezvematongerwo enyika sezviri kuitwa nevechidiki ava. Asi sachigaro wevezvechidiki mubato rinopikisa reMDC inotungamirirwa navaMorgan Tsvangirai kuno kuManicaland VaItai Masaka vanoti kukundikana kwebato reZanu PF pahutungamiriri hwaro kubva pakawanikwa rusununguko. VaMasaka vanoti vechidiki ava vanosungirwa zvakare kuudza vakuru vavo kuti vasiye zvigaro nekuti vakundikana. “Idambudziko reZanu PF nekuti ndiyo yakapromisa vanhu veZimbabwe mabasa 2,2 million kana vaivhotera, sekuno kuManicaland havana mabasa kumangoda. It is the failure of their leaders veZanu PF yekuti iwanire vanhu vose minda, mabasa uye pekugara kunyanya vaMugabe. Nyaya yemamultiple farm owner’s iri kwavari zvakare sanaMushowe, Chinamasa nanaChimene, the youths should tell them kuti they have failed and they have to resign nekuti the ball is in their hands.” Vakadaro VaMasaka VaVictor Edson Mthulisi Dube inyanzvi munyaya dzezvemagariro evanhu uye nezvematongerwo enyika muno maMutare vachishanda vakazvimirira voga. VaDube vanoti danho ririkuda kutorwa nevechidiki veZanu Pf rinofanirwa kunge richipa mukana kune vechidiki vose kwete kutarisa kapoka kavo chete sezvo nhunha dzavo dzakatarisana nevazhinji. Vanoti zvavari kuda kuita izvi zvave zvishoma uye zvanonoka sezvo sarudzo dzave pakona. “Nyaya iripo apa ndeyekuti vechidiki ava vanofanirwa kunge vakaita izvi nguva yapfuura kare ,asi izvezvi vatarisana nenguva yapera apo sarudzo dzave pedyo zvopa kuti donzvo ravo rinentse kuowonekwa.” VaDube vanoenderera mberi vachiti, “Zvakare zvavari kuchemera izvi ishuviro yevese vechidiki yekuda mabasa, mapurazi uye nepekugara mungave mumaguta kana kumaruwa; asi ngavaite izvi vachiziva kuti izvi ndizvo zvagara zvichichemerwa nenyika yose” Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kubata VaChris Mushowe avo vari kupomerwawo mhosva naVaChinguno yekunzi vane mapurazi akawandisa anosanganisira kuKondozi ine mahekita zviuru zvitatu, kwaOdzi, kuBurma Valley ine mazana mahekita mazana, kupurazi reNyamajura rine mahekita mazana mana nepurazi reDonhoro rine mahekita mazana matanhatu kuClare kuManicaland. Bato reZanu-PF rainge ravimbisa munguva yesarudzo kuti richawanira vanhu mabasa anodarika mamiriyoni maviri asi zvakakona n’anga murapwa achida. No media source currently available  .
title: VeChidiki veZanu-PF Vanoti Vacharatidzira Vachishora Zviri Kuitwa neBato Ravo kuManicaland

text: Dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dzaparura chirongwa chekuongorora pachena zvinodhaka mumiviri memunhu kuyedza kupedza dambudziko ratekeshera munyika rekushandiswa kwezvinodhaka. Chirongwa ichi chinonzi Abused Substances Diagnostics & Manangement Project chichapa vanhu zvikwanisiro kana kuti (test kits) ekuona mhando yezvinodhaka zvinenge zvashandiswa. Vachitaura pachiitiko ichi, vaFanwell Dzoma vanoshanda kubazi rinoona nezvevashandi uye vataura vakamiririra mushandirapamwe wemapazi ehurumende mukuedza kupedza dambudziko rekushandiswa kwezvinodhaka kana kuti Inter-ministerial Taskforce on Drug and Substance Abuse varumbidza zvikuru chirongwa chaparurwa ichi. VaDzoma vati ongororo yakaitwa munyika irikuratidza kuti zvikamu zvinodarika makumi mashanu nechimwe kubva muzana zvevechidiki chirikushandisa zvinodhaka. Vachange vachitungamirira chirongwa ichi, nyanzvi munezvehutano uye vari mukuru weDepartment of Chemical Pathology paUniversity of Zimbabwe School of Medicine, Muzvinafundo Hilda Matarira vati chakanakira chirongwa ichi ndechekuti munhu anozviongorora ega. VaJacob Shamuyarira, avo vakamboshandisawo zvinodhaka vakazovamba sangano rakazvimiririra rinonzi Pamumvuri rinobatsirawo vanoshandisa zvinodhaka varumbidzawo chirongwa ichi. Muzvare Chengeto Nyanzira vanoshanda nekambani yeFaStep inova kambani ichange ichiwanisa zvekuongoreresa zvinodhaka izvi vati vanhu vachazviongorora vachishandisa weti yavo. Pasi pechirongwa ichi pachaitwawo dzidziso yekukurudzira vanhu kuti vasashandise zvinodhaka izvio zvinozokanganisa hupenyu hwavo vamwe vachifa kana kupenga. Masangano akasiyana siyana abatana muchirongwa ichi anosanganisira hurumende, University of Zimbabwe Health Sciences, Zimbabwe College of Pathology, FaStep, Pamumvuri nemamwe. No media source currently available
title: Nyanzvi Dzoparura Chirongwa Chekubatsira Vanoshandisa Zvinodhaka Pachena

text: Mubatanidzwa wemapato anopikisa weNational Electoral Reform Agenda, Nera, unoti wakagutsikana nehurongwa hweZimbabwe Electoral Commission, Zec, hwekuyedzwa kwemichina yekunyoresa vanhu kuvhota ye biometric voter registration, BVR, hwakaitwa svondo rapera. Mutauriri weNera, VaDouglas Mwonzora, vanove zvakare munyori mukuru webato reMDC T, vanoti kunyange hazvo vakagutsikana nezvavakaona kusvika pari zvino, vane zvinyunyuto gumi nezviviri zvinosanganisira zvekuti pachachengeterwa zvinenge zvabva mukunyoreswa kwevanhu kana kuti servers, zvichabvepi. VaMwonzora vanotiwo vachada kuziva kuti michina iyi ichange ichichengeterwa kupi, uye vanodawo kuti vamiriri vemapato vange varipowo pose panenge pachinyoreswa vavhoti. Makambani maviri akabudirira anoti Laxton Group yekuChina neDermalog Identification Systems yekuGermany ndiwo akarakidza mashandiro emichina yawo, saka zvasarira Zec ichishanda neState Procurement Board kuti vasarudze kambani inenge yakabudirira. No media source currently available
title: Nera Inoti Yakagutswa neHurongwa hweBVR, Asi Ine Zvimwe Zvinyunyuto

text: Muzvare Lynda Masarira vesangano reTajamuka vanoti hapana chabuda pamusangano wavakaita nagavhuna weRBZ Dr John Mangudya avo vati mabond notes ari kuzoparurwa mukupera kwemwedzi uno, uye ari kudhindwa kunze kwenyika. Sangano reTajamuka rakakumbira musangano naVaMangudya kuti vanzwisise nyaya yema bond notes vakamirira veruzhinji asi kunyangwe zvazvo vakatambirwa kumahofisi eRBZ nhengo dzavo gumi chete ndidzo dzakapinda mukati vamwe vakarambidzwa. ​Muzvare Masarira vanoti havana kufara nemafambiro aita musangano uyu nekuti vabuda vasina chavawana pachikumbiro chavo chekuti mabond notes ambomirwa sezvo achakanganisa mararamiro everuzhinji munyika kunyanya vanorarama nekutengesa zvinhu. "Ndarwadziwa nekuti pane zvese zvatapa sezvikumbiro hapana chatambirwa uye tatoudzwa kuti chirongwa chemabond notes chiri kuenderera mberi kupera kwemwedzi uno," Muzvare Masarira vaudza Studio 7. Vanotiwo shuwiro yavo ndeyekuti veruzhinji vasatambire mabond notes. VeTajamuka nevamwe vanoti vacharatidzira svondo rinouya vachiti havasi kusafara nenyaya yemabond notes. "Tichange tichienda mumugwagwa svondo rinouya ticharatidza kusafara kwedu nemabond notes," Muzvare Masarira vaudza Studio 7. VaMangudya vanonzi vatsika madziro vachiti mabond notes achatoparurwa kupera kwemwedzi uno. Muzvare Masarira vanoti vabvunzawo nezve nyaya iri kubuda mumapepanhau yekuti mabond notes ave kutodhindwa zvisiri pamutemo asi VaMangudya vanonzi vati vanenge vaoona mabond notes ari kunzi akadhindwa aya vaman'are kumapurisa. No media source currently available
title: VeTajamuka Vanoti Hapana Chabuda paMusangano Wavaita naGavhuna weRBZ VaMangudya nezvemaBond Notes.

text: Vakafanobata chigaro chemutungamiri webato reNational People’s Party (NPP), Amai Joice Mujuru, vanoti hapana chakaipa nekuda kwavo kutungamirira mubatanidzwa wemapato kuitira kuti vabvise VaMugabe pachigaro chekutungamira nyika musarudzo dzegore rinouya. Vachitaura neChipiri kwaZvimba pakuvigwa kwaamai vemuchengetedzi wavo kwaZvimba, Amai Mujuru vati nhengo dzavo dziri kuvakurudzira kuti vamisidzane naVaMugabe musarudzo dzegore rinouya. Amai Mujuru vati ivo vanoda kukwikwidza musarudzo dzegore rinouya vachiti hapana chakaipa nekushuwira kutungamira mubatanidzwa wemapato sezvo zvisingarambidzwe. Amai Mujuru vati zvinoratidza kuitwa kwejekerere sezvo pasati pasarudzwa munhu achatungamira mubatanidzwa wemapato. Amai Mujuru vati kutungamira kwavo kwakanakira mubatanidzwa sezvo vaine vatsigiri kubva kumauto, mapurisa pamwe nekune vanhu vakagariswa patsva. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzematongerwo enyika, uye vari mukuru wesangano ravana chipangamazano re Zimbabwe Democracy Institute, VaPedzisayi Ruhanya, vanoti zviri kutaura Amai Mujuru hazvina maturo nekuti simba rekuve mutungamiri wehurumende rinobva kuvanhu kwete kumauto. VaRuhanya vanoti zviri kutaura Amai Mujuru zvekuti vanotsigirwa nedzimwe nhengo dzechiuto nemapurisa hachisi chokwadi chizere sezvo pavakadzingwa mubato reZanu PF hapana wemuchiuto kana kumapurisa akasimudza musoro. Nyaya yemubatanidzwa wemapato yave kukonzera mutauro munyika zvichitevera kutaura kwevakuru vemapato pamusoro peachatungamira mubatanidzwa uyu. Masvondo maviri apera mutungamiri webato reMDC, VaMorgan Tsvangirai, vakayambira vatungamiri vemapato kuti vasarwire zvigaro. Zviri pachena muMDC kuti vatsigiri vaVaTsvangirai vari kuti VaTsvangirai ndivo vanofanirwa kutungamira mubatanidzwa nekuti MDC-T ndiro bato guru rinopikisa, uye rine nhengo dzakawanda muparamende, kana zvichienzaniswa nemamwe mapato. Mushure meMDC-T, mune MDC inotungamirwa naVaWelshman Ncube, iyo ine nhengo muparamemnde. No media source currently available
title: Amai Mujuru Vanoti Ndivo Vane Mukana Wekuita Mutungamiri weMubatanidzwa weMapato

text: Vanhu makumi maviri nevasere (28) vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 nezuro, uye vanhu chiuru chimwe chete chinemazana matatu nemakumi matatu nemumwe chete (1,331), vakabatwa nechirwere ichi nezuro wakare. Ichiburitsa nezuro manheru zvakabuda muongororo yayo nezuro munyika yose, hurumende yakazivisa kuti vanhu vafa nechirwere munyika yose vava chiuru nemazana manomwe nemakumi masere nevapfumbamwe (1,789), uye vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika yose vava zviuru makumi mana nezvipfumbamwe zvine mazana masere anemakumi matanhatu nevana (49,864). Nyanzvi mune zvehutano, Dr Simbiso Ranga, vaudza Studio 7 kuti kukwira kwehuwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa pamwe nekufa neCovid-19 kuri kukonzerwa nenguva yekutonhora pamwe nehukasha hwechirwere ichi, hwe’Third Wave’. Dr Ranga, avo vanoshanda muNorth Carolina sachiremba, vanotiwo vanhu vabaiwa nhomba yeCovid-19 muZimbabwe vashoma zvikuru. Hurumende yakazivisa nezuro kuti vanhu vabaiwa nhomba yekutanga vava zviuru mazana manomwe nemakumi manomwe nezvinomwe nezana nemakumi mashanu nemumwe (777,151), uye vabaiwa nhomba yepiri vava zvuru mazana mashanu nemakumi mashanu nezvishanu nemazana maviri nemakumi manomwe nevanomwe (555 277). Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi, kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana (60%) senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi. Asi Dr Ranga vanoti huwandu hwevanhu vari kubaiwa nhomba hunofanira kukwira zvakanyanya zuva nezuva kuitira kuti vanhu vakawanda vabaiwe nhomba kaviri sezvinotarisirwa. No media source currently available
title: Chirwere cheCovid -19 Chakauraya Vanhu Makumi Maviri neVasere Nezuro

text: Zimbabwe pamwe neU.N. Refuge Agency neUNHRC, vari kuparura chirongwa chekuedza kumisa kuparadzwa kwemasango uye kuwana cheuviri kubva mukushandiswa kwetsvina panzvimbo huru inochengeterwa vapoteri iri munyika iyi. Kamba yevapoteri yeTongogara iri pedyo nemuganhu weZimbabwe neMozambique yakaisira vapoteri michina inoshandura ndove yemhuka kuve gasi, rinogona kushandiswa mukubika, uye kuve fotereza. VaDominic Katumbayi, mumwe wevapoteri vari pakamba yevapoteri yeTongogara , vave kushandisa fotereze inobva mundove yemhuka muzvirimwa zvavo. “Tisati tave kushandisa izvi raitove dambudziko, nekuti fotereza unotenga, asi iyi ndeyemahara. Zuva roga roga ndinokwanisa kugadzira marita anodarika mazana matatu efotereza. Iye zvino zvave nyore, munhu wese anokwanisa kuuya achitora achiisa mugadheni.” Fotereza iyi chigadzirwa chinobva mundove yemhuka mushure mekunge yavira iri mumichina yekugadzira gasi rinobva mundove. Gasi iri rinowaniswa pachena kuvapoteri ava, vamwe vacho vanorishandisa kubika. Amai Francine Kayumba, saVaKatumbayi, vanobva kuDemocratic Republic of Congo. “Tave kushandisa gasi nekuti rine uye riri nani kuti hariburitse hutsi. Kana wakaisa poto yako pamoto wegasi inoramba yakachena.” Chikwata cheWater, Sanitation neHygiene che UNHCR chiri muZimbabwe chinoti chakatanga chirongwa ichi mushure mekuona kuti vapoteri vainetseka kurasa ndove yezvipfuwo zvavo pakamba iyi. “Tave kufunga kuichengetedza nenzira yakanaka ndipo patakabuda nepfungwa ye gasi rinobva mundove yenguruve senzira yekuchengetedza (ndove yemhuka). Uye gore rino, takatanga nechirongwa chegasi rinobva mundove yemhuka iri.” Hurumende inotarisira kuwana mari yakawanda yekuwedzera chirongwa ichi pakamba yevapoteri iyi, iyo ine vanhu vangangoda kusvika zviuru makumi maviri, kana kuti 20,000. “Chirongwa chegasi rinobva mundove ichi chinochengetedza mari chakanangana nekuona kuti vapoteri vawana mhando yemoto yakachena. Vapoteri vanoiswa munzira itsva dzekuwana nadzo mafuta kana mhando yemoto yakachena. Nekudaro kwatiri chinhu chakataobatsira vagary zvakanyanya.” Zimbabwe inoti chirongwa ichi chichabatsira kuderedza dambudziko rekuparadzwa kwemasango ari pedyo nekamba yevapoteri yeTongogara. Vakuru vehurumende vanoti Zimbabwe iri kurasikirwa nemahekita anosvikwa mazana matatu nemakumi matatu ezviuru, kana kuti 330 000, zvemasango gore roga roga, mamwe acho kuburikidza nekuparadzwa pachitsvagwa huni.
title: Zimbabwe, U.N. Refuge Agency neUNHRC, Vanoparura Chirongwa Chekuedza Kumisa Kuparadzwa kweMasango paKamba yeVapoteri yeTongogara

text: Mhuri yeZimbabwe iri muCanada iri pasi pesangano rePachedu Zimbabwe neMugovera uno iri kuungana muToronto ichitenda pamwe nekuremekedza zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviviri zvakasimudzira nhabvu munyika zvinoti Bruce Grobbelaar naByron Manuel, avo vari muCanada pari zvino. Mumwe wevari kutungamira hurongwa uhwu, Darlington Choto, uyo akambotambawo nhabvu kuchikwata cheCaps United, anoti chinangwa chavo ndechekutenda basa rakaitwa nevarume vaviri ava, uye havasi kuzomirira pane vaviri ava chete. "Hatisi kungotarisa vanhu vanotamba nhabvu chete, tiri kutarisawo nevamwe vanenge vakaita zvakanaka kana mudzidzo, vanenge vakaita zvakanaka mune zvimwe zvakasiyanasiyana," Choto anodaro. Choto anoti vacharemekedza zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvakasimudzira nyika nenzira dzakasiyanasiyana, kwete nhabvu chete. Grobbelaar akaita mukurumbira achibatira zvikwata zvinosanganisira chenyika munguva yeRhodesia pamwe nekunge nyika yawana kuzvitonga kuzere. Akatambirawo zvikwata zvemunyika zvinoti Highlanders neChibuku Shumba asati aenda mhiri kwemakungwa uko kwaakaita mukurumbira kwazvo achitambira chikwata cheLiverpool asati aendawo kune zvimwe zvakawanda ikoko. Byron Manuel, uyo aizivikanwawo neremadunhurirwa rekuti “Piripiri”, akaitawo mukurumbira achitambira zvikwata zvinoti Chibuku Shumba, icho chakazoshandura zita kuti Black Aces pamwe neRiodairibord. Choto anoti zvakakosha kwazvo kuti vana veZimbabwe vari kunze kwenyika vashandise mikana yavari kuwana mukusimudzira nyika pamwe nekutenda mabasa akaitwawo nevaive mberi kwavo. No media source currently available
title: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe Zviri kuCanada Zvoremekedza Shasha dzeNhabvu, Grobbelaar naManuel

text: Sangano reZimbabwe Catholic Bishop’s Conference raburitsa tsamba yakanangana nesarudzo dzegore rinouya kana kuti “Pastoral Letter of the Zimbabwe Catholic Bishops On Preparing for the Zimbabwe 2018 National Elections.” Mutsamba iyi, mabishopu ekereke iyi ayambira kuti sarudzo dzine mhirizhonga dzinopa kuti Zimbabwe ishorwe nedzimwe nyika uye kupa kuti vanhu vashaye chivimbo nesarudzo. Nekudaro mabhishopu aya ari kukurudzira kuti sarudzo dziitwe murunyararo uye kuti hurumende ivandudze mitemo yose yesarudzo. Mitemo yesarudzo iyi inosanganisira kunyoresa vanhu kuvhota nekuvadzidzisa nezvesarudzo, uye kuti madzishe nemasabhuku asapindire musarudzo, pamwe nenyaya yekuti mapato ose awaniswe mukana panhepfenyuro nemumapepanhau ehurumende. Sangano iri rakurudziravo vanhu kuti varume rurimi kana vofunga kutaura mashoko ekunyomba kana kutuka vemamwe mapato ezvematongerwo enyika. Panyaya yemhirizhonga, vakuru vemakereke ava vati ngoromera harivake musha. Mabishopu ati vanhu vangwarirewo pakuvhota nekuti muromo hauzarirwe nerwizi sezvo vamwe vanhu vachingovimbisa zvinhu zvavasingakwanise kuita. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika vachidzidzisa paMulungushi University kuZambia, VaShakespear Hamauswa, vanoti vemakereke vaita zvakanaka kuyambira nyika nezvekutyora kodzero dzevanhu.
title: Mabhishopu eRoman Catholic Okurudzira Sarudzo Dzakachena Munyika

text: Vanhu vakawanda vakuvara kunhandare yeRufaro meshure mekunge zviuru zvevanhu zvatsikirirana zvichimhanyira kundoona mutumbi wevaimbove mutungamiriri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, munhandare yeRufaro. Mutumbi waVaMugabe waendeswa kunhandare yeRufaro Stadium kuMbare uko vakatora mhiko yekutungamira nyika muna 1980. Mutumbi wasvika munhandare uri muchikopokopo chemauto reZimbabwe National Army. Mushure memunamato, mudzimai waVaMugabe, Amai Grace Mugabe, nevana vavo ndivo vatanga kuona mutumbi waVaMugabe. Kwazotevera, vehukama, makurukota ehurumende nevanyarikana uye mushure meizvozvo munhu wese ange ari munhare apihwa mukana wekuona mutumbi. Pakutanga vanhu vange vachifamba zvakanaka vari mumutsetse asi mushure mechinguva vanhu vazopinda vakawandaizvo zvakonzera kukuvara kwevanhu vakawanda. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kumapurisa kuti vanhu vangani vakuvara. Chirongwa ichi chambomiswa uye pazosheedzwa mapurisa anodzivirira nyonga nyonga kuzogadzirisa zvinhu izvo zvazoita kuti chirongwa ichi chienderere mberi. Mumwe musikana wechidiki uyo ati anonzi MaTshuma audza Studio 7 mushure mekuona mutumbi waVaMugabe kuti arwadziwa zvikuru kuparadzana naVaMugabe. Vaimbomirira Mbare mudare reNational Assembly, VaTendai Savanhu, vataurawo neStudio 7 mushure mekuona mutumbi waVaMugabe vachiti vadzimbikana zvikuru. Dr Paul Chimedza, avo vakambomirira Gutu South muparamende, vaudza Studio7 kuti vafara zvikuru kuwana mukana wekuparadzana naVaMugabe vachiti vanotenda basa guru ravakaita mukusimudzira hupenyu hwavo. Mutumbi waVaMugabe uchange uri kuRufaro Stadium zvekare mangwana kuti veruzhinji vawonekane navo.
title: Vanhu Vanokuvara Vachida Kuona Mutumbi waVaMugabe

text: Mubatanidzwa weMDC AlIiance uri kugadzirira kuita misangano mudunhu reManicaland kubva neMugovera mangwanani kusvika musi weSvondo. Misangano iyi yakanangana nekutsvaga rutsigiro musarudzo dziri kuuya. Mutungamiriri webato reMDC-T uye vari ivo vachamirira mubatanidzwa uyu musarudzo dzemutungamiri wenyika, VaNelson Chamisa, vanotarisirwa kunge vachitaura pamisangano ichaitwa kuBuhera, neMugovera mangwanani, kwaMakoni neMugovera masikati, uye kuBocha, kwaMarange, neMusi we Svondo. Murongi wemisanagano mubato reMDC-T rinotungamirirwa naVaChamisa, VaAmos Chibaya, vanoti VaChamisa vari kungosvika kuZimbabwe vachibva kuBritain kwavanga vachishanya, vachikaka rwendo rwekuManicaland kunoita misangano iyi. No media source currently available
title: Chitima cheMubatanidzwa weMDC Alliance Chonanga kuManicaland

text: Mutungamiri weMDC VaNelson Chamisa vashanyira chipatara cheWilkins muHarare icho chinorapwa vanenge vabatwa nezvirwere zvekutapurirana zvakaita secoronavirus.  Vachitaura neStudio 7 pavapedza kushanyira chipatara ichi, VaChamisa vashorawo gurukota rinoona nezvekudzivirirwa kwenyika Amai Oppah Muchinguri Kashiri zvekuti vakabatwa necoronavirus vari kurangwa nekuda kwekutemera Zimbabwe zvirango. Vati mashoko aya anoratidza kushaya hany'a nerufu rwevanhu.  Hatina kukwanisa kubata Amai Muchinguri Kashiri kuti tinzwe divi ravo asi vakataura mashoko aya kuMashonaland West nemusi weSvondo.  VaChamisa vanoti vari kuda kuti makanzuru ose ari pasi pebato ravo aite gadziriro yepamusoro soro kuitira kudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi.  Pavashanyira chipatara ichi, VaChamisa vachiperekedzwa nameya weguta reHarare VaHerbert Gomba.  . No media source currently available
title: VaChamisa Voshora Amai Muchinguri Kashiri paNyaya yeCoronavirus

text: Sangano rinomirira varimi reZimbabwe Commercial Farmers’ Union, ZFCU, riri kukurudzira varimi vakawana zvikwanisiro kubva kuchirongwa chehurumende chekubatsira varimi cheCommand agriculture kuti vashandise nemazvo rubatsiro urwu. Kurudziro iyi inouya zvichitevera yambiro yapiwa nevakafanobata chigaro chemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa yekuti varimi vanenge vakapfachura zvikwanisiro izvi vachatorerwa matanhoakaomarara. Mutungamiri weZFCU, VaPaul Zakariya vanoti zvakakosha zvikuru kuti varimi vavimbike sezvo izvi zvichizovabatsirawo mune remangwana kuti vazowana zvakare rubatsiro. Vamwe varimi vari kupomerwa mhosva yekutengesa mbeu nefotereza zvavakawana kubva kuchirongwa ichi. Chirongwa ichi chakaparurwa nehurumende pakati pegore nechinangwa chekuti nyika ikwanise kuzvirimira chkafu chinoikwanira. Varimi vanosvika zviuru zviviri vakapinda muchirongwa ichi, murimi oga oga achitarisirwa kukohwa chiuru chematani echibage. Murimi uyu anozoendesa matanu mashanu pahekita yogayoga kuhurumende senzira yekubhadhara nayo chikwereri chake. Asi VaZakariya vanoti havaoni varimi vose vachizokwanisa kudzosera zvikwereti izvi nekuda kwezvikonzero zvakasiyanasiyana, zvinosanganisira zvekuti havasi varimiri vose vakawana zvose zvaipiwa nehurumende.
title: Varimi Vokurudzirwa Kuvimbika muKubhadhara Zvikwereti Zvavo

text: Bato reMDC-T rinoti sezvo mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vadzoka munyika, vanofanirwa kuita musangano wechimbichimbi nemakurukota avo kuti vatsvage mazano ekurwisana nenzara iyo yapfunya chisero munyuka. VaMugabe vakadzoka munyika nemusi weChishanu nemhuri yavo vachibva kuzororo ravo repagore. Mutungamiri weMDC-T VaObert Gutu vanoti kunyangwe paine zvakawanda zvinofanirwa kukosheswa nehurumende, nyaya yenzara ndiyo inofanirwa kugadziriswa nekukurumidza nekuti vanhu vanogona kuenda kwamupfiga nebwe nenyaya yenzara. Asi VaGutu vatiwo VaMugabe vave kuremerwa nemutoro wekutungamira nyika nekudaro vanofanira kuenda pamudyandigere. No media source currently available Sezvo tichitema tisina divi ratinorerekera tabatawo nhengo yePolitburo yeZanu-PF VaMunyaradzi Paul Mangwana avo vati veMDC-T havana simba rekuudza VaMugabe zvekuita. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, kurwisana kuri kuenderera mberi mubato reZanu-PF pakati pechikwata cheG40 nechimwe chinonzi chinotsigira mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa. Gurukota rinoona nenyaya dzevakarwa hondo yerusuunguko VaChris Mutsvangwa, avo vanonzi vari muchikwata chaVaMnangagwa vaudza vebepanhau reNewsday kuti kurwisana kwavo nechikwata che G40 kwanyanyisa nekuti chikwata ichi chava kuda kufurira nekuisa muchikona mavo mudzimai waVaMugabe, amai Grace Mugabe. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika VaBlessing Vava vanoti havaone VaMugabe vachigadzirisa matambudziko ari mubato ravo.
title: MDC-T Inoti VaMugabe Ngavagadzirise Nyaya yeChikafu neChimbi Chimbi

text: Vechidiki vari kutanga kuvhota gore rino vanoti vanovimba kuti vhoti yavo ichaunza shanduka munyika. Vechidiki ava vanoti vaneta nehurovha kubva pavakapedza zvidzidzo zvavo nekudaro vanotarisira kuti mutungamiri wavachavhotera achakwanisa kuvandudza hupfumi izvo zvichaita kuti mabhizinisi atange kushanda zvichavapa mabasa. Mumwe wevechidiki, VaHuxley Briet, avo vanogara mumusha weveruzhinji weGunhill, vanoti vakafunga zvekunyoresa kuti vavhote kekutanga sezvo kukura kwavo kwose vaingonzwa vanhu vakawanda vachichemachema kuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka munyaya dzezvehupfumi. VaBriet vanoti vakafunga kuti vanhu vakanovhota vakawanda zvinounza shanduko inodiwa neveruzhinji munyika. VaBriet vanoti vachavhotera mutungamiri anonzwa nekugadzirisa zvichemo zvevanhu. Mumwe wevechidiki, VaLiberty Mukosiwa, ane chivimbo chekuti mutungamiri waachavhotera anokwanisa kugadzirisa nyaya dzehupfumi kuti vanhu vawane mabasa. VaMukosiwa vanoti vanoda mutungamiri anokwanisa kupinda muvanhu achinzwa zvichemo zvavo nekuzvigadzirisa. VaOwen Gorejena vanogara mumusha weveruzhinji weChikonohono. VaGorejena vanoti nguva yasvika yekuti havafanirwe kuramba vachikumirwa semombe yemavhu. VaGorejena vanoti rwendo rwuno vari kunovhotera mutungamiri kwete zvekusarudzirwa vatungamiri ivo vasinga vhote. VaGorejena vanoti vane chivimbo chekuti mutungamiri wavachavhotera anokwanisa kuchinji zvehupfumi izvo zvichavapa mabasa uye anodiwa kwete naivo voga asi nevakawanda munyika. Mumwe wechidiki anoda kuzivikanwa nezita rekuti Boss Mugo anoti kushanduka kwakaita hutungamiri munyika gore rapera muna Mbudzi kwakasimudzira tariro yekuti zvinhu zvinogona kushanduka munyika zvinoda vanhu. Boss Mugo anoti kushanduka kwakaita zvinhu munyika ndiko kwakaita kuti anyorese kuvhota netarisiro yekuti zvinhu zvichaenderera mberi zvichishanduka. Kunyange hazvo vechidiki vari ivo vakawanda munyika wongororo yakaitwa inoratidza kuti vashoma vavo ndivo vanoenda kunovhota. No media source currently available
title: Vechidiki Vari Kuvhota Vanoti Vachavhotera Shanduko Munyika

text: Muzinda weZimbabwe muBotswana neMuvhuro wakaita musangano wekukurudzira kuti zvirango zvakatemerwa vamwe vakuru muhurumende nemakambani avanodyidzaba nawo zvibviswe vachiti zvakanganisa hupfumi hwenyika. Asi vebato guru rinopikisa reMDC Alliance varatidzira panze pemuzinda uyu muGaberone vachiti nyaya yehuori nekutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu ndiyo yapa kuti Zimbabwe iite seyakageza negoka munyama. Vapinda mumusangano uyu vanosanganisira vamiriri vedzimwe nyika kubva kuChina, Russia meSaharawi Republic. Musangano uyu unotevera chisungo cheSADC gore rapera kuTanzania kuti nyika dzemugungano iri nemuAfrica dzibatane mukurwisa zvirango izvo zvinonzi nemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa zvakanangana nekupidigura hurumende yavo. Asi vatsigiri veMDC Alliance varatidzira panze pemuzinda weZimbabwe vanosanganisira murongi wemabasa VaTaurai Mavhoko vati chapa kuti hupfumi hwenyika huende kumawere inyaya yekutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu nehurumende yaVaMnangagwa. VaMavhoko vaenderera mberi vachiti kuremekedzwa kwekodzero dzevanhu ndiko chete kungakwezva vana muzvinabhizinesi kuti vauye kuzouchika mari muZimbabwe Mumwe ange achiratidzira mukuru wekufambiswa kwezvirongwa musangano reZimbabwe Network for Social Justice kana kuti ZimJustice VaTendai Mbofana vanoti SADC mukumira neZimbabwe iri kupesvedzera kutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu. Asi mumiriri weZimbabwe muBotswana VaHenry Batiraishe Mukonoweshuro vaudza Studio7 kuti kuratidzira kwaita nevatsigiri veMDC Alliance kwashaya mutsindo nokuti pasi rose riri kumira neZimbabwe panyaya yezvirango. Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chauya kuzocherechedza zuva iri ndiMuzvare Edith Kurwakumire avo vanoti hunhu hweMDC ndihwo huri kuita kuti zvirango zvisabviswe. Kunyangwe hurumende iri kuti zvirango zvakatemerwa vamwe vakuru neAmerica, Britain nesangano reEU zvauraya nyika mumirii weAmerica muZimbabwe VaBrian Nichols uye mumiri weBritain muZimbabwe Amai Melanie Robinson vanoti nyaya yehuori ndiyo iri kupa kuti zvinhu zviite manyama amire muZimbabwe vashandi vachiramwa mabasa uye vakunze vachitadza kuzovamba mabhizimisi munyika nekuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka. Amai Robinson vati vanhu vemuZimbabwe vanofanira kusungunuka kutaura nyaya dzehuori uye vanotyora kodzero dzevanhu vanofanira kusungwa. No media source currently available
title: MDC Alliance Yoratidzira kuBotswana Ichiti Kutyora Kodzero dzeVanhu Kwete Zvirango Kwauraya Nyika

text: Mutungamiri wenyika yeEgypt VaAbdel-Fattah El-Sissi avo vakauya pachigaro vachiita zvekupidigura hurumende ndivo vakasarudzwa kuita sachigaro weAfrican Union vachitevedzerwa nemutungamiri weSouth Africa VaCyril Ramaphosa avo vachatora chigaro chekutungamira gore rinouya. Asi masangano anorwira kodzero dzevanhu akaita seAmnesty International anoti VaEl Sissi vachadzosera kumashure zvakanyanya nyaya dzekuremekedzwa kwekodzero dzevanhu muAfrica. AU iri kushorwa nemamwe masangano akawanda nenyaya yairi kupomerwa yekunzi iri kutadza kugadzirisa matambudziko ari muZimbabwe, DRC neSudan umo musina kugadzikana. Egypt inonziwo iri pakati penyika dzinotyora kodzero dzevanhu zvakanyanya. Nyaya yeZimbabwe yakakurukurwawo hayo kumucheto wemusangano weAU uyu sezvo sachigaro weSADC vari mutungamiri weNamibia VaHage Geingob vakati vaida kunzwa mamiriro ezvinhu kubva kuvatungamiri veZimbabwe neDRC. Vachitaurawo pamusangano uyu, mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vakakurudzira AU kuti izvimirire kwete kurarama nemari dzekukumbira nyika dzakabudirira. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika VaEarnest Mudzengi, mukuru weMedia Centre vanoti havo vanasachigaro weAU havana zvakawanda zvavanoita vasina kutenderana nevamwe. No media source currently available
title: African Union Yotarisirwa Kupedza Musangano Wayo wePagore Nhasi

text: Mutungamiri webato guru rinopikisa muMozambique, reRENAMO, VaAfonso Dhlakama, vanonzi vakashaya neChina. VaDhlakama, avo vanga vave nemakore makumi matanhatu nemashanu ekuberekwa, vanonzi vakashayira kumba kwavo kuGorongoza muMozambique makare, kunyange hazvo chakavauraya chisati chanyatsozivikanwa. VaDhlakama vakatungamira bato reRENAMO kwemakore makumi matatu nemapfumbamwe muhondo yebato iri yekurwisana nehurumende yeMozambique. Iyo yakaurayisa zviuru nezviuru zvevanhu munyika iyi, pamwe nemazana evanhu muZimbabwe. Vazhinji vevanhu vari kumuganhu kweMozambique neZimbabwe vaipota vachitizira muZimbabwe kana hondo yenyika iyi yanyanya kupisa. Nyanzvi mune zvepamtongerwo enyika, VaFarai Maguwu, vanoti kushaya kwaVaDhlakama kunorwadza pachitariswa basa ravaibata sebato rinopikisa muMozambique, kunyangewo hazvo bato ravo rakakonzeresa kufa kwevanhu vakawanda.
title: Mutungamiri weRENAMO, VaAfonso Dhlakama, Vanoshaya

text: MDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa inoti iri kubatana mukuchema nhengo dzayo mbiri, VaPaul Rukanda naVaTafadzwa Mhundwa, avo vakashaya nezuro manheru mutsaona yemotokari kuKwekwe. Tsaona iyi yakakuvadzawo mumiriri weGlen View South muparamende, Amai Vimbai Tsvangirai-Java, pamwe nasachigaro wemadzimai ebato muHarare West, Amai Muringani. VaRukanda, avo vaibatsira Amai Tsvangirai-Java kutsvaga rutsigiro, ndivo vaive murongi wemusangano mudunhu reGlen View South. VaMhundwa, avo vaive hanzvadzi yamushakabvu Amai Susan Tsvangirai, ndivo vaive mutevedzeri wasachigaro muWard 7 ku Mt. Pleasant. Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vaburitsawo mashoko ekunyaradza mhuri dzarasikirwa nehama mutsaona iyi. Vachinyora paTwitter, VaMnangagwa vati vane hurombo zvikuru nekushaya kwevaviri ava, pamwe nevamwe vaviri vakakuwara, vachiti ndangariro dzavo dziri kumhuri dzavo. Vatiwo vari kubatana nemhuri yekwaTsvangirai pamwe nenyika yose mukunamatira kuti Amai Tsvangirai-Java vakurumidze kunaya. Vana ava vaibva kuBulawayo mushure memusangano wekutsvaga rutsigiro pamberi pekongiresi yebato svondo rinouya. Amai Tsvangirai-Java vari kuda kukwikwidza kuve munyori weboka remadzimai. Mutauriri weMDC, VaJacob Mafume, vanoti mapurisa chiri kuferefeta chakakonzera tsaona iyi, asi vanoti ruzivo rwavanga vave nahwo panguva yataenda pamhepo nderwekuti paine mumwe mutyairi aida kupfuura imwe motokari zvakaita kuti arovane nemotokari yaive naAmai Tsvangirai-Java. VaMafume vanotiwo vanga vasati vagara pasi nevemhuri dzevakashaya mutsaona iyi kuti vanzwe hurongwa hwemafambiro achaitazvinhu, asi vanoti vanhu vanga vachakaungana kudzimba dzevafi muHarare. No media source currently available
title: Amai Vimbai Tsvangirai-Java Vanokuwara Mutsaona Yakauraya Vamwe Vaviri

text: Mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, nhasi vazivisa kuti hurumende yavo ichatsigira kanzuru yeHarare nemari kuti kanzuru ikwanise kuwanisa vagari mvura yakachena. VaMnangagwa vataura mashoko aya mushure mekushanyira chigayo chemvura cheMorton Jafray Work Works uko vaudzwa matambudziko akatarisana nekanzuru panyaya yekuwanisa vagary mvura yakachena. Mutungamiri wenyika audzwa nameya nevakuru vakuru vekanzuru kuti zvingave nane kuti kanzuru itore mvura kubva kudhamu reManyame sezvo mvura iyi isingade mishonga yakawanda kuichenesa. Vati iyi ipfungwa yakanaka chose uye hurumende ichabhadhara mari yekuisa mapombi ekuti kanzuru itore mvura yakawanda kubva kuManyame. Pari zvino hazvisati zvazivikanwa kuti panodiwa mariii kuita basa iri asi patove nenyanzvi dzakabva kuSouth Africa dzave kutogadziririra kuti chirongwa ichi chichitanga kuitwa. VaMnangagwa avo vange vaine makurukota ezvemari, matunhu nemadhorobha uye mvura vati vaudzwa kuti chigayo ichi chasakara uyewo vaudzwa kuti mvura inobva mudhamu reChivero yakasviba izvo zvinoita kuti kanzuru ishandise mishonga yakawanda kuchenesa mvura yacho Meya veHarare, VaHebert Gomba, vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvinofadza kuti kunyange hazvo kanzuru yange yave kutora imwe mvura kubva kunaManyame, hurumende yawedzera huwandu hwemvura yavave kutora kubva kunaChivero Vatiwo zvinofadza kuti hurumende yave kubhadhara chikwereti chayo chemvura kukanzuru yeHarare. Mabharani mukuru wekanzuru yeHarare, VaHosea Chisangano vati mvura muChivero yange yave shomasa uye danho ratorwa nehurumende rakanaka chose nekuti zvave kureva kuti guta richawana mvura yakawanda. Asi VaChisango vati kukwira kwemutengo wemagetsi, kuchakwidza mutengo wemvura vachiti vange vari kushandisa mazana mashanu ezviuru zvemadhora kuzvigayo zvemvura uye pari zvino vave kushandisa mamiriyoni mapfumbamwe pamwedzi. Harare nemadhorobha akaitenderedza akatarisana nedambudziko rekushomeka kwemvura zvekuti nyanzvi munyaya dzekuwanisa vanhu mvura dzinoti chinodiwa kuvaka mamwe madhamu akaita seKunzwi kuti pawanikwe mvura inokwanira vanhu vese. No media source currently available
title: VaMnangagwa Vovimbisa Kubatsira Harare Kuti Iwane Mvura Kubva kuManyame

text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vasaina bhiri remutemo we Constitutional Amendment Bill Number 2 nhasi kuitira kuti mutemo uyu uchishandiswa zviri pamutemo. Bhiri iri rakatambirwa nedare reSenate nemusi weChipiri mushure mekunge maseneta makumi matanhatu nemashanu avhotera bhiri iri, asi maseneta gumi akapikisa kuti bhiri iri vachiti risavandudze bumbiro remitemo yenyika. Mutemo uyu unopa mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, masimba ekusarudza mutevedzeri wavo pamadiro, kudoma vatongi vematare edzimhosva, kuwedzera huwandu hwemadzimai nevechidiki muparamende nemumakanzuru nezvimwe. Mutemo mutsva uyu unowedzerawo makore ekuti mutongi wematare edzimhosva arambe ari pabasa mushure mekusvitsa makore makumi manomwe. Mukuru wevatongi vematare edzimhosva, VaLuke Malaba, vanga vachifanirwa kuenda pamudyangigere musi wa 15 Chivabvu apo vanosvitsa makore makumi manomwe. Sezvo mutemo uyu wava kushanda, VaMalaba havachaendi pamudyandigere uye vacharamba vari mukuru wevatongi vematare edzimhosva. Gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu, VaNqobani Sithole, vakapikisa kutambirwa kwakaitwa Constitutional Amendment Bill Number 1, iro rakapa hwaro hwekuti Constitutional Amendment Bill Number 2 riumbwe, vachiti bhiri rekutanga rakaitwa nenzira dzinotyora bumbiro remitemo yenyika. Dare reConstitutional Court harisati rapa mutongo waro panyaya iyi kunyange hazvo mahofisi ehurumende, kusanganisira emutungamiri wenyika, dare reNational Assembly nedare reSenate, akapihwa zviri pamutemo magwaro ekupikisa bhiri iri.
title: VaMnangagwa Vanosaina Constitutional Amendment Bill Number 2

text: Bato reMDC Renewal Team raramba mashoko ekuti riri kukundikana kuita musangano waro mukuru wepagore wekutanga, uyo waifanirwa kuitwa mukupera kwaChikunguru. Vakafanobata chigaro chevanoona nezvesarudzo mubato iri, VaSettlement Chikwinya, vanoti chiri kuitika chete kuendeswa mberi kwemazuva achaitwa musangano uyu. No media source currently available Vanoti izvi zviri kuitwa nekuda kwekushaya nzvimbo yakatambanuka yekuitira musangano uyu. Vanotiwo musangano wakaita sekongiresi unoda mari yakawanda iyo bato ravo richiri kutsvaga kubva kunhengo dzaro. Bato iri rinoda mari inosvika mazana matatu ezviuru zvemadhora kuitira kuti musangano uyu ubudirire. VaChikwinya vanotiwo bato ravo rine hurongwa hwekutsvaga zita idzva rekuti ringe rave kushandiswa pachaitwa sarudzo dza 2018, senzira yekuti vatsigiri vavo vave nechivimbo nebato ravo.
title: MDC Renewal Team Yoita Kongiresi Muna Nyamavhuvhu?

text: Apo nyaya yeZimbabwe yoramba ichitemesa vakawanda musoro muAfrica nepasi rose, Botswana inoti haisi kuzoshanda semupurisa wenyika dziri mudunhu reSADC panguva iyo nyika iyi ichange yakabata matomu ehusachigaro hweSADC Organ on Politics, Defense and Security Cooperation. Vachipindura mubvunzo wanga wabvunzwa nemukuru wemapato anopikisa muBotswana, VaDumelang Saleshando muparamende yenyika iyi nhasi, gurukota rinoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika muBotswana, Doctor Lemogang Kwape vati Botswana haisi kuzopindira zvakanyanya mune dzimwe nyika apo inenge ichitungamira bazi reSADC rezvematongerwo enyika kana kuti SADC Troika on Politics and Defence. Dr. Kwape avo vakabata matomu ehusachigaro hwe SADC Ministerial Committee of the Organ on Politics, Defense and Security Cooperation, vaenderera mberi vachiti kune gwara rinotewerwa iro ranga richishandiswa kwemakore mukugadzirisa zvimhinga mupinyi zvinonetsa mudunhu. Mumubvunzo vavo, VaSaleshando vanga vachida kuziva kuti Botswana, iyo yakapihwa matomu ehusachigaro hwebazi iri neZimbabwe mwedzi wakapera, ichatora matanho akaita sei mukugadzirisa matambudziko ehupfumi hwenyika uho hwava nemakore hwakananga kumawere uye kutyorwa kwavanoti kuri kuitwa kwekodzero dzevanhu muZimbabwe. VaSaleshando vanoti kusamiria zvakanaka kwezvinhu muZimbabwe kuri kuremedza nyika yeBotswana mukuchengeta vapoteri vari kutizira munyika iyi. Mukuru wezvirongwa zvesangano reZimbabwe Network for Social Justice, VaTendai Mbofana vaudza Studio7 parunhare kuti mashoko ataurwa neBotswana haashamisi nokuti igaroziva kuti mhanza yembudzi iri mumabvi. Dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika dzange dzichitarisira kuti mutungamiri wenyika yeBotswana VaMokgweetsi Masisi vanenge vasingarume vachifuridzira panyaya yeZimbabwe sezvaiitwa nevaive mutungamiri wenyika iyi VaIan Khama. Imwe nyanzwi munezve matongerwo enyika VaTafadzwa Matambo vaudza Studio7 kuti Botswana inyika diki kwazvo mukugadzirisa matambudziko ari kusangana neZimbabwe pari zvino. Kunyangwe hazvo, mutungamiriri weSouth Africa VaCyril Ramaphosa vakatumira zvikwata zvenhumwa zviviri kuZimbabwe, Zimbabwe iri kuramba ichitsika madziro ichiti hapana chinoda kugadziriswa munyika. Vachitaura mukupera kwesvondo mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vakati nhumwa dzaVaRamaphosa dzakapinda munyika kuzoona ivo nebato ravo reZanu-PF kwete vanopikisa. Asi veANC vari kuti vchadzoka munyika kuzoita misangano nevanopikisa nemasangano akazvimirira akakumbira musangano navo. Kusagadzikana kwezvinhu munyaya dzezvehupfumi nematongerwo enyika muZimbabwe kunonzi kwave kuremera dzimwe nyika sezvo vakawanda vave kuenda muhupoteri munyika idzi. No media source currently available
title: Botswana Inoti Haisi Kuzoita Zano Ndega paKugadzirisa Zvinonzi Zviri Kunetsa muZimbabwe

text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano dzinoti zvakanaka chose kuti vakuru vakuru muhurumende pamwe nenhengo dzeparamende vabude pachena kana vachinge vabatwa neCovid-19, dzichiti izvi zvinobatsira pakudzivirira kupararira kwedenda iri pamwe nekuti veruzhinji vasununguke kutaura pamusoro paro. Vaimbove gurukota rezvekurima, VaPerence Shiri, vakashaya neCovid-19, mutevedzeri wegurukota revechidiki nemitambo, VaTinomuda Machakaire vakabatwawo neCovid-19 vakabuda pachena. Pane nhengo dzeparamende dzakabatwa neCovid 19 dzikabuda pachena dzinosanganisira mumiriri weHarare South muNational Assembly, VaTongai Mnangagwa pamwe nasachigaro wekomiti yeNational Assembly inoona nezvehutano, Dr Ruth Labode, veMDC Alliance. Vamwe vakaita segurukota rezvekudzivirirwa kwemukati munyika, VaKazembe Kazembe uye gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, vanoti vari kugara kumba mushure mekuita misangano naVaShiri asi vachiti vari kunzwa zviri nani. Bato reZanu-PF rakati nhengo dzaro dzinoshandira pamuzinda webato iri muHarare makumi maviri nenhanhatu dzakabatwawo nechirwere ichi. Vaive gurukota rezvehutano muhurumende yemubatanidzwa, Dr Henry Madzorera, vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvakaitwa nevakuru vakuru ava pamwe nenhengo dzeparamende zvekubuda pachena zvakanaka chose mukurwisana neCovid-19. Mumiriri weBinga North muNational Assembly, VaPrince Dubeko Sibanda veMDC Alliance, vati vanobvumirana naDr. Madzorera vachiti pakutanga hurumende yaingoburitsa huwandu hwevanhu vafa kana kubatwa nechirwere ichi pasina mazita. Vati kubuda pachena kunobatsira kuti munhu wese awone kuti zvechokwadi chirwere ichi chiriko. VaSibanda vati hurumende yakakanganisa chose payakapinza masoja mumigwagwa mushure mekutanga kwechirwere ichi vachiti ingadai yakatuma vashandi vezvehutano kuti vadzidzise vanhu pamusoro pechirwere ichi. Mumiriri weMakonde muNational Assembly, VaKindness Paradza, vaudza Studio 7 kuti ichokwadi kuti kubuda pachena kuri kuitwa nenhengo dzeparamende nevakuru vakuru muhurumende kuri kubatsira kuti vanhu vanzwisise nezvechirwere ichi. Vati vari kushanda neimwe kambani mudunhu mavo kudzidzisa vanhu pamusoro peCovid-19 pamwe nekuvapa mishonga inouraya hutachiwana kana kuti sanitizer, sipo nezvimwe zvekuti vazvidzvirire kubva kuchirwere ichi. Vati basa rekurwisa Covid-19 riri kukanganiswa nevanopikisa vanoda kuti vanhu varatidzire panguva ino. Dr. Madzorera vati kunyange hazvo vanhu vakave neruzivo pamusoro peCovid-19 dambudziko guru nderekuti nzvimbo dzekuvhenekwa chirwere ichi ishoma uye kuvhenekwa kwacho kuno dhura. Munyori musangano ranavachiremba vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu munyaya dzehutano, Dr Norman Matara vaudza Studio 7 kuti chirwere chatove muvanhu uye pave kudiwa kuti zvipatara zvipihwe zvikwanisiro kuti zvirape vanhu. VaDubeko Sibanda vatiwo vanoona sekuti kubatwa kwemakurukota nevamwe vakuru vakuru muhurumende nechirwere ichi kuchaita kuti vape mari yakawanda kubazi rezvehutano kuitira kuti vakoti navanachiremba nevamwe vashandi vezvehutano vapihwe mihoro inofadza pamwe nekuti zvipatara zviwaniswe zvikwanisiro kuti zvikwanise kurapa vanhu vese munyika. Covid-19 idenda ratemesa musoro nyika dzepasi rese uye muZimbabwe rauuya apo vakoti navanachiremba vari kuramwa mabasa nekuda kwemihoro yavanoti isingakwane, uye muzvipatara musina mishonga nezvimwe zvekushandisa. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rehurumende sezvo mutauriri wekomiti yehurumende inoona nezvekurwisana neCovid-19, zvakare vari gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, vange vasiri kubatika. No media source currently available
title: Vakuru muHurumende, Nhengo dzeParamende, Vopembedzwa neKubuda Pachena paChirwere cheCovid-19

text: Zvinhu zvaramba zvakaita manyama amire nerongo muZanu-PF. Pave kuita kukandirana zvekare makobvu nematete pakati pesangano revakarwa hondo reZimbabwe National Liberation War Veteran’s Association negurukota itsva revakarwa hondo, VaTshinga Dube. Zvinhu zvaramba zvakaita manyama amire nerongo muZanu-PF. Pave kuita kukandirana zvekare makobvu nematete pakati pesangano revakarwa hondo, reZimbabwe National Liberation War Veteran’s Association, negurukota idzva revakarwa hondo, VaTshinga Dube. VaDube vakatora mhiko kuve gurukota idzva neMugovera vachitora chigaro chaVaChris Mutsvangwa avo vakadzingwa basa mushure mekumbomiswa kuve nhengo yeZanu-PF kwemakore matatu. Kunyange hazvo VaDube vaive pamusangano nevatori venhau wakapawo kuti VaMutsvangwa vanyanye kupinda muna taisireva vachinzi vaituka Amai Grace Mugabe, VaDube vave kuti vakarwa hondo vanofanira kutsvaga sachigaro mutsva anotsiva VaMutsvangwa nekuti havakwanise kushanda nemunhu akadzingwa musangano rePolitburo yeZanu-PF. Vachitaura nebepanhau reChronicle, VaDube vanotiwo musangano wainge warongwa naVaMutsvangwa kuti VaMugabe vasangane nevakarwa hondo ava kuti vataure nhuna dzawo, unogona kusabudirira kana VaMutsvangwa vari panyanga. VaMutsvangwa vari kupomerwa mhosva yekutsigira chikwata cheZanu-PF chinonzi Team Lacoste icho chinonzi chiri kutsigira mumwe mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, kuti vazotungamira kana vamugabe vasiya basa. Chikwata ichi chiri kunetsana nechinzonzi Generation 40 icho chine rutsigiro rwakasimba rwaamai Grace Mugabe. Asi munyori mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe National Liberation War Veterans Association, VaVictor Matemadanda, vanoti VaDube havana simba rekutaura kwavasina kuswera nekuti sangano reZNLWA rakazvimirira hariudzwe zvekuita nemakurukota ehurumende. No media source currently available
title: Vakarwa Hondo yeRusununguko Voburutsira VaTshinga Dube Makano

text: Hurumende yeZimbabwe yazvisudurudza pamashoko evakafanobata chigaro chemurongi wemisangano muZanu PF, VaPatrick Chinamasa, avo vakashoropodza nhepfenyuro yeStudio7 vachiti inhepfenyuro ine ruvengo neZimbabwe uye yakafanana nezvirango zvakatemerwa Zimbabwe. Vachibvunzwa neStudio 7 kuti mashoko aVaChinamasa avakataura pamuzinda weZanu PF muHarare nemusi weChina, anoreva here pamire hurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa, gurukota rezvekubudiswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, vanoti mashoko akataurwa naVaChinamasa haana kubva kuhurumende, nokudaro Studio7 inofanirwa kunzwa kuna VaChinamasa mbune kuti mashoko avo aireveyi.  Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kuna VaChinamasa sezvo vanga vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. Bepanhau repaindaneti reNew Zimbabwe rakaburitsa nyaya iyi nezuro richiti VaChinamasa vakashoropodza nhepfenyuro yeStudio7 pamusangano wavakaita nevatori venhau nemusi weChina vachiti inhepfenyuro ine ruvengo nehurumende yeZimbabwe. Mashoko aVaChinamasa aya akoknzera kuti sangano reMisa Zimbabwe rishushikane zvikuru. Sachigaro weMisa-Zimbabwe, VaGolden Maunganidze, vati havawirirane nemashoko aVaChinamasa ekuti Studio 7 imhandu yehurumende.  VaMaunganidze vatiwo vezvematongerwo enyika vanofanirwa kuziva mabasa evatori venhau kwete kuvapinza mune zvematongerwo enyika. Rimwe gweta rinomiririra vatori venhau, VaChris Mhike, vatiwo mashoko aVaChinamasa anovafungisa kushungurudzwa kwevatori venhau panguva yehutongi hwemushakabvu VaRobert Mugabe. Vati vane tarisiro yekuti hurumende yaVaMnangagwa icharemekedza kushanda kwakasununguka kwevatori venhau sezviri mubumbiro remitemo yenyika. VaMhike vati nhepfenyuro yeStudio 7 ine vatori venhau muZimbabwe avo vanofanirwa kushanda vakasununguka pasina kutyityidzirwa nevematongerwo enyika. VOA inoti mukuchengetedza zvisungo zvayo, zvirongwa zveStudio7 ndezvechokwadi, hazvina kwazvinorerekera uye zvine hudzamu. Yatiwo zvirongwa zveVOA Zimbabwe zvinoramba zvichivimbwa nazvo neveruzhinji uye zvinoburitsa nhau dzechokwadi pamwe nekuita hurukuro uye kunzwa pfungwa dzenyanzvi dzinobatsira mukusimudzira budiriro muAfrica , muAmerica nepasi rose. No media source currently available
title: Amai Mutsvangwa Vanoti Mashoko aVaChinamasa eKushoropodza Studio7 Haana Kubva kuHurumende yeZimbabwe, Uye Havaazivi

text: Gweta rehurumende riri kumirira mukuru wemapurisa, Commissioner General Godwin Matanga, rinoti vatapi nevenhau havasi vanhu vanoita basa rakakosha zvakanyanya pakuvharwa kwenyika kwakanangana nekudzivirira kuparira kweCoronavirus. Izvi zvabuda mudare apo hurumende iri kupikisa chikumbiro chakasvitswa mudare iri chekuti mapurisa asavhiringa vatori venhau vanenge vari pabasa munguva yeNational Lockdown. Chikumbiro ichi chakaiswa mudare iri nemutori wenhau anoshanda akazvimirira, Panashe Makufa, achitsigirwa nesangano reMedia Institute of Southern Africa-Zimbabwe paine chinangwa chekuti dare ripe mutongo unorambidza mapurisa kuvhiringa vatori venhau pavanenge vachiita basa ravo. Izvi zvinotevera kuvhiringwa kwaMakufa nevamwe vatori venhau vakawanda kubva pakatanga Lockdown musi wa30 Kurume. Kunyange hazvo Zimbabwe Media Commission pamwe nebazi rezvemutemo vange vabvuma chikumbiro ichi, gweta raVaMatanga raramba izvi rikaudza dare kuti vatori venhau havana basa rakakosha ravanoita. Asi gweta reMISA-Zimbabwe naMakufa, VaChris Mhike, vati gweta raVaMatanga rinofanira kupa dare zvikonzeero zvekuti sei riri kupikisa nyaya iyi. Mutongi wedare, Justice Jacob Manzunzu, vati gweta raVaMatanga rinofanira kupa VaMhike nedare zvikonzero zvekuti sei riri kupikisa nyaya iyi uye nyaya iyi ichanzikwwa nemusi weChishanu masikati. Danho ratorwa negweta raVaMatanga rinopikisana nechisungo chebazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko iro rakazivisa kuti vatori venhau vanotorwa sevashandi vanoita basa rakakosha pakurwisa chirwere cheCorovanirus. Mukuru weMISA Zimbabwe, VaTabani Moyo, vaudza Studio7 kuti vari kushushikana zvikuru kuti vatapi venhau vakawanda vari kushungurudzwa panguva ino yeLockdown. Mune imwewo nyaya, nhengo dzeparamende dzeMDC dzinoti hadzinei nehurongwa hwekuunganidza mari yekubatsira kurwisana neCoronaviurs hwakaparurwa neparamende nezuro dzichiti dzakaparura chirongwa chadzo chekuunganidza mari yekubatsira paCoronavirus. Vanokokera nhengo dzeZanu PF, VaPupurai Togarepi, vakaparura neChitatu chirongwa chekuunganidza mari inodarika mazana matatu ezviuru zvemadhora kubva kunhengo dzeparamende. Asi nhengo dzeMDC Alliance hadzina kupinda pachiitiko ichi uye vanokokera nhenge dzebato iri muparamende, VaProsper Mutseyami, vaudza Studio7 kuti vane chirongwa chavo chakasiyana nechakaparurwa neChitatu. Mumiriri weGlen Norah, VaWellington Chikombo, vati kuti nyika ibudirire pakurwisa Coronavirus, hurumende inofanira kushanda nenhengo dzese dzeparamende pamwe nemasangano akasiyana siyana zvisineyi nekuti munhu abuda mumba maamai vani. Hurumende yakazivisa nemusi weChitatu kuti yakaisa parutivi mari minodarika mamiriyoni mazana mashanu emadhora emuno ichashandiswa kurwisa chirwere cheCoronavirus. No media source currently available
title: Gweta reHurumende Rinoti Vatori veNhau Havasi Vashandi Vakakosha

text: Vamwe vagari vekumaruwa mudunhu reMashonaland West vanoti havasi kuwana dzidziso yakakwana yechirwere cheCoronavirus izvo zvichavasiya vari panjodzi. Mumwe mugari wekuMakonde, Amai Emilia Nyikadzino, vanoti havasi kuwana dzidziso yakakwana pamusoro peCoronavirus vachiti havana redhiyo zvekuti vanongonzwawo vanhu vachitaura. Amai Nyikadzino vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kufambisa mashoko eCoronavirus kuburikidza nemasabhuku ayo anowanzofambisa mashoko sezvo vachiteererwa. Vamwe vakanzwa nezvechirwere cheCoronavirus vakapihwa dzidziso isiri iyo. Amai Roseline Shumba vanoti vakanzwa nevamwe kuti vanofanirwa kugeza maoko, muromo nemaziso. Mumwe wechidiki, VaArnold Zirema, vekuMhangura vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kutuma vezvehutano kuti vafambe vachidzidzisa vanhu nezvechirwere cheCoronavirus. Sachigaro weHurungwe Community Radio, iyo isati yave kubvumirwa kutepfenyura, VaJoel Zilala, vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kupa marezinesi kumaredhiyo ematunhu uye kuti nhengo dzeparamende dzitaurire vanhu mumatunhu adzo nezvechirwere cheCoronavirus sezvo vachiteererwa. Izvi zvinotsigirwa nemukuru weredhiyo yakazvimirira yedunhu reKariba yePatsaka, VaAnwell Bepe, vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kudzidza chidzidzo chekuti panofanirwa kuve nemaredhiyo ematunhu akawanda ayo anogona kubatsira kushambadza mashoko akakosha kuvagari. Munyori mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaNicky Mangwana, vanoti hurumende yakapa mukana kuti vanoda kutepfenyura kumatunhu gumi akaziviswa munyika vanyorere kupihwa bvumo asi vanoti kusvika pari zvimo hapana ati anyorera zvekuti boka reBroadcasting Authority of Zimbabwe rakatowedzera nguva yekugamuchira magwaro ekupihwa marezinesi. Mukuru anoona nezvezvirwere zvinotapiriranwa mubazi rezvehutano mudunhu reMashonaland West, Dr Gift Masoja, vanoti vari kudzidzisa vashandi mubazi ravo avo vanozonodzidzisa masabhuku nemasadunhu vanozotaurira vanhu vavo. VaMasoja vanoti vari kushushikana zvikuru nevemabhawa vachiri kuvhura nguva dzemanheru uye vane hurongwa hwekubvisa vanotengesa mumigwagwa. Kusvika pari zvino vanhu vanodarika zviuru mazana mana vakabatwa nechirwere cheCoronavirus vamwe vanodarika zviuru gumi nezvipfumbamwe vafa pasi rose. No media source currently available
title: Hurumende Yoshushikana neMabhawa Ari Kuvhurwa Husiku kuMash West

text: Sangano reEuropean Union rinoti kudyidzana kwaro nehurumende yeZimbabwe kunogona kukanganisika zvikuru nenyaya yekutsakatika kwaVaItai Dzamara avo vakapambwa nevanhu vasingazikanwi mwedzi miviri yapfuura. Mumashoko ayo kuvatori venhau neMuvhuro EU inoti hurumende inofanirwa kutsvaga VaDzamara yakazvipira uye inofanira kuvadzosera kumhuri yavo. Sangano iri rinoti vanhu vakatsakatitsa VaDzamara vanofaniraeo kutsvagwawo uye kusungwa. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika VaNkululeko Sibanda vanoti zvakakosha kuti hurumende isimbise kutsvagwa kwaVaDzamara. No media source currently available VaDzamara nechikwata chavo cheOccupy Africa Unity Square vairatidzira murunyararo muAfrica Unity Square vachiti mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vanofanira kusiya basa nekuti vakundikana kutonga. Masangano akawanda anorwira kodzero dzevanhu ari kushora hurumende nezvekutsakatika kwaVaDzamara. Asi vachitaura mudare reparamende svondo rapera, mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vanoti hurumende iri kuenderera mberi nekutsvaga vaDzamara.
title: EU Inoti Kupambwa KwaVaDzamara Kunogona Kukanganisa Kudyidzana neZimbabwe

text: Vaimbova gurukota rezvehutano Doctor Henry Madzorera vanoti vanhu vakawanda muKweke havasi kutevedzera zviri kukurudzirwa nenyanzvi kuti vaite mukudzivirira kupararirwa kwemhando yeCovid-19 iri kuuraya vanhu vakawanda muIndia uye yakatouraya mumwe munhu muguta iri. Mhando yeCovid-19 yekuIndia iyi inonzi B.1.617 variant. Gurukota rezvehutano vaConstantino Chiwenga vakakurudzira vanhu vemuKwekwe nenzvimbo dzakapoteredza kuti vange vave mudzimba kubva na7 manheru kusvika na6 mangwanani serimwe danho rekuyedza kumisa kupararira kwechirwere ichi. VaMadzorera vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanhu havasi kupfeka zvivhara miromo nemhino uye vari kuramba vakaungana zvinopa kuti kutapurirwa chirwere kuve nyore. Asi mukuru anoona nezvekudzivirirwa kwechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika Dr Agnes Mahomva vaudza bepanhau reSunday Mail kuti vanhu havafanire havo kunyanya kuvhunduka nezvekuwanikwa munyika kweB.1.617 variant sezvo hurumende yaita gadziriro yakasimba kuti chirwere chisapararire munyika zvakanyanya. Asi Dr Mahomva vayambirawo vanhu kuti vasarivare vachiti vanofanira kutevedzera zvose zvinokurudzirwa kuti vadzivirire kutapurirana chirwere ichi. Asi dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dzaudza Studio 7 kuti Zimbabwe yaifanira kuita zvakaitwa nedzimwe nyika zvekurambidza vanhu kuenda kuIndia kana kubva kunyika iyi zvichipinda munyika kanazvisina kukosha zvazviri kufambira. Izvi zvakaitwa nenyika dzakaita seAmerica, Britain, Canada, Germany, Italy nedzimwe. Zvichakadaro, bazi rezvehutano rinoti nezuro hakuna munhu akafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika nemusi weSvondo zvasiya vanhu vafa kubva zvatanga kupararira chirwere ichi vave chiuru chimwe chete nemazana mashanu nemakumi masere nevatanhatu kana kuti 1,586. Vanhu gumi nevashanu vakabatwawo nechirwere ichi nemusi weSvondo zvasiya vabatwa nacho vave zviuru makumi matatu nemasere zvine mazana matanhatu nemakumi manomwe nemapfumbamwe kana kuti 38, 679. Vanhu gumi vakapora kubva kuchirwere ichi zvasiya vapora vave zviuru makumi matatu nematanhatu zvine mazana mana nemakumi mana nevashanu kana kuti 36, 445. Vanhu vachiti kurwara nyika yose mazana matanhatu nemakumi mana nevasere kana kuti 648. Vakawanda vari kurwara ava vari muHarare mune vanhu mazana matatu nemakumi masere nevana kana kuti 384. Vanhu vabayiwa nhomba kekutanga vave zviuru mazana matanhatu nemakumi matatu zvine mazana mamatatu nemakumi mana nevasere kana kuti 630, 348. Pavanhu ava, vabayiwa nhomba kechipiri sezviri kukurudzirwa nebazi rezvehutano vave zviuru mazana maviri nemakumi manomwe nevatau zvine mazana manomwe nemakumi maviri nevashanu kana kuti 273, 725. Asi hurumende inoti iri kuda kubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi nhomba kuti inyatsoshanda zvakanaka kudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi. No media source currently available
title: Vanhu vemuKwekwe Vokurudzirwa Kutevedzera Kurudziro dzeKudzivirira Kupararira kweCovid-19

text: Kanzuru yeHarare inoti yave kuronga kuendesa mapurisa ayo kuno chengetedza runyararo kuzvibhorani nedzimwe nzvimbo dzinowanika mvura uko kwave kutiika mhirizhonga pamwe nekushungurudzwa madzimai, vanasorojena pamwe nevana apo dambudziko rekushomeka kwemvura riri kutekeshera muguta iri. Dambudziko rekushaikwa kwemvura muguta guru iri rave kukonzera mutauro uye veruzhinji vanoti kanzuru inofanira kuona zvaingaite kuchengetedza vanhu pazvibhorani apo pave kugara paine mitsetse yakareba sezvo misha mizhinji ichigara isina mvura kwemazuva akawanda. Harawa, chembere, madzimai nevavana vave kushungurudzwa nemakoronyera aYo anovabhadharisa kana kuvatengesera mvura. Mumwe mugari wemuHarare, Amai Juliana Kadano vanoti dambudziko iri ratekeshera mumisha mizhinji muguta. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwebasa musangano reCommunity Water Alliance, VaHardlife Mudzingwa, vaudza Stduio 7 kuti vano shushikana zvikuru nezvave kuitika nekuda kwedambudziko rekushaikwa kwemvura. Mumiriri weMufakose mudare reparamende Amai Susan Matsunga vaudza Studio 7 kuti hazvifadzi kuona vana sorojena, madzimai nevasikana vachishungurudzwa nekuda kwedambudziko remvura uye vanoda kuti kanzuru ichengetedza vanhu ava. Meya veguta reHarare, VaHebert Gomba, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vari kuziva matambudziko akatarisana nevagari kuzvibhorani uye vachatuma mapurisa avo kuti achengetedze runyararo. VaGomba vaudza Studio 7 kuti dambudziko remvura rakakura kudarika zvino fungidzirwa nevagari uye kanzuru yega haikwanisi kuripedza. Vatiwo mwaka uno kuri kupisa zvakanyanya zvinoita kuti vanhu vashandise mvura yakawanda. Vatiwo dambudziko rakawedzera pakimisimusi nekuti kambani inovatengesera mushonga wekuchenura mvura yakatadza kuvapa huhwandu hwemishonga inokwana. Asi vati dambudziko iri richaderera munguva pfupi inotevera sezvo mishonga yavakatenga kunze kwenyika yakasvika kuBeira. Vanoona nezvekupararira kwezvirwere mubazi rezvehutano Dr Portia Manangazira vagara vachiyambirawo kuti kushaikwa kwemvura kuri kupa kuti muHarare mupote muchipararira zvirwere zvemanyoka, typhoid necholera mune dzimwe nguva. Vanoti havo vari kuyedza kubatsira nekupa vanhu nhomba yekunwa kudzivirira zvimwe zvirwere asi mvura yakachena inodiwa nguva dzose. Gore rapfuura, hurumende yakapa kanzuru yeHarare mvumo yekutora mvura kubva kudhamu reManyame uye izvi zvinobatsirapakuti kanzuru inenge yave kushandisa mishonga mushoma pakuchenura mvura iyi sezvo isina kusviba seyekudhamu reChivero. VaGomba vanoti kuti dambudziko remvura ripere muHarare, panotodiwa madhamu matsva akaita seKunzvi nemamwe sezvo madhamu aripo akaita seChivero ave nemvura shoma uye mamwe aiunza mvura kuHarare akaita seSeke neHarava asara nemvura shomanana. Mutungamiriri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vakavimbisa kuti hurumende yavo ichabatsira kanzuru yeHarare pakugadzirisa dambudziko remvura apo vakashanyira chigayo chemvura cheMorton Jaffray Water Works mukupera kwegore rapera. No media source currently available
title: Kanzuru yeHarare Yotumira Mapurisa Kuzvibhorani Uko Kwombunyikidzwa Madzimai

text: Vashandi nevashandirwi vacherechedza zuva revashandi pasi rose vari mudzimba dzavo nepamusana pechirwere cheCovid-19 masangano avo achikurudzira kuti munyika muite nhaurirano pamisoro yemihoro iyo vashandi vari kuti haisi kuvakwanira. Ukuwo makambani akawanda anoti anogona kutadza kutanga zvakare basa kana chirwere cheCovid-19 chapera. Kekutanga munhoroondo rezuva revashandi pasi rose, zuva iri racherechedzwa nhasi vanhu vari mudzimba dzavo zvichitevera kuvharwa kwakaitwa nyika senzira yekudzivirira chirwere cheCovid-19 icho chiri kuita chamurambamhuru chichiuraya vanhu pasi rose. Mumwe mushandi, Amai Rutendo Zhou, vati kunyange hazvo nguva zhinji vanga vari kuchema chema nemihoro isingakwani kuriritira mhuri dzavo, kuuya kwechirwere cheCOVID-19 kuri kuwedzera zvakanyanya matambudziko avo sezvo vari kudzikisirwa muhoro wavo. VaZhou vati remangwana ravo vari mushandi harina kujeka. Mumwe mushandi, VaJeff Chaitezvi, vatiwo zvinhu zvinosuwisa kuti vamwe vashandi vari kubvisirwa mari sezvo vasiri kuenda kubasa, ukuwo vamwe vashandirwi vave kutotora mukana wechirwere ichi kudzinga vamwe vashandi. Mumwe mushandi munezvekushanyirwa kwenyika, VaGodknows Homwe, vati havasisina kana tarisiro neramangwana ravo. Sangano guru rinomirira vashandi munyika, reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, ZCTU, rinoti kuuya kwechirwere cheCoronavirus kwayanika pachena kusatongwa kwakanaka kwenyika.Mutungamiriri weZCTU, VaPeter Mutasa, vaudza Studio7 kuti chirwere cheCoronavirus chichasiya nyika yave mamvemve nekuti hupfumi hwenyika hwanga hwaparara kare. VaMutasa vati kuti nyika igadziriswe, panofanirwa kuitwa hurukuro pakati pevashandi, vashandirwi nehurumende kuitira kuti pabudwe negwara rinoita kuti nyika ienderere mberi. VaMutasa vatiwovakatonyorera kuhurumende nevemabhizimusi kuti kuiswe mitemo inochengetedza vashandi panguva ino nyika iri kurwisana nechirwere cheCOVID-19. VaMutasa vatiwo sesangano revashandi vanodawo kuti hurumende ibetsere mabhizimusi ari kutambudzika panguva ino pamwe nevanhuwo. VaMutasa vatiwo sangano ravo rakagadzirira kubetsera vese vachadzingwa mabasa kana kutapudzirwa mari dzavo kuburikidza nekuendesa nyaya idzi kumatare evashandi. Asi mukuru wesangano revashandirwi reConfederation of Zimbabwe Industries, VaHenry Ruzvidzo, vanoti vanotarisira kuti vashandi nevashandirwi vakurukure kuti vanga batsirana sei sezvo vashandirwi vasinawo chavari kuwana. VaRuzvidzo vati kunyange hazvo pane hurukuro pakati pevashandirwi nehurumemde, hapana chati chajekeswa kuti hurumende ichabatsira seyi vashandirwi. VaRuzvidzo vaudzawo Studio7 kuti makambani mazhinji anogona kutadza kuzosimudzira mabasa awo sezvo anga asina mari yaange akachengetera njodzi nekuda kwekumira kwakaita hupfumi hwenyika. Mumashoko avo kuvashandi nhasi, mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vati vanonzwisisa zvakanyanya matambudziko ari kusanganikwa nevashandi, uye vabvumawo kuti vashandi avo vanga vagara vari kutambira mari yemihoro isingakwani, vave padambudziko rekugona kurasikirwa nemihoro yavo vamwewo namabasa vakatiwo mhuri zhinji dziri kutambura munyika. VaMnangagwa vatiwo hurumende yavo ichatsanangura rubatsiro rwaichapa mumazuva mashoma ari kutevera . MDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa inotiwo gore rino vashandi vari kupemberera zuva ravo vakasurukirwa. Mumashoko avatumira Studio7, vanoona nezvevashandi mubato iri, Seneta Gideon Shoko, vati vashandi vakatarisana neramamgwana rakaomarara zvikuru. Vatorawo mukana uyu kurumbidza vashandi vezvehutano vari kuisa hupenyu hwavo panjodzi vachiedza kupedza dambudziko reCOVID-19. Zuva reInternational Workers Day rakasarudzwa sezuva rekurangarira mabasa anoitwa nevashandi pasi rose, uye nhoroondo yaro inotangira muna 1886 apo vashandi vemuguta reChicago mu America, vakaratidzira vachida kuti mushandi ashande zviri pamutemo, kwemaawa masere pazuva. No media source currently available
title: Zimbabwe Inobatana neDzimwe Nyika Mukucherechedza Zuva reVashandi Pasi Rose

text: Sangano rakazvimiririra richiona nezvekufamba zvakanaka kwedzimotokari zvisina njodzi mumigwagwa, re Traffic Safety Council of Zimbabwe, rinoti harisi kufara nehuwandu hwevanhu vafa munjodzi dzemumigwagwa panguva yezororo rekisimisi. Mutauriri wesangano iri, VaTatenda Chinoda, vanoti kutanga musi waZvita 12, 2017, vanhu zana negumi nevaviri vafa munjodzi dzemotokari asi pachine mazuva gumi nemapfumbamwe asara zororo kuti ripere.
