"Kubva musi wa 15 December kusvika musi wa 26 December 2017 rinonzi Boxing Day, pafa vanhu vanoita zana negumi nevaviri asi gore rapera munguva imwe chete iyi pakafa vanhu makumi matanhatu nevatanhatu," VaChinoda vaudza Studio7. "Kufa kwakaita vanhu kunofanira kutibata tose," vadaro VaChinoda. VaChinoda vanoti nguva zhinji vatyairi ndivo vane mhosva mukufa kwevanhu munjodzi dzemimigwagwa nekuti vanofarisa uye vamwe havana magwaro ekutyaira mota. No media source currently available
title: Tsaona dzeMumigwagwa Dzotora Hupenyu hweVanhu Vakawanda Munguva yeZororo

text: Vari kukwikwidza musarudzo ye by-election kuChirumhanzu-Zibagwe vakamirira bato reNational Constitutional Assembly, NCA, VaMunashe Mutodza, vanoti nhengo dzavo dziri kutyisidzirwa nenhengo dzeZanu PF apo dzinenge dzichitsvaga rutsigiro. VaMutodza vanotiwo kunyange hazvo vakakwanisa kuwana gwaro revavhoti mazuva maviri apfuura, vanoona vaine nguva duku kwazvo yekuti variongorore vachizotora matanho kana vaine zvekupokana nazvo. Sarudzo yekutsvaga vachatora chigaro chakasiiwa nemumwe wevatevedzeri vemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, dziri kutarisirwa kuitwa nemusi weChishanu 27 Kurume 2015. Vamwe vari kukwikwidza musarudzo idzi mudzimai waVaMnangagwa, Amai Auxilia Mnangagwa, Amai Abigail Rumbidzai Musambasi veTransform Zimbabwe, VaGadzamoyo Dhewa vebato reGood People’s Movement Party pamwe naVaWillbroad Kanoti vari kukwikwidza vakazvimirira. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kubata Amai Mnangagwa nevamwe vavachakwikwidzana navo kuti tinzwewo divi ravo. Mapato eMDC ose akaramba kupinda musarudzo idzi achiti anoda kutanga aona shanduko mune nyaya dzakawanda dzinosanganisira gwaro revavhoti. No media source currently available
title: Vakwikwidzi kuChirumhanzu-Zibagwe Votyisidzirwa neZanu PF?

text: Zvinhu zvichiri zvakaita manyama amire nerongo munyika vemapato anopikisa nevemasangano akazvimirira vachipomera mauto nemapurisa mhosva yekuvaita kafiramberi, kuvabata chibharo, kuvasunga uye kupwanya dzimba dzavo. Zvinhu zvichiri zvakaita manyama amire nerongo munyika sezvo vemapato anopikisa nevemasangano akazvimirira vari kupomera mauto mhosva yekuvaita kafiramberi, kuvabata chibharo kuvasunga uye kupwanya dzimba dzavo. Izvi zviri kubudawo paine kunetsana kwakanyanya mubato reZanu-PF vamwe vachiti vanoda kuti paitwe nhaurirano neMDC asi vamwe vachitsigirwa nevemauto zvikuru vari musangano reJoint Operation Command vachiti hapana nhaurirano dzinofanira kuitwa. Masangano akawanda ekunze nemunyika ari kushushikana nezviri kuitika muZimbabwe uye vakawanda vanoti masangano eSADC, African Union neUnited Nations anofanira kupindira munyika musati madeuka ropa rakawanda. Nhengo yeNational Executive yeMDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa, Muzvare Maureen Kademaunga, vanoti nhengo dzebato ravo dziri kushungurudzwa zvakanyanya. Nhengo yeZanu-PF, VaGilbert Muponda, avo vakakwikwidza kuWarren Park vakakundikana, vanotiwo zvinhu zviri kuita zvichigadzikana.  No media source currently available
title: Zanu-PF neMDC Dzopesana Maonero paNyaya yeMhirizhonga

text: Vaimbova gurukota remhando dzemoto, VaSamuel Undenge, vatongerwa kugara mujeri kwemakore mana mushure mekubatwa nemhosva yekushandisa chinzvimbo chavo zvisirizvo pavanonzi vakaita kuti imwe kambani yakange isingafanire kupuhwa basa nebazi ravo iite basa mubazi ravaitungamira. Mutongi wedare, VaHosea Majaya, vasendeka parutivi mwedzi gumi nemisere zvinoreva kuti VaUndenge vachapika mujeri kwemakore maviri nechidimbu. VaUndenge vanonzi vakaita zvehuori apo vakabvumidza kambani yeZimbabwe Power Company kupa basa rekuita kukambani yaVaPsychology Maziwisa, nemumwe munhu anzi VaOscar Pambuka, vasina kuenda kutenda. Zvinonzi VaUndenge vakabvumidza kuti kambani iyi ibhadharwe zviuru gumi nezviviri zvemadhora. VaUndenge ndevamwe vemakurukota akakasara asina chekubata pakapindira mauto mune zvematongerwo enyika muna Mbudzi gore rapera zvakazoita kuti vaimbova mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vasiye basa. Izvi zvakaitika panguva iyo muZanu PF maive nemakakatanwa pakati pezvikwata zviviri zvinoti cheG40, icho chinonzi chaitungamirwa naAmai Grace Mugabe, necheTeam Lacoste icho chaitungamirwa naVaEmmerson Mnangagwagore rapera zvichitevera makakatanwa aiva muZanu PF pakati pechikwata cheG40 neTeam Lacoste.
title: Vaimbove Gurukota reMhando dzeMoto, VaSamuel Undenge, Vakandwa Mujeri

text: Mutngamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vari kushorwa zvikuru nevanhu munyika mushure mekunge vashora vatongo vematare avo vari kupa mvumo vanhu vari kuratidzira kuti vapinde mumigwagwa. Vachitaura pamusangano wevechidiki vebato ravo weZanu-PF Youth league nemusi weMugovera, VaMugabe vakashora vatongi ava vachiti vari kupa vanhu mvumo avo vari kubuda pachena kuti vanoda kubvisa hurumende pachigaro vachishandisa mhirizhonga. Mashoko aVaMugabe ari kushorwa zvikuru nevanhu vakawanda. Mutungamiri webato rePDP VaTendai Biti vakashora VaMugabe pamusangano wavakaita kuEpworth nemusi weSvondo. Mumwe mutevedzeri wemutungamiri webato reMDC-T VaNelson Chamisa vashorawo zvikuru mashoko aVaMugabe vachiti anotyisidzira vatongi. Mumwe wechidiki muHarare, Tinashe Muzamindo audza Studio 7 kuti zviripachena kuti VaMugabe havana hanya nekodzero dzevanhu. VaOwen Dhliwayo mumwe mugari wemuHarare vatiwo kuita kwaVaMugabe kunoratidza kuti havatevedzeri bumbiro remutemo wenyika uye zviri pachena kuti vanogona kumakidzira matare edzimhosva kuti vaite zvavanofarira ivo mbune. Vanoti aka hakasi kekutanga VaMugabe vachizviita. Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika zvakare vari mukuru weZimbabwe Democracy Institute, Dr Pedzisai Ruhanyaya, vati vanoshushikana zvikuru nemashoko aVaMugabe uye vati vanofanira kurangarira kuti mhuri yavo ichazodawo matare mune remangwana. VaRuhanya vati nhoroondo yaVaMugabe nebato ravo yekutyisidzira vatongi inozikanwa uye VaMugabe vanoita izvi kana hurumende yavo ichinge yave pamurumananzombe. Hurumende yaVaMugabe yakambodzingawo vatongi vakawanda mumakore ekuma2000 zvichitevera kupinda kweMDC mudariro rezvematongerwo enyika pamwe nehondo yeminda. No media source currently available Gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu muChinhoyi VaMichael Chandida vanoti hapana dare ringarambidze munhu kuratidzira sezvo bumbiro remutemo richipa kodzero iyi kumunhu wese paSection 59. VaChandida vanoti dare haringarambidze munhu kuratidzira nekufungidzira kuti achaita mhirizhonga. Izvi zvinotsigirwa nerimwe gweta VaTapiwa Muchineripi avo vanoti mabasa ehurumende akasiyaniswa zvekuti bazi revatungamiri venyika kana kuti executive harifanirwe kupindira mukutongwa kwedzimhosva. Sachigaro weZimbabwe People Fist (ZimPF) muChinhoyi VaTendai Musonza vanoti mashoko aVaMugabe ndeekutyisidzira vatongi vedzimhosva sezvinoita vadzvanyiriri pasi rose. VaMusonza vanoti zviri kuita VaMugabe ndizvo zvakaitwa nevaimbotonga nyika ino muchakabvu VaDouglas Ian Smith. VaMusonza vanoti kurambidzwa kuratidzira kuchaita kuti mhirizhonga inyanye kuitwa sezvo kurambidza vanhu kuratidzire kutyora kodzero dzavo. Izvi zvinotsigirwa nenhengo yezvematongerwo enyika VaDenis Kagonye vanoti mhirizhonga ichanyanya munyika vanhu vakarambidzwa kuratidzira. Asi gurukota rinoona nezvekudzivirirwa kwemukati menyika VaIgnatious Chombo vanoti mapurisa kwete matare ndiwo anoziva mamiriro anenge akaita zvinhu. VaChombo vakaudza Studio 7 kuti akawana zvakakodzera kumisa kuratidzira anongoita izvozvo. Vachitaura kunhengo dzeZanu PF Youth League neMugovera, VaMugabe vakashoropodza vatongi vedzimhosva vachivapomera mhosva yekubvumira vanhu kuti varatidzire sezvinobvumirwa nebumbiro remutemo wenyika. No media source currently available
title: Vanhu Vakawanda Voshora VaMugabe Vachiti Varikutyisidzira Vatongi veMatare

text: Mutevedzeri wegurukota redzidzo yepamusoro, VaGodfrey Gandawa, vakati makoreji munyika anofanira kupinza vadzidzi vakawanda vanorarama nehurema muzvikoro izvi sezvo hurumende iri kukurudzira kuti vanhu vanorarama nehurema vadzidze pamwe nevamwe. Vachitaura pamabiko ekupemberera vadzidzi vainge vapedza zvidzidzo pachikoro chevadzidzisi cheMasvingo Teachers College nguva pfupi yapfuura, VaGandawa vakati hurumende inoda kuona zvikoro izvi zvichiwedzera vadzidzi vane hurema. Vakati vanofara kuti zvikoro zvakaita seMasvingo neUnited College of Education kuBulawayo zvave kutoita izvi. Asi vakati zvikoro izvi zvinofanira kuwedzera huwandu hwevadzidzi ava uyewo zvimwe zvikoro zvevadzidzisi pamwe nemaUniversities zvinofanira kutora vadzidzi vanorarama nehurema vakawanda. Muzvare Makanaka Gumbo vakati kurudziro yehurumende yakanaka chose sezvo vanhu vanoraramba nehurema vange vasiri kuwana mikana seinowanawo vamwe mumakoreji. Munyori wenhau anorarama nehurema uye achishanda nevanhu vanorarama nehurema, VaPatrick Musira vakati kurudziro yehurumende yakanaka asi vakati hurumende inofanira kuona kuti makoreji aya ane zvinhu zvinoshandiswa nevanorarama nehurema kuti vakwanise kudzidza zvakanaka. Mukuru weCentre for Disability and Development, VaMasimba Kuchera vakatiwo izvi zvakakosha asi makoreji anofanira kushandisa mari yakawanda kugadzirisa zvivakwa zvavo kuti vadzidzi vanorarama nehurema vadzidze vasina dambudziko. Vakatiwo kurudziro chete haina kukwana vachiti kuti zvikoro zvepamusoro zvikwanise kutora vadzidzi vanorarama nehurema hurumende inotofanira kuitwa mutemo. Munyika mune vanhu mamiriyoni maviri vanorarama nehurema uye vazhinji vevanhu ava vanoshaya mikana yekuenda kuzvikoro sezvo zvikoro zvizhinji zvepasi nezvepamusoro zvisina dzimba dzekudzidzira nemimwe midziyo inoita kuti vanhu ava vadzidze zvakanaka. No media source currently available
title: Zvikoro zvePamusoro Zvokurudzirwa Kupa Mikana Kune Vakaremara

text: Vanomirira Zengeza West mudare reparamende VaJob Sikhala nhasi vamira pamberi pedare repamusoro reHigh Court vachipikisa mutongo wedare ramejastiriti wekuvanyima mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso pamhosva yavari kupomerwa yekunzi vaida kupesvedzera mhirizhonga kuNyatsime, pedyo neChitungwiza. Rimwe gweta ravo vari mutauriri wavo, VaFreddy Masarirevhu vaudza Studio 7 kuti nyaya iyi yambosendekwa parutivi uye ichaenderera mberi ichinzwikwa mudare mangwana. Asi vatiwo VaSikhala nevanomirira Chitungwiza North mudare reparamende VaGodfrey Sithole vanenge vachitarisirwa kumiswa pamberi pedare ramejastiriti mangwana zvekare mukutanga kutongwa kweimwe mhosva yavari kupomerwa yekukonzera mhirizhonga. VaSikhala, naVaSithole vakasungwa muna Chikumi nevamwe gumi nevashanu vachipomerwa mhosva dzekurudzira mhirizhonga mushure mekupondwa kwenhengo yebato reCCC Muzvare Moreblessing Ali. Kusungwa kwavo kuri kushorwa zvikuru nenyika dzakaita seAmerica, Britain, nemasangano anomirira nhengo dzeparamende pasi rose uye masangano anorwira kodzero dzevanhu. VaSikhala nevamwe vavo vari kujeri reChikurubi uko magweta avo anoti vakaiswa munochengeterwa mhondi kunyangwe vasati vabatwa nemhosva. Magweta kusanganisira mutungamiri webato ravo reCitizens Coalition for Change VaNelson Chamisa vari kurambidzwa kuvaona. Asi gurukota rezvemitemo VaZiyambi Ziyambi vanoti VaSikhala vari mujeri nemhosva dzavari kupomerwa kwete kuti vari kushungurudzwa nezvematongerwo enyika. No media source currently available
title: VaSikhala Votarisirwa Kumiswa kuMatare eHigh Court neMejastiriti Court Mangwana

text: Zanu PF yawana zvigaro zvakawanda zveNational Assembly, izvo zvinoita kuti ichinje yega bumbiro remitemo yenyika. Kusvika pari zvino, Zanu PF yava nezvigaro zana nemakumi mana nezvishanu; MDC Alliance iine zvigaro makumi matanhatu, bato reNational Patriotic Front riine chigaro chimwe chete, ukuwo VaTemba Mliswa, avo vakakwikwidza vakazvimirira, vaine chigaro chimwe chete. Pane matunhu matatu asati aziviswa veruzhinji kuti achange akamirirwa nani muparamende. Pava nematunhu mazana maviri nemanomwe ava nevamiriri, kubva pazvigaro mazana maviri negumi zviri muparamende Sachigaro weZimbabwe Electoral Commission, Zec, Justice Chigumba, vati sezvo vapedza kuzivisa zvakabuda musarudzo dzeparamende, zvakabuda musarudzo yemutungamiriri wenyika zvichaziviswa neChina. MDC Alliance iri kupikisa zvabuda musarudzo idzi uye vatsigiri vayo varatidzira mumigwagwa izvo zvasiya vanhu vatatu vaurayiwa nemapurisa nemauto, mushure mekupfurwa. Justice Chigumba varatidza kushushikana zvikuru nemhirizhonga yaitika vachiti vati vane zvichemo vanofanira kuenda kumapurisa kana kumatare edzimhosva. Sachigaro weMDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa, VaMorgan Komichi, vati MDC haisi kufara nezviri kubuda musarudzo nekuti inoziva kuti ndiyo yakakunda. VaKomichi vashora kurohwa kwazoitwa vatsigiri vavo nemauto vachiti zvinoratidza kuti munyika hamuna runyararo. Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika zvakare vari mukuru weMedia Centre, VaEnerst Mudzengi, vati kupindira kwaita masoja pakuratidzira kwevatsigiuri veMDC Alliance kunoratidza kuti zvinhu hazvina mumira zvakanaka panyaya dzesarudzo nezvimwe. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura neZanu PF kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi. Mutungamiri weZanu PF, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vari kukwikwidzana nemutungamiri weMDC Alliance, VaNelson Chamisa, musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika. VaChamisa vanoti kubva mune zvavatambira kubva kumativi mana enyika, huwandu hwevanhu vakavavhotera hunoratidza kuti ndivo vakakunda musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika. Zanu PF inotiwo zviri kubuda musarudzo zvinoratidza kuti VaMnangagwa ndivo munhu akasarudzwa semutungamiri wenyika.
title: Zanu PF Inokunda Zvine Mutsindo Musarudzo?

text: Sangano remubatanidzwa wemasangano anomirira vechiki munyika, reNational Association of Youth Organisations, kana kuti NAYO, rapurura chirongwa chinokurudzira veruzhinji kuti varwire kodzero dzavo dzekuti vawaniswe mvura yakachena uye inokwanira munhu wese sezvakatarwa mubumbiro remitemo yenyika. Vachiparura chirongwa che#Claim Your Water Rights, sachigaro weNAYO, Doctor Prolific Mataruse, vati veruzhinji muZimbabwe havachina chimiro nekuda kwekushaya mvura yakachena. Vati vanhu vari kupedza nguva vari mumitsetse pazvibhorani mumaguta uye dzimwe nguva vanhu vave kurwisana, madzimai nevasikana vachishungurudzwa panzvimbo idzi. Vatiwo zvinosuwisa kuti kunyange painowanikwa mvura, kazhinji kacho inenge yakasviba zvekuti inotovhiringidza hutano hweveruzhinji. Vati pasi pechirongwa ichi, vari kushanda nemakanzuru, masangano anomirira vagari pamwe nenhengo dzeparamende kuona kuti vanhu vawaniswa mvura yakachena. Vati munzvimbo dzakaita seChitungwiza, kanzuru yeko yakachera zvibhorani senzira yekuti vanhu vawane mvura yakachenamushure mekupindra kwesangano ravo. Vati donzvo guru rechirongwa chavo ndere kuona kuti vanhu vawaniswa mvura yakachena kuti vashandise zvese zvavanoda uye kuti hurumende ione kuti madhamu, nzizi nezvibhorani hazvisvibiswe sezviri kuitika pari zvino. Sachigaro wekomiti yekanzuru yeHarare inoona nezvemamiriro ekunze, Amai Kudzai Kadzombe, vakazivisa nguva pfupi yapfuura kuti kanzuru yavo iri kuedza napose painogona napo kuwanisa vagari mvura yakachena uye inokwana. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa divi regurukota rinoona nezvemvura, VaPerence Shiri, sezvo vange vari mumusangano weZanu PF Conference. Asi vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwebasa musangano reCommunity Water Alliance, Hardlife Mudzingwa, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanotambira chirongwa cheNAYO chekuti vanhu vawaniswe mvura yakachena vachiti iyi ndiyo hondo yavagara vachirwa misi yese. Mune imwewo nyaya, mutungamiriri mutsva wesangano rinomirira vadzidzi vemuzvikoro zvepamusoro reZimbabwe National Students Unions, ZINASU, VaTakudzwa Ngadziore, vati vanoshushikana zvikuru kuti pane hurongwa hwekukwidza mari yechikoro zvakanyanya apo zvinhu zvisina kumira zvakanaka munyaya dzehupfumi munyika. Vati semanzwire avakaita, hurumende iri kuronga kukwidza mari muzvikoro zvempamusoro kusvika pazviuru zvipfumbamwe pakotoro uye vabereki vavo havakwanisi kubhara mari iye sezvo vari kutambira mari shomanana. VaNgadziore vakurudzirawo vatungamiriri vemapato maviri makuru munyika, Zanu PF, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa pamwe neMDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa kuti vaite nhaurirano dzekugadzirisa matambudziko akatarisana nenyika. Kunyange hazvo zvikoro zvepamusoro zvisati zvakwidza mari yechikoro pane kuchema chema munyika sezvo zvikoro zvePrimary neSeconday zvakatokwidza zvakanyanya mari dzinobhadharwa. Zvikoro zvepamusoro zvinotarisirwawo kukwidza mari gore rinouya. No media source currently available
title: Vechidiki Vaparura Chirongwa Chinobata Kodzero dzeKuwana Mvura Yakachena

text: Gurukota rinoona nezvemhando dzemoto, VaFortune Chasi, vari kuSouth Africa uye vachibva ikoko vachaenda kuMozambique kunoita hurukuro dzekuona kuti Zimbabwe ingawane magetsi akawanda zvakadii kubva kunyika mbiri idzi. Vachitaura mushure memusangano wechimakumi maviri nemina yedare remakurukota, gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, vati rwendo rwaVaChasi runotevera nhaurirano panyaya yemagetsi dzakaitwa nemutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangangwa nemutungamiri weSouth Africa, VaCyril Ramaphosa, pamwe naVaFillipe Nyusi vekuMozambique pamusangano uchangobva kupera weAfrican Union wakaitwa kuNiger. Amai Mutsvangwa vazivisa kuti hurumende inokoshesa nyaya yemagetsi uye veruzhinji vachaziviswa nekufamba kwenguva zvichabuda munhaurirano dziri kuitwa naVaChasi. Svondo rapfuura Zimbabwe yakabhadhara mamiriyoni gumi emadhora ekuAmerica pachikwereti chainayo kukambani yemagetsi yekuSouth Africa ye Eskom uye yasarirwa nechikwereti chinodarika mamiriyoni makumi maviri emadhora ekuAmerica. Zimbabwe ine chikwereti chinodarika mamiriyoni makumi matatu emadhora ekuAmerica kukambani yemagetsi yekuMozambique yeCohora Basa izvo zviri kuita kuti isawedzerwe huwandu hwemagetsi anoiwana kubva kumakambani maviri aya. Amai Mutsvangwa vatiwo hurumende iri kushushikana nekushakiwa kwemvura mumaguta nemadhorobha uye yaita chisungo chekuunganidza mari yekugadzirisa dambudziko iri. Gurukota rezvemari, VaMthuli Ncube, vazivisa kuti havasati vaziva kuti imarii iri kudiwa kugadzirisa dambudziko iri iro rakaparira nyika yese. Zvichakdai, Amai Mutsvangwa vazivisa kuti Zimbabwe yapihwa rubatsiro rwemichina yakakosha yekushandisa muzvipatara inokosha miriyoni yemadhora ekuAmerica kubva kuUnited Arab Emirates neIndia. Vati kunze kwemichina inokoshana mazana mana ezviuru zvemadhora ekuAmerica, UAE yavimbisawo kuvakiridza chipatara cheHarare Central. Amai Mutsvangwa vazivisawo kuti hurumende yakatengawo michina yemuzvipatara inokosha mazana matatu ezviuru zemadhora eku America ichapinda munyika munguva pfupi inotevera. Gurukota rezvehutano, Dr Obadiah Moyo, vayambira vezvitoro zvemishonga kana vari kuramba vachitengesa mishonga nemari yekuAmerica kuti zviri kunze kwemutemo uye vacharangwa kana vakabatwa. Dr Moyo vazivisawo kuti hurumende yave kutenga mishonga nemichina kumakambani ekunze anogadzira zvinhu izvi vachiti vairasirikirwa nemari yakawanda nekutenga zvinhu izvi vachishandisa vamiriri vemakambani aya muno avo vaivadhurisira. Vazivisawo kuti vave kuronga nemakambani anogadzira mishonga kubva kunyika dzakaita seIndia kuti azogadzirira mishonga iyi muno vachiti izvi zvinoita kuti mishonga iyi isvike muzvipatara nekukasika. No media source currently available
title: VaChasi Voenda Kunopemha Magetsi kuSouth Africa neMozambique

text: Mumuriri we Highfield West mudare reparamende uye vari nhengo yeZanu PF, VaPsychology Maziwisa pamwe nemutori wenhau Oscar Pambuka vanopiwa mukana wekubvisa chibatiso panyaya yekubira kukambani yeZESA mari yavari kupomerwa. No media source currently available Vakawanda vakange vasina kukwanisa kunyoresa kuvhota muchirongwa chakadarika vopiwa mumwe mukana kuburikidza nekuwedzerwa mazuva kwechirongwa chekunyoresa che Mop-up voter registration chatanga mumatunhu ose emunyika nhasi. Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vokurudzirwa kuti vagadzirise nyaya yeGukurahundi, zvichitevera kukwira kudare kwerimwe sangano riri kuda kuti hurumende imanikidzwe kuburitsa ongororo dzakaitwa nemakomisheni eDumbutshena neChihambakwe. Muchirongwa cheLiveTalk Diaspora forum na 8pm, tiri kutarisa danho rebazi rezvemukati menyika muSouth Africa re Department of Home Affairs, rekukurudzira vemabhanga, vashandirwi kuti varambe vachibatsira zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvakamirira magwaro eZimbabwe Exemption Permits, ayo akapera kushanda musi wa 31 Zvita 2017. Kana muchida kupinda muchirongwa ichi, kanawo kutumira mashoko kuStudio7, shandisai WhatsApp panhamba dzinoti 001 202 465 0318… Vanoda kuteerera Studio7, tibateyi na7pm pamasaisai anoti 909 am 4930; 13860, 6080, 15580 ne 15460 Kilohertz paShortwave mazuva ose. Musakanganwe kuteerera chimwe chirongwa chedu na 6:00am, Muvhuro kusvika chishanu. Musakanganwe kutifarira paFacebook peji redu re VOA Shona. Kurudzirai hama neshamwari kuti dzitifarire paFacebook yedu. Endai pa link iyi: https://www.facebook.com/voa.shona/
title: Misoro yeNhau, Chitatu Ndira 10, 2018

text: Vamwe vanachiremba vari kukurudzira vanhu kuti vapote vachinoongororwa maziso kuti vasazoguma vaita mapofu nekuti zvirwere zvinenge zvakomba. VaSendiso Ndlovu, avo vanoshanda nesangano reSAYWHAT vanoti vakaita bofu mugore 2008 vaine makore makumi maviri nemanomwe mushure mokunge vatopedza kuita dhigiri reengineering paUniversity of Zimbabwe. VaNdlovu vanoti vakaona nyanzvi inorapa maziso Dr Solomon Guramatunhu avo vakavaudza kuti maziso avo aisazoona nokuti aiva akuvara nechirwere cheshuga zvokuti vave kufamba nemubatsiri kuti vaende kubasa nokuti havachakwanisa kudhiraivha mota kana kufamba vega. VaNdlovu vanoshanda nevechidiki vari muzvikoro zvepamusoro soro vachivadzidzisa nezvezvirwere zvepabonde zvakaita seHIV/Aids. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvezvehutano Dr Josephat Chiripanyanga vanoti zvirwere zvemaziso zvakawandisa zvokuti kune zvimwe zvinorapika nyore nezvimwe zvisingarapike. Dr Chiripanyanga vakatsangura zvimwe zvezvirwere zvinokonzera kuti munhu aite bofu zvinonzi Glaucoma neTrachoma. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano, vanova zvakare mutevedzeri wemukuru anoona nezvematenda asingatapuriranwe mubazi rehutano, Dr Justice Mudavanhu, vakakurudzira vanhu kuti vachengetedze hutano hwemaziso zvakanaka nokuti vanhu vakawanda vari kutambura nezvizvirwere zvemaziso zvakasiyana siyana. Dr Mudavanhu vanoti vanhu vanodarika zviuru makumi matanhatu, 60 000, vakamirira kuti vabviswe tsanga dzemumaziso zvokuti varikuedza nepavanogona napo kubatsira vanhu ava nechimbi chimbi. Matunhu maviri anoti Mashonaland Central neMashonaland East, ndiwo mamwe ematunhu emunyika akatekeshera chirwere chinonzi Trachoma zvokuti patori nechirongwa chakatotangiswa chekupa pachena vagari vemunzvimbo idzi, mishonga yokudira mumaziso avo iri nzira yokuchidzivirira hubofu. Ongororo yakaitwa nesangano rinonzi Sightsavers yakaburitsa mashoko anoti tsanga dzemumaziso ndidzo dzinonyanya kukonzeresa hupofu munyika uye kuti chirwere cheTrachoma chakatodzika midzi mune mamwe matunhu enyika. Dr Mudavanhu vakabvumawo kuti kune vanhu vakawandisa vanoda magirazi okuonesa zvokuti vari kukurudzira varapwi kuti vaende kumakiriniki anosanganisira Sekuru Kaguvi iri paParirenyatwa Hospital, Norton Eye Hospital, Sakubva Clinic kwaMutare, Richard Morris Hospital kuBulawayo uko kunotengeswa magirazi aya nemari iri pasipasi. No media source currently available
title: Vanhu Vokurudzirwa Kuongororwa Maziso Vasati Vaita Mapofu

text: Vamwe vechidiki vanoti kusagadzikana kwehupfumi munyika kwave kupa kuti vanonge svosve nemuromo sezvo mabasa ezvavakadzidzira asiri kuwanikwa uyewo vasina mari dzekutanga mabhizimusi. Mumwe wevechidiki ave nemakore maviri apedza zvidzidzo zvake zveComputer Science Muzvare Simbiso Mautsa vanoti vave kutorarama nekutenga nekutengesa. Muzvare Mautsa vanoti izvi handizvo zviri pamoyo wavo. VaPrince Mutebuka vakapedza zvidzidzo zekuongorora zvicherwa kana kuti geology muna2017 vatiwo pane vavakadzidza navo gumi nevasere, vashanu chete ndivo vakawana mabasa. Vati kubvira zvavapedza zvidzidzo zvavo havasati vambo bayirwawo chitupa chebasa uyewo vati kuti vatange mugodhi wavo zvinoda mari iyo yavasina. Mutauriri wevechidiki muCitizens Coalition for Change VaStephen Chuma vaudza Studio 7 kuti sevechidiki vanoshushikana zvikuru nenyaya yekushaya mabasa . Vapomera bato reZanu PF mhosva yekuondonga hupfumi hwenyika. Asi vakafanobata chigaro chemutevedzeri wemukuru wevechidiki mubato reZANU PF VaTendai Chirau vaudza Studio 7 kuti hurumende iri kuumba mabasa vakapa muenzaniso wekuti pakugadzirwa kwemigwagwa v vanhu vari kuwana mabasa. VaChirau vatiwo vechidiki vasina mari vane mikana yekunotsvaka mari kumabhanga ari kushanda nehurumende kusimudzira vechidiki. Vanoongorora nyaya dzezvehupfumi VaMasimba Kuchera vatiwo zvakakosha kuti hupfumi huvandudzwe munyika kuti vechidiki vawane chouviri. VaKuchera vakurudzirawo kuti vechidiki vabatanewo pamwe nekudzidziswa zvemabhisimusi. Studio 7 yakundikana kunzwa kubva kudivi rehurumende sezvo mutevedzeri wegurukota revechidiki nezvemitambo, Muzvare Yeukai Simbanegavi vange vasati vapindura mibvunzo yatavatumira pataenda pamhepo.
title: Vamwe veChidiki Vononga Svosve neMuromo Nekushaya Mabasa

text: Vamwe varimi vekuRushinga vari kuchishandisa mvura yekudiridzira vanoti vava kutyira ramangwana ravo sezvo dhamu rinovapa mvura, riri kuzara nejecha rakawandisa. Chirongwa chevarimi cheChimhanda Irrigation Scheme mudunhu reMashonaland Central, chine varimi zana nemakumi mana nevashanu, uye chakatanga mugore ra1992. Varimi ava vanoti kunyange hazvo nzvimbo yeruRushinga iri yedzimwe nzvimbo dzisingawani mvura yakakwana, vanoti dhamu reGulliver ranga richivapa mvura izvo zvaiita kuti varime katatu pagore vachiwana zvekudya pamwe nemari yaibva mukutengesa zvirimwa zvavo. Nekuda kwejecha rakawandisa rapinda mudhamu iri, varimi vanoti vave kutyira kuti mumakore mashomana anotevera, nzara inogona kudzoka zvakare munzvimbo mavo kana dambudziko rejecha mudhamu rikasagadzirwa. Mumwe wevarimi vepaChimhanda Irrigation Scheme, VaAlfa Karero, vanoti vakakwanisa kupedza nzara mumba pamwe nekuendesa vana kuchikoro nemari yekurima. Asi VaKarero vanoti ramamgwana ravo nemhuri dzavo harichisina kujeka. VaKarero vanoti shuviro yavo ndeyekuti hurumende igarise patsva varimi vari kurima kumusoro kwedhamu iri kuitira kuti vasavhiringa ivhu riri kumusoro kwedhamu iri. Izvi zvatsigirwa nemumwe murimi, Va Chinguku Gunde, avo vatiwo hupenyu hwavo hwange hwachinja zvikuru nekuda kwekurima vachidiridzira. VaGunde vati chikumbiro chavo kuhurumende ndechekuti vabatsirwewo kubvisa jecha riri kupinda mudhamu kuti varambe vachiwana raramo. Sachigaro weChimhanda Irrigation Scheme, VaStanley Kapasura, vanoti shuviro yavo ndeyekuti hurumende pamwe nemasangano akazvimirira vabatsiro Chimhanda kubvisa jecha munzizi dzinodira mudhamu reGulliver. Mukuru weMazowe Catchment muZimbabwe National Water Authority, Amai ColletaTundu, vanoti ongororo yakaitwa mugore ra2015 inoratidza kuti zvikamu makumi mana kubva muzana zvedhamu iri ijecha. Amai Tundu vanoti kurimwa kuri kuitwa nevamwe vagari vari kumusoro kwedhamu pamwe nekutemwa kwemiti ndozviri kukonzera kueredzwa kwejecha richipinda mudhamu reGulliver iri. Hurumende yakatanga chirongwa chekubvisa jecha munzizi nemadhamu makuru munyika. Nyanzvi dzinoti chirongwa chekubvisa jecha iri chinoda mari yakawanda zvikuru. Nhengo dzekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvenharaunda dzakashanyira irrigation yeChimhanda neChitatu vaine chinangwa chekuona kuti dambudziko rakatarisana nevarimi iri rngagadzirwe seyi. No media source currently available
title: Varimi Vochema Chema Zvichitevera Dhamu Razara Jecha kuChimhanda

text: Mufundisi mukuru we St Georges Anglican Church, muCape Town, Archibishop Thabo Cecil Makgoba, vakazivisa nezuro kuti kereke yavo ichaita zvakasiya zvarairwa naArchbishop Desmond Tutu vasati vafa. VaTutu vakaudza Archibishop Makgoba kuti kana vafa, vanoda kupiswa uye madota avo agochengeterwa mukereke iyi. Archibishop Tutu vakashanda paSt Georges Anglican Church muCape Town kubva mugore ra1986 kusvika muna1994. Kuchengetwa kwemurumbi wa Archbishop Tutu kuchaitwa na 10 o’clock mangwanani emusi wa1 Ndira, 2022, vagopiswa uye madota avo achizochengeterwa mukereke iyi, mavakashanda kwemakore mazhinji. Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika, vachidzidzisa paTswane University of Technology, Muzvinafundo Ricky Mukonza, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vezvematongerwo enyika, pamwe nevafundisi vazhinji, vane zvokudzidza zvakawanda kubva kuna VaTutu, vachiti VaTutu vaigona kusanganisa zvematongerwo enyika nezvekereke nenzira inoyananisa. No media source currently available
title: Archibishop Tutu Voradzikwa Musi wa1 Ndira, 2022

text: Mubato reMDC-T munonzi mave nezinyeke-nyeke zvekare zvichitevera mhirizhonga yakaitika nemusi weSvondo pamahofisi ebato iri muguta reBulawayo. Pane mashoko anoti vamwe vakuru-vakuru vasiri kufara nemubatanidzwa wakapindwa nebato ravo nemamwe mapato anopikisa vave kufunga kubuda mubato. Vanoziva zviri kuitika vanoti vakuru vakuru ava, avo vanosanganisira mumwe wevatevedzeri vebato iri Muzvare Thokozani Khupe, sachigaro webato iri VaLovemore Moyo, pamwe nemurongi wemabasa VaAbednico Bhebe, vakatora chisungo chekushora mubatanidzwa weMDC Alliance wakapindwa nebato ravo reMDC-T nemamwe mapato anopikisa, uyo wakaparurwa zviri pamutemo nemusi weMugovera muHarare. Vatatu ava nevamwe vatsigiri vavo vasiri kudawo zvemubatanidzwa, vaive vasipo pachiitiko ichi uye vakaita musangano neSvondo pamahofisi ebato reMDC-T muBulawayo. Musangano uyu wakambovhiringwa nemhirizhonga apo vamwe vanonzi ndevamwe vechidiki vebato reMDC-T vakasvika pamusangano uyu vachibvunzurudza vaivepo kuti waive weyi. Studio 7 yaedza kunzwa kubva kuna Muzvare Khupe asi nharembozha yavo yange isingadavirwi. Asi vanoziva zviri kuitika ava, avo vasina kuda kudomwa nemazita kana kubuda pamhepo, vanoti chimwe chezvisungo zvakaitwa pamusangano uyu ndechekuti vasingafare nemubatanidzwa uyu vabude mubato reMDC T vavambe ravo rinotungamirwa naMuzvare Khupe, VaMoyo naVaBhebe vari vatevedzeri vavo. Muzvare Khupe vakagara vabuda pachena kuti havafarire mubatanidzwa weMDC T nemamwe mapato kunyanya mumatunhu eMatabeleland umo vanoti bato iri rine vatsigiri vakakwana. Mutevedzeri wemutauriri webato reMDC T Muzvare Thabitha Khumalo vati vanoziva kuti kune vamwe vari muMDC T vasiri kuwirirana nenyaya yemushandirapamwe nemamwe mapato asi vati zvakaitwa nebato ravo izvi ndizvo zvakabvumiranwa nevakawanda mubato senzira ichaburitsa veruzhinji mumatambudziko avakatarisana nawo. Muzvare Khumalo vati havasati vave neruzivo rwakakwana nezvakaitika pamusangano wakaitwa nevamwe vavo nezuro muBulawayo, asi vati bato ravo richaita ongororo munguva pfupi inotevera. Asi sachigaro vebato iri VaLovemore Moyo varamba mashoko ekuti vari kuronga kubuda muMDC-T vachinoumba bato ravo vari vatatu. VaMoyo vaudza Studio 7 kuti hapana asingazivi kuti mubato ravo hamuna kuwirirana pamusoro penyaya yekuumba mubatanidzwa. Vati musangano wavakaita nezuro waive wekuzeya nezvemubatanidzwa uyu, zvigaro zvinonzi zvakapiwa kubato reMDC inotungamirirwa naMuzvinafundo Welshman Ncube, uye nzira yekuenda mberi kuti vagadzirise nyaya iyi. VaMoyo vati vanotarisira kuti sebato, vachagadzirisa matambudziko aya nekukasika. Zvichakadaro vebato reZAPU vanoti zvakanaka chose kuti vemapato anopikisa vabatane asi ivo havawone mubatanidzwa weMDC Alliance uri mubatanidzwa chaiwo wemapato anopikisa. Mutauriri webato iri vaIphithule Maphosa vaudza Studio 7 kuti bato ravo rakazvipira kuramba richisanda nemamwe mapato anopikisa kuita mushandirapamwe. Vanhu vakawanda vanoti mapato anopikisa angakwanisa kukunda bato riri kutonga reZanu PF chete kana akaita mubatanidzwa unosanganisa mapato ose kunyanya ayo anofungidzirwa kuti ane rutsigiro rwakati kureyi akadai seZAPU neNational People’s Party inotungamirwa naAmai Joice Mujuru. No media source currently available
title: Vamwe Vakuru-Vakuru muMDC-T Vanoramba Mashoko eKuti Vari Kuronga Kubuda muBato Iri

text: Mutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica VaDonald Trump avo vambenge vachitsika madziro vachiramba kusaina mabhiri anoti rekubatsira vanhu munguva yeCovid nekuti hurumende irambe ichishanda vazoita izvi vari kuFlorida uko vari pazororo. VaTrump vambenge vachiti havasi kuda kusaina mabhiri aya kusvika vanhu vapihwa zvuru zviviri zvemadhora pamunhu semari yekubatsirikana munguva yeCovid-19 kwete madhora mazana matanhatu akatenderanwa nedare reCongress.
title: VaTrump Vosaina Bhiri reKuti Vanhu muAmerica Vabatsirwe muNguva yeCovid

text: Zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri muno muAmerica zvinoti nyanzvi munyaya dzesarudzo pamwe nevedzinhau vakakundikana kuona kuti VaDonald Trump vebato reRepublican ndivo vachakunda musarudzo dzemutungamiri wenyika. Vazhinji vemapepanhau nematerevhizheni vaiti Amai Hillary Clinton veDemocratic Party ndivo vachakunda musarudzo dzemutungamiri wenyika, idzo dzaikwikwidzwa nevanhu vashanu. No media source currently available  Vamwe vaikwikwidzana naVatrump naMai Clinton ndaVaGary Johnson vebato reLibertarian, Amai Jill Stein pamwe nevakakwikwidza vakazvimirira, VaEvan MacMullin. Vanhu vakawanda, kusanganisirawo zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvakawanda, vaifunga kuti Amai Clinton vachakunda VaTrump nyore nyore, vasina kana kumboburitsa ziya. Asi, zvisineyi, zvinhu zvakafamba nepamwe, VaTrump vakakunda zvine mutsindo. Mumashoko avo ekutambira kukunda kwavo, VaTrump vanoti vachashanda nemunhu wese, vachiti izvi zvakavakoshera zvikuru. Nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika Doctor Chipo Dendere, vanodzidzisa paGettysburg College mudunhu rePennsylvania vanoti zvizhinji zvinokwanisa kudzidzwa nevanhu vemuzimbabwe, zvikuru vemapato anopikisa, zvakaita sekunzwisisa kuti Zanu PF ine vanhu vanoitsigira. Mutori wenhau webepanhau reZimbabwe Independent, VaElias Mambo, avo vari muAmerica mavaiongorora sarudzo, vanoti vanowirirana nemaonero aDoctor Dendere ekuti vanopikisa vanofanirwa kushanda kukurudzira vanhu kuti vanovhota. Vanoti vanoona vanopikisa vachitarisira kuti vanhu vanofanirwa kungonovhota sezvo vasingadi Zanu PF kana mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe.
title: Zimbabwe Yokurudzirwa Kuti iDzidzewo Kubva kuSarudzo dzemuAmerica

text: Panguva iyo nyika yatarisana nesarudzo dza2023, kuvhundutsirwa nekushungurudzwa kwenhengo dzebato rinopikisa reCitizens’ Coalition for Change nenhengo dzeZanu PF, zvikuru kumaruwa, kunonzi kuri kutowedzera. Nhengo dzeCCC dzinonzi dziri kumanikidzwa kupinda misangano yeZanu PF, kupisiswa nhumbi dzebato radzo dzeruvara rwe yellow, uye kunzi dzichadzingwa mumisha yadzigere kana dzakaramba dzichidyidzana nebato rinopikisa iri. Kunyange hazvo mapurisa pamwe nekomisheni inoona nezvekodzero dzevanhu, yeZimbabwe Human Rights Commission vari kuti vave kuferefeta nyaya yekutyisidzirwa nerufu kwemutungamiri weCCC VaNelson Chamisa nemhuri yavo pamwe nevatsigiri vavo nenhengo yeZanu PF, VaAbton Mashayanyika, bato riri kutonga rinoti harikurudzire nhengo dzaro kuita zvemhirizhonga. Mutauriri weZanu PF, VaChris Mutsvangwa, vakati hutungamiri hwebato ravo hahukurudzire mhirizhonga uye vanoita izvi vanofanira kumhan’arirwa kumapurisa. Asi vebato rinopikisa reCitizens' Coalition for Change vanoti mapurisa ane rimwero neZanu PF vachiti mutemo unoshandiswa pachitariswa kuti munhu abuda mumba maani. Sachigaro veCCC mudunhu reNorth America, VaTawanda Svosve Dzvokora, vanoti muenzaniso wekuti mutemo unoshandiswa zvakasiyana ndewekusungwa kwenhengo dzebato ravo kusanganisira mumiriri weZengeza West muparamende, VaJob Sikhala nevamwe vekuChitungwiza vachipomerwa mhosva yekukurudzira mhirizhonga asi VaMashayanyika vachisiiwa vachizvifambira zvavo. Asi nhengo yeZanu PF, VaGadzira Chirumhanzu, vanoti pane musiyano mukuru pakati pezvinonzi zvakataurwa naVaMashayanyiika nezvakaitwa naVaSikhala, vachiti ndizvo zvakaita kuti VaSikhala vanyimwe mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso nemutongi wedare nekuda kwetsika yavo yekuita zvemhirizhonga nguva dzose. Pane vanonzi vari kupisa nhumbi dzebato rinopikisa, VaChirumhanzu vanoti vanhu ivavo vanofanirwa kusungwa, vachiti veCCC vanofanirwa kunge vaine humbowo hunoratidza kuti ngana ndiye aita ichi, kwete kungoti ibato reZanu PF. Ukuwo VaDzvokora vanoti bato ravo, kubva kumutungamiri wavo VaChamisa, haridi zvemhirizhonga, uye harina zvikwanisiro zvekuti vaite zvemhirizhonga sezvo vasina mari kana zvombo sezvavanoti zvine bato riri kutonga reZanu PF. Vachipeta chirongwa, VaChirumhanzu vanotiwo vanokurudzira nhengo dzebato ravo reZanu PF kuti dzidzivirire rusunguko rwenyika redonhwe reropa radzo rekupedzisira, vachiramba kuti havasi kukurudzira mhirizhonga asi kuti pasi rose kusanganisira kuAmerica kunonzi kune hutongo hwejekere, vanotengesa nyika vanotorerwa matanho. No media source currently available
title: Bato reZanu PF roKurudzirwa Kusiyana neTsika yeKushungrudza Nhengo dzeCCC paMberi peSarudzo dza2022

text: Nhengo gumi nenhatu dzebato rinopikisa reCitizens Coalition for Change dzakasungwa nezuro muHarare dzamiswa pamberi pedare ramejasitiriti nhasi dzichipomerwa mhosva yekurova mupurisa. Gweta riri kumirira vasungwa ava, VaKudzai Kadzere, veZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights, vanoti varume gumi nevaviri pamwe nemudzimai mumwechete ava vakarohwa zvakaipisisa vari mukamba yemapurisa, uye mutongi wedare Muzvare Yeukai Nzuda havana kuvapa mukana wekuti vasungwa ava vaonekwe navanachiremba. Nhengo dzebato dzeCCC idzi dzakasungwa muHarare umo dzaitsvaga rutsigiro pamwe nekukurudzira veruzhinji kuti vaende kumusangano wekutsvaga rutsigiro uchaitwa nemutungamiri webato radzo VaNelson Chamisa kuZimbabwe Grounds mumusha weHighfields mangwana. VaKadzere vanoti vasungwa ava vanzi vadzoke kudare nemusi wa 22 mwedzi uno, unove Chipiri chinouya apo vanotarisirwa kusvitsa chichemo chavo chekuti vapiwe mukana wekurapwa kudare. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, bato reCCC rinoti musangano wekutsvaga rutsigiro wanga wakarongwa nevari kuda kukwikwidza musarudzo dzema by-election dzeparamende mudunhu reHarare East vari mumwe wevatevedzeri vemutungamiri webato iri, Va Tendai Biti, paChemhanza Grounds kuOld Tafara watadziswa nevanofungidzirwa kuti inhengo dzeZanu PF. Musangano uyu unonzi wakanga wabvumidzwa nemapurisa asi achiti paifanirwa kuungana vanhu vasingadariki zana chete kutevedzera mutemo wekudzivirira kupararira kweCovid-19. Bato iri rinotiwo nhengo dzaro dzinodarika makumi masere dzasungwa kuMasvingo uko dzanga dzichitsvaga rutsigiro mudzimba. Bato iri rati nhengo dzaro dzanga dzakachengetedzwa pakamba yemapurisa yeMasvingo Central Police Station panguva yataenda pamhepo. Hatina kukwanisa kubata mutauriri wemapurisa Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi kanawo veZanu PF muHarare East kuti tinzwe mativi avo.
title: Nhengo dzeCCC Gumi neNhatu Dzakasungwa Chishanu muHarare Dzinomiswa Pamberi peDare

text: Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvemataongerwo enyika Doctor Pedzisayi Ruhanya avo vari kushanda neUniversity of Johannesburg vanoti ZEC inofanira kuburitsa gwaro remazita evavhoti rine mifananidzo yevanhu sezvinodiwa nechirongwa chitsva cheBVR. Doctor Ruhanya vanoti chiso chemunhu hachifanire kuwandiswa asi chinofanira kuwandiswa ivhoti. Mashoko aya anotevera kutsika madziro kuri kuita sachigaro weZEC Amai Priscilla Chigumba vachiti havasi kuzoburitsa gwaro revavhoti rine mifananidzo. Zvichakadaro, sangano rinoona nezvemitemo nemashandiro eparamende reVeritas raramba mashoko ari kubuda mubepanhau reHerald kunyanya kuti riri kuda kukanganisa mashandiro esangano reZimbabwe Electoral Commission kana kuti ZEC nekuriendesa kumatare edzimhosva richipomera mhosva yekutyora mitemo yesarudzo. Bepanhau iri rinotiwo veVeritas vanoda kusvibisa zita remutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa. Sangano iri ratiwo rakatanga basa rekuti mutemo wesarudzo ugadziriswe muna 2013 pakatambirwa bumbiro remutemo idzva. Asi veVeritas vanoti izvi ndezvemugotsi matsuro sezvo nyaya zhinji vakadzikwidza kumatare VaMnangagwa vasati vatora masimba vachishandisa mauto kubva kune vaimbova mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe. Veritas yati haina bato rematongerwo enyika rainotsigira asi yakurudzira kuti bumbir remutemo richengetedzwe uye kuti munyika muitwe sarudzo dzakachena. Sangano iri ratiwo rinoda kuti kana sarudzo dzaitwa mapato asazoenda kumatare achidzipikisa nekuti bumbiro remutemo rinenge risina kuteverwa. Veritas yatiwo pamutemo ZEC inofanira kungotevera mutemo kwete kuda kutara iyo mitemo nekupikisa nyaya dzose dzinenge dzaendeswa kumatare kunyangwe iri risiri basa rayo. No media source currently available
title: ZEC Inoudzwa Kuti Chinowandiswa Ivhoti Kwete Mifananidzo

text: Kanzuru yeguta reHarare yaita musangano nevagari kuitira kuti pakurukure zvakakosha zvinofanirwa kugadziriswa muguta pamazuva zana ekutanga. Kanzuru yeHarare inoti pamazuva zana ayo ekutanga, ichagadzirisa dambudziko revanotengesa mumigwagwa, kuitira kuti vatengese zvisina njodzi yekuparadzira zvirwere nekugadzirisa mudhorobha kuti mufambike zvakasununguka. Kanzuru inoti inodawo kugadzirisa zvivakwa zvekanzuru kusanganisira zvimbuzi zvinoshandiswa neveruzhinji pamwe nekugadzirisa nyaya yemvura. Vachitaura vakamirira meya weguta reHarare, Muzvare Kudzai Kadzombe, vanova kanzura kuMalborough, vati kanzuru yavo ine chinangwa chekuchenesa guta pamwe nekuzadzisa mabasa ainotarisirwa kuita neveruzhinji. Muzvare Kadzombe vatiwo vakatarisirawo kuwanisa vagari vemuHarare mvura yakachena. VaHardlife Mudzingwa, avo vanoshanda neCommunity Water Alliance, vaudza Studio7 kuti chikuru chavanoda kuti kanzuru igadzirise nechimbichimbi kusimudzirwa kwekodzero yekuwanisa vagari mvura yakachena. Nhengo inoshanda neCombined Harare Residents Association, VaReuben Akili, vatiwo nhengo dzavo dzakatarisira kugadzirisa mabhadharirwo anoitwa mari kukanzuru vachiti mari dzevagari dzavanobhadhara dzimwe nguva hadziratidzi pamapepa emvura. VaAkili vanotiwo vakatarisira kuti kanzuru itsva iyi iite mabasa ayo pajekerere pamwe nekuzivisa vagari zvavanenge vachiita. Vagari muHarare vanoti vanoshuvira kuti kanzuru yavo ichashanda zvakanaka pasina kupindira kwebazi rezvematunhu sezvaiitika mukanzuru yakanga ichishanda iri pasi pevaimbove meya weguta iri, VaBernard Manyenyeni, avo vakapedza temu yemuna Chikunguru. VaManyenyeni vakatiwo kupindira kwehurumende kwakakanganisa zvikuru mashandiro wekanzuru yeHarare. Kupindira kwehurumende mumashandiro emumaguta kwakatanga muna 2000, apo MDC yakatora makanzura ose emumaguta. No media source currently available
title: Kanzuru yeHarare Inoita Musangano neVagari

text: Vatsigiri vemaWarriors vakawanda vari kutambira nemufaro kudzoka munhandare mushure mekumbokuvara kwakaputeni wemaWarriors Knowledge Musona uyo akakanda zvibodzwa zviviri. Asi kuunganidza vamwe vatambi vechikwata chemaWarriors kuri kutemesa ZIFA musoro. Musona akakanda zvibodzwa zviviri achangobva kunaya mukukuvara apo chikwata chake cheAS Eupen kuBelgium chakaita mangange 3-3 ne Leuven mukupera kwesvondo. Izvi zvafadza vatsigiri venhabvu muZimbabwe sezvo chikwata chenyika chemaWarriors chakatarisana nemitambo mikuru miviri munzira yekuenda kumakundano e2021 Africa Cup of Nations. Musona arikudiwa kutungamira chikwata ichi kukunda mumitambo neBotswana neZambia kuti chibudirire kuenda kumafainari e2021 Africa Cup of Nations. Asi hapana tarisiro yekuti vamwe vatambi veZimbabwe vari kuEnglandTendai Darikwa, Brendon Galloway, Jordan Zemura naAdmiral Muskwe vachauya kuzotambira maWarriors nemhaka yemitemo yeko yeCovid 19. Chikwata chaMarvelous Nakamba cheAston Villa chakatozivisa kare kuti mutambi uyu haasi kuuya kuzotambira nyika yake pamitambo yeAfcon iyi.  Maneja wemaWarriors VaWellington Mpandare vanoti vakamirira zvekare kunzwa kuzvikwata zvaTino Kadewere naMarshall Munetsi kuFrance kuti vatambi ava vachauya here. Izvi zvasiya Musona ari iye mupata kiyi pamitambo iyi iyo Zimbabwe inofanira kukunda kuti iende kuAfcon kechitatu kakateverana. Munyori wenhau Edgar Gweshe uyo anotsigira chikwata cheDynamos anoti arikutarisira kuti Musona achaitira Zimbabwe zvaari kuitira Eupen. Muongorori wemutambo wenhabvu VaJairos Sendekai vanoti Zimbabwe inofanira kurongera mitambo iyi isingatarise vatambi vari kuBritain. Kadewere akasauya Musona angangobatanidzwa naKnox Mutizwa uyo anotambira Golden Arrows kuSouth Africa. Mutizwa akakandawo chibodzwa nezuro apo Golden Arrows yakarova Black Leopards 3-1. Zimbabwe irikusangana neBotswana musi wa 25 Kurume vachizopedzisira neZambia musi wa 30 Kurume. No media source currently available
title: Zimbabwe Warriors Yotatarika Kuunganidza Chikwata cheMitambo yeAfrica Nations Cup

text: Mapato makuru ezvematongerwo enyika anoti reZanu PF nCcitizens Coalition for Change, CCC, ane muonero wakasiyana padanho reRussia rekupinda zvine chisimba muUkraine mambakwedza emusi weChina. Mauto eRussia arwisa guta guru reUkraine reKyiv mambakwedza kusanganisira nemamwe maguta muchiitiko chinonzi nehutungamiri hweUkraine chasiya vanhu vangangosvika makumi mana vaurayiwa. Vanhuwo zvavo vanonzi vari mushishi kuita chipatapata kuedza kubuda munzvimbo dziri kurwiswa neRussia idzi. Kupinda nechisimba kweRussia muUkraine kunonzi nasachigaro veCCC mudunhu reNorth America, VaTawanda Dzvokora ndihwo hunhu hwenyika dzine hutungamiri hwehumbimbindoga, hwakaita sehwavanoti hunoitwa naVaVladmir Putin. “Putin ari kuratidza humbimbindoga hwake nekupinda munyika imwe yakazvimirira, a sovereign nation, uchinopaza, uchinorwisa, uninoponda, uchinouraya uchishandisa twunhu twusina nebasa rese. Ndizvo zvatiri kuona zviri kuitwa naPutin,” VaDzvokora vanodaro. Vanoti hondo iyi ichaunza matambudziko akasiyanasiyana, kwete muUkraine chete, asi kuti munyika dzakawanda pasi rose kusanganisirawo Zimbabwe nekuda kwekukwira kuchaita mutengo wemafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari, izvo zvinozoitawo kuti mitengo yezvimwe zvinhu ikwidzwe. Nhengo yeZanu PF vari gweta, Doctor Simba Mavaza, vanove gweta, vanoti kunyange vachiwirirana naVaDzvokora kuti hondo yakaipa, Russia ine kodzero yekupinda muUkraine nechisimba. “Chekutanga chandinoda kuti VaDzvokora vanzwisise ndechekuti Ukraine yakanga iri part yeRussia. Ikaita sahwira weNATO inenge yave kufumura zvakanga zvakavigika mukati meRussia neUkraine. Saka izvo ndizvo zvapa chikonzero chaita Russia isimuke,” Doctor Mavaza vanotsigira maonero avo panyaya iyi. Vanoenderera mberi vachiti Russia ine kodzero yekuchengetedza zvinhu zvayo zviri muUkraine vachiti ine zvakawanda mumapoka akasiyanasiyana kusanganisira hupfumi hwayo. Zimbabwe inotenga zvakawanda kubva kuUkraine, zvinosanganisira gorosi nemichina, ukuwo ichitengeserawo Ukraine zvicherwa, kunyange hazvo ichinyanyodyidzana zvayo neRussia. Mutungamiri weRussia, VaVladmir Putin vazivisa nezvekurwisa kwemauto avo Ukraine vachiyambira dzimwe nyika kuti dzakaedza kuda kupindira dzichasangana nezvadzisati dzamboona muhupenyu hwadzo. Ukuwo mutungamiri weAmerica, VaJoe Biden, vashoropodza zvikuru kurwiswa kweUkraine neRussia uku, uko vati kwaitika Russia isina kudenhwa. America nevamwe vainodyidzana navo vari kuronga kudzika zvirango zvakaomarara zvekuomesera Russia pamusoro pezvimwe zvatovepo kare. Asi vamwe vanoti havaoni zvirango izvi zvichimisa Russia kurwisa Ukraine, sezvo iine shamwari dzimwe dzakaita seChina dzinogona kuibatsira. Russia iri kuda kuti Ukraine isapinda mumubatanidzwa weNATO, asi vamwe vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vanoti Ukraine inofanirwa kuita zvido zvayo sezvo iri nyika inozvitonga. No media source currently available
title: Mapato eCitizens Coalition for Change neZanu PF Oita Maonero Akasiyana paKurwiswa kweUkraine neRussia

text: Vanachiremba vachangopedza zvidzidzo zvavo vari muzvipatara zvehurumende, nezuro vakakanda mapadza pasi vachinyunyuta nekusagadziriswa kwezvichemo zvavo nehurumende. Kuramwa mabasa kwavanachiremba uku kunonzi kwakakonzerawo kuti zvipatara zvikuru zvemunyika, zvakaita seMpilo Central Hospital zviise zviziviso pamikova zvinozvisa veruzhinji kuti nekuda kwematanho akatorwa navavachiremba, zvakanga zvave kungotora varwere vari munjodzi chete. Mutungamiri wavanachiremba vepaMpilo Central Hospital, uye vari mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wesangano ravachiremba nyika yose reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association, Dr. Mxolisi Ngwenya, vanotivakanyorera kuhurumende musi wa23 Ndira vachipa zvichemo zvavo, asi havana kuwana mhinduro inovagutsa. Dr. Ngwenya, vanove zvakare mutauriri weZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association, vanoti vazonyorera zvakare hurumende imwe tsamba musi wa 5Kukadzi, asi kusvika nhasi hapana zvati zvagadziriswa. Zvimwe zvezvichemo zvavo zvinosanganisira zvekuti varwere vasatenge mishonga, asi kuti vaiwane muzvipatara, mari dze on-call allowance dziwedzerwe kusvika pa$720.00 pamwedzi, uye kuti mihoro yavanachiremba vachangotanga basa isiyaniswe neyevagara pabasa. Zvichakadaro, hurumende inonzi iri kukurudzira vanachiremba vari pakuramwa mabasa ava kuti vadzokere pamabasa. Bepanhau reHerald rinoti gurukota rezvehutano Dr. David Parirenyatwa pamwechete nebhodhi rezvehutano reHealth Services Board, vakaburitsa gwaro neChina usiku vachikurudzira kuti vanachiremba vose vakapinda pakuramwa mabasa vadzokere pabasa, vachiti hurumende iri kutarisisa zvichemo zvavo. No media source currently available
title: VanaChiremba vemuZvipatara zveHurumende Vanokanda Mapadza Pasi

text: Mutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica VaDonald Trump vebato remaRepublicans nemutungamiri webato remaDemocrats VaJoe Biden neMuvhuro vakapeta hurongwa hwavo hwekutsvaga rutsigiro musarudzo dziri kuitwa neChipiri Vaviri ava vari mumatunhu akakosha zvikuru akaita sePennsylvania umo VaTrump vakakunda musarudzo dzadarika muna 2016 asi zvinhu zvakati omeyi rwendo rwuno sezvo VaBiden vakaberekerwa mudunhu iri uye vainewo rutsiro rwakasimba. VaTrump vari kutsvaga rutsigiro nhasi muPittsburg vozoenda kuNorth Carolina, Michigan neWisconsin ukuwo VaBiden vari mudunhu reOhio. Zvichabuda musarudzo zviri kutarisirwa kutora vhiki sezvo matunhu aine mitemo yakasiyana siyana pakuverengwa kwemavhoti. Tichiri panyaya iyi, vanhu muZimbabwe vane maonero akasiyana panyaya yesarudzo dzemuAmerica idzi. Gurukota rezvemitemo VaZiyambi Ziyambi vanoti sarudzo dzekuAmerica hadzinei neZimbabwe uye nyika haipindire musarudzo iyi sezvinoita America. Asi mutevedzeri wemutauriri weMDC Alliance VaClifford Hlatswayo vanoti Zimbabwe haifanirwe kuoma musoro asi kudzidza kune vamwe kuti munyika muve nesarudzo dzisina mutauro sezvinogara zvichiitika. Mukuru weZimrights VaDzikamai Bere vanoti zvikomo zvinopanana mhute nyika dzinodzidza zvakawanda kune dzimwe nyika sezvo pasina nyika inogona kuti isu tisu tinoita sarudzo dzisina zvipomerwa. Mashoko aya atsinhirwa nemurongi wemabasa musangano rinoona nezvesarudzo munyika reElection Resource Centre VaSolomon Bobosibunu. Dzimwe nyanzvi dzmunyaya dzesarudzo dzinoti Zimbabwe inogona kudzidza nyaya yekugadzirisa gwaro revavhoti iro rinogara richinetsa nguva dzose panoitwa sarudzo. Sarudzo dzemuAmerica dziri kutarisirwa zvakanyanya nenyika dzose dzepasi rino. No media source currently available
title: VaTrump naVaBiden Votatsurana Musarudzo neChipiri Asi Zimbabwe Inoti Hainei neMuchato weDhongi neBere

text: Mutungamiri webato rinopikisa reMDC-T VaDouglas Mwonzora vanoti chimwe chakapa kuti vaforere nekutambira munda kubva kuhurumende inyaya yekuti muzukuru wegamba rehondo yeChimurenga Ishe Rekayi Tagwena vakashaya muna 1984. “Ini ndiri muzukuru waRekayi Tangwena, ndiri weSimboti, tiri veMadzimambo kuNyanga ikoko, Saka Land yese iri kutaurwa iyi, iri pasi peland yedu yehumambo hwedu.” VaMwonzora vaudza Studio 7. Vaenderera mberi vachiti, “Zvingaita sei kuti Senator, kuti mwana waMambo, kuti muzukuru waMambo agonzi haana munda munyika inotongwa nemadzitateguru ake? Ishe Tangwena vakabatsira vaimbova mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe naVaEdgar Tekere kuyambuka kuenda kuMozambique kunorwa hondo yerusungunuko. Izvi zvinotevera kutorerwa ivhu ravo nevachena mugore ra1966. Nzvimbo yehushe hwaTangwena inosanganisira Nyamaropa, Matema, Tombo, Bumhira, Regina neTrout beck kuNyanga South kunova kwakapihwa VaMwonzora purazi. VaMwozora varamba kuti vari kushanda neZanu-PF vachiti vamwe vanopikisa vakaita semumwe mutevezderi webato reCCC VaWelshman Ncube vakapihwawo mapurazi. Panyaya yekuti zvavari kupihwa nehurumuende zvawandisa kudarika zvakapihwa mushakabvu Gibson Sibanda naDoctor Thokozani Khupe pavaitungamira vanopikisa mudare reparamende, VaMwonzora vati vaviri ava vainge vaine zvigaro zviri pasi pavo sezvo ivo vakapkeka bhutsu dzamushakabvu Morgan Tsvangirai. VaMwonzora vatiwo mumwe mutevedzeri wemutungamiri webatoreCCC VaTendai Biti vakapihwa munda kuNyanga. Asi VaBiti vaudza Studio 7 kut zviri kutaurwa naVaMwonzora hazvina nematuro ose nekuti havana kubvira vapihwa kana nzvimbo yekuvakira chaiyo nehurumende. No media source currently available
title: VaMwonzora Vanoti: "Ndakapihwa Purazi Nekuti Ndiri Muzukuru waIshe Tangwena"

text: Nhoroondo yehupenyu hwevaimbove mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Gabriel Mugabe. No media source currently available
title: Nhoroondo yeHupenyu hweVaimbove Mutungamiri weNyika, VaRobert Mugabe.

text: Sangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu reHuman Rights Watch raburitswa gwaro riri kupomera mhosva mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, yekutyora kodzero dzevanhu zvakanyanya. Gwaro iri rinonzi Human Rights Watch World Report 2020. Hurumende yeZimbabwe iri kupomerwa mhosva yekurega mauto achipuura nekubata chibharo vanhu vairatidzira nevamwe vaisaratidzira gore rapera. Rinotiwo vanopikisa nevemasangano akazvimirira vari kumbunyikidzwa uye mitemo inonzi nehurumende iri kuvandudzwa yakaita seMOPA iri kutoshandiswa kutyora kodzero dzevanhu zvakanyanya. Sangano reSADC rinonziwo raita ndonda pakugadzirisa matambudziko ari munyika dziri mugungano iri kusanganisira South Africa, Zimbabwe, Eswatini neMozambique. Angola chete ndiyo inonzi iri kumboita zviri nani pakuvandudza mitemo kuti iremekedze kodzero dzevanhu. Human Rights Watch inoti vaive mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vaifanirawo kutongerwa mhosva dzavakapara pavakabviswa pachigaro. Asi mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaEnergy Mutodi, vaudza Studio 7 kuti Zimbabwe iri kuzorwa mafuta enguruve yaisina kudya No media source currently available Mukuru we Human Rights Watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica, VaDewa Mavhinga, vanoti Zimbabwe yadzokera kumashure zvakanyanya panyaya yekodzero dzevanhu. No media source currently available
title: Human Rights Watch Inoti Hurumende yaVaMnangagwa Iri Kutyora Kodzero dzeVanhu

text: Vakoti vanoti vari kudzokera kubasa mushure memwedzi inodarika mitatu vachiramwa mabasa kunyange hazvo zvichemo zvavo zvisati zvagadziriswa. Sangano rinomirira vakoti reZimbabwe Nurses Association, Zina, rinoti nhengo dzaro dzadzokera kubasa zvisinei nekuti zvavaive vamboramwira mabasa zvinosanganisira mari yemihoro nekushaya zvekushandisa zvakakwana hazvisati zvagadziriswa. Mutungamiriri weZina, VaEnoch Dongo, vati kudzokera kwavo kubasa kunotevera chikumbiro chakaitwa negurukota rezvehutano uye vari mutevedzeri wemutungamiriri wenyika, VaConstantino Chiwenga, chekuti vambovapa mukana wekuedza kugadzirisa matambudziko ari muzvipatara. VaDongo vatiwo pamusangano wavakaita, VaChiwenga vakabvuma kuti zvinhu zvanga zvisina kumirira zvakanaka kuvashandi vezvehutano. VaDongo vatiwo vanoona sekuti gurukota rezvehutano iri rine chido chekugadzirisa zviri kunetsa munyaya dzezvehutano vakatiwo mangwana vari kuita musangano nebazi rezvehutano pamwe neHealth Services Board. Mumwe mugari wemuHarare, VaZacharia Ndongwe, vati vakamboshaya pekubata mushure mekurwarirwa kuzvipatara kusina vashandi vezvehutano. VaNdongwe vati vanotenda zvikuru zvaitwa nevakoti vachiti zvinobatsira kudzikisa kufu kwevanhu munyika. Amai Eugene Muchetu vatiwo kudzokera kubasa kwevakoti kunoita kuti vanhu vawane rubatsiro. Mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvehutano, VaJohn Mangwiro, vaudza Studio7 kuti hurumende inofara zvikuru nedanho ratorwa nevakoti asi vakati vanga vasati vava nehuwandu hwekuti vakoti vangani vadzokera kumabasa pari zvino. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi raVaChiwenga panyaya iyi. Asi pamusangano wavakaita nevatori venhau neMuvhuro, VaChiwenga vakatiwo vaizogadzirisa zviri kunetsa munyaya dzehutano vakatiwo hurumende ichazenge ichimisa vanhu kunorapwa kunze kwenyika kuitira kuti mari yacho ivandudze zvipatara zvemuno. No media source currently available
title: Vakoti Vanodzokera kuBasa Mushure Mekuramwa kweMwedzi Inodarika Mitatu

text:
Chipangamazano munyaya dzezvehutano mubazi reAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, Dr Nicaise Ndembi, vanoti African Union yakwanisa kuwana nhomba yeCivod-19 inosvika mamiriyoni mazana matatu kana kuti 300 million ichashandiswa mukudzivira kupararira kwechirwere ichi.

Mashoko atumirwa Studio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni matatu kana kuti 3 million vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 muAfrica. Vanhu vafa vasvika zvuru makumi manomwe nezvina nemazana mana nemakumi mana nevana kana kuti, 74, 444. Vanhu vapora kubva kuchirwere ichi vave mamiriyoni maviri nezvuru mazana mashanu kana kuti 2,5 million.

Zvichakadaro, America iyo ine vanhu vakawanda vafa nekubatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 pasi rose, yave kusimbisa chirongwa chekubaya vanhu nhomba kusanganisirawo zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri munyika iyi. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose, inoti muAmerica mune vanhu mamiriyoni makumi maviri nemaviri nemazana masere ezviuru, kana kuti 22,8 million vabatwa nechirwere ichi uye vafa vadarika mazana matatu nemakumi masere ezviuru nemazana masere kana kuti 380, 800.

Bazi rinoona nezvezvirwere muAmerica reCenters for Disease Control and Preventation, kana kuti CDC, rakatumira nhomba dzinodarika mamiriyoni makumi maviri nemashanu kumatunhu akasiyana siyana enyika.

Vakasarudzwa kutungamira nyika vachitora mhiko musi wa 25 Ndira, VaJoe Biden, nemutevedzeri wavo, Amai Kamala Harris, vakatobayiwa nhomba paruzhinji. Vakambove vatungamiri veAmerica, VaGorge Bush, VaBarack Obama naVaBill Clinton, vanoti vari kudawo kubayiwa nhomba iyi veruzhinji vachiona.

Pari zvino nhomba iri kubayiwa vanachiremba nevakoti, mauto, vane makore anodarika makumi matanhatu nemashanu, uye vamwe vane zvirwere zvakaita seshuga, moyo uye vane muviri yakati kurei pane zvinokurudzirwa navanachiremba avo vari munjodzi yakakura yekufa nechirwere ichi.

Mumwe akaita rombo rakanaka rekubayiwa nhomba iyi muAmerica, ndiVaZvidzai Ruzvidzo, avo vanogara kuOhio. VaRuzvidzo vanoti zvakakosha kuti vanhu vabayiwe nhomba iyi kuti vachengetedze hutano hwavo. No media source currently available
title: African Union Yowana Nhomba yeCovid-19 Apo Chirwere Ichi Chouraya Vakawanda

text: Mapurisa epaparamende ambochengetedza neChina nhengo dzesangano re Democracy Advocacy Initiative idzo dzanosiya gwaro renyunyuto kuparamende dzichikurudzira kuti nhengo dzeparamende dzibvise mutungamiri wenyika, Va Robert Mugabe, pachigaro. No media source currently available Nhengo nhatu dzesangano iri dzambochengetedzwa pakamba yemaurisa iri paparamende mushure mekusvitsa gwaro renyunyuto ranga richikurudzira nhengo dzeparamende kuti dzitorere matanho Va Mugabe semutungamiri wenyika nepamusana pekushaikwa kuri kuitwa mari inodarika mabhiriyoni matatu emadhora muhomwe yehurumende. Izvi zvinotevera gwaro rakaburitswa nehofisi yaAuditor and Comptroller General rinoratidza kuti hurumende haisi kuziva kuti mari iyi iri kupi. Mutungamiri we Democracy Advocacy Initiative, Va Shepherd Chidhakwa, vaudza Studio 7 kuti ichokwadi kuti vambochengetedzwa paparamende mushure mekusvitsa gwaro ravo kuparamende. VaChidhakwa vati vazoregedzwa mushure mekupindira kwaita magweta anorwira kodzero dzevanhu esangano re Zimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights. Mumwe wevambochengetedzwa ava uye vachiona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa musangano re DAI, Va Irvin Takavada, vanoti havana kufadzwa nemabatirwo avaitwa nemapurisa ayo avati anga achivabvunza mibvunzo isinei negwaro ravasvitsa kuparamende iri. Vati nhengo dzeparamende dzinokwanisa kuvhota kuti Va Mugabe vabviswe pachigaro nepamusana penyaya yekushayikwa kwemari iyi kunyange hazvo nhengo dze Zanu PF dziri idzo dzakawanda muparamende. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi remapurisa panyaya iyi. Zvichakadai, nhengo dzesangano reCongress of Zimbabwe Trade Unions dzasvitsawo gwaro renyunyuto kuparamende dzichigunun’una nekudzingwa mabasa kuri kuitwa vashandi munyika zvichitevera mutongo wedare repamusoro-soro. Mumwe wenhengo idzi, Va Raymond Majongwe, vanoti havana kufara nemhinduro yavapihwa kuparamende. Va Majongwe vati nemamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika pari zvino, nhengo dzeparamende dzinofanira kudzoka kubva kuzororo dziedze kugadzirisa nyaya yevashandi yanetsa iyi. Kubva pakaturwa mutongo uyu nedare reSupreme Court, zvinonzi pane vashandi vanodarika zviuru makumi maviri vadzingwa mabasa mumakambani akawanda munyika.
title: Vanorwira Kodzero Vokurudzira Paramende Kudzinga VaMugabe

text: Sachigaro wemadzimai muMDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa, Amai Paurina Mparaiwa Gwanyanya, vanoti hukama hwavo nehutungamiri hwebato ravo hwasvika kwamvura yacheka makumbo asi vacharamba havo vari muparamende. Amai Mpariwa Gwanyanya vanoti vaona zvakakodzera kuti vasiye chigaro chekuva sachigaro wemadzimai muMDC zvichitevera kuzvidzwa kwavari kuitwa mubato. Vanoti vakabviswa pandandemutande renhengo dzeNational Standing Committee yebato iri mushure mekutadza kuenda kumusangano wekomiti iyi sezvo vainge vakabatikana. Vanoti vakaudza vamwe vavo zvikonzero zvakavatadzisa kuenda musangano uyu uye vakazoshamiswa nezvakaitika. Vanoti pavakabvunza kuti izvi zvainge zvaitirwei vakaudzwa kuti vainge vave kukanganisa kuchengetedzeka kwenhengo dzeNational Standing Committee pamwe nebato. Vanoti nekuda kwaizvozvo vakanyora tsamba neChipiri vachiti vave kumbosuduruka kuitira kuti MDC Alliance idome munhu wainoda kuti atungamire madzimai. Vatiwo vakange vave kutukwa pamwe nekupomerwa mhosva yekuti vakapinda mumusangano wechimwe chikwata cheMDC inotungamirirwa naMuzvare Thokozani Khupe. Asi mutauriri weMDC Alliance, Muzvare Fadzai Mahere, pamwe nemunyori mukuru webato iri, VaCharlton Hwende vaudza Studio 7 kuti Amai Mpariwa Gwanyanya vachiri nhengo yebato ravo. VaHwende vaudza Studio7 kuti Amai Mpariwa Gwanyanya vakatadza kuuya kumusangano wakaitwa neChipiri uye vakapa chichemo chavo chakatambirwa uye kusvika pari zvino havasati vawana gwaro rekusiya chigaro kubva kwavari. Asi Amai Mpariwa Gwanyanya varamba mashoko aVaHwende vachiti vave kutorwiswa nenhengo dzeMDC Alliance vachinzi mutengesi. Vaenderera mberi vachiti hapana chakaipa kutaura naMuzvare Khupe nevamwe vavo vachiti vaimbove nhengo dzeMDC. Vatiwo zviri pachena kuti MDC Alliance haichada vashandi ichiti vanhu vese vakatumwa nesangano reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions kunoumba bato rezvematongerwo enyika reMDC vave kushungurudzwa kana kuti vakatodzingwa mubato iri. Muzvare Khupe ndemumwe wevanhu vakabva kuZCTU pakaumbwa bato reMDC muna 1999 richitungamirirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai, avo vainve munyori mukuru weZCTU. Zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka muMDC umo chikwata chaVaChamisa nechaMuzvare Khupe zviri kurwisana panyaya dzemuzinda webato iri weMorgan Tsvangirai House pamwe nenhengo dzeparamende. Mune imwewo nyaya, madzimai matatu eMDC yaVaChamisa, Muzvare Joanna Mamombe, Muzvare Cecilia Chimbiri naMuzvare Netsai Marova, avo vanga vari muchipatara, vanonzi vasungwa apo vanga vaenda kunosvitsa mapasipoti avo sezvakatarwa nedare. Baba vemumwe wemadzimai aya, VaHenry Chimbiri, vati ichokwadi kuti vatatu ava vasungwa nemapurisa. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi remapurisa panyaya iyi sezvo mutauriri wemapurisa, VaPaul Nyathi, vanga vachinetsa kubata panherembozha yavo. No media source currently available
title: Amai Mpariwa Gwanyanya Vanosiya Chigaro cheMadzimai muMDC

text: Motokari yebato rinopikisa reMDC-T yakapiswa nezuro manheru mumusha unogara vazhinji wekuKuwadzana muHarare nemusi weChitatu manheru.  Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri webato iri VaNelson Chamisa avo vanovawo mumiriri weKuwadza East mudare reparamende vaudza Studio 7 kuti sezvo nyika yatarisana nesarudzo dza2018 zviri pachena kuti pane vamwe vanhu vave kuda kukonzera mhirizhonga. VaChamisa vakati mapurisa ainge apirwa nyaya iyi uye vange vatotanga kuiferefeta. Hatina kukwanisa kubata mutauriri wemapurisa Senior Assistant Commissioner Charity Charamba sezvo vakanzi vainge vari mumusangano. Zvichakadaro, sangano reZimbawe Lawyers for Human Rights rinoti maourisa akasunga vamwe vatsigiri veMDC-T vaviri mushure mekuratidzira kwavakaita nemusi weChitatu vachiti havasi kufara nemabatirwo ari kuitwa basa nesangano reZimbabwe Electoral Commission. Vakasungwa ava ndiVaDarlington Madzonga uye VaEdmore Musvibhi. Vaviri ava vari ava vari kupomerwa mhosva yekuputsa midziyo pakuratidzira uku uye vari kuratarisirwa kumiswa pamberi pedare nemusi weChishanu. Mumwe wechidiki ange achiratidzira muHarare Grievance Sipikita uyo ange achiti mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vasiye basa kana vakundikana aksungwawo nemusi weChina achinzi ari kuda kukonzera musarinya kana kuti criminal nuisance. Sipikita anoti haasi kufara kuti vanhu vemuZimbabwe havasi kuenderera mberi nekunyunyuta zvaiita VaItaii Dzamara avo vakapambwa muna 2015 vasiri kuzivikanwa kuti vari kupi. No media source currently available
title: Motokari yeMDC Inopiswa kuKuwadzana Uko Mapurisa Achisunga Vamwe VeChidiki veBato Iri

text: Kunyangwe zvazvo bumbiro remutemo renyika rasvitsa makore mashanu mwedzi uno, nyanzvi mune zvemitemo dzinoti pane zvizhinji zvisati zvazadzikiswa. Gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu VaTafadzwa Christmas vafananidza bumbiro remutemo nehurongwa hwekuvaka imba hunonzi plan  paChirungu. VaChristmas vati kunyangwe zvazvo hurongwa hwekuvaka hwakanaka chakakosha kuti imba yazomira here vakati kunyangwe nyika rine gwaro rakanaka, kuchine mitemo mizhinji isati yashandurwa kuti ifambirane nezviri mubumbiro. VaChristmas vatiwo zvinosuwisa kuti pane zviumbwa zvakawandawo zviri mubumbiro zvakadai seIntegrity and Ethics Committee rinoona mashandiro emadzishe nezvimwewo zvisati zvaumbwa. Gweta huyewo vari mukuru weHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica, VaDewa Mavhinga vaudza Studio 7 kuti bumbiro redu mumakore mashanu aya ririkuita kunge bepa risina basa. VaMavhinga vati kusagadziriswa kwemitemo inodarika mazana mana kuti ifambirane nebumbiro zvinoita kuti veruzhinji vasabatsirikana nekodzero dzirimo. Mukuru weZimbabwe Human Rights NGO Forum rinova sangano rakaparura ongororo inoratidza kutyorwa kwakaitwa kodzero muna2017 huyewo vari gweta Amai Blessing Gorejena vatiwo zvinosuwisa kuti hurumende haisi kutevedzera zvirimubumbiro kunyangwe kwakaiswa mari zhinji richigadzirwa. Sangano reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights riri kukurudzira hurumende kuti izadzikise zvose zvinodiwa kuti bumbiro remutemo rinyatsoshanda zvakanaka. ZLHR inoti kusazadzikiswa kwezvinodiwa nebumbiro zviri kupa kuti Zimbabwe idzokere kumashure. Semuenzaniso ZLHR inoti panofanira kuva nemusiyano pahurumende, matare uye paramende kwete kuti hurumende ndiyo inenge iine masimba akawandisa pasina anoitsiura. Sangano iri rinoti mapurisa nemauto anofanirawo kuita basa achitevera bumbiro remutemo kwete kuita madiro ajojina. ZLHR yasimbisa kuti kodzero dzevanhu dziremekedzwe sezviri mubumbiro remitemo. Bumbiro remutemo yenyika rakagadzikwa zviri pamutemo musi wa22 Chivabvu muna2013 nevaimbove mutungamiriri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe. Bumbiro iri rakanyorwa panguva yehurumende yemubatanidzwa. No media source currently available
title: Kunyangwe Bumbiro Rasvitsa Makore Mashanu, Vamwe Vanoti Zvizhinji Zvisati Zvazadzikiswa

text: Hurumende yeSouth Africa yawedzera nguva yekuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvakawana mapepa zviri munyika iyi zvitore mapepa ekushanda munyika pasi pechirongwa cheZimbabwe Special Permit. Chirongwa ichi change chichipera neChipiri asi chawedzerwa kusvika musi wa 22 Gumiguru. Vasati vapihwa mapepa vaine humbowo vanonzi vaende kumahofisi akatarwa munzvimbo dzakasiyana siyana, kana kuti Permit Facilitation Centres. Sachigaro wesangano reGlobal Zimbabwe Forum, VaSolomon Chikowero, vanoti kunyange nguva yakawedzerwa ichiita kunge shoma, vanhu vanofanirwa kuenda kunonzwisisa kuti chiyi chiri kudiwa kuti vapihwe mapepa avo vasamirire kuti nguva iyi ipere. "Hapana anosungwa kana akaenda kunovhunza kuti mapepa avanofanirwa kunge vai navo ndeapi kuti vagare muSouth Africa, uye kuti zviyi zvinodiwa kuti vawane mapepa aya," Va Chikowero vanodaro. Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvakawanda zvamukira kumahofisi ema Permit Facilitation Centers munharaunda dzakasiyana siyana muSouth Africa vachida kunzwa kuti nyaya yemapepa avo yange yakamira seyi. Magwaro aya ari kupihwa zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe ndeye makore matatu uye pachapera nguva iyi vanenge vasina kugadzisira mapepa avo emunyika iyi havazokwanise kuramba vachiwedzerwa nguva pasi pemaZimbabwe Special Permits. Hurumende ye South Africa inoti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinosvika mazana maviri ezviuru zvakanyorera kuti zviwane mapepa aya. Asi vanhu vanosvika zana nemakumi masere neshanu ezviuru ndivo vakapihwa mvumo yekugara nekushanda muSouth Africa, vanhu vanodarika zviuru gumi vakanyimwa. Hazvisati zvazivikanwa kuti chiyi chichaitika kune vanhu vakanyimwa ava. Asi VaChikowero vanoti vanhu ava vanofanira kusatya kunovhunza kwavaka nyorera mapepa avo kuti chiyi chimwe chavangaite kuti varambe vari munyika iyi zviri pamutemo. No media source currently available
title: South Africa Yowedzera Nguva Yekuti Vanhu Vanotora Mapepa Avo

text: Hurumende inoti iri kuvandudza mutemo wekuendeswa kweupfumi kuvatema kuti ufambidzane negwara rezvekuendeswa kweupfumi kuvatema, iro rinoti zvikamu makumi mashanu nechimwe zviende kuzvizvarwa zveZimbabwe, zvikamu makumi mana nezvipfumbamwe zvoenda kune vekunze vanenge vachida kuita mabhizimusi munyika. Mutauriri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaGeorge Charamba vazivisa kuti mutemo uyu wakanangana chete nemabhizimusi ane chekuita nechikamu chezviwanikwa. Asi mukuru wesangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu vagere mune zviwanikwa, re Center for national Resource Governance, VaFarai Maguwu, vanoti hurumende yaifanirwa kutarisisa zvakare mutemo uyu, sezvo uchityisidzira vekunze vanoda kuzotanga mabhizimusi munyika. VaMaguwu vanotiwo hurumende inofanirwa kutora mukana wekuvandudza mutemo uyu kuti iwanise vagari vematunhu ane zviwanikwa cheuviri. No media source currently available
title: Vanorwira Kodzero Voshoropodza Mutemo Unoendesa Upfumi kuVatema

text: Mutungamiri weZanu PF uye vari mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vati bato ravo rakabatana zvakasimba vakakurudzira kuti nhengo dzechimwe chikwata cheG40 dzavanoti dzichiri mumusangano wavo dzidzingwe. Vachitaura nevatsigiri vavo kunhandare yeRimuka muKadoma, VaMnangagwa vati bato ravo rakabatana mazuvano kunyange hazvo vasina kutora nguva yakareba vasati vataura kuti muchine nhengo dzeG40 dziri mubato ravo idzo dzavati dzinofanira kudzingwa. Mashoko aVaMnangagwa aya anopesana nemashoko avakataura svondo rapera apo pavakukurudzira nhengo dzeG40 dzakadzingwa mubato ravo kuti dzidzoke vashande pamwe chete. Imwe nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika, VaVivid Gwede, vati zvataurwa naVaMnangagwa hazvipindirane nemamiriro akaita bato ravo pari zvino. Panyaya yesarudzo, VaMnangagwa vati bato ravo harina masimba ekuudza komisheni inoona nezvesarudzo yeZimbabwe Electoral Commission, Zec, zvekuita vachiti komisheni iyi inoshanda yakazvimirira. Izvi zvinouyawo apo MDC Alliance ichiti haisi kufadzwa nemafambisiro ari kuita Zec basa pamberi pesarudzo dzemusi wa30 Chikunguru. No media source currently available
title: VaMnangagwa Voyambira Kudzinga Vatsigiri veG40 muZanu PF

text: Dare reSenate ratambira kuvandudzwa kweConstitutional Amendment Bill Number 2 zvichitevera kuvhota kwemaseneta makumi matanhatu nemashanu achitsigira bhiri iri, ukuwo maseneta gumi achiripikisa. Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri weSenate, VaMike Nyambuya, ndivo vazivisa dare reSenate zviri pamutemo kuti Constitutional Amendment Bill Number 2 rapasa pachitevedzwa bumbiro remitemo yenyika. Dare reSenate rine nhengo makumi masere uye nhengo shanu dzange dzisiri mudare nhasi. Dare reZanu PF rine nhengo makumi matatu neina, MDC iine nhengo makumi maviri nenhanhatu kusanganisira nhengo imwe chete yakapinda iri kudivi kwaMuzvare Thokozani Khupe, uye madzishe ari gumi nemasere. Pange pachidiwa nhengo makumi mashanu nenhatu chete kuti bhiri iri ripase. Zvaitika nhasi zvinogona kureva kuti madzishe ese gumi nemasere, nhengo mbiri dzinomirira vakaremara pamwe nedzimwe nhengo gumi neimwe dzebato rinopikisa dzatsigira bhiri. Sachigaro weMDC T, VaMorgan Komichi, vaudza Studio 7 kuti kunyange hazvo vange vaita chisungo chekuti vachapikisa bhiri iri pane vamwe vavo vari tsigira. Asi VaKomichi vati bhiri iri rine zvimwe zvakanaka uye vanoona sekuti pane vavhota vachitarisa remangwana ravo. Vati bato ravo richagara pasi roona kuti rotora matanho api neavo vapesana negwara remusangano. Pachitariswa huwandu huri mudare reSenate, nhengo Zanu PF nemadzishe pamwe nenhengo mbiri dzinomirira vakaremara, dzaikwanisa kupasisa bhiri iri pasina nhengo dzeMDC. Vachitaura mushure mekupasa kwebhiri iri, gurukota rinoona nezvemitemo neparamende, VaZiyambi Ziyambi, vatenda vese vatsigira bhiri iri. Vati hurumende yakaona paine mikaha pabumbiro ra2013 munyaya dzakaita sekuvandudzwa kwematunhu kana kuti Devolution uye bhiri richaita kuti hurumende ichiisa mitemo yekuvandudza nekusimudzira matunhu. Rimwe gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu, VaNqobani Sithole, avo vakatokwira kudare reConstitutional Court vachipikisa kusandurwa kwebumbiro remitemo, vati vashamisa kuti paramende ichiendererra mberi nekuchinja bumbiro remitemo. Vati vachataura nemagwata avo kuti vamise kusandurwa kwebumbiro kwaitwa nhasi. VaSithole, vakaenda kudare reConstitutional Court vachida kuti dare iri ritonge kuti paramende yenyika haina kubata zvakanaka nyaya yekuvandudzwa kwebhiri remutemo weConstitutional Amendment Bill Number 1, iro rakapa hwaro hwekuvandudza Constiutional Amendment Bill number 2 vachiti hapana kutevedzwa zvinodiwa nebumbiro remitemo yenyika. Mukuru weMedia Centre, VaEnerst Mudzengi, vaudza Studio 7 kuti hapana chinoshamisa pane zvaitika nhasi nekuti ndizvo zvavange vakatarisira. Vati kunyange bumbiro ra2013 range risina kunaka range riri nane pane zvaitwa nhasi. Masangano anoshanda akazvimira munyika ari kupikisa bhiri iri achiti rinopa masimba akawanda kumutungamiriri wenyika. Zvimwe zviri kupikiswa nemasangano aya kuvandudzwa kwenguva inofanirwa kushanda nevatongi vematare edzimhsova, avo vanofanirwa kuenda kumudyandigere kana vasvika makore makumi manomwe. Pari zvino, mukuru wevatongi vematare, VaJustice Luke Malaba, vari kufanirwa kuenda pamudyandigere musi wa 15 Chivabvu. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vakasaina bhiri iri, zvinoita kuti VaMalaba vasaende pamudyandigere zviri pamutemo sezvo muytemo unenge washandurwa. Bhiri ratambirwa nhasi rinogona kusainwa chere nguva naVaMnangagwa. No media source currently available
title: Dare reSenate Rinopasisa Bhiri Rinopa Mutungamiri weNyika Masimba Akawandisa

text: Mutungamiri weTanzania, VaJohn Magufuli, vanoti vashanya muZimbabwe nechinangwa chekusimbaradza hukama hwenyika yavo neZimbabwe. Vachitaura pakupera kwerwendo rwavo kuState House muHarare, VaMagufuli vati hukama hweZimbabwe neTanzania hucharamba huchisimba. VaMagufuli vataurawo pamusoro pezvirango zvavati zvakatemerwa Zimbabwe vachiti zvinofanirwa kubviswa nekukurumidza. Pavabvunzwa kuti kurudziro yavo yekuti zvirango zvibviswe inotambirwa here, VaMagufuli vati havana basa nazvo kuti zvanzwikwa here kana kuti kwete. Asi vati zvirango zvinoita kuti vanhuwo zvavo vashupike. VaMagufuli vati pane dzimwe nzira dzinofanirwa kuitwa nadzo dzakaita sekutaurirana pane kushungurudza vanhu nezvirango. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vatiwo kunyange paine zvirango, vacharwisa kuti nyika ibudirire vachishandisa zviwanikwa zviri munyika munyaya dzezveupfumi. Asi nyanzvi yezvematongerwo enyika inotaura yakazvimirira, VaMasimba Kuchera, vati kushanya kwaVaMagufuli hakuna chakunoyamura nyika munyaya dzezvehupfumi sezvo Tanzania isina zvainazvo. VaKuchera vati kushanya kwaVaMagufuli kunongosimbaradza hukama pakati pemapato eZanu PF neChama Chama Pinduzi. Sachigaro wePlatform for Youth Development, VaClaris Madhuku, vati nyaya iri kutaurwa nevatungamiri venyika ava yekuda kusimbaradza hupfumi hapana kwainosvika sezvo nyaya iri kunetsa iri yematongerwo enyika. Asi nhengo yeZanu PF, VaGadzira Chirumhanzu, vachitaura semuongorori zvematongerwo enyika akazvimirira, vatiwo vanhu havafanirwe kungoshora zvese zvinenge zvaitwa nehurumende nekuti vachashora mbodza neinozvimbira. VaChirumhanzi vati Zimbabwe neTanzania dzagara dzichidyidzana zvakanyanya munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika kubva munguva yehondo yerusununguko, nekudaro zvakakosha kuti vasimbaradze hukama hwadzo munyaya dzezvehupfumi. VaMagufuli vakapinda munyika neChipiri, uye kushanya kwavo muZimbabwe kwapera neChitatu. Vasati vapinda muZimbabwe, vakashanyariwo kuNamibia. VaMagufuli ndivo mutungamiri weTanzania weChishanu kubva nyika iyi yawana kuzvitonga muna 1964. No media source currently available
title: VaMagufuli Vanoti Kushanya Kwavo Kunosimbaradza Hukama hweZimbabwe neTanzania

text: Mutori wenhau ane mukurumbira, Hopewell Chin’ono, aunzwa kudare akaiswa ngetani dzemumaowoko nedzemumakumbo izvo zvashorwa zvikuru nerimwe remagweta ake, Amai Beatrice Mtetwa Mtetwa mudare. Amai Mtetwa vabva vasvitsa chichemo chekuti Chin’ono akaendeswa seyi kujeri reChikurubi Maxumim Prison kwaanonzi ari kugara nevasungwa vakatongwa kare avo vakapara mhosva dzakakura kwazvo uko kunodaidzwa kuti kuD-Section. Vachipindura kuchichemo ichi, muchuchisi wenyaya iyi, VaLancelot Mutsokoti, vati bazi rinochengeta vasungwa ndiro rinoziva zvikonzero zvekuti vakamuendeserei kuChikurubi asi vati vachaita tsvagiridzo yekuti zvakafamba sei. Vachitura mutongo wavo pachikumbiro chasvitswa kudare naChin’ono kubudikidza nemagweta ake, mutongi wedare, Amai Marehwanazvo Gofa, vati Chin’ono akaunzwa pamatare emhosva maawa makumi mana nemasere asati adarika kubva paakasungwa saka nokudaro chin’ono anga ari pamberi pedare zviri pamutemo. Mutongo uyu unotevera mashoko asvitswa kudare nerimwe remagweta aChin’ono, Amai Beatrice Mtetwa, ekuti musungwa anofanira kumiswa pamberi pemutongi nguva iyi isati yadarika kwete kuti nguva iyi inotarwa munhu paanosvika pamatare. Rimwe remagweta aChin’ono, VaGift Mtisi, vatsinhira kuti izvi ndizvo zvaitika mudare. Mushure memutongo uyu, magweta aChin’ono asvitsawo chikumbiro chekuti hurumende itsanangure kuti mhosva iri kupomerwa Chin’ono chaiyo ndeyeyi sezvo vachiti mapepa ari pamberi pedare haaburitse pachena mhosva inonzi yakaparwa naChin’ono. Amai Mtetwa vati Chin’ono mutori wenhau saka nokudaro hainganzi imhosva kuti haana kutaura kuti vanhu vakamupa mashoko ezvaanonzi akanyora padandemutande rake reTwitter ndivanani. VaMtisi vati Chin’ono haafanire kutongwa nemhosva isinganyatsonzwisisike. Asi muchuchisi wenyaya iyi, VaLancelot Mutsokoti, vati vanoda kusvika neMuvhuro kuti vape mhinduro izere panyaya iyi. Amai Gofa vati nyaya iyi ichaemderera mberi neMuvhuro. Chin’ono akambosungwa muna Chikunguru akagara mujeri kwemasvondo matanhatu achipomerwa mhsova yekunzi akashandisa dandemutande ravo Twitter kukurudzira veruzhinji kuti varatidzire. No media source currently available
title: Chin'ono Anosvika paMatare Akaiswa Cheni Mumakumbo neMumaoko

text: Vaimbova gurukota rezvevashandi, Amai Petronella Kagonye, vapihwa mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso pamhosva nhanhatu dzavariu kupomerwa dzekuita zvehuori. Mutongi wedare, VaStanford Mambanje, vatura mutongo wekuti Amai Kagonye vatongwe vachibva kumba mushure mekunge hurumende yati haisi kupikisa chikumbiro chavo chekuti vapihwe mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso. VaMambanje vati Amai Kagonye vabhadhare zviuru makumi matatu zvemadhora ari maRTGS ($30 000) semari yechibatiso, vazvipire kumapurisa neChishanu chega-chega, vasiye magwaro avo ekufambisa kudare, uye vagare pakero yavakanyoresa kumapurisa uye kuti vasavhiringidzane nevafakazi kudzamara nyaya iyi yapera kutongwa.
