Muchuchisi wenyaya iyi, VaMichael Reza, vati Amai Kagonye, vachishandisa kambani yavo yeGlorious Properties, vakanyepera mimwe mishandirapamwe inoita zvedzimba kana kuti ma housing cooperative epapurazi reSolomio riri muRuwa rinova reZB Bank kuti vaive nechidimu chavo mupurazi iri vakatengesera mibatanidzwa iyi masitendi ivo vachiziva kuti havasi muridzi wepurazi iri izvo zvakaita kuti mishandirapamwe iyi irasikirwe nemari inoita zviuru mazana maviri namakumi manomwe nezvishanu zvemadhora ekuAmerica (US$275 000). Mapepa ari pamberi pedare anotiwo Amai Kagonye vakanyepera vagari vemuRuwa kuti vane masitendi papurazi reCloverdale riri muGoromonzi vakavatengesera masitendi aya vachiziva zvakare kuti purazi iri harisi ravo zvakaita kuti vanhu ava varasikirwe nemari inoita zviuru makumi mana zvemadhora ekuAmerica (US$40 000). VaReza vatiwo Amai Kagonye vakaba ma computer makumi maviri kubazi rePosts and Telecommunications Regulatory Authority of Zimbabwe avakapihwa achinzi aizonoshandiswa muzvikoro zviri muGoromonzi South asi ma computer aya haana kuzosvika kuzvikoro izvi. VaReza vatiwo Amai Kagonye, avo vakamboshanda mubazi rezveminda vari chief lands officer, vakapawo hama yavo, VaIshamael Kagonye, purazi vachishandisa simba ravo zvisirizvo sezvo pasina kutevedzerwa gwara rinoshandiswa nebazi iri kupa vanhu minda. Gweta raAmai Kagonye, VaRungano Mahuni, vati Amai Kagonye havasi kubvuma mhosva dzavari kupomerwa idzi asi vafara kuti vapihwa mukana wekutongwa vachibva kumba kwavo. VaMambanje vati Amai Kagonye vagodzoka kudare musi waKurume 30. No media source currently available
title: Amai Petronella Kagonye Vanobvisiswa Chibatiso neDare

text: Vamwe vanoongorra zvematongerwo enyika vanoti kuratidzira murunyararo kwaitwa nhasi nebato rinopikisa reMDC mucherechedzo wekuti nhengo dzebato iri dzabvazera, uye vatsigiri veMDC vanotevera murairo wehutungamiri hwebato. Asi vamwewo ndivo vanoti kutaridzira kwaitwa murunyararo uku kunotevera yambiro yakasimba yakapiwa nehurumende kuti ani nani zvake aizokonzera mhirizhonga aizotorerwa matanho akaomarara. MDC yaratidzira muHarare mutungamiri webato iri VaNelson Chamisa vachiti bato ravo ratora danho iri senzira yekuratidza kusatambira kwavo kuti mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vakasarudzwa nevanhu, vachiti semaziviro avo VaMnangagwa vakasarudzwa nedare redzimhosva. VaChamisa vazivisawo kuti vasvitsa gwaro renyunyuto kuparamende, nekumasangano anoti African Union neSADC vachizivisa kuti havasi kuzobvisa VaMnangagwa nepfuti kwete, asi nemavhoti, vachiti vasvitsawo gwaro iri kuna VaMnangagwa, kwete semutungamiri wenyika, asi semutungamiri weZanu PF. Munyori mukuru weMDC, VaDouglas Mwonzora vanoti bato ravo ragara richiratidzira murunyararo kana chete pakasapindira vemamwe mapato kana mauto nevasori. VaMwonzora vanoti mutungamiri webato ravo VaChamisa, vakazvipira kugara pasi nemutungamiri weZanu PF, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, voumba hurumende yemubatanidzwa kuti nyika iende mberi. Asi vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vakarerekera kuZanu PF, VaGadzira Chirumhanzu, vanoti kuratidzira kwaitwa neMDC murunyararo hakusi kuti bato iri rarongeka kwete, asi kuti ratya yambiro yakapiwa nenhengo yeZanu PF, VaObert Mpofu, yekuti hurumende yaizotora matanho akaomarara kune vanenge vatyora mutemo. VaChirumhanzu vanotiwo manyepo kuti vanhu vapinda mumigwagwa nehuwandu hwavo, vachiti kune ruzhinji rwevana neZimbabwe, ranga riri basa pamberi semazuva ose. vasekawo mashoko ekuti VaChamisa vakazvipira kugara pasi naVaMnangagwa vachiti Zanu PF ine huwandu muparamende saka haizombofa yakaumba hurumende yemubatanidzwa neMDC. No media source currently available
title: Vamwe Vanoti Kuratidzira muRunyararo Kwaitwa neMDC Mucherechedzo weKuyaruka kweBato iri

text: Nemusi weChitatu VaJoe Biden vakatora mhiko yekutungamira America kwemakore mana anotevera muchiitiko chainge chakatariswa nepasi rose kusanganisirawo nyika yeZimbabwe iyo ine vatungamiri vakatemerwa zvirango neAmerica vachipomerwa mhosva yekutonga nedemo. Asi vakuru vehurumende ava vanoti chakapa kuti vatemerwe zvirango inyaya yekuti vakatora minda kubva kuvachena vachipa vatema. Zvirango izvi zvange zvichiwedzerwa gore roga roga kubva muna 2004 uye zviri kutarisirwa kuwedzerwa zvekare muna Kurume naVaBiden. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vakanyora padandemutande ravo reTwitter kuti America haikwanise kumira pachuru ichitsiura Zimbabwe nezvekodzero dzevanhu mushure mebatamurefu bata mupfupi yakaitika padare reparamende reCapitol Hill apo vatsigiri vevaive mutungamiri wenyika, VaDonald Trump, vakaita mhirizhonga vachiramba kutambira zvakabuda musarudzo. Asi muzinda weAmerica muZimbabwe wakabva watiwo Zimbabwe inofanira kuferefeta kuurayiwa kwakaitwa vanhu, kubatwa chibharo uye kutochwa kwevamwe vairatidzira nemauto muna Ndira 2019. Mukuru wesangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu reHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica, VaDewa Mavhinga, vanoti havaone zvirango zvichbviswa kana Zimbabwe isiri kuremekedza kodzero dzevanhu. Asi sachigaro wekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika vari nhengo yeZanu-PF, VaKindness Paradza, vanoti hapana chikonzero chekuti zvirango zvirango zvirambe zviripo vachiti Zimbabwe iri kuzorwa mafuta enguruve yaisina kudya. No media source currently available
title: VaBiden Vangabvisa Here Zvirango Zvakatemerwa Vamwe Vakuru muZimbabwe?

text: Nhengo yekomiti yepamusoro muboka revechidiki muMDC Alliance, VaMakomborero Haruzivishe, vapihwa mukana wekutongwa vachibva kumba nedare repamusoro reHigh Court pamhosva yavari kupomerwa yekunzi vakapamba vashandi vakambani yeImpala Car Rental gore rapera. Vatongi vaviri vedare repamusoro vanoti VaJoseph Chilimbe naVaRongers Manyangadze Foroma, vatura mutongo wekuti VaHaruzivishe vabhadhare zviuru makumi maviri zvemadhora ari maRTGS semari yechibatiso uye vazvipire kumapurisa kaviri pasvondo kudzamara nyaya yavari kupomerwa yapera kutongwa. Izvi zvinotevera kusapikiswa kwechikumbiro ichi nevachuchisi vehurumende avo vati hapana chikonzero chekunyima VaHaruzvishe mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso sezvo vamwe vevavari kupomerwa navo mhosva imwechete vakapihwa mukana uyu kare. Rimwe remagweta ari kumirira VaHaruzivishe, VaSimon Chabuka, vati vafara nemutongo wedare. Mutevedzeri wemutauriri weMDC Alliance, VaGift Siziba, vati VaHaruzivishe vanga vasingafanire kugariswa mujeri nenyaya yavati haina maturo. Vati VaHaruzvishe munhu ari kushungurudzwa zvine chekuita nezvematongerwo enyika. VaHaruzivishe, avo vave nemwedzi inodarika mipfumbamwe vari mujeri, vaifanira kubuditswa mujeri mwedzi wapera pavakapihwa mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso pane imwe nyaya yavainzi vakange vasina kuzvipira kudare pavakange vanzi vadzoke mune imwewo nyaya. Asi vakange vaudza dare kuti vakatadza kuzvipira kudare nekuti vakanga vasangana nemunhu aive nehutachiwana hweCovid 19. Panyaya yavapihwa mukana wekutongwa vachibva kumba nhasi, VaHaruzivishe vanonzi vakapamba vashandi wekambani yeImpala Car Rental pavairatidzira vachinyunyuta nekushandiswa kunonzi kwakaitwa motokari yekambani iyi gore rapera mukupambwa kwemumwe mudzidzi kuBulawayo, VaTawanda Muchehiwa, nevanofungidzirwa kuti vasori. VaHaruzivishe, avo vakabatwa nemhosva yekukurudzira veruzhinji kuratidzira zvine mhirizhonga mukati, vakatongerwa kugara mujeri kwemwedzi gumi nemina, vakapihwawo zvakare mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso mushure mekupikisa kubatwa kwavakaitwa nemhosva pamwe nemutongo wavakapihwa. Vari kupomerwawo zvakare imwe mhosva yekuratidzira vasina mvumo muHarare. Mune imwewo nyaya, gurukota rinooona nezvinoitika mukati menyika, VaKazembe Kazembe, vazivisa kubudikidza nemutemo weStatutory Instrument 3 of 2022 kuti veruzhinji havachasungirwa kubhadhara mari inoita madhora makumi maviri ekuAmerica kubhanga reCBZ kana vachida kutora mapasipoti sezvakambenge zvaziviswa. Danho ratorwa nehurumende iri rinotevera kunyunyuta kwakaitwa neveruzhinji kuti pakanga pashandiswa huori kuti bhanga iri ripihwe basa rekutambira mari yemagwaro ekutsvaga mapasipoti vachiti hapana kunge kwaendwa ku tender sezvinodiwa nemutemo. Bhanga reCBZ iri rinonzi mumwe ane hupfumi mubhanga iri ndiVaKuda Tagwirei vanove chipangamazano chemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa. VaTagwirei vakadomwa netsvagiridzo yakaitwa neThe Sentry semunhu ane hupfumi hwakawandisa uho vari kuviga kunze kwenyika, izvo zviri kuita kuti nyika irasikirwe nehupfumi hwakanda. VaTagwirei havadi kutaura nevatori venhau pamusoro penyaya idzi. VaKazembe vati kutora pasipoti yechimanjemanje, kana kuti e-passport nechimbichimbi kuchange kuchiita madhora mazana maviri ekuAmerica uye pasipoti isiri yechimbichimbi ichange ichiita zana rimwe chete remadhora ekuAmerica. Mune imwewo nyaya, VaMnangagwa nhasi vapa vechidiki mazana matanhatu mombe imwechete pamunhu wegawega kuKwekwe vachiti vechidiki ava vakachengeta mombe idzi zvakanaka dzikaberekana zvichaita kuti huwandu hwemombe munyika hukure zvavati zvichaitawo kuti nyika irambe ine nyama inokwanira nyika. No media source currently available
title: VaMakomborero Haruzivishe Vanobvisiswa Mari yeChibatiso Kuitira Kuti Vatongwe Vari Panze

text: Zimbabwe neChishanu manheru yakadomwa kuti ive mutevedzeri wasachigaro weKimberley Process, sangano rinoona nezvekucherwa pamwe nekutengeswa kwemangoda pasi rose zviri pamutemo. Izvi zvakaitika pakupetwa kwemusangano weKimberley Process waiitirwa kuMoscow, guta guru reRussia kubva musi wa08 Mbudzi kusvika musi wa 12 Mbudzi. Izvi zvinoreva kuti muna 2022 Zimbabwe inenge yave mutewedzeri weBotswana, iyo ichange yave iyo sachigaro, uye muna 2023 Zimbabwe ndiyo inenge yave sachgaro. Sangano reKimberley Process riripo kuona kuti mangoda anenge achitengeswa kubva munyika dzakasiyanasiyana ari kucherwa zvisina ropa mukati here uye kuti mari dziri kuwanikwa kubva mukutengeswa kwemangoda aya hadzisi kushandiswa mukuita zvehugandanga. Russia ndiyo sachigaro wesangano iri pari zvino, ichiteverwa neBotswana. Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika uye vari nhengo yeZanu PF mudunhu reBritain, Doctor Simba Mavaza, vanoti kudomwa kweZimbabwe kuti itore chigaro ichi chiratidzo chekuti pasi rose rine chivimbo neZmbabwe uye mashoko ekuti Zimbabwe yaitengesa mangoda eropa aive emanyepo. Asi mukuru wesangano reCentre for Natural Resource Governance, iro rinokurudzira kuchengetedzwa kwezviwanikwa, VaFarai Maguwu, vanoti kudomwa kweZimbabwe hakuna zvikuru zvakunoreva sezvo pasina sarudzo dzinoitwa kumisangano yakadai, asi kuti nyika ndiyo inotokumbira kuti inodawo chigaro chakati. VaMaguwu vanotiwo Kimberley Process haitarise nyaya dzehutongo hwejekere asi kuti inongotarisa zvekutengeswa kwemangoda chete, izvo zvinoita kuti nyaya dzekutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu muZimbabwe dzisave nechekuita nekudomwa kwayo kutungamira sangano iri. No media source currently available No media source currently available
title: Zimbabwe Inodomwa Kutora Chigaro cheMutevedzeri waSachigaro weKimberley Process Muna 2022

text: Munyori mukuru werimwe sangano revanozviitira mabasa emaoko reZimbabwe Chamber of Informal Economy Associations, VaWisborn Malaya, vanoti vari kukumbira hurumende, makanzuru nemasangano akazvimirira oga kuti vavabatsire nezvikwanisiro kuitira kuti vakwanise kutanga basa pasina kutyira kutapurirwa chirwere cheCovid-19. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vakazivisa neMuvhuro kuti vanozviitira mabasa avo emaoko vatange kushande asi vachitevedzera kurudziro yeWorld Health Organization yekuti vageze maoko, kupfeka mamasiki, kugara kure nakure nezvimwe. Sangano rinopa rubatsiro reOxfam richitsigirwa neUnited Nations Development Program rakatobatsira kugadzira musika wevarimi weMbare Farmers Market muHarare uyo wakaiswa mvura, zvimbuzi nezvimwe zvakakosha. Gurukota rezvevashandi nezvemagariro akanaka evanhu, Muzvinafundo Paul Mavima, vakatozivisa kuti hurumende yakagadzirira kubatsira vanozviitira mabasa emaoko kunyange hazvo vanhu ava vari kuchema chema kuti rubatsiro rwacho rwuri kunonoka. Mukuzeya nyaya iyi, Blessing Zulu weStudio 7 abata VaMalaya akatanga nekuvabvunza kuti vari kumbowana here rubatsiro kubva kune masangano anoshanda akazvimirira. No media source currently available
title: Vanozviitira Mabasa eMaoko Vokumbira Rubatsiro rweZvikwanisiro

text: Mutungamiri wesangano revadzidzisi reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe kana kuti ARTUZ VaObert Masaraure vanoti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka mujeri reChikurubi mavange vari. Vachitaura neStudio 7, VaMasaraure vati mujeri hamusi nyore kugara munguva ino yechando uye chikafu chishoma. Vanotiwo vaigara nevamwe vakatongerwa kugara mujeri kwehupenyu hwose kunyangwe izvi zvisiri pamutemo sezvo vasati vatongwa. VaMasaraure vari kupomerwa mhosva yekuponda VaRoy Issa vaive nhengo yesangano ravo muna 2016. Vari kuramba mhosva iyi uye dare rakamboti VaIssa vakadonha kubva mukamuri yechinomwe paJameson Hotel muHarare vachibva vafa. Asi mapurisa akati ave nehumwe humbowo. VaMasaraure vakapihwa mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso nemusi weChitatu nedare repamusoro. No media source currently available
title: VaMasaraure Votaura nezveHupenyu muChikurubi

text: Mashoko ebhanga guru rinokweretesa mari nyika dzepasi rino reWorld Bank ekuti hupfumi hweZimbabwe huchakwira gore rino uye wakati kwirirei zvakare gore rapera yaunza kupokana kukuru munyika pakati penyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi. Vamwe vanoti zviri kuratidza kuti hurumende iri mugwara asi vamwe vachiti hapana chekurovera bembera. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvemabhanga vari nhengo yeZanu-PF, VaGilbert Muponda, vanoti zviri kutaurwa neWorld Bank zvinoratidza kuti Zimbabwe iri mugwara sezviri kutaurwa negurukota rinoona nezvemari, Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube, vanoti hupfumi hwenyika huri mugwara uye vanotarisira kuti hupfumi huchakwira nezvikamu zvishanu nechidimbu kubva muzana kana kuti 5,5%. Mumashoko kuvatori venhau, bhanga reWorld Bank rinoti hupfumi hwenyika hwakati kwirirei gore rapera nekuda kwekunaya zvakanaka kwemvura uye rinotarisira kuti uchaita zviri nani zvakare gore rino kana mvura ikanaya zvakanaka, vanhu vakabayiwa nhomba yeCovid-19 uye hurumende ikaendereera mberi nekudzika mitemo yekusimbaradza hupfumi. Asi bhanga iri rinotenda kuti vanhu vanosvika mamiriyoni matanhatu nechiuru chimwe chete munyika vakatarisana nenzara. Nyaya yemutsauko wakakura pakati pemari iri kutengwa dhora rekuAmerica pamusika weReserve Bank of Zimbabwe Foreign Exchange Auction nepamusika wepamukoto inonzi neWorld Bank ichapa kuti mitengo yezvinhu idhure zvakanyanya. VaMuponda vati musika wekutenga nekutengesa mari weRBZ uri kushanda zvakanaka. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi, Muzvinafundo Gift Mugano, vanoti hupfumi hwakati kwirirei asi vakawanda havaone mutsauko nekuti hupfumi hwange wakati dererei kwenguva yakareba. Vati nyaya yekuramba nyika ichishandisa dhora remunyika ichapa kuti mitengo yezvinhu irambe ichiita chamurambamhuru. Mashoko aya atsinhirwa nemunyori mukuru wesangano revashandi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, VaJaphet Moyo. VaMoyo vati vanhu vakawanda vachiri kunonga svosve nemuromo. Bhanga reWorld Bank iro rakati gore rapera vanhu mamiriyoni manomwe nezviuru mazana mapfumbamwe munyika vainge vakatatisana nenzara inotyisa rinoti huwandu uhu huchaderera kusvika pamamiriyoni matanhatu nechiuru chimwe chete gore rino.
title: World Bank Inoti Hupfumi hweZimbabwe Huchati Kwirirei Asi Dzimwe Nyanzvi Dzichiti Zvichanetsa

text: Mutungamiri webato rinopikisa rePeople’s Democratic Party, PDP, VaTendai Biti, vanoti kunetsana kuri kuitika muZanu-PF kunogona kukonzera kusagadzikana kwenyika kana kurwisana pachideuka ropa mubato iri. Mutungamiri webato rinopikisa rePeople’s Democratic Party, PDP, VaTendai Biti, vanoti kunetsana kuri kuitika muZanu-PF kunogona kukonzera kusagadzikana kwenyika kana kurwisana pachideuka ropa mubato iri. Mubato reZanu-PF maita kunetsana kunotyisa pakati pevanhu vanonzi vari kutsigira chikwata cheG40 chinonzi chinotsigira Amai Grace Mugabe nechikwata chiri kunzi Team Lacoste chiri kutsigira mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa. VaBiti vanoti zvinhu zvashata muZanu PF zvokuti zvikasagadziriswa, vanhu vachatanga kuurayana mubato iri. VaBiti vanoti munyika mava kuda hurumende inofanobata matomu, transitional authority, kuitira kuti zvinhu zvigadziriswe nenzira kwayo. Asi VaBiti varamba mashoko ekuti vakaudza vatori venhau kuti havafi vakashanda zvakare munyayaya dzematongerwo enyika nemutungamiri we MDC, VaMorgan Tsvangirai. No media source currently available
title: VaBiti Vanoti Vanhu Vanogona Kupondana muZanu PF

text: Vanhu vakawanda munyika vanoti mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe nebato ravo riri kutonga reZanu-PF vakundikana kugadzirisa nyaya dzehuori zvekuti pave kuda vatungamiri vatsva kuti nyika ipinde mugwara rakanaka. Vanhu vakawanda vakachaya nhare pachirongwa cheLiveTalk cheStudio 7 nemusi weMuvhuro vakati vaneta nenyaya dzehuori munyika uye kusasungwa kwevanhu vanenge vachipomerwa mhosva dzakadai. Gurukota rinoona nezvedzidzo yepamusoro Muzvinafundo Jonathan Moyo vari kupomerwa mhosva yekuba mari yebazi ravanotungamira reZimbabwe Manpower Development Fund kana kuti ZIMDEF. VaMoyo vanonzi vaishanda nemutevedzeri wavo VaGodfrey Gandawa. Mari iyi yaifanira kupihwa vadzidzi asi VaMoyo vanoti vakatenga mabhazikoro vakapa madzishe. Izvi zvapa sangano revadzidzi reZimbabwe National Students kuti rikurudzire kuti vasiye basa. Asi VaMoyo padandemutande retwitter vari kuti mamwe makurukota ehurumende ari kununa nenyaya dzehuori asi havasi kusungwa. Pave kuita kukandiranwa makobvu nematete pakati pechikwata chinonzi Generation 40 uye cheTeam Lacoste pachipumhanwa huroyi. Chikwata cheTeam Lacoste chinonzi chinotsigira VaMnangangwa cheGeneration 40 chichitsigira Amai Grace Mugabe mudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika. Vamwe vabatwa mumambure emari inonzi yakabiwa vanosanganisirawo gurukota rezvehumhizha mukuburitswa kwemashoko VaSupa Mandiwanzira uye VaKudzai Chipanga vanotungamira bazi revechidiki reZanu-PF Youth League. Mumwe mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika VaPhelekezela Mphoko vanonzi vari kuchikwata chaVaMoyo cheGeneration 40 vanoti kuda kusunga VaMoyo kupinda nemwenje mudziva. Mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vari kuMalaysia parizvino apo mubato mavo muine hondo inotyisa iyi. Mwedzi wapera, VaMugabe vakambopomerawo gurukota rezvematunhu VaSaviour Kasukuwere mhosva yekuita zvehuori panyaya yemastands asi havana kusungwa. Mamwe makurukota akawanda ari kupomerwa mhosva yekuita zvehuori asi vari kuregwa vachiita madiro aJojina. VaDumisani Mtombeni vanotungamira sangano re Zero Tolerance-Wise Consultancy rinorwisa nyaya dzehuori vanoti sangano reZimbabwe Anti- Corruption Commission rinofanira kuregedzwa richishanda rakasununguka. Sangano iri riri kuda kubvunzurudza VaMoyo asi rakarambidzwa naVaMugabe naVaMphoko. No media source currently available
title: Vakawanda Vogunu'una neHuori muZanu-PF

text: Nhasi mhuri yemuAmerica iri kubatana pazororo rekutenda kana kuti Thanksgiving Holiday iro rakatanga kucherechedzwa muna 1621 senzira yekumbotura befu nekutenda maropafadzo egoho rakanaka kana vanhu vachinge vapedza kukohwa. Kunze kweAmerica, nyika yayakavakidzana nayo yeCanada inewo tsika yekukoshesa zororo iri. MuAfrica, Liberia inocherechedzawo zuva iri. MuAmerica zororo iri ririko muvhiki rechitatu remuna mwedzi waMbudzi uri musi weChina. Kare vanhu vainguna nehama neshamwari vachidya zvinhu zvakaita senyama yegarikuni, bhatatisi nezvimwe. Asi mukore uno kunze kwekudya, vanhu vave kushandisa zororo iri senguva yekutengawo zvinhu muzvitotoro sezvo zvinenge zvaderedzwa mutengo. Chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chiri muAmerica, Muzvinafundo Elliot Masocha vanodzidzisa paDevry University kuOhio vanoti macherechedzerwo ezuva iri muAmerica anoita kuti vafunge zvaimboitwa kuZimbabwe nguva dzeKisimusi negore idzva. No media source currently available
title: America Inocherechedza Zuva reThanksgiving

text: Vakasarudzwa kumirira Highfield West mudare reparamende vakamirira MDC Alliance, VaHappymore Chidziva avo vakasungwa nemusi weMuvhuro vakapihwa mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso yemadhora zana. Izvi zvave kureva kuti VaChidziva vave kukwanisa kutora mhiko nhasi nedzimwe nhengo dzedare reparamende nedzesenate. VaChidziva vari kupomerwa mhosva yekukonzera mhirizhonga muna Chikunguru pasi pemutemo we Criminal Law (Codification and Reform) Act. Vanonzi vakapara mhosva iyi kuGweru uko vakazoendeswa nemusi weMuvhuro kuti vanotongwa. Magistrate Charity Maphosa vakati VaChidziva vabvise mari yechibatiso asi vazopote vachienda kumapurisa ekwaMachipisa kamwechete pamavhiki maviri. Dzimwe nhengo dzeMDC Alliance dzakasungwawo nemusi weMuvhuro, VaChamunorwa Madya vanove mutevedzeri wemunyori mukuru wevechidiki kana kuti Youth Assembly uye vamwe vanochengetedza muzinda webato iri weRichard Morgan Tsvangirai House muHarare, VaMafaiti Mubaiwa vakanziwo nedare ramejastiriti muHarare vabvise mari yechibatiso inosvika madhora makumi mashanu pamunhu. Vaviri ava vari kunzi vane chekuita nekuratidzira kwakaitika muHarare mukutanga kwaNyamavhuvhu apo vanhu vatanhatu vakazoguma vapfuurwa nemauto. Asi VaChidziva nevamwe vavo vaviri vari kumiririrwa nemagweta eZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights vari kuramba mhosva dzavari kupomerwa.
title: VaChidziva neVamwe veMDC Alliance Vobvisiswa Mari yeChibatiso

text: Zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinogara kunze kwenyika zviri kubatsira kurwisa dambudziko rechirwere chekorera kuburikidza nekutsvaka mari yekubatsira vanhu kuZimbabwe kuitira kuti varwise chirwere ichi. Mari iri kuunganidzwa iyi ndeyekutenga mvura yakachena kuZimbabwe ichipihwa vanhu sezvo mvura yakachena iri kunetsa zvikuru muHarare nedzimwe nzvimbo. Kusvika pari zvino vanhu vanosvika makumi maviri nemumwe vafa nechirwere chekorera, uye vanhu vanodarika zviuru zvitatu vabatwa nechirwere ichi. Mumwe wezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe izvi, VaFreeman Chari, avo vanogara ku Ohio muAmerica, vanoti zvinovarwadza kuti mishonga inodiwa kurapa nekudzivirira chirwere ichi haisi kuwanika nyore munyika. Vanotiwo mimwe mishonga inopihwa vanhu zvechimbi chimbi kana vabatwa nechirwere chekorera haisisina simba rekumisa chirwere ichi. Kana munhu achinge abatwa nechirwere ichi, mishonga yaanotanga kupihwa ma Ciprofloxacin neCefriaxone, ayo anonzi haasi kushanda pakorera iri kubata vanhu muHarare. Naizvozvo, VaChari vanoti vari kuunganidza mari yekuti vanhu vabatsirike mukurwisa chirwere ichi. “Takangofunga kuti isusu nevamwe vedu tiri kuno kuAmerica, chii chatingakwanisa kuita kuitira kuti tibatsire vari kumusha. Takaona kuti chekutanga vanhu vanoda mvura tikatanga kufona fona kuZimbabwe tichitaura nemakambani akasiyana siyana anogadzira mvura,” VaChari vaudza Studio7. “Vamwe vaititi vanokwanisa kutipa mvura asi zvekutakurisa ndipo pasina. Saka takaedza kutsvaka mabhauza kuti patinopiwa mvura yamahara tonoisa kuvanhu, tichivapavo mapiritsi anochenesa mvura.” VaChari vanoti chinangwa chavo ndechekuunganidza mari inosvika zviuru gumi zvemadhora kuti vabatsire varombo nemvura nemishonga yekurwisa korera kuZimbabwe. Nzvimbo dzanyanyobatwa nekorera muHarare muHarare mumisha yeGlen Vierw neBudiriro, pamwe nenzvimbo dziri mumatunhu eMasvingo, Manicaland, neMidlands. Gurukota rezvehutano, VaObediah Moyo, vakazivisa neChitatu kuti vanhu makumi maviri nemwe chete vakange vafa nechirwere chekorera. Mutungamiri weMDC, VaNelson Chamisa, vakashanyira neChitatu musha weGlen View vachiona varwere vakabatwa nekorera. Korera yakambonetsa zvakare muna 2008 vanhu vanodarika zviuru zvina vakafa nechirwere ichi munyika yose. No media source currently available
title: VaFreeman Chari Votungamira Hurongwa hweKubatsira Kurwisa Korera KuZimbabwe

text: Panguva iyo vanhu vakawanda munyika, kunyanya vanhukadzi, vari kurarama nekuriritira mhuri dzavo vachizvishandira pachavo vega, rimwe sangano rinoshanda rakazvimirira riri kudzidzisa mamwe madzimai nezvemabhizimisi kuitira kuti vavandudze hupenyu hwavo.Mutori wedu wenhau, Muzvare Roselyn Ncube vanoti vakaberekwa vaine chipo chekugadzira nekusona mbatya zvekuti pavaikura vaiti vakatengerwa zvipfeko nevabereki vavo vaipedzisira vachinja zvipfeko izvi vogadzira zvavo zvavanoda. Muzvare Ncube, avo vave nebhizimisi rekusona mbatya, kusanganisira dzinopfekwa nevamwe vanhu vane mukurumbira, vanoti vakazodzidzira havo zvekusona mbatya pane imwe nguva, asi vanoti vanovimba nechavanoti chipo chekuzvarwa nacho. Muzvare Ncube ndemumwe wemadzimai makumi matatu vanobva kuchamhembe kwenyika vari kudzidziswa zvakasiyana siyana pamusoro pebhizimisi pasi pechirongwa chesangano reProfessional Women, Women Executives and Business Women’s Forum, kana kuti Proweb. Vanoti kusvika pari zvino vadzidza zvakawanda pamusoro pezvekuve mubhizimisi, kusanganisira zvimwe zvinhu zvavaisakoshesa, zvakadai sekuti mari inochengetedzwa sei. Amai Adelaide Muchetu ndemumwe wemadzimai ari kudzidziswawo nezvebhizimisi pasi pechirongwa cheProweb. Amai Muchetu vanoti vave nemakore akati kuti vachiita basa rekuronga wungano dzakaita semichato kana ndufu, zvinoziikanwa muchirungu kunzi ‘Event Management.’ Vanotiwo kuve kwavo muchirongwa chekudzidziswa zvebhizimisi kuri kuvabatsira zvikuru. Mukuru wesangano reProweb, Amai Moira Ngaru, vanoti sangano ravo rakatanga kudzidzisa vanhukadzi zvakasiyana-siyana mune zvemabhizimisi mugore ra2015 mushure mekuona kukosha kwemabasa anoitwa nemadzimai. Pagore rega rega sangano reProweb rinodzidzisa madzimai makumi matanhatu kubva kunzvimbo dzakasiyana munyika, uye zvidzidzo izvi zvinoitwa kamwe chete pavhiki mukati memwedzi miviri kusvika gore rapera. Amai Ngaru vanoti madzimai aya anosarudzwa zvichienderana nepfungwa dzavainadzo dzemabhizimisi avo, uye vanobhadhara mari shoma kuitira kuti vave muchirongwa ichi. Muzvare Violet Mhute inyanzvi munyaya dzekuongorora mashandisirwe emari uye inhengo yeInstitute of Public Auditors. Muzvare Mhute vane kambani yavo inoita basa rekuongorora mashandisirwo anoitwa mari, uye vanoti zvidzidzo zvavari kuwana pamwe nekusangana nemamwe madzimai anoita zvemabhizimisi, kuri kuvabatsira zvikuru.\n\nAmai Mariyeti Mpala avo vave nenguva vachiita zvekubatsira vanhu vakwegura pachena, ndemumwe wemadzimai ari kudzidziswa hutungamiri mumabhizimisi pasi pechirongwa cheProweb. Amai Mpala vanoti nekuda kwedzidziso yavari kuwana, vanotarisira kuti munguva pfupi inotevera vachave mumwe wevatungamiri vakanaka vemunzvimbo yavanogara. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi dzinoti chirongwa chekudzidzisa madzimai ari mumabhizimisi kuti avandudze mabhizimisi avo, chinogona kubatsira mukusimudzira hupfumi hwenyika. No media source currently available
title: Madzimai Owana Rubatsiro Rwekuita Mabhizinesi

text: Dare repamusorosoro, reConstitutional Court neChitatu rakapa mutongo unoti chikamu 27 chemutemo wePublic Order and Security Act, POSA, icho chinopa mapurisa masimba ekurambidza misangano kana kuratidzira, hachisi pamutemo. Izvi zvinotevera nyaya yakakwidzwa kudare iri nemamwe masangano akazvimirira achipikisa chikamu ichi chiri kushandiswa zvisiri pamutemo kumbunyikidza kodzero dzavo dzekuungana dzavanopiwa nebumbiro remitemo yenyika. Masangano aya anoti reDemocratic Assembly for Restoration and Empowerment (Dare), National Vendors’ Union of Zimbabwe, Combined Harare Residents’ Association (CHRA), neNational Election Reform Agenda (NERA), Vachitura mutongo uyu vakamirira vatongi vose vedare repamusorosoro iri, Amai Rita Makarau vakati chikamu chemutemo uyu chinogona kushandiswa zvisizvo nemapurisa kuburikidza nekuramba vorambidza vanhu kuungana kana kuratidzira. Gweta raimirira masangano aya, VaTendai Biti, vanoti vari kufadra nemutongo uyu. Asi VaBiti vanoti vanofanirwa zvakare kurwisana nechikamu 12 chePOSA, icho chinoti vanhu vanoda kuungana vanofanirwa kutanga vazivisa nekupuwa mvumo nemapurisa. Studio 7 yaedza kubata mutauriri wemapurisa, Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi, kuti tinzwe divi remapurisa pamutongo uyu asi vati vari pazororo. Taedzawo kubata mumwe mutauriri wemapurisa, Chief Superintendent Blessmore Chishaka, asi nharembozha yavo yanga isingabatiki. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, sangano reAmnesty International rinoti mutongo wakapiwa neConstitutional Court uyu unovhura chikamu chitsva munyaya dzekodzero dzevanhu muZimbabwe. Mukuru weAmnesty International muZimbabwe, Amai Jessica Pwiti, mugwaro ravaburitsa, vati mutongo uyu unotambirika zvikuru. Vatiwo kwemakore akawanda mutemo uyu wanga uchishandiswa kutyora kodzero dzevanhu kuburikidza nekusungwa, kushungurudzwa uye kutochwa kwevanhu vanoonekwa sevanopikisa hurumende kana vanoedza kufumura kutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu. Asi Amai Pwiti vati chitsvambe chasarira kuhurumende kuona kuti mutongo wedare uyu vatevedzerwa. Vati mapurisa anofanirwa kuonawo kuti aremekedza mutongo uyu. Mutemo wePOSA wakadzikwa muna 2002 uchutsiwa mutemo weLaw and Order Maintenance Act, LOMA, uyo waishandiswa nehurumende mukutyora kodzero dzevanhu. Mutemo muyu waivepo zvakare munguva yeRhodesia nyika isati yawana kuzvitonga.
title: Veruzhinji Votambira Mutongo weConstitutional Court paChikamu chePOSA

text: Makare, kambani yainzi Cold Storage Commission, iyo yave kunzi Cold Storage Company (CSC) yaive chidadiso chenyika. Asi ikozvino kambani iyi semamwe makambani ehurumende yave zuru rakapinda nyoka. Kambani iyi inonzi iri kushanda pazvikamu gumi kubva muzana zvemashandiro ainofanirwa kunge ichiita. Kutatarika kuri kuita kambani iyi kwapa kuti kambani yeNational Social Security Authority, kana kuti NSSA, iuchike mari inosvika mamiriyoni gumi nemasere emadhora kuBulawayo kumutsiridza kambani iyi. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi hadzisi kuwirirana pakupindira kweNSSA uku. Vamwe vanoti zvakanaka, asi vamwe vachiti hazvina kunaka. CSC yainge iine makambani kuMarondera, Harare, Chinhoyi neBulawayo ichitengesa nyama kunyika dzekumawarira kuEurope. Izvi zvaipa nyika mari inosvika zana remamiriyoni emadhora pagore. Kunyangwe EU yakatemera mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, nemudzimai wavo zvirango, sangano iri richiri kutenga nyama yemombe kubva kuZimbabwe, asi nyika iri kukundikana hayo kuzadzisa chiga chayo. Mumazuva ayo, CSC ndiyo kambani yesiraha yaive hombe muAfrica mose uye yaiunza mari yekunze yakawanda munyika. Asi ikozvino kambani iyi ine zvikwereti zvakawanda zvapa kuti igwadame. Nemusi weChipiri kuMarondera mimwe midziyo yange ichototengeswa nezvikonzi zvedare nenyaya yezvikwereti izvi. Kumakore ekuma 1990 kambani yainge iine vashandi vakabayirwa zvitupa vanodarika chiuru nemazana mashanu nevamwe vakawanda vaiita maricho, asi ikozvino kune vashandi vasingadarike mazana mashanu. Asi vamwe vashandi vanoti vave nemakore vachinzwa mashoko aya pasina chinobuda nekudaro vanoti vanovimba kuti haasi manatsa mukanwa ndonda kurota ichiyamwa. Mutungamiri weConfederation of Zimbabwe Industries, VaBusisa Moyo, vanoti vanofara nezvaitwa neNSSA sezvo zvichipa varimi musika wekutengesa mombe dzavo. VaMoyo vanoti izvi zvichamutsiridza hupfumi hweguta reBulawayo nekuwanisa vanhu mabasa. Asi handi vose munyika vari kuti NSSA yabaya dede nemukanwa. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi uye vaimbotungamira Zimbabwe National Chamber of Commerce, VaLuxon Zembe, vanoti NSSA, iyo inoshandisa mari dzevashandi dzemudyandigere, haifanire kuonekwa ichisungirira mari pagumbo rengwe. VaZembe vanoti hurumende inofanira kuyedza kukwezva vekunze vanoda kuzouchika mari mumakambani akaita seCSC aya. Mukuru weZimbabwe Farmers Union, VaPaul Zakaria, vanoti vanopfuya mombe vanotambira zvikuru danho rekumutsiridza CSC. Asi vatiwo varimi vanodawo kupihwa mukana wekuti vave nemasheya mukambani iyi. Nyaya yekurima ndiwo wainge uri musimboti wenyika hurumende isati yatanga chirongwa chekugovera vatema ivhu vamwe vacho vari ana mugarira badza. Kusafamba zvakanaka munyaya dzekurima kwapa kuti hupfumi hwenyika hutatarikewo sezvo kusisina mabasa mumapurazi uye makambani akawanda anodyidzana nekurima. Makare, Zimbabwe yainge iine mombe dzinosvika mamiriyoni matanhatu nezviuru mazana masere, asi iko zvino mombe dzadzikira kusvika kumamiriyoni mashanu nezviuru mazana maviri uye dzenyama dzaderera kusvika pazviuru mazana maviri kubva pazviuru mazana matanhatu nezvishanu. Vamwe vari kuyedza kubatsira kumutsiridza CSC ndeveFood And Agriculture Organization uye veAgribank. No media source currently available
title: NSSA Yoyedza Kumutsiridza CSC Asi Paine Mutauro

text: Dzimwe nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika dzinoti hadzisi kunzwisisa kuti sei nhumwa yeUnited Nations, Amai Elena Douhan, vasina zvavari kutaura pamusoro penhirizhonga dziri kuitika pamisangano yeMDC Alliance. Misangano iri kuitwa nemutungamiri weMDC Alliance, VaNelson Chamisa, iri kuvhiringidzwa nevanhu vanofungidzirwa kuti vatsigiri veZanu-PF. Pane mumwe musangano kuManicaland, pakaridzwa pfuti uye motikari dzaifamba navachamisa dzikatemwa nematombo, izvo zvakaitika mazuva mashoma mushure nekutemwa kwemotikari dzaVaChamisa kwaCharumbira, kuMasvingo. Amai Douhan vari muZimbabwe mavari kuongorora nyaya dzezvirango nekodzero dzevanhu. Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vachishanda vakazvimirira, VaRejoice Ngwenya, vanoti Amai Douhan havana zvavakafambira, zvikurusei kana takatarisa kuti vakaitwa zvekukokwa uye vachibvazve kuBelarus, nyika ine hurumende inowirirana zvikuru naVaMnangagwa. No media source currently available
title: Nhumwa yeUnited Nations Yokurudzirwa Kutaura Pamusoro peMhirizhonga Iri Kuitika Munyika

text: Mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vadoma dare ravo remakurukota makumi maviri rinosanganisira nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi, VaMtuli Ncube, segurukota rezvemari, pamwe nenyanzvi munyaya dzemitambo, Muzvare Kisrty Covenrty, segurukota revechidiki nemitambo. Vamwe vadomwa kuva makurukota ndiAmai Oppha Muchinguri Kashiri, vaitwa gurukota rezvekudzivirirwa kwenyika; VaJuly Moyo vaitwa gurukota rezvemaguta nematunhu; VaSibusiso Moyo vachiitwa kugurukota rekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, chinzvimbo chavanga vainacho kubva gore rapera, apo mauto akapindira mukubvisa vaive mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, pachigaro. VaMnangagwa vadomawo vatevedzeri vemakurukota vemapazi gumi nematatu uye bazi rezvekurima richaramba riine vatevedzeri vaviri. VaDouglas Karoro naVaVangelis Haritatos ndivo vatevedzeri vebazi iri. VaVictor Matemadanda ndivo mutevedzeri wezvekudzivirwa kwenyika nevakarwira hondo yerusunguko; VaEdgar Moyo ndivo mutevedzeri wedzidzo yePrimary neSecondary; VaLovemore Matuke vaitwa mutevedzeri mubazi rezvevashandi, ukuwo VaFortune Chasi ndivo vaitwa mutevedzeri mubazi rezvekutakurwa kwezvinhu. Amai Yeukai Simbanegavi ndivo mutevedzeri wevechidiki, VaRajeshakumart Modi vaitwa mutevedzeri webazi rezvemaindaisitiri, uye VaMike Madiro ndivo mutevedzeri wezvemukati menyika. VaManngagwa vadomawo makurukota ematunhu mapfumbamwe kusiya kweHarare vachiti vachiri kuona kuti vachaita sei sezvo nhengo zhinji dzeZanu PF dzakakundikana musarudzo. Vapfumbamwe ava ndevanoti, Amai Judith Ncube Bulawayo, Muzvare Mary Mliswa - Mashonaland West, Appolonia Munzverengi - Mashonaland East, Amai Monica Mavhunga - Mashonaland Central, Amai Ellen Gwaradzimba - Manicalanda, VaEzra Chadzamira - Masvingo, VaAbdenico Ncube - Matabeleland South naVaRichard Moyo kuMatabeleland North. Makurukota aya achatora mhiko yekutanga basa nemusi weMuvhuro. VaMnangagwa vati vanovimba nemakurukota avadoma uye achaita basa rekusimudzira hupfumi nehupenyu hwevanhu. Mukuru weMedia Centre, VaEnerst Mudzengi, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vamira kuona kuti makurukota aya achapihwa mukana wekuita basa rawo zvakanaka here uyewo kuti paiswa mitemo inovabvumidza kuita izvi. Vanongorora nyaya dzehupfumi vanoti VaMnangagwa vaita zvakanaka nekudomwa nyanzvi mumapazi akaita seremari nehutano pamwe nekusendeka mamwe makurukota ange agara achingotenderera muhurumende kwenguva yakareba. Nhengo yebhodhi resangano rePlatofrm for Youth Development, VaOwen Dhliwayo, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vafara nekudomwa kwevechidiki kuti atungamiri bazi revechidiki. Mumwe mugari wemuHarare, Amai Hildah Shumba, vati vanoona sekuti VaMnangagwa vasarudza makurukota ane hunyanzvi. Pavabvunzwa kuti sei vange vasina kudoma nhengo dzebato rinopikisa reMDC mudare ravo, VaMangagwa vati hapana kumbogara paita nhaurirano nebato ravo uye vadoma makurukota avo sezvinodiwa nebato ravo reZanu PF. Mamwe makurukota asendekwa ange ave nenguva achingotenderera muhurumende, ndiVaObert Mpofu, VaPatrick Chinamasa, VaJosaya Hungwe naVaDavid Parirenyatwa. No media source currently available
title: VaMnangagwa Vanodoma Dare reMakurukota

text: Dambudziko rekushaikwa kwemari munyika rave kuita kuti kambani yeFidelity Printers and Refiners, itadzewo kuwana mari yekutenga goridhe kunyanya kubva kune vemakambani madiki anochera chicherwa chakakosha ichi. Kambani yehurumende iyi ndiyo chete kambani munyika inobvumirwa kutenga goridhe nekuritengesa kunze kwenyika. Vamwe vanhu vanorarama nekuchera pamwe nekutengesa goridhe vanoti havachawane mari inovafadza sezvo kushaikwa kwemari munyika kwave kuita kuti kambani yehurumende yeFidelity Printers iyo inotenga gordhe kubva kune vanorichera, ishaywo mari yekutenga goridhe iri. Vamwe vanochera nekutengesesa goridhe mumadhorobha akadai seGweru neGwanda vakataurira Studio 7 kuti vave nemazuva akawanda vachiedza kutengesa goridhe iri kumizinda yeFidelity Printers iri mumadhorobha aya asi vachitaurirwa kuti hakuna mari. Mumwe wevanhu ava ndemumwe murume anogara kuGwanda uyo akangozvidoma nezita rekuti Ncube akataurira Studio 7 kuti nekuda kwekuti vanoda mari yekushandisa pazororo kudai iye nevamwe vakaita saye vari kupedzisira vave kutengesa goridhe ravo kune vamwe vanhuwo vanenge vane mari. “Ndave nemazuva ndichienda kuFidelity yekuno uku ndichingudzwa kuti hakuna mari…ndofunga about three or four times.” Vanoenderera mberi vachiti, “Sezvamunongozivawo nguva ino yezororo munhu unenge uchidawo mari yekuti ufare nemhuri plus manje manje zvikoro zvinenge zvave kuvhurwa saka tinenge tichida mari yefees. But most importantly tinenge tichida mari yekuita reinvest mubusiness. Saka tiri kungozopedzisira taenda kuma middlemen vanenge vane cash, ndiko kwatinonotengesa goridhe racho.” VaDosman Mangisi ndivo mutauriri wesangano reZimbabwe Miners’ Federation, kana kuti ZMF. VaMangisi avo vanoshandira muBulawayo vakabvuma kuti vanochera goridhe munzvimbo dzakasiyan-siyana munyika vari kusangana nedambudziko rekushaikwa kwemari kukambani yeFidelity Printers. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kukambani yeFidelity Printers kana kubhanga guru renyika reReserve Bank of Zimbabwe. Asi Amai Apollonia Munzverenwgi vanove mutungamiri wesangano reZMF vataurira Studio 7 parunhare kuti ichokwadi kuti kambani yeFidelity Printers iri kushaya mari yekutenga goridhe kubva kune vamwe vari pasi pesangano ravo. Kambani yeFidelity Printers ine mizinda yekutenga goridhe munzvimbo dzakasiyana-siyana munyika kusanganisira, Gwanda, gweru, Kadoma, kwekwe, Masvingo, Mutare neZvishavane. Amai Munzverengwi, avo vanoti sangano ravo rinogara richitaurirana nekambani yeFidelity vanoti kuve nevanhu vakawanda vanopiwa marezinesi ekutenga goridhe kunogona kubatsira asi vanoti vanhu ava vanofanirwa kuve vanhu vakavimbika vasingazotengesi goridhe iri kunze kwenyika zvisiri pamutemo. Goridhe ndicho chicherwa chiri panzvimbo yechipiri chichitevera platinum pakuwanisa nyika mari yekunze. Nyika yeZimbabwe yaimbowana goridhe rinosvika matonne makumi maviri nemanomwe pagore rega rega asi nekuda kwekuwondomoka kwehupfumi, huwandu uhu hwakazodzikira kusvika pamatonne matatu chete mugore ra2008. Huwandu uhu hwave kuwkira zvekare nekuda kwekuti kwave nevemakambani madiki vave kucherawo goridhe. Sangano reChamber of Mines rinoti nyika yakawana matonne makumi maviri egoridhe mugore ra2015 uye mugore rino rave kupera nyika yakawana matonne makumi maviri nemaviri. No media source currently available
title: Fidelity Printers And Refiners Yopererwa neMari yeKutenga Goridhe

text: Hurumende inoti vatori venhau vane basa zvakanyanya mukuzadzisa chishuviro chehurumende chebudiriro pamwe nekuona kuti nyika inenge yabuda muhurombo panosvika gore ra2030. Vachitaura kumhemberero yebepanhau reDaily News rekusvitsa makore gumi mushure mekumbovharwa, gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, vati vatori venhau vanofanirwa kubatsira hurumende mukuona kuti nyika yabudirira huye kubatana. Amai Mutsvangwa vatiwo hurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa inokoshesa zvakanyanya kushanda kwevatori venhau zvakasununguka. Vatiwo segurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, vari kuedza nepese pavanogona kuti vatori venhau vawaniswe ruzivo rwezvavanenge vachida pakupepeta nhau pamwe nekuti vashande zvakasununguka. Mukuru wesangano rinoona nezvemashandiro evatori venhau reVoluntary Media Council of Zimbabwe kana kuti VMCZ, VaLoughty Dube, vakurudzirawo vatori venhau kuti vashande vachitevedzera zvinotarisirwa kubva kuvatori venhau. VaDube vatsigirawo mashoko aAmai Mutsvangwa vachiti vatori venhau vane basa guru rekusimudzira budiriro munyika. Asi nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika vachishanda nesangano rakazvimiririra rePlatform for Youth Development, VaOwen Dhliwayo, vati vatori venhau vanonyora nekutepfenyura zviri kuitika vakapa chitsvambe kuhurumende kuti ikoshese nyaya dzebudiriro. Kunyange hazvo hurumende ichiti ine chido chekuti vatori venhau vashande vakasunungukavatori venhau vanogarochema chema nekushungurudzwa vari pabasa. Sangano reMedia Institute of Southern Africa Zimbabwe rakabudisagwaro rayo repagore richiti vatori venhau vakashungurudzwa muna 2020 vaive vakwira kusvika pamakumi mashanu nevaviri zvichienzaniswa nemakumi maviri nevanomwe muna 2019. Musi weChipiri mumwe mutori wenhau webepa repadandemutande re263 Chat anonzi akakuvadzwa nemapurisa ari pabasa. Bepanhau reDailynews rakambovharwa muna 2003 nehurumende yemushakabvu VaRobert Mugabe ndokuzovhurwa zvakare muna 2011. No media source currently available
title: Vatori veNhau Vokurudzirwa Kunyora Nyaya dzeBudiriro

text: Sangano rinomirira vashandi vehurumende, reApex Council, rinoti kuratidzira kwakarongwa kuitwa nevashandi vehurumende neChitatu kuri kuenderera mberi zvichitevera kushaya muchero kwemusangano weNational Joint Negotiating Council waitwa neChipiri pakati pehurumende nevamiriri vevashandi. Mutewedzeri wasachigaro veApex Council, VaThomas Muzondo, vanoti vashandi vasunga kuenderera mberi nedanho ravo sezvo hurumende isina chayanga yakapfumbata kumusangano uyu pane zvichemo zvavo zvose zvavakaipa. VaMuzondo vanoti chimwe chanyanyotsamwisa vashandi ndechekuti hurumende yazivisa kuti haichakwanisa kuvabhadhara mari dzavo dzekutendwa kana kuti mabhonasi mumwedzi mumwechete waMbudzi nekuti haina mari. Izvi zvinenge zvave kureva kuti vashandi ava vachawana mabhonasi avo muna Mbudzi naZvita, hurongwa hwavanoti hunoomesera vachatambira mari idzi muna Zvita sezvo vachadziwana dzaderera huremu zvichienzaniswa nevamwe vavo vanenge vapiwa muna Mbudzi. No media source currently available Vashandi vanonzi vachaungana pamahofisi ePublic Service Commission mangwanani vachizofora vachinosiya magwaro enyunyuto kumahofisi emakurukota akasiyanasiyana ari paNew Government Complex, apo vatungamiri vemasangano evashandi vachataurawo kwavari. Mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaEnergy Mutodi, vanoti sehurumende vachaita kuti hurukuro dzemihoro nevashandi vayo dzirambe dzichienderera mberi, kunyange hazvo hurumende isingagone kupfuura mari dzairi kuvabhadhara pari zvino nekuda kwechirongwa chekuvandudza hupfumi chairi kuita. Panyaya yekuratidzira, VaMutodi vanoti ikodzero yemushandi wemuZimbabwe yaanopiwa nebumbiro renyika kuti aratidzire, chero asingaite zvemhirizhonga pamwe nekuparadza midziyo. No media source currently available
title: Vashandi veHurumende Vanoti Vachaenderera Mberi neKuratidzira neChitatu

text: Bato reZanu PF rabvisa pachigaro vatungamiriri vebandiko revechidiki vanoti VaPupurayi Togarepi, VaGodfrey Tsenengamu naVaLewis Matutu mushure mekuvapomera mhosva yekurasa gwara remusangano. VaMatutu naVaTsenengamu vakaita musangano nevatori venhau neMuvhuro vachipomera vamwe vana muzvinabhizinesi vanoshanda nebato iri mhosva dzehuwori. Izvi zvaziviswa nevakafanobata chinzvimbo chemunyori anoona nezvekufambiswa kwebasa pamwe nekuburitswa kwemashoko mubato iri, VaPatrick Chinamasa, mushure memusangano wePolitburo yebato iri waitwa neChitatu. VaTogarepi naVaMatutu, avo vange vari nhengo dzePolitburo semunyori nemutevedzeri wemunyori wezvechidiki, varasikirwawo nezvigaro zvavo mudare iri, uye imwe nhengo yevechidiki, VaTendai Chirau, ndivo vapuwa matomu kuti vasanobata chinzvimbo chemunyori wevechidiki muPolitburo chinove chinzvimbo change chiina VaTogarepi. VaChinamasa vati Politburo yatora danho iri mushure mekunge yambovayambira mushure mekunge vataura mazita evanhu vakawanda gore rapfuura vachiti ndivo vaiita zvehuwori munyika. Asi VaChinamasa vati VaTogarepi, avo vbanomirira Gutu South muNational Assembly, uye vari mukokeri weZanu PF mudare iri, vacharamba vachikokera nhengo dzedare reparamende. Vati VaMatutu naVaTsenengamu vabvisawo pazvigaro zvavo muYouth League kwegore uye kana gore rapfuura vanogona kukwikwidza zvigaro muYouth League. Vaviri ava vanziwo vaende kunodzidziswa gwara remusangano kuchikoro chemusangano chinodzidzisa gwara iri cheHebert Chitepo School of Ideology. Hatina kukwanisa kubata VaTogarepi, VaTsenengamu naVaMatutu kuti tinzwe divi ravo manyaya iyi sezvo nharembozha dzavo dzanga dzichinetsa kubata. Nemusi weMuvhuro VaTsenengamu naVaMatutu vakadoma muzvinabhimisi, Kudakwashe Tagwirei, Billy Rautenbach naVaTafadzwa Musarara sevamwe vevanhu vari kuita huwori munyika uhwo vakati hwave kukonzera kutambura kweveruzhinji munyika. VaMatutu naVaTsenengamu vakati vaiziva kuti pane zvaizoitika kwaviri vakakururudzira veruzhinji kuti varwise huwori munyika. VaTagwirei nekambani yavo yeSakunda vakapihwa basa nehurumende pachirongwa cheCommand Agriculture kozotiwo VaRautenbach ndivo vega vakapihwa rezenisi nehurumende rekugadzira Ethanol iyo inosanganiswa nemafuta emotokari. VaMusarara, avo vanova sachigaro wesangano revanogaya chibage, reGrain Millers Association of Zimbabwe, vakapomerwa mhosva yekukonzera kushaikwa kwehupfu munyika nenyaya dzehuwori. No media source currently available
title: Zanu PF Inobvisa paZvigaro VaMatutu, VaTsenengamu naVaTogarepi

text: Hurumende yadzika mutemo weStatutory Instrument 89 of 2021 uyo uri kurambidza veruzhinji kubva iye zvino zvichienda mberi kupinza munyika motokari dzine makore gumi kana kudarika ichiti vanenge vachida kupinza motokari idzi munyika vanofanira kutanga vapihwa mvumo nebazi rinoona nezvekugadzirwa nekutengeswa kwezvinhu, reIndustry and Commerce. Mumwe mukuru anoona nezvekutorwa kwemitero mubazi reZimbabwe Revenue Authority kana kuti Zimra, Amai Sibongile Dhliwayo, vanyora tsamba kuvashandi vebazi ravo vari kumiganhu yose yenyika, tsamba iyo iri mumaoko eStudio 7, vachivaudza kuti kubva izvozvi hapana munhu achabvumidzwa kupinza munyika motokari ine makore anodarika gumi asina tsamba kubva kubazi rinonona nezvekugadzirwa kwezvinhu pamwe nekutengeserana zvisinei nekuti motokari idzi dzange dzatove munzira kupinda munyika mutemo uyu usati wadzikwa. Vamwe vagari vemuHarare vakaita saVaTichakunda Mhiko, avo vanorarama nekutengesa mumigwagwa, vaudza Studio7 kuti varwadziwa zvikuru nedanho ratorwa nehurumende iri. VaMhiko vati vanga vari pakati pekuunganidza mari yekuti vatenge motokari kunze kwenyika kuti vagoishandisa mukunohodha zvavanotengesa. Mumwe mugari wemuHarare, VaTendai Nzara, vatiwo nemamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika munyaya dzezvehupfumi havakwanise kutenga motokari kumakambani anotengesa motokari muno vachiti mutemo wadzikwa nehurumende uyu unofanira kusendekwa parutivi. Mutemo wadzikwa nehurumende uyu unotiwo zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinenge zvichishanda kunze kwenyika hazvichabvumidzwewo kupinza motokari munyika dzinokosha madhora zviuru zvishanu zvemadhora ekuAmerica (US$5 000) kusanganisira mari yekupinza motokari idzi munyika zvasiyana nezvaisimboitwa mutemo uyu usati wadzikwa kuti munhu aishanda ari kunze kwenyika aigona kuuya nemotokari yake pasingatariswe kuti inokosha mari yakawanda zvakadii. Mutungamiri wesangano rePassengers Association of Zimbabwe, VaTafadzwa Goliathi, vati zvaitwa nehurumende izvi hutsinye hukuru sezvo zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinenge zvichishanda kune dzimwe nyika zvichibatsirawo nyika kubudikidza nekutumira mari yekunze kumusha. Munyori anoona nezvekutakurwa kwezvinhu muMDC Alliance, VaSettlement Chikwinya, vaudza Studio 7 kuti danho ratorwa nehurumende iri rinotsikirira varombo munyika vachiti vari kudzika mitemo iyi vanhu vari kuzvimba matumbu nekuguta avo vavati vanopihwa motokari pachena nehurumende. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura negurukota rinoona nezvekugadzirwa kwezvinhu nekutengeserana, Amai Sekai Nzenza, kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi sezvo vanga vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. Asi mhemgo yeZanu PF, VaObert Gutu, vati zvinenge zvichidawo kuti hurumende isimudzire kugadzirwa kwedzimotokari dzakawanda munyika izvo zvinozoderedza mutengo wemotokari. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi uye vachishanda neLabour and Economic Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Prosper Chitambara, vati zvaitwa nehurumende zvichaita kuti hurumende irasikirwe nemari yemitero yayanga ichiwana. Pavakatura bhajeti rekushandiswa kwemari yenyika kwegore rino muna Mbudzi gore rapera, gurukota rezvemari, VaMthuli Ncube, vakati hurumende yakaona zvakakodzera kuti itore danho iri sezvo Zimbabwe yave nyika yekurasirwa motokari dzisingakodzere kunge dziri mumigwagwa. No media source currently available
title: Hurumende Yoomesera Vanoda Kutenga Motokari Tsaru Kunze kweNyika

text: Sangano ravana chipangamazano munyaya dzehupfumi nebudiriro, re Labour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, (LEDRIZ), rinoti hurumende gore rino yakaisa mubhajeti rehutano mari shoma inofanirwa kushandiswa pagore nemunhu mumwe chete munyaya dzehutano izvo zviri kuita kuti zvipatara zvemunyika zvisangane nematambudziko asingaperi. Vachitaura pamusangano wakaitwa ne LEDRIZ nevatori venhau neChitatu manheru muMasvingo, chipangamazano musangano iri, Doctor Propsper Chitambara, vakati matambudziko ari kusangana nebazi rehutano munyika gore rino ari kukonzerwa nekuti hurumende yakaisa mari shoma shoma kubva mubhajeti kubazi iri. VaChitambara vakati munhu mumwe chete ari munyika akaisirwa parutivi mari inosvika maRTGS makumi mana nerimwe semari yekushandisa muhutano hwake kwegore rose. VaChitambara vakati dzihurumende pasi rose dzinotara mari inofanira kushandiswa nemunhu mumwe chete munyaya dzehutano gore rose, yoiswa mubazi rezveutano. VaChitambara vakati dzimwe nyika dzinnoisa parutivi mari inosvika zviuru zvitanhatu zvemadhora ekuAmereka pamunhu wega wega mubazi rezveutano semari yarinopihwa mubhajeti repagore. VaChitambara vakati hurumende yakapa bazi rehutano mari inosvika mazana matanhatu nemakumi mapfumbamwe emamiriyoni emadhora emaRTGS. Studio7 yatadza kubata gurukota rezvehutano, Dr Obadiah Moyo, kuti tinzwe divi ravo, sezvo vanga vasiri kubatika panharembozha yavo. Asi munyori mubazi rezvekufambiswa kwemashoko munyika, VaNick Mangwana, varamba mashoko aya vachiti hurumende iri kuisa mari yakawanda kubazi rezveutano. Mashoko aVaChitambara anobuda panguva iyo zvipatara zvizhinji munyika zviri kushaiwa mishonga, zvikwanisiro nezvimwe, izvo zviri kuita kuti varwere vazhinji varasikirwe nehupenyu nguva yavo isati yanyatsosvika. Madhokotera anotiwo haakwanisi kuenda kubasa nekuti mari yavanotambira haisi kuvakwanira. Mune imwewo nyaya, varimi vemumaruwa eMasvingo vari kuchema chema nekudhura kuri kuita mbewu kunyanya yechibage vachiti nekushaikwa kwemari munyika, gore rino vachatadza kurima. Va IShmael Chitukutu vanobva kwaChimombe kwaGutu, vanoti nekukwira kwakaita mitengo yembeu, gore rinouya vanogona kufa nenzara vasina kurima. Kunyange mvura isati yanaya, varimi vazhinji kumaruwa vanoti ivo havasati vatanga kugadzirira kurima nekuti havana mari yembeu pamwe neyefetiraiza. Dambudziko revarimi riri kuitika panguva iyo sangano reWorld Food Program riri kupemha mari yekutengera vanhu chikafu vanopfuura mamiriyoni masere munyika yose.
title: VaChitambara Vanoti Hurumende Yakaisa Mari Shoma Mubazi reHutano

text:
Vamwe vabereki kuMasvingo vari kuchemachema nenyaya dzehuori dziri kupomerwa vamwe vakuru vezvikoro vachiti vari kutatarika kubhadhara mari iyi kuti vana vavo vaende kuzvikoro. Vamwe vabereki vakaita saVaHardlife Tangayi, vanoti kukwira kurikuita nyaya dzehuori munyika kuri kuvashungurudza sezvo vachinetseka kuwana mari dzekubhadharira vana nenyaya yakuoma kwehupenyu.

Mazuva mashoma apfuura mukuru wechikoro weGokomere High School, VaAcqunos Mazhungu, pamwe nevamwe vatungamiri vechikoro ichi vashanu kusanganisira mufundisi wepachikoro ichi vakamiswa pamberi pedare remajistereti muMasvingo, vachipomerwa mhosva yekuba mari inopfuura mamirioni maviri. NeChitatu vabereki vevana vepaBatanai Primary School kwaGutu vakaratidzira vakavharisa chikoro vachipomera mutevedzeri wemukuru wechikoro, VaEnock Sithole, mhosva yekuba mari yechikoro yakawanda.Vamwe vabereki vevana vepaMpandawana vakaratidzirawo vachiti mari yepachikoro ichi yainge isiri kufambiswa zvakanaka.

Mumwe mubereki VaOglive Makova avo vane mwana ari paGokomere vanoti dzidzo yaderera pachikoro apa nenyaya yehuori pamari dzavanobhadhara hwavari kupomera vakuru vechikoro. Hatina kukwanisa kubata vakuru vepachikoro apa kuti tinzwe divi ravo.

VaShadreck Sharara, vane mwana paBatani Primary, paBhasera, avo vakaratidzira vakavharisa chikoro vachiti vakuru vechikoro varikuba zvinhu zvechikoro pamwe nemari inofanira kunge ichishandiswa padzidzo yevana vanoti vari kuba ngavadzingwe mabasa.

Vachipa divi rehurumende, mutauriri webazi redzidzo VaTaungana Ndoro, vatihuori muzvikoro haukurudzirwe nekudaro vave kushanda nebazi re Zimbabwe Anti Corruption Commission(ZACC) vachisungisa vakuru vezvikoro vanoita zvehuori. Mukuru wesangano rinomirira vadzidzisi mumaruwa reAmalagamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe(ARTUZ), VaObert Masaraure, vati kunyangwe vasingakurudzire kuba, huori huri kuwanda muzvikoro nenyaya yekuti hurumende iri kubhadara vadzidzisi mari shoma.

Asi VaNdoro vanoti nyaya dzehuori hadzineyi nemihoro yevadzidzisi sezvo hurumende iri kuzama kuvapa mari inokwana. No media source currently available
title: Vabereki Vakawanda kuMasvingo Voshushika neKubiwa kweMari Muzvikoro

text:
Mishonga yenhomba inodzivirira chirwere cheCovid-19 yakabva kuChina yaendeswa kumatunhu ari munyika yose kuitira kuti vanhu vatange kubayiwa mumatunhu uyo kutanga nemusi weMuvhuro, panguva iyo vanhu vakawanda vari kuti vanoda kutanga vanzwisisa nezvemushonga uyu vasati vabayiwa nhomba. Vachitaura pakupihwa kwemajekiseni enhomba anosvika zviuru gumi
nechimwe chete nemazana masere kana kuti 11 800 kunyange vanga
vakatarisira nhasi kutambira zviuru gumi nezviviri mudunhu reMashonaland West, mukuru mubazi rezvehutano mudunhu, Dr Gift Masoja, vati vachatanga kubaya nhomba neMuvhuro. Dr Masoja vati muchikamu chekutanga vachabaya vanamukoti, mapurisa,
masoja vashandi vemumajeri pamwe nevatori venhau.

VaMasoja vati kuti munhu abayiwe nhomba, anofanirwa kutanga
awongororwa kuti haana chirwere cheCovid-19 here kana kuti kwete, uye
vose vanorwara nezvimwe zvirwere zvakaita sechirwere cheshuga,
neHigh Blood Pressure nezvimwe zvirwere vasiri pamishonga, havabayiwe nhomba yeSinopharm.

Dr Masoja vati sezvinokurudzirwa nebazi rezvehutano pasi rose reWorld Health Organisation, vanhu vari pasi pemakore gumi nemasere pamwe nevane makore anodarika makore makumi matanhatu, havabayiwe
nhomba iyi. Asi izvi zvinopesana nezvakaitika nemusi weChina apo gurukota rezvehutano, VaConstantino Chiwenga, avo vane makore anodarika makumi matanhatu, vakabayiwa nhomba iyi. Dr Masoja vati vanhu vanofanirwa kuramba vachitevedzera mitemo yekuzvidzivirira kunyange vakabayiwa nhomba iyi. Mukuru weCommunity Working Group on Health, VaItai Rusike, vati
hurumende haifanirwe kuita rusarura panyaya yekurwisa chirwere
cheCovid-19. Vati hurumende inofanirwa kutevedzera zvinotaura World Health Organization kuti "tese tiri panjodzi kana mumwe munhu ari panjodzi." Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano uye vaimbove gurukota rezvehutano
muhurumende yemubatanidzwa, Dr Henry Madzorera, vanoti sezvo nhomba iyi iri kumboedzwa kuti inotishandira here muno munyika, zvakakosha kuti kutangwe kubyiwa vanhu vane hutano hwakasimba.

Hatina kunzwa kuna VaChiwenga, sezvo nharembozha yavo yanga ichinetsa kubata. Asi mutevedzeri wavo, Dr John Mangwiro, vanopesana nemashoko aDr Masoja vachiti vanorwara nezvimwe zvirwere zvakaita segomarara, shuga kana hypertension vanogona kubayiwa nhomba. Zvinonzi munhu anofanirwa kubayiwa nhomba iyi kaviri, kamwe kacho
masvondo maviri kana matatu mushure mekubayiwa kekutanga. Nezuro, hurumende yakazivisa kuti vanhu vaviri vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19, izvo zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vafa nechirwere ichi pachiuru nemazana mana nemakumi maviri, 1420. Vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika yose vava zviuru makumi matatu nezvishanu nemazana mashanu nemakumi mana nevatatu, 35543. Vanhu vachiri kurwara nechirwere ichi munyika yose vava zviuru zviviri nemazana matatu nevaviri, kana kuti 2302. No media source currently available
title: Matunhu Ose Ave neNhomba yeCovid-19 Vanhu Vachitanga Kubayiwa neMuvhuro

text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vakatura mashoko emamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika vachiti hurumende yavo iri mubishi rekugadzirisa nhuna dzevashandi vayo pamwe nehupfumi hwenyika, uho vanoti hwave kuita nani. Sachigaro weMDC Alliance mudunhu reNorth America, VaTawanda Dzvokora, vanoti zvataurwa naVaMnangagwa ndezve manyepo sezvo vakazvitaura kare asi hapana chakaitwa. VaDzvokora vati pavakatora hutungamiri, VaMnangagwa vakavimbisa nyika kuti vachapa vanhu rusununguko, kusanagnisa mvumo yekuratidzira, asi nhasi vanhu varikupfurwa nepfuti, vazhinji vachirohwa nekusungwa. Vati hapana humbowo hwekuti nyaya yezvehupfumi yave kuita zvirinani sezvo nyika isina mabasa uye isina mari nanhasi wese. No media source currently available Asi sachigaro veZanu-PF mudunhu reNorth America, VaRegis Charumbira, vanorumbidza mashoko aVaMnangagwa vachiti hapana chavakavimbisa chavasina kuzadzikisa. VaCharumbira vati zviri pachena kuti, kunyange hazvo Zimbabwe yakatemerwa zvirango, zvinhu zvave kuita nani munyika. Vati hatifanirwi kukanganwa kuti VaMnangagwa vane zvinhu zvizhinji zvavari kugadzirisa zvavakawana zvisina kumira zvakanaka pavakatora hutungamiri kubva kuna VaRobert Mugabe. No media source currently available
title: Vanhu Voita Maonero Akasiyana PaMashoko Akaturwa NeMutungamiri weNyika

text: Vanhu gumi nevashanu vakashaya munjodzi yemumugwagwa manheru anezuro pedyo neKandava Secondary School pedyo neDema munzira yeChitungwiza-Hwedza. Izvi zvakatevera kuroverana kwerori yainge yakatakura fodya nekombi yaienda kuhHwedza. Rori iyi inonzi yakaputika vhiri ndokubonderana nekombi. Mutauriri wemapurisa Senior Assistant Commissioner Charity Charamba vatenda kuti njodzi iyi yakaitika. Asi vati vakwanisa kuziva vanhu vana chete uye vari kuyedza kuzivisa hama dzepedyo. Asi vamwe vanhu gumi nemumwe vange vasina zvitupa zvekuti kuvaziva kuri kunetsa. Senior Assistant Commissioner Charamba vakurudzira vanhu kuti vaende kuchipatara cheChitungwiza kana vaine hama dzavo dzavasiri kuziva kuti dziri kupi. Vanhu vatanhatu vanonzi vakakuvara munjodzi iyi. Mapurisa ekudema ndivo vari kuferefeta nyaya iyi.
title: Vanhu Gumi neVashanu Voshaya kuDema muNjodzi yeMumugwagwa Asi Vamwe Votadza Kuzivikanwa neKushaya Zvitupa

text: Vakaremara vari kukurudzira hurumende kuti itore matanho ekuti vave vamwe vevanhu vekutanga kubayiwa nhomba yekuzvidzivirira chirwere che COVID-19. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi, VaMasimba Kuchera, avo vasingaone, vanoti vakaremara vanofanira kuvewo mberi pachirongwa chekubayiwa nhomba yeCOVID-19. Ndiri kuona sekuti dai vakaremara vakave vekutanga pamapoka achatanga kubaiwa nhomba. Vakaremara vasingaone vanoda munhu anovabatsira kuyambuka mugwagwa. Dzimwe nguva vanhu ava dzinenge dzisiri shamwari kana hama dzavo. Zvikwanisiro zvekuti vange vachizvidzivirira nazvo zvinosanganisira ma sanitizers havana. Izvi zvinotsigirwa naVaThomas Muchadenyika avo vanoshandisa madondoro pakufamba. Vanoshandisa ma wheelchair vanobata mavhiri anotsika pese pese zvekuti vagara vari pamuteyo weCOVID 19. Zvinogona kuti pavanokumbira rubatsiro kuti munhu asunde wheelchair, anogona kunge ane COVID kudhara iwe wobva wabatira. Mukuru wesangano revakaremara reSigns of Hope, Muzvare Samantha Sibanda, vanoti hurumende inofanira kunzwisisa matambudziko anosangana nevakaremara. Vamwe havakwanisi kugara vega. Vanotoda munhu anovariritira kubatsira kusunda wheelchair. Vasingaone vanotorarama nekubata bata pese pese saka vanogona kungochibatira nyore chirwere chacho. Muzvare Sibanda vanoti chimwe chiri kunetsa ndechekuti vakaremara vakaita sevasingagone kunzwa kana kutaura, vanosarira shure pakuwana ruzivo rwakakwana pamusoro peCOVID-19 kana ihwo hurongwa hwekubayiwa nhomba. Saka panofanira kuve nezivo munhu asati abayiwa, asi vakaremara havasi kuziviswa. Vane ma cellphones ndivo vane zivo pamusoro pema vaccines. Pazvinosvika kune vakaremara zvinenge zvavhengana. Mukuru wesangano reDeaf Zimbabwe Trust, Amai Barbara Nyangairi, vanoti zvakakosha kuti Zimbabwe nedzimwe nyika dzichiri kusimukira dzinofanira kuzvimiririra pakutsvaga nzira dzekurwisa chirwere che COVID-19, kwete kumirira nyika dzakabudirira. Ini ndinofunga kuti dambudziko redu seAfrica nderekuti tiri kumirira vamwe kuti vagadzire zvinhu zvakaita sema vaccines vozotipa. SeAfrica kana SADC hatina nyanzvi here munyika medu? Saka kana ma vaccines achiuya ari mashoma kudaro, patinozosvika kune vakaremara panenge patooma. Gurukota rinoona nezvekugara zvakanaka kwevanhu, Muzvinafundo Paul Mavhima, vanoti vari kushanda zvakasimba kuitira kuti vakaremara vave nehupenyu hwakanaka. VaMavhima vavimbisa kuti vachaendesa kumusoro zvikumbiro zvevakaremara zvekuti vave vamwe vekutanga kubayiwa nhomba yeCovid-19. Handione pane dambudziko kuti hurumende ipagadzirise kuti vakaremara vapinde muchikwata ichocho. Chinhu chatinogona kuti chitaurwe ku cabinet kana ku task force ye COVID-19. Zimbabwe yakatara vashandi vemuzvipatara, vashandi vemumapazi ehurumende anoita mabasa anosangana neveruzhinji kuti vave vanhu vekutanga kubayiwa nhomba yeSinopharm pasi pechirongwa chakatanga munyika nemusi weChina. No media source currently available
title: Vakaremara Vanodawo Kutanga Kupihwa Nhomba yeCovid-19

text: MDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa inoti haisi kuzotadza kuita hope nemashoko emutungamiri weMDC-T, Muzvare Thokozani Khupe, ekuti ndivo vava munhu ari panyanga zvichitevera mutongo wakaitwa naAmai Edith Mushore. Vachipa mutongo wavo svondo rino, Amai Mushore vakati MDC inofanirwa kudzokera payakanga iri muna 2014 apo pakaitwa kongiresi yebato yakaona VaMorgan Tsvangirai, avo vakashaya gore rapera, vachisarudzwa semutungamiri webato, ukuwo Muzvare Khupe vachisarudzwa semutevedzeri waVaTsvangirai. Vachipindura mashoko aMuzvare Khupe kuvatori venhau, mutauriri weMDC, VaJacob Mafume, vati havasi kutambira mutongo waAmai Mushore, uye havaneyi nezviri kutaurwa naMuzvare Khupe, sezvo vakaenda kunovaka bato ravo. VaMafume vati chavanoziva ndechekuti VaChamisa vakasarudzwa nevanhu uye vari kuenderera mberi nehurobgwa hwekongiresi yavo ichaitirwa muGweru mwedzi uno. VaMafume, avo vati vanga vari kuGwanda kuhurongwa hwebato ravo hwekuyedzana pfungwa dzevari kukwikwidzana kukongiresi, vati Muzvare Khupe vanofanirwa kuziva kuti munhu akabuda mubato akaenda kunovamba bato rake nokudaro havasi kuzotambirwa kuMDC inotungamirwa naVaChamisa. Vachitaura neStudio7, Muzvare Khupe vati vatuma magweta avo kuti atange nhaurirano nemagweta aVaChamisa senzira yekutsvaga kuti mativi maviri aya angafambise seyi nyaya dzekuti vatevedze zvinodiwa nemutemo sezvakaturwa nemutungo waAmai Mushore. Asi VaMafume vati bato ravo harisi kutambira mutongo waAmai Mushore. Mutungo waAmai Mushore unouya panguva iyo VaChamisa, avo vakadomwa nematunhu ebato ravo gumi nematatu kuti vakwikwidze chigaro chemutungamiri webato pakongiresi, vari mubishi rekuona kuti kongiresi yavo yaitwa nemazvo. VaChamisa havana ari kuvakwikwidza pachigaro chemutungamiri webato. VaMafume, avo vari kukwikwidza chigaro chemutauriri webato pakongiresi, vati havasi kuzocheuka mutsindo webete pane zviri kuitwa naMuzvare Khupe, avo vati vakanga vasiri kuwirirana naVaTsvangirai mumazuva avo ehurwere vasati vashaya. VaTsvangirai vakashaya muna Kurume gore rapera mushure mekurwara nechirwere chegomarara. Zvichitevera kushaya kwaVaTsvangirai, mubato iri makaita makakatanwa anotyisa pakati paVaChamisa, VaElias Mudzuri pamwe naMuzvare Khupe, vose vachiti ndivo vanofanirwa kufanobata matomu. VaChamisa vaimira nerekuti ndivo vakadomwa naVaTsvangirai kuti vafanobata chigaro chemutungamiri webato apo VaTsvangirai vairapwa kuSouth Africa, ukuwo VaMudzuri vachipikisa VaChamisa vachiti hapana mumwe munhu akanga anzi asanobata chigaro chaVaTsvangirai kunze kwavo ivo VaMudzuri, Muzvare Khupe vachitiwo sezvo vari ivo chete vakasarudzwa pakongiresi yakaitwa muna 2014, ndivo vaifanirwa kufanobata matomu. Mutongo waAmai Mushore unosimbaradza mashoko aMuzvare Khupe, asi VaMafume vanoti Muzvare Khupe vakabuda mubato rakasiyiwa naVaTsvangirai vakanovamba ravo bato, nekudaro havafanirwi kuuya kuzobvongonyodza zvinhu mubato ravakasiya. No media source currently available
title: MDC yaVaChamisa Inoti Haicheuki Mutsindo weBete Uri Kuitwa naMuzvare Khupe

text: Mamwe masangano makumi maviri anorwira kodzero dzevanhu pasi rose kusanganisa reCommunity to Protect Journalists, anyorera tsamba kugurukota rezvehumhizha mukufambiswa kwemashoko, VaKazembe Kazembe, achinyunyuta nenyaya yekumbovharwa kwemasaisai e internet munyika yose. Masangano aya anoti kuvhara internet kutyora zvibvumirano zveUnited Nations. Masangano aya anosanganisa re Keep It On, iro rine masangano zana nemakumi manomwe anorwira kodzero dzevanhu pasi rose, uye The World Wide Web Foundation, Open Net Africa, Human Rights Foundation nemamwe. Masangano aya anoti kazhinji hurumende dzinodzima masaisai dzinenge dzichida kutyora kodzero dzevanhu pasina anoona. Hatina kukwanisa kubata VaKazembe kuti tinzwe divi ravo. Asi vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika uye vaive mukuru weMISA Zimbabwe, VaRashweat Mukundu, vanoti zviri kuitwa nehurumende kutyora kodzero dzevanhu. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, mamwe maseneta ekuAmerica ari kukurudzira vakuru muhurumende yeZimbabwe kuti varemekedze kodzero dzevanhu vari kuratidzira, vovhura masaisai emadandemutande pamwe nenhare. Nhengo dzeseneti dziri zvakare nhengo dzebato reDemocratic Party uye vari nhengo dzekomiti yedare reseneti inoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, yeSenate Foreign Relations Committee dzinoti VaChris Coons, vanomirira Delaware, pamwe naVaCory Booker, vanomirira New Jersey, vaburitsa mashoko anoti vari kushushikana zvikuru nezviri kubuda muZimbabwe. Vanoti vari kuwana mashoko ekuti vanhu vari kuratidzira vari kuurayiwa, kusungwa kusina tsarukano, kurohwa, pamwe nekushungurudzwa nevanochengetedza runyararo munyika. Maseneta aya anoti ari kukurudzira hurumende kuti igadzirise zvinhu kuburikidza nekutaurirana pachiteverwa mutemo, uyewo kuti vari kuratidzira vaite zvavanosungirwa nebumbiro remitemo.
title: Hurumende Yoshoropodzwa neKuvhara Kwainonzi Yakaita Masaisai

text: Rimwe remasangano anoongorora mashandiro evatori venhau munyika, reMedia Monitors, rinoti mapato ezvematongerwo enyika ari kukwikwidza musarudzo dzichaitwa Muvhuro haasi kupiwa mikana yakaenzana yekubuda panhau. Mukuru weMedia Monitors, Muzvare Patience Zirima, vati ongororo yavakaita inoratidza kuti Zanu PF ne MDC Alliance ndivo vari kunyanyobuda munhau mapato madiki asingabudi. Muzvare Zirima vatiwo vanhukadzi havasiwo kubudiswa munhau zvichienzaniswa nevanhurume vari kukwikwidza musarudzo. Vati ongororo yavo yakatanga musi wa 31 Chivabvu inoratidza kuti panyaya dzakanyorwa dzesarudzo, zvikamu gumi nechimwe chete kubva muzana ndodzaitaura zvevanhukadzi vari kukwikwidza. Muzvare Zirima vatiwo tsvagiridzo yavo inoratidzawo kutinhepfenyuro yehurumende yeZimbabwe Broadcasting Corporation haisi kubudisa musiyano pakutsvaka rutsigiro kwebato reZanu PFnepavanenge vachiita mabasa ehurumende. Muzvare Zirima vatiwo vari kushushukana nemaitiro ekomiti yeZimbabwe Electoral Commissioninoongorora mashandiro evatapi venhau musarudzo, vachiti haisi kuonekwa zvairi kuita kunyange kwasara nguva shoma shoma yekuti sarudzo dziitwe . VaPrisiel Samu vanoshanda neMedia Monitors vaudzawo Studio7 kuti bato reZanu PF ndoriri kunyanyobuda munhau vachiti zvikamu makumi mashanu nezvitatu kubva muzana dzenyaya dzesarudzo munhau dzaitaura zvebato reZanu PF. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa muMedia Alliance of Zimbabwe, VaNigel Nyamutumbu, vatiwo kunyange hazvo vatori venhau vari kuita basa ravo nepavanogona napo, zvinosuwisa kuti mapato maviri chete ndiwo anongoramba achitaurwa. VaNyamutumbu vakurudzira vatapi venhau kuti munyaya dzavo vabudisewo kuti mapato ari kuzokwikwidza akamirira chii huye vachagadzirisa seyi matambudziko ari munyika. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kubata sachigaro weZec Media Monitoring Committee, Amai Joyce Laetitia Kazembe, kuti tinzwe divi ravo. No media source currently available
title: Media Monitors Inoti Vatori veNhau Ngavabate Mapato Ose

text: Mhuri zhinji dzakawana hupoteri munyika kuTongogara Refugee Camp dziri kunonga svosve nemuromo nekuda kwenhamo yavakatarisana nayo. Vakawanda vari kuyedza kutanga tumabhizimisi tudiki asi vachiti hazvisi kuvapa pundutso. Pamuzinda weTongogara pane vapoteri vangangodarika zviuru gumi vanobva kunyika dzakasiyana siyana kunyanya dzemuAfrica dzinosanganisira, Mozambique, DRC, Angola, Burundi, Rwanda Somalia, Eritrea nedzimwewo. Mhuri idzi dzakatiza kusagadzikana munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika dzavo zvichikonzera nehondo kunyanya. Mhuri yega yega iri pakamba apa inotambiriswa madhora gumi nematatu zvisineyi nekuti yakakura zvakaita seyi inova mari isingakwaniri mhuri idzi. Vapoteri ava havatenderwi kushanda muno munyika izvo zviri kuvaomera zvopa kuti vakawanda vagume voita misika yekutengesa zvakasiyana siyana. Mumwe mupoteri, VaRodroguez Domingos vanoti vanobva kunyika yeBurundi uye vakauya muuZimbabwe muna2003 vachitiza hondo. Vanotengesa nyama yenguruve pamuzinda weTongogara uyu kuti vawane kurarama . "Nekuda kwemari yeallowance yatinopihwa inova $13 chete tinotoita zvekutengesa kuti tiwanire mhuri mari yekutenga chekudya. Uye munomu muCamp hatibvumirwi kushanda mabasa. Hatiwani mari kwayo nekuti business racho riri slow slow, hapana ane mari muno. Kupera kwemwedzi vanhu vapihwa mari ndipo patinombobata tucash but $13 haina zveinotenga." VaDomingoos vanoti pazuva vanotengesa zvishoma zvekuti vakwanise chete kuwanira vana vavo zvekudya. "Hapana mari yakawanda yatinowana kunze kweyekuti titenge food chete, pamwe mwedzi wese tinoita cash ye$23 nekuda kwekuti hakuna cash." Amai Beauty Kasongo vanobva kuAngola, uye vane musika mukembi yeTongogara. Pamusika wavo amai ava vanotengesa matemba, tepwe, nezvimwe zvekudya zvakamomeswa. Amai Kasongo vanoti musika wavo vanongomuitira kuti vakwanise kuwana kwekuswera uye nemari yekudya zuva nezuva pasina chouviri chinonyatsobuda. "Bhizinesi rekubatira chete, imari yekutenga zvekudya chete, hakuna mari nekuti yatinopihwa haishandi chiro, haikwani mwedzi imari yechikafu chete apa." Amai Kasongo vanotiwo mari yekugoverwa haikwaniri mhuri yavo sezvo vaine vana vana pamwechete nemurume. "Imari shoma shoma chete yatinowana pano apo ndikaona upfu ndinotenga ndikaona fish ikapera ndotenga zvakare, kuti tiiti mari yatinopihwa ikwane apa hailasti mwedzi kungoti chete mhuri isafe nenzara muno." VaJeremiah Muzondi vane chitoro chidiki asi vanongochemawo nenyaya imwechete yekushaya vanovatengera. Vanoti nguva zhinji inotodarika hayo vachitamba tsoro, kana mutambo wemakadzi nekuti kunenge kuusina anouya kuzotenga, nekudaro vanototengesa zvinhu zvizingakurumidza kushata kana kuwora. Mukuru wepakamba yeTongogara Camp Amai Rudo Manyara vanoti mutemo wehurumende ndewekuti vapoteri havatenderwi kushandira munyika muno kudzimara vawanirwa mapepa akakwana ekuti vashandire masangano kana makambani emuno. Vanoti zvakare mari inogoverwa vapoteri ndiyo yakatarwa uye inenge ichiwanikwa kuti vabatisikane kunyangwe hazvo isingavakwanire. No media source currently available
title: Vapoteri vepaTongogara Refuge Camp Vononga Svosve neMuromo

text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, nevamwe vanasorojena vemunyika dzemuAfrica, vari kukurudzirwa kuti vazeye nyaya yekuti ndiyani achatora chigaro chaVaMugabe kana vasiya basa nekuti kusadaro zvinogona kupinza Zimbabwe nenyika dzakaipoteredza mumatambudziko makukutu. Mudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Grace Mugabe, vachitsigirwa neZanu-PF Youth League, vari kukurudzira VaMugabe kuti vadome munhu anozotora chigaro chavo kana vasiya basa. Asi nyaya yekuti izvi zvoitwa sei yave gangaidzwa kumukwenyika wemhezi yavavira mudumbu. Pari zvino mabhiza ari pamberi anonzi ndemumwe mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vari kuchikwata chinonzi Team Lacoste, uye gurukota rezvekudzivirirwa kwenyika, VaSydney Sekeramai, avo vanonzi vari kutsigirwa nechikwata cheG40. Mutevedzeri wemunyori munyaya dzezvemutemo muZanu-PF, VaPaul Mangwana, vanoti vari kushamisika kuti vanhu vasiri mubato ravo vanodei pahuku yemweni sezvo zvakajeka kuti mumwe mutungamiri anosarudzwa sei VaMugabe vakasiya chigaro. Asi vaimbotungamira bato rinopikisa reZimbabwe Union of Democrats vari murwiri wehondo yerusununguko, Amai Margaret Dongo, vanoti hazvina kujeka uye nyaya iyi inofanira kuzeyiwa nyika isati yaita zinyekenyeke. Amai Dongo vatiwo chinoziva ivhu kuti mwana wembeva anorwara nekudaro vanhu vanofanira kubata mazwi voona kuti anoreveyi kana Amai Mugabe vachitaura pamusoro penyaya yeluti VaMugabe vadome munhu achatora chinzvimbo chavo. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika vachidzidzisa paUniversirty of Zimbabwe, Muzvinafundo Eldred Masunugure, vanoti chinonetsa kugadzirisa nyaya iyi inyaya yekuti Zanu-PF inenge muzerere unoti ukakwira wodzika. VaMasunungure vanoti chapa kuti zvinhu zviite manyama amire nerongo inyaya yekupinzwa kwaVaSekeramai mudariro nevari kudivi reG40. Asi dambudziko iri ringapedzwe sei chaizvo? Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika vachishanda neCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition, VaJoy Mabenge, vanoti vamwe vanasorojena vemuAfrica vanofanira kuita dare naVaMugabe sezvo kusagadzikana kweZimbabwe kuchikanganisawo vavakidzani vayo. Asi VaMasungungure vanoti munhu akaita saVaThabo Mbeki haana chaangabatsire Zimbabwe nyika sezvo yake yeSouth Africa uye bato reANC zviri kubvirawo moto. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika uye vari mukuru weMedia Centre, Va Enerst Mudzengi, vanoti Zanu-PF inokwanisa kugadzirisa nyaya iyi isingazvhiyire dembo pane vanhu. Bato reZanu-PF rakaita kongiresi rayo muna 2014 rikati VaMugabe ndivo vachamiririra bato musarudzo dzegore rinouya kunyangwe hazvo vanenge vave nemakore makumi mapfumbamwe nemana. VaMugabe vanotiwo kunyange hazvo paine vamwe vari kuda kuvagara nhaka, vachakasimba kunyange hazvo vachimborwara pano neapo. Zimbabwe haina kuita mumwe mutungamiri kubva zvayawana kuzvitonga muna 1980. No media source currently available
title: Nyanzvi Dzozeya Nyaya Yanetsa Yekuti Ndiyani Achatora Chigaro chaVaMugabe

text: Vaive mutungamiri webato rinopikisa reMovement for Democratic Change VaMorgan Tsvangirai vakaradzikwa kumusha kwavo kuBuhera nezuro asi mubato mavo mabva matangazve makakatanwa pakuti ndiyani achatungamira pakati paVaNelson Chamisa, VaElias Mudzuri naMuzvare Thokozani Khupe. Pakuradzikwa kwaVaTsvangirai panonzi pakaita bata murefu bata mupfupi vamwe vechidiki rebato iri vachiti vaida kurova Muzvare Khupe, munyori mukuru webato VaDouglas Mwonzora uye vaoona nezvemabasa mubato VaAbednicho Bhebhe. Vatatu ava vari kupomerwa mhosva yekuramba nyaya yemubatanidzwa weMDC Alliance uyo une mapato manomwe. Nyaya yemhirizhonga iyi yashorwa nemuzinda weAmerica muZimbabwe uye sangano reZimbabwe Peace Project kana kuti ZPP. Sangano iri rinoti chiri kunetsa inyaya yekuti bato iri roenda kukongiresi here kana kuti rongotambira zvakabuda kubva kuNational Council yebato zvekuti VaChamisa vafanotungamire. Vamwe muMDC-T vanoti vanoda kuti pauye vana mutongi gava vekunze kuzobatsira kuyananisa vari kunetsana ava. Sarudzo dziri kutarisirwa kuitwa muna Chikunguru zvekuti zviri kunetsa zvikasagadziriswa zvinogona kukanganisa bato iri musarudzo. Nezuro pachirongwa cheLive Talk, Studio 7 yakaita hurukuro naVaChamisa na Muzvare Khupe. Muzvare Khupe vakati pachitariswa bumbiro remutemo, ivo ndivo vanofanira kunge vachifanotungamira. No media source currently available Asi VaChamisa vati ivo ndivo vakasarudzwa neNational Council kuti vatungamire bato parizvino. No media source currently available
title: VaChamisa naMuzvare Khupe Votaura neStudio 7 nezveHutungamiri hweBato reMDC-T

text: Vatungamiriri wemuAfrica vanotambidzana husachigaro hweAU gore rega rega uye VaMugabe vari kutambidza husachigaro uhwu kuna VaIdris Derby vekuChad pamusango uri kuitirwa kuEthiopia. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, avo vange vari sachigaro weAfrican Union,AU, vari kusiya chigaro ichi pamusangano weAU uri kuitirwa muAddis Ababa kuEthiopia. Veruzhinji munyika vane maonero akasiyana nemashandiro akaita VaMugabe apo vaive vakabatana matomu eAU. Vazhinji muhurumende pamwe nebato ravo reZanu PF vanoti VaMugabe vakabata basa nemazvo uye vakamirira Africa zvakasimba panyaya dzekurwisa hondo, nyava dzekuona kuti Africa yawana chouviri pazviwanikwa zvayo pamwe nekutiwo Africa yawanawo chinzvimbo chiri permanent musangano repasi rese reUnited Nations. No media source currently available Asi veruzhinji, pamwe nevemamwe mapato anopikisa munyika vanoti husachigaro hwaVaMugabe kuAU hawuna chahwakabatsira nyika. Amai Christine Sekerani vanoti nzendo dzaVaMugabe vachiita basa reAU dzaitovakanganisa kuti vagadzire matambudziko akatarisana nenyika. Mutauriri webato rinopikisa rePeople’s Democratic Party, VaJacob Mafume, vanotiwo hapana zvavakawana kubva kuchigaro chaVaMugabe kuAU. VaByron Mutingwende vanoti VaMugabe vangadai vakashandisa chinzvimbo chavo sachigaro weAU kukwezva vemabhizimisi kuti vauye munyika , uyewo kugadzirisa hukama hwavo neAmerica apo pakashanya mutungamiriri wenyika iyi, VaBarack Obama, muAfrica gore rapera. Asi mukuru wevamiriri venyika dzemuAfrica muZimbabwe, VaMawampanga Mwana Panga , vakaudza bepanhau reSunday Mail kuti VaMugabe vakshanda zvikuru kukwezva mutungamiriri weChina kuAfrica avo vakavimbisa kutsigira Africa nemabhiriyoni makumi matanhatu emadhora pamusangano wakavakaita nevamiriri venyika dzemuAfrica kuSouth Africa gore rapera. Asi mutauriri webato rinomirira MDC inotungamirwa naVaWelshman Ncube, VaKurauone Chihwayi, vanoti VaMugabe vakatadza kupenda hondo nekurwisana kuri munyika zhinji muAfrica. Asi imwe nhengo yevechidiki mubato reZanu PF, VaTongai Kasukuwere, vanoti VaMugabe vakaita basa ravo vachiti nyaya yeBurundi inonetsa sezvo nyika iyi iri kutoramba kuti AU itimure masoja kunyika iyi. Mumwe murairidzi wepaGreat Zimbabwe University, VaJoel Mukusha, vanoti kunyange hazvo paine vamwe vanoti VaMugabe havana zvavakaita sasachigaro weAU, maoenero avo ndeekuti vakaita basa guru chose. Vanoongorora nyaya dzehupfumi, VaMasimba Kuchera, vanoti hapana chaifanira kunyanyotarisirwa kubva kuna VaMugabe nekuti hapana zvizhinji zvinoita nemunhu anenge ari sachigaro weAfrican Union. Asi vatiwo pfungwa dzaVaMugabe dzekuti vanhu vemuAfrica vabatsirikane nezviwanikwa zvemunyika dzavo dzakanaka chose. Nyanzvi munyaya dzematomgerwo enyika dzinoti VaMugabe, avo vange vachigaropomerwa mhosva yekubira sarudzo pamwe nekutyora kodzero dzevanhu, ndivo vakanyanyobatsirika chose nekusarudzwa kuti vaite sachigaro weAU sezvo izvi zvakaita kuti vaonekwe semunhu akachena. VaClaris Madhuku vesangano rePlatform for Youth Development vanoti kuve sachigaro weAU zvinoita kuti upihwe ruremekedzo nenyika dzose dzemuAfrica nepasi rese.
