Vatungamiriri wemuAfrica vanotambidzana husachigaro hweAU gore rega rega uye VaMugabe vari kutambidza husachigaro uhwu kuna VaIdris Derby vekuChad pamusango uri kuitirwa kuEthiopia.
title: Vakawanda Vopesana Pane Zvakakwanisa Kuitwa naVaMugabe Vari Sachigaro weAU

text: Kusiya basa nezuro kwevaimbove mumwe wevatevedzeri vemutungamiri wenyika, VaKembo Mohadi, vachipomerwa nyaya dzehupombwe, kwamutsa mutauro mukuru munyika wekuti ndiyani achatora chigaro chavo. Mazita ari kutaurwa anosanganisira nhengo dzePolitburo, murongi wemabasa muZanu PF, VaObert Mpofu, gurukota redzidzo yepasi, VaCain Mathema, mutauriri weZanu PF, VaSimon Khaya Moyo, Amai Sithembiso Nyoni kozoti vaimbove mukuru weZimbabwe Defence Industries, VaTshinga Dube, gurukota redunhu reBulawayo, Amai Judith Ncube, mutauriri weparamende, VaJacob Mudenda pamwe nemukuru wemauto, General Valerio Sibanda. Vanoongorora nyaya dzematongerwo enyika, VaStephen Sibanda, vati zviri pachena kuti mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vachadoma munhu anobva kuZapu sezvo VaMohadi vaibva kubato iri. Vati mazita mazhinji ari kudomwa ndeevanhu vane nhoroondo mubato riri kutonga. VaAlphios Mapuranga vati vanoona sekuti chigaro ichi chichapihwa munhu ane nhoorondo yechiuto. Chipangamazano musangano reRevolutionary Research Institute, VaTjenesani Ntungakwa, vaudza Studio7 kuti chibvumirano cheUnity Accord cha1987 chakaenda nevaimbove mutungamiriri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, uye vanoona sekuti VaMnangagwa vachasarudza munhu wavanovimba naye zvisinei kuti ndiye anokodzera kuvepo here kana kuti kwete. Vati kubvira muna 1987 paidomwa vanhu pachigaro ichi pachitevedzewa hukuru hwevanhu kubva kuZapu asi mazita mazhinji ari kutaurwa, ane vanhu vasingakodzeri kutora chigaro ichi kana izvi zvikatevedzwa. Izvi zvatsinhirwa naVaButler Mwarwizi avo vakarwa hondo vari kuZipra. VaMagwizi vati havanei nekuti ndiani adomwa asi kuti vanoda munhu anoyananisa vanhu munyika. Pasi pebumbiro remitemo yenyika, mutungamiriri wenyika ndiye anodoma vatevedzeri vake. Mushandi mukuru mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko muZanu PF, VaTafadzwa Mugwadi, varamba kutaura zvinji pamusoro pekuti ndiyani achatsiva VaMohadi kuhurumende vachiti inyaya yemutungamiriri wenyika nehurumende. Kunyange hazvo vakasiya basa kuhurumende, VaMohadi havasati vasiya chigaro chavo kuZanu PF uko vari mumwe wevatevedzeri waVaMnangagwa. VaMohadi vakasiya basa nezuro mushure mekufumurwa pamadandemutande akaburitsa mavhidhiyo ane mashoko aVaMohadi vachitaura nyaya dzepabonde nemadzimai echidiki anosanganisira madzimai akaroorwa. Nyaya iyi yaigara yakaburitswa nebepanhau repaindaneti, reZimLive, VaMohadi vakambobuda svondo rapera vachiti aive manyepo, asi ZimLive yakati yaimira nenyaya dzayo dzokuti VaMohadi vari kushandisa chinzvimbo chavo zviri izvo uye vachikonzeresa kuparara kwedzimba. Bato reZanu PF richaita musangano waro wePolitiburo mangwana uye nyaya yaVaMohadi inotarisira kuzeyiwa pamusangano uyu. No media source currently available
title: Ndiyani Achatora Basa Rakasiyiwa naVaMohadi?

text: Sangano reCrisis In Zimbabwe Coalition raendesa gwaro renyunyuto kuhurumende, paramende, komisheni inoona nezvekuchengetedzwa hwekodzero dzevanhu pamwe nesangano reFinancial Action Taskforce (FATF) richitsutsumwa pamusoro pebhiri rePrivate Voluntary Organisation Amendment Bill iro rinoti rine chinangwa chekudzivirira masangano anoshanda akazvimirira kushandiswa nevanopfurikidza mwero pakushandisa mari pamwe nekuita zvematongerwo enyika. Mugwaro ravatura kubazi rezvemutemo, bazi rezvekugara zvanakaka kwevanhu, makomisheni eZimbabwe Human Rights, Peace and Reconciliation neGender pamwe neFinancial Action Taskforce, sachigaro weCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition, VaRashid Mahiya, vati semaonero avo bhiri iri rinotyora kodzero dzavo uye harifaniri kuenderera mberi. VaMahiya vati havagutsikane nezvikonzero zviri kupihwa nehurumende zvekuda kushandura mutemo wemashandiro avo. Bhiri iri, iro rakaburitswa mugwaro rehurumende reGovernment Gazette rinosungira masangano anoshanda akazvimirira kutevedza mitemo yeFATF kuitirakuti asashandiswa nemasangano anopfurikidza mwero pamwe nekuarambidza kuita zvematongerwo enyika. Asi VaMahiya vati havagutsikane nezvikonzero zviri kupihwa nehurumende vachiti zviri pachena kuti hurumende iri kuda kumbunyikidza mabasa avo. Vati kana bhiri iri rikapasa kuva mutemo, zvichanganganisa mashandiro emasangano anoshanda akazvimirira sezvo zvichereva kuti hurumende inenge yave kupindira mumashandiro awo zuva nezuva. VaMahiya vati hurumende handiyo yega inoita mabasa ebudiriro munyika. Nhengo yebhodhi rePlatform For Youth and Community Development, VaOwen Dhliwayo, vatiwo zvikonzero zvakapihwa nehurumende pakuunza bhiri iri hazvigutsi nekuti hapana masangano anoshanda akazvimirira anoita zvematongerwo enyika. Vati vanoita mabasa ebuduriro pamwe nekutobatsira hurumende muzvirongwa zvayo zvakasiyana siyana munyika yese. VaMahiya vati vanyorera kumakomisheni akaita seZimbawe Human Rights Commission nemamwe nekuti kodzero dzavo dziri kutyorwa uye vanoshandawo nemakomisheni aya pabasa ravo. Vatiwo vanodawo kuti Financial Action Tastforce ikokwe munyika kuti izotsangangura kuti masangano emuZimbabwe ari kushandiswa nematororo here mutemo uyu usati wadzikwa. Muna 2004 hurumende yakamboedza kushandura mutemo wemashandiro emasangano anoshanda akazvimirira asi vaive mutungamiriri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, havana kuzosaina bhiri racho mushure mekunge rapasa muparamende. Gore rino mukuru anoona nezvekufambiswa kwebasa mudunhu reHarare, VaTafadzwa Muguti, vakadzika mutemo wekuti masangano ese anoda kushanda muHarare aifanira kutanga aenda nekumahofisi avo izvo zvakarambwa nedare reHigh Court. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rehurumende sezvo gurukota rezvemutemo, VaZiyambi Ziyambi, vange vasiri kudaira nhare mbozha yavo. No media source currently available
title: Masangano Onyunyutira Hurumende Pamusoro peBhiri Rinobata Mashandiro eMasangano Aya

text: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri muSouth Africa zvabatana nemhuri yaVaElvis Nyathi avo vakapondwa nekupiswa kuDiepsloot, Johannesburg nezvinofungidzirwa kuti zvizvarwa zveSouth Africa svondo rapera. Kusvika parizvino hapana munhu ati asungwa nemhosva iyi. Vanhu vaungana muHillbrow, Johannesburg vachionekana nemutumbi wavo usati watakurwa kuenda kuBulawayo uko vari kutarisirwa kuradzikwa mukupera kwesvondo. VaNyathi vange vave nemakore makumi mana nematatu ekuberekwa. Vasiya mudzimai nevana vana. Asi kunyangwe hazvo hurumende yakati ichabatsira mhuri pakuvigwa kwavo, zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvarambidza mumiriri weZimbabwe muSouth Africa Vadavid Hamadziripi kuti vataure sezvo zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kuchema chema kuti hurumende haisi kuita zvakakwana kutaura nehurumende yeSouth Africa kuti zvisariswe. Zvimwe zvizvarwa zveSouth Africa zvinoti hazvichadi kuti zvizvarwa zvemuZimbabwe nedzimwe nyika dzemuAfrica zvigare muSouth Africa zvichizvipomera mhosva yekutora mabasa uye kuba nekutengesa zvinodhaka. Vachitaurawo neStudio 7, vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa musngano reSouthern African Liason Office rinokurudzira kuyanyana VaMunjodzi Mutandiri vati vari kuyedza kuita nhaurirano nehuurmende yeZimbabwe neyeSouth Africa sezvo vakawanda vatema vasiri vemuSouth Africa vari kuti maberekera ingwe uye havachina kugadzikana. No media source currently available
title: Mutumbi waVaElvis Nyathi Vakapondwa kuSouth Africa Woendeswa kuZimbabwe

text: Sangano rinoongorora sarudzo, reZimbabwe Election Support Network, ZESN, rinoti sarudzo dzeby-election dzekutsvaga vamiriri veparamende dzakaitwa kuGlen View South muHarare pamwe nekuMangwe kuMatabeleland South neyemakanzuru yakaitwa ku Ward 1 kuMasvingo, neMugovera dzakaitwa murunyararo. Asi ZESN inoti huwandu hwevanhu vakavhota hwakaderera zvakanyanyisa rwendo rwuno zvichienzaniswa nevanhu vakavhota musarudzo dzegore rapera. Bato reMDC rakaramba riine chigaro cheGlen View South zvichitevera kukunda kwevakakwikwidza vakamirira bato iri, VaVincent Tsvangirai, kuchitiwo kuMangwe nekuMasvingo Zanu PF yakakundawo musarudzo idzi zvakaita kuti irambe iine zvigaro zviviri izvi. KuGlen View South VaTsvangirai veMDC vakawana mavhoti zviuru zvitatu nemazana mana nemakumi manomwe nemana, VaOffard Muchuwe veZanu PF vachiwana mavhoti chiuru nemazana mashanu nemakumi matatu nemana. Mamwe mapato akakwikwidza kuGlen View South anoti reLEAD iro rakanga rakamirirwa naVaMilton Edwin, avo vakawana mavhoti makumi mashanu nemasere, bato reUANC rakanga yakamirirwa naAmai Ellah Zisanhi, avo vakawana mavhoti makumi matatu nemana pamwe naVaParlington Pikelele avo vakawanawo mavhoti masere. Amai Rosemary Nyamayedenga veFree Zim Cogress Party vakawana mavhoti makumi matatu nerimwe, kuchitiwo VaCrispen Rateiwa veZAPU vachiwana mavhoti gumi nemanomwe. Vamwe vakakwikwidza vakazvimirira ndaVaPhilip Chamunorwa Ndengu avo vakawana mavhoti makumi matanhatu nemana, naVaMaxwell Kasema, avo vakawanawo mavhoti gumi nemana. Mukuru wezvirongwa zveZESN, Amai Ellen Dingani, vanoti sangano ravo rakanga rakaisa vaongorori vesarudzo makumi mashanu nevanomwe mumatunhu ose ari matatu. Vanoti kunyange hazvo iri garoziva kuti vanhu ndivo vanobuda kunovhota panoitwa sarudzo dze by-election nguva dzose, panoda kuongororwa kuti sei zvichidaro kuti vanhu havadi kuenda kunovhota sezvavanoita musarudzo dzinoitwa pekutanga. Sarudzo dzekuGlen View South neMangwe dzakaitwa zvichitevera kushaya kwaAmai Vimbai Tsvangirai-Java veMDC pamwe naVaObedingwa Madlala Mguni veZanu PF. No media source currently available
title: ZESN Inoti Sarudzo dzeBy-Election kuGlen View South, Mangwe neMasvingo Dzakaitwa Murunyararo

text: No media source currently available Vana muzvinabhizimusi vari munzvimbo dzinoshanyirwa kuMasvingo vanoti kushaikwa kwendenge dzinouyisa vanhu mudunhu mavo zviri kuvhiringa bhizimusi munyaya dzekushanyirwa kwedunhu iri. Vachitaura pamusangano waitwa neChina muguta reMasvingo, vemabhizimusi vaudza gurukota rezvekushanyirwa munyika, VaWalter Mzembi, kuti vagadzirise nzvimbo dzinomhara ndege kuitira kuti ndege dzinotakura vanhu dziuye kudunhu ravo nevashanyi vekunze vakawanda. Mashoko aya anotevera kudzikira kwaita mabhizimusi munyaya dzekushanyirwa kwedunhu iri, sezvo vakawanda vari kuti havadi kufamba nemigwagwa yenyika nekuti haina kumira zvakanaka. Vashanyi vanonzi vanosarudza nzvimbo dzinosvikika nendege vachitora nguva shoma, dzakaita se Victoria Falls, vachisiya dzakaita seMasvingo eGreat Zimbabwe nenzvimbo yemhuka yeGonarezhou kuChiredzi. VaPhanos Matura, avo vanoita zvemahotera uye vari sachigaro weMasvingo Publicist Association, vanoti vashanyi vaderera nekuti havadi kutora nguva yakareba vachifamba nemumugwagwa. “Kutaura chokwadi, vaenzi vakaderera, zvikuru vekunze. Tinona kuti vashanyi kazhinji vakafuma pamari asi vane nguva shoma. Mushanyi anoda 4 to 5 hours kubva kuHarare asi ne ndege vanoda 20 minutes saka vanoda ndege. Saka zvatisina ndege vanonoshanya kunzvimbo dzine ndege.” vanodaro VaMatura. Nyanzvi mune zvekushanya nekushanyirwa, VaFredrick Kasese, vanotiwo mamiriro akaita migwagwa mikuru yemunyika haana kunaka nokudaro vashanyi havadi kufamba nemo vachityira njodzi ndosaka vasiri kuuya kuMasvingo. “Kufamba nendege kunodzikisa nguva yekufamba, zvinoita nyore kumunhu anoda kuuya ku Great Zimbabwe achidzoka musi uyoyo. Kana munhu achifamba nenzira yedu isati yagadzirwa pane njodzi dziripo, pane njodzi yemhuka, iyo road yacho pachayo haina kunaka, chechitatu nguva yaunotora uchifamba kuti uzondoita zvimwe inorebesa hausozvikwanisi,” vadaro VaKasese. VaMzembi vaudza vanhu ava kuti hurumende ichavandudza nhandare yendege yeMasvingo pamwe neyeBuffalo Range kuChiredzi kuitira kuti vashanyi vakwanise kuzoona Masvingo e Zimbabwe ane mukurumbira pasi rose, pamwe nemhuka kuGonarezhou ne Save. Vati kutanga mwedzi unouya hurumende ichadzosa ndege muMasvingo kuti dzitakure vanhu nevashanyi kuti dunhu riwane mari yekunze zvinozoita kuti mabhizimusi asafe. Mukuru mubazi rezviwanikwa nekuchengetedzwa kazvo muMasvingo, VaLovemeore Mandima, vanoti ndege dzikauyiswa kuMasvingo vashanyi vanowedzera. “Ndinoona kuti pakauyiswa ndege muno ‘in terms of our number’ yema vistors dzino improvha kunyanya ku key place ye Great Zimbabwe Monuments asi tinemamwe akawanda anoshanyirwa," vadaro VaMandima. Vamwe vataura vati Zimbabwe inofanirwa kugadzirisa chimiro chayo panyaya dzematongerwo enyika pamwe nekodzero dzevanhu kuitira kuti iremekedzwe nenyika dzine vanhu vane mari yakawanda vanokwanisa kushanyira Zimbabwe vakasununguka.
title: Kushaikwa kweNdege Kwotadzisa Vekunze Kushanyira Masvingo?

text: Zimbabwe iri kuenderera mberi nekuyedza kutsvaga nyika dzemuAfrica dzekushanda nadzo pakuvaka dura renhoroondo yehondo yeChimurenga kana kuti Museum of African Liberation. Mutungamiri wenyika bebato reZanu-PF VaEmmerson Mnangagwa svondo rino vakatuma munyori anoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika mubato ravo VaSimbarashe Mumbengegwi kuti vanoita musangano nemutungamiri wenyika yeBotswana VaMokgweetsi Masisi. Mumusangano uyu, VaMumbengegwi vakaudza VaMasisi kuti Zimbabwe yaisa parutivi one hectare kuti ivake dura kana kuti museum inenge iine nhoroondo yezvayakaita kubatsira dzimwe nyika dzairwira rusungunuko. Bepanhau reHerald rinoti VaMasisi vakaratidza kufara nezvakataurwa nehurumende izvi. Botswana yaive pasi peBritain kana kuti British Protectorate haia kutora zvombo kurwisa Britain asi yakawana kuzvitongo kuzere muna 1965 kuburikidza nekutaurirana pasina kudeuka ropa. VaMumbengegwi vakatiwo dura iri rakakosha mukuchengetedza nhoroondo yekurwira rusungunuko muAfrica. Kuvakwa kwedura iri kuri kutsigirwawo nesangano reinstitute of African Knowledge iro rine basa rekutsvaga rutsigiro kubva kuvatungamiri vedzimwe nyika nemari. Vanoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko musangano renyanzvi muAfrica reInstitute of African Knowledge, VaJoseph Nkani vakatenda kuti Botswana yakapihwa chikamu chemunda pamuzinda ucharatidza nhoroondo yerusununguko rweAfrica uyo uri muHarare. Vati nzvimbo iyi inotarisirwa kuisa zvinhu kubva kunyika dzese dzemu Africa dzakarwa hondo yerusungunuko nedzimwe dzakabatsira nemari mazano nezvimwe dzakaita seBotswana. Parizvino inonzi yavakwa kusvika pazvikamu gumi nezviviri kana kuti 12% uye inotarisirwa kupedzwa kuvakwa muna 2024. Gurukota rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika muBotswana, Doctor Lemogang Kwape vaudza Studio7 parunhare vari muGaborone muBotswana kuti danho ratorwa nehurumende yeZimbabwe rinotendwa samara sezvo kunyangwe Botswa isina kurwa hondo yerusungunuko, yakabatsirawo dzimwe nyika dzemuAfrica panguva yekurwisa hudzvanyiriri. Nyanzvi munyaya dzenhoroondo uye vachishandira bazi rinochengetedza nhoroondo yenyika kana kuti Department of National Archives and Heritage muBotswana, VaSiyephambili Sikhosana vati hurongwa uhu hunobatsira kumutsidzira kushanyirwa kwenyika. Miziyamu uyu, uyo uri kuvakwa nemari inodarika mamiriyoni makumi maviri emadhora ekuAmerica, uchachengetera nyaya dzedzimwe nyika zvibayiro uye nhoroondo dzeFRELIMO, SWAPO, MPLA, uye mamwe mapato akarwira rusungunuko nevakabatsira. Semuenzaniso, nzvimbo iyi ichange ichiratidza kuurayiwa kwevanhu vakawanda mumusha weWiriyamu nemaPutukezi muMozambique muna 1972, hondo yeCuito Cuanavale kuAngola muna 1987 kusvika 1988 pakati pemauto eAngola ichitsigirwa neCuba, Soviet Union, Vietnam, ANC neSWAPO vachirwisana neUNITA neSouth Africa. Icharatidzawo nhoroondo yevarwi veMau Mau kuKenya. Chirongwa ichi chiri kuvakwa panzvimbo ine mahekita zana, chakakomekedzwa zviri pamutemo nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Dambudzo Mnangagwa musi wa4 Zvita muna 2020. Iri kuvakwa panzvimbo inonzi Liberation City kuWarren Park muHarare.
title: Zimbabwe Yotsvaga Rubatsiro rweKuvaka Dura reNhoroondo yeHondo yeRusungunuko

text: Nherera nevanoshaya kwaMurehwa vari kunyemwerera nemufaro zvichitevera rubatsiro rwemari inoita zana nemakumi mashanu ezviuru zvemadhora rwavakapihwa nehurumende yeAmerica kuburikidza nesangano reUnited States Africa Development Foundation. Sangano reHeather Chimoga Orphan Care rakapihwa mari iyi nemusi weChina kuitira kuti ishandiswe mumabasa emaoko anounza mari kuitira kuti risarambe richipemha rubatsiro. Imwe nherera inochengetwa nesangano iri, Althea Kaputa, anoti rubatsiro urwu huchavandudza hupenyu hwake. Izvi zvinotsigirwawo naTrosky Nyahunzvi, uyo ari kuita Form Three. Nyahunzvi anoti haazivi kuti aitangira papi dai asina rubatsiro rwaanowana. Imwe yechirikadzi yakasiiwa ine vana vapfumbamwe inogara muWard 1 mumusha weNyamashato kwaMurehwa, Amai Emmaculate Murehwa, vanoti sangano reHeather Chimoga riri kushandura hupenyu hwenherera zhinji. Mutungamiriri weHeather Chimoga, VaAlbert Mukondwa, vanoti vanotarisira kuti mari yavakapihwa iyi ivabatsire mumabasa avo emaoko kuti vasarambe vachipemha. Sangano iri riri kubatsira nherera mazana manomwe ane makumi masere nemana dziri muzvikoro zvakasiyana-siyana kusanganisira kumaunivhesiti. Mumiriri weAmerica MuZimbabwe, Ambassador Harry K. Thomas Junior, vanoti zvinovafadza zvikuru kuwona zvirongwa zvinobetsera mukusimudzira nherera nevechidiki kuitira kuti vave nehupenyu hwakajeka. No media source currently available
title: America Yobatsira Vanoshaya kwaMurehwa

text: Chirwere chegomarara chiri kuvhiringidza hupenyu hwevanhu vakawanda sezvo zvinhu zvisina kumira zvakanaka munyaya dzehutano pamwe nehupfumi hwenyika uhwo hwaenda kumawere. Mumwe wevanhu vari kutambura nechirwere ichi, ndiGogo Vongai Muhwadzarira avo vane gomarara repazamu. Mbuya Muhwadzarira vanoti vari kugara vaine marwadzo makuru, uye chiremba wavo anoti haaakwanise kupisa chirwere ichi pazamu ravo sezvo vari munhu agara aine chimwe chirwere chemoyo. Sezvo Mbuya Muhwadzarira vari mumarwadzo, takaona zvakakodzera kuti titaure nemwanasikana wavo, Muzvare Unika Muhwadzarira, avo vari kuvapepa muHarare. Muzvare Muhwadzarira vanoti havasisina mari yokuti vanachiremba vagadzirise musana wavo uyo wakaremerwa nezamu ravo iro rakazvimba. Muzvare Muhwadzarira vanoti amai vavo vakaita kapundu pazamu vakaenda kuchipatara chiri kumusha kwavo ndobva vaudzwa kuti vaende kuchipatara chekuru chekuMasvingo. Asi vanoti kurapwa kwavo kwakadzoserwa shure nekuratidzira kwaiita vana chiremba vemuzvipatara zvehurumende ndokubva Muzvare Muhwadzarira vafunga zvokuti amai vavo vauye kuHarare kuti vazovarapisa kuna chiremba wavo. Muzvare Muhwadzarira vanoti panodiwa mari inosvika zviuru zviviri nemazana mana emadhora ekuAmerika, US$2400, kuti vambotanga vamborapwa zvimwe zvir ikuvanetsa vasati vapiswa gomarara repazamu. Muzvare Muhwadzarira vanoti havasati vave kuziva kuti gomarara rezamu iri rakomba zvakadini nokuti havasisina mari yokuti vaende kwaChiremba asi vanoti zironda racho riri kuramba richikura zvokuti ranyenga zvokusachatarisika. Muzvare Muhwadzarira vanoti amai vavo vanongorara nekuswera vachichema nemarwadzo eronda iri zvokuti vanotoita zvekusimudzwa kuti vaende kunozvibatsira kuchimbuzi nokuti havachisina simba racho. Muzvare Muhwadzarira, avo vaitosvimha misodzi pavaitaura nyaya iyi, vanoti chirwere chegomarara chinodhura kurapisa zvokuti vave munhu angopererwa nepfungwa nokuti havachaziva kuti voita sei nokuti havasisina mari. Mukuru wesangano reCancer Association of Zimbabwe, Amai Junior Mavhu, vanoti chirwere ichi ndicho chechitatu pamagomarara ese anobata vanhukadzi muZimbabwe. Amai Mavhu vanoti paongororo yavakaita mumwedzi waGumiguru gore rakapera, vakaona vakadzi nevarume vakati wandei paguva yaicherechedzwa chirwere ichi pasi rose, avo vaiva nemapundu mumazamu airatidza kuti aigona kuita kunge aiva magomarara emuzamu. Amai Mavhu vanoti panoda dzidziso yakanyanyisa yokujekesera vanhu munyika kuti mukadzi akabviswa Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano, Dr Mudavanhu, vanoti gomarara repazamu neremuromo wechibereko ndiwo akafararira muvarapwi vemagomarara ose, uye vanoti magomarara aya anokwanisa kurapwa zvokutopera kana madzimai akakurumidza kuenda kunoongororwa kuzvipatara nemakiriki. Vanotiwo munhu wese anofanira kuongororwa kuona kuti hapana here vamwe vemumhuri vakamborwara nezvirwere zvegomarara nokuti izvozvo zvinokwidza mukana wokuita zvirwere zvegomarara . Mukuru weNational Cancer Registry ririvpasi pebazi rehutano, VaEric Chokunonga, vanoti vanhu vakawanda vanozotsvaga rubatsiro chirwere chegomarara chakomba zvokuti panenge pasisina chokuita sezvo muviri wese unenge waparara nacho. VaChokunonga vanoti ongororo yavakaita inoratidza kuti magomarara ari kunyanya kunetsa veruzhinji munyika anosanganisira gomarara remuromo wechibereko nerepazamu kumadzimai, kwotiwo gomarara resikarudzi kana, kana kuti prostate cancer, kuvarume. Vaimbove gurukota rehutano, Dr Obadiah Moyo, vakamboudza nhengo dzeSenate gore rakapera kuti vanhu zviuru zvishanu vari kubatwa nemagomarara akasiyana siyana pagore rega rega munyika uye vanhu vanodarika chiuru nemazana mashanu vari kufawo nechirwere ichi pagore rega rega. No media source currently available
title: Chirwere cheGomarara Chouraya Vanhu Vakawanda muNyika

text: Hurumende yakatora nechisimba mabhuku anga auya nevaimbove mutungamiri wenyika yeNigeria, VaOlesugun Obasanjo, pavakapinda munyika neChina. Izvi zvakaitika neChina panhandare yeRobert Mugabe International muHarare. VaObasanjo vakanyora bhuku rehutongo hwejekerere muAfrica pamwe chete nemutevedzeri wasachigaro weMDC Inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa, VaTendai Biti, Greg Mills uye muzvinafundo wemuAmerica, Jeffrey Herbst. Bhuku iri rinonzi Democracy Works: Re-Wiring Politics to Africa's Advantage uye razoparurwa muHarare naVaObasanjo naVaChamisa pasi pehurongwa hwesangano reSouthern Africa Political and Economy Series Trust. Asi hurongwa uhu hunonzi hwanonotswa kuitwa kwemaawa matatu. Hazvina kujeka kuti ndiyani chaizvo akaita kuti mabhuku aya atorwe, kana kuti zvakaitwa nebazi ripi rehurumende. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kubazi rezvekupinda nekubuda munyika. Ukuwo munyori mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaNick Mangwana, vakatiwo havazivi zvaitika sezvo vari kuNambia. Asi vakati vachayedza kuti vanzwisise kuti chii chatora nzvimbo. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura naVaBiti kanawo VaObasanjo sezvo vange vaenda kunoparura bhuku iri kuMalawi. Asi mutauriri weMDC, VaJacob Mafume, vakati zvaitwa nehurumende zvekutora mabhuku zvinoshoresa nyika pasi rose. VaMafume vakatiwo hurumende inofanirwa kuremekedza VaObasanjo sezvo vari munhu aimbove mutungamiri wenyika, uye anozivikanwa nekuunza hutongo hwejekerere munyika make. No media source currently available
title: Bhuku raVaObasanjo naVaBiti Rinotorwa Zvechisimba neHurumende yaVaMnangagwa.

text: Muchuchisi mukuru wenyika, VaJohannes Tomana, vomiswa pamberi pematare edzimhosva vachipomerwa mhosva yekutyora mitemo mukuita basa ravo rekuchuchisa…. Hurumende yokurudzira kutengeswa kwemombe dziri mumatunhu asina mvura nemafuro…. IMF yotsvaga nzira dzekubatsira Zimbabwe kuti ipedze kubhadhara chikwereti chayo panguva iyo mumwe seneta wemuAmerica ari kukurudzira hurumende yaVaBarack Obama kuti ishandise simba rayo mukuona kuti Zimbabwe yabhadhara zvikwereti zvayo zvose nekuremekedza kodzero dzevanhu isati yatanga kukwereteswa zvakare neIMF…. Muchirongwa chevechidiki che The Connection tiri kutarisa mashoko aVaMugabe kuAfrican Union ekuti Africa itsvage nzira dzekumisa vechidiki kuti vasabude munyika dzavo vachinogara kudzimwe nyika…. Iyi ndiyo misoro yenhau dzedu dzanhasi...munotibata pa 909 am, 4930, kana pa 12080, ne 15460 Kilohertzs pa Shortwave kana paFacebook page yedu yeVOA Shona.
title: Misoro yeNhau, Chipiri Kukadzi 2, 2016

text: Vamwe vanotevera zvematongerwo enyika vanoti dariro rezvematongerwo enyika rinenge richaita duku zvichitevera kuburitswa kwegwaro kana kuti manifesto naAmai Joice Mujuru, izvo zvinonzi nevamwe munongedzo wekuti vanenge vafunga kupinda mune zvematongerwo enyika. Asi vamwe vanoti nzvimbo yavo inogona kuita duku sezvo mukati medariro iri magara muine vamwe vanopikisa vakaita saVaMorgan Tsvangirai nebato ravo reMDC T, VaTendai Biti nebato ravo rePeople’s Democratic Party, iro riri kuitawo kongiresi yaro muHarare, VaElton Mangoma nebato ravo re Renewal Democrats of Zimbabwe. Vamwe vane mapato anopikisa ndaVaWelshman Ncube, Amai Barbara Nyagomo, VaDumiso Dabengwa, VaSimba Makoni,VaJacob Ngarivhume Satiya, Amai Margaret Dongo, Muzvinafundo Lovemore Madhuku neNCA, nevamwe vanongonyuka chete munguva dzesarudzo vakaita savaKisinoti Mukwazhi, VaEgypt Dzinemunhenzva, nevamwe. Asi veZanu PF vanoti havasi kuzofa vakashaiswa hope nevanopikisa, avo vavanoti vari kuramba vachitsemuka tsemuka. Nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika, uye vari mudzidzisi wezvemutemo paKent University kuEngland, Doctor Alex Magaisa vanoti kuwanda kwemato anopikisa zvinoratidza kuti munyika mune vanhu vane chido chekuti vaunzewo maonero avanoita kuti nyika ingafambe sei. Vanoti izvi zvinoratidza kuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka munyika, zvinhu zvinobvumiwawo kana naivo vakuru muZanu PF kuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka munyika. Asi vanoyambirawo kuti kana paine vanoda kurwisana nebato reZanu PF vanofanirwa kunge vakaungana nekuti Zanu PF yakatora nguva yakareba yakabatana uye hurumende iri pasi payo. Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika uye vari nhengo yeZanu PF, VaGadzira Chirumhanzu vanoti kuwanda kwemapato ezvematongerwo enyika mucherechedzo wekuti munyika mune hutongo hwejechetere, izvo zvinopikisana nezvinotaurwa kunze zvekuti hurumende yeZanu PF ino dzvinyirira vezvematongerwo enyika vanoipikisa. No media source currently available
title: Vamwe Voti Kuwanda kweMapato Anopikisa Asina Kubatana Hakubatsire

text: Mapato anopikisa pamwe nemasangano anoshanda akazvimirira anoti haasi kufara nenyaya yekuti bhiri rekuvandudza mutemo wesarudzo, Electoral Amendment Bill, rakapasa muparamende nezuro risina zvizhinji zvavaida zvakaita sekuti kudhindwa kwemapepa ekuvhotesa kana kuti maballot papers kuitwe pachena. Mubatanidzwa wemapato manomwe anopikisa pasi pemubatanidzwa weMDC Alliance unoti hausi kufara nezvakaitika uye uchiri kuzeya nyaya iyi usati wazivisa veruzhinji danho raachatora. Mutauriri webato reMDC inotungamirirwa naVaWelshman Ncube, avo vanove mutairiri weMDC Alliance, VaKurauone Chihwai, vaudza Studio7 kuti semaonero avo, mapato ese achapinda musarudzo anofanira kuve nechekuita nekudhindwa nekufambiswa kwemapepa ekuvhotesa. Mutungamiriri Renewal Democrats of Zimbabwe zvakare vari sachigaro wemubatanidzwa wemapato weCoalition of Democrats, VaElton Mangoma, vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvaitika izvi zvinoratidza kuti bato riri kutonga reZanu PF haridi kusandura mutemo wesarudzo. VaMangoma vane nyaya iri kudare reConstitutional Court uko vari kuda kuti dare iri rimanikidze gurukota rezvemutemo, gweta guru rehurumende pamwe neZImbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, kuti vavandudze mutemo wesarudzo kuti uenderane nebumbiro remutemo wenyika. VaMangoma vanoti zvichitevera zvakaitika muparamende, vave kuzovandudza nyaya yavo iri kudare. VaMangoma vati bumbiro remitemo yenyika rinotaura pachena kuti ZEC inofanira kunge yakazvimirira nekudaro ZEC inokwanisa kuronga kuti nyaya yemaballot papers yofambiswa sei isingatevedzi mutemo weElectoral Act. Gurukota rezvemutemo, VaZiyambi Ziyambi, vakaramba zvaidiwa neMDC T inotungamirirwa naVaNelson Chamisa kuti ballot papers adhindwe pachena vachiti izvi hazvifambirani nemutemo wekutengwa kwezvinhu muhurumende weProcurement Act. Mutauriri sangano remubatanidzwa wemasangano anoshanda akazvimirira eCrisis Coalition, VaTabani Moyo, vanoti nyika haigoni kuita sarudzo dzakachena kana nyaya yedhindwa kwemaballot papers ikasaitwa pachena. Bhiri iri rasara kusainwa nemutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa , risati rave mutemo. VaMangagwa vanotarisirwa kuzivisa zuva richaitwa sarudzo mukupera kwemwedzi uno. No media source currently available
title: Kupasiswa kweBhiri reMitemo yeSarudzo Kokonzera Mutauro Mukuru

text: Vechidiki ava vari pasi pemusangano we Youths for Advocacy Reform and Democracy, Yard, vanoti vanoona zvisina kukodzera kuti vatungamiriri ve Zanu PF vaite mabiko emari yakawanda inosvika zviuru mazana masere emadhora ivo vachifa nenzara. Vamwe vechidiki mudunhu rema Masvingo vari kugadzirira kupinda mumugwagwa musi weChishanu vachiratidzira kusafarira kwavo danho rakatorwa neZanu PF rekuita mabiko ebhavhadhe remutungamiriri wenyika, Va Robert Mugabe, musi weMugovera mudunhu ravo. Vechidiki ava vari pasi pemusangano we Youths for Advocacy Reform and Democracy, Yard, vanoti vanoona zvisina kukodzera kuti vatungamiriri ve Zanu PF vaite mabiko emari yakawanda inosvika zviuru mazana masere emadhora ivo vachifa nenzara. Anoona nezvekufambiswa kwebasa mu Yard muMasvingo, VaMunyaradzi Rushwaya, vanoti gadziriro yavo yekuratidzira yatova pachinhanho chepamusoro soro. Vechidiki vari kuronga kuratidzira vanobva kumapato akasiyana siyana ayo ari kunyunyuta kuti Zanu PF haina hany'a nevanhu vanotambura, izvo zviri kuipa kuti kushandisa zvisina musoro mari yakawandisa pamabiko achaitirwa pa Great Zimbabwe. VaRushwaya vanoti vacharatidzira vachiudza hutungamiriri hwenyika kuti havasi kufara nemabiko aya. Vanoti dai Zanu PF iine hany'a neveruzhinji vari kutambura dai yakashandisa mari iyi mukutengera vanhu chibage kuti vawane sadza mudzimba dzavo. VaRushwaya vanotiwo mari ichashandiswa inokwana kutenga chikafu che dunhu rose reMasvingo kusvika muna Nyamavhuvhu. VaRushwaya vanotiwo sangano ravo rakatozivisa mapurisa kuti vachaita ratidziro iyi sezvinodiwa nemitemo yenyika. Ratidziro iyi iri kuuya apo panguva iyo paine kufungidzirwa kuti vechidiki pamwe nevaimbova varwi verususngunuko vakarohwa nemapurisa vari kugadzirirawo imwe ratidziro yavo musi wemabiko aya. Sachigaro wekomiti iri kugadzirira mabiko aya muMasvingo, Va Ezra Chadzamira, havana kubatika sezvo nhare mbozha yavo yanga isingaiti. Asi vechidiki muZanu PF musi weChina chapfuura vakaudza vatori venhau kuti vakagadzirira kuteura ropa vachirwisa vose vanoda kukanganisa bhavhadhi raVaMugabe. VaTalent Majoni, vanova nhengo ye Zanu PF yevechidiki mudunhu reMasvingo, vakati vakatogadzirira kufira mhuri yekutanga, kana kuti First Family, vachiidzivirira pane vose vari kufungirwa kuti vanoda kuzotadzisa kuitwa kwebhavhadhi zvakanaka.
title: Vechidiki Voratidzira neChishanu Kusafarira Bhavhadhe raVaMagube kuMasvingo

text: Vanhu vakawanda munyika vari kurangarira muchakabvu Dr Joshua Nkomo avo vaimbova mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika. Vankomo vakashaya musi wa 1 Chikunguru. VaCephas Msipa ndemumwe waana sorojena vashoma vasara munhoroondo yehondo yerusununguko rwenyika uyezve ndemumwe wevanhu vashoma vakashanda kwenguva yakareba namushakabvu Dr Joshua Nkomo pamwe nemutungamiri wenyika vaRobert Mugabe. VaMsipa, avo vaive nhengo yebato reZAPU munove makazobuda bato reZanu PF, vanoti kubvira pakutanga, VaNkomo munhu airemekedzwa nevanhu vose semutungamiri chaiye panyaya yekurwisa hutongi hwevachena uye kubatanidza vanhu vatema vemunyika ino panguva yaiziikanwa kuti Southern Rhodesia. VaMsipa vanoti VaNkomo munhu aive nerudo rukuru rwenyika yake. VaMsipa vanotsinhira kuti pane zvose zvavaiita VaNkomo vaitungamirwa nekukoshesa kuti nyika ive nehutongi hwejekerere vachitiwo, kunyangwe vairwira kuzvitonga kuzere pavakapatsanuka vachibuda muZAPU, VaNkomo vakaramba vari munhu aitsvaga kushanda nevese vairwira kodzero dzevanhu vatema. Vanotiwo VaNkomo vaive munhu aiva nemutsa vachikwanisa kuregerera munhu wese ainge avatadzira, vachitiwo hunhu hwakadai ndihwo hwakaita kuti vaNkomo vakwanise kuzvininipisa, vakashanda pasi paVaMugabe mushure mechibvumirano cheUnity Accord chakaitwa pakati peZanu PF neZAPU muna 1987. Sezvinowanzoitika kune munhu wese akakosha munhoroondo yenyika, nekuda kwekusanzwisisa, kune vanhu vanogona kushora kunyange zvakanaka zvaanenge aita. VaDumiso Dabengwa avo vaive mukuru wemauto eZimbabwe People’s Revolutionary Army kana kuti ZIPRA, vanoti ivo ndemumwe wevanhu vakamboshora VaNkomo pavakasaina chibvumirano cheUnity Accord, asi vanoti vakazoona kuti VaNkomo vakaita izvi nechido chekuda kuunza kubatana pamwe nerunyararo munyika. VaChristopher Ndiweni avo vaivewo murwi weZIPRA vanotsinhirawo izvi vachiti VaNkomo vanofanirwa kuremekedzwa nekuyedza kuunza runyararo munyika zvisinei kuti ivo nevamwe vakuru vakuru veZAPU pamwe nevarwi veZIPRA vaive vamboshungurudzwa zvakanyanya nevebato reZanu PF. Hurumende yeZanu PF inonzi yakashungurudza varwi vehondo vaive pasi peZIPRA. Isu sevarwi vacho taigara tichizivisa VaNkomo zvaiitika tikatomboedza kuti vabvume kuti titore zvombo zvedu tidzorere kushungurudza kwataiitwa uku. Asi VaNkomo vakaramba zvachose vachiti izvi vaizokonzera hondo. Vamwe vanoti VaNkomo vakatengesa pavakabvuma kusaina Unity Accord asi chokwadi chiripo ndechekuti vakaita izvi nekuti vaisada kuti muZimbabwe muite hondo seyakaitika kuAngola kana kuMozambique. VaNkomo vanofanirwa kurangarirwa nekurumbidzwa nariinhi wose semutungamiri chaiye wehondo yekusunungura nyika kubva muhutongi hwevaChena. Retired Brigadier General Agrippa Mutambara murwi wehondo yerusununguko uye vairwa vari mumauto eZimbabwe African National Liberation Army kana kuti ZANLA. VaMutambara avo vave kutsigira bato reZimbabwe People First vanoti ivo nevamwe vakawanda vaive muZANLA vairemekedza hunhu nehutungamiri hwavaNkomo uye vanokudza basa rose ravakaita munhoroondo yerusununguko rwenyika. VaBernard Manyadza avo vaizivikanwa nezita rekuhondo rekuti Parker Chipoyera vaive nhengo yeHigh Command yemauto eZimbabwe African National Liberation Army kana kuti ZANLA. VaManyadza vanotsinhirawo maonero aVaMutambara vachiti vatungamiri vose kusanganisa VaMugabe vanofanirwa kudzidza kuramba vachikoshesa zvido zvevanhu sezvaiitwa naVaNkomo. Panguva yehondo VaNkomo nebato ravo reZAPU vakaumba hukama hwakasimba nenyika dzakawanda kunyanya yeRussia iyo yainzi Soviet Union, izvo zvakapa kuti vanzi nevekunyika dzekumadokero vaitevera gwara renyika iyi reCommunism uye vaida kukurudzira mafungiro aya kuchamhembe kweAfrica. Mwanakomana waVaNkomo VaSibangilizwe Nkomo vanoti baba vavo vaisave muCommunist asi kuti vaida kuti vanhu vatema vawane kuzvitonga vachiwana kodzero dzavo dzakakwana sezvaiitwa nevechiChena. Panyaya yemhuri VaSibangilizwe Nkomo vanoti baba vavo vaive munhu ane rudo uye aiedza nepose paaigona napo kuriritira mhuri yake zvisinei nekuzvipira kwavaive vakaita kunyaya yehondo yerusununguko. VaSibangilizwe Nkomo vanoti mhuri yavo yakamboomerwa nezvinhu apo baba vavo vaive mujeri kwemakore gumi. Asi vanoti amai vavo, mushakabvu Joanna Nkomo vaive mukadzi aive akangwarirawo kuriritira mhuri yake vasingagarire maoko. Amai vedu vaive munhu aishanda nesimba. Vakashandisa pfungwa dzavo kuti vaone kuti hunyanzvi hwavo hwekusona nekubika huite kuti vatiwanire mari yekuenda kuchikoro. Taibatsirwawo nemadzisahwira ababa pano nepapo. Kunewo vesangano reChristian Care avo akabatsira nekutibhadharira mari yechikoro patakange tave kusecondary. Nhoroondo yehupenyu hwaVaNkomo inogona kuonekwa nenzira dzakasiyana-siyana nevanhu akasiyana-siyana. Asi panguva iyo veruzhinji vari kuchema-chema nekusamira zvakanaka kwakaita zvinhu munyika, zviri pachena kuti vanhu vakawanda vanorangarira nerukudzo rukuru, kuzvininipisa pamwe nekurwira zvido zvevanhu kwakaitwa negamba guru iri. No media source currently available
title: Zimbabwe Yorangarira Dr Joshua Nkomo

text: Kudomwa kwebhodhi idzva rekupepeta zvinobuda munhepfenyuro nemunganonyorwa kana kuti Censorship Board rinosanganisira mwanasikana wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Bona Mugabe-Chikore, kwakonzera mutauro wakanyanya munyika. Vaimbi nevanoita zvemitambo vari kushora bhodhi iri vachiti rinovhiringidza mabasa avo. Asi vamwe vanoti bhodhi iri rakakosha munyika sezvo pasingafanire kuita wadawatonga muzinda wenyuchi vanhu vachiita madiro ajojina. Sachigaro webhodhi iri ndiVaAeneas Chigwedere. Vamwe varimo vanosanganisira mutauriri wemapurisa Senior Assistant Commissioner Charity Charamba, Amai Runyararo Magadzire, Ishe Nyamukoho Samson Katsande, VaRegis Chikowore, VaShingai Rukwata Ndoro, VaChenjerai Daitai, VaTungamirai Muganhiri uye Father Fidelis Mukonori veRoman Catholic Church. Gurukota rinoona nezvemukati menyika, VaIgnatious Chombo, vanoti bhodhi iri richarambidza kubuditswa panhepfenyuro nezvivhiti vhiti kana mumabhuku zvinhu zvavanoti zvinodzikisira hunhu, kusanganisira zvepabonde kana mifananidzo yevasina kupfeka nhumbi uye zvimwe zvinogona kukonzera kusawirirana munyika. Asi vaimbi vakaita saDoctor Thomas Mapfumo na Leonard Zhakata vanoti mimhanzi yavo inomborambidzwa kuridzwa panhepfenyuro kana ichifungidzirwa kuti inoshora hurumende. Bhodhi iri rakabhanawo mamwe mafirimu anoti No Voice No Choice uye rinonzi Democrats in Zimbabwe. Mutemo wakadai wakatanga kushandiswa muna 1967 panguva yeRhodesia uchinzi Censorship and Entertainment Act uye kubva nguya iyi wangovandudzwa zvishoma nezvishoma. Father Mukonori vanoti ivo vane hunyanzvi hwakadzama munyaya dzekuongorora nyaya dzekuchengetedzwa kwehunhu. No media source currently available Nhengo yePolitburo yeZanu-PF vari gweta, VaMunyaradzi Paul Mangwana, vanoti hapana chakaipa pakudomwa kwaAmai Bona Chikore sezvo vari munhu akadzidza. No media source currently available Asi muimbi, Doctor Thomas Mapfumo, vashora zvikuru kudomwa kwaAmai Chikore uye vakati hurumende yaVaMugabe iri kutodzvinyirira vanhu kutodarika yeRhodesia yaitungamirwa naIan Smith.  No media source currently available
title: Nyaya yeKudoma Mwana waVaMugabe muCensorship Board Yokonzera Mutauro

text: Sangano revarairidzi vekumaruwa, reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, rinoti nhengo dzaro dzinosvika zvikamu makumi masere nezvishanu kubva muzana dzateerera kurudziro yaro yekuti dzikande mapadza nemusi weChina neChishanu senzira yekuratidza kunyunyuta kwadzo nemabatirwo adzinoti dziri kuitwa nehurumende. Mutungamiri wesangano iri, VaObert Masaraure, vanoti zvinyunyuto zvikuru zviri kususukidzwa nevarairidzi ndezvekuti vabhadharwe mari yemihoro nemari yekunze yekuAmerica vachiti yavari kupiwa haichavakwanira. Vanotiwo vanofara nevemamwe masangano evashandi vehurumende avapa rutsigiro mukuratidzira kwavo uku, uye vanotarisira kuti neChishanu varairidzi vakawanda vachabatana navo muzuva repiri rekuramwa mabasa iri. No media source currently available Ukuwo, rimwe sangano revarairidzi, re Progressive Teachers’ Union of Zimbabwe, rinotiwo nhengo dzaro dzapiwa mvumo nemapurisa yekupinda mumigwagwa muHarare neChishanu dzichiratidzirawo nemabatirwo adzinoti dziri kuitwa nehurumende. Munyori mukuru wesangano iri, VaRaymond Majongwe, vanoti vakaita musangano nemapurisa neChitatu vakazopiwa mvumo mushure mekubhadhara madhora mazana mana nemakumi mashanu emadhora kumapurisa, mari yavanoti ndeyekuti vakwanise kuchengetedzwa nemapurisa pavanenge vachifora. VaMajongwe vanoti nhengo dzavo dzichafora dzichanosiya magwaro enyunyuto kukambani yePremier Service Medical Aid Society, kubazi rezvevashandi nekubazi rezvemari. Vanoti zvinyunyuto zvavo zvikuru zviri pamusoro pemabatirwo ari kuitwa varairidzi nekambani yePSMAS, iyo inovabatsira nenyaya dzekurapwa, uye kuhurumende, iyo iri kuvapa mihoro nemari yemunyika, iyo vanoti haichatenga chinhu. VaMajongwe vanoti varairidzi, sevashandi vese vehurumende, vari kudawo kuti vabhadharwe mihoro nemari yekuAmerica, sezvo kwese kwavanoenda vachida kurapwa kana kutenga mishonga vachinzi vabhadhare nemari yekuAmerica. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, sangano rinomirira vashandi vehurumende vose, reApex Council rinonzi rakati harineyi nechekuita nekuramwa mabasa kuri kuitwa nemasangano maviri aya. Sachigaro veApex Council, Amai Cecilia Alexander vakaudza bepanhau reHerald kuti sangano ravo rinotungamidza mberi nhaurirano nevashandirwi, zvinove zvavanoti vachiri kuita pari zvino. Asi masangano maviri aya anotiwo haaneyi nechekuitawo neApex Council, achiti yakundikana kubatsira vashandi vehurumende.
title: Varairidzi Vanopinda Mukuratidzira Vachida Kubhadharwa Mihoro neMari yekuAmerica

text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vati vakatambira zvakataurwa neZimbabwe Electoral Commission, Zec, zvekuti ndivo vakakunda musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika. Vachitaura nevatori venhau pamusangano wavaita muHarare, VaMnangagwa vati vamirira kugadzwa semutungamiri wenyika sezvinodiwa nebumbiro remitemo yenyika. VaMnangagwa vati vakazvipira kushanda vachisimudzira hupfumi hwenyika sezvo chinangwa chavo chiri chekuona kuti Zimbabwe itsva yazadzisa zvido zveveruzhinji. Vati kana vachinge vagadzwa semutungamiri wenyika vachasarudza makurukota avanoona kuti anokwanisa kuita basa ravo nemazvo. Vatiwo dare ravo remakurukota richange riine vechidiki vanokwanisa kuita basa nemazvo. Vachipindura mubvunzo wekuti vachabatana here nemutungamiri weMDC Alliance, VaNelson Chamisa, muhurumende yavo, VaMnangagwa vati zvavachaita zvichabuda pachena kana vachinge vagadzwa semutungamiri wenyika. Zvichakadai, VaMnangagwa vakurudzira kuti munyika muve nerunyararo zvichitevera sarudzo dzakaitwa neMuvhuro.
title: VaMnangagwa Vanoti Vanotambira Kusarudzwa Kwavo seMutungamiri weNyika

text: Gurukora rezvevechidiki, Muzvare Kirsty Coventry, vaparura homwe yemari inoita mamiriyoni gumi nemanomwe emadhora emaRTGS, iyo ichabatsira masangano evechidiki pamwe nemabhizimusi evechidiki avati akavhiringidzwa kushanda kwawo nechirwere cheCoronavirus. Vachiparura homwe iyi muHarare Muzvare Coventry chirongwa ichi chakanangana nekubatsira mukusimudzirwa kwemabhizimusi pamwe nemibatanidzwa inotungamirwa nevechidiki ayo vati anga ave kuwira pasi nekuda kwekuvharwa kwakaitwa nyika kuri kukonzerwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 pasi rose. Vaenderera mberi vachiti vechidiki vanenge vachida mari idzi vanofanira kuvabata paWhatsapp nezvinyorwa zvavo kana kuenda kumahofisi ebazi ravo ari mumatunhu avanogara sezvo vanhu vasiri kubvumidzwa kubuda mudzimba. Vechidiki vanokodzera kupinda muchirongwa ichi vanofanirwa kunge vaine makore gumi nemasere kusvika pamakore makumi matatu nemashanu. Vatiwo vechidiki ava vachapihwa mari isingadarike zviuru zvishanu zvemadhora ari maRTGS vachiti vanenge vatadza kukwana muchirongwa chavo vachazenge vachiendeswa kune mamwe mapazi ehurumende kuti vanobatsirwa ikoko. Vati kugoverwa kuchange kuchiitwa mari idzi kuchange kuchiitwa pasina kupinzwa kwezvematongerwo enyika. Izvi zvatambirwa nemutauriri weboka revechidiki muMDC inotingamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa, VaStephen Chuma, avo vati zvanga zvakanaka kuti mari iyi itange kupihwa vechidiki vasina mabasa vavanoti ndivo vari kunyanya kutambura. Mutungamiri webato reLabour Econimists and Afrikan Democrats, Muzvare Linda Masarira, vatiwo hurumende yanga ichifanira kucheuka vanhu vanga vachirarama nembasa emaoko kwete kutungamidza mberi vane mabhizimusi akapfumbira kare. Muzvare Coventry vati vemabhizimusi akanangana nekurwisa chirwere cheCovid-19 akafanana nekugadzira sipo nemishonga inoshandiswa kugeza maoko, ndivo vachakosheswa zvikuru pakupihwa kwemari iyi. Vatiwo mabhizimusi evechidiki avachapa mari mabhizimusi akanga akanyoreswa nechekare mwedzi mitanhatu nyika isati yavharwa nekuda kwechirwere che Coronavirus. No media source currently available
title: Hurumende Inoparura Homwe yeZW$17m Ichabatsira Vechidiki

text: Vanhu vakawanda munyika vari kushushikana zvikuru nemoto iri kuramba ichibvira munzvimbo dzakasiyana siyana ichikonzera kukuvara kwevanhu uye kutsva kwemidziyo yakawanda inodarika mamiriyoni emadhora. Mutauriri wemapurisa Senior Assistant Commisioner Charity Charamba vati mapurisa achiri kuferefeta chakakonzera moto iyi vozozivisa nyika kana vave nehumboo huzere. Nemusi weChipiri, kwaSiyaso Home Industries kuMbare kwakabvira moto kukatsva marori maviri uye dzimwe motokari dzaigadzirwa panzvimbo iyi. Hapana ari kuziva kuti chii chakakonzera moto uyu vamwe vachiti vanhu vaisvuura tambo dzemhangura vamwe vachiti marara anogara achitsva panzvimbo iyi kwemazuva akawanda. Motokari dzinodzima moto dzinonzi dzakakurumidza kusvika asi dzainge dzisina zvikwanisiro. Moto uyu unotevera mumwe wakapisawo paGlen View 8 Furniture Complex muHarare makare uye umwe wakabvirawo kuKadoma nemusi weMuvhuro manheru. Zvitoro zvakatsva zvinosanganisa Edgars, Jet Stores nechitoro chinogadzira midziyo yemumba cheColoursel Furniture. Hapana kana chakabuditswa muchitoto cheColoursel ichi. Musi weMugovera paMpilo Hospital kuBulawayo pakatsvawo imwe nzvimbo inogara vanachiremba. Vanhu makumi mana nemumwe vanonzi vakatsvirao mubhazi reBrooklyn Express kuWest Nicholson, Matabeleland South nemusi weChishanu. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezve mhando dze moto Engineer Kudzayi Chiweshe vanoti moto mizhinji iri kukonzerwa nevanhu vanoita basa remagetsi risina hunyanzvi uye zvivakwa zvave nenguva zvavakwa. Meya weguta reHarare VaHerbert Gomba vati vari kunetsekana zvikuru nemoto iyi yaparadza midziyo yakawanda muguta ravo. No media source currently available Vaimbove meya we guta reKadoma, vari nhengo yeparamende yeKadoma Central VaMuchineripi Chinyangana vanoti moto wakapisa zvitoro kuKadoma unofungidzirwa kuti wakatangwa nekusangana kwe waya dzemagetsi dzisina kugadzirwa zvakanaka. No media source currently available
title: Vakawanda Munyika Voshushikana neMoto Yoparadza Zvinhu Munzvimbo Dzakasiya Siyana

text: Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa nemusi weChina kuti vanhu zana negumi nevashanu, kana kuti 115, vakawanikwa vaine chirwere cheCovid-19 munyika yose mushure mekuvhenekwa kwevanhu chiuru nemazana manomwe nemakumi manomwe, kana kuti 1770. Pavanhu ava, makumi matanhatu nevatatu, kana kuti 63 vanhu vari kuBulawayo, uye vanhu vose vakabatwa vaine chirwere vanhu vagara vari munyika. Huwandu hwevanhu vakafa hwakaramba huri pamazana maviri nemakumi manomwe nevana, kana kuti 274, sezvo pasina munhu akashaya nemusi weChina. Izvi zvakasiya huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika yose hwasvika pazviuru zvipfumbamwe nemazana matanhatu ane makumi maviri nevatatu, kana kuti 9 623. Vanhu vakanga vapona kubva kuCovid-19 vakanga vasvika pazviuru zvisere nemazana matatu ane makumi mapfumbamwe nevanomwe, kana kuti 8 397. Johns Hopkins University Hospital yemuAmerica, iyo iri kutevera chirwere ichi, inoti vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni makumi matanhatu neimwe nezviuru zana, kana kuti 61,100 000 vabatwa nechirwere ichi uye vanhu vafa vadarika miriyoni imwechete nezviuru mazana mana, kana kuti vadarika 1, 434 000. MuAmerica vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni gumi nemaviri nezviuru mazana masere kana kuti 12,886 000 vabatwa nechirwere ichi uye vanodarika zviuru mazana maviri nemakumi matanhatu nematatu, kana kuti 263 000 vafa nacho. Chirwere ichi chave kutyisawo nekuti chapinda mune zvimwe zvikoro zvemunyika, zvikuru zvikoro zviri kumatunhu ekuMatabeleland, izvo zvakonzera kuvharwa kwezvikoro izvi. Chikoro cheMatopo High School chiri kuMatabeleland South chinonzi chakavharwa svondo rino mushure mekunge vamwe vana vawanikwa vaine chirwere ichi. Izvi zvinouya mazuva mashoma vana vanodarika zana nemakumi masere vabatwa neCovid-19 paJohn Tallach Secondary School kuNtabazinduna, mudunhu reMatabeleland North. Dzimwe nhengo dzeparamende dzinonzi dziri kukurudzirawo kuti zvikoro zvimbovharwa kuitira kuderedza dambudziko rekutapuriranwa kwevana. Mukuru anoona nezvezvirwere zvinotapuriranwa mubazi rezvehutano, Doctor Portia Manangazira, vanoti sehurumende vanoshushikana zvikuru nehuwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19, uye kufa nacho. Doctor Manangazira vanoti veruzhinji vanofanirwa kuramba vachitora matanho ekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi kuburikidza nekugeza maoko, kuvhara miromo nemhino, kusiya mikaha pamwe nekusafambafamba. Vanotiwo panofanirwawo kutorwa matanho ekuvheneka vana vechikoro muzvikoro zvose pamwe nekufirita nemishonga mipanda yezvikoro kuitira kuti chirwere ichi chisaramba chichipararira. No media source currently available
title: Kupinda kweDenda reCovid-19 muZvikoro Kwoshusha Nyanzvi dzeHutano

text: Mutungamiri weMDC, VaMorgan Tsvangirai, vanoti vakagadzirira kutungamira mubatanidzwa wemapato anopikisa kuti vakwikwidzane nemutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, musarudzo dzegore rinouya ndokunge mapato aya avasarudza. VaTsvangirai vanoti vakagadzirira kuumba mubatanidzwa nemamwe mapato asi nekuwanda kwaita mapato anopikisa anonzi ave kudarika makumi mashanu nemana, VaTsvangirai vanoti vachashanda chete nemapato ane hutungamiri hwakajeka. Panyaya yehutano hwavo, VaTsvangirai vanoti vave kunzwa zviri nani chose kunyange hazvo vachiri havo kupota vachinovhenekwa navanachiremba. Vati vari kutarisira kuenda kuna chiremba kekupedzisira mumasvondo maviri anotevera. VaTsvangirai, avo vakatanga kunetsekana nechirwere chegomarara gore rapera, vanoti ishuviro yavo yekuti vanhu vasarudze mutungamiri wenyika anoziva matambudziko akatarisana nevanhu munyika. Vatiwo dambudziko riri muZimbabwe harisi rekuti mapato abatane, asi kuti zvii zvingaitwe kuti Zanu PF itambire zvido zvevanhu. VaTsvangirai vati vakakunda VaMugabe musarudzo dza 2008, asi Zanu PF yakaramba kutambira zvakabuda musarudzo idzi. "Iri ndiro dambudziko ratinofanirwa kuona kuti ragadziriswa munyika kuitira kuti zvido zvevanhu zviremekedzwe," vanodaro VaTsvangirai. No media source currently available
title: Tsvangirai: Mubatanidzwa Ngauve weMapato Ane Vanhu

text: Kutambidzanwa kwemasimba muAmerica hakusi kufamba zvakanaka sezvinotarisirwa nguva dzose zvichitevera danho rakatorwa nemutungamiri wenyika iyi, VaDonald Trump, rekupikisa zvakabuda musarudzo yemamwe matunhu.  Kupikisa kwaVaTrump uku kwaita kuti chikwata chevachangobva mukusarudzwa semutungamiri mutsva wenyika anofanirwa kutora matomu zviri pamutemo muna Ndira gore rinouya, Va Joe Biden, chitadze kuita basa racho nemazvo rekutanga kuronga hurumende ichange iriko gore rinouya. Bazi reGeneral Services Adminstration, GSA, iro rinoona nezvekutambidzwana kwemasimba kuburikidza nekupa achangokunda musarudzo zvikanisiro zvose, rinonzi harisati rapa chikwata chaVaBiden svumbunuro dzekuti chitange kushanda zviri pamutemo sezvinodiwa nemutemo wePresidential Transition Act of 1963. GSA iri kuti haisati yasumwa zviri pamutemo kuti VaBiden ndivo vakakunda musarudzo yemutungamiri we America, zvisineyi kuti masangano enhau ose emuAmerica akabuda ose achiti VaBiden ndivo vakakunda musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kubata mukuru weGSA, Amai Emily Murphy, kuti tinzwe pamire bazi ravo panyaya iyi.  Nepamusana pekuti GSA haisati yasumwa zviri pamutemo, bazi iri rakaudza masangano enhau kuti harikwanisi kuvhura mukana wekuti chikwata chaVaBiden chekutambidzana masimba chiwane mari inosvika mamiriyoni gumi emadhora yekushandisa mukuumba hurumende inofanirwa kutanga kushanda zviri pamutemo musi unogadzwa VaBiden semutungamiri wenyika. Zvimwe zviri kunetsa munyaya iyi idanho zvakare rakaitwa naVaTrump rekudzinga nemusi weMuvhuro gurukota rezvekudzivirirwa kwenyika, VaMark Esper, avo vakaziva nezvekudzingwa kwavo mushure mekunge mutungamiri wenyika vazivisa izvi paTwitter yavo.  Bazi rekudzivirirwa kwenyika rine masimba zvikuru pamafambisirwo emari dzehurumende, uye bazi iri kuti riburitse mari iyi, rinofanirwawo kutanga rasumwa neGSA. Semutungamiri achangobva mukusarudzwa, VaBiden vanofanirwa kudoma vashandi muhurumende vanosvika zviuru zvina vanofanirwa kuongororwa kuti vanokodzera here kunge vachitungamira hurumende muzvinzvimbo zvakasiyana siyana. Pavanhu ava, vamwe chiuru nemazana maviri nemakumi mashanu vanofanirwa kutambirwa nedare reSenate kuti vanokodzera kuita mabasa avakadomerwa. Asi izvi zvinoda mari yakawanda, mahofisi, makombiyuta pamwe nezvimwe zvikwanisiro zvisati zvapihwa chikwata chaVaBiden. Pasi pemitemo yeAmerica, VaBiden vanogona kushandisa imwe yemari yavakapihwa sarudzo dzisati dzaitwa mukuumba hurumende yavo, asi mari iyi inonzi ishoma zvikuru pamari inosvika mamiriyoni gumi emadhora yavanofanirwa kupihwa mushure mekudomwa semutungamiri mutsva akasarudzwa. Chikwata che Electoral College chiri kusangana musi 14 Zvita kuti chitambire zviri pamutemo akakunda musarudzo iyi. Asi izvi zvinogona kunonotswa nenyaya dziri mumatare dzakaiswa naVa Trump vachipikisa kukundwa kwavo. Nyanzvi munyaya dzematongerwo enyika uye vari mudzidzisi pa University of Arizona, Professor Praise Zenenga, vanoti kunetsana kwakadai kwakaitikawo muna 2000, apo mumiriri we Democratic Party musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika, Va Al Gore, vakapikisa zvakabuda musarudzo yemu Florida, dare repamusoro soro rikazobuda nemutongo wekuti Va George W. Bush veRepublican Party, ndivo vakanga vakakunda musarudzo iyi.  GSA yakazopa chikwata chaVaBush svumbunuro musi waZvita 14, 2000. Kubva ipapo kusvika musarudzo dzakaitwa muna 2016 idzo dzakaona VaTrump vachikunda Amai Hilary Clinton, hapana kuzvuva makumbo kwakaitika mukutambidzwana kwemasimba. Pakakunda VaBarack Obama muna 2008, VaBush vakatevedza zviri pamutemo kugadzirira VaObama nekuvapa rutsigiro rwose rwunokodzera.  Izvi zvakaitikawo pakakunda VaTrump muna 2016 avo vakapihwa rutsigiro rwese naVaObama kuitira kuti vagadzirire hurumende yavo vasati vatoreswa mhiko. Professor Zenenga vanoti pasi rose rinenge rakatarisira zviri kubuda musarudzo dzemuAmerica, nokudaro nyika iyi inofanirwa kuratidza pasi rose kuti zvinhu zvayo zvakatsetseka. Professor Zenenge vanoti nguva yekuti VaBiden vaite basa ravo nemazvo nechikwata chavo che transition team iri kufamba sezvo paine zvinhu zvakawanda zvinoda kuitwa VaBiden vasati vatoreswa mhiko musi Ndira 20, 2021. Kunyange hazvo paine kunetsana uku, Professor Zenenga vanoti mitemo yemuAmerica iri pamusoro pemunhu wese, uye ndiyo ichashanda mukuona kuti kutambidzwana kwemasimba kwaitwa pasina kuzvuva makumbo. Nhengo dzeRepublic Party, kusanganisira VaBush, pamwe nenhengo dzebato reDemocratic Party, dziri kukurudzira hurumende yaVaTrump kuti iremekedze mitemo yenyika nekuona kuti chikwata chaVaBiden chatanga kuita basa racho nemazvo uye kuona kuti chine zvikwanisiro zvose zvinodiwa. No media source currently available
title: Kutambidzanwa kweMasimba Pakati paVaTrump naVaBiden Koita Zvipingaidzo

text: Mutauriri weMDC inotungamirwa naMuzvare Thokozani Khupe, Muzvare Linda Masarira, vanoti vanonzwa kurwadzikana zvikuru nemashoko eruvengo ari kuiswa pamadandemutande zvichitevera kupinda kwavakaita muchipatara vachirwara. Muzvare Masarira vanoti ichokwadi kuti vari kurwara kunyange havo vava kunzwa zvakanaka mushure mekuwana rubatsiro kuchipatara kwavanga vari. Asi Muzvare masarira vanoti mashoko ekuti vakabvisa pamuviri ndeemanyepo, uye ari kufambiswa nevanhu vanovenga. 'Ichokwadi kuti ndiri kurwara, uye chirwere changu chirwere chinobata vanhukadzi vakawanda, zvikuru vanenge vava nemakore makumi matatu nemashanu zvichikwira," vadaro Muzvare Masarira. Muzvare Masarira vanoti shuviro yavo ndeyekuti vanhu vemuZimbabwe vanzwisisane nekutsigirana zvikuru munguva dzehurwere. No media source currently available
title: Muzvare Masarira Vanoti Manyepo Kuti Vakabvisa Pamuviri

text: Sangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu, reHuman Rights Watch, (HRW), rinoti harisi kuzozorora kusvika murwiri wekodzero dzevanhu akapambwa akatsakatika, VaItai Dzamara, vawanikwa. VaDzamara vakapambwa masikati machena nevanhu vanofungidzirwa kuti vasori vehurumende makore mashanu apfuura apo vaigerwa musoro wavo mumusha Glen View, uye kusvika pari zvino, havasi kuzikanwa kwavari. Mukuru weHRW kuchamhembe kweAfrica, VaDewa Mavhinga, vaudza Studio7 kuti sangano ravo riri pakati pekuita tsvagiridzo yekuti ndezvipi zvingaitwa kuitira kuti kodzero dzevanhu dzisimudzirwe muZimbabwe. VaMavhinga vanoti sangano ravo richange richiita misangano yepamusoro nesangano reZimbabwe Human Rights Commission, makurukota ehurumende, kusanganisira gurukota rezvemitemo, VaZiyambi Ziyambi, vachitaura pamusoro pekutsakatika kwaVaDzamara. VaMavhinga vanotiwo vari kutarisira kusanganavo nemutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa. No media source currently available
title: Human Rights Watch Yoronga Kuita Hurukuro neHurumende Pamusoro paVaItai Dzamara

text: Mumiriri weBuhera South VaJoseph Chinotimba nemumiriri weMakonde mudare reparamende VaKindness Paradza vanoti Zimbabwe haina zvakanyanya zvaingawana kubva kusarudzo dzemutungamiri wenyika. VaChinotimba vanoti vachitarisa havo vari kukwikwidzana ava, Amai Hillary Clinton naVaDonald Trump, vanofunga kuti VaTrump vachakunda. Vanoti vanofarira VaTrump nekuti munhu anoziva zvemabhizimisi. No media source currently available Asi VaParadza vanoti makudo ndemamwe chete uye havana kana munhu wavari kutsigira musarudzo idzi. Nyika yeAmerica yakatemerwa Zimbabwe zvirango VaGeorge Bush vachitungamira muna 2003. No media source currently available VaObama vakaramba vachienderera mberi nezvirango izvi. Zimbabwe inoti zvirango izvi ndizvo zviri kukanganisa hupfumi hwenyika uye zvakatemerwa nyika nekuda kwekuti yakagovera ivhu kuvatema. Asi America inoti zvirango izvi zvakatemerwa Zimbabwe nenyaya yekutyora kodzero dzevanhu.
title: VaChinotimba Vanoti Vanotsigira VaTrump

text:
Vabereki vane vana muzvikoro zvakasiyana siyana kuMasvingo vari kuchema chema zvikuru nekukwidzwa kwakaitwa mari dzechikoro pakati pekotoro vachiti havakwanisi kubhadhara mari idzi. Zvikoro zvizhinji mudunhu reMasvingo zvakakwidza mari yechikoro pakati
pekotoro nezvikamu zana kubva muzana, kuitira kuti vabereki vapamhidzire mari idzi kunyange vakambokwidza pakavhurwa zvikoro mwedzi wapera. Vabereki vanoti havasi kufara nekuwedzerwa kwemari iyi apo vana vavo
vave kudzidza kaviri pasvondo, uye vamwe vasiri kunyatsodzidza
nenyaya yevadzidzisi vari kuramwa mabasa vachida kuwedzerwa mari. Mumwe mubereki wemumusha weRunyararo West, Amai Beatrice Hamadziripi, avo vane mwana pachikoro cheFrancis Aphiri Primary, chakakwidzawo mari kubva pazviuru zvitatu kusvika kuzviuru zvinomwe zvema RTGS, vanoti mari iyi yakawandisa uye havaikwanisi kuiwana.

Zvimwe zvikoro zvakawedzera mari zvinosanganisira zvine vana vanogara
pachikoro zvakaita seGokomere High, iyo yakawedzera mari nezviuru
gumi nezvishanu nemadhora makumi matanhatu nemashanu, 15 650 RTGS, apo vakange vabhadhara zviuru makumi mana nezvinomwe zvine madhora makumi mashanu nematanhanhatu, 47 560 RTGS pakavhurwa zvikoro mwedzi wadarika. Chikoro cheHellen Macgie, mudhorobha reMasvingo, chakawedzerawo mari yechikoro kusvika pazviuru zvinomwe zvamaRTGS kubva pazviuru zvina. Mumwe mugari wekuBikita, VaOscar Makova, vanoti zvikoro zviri
kuvakuvadza nekuti zvawedzera mari asi ivo mihoro yavo sevashandi
vehurumende isina kukwidzwa.

Mumwe mubereki, VaGarikai Madziva, vati pamusoro pekuti vana vanoenda mazuva mashoma kuchikoro, vadzidzisi vari kuramwa mabasa, nekudaro mari iyi iri kuwedzererwa zvisina maturo.

Vakuru vezvikoro varamba kutaura neStudio7 panyaya iyi vachiti
havabvumidzwi kutaura nevatori venhau nebazi rezvedzidzo munyika. Asi mutsamba yakanyorera vabereki nezuro, nemukuru wechikoro che
Hellen Macgie , Amai Stella Deve, vakati mari inotanga kubhadharwa
nhasi kunyange vasina kupa zvikonzero zvekukwidzwa kwemari. Gurukota rezvidzo yepasi , VaCain Mathema, varamba kutipa divi
rehurumende panhare vachiti tipedzerane nevakuru vezvikoro kunyange
hazvo Studio7 yavaudza kuti vakuru vezvikoro ava vari kuramba kutaura nevatori venhau. Asi mutauriri webazi rezvedzidzo, VaTaungana Ndoro, vati hurumende haina kupa zvikoro mvumo yekukwidza mari dzehikoro. Vatiwo zvikoro zvinofanirwa kugara pasi nevabereki powiriranwa mari dzinenge dzichida kukwidzwa. Zvimwe zvikoro zvakakwidza mari zvinosanganisira Shakashe Primary, Runyararo primary, Runyarararo Adventist pamwe neVurombo. No media source currently available
title: Zvikoro Zvizhinji Zvokwidza Mari kuMasvingo, Izvo Zvorwadza Vabereki

text:
Vanhu vakawanda muBritain nedzimwe nyika kusanganisira muZimbabwe vari kubatana kuchema Mambokadzi Elizabeth. Mambokadzi Elizabeth veChipiri vari kutarisira kuradzikwa kuWestminster Abbey London nemusi weMuvhuro, Gunyana 19. Nezuro mutumbi wavo watakurwa kubva kuBalmoral, Scotland kwavakafira nemusi weChina kuenda k Edinburgh rwendo rwemakiromita mazana maviri nemakumi masere kana kuti 280 kilometers. MuZimbabwe nezuro pakaitwa munamamato wekurangarira mambokadzi Elizabeth pakereke yeAnglican yeSt John The Baptist Cathedral vamwe vatendi vachirangarira kushanyira kwakaita mambokadzi kereke iyi. Queen Elizabeth vakapinda svondo pakereke iyi pamwe nemurume wayo mushakabvu Prince Phililip pavaive munyika mugore ra1991.

Amai Veronica Majoni vanove mutendi weAnglican ndemumwe wevanhu vakapinda chechi pakashanya Queen Elizabeth uye vakaudza Studio 7 kuti vanorangaraira chiitiko ichi nemufaro sezvo vakakwanisa kuve mumwe wevanhu vashoma-shoma vakakokwa musi uyu.

Mumwezve mutenderi Amai Isabel Mupita vakakwanisa kupindawo svondo pakashanya Queen Elizabeth vanoti vanoona izvi zvichipa kereke yeSt John The Bapstist chiremera chikuru.

Kunyange hazvo vakange vasipo pakashanya Queen Elizabeth, mumwewo mutenderi VaPatrick Matyatya vatiwo vanoona chiri chinhu chinoyemurika kuti mambokadzi vakashanyira chechi yeSt John The Baptist.

Vati zvisinei nenhoroondo yekupambwa kwaive kwakaita nyika yeZimbabwe nenyika yeBritain, Queen Elizabeth vanorangarirwa neruremekedzo.

Mufundisi wepachechi iyi Reverend Fritz Madida vanpti vakaona zvakakodzera kuti svondo yanezuro vaikumikidze mukurangarira Queen Elizabeth semucherechedzo wekukoshesa kushanya kwavakaita uye nekuti samambokadzi ndivo vaive mukuru wechechi yeAnglican.

Vatiwo macheya akagarwa naQueen Elizabeth namushakabvu Prince Philip ari kuchengetedzwa muchechi iyi semucherechedzo wekurangarira kushanya kwavo vakatiwo shuviro yavo ndeyekuti mwanakomana wavo King Charles III achafunga kushanyirawo chechi iyi sezvakaita mai vake.

Pane bhuku rekunyora mashoko enyaradzo kana kuti book of condolences muChirungu rakavhurwa muchechi iyi mushure mekushaya kwaQueen Elizabeth uye Reverend Madida vati vanotarisira kuti bhuku iri richaendeswa kumhuri yavo mumwedzi waGumiguru. Chechi yeSt John The Baptist yakavakwa mugore ra1910. Mutumbi waMambokadzi nezuro wakapfuura nemaguta anosanganisira Aberdeen, Dundee nePerth. Muguta reEdinburgh, Scotland vanhu nhasi vachaonekana nemutumbi uchange uri muPalace of Holyroodhouse usati waenda kuSt Giles Cathedral magwana.. Mangwana, mwanasikana mumwe chete waMambokkadzi, Princess Anne achaperekedza mutumbi kuimba yehushe yeBuckingham Palace kuLondon uye uchatakurwa nendege yemauto yeRoyal Air Force aircraft. Kunyangwe vamwe vatungamiri venyika dzemuAfrica kusanganisira mutungamiri wenyika Vaemmerson Mnangagwa vakatumira mashoko enyaradzo, vamwe akauta sevebato reEconomic Freedom Fighters kuSouth Africa vakatumira mashoko kuvatori venhau vachiti hapana chekuchema nekuti rufu urwu rwunovarangaririsa huipi hwehutongo hweBritain muAfrica pasi pamambokadzi apo vanhu vaibatwa senhapwa. No media source currently available
title: Kereke yemuBulawayo Yakaendwa naQueen Elizabeth muna 1991 Yovarangarira

text: Vagari vemuguta reGweru vave kukwanisa kubhadhara mitero yavo nezvimwe zvakasiyana siyana kukanzuru yavo vachishandisa dandemutande repanharembozha dzavo. Izvi zvinotevera kuparurwa nezuro kwakaitwa chirongwa che G-City mobile application muGweru nesangano reGweru Residents Forum rakabatana nekanzuru yeguta iri. Chirongwa ichi chakaparurwa padandemutande senzira yekuti vanhu vasaungana sezviri kukurudzirwa nehurumende. Vachitaura mushure mekuparurwa kwechirongwa ichi, mutauriri wekanzuru yeguta reGweru, Muzvare Vimbai Chingwaramusee, vakati kanzuru iri kufara zvikuru nedanho iri iro vakati richabatsira zvikuru. Mukuru mukuru weGweru Residents Forum, VaCharles Mazorodze, vakati sangano ravo rakaita hurongwa uhu mushure mekunge rave rimwe remasangano matatu munyika akasarudzwa neboka rehurumende yeGermany rinobatsira munyaya dzebudiriro pasi rose, reGIZ kuti abatsirwe, pachirongwa chekushandisa hunyanzvi hwezvekufambiswa kwemashoko mukuvandudza hupenyu hwevanhu. VaMazorodze vakati vakaona zvakakosha kuti pave nehurongwa hwakadai sezvo veruzhinji vave kushandisa madandemutande akaita seFacebook, WhatsApp nemamwe mukurarama kwavo zuva nezuva. Mumwe mugari, Muzvare Jennifer Chimange, vakati vanotambira chirongwa ichi sezvo vagari vachikwanisa kubhadhara mitero vasina kupedza nguva yakakosha vachimira mumitsetse, kana kukwira mabhazi kuenda kumahofisi ekanzuru. Meya weguta reGweru, VaJosiah Makombe, vakarumbidzawo chirongwa ichi vachiti chinoratidza kuti vagari vanogona kushanda zvakanaka pamwe nekanzuru mukuunza shanduko mumaguta nemumadhorobha. Sachigaro weWomen’s Coalition of Zimbabwe mudunhu reMidlands, Muzvare Locadia Mavhudzi, vakati G-City mobile application muenzaniso wakanaka wekushandiswa kwehunyanzvi hwezvekufambiswa kwemashoko mukuita kuti hupenyu hweveruzhinji hureruke. Asi Muzvare Mavhudzi, avo vanove mutori wenhau, vakati mutengo wekuti vanhu vaende paindaneti uchiri kudhurira veruzhinji munyika. Asi G-City Mobile application inogona kushanda kunyange munhu asiri paindaneti uye zvaanenge aishandisira zvinogona kuzokwidzwa pahwaro uhu kana munhu ave pane masaisai. No media source currently available
title: Kanzuru yeGweru Yotambira Mitero Inobhadharwa paDandemutande

text: Madzimai akawanda vari kuenda kuZambia kunoita basa rekurarama nekuita zvepabonde vachiti kuoma kwehupenyu munyika ndizvo zviri kuvatuma kuita zvepabonde vachibhadharisa. Madzimai aya vakawanda vavo vanobva kunzvimbo dzakaita seKariba, Karoi, Chinhoyi, Chegutu, Kadoma pamwe nemaguta makuru akaita seHarare. Vanoti kuita zvechipfambi kuZambia zviri kubhadhara sezvo vari kupihwa mari yekuAmerica. Vazhinji vemadzimai aya vanoti vanozonochinja mari iyi voisa kuma bond notes zvinozoita kuti ive inowanda zvichienzaniswa nekupihwa ma bond notes. Mumwe wemadzimai aya uyo anoti anoda kuzivikanwa saAmai Shupi vanobva kuKaroi vanoti zvinonzi muroyi royera kure kuti vepedyo vagokureverera nokudaro havadi kuzivikanwa zvavanoita munharaunda mavanogara. Amai Shupikai vanoti chimwe chikonzero ndechekuti zvechipfambi zvinosungisa asi kuZambia hazvisungise nemapurisa sezvo vanenge vaine dzimba dzavanenge vachishandisa. Chimwe chizvarwa chekuZambia, VaMaxwell Mwale, vanoti madzimai ekuZimbabwe vari kuita zvechipfambi vakawandisa zvakanyanya pamuganhu weZimbabwe neZambia. Asi VaMwale vanoti havasi kuwana mari yakawanda sezvavanotaura sezvo vari kuva bhadhara mari inoita madhora matatu kusvika pamadhora mashanu panguva pfupi yavanenge vachitandadzana. Asi mumwe mudzimai wekuDemocratic Republic of Congo anotyaira motokari dzinotakura zvinorema, Amai Elizabeth Lewis, vanoti kunyange madzimai ekuZimbabwe achiwanikwa kunyika yavo vachiita zvechipfambi vanoti hazvisi zvitsva sezvo madzimai edzimwe nyika achiwanikwa munyika dzisiri dzavo vachita basa rimwe chete rechipfambi. Muzvari Sally Kanyakanyaka avo vanorwira kodzero dzevanorarama nehurema vanoti zvinhu zvinofanirwa kushanduka munyika munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika kuti zvehupfumi zvigadzikane izvo zvinozoita kuti madzimai awane zvinovapa pundutso muhupenyu kuti vararamise mhuri dzavo. Muzvari Kanyakanyaka vanoti zvechipfambi zviri kuita madzimai aya zvinokonzera mamwe matambudziko akaita sekubata HIV zvinoisa hupenyu hwavo panjodzi. Madzimai anoita zvechipfambi aya vanonyanya kuda kunofara nanamutyairi vemotokari dzinotakura zvinorema vanenge vakamirira kufambiswa kwemapepa avo emotokari kuti vapinde kana kubuda munyika. Vanoti vanoshanda masikati pamwe nemanheru apo vanowana mari inodarika madhora makumi maviri pazuva. No media source currently available
title: Mamwe Madzimai Oenda kuZambia Kunotengesa Miviri Yavo

text: Vamwe vaimbove varwiri verusununguko vechidzimai vanoti zuva rerusununguko rinovarwadza kuti vari pemberere nekuti zvavakange vachifunga kuti vakarwira, havasati vazviwana. Vamwe vaimbove varwiri verusununguko vechidzimai vanoti zuva rerusununguko rinovarwadza kuti vari pemberere nekuti zvavakange vachifunga kuti vakarwira, havasati vazviwana. Mumwe wemadzimai aya, Amai Daphney Kanoti, vanoti madzimai mazhinji akarwa muhondo yerusununguko hapana zvavakawana uye vamwe vavo vari kunhonga svosve nemuromo zvichienzanisa nevanhurume vavaiva navo muhondo. Amai Kanoti vanoti zvinorwadza kuti vafunge zvavakasangana nazvo muhondo vozoona hupenyu hwavari kurarama pari zvino kunyange havo vakakwanisa kuenda kuzvikoro zvepamusoro. Amai Kanoti vanoti huwori nechizivano ndizvo zviri kuuraya nyika kunyanya kune avo vaive varwiri vehondo yerusununguko. "Zvinorwadza kuti kana pasina waunoziva mumahofisi epamusoro hapana zvinokufambira kunyanya uri mumhukadzi zvikuru isu takarwa hondo yerusununguko. Pari zvino vamwe vedu vari kunhonga svosve nemuromo sezvo zvinhu zvakawoma uye kune huwori hunorwadza," Amai Kanoti vaudza Studio7. No media source currently available
title: Madzimai Akarwira Rusununguko Vanoti Vari Kubatiswa Pasi

text: Kunyange hazvo matunhu akawanda emuAmerica akazivisa nezvematonho akasiyanasiyana aari kutora ekudzivirira kupararira kwehutachiwana hwe coronavirus, hapana dunhu rati rasvika pakurambidza zvachose kuti vagari varo vange vasingaende kumabasa. Dunhu reCalifornia ndiro dunhu pari zvino rine mutemo unorambidza vanhu kuwadzana kunze kwedzimba dzavo, kuchitiwo New York yakadzikawo mutemo wekuti vanhu vasashanyire misha inogara vakwegura. Mamwe matunhu, kusanganisira Maryland, Virginia neWashington D.C., akatovharisa nzvimbo dzekudyira, dzekutamura pamwe nekusimbisa miviri uyewo kwekuona mabhaisikopo. Gavhuna veMaryland, VaLarry Hogan neMuvhuro vadzika mutemo unomanikidza vemabhizimusi asina kukosha kuti vange vachivhara zvitoro zvavo nenguva dzeshanu manheru. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaDonald Trump neSvondo vakazivisa kuti vakabvumidza mauto eNational Guard kuti aende kunobatsira kudzivirira kupararira kwehutachiwana hwe coronavirus kumatunhu anoti New York, California and Washington. America ine vanhu vanodarika zviuru makumi matatu nezvishanu vabatwa nechirwere ichi, uye vanodarika mazana mana nemakumi manomwe vaurayiwa nacho. Kunyange hazvo vamwe vari kuti vari kuomeserwa nemitemo iri kudzikwa mumatunhu iyi, chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chiri muVirginia, Doctor Frenk Guni, avo vari mune zvehutano, vanoti vanoona matanho ari kutorwa nematunhu aya akakosha zvikuru mukuderedza kutapuriranwa nekuparadzirwa kwehutachiwana. No media source currently available
title: Matunhu eAmerica Odzika Mitemo Inodzvirira Kupararira kweCoronavirus

text: Vamwe vatungamiri venyika dzemuSADC kusanganisira mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vari kutarisirwa svondo rino kuti vaite musangano wechimbichimbi kana kuti "Extraordinary meeting of the Sadc Organ on Politics, Defence and Security Cooperation." Musangano uyu nde wekuzeya kuti vangatore danho ripi kuMozambique uko kune vapanduki vanotsigira chikwata chinopfurikidza mwero cheIslamic State vari kuponda vanhuwo zvavo kusanganisira vana vadiki. Vari kupinda mumusangano uyu vanosanganisirira mutungamiri weBotswana VaMokgweetsi Masisi uye mutungamiri weSouth African VaCyril Ramaphosa. Kunyangwe hazvo SADC iine chibvumirano kana kuti Mutual Defence Pact of 2002 chekuti imwe nyika ikarwiswa dzimwe dzinopindira, nyika dzekuchamhembe kweAfrica hadzisi kuratidza chido chekubatsira Mozambique. Vachitaura nevatori venhau muHarare mutauriri wemutungamiri wenyika VaGeorge Charamba vakati Zimbabwe haisi kuzoita zano ndega kupindira hondo yekuMozambique asi ichatora matano ose iri pasi peSADC. Mukuru wesangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu reZimbabwe Human Rights NGO Forum Doctor Musa Kika vatenderana nemashoko ekuti Zimbabwe haifanire kuita fungira mumoyo rwendo rwemba ichipindira muhondo yekuMozambique yega pasina SADC. Asi vakurudzira kuti nyika idzi dzipindire nekuti hondo iyi kamoto kambeveve kanogona kupisa matanda mberi nekukonzera hondo mudunhu rose. No media source currently available
title: VaMnangagwa, VaRamaphosa naVaMasisi Vozeya Nyaya yeHondo yekuMozambique

text: Sangano rrinomirira vamwe vashandi vehurumende, reApex Council, nemusi weChina rakashanduka kuve mubatanidzwa wemasangano anomirira vashandi vehurumende vose kusanganisira nevashandi vemakambani ari pasi pehurumende kana kuti parastarals, richishanda seZimbabwe Confederation of Public Sector Trade Unions (ZCPSTU). Sangano idzva iri richange richimbotungamirirwa nehutungamiri hwanga huri kuApex Council hwaAmai Cecilia Alexander nechikwata chavo, uye richasanganisa masangano ose anomirira vashandi vehurumende kuve pasi pegungano rimwe chete. Mutewedzeri wemunyori mukuru wesangano idzva iri, VaGibson Mushangu, avo vaive zvakare kuApex Council, vanoti hurongwa uhwu huchabatsira zvikuru kuti vashandi vehurumende vataure nezwi rimwe chete, vachiri muruzhinji mune simba. Asi mamwe masangano evashandi vehurumende anosanganisira revarairidzi reProgressive Teachers Union, PTUZ, akanga achinyunyuta kuti nguva yekuve muhofisi yechikwata chaMai Alexander yakapera musi wa 31 Kurume gore rino, achiti hachichisiri kushanda zviri pamutemo. Asi VaMushangu, avo vanobvuma kuti nguva yehutungamiri hwavo yakapera kushanda muna Kurume, vanoti nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19, hutungamiri hweApex Council hwakanga hwapiwa mimwe mwedzi mitatu yekuita basa kusvika pazoitwa musangano wekudoma humwe hutungamiri. Vanoti nekuda kwezvazoitika izvi zvekushanduka kuve rimwe sangano guru rinomirira vashandi, zvave kureva kuti hutungamiri hwavo huri pamutemo. VaMushangu vashora vari kupokana nehutungamiri hwavo vachhiti havatevere zviri kutora nzvimbo, vachiti zvakaziviswa kuvanhu vose kuti Apex Council yakanga ichiri kushanda zviri pamutemo. No media source currently available Mutungamiri wePTUZ, Doctor Takavafira Zhou, vanoti zvinokatyamadza kuti Apex Council ndiyo yave Zimbabwe Confederation of Public Sector Trade Unions ipo pasina masangano acho kana kuti ma federation akaita mubatanidzwa. Vanotiwo hutungamiri hwesangano idzva iri hapana akahusarudza nekudaro hwakazvigadza hwega, izvo zvavanoti zvinonyadzisa. Doctor Zhou vanoti vanofunga kuti hurongwa hwese uhwu hune makomborero ebazi rezvevashandi, nekuti dai hurumende isina chekuita muhuruongwa uhwu, sangano iri haraikwanisa kunyoreswa zviri pamutemo. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata gurukota rezvevashandi, VaPaul Mavima, kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi. No media source currently available
title: Apex Council Inoshanduka Kuve Mubatanidzwa weMasangano eVashandi veHurumende, weZimbabwe Confederation of Public Sector Trade Unions

text: MDC inotungamirirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai yanyorera tsamba mutauriri weparamende VaJacob Mudenda ichi gunun’una nemabatirwo ayinoti akaitwa nyaya yekutyisidzirwa nerufu kwakaitwa kunhengo dzayo pakuvhurwa kweparamende nemutngamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe neChipiri. Mutauriri weMDC T, VaObert Gutu vaudza vatori venhau kuti bato ravo harisi kufara nekutyisidzirwa nerufu kwakaitwa nhengo dzebato dzavo pakuvhurwa zviri pamutemo kwakaitwa chikamu chechitatu cheparamende yechisere kwakaitwa nemutungamiri wenyika VaMugabe. VaMugabe vakaverengawo mashoko asiri avaitarisirwa kuverenga, asi avakamboverenga masvondo matatu adarika pavaitaura nemamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika, kana kuti State of The Nation Address. Nhengo dzeMDC T nomwe dzinonzi dzakawana mashoko ekudzityisidzira nerufu kubva kunhamba isiri kuzivikanwa kuti ndeyani, uye mashoko aya aiti nhengo idzi dzaizopinda muna taisireva kana dai dzakasveveredza VaMugabe zvakare sezvadzakaita pakaitwa State of The Nation Address. VaGutu vati bato ravo ranyorera VaMudenda richi ratidza kusafara nemabatiro avakaita nyaya iyi pavakati nhengo dzeparamende dzeMDC T idzi dziende kunomhan’ara nyaya iyi kumapurisa. VaGutu vati nhengo dzeparamende dzakatambira mashoko ekutyisidzirwa aya dzavakugara dzichityira hupenyu hwadzo nokudaro vati VaMudenda vanofanira kutora matanho akasimba semutauriri weparamende. Zvichakadai, anotungamira chikwata chenhengo dzeMDC T dziri muparamende kana kuti chief whip, VaInnocent Gonese, vakumbira muparamende kuti pawumbwe komiti yeparamende inoferefeta nyaya iyi. Asi VaMudenda vati nyaya iyi izeyiwe nekomiti yeparamende yeStanding Orders and Rules Committee, nyangwe zvazvo neChipiri vakanga vati nhengo dzeparamende dzakatyisidzirwa dziende kunomhan’ara kumapurisa. Asi mutauriri wemapurisa Amai Charity Charamba vati semapurisa havasati vatambira nyaya iyi. Mumwe mugari wemuHarare, VaThomas Madhuku vati kugara muZimbabwe kwave kutyisa kana nhengo dzeparamende dzichityisidzirwa kudai. Zvichakadai, nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika uye vachishanda vakazvimirira, VaMalvern Mkudu, vati kutyisidzirwa kwakaitwa nhengo dzeparamende idzi kunoratidza kuti hurumende haisi kukoshesa zvido zveveruzhinji. Nhengo dzeMDC T dzakasveveredza VaMugabe masvondo matatu apfuura mushure mekunge VaMugabe vaudza paramende kuti hupfumi hwenyika huri kusimukira kunyanghwe hazvo vakawanda vachiti vari kunonga svosve nemuromo. No media source currently available
title: MDC T Inonyunyuta kuMutauriri weParamende neKutyisidzirwa kweNhengo Dzayo

text: Mubato reZanu-PF munonzi mapindwa naPongwe zvekare uye panonzi pave nekunetsana kunotyisa dzimwe nguva pachiita mhirizhonga pakati pevari kutsigira mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa nevamwe vari kunzi vari kutsigira chikwata chinonzi chiri kudivi remumwe mutevedzeri wavo VaConstantino Chiwenga. Asi mukuru mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko VaTafadzwa Mugwadi vaudza Studio 7 kuti VaMnangagwa naVaChiwenga vane hushamwaro hwakasimba uye nyaya yekunetsana iri kutaurwa iri kurukwa nevemapepanhau ana tinhai dzirwe. No media source currently available VaMugwadi vati havo vari kurwira zvigaro zvepasi nguva isati yakwana vachatorerwa matanho. Vamwe vakuru mubato iri vari kutiwo pane vamwe vakaita segurukota rezvematunhu VaJuly Moyo vari kunziwo vane chidokwa dokwa chekuda kutungamirawo uye vave kugadzira hwaro hwekuita izvi zvinonzi zvave kupa kuti bato rite zvinyekenyeke. KuMasvingo kusungwa kwasachigaro wedunhu iri VaEzra Chadzamira nenyaya yekupomerwa huori pakugovera minda yedzimwe kuChiredzi yave kuiswawo zvematongerwo enyika vamwe vachiti zviri kuitwa nechkwata chaVaChiwenga avo vakamboyambira VaChadzamira muna Kubvumbi kuti vasiyane nenyaya yekuita zvehuori pakugovera minda. VaChadzamira vari kunzi vari kudivi raVaMnangagwa. KuMashonaland West kune makwikwi akasimba pakati paAmai Mary Mliswa Chikoka naAmai Abia Mujere. Kudunhu reMidlands, nhengo dzebato iri dzaudza Studio 7 kuti pane kunetsana kunotyisa pakati pevari kutsigira sachigaro wedunhu iri VaDaniel Mckenzie Ncube nevari kutsigira vari kuda kutora chigaro ichi vari gurukota rezvevasori VaOwen Mudha Ncube avo vanonzi vari kudivi raVaMoyo. KuMashonaland Central kune kukandirana makobvu nematete pakati pevari kutsira vakafanobata chigaro chasachigaro vari gurukota rezvemukati menyika vaKazembe Kazembe naVaLazerus Dokora. KuMashonaland East kune kunetsanawo kwakasimba mubazi remadzimai reWomen’s League uye pachigaro chasachigaro pakati paVaKelvin Mutsvairo vari kutungamira vechidiki naVaMichael Madanha vakafanobata chigaro mushure mekushaya kwaVaJoel Biggie Matiza. KuManicaland kune kunetsanawo kwakasimba pakati pevanonzi vari kuda chigaro chasachigaro webato vanosanganisira vakabata chigaro ichi pari zvino VaMike Madiro, VaAlbert Nyakuedzwa, VaEnoch Porusingazi uye VaJenfan Muswere. Vakafanobata chigaro chemurongi wemabasa mubato iri vaPatrick Chinamasa vakatendawo kuti mudunhu iri mune makakatanwa anotyisa nenyaya dzezvigaro. Kunyangwe hazvo Studio 7 yataura nevakawanda vari kuda kukwikwidza vachitenda kuti vari kuda zvigaro, vaakawanda vatiwo havangabude pachena sezvo dare rePolitburo rakayambira kuti kutsvaga rutsigiro hakusati kwatanga nekudaro vari kuita izvi vacharangwa. Matunhu aita mhirizhonga nenyaya yesarudzo anosanganisira Mashonaland Central neMashonaland West. Vachipawo pfungwa dzavo, nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika VaFarai Maguwu vanotungamira sangano reCentre for natural Resource Governance, VaFarai Maguwu vati zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka mubato iri uye zvakatoenda kumazivandadzoka pakabviswa nechisimba vaive mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe. No media source currently available
title: Zanu-PF Yoramba Kuti VaMnangagwa naVaChiwenga Vave Makara Asionani

text: Bato rinopikisa reRenewal Democrats of Zimbabwe, RDZ, rinoti nhengo dzaro dziri kushungurudzwa nevatsigiri veZanu PF, mapurisa, mauto pamwe nemasadunhu, pamberi pesarudzo dze by-election dziri kutarisirwa kuitwa musi wa 26 mwedzi uno kuChimanimani West.
