Mutauriri weRDZ VaPishai Muchauraya vanoti nhengo dzavo dziri kushungurudzwa pamwe nekunyimwa chikafu, mapepa avo ekushambadza nhengo yavo ari kubvarurwa uye vari kurambidzwa kuita misangano nevatsigiri vavo. VaMuchauraya vanoti vakaedza kusvitsa zvinyunyuto zvavo izvi kuZimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, asi havatarisiri zvikuru zvingashanduka sarudzo dzisati dzaitwa. Izvi zvatsinhirwawo nesangano reZimbabwe Peace Project, iro raburitsawo gwaro rinotsanangura nezvemamiriro akaita zvinhu kuChimanimani West. Sangano iri rinoti riri kushushikana kutyisidzirwa kwevavhoti uye rusarura pakupiwa kwevanhu chikafu vachitariswa kuti vabuda mumba maani. ZPP inoti izvi zvinogona kutadzisa vagary kuvhota vakasununguka musi wesarudzo. Bato reRDZ riri kumirirwa naVaPeter Tumburai Gudyanga, kwotiwo reZanu PF richimirirwa naAmai Nokuthula Matsikenyere, NCA ichimirirwawo naVaPesanai Musakaruka. Pane imwe nhengo iri kukwikwidzawo yakazvimirira. Chimanimani West yakasara isina mumiriri zvichitevera kudzingwa mubato reZanu PF kwaVaMunacho Mutezo vachipomerwa mhosva yekudyidzana naAmai Joice Mujuru avo vave kutungamira bato rinopikisa reZimbabwe People First. No media source currently available
title: ZPP Inoshoropodza Mhirizhonga Iri Kuitika Pamberi peSarudzo dzeBy-Election kuChimanimani West

text: Maitiro emabhizinesi pamwe nemafambisirwo emari nenzira dzisina kujeka muZimbabwe ari kuvhiringa huhupfumi hwenyika iyi, sangano reSentry rinodaro. Sangano reSentry, iro rinoferefeta mafambisirwo ari kuitwa mari inowanikwa nenzira dzisina kunaka pamwe nekujeka, rinoti muzvinabhimisi, VaKudakwashe Tagwirei, vane mabhizimisi anopfuura makumi mana uye vane mari yavakaviga mumabhanga munyika dzinosanganisira Mauritius, Cayman Islands, South Africa nedzimwe. VaTagwirei, avo vanova chipangamazano uye vari hama yemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vanonzi vakaruka dandemutande remakambani muchivande senzira dzekufambisa mari yavo vachibatsirwa nemadzisahwira avo muSouth Africa, mamwe makambani kuMauritius neCayman Islands. Sentry inoti VaTagwirei, avo vari kubatanidzwa munyaya huru dzehuori muZimbabwe, vanowana rutsigiro rwehurumende rwekuita mabhizinesi avo asina kujeka kuruzhinji rweZimbabwe. Gwaro iri rinotiwo, muna 2019, VaTagwirei vakabhadhara mamiriyoni akawanda emadhora kune imwe kambani yemauto eZimbabwe kuitira kuti kambani yavo, yeLandela Mining Ventures, ikwanise kutenga zvikamu makumi mashanu kubva muzana zvekambani yeGreat Dyke Investiments, inochera platinum pamwe nekambani yekuRussia. Gwaro iri rinotivo, VaTagwirei ndivo mukuru wekambani ine zvikamu makumi matatu nezvishanu kubva muzana zvekambani yehurumende, yeKuvimba Mining House. Sentry inoti gurukota rezvemari, VaMthuli Ncube, vanoramba mashoko aya. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kubata VaNcube kanawo VaTagwireyi nkuti tinzwe divi ravo sezvo vaviri ava vanga vasingabatike panharembozha dzavo. Sentry inokurudzira nyika dzakapfuma kuti dzipindire mekumiswa kwemafambisirwo emari pasi rose nenzira dzisina kujeka. Nyanzvi munyaya dzemabhizimisi uye vari mudzidzisi mukuru paDeVry University, kuOhio, Muzvinafundo Elliot Masocha, vanoti Sentry yakaita zvakanaka nekuburisa chikiribidi chiri kuitwa munyaya dzehupfumi. Muzvinafundo Masocha vanoti kubudirira mune zvemabhizimisi hakuna kuipa kana kuchiitwa nenzira isingakanganisi hupfumi hwenyika sezviri kuitika muZimbabwe. Pataenda pamhepo, gurukota rezvekubudiswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, pamwe nemutauriri weZimbabwe Anti-Corruption Commission, VaJohn Makamure, vange vasati vapindura mibvunzo yatavatumira. Sentry inoti hurumende yeZimbabwe yakapa kambani yaVaTagwirei yeSakunda Holdings mari inodarika bhiriyoni rimwe nemazana matanhatu emamiroyoni emadhora – one point six billion U S dollars, uye izvi zvinofanirwa kuferefetwa. Muzvinafundo Masocha vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kupa vana muzvinabhizimisi vemuZimbabwe mikana yakaenzana, vachiti zviri kuitika pamakambani aVaTagwirei, zvnhu zvinosvibisa chimiro chehurumende. No media source currently available
title: Sentry Yoburitsa Chivande Chiri Kuitwa naVaKudakwashe Tagwirei

text: Bato rinopikisa reZimbabwe African People’s Union, ZAPU, nemusi weMuvhuro rakapemberera kusvitsa makore makumi mashanu nemanomwe kubva zvaraumbwa musi wa17 Zvita 1961. Vanoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko mubato iri, VaEphithule Thembani Maphosa, vaudza Studio 7 kuti ZAPU yakaitira nyika zvinhu zvakawanda, kusanganisa kurwira rusununguko, kunyorerana chibvumirano chekubatana neZanu-PF kumisa hondo yeGukurahundi nezvimwe. VaMaphosa vati nyika inofanirwa kusvinura ione kuti hapana kugadzikana kunogona kuitika munyika pasina ZAPU, iyo yavanoti ndiyo bato guru pamakore pamapato ese munyika. No media source currently available
title: ZAPU Yopemberera Kusvitsa Kwayo Makore Makumi Mashanu Nemanomwe

text: Mubatanidzwa wemasangano emadzimai munyika, weWomen's Coalition of Zimbabwe, unoti uri kufara nekugadzwa kwaitwa Amai Samia Suluhu Hassan, semutungamiri weTanzania zvichitevera kushaya kwaVaJohn Magufuli nemusi weChitatu. Amai Hassan vachange vari kutungamira Tanzania kudzamara sarudzo dzaitwa muna 2025 sezvinodiwa nebumbiro remitemo yenyika iyi. Sachigaro veWomen’s Coalition In Zimbabwe, Amai Evernice Munando, vanoti kugadzwa kwaAmai Hassan semutungamiri weTanzania kuchabatsira zvikuru mukusimudzira mabatirwo anoitwa madzimai munyika iyi nekunze. Amai Munando vanoti Zimbabwe inofanirwa kudzidza kubva kuTanzania makoshero akaita kugadza madzimai pazvinzvimbo zvepamusoro. Vanoti vane shuwiro yekuti mutevedzeri wemutungamiri weZimbabwe achagadzwa mushure mekusiya basa kwakaitwa nava kembo mohadi, achange ari mudzimai. Vanoti sangano ravo rakatonyorera mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vachivakurudzira kudoma munhukadzi pachigaro chisina munhu muhurumende ichi. Asi bumbiro remitemo yeZimbabwe harina zvakajeka zvarinotaura panyaya yevatevedzeri vemutungamiri wenyika, kunze kwekukurudzira kuti pave nekuenzaniswa kwevanhurume nevanhukadzi muzvigaro. No media source currently available
title: Kugadzwa kwaAmai Samia Suluhu Hassan seMutungamiri weTanzania Kwofadza Madzimai

text: Nekuona kubudirira kwarinoti kwakaita zvirongwa zvaro zvekutanga zvekudzikamisa hupfumi hwenyika pamwe nekusunga inflation, zvinosanganisira chekutengeswa kwemapeni egoridge, bepanhau reSunday Mail rinoti bhanga guru renyika reReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, svondo rinouya riri kuwedzera zvakare pamusika mamwe mapeni . Mapeni egoridhe aya, ayo anonzi anenge ane huremu hwegoridhe hwepasipasi, anonzi anenge ari zviuru zvina nemazana mashanu, kana kuti 4 500 . Asi hurongwa uhwu hwagara huchisimudza maonero akasiyanasiyana kunyanzvi mune zvehupfumi, dzimwe dzichihupembedza asi dzimwe dzichihushora. Mumwe wevari kupembedza danho rekutengeswa kwemapeni egoridhe iri ndi Doctor Prosper Chitambara, avo vanoshanda nesangano re Labour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe. Doctor Chitambara, vanoti kuparurwa kwemapeni madikidiki aya kuchapawo mukana kune veruzhinji wekuti vange vachikwanisawo kuchengetedza mari dzavo kuburikidza nekutenga mapeni aya. Imwe nyanzi mune zvehupfumi, Doctor Charles Mutasa, vanotiwo kuuya kwemapeni egoridhe kwave kuoneka kubatsira kwawo sezviri kuonekwa pakuderera kwe inflation kwakatika mwedzi wapera. Asi Doctor Mutasa vanoti pachine zvakawanda zvinofanirwa kuitwa kuitira kuti kudzikamiswa kwehupfumi hwenyika kubudirire. Asi imwe nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi, Muzvare Chenai Mutambasere, vanoti hapana zvikuru zvati zvaonekwa zvati zvaburitswa nekuuya kwemapeni aya. Muzvare Mutambasere vanoti vanhu vanongonzwa kuti kwatengeswa mapeni akawanda zvakati, asi hapana humbowo kunoiswa pajekerere. Dzimwe nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi dzinoti kunyange hazvo hurumende neReserve Bank of Zimbabwe vose vari kuti mapeni egoridhe aya pamwe nemamwe matanho avari kutora akwanisa kudzikamisa hupfumi hwenyika nekusunga inflation, zvirongwa zvehurumende zvinoda mari, zvinosanganisira mabhonasi evashandi vayo, zvekurima zvePfumvudza nePresidential Input Scheme, uye sarudzo dzegore rinouya, zvinogona kuisa mudondo hurongwa hwese uhwu. Mapeni ari kutarisirwa kuparurwa svondo rinouya aya anonzi achange achitengeswa nemutengo wemadhora ekuAmerica pamwe nemadhora emunyika zvichienderana nemutengo wegoridhe pamisika yekunze yezuvaro, sezviri kungoitwa pane akaburitswa kare. Gavhuna veRBZ, Doctor John Mangudya, vakaudza bepanhau reSunday Mail kuti kubva muna Chikunguru wegore rino mapeni anodarika zviuru gumi nechimwe, kana kuti 11 000 atengeswa munyika. Zvasarira kuona kuana kuiswa kwemapeni madikidiki aya pamusika kuchaitawo kuti veruzhinji vakwanise kuatenga sezvo agara achitengeswa anga achinzi mitengo yawo iri pamusoro zvekuti vakawanda vepasi havakwanise kuwana mari yekutenga. No media source currently available
title: RBZ Yotarisirwa Kuparura Svondo Rinouya Mamwe Mapeni Ane Huremu hweGoridhe huDikidiki Zvinonzi Nevamwe Zvichabatsira Vane Mari Shoma

text: Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika VaConstantino Chiwenga nhasi vatambira nhomba yeCovid-19 panhandere yendege yeRobert Gabriel Mugabe International Airport. Nhomba iyi inosvika zviuru mazana maviri uye yakapihwa Zimbabwe neChina. Yauya yakatakurwa nendege yeAir Zimbabwe. Vana mazvikokota munyaya dzezvemishonga kusanganisira veMedicines Control Authority of Zimbabwe vari kutarisirwa kuongorora nhomba iyi kuti ndeyechokwadi here kwemazuva maviri isati yatanga kubayiwa vanhu. Vari kutanga kubayiwa vanosanganisira vanachiremba, vakoti nevamwe vanoshanda muzvipatara, vanoshanda pamiganhu nenhandare dzendege uye vane zvirwere zvinovaisa panjodzi yakakura yekufa nechirwere ichi. Nhomba iyi yakagadzirwa nekambani inonzi Sinopharm inova yehurumende yekuChina. China yakapa mvumo kuti nhomba iyi itange kubayiwa vanhu mukupera kwaZvita gore rapera. Kunze kweChina, nyika dzakatanga kushandisa nhomba iyi iUnited Arab Emirates ichiteverwa neBahrain. Dzimwe nyika dziri kutenga mushonga uyu dzinosanganisira Singapore, Turkey, Brazil ne Chile. Mukuru wesangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu munyaya dzezvehutano reCommunity Working Group on Health VaItai Rusike vanoti zvakanaka kuti vanhu vabayiwe nhomba asi vanofanira kuramba vachizvichengetedza. Zvichakadaro, mukuru mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko VaNick Mangwana vati mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vari kutarisirwa kuzivisa nyika kuti vanhu vacharamba vachinzi vagare mudzimba here kana kuti kwete senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid- Huwandu hwevanhu vari kufa nekubatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 huri kuramba huchiderera uye bazi rezvehutano rinoti nemusi weSvondo kwakafa vanhu vaviri nechirwere ichi. Izvi zvinorevea kuti vanhu vafa kubva chirwere ichi zvachakatanga kupararira vave chiuru chimwe chete nemazana mamana kana kuti 1, 400. NeSvondo vanhu makumi matanhatu nevasere kana kuti 68 vakabatwa nechirwere ichi zvasiya vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kupararira vave zviuru makumi matatu nemashanu anezana nemakumi manomwe nevaviri kana kuti 35, 172. Vanhu mazana mashanu negumi nevaviri kana kuti 512 vakapora kubva kuchirwere ichi nezuro zvasiya vanhu vapora vave zviuru makumi matatu nemazana matanhatu nemumwe kana kuti 30, 601. Vanhu vachiri kurwara zviuru zvitatu nezana nemakumi manomwe nemumwe kana kuti 3, 171.
title: Nhomba yeCovid-19 Yosvika muNyika Kubva kuChina

text: Bato riri kutonga reZanu PF rinoti riri kutsvaira nzvimbo dzose dzeparamende dziri kukwikwidzwa mudunhu reMasvingo, uye richakunda zvine mutsindo musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika. Vachitaura neStudio7 mutauriri we Zanu PF muMasvingo, VaRonald Ndava, vanoti bato ravo rakatopedza kutsvaga rutsigiro uye rinotarisira kutora matunhu ose makumi maviri nematanhatu achakwikwidzwa sezvavakaita muna 2013. VaNdava vanoti MDC-Alliance pamwe nemawe mapato anopikisa ari kuchema nhando achipomera bato ravo mhosva yemhirizhonga nekuti vari kutya kudyiwa musarudzo. Mugore ra 2008 MDC-T yakakunda Zanu PF pazvigaro zvemuparamende ikatora zvigaro gumi nezvina, kubva pazvigaro makumi maviri nezvitanhatu. Asi MDC Alliance inoti rwendo rwuno iri kutora zvigaro zvose. Sachigaro we Zanu PF, uye vari kumirira bato ravo kuMasvingo West, VaEzra Chadzamira, vanoti vatomirira kupemberera chigaro chavo nekuti basa vakatopedza kare. Asi Sachigaro we MDC inotungamirirwa neVaNelson Chamisa, VaJames Gumbi, vanoti gore rino mutambo wakasiyana uye vanovimba kuti vanokunda Zanu PF zvine mutsindo vachiti gore rino vakangwarira kuti vasabirwe. VaGumbi vanoti nyaya yainetsa kubato ravo yekuva nenhengo mbiri –mbiri munzvimbo imwe yakagadziriswa nekudaro vave mubishi rekutsvaga rutsigiro kuti vatsvaire Zanu PF nemamwe mapato ari kukwkiwdza. Asi vamwe vevakaisa mapepa avo vari vaviri ku Gutu Central, VaCripser Musoni, vaikakavadzana naVa Enerst Mandingo vanzi ndovabvumirwa neMDC Alliance, varamba mashoko abudiswa naVaGumbi vachiti havawirirani nazvo. Mutungamiri weTransform Zimbabwe, uye vari nhengo yeMDC Alliance, vanotiwo zvabudiswa na VaGumbi manyepo. VaNgarivhume vati vari kuenderera mberi nekutsvga rutsigiro muvanhu izvi zvichaita kuti nyaya iyi irambe iri manyama amire nerongo uye ichigona kukanganisa MDC-Alliance musarudzo. Studio7 yakundikana kubata mutauriri we MDC Alliance, VaWelshman Ncube, kuti tinzwe zvizere zviri kuitika sezvo mashoko ari kubuda kuMasvingo ari kupesana. Vanoongorora zvematongerwe enyika vakazvimiririra, VaMasimba Gonese, vanoti gore rino zvinhu zvinogona kushatira Zanu PF. VaGonese vanoti Zanu PF yaita zinyekenyeke gore rino nekuti yakapatsanuka kaviri sarudzo dzegore rino dzisati dzasvika izvo zvichaita kuti vatsigiri vayo vaende kwakasiyana-siyana. No media source currently available
title: Zanu-PF Inoti Ichatora Nzvimbo Dzose dzeParamende kuMasvingo

text: Sachigaro vekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvevadiki, kana kuti Parliamentary Portfolio Committee on Youth Affairs, VaOmega Sibanda vakaudza Studio 7 kuti vari kunyora gwaro richaendeswa kuparamende rinotaura pamusoro pemhirizhonga dzakaitika pamisangano yaikurukurwa nezvekudzorwa kwechirongwa che National Youth Service . Misangano iyi yakavhiringwa muBulawayo neku Watsomba, ku Manicaland, nevanofungidzirwa kuti vadiki vebato reZanu-PF. Vamwe vakapinda mumisangano iyi vanoti vakarohwa pamisangano iyi nekuti vakanga vachiramba kuti National Youth Service idzoswe. Hurumende inoti iri kuronga kuti chirongwa cheNational Youth Service chidzoswe gore rinouya asi veruzhinji, pamwe nevemapato anopikisa, vanotya kuti vadzidzi vanobva kuchikoro ichi vanokonzera mhirizhonga nekurova vanhu vasingatsigiri bato reZanu-PF, zvikuru sei panguva yesarudzo yatarisana nenyika. Nyanzvi munyaya dzebudiriro dzematunhu, VaJoy Mabenge, vanoti National Youth Service haina chainopa vechidiki ava, vachiti chinodiwa ikozvino mikana yemabasa. VaMabenge vanoti pane zvikoro zvizhinji munyika zviri kudzidzsa vanhu mabasa asi mabasa acho asipo munyika, vachiti Zimbabwe inodzidzisa varairidzi asi yovaendesa kunoshanda kune dzimwe nyika nekuti haina mabasa kana mari yekupinza vanhu ava mabasa munyika mayo. No media source currently available Mutauriri webato re Zanu-PF, VaTafadzwa Mugwadi, vanoramba mashoko ekuti vatsigiri vebato ravo ndivo vari kukonzera mhirizhonga pamisangano iyi.
title: Paramende Yotarisirwa Kuzeya Kuvhiringidzwa kweZvirongwa Zvayo neVanofungidzirwa Kuti Vatsigiri veZanu-PF

text: Mutungamiri weBotswana, VaSeretse Khama Ian Khama, neMuvhuro vakatora chigaro chasachigaro weSADC kubva kumutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe. Izvi zvaitwa pakuvhurwa kwemusangano weSADC uri kuitirwa muGaborone. Vatungamiri veSADC vanotora majana ekutungamira SADC kwegore rimwe chete. Musangano weSADC uyu uchapera neChipiri uye dingindira rawo rakanangana nekukurudzira budiriro munyaya dzezvehupfumi mudunhu kuburikidza nemaindisitiri. VaKhama vari kuenda panyanga apo SADC yakatarisana nekusagadzikana munyika dzakaita seMadagascar, Lesotho neSwaziland. Zvinhu hazvinawo kumira zvakanaka muzimbabwe. Bato guru rinopikisa reMDC ratumirawo nhumwa kuna VaKhama richivakumbira kuti vaonewo kuti SADC yazeya nyaya yeZimbabwe vachiti zvinhu munyika hazvina kumira zvakanaka munyaya dzezvehupfumi nezvematongerwo enyika. Vachitaura pakuparurwa kwemusangano wevatungamiri uyu, VaKhama vati chishuwo chavo ndechekuda kuona kuti SADC yabudirira munyaya dzezvehupfumi uye yagadzikana munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika nekuwana rukudzo kubva kunyika dzepasi rino. VaMugabe vakataurawo pamusangano uyu vachiti zvinhu zviri kufamba zvakanaka muSADC vachiti dunhu iri ndiro rakagadzikana kudarika mamwe matunhu ose emuAfrica. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, sangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu reHuman Rights Watch rakurudzira SADC kuti ikoshese nyaya dzekuchengetedzwa kwekodzero dzevanhu richiti nyika dzemuSADC dziri kutyora kodzero dzevanhu zvakanyanya. Chipangamazano musangano reHuman Rights Watch, VaDewa Mavhinga, vanoti vatungamiri veSADC vakawanda vari kutyora kodzero dzevanhu. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, mutungamiri wesangano revemabhizimisi reAssociation of SADC Chamber of Commerce and Industry, VaOswell Binha, vanoti vemabhizimisi havasi kufara nenyaya yekuti vatungamiri venyika dzemuSADC havasi kuda kutambirawo pfungwa dzavo kuti paite mubatirapamwe chuma chemuzukuru mukugadzirisa nyaya dzezvehupfumi. No media source currently available
title: VaKhama Votora Chigaro chaSachigaro weSADC

text: Zvinhu zvichiri zvakaita manyama amire nerongo muSouth Africa muguta guru renyika iyi repretoria zvichitevera kuratidzira kunotyisa kwange kuchiitwa nevatsigiri vebato reanc kwasiya vanhu vaviri vashaya vamwe vanodarika makumi mana vasungwa. Sangano reZimbabwe Exiles Forum rinomirira zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe munyika iyi rinoti zvitoro zvezvizvarwa zvezimbabwe zvakaputswa nezuro manheru zvikabiwawo zvinhu. Asi nemusi weChitatu zvinhu zvinonzi zvange zviri nani sezvo mapurisa aenda kunzvimbo dzangedziine mhirizhonga. Vatsigiri veANC vange vachiratidzira vachiti havasi kufara nekusarudzwa kwakaitwa meya wepretoria amai thoko didiza vanove muzulu munzvimbo inonzi ine verudzi rwechipedi nevechisotho vakawanda. Sarudzo idzi dziri kuitwa musi wa 3 Nyamavhuvhu. Nzvimbo dzine mhirizhonga dzinosanganisa Mamelodi, Attridgeville ne Hamanskraal. Vanoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko muZimbabwe Eexiles Forum Amai Diana Zimbudzana vanoti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvavafonera zvichiti zvaputsirwa dzimba. No media source currently available
title: Zvitoro zveVana veZimbabwe Zvopazwa neKubiwa muPretoria

text: Imwe yendege mbiri dzerudzi rweBoeng 777-200 dzakatengwa nehurumende kubva kuMalaysia muna 2016 yasvika munyika apo yamhara panhandare yendege yeRobert Gabriel Mugabe International masikati. Ndege iyi inonzi yatambirwa nevakafanobata chigaro chemutungamiri wenyika, VaConstantino Chiwenga, avo vanove zvakare mumwe wevatewedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, avo vanonzi vabva vangoisvitsa kukambani yendege yeAir Zimbabwe. Vamwe vakuru muhurumende vatambira ndege iyi vanosanganisira gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, pamwe negurukota rezvekutakurwa kwezvinhu, VaJoel Biggie Matiza, avo vanonzi vaperekedza ndege iyi kubva kuMalaysia. Amai Mutsvangwa vanoti kutengwa kwendege iyi chinhu chikuru kwazvo chaitwa nehurumende sezvo zvichibatsira nyika zvikuru mukupinda kwevashanyi vanobva kunze vachiuya kuzoona nzvimbo dzekushanyirwa dzakasiyanasiyana. Ndege idzi dzinonzi dzakatengwa nehurumende dzakatombopinda munyika muna 2018, asi dzinonzi hadzina kuzogara sezvo pakaita kusawirirana panyaya yekubhadharana, izvo zvinonzi zvakaita kuti dzidzoserwe kuMalaysia. Gore rapera hurumende inonzi yakatengawo zvakare imwe ndege yerudzi rweEMBRAER ERJ-145, asi hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kuti ndege iyi iri kufamba here pari zvino. Air Zimbabwe inonzi ine ndege nhanhatu asi imwe chete ndiyo inonzi yanga ichiri kufamba. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata gurukota rezvekutakurwa kwezvinhu VaMatiza kuti tinzwe kuti nyika yave nendege ngani uye dzichiri kushanda ingani. No media source currently available
title: Ndege Yakatengwa neHurumende kuMalaysia Inosvika Munyika

text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vanoti nhasi izuva rekutenda Mwari. Vachizivisa nezvezuva iri nezuro, VaMnangagwa vakati vakakoka vanhu vemuZimbabwe gore rapera kuti vabatane navo nevakuru vemakereke vachiita minamato nekutsanyira nyika. VaMnangagwa vakati senzira yekutenda zvakaitirwa nyika naMwari, vari kukoka rwendo rwuno vana vese veZimbabwe kuti vapinde mumusangano wekutenda Mwari uchaitirwa kuState House nenguva dza 10 mangwanani anhasi kusvika nguva ya 1 masikati. VaMnangagwa vakati veruzhinji vanokwanisa kushandisa madandemutande eFacebook, Twitter, terevhizheni pamwe nemarhedhiyo kuti vanzwe zvinenge zvichiitika. Mukuru anoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko muZanu PF, VaTafadzwa Mugwadi, vanoti zviri kuitika izvi zvinoratidza kuti VaMnangagwa munhu anoremekedza Mwari uye anoshanda nevezvitendero zvakasiyana siyana. No media source currently available Asi sachigaro veMDC Alliance mudunhu reNorth America, VaTawanda Dzvokora, vanoti kunyange hazvo kunamata kusina kuipa, marongerwo azvaita anoratidza kuti Zanu PF yapererwa nemazano. No media source currently available
title: Zimbabwe Yoita Munamato Ichitenda Mwari

text: Mutungamiriri wenyika, Va Emmerson Mnangagwa, vari kuenda Botswana uko vakakokwa nemutungamiri wenyika iyi, Va Ian Khama, kumisangano ichapindwa nenyika mbiri idzi. Botswana inoti yakoka VaMnangagwa nevamwe vavo muhurumende kumisangano ichaitirwa muGaborone kwemazuva maviri. Misangano ichapindwa naVaMnangagwa ichatanga neMuvhuro uye iine chinangwa chekutsvaga nzira dzekusimbaradza hukama hweBotswana neZimbabwe munyaya dzehupfumi pamwe nezvematongerwo enyika. Mutauriri waVaKhama, VaJeff Ramsey, vanoti ichokwadi kuti Botswana yakakoka Zimbabwe kumisangano iyi. Vatiwo mamwe makurukota emuZimbabwe atove muBotswana izvo. VaRamsey vatiwo pane nyanzvi munyaya dzakasiyana siyana dzatovewo muBotswana, idzo dziri kupinda misangano iri kuitwa pamberi pemisangano mikuru ichaitwa neMuvhuro neChipiri. VaRamsey vati Zimbabwe neBotswana dzange dziine hukama husina kunyatsoti tsvikiti sezvo dzimwe nguva nyika mbiri idzi dzaipokana zviri pachena. Botswana inoti yaona zvakakosha kuti iumbe hukama hwayo neZimbabwe sezvo munyika iyi mava nemutungamiri mutsva, kunyange hazvo bato riri kutonga richiri rimwe chete raitonga pasi paVaRobert Mugabe. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi, uye vari mukuru weLabor and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, VaGodfrey Kanyenze, vanoti misangano iri kuitwa pakati peZimbabwe neBotswana yakanaka chose sezvo panga pasina hukama hwakanaka pakati paVaMugabe naVaKhama. "Rwendo uru rwakanaka zvikuru tichitarisa kuti Botswana ne Zimbabwe dzine hukama hunobva kare asi hangwe hwave kuda kugadziriswa kubva mutungamiri weBotswana VaKhama zvavakanga vasingawiriarane nemutungamiri weZimbabwe akasiya basa, Va Robert Mugabe," vadaro VaKanyenze. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi dzinoti dziri kutarisira zvichabuda kumisangano iyi sezvo Zimbabwe iri mubishi rekuedza kusimudzira hupfumi hwayo kuitira kuti ikwanise kubhadhara zvikwereti zvainazvo kumasangano anokweretesa mari akaita seWorld Bank, International Monetary Fund, African Development Bank, nemamwe. No media source currently available
title: Zimbabwe neBotswana Dzoita Misangano muGaborone

text: Vaimbova mutungamiriri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vashaya. Vange vave nemakore makumi mapfumbamwe nemashanu. Mashoko ekushaya kwaVaMugabe ari kubudiswa nenhepfenyuro dzakasiyana siyana dzinosanganisira CNN, BBC nedzimwe. Izvi zwatsihirwa nemashoko abudiswa nemutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, avanyora paTwitter pavo. VaMugabe vashaikira kuSingapore uko kwavaigara vachienda kunorapwa.
title: VaRobert Mugabe Vanoshaya kuSingapore

text: Bato idzva rezvematongerwo enyika, rePatriotic Zimbabwe, rinoti mashoko akataurwa negurukota idzva rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaFrederick Shava, ekuti bazi ravo richashanda pamwe chete nezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika mukusimudzira hupfumi nemagariro, akanaka chose asi harioni paine chinobuda. VaShava vakataura mashoko aya neChipiri vachitanga basa, vachiti vana veZimbabwe vari kunze kwenyika vari kumirira nyika munyika dzavari, nekudaro hurumende inofanirwa kuwedzera kudyidzana nekushanda pamwe nevanhu ava kuitira kuti nyika ibatsirike. Vakatiwo bazi ravo richashanda zvakasimba mukudyidzana navo kuitira kuti nyika ibatsirike kubva kuvamiriri venyika ava. Asi munyori anoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika mubato rePatriotic Zimbabwe, VaPishai Muchauraya, vanoti havaoni paine chinoshanduka sezvo mashoko akataurwa naVaShava aya agara achingotaurwa naani nani zvake anenge atora chigaro chegurukota mubazi iri asi pasina chinozoshanduka. Vana veZimbabwe vari kunze vanonzi vari kubatsira zvakanyanya mune zvehupfumi hwenyika kuburikidza nemari dzavanotumira kumusha. Asi vanonyunyuta kuti hurumende iri kuvabata nekunze kweruoko kana yave nguva yekuvhhota, sezvo vasiri kubvumidzwa kuvhota vari munyika dzavagere. No media source currently available
title: Bato Idzva rePatriotic Zimbabwe Roshaya Chivimbo neMashoko aVaShava

text: Vanga vari mukuru wevatongi vematare edzimhosva muZimbabwe, VaLuke Malaba, havasisiri mutongi wematare edzimhosva sezvo vakaenda pamudyandigere pakati pehusiku hwapfuura sezvinodiwa nebumbiro remitemo yenyika ratambirwa nevana veZimbabwe muna 2013, dare repamusoro ratonga richidaro nhasi. Vatongi vatatu vedzimhosva mudare repamusoro vanoti; Justice Happias Zhou, Justice Edith Mushore naJustice Jesta Charehwa, vati kuwedzerwa kwakaitwa makore ekuti VaMalaba varambe vari pabasa kunotyora bumbiro remitemo yenyika. Mutongo uyu unoreva kuti zvakaitwa nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, zvekuwedzera nguva yaVaMalaba ivo vasvika panguva yekuti vaende pamudyandigere, zvinotyora bumbiro remitemo yenyika. VaMnangagwa vakazivisa nemusi wehipiri kuti vakanga vawedzera nemakore mashanu nguva yaVaMalaba yekuti varambe vari pabasa. Pasi pemitemo yenyika, VaMalaba, avo vakasvitsa makore makumi manomwe pakati pehusiku hwapfuura, havaifanirwa kuramba vari pabasa, zvinova zvatongwa nhasi. Asi mutemo uyu wakavandudzwa zvechimbi chimbi mudare reSenate svondo rapera nebato reZanu PF richitsigirwa nedzimwe nhengo dzeMDC T inotungamirwa naVaDouglas Mwonzora izvo zvakaita kuti VaMnangagwa, vasaine bhiri iri kuva mutemo. Mushure mekusaina Constitutional Amendment Bill Number 2 rakonzera muchokoto iri kuti rive mutemo, VaMnangagwa vakabva vawedzera nguva yaVaMalaba kuti varambe vachishanda kunyange hazvo vanga vachifanirwa kuenda pamudyandigere kutanga nhasi Chivabvu 15, 2021. Hurumende, kuburikidza negurukota rezvemitemo, VaZiyambi Ziyambi, yakamboedza kuda kumisa kutongwa kwenyaya iyi nezuro ichiti vatongi vatatu ava vane kwavakarerekera panyaya yaVaMalaba, nokudaro, havafanirwe kutonga nyaya iyi. Ukuwo Judicial Services Commission, JSC, yakapikisawo ichiti VaZhou havafanirwe kunge vari pabhenji panotongwa nyaya yaVaMalaba sezvo vaine zvido munyaya iyi. Asi vatongi vatatu ava, VaZhou, Amai Mushore naJustice Charehwa, vakatsika vose madziro vachizviti vatongi vakakwana vasina divi ravakarerekera vakati nyaya iyi ngaienderere mberi ichitongwa vachibva varasa zvikumbiro zvaVaZiyambi neJSC. Aka ndekekutanga nyaya yakadai ichipinda mudare kubva Zimbabwe yawana kuzvitonga muna 1980. Vanga vachipikisa zvakaitwa naVaMnangagwa, vanova sangano reYoung Lawyers Association of Zimbabwe pamwe neZimbabwe Human Rights NGO Forum, vaiti VaMalaba havafanirwe kuwana cheuviri pakuvandudzwa kwebumbiro remitemo yenyika sezvo zvichityora zvimwe zvikamu zvebumbiro zvinorambidza kuvandudzwa kwemitemo kuitira kuti vatongi vematare vari pabasa, vawane cheuviri kubva mukuvandudzwa kwemitemo yenyika. VaMalaba vakadomwa nevaimbove mutungamiri wenyika, muchakabvu Robert Mugabe, musi wa Kurume 27, 2017 kuva mutongi mukuru wematare edzimhosva zvichitevera kuenda pamudyandigere kwaVaGodfrey Chidyausiku. Panguva iyi VaMnangagwa vaive mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, vari zvakare gurukota rezvemitemo. Panguva iyi, VaMalaba vaive mutevedzeri waVaChidyausiku, asi vakatanga kufanobata chigaro chemukuru wevatongi vematare edzimhosva musi wa Kurume 1, 2017. Vakadomwa semutongi wedare repamusoro naVaMugabe muna 1994, vachishandira vari muBulawayo kusvika muna 2001. Pakadomwa VaMalaba kuva mutongi wedare reHigh Court, VaMnangagwa ndivo vaive gurukota rezvemitemo panguva iyi. VaMalaba vakazosimudzirwa kuva mutongi weSupreme Court muna Nyamavhuvhu 2001, vakazoitwa mutevedzeri wemukuru wevatongi vematare edzimhosva muna 2008. VaMalaba vanozivikanwa nemitongo yakawanda yakakonzeresa mitauro vakawanda vachiti yairerekera kuZanu PF. Muna 2018, VaMalaba vakatungamira vatongi vedare reConstitutional Court mukurasa nyaya yemutungamiri weMDC Alliance, VaNelson Chamisa, avo vaiti vainge vakunda musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika yakaitwa mugore iri. Gweta raVaChamisa panguva iyi, VaThabani Mpofu, rimwe remagweta anga achipikisa kwavanoti kutyorwa kwebumbiro remitemo yenyika izvo zvakazoita kuti VaMalaba varambe vari pabasa.
title: VaMalaba Vanomanikidzwa Kuenda kuMudyandigere neDare reHigh Court

text: Zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakana muMDC Alliance zvichitevera kusaremekedza chibvumirano kunonzi kuri kuitwa neMDC-T inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa. Vamwe vari muMDC Alliance vasina kuda kudomwa nemazita vanoti MDC-T yava kuita zvisiri muchibvumirano zvekutora zvigaro kubva kumamwe mapato madiki ari mumubatanidzwa uyu. MDC-T inonzi yatora zvigaro gumi nezvipfumbamwe kuMDC inotungamirwa naVaWelshman Ncube, iyo yakange yagoverwa zvigaro makumi matatu nezviviri. Transform Zimbabwe, iyo yange iine zvigaro gumi nezvipfumbamwe, yatorerwa zvigaro gumi, ukuwo People’s Democratic Party ichinzi yatorerwawo zvigaro mumatunhu anoti Masvingo neMatabeleland South. Vataura neStudio7 ava vatiwo MDC-T inoti iri kutora zvigaro zvose zvemakanzura, seneta neproportional representation, izvo mamwe mapato ari muAlliance ari kuti akanyengedzwa paakanyorerana zvibvumirano zvezvigaro. Nyaya iyi yakatsvirira nezuro ose pamuzinda weMDC-T muHarare apo mutungamiri weMDC Alliance, VaNelson Chamisa, vaitarisirwa kuuya kuzogadzirisa dambudziko rapinda mumba iri, asi havana kuita izvi. Vachitaura nezuro manheru mushure mekunge vatadza kusangana naVaChamisa, mutauriri weMDC Alliance, Professor Welshman, Ncube vakabvuma kuti hapana mufaro mumapato ese asi vakati Alliance ichaendesa vanhu kuNomination Court pazvinzvimbo zvese zvinokwikwidzwa. VaNcube vakati dambudziko raitika nderekuti mapato haana kutevedza chibvumirano chavakasainirana zvaita kuti vatange kutaurirana patsva uye kuti vamwe vaone sekuti vanogona kukunda musarudzo vari vega vasina mubatanidzwa wemapato. Asi vanoona nezvekudyidzana neZEC muMDC-T, VaJameson Timba, vakati mapato ese ari muAlliance achapinda musarudzo sebato rimwe chete uye vakuru vakuru veAlliance ndivo vachadoma vanhu vanomirira matunhu akasiyana siyana. VaNcube vati chivimbo chavo ndechekuti hapana bato richanyoresa nhengo dzaro dzisiri muAlliance uye vati kunyange izvi zvikaitika tariro yavo ndeyekuti vanhu vabatane zvakare panopera Nomination Court kuti vakwanise kukunda musarudzo. Vati vaimbove mutungamiriri weMDC-T, VaMorgan Tsvangirai, vakatanga mubatanidzwa uyu zvakanaka chose mushure mekuona kuti zvainetsa kuti bato rimwe chete rikunde Zanu PF musarudzo. Vari kuziva zviri kuitika vanoti mapato madiki ari muAlliance atorerwa zvigaro zvose zvaakange apihwa izvo zvichavhiringa zvakawanda muMDC Alliance Dare reNomination Court riri kugara nhasi mumatunhu ese munyika kuti ritambire mazita evanoda kukwikwidza musarudzo dzegore rino. No media source currently available
title: MDC Alliance Yoita Zinyekenyeke neNyaya yeZvigaro

text: Imwe shoroma yekuNigeria VaAliko Dangote voronga kuvamba mabhizimisi munyika. Zimbabwe yave kusendeka parutivi chirongwa chekutora zvikamu makumi mashanu nechimwe kubva muzana kumakambani ekunze, kunze kwemigodhi. Musangano wekuongorora nyaya dzekutorwa kwenhau yeHighway Africa wopetwa kuSouth Africa. Muchirongwa cheLivetalk cheThe Youth Connection na 8:30 pm tiri kutarisa zviri kuitwa munyaya dzebudiriro nevechidiki vakambenge vari kunze kwenyika vawana mari dzorubatsiro dzokunze kuti vadzidze. No media source currently available
title: Misoro yeNhau Dzanhasi - Gunyana 1, 2015

text: Mutauriri wedare reparamende VaJacob Mudenda vari kutungamira chikwata chemaseneta pamwe nenhengo dzedare reparamende chiri kumusangano wenhengo dzeparamende kuRussia, uko chakwakokwa nedare reparamende repasi renyika iyi, re Duma. Pane nyika dzakawanda dzine nhengo dzeparamende dziri kupinda musangano uyu, uyo uri kupera neChitatu. Mumiriri wedunhu reMazowe South mudare reparamende uye vari nhengo yeZanu PF, VaFortune Chasi, avo vari muchikwata chevamiriri vakabva kuZimbabwe, vanoti nyaya dziri kutaurwa dzakanangana nehutongo hwejekerere nekukurudzira nyaya dzekuwanisa madzimai mikana. Vamwe vari muchikwata chenhengo dzeparamende ichi vanosanganisira mumiriri weNorton Vatemba Mliswa, pamwe naAmai Priscilla Misihairambwi. Vamwewo vanzi vari kumusangano uyu asi vasiri muchikwata chenhengo dzeparamende ichi chipangamazano chemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, VaChristopher Mutsvangwa. No media source currently available
title: Nhengo dzeParamende Dzoshanya kuRussia Kwadzakakokwa neDare Reko

text: Vaive mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, avo vakashaya svondo rapera, vanonzi nevakawanda munhu akasiya nhaka yakakosha zvikuru kumhuri yeZimbabwe kuburikidza nekuwanisa vanhu dzidzo pamwe nevhu. VaMugabe vanopembedzwawo zvikuru nekuwanisa vanhu vekumaruwa magetsi, uye kuendesa budiriro kunzvimbo zhinji dzakanga dzakashaiswa budiriro nehurumende yeRhodesia, kuburikidza nekuvandudza mataundishipi akawanda vachiaita ma growth point. Mumwe wevanoti VaMugabe vakaita zvikuru muzvinhu izvi mufundisi veUnited Methodist Church vachishanda vari paNyadire Mission kuUzumba mudunhu reMashonaland East, Reverend Forbes Matonga. Asi Reverend Matonga vanoti kunyange hazvo VaMugabe munhu airemekedzwa kunze kwenyika nekuda kwemashoko avaitaura uye kusatya vachena, vakave mutungamiri akakanganwa mhuri yake iye achisweropembedzwa nevekunze. Vanoti zvaiitwa naVaMugabe hazvina kusiyana nababa anoita mbiri nevavakidzani vake asi achikanganwa mhuri yake. VaMugabe vari kutarisirwa kuradzikwa kumarinda emagamba enyika kuNationa Heroes Acre muHarare, kunyange hazvo pasina kunyatsojeka kuti ndiko kwavacharadzikwa here, kana kuti vacharadzikwa zuva ripi. Vakashaya vave nemakore makumi mapfumbamwe nemashanu ekuberekwa, uye vakasiya mudzimai Amai Grace Mugabe nevana vatatu vanoti Amai Bona Mugabe-Chikore, Robert Junior naChatunga Bellarmine. No media source currently available
title: Vamwe Vanoonawo VaMugabe seMutungamiri Aikanganwa Mhuri Yake

text: Masangano ose anomirira vashandi vehurumende nhasi apa hurumende mazuva manomwe kuti izadzikise chivimbiso chayo chekuwedzera vashandi mari mwedzi uno achiti kana hurumende ikasaita izvi vacharamwa mabasa kutanga musi wa 26 Gunyana. Vachitaura mushure memusangano waitwa nemasangano aya kusanganisira anomirira varairidzi, vashandi vezvehutano nevamwe vashandi vehurumende, sachigaro vesangano reZimbabwe Conferderation of Public Sector Trade Unions, Amai Cecelia Alexander, vati vatora danho iri mushure mekunge mihoro yemwedzi uno yauya isina kuwedzerwa sezvainge zvataurwa negurukota rezvemari, VaMthuli Ncube. Vati vati vanyorera VaNcube tsamba vachivazivisa nechisungo chabuda mumusangano wavo nhasi. Sachigaro verimwe remasangano apinda mumusangano wanhasi, reFederation of Zimbabwe Educators Union, VaObert Masarure, vatsinhira izvi vachiti hurumende ichine nguva yekuzadzikisa chivimbiso chayo sezvo mwedzi usati wapera. VaMasaraure vati chavari kuchemera chete mihoro inogutsa kuitira kuti vakwanise kurarama zvakanaka nemhuri dzavo. VaNcube vanonzi vakavimbisa pamusangano wavakaita nevashandi kutanga kwaNyamavhuvhu kuti hurumende yaizowedzera mari dzinotambirwa nevashandi vayo. Amai Alexander vatiwo chinorwadzwa ndechekuti hapana nhaurirano dziri kuitwa pakati pevashandi nehurumende kubva muna Nyamavhuvhu. Masangano anomirira vashandi vehurumende anoda kuti mushandi wepasi atambire mazana mashanu nemakumi mana emadhora ekuAmerica pamwedzi (US$540) asi hurumende inoti haina mari yekuita izvi. Iyi ndiyo mari yaitambirwa nemushandi wehurumende muna Gumiguru 2018 apo vakatotanga kutambira mari yemuno. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura naVaNcube sezvo vange vari mumusangano. Hatinawo kukwanisa kutaura negurukota rezvevashandi nemabasa nekugara zvakanaka kwevanhu, Muzvinafundo Paul Mavhima sezvo vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. No media source currently available
title: Vashandi veHurumende Vopa Hurumende Mazuva Manomwe eKuti iZadzise Chivimbiso Chayo cheMihoro, Kukundikana Voramba Mabasa

text: Dare ramejasitiriti nemusi weChitatu rakatura mutongo wekuti vatungamiri vana vesangano revakarwa muhondo yerusunguko reZimbabwe National Liberation War Veterans Association vabude muhusungwa mushure mekubhadhara chibatiso pamhosva yavari kupomerwa yekuzvidza nekutuka mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe. Mutongi wedare, VaVakayi Chikwekwe ndivo vakatura mutongo wekuti mutevedzeri wasachigaro wesangano iri, VaHeadman Moyo, munyori mukuru musangano iri, VaVictor Matemadanda, mutevedzeri wasachigaro mupurovhinzi yeHarare, VaHoyini Samuel Bhila pamwe naVaFrancis Nhando vabuditswe muhusungwa mushure mekubhadhara madhora mazana matatu pamunhu wega wega semari yechibatiso. Vatatu ava vanzi vazvipire kumapurisa kaviri pasvondo uye kuti vagare vachiramba pakero dzavakanyoresa kudzamara nyaya iyi yapera kutongwa. Mukunzwikwa kwenyaya iyi, rimwe remagweta evasungwa ava, Amai Beatrice Mtetwa, vaudza dare kuti havasi kufara nemabatirwo avakaitwa nemapurisa sezvo vachiti vaitadza kuona vanhu vavari kumiririra ava sezvo mapurisa kumakamba kwaive nevasungwa ava achinzi aida tsamba kubva kumapurisa eLaw and Order inovapa mvumo yekumiririra vasungwa ava. Amai Mtetwa vazivisawo dare kuti vachakwikwidzawo pachadzoka nyaya iyi mudare kunyimwa kwavaiitwa mapepa ekupomera vasungwa mhosva segweta riri kumirira vasungwa. Vatiwo zvakare imwe nyaya yavachakwidza kudare inyaya yekuti vakafanobata chigaro chegweta guru rehurumende, VaRay Gova, havana masimba ekusaina magwaro ekuti vanhu vamiswe mumatare. “Muchuchisi mukuru wehurumende haana kugadzwa zviri pamutemo nekuti anofanira kugadzwa nezvinoitwa vatongi vematare epamusoro saka nokudaro tinoda kuti matare atarise kuti VaGova vane kodzero here yekusaina mapepa anoita kuti vasungwa vamiswe pamatare” Amai Mtetwa vatiwo pane vamwe vaiva vari muhondo yerusunguko vaviri vasungwa zvakare pamatare edzimhosva. “Vasungwa ava vazoburitswa muhusungwa uye mapurisa ati kana achizovada achatumira masamanisi ekuti vauye. Izvi ndizvo zvinofanira kuitwa nekuti mutemo wekuti munhu ange amire pamberi pedare unoti munhu anosungirwa kunge amiswa pamberio pedari mukati memamawa makumi mana nemasere asi dzimwe dzenguva hapana zvakawanda zvinenge zvichiitwa nemapurisa ayo anenge apedza kugadzira mapepa avo kuti munhu. Nokudaro, inyaya yatichakwidza zvakare kuti iwongororwe." Amai Mtetwa vakaudza Studio 7. Zvichakadaro nemusi weChitatu, mapurisa akasungazve vamwe varwi vehondo vaviri vanoti Karren Kazingizi naElphas Mudzimunyi. Vaviri ava vari kupomerwa mhosva imweyo yekutuka mutungamiri wenyika. Vakarwa muhondo yerusunguko vari kusungwa vachipomerwa kuzvidza pamwe nekutuka mutungamiri wenyika mushure mekunge sangano ravo raburitsa gwaro mwedzi wapera raikurudzira kuti VaMugabe vagadzirise zviri kunetsa munyika pamwe nemararamiro evaimbova varwi muhondo yerusunguko. No media source currently available
title: Vamwe Vakarwa Hondo Vopihwa Mukana weKubvisa Mari yeChibatiso Asi Vamwe Vachisungwazve

text: Mutungamiri we People’s Democratic Party, Va Tendai Biti, vanoti vanhu vemuZimbabwe vari kutyora kodzero dzaVaMugabe nekuvasiya vari pabasa ivo vachiratidza kuti vaneta uye vakwegura. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika dziri kupesana pamashoko emutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, ayo vakataura ku Japan pamusangano wavakaita nevatori venhau. VaMugabe vanonzi vakati vanhu vemuZimbabwe havadi kuti vasiye basa, sezvo vachivafarira zvikuru. VaMugabe vakatiwo vakasiya basa, munyika munopedzisira musina kugadzikana sezvo ivo vari mutungamiri anoziva zvinoda vanhu. Mashoko aya ari kushorwa zvikuru nevanhu pamadandemutande, vamwe vachiti VaMugabe vakwegura, nokudaro vanofanirwa kuchienda pamudyandigere. Mutungamiri we People’s Democratic Party, Va Tendai Biti, vanoti vanhu vemuZimbabwe vari kutyora kodzero dzaVaMugabe nekuvasiya vari pabasa ivo vachiratidza kuti vaneta uye vakwegura. VaBiti, avo vanova gweta rine mukurumbira munyika, vanoti bumbiro remitemo yenyika rinopa masimba ekuti kana mutungamiri wenyika ava kutadza kuita basa rake nemazvo, kanawo kuva anonetsekana nehutano hwake, anofanirwa kubviswa pachigaro. Asi nhengo yeZanu PF uye vari sachigaro webato iri kuBritain, Va Nick Mangwana, vanoti VaMugabe vakasarudzwa neruzhinji rwevanhu, nokudaro vanofanirwa kuramba vari pabasa. VaMangwana vanoti bato ravo rakabuda pachena kuti VaMugabe ndivo vacharimirira musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika ichaitwa muna 2018, nokudaro hapana chinoshamisira kana VaMugabe vachiti vachamirira bato ravo musarudzo. Asi VaBiti vanoti Zanu PF ngainzwire VaMugabe tsitsi nekuti mukuru uyu ari kuratidza zviri pachena kuti aneta, uye anoda kuzororo. No media source currently available
title: VaBiti naVaMangwana Vozeya Mashoko Ava Mugabe kuJapan

text: Masangano akazvimirira anoti haasi kufara nechinono chiri kuitwa neZimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, mukuita zvironga zvekushambadza chirongwa chekuti vanhu vaongorore gwaro revavhoti. Masangano aya anoti ZEC inofanirwa kupinda mumaruwa pamwe nekushandisa masangano enhau ichidzidzisa veruzhinji nezvechirongwa chekuongorora kana mazita avo ari mugwaro revavhoti vakanyoresa. Masangano aya anotiwo ZEC yakatara mazuva mashoma ekuti vanhu vaongorore zviri mugwaro revavhoti, izvo anoti vanhu vakawanda vachatadza kuongorora gwaro iri. ZEC yakazivisa kuti chirongwa ichi chichatanga musi 19 kusvika musi 29 Chivabvu. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa muMasvingo United Residents and Rate Payers Alliance, VaHardlife Tangai, vanoti ZEC iri kutadza kuita basa rayo nemazvo. Nhengo yeCommunity Tolerance and Reconciliation Development, VaZivanai Muzorodzi, vanotiwo ZEC haisati yatuma vashandi vayo kuti vadzidzise nekuzivisa veruzhinji vari kumaruwa nezvechirongwa chekuongorora gwaro iri. Mutauriri we Crisis in Zimbabwe Coalition, VaTabani Moyo, vatiwo havasi kufara nedanho reZEC rekubhadharisa masangano akazvimirira mari yekuongorora chirongwa ichi, vachiti izvi zvinotadzisa kuitwa kwesarudzo dzakachena. Sangano reMISA-Zimbabwe rinotiwo harisi kufara nekubhadhariswa mari kuri kuitwa vatori venhau sezvo vakabhadhariswa kare mari neZimbabwe Media Commission kuitira kuti vaite basa ravo zviri pamutemo. Vatori venhau vanobhadhariswa madhora gumi pamunhu kuti vaongorore chirongwa ichi. Studio7 yakundikana kubata sachigaro weZEC, Amai Priscilla Chigumba, kuti vatipe divi ravo. Asi mumwe mushandi weZEC, VaTaurai Gavi, vakaudza vatori venhau muMasvingo svondo rapfuura kuti ZEC ine chido chekugadzirisa nyaya yekuti vatori venhau vasabhadhare mari. Zvisineyi nezviri kuitwa neZEC, masangano aya anoti akatotanga kare kupinda muvanhu achivadzidzisa zvakakoshera kuongorora gwaro revavhoti munguva yakatarwa neZEC. No media source currently available
title: ZEC Yokurudzirwa Kushambadza Kuongororwa kweGwaro reVavhoti

text: Kurudziro yedare remakurukota yekuti vemakambani vambomira kugumura vashandi inenge isina ari kuteerera sezvo makambani a munyika ari kuenderera mberi nekugumura vashandi basa. No media source currently available Izvi zvapa kuti mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vaite musangano wechimbi chimbi negurukota rezvevashandi, Amai Prisca Mupfumira. Vane ruzivo nezvemusangano uyu vanoti nyaya yekuti padzikwe mutemo wechimbi chimbi unoshanda kwemwedzi mitanhatu ndiyo yanga iri mudariro. VaMugabe vanenge vachiita izvi vachishandisa masimba avo pasi pemutemo wePresidential Powers Temporary Measures Act. Amai Mupfumira mumashoko avo kuvatori venhau pakapera dare remakurukota neChina vakati vainge vachikumbira vashandirwi kuti vamire kugumura vashandi uye vakavimbisa kuti hurumende yaida kugadzirisa mutemo weLabor Act. Asi makambani ari kuramba achigumura mabasa anosanganisira anoti Zimasco, Cotton Ginnery Sino-Zim, Econet, TN Holdings, Ruwa Pharmaceutical, MedTech, varidzi vebepanhau reDaily News, ANZ, vadzinga vashandi gumi nemumwe kusanganisia vasiri vatori venhau vanosvika vapfumbamwe. Kambani yeANZ inoti yamisa vashandi basa nekuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka munyaya dzezvehupfumi munyika. Mutungamiri weZCTU, VaGeorge Nkiwane, vanoti nyaya yevashandi inofanirwa kugadziriswa nechimbi chimbi.
title: VaMugabe Voita Hurukuro dzeChimbi Chimbi neGurukota reVashandi Amai Mupfumira

text: Mutungamiriri weZanu PF, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vachaparura chirongwa chekutsvaga rutsigiro kune nhengo dzebato ravo musarudzo dzemaBy-Elections nemusi weMugovera kuEpworth. Asi bato guru rinopikisa munyika, reCitizens Coalition for Change (CCC), rinotungamirirwa naVaNelson Chamisa rinoti riri kuvhiringidzwa nemapurisa nevatsigiri veZanu-PF kuita misangano yaro. Mutauriri weZanu PF, Chris Mutsvangwa, vaudza vatori venhau muHarare nhasi kuti VaMnangagwa vachaparura chirongwa chekutsvaga rutsigiro kuEpworth vachiti sarudzo dzemaby-election dzakakosha uye dzichave munongedzo wemafambiro achaita sarudzo dza2023. VaMutsvangwa vati bato ravo richakunda mumaby-election uye uku ndiko kuchave kutanga kwebato reZanu PF kukunda mumadhorobha mukati memakore makumi maviri apfuura umo range riri kukundwa nebato reMDC. Vati bato raVaChamisa kubva richiri kunnzi MDC Alliance rakawondonga maguta uye Zanu PF yave kugadzirisa izvi nekuita zvinhu zvakaita sekupa vanhu maTitle Deeds munzvimbo dzakavakwa zvisiri pamutemo mumaguta nemadhorobha. Asi vaimbove meya wegura reHarare zvakare vari nhengo yeCitizens Convergence for Change, VaBen Manyenyeni, vaudza Studio 7 kuti havabvumirane naVaMutsvangwa kuti bato ravo rakauuraya maguta vachiti kunyange bato ravo raikunda musarudzo Zanu PF ndiyo inotonga mumaguta. Vati semuenzaniso muHarare makanzura mazhinji akadzingwa basa uye hurumende inopindira mukufambiswa kwebasa muguta iri. Vati bato ravo harinei nekuvakwa kunoitwa pese pese muguta vachiti izvi zviri kuitwa nenhengo dzeZanu PF. Vati bato ravo richakunda zvine mutsindo sekukunda kwarakaita muna2018. Vanoongorora nyaya dzematongerwo enyika vakazvimirira, VaSydicks Muradzikwa, vaudza Studio 7 kutu havawoni Zanu PF ichikunda musarudzo dzemaby-elections. Vatiwo zviri kuitika zvekuti Zanu PF ino bvumidzwa kuita musangano asi Citizens Coalition for Change ichirambidzwa zvinoratidza kuti hapana chati chashanduka pamafambisirwo esarudzo munyika. Mutungamiriri weCCC, VaNelson Chamisa, vanotarisirwa kuparura hurongwa hwekutsvaga rutsigiro rwebato ravo kuBulawayo mukupera kwesvondo asi nhengo dzebato ravo dzinoti dziri kubvunzurudzwa nemapurisa pamusoro pehurongwa hwavo. Mutauriri weCitizens Convegence for Change muBulawayo, VaSwithern Chirowodza, vaudza Studio 7 kuti mapurisa ari kuvarambidza kuita misangano yekutsvaga rutsigiro. Asi vati zvisinei nezviri kuitika bato ravo richabudirira pahurongwa hwaro vachiti havangataure nyaya yavo paruzhinji. Asi bato guru rinopikisa munyika, reCitizens Coalition for Change (CCC), rinotungamirirwa naVaNelson Chamisa rinoti riri kuvhiringidzwa nemapurisa nevatsigiri veZanu-PF kuita misangano yaro. Asi vati zvisinei nezviri kuitika bato ravo richabudirira pahurongwa hwaro vachiti havangataure nyaya yavo paruzhinji.
title: VaMnangagwa Votanga Kutsvaga Rutsigiro Asi VaChamisa Vachiti Vakasungwa Mbiradzakondo

text: Nhepfenyuro yeVoice of America yakaita neChina hurukuro pamwe nechikoro chepamusoro soro, che Norfolk University mudunhu re Virginia. Hurukuro idzi dzakanangana nekucherechedza kusvitsa makore mazana mana kubva musi wakatanga kusvika mu America vanhu vakanga vapambwa mu Africa muna Nyamavhuvhu 1619. Mugore iri, chikepe chainzi White Lion chakasvika pamahombekombe e Chesapeake Bay, ndokumira pa Point Comfort, umo chakaburutsa vanhu vatema makumi maviri. Kusvika kwevanhu vatema ava makore mazana mana apfuura, kwakava kwekutanga kwenhapwa dzaiuyiswa ku America. Kubva gore iroro, kutengeswa kwevanhu vatema vachiitwa varanda kwakaenderera mberi. Muhurukuro dzaitwa nenyanzvi dzinobva muzvikoro zvepamusoro soro mu America yose, pakataurwa pamusoro pekusvika kwenhapwa mu America, gakava riripo pamusoro pekuita mumwe munhu muranda, pamwe nekunzwisisa zvinoreva huranda. Vakataura vese vakaratidza kubvumirana kuti vanhu vatema mu America vanofanirwa kubhadharwa kutapwa nekushandiswa zvina mubairo kwavakaitwa. No media source currently available
title: Kusvika muAmerica kweVanhu Vatema Vakange Vapambwa Muna 1619 Kunocherechedzewa

text: Sangano revashandi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, ZCTU, rinoti rakanyorera kusangano revashandi pasi rose reInternational Labour Organisation, ILO, richizivisa sangano iri nezvekutyorwa kwekodzero dzevashandi pamwe nekurambidzwa kuungana kwevanhu nehurumende yeZimbabwe. Munyori mukuru weZCTU, VaJaphet Moyo, vanoti vanyora tsamba kusangano re ILO mazuva matatu apfuura, vachiti Zimbabwe imwe yenyika dzepasi rose dzakasaina chibvumirano chekutevedzera mitemo yevashandi pamwe nekuchengetedza kodzero dzavo. Asi vanoti Zimbabwe haisi kutevera chibvumirano ichi mukuita sezvayakasaina. Vanoti kuenda ku ILO kunovabatsirawo zvikuru nekuti zvinoitawo kuti dzimwe nyika dzizive zviri kuitwa nehurumende yeZimbabwe mukumbunyikidza kodzero dzevashandi, zvichizogonawo kuita kuti vanoda kupa rubatsiro vatange vaona mamiriro akaita zvinhu. VaMoyo vanotiwo vari kuronga kukwirira kudare redzimhosva vachida kuti mapurisa amiswe kushungurudza nhengo dzavo. Studio7 yakundikana kubata gurukota rezvevashandi, Amai Sekai Nzenza, kuti tinzwewo divi rehurumende panyaya iyi. No media source currently available
title: ZCTU Inonyorera ILO Tsamba yeNyunyuto

text:
Mukuru anoona nezvekudzivirirwa kwenjodzi kana kuti Civil Protection Unit kana kuti CPU VaJonathan Nkomo vanoti vari mubishi kuyedza kubvisa mvura kuti vaburitse vanhu vakadhirikirwa nemugodhi paRan Mine, kuBindura. Kubvisa mvura uku kwakapa kuti mumwe murume aibatsira adonherwe nedombo achibva afa neMugovera. Mufi, VaBlessing Bere vakafa vachiedza kuisa pombi yekukweva mvura panzvimbo yakadhirikirwa vanhu vanofungidzirwa kuti vari pakati pemakumi matatu nemakumi manomwe. Mumwe aishanda naVaBere VaMunashe Kandawasvika vanoti VaBere vakadonherwa nedombo vachibva vadonhera mumugogdhi. VaNkomo vanoti sezvo mutemo uchibvumira vanhuwo zvavo kubatsira panenge paitika njodzi hurumende inosungirwa kubatsirawo pakuvigwa kwaVaBere. Patabvunza kuti vave pachinhano chipi mukuedza kufukunura vanhu vakadhirikirwa nemugodhi, VaNkomo vati parizvino vachiri kurwisana nekukweva mvura sezvo mugodhi uyu wanga wave nenguva yakareba usingashande. Amai Senzeni Nyengeta vanoti mwana wavo VaTichaona Nyengeta mumwe wevanhu vakadhirikirwa nemugodhi. Mumwe wevechidiki muBindura VaNyasha Moyana vanoti dambudziko iri raratidza kuti hurumende haina kugadzirira matambudziko akadai sezvinotarisirwa. Asi VaNkomo vanoti hurumende yega haingazvikwanise vachiti vemakambani akazvimirira vanofanirwa kuisa misoro pamwechete nehurumende kugadzirisa matambudziko anowira vanhu vasingafungire.
Amai Nyengeta vanoti nhamo yekushaya basa ndiyo yauraisa mwana wavo zvisinei kuti anga akadzidza.

Mashoko aya atsinhirwa nemukuru wesangano rinoona nezvekucherwa kwezvicherwa reCentre for Natural Resource Governance-CNRG) VaFarai Maguwu. VaMaguwu vanoti vanhu vari kuchera goridhe havana hunyanzvi hunotarisirwa izvo zvave kuita kuti vakawanda vafire mumigodhi. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nevakuru veRan Gold Mine sezvo nhare yavo yange isiri kudairwa kumohofisi avo ekuHarare. Kambani iyi haina mahofisi muBindura. Gwaro rakaburitswa neZimbabwe Enviromental Law Association (ZELA) muna Nyamavhuvhu gore rino rinoti migodhi yakawanda yakavhara nekuda kwehupfumi hwenyika hwawondomoka, nyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika dzisina kumira zvakanaka pamwe nekukundikana basa kwevakuru vemakambani ehurumende anoona nezvezvicherwa. ZELA inoti nekuda wekuvharwa kwemakambani, vanhu vakawanda vave kuita basa rekuchera zvicherwa pamigodhi yakavharwa asi ine njodzi yekudhirika sezvo yagara kwenguva yakareba isingashande. Masvondo maviri apfuura vamwe vanhu gumi vakadhirikirwa nemugodhi paPremier Estate pedyo neMutare. Gore rapera vamwe vanhu vanosvika makumi mana vanofungidzirwa kuti vakadhirikirwa nemugodhi weEdorado pedyo neChinhoyi. No media source currently available
title: Kuburitswa kweVakadhirikirwa neMugodhi kuBindura Kwokanganiswa neMvura

text: America iri kupinda musarudzo huru yekutsvaga nhengo dzichange dzichimirira mamwe matunhu mumatare eseneti, neparamende pamwe nemagavhuna neChipiri svondo rinouya, makwikwi makuru ari pakati pemapato eDemocratic Party neRepublican Party. Sarudzo idzi, idzo dzinoitwa pakati petemu, kana kuti mid-term elections, dzinonzi nevari kudzitevera dzakakosha zvikuru sezvo dzichigona kunongedza zvingazongobuda musarudzo huru dzichaitwa muna 2024. Mutungamiri weAmerica VaJoe Biden vakakurudzira svondo rino kuti veruzhinji vatambire zvinenge zvabuda musarudzo idzi uye kuti dziitwe murunyararo. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika pamwe nezvehupfumi, Muzvinafundo Elliot Masocha, vanoti sarudzo idzi dzakakosha zvikuru sezvo dzicharatidza remangwana redare guru reseneti. Dare iri pari zvino rine nhengo dzakaenzana asi bato riri kutonga remaDemocrats richizova nenhengo imwe inopatsanura kana pakaita mangange, inove mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica Amai Kamala Harris. Matunhu anonzi ane makwikwi akasimba pakati pemapato maviri aya ndeanoti Arizona, Georgia, Michigan, Wisconsin, Nevada nePennsylvania. No media source currently available
title: Sarudzo dzePakati peTemu muAmerica Dzichaitwa Mune Mamwe Matunhu Dzotarisirwa Kushandura Mamiriro eMatare eSeneti neParamende

text: Mutungamiri wechechi yeZimbabwe Devine Destiny Bishop Ancelimo Magaya nevamwe vakuru vemakereke anoti Prayer Network of Zimbabwe, Zimbabwe Pastors Fellowship, Christian Voice neZimbabwe Christian eAlliance vakambochengetedzwa nemapurisa mushure mekuratidzira kwavakayedza kuita muHarare nemusi weChina. Nhengo dzose dzemakereke aya dzainge dzichida kuratidzira idzi dzakazosara dzosvika panzvimbo yadzanga dzichifanira kusangana patozara mapurisa anorwisa mvongamupopoto ayo ainge achidzinga vanhu. VaMagaya nevamwe vavo vashanu vavanga vachifamba navo vakasungwa pavanga voda kutanga kuratidzira panosangana migwagwa inoti Julius Nyerere naNelson Mandela ndokubva vapinzwa mumotokari yemapurisa vakaendwa navo. Zvichakadaro, vatori venhau vaviri vanoti Obey Manayiti anoshandira bepanhau reNewsday pamwe naRobert Tapfumaneyi vakasungwawo pachiitiko ichi asi vakazoregedzwa mushure mechinguvana vasina mhosva yavapomerwa. Mutauriri wemapurisa, Senior Assistant Commissioner Charity Charamba vati havakwanise kutaura nezvenyaya iyi vachiti vanga vasati varumwa nzeve. Zvichakadaro, mapato anopikisa hurumende ashora kumbochengetedzwa kwaitwa Bishop Magaya nevamwe vavo achiti kuratidzira haisi mhosva pasi pebumbiro idzva remitemo yenyika. Mutauriri waAmai Joice Mujuru vebato reZimbabwe People First, VaJealous Mawarire, vati kusungwa kwaVaMagaya nevamwe vavo kutyora kodzero dzevedzisvondo. Mashoko aVaMawarire atsinhirwa nemunyori mukuru muMDCT, VaDouglas Mwonzora. VaMagaya nevamwe vavo vanga vachida kuratidzira vachiti havasi kufara nemamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika vachitiwo vachakurudzira nhengo dzeparamende kuti dzivhote kuti dzibvise mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe pachigaro kana kuti impeachment kana VaMugabe vakaramba kuita nhaurirano nemapoka akasiyana-siyana kuti paedzwe kutsvagwa nzira dzekugadzirisa matambudziko akatarisana nenyika. VaMawarire vatiwo havasi kufara nekuzadzwa kwaitwa mapurisa mudhorobha vachiti mapurisa ndiwo arikukonzeresa mhirizhonga. VaMwonzora vati kushurungurudzwa kuri kuitwa varatidziri nemapurisa kwavapawo kuti vaende kumatare edzimhosva sezvo mapurisa asiri kuda kuti varatidzire neChishanu muHarare. Mapato anopikisa ari kushorawo kurohwa kwakaitwa vanhu vakawanda nemapurisa pamwe nekusungwa kwevanhu makumi mashanu nevapfumbamwe vari kufungidzirwa kuti inhengo dzeMDC. Vanhu ava vakasungwa mukuratidzira kwevechidiki veMDC Youth Assembly neChitatu vari kutarisirwa kumiswa pamberi pedare neChishanu. No media source currently available
title: Mapurisa Anombochengetedza Vakuru veMachechi Vange Vachiratidzira muHarare

text: Sangano re Human Right Watch rinoti riri kuenderera mberi nekuteverera zviri kuitika mukuverengwa nekuburitswa kwe zvri kubuda musarudzo. Mukuru we sangano iri kuchamhembe kwe Africa, VaDewa Mavhinga, vanoti chirongwa ichi chanonoka kutanga uye hazvisati zvanyatsojeka kuti bato riri kukunda nderipi kunyange hazvo mamwe mapato ave kutopemberera achiti akakunda. Matunhu mazhinji achiri kuverenga zvakabuda musarudzo dzakaitwa, vemapato anopikisa vachichema nerekuti zvinhu hazvisi kuitwa nenguva saka pane fungidziro yekuti panogona kuitwa huori kana kubiridzirwa kwesarudzo. Zimbabwe Electoral Commission yatanga kuzivisa vanhu zviri kubuda izvo zviri kuratidza kuti Zanu PF iri kutungamirira mune zvaburitswa pari zvino. Mumaguta muri kuratidza kuti mune kukweshana pakati pemapato anopikisa asi kumaruwa kuri kubuda Zanu PF ichitungamira munzvimbo dzakawanda. Mukuru weHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica, Va Dewa Mavhinga, vanoti kuburitswa nekunamirwa munzvimbo dzekuvhotera kwezviri kubuda musarudzo hakuna kushata nekuti ndizvo zviri mumutemo asi vamwe vari kumira nerekuti zvinogona kukonzera mhirizhonga pakati peveruzhinji. No media source currently available
title: Human Rights Watch Inoti Iri Kuzeya Zvakaitika Musarudzo.

text: Mutungamiri wekereke yeRemnant Church, Pastor Philip Mugadza, avo vakasungwa mushure mekunge varotswa kuti mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vachafa musi wa 17 Gumiguru gore rino, vakazoburitswa muhusungwa neMuvhuro mushure mekugaramo kwemazuva makumi mashanu nemashanu. Pastor Mugadza vakasungwa musi wa 16 Ndira panze pedare ramejasitiriti muHarare apo vakanga vari vachitongwa mune imwe mhosva yavari kupomerwa, yekuzvidza mureza wenyika. Pastor Mugadza vanoti havana godo nezvose zvakaitika kwavari zvakaita kuti varambe vari muhusungwa, vachiti vanoziva kuti Mwari vanenge vaine zvikonzero zvekuti zviite saizvozvo. Magweta avo, VaObey Shava naVaGift Mtisi, vakaedza kwazvo kuti vabude muhusungwa, asi vatongi vematare vaipa zvikonzero zvakasiyanasiyana zvaiita kuti Pastor Mugadza varambe vari muhusungwa. Asi vakazokwanisa kuwaniswa mukana wekutongwa vachibva kumba kudare repamusoro nemusi weChishanu mushure mekubhadhariswa madhora makumi mashanu. Kunyange hazvo vakanga vabhadhariswa mari yechibatiso, Pastor Mugadza havana kukwanisa kubuda musi uyu sezvo munyori wematare akaramba kutambira gwaro rekubuda kwavo, achiti aida kutanga aona kuti raive riri rechokwadi here. Izvi zvinonzi zvakazoita kuti Pastor Mugadza vapedze mamwe mazuva maviri ekupera kwesvondo vari muhusungwa. Asi Pastor Mugadza vanoti havana godo nezvose zvakaitika kwavari zvakaita kuti varambe vari muhusungwa, vachiti vanoziva kuti Mwari vanenge vaine zvikonzero zvekuti zviite saizvozvo. Pahope dzavanoti vakarotswa dzekushaya kwaVaMugabe, Pastor Mugadza vanoti hapana chati chashanduka kubva pane zvavakarotswa gore rapera. "Pamusoro peshoko randakataura, hapana chashanduka. richaramba rakamira rakadaro kana pasina zvinenge zvaitwa nemuridzi weshoko iroro," Pastor Mugadza vanodaro. No media source currently available
title: Pastor Mugadza Votambira Kugara Kwavo Mutirongo seKuronga kwaMwari

text: Vaimbova mutauriri wedare reparamende VaCyril Ndebele avo vakashaya nemusi weChishanu kuMater Dei Hospital kuBulawayo vakaradzikwa kupurazi ravo kuDenver Farm kuUmguza nemusi weChitatu. VaNdebele vange vave nemakore makumi masere nematatu. Vanhu vakatanga vaungana kukereke yeSelbourne Park Seventh Day Adventist muBulawayo vasati vaenda kumarinda. Muchakabvu vakange vari nhengo yeAfrican National Congress kuSouth Africa apo vainge vari mudzidzi paUniversity of Natal. Vakatora degree ravo remutemo paQueens University, Belfast kuNorthern Ireland muna 1970. VaNdebele vainge vari muchikwata chemagweta aimirira Patriotic Front chakaenda kuGeneva, Malta neLancester zvakazopa kuti nyika iwane kuzvitonga kuzere muna 1980.
title: VaCyril Ndebele Voradzikwa kuUmguza

text: Gweta riri kumiririra nhengo nhatu dze MDC-T dzakarohwa ku Chitungwiza masvondo maviri akapera, Va Douglas Mwonzora, vanoti vari kupinda mudare neChipiri vachimirira Va Delma Amos Kaliati, Muzvare Clara Panganai, naMuzvare Lucia Ruya. Nyaya iyi iri kunzwikwa kwaMakoni kuChitungwiza kwakare. VaMwonzora vanoti VaKaliati vakabudiswa muchipatara nemusi weMugovera. Vatiwo mupurisa akarumisa VaKaliati neimbwa akanzi auye kudare uko achapomerwa mhosva yemashandisiro aakaita imbwa pana VaKaliati. VaKaliati, avo vava kurapwa vari pamba pavo, vanoti vave kunzwa zvirinani uye vanoda kukurumidza kunaya kuti vanoita basa rebato ravo semazuva ese. No media source currently available
title: Nhengo dze MDC-T Nhatu Dzomiswa Pamberi peDare kuChitungwiza

text: Zimbabwe inobatana nedzimwe nyika mukucherechedza zuva rekurwisana nehuwori pasi rose, reInternational Anti-Corruption Day, paine kurudziro yekuti hurumende igadzirise nekukasika dambudziko rehuwori munyika iro rinonzi rabata mapazi ose. Mumiriri weMbare muNational Assembly, VaStarman Chamisa pamwe nevagari vemuMbare vokurudzira hurumende kuti ivhure musika weMupedzanhamo sezvo kuvharwa kwawo kwapinza nzara mumhuri zhinji munyika. Kushandiswa zvakanyanya kwezvinodhaka nevanhu kunonzi nemukuru anoona nezvehutano mudunhu reHarare kwawedzera zvakanyanyisa dambudziko rechirwere chepfungwa. Nyaya dzekurwira hushe, husadunhu pamwe nehusabhuku dzinonzi dziri kuwanda mudunhu reMashonaland West pamwe nenyika yose, dzimwe mhuri dzichiti zviri kukonzerwa nevashandi vehurumende mubazi rezvekutongwa kwematunhu, vavanoti vari kutora mativi pamakakatanwa ehushe. Muchirongwa chedu chemagitare chesvondo rino, tine hurukuro nemuimbi wemusambo weContemporary Jazz, Sarungano, anove mumwe wevaimbi vechidiki vakadzidziswa kuimba pamuzinda wePAKARE PAYA, wakasiya wavakwa namushakabvu Oliver Mutukudzi kuNorton. Tichakupai zviri kubuda kumakwikwi eFifa world cup 2022 ari kutambirwa kuqatar uko makundano aya apinda mumakotafainari kutanga nhasi. Muchirongwa chedu cheLiveTalk na8 pm nhasi, tiri kuendera mberi tichitarisa mitambo yenhabvu yeFIFA World Cup Quarter Finals iri kutambirwa kuQatar. Kana muchida kupinda muchirongwa ichi, kanawo kutumira mashoko kuStudio7, shandisai WhatsApp nhamba dzinoti 001 202 465 0318. Vanoda kutererera Studio7, tibateyi na7pm pamasaisai anoti 909 am 4930; 13860, 15460 Kilohertz paShort Wave mazuva ose
title: Misoro yeNhau dzanhasi Chishanu, Zvita 09, 2022

text: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinoti zvinotambira nemufaro mukuru danho ratorwa nebazi rezvemukati meSouth Africa, rekunyevenutsa mutemo unobvumidza kupinda kana kubuda munyika iyi kwevana vari pasi pemakore gumi nemasere vanenge vachifamba vasina vabereki vavo kana mumwe mubereki. Bazi iri neChitatu rakazivisa kuti rakanga risisamanikidzi kuti munhu anenge achifamba nemwana mudiki aratidze magwaro anobva kuvabereki kana mumwe mubereki wemwana uyu achipa mvumo yekuti mwana wake apinde kana kubuda munyika iyi. Asi bazi iri rinoti zvakakosha kuti munhu anenge achifamba nemwana mudiki angogara aine magwaro aya nekuti anogona kubvunzwa nevanenge vachishanda pamuganhu. Gweta uye vachishanda nesangano re Human Rights Watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica, VaDewa Mavhinga, vatiwo vanoona danho iri rakanaka chose asi vachiti vanofunga kuti kuteverwa kwemutemo uyu nevashandi vebazi iri ndiko kukangononoka. Mukuru anoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa musangano reZimbabwe Exiles Forum, Muzvare Diana Zimbudzana, vanoti vanoona danho iri richirerutsira vabereki vakawanda, zvikuru vaya vanenge vachichengeta mhuri vari mubereki mumwechete. Asi Muzvare Zimbudzana vanoti vanotarisirawo kuti hurumende yeSouth Africa yakatorawo matanho ekudzivirira kubiwa kwevana, sezvo vamwe vachizogona kushandisa mukana uyu kuyambutsa vana kupinda kana kubuda munyika iyi. No media source currently available
title: Vakawanda Votambira neMufaro Kunyevenutswa kweMutemo weKupinda neKubuda kweVana Vadiki muSouth Africa

text: Mumiriri wenyika yeAmerica muZimbabwe, Ambassador Harry K Thomas Jnr, vanoti nyika yavo ine hukama hwakasimba nevanhu vemuZimbabwe zvisinei nekuti mutungamiriri wenyika pamwe nevamwe vavo vakatemerwa zvirango neAmerica ichipomerwa mhosva yekutyora kodzero dzavanhu pamwe nekubiridzira sarudzo. Asi Zimbabwe inoti zvirango izvi zvakauya nekuti yainge yatora minda kubva kuvachena ichipa vatema kutanga muna 2000. VaThomas Jnr vanoti mutungamiriri wenyika yavo VaBarack Obama nedare reSeneti rekuAmerica vachabvisa zvirango izvi chete kana VaMugabe nehurumende yavo vagadzirisa hupfumi pamwe nekuremekedza kodzero dzevanhu. Mumashoko avo pachirongwa chainge chakarongwa neboka re263 Chat muHarare nemusi weChina, VaThomas Jnr vakati gore rapfuura chairo Zimbabwe yakatengesa zvinhu zvakwanda kuAmerica kudarika zvakatengeswa neAmerica kuZimbabwe. 263 inoburitsa nhau pandemutande reinternet. Gore rapera Zimbabwe yakatengesa zvinhu zvinokosha mamiriyoni makumi matanhatu nemapfumbamwe kuAmerica, America ikatengesa zvinhu zvinokosha mamiriyoni makumi mana nemashanu kuZimbabwe. VaThomas Jnr vakati izvi zvinoratidza kuti pane kutyidzana kwakasimba pakati penyika mbiri idzi uye vacharamba vachishanda zvakasimba kusimbaradza hukama uhwu. Vakatiwo pane zvizvararwa zveAmerica zviuru makumi mashanu nezvishanu zvakashanyira Zimbabwe uye zvizhinji zvacho zvakashanyira mapopoma eVictoria Falls. Vanotiwo manyepo kuti zvirango zvakatamerwa VaMugabe nevamwe ndizvo zviri kuvhiringa hupfumi hweZimbabwe vachiti Zimbabwe yakange yatopinda mumatope kare zvirango izvi zvisati zvavepo. Asi bepanhau reHerald richinyora nyaya iyi rakati VaThomas vakatenda kuti zvirango zviri kukanganisa vanhuwo zvawo muZimbabwe nekuti vakati ahvasati vanyatsoita ongororo yekuti zvirango izvi zvingadai zvichikanganisa vanhu here. Vanonoongorora nyaya dzebhimisi VaMasimba Kuchera vanoti mashoko ava Thomas anoratidza pachena kuti pane kudyidzana pakati peAmerica neZimbabwe uye VaMugabe nehurumende yavo vanovanda nenyaya yezvirango sezvo vasingadi kuvanduza hupfumi nekodzero dzevanhu. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzemabhizimisi, VaRoy Magosvongwe vanotiwo kudyidzana kweAmerica neZimbabwe kunogona kuvandudzwa zvikurusei kana zvirango zvikabviswa. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi uye vakamboshanda mubazi rezvemari VaMasimba Manyanya vanoti zvirango zvaVaMugabe neshamwari dzavo handizvo zvinganzi zviri kuvhiringa hupfumi hwenyika asi kuti kutotadza kuita basa kwehurumende yavo. Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika zvakare vari mukuru weMedia Centre vaEnesrt Mudzengi vanoti nyaya yezvirango zvaVaMugabe haisi yemabasa ehupfumi asi kuti yekutyorwa kwekodzeo dzevanhu nekudaro haikanganisi kudyidzana kweAmerica nevanhu vemuZimbabwe. Ambassador Thomas Jnr vakatiwo America yakazvipira kuramba iuchibatsira vanhu vemuZimbabwe vakati semuenzaniso, gore rino chete nyika yavo yakabatsira Zimbabwe ne,ari inosvika mamiriyoni makumi mashanu nemashanu yekutengera chikafu vanhu vane nzara. America inopawo Zimbabwe mamiriyoni anodarika zana gore rega rega ekurwisa HIV/AIDS.VaThomas vatiwo kunze kweNigeria, Zimbabwe ndiyo nyika inowana rubatsiro munyaya dzedzidzo yakawanda kudarika nyika dzese muAfrica. Zvichakadai, VaThomas vatiwo vanovimba kuti chirongwa cheMandela Washington Fellowship chichaenderera mberi kunyange President Obama vakasiya basa muna gore rinouya. Pane vechidiki makumi matanhatu vasimuka muZimbabwe vakananga kuAmerica nezuro pasi pechirongwa cheMandela Washington Fellowship icho chakatangwa naVaObama makore mashona nana apfuura. Vaimbotungamira sangano rinomirira vadzidzi vezvikoro zvepamusoro reZimbabwe National Students Union, VaGilbert Mutubuki vanoti vanofara chose nerubatsiro runobva kuAmerica zvikuru sei munyaya dzedzidzo. America yapa Zimbabwe rubatsiro runodarika mabhiriyoni maviri nemazana amashanu ezviuru zvemadhora kubvira muna 1980. No media source currently available
title: Hurumende yaVaObama Inoti VaMugabe Ngavaremekedze Kodzero dzeVanhu Kana Vachida Kuti Vabvisirwe Zvirango

text: Masangano anorwira kodzero dzevanhu anoti ari kushushikana nekusachengetedzeka kwevanhu zvichitevera kupambwa kunonzi kwakaitwa vanhu vatanhatu pamberi pekuratidzira kuri kuda kuitwa neMDC nemusi weChishanu. Vachitaura nevatori venhau muHarare, sachigaro wemubatanidzwa wemasangano anorwira kodzero dzevanhu weZimbabwe Human Rights NGO Forum, Muzvare Jestina Mukoko, vati havasi kufara nekutyorwa kuri kuitwa kodzero dzeavanhu nevanofungidzirwa kuti vari muhurumende avo vavati vakapamba vanhu vatanhatu kusvika pari zvino pamberi pekuratidzira kuri kuda kuitwa neMDC neChishanu. Muzvare Mukoko vati mapurisa nemauto vanofanira kuchengetedza zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe pazvinenge zvichiratidzira. Vati semasangano anoshanda asina kwaakarerekera vanoda kuti kodzero dzekuratidzira dziri mubumbiro remitemo dzichengetedzwe uye vanenge vachida kuratidzira, vaite izvi murunyararo. Muzvare Mukoko vakurudzira kuti masangano ekunze akaita seSadc, African Union, pamwe neUnited Nations kuti aise maziso awo muZimbabwe. Muzinda weAmerica muZimbabwe waburitsawo mashoko ekutsoropodza kupambwa kunonzi kuri kuitwa varwiri vekodzero dzevanhu pamwe nenhengo dzeMDC pamberi pekuratidzira. America yakurudzira hurumende kuti iferefete zvakakwana kupambwa kunonzi kuri kuitwa vanhu uku. Mutauriri wemapurisa, Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi, vaburitsa mashoko ekuti vari kuferefeta nyaya yekupambwa kwevanhu iyi uye vanoti semapurisa vawanawo matombo nerhekeni pakati pedhorobha reHarare zvavanoti zviri kufungidzirwa kuti zvakaunzwa mudhorobha nenhengo dzeMDC kuti dzizokonzera mhirizhonga. Vati mapurisa achabuda nehuwandu hwawo mangwana kuti achengetedze runyararo, veruzhinji pamwe nezvivakwa zvehurumende. Nhasi mapurisa anga akapakatira zvombo aswera achitenderera pakati pedhorobha muHarare ane zvinoshandiswa pakudeedzera achikurudzira veruzhinji kuti vasapinde mumigwagwa vachiratidzira mangwana asi kuti vaite mabasa avo murunyararo. Murongi wemisangano muMDC, VaAmos Chibaya, vakurudzira vatsigiri vavo kuti varatidzirewo murunyararo vachiti basa remapurisa nderekuchengetedza runyararo kwete kushungurudza vanenge vachiratidzira. Nekune rumwe rutivi, munyori mukuru musangano rinomirira vashandi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, VaJaphet Moyo, vati nhengo dzesangano ravo dzinoda kupinda mumigwagwa dzichibatana neMDC pekuratidzira, dzakasununguka kuita izvi vachiti sangano ravo rine nhengo dzinobva kumapato akasiyana-siyana uye nhengo idzi dzine kodzero yekudyidzana nemapato adzinoda. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vaburitsawo mashoko padandemutande ravo reTwitter neFacebook kuti havasati vavhara misuwo yekuti paitwe nhaurirano munyika vachiti kuratidzira nemhirizhonga hakuna zvakunobatsira. VaMnangagwa vanonzi vaudza chikwata chekomisheni inoona nezvekodzero vanhu muAU cheAfrican Commsion on Human and People’s Rights icho chiri kushanya munyika kuti hurumende haisi kuzorambidza MDC kuratidzira vachiti nhengo dzebato iri dzinofanira kuita izvi murunyararo. MDC inoti icharatidzira mangwana ichiti haisi kufara nekusamira zvakanaka kwakaita hupfumi hwenyika. Mutungamiri weMDC, VaNelson Chamisa, vanoti havaone VaMnangagwa semutungamiri wenyika akasarudzwa pachena kunyange hazvo komisheni inoona nezvesarudzo yeZimbabwe Electoral Commission yakazivisa kuti VaMnangagwa ndivo vakakunda musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika gore rapera izvo zvakatsinhirwa nedare reConstitutional Court. No media source currently available
title: Vanorwira Kodzero dzeVanhu Voshushikana neKutyorwa kweKodzero dzeVanhu

text: Zvichitevera mashoko ehurumende ichizivisa kuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kudzoka kumusha, nevabvakure vari kushanya kuZimbabwe, vachavhenekwa panzvimbo yavanosvikira kana vaine chirwere cheCovid-19 uye vachazvibhadharira mari yekuvhenekwa kwavo, imwe nyanzvi mune zvehutano inoti chirwere chinotapuriranwa chinofanirwa kuiswa mumaoko ehurumende, senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi. Richinyora paTwitter paro, bazi rezvekufambiswa kwemashoko rati vose vanosvika munyika vachavhenekwa uye vachagariswa kure nevamwe, kana kuti quarantine, vachizvibhadharira kuvhenekwa nepavanogara kwemasvondo maviri. Hurumende yati izvi zvichaitwa kumunhu arikupinda muZimbabwe wese kunyangwe akawanikwa asina hutachiona hweCovid-19. Izvi zvinotevera kuziviswa neSouth Africa kweimwe mhando yeCovid 19 itsva, yeOmicron. Hurumende inotiwo, senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwe mhando iyi muZimbabwe, vanhu havabvumidzwi kufamba famba pakati pa9 O’clock manheru na 6 O’clock mangwanani. Hurumende inotiwo vachabvumidzwa kupinda mumabhawa nemu maNight Club ndeavo vakabaiwa nhomba yeCovid-19. Vaimbova gurukota rezvehutano, Dr Henry Madzorera, vanoti hurumende yaita zvakanaka mukuratidza chido chekuchengetedza hutano hwevana veZimbabwe kubva kuchirwere ichi, asi vachiti hurumende haifanirwi kuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvibhadhare mari yekuvhenekwa neyekumbogariswa vari voga, kana kuti ‘quarantine’, sezvo riri basa rehurumende rekubatsira zvizvarwa zvayo panguva yedambudziko rinogona kubata nyika yose, kana kuti ‘national emergency’. Dr Madzorera vati zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinofanirwa kuvhenekwa pachena uye kuchengetwa mu‘quarantine’ pachena kusvika vawonekwa kuti vane hutano hwakanaka. Dr Madzorera vashora kuti hurumende inoda kubvumidza vanhu vakabaiwa nhomba kuti vapinde mumabhawa nemu maNight Club, vachiti idzi inzvimbo dzinoparadzira hutachiwana uhu. Vanoti zvataurwa nehurumende, zvokuti vanhu vanobvumidzwa kuungana vanofanirwa kutevedzera mitemo yakatarwa nesangano reWorld Health Organization (WHO), hazvina maturo nekuti WHO inongobatsira neruzivo asi zviri mumaoko ehurumende dzose dzose kusarudza zvadzinoda kushandisa munyika dzavo. Dr Madzorera vanoti hurumende haina kutaura pamusoro penzvimbo dzinorapwa vanhu, vachiti izvi zvinoreva kuti mhando yeOmicron iyi ikauya nyika yose haina kugadzirira. Dr Madzorera vabvuma kuti mitemo yaiswa nehurumende yakanaka asi vachiti inoda kungotsvenenzerwa chete uye vachiti vanofara kuti hurumende haina kuvharisisa mabhodha nenyika dzakapoteredza Zimbabwe sezvo zvisina zvazvinobatsira. Vati hurumende inofanirwa kusimudzira zvirongwa zvekubaya vanhu nhomba nokuti ndiyo nzira yoga yekurwisa denda iri. No media source currently available
title: Hurumende Yoshorwa neKurumbidzwa Padanho Rayatora Mukurwisana neMhando yeOmicron

text: Vagari vakawanda vemuguta reMasvingo vanoti havasi kufara nekudzimwa dzimwa kuri kugara kwakaitwa magetsi izvo zviri kuvhiringawo kuwanikwa kwemvura. Vagari vemumisha yeveruzhinji muMasvingo vanoti vave nemazuva anopfuura mashanu magetsi achidzimwa izvo vanoti zviri kuvhiringa mararamiro avo. Mumwe mugari wekuMucheke, Amai Patience Masuka, vanoti kuenda kwemagetsi zuva nezuva kuri kuvarwadza sezvo varisiri kuudzwa chikonzero chaari kudzimirwa. VaTipen Mago, avo vanogara kuRunyararo West, vanoti kuenda kwemagetsi kwave kuvadhurira nekuti vave kumanikidzwa kutenga dzimwe mhando dzemoto dzakaita segasi kana huni. Mukuru wemabasa musangano revagari, reMasvingo United Residents and Rate Payers Alliance, VaAnoziva Muguti,vanoti kambani yeZesa inofanira kuzivisa vagari zvikonzero zvairi kudzimira magetsi. Pamusoro pekushaya magetsi, vagari vazhinji vanoti vari kushushikana nekukwidzwa kwemutengo wemagetsi uyo wakakwidzwa neZesa nemusi weChina. Aka kava kechipiri magetsi achikwidzwa mwedzi uno. Mayunitsi makumi mashanu aiita dhora nemasendi makumi matanhatu ekuAmerica, ave kuita dhora nemasendi makumi manomwe. Mayunitsi zana ave kuita madhora matanhatu kubvapamadhora mashanu nemasendi makumi manomwe ekuAmerica. Mukuru webasa muhofisi yesangano rinomirira vatengi reConsumer Council of Zimbabwe muMasvingo, VaDumisani Mungusthini, vanoti kukwira kwemitengo yemagetsi kunogona kukwidza mitengo yezvimwe zvinhu muzvitoro. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kumutauriri weZESA, VaFullard Gwasira, sezvo vanga vasingadairi nhare yavo kana kupindura tsamba mbozha dzatavatumira. Mune imwewo nyaya, chikoro cheDandavare Primary kwaGutu, chakapindwa nenjodzi mushure mekunge vana vatatu vanwa mvura pachikoro ichi negaba rinofungidzirwa kuti raiva nemuchetura, mumwe wavo akashaya. Mwana akashaya nemusi weChitatu uyu, avigwa nhasi muraini rekwaMutero mudunhu raIshe Chin’ombe. No media source currently available
title: Magetsi Ogara Akadzimwa Nguva Zhinji kuMasvingo

text: Mugari wekuMasvingo, Va Paul Zinhoro, vanoti muguta hamuna mufaro hwakakwana kuvagari kunyange kune musangano mukuru wakadai. Vagari vemudhorobha reMasvingo vanoti vari kugara vachitya kutaura nyaya dziri kuvanetsa mukurarama pamwe nezviri kuitika munyika sezvo muguta ravo muzere vasori zvichitevera musangano we Zanu PF wekupera kwegore uri kuitirwa muguta iri. Vataura ne Studio7 vanoti nyaya hadzisi kutaurika sezvo vanochengetedza runyararo vanosanganisira mapurisa, mauto pamwe nevasori vakawandisa muguta iri. Mugari wekuMasvingo, Va Paul Zinhoro, vanoti muguta hamuna mufaro hwakakwana kuvagari kunyange kune musangano mukuru wakadai. Mumwevo mugari aramba kudomwa zita rake atikunyange kufamba famba kwava kunetsa kunyaya mumusha we Rhodene uyo une imba ichange ichigara mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe. Vamwe vanoti vakatarirwa nguva dzekufamba vakanzi kana nguva dza six manheru dzachaya vapinde mudzimba. VaJefferson ChitandovekwaMucheke vanoti nyaya hadzichatauriki munzvimbo dzekutandarira. Musangano uyu uri kuitwa apo kune kurwisana kukuru mumusangano pakati pezvikwata zviviri zve Lactose ne G40. Musangano uyu, uyo unopera musi we Mugovera uri kuitwa apo zvikwata zviviri zve Lactoste ne G40 zvirikurwisana zvikuru kuti zvigotsiva Va Mugabe pavachasiya chigaro. Studio 7 yatadza kubata sachigaro we Zanu PF veMasvingo, Va Amasa Nenjana, kuti tinzwe pfungwa dzavo panyayayevagari avo vari kutya kufamba vachitaura pfungwa dzavo pachena. No media source currently available
title: Vanhu Votadza Kusununguka kuMasvingo Vachitya Vasori

text: Bhaisikopo refu rinonzi 'Lost Tongue' iro rinorondedzera nezve rurimi rwechi N!uu rwunotaurwa nevanhu verudzi rweKhomani San, vanowanikwa mugwenga reKalahari kuSouth Africa, rakashura mare neSvondo manheru mushure mekuwana mubairo unokosha weWomen Film Critics Circle Award. Mubairo uyu wakapiwa pamabiko akaitwa kumutambo weSocially Relevant Film Festival uchangobva kupera ku New York, muno muAmerica. Bhaisikopo iri rakaitwa nekambani yeMvura ya Afrika Productions ichi tungamirwa nechizvarwa cheZimbabwe, VaDavison Mudzingwa. Vachitaura vari kuJohannesburg, South Africa, VaMudzingwa vanoti vakafadzwa zvikuru nekuwana mubairo uyu sezvo bhaisikopo ravo rakakwanisa kuve pakati pemabhaisikopo masere akawana mubairo kubva pamabhaisikopo makumi mana nemapfumbamwe. “Chiitiko ichi chakatifadza, uye chakatikatyamadzawo kuti pamabhaisikopo makumi mana nemapfumbamwe airatidzwa ikoko mumipanda yakasiyanasiyana inosanganisira iyo ma documentary marefu munove mataive tiri, nema documentary mapfupi uyewo mafirimu aya anonzi pachirungu efiction, tinge tichipiwawo mubairo pavasere vakawana,” VaMudzingwa vanodaro. Vanoti vanofunga kuti kucherechedzwa kwavakaitwa uku kuchabatsira zvikuru kuti hurumende yeSouth Africa ichengetedze mutauro wechi N!uu uyu.
