VaMudzingwa, vanove chizvarwa cheZimbabwe, vanoti vanofungidzira kuti mubairo wavakawana uyu pamwe nerukuremekedzo rwacho zvichaitawo kuti dzimwe hurumende dzakaita seZimbabwe, uko kune mitauro inosanganisira Nambia, Ndau neKalanga iyo yave kukotama irarame. “Izvozvi izvi zvakakoshawo kuti iyeni sechizvarwa cheZimbabwe ndinge ndichisvika pakunzwa manyavi kuti inyaya inofanirwa kunge ichiongororwawo mukati mehurumende yeZimbabwe kuti zvigadziriswe mukati menyika yedu kunzvimbo dzakasiyanasiyana dzine mitauro yave kusvika pakunge ichi kotama nekutsakatika,” vanodaro VaMudzingwa. Vanoti kunyange hazvo rwendo rwebhaisikopo ravo kuAmerica rwapera, havasi kumira sezvo riri kutarisirwa kuratidzwa zvakare kuSingapore kuWorld International Film Festival mwedzi unouya kozotiwo muna Chikunguru kuCanada kumakwikwi e Best Feature Documentary. No media source currently available
title: Bhaisikopo 'Lost Tongue' Rinowana Mubairo weWomen Film Critics Circle kuNew York

text:
Mukuru wesangano reConfederation of Zimbabwe Retailers VaDenford Mutashu, vanoti kushaikwa kwehupfu nekutengeswa kwaho pamukoto mucherechedzo mukuru wekusamira zvakanaka kwehupfumi munyika.

Vachitaura neStudio7 mushure memusangano waitwa nesangano reGrain Millers Association of Zimbabwe nevatapi venhau muBulawayo, VaMutashu vati kuvepo kwevanhu vakawanda vanoita zvemabhizimisi vakazvimirira vega vakawanda vacho vachiita izvi zvisiri pamutemo - kana kuti informal sector, kuri kuita kuti vemabhizimisi ezvitoro zvikuru vatatarike. Vati hurumende inofanirwa kugadzirisa mamiriro ehupfumi nekukasika vachiti kana izvi zvikasaitika vamwe vezvitoro zvikuru ava vachatadza kuramba vachishanda.

VaMutashu varamba nyaya yekuti vezvitoro zvikuru ndivo vari kukonzera kushaikwa kwehupfu vachinzi vanohutengesa pamukoto vachiti kushikwa kwehupfu kuripo kuri kukonzerwa nekuti hupfu hwacho hausi kuwanikwa. VaMutashu vati nekuda kwekuti mafuta emotokari ari kugara achikwira nguva dzose, izvi zvinorevawo kuti mutengo wehupfu unofanirwa kugara uchiwedzerwawo zvakaringana. Mukuru weGrain Millers Association of Zimbabwe, GMAZ, VaTafadzwa Musarara, vati sangano ravo rakapiwa mvumo nehurumende pakupera kwaMbudzi kuti ritenge chibage kubva kunze kwenyika vakati izvi zvichabatsira kuderedza kushomeka kwehupfu mukati memasvondo mashoma ari kutevera. VaMusarara vabvuma kuti vamwe vanogaya hupfu nevamwewo vanotengesa vari kukonzera kushaikwa kwehupfu nekuti vanohutengesa pamukoto asi vati kuti dambudziko iri ripere, munyika munofanirwa kuve nehupfu hwakawanda. Munyori mukuru wesangano reBulawayo United Residents Association, Amai Louisa Mangisi, avo vange vari pamusangano uyu, vati vanotarisira kuti danho riri kutorwa nesangano reGMAZ richabatsira kupedza dambudziko rekushaikwa kwehupfu. Apo VaMutashu vanga vachitaura nevatori venhau, vanhu vakawanda vanga vakamira pamutsetse wekutenga hupfu muBulawayo. Mutengo wehupfu wakambokwira zvikuru mushure mekunge hurumende yabvisa mari yainosa pamutengo wehupfu kuitira kuti husanyanya kukwira, asi yakazodzorerazve mari iyi pakutanga kwaMbudzi. Nekuda kwekusanaya zvakanaka kwemvura munyika, nyika yakatarisana nedambudziko rekushaikwa kwechikafu kunyanya chibage icho chinogadzirisa hupfu chinove chikafu chinonyanya kudyiwa neveruzhinji munyika. No media source currently available
title: Hupfu Hwonetsa Kuwana Munyika

text: Zimbabwe Footaball Association (ZIFA) yaudza paramende kuti iri kunamata kuti mutambo weZimbabwe neAlgeria weConfederation of Africa Football (CAF) uyo unotarisirwa kutambwa kuSouth Africa mushure mekunge nhandare dzemuno dzanzi hadzikodzeri kutambirwa nhabvu, uchambomiswa nekuda kwechirwere cheCoronavirus icho chapararira pasi rese kusanganisira South Africa neAlgeria. ZIFA inoti kana izvi zvikaitika, zvinopa Zimbabwe mukana wekugadzirisa nhandare yadzo uye mutambo uyu unogona kuzotambirwa muZimbabwe. Vachipa humbowo kukomiti inoona nezvemutambo pamusoro pemamiriro akaita nhandare dzemuno, mutungamiriri weZIFA, VaFelton Kamambo, vati zvichitevera chisungo cheCAF, vakatora danho rekuti mutambo uyu utambirwe kuSouth Africa. Vati kunyange hazvo vaida kuti mutambo uyu utambirwe kunhandare yeOrlando, izvi hazvichaita uye vave kutarisira kuti mutambo uyu utambirwe munhandare yeDobsonville kuSoweto. Asi vati hapana chibvumirano chati chaitwa kuti vashandise nhandare iyi uye vati nhume dzavo dziri kusangana neSouth Africa Footaball Association, hurumende yeSouth Africa pamwe nevamiriri vemuzinda wemumiriri weZimbabwe kuSouth Africa kuti vagdzirise nyaya iyi. Vati kana vakatadza kuwana nhandare kuSouth Africa, vachatsvaga nhandare kuZambia. Asi vati nokuda kwechirwere cheCoronavirus icho chatove kuSouth Africa neAlgeria, vanovimba kuti mutambo uyu uchaendeswa mberi. Vanoona nezvemari muZIFA, VaPhilemon Machana, vati vakatonyorera kuhurumende neCAF vachikumbira kuti mutambo uye uendeswe mberi uye vakamirira mhinduro. Vati kana mutambo uyu ukaendeswa mberi, zvinopa mukana wekuti nhandare dzemuZimbabwe dzeBarbourfields neNational Sports Stadium dzigadzirwe uye mutambo uyu unozotambirwa muno. Vatiwo kunyange mutambo wekuSouth Africa ukabudirira Zimbabwe haisi kuda kuenda kuAlgeria uye yakatonyorera CAF ichiti Algeria inofanirawo kutambira kunyika isina Coronavirus. Chirwere ichi chatouraya munhu mumwe muAlgeria. Vakuru veZIFA vazivisawo kuti kusvika pari zvino mutambo weZimbabwe neAlgeria hausati wava kushambadzwa nekuti South African Football Association yakamirira kunzwa kubva kuAlgeria yacho ichabvumidzwa kupinda muSouth Africa here sezvo nyika zhinji dzave kurambidza vanhu vanobva kunyika dzine Coronavirus kupinda munyika madzo. VaKamambo vatiwo pane vatambi vasere vanotambira mhiri kwemakungwa vakatozivisa kuti havakwanisi kuzotambira maWarriors nekuda kweCoronavirus. VaKamambo vati vane bhajeti rezviuru zana nemakumi mashanu emadhora ekuAmerica pamutambo weAlgeria asi kana mutambo uyu ukatambirwa kuSouth Africa, vanenge vave kuda zviuru mazana maviri zvemadhora ekuAmerica. Mumiriri weHighfields East, VaEric Murayi veMDC, vati ZIFA inofanira kutoramba zvachose kutamba neAlgeria vachiti hutano hwemaWarriors hwakakosha kudarika nhabvu. VaKamambo vaudzawo paramende kuti ZIFA haina rubatsiro rwemari hwairi kuwana kubva kuhurumende nekudaro gore rino pamitambo yese yemaNational Teams inotambirwa munyika dzemuSADC, vatambi vanenge vachienda nemabhazi. Sachigaro vekomiti yezvemutambo, VaMathias Tongofa, vaudza ZIFA kuti inofanira kushanda nekomiti yavo vachiti dai vakaziva matambudziko eZIFA kare, vangadai vakaibatsira pane zvakawanda kusanganisira kutsvaga mari yekugadzirisa nhandare kuti mitambo yeCAF itambirwe. Asi kunyange ZIFA ichitarisira kuti mutambo wayo neAlgeria uchaendeswa mberi, CAF yazivisa nhasi kuti mitambo yayo yese iri kuenderera mberi. Yati yasununguka kuti mitambo iyi itambwe munhandare dzisina vanhu nekuda kweCoronavirus. Dzimwe nyika dzakaita seMadagascar neKenya dzatorambidza vatambi vadzo kuenda kune dzimwe nyika nekuda kweCoronavirus. Kusvika pari zvino Coronavirus yabata vanhu vanodarika zviuru zana nemakumi maviri nekuuraya vanhu vanodarika zviuru zvina nemazana matanhatu pasi rose. No media source currently available
title: Zifa Yonamatira Kumiswa kweMitambo yeNhabvu Kuburikidza neCoronavirus

text: Mutongi wedare repamusoro reHigh Court Justice Joseph Musakwa nemusi weMuvhuro vakakurudzira vemapato ezvematongerwo enyika navose vanoda zvigaro zvacho kuti vasiyane netsika yekuita mhirizhonga panguva yesarudzo idzo dziri kutarisirwa kuitwa mwedzi mishoma inotevera. Justice Musakwa vakataura mashoko aya nhasi pakuvhurwa kwegore ra2018 mukutongwa kwedzimhosva kuno kwaMutare. Vakati panguva dzekutsvaga rutsigiro dzimwe nguva panodeuka ropa sezvo vezvematongerwo enyika vachiita mhirizhonga pakutsvaga rutsigiro kuti vakunde musarudzo idzi. VaMusakwa vati matare anoguma oremerwa nenyaya idzi ukuwo vamwe vachitaura zvengozi. Justice Musakwa vati nyaya dzekupondwa kwevanhu dziri kuramba dzichikwira uye gore rino kune gumi dzichatongwa muManicaland. Vati chido chavo kuti Mutare ivewo nemuzinda wedare repamusoro sezvakaitwa kuMasvingo. Vatiwo nyaya dzehuowi idzo vati dzakawandira kumapazi ehurumende dzinofanira kupedzwa. Mashoko aJustice Musakwa akatambirwa zvakanaka nevemachechi, mapoka emagweta, uye nevashandi vekumatare vachiti vabata zvakakosha zvavanosangana nazvo zuva nezuva. VaPassmore Nyakureba gweta rinosanda nesangano reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights, ZLHR vanoti vafarira mashoko avo kunyanya panyaya yehuwori hwatsviriridza munyika. “Ndafara nemashoko aJustice Musakwa kuno kuManicaland apo vati huwori hwanga hwauraya nyika uye nyaya yemhirizhonga dzinosanganisira dzema-elections, zvakare nesanctity of human life saka zvinhu zvitatu izvi ndizvo zvinobata pillar yemessage yavo.” Vatiwo, “Saka ndino kurudzira kuti Judiciary service system yedu inge ichipa rutsigo kucommunity yedu, nekupedza corruption, uye kuvepo kwemaspecial courts ekutonga corruption sezvo iri nyaya yakakosha.” Mukuru weZimbabwe Law Society VaBlessing Nyamaropa vaudza Studio 7 kuti VaMusakwa vanyatsobata nyaya yekupedzwa kwehuwori munyika. “Justice Musakwa vabata nyaya yecorruption iyo vanoti inokanganisa investment yemunyika.” Vaenderera mberi vachiti vaMusakwa, “Vabatazve nyaya yecorruption mujustice delivery system, vakati justice is for free haifanirwi kutengeswa uye vanhu vanofanirwa kurepota macases ecorruption mujustice system.” VaDavid Tandiri vanoshanda neTandiri Law Chambers vatiwo mashoko aVaMusakwa ekuti mapurisa awanirwe zvakaringana mukuita basa ravo akakosha mukufambisa nyaya dzekutongwa kwevanhu kumatare edzimhosva. “Mashoko aturwa navaMusakwa mashoko kwawo apo vataura kuti tichange tave neHigh Court, vatiwo nyaya dzekutorwa kwehumbowo kumapurisa kugadziriswe, uye kuti vawanirwe zvikwaniisiro zvekuti vakwanise kuunganidza humbowo hwose hunodiwa pasinaa zvinetsva kunyanya kunyaya dzekuba vakapfumbata pfuti, dzekubhinya, dzekurwisna nedzimwe.” Reverand Basil Matikiti vechechi yeAnglican avo vange vari pachiitiko ichi vanoti machechi ane chekuitawo pamusoro pemashoko ataurwa naVaMusakwa kunyanya panyaya yemhirizhonga yavataura. “Message yange yakamira zvakanaka taiappreciyeta nekuti tave kupinda mumaelections ende apa ndipo vanhu wanotanga kupondana, asi zvawataurawo kudai wanhu tichateerera.” Sachigaro weZanu-PF mudunhu reManicaland VaMike Madiro vanoti mashoko aJustice Musakwa anosimbaradza mamwe akambotaurwa nemutungamiriri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa. “Justice Musakwa vakahomedza kukosha kunoita zvinobuda musarudzo yaitwa murunyararo, ichokwadi ichocho, vaMusakwa vange vachitodzokorora zvagara zvichitaurwa naPresident wedu waMnangagwa vari kuti chishuwo chenyika, chishuwo chemhuri yeZimbabwe kuti waite zviro zvawo murunyararo, paitwe sarudzo isina mhirizhonga sarudzo inoti anenge akundwa neahwina vanenge vangori vana veZimbabwe.” Vakuru vemapazi ehurumende, kuchiuto, mapurisa nemajeri vange vari pachiitiko chanhasi pamwechete negurukota redunhu reManicaland Amai Monica Mtsvangwa. Madzishe, Zimunya, Mutasa uye Marange vange varipoowo pakuvhurwa kwedare zviri pamutemo.
title: Mutongi weDare rePamusoro VaMusakwa Voshora Mhirizhonga yezveMatongerwo eNyika

text: Musangano weNational Council yeMDC-T unoti wabuda nechisungo chekudzinga mubato iri, mutevedzeri wemutungamiri webato, Muzvare Thokozani Khupe, sezvo vari kuramba vakaomesa musoro vachiramba kutambira zvakatarwa ne National Council zvekucherechedza kudomwa kwaVaNelson Chamisa semutungamiri mutsva webato. Bato iri rinotiwo radzinga mubato munyori wezvekurongwa kwemisangano, Va Abednico Bhebhe, uye rinoti ratambira kusiya basa kwakaitwa neChina nasachigaro webato, Va Lovemore Moyo. Bato iri ratiwo riri kubvisa Muzvare Khupe naVa Bhebhe muparamende sezvo vasisiri nhengo dzebato iri. Vachitaura nevatori venhau, mutevedzeri wasachigaro webato, VaMorgen Komichi, vatiwo mutauriri webato, VaObert Gutu, vadzingwawo mubato. Asi VaGutu vaudza vatori venhau kuti havangadzingwe mubato nemutungamiri webato asiri pamutemo. Nemusi weSvondo, Muzvare Khupe vakazivisa kuti havachineyi nevanhu vari kutyora bumbiro rebato, vakati ivo vari kuronga kongiresi mwedzi unouya yekugadzirisa zviri kunetsa mubato. Mashoko akaburitswa naMuzvare Khupe mushure memusangano wavakaita muBulawayo kuAmphi Theatre, akaratidza pachena kuti vava kuenderera nehurongwa hwavo vega hwokuita kongiresi iyo inotarisirwa kuvagdza semutemutungamiri achafanobata chigaro zvichitevera kushaya kwaVaMorgan Tsvangirai mwedzi wapera. Zviri kuitika muMDC T zvava kuburitsa pachena kuti pava nemapato maviri achange achizviti MDC-T. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi raVaBhebhe naMuzvare Khupe zvichitevera chisungo cheNational Council.
title: MDC-T Inodzinga Muzvare Khupe, VaGutu naVaBhebhe

text: Vagari vemumaguta nemadhorobha, pamwe nenyanzvi vanoti nyaya yekuti vanhu vanoramba vachibatwa nezvirwere zvemanyoka zvakaita setyphoid nekorera zvinoratidza kuti hurumende nemakunzuru hazvisi kushandisa mari zvine mwero kwenguva yakareba. Hurumende ine mutemo unoti makanzuru anofanirwa kushandisa zvikamu makumi manomwe kubva muzana zvemabhajeti awo kuita mabasa akaita sekuwanisa vanhu mvura yakachena nekutakura marara uye zvikamu makumi matatu kubva muzana semari yemihoro. Asi izvi handizvo zviri kuitika sezvo makanzuru mazhinji munyika ave kutotambirisa mari yakakwira kudarika makambani anoshanda akazvimirira. Semuenzaniso, mukoti wemukanzuru yeHarare anotambira zviuru zviviri nemazana mashanu emadhora asi mukoti anoshandira hurumebde achitambira mazana mashanu emadhora. Vaimbove meya VeHarare, VaBenard Manyenyeni, vanoti nyaya yemihoro yevashandi ndiyo yauraya kanzuru yeHarare. VaManyenyeni vanoti kanzuru iyi haigoni kuita basa rayo nekuda kwenyaya iyi. Mukuru werimwe remasangano anomirira vagari vemuHarare, reHarare Resident Trust, VaPrecious Shumba, vaudza Studio7 kuti hurumende inofanira kumisa zvese izvi yowona kuti mari yemvura yashandiswa mabasa emvura. Vanotiwo nyaya yehuwori mukanzuru ndiyo iri kuita makanzuru aya atadze kutakura marara nekupa vanhu mvura yakachena izvo zvinokonzera kuwanda kwetsvina nezvirwere zvemudumbu. VaManyenyeni vanotiwo nyaya yekuti hurumende, vagari nemakambani havasi kubhadhara mitero inoomeserawo kunzuru nekuitadzisa kuita mabasa ayo zvinozopedzisira zvakonzera zvirwere zvakaita sekorera. Mutauriri wekanzuru, VaMichael Chideme, vanoti havadi kuti vagari vabatwe nezvirwere, uye zvakakosha kuti vanhu vabhadhare mitero kuitira kuti kanzuru ikwanise kuivaitira zvese zvakaita sekuvapa mvura yakachena. MuHarare nemamwe madhorobha vanhu vanogara vakabatwa nezvirwere zvinokonzerwa netsvina nekushaikwa kwemvura yakachena nekusatakurwa kwemarara. Iko zvino pane vanhu makumi mana nemapfumbabwe vafana nechirwere korera uye hurumende yave kuita chipata pata chekutsvaga rubatsiro kuti ikwanise kurapa nekumisa kupararira kwechirwere. Mukuru wezvirwere zvekutapurirana mubazi rezvehutano, Dr Portia Manangazira, vanoti zvirwere zvekorera netyphoid zvave kunetsa kurapika zvopa kuti vape vanhu nhomba kuti vasatapurirwe chirwere ichi. VaManyenyeni nenyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi, VaMasimba Manyanya, vanoti mafambisirwe ari kuitwa hurumende handiwo vachiti nyika haingararame nekupemha. Vanoti hurumende nemakanzuru vanofanira kugara vaine mari parutivi yekubatsira kana pachange paita dambudziko rakaita sekorera. Tsvagiridzo ichangobva mukuitwa neUniversity of Zimbabwe, inoratidzawo kuti zvirango zvakatemerwa Zimbabwe zvakakanganisawo zvikuru mabasa ezvehutano munyika. Zvakabuda mutsvakiridzo iyi, iyo yakaitirwa bazi rezvedzidzo yepamusoro neUniversity of Zimbabwe, zvinoratidza kuti mari yerubatsiro kunyika nemakanzuru munyika yakadzikira nekuda kwezvirango uye kuti mitengo yezvinhu nemabasa yakakwirawo zvakanyanya. Tsvagiridzo iyi inotiwo hurumende nemakanzuru vanofanira kutsvaga nzira dzekukunganidza mari muno kwete kumirira vekunze. Nyika dzakawanda nemasangano ekunze nemakambani akazvimira ndivo vari kubatsira zvakanyanya mukurwisana nekokera pamwe nekubatsira makanzuru kuita mabasa ekuwanisa vanhu mvura pamwe nekutakura marara. No media source currently available
title: Kutadza Kuronga Zvinhu Kwokonzeresa Zvirwere Zvinorapika Nyore

text:
Zimbabwe yakatarisana nedambudziko remweya wekubatsira kufema kwevarwere veCovid-19 vanenge vachirwarisa munzvimbo dzakawanda munyika. Vanoziva zviri kuitika vanoti dambudziko rekushaikwa kwemweya unobatsira vanhu vanenge varwarisa riri kuitika mumatunhu akawanda. Izvi zvinonzi zviri kukonzerwa nehuwandu hwevarwere veCovid-19 vari muzvipatara pamwe nevakachengeterwa muma isolation centers.

Gurukota reMashonaland West, Amai Mliswa-Chikoka, vakazivisa mukuru anomirira dunhu muCovid-19 National Taskforce uye vari gurukota rezvemitemo, VaZiyambi Ziyambi, pamusangano wavakaita neMugovera kuti nzvimbo dzinochengeterwa vanhu vanenge varwarisa nechirwere cheCovid-19, hadzichisina medical oxygen.

Amai Mliswa-Chikoka vakati vakaudza bazi rezvehutano mamiriro
akashata aita dambudziko iri mudunhu reMashonaland West.

Mukuru wezvehutano mudunhu reHurungwe kuMashonaland West, VaShephard Marweyi, vakatiwo ichokwadi kuti dambudziko re medical oxygen, ranetsa munzvimbo yavo.

Mukuru anoona nezvechirwere cheCovid-19 mudunhu reMashonaland Central uye vari gurukota rezvemukati menyika, VaKazembe Kazembe, vanoti dambudziko iri richiri mudunhu ravo, kunyange hazvo rava nani.

Mudunhu reMidlands, mukuru wezvehutano mudunhu iri, VaReginald Mhene, vanoti kunyange zvava nani, dambudziko iri rinogara richinetsa mudunhu ravo.

Asi mukuru mubazi rezvehutano mudunhu reManicaland, VaSamson Nyoni, vanoti dunhu ravo harina dambudziko iri.

Mukuru anoona nezvechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika, Dr Agnes Mahomva, vati titaure nemutauriri webazi rezvehutano, VaDonald Mujiri, avo vanoti vanga vasati vataura nematunhu ose kuti vazive kuti ndeapi mamwe matunhu ane dambudziko iri.

Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa kuti vanhu makumi matatu nevatatu vkafa
nechirwere cheCovid-19 nezuro izvo zvakasvitsa vanhu vafa nechirwere
ichi pachiuru chimwe chete nemazana mapfumbamwe ane gumi nemumwechete, 1 911, uye vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika yose, vave zviuru makumi mashanu nezvitanhatu zvine gumi nevana, 56
014, zvichitevera kubatwa kwevanhu chiuru chine mazana mashanu nemakumi mana, 1 540, nezuro wakare.

Kusvika nezuro, hurumende inoti vanhu vabaiwa nhomba yekutanga yeCovid-19 vave zviuru mazana manomwe ane makumi mapfumbamwe nezvinomwe zvine zvine mazana manomwe negumi nevashanu, 797 715, uye vabaiwa nhomba dzose dziri mbiri vave zviuru mazana mashanu ane makumi masere nechimwe chete ine mazana manomwe ane makumi maviri nemumwe chete, 571 721.

Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhuta kubva muzana kuitira kuti chirwere ichi
chisarambe chichipararira munyika. No media source currently available
title: Mweya Unobatsira Kufema Varwarisa, Medical Oxygen, Wonetsa Kuwana Munyika

text: Nhengo dzeMDC mbiri dzakabuditswa mujeri reChikurubi nezuro mushure memakore masere mushure mekukuwanikwa dzisina mhosva panyaya yadzainzi dzakaponda mupurisa muna 2011 dzinoti hadzisi kuzodzokera kumashure nenyaya yekurwira kuti munyika muve nehutongi hwejekerere. Vachitaura neStudio 7 nhasi mushure mekubuditswa kwavakaitwa mujeri nezuro, VaLast Maengehama naVaTungamirai Madzokere vati kugara kwavakaita mujeri kwenguva refu hakusi kuzovaworesa mwoyo panyaya yekurwira kuti munyika muve neshanduko munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika.  VaMaengehama vati vari kuda kuti munyika muve nehutongi hwejekere vachiti vachashanda zvakasimba nevamwe vavo. Mashoko aVaMaengehama atsinhirwa naVaMadzokere avo vati vacharamba vachiita zvematongerwo enyika donzvo riri rekuti munyika muve negutsaruzhinji. VaMadzokere naVaMaengehama vati vachabata basa vari kuMDC Alliance inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa. VaMaengehama vati kusawirirana kuri muMDC hakufanire kuita kuti veruzhinji varase gwara remusangano wavo vachiti chakakosha ndechekuti zvido zveveruzhinji zvitungamidzwe mberi. VaMaengehama vakurudzirawo mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, kuti vagare pasi vataurirane naVaChamisa kugadzirisa matambudziko akatarisana nenyika. Asi VaMnangagwa nebato ravo reZanu PF vanoti nhaurirano dziri kuitwa dziri kuitwa pasi pegungano rePolitical Actors Dialogue kana kuti Polad vachiti vese vanoda zvenhaurirano vanofanira kuuya kuPolad. VaChamisa nekune rumwe vanoti havasi kuzoenda kunhaurirano dzekuPolad vachiti gakava riri munyika rinotangira panyaya dzekubirirwa kwavanoti kwakaitwa sarudzo naVaMnagagwa avo vanoti vakahwinha zviri pachena. VaMadzokere vakurudzira kuti patsvagwe nzira dzekugadzirisa kuti sarudzo dzisabirirwe.  VaMadzokere vatiwo ivo naVaMaengehama vakashandisawo nguva yavanga vari kujeri kuwedzerera dzidzo yavo asi vanoti kujeri hakuna zvikwanisiro zvekuti vasungwa vanenge vachida kudzidza vaenderere mberi nedzidzo vachipika zvavo. VaMaengehama naVaMadzokere vakasungwa pamwe chete nedzimwe nhengo dzeMDC makumi maviri nenomwe vachipomerwa mhosva yekuponda mupurisa VaPetros Mutedza panzvimbo yemabhizimusi iri mumusha weGlen View muna 2011 pamhirizhonga yakaitika panzvimbo iyi ine chekuita nezvematongerwo enyika. Vakazobatwa nemhosva yekuponda VaMutedza nedare repamusoro vakagara mujeri kwemakore masere asi vakazowanikwa nedare reSupreme Court nezuro vasina mhosva panyaya iyi. Pakutongwa kwenyaya yavo, nhengo dzeMDC idzi dzaiti dzaishungurudzwa zvine chekuita nezvematongerwo enyika. No media source currently available
title: VaLast Maengahama naVaTungamirai Madzokere Vanoti Vacharamba Vachirwira Hutongo hweJechetere

text: Mudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Grace Mugabe, vanoti hapana munhu anovamisa kuita zvavanoda muZanu PF sezvo vaine kodzero yakangofanana nemhunhu wese zvisinei nekuti havana kuenda kuhondo. Amai Grace Mugabe vataura mashoko aya neChina paMurombedzi uko vasangana nevanhu vemudunhu reMashonaland West. Amai Mugabe, avo vataura kwenguva inodarika awa imwe chete, vapedza nguva yakawanda yeknguva iyi vachitaura nezvekubvisa pachigaro gore rapera kwavakaita vaimbove mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Joyce Mujuru. No media source currently available Amai Mugabe vati vakaridzira Amai Mujuru pembe kuti vadzingwe mubato reZanu PF uye vati vacharamba vachiridza pembe kuna ani nani zvake achange asingatevedzeri gwara remusangano. Amai Mugabe vashoropodza vamwe vemapepanhau vavati vakatengwa nemari inosvika mamiriyoni maviri emadhora kuitira kuti vanyore zvakaipa pamusoro pavo. Mudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika abvuma kuti hupfumi hwenyika hwaenda kumawere. Asi vakakurudzira vanhu kuti varambe vakashinga. Vati vanhu vanotengesa mumigwagwa vasatengese hembe dzemumabhero. Asi chashamisa vanhu vakawanda ndechekuti vazogovera vanhu vanga vari pamusangano mabhero zana nemakumi mashanu.
title: Amai Grace Mugabe: Ndicharamba Ndichiridzira Pembe Vose Vanorasa Gwara reZanu PF

text: Sangano remagweta reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights nemagweta akawanda munyika uye vemapato anopikisa vanoti kusungwa kwemuchuchusi mukuru wenyika kunotyora bumbiro remitemo. Sangano remagweta reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights, magweta akawanda munyika pamwe nevemapato anopikisa vanoti kusungwa kwemuchuchusi mukuru wenyika kunotyora bumbiro remitemo. Asi vachuchusi vehurumende vanoti VaTomana vakatyora mutemo panyaya yakakomba zvikuru. VaTomana vanonzi vakaresva apo vakabvuma kupa vamwe varume vaviri vaipomerwa mhosva yekuda kubhomba Gushungo Dairy, kambani yemutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso. Mukuru musangano reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights, VaDzimbambwe Chimbgwa, vanoti kusungwa kwaVaTomana vachizopiwa mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso hakusi pamutemo. Mashoko aya anotsinhirwawo namuzvinafundo, uye vari mutungamiri webato reNational Constitutional Assembly, Va Lovemore Madhuku, avo vanoti mutemo uri pachena pazvinhu zvinofanira kuitwa kana mapurisa achifunga kuti patyorwa mutemo. Gweta uye vachimbomirira mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe, VaTerrence Hussein, vanotiwo zvakaitwa nemapurisa kutyora mutemo. Ko nyaya yakadai yakamboitikawo here munhoroondo yenyika? Vanodzidzisa mutemo paKent University, Doctor Alex Magaisa, vanoti aka hakasi kekutanga. VaMagaisa vanoti vaimbova muchuchusi mukuru wenyika, VaSobhuza Gula Ndebele, vakatombotambiswawo nhova vachisungwa vachinzi naivo vainge vasina kushandisa hofisi yavo zviri pamutemo. VaMagaisa vanoti zvoitwa VaTomana zvinoratidza pachena kuti pane vamwe vanhu vavakatsikana nawo konzi mubato reZanu-PF. Ko kana zvinhu zvaita mamiriro akadai chii chaizvo chingaitwe kugadzirisa dambudziko iri? VaMadhuku vanoti VaMugabe vave kutosungirwa kuumba dare kana kuti tribunal yekuferefeta VaTomana. Kunyange hazvo magweta ari kuti pari kutyorwa mutemo, vamwe vanhu munyika vari kuti VaTomana vave kuzvionera pamhuno sefodya kuti Zanu-PF itamba wakachenjera. VaTomana vakabuda pachena kakawanda mumakore apfuura vachiti vanotsigira bato reZanu-PF asi vachiti izvi hazvivakanganise kuita basa ravo. Asi vamwe vanoti kuendeswa kwavo kumatare vachiramba kuchuchisa vamwe veZanu-PF vakaita senhengo yeparamende, VaMunyaradzi Kereke, munongedzo wekuti vanochuchisa vachitarisa kuti wabuda mumba maani. Asi magweta anoti izvi hazvineyi nekutevedzera bumbiro remitemo uye hapafanire kuita wada watonga muzinda wenyuchi. Zvichakadaro, munyori anoona nezvemutemo mubato reMDC-T, Muzvare Jessie Majome, vashorawo nyaya yekusungwa kwaVaTomana. Asi vati kusungwa kwaVaTomana chinofanira kuva chidzidzo kumapurisa nevachuchusi kuti vaite basa nemazvo vachitevera mutemo kwete kuda kuita zvematongerwo enyika. Mutauriri webato rePeople’s Democratic Party, VaJacob Mafume, vanotiwo VaTomana inguruve yokangwa nemafuta ayo asi vati bumbiro remitemo rinofanira kuremekedzwa. No media source currently available
title: Mamwe Magweta Anoti Kusungwa kwaVaTomana Hakusi paMutemo?

text: Varwere vakawanda vanonzi vachafira mudzimba vachitadza kuwana mari dzekuenda kunorapwa kuzvipatara zvehurumende zvichitevera danho rakatorwa nehurumende kutanga kwegore rino rekukwidza mari dzinobhadharwa nevarwere muzvipatara zvavo zvese zvemunyika. Bazi rezvehutano nekuchengetwa kwanaka kwevana rakazivisa neChipiri nezvekukwidzwa kwemari dzinoripirwa pakurapwa muzvipatara zvehurumende kutanga musi wa 01 Ndira. Vachinyora mugwaro rakaendeswa kuvakuru vezvipatara zvese, munyori mukuru mubazi rezvehutano, Doctor Agnes Mahovha vakati bazi ravo rakanga rasvika padanho iri richitarisawo kushupika kuri kuitwa neveruzhinji. Mari itsva idzi dzinenge dzave kureva kuti murwere wechikuru achanoonekwa pachipatara cheParirenyatwa ave kufanirwa kubhadhara madhora mazana maviri emari yemunyika, kuchitiwo mwana ane makore ari pamusoro pemashanu ave kubhadhara madhora zana. Varwere vachaenda kuzvipatara zvikuru zvemunyika zvakaita seHarare Central Hospital neChitungwiza Central Hospital vave kutarisirwa kubhadhara madhora zana nemakumi matanhatu, mwana ane makore ari pamusoro pemashanu achibhadharawo madhora makumi masere. Zvipatara zvematunhu makuru, kana kuti provincial hospitals, zvave kubhadharisa madhora zana nemakumi maviri kumurwere wechikuru, kuchitiwo mwana achibhadhara madhora makumi matanhatu. Zvipatara zvehurumende zvematunhu madiki, kana kuti district general hospitals, murwere anenge obhadhariswa madhora makumi masere, mwana ane makore ari pamusoro pemashanu achibhadhariswa madhora makumi mana. Vakazvitakura vanosununguka vachiita zvekuvhiyiwa vanonzi vave kubhadhara madhora zviuru zviviri nemazana mashanu, kuchitiwo vanosununguka zvakanaka vachitarisirwa kubhadhara madhora mazana matanhatu muzvipatara zvepamusoro pamwe nekuParirenyatwa. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata Doctor Mahovha kuti tinzwe zvizhinji. Asi mukuru wesangano reCommunity Working Group on Health, VaItai Rusike vanoti kukwidzwa kwemari dzemuzvipatara uku kuchaomesera vakawanda sezvo ruzhinji rwusingawani mari dzacho. VaRusike vanoti verizhinji havasi kuhora kana kutambira mari dziri kurehwa idzi kuitira kuti vanenge vachikwanisa kubhadhara kuzvipatara izvi. "Chiremba chaiye nemari yaari kutambira, kana kuti mukoti, ma nurses nemari dzavari kutambira, havatombokwanise kubhadhara ma fees arehwa iwayo. No media source currently available Zvoreva kuti vanhu vacho vari kupa service vakaita savanamukoti vari kushanda muzvipatara izvozvo vakava nedambudziko rekurwarirwa kana kurwara iye pachezvake, haatombokwanisa kubhadhara ma fees iwayo," VaRusike vanodaro.
title: Bazi rezveHutano Rinokwidza Mari dzeKurapwa muZvipatara zveHurumende

text: Dare repamusoro-soro re Constitutional Court rarasa chikumbiro chevaimbova gurukota rinowona nezvinotika muhofisi yemutungamiri wenyika, Va Didymas Mutasa, pamwe nevaimbova mumiriri weHurungwe West muparamende, Va Themba Mliswa, chekuti mutongo wakaturwa nemutauriri wedare reparamende wekuvadzinga muparamende usendekwe parutivi. Nyaya yekudzingwa muparamende kwakaitwa vanga vari mumiriri we Headlands muparamende, Va Didymas Mutasa, avo vakambenge vari gurokota rinowona nezvinoitika muhofisi yemutungamiri wenyika, pamwe nevakange vari mumiriri weHurungwe West muparamende, Va Themba Mliswa, yanzwikwa mudare repamusoro-soro neChitatu. No media source currently available Gweta revaviri ava, Va Lovemore Madhuku, vaudza dare kudzingwa kwavakaitwa kwakanga kuri kunze kwemutemo sezvo vaMutasa naVa Mliswa vasina kupihwa mukana wekutaura divi ravo nemutauriri weparamende, Va Jacob Mudenda, mushure mekunge Va Mudenda vatambira tsamba kubva kumunyori anowona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa mu Zanu PF, Va Ignatius Chombo, yekuti vaviri ava vadzingwe muparamende. Va Madhuku vati Va Mutasa naVa Mliswa vaifanira kupihwa mukana naVa Mudenda wekuenda kumatare sezvo Va Mutasa vakanga vanyorera Va Mudenda tsamba vachiti vakanga vachiri nhengo ye Zanu PF zvinova zvakasiyana nezvakanga zviri mutsamba yaVa Chombo. Asi rimwe remagweta aVa Mudenda, Va Andrew Demo, vaudza dare Zanu PF yaizorasikirwa zvikuru kana vaviri ava vakabvumidzwa kudzoka muparamende sezvo vasisiri nhengo dzebato iri. Vatiwo hapana mutemo wakatyorwa naVa Mudenda sezvo vakangotevedzera zviri mubumbiro remitemo yenyika zvekutI kana munhu asisiri nhengo yebato, bato iri rinobvumidzwa kubvisa munhu uyu muparamende. Vatiwo Va Mudenda havabvumidzwe nemutemo kugadza vanhu dare sezvataurwa naVa Madhuku kuti vaviri ava vaifanirwa kubvunzwa pavamire zvichitevera kutambira kwakaita Va Mudenda tsamba yakanyorwa naVa Chombo. Asi mukuru wevatongi munyika, Va Godfrey Chidyausiku, vaudza dare kuti vatongi vese vanga vachinzwa nyaya iyi vaona zvakakodzera kuti varase chikumbiro chaVa Mutasa naVa Mliswa vachiti vachazotura zvikonzero zvavo zvizere munguva yavasina kutara. Zvichakadai, Va Madhuku vati vanotambira mutongo waturwa nedare kunyange usina kuuya wakarerekera kudivi ravo. Rimwe remagweta aVa Mudenda, Va Simplicious Chihambakwe, vanoti vafara zvikuru nemotongo waturwa nedare uyu. Va Mutasa naVa Mliswa vakadzingwa muparamende mushure mekudzingwa kwavakaitwa mu Zanu PF vachipomerwa mhosva yekusvibisa zita rebato iri zvichitevera makakatanwa akanga ari muZanu PF pamberi pekongiresi yebato iri yakaitwa gore rapera. Zanu PF iri kupomerawo Va Mutasa mhosva yekuronga zvekupidigura mutungamiri wenyika, Va Robert Mugabe, vachishanda pamwe chete nevaimbova mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Joice Mujuru, avo vari kuramba mhosva iyi. Zvichakadai, Va Mugabe vakazivisa kuti sarudzo dzekutsvaga vamiriri vatsva vanomirira Headlands ne Hurungwe West muparamende dzichaitwa musi wa 10 Chikumi.
title: VaChidyausiku Vanorasa Nyaya yaVaMutasa naVaMliswa

text: Gurukota rinoona nezvemukati menyika VaKazembe Kazembe, mukuru wemapurisa VaGodwin Matanga, nevamwe, vaendeswa kudare redzimhosva vachipomerwa mhosva yekusunga vamwe vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu zvisiri pamutemo. Vakasungwa vanosanganisira munyori mukuru wesangano revarairidzi re Amalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe vaRobson Chere, magweta aorwira kodzero dzevanhu VaDoug Coltart naMuzvare Jessica Drury, uye VaMunyaradzi Ndawawana naMuzvare Preciuos Ndlovu. Gweta revashanu ava Vashanu ava ndivaTinashe Chinopfukutwa vanove nhengo yeZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights kana kuti ZLHR. Vamwe vari kuendeswa kumatare mapurisa akavasunga Detective Sergeant Lovemore Marwisa naDetective Constable Dennis Muroiwa. Hatina kukwanisa kubata mutauriri wemapurisa Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi kuti tinzwe divi rebazi ravo. Asi mutauriri wesangano reZLHR vaKumbirai Mafunda, vanoti vakakwira kudare ava vanoti vanoda mari inosvika mamiriyoni gumi nemaviri nechidimbu, kana kuti ZWL$12, 5 million sezvo vachiti vakatyorerwa kodzero dzavo apo vakasungwa muna 2019 muna Kubvumbi vachipomerwa mhosva yekuda kupidigura hurumende. No media source currently available
title: Gurukota rezveMukati meNyika Vakzembe, Voendeswa kuMatare neVanhu Vakasungwa Zvisiri paMutemo

text: Sangano rinomirira vashandi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, ZCTU, rinoti bhajeti rakaturwa nemusi weChna negurukota rezvemari, Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube, harizadzise tariso yevashandi pamwe nevarombo. Munyori mukuru wesangano iri, VaJaphet Moyo, vanoti hapana zvitsva zvavakaona zvakaburitswa nebhajeti iri kubva hurumende yasarudzwa uye kubva pave negurukota rezvehupfumi idzva. Asi vanotiwo pane zvimwewo zvakanaka zviri muhurongwa uhwu zvinobatsira nyika-zvakafanana nenyaya yekubvisa vashandi vanonzi vari kutambiriswa mari vasina kubairwa zvitupa, kana kuti 'ghost workers'. No media source currently available
title: ZCTU Inoti Bhajeti Harizadzise Tarisiro Dzevashandi neVarombo

text: Hurumende inoti yawana mari kubva kusangano rekutengeserana kwenyika dzekuchamhembe nekumabuda zuva kweAfrica reCommon Market for Eastern and Southern Africa kana kuti COMESA kuti imutsiridza industry yekutengesa matehwe. Kushomweka kwemombe kwapa kuti makambani emunyika akaita seBata atatarike kuwana matehwe. Muna 2000 Zimbabwe yaigadzira shangu dzinodarika mamiriyoni gumi nemanomwe kana kuti 17 million asi ikozvino basa iri raderera zvikuru. Mukuru webata VaSimon Mutisya vakatoyambira kuti vanogona kumisa vamwe vashandi basa nekuda kweCovid-19 uye kushaya zvakawanda zvinodiwa kugadzira butsu sezvo vave kumanikidzwa kuzvitenga kunze kwenyika nekuti nyika iri kukundikana. Bata ine vashandi vanodarika zviuru zvishanu. Zimbabwe kare yaikwanisawo kutengesa nyama yemombe kumisika yeEuropean Union izvo yave kutatarika kuita makore ano nekusamira zvakanaka kwezvinhu munyaya dzezvehupfumi. Makambani akawanda ari kuvharwa zvosiya vanhu vakawanda vasina mabasa. No media source currently available
title: Hurumende Yoshanda neCOMESA Kumutsiridza Kutengeswa kweMatehwe

text:
Hurumende iri kukurudzirwa kuita ongororo yakakwana yekuona kuti vanhu
vakaremara vari kubatwa nenzira dzipi nechirwere cheCovid-19 kuitira kuti igotora matanho akafanira sezvo vakawanda vevanhu ava vari kutambura zvikuru nekuda kwechirwere ichi. Nepamusana pekuti huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa nechirwere ichi huri kuramba huchikwira, vanorwira kodzero dzevakaremara vari kukurudzira
hurumende kuti iwedzere rubatsiro rwayo kune veruzhinji kunyanya
vakaremara sezvo vachiti hupenyu hwavo huri kuvaomera nekuda kwekuvepo kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Kurudziro iyi yakabuda pamusangano wakaitwa muGweru nezuro pakati pesangano reZimbabwe Association of Doctors for Human Rights nemamwe masangano anoshanda akazvimirira.

Muzvare Belinda Musesengwe vesangano reMidlands Association for the
Protection and Welfare of the Blind, vakati vakaremara vakawanda vanorarama nekupemha vamwewo vachirarama nekutengesa zvinhu mumigwagwa.

Muzvare Musesengwe vakati kunyange hazvo hurumende yakarerutsa mitemo yelockdown, vakawanda vakaremara havasi kukwanisa kuwana chauviri nekuti veruzhinji havana mari nekuda kwekusamira zvakanaka kwakaita hupfumi munyika.

Vakati kunyange hazvo hurumende yakaisa chirongwa chekubatsira
vanotambura nekuvapa mari yekubatsirikana panguva yeCovi-19, vakaremara vakawanda havazi kuwana mari iyi izvo zviri kuita kuti zvinhu
zvivawomere.

Muzvare Musesengwe vakatiwo rimwe dambudziko guru rinosangana
nevasingawone kunyanya inyaya yekushaya ruzivo rwakakwana pamusoro
pechirwere cheCovid-19.

Mukuru wesangano reQuadriplegic and Paraplegic Association of Zimbabwe, Amai Audry Rusike, vakatiwo vakaremara vakawanda
vanoda zvikwanisiro zvinovabatsira mukurarama kwavo nguva nenguva asi
nekuda kwekuoma kwakaita zvinhu, vakawanda vavo havakwanise kuzvitenga.

Vachipa muenzaniso wevanhu vanorarama nechirwere cheCerebral Palsy,
Amai Rusike vakati zvakakosha kuti painoiswa mitemo seyekuedza
kudzivirira chirwere cheCovid-19 zvakakosha kuti hurumende iyeuke kuti
kune vakadaro.

Munyori mukuru wesangano Zimbabwe Association of Doctors for Human Rights, Dr Norman Matara, vakaudza Studio 7 kuti zvimwe zvezvakabuda pamusangano uyu zvakakosha zvikuru sezvo zvichibudisa pachena mamwe matambudziko ari kusangana nevakaremara panguva ino yedambudziko reCovid-19 asiri kutaurwa nezvawo.

Sangano reZimbabwe Association of Doctors for Human Rights riri kuita misangano yakadai munzvimbo dzakasiyana-siyana munyika nechinangwa chekuda kunzwa matambudziko ari kusangana neveruzhinji pakatariswa dambudziko reechirwere cheCovid-19 kuitira kuti rigokwanisa kupangana mazano anozobatsira kuhurumende. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kubata mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvehutano, Dr John Mangwiro, kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi sezvo nharembozha yavo yanga ichinetsa kubata. Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa nezuro manheru kuti vanhu vaviri vakafa munyika nechirwere cheCovid-19, izvo zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vafa pamazana matatu negumi nevatanhatu. Hurumende yakazivisawo kuti vanhu zana nemakumi masere nemumwe chete, vakabatwa nechirwere ichi, uye vanhu vose ava, vanhu vagara vari munyika.

Vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika yose vava zviuru gumi nezviviri nemakumi mana nevanomwe, kana kuti 12, 047. Vanhu vapora kubva kuchirwere ichi vava zviuru zvipfumbamwe nemazana masere nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevana, zvichitevera kupora kwevanhu makumi mashanu nevasere. Vanhu vachiri kurwara nechirwere ichi vava chiuru nemazana masere
nemakumi matatu nevanome, kana kuti 1,837. Huwandu hwatazivisa uhu hunogona kukwira nhasi manheru apo hurumende ichazivisa zvabuda muongororo dzaitwa neMugovera. No media source currently available
title: Hurumende Yokurudzirwa Kuita Ongororo Pamusoro peDambudziko reCovid-19

text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vanoti kuwanda kuri kuita mapato anopikisa munongedzo wekuti Zimbabwe ine hutongo hwejekerere. Zimbabwe Election Commission inoti munyika mave nemapato anosvika zana nemakumi manomwe kana kudarika. VaMnangagwa vakataura mashoko aya pamusangano webato reZanu-PF kuNyamhunga Stadium kuKariba neChitatu. Vakaudza vatsigiri vavo kuti, “Vose vane havi yekuformer tumapato twenyu fomayi tigonyatsokurakashai muna July muzive kuti Zanu-PF inorakasha, ichingorakasha, ichingorakasha. Ichingotonga, ichingotonga, ichingotonga, Zanu-PF." Vakatiwo vaongorori vesarudzo kubva kuUnited Nations neEuropean Union vakasungunuka kuuya kuzoongorora sarudzo idzi. Nyika dzakawanda dzakaita seAmerica nedzimwe dziri mugungano reEuropean Union dziri kuti kudyidzana neZimbabwe kuchasimbaradzwa kana ichinge yaita sarudzo dzakachena nekuremekedza kodzero dzevanhu. Nhengo yeZanu-PF inomirira Makonde uye vainge vari pamusangano uyu, VaKindness Paradza, vanoti kuwanda kwevanhu vakapinda musangano uyu munongedzo wekuti Zanu PF ichakunda musarudzo dzegore rino. No media source currently available
title: VaMnangagwa Vanoti Kuwanda kweMapato Munyika Munongedzo weHutongo hweJekerere

text: Mutungamiri weAmerica, VaDonald Trump, vanoti vari kuwedzera negore rimwe chete zvirango zvakatemerwa vakuru vakuru muZimbabwe pasi pemutemo weNational Emergencies Act. Zvirango izvi zvakatanga kutemerwa vakuru vakuru vemuZimbabwe musi Kurume 6, 2003, pachishandiswa Executive Order 13288, iyo yakasainwa nevaimbove mutungamiri weAmerica, VaGeorge Bush. Mutemo weInternational Emergency Economic Powers Act unoshandiswa mukubata hupfumi hwevanhu vanenge vakatemerwa zvirango uho hunopfuura nemuAmerica, kana nyika dzinodyidzana nehurumende yaVaTrump. Vakatemerwa zvirango neAmerica vanhu vari muhurumende yeZanu PF, pamwe nevanodyidzana nehurumende iyi, kusanganisirawo makambani avo. America inoti inoshandisa mutemo uyu senzira yekuranga vose vanoonekwa sevanhu vanombunyikidza hutongo hwejechetere. America inoti yakatora matanho aya sezvo maitiro evanhu vari pari pazvirango aya achivhiringa kushanda zvakanaka kwemitemo, kukonzerwa kwemhirizhonga, uye kusagadzikana kwenyika iri kuchamhembe kweAfrica iyi. Musi wa Mbudzi 22, 2005, mutungamiri weAmerica akawedzera zvakare negore rimwe chete zvirango izvi kuvakuru vakuru muhurumende yeZimbabwe pamwe nevanhu nemakambani anodyidzana nehurumende yeZanu PF. Mutemo uyo unomisa kupfuura kwehupfumi hwevanhu ava muAmerica, uye kubata mari dzavo dzinenge dzazivikanwa. Musi wa 25 Chikunguru 2008, mutungamiri weAmerica akawedzera zvakare zvirango izvi pasi peExecutive Order 13288, ndokuwedzera huwandu hwevanhu vaionekwa kuti vari kumbunyikidza hutongo hwejechetere muZimbabwe. “Maitiro pamwe negwara revanhu vari pazvirango anoenderera mberi mukuvhiringa gwara reAmerica pazvinhu zvinoitika kunze kwenyika iyi. Nepamusana paizvozvo, matanho akatorwa musi wa Kurume 6, 2003, uye mirawu yakagadzwa musi Mbudzi 22, 2005, uye nemusi wa Chikunguru 23, 2008, kuti zvishandiswe pazvirango zvakatemerwa vanhu vemuZimbabwe, zvichaenderera mberi kwerimwe gore kubva musi wa Kurume 6, 2018,” vadaro vaTrump. “Nokudaro, pachitevedzerwa chikamu chemutemo we National Emergencies Act (50 U.S.C 1622 (d), ndiri kuwedzera negore zvirango zviri pasi peExecutive Order 13288,” vadaro VaTrump. Gwaro raVaTrump richaburitswa mugwaro re Federal Register zviri pamutemo, uye kuendeswa kudare reparamende yemuAmerica.
title: America Yoenderera Mberi neZvirango Zvayakatemerwa Zimbabwe

text: Vechidiki vemapato ezvematongerwo enyika akasiyana-siyana vanoti zvakakosha kuti vechidiki vabve zera vanyorese kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota uye vawanikwewo vachitsvaga zvinzvimbo zvehutungamiri. Vachitaura pamusangano wekuzeya kuti sarudzo dzegore rinouya dzakakosha sei kune vechidiki, vechidiki vemapato akasiyana-siyana kusanganisira veZanu PF neMDC vakabvumirana kuti vane danho rakakosha mukuvaka nyika uye kuti zvakakosha kuti vechidiki vanyorese kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota, uyewo kuti vawanikwe vachishuvira kupinda pazvinzvimbo zvakadai sekuve makanzura kana vamiriri veparamende. Nhengo yeYouth League mudunhu reBulawayo, VaFundisani Dewa, vakati kunyange hazvo zviri pachena kuti vechidiki ndivo vakawanda munyika, musarudzo dzapfuura vechidiki vakawanda havana kuvhota vachitiwo, sarudzo dzegore rinouya dzinogona kungofanana nedzimwe sarudzo dzose kana vechidiki vakasazvipira kuti vanyorese kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota. Vachipindura mubvunzo wekuti sei vechidiki veZanu PF vari kutsigira kuti mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vakwikwidze musarudzo dzegore rinouya izvo zviri pachena kuti vakwegura, VaDewa vakati bato ravo rinoona VaMugabe vari ivo vakakodzera nekuti vachiri kudiwa neveruzhinji. No media source currently available  Mutauriri wevechidiki veMDC-T, VaAlfred Dzirutwe, vakakonzera mutauro pamusangano uyu apo vakati VaMugabe nebato ravo reZanu PF vajaira zvemhirizhonga, vakati vanobva pachigaro chete kana vechidiki vakazvipira kuvabvisa nechisimba. VaDzirutwe vakati bato ravo reMDC T hariite uye hari kurudzire zvemhirizhonga, asi vakati nekuda kwehutongi hwavanoti ndehwe hudzvinyiri huri kuitwa neZanu PF, vechidiki vanofanirwa kuzvipira kusangana nemhirizhonga mukurwira kodzero dzavo. Mutauriri webato reZAPU, VaIphithule Maphosa, vakatiwo zvakakosha kuti vechidiki vadewo kupinda muzvinzvimbo zvehutungamiri, vachiti izvi zvinobatsira kuti vakwanise kupedza matabudziko akasiyana-siyana avakatarisana nawo. Muzvare Natasha Karimakwenda vanove mumwe wevechidiki aivepowo pamusangano uyu, vakati kunyange hazvo zvakakosha kuti vechidiki vapinde muzvigaro zvehutungamiri, vechidiki kunyanya vechikadzi, vanotya kuita izvi nekuda kwemhirizhonga yezvematongerwo enyika inowanzoitika panguva dzesarudzo. Mumwezve wechidiki aive pamusangano uyu VaMangosuthu Mbele, vakati zvisinei nemapato avanotsigira, vechidiki vanofanirwa kuziva kuti zvakakosha kuti vaise misoro pamwe chete kuti vakwanise kurwisa matambudziko avakatarisana nawo akadai sekushaya mabasa. VaAdrian Moyo vebato reMDC inotungamirwa naVaWelshman Ncube vakatsinhirawo vachiti vechidiki havafanirwe kungoita gundamusaira vachiteverera zvematongerwo enyika mumapato avo vasingafungisise nezvematambudziko avakatarisana nawo. Musangano wanezuro wakaitwa pasi pechirongwa chinonzi Political Café pasi pezvirongwa zvinoitwa nesangano reFriedrich Ebert Stiftung zvekudzidzisa vechidiki zvinhu zvakasiyana-siyana kusanganisira zvehutungamiri.
title: Vechidiki veMDC neZanu PF Vobatana paMusangano muBulawayo

text: Hondo muZanu-PF iri kuenderera mberi zvapa kuti paumbwe chikwata chevanhu vashanu chiri kuenda kuManicaland kunoongorora Amai Monica Mutsvangwa avo vari kupomerwa mhosva neWomens League yebato iri yekuzvidza mudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Grace Mugabe. Mutevedzeri wemunyori mubazi remadzimai, Amai Eunice Sandi Moyo, vanoti Amai Mutsvangwa vakadziya moto wembavha nekupinda kwavo mumusangano wakatsigira vainge vadzingwa kuva sachigaro weManicaland, Amai Happiness Nyakuedzwa. Amai Nyakuedzwa vaipomerwa mhosva yekuzvidza Amai Mugabe nekusanyarara apo Amai Mugabe vaitaura mumusangano wakaitwa kuManicaland mwedzi wapera. Murume waAmai Mutsvangwa, VaChris Mutsvangwa, vanove gurukota rezvevakarwa hondo, vari kunziwo nevamwe vabude mubato vachinzi vanotsigira chikwata chinonzi cinotungamirwa nemutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa. KuMashonaland West kunonzi kwaitawo kunetsana mubazi reYouth League rebato sezvo paine kurwira masimba nekudzingana mubato. Kunetsana kunonzi kwanyanyawo ku Masvingo, Mashonaland West neMashonaland East. Amai Mugabe vari kutarisirwa kuita musangano paMurehwa Center kuMashonalnd East neMugovera. Vanoongorora nyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika vachishanda neTrust Africa, VaBrigs Bomba, vanoti zvave kuitika muZanu-PF zvinonyadzisa uye zvadzosera bato iri kumakore akare aitongwa nemadzishe. No media source currently available
title: Amai Mutsvangwa Voridzirwa Pito Yekuzvidza "Amai" muZanu PF

text: Mhuri yevaimbova mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, iri kuramba ichichinja chinja nyaya yekuti VaMugabe vacharadzikwa kupi izvo zvotemesa vakawanda munyika musoro. Muzukuru waVaMugabe, uye vari mutauriri wemhuri, VaLeo Mugabe, vaudza Studio7 kuRufaro Stadium uko kwange kwakaungana vanhu vachionekana naVaMugabe kuti sekuru vavo vacharadzikwa kuHeroes Acre, asi nemhuri yave chete. Vane ruzivo nezviri kuitika mumhuri yaVaMugabe vaudza Studio 7 kuti kunetsana mumhuri hakusati kwapera sezvo vamwe vachiri kuda kuti varadzikwe kwaZvimba kumusha. Ukuwo Ishe Katizagombo, avo vari kutaura vakamirira madzishe edzinza raVaMugabe, vaudzawo Studio7 kuti mufi achavigwa kuHeroes Acre semavigirwo anoitwa mamwe magamba ane apihwa ruremekedzo rwakadai. Vachitaura kuSouth Africa neChina pagungano rekurangarira VaMugabe rakarongwa nebato rinopikisa munyika iyi reEconomic Freedom Fighters, mumwe muzukuru waVaMugabe, VaPatrick Zhuwao, avo vari muhupoteri vakati mhuri yainge isiri kufara kuti vanhu vakashungurudza sekuru vavo kusvika parufu vataure pakuvigwa kwavo sekunge vatsvene. VaPatrick Zhuwao vakati bato reZanu-PF rakabata VaMugabe neseri kweruoko. Munhandare yeRufaro kuVietnam Stand kwange kuchiratidzawo kusagadzikana zvichiratidzwa nenzimbo dzange dzoimbwa nedzimwe nhengo dzeZanu-PF dzinenge dzange dzichiratidzawo kusafara nekufa kwaVaMugabe. Vamwe vange vachiimba vaudza Studio7 kuti havana kufara nemafiro akaita VaMugabe mushure mekupidigurwa pachigaro nemauto aitungamirwa nevaive mukuru wemauto muna 2017, VaConstantino Chiwenga. Pavanzi nevange vachiita hurongwa hwanhasi vambonyarara, vanhu ava vange vaine kamwe kambo kekuratidza kusafara kwavo. Vamwe vange vachiimbawo nezvekushaikwa kwezvinhu zvakawanda munyika kusanganisira magetsi nekudhura kwechingwa. Zvichakadaro, bazı rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko raburitsa mashoko padandemutande reTwitter richiti migwagwa inoterevera inenge yakavharwa kuitira hurongwa hwekuchema VaMugabe kuNational Sports Stadium. Simon Muzenda, corner Jason Moyo kusvika Tongogara na S.V. Muzenda, Tongogara kusvika muna Harare Drive; Sam Nujoma kusvika kuna Tongogara; kwoti Rotten Row kubva kuna Coventry kusvika kuna Tongogara. Pahurongwa uhu bazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko rati vatungamiri vemapato anopikisa vanoti VaNelson Chamisa, Muzvare Thokozani Khupe, VaLovemore Madhuku, uye Amai Joice Mujuru, vanenge vakagara kuVIP, asi kuVVIP kunenge kuine mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, nevamwe vatungamiri vekune dzimwe nyika. No media source currently available
title: Kuradzikwa kwaVaMugabe Kworamba Kusina Kujekeswa

text: Mutongi wedare repamusoro, VaCharles Hungwe, neChitatu vakati vachatura mutongo wavo muzuva ravasina kutara panyaya yakakwidzwa kudare iri naVaAbraham Mateta, vachida kuti dare rimanikidze ZEC kudhinda magwaro ekuvhotesa anoshandiswa nevasingaoni erudzi rwe braille. Vasingaoni vanoti kana magwaro ekuvhotesa musarudzo dzegore rino akange aine runyoro rwemapundu kana kuti braille, zvinozovaitira nyore pakuvhota musarudzo idzi uye pavanenge vavhotera hapazozivikanwe chero nani zvake. Vachisvitsa chikumbiro ichi mudare reHigh Court, rimwe gweta rakamirira vasingaone panyaya iyi, VaJustice Mavedzenge, vakaudza dare kuti komisheni inoona nezvesarudzo yeZimbabwe Electoral Commission, kana kuti ZEC, inosungirwa kutevedza bumbiro remitemo iro rinoisungira kuti iite zvose zvinodikanwa kuti veruzhinji vavhote zvakasununguka uye pavanenge vavhotera pasazivikanwe. Vakaenderera mberi vachiti zvinoshamisa kuti ZEC haisati yaita kana chinhu chimwe zvacho chinoratidza kuti yakazvipira kutevedzera bumbiro remitemo makore mashanu bumbiro idzva rapasiswa, panyaya yekugadzirisa zvinodikanwa nevanhu vasingaone kuti vakwanise kuvhota vakasununguka uye vasingazivikanwe kuti vavhotera papi. VaMavedzenge vakaudza mutongi wedare repamusoro kuti zvakakosha kuti vasingaone vapihwe mapepa ekuvhotesa ane runyoro rwemapundu kana kuti braille rwavanokwanisa kuverenga zvinozoita kuti vasazobatsirwa nevamwe vanhu sezvinotaurwa nemutemo unoona nezvesarudzo. Mutemo wesarudzo unoti vasingakwanise kuverenga kana vasingaone vanogona kubatsirwa kuvhota pachishandiswa mapurisa, vana muzvinahofisi vanoona nezvekuvhotesa kana munhu anenge asarudzwa nemunhu anenge asingaoni kuti amubatsire pakuvhota. VaMavedzenge vanoti kana ZEC ikaburitsa magwaro ekuvhotesa ane runyoro rwe braille zvinoitira nyore vasingaone pakuvhota uye pavanenge vavhotera hapazozivikanwe kana nani zvake. Rimwe remagweta ari kushanda pamwe chete naVaMavedzenge panyaya iyi, VaInnocent Maja, vakati zvakakosha kuti bumbiro remitemo ritevedzwere neZEC kuitira kuti kodzero dzevasingaone dzisatyorwe munguva yesarudzo. VaMaja, avo vanove zvakare mukuru wezvidzidzo zvemitemo paUniversity of Zimbabwe, vakati hazvidhure uye hazvitore nguva kuti magwaro ekuvhotesa aiswe murunyoro rwe braille. Zvichakadai, gweta reZEC, VaTawanda Kanengoni vakapikisa chikumbiro chakasvitswa kudare vachiti kunyange hazvo bumbiro remitemo richiti kodzero dzevasingaone dzinofanira kuchengetedzwa, komisheni yavo haina mari yekugadzira gwaro rekuvhotesa rine runyoro rwe braille. VaKanengoni vakatiwo sekomisheni mawoko avo akasungwa nemutemo unoona nezvesarudzo uyo unotiwo magwaro ekuvhotesa anofanira kunge akadhindwa uye aine mifananidzo yevanhu vanenge vachivhoterwa zvavanoti zvinogona kutadzika kuti mifananidzo iyi ibude murunyoro rwe braille. Muchikumbiro chavakasvitsa kudare ichi, VaMavedzenge, avo vakange vakamirira vasingaone, vakati vanodawo zvakare kuti gurukota rezvemitemo pamwe nemuchuchisi mukuru wehurumende vaone kuti paumbwa mutemo unokoshesa zvido zvevasingaone munguva dzesarudzo gore rino risati rapera. Asi gweta rakanga rakamirira hurumende panyaya iyi, Amai Fortune Chimbaru vakati hurumende haione izvi sezvakakosha sezvo vachiti mitemo iripo pari zvino inoita kuti vasingaone vakwanise kuvhota zvakasununguka. No media source currently available
title: Mutongi weDare rePamusoro Anoti Achapa Mutongo Wake paNyaya yeMagwaro eKuvhotesa eBraille

text: Zimbabwe nemusi weMuvhuro yakabatana nedzimwe nyika dzepasi rose kucherechedza zuva reDown syndrome kana kuti World Down Syndrome Day. Sangano reZimbabwe Down Syndrome Association ndiro range richitungamira hurongwa uhu muBulawayo, richiti riri kushushikana nekuwanda kwevana varikubarwa nechirwere che down syndrome, uye neMuvhuro vange vane zvirongwa zvekudzidzisa veruzhinji pamusoro pekukosha kwe vanhu vane down syndrome association. Dindingira regore rino rakatarisana nevana sezvo vana vazhinji vari kubatwa nedambudziko iri – muchirungu riri kunzi “My friends, my community”. Vanoshanda nesangano reZimbabwe Down Syndrome Association amai Sibonisiwe Mazula vanoti vanhu vane vana vane Down Syndrome vanofanira kuwanirwawo mikana inowanikwa nevamwe uye havafanire kutarisirwa pasi. Vanotiwo hurumende ikavabatsira nemari vanokwanisawo kuwana mukana wekuti vaende kumamisha kunobatsira vamwe vana vane chirwere ichi. No media source currently available
title: Zimbabwe Yocherechedza Zuva reWorld Down Syndrome Day

text: Mutungamiri webato rinopikisa reForces for the Liberation Organization of Africa National Party (FLOANP) VaEgpyt Dzinemunhenzva vakabatana nemumiriri weHarare North VaAllan Markam veCitizens Coalition for Change, vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu VaTapiwanashe Chiriga naMuzvare Vongai Zimudzi vaendesa kumatare Zimbabwe Electoral Commision negurukota rezvemitemo VaZiyambi Ziyambi nekuwedzerwa kwavakaita mari yekuti vanoda kukwikwidza musarudzo vabhadhare. Hatina kukwanisa kubata sachigaro weZEC Amai Priscilla Chigumba kana VaZiyambi sezvo nharembozha dzavo dzange dzisiri kudairwa. Vana ava vari kuda kuti dare repamusoro riti ari dzakawedzerwa idzi dzinokanganisa hutengo hwejekere. Vari kudawo kuti dare riti mutemo wechimbi chimbi wakashandiswa kudzika mari idzi weStautory Instrument 144 0f 2022 (Electoral Nomination of Candidates) (Ammendement) Regulations unzi unotyora bumbiro remitemo. Vana ava vari kumiririrwa negweta reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights vanoti zvakaitwa neZEC zvakangoitwa pasina kutaurirana zvichityora bumbiro remitemo. VaDzinemunhenzva vanoti bato ravo rakaumbwa munguva yeRhodesia uye munguva iyi hamuna kumbobvira madzikwa mitemo yakadai kuyedza kumisa vatema kuti vakwikwidze musarudzo nekuti vaive varombo. Musi wa 23 Nyamavhuvhu VaDzinemunhenzva nevamwe vavo vakapa ZEC mazuva matatu ekuti ibvise maro yainge yawedzerwa iyi asi komisheni iyi yakaramba yakatsika madziro. Vanenge vachida kukwikwidza musarudzo dzemutungamiri wenyika vari kunzi vabhadhare mari inosvika zviuru makumi maviri kana kuti US$20, 000 kubva pachuru chimwe chete chemadhora kana kuti US$1000. Vanoda kuita nhengo dzeparamende vanonzi vabhadhare mari inosvika chiuru chimwe chete chemadhora uye vanoda kuita makanzura vobhadhara zana remadhora.
title: VaEgypt Dzinemunenzva neVamwe Voendesa ZEC naVaZiyambi kuMatare

text: Bato rePeople’s Democratic Party iro rinotungamirwa naVaTendai Biti, rapinda neChina mumubatanidzwa wemapato anopikisa hurumende weCoalition of Democracts, kana kuti CODE. Vatsigiri vebato rePDP vapembera apo bato ravo rapinda muCODE. PDP ndiro bato rechipfumbamwe kupinda muCODE uye VaBiti vanoti bato ravo rapinda muCODE nekuti ndiyo chete nzira yekubvisa bato reZanu PF pachigaro. VaBiti vanoti pane mukana wekuti mapato ese anopikisa abatane uye izvi ndizvo chete zvichaita kuti vakunde Zanu PF. Panyaya yekuti mapato anopikisa ari kurwisana nenyaya yezvigaro, VaBiti vati iri harisi dambudziko asi chinodiwa mukana chete wekuti mapato aya agare pasi. Sachigaro weCODE parizvino, VaFarai Mbira vebato reZunde vati CODE iri kuda kuti mapato ose kusanganisira MDC inotungamirwa naVa Morgan Tsvangirai neZimbabwe People First apindewo muCODE. VaBiti vatsinhirawo vachiti CODE inoda kuti mapato ese ashande akafanana uye VaTsvangirai vanogona kutungamira mubatanidzwa uyu kana vakazvininipisa. Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri weMDC inotungamirwa naVaWelshman Ncube, Va Edwin Mushoriwa, vatiwo vane chivimbo chekuti mamwe mapato anopikisa achapinda muCODE. Zvichakadai, CODE inoti haina chivimbo negwaro revavhoti richaumbwa neZimbabwe Electoral Commission uye vanoda kuti vanhu vashandise zvitupa zvavo kuvhota musarudzo dza2018. MDC-T inotiwo yakazvipira kuumba mubatanidzwa wakasimba uchabvisa Zanu PF pachigaro uye inoti iri kutaurirana nemamwe mapato pasi pechirongwa cheNational Electoral Reform Agenda, kana kuti NERA. No media source currently available
title: VaBiti Vanopinda Mumubatanidzwa weCODE Vachiti Zanu PF Payo Papera

text: Kusimudzirwa kwekunyoresa vanhu kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota kwatanga neChipiri munzvimbo dzakasiyana siyana munyika vamwe vanhu muBulawayo vachichema-chema nemutemo wekuti vanonyoresa vanofanirwa kuve nemagwaro anoratidza pavanogara. Ongororo yaitwa neStudio7 yaratidza kuti vanhu vange vachinyoresa panzvimbo dzakasiyana siyana dzekunyoresa muguta reBulawayo pasina zvimhingamupinyi zvakawanda. Mumwe weavo vanyoresa, Amai Nyarai Gwari, vaudza Studio7 kuti vakwanisa kuita izvi munguva pfupi sezvo vange vane zvose zvanga zvichidiwa. Asi vamwe vanhu vakawanda vange vachida kunyoresa vange vachitadza kuita izvi nekuti vange vasina magwaro anodiwa anoratidza kuti vanogara kupi kana matsamba anopa huchapupu hwepavanogara, kana kuti ‘proof of residence’. Mumwe aenda kunonyoresa ndiAmai Gwari avo vati vaona vanhu vakawanda vachitadza kunyoresa nekuda kwedambudziko iri. VaRonald Mubhemi vanoti vari kunyunyutawo pamusoro pemutemo wekuti vanhu vanofanirwa kuve nemagwaro epavanogara vachiti kuve nechitupa chinoratidza kuti uri chizvarwa chemuZimbabwe ndizvo chete zvinofanirwa kudiwa. Mutemo wekuti vanhu vanofanirwa kuve nemagwaro anoratidza pavanogara unoitirwa kuti veZimbabwe Electoral Commission vagokwanisa kunyoresa vanhu papolling station iri pedyo nepavanogara sezvo musarudzo dzinouya vanhu vanenge vachivhotera papolling station yavakanyoresa. Mumwe mugari angozvidoma nezita rekuti James ati haawone chinonetsa vanhu pamutemo wekuti vave nemagwaro anoratidza pavanogara achiti izvi zvinhu zvinogara zvichiitika kana munhu uchivhura account kubhangi. Ati kunyange hazvo achiroja, akwanisa kuwana gwaro rinoratidza kuti anogara papi zviri nyore uye akwanisawo kunyoresa zvisina dambudziko. Izvi zvatsigirwawo naVaBrian Ngundu anonyoresawo. Mumwe wechidiki, Jonathan Nkomo, uyo ati anyoresa kuti agokwanisa kuvhota kekutanga muhupenyu ati afarawo kuti akwanisa kuita izvi uye ari kutarisira kuvhota musarudzo dzegore rinouya. Chikamu chekunyoresa vanhu kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota chatanga nhasi chichapera musi wa16 Gumuguru. Kuchaitwa zvimwe zvikamu zvitatu munyika mose uye chikamu chinotevera chinotanga pakupera kwemwedzi uno. Pari zvino muBulawayo mune nzvimbo dzinopfuura zana pari kunyoreswa vanhu. No media source currently available
title: Vanoda Kunyoresa Voshushikana neNyaya yeMagwaro Anoratidza Pavanogara

text: Komisheni inoona nezvesarudzo yeZimbabwe Electoral Commission, Zec, inoti haisi kuzoburitsa gwaro revavhoti rine mifananidzo yevavhoti ichiti mifananidzo iyi inogona kuzoshandiswa zvisirizvo nevari kuda kusvibisa mafambisirwo ari kuitwa sarudzo munyika. Vachitaura nevatori venhau muHarare muHarare, sachigaro weZec, Amai Priscilla Chigumba, vati komisheni yavo haisi kuzoburitsa gwaro revavhoti rine mifananidzo yevanhu vakanyoresa kuvhota musarudzo dzemwedzi unouya. Amai Chigumba vati komisheni yavo iri kutyira kuti mifananidzo iyi inogona kuzoshandiswa zvisiri izvo. Kunyange hazvo mamwe mapato anopikisa achiti haasi kukwanisa kunyatsopengura gwaro revavhoti nemhando yariri, Amai Chigumba vati gwaro iri rinopenengurika zvakanaka uye vati rakagadzirwa nemhando yekuti hapana anokwanisa kuchinja chinhu pariri. Amai Chigumba vazivisawo kuti vose vachada kuvhota vasiri munzvimbo dzavanogara musi uchaitwa sarudzo kana kuti postal voting vane mukana wekuzivisa komisheni yavo musi wa28 Chikumi usati wadarika. Mutungamiri wesangano reElection Resource Centre, VaTawanda Chimhini, vati sangano ravo ratanga hurongwa hwekuongorora kuti zviri mugwaro revavhoti zviri kuenderana here nekunyoresa kwakaita veruzhinji kuti vagozovhota musarudzo dzegore rino. Zec inoti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika hazvikwanise kuvhota musarudzo dzegore rino kana zvisina kunge zvakauya munyika kuzonyoresa kuvhota maererano nemutongo wakaturwa nedare repamusorosoro reConstituitional Court masvondo mashoma adarika. No media source currently available
title: Zec Inoti Haisi Kuburitsa Gwaro Rine Mifananidzo yeVavhoti.

text: Vanotengesera mumigwagwa panzvimbo yemabhizimisi, yeShowgrounds kuDomboshava mudunhu reGoromonzi West, vanoti vambomira kubhadhara mitero kukanzuru yeGoromonzi dzamara kanzuru iyi yavavakira zvimbuzi, misika yakanaka pamwe nekuvapa mvura panzvimbo dzavanoshandira. Vanhu ava vanoti vave nemakore akawanda vachibhdhara mitero kuGoromonzi Rural District Council asi pasina chinobuda, uye vanoti zvave kuitika panzvimbo iyi zvinogona kukonzera zvirwere zvemanyoka. Mumwe wevatongesera panzvimbo iyi, Amai Jesca Mawodzwa, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanoshushikana kuti kunyange hazvo vari kubhadhara mutero hapana chavari kuitirwa nekanzuru yavo. Vamwewo amai vasina kuda kudomwa nezita vaudza Studio 7 kuti havaoni chikonzero chekuramba vachibhadhara mitero nekuti hapana chavari kuwana kubva kukanzuru. Sachigaro vesangano reGoromonzi Vendors Association, VaTichaona Mazhambe, vaudzawo Studio 7 kuti zvave kuitwa nevanhu paShowgrounds zvinonzwisisika sezvo zvichemo zvavo zvave nemakore zvisina kugadziriswa. Pane vanhu vanodarika chiuru vanotengesera mumigwagwa paShowrounds kuDomboshava, uye vakatomboita mudememudeme wekutenga zvidhinha nesamende kuti vavakise zvimbuzi, asi havana kuwana rutsigiro kubva kukanzuru. Kanzura weWard 4 muGoromonzi Rural Distict Council, avo vanomirira nzvimbo iyi, VaTapiwa Murima, vaudza Studio 7 kuti kanzuru yavo yakaita chisungo kare chekuti zvinhu zvigadziriswe paShowgrounds, uye havachaziva kuti chii chiri kutadzisa basa kufambira mberi. VaMurima, avo vanovewo nhengo yekomiti inoona nezvemari muGoromonzi Rural District Council, vati paShowgrounds ndipo panobva mari yemitero yakawanda yekanzuru kudarika nzvimbo dzese muGoromonzi uye zvakakosha kuti kanzuru iitire vanhu zvavanoda kuti vasarega kubhadhara mitero. Vavimbisa kuti vachagara pasi nevakuru-vakuru mukanzuru yavo kuti matambudziko akatarisana nevanhu vepaShowground agadziriswe. No media source currently available
title: Vanotengesera paShow Grounds kuGoromonzi Voramba Kubhadhara Mitero

text: Zimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, yasangana neChipiri nevanhu vari kuda kukwikwidza musarudzo ichivaudza zvinodiwa kuti vakwanise kukwikwidza ichiti vanhu ava vave kukwanisa kuendesa magwaro avo kunyange hazvo dare reNomination Court richizogara musi wa14 Chikumi 2018. Mukuru weZEC muBulawayo District, Amai Sithembiso Khupe, vaudza Studio 7 kuti aka ndekekutanga ZEC ichiita hurongwa hwakadai vachiti ZEC yakaona zvakakodzera kuita izvi senzira yekuedza kurerutsa basa rayo uye kuitira kuti vanoda kunyoresa kuti vagokwikwidza vaite izvi nenzira iri nyore. Pamusangano uyu paita mibvunzo yakawanda kusanganisira wekuti vanokwikiwdza ava vachakwanisa kuwana riinhi gwaro rine mazita ane vanhu vakanyoresa kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota. VeZEC vatsanangura kuti munhu wose anenge akwanisa kunyoresa kuti agokwikwidza musarudzo achapihwa electronic copy yegwaro iri pachena mushure mekunge dare reNomination Court ragara musi wa14 Chikumi. Amai Sheila Musonda avo vati vari kukwikwidza pachinzvimbo chehukanzura vati vanhukadzi vakawanda vanenga vachida kukwikwidza muzvinzvimbo zvakasiyana siyana vanovhiringidzwa nenyaya yemagwaro ekuberekwa anenge akasiyana. VeZEC vavimbisa kuti vachaita zvose zvavanogona kurerutsira vanhukadzi vose vakagura michato yavo asi vachiri kushandisa mazita evarume vaive vakavaroora. Panyaya yenzira dzekubhadhara nadzo mari dzinodiwa pakunyoresa kuve nhengo yeNational Assembly kana pakuve nhengo yeSenate, VaDaniel Chigaru, mumwe wemakomishina eZEC ange ari pamusangano uyu, vati ZEC ichange ichitambira kubhadharwa nenzira dzakasiyana-siyana. Nhengo yebato reZanu PF, VaElifasi Mashaba, avo vachakwikwidza kuve nhengo yeparamende yakamirira Nkulumane vaudza Studio 7 kuti hurongwa hwaitwa neZEC huchabatsira zvikuru. Amai Nomvula Mguni avo vachakwikwidza kuve nhengo yeparamende yeBulawayo Central pasi pebato reMDC T inotungamirwa naMuzvare Thokozani Khupe vatsinhirawo kuti hurongwa hwaitwa neZEC hwakanaka. Dare reNomination Court richagara musi wa14Chikumi uye sarudzo dzichaitwa munyika musi wa30 Chikunguru. No media source currently available
title: ZEC Yosangana neVanhu Vachakwikwidza Musarudzo

text: Rimwe sangano rinomirira vagari vemuHarare, Harare Residents Trust, rinoti vagari vari kushushikana zvikuru nekusateverwa kwenguva dzakaziviswa nekambani yemagetsi ye Zimbabwe Electricity Transmission and Distribution Company kuti ichange ichidzima nekubatsidza magetsi, vachiti magetsi ari kudzimwa kwenguva ndefu uye dziri kunze kwedzakaziviswa. Mukuru wesangano iri, VaPrecious Shumba, vanoti izvi zvave kuita kuti vagari vatadze kuronga zvinhu zvavo zvakanaka, sezvo magetsi aya ari kungoenda kana kudzoka chero nguva, kwete dzakatarwa. VaShumba vanoti sangano ravo riri kutarisirawo kugara pasi nekambani yemagetsi iyi kuitira kusvitsa zvinyunyuto zvavo. Vanoti nekuda kwekuti magetsi haasi kuwanikwa, vagari vazhinji vave kushandisa mhando dzemoto dzakaita segasi nembhaura, izvo zvavanoti zvinogona kunge zviine njodzi huru kana zvakasabatwa zvakanaka. Vanotiwo mutengo wegasi unenge wakabva wakwidzwawo zvichitevera kunetsa kwemagetsi uku, izvo zvave kuita kuti vagari vazhinji varemerwe. VaShumba vanoyambirawo vari kushandisa mbhaura vachiti vasaishandisira munzvimbo dzisina mhepo yakakwana, sezvo utsi hwacho kuchikuwadza hutano kana kuuraya. No media source currently available Asi mutauriri wekambani yeZimbabwe Electricity Supply Authority, VaFullard Gwasira, vanoti nguva dzekudzimwa kwemagetsi dzavakazivisa hadzirevi kuti hadzishandurwe sezvo dziri dzekungoti vanhu vashande nadzo. VaGwasira vanoti kambani yeZimbabwe Electricity Transmission and Distribution Company iri kuedza napose paingona kuona kuti vagari vawana magetsi nguva dzakakodzera, asi mune dzimwe nguva zvinozoitika zvinenge zviri kunze kwehurongwa hwavo. Vanotiwo mamwe matambudziko avakatarisana nawo kunze kwekushomeka kwemvura mudhamu reKariba, ndeekubiwa kwemafuta mumichina yavo kana kukanganiswa nevanhu, uye kushaikwa kwemari yekunze. ZESA yakazivisa nezvehurongwa kwekudzimwadzimwa kwemagetsi ichiti mvura yadzikira zvakanyanya mudhamu reKariba, uye kusashanda zvakanaka kwemagwenya ayo kuHwange. No media source currently available
title: Vagari vemuHarare Vonyunyuta neNguva Dziri Kudzimwa Magetsi neZESA

text: Vanhu vakawanda muAmerica vataura neVoice of America vanoti nyaya yehupfum ndiyo yavari kunyanya kutarisa pavachavhota musarudzo dzakakosha zvikuru dzedare reHouse of Representatives neSenate. Izvi zvinonzi nenyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika zvichaomesera zvakanyanya bato riri kutonga remaDemocrats zvichipa mukana kubato rinopikisa remaRepublicans. Ongororo yakaitwa ne Monmouth University inoratidza kuti vanhu zvikamu makumi masere nemaviri kubva muzana kana kuti 82% havasi kufara nekudhura kwemitengo yezvinhu uye vanhu vatatu pavanhu gumi vanoti havasi kufara nezvirongwa zvekugadzirisa hupfumi zviri kudzikwa nemutungamiri wenyika VaJoe Biden vebato remaDemocrats. Asi vamwe vanotiwo havasi kufara nemitemo iri kuda kudzikwa nemaRepublicans yekuti madzimai asabvumidzwe kubvisa mimba kunyangwe hupenyu hwavo huri munjodzi.
title: Bato raVaJoe Biden remaDemocrats Rinonzi Rinogona Kukundwa Musarudzo Nekuda kweHupfumi Husina Kumira Zvakanaka

text: Musika weZimbabwe Stock Exchange, ZSE, unonzi uri kuita zvidavado sezvo vanhu vakawanda vari kuenda kunotenga nekutengesa hupfumi hwavo. Musika uyu pari zvino uri kuverengwa pamisika yepasi rose iri kushura mare mukuita mari. Mari iri kutenderera pamusika uyu yakange yasvika pamabhiriyoni gumi nerimwe emadhora. Makambani ari kuita zviri nani pamusika uyu anosanganisira Delta Corporation, kambani inotengesa makanda engwena yePadenga, Econet Wireless, Simbisa, National Foods, Old Mutual, Seedco, BAT, OK Zimbabwe nemamwe. Kunyange hazvo zvinhu zviri kufamba zvakanaka pamusika uyu, dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dziri kuyambira kuti uyu munongedzo wekuti hupfumi hwananga kumawere. Nyanzvi idzi dzinotiwo nyaya yekushomeka kwemari munyika nekusafamba zvakanaka kwehupfumi ndizvo zviri kupa kuti vanhu vauchike mari pamusika uyu. Vaimbova gurukota rezvemari muhurumende yemubatanidzwa uye vachitungamira bato rePeople’s Democratic Party, VaTendai Biti, vanoti kusamira zvakanaka kwehupfumi ndiko kuri kupa kuti vanhu vakawanda vaendese mari kuZSE. Mashoko aya atsinhirwa nemutevedzeri wemutungamiri wesangano reConfederation of Zimbabwe Industries, VaCallisto Jokonya, vanoti kana vanhu vekunze vave kuuya kumisika weZSE sezvo zvinhu munyika zvisina kumira zvakana muZimbabwe. Muzvinabhizimisi uye vaimbotungamira Zimbabwe National Chamber of Commerce, VaLuxson Zembe, vanoti nemamiriro akaita zvinhu munyaya dzezvehupfumi, Zimbabwe Stock Exchange ndiro bako rekuhwanda. Vanoti vamwe vave kutenga dzimba. Asi VaBiti vati zviri kuitwa pamusika uyu injuga. VaJokonya vayambirawo kuti zviri kuitika pamusika weZSE unogona kuva munongedzo wekuti Zimbabwe yadzokera kumakore ekuma 2008 apo dhora renyika rakashaya simba zvisina mukare akamboona kana kuti hyperinflation. VaZembe vanoti vane maonero mamwe nezviri kutaurwa naVaJokonya kuti uyu moto wemapepa. VaBiti vanotiwo zviri kuitika izvi ndizvo zvakambopa kuti musika uyu uvharwe mumakore apfuura. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kubata mukuru weZimbabwe Stock Exchange, VaAlban Chirume, sezvo vanzi vange vari pazororo uye vakafanobata nzvimbo yavo vanzi vange vari mumusangano. Mabhizimisi akawanda munyika haasi kufamba zvakanaka zvapa kuti vanhu vakawanda varasikirwe nemabasa. Hurumende inoti kusafamba zvakanaka kwehupfumi zviri kukonzerwa nezvirango zvainoti zvakatemerwa Zimbabwe nenyika dzakabudirira. Asi vanopikisa vanoti nyaya yehuori nekutonga nedemo ndizvo zvapa kuti zvinhu zviite mhidigari muZimbabwe. No media source currently available
title: Nyanzvi Dzoyambira Kuti Kunaka kweZvinhu kuZSE Munongedzo weHupfumi Hwoenda kuMawere.

text: Padare rekugamushira mapepa evachamirira mapato achakwikwidza musarudzo dzeparamende muMasvingo, pakaita mvonga mvonga yakanonotsa chirongwa ichi apo mamwe mapato akatadza kuwirirana kuti anoisa mapepa ndiyani. Izvi zvakazoita kuti MDC Allaince iwanike ine vamiriri vaviri mudunhu rimwe vachakwikwidzana mushure mukupinza mapepa avo ayo akatambirwa nedare, ukuwo kuZanu PF vane chitsamwa vakaisawo mapepa avo vachikwikwidza vakazvimirira voga. KuMDC Alliance matunhu masere akaita vamiriri vaviri vaviri vachibva kumapato akasiyana ari mumubatandizwa uyu avo vakatadza kuwirirana kuti pamire munhu mumwe chete. Mutauriri we MDC Alliance muMasvingo, VaSimon Mupindu, vakatenda izvi asi vakati zvichagadziriswa sarudzo dzisati dzaitwa. KuZanu PF kwakaitawo vanopfuura vashanu vakazvimirira kusanganisira nhengo yeparamende ye Chiredzi West, VaDarlington Chiwa, avo vakati vakabirirwa pasarudzo dze bato ravo. Asi mutungamiriri wevechidiki muZanu PF, VaPupurai Togarepi, avo vakakandawo mapepa avo kuGutu South, vakati vanhu vose vazvimirira vagara vakapandukira bato ravo nekudaro havana basa navo. Mamwe mapato aisa mapepa anosanganisra mubatanidzwa we Peoples’Rainbow Coalition inotungamirirwa na Amai Joyce Mujuru vakakanda kumatunhu gumi nemasere pamatunhu makumi maviri nematanhu aripo muMasvingo, uye bato re MDCT rinotungamirirwa naMuzvare Thokozani Khupe. Munyori mukuru wevechidiki veMDCT, Muzvare Isabel Mwonzora, vakati bato ravo raisa mapepa kumatunhu gumi nemana uye kumakanzuru akawanda. Kunetsana kwakaitika mumapato makuru akaita seMDC-Alliance ne Zanu PF kwakaita kuti dare rinonoke kupedza kutora magwaro evachamiririra. No media source currently available
title: Bhora Musango muMDC Alliance neZanu PF kuMasvingo?

text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti vanhu vanomwe vakafa nemusi weChipiri nechirwere cheCovid-19 icho chave kupararirawo zvakanyanya muzvikoro kubva zvazvavhurwa. Vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kupararira gore rapera vave zviuru zvina nemazana manomwe nemakumi manomwe nematanhatu kana kuti 4, 576. Vanhu mazana maviri nemakumi manomwe nevasere kana kuti 278 vakabatwa nechirwere ichi nezuro. Pavanhu vakabatwa nechirwere ichi ava, makumi mapfumbamwe nevasere kana kuti 98 vana vechikoro zvikuru kuMasvingo kune vana makumi mana nemumwe vakabatwa nechirwere ichi nezuro chete. Kusvika parizvino, vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika kubva zvachatanga kupararira vave zviuru zviuru nemakumi maviri nezvisere zvine mazana mana nemakumi matanhatu nevana kana kuti 128, 464. Kunyange hazvo vanhu zvikamu makumi mana kubva muzana vakabatwa nechirwere ichi nezuro vari muzvikoro, mutauriri mubazi rezvedzidzo, VaTaungana Ndoro, vanoti vari kuita zvavanofanira kuita. No media source currently available Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano, Dr Enoch Mayida, avo vakambotungamira chipatara cheChitungwiza, vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kuisa zvikwanisiro zvakakwana muzvikoro kuitira kuti vana nevarairidzi vakwanise kuzvidzivirira. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, vanhu vabayiwa nhomba yeCovid-19 kekutanga vave mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi manomwe nezvitanhatu nemazana mashanu negumi nemaviri kana kuti 3 976 512. Vanhu vabayiwa nhomba kechipiri vave mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru zviuru zana nezvitanhatu zvine mazana masere nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevasere kana kuti 2 106 898. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya nhomba yeCovid-19 vanhu mamiriyoni gumi kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi.
title: Vana veChikoro Makumi Mapfumbamwe neVasere Vobatwa neCovid-19 neMusi weChipiri

text: Misika yefodya yavhurwa nhasi varimi vachigunun’una nemitengo yange iri pasi pamwe nedanho ehurumende rekuti vabhadharwe zvikamu makumi matanhatu nemari yekunze kunyange hazvo ivo vaida kupihwa zvikamu makumi masere kubva muzana pamari yavenenge vatengesa fodya. Vachiparura mwaka wekutengesa fodya gore rino pamusika weTobacco Sales Floor, gurukota rezvekurima, Dr Anxious Masuka, vati fodya yaunzwa nevarimi yakanaka chose uye vanotarisira kuti ichatengwa nemitengo inofadza varimi. Asi izvi handizvo zvaitika nekuti kirogiramu rekutanga ratengwa nemadhora mana nemasendi makumi matatu ekuAmerica izvo zvisina kufadza varimi. Mumwe murimi, VaRobson Katiyo vekwaKazangarare kuKaroi, vati misika yavhura mitengo yakadzikira pane zvavanga vakatarisira. Amai Kudzai Bhutai avo vave nemakore gumi nemashanu vachirima fodya kuKaroi ndemumwe asina kufara nemitengo yange iri kumisika nhasi. Sachigaro webhodhi yeTobacco Industries Marketing Board, TIMB, VaPat Devenish, vati gore rino varimi vachabhadharwa zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana nemari yekunze kubva pazvikamu makumi shanu kubva muzana gore rapfuura. Asi varimi havana kufara nazvo vachiti zvinhu zvizhinji zvavanoshandisa pakurima vanoshandisa mari yekunze uye vanoda kuti vapihwe zvikamu makumi masere kubva muzana zvemari iyi ari madhora ekuAmerica. Amai Bhutai vati vanoda mari yekuAmerica yakawanda nekuti ndiyo yave kushandiswa pane kutenga nekutengeswa kwezvinhu zvese munyika. VaMasuka vati hurumende inoziva matambudziko akatarisana nevarimi uye vanoda kuti goho refodya riwedzerwe kubva pamakirogramu mamiriyoni mazana maviri pari zvino kusvika pamamiriyoni mazana matatu gore rega raga. Asi vati izvi zvinofanira kuitwa pachishandiswa mari yemuno kwete kushandisa mari yekunze sezviri kuitika pari zvino. VaDevenish vati kunyange hazvo huwandu hwevanhu vari kurima fodya munyika huri kuwedzera, paita dambudziko guru rekuti vazhinji vari kuomesa fodya yavo nekuparadza miti nemasangango. Vati nekuda kwaizvozvo makambani akawanda ekunze anogadzira fodya yekuputa, akatovayambira kuti acharega kutenga fodya yemuZimbabwe kana izvi zvikaramba zvichiitika. Asi VaMasuka vaudza Studio 7 kuti dambudziko rave kugadziriswa nemutero weTobacco Levy uyo unosungira kuti varimi vefodya vadyare miti yekushandisa fodya yavo kwete kuparadza masangano. Fodya inounza mari yekunze yakawanda kudarika zvimwe zvirimwa zvese uye gore rapera chete yakaunza munyika mamiriyoni mazana manomwe nemakumi masere nemaviri emadhora ekuAmerica. Gore rino inotarisirwa kuunza mari yekawanda kudarika apa sezvo huwandu hwevarimi vefodya hwawedzera kubva pa 145 625 kusvika pa 147 931. VaMasuka vati hurumende inotarisira kuti TIMB ichavandudza mabasa ekurimwa kwefodya munyika pamwe nezvimwe zvinogadzirwa kubva mufodya kuti nyika iwane mabhiriyoni mashanu emadhora ekuAmerica kubva kuindasitiri iyi gore rega rega. Pane misika mitatu yavhura nhasi inoti TSF, Boka Tobacco Floors nePremier Tobacco Floors. No media source currently available
title: Varimi veFodya Vonyunyuta neMutengo Wayo Uri Pasi

text: NeChitatu nhengo dzeHouse of Assembly dzeZanu-PF dzinosvika gumi nevatanhatu dzakatora mhiko mushure mesarudzo dzakaitwa musi wa 10 mwedzi uno. Asi mapato makuru anopokisa achitungamirwa neMDC-T haana kupinda musarudzo idzi achiti haasi kufara nekuti hapasi kuvandudzwa mitemo yesarudzo. Izvi zvinoreva kuti Zanu PF yava nezvigaro mudare iri zvinodarika mazana maviri negumi zvichitevera kutora kwayakaita zvigaro gumi nezvina zvanga zviri zveMDC-T iyo yakaramba kupinda musarudzo. Kunyange hazvo paine kugunun’una uku, vakasarudzwa kumirira Highfield West muZanu PF, VaPyschology Mazivisa, vanoti vafara nekutora kwavo mhiko kwavaita. VaMazvivisa vati ikozvino vazvipira kuti vange vachishanda zvakasimba kuunza budiriro uye havanei nekuramwa kupinda musarudzo kweMDC-T. Asi vaimirira Dzivarasekwa vasati vadzingwa mudare, VaSolomon Madzore, vanoti zvaitika nhasi zvinosuwisa zvikuru. Sangano reZimbabwe Election Support Network rakatiwo sarudzo idzi hadzina kufambiswa zvakanaka kunyanya mhirizhonga inonzi yaiitwa kuHurungwe West. Mapato anofanira kutanga kugadzirira dzimwe sarudzo mumatunhu mashanu ange aine nhengo dzeZanu-PF dzimwe dzakadzingwa dzimwe dzakashanya. Vakashaya ndiVaAmos Midzi veku Epworth uye Amai Acquilina Katsande. Vakadzingwa ndiVaRay Kaukonde-Marondera Central, VaDavid Butau-Mbire uye VaKudakwashe Bhasikiti-Mwenezi East. Asi VaBhasikiti vanoti nemhirizhonga yavakaona kuHurungwe West havasi kuzopinda musarudzo ye by election. Asi sachigaro weZimbabwe Electoral Commision, Amai Rita Makaru, vanoti havangataure nezvemhirizhonga iyi sezvo nyaya iyi iri kumatare pari zvino. Mutauriri webato reMDC-T, VaObert Gutu, vanoti havasi kuzopinda musarudzo sezvo zvavari kuda kuti zviitwe zvisati zvaitwa nehurumende pamwe neZEC. Asi mukuru webato reNational Constitutional Assembly, Muzvinafundo Lovemore Madhuku, vanoti vachapinda musarudzo dzose dzinoitwa munyika. Asi VaMadhuku vanoti havo pane zvimwe zvinoda kuti zvigadziriswe neZEC. Sarudzo dzemunyika dzagara dzichiita mutauro uye vamwe vanoti izvi ndozvapa kuti Zimbabwe itatarike sezvo vekunze vachiiona senyika isina kugadzikana. No media source currently available
title: Nhengo dzeZanu-PF Dzotora Mhiko Mudare reParamende

text: Vanotengesera mumigwagwa yemuHarare varwisana nemapurisa ekanzuru yeguta iri mushure mekunge vatorerwa zvinhu zvavanga vachitengesa nemapurisa aya. No media source currently available Mapurisa ekanzuru aya anonzi afumira mumigwagwa maatorera vanhu zvinhu zvavo ndokuenda nazvo kumahofisi ekanzuru. Zvichitevera kupambwa kwaitwa zvinhu izvi, vatengesi ava vaita gurumwandira vakananga kumahofisi ekanzuru kwavaratidzira vakatakura mapepa ane zvinyorwa zvakasiyana-siyana vachida kuti vadzoserwe zvinhu zvavo.
