Zvimwe zvezvinyorwa izvi zvanga zvakanzi, “Tidzoserei zvinhu zvedu munoda kuti tife nenzara here?” Mutungamiri werimwe remasangano anomirira vanotengesera mumigwagwa re National Vendors Union of Zimbabwe, VaSamuel Wadzayi, vati chavanga vachida chete ndechekuti nhengo dzesangano ravo dzidzoserwe zvinhu zvadzo zvatorwa nemapurisa ekanzuru. VaWadzayi vari pakati pekutaura neStudio 7, mapurisa ekanzuru anga aine tsvimbo abva atanga kurova vatengesi ava avo vazodzoserawo nekuatema nematombo. Mukurwisana uku, mapurisa asunga vatengesi vanokwana gumi zvazoita kuti VaWadzayi vaende mumba yekanzuru yanga yakachengeterwa vanhu vasungwa nemapurisa ekanzuru ava zvazokonzera kuti vabve vasungwa wo zvakare. Mumwe wevatori venhau, Edgar Gweshe, ambosungwawo nemapurisa aya mushure mekutora mifananidzo yezvanga zvichiitika asi azoregedzwa. Munyori musangano rinomirira vatori venhau reZimbabwe Union of Journalists, VaFoster Dongozi, vaburitsa mashoko ekushora mapurisa ekanzuru vachiti vatori venhau vanofanirwa kuregedzwa vachiita basa ravo vakasununguka. Studio 7 yazoona VaWadzayi nevamwe vatengesi vakaiswa ngetani vari mune imwe hofisi yekanzuru yeHarare, uye vamwe vevatengesi vanga vabatwa ava vanga vachizvindikitwa netsvimbo nemapurisa ekanzuru aya. Rimwe remasangano anomirira vagari vemuHarare, reCombined Harare Residents Association, rinoti ratumira magweta kuti anomirira vasungwa ava. Mumwe wevanotengesera mumigwagwa ava, Amai Merjury Gobvu, vati havana kufara nekutorwa kwaitwa zvinhu zvavo nemapurisa ekanzuru aya. Sachigaro werimwe remasangano anomirira vanotengesera mumigwagwa reMobile Youth Foundation, Va Peter Jack, vati kupambwa kwaitwa zvinhu nekanzuru kwaitwa kanzuru ichishanda pamwe chete nevasori pamwe nevamwe vasiri vashandi vekanzuru. VaJack vati vamwe vashandi vekanzuru vanga vachida chioko muhomwe kuti vadzosere zvinhu zvavanga vatorera vanhu vanotengesera mumigwagwa ava. Zvichakadai, mutauriri wekanzuru, VaMichael Chideme, varamba mashoko ekuti mapurisa avo arova vanotengesera mumigwagwa ava vachiti mapurisa aya anga achichengetedza mahofisi ekanzuru yavo. Kunyange hazvo kanzuru yaswera ichitorera vanhu zvinhu mudhorobha reHarare, vanotengesera mumigwagwa ava vanga vachidzoka mbichana-mbichana vachizowaridza zvinhu zvavo mumigwagwa vachiti havana chekubata kudzimba dzavo. Vamwewo vanotengesera mumigwagwa ava vave kutanga kutengesa manheru kana vashandi vekanzuru vachinge vapedza mabasa. Zvichakadaro, VaWadzayi vaudza Studio 7 vari mumaoko emapurisa kuti vaudzwa nemapurisa aya kuti vangangoendeswa kudare redzimhosva neChitatu, vachipomerwa mhosva yekukonzera mhirizhonga. VaWadzayi vanoti vakuru vekanzuru pamwe nevehurumende havasi kuda kutaurirana nevanotengesera mumigwagwa ava senzira yekugadzirisa dambudziko iri. No media source currently available
title: Vanotengesera Mumigwagwa Vorwisana neMapurisa eKanzuru yeHarare

text: Nhengo dzedare reparamende dziri kutarisirwa neChipiri kuita sarudzo dzekutsvaga achave mutauriri wedare reNational Assembly pamwe nemutungamiri weSeneti nevatevedzeri vavo. Bato reZanu PF rinonzi rakasunga kuti vanga vari mutauriri wedare reparamende yadarika VaJacob Mudenda vadzoserwe pachigaro ichi kuchitiwo Amai Mabel Chinomona vachisarudzwa kuve mutungamiri wedare reSeneti. Mashoko atiri kuwana asi asina kutsinhirwa neMDC Alliance anoratidza kuti bato iri rakadomawo Muzvare Thabitha Khumalo kuti vakwikwidze chigaro chemutauriri wedare reparamende, kuchitiwo VaElias Mudzuri vachinzi vakwikwidze chigaro chemutungamiri wedare reSeneti. Sarudzo idzi dzinonzi dzichaitwa kuburikidzwa nekuvhota muchivande dzichitungamirwa neZimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC. Asi Zanu PF ine mukana mukuru kwazvo wekutora zvigaro zvose izvi pachitariswa kuti ine huwandu mumatare ose ari maviri zvichienzaniswa neMDC Alliance. Vakasarudzwa senhengo dzeparamende vasina kukwanisa kutoreswa mhiko svondo rapera vari kutarisirwawo kutoreswawo mhiko. Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vachishanda nesangano reConcerned Citizens Support Network of Zimbabwe, uye vakarerekera kubato reMDC Alliance, VaTawanda Dzvokora, avo vari kuNorth Dakota muAmerica, vanoti kunyange hazvo zanu PF iine huwandu, inofanirwawo kukoshesa ruzivo rwenhengo dzinopikisa kana yoshara vatungamiri. Vanoti kuMDC Alliance kune vanhu vakaita saVaMudzuri avo vavanoti vane nhoroondo yekushanda senhengo yeparamende kwemakore akawanda uye vakambotungamira guta reHarare vari meya. No media source currently available
title: Matare eParamende neSeneti Oita Sarudzo dzeKutsvaga Vatungamiri

text:
Vamwe vanhu vanoti vari kufara nedanho ratorwa nemutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, rekudoma Justice Luke Malaba semukuru wevatongi vematare edzimhosva. VaMalaba vari kutora basa rakasiyiwa naVaGodfrey Chidyausiku, avo vakaenda pamudyandigere kutanga kwaKurume.

Mutevedzeri wemukuru wesangano rinoshanda rakazvimirira rega reCentre for Public Engagement, VaButler Tambo, vanoti vari kufara nedanho ratorwa nemutungamiri wenyika vachiti izvi zvinoratidza kuti VaMugabe vatevedzera mutemo wenyika sezvinotarisirwa. . Sangano iri nderimwe remasangano pamwe nevamwe vanhu vange vasiri kufara nemakakatanwa ange aripo panyaya yekusarudzwa kwaChief Justice mutsva uye kuda kuvandudzwa kwemutemo une chekuita nekusarudzwa kwemukuru wevatongi vematare. Murwiri wekodzero dzevanhu vachitaura semuongorori wezvematongerwo enyika akazvimirira ega, VaVivid Gwede , vatiwo vanofunga kuti vanhu munyika vari kufara nedanho ratorwa nemutungamiri wenyika. Pamusangano wekuzeya nezvekuvandudzwa kwemutemo wekusarudzwa kwaChief Justice wakaitwa muBulawayo muna Kukadzi, vanhu vakawanda vakaratidza kusafara kwavo nehurongwa hwehurumende uhu vachiti vanotyira kuti kuda kuchinja mutemo uku inzira yebato riri kutonga reZanu PF yekuedza kupindira mumashandiro evatongi vematare epamusoro. Kunyange hazvo kuda kuvandudzwa kwemutemo uku kungangoenderera mberi, VaGwede vanoti vanotarisira kuti vadare veparamende vachatevedzera zvido zvevanhu. Asi VaTambo vanoti havafunge kuti kunyange mutemo ukavandudzwa, pachave nechichachinja pakudomwa kwaJustice Malaba Gurukota redzidzo yepamusoro, Muzvinafundo VaJonathan Moyo, varatidzawo kufara paTwitter pavo vachiti kudomwa kwaJustice Malaba naVaMugabe kunoratidza kuti mutungamiri wenyika vanotevedzera gwara remutemo. Kubvira payakatanga, nyaya yekuda kuvandudza mutemo wekusarudzwa kwemukuru wevatongi yakonzera mutauro munyika vamwe vachiti kuda kuvandudzwa kwemutemo uku kunoratidza makakatanwa ari mukati mebato riri kutonga reZanu PF. Murongi wemabasa musangano reAbammeli Human Rights Lawyers Network, VaTineyi Mukwewa, vanotiwo vari kufara nekudomwa kwaVa Malaba semukuru wevatongi, asi vati zvinogona kuitika kuti pane vangade kuramba vachipikisa kudomwa uku. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kune boka reJudicial Services Commission. Asi mutauriri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaGeorge Charamba, vati VaMalaba, avo vari kunze kwenyika pari zvino, vanotarisirwa kutora mhiko svondo rinouya.

VaMalaba vakazvarwa mugore ra1951 vakashanda semuchuchisi mushure mekuwana kuzvitonga kwenyika. Vakaita zvidzidzo zvemitemo kuBritain nemuZimbabwe. Mushure mekushanda semuchuchisi, vakashandawo samajesitireti kwemakore akawanda. Vakazodomwa semutongi wematare edzimhosva epamusoro muna 1994, vakazoitwa mutongi wemuSupreme Court muna 2008.
title: VaLuke Malaba Vanodomwa Kuve Mutongi Mukuru weMatare

text: Nyanzvi dzezvemutemo dziri kupesana panyaya yekusungwa kwemutungamiri webato rinopikisa reTransform Zimbabwe, VaJocb Ngarivhume pamwe nemutori wenhau Hopewell Chin’ono, avo vakasungwa neMuvhuro. Vaviri ava vari kupomerwa mhosva yekutyora chikamu 187 chebumbiro remitemo mushure mekunge vakurudzira vanhu kuti varatidzire musi wa 31 Chikunguru, unove mwedzi uno. Gweta rinorwira kodzero uye vari mukuru weHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica, VaDewa mavhinga, vari kupomera hurumende mhosva yekutyora kodzero dzevaviri ava dzekuratidzira dzavanopiwa nebumbiro remitemo yenyika. VaMavhinga vanoti hapana chinganzi chakakanganiswa naVaNgarivhume pamwe naChin'ono sezvo vari kuzadzisa kodzero dzavo dzekuburitsa huwori hwavanoti huri kuitika muhurumende. Vanoti hurumende iri kuita semunhu anotya changodonha nekuti anenge aine katurike, Asi Doctor Simba Mavaza, avo vanove nhengo yeZanu PF, vanoti vaviri ava ndivo vari kutotyora mutemo kuburikidza nekufurira vanhu kuti vaungane ipo paine mutemo unorambidza kuungana kwevanhu vanodarika kuungana kwevanhu vanodarika makumi mashanu munguva ino yechirwere che Covid-19. Doctor Mavaza vanoti hurumende hairambidze vanhu kuti varatidzire, kana chete vachingoratidzira zviri murunyararo, asi nguva yada kuratidzirwa nevanhu ava ndiyo iri kuita kuti varambidzwe nekuti inguva ye lockdown yechirwere che covid-19. Vanoti vaviri ava vari kuda kupidigura hurumende, vachiti vanoda kubvisa hurumende vanofanirwa kumirira sarudzo dza023, kwete kuda kubvisa hurumende nechisimba. VaNgarivhume naChin'ono vamiswa pamberi pedare nnemusi weChina apo VaNgarivhume vanyimwa mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso, vakanzi vanozodzoka zvakare kudare musi wa 14 Nyamavhuvhu. Chin'ono anzi agozodzoka zvakare kudare nemusi weChishanu sezvo dare rakasika kuvharwa nekuda kwemutemo mutsva wekurambidza vanhu kufamba pakati penguva dza 6 manheru na 6 mangwanani, uyo wakadzikwa nemutungamiri wenyika svondo rino vachisimbisa mutemo wekudzivirira kupararira kwe Coronavirus.. No media source currently available
title: Nyanzvi dzeMutemo Dzopesana paNyaya yeKusungwa kwaVaNgarivhume Pamwe naChin'ono

text: Mutumbi wegamba renyika Dr Sikhanyiso Ndlovu uri kurara muHarare nemusi weChishanu pachigadzirirwa kuvigwa kwavo neMugovera kumarinda eNational Heroes Acre. Mutauriri weZanu-PF VaSimon Khaya Moyo vanoti mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vari kutarisirwa kutura mashoko pakuvigwa kwaVaNdlovu. Dr Ndlovu vakashaya neChipiri kuBulawayo. NeChishanu kwakaitwa munamato pamba pavo kuSunning Hill muBulawayo. Vakuru vehurumende neveZanu-PF kusanganisa VaObert Mpofu, amai Angeline Masuku, amai Eunice Sandi Moyo uye VaRichard Ndlovu. Kunze kwezvematongerwo enyika, VaNdlovu vaizivikanwa zvikuru nekusimbisa nyaya yedzidzo. Mutungamiri wesangano revadzidzi reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe VaTakavafira Zhou vanoti VaNdlovu vane kodzero yekuvigwa kumarinda eNational Heroes Acre. No media source currently available Mashoko aya anotsinhirawo naVaRugare Gumbo avo vaimbova mutauriri webato reZanu-PF uye vakashanda nemufi. No media source currently available
title: VaSikhanyiso Ndlovu Vovigwa kuHeroes Acre neMugovera

text: Vaimbova murwiri wehondo yerusununguko, Amai Margaret Dongo vanoti havasi kufara nezviri kuitwa nehurumende mukugadzirisa zvido zvevanhu vakarwa hondo yerusununguko. Mashoko aya ari kuuya apo mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vari kutarisirwa kuita musangano nevakarwa hondo yerusununguko ava kuti vazeye nezvematabudziko avo. Asi Amai Dongo vanoti nyaya yekushaya mari dzekurapwa iri kupa kuti vaive varwi vehondo yerusununguko vakawanda vafe nezvirwere zvinokwanisa kurapwa. Vatiwo zvainge zvakakosha kuti hurumende itevedzerewo zvinoitwa nedzimwe nyika dzakabudirira dzakaita seAmerica idzo dzine zvipatara zvevakarwa hondo ava. Vatiwo varwi vehondo yerusununguko vakashandiswa pakutora minda kubva kuvachena iyo yakazotorwa nevematongerwo enyika mushure mekunge vachena vadzingwa. Muna 1997, hurumende yakambopa varwi vehondo yerusununguko ava mari inosvika zviuru makumi mashanu zvemadhora asi vakarwa hondo ava vanoti iyi yaive mari shoma zvikuru zvichienzainswa nezvinoitwa nedzimwe nyika. Amai Dongo vati vakarwa hondo vakawana mari dzezvikwereti vanokwanisa kuzviitira mabasa avo pasina kuda kuzembera hurumende. No media source currently available
title: Vakarwa Hondo yeRusungun Vofa Vachidya Nhoko dzeZvironda

text: Hukama pakati pameya weguta reHarare nemakanzura haachina kumira zvakanaka zvichitevera mashoko ameya ekuti kanzuru inoda makanzura ane hunyanzvi. Kirsty Coventry otora menduru yegoridhe kumakwikwi ema All Africa Games. Zvikoro zvepamusoro zvokurudzirwa kupa mukana kune vakaremara. EU inokurudzira hurumende yeZimbabwe kuti itsvage kune murwiri wekodzero dzevanhu akapambwa Itai Dzamara. Nyanzvi nemapato ezvematongerwo enyika votaura nezvegwara rakaparurwa nesangano raAmai Joyce Mujuru nezuro. Muchirongwa cheLivetalk na 8:30 pm tiri kutarisa nyaya yegwaro rezvematongerwo enyika rakaparurwa naAmai Joyce Mujuru rakanangana nezvavanoda kuita vakasarudzwa kutungamira nyika. Iyi ndiyo misoro yenhau dzedu dzanhasi...munotibata pa 909 am, 4930, kana pa 12080, ne 15460 kilohertzs pa Shortwave kana pafacebook page yedu yeVoa Shona. No media source currently available
title: Misoro yeNhau, Gunyana, 09, 2015

text: Dare repamusoro rambosendeka parutivi danho rainge ratorwa neBroadcasting Authority of Zimbabwe, BAZ, iyo yakanga yakanzura rezinesi rekambani yeDr Dish iyo iri kushanda nekambani yeKwese TV. Dare rati BAZ yakaknzura rezenisi iri zvisiri pamutemo. Kambani yeKwese TV ndeyamuzvinabhizinesi, VaStrive Masiyiwa, uye iri kushanda zviri pamutemo munyika dzakaita seNigeria, Botswana, Kenya, Zambia nedzimwe. Musi wa 22 Nyamavhuvhu, BAZ yakati yainge yakanzura rezinesi iri nekuti Dr Dish yainge yanzi ingoshanda chete nekambani yeMy TV Africa Service, kwete Kwese TV. Asi Dr Dish yakaenda kumatare ichiti zvainge zvaitwa nemukuru weBAZ zvainge zvisiri pamutemo sezvo achifanira kukanzura marezinesi awirirana nebhodhi iro risipo pari zvino. Kambani iyi yakatiwo hachisi chokwadi kuti yaifanira kungoshanda neMy TV Africa chete. Kambani yeDr Dish yati kambani yavari kukwikwidzana nayo yeDSTV inoshanda nemakambani akawanda muzvirongwa zvayo, nokudaro haioni chikonzera chinopa hurumende kuti ikanzure rezenisi rayo. Kambani yeKwese inoti yange itori nevanhu zviuru makumi maviri nezvitatu vainge votoona zvirongwa zvayo uye kune vamwe zviuru zvinomwe vakatobhadhara mari yekutanga kuona zvirongwa izvi. Gweta reDr Dish, VaTawanda Nyambirai, vanoti vari kufara nemutongo wapihwa nedare redzimhosva. VaNyambirai vati zvichitevera mutongo uyu, vanhu vachatanga kuona zvakare Kwese TV chero nguva kubva pari zvono. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi reBAZ. Nyanzvi munyaya dzemitemo dzinoti hurumende inogona kuita kuti bhodhi reBAZ rigadzwe richibva rapa danho rekukanzura rezenisi reDr Dish. Asi dzimwe nyanzvi dzinotiwo bhodhi iri rikatora danho rekukanzura rezenisi reDr Dish, kambani iyi inogonawo kuendesa nyaya iyi kudare repamusoro soro. No media source currently available
title: Matare Anobvumidza Kambani yeDr Dish Kutepfenyura Zvirongwa zveKwese TV

text: Bato guru rinopikisa reMDC Alliance rinotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa rinoti nhengo dzaro dzose hadzisi kuzoenda kumatare eSenate neHouse of Assembly dzichiratidza kutsutsumwa kwadzo nekudzingwa mudare iri kwevamwe vavo vana emutauriri wedare reparamende VaJacob Mudenda nemutungamiri wedare reSenate Amai Mabel Chinomona. Izvi zvinotevera tsamba yainge yanyorwa naVaDouglas Mwonzira vari kuzvitiwo ndiwo vawe munyori mukuru webato reMDC T zvichitevera mutongo wedare repamusoro wekuti Amai Thokozani Khupe vambobata matomu kwemwedzi mitatu pasati paitwa sarudzo. Asi Standing komiti yeMDC Alliance yakasangana neChitatu inoti mutongo uyu hauna nematuro ose sezvo Amai Khupe vakakwikwidza musarudzo nebato ravo reMDC-T. Mutevedzeri wemutauriri weMDC Alliance VaLuke Tamborinyoka vaudza Studio 7 kuti bato ravo radzingawo VaMwonzora vacho, vaive chipangamazano chaVaChamisa VaMorgan Komichi uye munyori munyaya dzezvekutongwa kwematunhu VaElias Mudzuri. No media source currently available Vati vachaendawo kumatunhu ose kunonzwa pfungwa dzevanhu. Hatina kukwanisa kubata VaMwonzora sezvo vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. Vakadzingwa mumatare eHouse of Assembly vanoti VaCharlton Hwende, Kuwadzana East, VaProsper Mutseyami, Chikanga/Dangamvura, sachigao webato iri Amai Tabitha Khumalo uye vanokokera MDC Alliance mudare reSenate, Amai Lilian Timveous. Bato iri rabuda nechisungo chekuti vana ava vaende kumatare kunopikisa zvakaitwa naVaMudenda naAmai Chinomona
title: MDC Alliance Yomira Kuenda KuMatare eParamende Uye Yodzinga VaMwonzora, VaMudzuri naVaKomichi

text: Zimbabwe iri kutarisirwa kuzeya zvine hudzamu kumusangano wevanhukadzi mu New York dambudziko rekurodzwa kwevanasikana vasati vabva zera iro rinonzi riri kuramba richikwira munyika. Nhengo yechikwata chemadzimai chinoona nezvevanhukadzi muparamende, uye vari mudare weZanu PF vanomirira Goromonzi West, Amai Biata Nyamupinga, mumwe weavo vari kumusangano uyu uye vanoti vari kufadzwa nemabasa arikubatwa nemadzimai ari kumirira Zimbabwe.  Musangano wemadzimai uyu uri kukokerwa neUnited Nations muNew York uye uri kupindwa nemadzimai anobva kumapato nemakambani akasiyana siyana pasi rose. Dambudziko rekuroodzwa kwevanasikana vasati vabva zera rinonzi riri kutekeshera munyika nyanya kudzvimbo dzakadayi seMashonaland Central. Amai Nyamupinga vanoti nhengo dzeparamende dzichatanga chirongwa chavakamboita chekudzidzisa veruzhinji mitemo iri munyika pamusoro pekuroodza vanasikana vasati vabva zera, iyo yave mhosva munyika. "Kutanga kwemwedzi unouya tichatanga zvakare zvirongwa zvedu sevadare chekudzidzisa veruzhinji nyanya vari kumaruva kuti kuroodza vanasikana vasati vabve zera yave mhosva uye dambudziko iri rinofanirwa kusvika kumagumo," Amai Biata Nyamupinga vaudza Studio7. Amai Nyamupinga vanoti vachatorawo zvimwe zvidzidzo kubva kune dzimwe nyika dziri muAfrica dziri pamusangano uyu dzakakwanisa kana kuti dziri kurwira dambudziko iri zvakasimba. No media source currently available
title: Kuroodzwa kweVanasikana Vasati Vabva Zera Kwozeya kuNew York

text: Vaive vashandi vepamugodhi weShabanie kuZvishavane mudunhu reMidlands vanodarika zana nemakumi matatu vanoti vakaburitswa mudzimba dzekambani iyi dzavanga vachigara mumusha weMaglas, mushure mekunge vamiswa mabasa. Mumwe wevaive vashandi ava, uye ave pamudyandigere, VaAndrew Lunga, vanoti ivo nevamwe vavo vanga vachiri kugara mudzimba idzi sezvo vasati vapiwa mari dzavo dzemihoro kubva muna 2009, pamwe nemari dzavo dzemudyandigere. VaLunga, avo vasati vaburitswa muimba yavari kugara, vanoti midziyo yevakaburitswa mudzimba ava iri kungogara panze uye vazhinji vavo vari kurara panze munguva ino yechando. Vanoti vaive vashandi ava vari kupiwa chiziviso chemazuva maviri nevakuru vemugodhi weShabanie chekuti vabude mudzimba idzi, kukundikana kubuda voburitsirwa midziyo nezvikonzi. Vanoti dzimba dzavari kudzingwa idzi dziri kuzorojeswa kuvana vechikoro chepamusoro soro cheMidlands State University. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata vakuru vekambani ye Shabanie Mine sezvo nhare yavo yanga isingadairwi. Asi VaLunga vanoti vave kutengesa zvinhu zvakaita sematomati kuti vakwanise kuunganidza mari dzekubhadhara magweta anovamirira kuti vasaburitswa mudzimba idzi. Migodhi yeShabanie neGaths, iyo yaimbove muchinhambo chechitanhatu pakucherwa kwe asbestos pasi rose, yaimbove nevashandi vanosvika zviuru zvishanu panguva yayaishanda zvakanaka. Mugore ra1996, migodhi iyi, iyo yaive pasi pekambani yeShabanie Mashaba Mines (SMM), yakatengwa namuzvinabhizimusi Mutumwa Mawere pasi pehurongwa hwainzi nevamwe hwakanga husina kujeka. Mugore ra2004 migodhi iyi yakatanga kuparara iri pasi paVaMawere mushure mekunge vatanga kupomerwa mhosva yekukuruka hurumende mari yakawanda kwazvo. VaMawere vakatizira kuSouth Africa, asi hurumende yakambozama kuti vadzoswe kumusha vamiswe mumatare edzimhosva. Izvi zvakundikana, hurumende yakazoisa makambani aya pasi payo, izvo zvakabva zvatonyanya kuanyudza mumatope. No media source currently available
title: Vaive Vashandi veShabanie Mine Voburitswa Mudzimba

text: Gweta remutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, VaLewis Uriri vaudza vatongi vedare reConstitutional Court kuti kunyangwe hazvo Zimbabwe Electoral Commission iri kubuditsa zvakasiyana siyana panyaya yezvakabuda musarudzo, VaMnangagwa ndivo vakakuda nekuti vachiri vakadarika mavhoti anosvika zviuru makumi mashanu nerimwe kubva muzana anodiwa kuti munhu akunde musarudzo. Sachigaro weZEC aburitsa zvitatu zvakasiyana pane zvakabuda musarudzo dzemutungamiri wenyika zviri kunzi nemagweta eMDC Alliance kukanganiswa kwezvakabuda kwainge kwakanangana nekuda kubirira sarudzo kuti VaMnangagwa vakunde musarudzo. VaUriri vati semuenzaniso, pakamboita makakatanwa akada kudai kuAmerica pakati paVaGeorge Bush vemaRepublicans naval Gore vemaDemocrats, vatongi havana kudzokorora sarudzo asi vakatonga kuti VaBush ndivo vainge vakunda.
title: Gweta raVaMnangagwa Rinoti Kunyagwe ZEC Irikupa Zvakasiyana paMavhoti Sarudzo Yakakundwa naVaMnangagwa

text: Senzira yekuedza kukwezva vanhu kuti vaende kunonyoresa kuvhota, sangano reElection Resource Centre rinonzi rakapaurura choringwa chekuti vanhu vakwanise kunonyoresa kuvhota. Sangano iri rinoti vanhu vanenge vaungana nehuwandu huri pakati pevanhu vatanhatu kusvika kuvanomwe vanowaniswa motokari inovatakura kuenda kunonyoresa kuvhota kumahofisi ekanzuru ari kuna Remembrance Drive kuMbare, pamwe neimwe hofisi iri mukati meguta reHarare. Sangano iri riri kukurudzirawo veruzhinji vanenge vachida kunyoresa kuvhota kuti vafone panhamba dzaro dzisingabhadharwi, kana kuti Toll Free, dzinoti 08080219. Izvi zvinoitikawo panguva iyo vemasangano akazvimirira vari kukurudzira Zimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, kuti ivhure imwe hofisi mukati meguta kuitira kupa vanhu mukana wekuti vanyorese vakawanda pazuva, kudarika zana rinonzi riri kunyoresa pazuva kuMbare. ZEC yakazivisawo kuti kusvika pari zvino, vanhu vanosvika mamiriyoni mashanu ane mazana mana ezviuru vanyoresa kuvhota. Mumiriri weHarare West muparamende uye vari nhengo yeMDC-T, Muzvare Jessie Majome, vanoti vari kukurudzira vanhu vemudunhu ravo kuti vashandise mukana uyu vaende kunonyoresa kuvhota. No media source currently available
title: Sangano reElection Resource Center Robatsira Vanoda Kunonyoresa Kuvhota

text: Vamwe vagari vemuChinhoyi vari kupomera masoja nemapurisa mhosva yekuvarova zvakaipisisa neChitatu manheru. Vachitaura neStudio 7, VaTinashe Musandami vati vakarohwa muviri wose kusanganisira mumusoro vakarara pasi. Vanoti vakarohwa vari pamba pavo nemasoja ane chitsama. VaMusendami vanoti pavairohwa vainzi vainge varegedza vanhu vachirova\nmapurisa mumusha weveruzhinji weGadzema. Vanoti kunyangwe vakanomhan’ara nyaya yavo kumapurisa epaChemagamba manheru iwayo, hapana matanho akatorwa. Asi vati nemusi weChina vanoti vakazoenda zvekare kunomhan’ara nyaya yavo iyo yanyorwa mubhuku iri nhamba RRB 4463526. Mumwe akarohwa ari pamba pake ndiVaRodger Mugande vemuGadzema avo vanoti vari kutya kuno mhan’ara kumapurisa. Mutauriri wemauto Lieutenant-Colonel Alphios Makotore vati havana chekutaura nezvenyaya iyi vakati titaure nemapurisa. Mutauriri wemapurisa mudunhu reMashonaland West VaIan Kohwera vati havasati vataurirwa nezvenyaya iyi asi vakurudzira vose vakarohwa kuti vaende kunomhan’ara kumukuru wemapurisa pakamba yeChemagamba kuti pakwanise kuferefetwa kuti chii chakaitika. Kurohwa kwevanhu muChinhoyi kunouya apo mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vari kuuya kuzopfekedza nguwani dzedzidzo kuvanhu vakapedza zvidzidzo zvavo pachikoro cheChinhoyi Unuversity of Technology kana kuti CUT neChishanu. Mune imwewo nyaya, masangano anomiririra vatori venhau ashoropodza hurongwa hwechikoro chikuru cheCUT hwekuendesa mazita evatori venhau kubazi rinoona nezvekuchengetedzwa kwenyika kuti vabvumirwe kuita basa ravo kana VaMnangagwa vasvika paCUT. Munyori mukuru weZimbabwe Union of Zimbabwe VaFoster Dongozi vati zviri kuitwa kutyora kodzero dzevatori venhau sezvo vaine marezinesi kare. Izvi zvatsinhirwa nemukuru weMedia Institute of Southern Africa-MISA-VaTabani Moyo. Patabvunza mutevedzeri wemutauriri weCUT VaZacharia Pumhayi kuti zvekuendesa mazita kuti anoongororwa zvakatanga rinhi, vati vanoshanda vachiudzwa zvekuita nevanhu vavasina kudoma. Vadzidzi vakapedza zvidzidzo vepaCUT ava vari kupfekedzwa nguwani dzedzidzo vakawanda vavo vari kumba zvichitwa padandemutande sezvo pari kutyirwa kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. No media source currently available
title: Masoja neMapurisa Opomerwa Mhosva yeKurova Vamwe Vagari veMuChinhoyi

text: Zanu PF haina kuzoita sarudzo dzayo nhasi dzekutsvaga vanhu vachamirira bato iri m,usarudzo dzichaitwa muna Kurume, ichiti dzava kuitwa mangwana, Chishanu. Mugwaro ravakabudisa nezuro manheru kuvatori venhau, murongi wemisangano muZanu PF, VaMike Bimha, vakati nhengo dzedare rePolitiburo ndidzo dzichange dzichitungamira sarudzo mumatunhu ese uye nhengo dzeCentral Committee ndidzo dzichange dzichifambisa sarudzo mumatunhu ese. VaZiyambi Ziyambi ndivo vachange vachitungamira sarudzo muHarare uye VaDouglas Mahiya ndivo vachange vachitungamira sarudzo kuBulawayo. Harare neBulawayo dzidzo dzinhe nzvimbo dzakawanda dzichaitwa sarudzo. Imwe nhengo muchikamu chevechidiki muZanu PF mudunhu reHarare, VaPeter Matangi, vaudza Studio 7 kuti hurongwa huri kuitwa nebato ravo hunoratidza kuti bato ravo rinoda kuti vanhu vasarudze vatungamiriri vavanoda. VaMatangi vati kunyange hazvo bato ravo range riri kukundwa nebato guru rinopikisa munyika, vanotarisira kuti Zanu PF ichakunda mumadhorobha musarudzo dzichaitwa musi wa26 Kurume nekuti MDC iri kutadza kuita basa mumadhorobha. Vati hurumende yabato ravo yave kugadzirisa migwagwa mumaguta izvo zviri kutadzwa nebato rinopikisa. Hatina kukwanisa kubata VaBimha kuti tipihwe mazita evanhu vari kupinda musarudzo dzemaprimaries idzi kana vakarambidzwa kupinda musarudzo. Asi dunhu reMidlands rakarambidza muzukuru wevaimbova gurukota revasori, VaOwen Mudha Ncube, VaEnergy Ncube pamwe naVaKandros Mugaba kupinda musarudzo dzichaitwa kuKwekwe Central. Zanu PF inoti kuMasvingo yagadzirira sarudzo idzi uye yakatoita maprimaries kare kuChivi South neMwenezi East. Dunhu reHarare ndiro rine nzvimbo dzakawanda dzichaitwa sarudzo mukanzuru nemuparamende. Mune maWard anodarika makumi maviri achaitwa sarudzo uye maConstituency achaitwa sarudzo anosanganisira Glen Norah, Mufakose, Epworth, Kuwadzana neKuwadzana East, Highfield East neHighfield West. Kunyange hazvo Zanu PF ichiti ichakunda musarudzo dzemaBy-election, vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika, vachidzidzisa paAfrica University, Dr Wellingto Gadzikwa vanoti havaoni Zanu PF ichikunda musarudzo idzi. No media source currently available
title: Zanu PF Yoita Sarudzo Dzayo dzePrimaries neChishanu

text:
Mapurisa anoti ari kuenderera mberi nekusunga vedzimotokari dzinotakura veruzhinji vasiri kutevedzera mitemo yekudzivirira chirwere cheCovid-19 munzvimbo dzakavharwa nehurumende mudunhu reMashonaland West. Mukuru anoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa emapurisa mudunhu reMashonaland West, Assistant Commissioner Martin Nyirenda, vakaudza musangano wedunhu weCivil Protection Unit, CPU, musi weChitatu kuti vari kushanda nemauto pamwe nevasori kubata vanhu vari kutyora mitemo
yekuderedza chirwere cheCovid-19. VaNyirenda havana kupa huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nemapurisa kusvika pari zvino asi vakati vakabata mabhazi anotakura vanhu vanoenda kuZambia kunohodha mapfumbamwe kusanganisira mabhazi ehurumende eZupco maviri.

VaNyirenda vakati vari kubatawo zvizvarwa zvekuZambia izvo zviri kupinda munyika zvisiri pamutemo nekuda kwezvikonzero zvakasiyana siyana zvinosanganisira kuvhima zvisiri pamutemo avo vari kutanga vaongororwa kuti havana chirwere cheCovid-19 here kana kuti kwete.

Sachigaro weCPU mudunhu diki reHurungwe iro rakavharwa, VaAndrew Tizora, vakati mapurisa ari kutadza kuita basa ravo nemazvo sezvo aine motokari imwechete pamawadhi makumi matatu nematanhatu uye inenge isina mafuta ekufambisa nguva dzakawanda. VaNyirenda vakabvuma kuti semapurisa havana zvikwanisiro zvakakwana kuti vaende panzvimbo dzose dzavanofanirwa kusvika nenguva.

Vakabvumawo kuti rimwe dambudziko nderekuti motokari dzinotakura venhu zvisiri pamutemo dzemushikashika ndedzevakuru vemuhurumende nemapurisa avo vanofona vachikumbira kuti motokari dzavo dziregedzwe kana dzasungwa.

VaTizora vakaudza musangano uyu uyo wakapindwa nevakuru vemapazi ehurumende kuti dunhu ravo harichisina nhomba yekudzivirira chirwere cheCovid-19.

Mapurisa akazivisawo kuti nekuda kwekuvharwa kwenzvimbo dzekutandarira vanhu vave kunwira doro mudzimba kana kuti mashabhini nzvimbo dzavanoti vanhu vanenge vasingatevedzeri mitemo yekudzivirira chirwere cheCovid-19. Mutauriri wemapurisa munyika, Asstistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi, vanoti havasati vave nehuwandu hwese hwevanhu vakasungwa munzvimbo dzakavharwa mudunhu reMashonaland West sezvo matunhu madiki ose asati avapa huwandu hwawo. Dunhu reMashonaland West riri kuramba riri pamusoro pavanhu vari kufa pamwe nekubatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika. Pavanhu gumi nevanomwe vakaziviswa nebazi rezvehutano kuti vakafa nezuro nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19 vapfumbamwe ndeve mudunhu reMashonaland West uye pavanhu mazana masere ane makumi maviri nevatanhatu, 826, vakabatwa nechirwere ichii nezuro wakare, mazana maviri
ane makumi masere nemumwe chete, 281, ndevemudunhu iri zvakare. Pavanhu zviuru zvishanu zvine makumi manomwe nevatatu, 5 073, vachiri kurwara neCovid-19, chiuru chimwe chete chine mazana masere nemakumi mana nevana,1 844, ndeve mudunhu reMashonaland West. No media source currently available
title: Mapurisa Anoti Acharamba Achisunga Vanotyora Mitemo yeCovid-19

text: Munyori mukuru webato reMovement for Democratic Change VaDouglas Mwonzora vanoti havasi kufara nemabatirwo ari kuitwa nyaya dzevanhu vakasungwa kumatare avo vanonzi vari kukurumidzwa kungotongwa magweta avo asina kana kupihwa mukana wekugadziririra. VaMwonzora vakashanyira vasungwa ava kuChikurubi uye kudare ramajastiriti muHarare. Mutungamiri webato ravo VaNelson Chamisa nemusi weMugovera vakaendawo kuChitungwiza uko kwairadzikwa VaTinashe Choto vakapfurwa nemauto. Sangano ravanachiremba reZimbabwe Doctors for Human Rights vanoti vanhu gumi nevaviri vafa kusvika parizvino nekuratidzira kwakatanga nemusi weMuvhuro svondo rapera. No media source currently available
title: Munyori Mukuru weMDC Anoti Haasi Kufara neMabatirwo Ari Kuitwa Nyaya dzeVakasungwa muMhirizhonga

text: Mapurisa nemasoja anonzi ari kupinda mudzimba dzevanhu achirova vanhu vanenge vakazvigarira havo zvikuru mumisha inogara veruzhinji. Masoja aya anonziwo arara achirova vanhu mudzimba kunzvimbo dzakaita seHighfield, Southlea Park, Warren Park D pamwe neHopley muHarare, uye nekuMarondera. Mashoko atiri kutambira anoti pane vanhu vane chitsama vasungwa neMugovera kuMarondera pamwe nekuBulawayo maererano nekuratidzira kwakaitika svondo rino kwakanga kwadeedzerwa nesangano rinomirira vashandi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, ZCTU. Mutungamiri weHashtag Tajamuka, VaPromise Mkwananzi, vanoti havasi kufara nekupindirwa kuri kuitwa vanhu mudzimba vachizvindikitwa nemasoja. Mutungamiri muboka revechidiki muMDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa, VaHappymore Chidziva, vaudza Studio7 kuti vari kushushikana nekukwira kuri kuramba kuchiita huwandu hwenhengo dzebato ravo zvichitevera kuratidzira uku. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa musangano reCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition, VaBlessing Vava, vaudza Studio7 vanoti havasi kufara nekutyorwa kuri kuitwa kodzero dzevanhu vachiti zviri kuitwa izvi zvakangofanana nezvaiitika panguva yehutongi hwaVaRobert Mugabe. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nemutauriri wemauto VaOverson Mugwisi kuti tinzwe divi remauto panyaya iyi. Hatinawo kukwanisa kubata mutauriri wemapurisa, Amai Charity Charamba. Asi gurukota rezvesori, VaOwen Ncube, vakaudza vatori venhau svondo rino kuti hurumende iri kutsvaga vose vakakonzeresa mhirizhonga. Zvinhu zvakamira kudai, VaMkwananzi vanoti pachave nekumwe kuratidzira zvakare munyika yose kubva neMuvhuro kudzamara hurumende yaVaMnangagwa yagadzirisa zviri kunetsa. Mutungamiri weZCTU, VaPeter Mutasa, vanoti vanzi kutsvagwa nemapurisa, uye vanhu havasi kuziva kuti varipi. Mapurisa anoti akasunga vanhu vanodarika mazana manomwe munyika yose kubva pakatanga kuratidzirwa neveruzhinji nemusi weMuvhuro. Zvichitevera kuratidzira uku, vanhu vanodarika makumi manomwe vakapfurwa vakaranorapwa mavanga emabara navana chiremba vari pasi peZimbabwe Association of Doctors for Human Rights. Hurumende yakabva yavharisa masaisai ose kuitira kuti vanhu vasashandisa Facebook, WhatsApp, Twitter nemadandemutande. Mutauriri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaGeorge Charamba, vaudza ZBC kuti hurumende yakavharisa masisai aya sennzira yekumisa kwefambiswa kwemashoko aikonzeresa kukuvadzwa kwenyika. Kunyange hazvo hurumende yakasunga masaisai eWhatsApp, Facebook neTwitter, vanhu vakawanda munyika vari kushandisa app yeTelegram kutumirana mashoko nemifananidzo yezviri kuitika munyika. No media source currently available
title: Mudzimba Moberekera Ingwe Munguva dzeManheru

text: Gurukota rezvemari, muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube, vaudza nhengo dzeparamende nhasi kuti hapana chinoshamisa pakurambwa kwemaRTGS dollars nevemabhizimisi vachida mari yekuAmerica vachiti zvinoitika panoshandiswa mari dzakawanda. Vachitaura kunhengo dzekomiti inoona nezvebhajeti nemari mamiriro akaita hupfumi hwenyika, VaNcube vati vemabhizimisi vanoita izvi sezvo vari kuda kuchengetedza huremu hwemari dzavo apo mari yemuno iri kuramba ichishaya simba. Vanoongorora nyaya dzehupfumi, VaNyasha Muchichwa, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanobvumirana naVaNcube kuti kurambwa kweRTGS dollar hakushamisiri vachiti kana hurumende pachayo iri kurambawo maRTGS zvikuru sei pamutero wemota. VaNcube Ncube vatiwo mitengo iri kukwira zvakanyanya nekuti vemabhizimisi vari kutara mitengo vachitevedza mutengo wemari wepamukoto. Vati zviri kuita nevemabhizimisi zvekukwidza mitengo vachitevedza mutengo wemari yepamukoto hazvina kunaka. Asi vati hapana matanho avangatore vachiti kuvasunga, kana kutara mitengo zvinogona kutovhiringa hupfumi zvakanyanya. VaNcube vati hurumende inokurudzira vemabhimisi kuti vatenge mari yekunze kumabhanga vachiti izvi chete ndizvo zvichaita kuti mitengo idzikire. Vati kunze kwemamiriyoni mazana mashanu emadhora ekuAmerica avakawana kunze kwenyika kuti aiiswe pamusika weInterbank Forex Rate, vari kutaurawo nemamwe mabhanga ekuSouth Africa avasina kudoma, kuti vawane imwe mari yekuisa mumusika uyu. VaNcube vatiwo hurumende haisi kuzotambirisa vashandi nemadhora ekuAmerica vachiti chavari kuita kuwedzera mari inotambirwa nevashandi vachitarisira kuti mitengo yezvinhu ichatanga kudzikira apo mabhizimisi akawanda anenge ava kuwana mari yekunze kubva kumabhanga. VaMuchichwa vati veruzhinji vari kutambura uye zvakakosha kuti hurumende igadzirise nyaya dzekuti vanhu vagare zvakanaka nekukasika. VaNcube VaNcube vatiwo hurumende inoona kutambura kweveruzjinji uye ndosaka iri kutora matanho akawanda kurerutsa hupenyu hweveruzhinji. Vati zvirongwa zvavari kuita zvekurerutsa hupenyu hwevanhu, zvakafanana nekuderedza mutengo wemabhazi eZUPCO, kubhadhara mari yechikoro pasi peBEAM iyo yave nemakore isingabhadharwi, kugovera chikafu vanotambura neharawa chikafu mumadhorobha nemaruwa. Pavaudzwa kuti veruzhinji munyika havana ruzivo hwezviri kuitwa nebazi ravo, VaNcube vati bazi ravo riri kuronga kupinza basa nyanzvi dzezvekuburitswa kwemashoko kuti dzigoshambadza zvirongwa zvaro dzichishandisa mitaura yemuno munyika yose. No media source currently available
title: Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube Vanoti Hazvishamisi Kuti Vamwe veMabhizimisi Vari Kuramba MaRTGS Dollars

text: Mutangamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, pamwe nemutungamiriri wenyika yeSouth Africa, vari zvakare sachigaro weSADC, VaCyril Ramaphosa, vakaita musangano muHarare neMugovera manheru, vakaita chisungo chekusimbisa hukama pamwe nekudyidzana pakati penyika dzavo munyaya dzese kusanganisira dzehupfumi. Vatungamiriri vaviri ava, avo vachangobva kutora nyanga munyika dzavo, vakati vakataura nyaya dzakasiyana dzinosanganisira matambudziko anosangana nenyika dzavo zvikuru sei munyaya dzehupfumi. VaRamaphosa vakaudza vatori venhau kuti vakaita chitsidzo chekushanda pamwe mukgadzirisa matambudzko aya. VaMnangagwa vakati vakafara chose kusangana naVaRamaphosa, uye kuti vakataurirana matambadziko avanosangana nawo uye kuti vangaagadzirisa sei sevatungamiriri vatsva venyika mbiri idzi. Pavakabvunzwa kuti pane zvingadzidzwe neSouth Africa here kubva kuZimbabwe zvikuru sei panyaya dzekutora minda, VaRamaphosa vakati nyika yavo ine zvekudzidza zvakawanda kubva kuZimbabwe nedzimwe nyika dzemuSADC apo iri kuronga kugadzirisa nyaya dzeivhu. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi vachishanda vakazvimirira, VaMasimba Manyanya, vanoti kunyange musangano wevatungamiriri vaviri ava wange wakakosha zvikuru sezvo dziri nyika dzakavakidzana, vanoona sekuti VaRamaphosa vaida kuziva zvakanyanya kuti Zimbabwe yakazvifambisa sei panyaya yekugova ivhu. Vanotiwo musangano wevaviri ava wakakosha nekuti Zimbabwe inotengeserana zvinhu pamwe nekuita bhizimisi neSouth Africa kudarika dzimwe nyika dzese. VaManyanya vanoti nekuda kwaizvozvo zvakakosha kuti vatungamiri vaviri ava vatauririrane kuti vasimbaradze hupfumi hwenyika mbiri idzi. Vanotiwo makambani emuSouth Africa anofanira kutora mukana wehutungamiriri hutsva kuti asime mari yawo muZimbabwe. Asi vanotiwo VaRamaphosa naVaMnangagwa vatungamiriri vakafanana nekuti vese vakapinda mukutungamira nyika mushure mekunge vaive nezvigaro izvi vadzingwa basa. VaMnangagwa vakadomwa kuti vatungamire nyika mushure mekunge VaRobert Mugabe vasiya basa musi wa 21 Mbudzi gore rapfuura uye VaRamaphosa vakatorawo chigaro chekutungamira South Africa mushure mekunge VaJacob Zuma vamanikidzwa kusiya basa musi 14 Kukadzi gore rino. Zvichakadai VaMnangagwa vakatiwo Zimbabwe ichaita sarudzo dzakachena muna Chikunguru gore rino. Vakati svondo rapfuura chairo vaida kuita musangano nemapato anopikisa kuti vataure nezvenyaya iyi asi vakazorega kuita musangano uyu mushure mekuona kuti mapato anopikisa munyika akawanda kudarika avainge vakoka. VaMnangagwa vanoti vaifunga kuti munyika mune mapato masere anopikisa asi vakazoudzwa kuti pave namapato anopikisa zana nemasere uye vakamisa musangano uyu kuti vakwanise kukoka masangano ese aya. VaTjenesani Ntungakwa veRevolutionary Reaserch Institute of Zimbabwe vanoti kuwanda kwemapato anopikisa hakuna basa uye sarudzo dzinofanira kungoitwa akajeka pasina mhirizhonga. VaMnangagwa vari kuvimbisa nyika nepasi rese kuti vachaita sarudzo dzakachena. Vanotiwo masangano akasiyana siyana pamwe nenyika dzese vakasununguka kuzoongorora sarudzo idzi. Asi pane kutsutsumwa kubva kumapato anopikisa pamwe nemasangano anaoshanda akazvimirira kuti mutemo wesarudzo pamwe nekutapwa kwenhau haisati yavandudzwa izvo zvinoita kuti sarudzo dzisafambe zvakanaka. No media source currently available
title: VaMnangagwa naVaRamaphosa Vanoita Musangano weKusimbisa Hukama hweNyika Dzavo

text: zimbabwe iri kukurudzirwa kudzika mitemo yakasimba inobatsira mukuderedza kumbunyikidzwa kwevanhu vachishandiswa kana kuendeswa kwavasingadi (human trafficking). Gwaro raburitswa nebazi rehurumende yeAmerica rinoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, kana kuti State Department ,panyaya dzekumbunyikidzwa kwevanhu vachizoguma vobatwa senhapwa kana kuti Trafficking in Persons Report rinoti Zimbabwe kwemakore maviri akatevedzana yaiswa panyika dzinoda kutarisiswa zvakanyanya kana kuti Tire 2 Watch list. Izvi zvinoreva kuti Zimbabwe iri kutadza kugadzirisa dambudziko iri. Vachitaura nezvegwaro iri rinonzi 2022 Trafficking in Person Report vakafanobata chigaro chemumiririri weAmerica muZimbabwe Amai Meg Riggs vaudza Studio 7 kuti gwaro iri rakakosha zvikuru mukuedza kudzivirira dambudziko rekumbunyikidzwa kwevanhu vachizoguma vobatwa senhapwa kana kumanikidzwa kuita zvepabonde. Kazhinji vanhu ava vanenge vanyeperwa kuti vari kuenda kumabasa. Vati Zimbabwe haina zvayakanyanya zvairi kuita kugadzirisa dambudziko iri. Kuti Zimbabwe ive pachidanho chiri nani, Amai Riggs vakurudzira hurumende kuti ipe zvikwanisiro kune vanorwisa nyaya dzekumbunyikidzwa kwevanhu idzi. Vana vadiki kubva kuZimbabwe vanonzi vari kusanganawo nedambudziko iri vachiburitswa muZimbabwe kunoshandiswa munyika dzakapoteredza dzakaita seSouth Africa. Zvimwe zvinokurudzirwa negwaro iri kuti Zimbababwe iite zvinosanganisira kuomesera vanoita zvekumbunyikidza vanhu uye kupota ichi mhan’ara nekupa humbowo hwezvedambudziko iri zvinonzi hazvisi kuitwa. Gwaro iri rinotiwo vamwe vana kubva Mozambique neZambia vanombunyikidzwa mushure mekupinzwa muZimbabwe zvisii pamutemo. Vanhu vakawanda vanoguma vombunyikidzwa kuSputh Africa vachibva kunyika dzakaita saanaEthiopia neSomali vanonzi vanodarikawo nemuZimbabwe Asi vachipindura, Amai Prisca Madziviridze vanova gweta rebazi rinoona nezvemukati menyika vati gwaro iri harisi kutarisisa kuti Zimbabwe sedzimwe nyika yakavhiringwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 izvo zvinovawo zvakakanganisa mabasa ekudzivirira kumbunyikidzwa uku. Amai Madziviridze vanotiwo Zimbabwe iri mushishi kuvandudza mitemo ine chekuita nekumbunyikidzwa kwevanhu. Vatiwo havawirirani nezviri mugwaro iri vachiti Zimbabwe iri kuisa zvekushandisa zvakawanda mukurwisa dambudziko iri vachitiwo nyika yakakwanisa kunotora vaive vasangana nedambudziko iri kunyika dzakaita seKuwait. Asi mukuru wesangano rakazvimirira roga rinoona nezvekurwiswa kwedambudziko iri reShamwari yeMwanasikana Amai Ekenia Chifamba vaudzawo Studio 7 kuti Zimbabwe ichiri kumashure mukugadzirisa dambudziko iri. Vaenderera mberi vachiti dambudziko guru nderekusanzwisisa kuti pane mhando dzakasiyana siyana dzekumbunyikidzwa dzinowanikwa nevanhu kunyangwe vari munyika yavo vasina kuenda mhiri kwemakungwa. Zimbabwe haisati yavandudzawo mutemo we2014 Trafficking in Person Act kunyangwe hazvo hurumende ichiti ine hurongwa hwekuita izvi. Munguva shoma yapfuura hurumende yeZimbabwe yakayambirawo veruzhinji kuti vasaenda kunyika dzakadai se Oman kuMiddle East vachiti vanhu vange varikumbunyikidzwa. MuTier 2 Watch List mune nyika makumi matatu neshanu dzinosanganisira gumi nesere dzemuAfrica. South Africa, Zambia, Eswatin, Mali nedzimwe. Nyika dzine dambudziko rakomba zvakanyanya kana kuti Special Case dzinoti Libya, Somalia neYemen. Munyika dzose nhatu idzi mune hondo. Panyika dzose dzemuAfrica, Namibia ndiyo chete iri muTier 1 mune nyika dzine mitemo yakanaka dzinosanganisira America nedzimwe dzakabudirira. No media source currently available
title: Zimbabwe Yokurudzirwa Kudzika Mitemo Yakasimba muKuderedza Kumbunyikidzwa kweVanhu Vachishandiswa kanaKuendeswa Kwavasingadi

text:
Chikamu chekutanga chekubaya nhomba yekudzivirira chirwere cheCovid-19 icho change chichifanirwa kupera nezuro, chiri kuenderera mberi
zvichitevera vanhu vashoma vakazvipira kubayiwa nhomba iyi. Vakafanobata chigaro chemukuru mubazi rezvehutano mudunhu
reMashonaland West, Dr Tapiwa Dhliwayo, vati kunyange hurongwa hwanga huri hwekuti chikamu chekutanga chiitwe mumazuva gumi, izvi zvakatadza kuitika. Dr Dhliwayo vati vari kuenderera mberi vachibaya vose vaitarisirwa
kubayiwa muchikamu chekutanga kusvika vapera. Asi mumwe chiremba ari kuona kufambiswa kuri kuitwa chirongwa chekubayiwa nhomba kuti chiri kufamba zvakanaka here mudunhu reMashonaland West, Dr Paradzai Mudzengere, vati havasati vave kuziva kuti voenderera mberi nekubaya vanhu vanofanirwa kubayiwa muchikamu chepiri here sezvo pasina shoko ravati vawana kubva kubazi ravo. Dunhu reMashonaland West raitarisirWa kubaya vanhu zviuru zvishanu
nemazana matatu nenegumi nevatanhatu, kana kuti 5 316, asi rakakwanisa kubaya chiuru chimwechete nemazana mapfumbamwe nevapfumbamwe kana kuti 1909 muchikamu chekutanga. Mutauriri webazi rezvehutano, VaDonald Mujiri, vati kubayiwa nhomba
kuchiri kuenderera mberi nyika yose asi vati havangataure kuti vanhu
vakabayiwa vashoma pane vaitarisirwa here sezvo vasati vave nemanhamba enyika yose. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano uye vaimbove gurukota muhurumende
yemubatanidzwa, Dr Henry Madzorera, vanoti vanhu havafanirwe
kumanikidzwa kubayiwa nekudaro hurumende inofanirwa kuenderera mberi nekubaya vari kuda kubayiwa chete. Dr Madzorera vanoti semaonero avo zvingangodaro kuti avo vari kuramba
kubayiwa vari kuda kubayiwa imwe nhomba isiri yekuChina saka nekudaro
vanofanirwa kupihwa mukana wavanoda. Vachipa hurongwa hwekuti ndiani anobayiwa muzvikamu zvitatu mukuru anoona nezvehurongwa hweCovid-19 Task Force, Dr Agnes Mahomva, vati muchikamu chekutanga chine hurongwa huviri kana kuti 2 stages. Vati chikamu chekutanga ndicho change chichibayiwa vashandi vanoshanda nevanhu kana kuti frontline workers change chichifanirwa kupera nezuroasi chiri kuenderera mberi kusvika vose vanofanirwa kubayiwa vabayiwa. Dr Mahomva vati chikamu chechipiri muchikamu chekutanga, kana kuti stage 2 ichange ichibayiwa vabvezera vave kumakore makumi matanhutu kana kudarika, vasungwa, vane zvirwere zvinovanetsa pamwe
nevapoteri vanogara munzvimbo dzakatsaurwa kana kuti ma refugees. Chikamu chechipiri chichabayiwa nhomba vadzidzi vemuzvikoro
zvepamusoro nevose vemuzvioro uye chikamu chechitatu chinove
chekupedzisira chichabayiwa vose vasiri panjodzi huru yekubatwa
nechirwere cheCovid-19. Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa nezuro kuti vanhu zviuru zviviri nemazana
masere nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevatatu kana kuti 2 893 vakabayiwa nhomba nezuro izvo zvakasvitsa vanhu vabayiwa nhomba nyika yose pazviuru makumi maviri nezvinomwe nemazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi manomwe kana kuti 27 970. Vanhu vatanhatu vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 nezuro, ukuwo vanhu vatsva makumi matatu nemumwe chete vakabatwa nechirwere ichi nezuro wakare. Mukusvika mukupera kwezuva ranezuro, Zimbabwe yanga yave nevanhu chiuru nemazana mana nemakumi manomwe nevasere, 1478, vafa nechirwere cheCovid-19, ukuwo vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika yose, vava zviuru makumi matatu nezvitanhatu nezana nemakumi manomwe nevapfumbamwe, 36 179. Vanhu vachiri kurwara nechirwere ichi vava chiuru nemazana matatu nevapfumbamwe, zvichitevera kupora kwevanhu zviuru makumi matatu nezvitatu nemazana matatu nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevaviri, kana kuti 33 392. No media source currently available
title: Zimbabwe Inoona Vanhu Vashoma Vachibayiwa Nhomba yeCovid-19

text: Vaimbova gurukota rinoona nezvevasori, VaDidymus Mutasa, vave kunakurira nyoka mhenyu kumukuru wesangano revasori reCentral Intelligence Organization, VaHappyton Bonyongwe, nemhosva yekutyora kodzero dzevanhu yakaitika muna 2008 nemuna 2013 panguva yesarudzo. Mashoko aVaMutasa anotevera nyaya yakakwidzwa kudare naMuzvare Jestina Mukoko, uye mamwe mapepa akaturwa kumatare, naVaTendai Biti, ekuvapomerwa ivo mbune mhosva yekutyora kodzero dzevanhu. Muzvare Mukoko vakaendesa VaMutasa kumatare nenyaya yekumbunyikidzwa nekupambwa kwavakaitwa muna 2008. Dare repamusoro nemusi weMuvhuro rakati Muzvare Mukoko vanokwanisa kuendesa kumatare VaMutasa mbune. Asi VaMutasa vanoti vachapikisa nyaya iyi sezvo vachiti segurukota havana zvizhinji zvavanoita. Vanoti basa guru rinoitwa nemukuru wevasori. Magwaro akaendeswa naVaBiti anotevera nyaya yakakwidzwa naVaMutasa kumatare vachivapomera mhosva yekuvasvibisa zita ravo. Izvi zvinotevera mashoko ekuti VaBiti vakati VaMutasa vainge vaine chekuita nekupisirwa mumba kwemwana anonzi Christpowers Maisiri kuHeadlands muna 2013 munguva yesarudzo. VaBiti mumapepa avo vanoti vari kudaidza sezvapupu zvevanhu vanoti vakashungurudzwa naVaMutasa kuHeadlands, Makoni North kusanganisa hama dzevanhu vanonzi vakapondwa muna 2008 uye madzimai akabatwa chibharo. Asi mukuru wesangano reInternational Commission of Jurists vari gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu, VaArnold Tsunga, vanoti kana VaMutasa vaigara mumisangano yairongwa nyaya idzi, vanogona kuendeswa kumatare sezvo vanenge vadziya moto wembavha.
title: VaMutasa Vonakurira Nyoka Mhenyu Mukuru weVasori Vachiti Ndiye Mutyori weKodzero dzeVanhu

text: Vari kukwikwidzana musarudzo dzemutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica vaDonald Trump vemaRepublicans naAmai Hillary Clinton vemaDemocrats vakaita gakava ravo rekutanga kana kuti dhibheti neChipiri manheru. Gakava iri rakaitirwa kuHempstead muNew York. Musarudzo dzemutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica munoitwa magakava matatu nevatungamiri venyika kwoti rimwe chete nevatevedzeri vavo. Vaviri ava vakabatabata panyaya dzakawanda dzinosanganisa kurwisa vanopfurikidza mwero veISIS uye nyaya yemitero. Vanhu vakawanda vakataura nenhepfenuro dzakaita seCNN neMSNBC vakati semaonero avo Amai Clinton ndivo vakakunda sezvo VaTrump vaiita sekunge vasina kunge vanyatsogadzirira. Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chiri kuFlorida muAmerica, VaPromise Sande vanoti pane zvizhinji zvingadzidzwe neZimbabwe zvikuru kukwanisa kuita gakava nevaunokwikwidza navo pasina mhirizhonga. VaSande vanoti vakafadzwa nekutatsurana kwaiita VaTrump naAmai Clinton uye nekuzovimbisa kwakaita vaviri ava kuti mumwe wavo akakunda vese vaizoremekedza zvinenge zvabuda musarudzo idzi. “Ndakatora nguva ndichioona zvange zvichibuda pachirongwa ichi nezuro (Chipiri) ndichida kunyatsokuziva kuti zviyi zviri kuvimbiswa nemapato maviri aya emaDemocrats nemaRepublications kuti ndiwane hwaro hwekuti nyika ino iri kuenda kupi panyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika saka ndakagutsikana nezvandakaona uye shuwiro yangu ndeyekuti zvirikuitika muno izvi tizozviona zvichiitwawo kumusha,”VaSande vaudza Studio 7. No media source currently available
title: Amai Hillary Clinton Votatsurana naVaDonald Trump muGakava reKutsvaga Mutungamiri Mutsva WeAmerica

text: Bato reCitizens Coalition for Change razobvuma kuti nhengo dzaro dziri muparamende dzitore mari yechikwereti yekutenga dzimba kubva kudare iri asi nhengo idzi dzinofanira kubhadhara zvikwereti izvi. Asi vamwe vanopikisa vari kushora danho iri. Vanokokera nhengo dzeTripple C muparamende, VaProsper Mutseyami, vaudza vatori venhau mHarare nhasi kuti nhengo dzebato ravo dziri muparamende dzakasangana nemutungamiri webato iri VaNelson Chamisa vakabvumirana kuti nhengo dzavo dzitambire mari dze zvikwereti zvedzimba kubva kuparamende asi dzichizozvimirira pakubhadhara zvikwereti izvi. Vakafanobata chigaro chemutevedzeri wemutauriri weTripple C, VaGift Ostallos Siziba vati pane zvibvumirano zvakasainiranwa nenhengo dzeparamende nedare reparamende kuti dzidzosere zvikwereti izvi. Asihurumende haina kuzivisa kunyika kuti zvikwereti izvi zvinobhadharwa sei uye nemadhora ekuAmerica here kana kuti huremu hwedhora pachikero chebhanga reRBZ kana kuti kumabhanga akazvimirira. Nhengo yebato reCCC inonzi yakaramba mari iyi ndiVaAllan Markham chete. Vanokokera nhengo dzeZanu PF mudare reparamende VaPupurai Togarepi vati hazvisi zvitsva kuti nhengo dzeparamende dzipiwe zvikwereti neparamende. Asi mutauriri webato rinopikisa rePatriotic Zimbabweans iro risina kana nhengo imwechete muparamende, VaShelton Mupambwa, vati nyaya yezvikwereti izvi yaitirwa kuti mapato ari muparamende awane mari dzekushandisa kutsvaga rutsigiro pamberi pesarudzo dzegore rinouya. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi uye vachishanda nesangano reLabour Economic Development and Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Prosper Chitambara vati hapana chakaipa kuti nhengo dzeparamende dzipihwe zvikwereti neparamende. Asi vati zvikwereti izvi zvinofanira kubhadharwa kuitira kuti zvisakanganise hupfumi hwenyika. Nhengo dzeparamende dzakapihwa zvikwereti zvemari inoita zviuru makumi zvemadhora ekuAmerica (US$40 000) pamunhu. Vatevedzeri vemakurukota ehurumende vakapihwawo mari inoita zviuru mazana matanhu nezviuru makumi mashanu pamunhu ($350 000) uye makurukota ehurumende akapihwa zviuru mazana mashanu zvemadhora ekuAmerica (US$500 000) pamunhu. Aka hakasi kekutanga hurumende neparamende ichiita izvi. Muna 2015, RBZ yakapa makurukota ehurumende, nhengo dzeparamende, vakuru vemauto nevamwe vanodyidzana nebato reZanu-PF zvikwanisiro zvekurimisa zvemari inodarika bhiriyoni imwe chete yemunyika. Mushre mekunge vakwanda vavo vatadza kubhadhara, chikwereto ichi chakazotorwa neRBZ zvinonzi nenyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi nemasangano anokweretesa mari akaisa seIMF neWorld Bank zvakanganis hupfumi zvakanyanya. No media source currently available
title: Dzimwe Nhengo dzeCCC Dzotsika Madziro Pakudzosera Mari Yadzinoti Dzakakwereteswa neHurumende

text: Nyanzvi mune zvemitemo dziri kupa maonero akasiyanasiyana pamusoro pedanho rakatorwa neparamende neChitatu, rekuedza kurambidza nhengo dzebato reCitizens Coalition for Change kupinda muparamende dzakapfeka nmidzipanyota kana kuti ma tie eruvara rwe yellow, rwunove ruvara rwebato radzinomirira. Nyanzvi mune zvemutemo vachidzidzisa paUniversity of Zimbabwe, uye vari mutungamiri webato rinopikisa reNCA, Muzvinafundo Lovemore Madhuku, vanoti iyi haisi nyaya huru kwete, asi bumbiro remitemo haritaure kuti kana uchipinda muparamende unopfeka hembe dzakadii asi kuti rinozvisiira kuvanhu vari muparamende kuti vasarudze kuti pachezvavo vanoda kupinda sei? Muzvinafundo Madhuku vapa muenzaniso wekuti munhukadzi anenge achida kupinda muparamende anokwanisa kurambidzwa kupinda achinzi akapfeka mbatya dzinonzi dzinoburitsa muviri wake panze, asi kana vanhukadzi vakati zvatinofamba takaita kunze ndizvo zvatinoda muparamende, zviri kuvanhu kuzvidzigira kana kuzviramba. Rimwe gweta vari nhengo yeZanu PF kuBritain, VaSimba Mavaza, vanotiwo bumbiro remitemo pamwe nemitemo yeparamende hazvibvumire kuti munhu apinde muparamende akapfeka nhumbi dzine ruvara rwebato raanotsigira. VaMavaza vanoti kunyange hazvo paramende yakazobvumidza nhengo dzebato reCCC idzi kupinda mudare, hazvirevi kuti vave kubvumidzwa kuramba vachiita madiro aJojina, vachiti pakatoumbwa komiti iri kuferefeta nyaya iyi nekutarisisa zvinorehwa nemutemo weparamende weStanding Rules and Orders. Asi rimwe gweta, vari nhengo yebato reCCC, VaJacob Mafume, vanoti zvakaitika muparamende mucherechedzo wekuti paramende pamwe nenhego dzeZanu PF vave kutya kudzoka muparamende kwepfungwa dzavanoti dzakapinza, vachiti hapana mutemo unorambidza munhu kupinda akapfeka ruvara rwaanoda. Nemusi weChipiri nhengo yeparamende inomirira Buhera South VaJoseph Chinotimba ndivo vakatanga kusimudza nyunyuto mudare paitoreswa mhiko vadare vatsva, yekuti sei nhengo dzeCCC dzakabvumidzwa kupinda mudare dzakapfeka ruvara rwebato radzo. Izvi zvakaita kuti mutauriri weparamende, VaJacob Mudenda, varambidze kupfekwa kwemidzipanyota ye yellow iyi. Asi neChitatu dzimwe nhengo dzeCitizens Coalition for Change dzakatungamirirwa nemutevedzeri wemutungamiri webato vari mumiriri weHarare East, VaTendai Biti, hadzina kuteerera VaMudenda sezvo dzakadzokera zvakare kuparamende dzakapfeka midzipanyota ye yellow, izvo zvakazoita kuti paite mhirizhonga dzichirambidzwa kupinda. No media source currently available
title: Nyanzvi dzeMutemo Dzopa Maonero Akasiyana paNyaya yeMutemo Unorambidza Kupfekwa kweNhumbi Dzine Ruvara rweMapato muParamende

text: Mapoka ane chekuita nekutapwa pamwe nekufambiswa kwenhau apeta musangano wemazuva maviri wanga wakanangana nebhiri remashandiro evatori venhau reZimbabwe Media Practitioners Bill, uyo wanga uchiitirwa kuKadoma. Musangano uyu unonzi wabuda nezviga zvinonzi zvichabatsira mukukwenenzverwa kwebhiri iri risati raenda kuparamende. Vamwe vanga vari kumusangano uyu vanosanganisira gurukota rezvekufambiswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, vashandi vekuhofisi yavo, nhengo dzeparamende, vekuhofisi yegweta guru rehurumende, makomishina eZimbabwe Media Commission, nevamwe vane chekuita nebandiko iri. Mukuru weMISA-Zimbabwe, VaTabani Moyo, avo vapindawo mumusangano uyu, vanoti vabvumiranawo zvakare kuti kubatwa kwebasa rekupepetwa kwenhau kuchange kwakamira sei, uye kuzoumba Zimbabwe Media Practitioners Council, iyo inenge ichizounza vezvenhau pamwechete. No media source currently available mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaKindness Paradza, avo vapindawo musangano uyu vanoti bhiri iri nderimwe remitemo yakadzikwa inotora nzvimbo yemutemo wakaraswa weAIPPA. No media source currently available VaParadza vanotiwo hurumende haineyi nekuumbwa kwebhiri iri sezvo riri kuumbwa nevatapi venhau pamwe chete ne Zimbabwe Media Commission, vachiti chavo sehurumende kungorefura chete kusvika zvasvika kuparamende. No media source currently available
title: VezveNhau Vanopeta Musangano weMazuva Maviri Wanga Uri Pamusoro peZimbabwe Media Practitioners Bill

text: Mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vavhura Harare Agricultural Show zviri pamutemo vachiti zvirongwa zveCommand Agriculture nePresidential Input Scheme hazvisi zvematongerwo enyika uye hurumende yavo icharamba ichitsigira zvirongwa izvi sezvo zviri kubatsira nyika kuwana chikafau chakakwana. Vati zvirongwa izvi zvaita kuti nyika iite goho rakawandisa uye hurumende yavo icharamba ichizvitsigira. Vati kubudira kweCommand Agriculture kwakaita kuti ivandudzwe kusanganisira zvimwe zvirimwa zvakaita segorosi, zvipfuyo zvakaita semombe pamwe nehove. Vati zvirongwa izvi hazvisi zvematongerwo enyika sezvinotaurwa nemapato anopikisa munyika uye hurumende yavo icharamba ichitsigira chirongwa ichi. VaMnangagwa vati hurumende yavo inotsigira Harare Agricultural Show pamwe nezvirongwa zvayo zvakaita semusangano wayakaita svondo rino wevarimi nemabhizimisi. Vati mashoo emamwe matunhu munyika yose anofanira kudzidza kubva kuHarare Agricultural Show uyewo vati vachakurudzira hurumende dzematunhu dzichaumbwa pasi pehurumende kuti dzikoshese zvirongwa zvevarimi. VaMnangagwa vakurudzirawo makambani akazvimirira kuti atsigire mabasa ekurima kuitira kuti nyika ikwanise kutengesa zvirimwa zvayo kunze sezvayaiita kare. Mukuru weZimbabwe Agricultural Society, varongi veHarare Agricultural Show, VaNgoni Kudenga, vati chirongwa chavo chakabudira zvikuru gore rino uye huwandu hwevairatidzira zvirimwa hwakakwira nezvikamu gumi nezvina kubva muzana kana zvichienzaniswa negore rapfuura. Vatiwo ivo nekomiti yavo vari kuzeya pfungwa dzakapihwa nevamwe kuti Harare Agricultural Show isandurwe kuve National Agricultural Show sezvo ichipindwa nevarimi nemakambani kubva mumatunhu ese munyika. Mutungamiriri weGrain Millers Association, GMA, VaTafadzwa Musarara, vaudza Studio 7 kuti makambani ari musangano ravo ave kutotsigira varimi nechekare. Pashoo yegore rino GMA ndiyo yapa mubairo wezviuru zviviri nemazana mashanu emadhora kukambani yeGushungo Dairy iyo yatora mubairo wekutanga pachikamu chevarimi vanochengeta mombe. Zimbabwe Parks and Wildlife Management Authority yatora mubairo wekuita basa rayo zvakanaka. Mukuru wekambani iyi, VaFulton Mangwanya, vaudza Studio7 kuti vafara chose nekukunda kwavaita. Kambani yeSeedco ndiyo yawana mubairo wekutanga pamakambani ese airatidzira gore rino kozotiwo Zimbabwe Broadcasting Cooperation ndiyo yawana mubairo pamakambani ese ezvenhau akapinda pashoo yegore rino. Varimi vahwina mibairo inosanganisira dzimotokari, mari nematirakita. No media source currently available
title: VaMnangagwa Vanovhura Zviri paMutemo 2018 Agricutural Show

text: Vachitaura kugungano reUnited Nations General Assembly nemusi weChina kuburikidza nevhidhiyo yavainge vaita sezvo vasina kuenda kuNew York kwaiitirwa musangano uyu nenyaya yechirwere cheCovid-19, mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vakati hurumende yavo yaumba hwaro hwekugadzirisa hupfumi hwenyika. Asi munyika hamuna kuwirirana panyaya iyi sezvo vamwe vari kuti zvinhu zvatonyanya kuoma kubva zvavatora chigaro. VaMnangagwa vakati Zimbabwe yakaparura chirongwa cheVision 2030 chavanoti chapa kuti mukaha uri pakati pevarombo nevapfumi uderedzwe. Vakatiwo vakwanisa kuumba mabasa. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvemabhanga VaGilbert Muponda vanova nhengo yeZanu-PF vanoti ichokwadi kuti hurumende yaVaMnangagwa yakwanisa kudzikamisa hupfumi. Vati dhora remunyika radzikama uye mitengo yezvinhu haicharambe ichiita chamurambamhuru. Asi imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi Muzvinafindo Gift Mugano vanoti mitemo mizhinji yegurukota rezvemari Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube haisi kushanda sezvo yakanangana nekuti hurumende isare nemari muhomwe mayo asi vanhu vachinonga svosve nemuromo. VaMugano vati zviri kuitwa naVaNcube, "zvakafanana nababa vanofamba vachiti handina chikwereti ivo vachitadza kubhadharira vana chikoro kana kuvatengera zvekudya."
title: VaMnangagwa Vadzikamisa Hupfumi Here Sezvavari Kutaura?

text: Zimbabwe iyo yakabudirira nezuro kupinda muchikamu chechipiri chemutambo wemaoko cheNetball World Cup yakundwa nhasi neNew Zealand 79 kwa 36. New Zealand yakambotora mukombe weWorld Cup uyu kaviri. Asi izvi hazvisi kumisa ruzhinji rweZimbabwe kupemberera kutamba kwechikwata chavo chinozivikanwa nekuti maGems ichi kupinda muchikamu chechipiri chine zvikwata gumi nezviviri. Zimbabwe iri kutamba iri muGroup F nezvikwata zvinoti Australia, Northern Ireland, New Zealand, Malawi ne Barbados. Kunyangwe Zimbabwe yakundwa, Malawi yakunda Northen Ireland 47 kwa 43. Rimwe gungano remakwikwi aya i Group G rine zvikwata zvinoti Jamaica, South Africa, Trinidad and Tobago, England, Uganda ne Scotland. Zvikwata zviviri zvinenge zviri pamusoro mumagroup maviri aya ndizvo zvichaenda kumasemi finals emakwikwi aya. Zimbabwe yakunda kaviri ikakundwawo kaviri kusvika parizvino kubva zvatanga makwikwi aya. Asi zvichitevera kurohwa kwechikwata chenhabvu chemaWarriors kuEgypt, vanhu vakawanda munyika neavo vanga vasingazive kana kutevera mitambo yeNetball vave kuziva kuti kune chikwata chemitambo chinonzi maGems mushure mekunge chikwata ichi chaita mbiri mumakundano avo ekutanga eWorld Cup. Vatambi vechikwata ichi vakaita saUrsula Ndlovu, Perpetua Sachikonye, Mercy Mukwadi, Joice Takaidza, Sharon Bwanali, Patricia Maoladi vaita mbiri munyika. VaOliver Musongoro avo vanotsigira chikwata cheDynamos munhabvu vanoti vanga vachingonzwa kuti Gems,Gems vasingazive kuti chii chacho. Muteveri wezvemitambo VaTatenda Makazhu vanoti vafadzwa zvikuru nezvakaitwa nemaGems vachiti ivo vane tarisiro yekuti vasikana ava vanouya nemukombe uyu. Mutsigiri wechikwata ichi Muzvare Rebecca Mushunje vanoti vanga vasingatarisire kuti maGems angaiite mashiripiti akadai vachiti ikozvino vave kutotarisira zvakawanda. Zvaitwa nemaGems izvi zvichataurwa nezvazvo kwemakore nemakore achatevera uyezve kuvatambi ava hazvikanwike muhupenyu hwavo. Chirikunyanyofadza ndechekuti mbiri iyi yauya kubva mumaoko evanhukadzi avo vanga vachingosimudzira zita renyika mumitambo pasi rese kubvira muna 1980. Mugore iroro chikwata chenyika chevanhukadzi chemutambo wehockey chakatora menduru yegoridhe mumakundano eZimbabwe ekutanga emaOlympic Games ayo akaitirwa kuMoscow. Izvi zvakateverwa nemenduru nomwe dzakatorwa nemutuhwini Kirsty Coventry kumakwikwi e2004 ne 2008 Olympic Games. Vasikana vemutambo wenhabvu vemaMighty Warriors havana kuda kusaririra ndokubudirirawo kuenda kumaOlympic Games a 2012, izvo zvatadzwa kuitwa nezvimwe zvikwata. Mumwe muteveri wemutambo wenhabvu VaLawrence Hwekwete vanoti zvaitwa ikozvino nemaGems zvinoratidza husiyano hwebudiriro hurikuitika mumitambo munyika. Muongorori wezvemitambo VaTinashe Museti vanoti vanhukadzi varikudadisa munyaya dzemitambo uye vanoti vatambi ava ngavapihwe mari. Asi mitambo yevanhukadzi haisi kuwana rutsigiro rwakasimba zvekuti maGems akazowana rubatsirwo rwemari vachema chema uyezve vatove pedyo nekuda kusimuka kubva muZimbabwe. Asi hurumende yakatora nguva imwecheteyo kuumba komiti yekuunganidzira mari chikwata chenyika chenhabvu chemaWarriors icho chaienda kumakundano e 2019 Africa Cup of Nations. Zvichiburikidza zvekare nekuti maMighty Warriors akatendwa nemadhora mashanu chete apo vakadzoka kubva kuma 2012 Olympic Games, mari yaive isingakwane kuti vamwe vavo vadzokere kudzimba dzavo. Izvakauya mushure mekunge vaimbove gurukota rezvemitambo VaMakhosini Hlongwane vavimbisa vatambi ava kuti vachatendwa zvakasimba nehurumende izvo zvisina kuzoitika. Vakawanda vanotevera mitambo vanoti panofanira kuve neshanduko mumabatirwo arikuitwa zvikwata zvenyika zvevanhukadzi VaMuseti vachiti vatambi vemaGems vanofanira kutendwa zvakasimba. Parizvino, hapana shoko rati rabva kuhurumende nezvaitwa nechikwata ichi kunyange hazvo kune makurukota matatu evanhukadzi akaperekedza maGems kuLiverpool. Asi vatambi ava vangangowana kutendwa kwakasimba nekuwana mabasa kuzvikwata zvekunze kwenyika izvo zvirikumakundano aya kuraura vatambi. No media source currently available
title: Chikwata cheNetball chemaGems Chodadisa Nyika

text: Mutongi wedare repamusoro mumasvingo VaGarainesu Mawadze vari kutarisirwa kupa mutongo wavo panyaya iri kutongerwa mumiriri weZengeza West mudare reparamende vari mutevedzeri wasachigaro weMDC VaJob Sikhala yekuti vaida kupidigura hurumende. Magweta aVaSikhala anoda kuti nyaya iyi iraswe vachiti haina humbowo hwakati tsvikiti. Mamwe magweta aVaSikhala anosanganisira Amai Beatrice Mtetwa, Blessing Nyamaropa uye VaTinomuda Shoko. VaSikhala vanonzi vakataura mashoko aya paMandadzaka Primary School kuBikita Masvingo musi wa6 Chikunguru. Muchuchusi wehurumende VaTawanda Zvekare vanoti VaSikhala vakataura mashoko akanangana nekuda kubvisa mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa pachigaro nechisimba. Asi VaBamu vanoti VaSikhala vari kuzorwa mafuta enguruve yavasina kudya. No media source currently available
title: Dare Rotarisirwa Nhasi Kuzeya Kuti Nyaya yaVaSikhala Yoenderera Mberi Here Kana Kuti Kwete

text: Mumazuva gumi apfuura, vatungamiriri veZimbabwe vange vachirwisana nezvinhu zvizhinji, kubva pakupambwa nekuwanikwa kwaDoctor Peter Magombeyi, kuramwa mabasa kwavana chiremba, rwendo rwaVaMnangagwa kuUnited Nations pamwe nekukwira kwemitengo yezvinhu munyika. Dzimwe nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika dzinoti VaMnangagwa vakakanganisa vega rwendo rwavo nemabatiro avakaita nyaya yaDoctor Magombeyi uye nekuvimbisa mapurazi pasina mubhadharo kune avo vanoda kuisa mari mune zvemabhizimisi mu Zimbabwe. Pane umwe musangano wavakaita muNew York, VaMnangagwa vakati hurumende yavo ichapa vana muzvinabizimisi vanoda kuisa mari yavo mukubatsira Zimbabwe munyaya dzekumutsidzira zvehutano mapurazi pasina mutengo. Vanodzidzisa zvemabhizimisi paDevry University, Muzvinafundo Elliot Masocha, vaudza Studio 7 kuti chinhu chikuru chichashorwa VaMnangagwa kwemakore mazhinji arikuuya mabatiro avakaita kufa nekuchengetwa kwe vaimbove mutungamiriri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe. No media source currently available
title: Vamwe Vanoti VaMnangagwa Vakazvikanganisira Vega Rwendo Rwavo kuUnited Nations

text: Vanhu vanodarika zana vanga vachishanda papurazi reProtea Valley kuRuwa vanoti zvinhu zvavaomera zvichitevera kudzingwa kwakaitwa murungu wechichena anga achirima papurazi iri, VaMartin Grobler. Vanhu zana nemakumi maviri vanga vachishanda papurazi iri vanoti vari kurwadziwa zvikuru nekudzingwa kwakaitwa VaGrobler papurazi iri mukupera kwesvondo rino naAmai Ivy Rupindi avo vanoshanda mubazi rezvekurima pamwe nekugoverwa kweminda. Amai Rupindi vanonzi vakasvika papurazi apa nezvikonzi zvedare repamusoro neChishanu vakasiya vapa VaGrobler zuva rimwe chete rekuti vatute zvinhu zvavo papurazi apa mushure mekunge mbatya dzavo dzaburitswa panze nezvikonzi. Pakasvika Studio 7 neMugovera papurazi apa zvikonzi zvaigwejenura mikova yepamba yaVaGrobler uye VaGrobler vakange vachituta zvinhu zvavo vachibatsirwa nehama dzavo nevamwe varimi vechichena. Mumwe wevanga vachishanda papurazi apa, Amai Pamhidzai Kambukuzi, vanoti VaGrobler vaivabata zvakanaka chose zvekuti havachaziva pekutangira. Izvi zvinotsigirwawo naVaYambani Chiunjiza avo vane makore makumi mashanu nemapfumbamwe ekuberekwa avo vanoti vave nemakore anodarika gumi nemashanu vachishanda paurazi apa. VaGrobler, avo vanoti vakazvarirwa muZimbabwe uye hapana imwe nyika yavanoziva, vanoti vanga vave nemakore akawanda vachinetsana naAmai Rupindi nenyaya yepurazi iri vakati vazopedzisira vasvika kuhofisi yegurukota rezvekurima uko kwavanoti vakanzi vabhadhare mari yechiokomuhomwe kuti vapihwe magwaro epurazi iri, kana kuti offer letter, iyo yavanoti vainge vasina panguva iyoyo. Vaendenderera mberi vachiti vakatanga kugara papurazi iri muna 2000 vachirima fodya, chibage pamwe nekuchengeta mombe. Vanoti makore ose avagara papurazi iri vanga vachibhadhara mari yekushandisa purazi iri kumuridzi waro uyo anonzi akazoshaya gore rapera. Vanoti hondo yavo yakatangira pakushaya mari yechiokomuhomwe yavanoti yaidiwa iyi. Pavakazotorerwa purazi iri naAmai Rupindi neChishanu, VaGrobler vanga vainemeibhedha yembeu yefodya yavanga vachitarisira kutanga kudyara neChishanu chinouya uye vange vaine mombe mazana matatu. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi, VaMasimba Manyanya, avo vaimboshanda mubazi rezvemari, vaudza Studio 7 kuti hupfumi hwenyika hucharamba huchiwira pasi sezvo vachiti hupfumi hwenyika hwakabatwa nenyaya dzekurima. Izvi zvatsinhirwawo nemutauriri weMDC Alliance, VaClifford Hlatshwayo, avo vanoti mapurazi anofanira kushandiswa zvakasimba kwete kuti vanotora mapurazi vanoswera vachirima sora. Rimwe gweta VaKudzai Kadzere vati zvakaitika papurazi raVaGrobler zvinoratidza kuti hurumende haisi kumira nemashoko ayo ekuti mapurazi ari kushandiswa zvakanaka haafanire kuvhiringidzwa. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzekurima uye vachishanda neUniversity of South Africa VaToendepi Shonhe, vaudza Studio 7 kuti kuramba hurumende yongotora mapurazi kuchaita kuti mari yemuripo inofanira kubhadharwa varimi vakatorerwa mapurazi irambe ichiwanda. Zvichakadai, Amai Rupindi vakati havana chavanokwanisa kutaura nezvenyaya iyi vakati titaure negurukota mubazi ravo VaAnxious Masuka avo vanga vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo kubva nezuro. Asi munyori mukuru mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko VaNick Mangwana vakanyora padandemutande ravo kuti hurumende iri mubishi kuongorora chii chaizvo chakanyatsotora nzvimbo kuti VaGrobler vazobviswa papurazi ravo. Nhasi tattumira VaMangwana mubvunzo paWhatsApp kuti pane chabuda here muongororo yavo asi vange vasati vapindura pataenda pamhepo. Zvichakadai, mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vabuda mubepanhau reSunday Mail vachiti mari yekuripa varimi vechichena vakabviswa mumapurazi haisi kuzobva muhomwe yehurumende asi kuti mari iyi ichatotsvagwa kubva kunze kwenyika. Izvi zvinotevera kuchema chema kwevamwe munyika kuti hurumende nechibvumirano chayakaita nevarimi vachena cheGlobal Compensation Deed. Makurukota ehurmende ari kupesana zvakanyanya panyaya yekuti ndiyani achabhadhara mari iyi. Sangano reCommercial Farmers Union rinoti pane varimi vechichena vanodarika zviuru zvina vakarasikirwa nemapurazi avo uye vashandi vavo vakasara vasina chekubata zvichitevera chirongwa chehurumende chekugovera minda kuvanhu vatema. No media source currently available
title: Vashandi Zana Vosiiwa paMhene Mushure Mekutorerwa Purazi kweMumwe Muchena kuRuwa

text: Kupindira kwemauto mune zvematongerwo enyika kusvikira VaRobert Mugabe vazosiya chigaro chemutungamiri wenyika gore rakapera kwakaitika muchihwande zvekuti kusvika pari zvino veruzhinji havanyatsoziva zvizere pachiitiko ichi. Mumwe mutambo, kana kuti drama, unoziikanwa uchinzi “Operation Restore Regasi” uri kuita mukurumbira munyika pamwe nekunze kwenyika nekuda kwekutevedzera zvinofungidzirwa kuti zvakaitika pamazuva aya. Mutori wedu wenhau Taurai Shava akaona mutambo uyu munguva pfupi yapfuura akatipa nyaya inotevera. Ichi ndechimwe chezvikamu zvakawanda zviri mumutambo weOperation Restore Regasi chinorwadzisa vakawanda mbamvu dzavo nekuseka. Mutambo uyu wakanyorwa naCharles Munganasa uyo anove mukuru wechikwata cheJubilee Arts chinoshanda chiri muguta reMasvingo, uyezve ari mumwe wevatambi mumutambo uyu. Mumwe wevanhu vanofadza veruzhinji zvikuru mumutambo uyu ndiMuzvare Caroline Magenga uyo anenge ari Amai Grace Mugabe. Caroline, uyo akazvarwa nekudzidza muMasvingo ndokuzoita zvidzidzo zvepamusoro paMidlands State University, anoti akatanga kuita zvemitambo ari kuprimary asi akazonyanyozvitevedzera mumakore mashoma apfuura. Anoti akatora nguva kuti anyatsokwanisa kutevedzera Amai Mugabe. Ketani Michael Banda ndiye anobuda achitevedzera VaMugabe. Ketani anoti akapinda mune zvemutambo mushure mekukurudzirwa nemumwe munhu waaiziva aiitawo zvemitambo. Ketani ndemumwe anofadzawo veruzhinji nekukwanisa kwake kutevedzera VaMugabe. Anoti nekuda kwekuti VaMugabe munhu anoziikanwa zvikuru munyika nepasi rose kukwanisa kuvatevedzera nemazvo hazvizi nyore. Charles akaberekerwa kwaGutu akaita zvidzidzo zvemitambo paUniversity of Zimbabwe. Mumutambo uyu anotamba chinzvimbo chemutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika Retired General Constantino Chiwenga uye anofadzawo vakawanda achitevedzera matauriro avanoita rurimi rweChirungu. Kunyange hazvo achiti anofara zvikuru nekutambirwa kwemutambo wake, Charles anoti anoodzwa moyo nenyaya yekuti hurumende hairatidze chido chekutsigira zvemitambo. Anoti nyaya yekuti masangano anotsigira zvinhu zvakasiyana siyana nemari ndiwo anotsigira zvemitambo munyika inogona kukanganisa zvetsika nemagariro emunyika. Caroline anoti kunyange hazvo veruzhinji vane mamwe maonero, kuita zvemitambo chinhu chinogona kuraramisa munhu semamwewo mabasa. Anoti shuviro yake ndeyekuti dai aikwanisa kusangana naAmai Mugabe onzwa divi ravo uye kuti vanonzwa sei kana kuti vanofungei nezvakaitika. Charles anoti nekuda kwemukurumbira waita mutambo wavo, hurongwa hwasvika pamusoro soro hwekuti vaende kunze kwenyika nemutambo uyu. Anotiwo munguva pfupi iri kutevera ane hurongwa hwekuburitsa mumwe mutambo une chekuita nesarudzo achitiwo anotariro yekuti mutambo uyu uchaitawo mukurumbira. Panguva yehutongi hwaVaMugabe, mutambo wakaita seOperation Restore Regasi waigona kurambidzwa kuitwa. Mutambo uyu uri kuita mbiri zvekuti vakawanda vanoti unogona kuvhurira vatambi vawo mikana yakakura uye kubatsira kusimudzirawo zvemitambo munyika. No media source currently available
title: Mutambo Uri Pamusoro peKubviswa kwaVaMugabe paChigaro Wotyora Mbabvu dzeVeruzhinji

text: Kuramwa mabasa kwavana chiremba kwakasvika muzuva rechimakumi maviri nematanhatu nemusi weChitatu varwere vakawanda vachidzorwa kumba zvopa kuti vakawanda vaomerwe pazororo rino rekisimusi negoredzva. Varwere vari muzvipatara vakawanda ndevaye vana vanachiremba vavo vanenge vakazvimirira asi vachishandisa mawhadhi navana mukoti vemuzvipatara zvehurumende kana kuti maprivate patients. Dare reLabour Court rakapa mutongo wekuti vanachiremba vadzokere kumabasa richiti kuratidzira kwavo kwaisava pamutemo. Hurumende yakabva yati yambomisa vanachiremba ava basa kwemavhiki maviri uye nekuvadaidza kudare. Asi vanachiremba vari kutsika madziro vachiti havasi kuzodzokera kusvika zvichemo zvavo zvinosanganisa mari yemuhoro uye kuwanisa varwere mishonga zvagadziriswa. Nhasi pataenda kumhepo vanachiremba ava vange vachiita musangano kuti vaone kuti votora gwara ripi. Studio7 haina kubata mumwe mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaConstantino Chiwenga, avo vakanzi nedare remakurukota vagadzirise nyaya yekuramwa mabasa kwavanachiremba uku. Mukuru weCommunity Working Group on Health VaItai Rusike vakurudzira hurumende kuti igadzirise dambudziko iri vachiti varombo vave kuomerwa nezvinhu. No media source currently available
title: Zvinhu Zvoramba Zvakaoma Muzvipatara Vana Chiremba Vachiramwa Mabasa

text: Vari kutungamira kupinzwa munyika kwechibage chakatengwa nevemabhizimusi akazvimirira kubva kuZambia vanoti kubva mwedzi waGunyana vanenge vokwanisa kupinza chibage chakawanda pane chiri kupinda munyika pari zvino. VaTafadzwa Musarara, vanove sachigaro wesangano revanogaya upfu reZimbabwe Grain Millers Association, uye vari ivo vari kutungamira kupinzwa kwechibage, vanoti vakaita musangano nevesangano revanotengesa chibage kuZambia reGrain Traders Association of Zambia. Vanoti vakawirirana kuti pakwidzwe huwandu hwechibage kubva pamatani zviuru makumi matatu zviri kupinda munyika pari zvino kuenda pamatani zana rezviuru. VaMusarara vanoti zvimwe zvimhingamipinyi zvakaita semitemo yepamabhodha yakaoma zviri kunonotsa kufamba kwakanaka kwedzimotokari dzechibage kuri kutariswawo nehurumende sezvo vakasvitsa zvichemo zvekuti vabatsirwe nekukasika. Goho rechibage rakadzikira zvikuru mwaka uno sezvo nyika iri kutarisira kukohwa matani angangosvika pamazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi mashanu ezviuru chete asi nyika ichida matani anosvika miriyoni nemazana masere ezviuru, izvo zvakazoita kuti kutengwe chibage kubva kuZambia senzira yekupfekedza matura. Hurumende iri kupinzawo chimwe chibage nekune rumwe rutivi, asi matunhu mazhinji anonzi vanhu vave kutanga kurwisana nenzara. VaMusarara vanoti kunyange hazvo vari kutenga chibage kubva kunze, vari kutengawo kubva kuvarimi vemunyika vakakwanisa kukohwa zvekutengesa. Vanoti nhengo dzavo dziri kutenga tani rechibage nemari iri pakati pemadhora mazana maviri nemakumi matanhatu emadhora nemazana matatu emadhora.
title: Chibage Chakatengwa kuZambia Chopinda Chakawanda Muna Gunyana

text: Dzimwe nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika dzinoti kushaya kwevaive mutungamiri weMDC, VaMorgan Tsvangirai, hakufanirwe kubva kwavewo kuparara kwemubatanidzwa wavakanga vavaka, weMDC Alliance, uyo une mapato manomwe anopikisa. Nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika uye vari mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Democracy Institute, Doctor Pedzisai Ruhanya, vanoti mubatanidzwa uyu ndiyo imwe yenhaka dzakasiiwa nemushakabvu, uye vari kukurudzira kuti vachange vachitungamira bato reMDC-T, vaendese mberi muono waVaTsvangirai uyu. "Chekutanga ndechekuti tine urombo nekurasikirwa naVaTsvangirai. Asi tine tariro yekuti VaTsvangirai pavakabatwa nechirwere che cancer, vane matanho avakatora ari kurambwa nevanhu," Doctor Ruhanya vanodaro. Vanoti matanho aVaTsvangirai akave ekudana vavakavamba navo musangano weMDC, vanoti Professor Welshman Ncube naVaTendai Biti kuti vabatane zvakare vaite chinhu chimwe chete sezvavakanga vari pakaumbwa musangano uyu muna 1999. Imwe nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika, Doctor Takavafira Zhou, vanove zvakare mutungamiri weProgressive Teachers' Union of Zimbabwe, PTUZ, vanotiwo nyaya yekuumba mubatanidzwa weMDC Alliance inobva kumuono waVaTsvangirai yekukurudzira mapato anopikisa kuti abatane, kana kuti apinde muimba hombe yavaiti 'big tent'. "Semaonero angu, ndanga ndichifunga kuti vanotungamira MFV dai vatadza kuonera pedo sehozhwa, vaona mberimberi kwatinoenda uko kuti alliance yakanaka," Vanodaro Doctor Zhou. Asi vane ruzivo nezviri kuitika mumubatanidzwa uyu vanoti mitswe yatotanga kuonekwa, sezvo vamwe vevatungamiri muMDC-T vari kuramba kubatana nemamwe mapato, vachingoda kubatana nemapato akabuda muMDC chete, kwete kutora vamwe vose vasineyi nekuumbwa kwebato iri. Vatungamiri vemapato ari mumubatanidzwa uyu vanonzi vari kutarisira kusangana kuti vazeye remangwana remubatanidzwa uyu, pamwe nekusarudza mumwe mutungungamiri achaumirira musarudzo. No media source currently available
title: MDC Alliance Yotyirwa reMangwana Rayo Zvichitevera Kushaya kwaVaTsvangirai

text: Vanhu vakawanda mudunhu reMashonald West pamwe nedzimwe nzvimbo vanoti havasi kufara nekukwidzwa kwemutengo wechingwa vachiti izvi zviri kupesana nechinangwa chehurumende chekudzikiswa kwemitengo yezvinhu muzvitoro. NeChishanu vanhu vakawanda vakashamiswa apo vakaenda kunotenga chingwa vakawana chingwa ichi chakwira mutengo. Chingwa, icho chaisimbotengwa nemari inoita masenzi makumi mapfumbamwe, chave kuita dhora rimwe chete ukuwo chaimboita dhora rimwe chete, chave kuita dhora rimwechete nemasenzi gumi. Kukwira mutengo kwechingwa kunotevera kukwira kwezvinhu zvakawanda zvinoraramisa vanhu zvakaita semukaka, mafuta ekubikisa, furawu yekubikisa chingwa pamwe nenyama. Mumwe mugari wemuChinhoyi, VaDenvor Chimuka, vanoti vari kushamiswa nekukwira kwechingwa apo nyika yakakohwa chibage negorosi rakawanda gore rino. "Semaonero edu kukwira kwemitengo yezvinhu hakuzi kwechokwadi. Ndinofunga kuti vamwe vari kuda kuzvibisa asi vanhu vari kuda kusvibisa zita rehurumende," vadaro VaChimuka. Mumwe mutengi asina kufara nekukwidzwa mutengo kwechingwa, VaDarlington Manyevere, vanoti kukwira mutengo wechingwa hakuna kunaka sezvo vanhu vakawanda vanodya chingwa mazuva ose. VaManyevere vanoti havaone hurumende ichikwanisa kugadzirisa nyaya yekukwira kwezvinhu sezvo zviri kutangira pamafuta ekufambisa, fuel. VaManyavere vanoti hurumende iripo haikwanise kugadzirisa nyaya dzehupfumi hwenyika nekuti havana pfungwa itsva dzekuvandudza hupfumi. Mumwe mushandi wekambani inogadzira chingwa yeLobels uyo asina kuda kudomwa nezita sezvo asingabvumirwe kutaura nevatori venhau anoti kambani yake yakakwidza chingwa sezvo zvinogadzira chingwa zvakaita sefurawo zvakakwira.
