Izvi zvinotsigirwa neimwe kabhani inobika chingwa yeBakers Inn iyo yakaburitsa gwaro ichitsanangura kuti yakakwidza chingwa nekuda kwekukwira mitengo yezzvinhu zvinoshandiswa kubika chingwa. Asi VaTongai Nyikayaramba avo vanorwira kodzero dzevatengi vanoti chinoita kuti vasagamuchire kukwidzwa kwechingwa inyaya yekuti makambani makuru ose anobika chingwa anoti Lobels, Bakers Inn neProton vawirirana kukwidza mutengo wechingwa nguva imwechete. VaNyikayaramba vanoti izvi zviri pachena kuti kukwidzwa kwechingwa hakunei nemitengo yezvinhu zvinogadzira chingwa asi kuwirirana, cartel, izvo zvinopesana nemitemo yemafambisirwo ezvehupfumi asingamanikidzwe, free economy. Mukuru weConsumer Council of Zimbabwe, Muzvare Rosemary Siyachitema, varamba kutaura nezvenyaya iyi vachiti nhasi izuva rekurumbidza Musiki havashande. Vachitaura pamusangano wavo wekongiresi yeZanu PF neChishanu mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vakayambira vezvitoro kuti vasanakidzwe nekukwidza mitengo yezvinhu asi mashoko avo hapana ari kuateerera.
title: Mitengo yeChingwa neZvimwe Zvinhu Inokwira

text: Broadcasting Authority of Zimbabwe (BAZ) yapa marezenisi eterevhizheni matanhatu kumakambani anosanganisira Zimpapers neDaily News nemamwe makambani anonzi akarerekera kuZanu PF. Sachigaro weBAZ, VaCharles Manzi Sibanda, vati vakabvunzurudza makambani gumi nemana uye makambani anotevera ndiwo apihwa marezenisi. Jester Media (Pvt) Ltd iyo inenge ine terevhizheni inonzi 3K TV; Zimbabwe Newspapers (1980) iyo inenge ichinzi ZTN; Rusununguko Media iyo ine NRTV; Acacia Media Group inenge iine terevhizheni inonzi Kumba TV; Fairtalk Communications iyo inenge iine terevhizheni inonzi Ke Yona TV pamwe neChannel Dzimbabwe inenge iine terevhizheni inonzi Channel D. VaSibanda vati makambani aya anofanira kuenda pamhepo mukati memwedzi gumi nemisere. Mukuru weFairtalk Communications, VaQubani Moyo, avo vanova zvakare komishina weZimbabwe Electoral Commmission, vaudza Studio7 kuti vafara zvikuru nekuwana kwavaita rezenenisi vachiti terevhizheni yavo ye Ke Yona TV ichaenda pamhepo mekukati memwedzi gumi nemviri. Ke Yona TV inenge ine muzinda wayo muBulawayo. Asi vamwe vanoona nezvenhau varatidza kusafara nezvaitwa neBAZ vachiti makambani ese apihwa marezenesi akarerekera kubato riri kutonga reZanu PF. Mukuru weMISA Zimbabwe, VaTabani Moyo, vaudza Studio7 kuti hapana chashanduka panyaya dzekutepfenyura pateverevhizheni vachiti hurumende yapa marezenesi kumakambani ayo nemadzisahwira ayo. Mutori wenhau anoshanda akazvimirira, Sofia Mapuranga ndemumwe asina kufara nezvaitwa neBAZ achiti makambani ese apihwa marezenisi akangofanana neZimbabwe Broadcasting Corpration. Zimpapers ikambani yehurumende sezvakaita Zimbabwe Broadcasting Corporation, Channel Dzimbabwe ine vakuru vanosanganisira vaimbove mukuru weZBC, VaHappison Muchechetere. Vamwe vanonzi vari muChannel Dzimbabwe ndiHazel Masvanhise naTariro Makanga, ukuwo Acacia Media Group ichinzi ikambani yaSharon Mugabe. Nhengo yekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaSettlement Chikwinya, vaudza Studio 7 kuti komiti yavo ichabvunzurudza kuti BAZ yakazvifambisa sei vachiti makambai ese apihwa marezenisi akarekera divi rimwe. Vatiwo zvaitwa nhasi dzozvakaitika apo pakapihwa marezenisi emaredhiyo. Mamwe makambani akakundikana kuwana marezenisi anosanganisira Heart and Soul TV yaTrevor Ncube vanove chipangamazano wemutungamiriri wenyika,pamwe neAB Communications inove kambani yenhengo ZANU PF zvakare vari mumiriri weNyanga North muNational Assembly, VaSupa Mandiwanzira. Zimbabwe yange iine terevizheni imwe chete yeZimbabwe Broadcasting Corporation iyo veruzhinji vanochema kuti yakarekera kubato riri kutonga reZanu PF. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rehurumende payanya iyi sezvo munyori mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaNick Mangwana, vange vasiri kudaira nhare mbozha yavo. Hatinawo kukwanisa kunzwa divi reZanu PF panyaya iyi sezvo mushandi mukuru anoona nezvekuburitswa kwwemashoko mubato iri, VaTafadzwa Mugwadi, vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. No media source currently available
title: BAZ Inopa Marezenisi Makambani Akarerekera kuZanu PF?

text: Dzimwe nyanzvi dzezvehutano dziri kukurudzira hurumende kuti iwedzere huwandu hwevanhu vari kuvhenekwa kuona kana vaine chirwere cheCovid-19 pazuva, uye kuti hurongwa uhwu huitwe pasina muripo. Imwe yenyanzvi idzi, uye vari chiremba vari kuBritain, Dr. Edgar Munatsi, vanoti vanhu vashoma kwazvo ndivo vanokwanisa kuwana mari yekunze inodiwa pakuvhenekwa kuona kana uine hutachiwana hunokonzera chirwere ichi, sezvo mari iyi ichibhadharwa nemadhora ekunze kwenyika. Izvi zvinotevera kukwira kuri kuita huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa nechirwere ichi pamwe nekufa nacho munyika zuva nezuva, zvikuru mudunhu reHarare. Nemusi weChina bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa kuti vanhu mazana masere nemakumi manomwe nemumwe kana kuti 871, vakawanikwa vaine chirwere cheCovid-19, uye vamwe gumi nevashanu, kana kuti 15 vakashaya nacho. Bazi iri rinoti vanhu vose vakawanikwa vaine chirwere ichi vanhu vagara vari munyika, uye mazana matatu nemumwe kana kuti 301, vavo vari muHarare chete. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa cheCovid-19 munyika kubva patanga chirwere ichi muna Kurume wegore rapera kusvika neChina, hwave pazviuru gumi nezvisere zvine mazana matanhatu nemakumi manomwe nevashanu, kana kuti 18 675. Huwandu hwevanhu vafa hwakasvikawo pamazana mana nemakumi mana nevatanhatu, kana kuti 446, kuchitiwo vanhu vapora kubva kuchirwere ichi vasvika pazviuru gumi nezviviri nemakumi masere nevatatu, kana kuti 12 083. Dr. Munatsi, vanoti nekuda kwekuoma kwezvinhu munyika, havaoni vanhu vakawanda vachitungamidza mberi nyaya yekuvhenekwa hutachiwana hwe coronavirus, ivo vasina chekuisa patafura kuti mhuri dzavo dzidye kudzimba kwavo. Nekudaro, vanoti zvakakosha kuti hurumende ivheneke vanhu vose pachena nekukasika kuitira kuti isazoremerwa nekutevera vanenge vakasangana nevane chirwere, kana kuti contact tracing. Vanotiwo kunyange hazvo hurumende pamwe nemamwe mapoka vari kupa dzidziso pamusoro pechirwere ichi, matanho iwayo ari kudzoserwa shure nevamwe vanhu, zvikuru vemamwe makereke, avo vavanoti vari kufurira nhengo dzemakereke avo kuti dzisavhenekwe kana kutora nhomba inodzivirira chirwere ichi. Zvipatara zvemunyika zvinonzi zvazara nevarwere veCovid-19, izvo zvave kuita kuti varwere vatsva vashaye kwekuenda. No media source currently available
title: Hurumende Yokurudzirwa Kuvheneka Vanhu Pachena Panguva Iyo Huwandu hweVanhu Vari Kubatwa neCovid-19 Hwakwira

text: Chikwata cheEuropean Union chinongorora sarudzo, cheElection Follow-up Mission, (EFM), icho changa chiri muZimbabwe kuti chione kana zvakakomekedzwa neElection Observation Mission (EOM) kuti hurumende iite mushure mesarudzo dzemuna 2018, chaita musangano nevatori venhau chichidzokorora kurudziro yacho kuhurumende yekuti izadzise zvakakomekedzwa sarudzo dziri kuuya muna 2023 dzisati dzasvika. Chikwata ichi nemusi weChina chakasangana negurukota rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaFredrick Shava mushure mekusanganawo nevemasangano akazvimirira nemusi weChitatu. Mukuru wechikwata ichi, VaElma Brok, vaudza vatori venhau kuti VaShava vakavimbisa kuti hurumende yavo iri kuita zvose kuona kuti sarudzo dzegore rinouya dzaitwa zvakajeka uye zvisina kugunun’una kwemamwe mapoka. Chikwata ichi chakasanganawo nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Manangagwa. Hurumende yakakomekedzwa kuti ivandudze zvinhu zvinosanganisira kuona kuti mhirizhonga yezvematongerwo enyika yamiswa, Zimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, yaita basa rayo yakazvimirira zvisina kupindira kwehurumende, vatori venhau vashanda vakasununguka uye kuti mapato ose awane mikana yakaenzana mukutsvaga rutsigiro. Zvimwe zvinonzi zvakakomekedzwa neEU inyaya yekuti madzishe vasapindira munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kubata VaShava kuti tinzwewo divi rehurumende panyaya iyi. Mukuru anoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa musangano rinoongorora sarudzo munyika, reElection Resource Centre, VaSolomon Bobosibunu vanoti chinhu chakanaka chose kuti pawanikwe masangano anobva kunze anokurudzira kuti Zimbabwe igadzirise zvinhu sarudzo dzisati dzaitwa. Asi VaBobosibunu vanoti nekuda kwemamiriro akaita zvinhu, havaoni hurumende ichigadzirisa zvose zvakanzi iite mukati menguva yasara sarudzo dzisati dzashevedzerwa muZimbabwe. No media source currently available
title: Chikwata cheEuropean Union Changa Chirti muNyika Chinokomekedza Hurumende Kuti iZadzise Zvayakanzi iite Mushure meSarudzo dza2018

text: Vaimbove mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe vari kutarisirwa nhasi kupa huchapupu kukomiti yezvemigodhi nemhando dzemoto pamusoro pemari inosvika mabiriyoni gumi nemashanu emadhora, iyo inonzi yakabva mukutengeswa kwemangoda, yavakati ivo mbune yakatsakatika. Sachigaro wekomiti yezvemigodhi, uye vari mumiriri weNorton mudare reparamende, VaTemba Mliswa, vaudza Studio 7 kuti VaMugabe vari kuuya kuparamende kunomira pamberi pekomiti yavo, kwete kuti komiti yavo ndiyo iri kuenda kumba kwaVaMugabe kuBlue Roof sezvanga zvichibuda mumadandemutande nemamwe mapepanhau. Nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika, uye vari mukuru wesangano rinookurudzira kuchengetedzwa kwezvicherwa reCentre for Natural Resource Governance, VaFarai Maguwu vanoti chingava chinhu chakanaka kwazvo kana VaMugabe vakasimuka mbune kunomira pamberi pekomiti iyi, sezvo vari ivo vakaparura nyaya iyi. “Kuuya kwavo, kana vabvuma kuuya, haisiri nyaya yekuda kuburitsa pachena huwori hwakaitika panyaya ye $15 billion, asi kuti vanenge vari kuuya vachida kunyadzisa kana kuti kufumura vanhu vakavatorera masimba, uye vachiziva kwazvo zvavanokwanisa kunge vachiitawo vanhu ivavo paku disappear kwe 15 billion yakabiwa kwaMarange,” VaMaguwu vanodaro. Muna 2016, vaMugabe vakashamisa nyika pavakazivisa kuti mari inoita mabhiriyoni gumi nemashanu yakawanikwa nenyika kubva mukutengeswa kwemangoda ekwaChiadzwa yakatsakatika. No media source currently available
title: Vaimbove Mutungamiri weNyika, VaRobert Mugabe Votarisirwa Kupa Huchapupu kukomiti yeMigodhi

text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vakasvika kuBotswana nemusi weMuvhuro uko vari kupinda mumisanagano yemazuva maviri nemutungamiri wenyika iyi, VaIan Khama. VaMngangagwa vakaperekedzwa nemakutukota gumi neri mwe chete. Vatungamiri vaviri ava vanoti misanagano iyi iri kufamba zvakanaka chose uye vatombosangana vari vaviri kuhofisi yaVaKhama. VaKhama vakagadzirirawo vaenzi vavo kudya kwemasikati vakakokawo makurukota ose navanamuzvinabhizimisi. VaMnangangwa vakazotaurawo mudare reparamende yeBotswana. Mutungamiri wenyika VaMnangagwa vanotarisirwa kunoonawo basa riri kuitwa nekambani inonzi Diamond Trading Company iri muGaborone guta guru renyika iyi. Mharidzo yaVaMnangagwa ichingori imwecheteyo yekuti Zimbabwe yavhurwa mukana wekuita mabhizinesi. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezve hupfumi vachishandira kuBotswana VaGarry Guma vanoti kudyidzana kweZimbabwe neBotswana kwakakosha zvikuru sezvo nyika idzi dzakaganhurana. No media source currently available
title: VaMnangagwa Voshanyira Botswana

text: Nhengo dzedare reSenate remuAmerica shanu dzange dzichishanya muZimbabwe dzakasimuka munyika nemusi weSvondo dzichidzokera kuWashington DC. Mutauriri wemuzinda weAmerica muZimbabwe VaDavid McGuire vakaudza Studio 7 kuti nhengo dzeSenate idzi dziri kutarisirwa kusvika muWashington DC neMuvhuro. Nhengo idzi dzakasangana nevatungamiri vehurumende uye vanopikisa. Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa avo vakasangana nenhengo dzeSenate idzi vachangobva kuChina vakati vanovimba kuti hukama hweZimbabwe neAmerica huchasimbaradzwa. America yakatemera VaMnangagawa nevamwe vavo zvirango zvekufamba nenyaya yekutonga nedemo. Asi hurumende inoti yakatamerwa zvirango nekuti yakatora minda kubva kuvachena ichipa vatema. Nhengo dzeSenate idzi dzakaitawo musangano nevamwe vanopikisa vakaita sevatungamiri veMDC-Alliance vanoti VaNelson Chamisa, VaTendai Biti uye VaWelshman Ncube pamwe nemutungamiri wePeople’s Rainbow Coalition Amai Joice Mujuru. VaChamisa vakatenda kuti vakaita musangano uyu vakazeya nyaya dzesarudzo, zvirango nezvimwe. No media source currently available
title: Nhengo dzeSenate dzemuAmerica Dzopeta Rwendo kuZimbabwe

text: Nhengo dzeparamende kubva kuZanu PF neMDC dziri kuramba dzichikakavadzana mudare pamwe nekukanganisa misangano yeparamende zvisinei kuti komiti inotungamira basa reparamende yakaumba komiti yekuongorora dambudziko riri pakati penhengo idzi. Komiti inoona nezvemhando dzemoto yatadza kuita musangano mushure mekunge pakandiramwa makobvu nematete pakati penhengo dzeMDC ne Zanu PF. Nhengo dzeZanu PF dzaramba kuti dzipinde mumusangano unokokerwa nenhengo yeMDC dzichiti bato iri riri kuramba kutambira mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa,semutungamiri akasarudzwa nevanhu. Sachigaro vekomiti iyi, VaJoel Gabuza, veMDC vati varambidzwa zvakare kuti vatungamire musangano nenhengo dzeZanu PF izvo zvavange vasingafungire sezvo nyaya iyi yave kukadziriswa. Asi VaElias Musakwa veZanu PF vati musangano wange watotanga vachitungamira musangano apo pazotanga kupopotedzana. Patavabvunza kuti havasi kuzvidza Standing Rules and Orders Committee here nekuramba vachikakavadzana sezvo nyaya iyi yave kuongororwa, VaMusakwa vati vacharamba vachiita izvi kudzamara vaudzwa nebato ravo kuti vachirega. MDC inotiwo iri kuremekedza chisungo chakaitwa nekongiresi yebato ravo kuti havatambiri hutungamiriri hwaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa. Komiti yeparamende inoona nezvebhajeti inotungamirwa naVaTendai Biti veMDC yakatadza kunzwa nyaya dzehuori mwedzi wapera mushure mekunge nhengo dzeZanu PF dzati VaBiti nebato ravo vatange vacherechedza VaMnangagwa semutungamiri wenyika.
title: Komiti Inoona Nyaya dzeMhando dzeMoto Inotadza Kuita Basa Rayo

text: Masangano anomirira vagari vemu Harare abatana nemamwe masangano anomirira vashandi pamwe nevechidiki kuramba hurongwa hwekanzuru ye Harare hwekuti veruzhinji vatange vabhadhara mvura vasati vaishandisa. No media source currently available Sangano remubatanidzwa wemasangano anomirira vagari vemupurovhinzi yeguta re Harare re Harare Metropolitan Residents Forum, kana kuti Hamref, rabatana nemamwe masangano akaita sesangango revashandi re Zimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions (ZCTU), Zimbabwe Coalition on Debt and Development (Zimcodd), Community Water Alliance pamwe nesangano revechidiki National Youth Organization kuramba hurongwa hwekanzuru ye Harare hwekuda kuisa mamita emvura anoita kuti vagari vatange vabhadhara mvura vasati vaishandisa, kana kuti pre-paid water meters. Ataura akamirira masangano ese uye vari mutaiuriri we Hamref , Va Marvelous Khumalo, vati havasi kuzofa vakatambira hurongwa hwekanzuru uhwu. Va Khumalo vati chimwe chiri kuvarwadza ndechekuti kanzuru ye Harare yakangotora danho iri isina kubvunza vagari mafungiro avo panyaya iyi. Mumwe wemasachigaro eHamref avo vanoshanda zvakare nesangano re Chombined Harare Residents Association, kana kuti CHRA, Va Simabarashe Moyo, vanoti danho riri kuda kutorwa nekanzuru iri richaita kuti vagari vemu Harare vazhinji vagare vasina mvura pakatariswa kuoma kuri kuramba kuchiita zvinhu munyika. Va Moyo vati ikodzero yevagari kuti vawane mvura yakakwana uye yakachena nguva nenguva vachiti kushayikwa kwemvura kunogona kukonzera kupararira kwezvirwere zvinokonzerwa netsvina zvakaita sekorera.. Va Moyo vati vachatora matanho akawanda kudzamara kanzuru yaregera kuenderera mberi nehurongwa hwekuisa ma pre-paid water meters mudzimba dzevagari.\n\nMeya wedhorobha re Harare, Va Benard Manyenyeni, vaudza Studio 7 parunhare kuti vachiri pakati pekuzeya nyaya iyi nevemasangano anomirira vagari. Asi mabharani wekanzuru ye Harare, Va Tendai Mahachi, vanoti kanzuru haisi kuzodzokera kumashure nehurongwa uhwu kunyange hazvo musangano wakaitwa nemakanzura e Harare nezuro wakabvumirana kuti chirongwa ichi chimbomiswa.
title: Vagari Voramba Kutambira Chirongwa Chekubhadhara Mvura Vasati Vaishandisa

text: Mumwe mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika General Constantino Chiwenga vari kurapwa kuchipatara chekuSouth Africa pamwe nemudzimai wavo Amai Mary Chiwenga. Mutevedzeri wemunyori wedare remakurukota uye vari mutauriri wevatungamiri venyika VaGeorge Charamba vatenda kubepanhau reHerald kuti VaChiwenga vari kurapwa vachiti vakakuvara pakaputika rinofungidzirwa kuti ibhambo kuWhite City Stadium muna Chikumi. VaCharamba vanotiwo VaChiwenga vakambokuvarawo munguva yehondo zvopa kuti hutano hwavo husamire zvakanaka. Rimwe gurukota rinoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika VaSibusiso Moyo vari kurapwawo kuSouth Africa kwavakaendeswa zvechimbi chimbi varwarisa. Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa uye vaimbova mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe nemhuri yavo vanopotawo vachienda kunorapwa kunze kwenyika kana varwara. Asi chii chinopa kuti vatungamiri venyika vaende kunorapwa kunze kwenyika? Vaimbova gurukota rezvehutano vari nhengo yeMDC Dr Henry Madzorera vanoti hurumende yakundikana kugadzirisa zvinhu muzvipatara nenyaya yekusapa bazi rezvehutano mari yebhajeti inokwana. Chiremba Dr Rutendo Bonde vanotiwo zvipatara zvakawanda hazvina mishonga zvopa kuti varwere vaomerwe nehupenyu. Asi Zimbabwe handiyo chete nyika ine dambudziko revatungamiri venyika vanoenda kunorapwa kunze kwenyika. Muna 2011 vaive mutungamiri wenyika yeZambia VaMichael sata vakashaikira kuchipatara cheKing Edward VII’s kuBritain. Mumwe aimbova mutungamiri weZambia zvekare VaLevy Mwanawasa vakashaikira kuFrance mushure mekurwarawo variko. Vaimbova mutungamiri weEthiopia VaMeles Zenawi vakashaika vari kuBelgium. Vaive mutungamiri weGuinea Bissau VaMalam Bacai Sqnhq vakashaikira kuFrance. Vanoongorora nyaya dzezvehutano vanoti zvose izvi zvinokonzerwa nekusarongeka munyaya dzezvehutano kwevatungamiri venyika dzemuAfrica. No media source currently available
title: VaChiwenga neMudzimai Wavo Vorapwa kuSouth Africa

text: Zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri muSouth Africa zvisina kuwana mapepa zvinonzi hazvisi kuda kudzokera kumusha pasi pechirongwa chekudzokera pasina kumanikidzwa nehurumende yaVaJacob Zuma. Vanhu ava vanoti hapana chekudzokera kumusha sezvo zvinhu zvakaoma kuZimbabwe. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemashoko muZimbabwe Exiles Forum, Muzvare Diana Zimbudzana, vanoti vanhu vakawanda vari kusarudza kuenda kune dzimwe nyika dzemuAfrica pane kudzokera kumusha sezvo zvinhu zviri kuramba zvichioma munyika. Muzvare Zimbudzana vaenderera mberi vachiyewuchidza zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri muSouth Africa zvakanyorera mapepa ema Zimbabwe Special Permits kuti zviende kunotora mapepa avo sezvo hurumende ye South Africa iri kuti vasina kutora mapepa aya panopera Gunyana, vanokwanisa kuzoshupika. No media source currently available
title: Vasina Kuwana Mapepa muSouth Africa Voramba Kudzokera kuZimbabwe

text: Mutevedzeri wegurukota rinoona nezvekurima, VaDavid Marapira, vanoti Zimbabwe yave kurambidza kutengwa kwechibage kunze kwenyika sezvo iri kuti ine goho rakakwana uye inoda kuti varimi vemunyika vawanewo chouviri. Hurumende inoti iri kutarisira kuti goho rechibage richasvika pamamiriyoni maviri ematani. GMB inotiwo yaunganidza mari inosvika mamiriyoni mazana maviri ekutenga chibage kubva kuvairimi. Gurukota rinoona nezvehupfumi, VaPatrick Chinamasa, uye mabhanga anokweretesa mari akaita seWorld Bank neInternational Monetary Funds, IMF, vanoti vari kutarisira kuti hupfumi hwenyika huchati wedzerei nenyaya yekuti goho rechibage nefodya rakati nakei gore rino. Asi zvechibage zvingabatsire here mukuvandudza hupfumi hwenyika uye munongedzo here wekuti vatema havachaita vanamugarira badza? Nyanzvi munyaya dzekurima dzinoti panyaya yechibage nyika yange yatodzokera kumashure sezvo varimi vatema vange vagara vari ivo vairima chibage chakawanda chaisvika pazvikamu makumi masere kubva muzana kunyangwe varimi vachena vainge vasati vatorerwa minda. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachitungamira nyaya dzezvidzidzo paZimbabwe Ezekiel Gutu University, Doctor Gift Mugano, vanoti goho rakanaka iri richabatsira nyika mukugadzirisa hupfumi. Mashoko aya anotsinhirwawo nemurimi vari nhengo yeZanu-PF, VaGadzira Chirumanzu, avo vati mari yange ichitengeswa chibage kunze neZimbabwe inenge yoshandiswawo zvimwe zvinhu. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi Doctor Prosper Chitambara vanoshanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe vanoti kunyangwe zvakanaka kuti nyika yamira kutenga chibage kunze, vanhu vanogona kuzopembedza n’anga neinobata mai sezvo zvinotengwa kunze zvinenge zviine mutengo wakaderera kukunda zvinogadzirwa munyika. Asi VaChitambara vanoti havo munyaya dzezvehupfumi, goho rakadai rinogona kubatsira zvakanyanya munyaya dzezvehupfumi. Mashoko aya atsinhirwa nasachigaro webhodhi reGrain Millers Association of Zimbabwe, VaTafadzwa Musarara, avo vati homwe yenyika yekutenga zvinhu kunze yange isisina kumira zvakanaka. Hapana hapo kuwirirana kuti chii chakapa kuti goho regore rino rive nani. VaChirumanzu vanoti chirongwa cheCommand Agriculture chakaparurwa nehurumende. Asi mutauriri webato reMDC-T, VaObert Gutu, vanoti hurumende yave kungokohwawo nepaisina kurima nekuti vamwe varimi kunyangwe vainge vasiri muchirongwa cheCommand Agriculture vakakohwa pakuru. VaGutu vanoti vose ava vave kungonzi vari muchirongwa chehurumende ichi. Sachigaro wekomiti yemakurukota inoona nezvechirongwa cheCommand Agriculture, uye vari mumwe wevatevedzeri vemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mngagagwa, vanoti pasi pechirongwa ichi, murimi anovaudza ndima yaanoda kurima ivo vomupa mbeu nezvimwe zvikwanisiro. Pannyaya yekuti sei matura akazara, Doctor Mugano vanoti havo ruvara rwekiti harwuna basa chakakosha ndechekuti iri kubata makonzo here. VaMugano vanoti zvakakoshawo kuti hurumende yakakwanisa kuwanira varimi zvikwanisiro zvekurimisa. Mashoko aya anotsinhirwawo negurukota rinoona nezvehupfumi, VaPatrick Chinamasa. Kunyange hazvo hupfumi hwenyika hwaimbenge hwati wedzerei munguva yehurumende yemubatanidzwa, ikozvino zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka sezvo vanhu vasina mabasa nekuda kwekuvharwa kwemakambani uye kuderera kwegoho mumakore apfuura. Vekunze havasi kuuyawo kuzotanga mabasa muZimbabwe vachiti mitemo yehurumende haina kujekesa. Hurumende inoti hupfumi hwaenda kumazivandadzoka nenyaya yezvirango zvainoti zvakatemerwa nyika. Asi vanopikisa vanoti inyaya yekutonga nedemo sezvo hurumende yemutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, ichipomerwa mhosva yekutyora kodzero dzevanhu. No media source currently available
title: Hurumende Yorambidza Kutengwa kweChibage Kunze kweNyika

text: No media source currently available Mutungamiri weMDC, VaMorgan Tsvangirai, vanoti vava kunzwa zviri nani chose zvichitevera kurapwa kwavari kuitwa kuSouth Africa. Vachitaura neStudio7 vari parunhare vari kuSouth Africa kwakare, VaTsvangirai, avo vakaenda kunorapwa ku South Africa mwedzi wapera, vanga vasati vataura mbune nevatori venhau pamusoro pehutano hwavo. Aka ndekekutanga kubuda pachena vachitaura nevatori venhau pamusoro pehutano hwavo. VaTsvangirai, avo vanova zvakare mutungamiri wemubatanidzwa wemamwe mapato anopikisa ayo anoti achakwikwidza musarudzo akabatana, weMDC Alliance, vanoti havaone chinovakanganisa mukutungamira MDC Alliance musarudzo dza 2018, zvisineyi kuti pane vamwe vanhu vari kuti vasiye chigaro chavo. Mashoko aVaTsvangirai aya anotevera mashoko anga achibuda mumamwe mapepanhau pamwe nemumadandemutande vamwe vachiti semurwere, VaTsvangirai vanofanirwa kusiyira vamwe chigaro ichi. Asi VaTsvangirai vanoti munhu wese anogona kurwara, uye havasi ivo vekutanga kurwara, nokudaro zvinotaurwa nevanhu hazvivatidzise kuita basa ravo. VaTsvangirai vanoti kana nguva yekuti vasiye basa ravo yakwana, vachaita saizvozvo sezvo munyika muzere vanhu vanogona kutungamira mubatanidzwa weMDC Alliance musarudzo dzegore rinouya. Asi vasimbaradza kuti vachaenderera mberi nebasa ravo kana vana chiremba vavo vati vachitanga.
title: VaTsvangirai Vanotaura neStudio7 Pamusoro peHutano Hwavo

text: Mumiriri weAmerica muZimbabwe, Ambassador Harry Thomas Jnr, avo vave kusiya basa, vanoti vanosuwa chose kuti vave kubuda muZimbabwe nyika isati yaita sarudzo dzakachena. Asi vane tariro yekuti vanhu vemuZimbabwe vachawana zvese zvavanoshuvira mune remangwana. Vachitaura nevatori venhau pamusangano wavo wekupedzisira nevatori venhau muHarare, VaThomas vati vane tariro yekuti zvinhu zvichafamba zvakanaka muZimbabwe zvekare. Vati vanofara chose kuti vanhu vemuZimbabwe vave netariro zvichitevera kushanduka kwehurumende muZimbabwe. VaThomas vatiwo vanofara nechirongwa chekunyoresa vavhoti cheBiometeric Voter Registration uyewo vane tarisiro yekuti nyika ichaita sarudzo dzakachena sekuvimbisa kwemutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa. Vati kusvika pari zvino, VaMnangagwa vari kuita zvese zvavakavimbisa zvakaita sekuwedzera nguva yekunyoresa vavhoti, kukoka dzimwe nyika kuti dzizoongorora sarudzo vachiti Europena Union neSADC dzakatotumira zvikwata zvadzo zvekuongorora sarudzo kuZimbabwe. Vatiwo hurumende yeAmerica ichatumawo chikwata chekuongorora sarudzo idzi. Vatiwo vemabhisimisi veAmerica vari kuuya kuzotanga mabhizimisi muZimbabwe uye vanotarisira kuti vakwanda vachauya kana nyika ikaita sarudzo dzakachena. Vati hurumende yeAmerica haironge nzendo dzezvikwata zvevemabhizimisi zvinoita dzimwe nyika uye vemabhizimisi vanouya vakazvimirira. Panyaya dzezvirango zvakatemerwa vakuru vakuru muhurumemende nemadzisahwira avo neAmerica, VaThomas vati mutemo weZimbabwe Democracy and Economic Recovery Act unosungira America kuti isatsigire Zimbabwe kumasangano akaita seWorld Bank neIMF asi masangano aya haasati ambogara pasi kuti ape rubatsiro Zimbabwe nekuti ine zvikwereti. Vatiwo kana nyika ikaita sarudzo dzakachena nekuremekedza kodzero dzevanhu zvirango zvakatemerwa vakuru vakuru muZimbabwe zvinogona kubviswa. Vati mukati menguva pfupi iri kutevera kuchauya chikwata chevakuru vakuru vehurumende yeAmerica uye ivavo ndivo vane simba rekuti zvirango zvakatemerwa Zimbabwe zvibviswe. Vatiwo zvinofadza kuti mutemo wekupa masimba kuvatema vemuno munyaya dzehupfumi wava kuvandudzwa uyewo vanodawo kuwona kuti vatori venhau vanoita basa ravo vasingambunyikidzwi uye kuti mapato anopikisa apihwe mukana mumapepanhau nenhepfenyuro dzehurumende. VaThomas, avo vave kuregedza basa muhurumende yeAmerica, vanoti vanofara kuti America ndiyo nyika inopa rubatsiro rwakakura kudarika nyika dzese kuZimbabwe munyaya dzehutano, dzidzo nezvimwe. Vatiwo vanosurukirwa zvikuru kuti vave kudzokera kumusha vachiti Zimbabwe ndiyo nyika yava gara zvakanyaya kudarika dzese. VaThomas, avo vakamboshanda pamuzinda wenyika yavo muZimbabwe vasati vadzoka zvakare semumiriri weAmerica muZimbabwe, vati vari kusuwa kuti vari kuenda muimbi ane mukurumbira, Thomas Mapfumo, uyo ave kugara kuAmerica asati adzoka kuzoita mutambo wake webira muHarare kupera kwemwedzi unouya. Vati Zimbabwe inyika yakanaka chose ine mushana uyewo vave kusiya shamwari dzavo dzakaita semuimbi ane mukurumbira, Oliver Mutukudzi. Vatiwo vanofarirawo Jah Prayzah uyewo vati vachodzoka kuzoshanya muZimbabwe. VaThomas vati vachaenda pamudyandigere vachigara naamai vavo nemhuri yavo vasati varonga zvimwe zvekuita. No media source currently available
title: Ambassador Thomas Vanoonekana neVatori veNhau

text: Zvari kubuda musarudzo dzema by-elections zviri kuratidza kuti bato reCitizens Coalition for Change rakunda munzvimbo dzakawanda dzanga dzichiitwa sarudzo idzi richiiteverwa nebato reZanu PF iro rawana zvigaro zvishomanana. Zvabuda musarudzo zviri kuziviswa nevashandi vekomisheni inoona nezvesarudzo yeZimbabwe Electoral Commission mumatunhu akasiyana-siyana anga achiitwa ma by-elctions zvinoratidza kuti bato reCCC rakunda munzvimbo dzakawanda ukuwo bato reZanu PF richikundawo munzvimbo mbiri dzaitungamirwa nebato rinopikisa reMDC Alliance risati ratsemuka pachizoumbwa bato reCCC. Bato reZanu PF rakunda muEpworth nekuMutasa South dzinova nzvimbo dzakanga dzichitungamirwa nebato reMDC Alliance VaNelson Chamisa vasati vavamba bato reCCC zvichitevera kudzingwa kwakanga kwaitwa nhengo dzavo muparamende nechikwata cheMDCT inotungamirwa naVaDouglas Mwonzora. Bato reCCC rakunda mumakanzuru akawanda kwese kwanga kuchiitwa sarudzo. Bato reZanu PF rikatorawo imwe wadhi kuMabvuku muno muHarare uko kwahwinwa naVaScot Sakupwanya kanove kekutanga kuti wadhi iyi itongwe neZanu PF kubva pakavambwa bato reMDC muna 1999. Vakunda musarudzo idzi nenzvimbo dzavanga vachikwikwidza nemapato avo vanoti: Harare Central - Murisi Zwizwai, CCC Harare East – Tendai Biti, CCC Epworth – Zalerah Makari, Zanu PF Highfield East – Eric Murai, CCC Highfield West – Happymore Chidziva, CCC Kuwadzana -----Johnson Matambo, CCC Kuwadzana East – Charlton Hwende, CCC Glen Norah – Wellington Chikombo, CCC Glenview North, Fani Munengami, CCC Kambuzuma – Willas Madzimure, CCC Mufakose -----Susan Matsunga, CCC St Marys ----Dickson Unganai Tarusenga, CCC Chivi South, Munyaradzi Zizhou, Zanu PF Mwenezi East, Master Makope, Zanu PF Dangamvura – Prosper Mutseyami, CCC Mutasa South- Misheck Mugadza, Zanu PF Murehwa South – Nyasha Masoka, Zanu PF Marondera Central, Caston Matewu, CCC Bato reCCC rakundawo kuKwekwe Central uko kwaitungamirwa nenhengo yaive yakazvimirira VaBlackman Matambanadzo avo vakashaya. Mutauriri weCCC, Muzvare Fadzayi Mahere vati vafara zvikuru nekukunda kwaita bato ravo musarudzo idzi. Mushandi mukuru anoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko muZanu PF, VaTafadzwa Mugwadi, vatiwo vafara zvikuru nezvabuda musarudzo. Mutauriri weMDCT yaVaMwonzora, VaWitness Dube, vati vachiri pakati pekunzwa zvabuda musarudzo kwese kwanga kuchiitwa sarudzo vachiti vachashanda nevose vabudirira musarudzo idzi. Sachigaro weMDC Alliance VaMorgan Komichi vati mutungamiri wemubatanidzwa uyu VaDouglas Mwonzora vachataurawo nevatori venhau mangwana nezvabuda musarudzo idzi. Mutungamiri webato reLabour Economists African Democrats, Muzvare Linda Masarira, avo vakakundwa kuHarare Central, vati vanotambira zvabuda musarudzo kunyange hazvo vanhu vasina kubuda nehuhwandu hwavo kunovhota. Mashoko aya atsinhirwao naMuzvare Falon Dunga munyori mukuru wesangano reproject Vote 263. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika, VaRashweat Mukundu, vati kukundwa kwaitwa bato raVaMwonzora musarudzo dzema by-elections idzi kunoratidza kuti rwendo rwebato iri rwasvika kumagumo. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nasachiagro weZEC, Amai Priscilla Chigumba kana mukuru anoona nezvesarudzo muZEC VaUtoile Silaigwana kuti tinzwewo divi ravo. Zvichakadai, bato raVaMwonzora radzingawo mamwe makanzura gumi nematanhatu munzvimbo dzakasiyana-siyana izvo zvave kureva kuti kwave kufanira kuitwa mamwe ma by-elections munzvimbo dzanga dzichimirirwa nemakanzura adzingwa aya achinzi haachatevedzeri zvido zvebato ravo. Pasi pemutemo unobata nyaya dzesarudzo weElectoral Court, sarudzo itsva dzekanzuru idzi dzinofanira kuitwa mukati memazuva makumi mapfumbamwe. Sarudzo dzakaitwa nezuro dzakazoitwa nguva iyi yadarika sezvo hurumende yaiti yaityira kuti chirwere cheCovid 19 chaigona kuzopararira. No media source currently available
title: CCC Yotora Zvigaro Zvakawanda Musarudzo, VaMwonzora Vasina Kana Chimwe Chete

text: Mutumbi wevaimbove mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, watakurwa kubva kumusha kwavo kwaZvimba uchiendeswa kuHarare kumba kwavo kuBlue Roof paine makakatanwa mumhuri ekuti uchachengeterwa kupi usati wavigwa. Kunetsana kwehama dzemufi kuti mutumbi unochengeterwa kupi uye uri muchimiro chipi, kwakatadzisa mutumbi uyu kuenda kuHarare nemusi weChipiri sezvakanga zvakarongwa. Asi mutumbi uyu wazoendeswa kuHarare nechikopokopo. chemauto.  Mutauriri wemhuri uye vari muzukuru wemufi, VaLeo Mugabe, vabvuma kuti hapana chisungo chawiriranwa vachiti zvose zvichanoperera kuHarare. VaLeo Mugabe varambawo mashoko ekuti mutumbi waVaMugabe uchanochengerwa kuSingapore kwavakafira usati wadzoka zvakare kuzovinga kumarinda emagamba eHeroes Acre. VaLeo Mugabe vati dambudziko riripo nderekuti vakuru vemhuri havasi kuda kuti mutumbi uchengetwe mumba unochengeterwa vafi kuDoves vachiti havazive zvingaitwe mutumbi wehama yavo asi vamwe vachiti hazvina basa. VaLeo Mugabe vati vave kushushikana sezvo rufu rwatora nguva yakareba izvo zvave kupa kuti vanhu vataure zvakawanda pamusoro perufu rwaVaMugabe vachiti havangachengetere mutumbi mumba. Mumwe mugari wekwaZvimba, Amai Loice Mutamba, vati hazviiti kuchengeta mufi mumba kwenguva yakareba Vanozviti Tete vaVaMugabe, Ambuya Josephine Jarija, vati hapana chakaipa kuti VaMugabe vatore nguva yakareba vasati vavigwa chero vakachengetwa zvakanaka kuti mutumbi usaore. Asi vamwe vataura neStudio7 vanoti sezvo VaMugabe vakarwara kwenguva yakareba, vemhuri yavo vanofanirwa kuchivazorodza nekuona kuti varadzikwa zvakanaka. Guva remhando yepamusoro soro richavigirwa VaMugabe riri kugadzirwa, uye hurumende, iyo iri kubhadhara mari yakuvaka guva iri, inoti zvichatora mazuva akati awandeyi guva iri richivakwa. Izvi zvinoreva kuti mutumbi waVaMugabe uchange wakachengetedzwa panzvimbo inokodzera. Pasi pemitemo, mutumbi wemufi haubvumidzwe kuchengeterwa pose pose kunze kwenzvimbo dzakatarwa semochari dzemuzvipatara, kana dzemakambani anochengeta mitumbi yevanhu vanenge vafa. No media source currently available
title: Mutumbi waVaMugabe Unodzoserwa kuHarare neChikopokopo

text: Masangano anomirira madzimai ari kushushikana kuti mapato ezvematongerwo enyika haasi kupa vanhukadzi mikana yakaenzana nevanhurume musarudzo achiti izvi zvakaburitswa pachena nesarudzo dzemaby-elections dzichangobva mukuitwa. Humbowo kubva kuZimbabwe Electoral Commission (ZEC) hunoratidza kuti zvikamu gumi nezvishanu nechidimbu kubva muzana kana 15.5 percent zvevanhu vakakunda musarudzo dzemakanzuru vaive madzimai uye zvikamu makumi maviri nechimwe nechidumbu kubva muzana kana kuti 21.4 percent madzimai akakunda musarudzo dzeparamende. Sachigaro wesangano reWomen’s Coalition, Amai Evernice Manando, vanoti izvi hazvienderani nezvino shuvirwa nebumbiro remutemo. Vanoti izvi hazvirevi kuti madzimai anotadza kukunda vachiti havasi kupihwa mukana yekuti vapinde musarudzo vakawanda. Vakurudzira vemapato ezvematongerwo enyika kuti vatevedze bumbiro remutemo vachiti nyaya yekuti madzimai mashoma mumakanzuru neparamende ndiyo inoitawo kuti nhunha dzavo disagadziriswa nguva dzese nekuti varume havanzwisise matambudziko anotarisana nemadzimai. Mukuru wesangano reWomen’s Academy for Leadership and Political Excellence Muzvare Stabile Dhewa vati zvinosuwisa kuti madzimai akabuda akawanda vachivhotera varume nekuti vakadzi vanenge vachikwikwidza vanenge vari vashoma. Vatiwo vemapato ezvematongerwo enyika vanofanira kupa mikana kumadzimai kuti akwikwidze zvigaro akasununguka. Vatiwo apo nyika yatarisana nesarudzo dza2023 sangano ravo richange richiongorora kuti mapato ezvematongerwo enyika anotevedza bumbiro remutemo here. Rimwe sangano rakapinda musarudzo dzemaby-election reMDC- T inotungamirirwa naVaDouglas rabvuma kuti harina kutevedza bumbiro asi rikati nhasi chaiko komiti yepamusoro yebato iri yaita musangano apo yazeya nyaya dzakawanda kusanganisira nyaya yekuti madzimai apihwe mukana yekukwikwidza musarudzo. Mutauriri webato iri VaWitness Dube vati itariro yavo kuti vazadzise zvinodiwa nebumbiro remutemo pasarudzo dza2023. Mutungamiriri wesangano reLabour, Economists and Africa Democracts, Amai Linda Masararira, vati bato ravo rinotevedza bumbiro remutemo. Vati pavanhu vatanahatu vakakwikwidza vakamirira bato ravo pamaby-election, vashanu vavo vaive madzimai nemurume mumwe. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kubato ririkutonga reZanu PF kuti sei risiri kutevedza bumbiro pakusarudza nhengo dzeparamende nemakanzuru sezvo mushandi mukuru muchikamu chekuburitswa kwemashoko mubato iri VaTafadzwa Mugwadi vange vasiri kudaira nhare mbozha yavo. Mutauriri webato reCitizens Coalition for Change iro rakakunda musarudzo dzemaby-election, Advocate Fadziyi Mahere, vaudza Studio 7 kuti bato ravo rinokurudzira kuti madzimai apinde akwikwidze zvigaro zvese zvigangave zveparemende. Asi vati pamaby-elections havana kuita izvi nekuti vatsigiri vebato ravo vaida kuti vainge vadzingwa vadzokere pazvigaro zvavo. Bumbiro remutemo paChapter 2 chikamu chegumi nechinomwe rinokurudzira kuti pave nemikana yakafanana pakati pevakadzi nevarume asi izvi hazvisi kutevedzwa nevazhinji sezvo pasati pave nemutemo wakanangana nazvo kana kuti Act of Parliament inomakidza kuti zviitwe. Constitutional Amendment Number 2 inosungirawo kuti zvigaro makumi matatu kubva muzana mumakanzuru ese zvinofanira kunge zviri zvemadzimai. No media source currently available
title: Madzimai Ochema Chema Nekushaiswa Zvigaro Musarudzo Dzapfuura

text: Dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzematongerwo enyika dzinoti zviri kuitika kumatare edzimhosva panyaya yeMDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa, zvinhu zvinofanirwa kugarirwa pasi potsvagwa nzira dzekugadzirisa zvinenge zvichinetsa pasina kuenda kumatare aya. Nyanzvi idzi dzinoti zviri pachena kuti MDC yaVaChamisa iri kutambisa nguva nekuenda kumatare nenyaya dziri pachena kuti inonokundikana, nokudaro VaChamisa vanofanirwa kudzokera kuvanhu vakavasarudza vopihwa gwara rekutora, kwete ivo kuita zvemusoro wavo.  Vachitaura zuva rimwe mushure memutongo wakaturwa nemutongi wedare repamusoro muHarare, VaTawanda Chitapi, mukuru weHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica, VaDewa Mavhinga, vanoti VaChamisa vanofanirwa kudzokera kuvanhu vogara pasi vachitsvaga nzira dzinoita kuti bato ravo risapote vachidzokera kumatare. VaMavhinga vanoti zvinenge zvakanaka kuti vari kukakavadzana ava muMDC vagarisane pasi votaurirana kuitira kuti zvinhu zvigadziriswe. Asi VaMavhinga vanoti semaonero avo, pasvika zvinhu pakati paVaChamisa naMuzvare Thokozani Khupe, nevamwe vavo vanoti VaDouglas Mwonzora, VaMorgen Komichi naVaElias Mudzuri, ndepekuti muchato uchibvarurwe zvawo zvachose.  VaMavhinga vanoti veruzhinji vari kuda kuona kuti VaChamisa vachaenda here kukongiresi ichadaidzirwa naMuzvare Khupe kana kuti vachangoenderera mberi vachidhonza nekwavo kana kutobuda nebato idzva risineyi nezita rekuti MDC. Vachipa mutongo wavo neChishanu, VaChatapi vakarasa nyaya yakapinzwa mudare naVaCharlton Hwende nevamwe vavo vachiti MDC Alliance harisi bato ringamiswa mudare sezvo risina kugadzwa zviri pamutemo. VaHwende nevamwe vavo vaida kuti dare rimise Muzvare Khupe kudzinga nhengo dzeMDC Alliance muparamende - izvo zvakaramba kutambirwa naVaChitapi vachiti MDC Alliance harisi bato riri pamutemo. Vachitaura mushure memutongo waVaChitapi, munyori mukuru weMDC-T, VaDouglas Mwonzora, vakaudza Studio7 kuti chinangwa chavo hachisi chekudzinga nhengo muparamende, asi kuti vanozotora matanho aya kunhengo dzinenge dzatyora mitemo yebato. Asi mutauriri mutsva weMDC yaVaChamisa, Muzvare Fadzai Mahere, vakaudzawo Studio7 kuti "simba rehove riri mumvura" nokudaro vachadzokera kuvanhu kunopihwa gwara rekutora. Kudzokera kuvanhu ndiko kuri kukurudzirwa naVaMavhinga senzira yekupedza bopoto ranetsa muMDC kwemakore maviri kubva zvakashaya mutungamiri webato iri wekutanga, VaMorgan Tsvangirai, muna Kukadzi 2018. No media source currently available
title: VaChamisa Vokurudzirwa Kudzokera kuVanhu Zvichitevera Mutongo waVaChitapi

text: Mutungamiri weBotswana, VaMokgweetsi Masisi, vanoti havasi kukwanisa kuenda kumusangano we Extraordinary SADC Troika Summit kuMaputo nemusi weChina uko vange vachifanira kuzeya nezvehondo iri munyika iyi nemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa uye mutungamiri weSouth Africa VaCyril Ramaphosa. Izvi zvinotevera dando ravo rekumbozvitsaura paruzhinji mushure mekunge chipangamazano chavo chabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19. VaMasisi ndivo sachigaro weSADC Troika uye vanoti havafunge kuti vari munjodzi. Mumashoko kuvatori venhau bazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko muBotswana rati mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaSlumber Tsogwane, ndivo vave kutarisirwa kumirira Botswana pamusangano uyu. SADC mumashoko kuvatori venhau inoti vatungamiri ava vari kuzeya nyaya yekuti vobatsira sei Mozambique muhondo iri mudunhu reCabo Delgado iro riri kurwiswa nechikwata chinopfurikidza mwero chichitsigira Islamic State. Chikwata ichi chamanikidza kambani yemafuta yeTotal kuti imire kuita basa sezvo musisina kugadzikana nenyaya yehondo. Zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kushanda mudunhu iri. Chimwe chizvarwa, VaNyasha Mugwagwa, vakatourayiwa neISIS. Nemusi weChitatu makurukota ehurumende anoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika kusanganisira VaFredrick Shava vachimirira Zimbabwe ange ari mumusangano uye achatura zvisungo zvavo kuvatungamiri venyika. SADC yakatobuda nechisungo chekuti itumire chikwata chemauto kunoona kuti ingapindire sei muhondo iyi. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika, VaJoy Mabenge, vanoti zvange zvakakosha kuti vatungamiri vose kusanganisira VaMasisi vaneg vari pamusangano uyu sezvo Botswana iri imwe nyika ine mabhesi anokwanisa kushandiswa neSADC kurwisa ISIS kana pakatenderanwa kuti mauto apindire. United Nations inoti vanhu vanodarika zviuru mazana manomwe vakatiza misha yavo vahityira hupenyu hwavo mudunhu reCabo Delgado. No media source currently available
title: Mutungamiri weBotswana Otadza Kuenda kuMusangano weSADC kuMaputo neNyaay yeCovid-19

text: Boka reHurumende rinoona nezvemvura reZimbabwe National Water Authority, ZINWA rinoti rakatanga kuvharira mvura vanhu vane zvikwereti zvaro, senzira yekuti rikwanise kuwana mari yayo inodarika mamiriyoni zana nemakumi mana emadhora. Mukuru wezvekushambadzwa nekuetengeserana muZINWA, Amai Marjorie Munyonga vakazivisa neChipiri kuti boka ravo rakanga rave kuzotora danho iri sezvo vanhu nemakambani vasiri kubhadhara zvikwereti zvavo, izvo zviri kuzoita kuti ZINWA ikundikanewo kuzogadzirisa michina yayo. Asi vakati varimi vari pasi pechirongwa chehurumende cheCommand Agriculture havasi kuzovharirwa mvura sezvo vachitarisirwa kuzobhadhara mvura yavanenge vashandisa mukupera kwemwaka wekurima. Pamari iyi, mamiriyoni makumi matatu emadhora inonzi chikwereti chiri mumakanzuru, kuchitiwo imwe imari yezvikwereti zvine mapazi ehurumende pamwewo nevarimi. Meya weguta reHarare VaBernard Manyenyeni vaudza Studio 7 kuti kanzuru yavo haisati yanzwa nezvedanho reZINWA iri. Asi mukuru werimwe sangano rinomirira vagari vemuHarare reHarare Residents Trust, VaPrecious Shumba vanoti sevagari havasi kuzoshaya hope nedanho rekuvharwa kwemvura iri, sezvo ivo vachibhadhara mitero yemvura kukanzuru yeguta reHarare. "Vagari vazhinji havana pavanosangana neZINWA, saka isu tiri kutarisira kuti kana iri nyaya yekuvhariranwa kwemvura kana hondo dzekumusoro ikoko dzine chekuita nemvura, dzinofanirwa kunge dziri pakati pevagari nekanzuru dzavo," VaShumba vanodaro. No media source currently available
title: ZINWA Yotanga Kuvharira Vane Zvikwereti Zvayo Mvura

text: Masangano anomirira vashandi vehurumende anoti haaoni nhengo dzawo dzichienda kumabasa svondo rinouya kana musangano wakarongwa kuitwa nemusi weMuvhuro pakati pemakurukota ehurumende, gavhuna weReserve Bank pamwe nevamiriri vevashandi ukatadza kubuda nechisungo panyaya yavo yemihoro. Izvi zvinotevera kukundikana kubuda nechisungo kwemusangano wekuzeya kuendeswa mberi kwemihoro yevashandi vehurumende wakaitwa nezuro muHarare, apo vashandi vakaramba kutambira danho iri vachiti vanoda kuwana mari dzavo dzemihoro mwedzi uno usati wapera. Munyori mukuru wesangano revarairidzi reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaRaymond Majongwe vanoti kunyange hazvo hurumende yakazivisa kuti yakanga ichi netsekana kuwana mari, havasi kuzotambira chivimbiso chehurumende chekuti vaizowaniswa mihoro yavo yemwedzi waChikumi naChikunguru munaChikunguru makare. Mutungamiri weCollege Lecturer Association of Zimbabwe VaDavid Dzatsunga vanoti havasi kuzotambira tsananguro yehurumende yekuti iendese mberi mazuva emihoro yavo. Ukuwo, sangano reZimta rinoti nhengo dzaro dzichabuda nechisungo mushure mekunzwa zvinenge zvabuda mumusangano uchaitwa nemuvhuro. Asi mutungamiri wesangano iri vaRichard Gundani vanoti zvinenge zvonetsa kuti varairidzi varambe vachienda kumabasa ivo vasina mari dzekufambisa kana kudya. Musangano wemusi weChitatu uyu wakapindwa nemakurukota anoti Amai Prisca Mupfumira vebazi rezvevashandi, VaPatrick Chinamasa vebazi rezvehupfumi, VaDavid Parirenyatwa vebazi rezvehutano, Doctor John Mangudya vanove gavhuna veRBZ, vatungamiri veboka reCivil Service Commission pamwe nevamiriri vevashandi vakabatana vari pasi peApex Council. Nekukundikana kwayo kuwana mari, hurumende yakaendesa mberi mihoro yevanhandi vayo. Mauto ave kutarisirwa kuwana mari dzawo musi wa 27 mwedzi uno, kuchitiwo mapurisa musi wa 30, varairidzi musi wa 7 mwedzi unouya kwozoti vebazi rezvehutano pamwe nevamwe vashandi vehurumende vose vozotambira musi wa 14 mwedzi unouya. No media source currently available
title: Masangano eVashandi veHurumende Oronga Kukanda Mapadza Pasi Svondo Rinouya

text: Mutongi wedare ramejasitiriti muHarare azivisa kuti achazopa mutongo wake nemusi weChishanu panyaya yemunyori mukuru wesangano revakarwa hondo reZimbabwe National Liberation War Veterans Associations, ZNLWVA, VaVictor Matemadanda. VaMatemadanda vari kupomerwa mhosva yekuzvidza mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, mudzimai wavo, Amai Grace Mugabe, pamwe nekuda kukonzera kusagadzikana munyika. Gweta riri kumirira VaMatemadanda, Amai Beatrice Mtetwa, vaudza vatori venhau kuti mutongi ati anoda nguva yekutarisisa zvakapirwa kudare asati apa mutongo wake. Asi Amai Mtetwa vaudzawo nhepfenyuro yeCommunity Radio Harare panze pedare ramejasitiriti kuti havatarisiri kufadzwa nemutongo uchapiwa neChishanu uyu, kana vakatarisa imwe nyaya yakafanana naiyoyi yavari kumirira yaVaEnergy Mutodi, avo vakarambirwa nedare kuti nyaya yavo iraswe. VaMatemadanda vari kuda kuti dare rirase nyaya yavari kupomerwa iyi, vachiti havana mutemo wavakatyora. Mutauriri wesangano reZNLWVA, VaDouglas Mahiya, vanoti sesangano vanoona sekunge munyori mukuru wesangano ravo ari kungoshungurudzwa nenyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika. "Hapana mutemo wenyika unosunga munhu kana achinge ataura nekuda kwemukadzi wemukuru wenyika. handifungi inofanira kuve mhosva," VaMahiya vanodaro. No media source currently available
title: Mutongo paNyaya yaVaMatemadanda Wotarisirwa neChishanu

text: Kwasara mazuva mashoma kuti sarudzo dziitwe munyika, mamwe mapato anopikisa haasi kuzivikanwa neveruzhinji kuti ari kuiteyi panguva ino zvichienzaniswa nezviri kuitwa neZanu PF pamwe neMDC Alliance. Mufundisi Everisto Chikanga veRebuilding Zimbabwe Party vanoti bato ravo riri kuzvizivisa kuruzhinji rweZimbabwe sebato rinomirira zvido zvechitendero. Vanoti bato ravo rinoda kuisa Mwari pamberi vachitungamidza hutungamiriri hwunorairidzwa nebhaibheri. Vaimbove gurukota remhando dzemoto, uye vari kutungamiririra mubatanidzwa wemapato ari muCoallition of Democrats, Va Elton Mangoma, vanoti vari mubishi rekutsvaga rutsigiro musarudzo munzvimbo dzakasiyana siyana, kunyange hazvo vamwe vasiri kuziva zvavari kuita. Mutungamiri weProgressive Democrats of Zimbabwe, Muzvare Barbara Nyagomo, vanoti ivo vari kuita basa guru riri kushandura hupenyu hwevanhu mudunhu reMuzvezve kuKadoma, uko vari kukwikwidza kuve mumiriri wenzvimbo iyi muparamende. Kunyange hazvo vemapato anopikisa aya vari kuti vari kupinda munzvimbo dzakawanda vari kutsvaga rutsigiro, nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika dzinoti veruzhinji havasi kuona vemapato madfiki aya vachiita zvine mutsindo mukutsvaga rutsigiro. Pachitariswa zviri kuitika muMDC Alliance neZanu PF, veruzhinji vanoti mapato maviri aya ndiwo chete achanyatsokwikwidzana zvine mutsindo musarudzo dzegore rino. Munyika mune mapato anodarika zana nemakumi maviri ari kukwikwidza musarudzo, kusanganisirawo vanhu vakawanda vari kukwikwidza vakazvimirira. Sangano ravana chipangamazano re Mass Public Opinion Institute rakaburitsa muna Kubvumbi richiti dai sarudzo yakaitwa munguva iyi, paishaya munhu anonyatsokunda musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika pakati paVaNelson Chamisa naVaEmmerson Mnangagwa, izvo zvaizoita kuti sarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika idzokororwe sezvakaitika muna 2008. No media source currently available
title: Mapato Madiki Anoti Ari Mubishi Kutsvagawo Rutsigiro Musarudzo

text: Vari kukwikwidza musarudzo vakamirira MDC Alliance musarudzo dzemutungamiri wenyika VaNelson Chamisa vanoti munyika munofanira kuitwa muonera pamwe chuma chemuzukuru panyaya yekuti sarudzo dziitwe pachena. Vachitaura neStudio 7, VaChamisa vati mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa handivo chete vane simba rekumisa sarudzo sematauriro avari kufamba vachiita pakutsvaga rutsigiro. Vati pakaita sungawirirano pasarudzo vanhu vanotambira zvinenge zvabuda musarudzo dzacho. VaChamisa vanoti kusvika parizvino havasati vapindurwa neZimbabwe Electoral Commission pachikumbiro chekuti vaite hurukuro pakugadzoirisa zvichemo zvavo kusanganisa nyaya yegwaro revavhoti uye rekuvhotera. VaChamisa varamba mashoko ekuti vari kutya kukundwa musarudzo vachiti Zanu-PF ndiyo isiri kunyatsobuda pachena nekutya kukundwa musarudzo. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nemutauriri weZanu-PF Vasimon Khaya Moyo sezvo nharembozha yavo yange isiri kudairwa. No media source currently available
title: VaChamisa Vanoudza Studio 7 Kuti VaChakunda Musarudzo Dzikaitwa Pachena

text: Chibvumirano chakanyoreranwa pakati pemutungamiri weAmerica, VaDonald Trump, nemutungamiri weNorth Korea, VaKim Jong Un, chiri kuonekwa nenzira dzakasiyana siyana nemaseneta pamwe nevakuru vakuru muhurumende yeAmerica. Vamwewo vanoti chibvumirano ichi hachina kubudisa pachena zvinofanirwa kuitwa mukubvisa zvombo zve nuclear muNorth Korea. Vamwevo vanoti zvakawiriranwa mavambo ekupedza hurongwa hwezvombo izvi. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika, Doctor Rhoderick Machekano, vanoti hapana chitsva chakaitika, zvikuru kubva kudivi reNorth Korea nokuti zvavakavimbisa svondo rino, ndizvo zvavagara vachingovimbisa pavakataura nemutungamiri weSouth Korea. VaMachekano vanoti havana kunzwa chimwe chitsva kubva kuna VaKim. "Tinoona sekuti VaKim ndivo vane zvavakawana kana tikaenzanisa neAmerica isina chitsva chayakambovimbiswa," vadaro VaMachekano No media source currently available
title: Musangano waVaTrump naVaKim Jong Un Wotambirwa Zvakasiyana

text: Vamwe vedzisvondo vanoti vanotambira nemufaro chiitiko chekuchinjanwa kwemasimba ekutungamira nyika chakaonekwa muZimbabwe svondo rapera, apo vaive mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe vakabvuma kusiya chigaro mushure mekupindira kwemauto. Vaive mutewedzeri wavo vavakazodzinga, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa ndivo vakazogadzwa semutungamiri wenyika mutsva nemusi weChishanu chapera. Mumwe wevechitendero vataura neStudio 7, ndiFather William Guri vekereke yeRoman Catholic Church. Father Guri vanoti mumakore makumi matatu nemanomwe VaMugabe vari pachigaro pane zvinhu zvakawanda zvakatadza kubudirira kuburikidza nematongero avo. Asi Father Guri vanokasikawo kuyambira vana veZimbabwe kuti vasarare nezamu mumukanwa, vachitadza kuita zvavanosungirwa nebumbiro remitemo kuti vaite vachizvisiira kune vechitendero. No media source currently available
title: Vamwe veDzisvondo Votambira VaMnangagwa seMutungamiri Mutsva

text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vakurudzira vechidiki veZanu PF kuti varange vamwe vavo vanowanikwa vachiita zvemhirizhonga. Vachitaura pamusangano wavaita nevechidiki vebato ravo kuLupane kuMatabeleland North, VaMugabe vati vechidiki muZanu PF havafanirwe kuita zvemhirizhonga nekuti bato ravo ndererunyararo. VaMugabe, avo vakwegura zvakanyanyisa, vataura mashoko aya vachiratidza kuneta. VaMugabe vakurudzirawo zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika kuti zvidzoke kuzosimudzira hupfumi hwenyika uho huri kuramba huchienda kumawere. Mashoko aVaMugabe pamusoro pemhirizhonga anouya mazuva mashoma zvichitevera kupiswa kwebhizinesi remumwe wevatevedzeri vemutungamiri weMDC-T, Engineer Elias Mudzuri. MDC-T inoti izvi zvakaitwa nevanhu vanofungidzirwa kuti vatsigiri veZanu PF. Asi munyori wemabasa muZanu PF, VaIgnatius Chombo, vanoti nhengo dzeMDC ndidzo dziri kupisirana dzimba nekuita zvemhirizhonga. Vanoona nezvemisangano yematongerwo enyika mu MDC-T, VaAbednico Bhebhe, vanoti vanhu havafanirwe kutora mashoko aVaMugabe seechokwadi nokuti ivo VaMugabe ndivo honzeri yemhirizhonga munyika. No media source currently available
title: VaMugabe Vanoudza Vechidiki Vavo Kusaita Mhirizhonga

text: Rimwe sangano rinomirira varairidzi reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe (PTUZ) nhasi raendesa gwaro renyunyuto kumutauriri weparamende, VaJacob Mudenda, richida kuti vamise hurumende kushungurudza varairidzi nekuvamisa basa vasina mihoro kwairi kuita senzira yekuvaranga nekutadza kuenda kwavo kubasa kwavaiita vachiti mihoro yavo haivakwanire. PTUZ yange yakaronga kufora kuenda negwaro renyunyuto kuparamende asi izvi zvakarambwa nemapurisa izvo zvazoita kuti vazotuma nhume negwaro iri masikati. Vachitaura neStudio 7 mushure mekuendesa gwaro iri, munyori muPTUZ, VaRaymond Majongwe, vati vanoda kuti paramende ivandudze mutemo wePublic Service Act kuti uenderane nebumbiro remutemo wenyika. Vati kana izvi zvikaitika kodzero dzavo dzinenge dzave kuremekedzwa. Vatiwo chimwe chvanoda kuti paramende iite, kumisa kushunguruudzwa kwavanoti kuri kuitwa varairidzi nevavakuru vezvikoro avo vati vari kumiswa mabasa kunyange hazvo vakadzokera kubasa. Vanoti zvave kuitwa nehurumende zvave kutokanganisa dzidzo muzvikoro sezvo varairidzi nevakuru vezvikoro vave kutya kudzingwa mabasa. Izvi zvatsigirwawo nemutauriri weZimbabwe National Union of Schools Heads VaMunyradzi Majoni avo vati kunyange hazvo vakatora danho rekuti vadzokere kubasa musi wa22 mwedzi wapfuura, bazi redzidzo yepasi riri kuramba richimisa varairidzi nevakuru vezvikoro basa vasina mihoro. Vati kusvika svondo rino pane vakuru vezvikoro makumi mashanu vakamisswa basa. Vati vanotsigira danho ratorwa nePTUZ vachiti nhengo dzeparamende dzinofanira kugadzirisa nyaya iyi nekukasika sezvo dambudziko iri riri munharaunda dzadzinomirira. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwebasa musangano rinomirira makomiti ebudiriro muzvikoro kana kuti School Development Associations and Committees, VaBanny Manokore, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanofara kuti zvinhu zvave kugadzikana muzvikoro. Mutauriri mubazi redzidzdzo yepasi, VaTaungana Ndoro, vaudza Studio 7 kuti varairidzi havafaniri kutya vachiti bazi ravo riri kutarisisa zvikonzero zvakaita kuti varairidzi vatadze kuenda kubasa kubva pakavhurwa zvikoro musi wa7 mwedzi wapera. Asi mutungamiriri weAmalgamateed Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaObert Masaraure, vaudza Studio 7 kuti hapana ongororo inofanira kuitwa nekuti hurumende inozviziva kuti varairidzi vanotambira mari dzisingakwane kuti vaende kubasa. Varairidzi vange vasiri kuenda kubasa kubvira pavhurwa zvikoro uye vazhinji vavo vakadzokera kubasa musi wa22 Kurume mushure mekunge hurumende yavimbisa kugudzirisa zvichemo zvavo pamwe nekuvawedzera mihoro yavo neyevamwe vashandi vehurumende. Varairidzi vanoti vanoda kupihwa mazana mashanu nemakumi mana emadhora ekuAmerica kuti vakwanise kuenda kubasa nekurarama zvakanaka. No media source currently available
title: PTUZ Inosvitsa Gwaro reNyunyuto kuParamende Richida Kuti Hurumende Imire Kushungurudza Varairidzi

text: Mutungamiriri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vanonzi vati hurumende yavo kubva pavakapinda panyanga, yakagadzirisa mitemo nezvikwanisiro zvekuti vekunze vanoda kuita mabhizinesi munyika vagone kuita izvi vakasununguka, vasingatyiri kurasikirwa nemari dzavo. VaMnangagwa vataura mashoko aya vachiparura musangano zvemabhizimusi pakati peZimbabwe neChina, weZimbabwe/China Business Forum muHarare, uyo unonzi wapindwa nevemabhizinesi vabva kuChina vanopfuura makumi matanhatu. VaMnangagwa vanonzi vati hurumende yavo yakazvipira kuchengetedza kodzero dzevemabhizinesi vanenge vazvipira kutanga mabhizimusi munyika pamwe nemidziyo yavo. Muongorori wenyaya dzezvehupfumi,VaMasimba Kuchera vanoti zvakanaka chose kuti vemabhizimusi vekuChina vari kuuyawo kuZimbabwe zvichitevera kushanyawo kwakaita VaMnangagwa nemakurukota avo kunyika iyi. Asi VaKuchera vanoti nyika inozotenda kana yazoona zvichabuda mumisangano yese iyi. VaKuchera vanotiwo mitemo yakavandudzwa mishoma asi kuchine zvimwe zvinoda kugadziriswa zvinoita kuti vemabhizimusi vade kuuya nemari dzavo munyika. Vanoti kuti vanhu vade kuuya munyika vanofanirwa kuziva kuti vanozobvumidzwa kutumira mari dzavo kune dzimwe nyika uye kuti zviri kushambadzwa navaMnangagwa kusangove kutaura chete asi kuti vazadzise zvavanotaura chero muhurumende kuitira kuti shanduko yavanenge vaparidza ionekwe kwese kwese. No media source currently available
title: VaMnangagwa Vanosangana neveMabhizimusi vekuChina Vari Kushanya Munyika

text: Sangano re Zimbabwe National Family Planning Council, ZNFPC, rakaita musangano nemusi weChishanu nevatori venhau vanoshandira masangano enhau akasiyana siyana wekuzeya nekupana mazano pamaburitsirwo enyaya dzine chekuita nezvepabonde. Mukuru weZNFPC mudunhu reManicaland, VaDyson Masvingise, vakati danho rakatorwa nesangano ravo rakanangana nekuti pave nechenjedzo kune veruzhinji maringe nenyaya dzepabonde kunyanya kune vechidiki vangave kumaruwa kana mumaguta.  VaMasvingise vakati hurongwa uhu hwakaitwa nekuda kwekuti pane kuwanda kuri kuita nyaya dzekubatwa nezvirwere zvepabonde kune vechidiki vkusanganisira vamwe vasati vabva zera,. Vakati mudunhu reManicaland vanasikana vanopfuura zviuru zvishanu vakarega dzidzo mushure mekuita pamuviri. Vakatiwo vakaona zvakakodzera kubatana nevatori venhau kuitira kuti vashambadze mashoko echenjedzo kuvazhinji pamusoro pematambudziko anosangana nevechidiki kana vakakurumidza kuita zvepabonde, uye kune vabve zera kuti varambe vachiita zvebonde vakazvidzivirira kuzvirwere kana kubata pamuviri. VaMasvingise vakati kubatana kwavakaita nevatori venhau panyaya yedzidziso iyi kwakabudikidzawo nekudyidzana kwesangano ravo nePlan International, iyo inonyanyoshandira kumaruwa. Amai Beauty Makotore vePlan International vakaudza Studio 7 kuti muongororo yavo vakaona zvakakodzera kuti pabatanwe nevatori venhau kuti vafambise shoko uye kuti vadzidzewo pamusoro pezvirwere zvepabonde nezvinofanirwa kuitwa kana paita hurwere zvemhando iyoyo. "Tinoshanda neZNFPC panyaya yezvenhengo yesikarudzi uye kupa dzidziso kuvana vari pamakore ari pagumi kusvika pagumi nemashanu uye kupfuura. Tinopa zvakare dzidziso yekuchengetedza nhengo dzesikarudzi dzevanasikana vadzichengetedzewo kubva kune vanovambunyikidza kana kuti rape. Saka vemedia vanotibatsira pakushambadzira dzidziso iyi kuvana vari kusangana nematambudziko aya kwavanenge vari," vakadaro Amai Makotore. Munyori mukuru musangano revatori venhau reZimbabwe Union of Journalists, ZUJ mudunhu reManicaland, VaFarai Matebvu, vakati dzidziso yavakawana ichabatsira zvikuru vatori venhau mukuburitsa nyaya dzine ruzivo munyaya dzehutano.  "Ndinoona sekuti hukama hwatangwa neveZNFPC neZUJ hwakakosha nekuti ma journalists anenge onyora nehudzamu uye kunzwisisa nyaya dzavanenge vachiita, saka training iyi ichapa kuti vange vachibata nyaya nehunyanzvi kupfuura zvavaiita kare uye vachiita izvi zvichikwanisa kunzwisisika," vakadaro VaMatebvu. Musangano uyu wakapindwa nevatori venhau vanopfuura makumi matatu vemasangano akasiyana siyana avo vakatenda kuti vadzidzawo zvinhu zvitsva maringe nenyaya dzezvehutano. No media source currently available
title: Vatori veNhau Vorodza Ruzivo Munyaya Dzinobata Zvebonde

text: Meya veguta reHarare, VaHerbert Gomba, vanoti kanzuru yeguta ravo ine hurongwa hwakawanda hwekusimudzira guta mugore rinouya ra 2020, kuburikidza nekuita zvirongwa zvakasiyanasiyana. VaGomba, avo vanova zvakare kanzura veGlen Norah, vanoti kanzuru yavo yakasunga kuti mugore riri kuuya iri ichakwereta mari yakawanda yekuti ivake zvikoro zvepasi munzvimbo nhatu, kugadziridza migwagwa yemukati meguta nekuvaka zvimbuzi zvitsva pamwe nekuwanisa vagari mvura yakachena. Meya vanoti mari yavachakwereta vachaidzosera vachishandisa mari iri kubva kukambani yekanzuru yeCity Parking. Vanoti zvikoro zvavachavaka zvitatu zvinenge zviri zvepasi, sezvo vasingabvumidzwe nehurumende kuvaka zvikoro zvepamusoro, kana kuti secondary. VaGomba vanoti vachaisa zvikoro zviviri kuKuwadzana neBudiriro, vachizoisawo chimwe chete kuHopley. Vanotiwo mugore riri kuuya iri kanzuru yeHarare ichaendesawo mberi hurongwa hwekutarisa vanhu vakazvigarisa munzvimbo dzisina kutarwa nekanzuru, vanenge vasingakodzeri kuramba vari munzvimbo idzi vachibva vabviswa, vanokodzera kuramba varipo vachigariswa zvakarongeka. No media source currently available
title: Kanzuru yeHarare Yoronga Kusimudzira Guta muGore Rinouya ra2020

text: Mamwe emasangano anoshanda akazvimirira anoti sarudzo dzemwedzi unouya isarudzo dziri kuitwa zvisiri pachena sezvo mapato ezvematongerwo enyika ari kupinda musarudzo idzi asina gwaro revavhoti sezvinodiwa pamutemo uye vari muchiuto vachiita madiro aJojina mukomisheni inoona nezvesarudzo. Vamiririri vemasangano anoti Human Rights Watch, Zimbabwe Democracy Institute pamwe ne Institute of Public Affairs in Zimbabwe, vakaudza vatori venhau muHarare nezuro kuti havasi kufara nemashandiro ari kuita komisheni inoona nezvesarudzo yeZimbabwe Electoral Commission, zvikurusei munyaya dzekuburitswa kwegwaro revavhoti pamwe nekushanda kuri kuita masoja muZEC. VaDewa Mavhinga, avo vanoshanda neHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica, vakati gwaro revavhoti ranonoka kupihwa mapato ezvematongerwo enyika iko kwasara mazuva mashoma ekuti dare rinotambira mazita evachakwikwidza musarudzo rigare. Munyori musangano reInstitute of Public Affairs in Zimbabwe, VaTamuka Chirimambowa, vakati ZEC inofanira kutaura chokwadi panyaya yegwaro revavhoti kwete kunyepera vanhu. Mutungamiri wesangano reZimbabwe Democracy Institute, VaPedzisai Ruhanya, vakatsigira zvakataurwa naVaChirimambowa vachiti ZEC yatove muhapwa memauto neZanu PF pamberi pesarudzo idzi vakati kana ZEC ikaenderera mberi nekuita sarudzo zvinhu zvakaita manyama amire nerongo kudai, zvichabuda musarudzo zvichanetsa kutambira. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nasachigaro weZEC, Amai Priscilla Chigumba, kuti tinzwe pamire komisheni yavo panyaya iyi. Asi mazuva mashoma adarika Amai Chigumba vakati komisheni yavo yakazvipira kuita sarudzo dzakachena vachiti komisheni yavo inoshanda yakazvimirira. Panyaya yemauto anonzi ari mukomisheni yavo, Amai Chigumba vakati vanhu ava vakatsvagawo basa sezvimwewo zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe saka nokudaro vane kodzero dzekushandira komisheni yavo. No media source currently available
title: Mamwe Masangano Akazvimirira Oti Sarudzo dzichaitwa Zvisiri Pachena

text: Sangano rinomiririra varairidzi vekumaruwa, re Amalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, ARTUZ, rinoti richaratidzira pamahofisi egurukota rezvemari, VaMthuli Ncube, nemusi weChishanu. Mutungamiriri wesangano iri, VaObert Masaraure, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanenge vachichema kufa kwakaita mihoro yevarairidzi iyo isisina chaichatenga. Vanotizve, nemusi weChishanu uyu,varairidzi neavo vanotsigira zvichemo zvevarairidzi vanofanirwa kupfeka mbatya nhema sezvo uri musi wekuchema kufa kwakaita mari yemihoro yevarairidzi. No media source currently available
title: Varairidzi Vanoti Vacharatidzira muHarare NeChishanu

text:
Komisheni iri kuongororo kuurayiwa kwevanhu nemauto mumhirizhonga yakaitika mushure mesarudzo dzegore rino, iri kuendererera mberi nekunzwa humbowo kubva kune veruzhinji, vakawanda vachiroverera MDC Alliance pamuchinjikwa. Vazhinji vevanhu vanodarika gumi nevasere vakapa humbowo kubva neChipiri kusvika musi weChitatu vakaudza komisheni iyi kuti vanoshanda kumahofisi ebato riri kutonga reZanu PF uye vari kuroverera MDC Alliance mhosva vachiti ndiyo inenge yakakonzeresa mhirizhonga yakaitaika musi wa1 Nyamavhuvhu.

Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika zvakare vari mukuru weMedia Centre, VaEnerst Mudzengi, vaudza Studio 7 kuti pane zvikonzero zvakawanda zviri kukonzera izvi zvakaita sekuti vanhu vari kuenda kunopa humbowo ndivo vega vakanzwa nezvekomisheni iyi. VaMudzengi vati zvakakosha kuti vese vane zvavakaona vaenda kunopa humbowo kukomisheni iyi vachiti komisheni iyi haifaniri kuonekwa nemumaziso emapato ezvematongerwo enyika. Mukuru wePlatform for Youth Development, VaClaris Madhuku, vanoti havasi kufara nehuwandu hwevanhu vari kuenda kukomisheni iyi kana zvichenderana nekushambadzwa kwakaitwa komisheni iyi. Vanoti vanoona sekuti vakawanda vari kutya kunopa humbowo vachifungidzira kuti vanongona kuzoshungurudzwa kana vachinge vaita izvi. Zvichakadai, vamwe vagari vemuHarare vaudza Studio7 kuti vanodawo kuona masoja nemapurisa achipawo humbowo pachena sezviri kuita veruzhinji.
Mumwe wechidiki ati anonzi Tecla audza Studio 7 kuti angafara chose kana masoja nemapurisa akapa humbowo pachena. Mumwewo mugari asina kuda kudomwa nezita ati kana izvi zvikaitika veruzhinji vangatambire nemufaro zvichabuda muongororo iyi.

VaMadhuku vaudza Studio 7 kuti hapana chingatadzise komisheni iyi kukoka masoja nemapurisa kuti azope humbowo pachena sezvo iiine simba rekuita izvi.

Mumwe mushandi wekomisheni iyi asina kuda kudomwa nezita rake sezvo asingabvumidzwe kutaura nevatori venhau audza Studio7 kuti masoja nemapurisa achabvunzurudzwa pachena kunze kwekuti apa zvikonzero zvakakosha zvinoenderana nekuchegetedzwa kwenyika kana kuti national security pachirungu. Komisheni iyi iri kuenderera mberi ichinzwa humbowo mangwana uye inoti izvi zvicharamba zvichiitika kudzamara vese vanoda kupa humbowo vawana mukana. No media source currently available
title: Komisheni Iri Kuongorora Kuurayiwa kweVanhu neMauto muHarare Yoenderera Mberi Ichinzwa Humbowo

text: Bato reMDC inotungamirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai rinoti riri kushushikana zvikuru nehurongwa hweZimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, hwekuda kudzora mutemo unomanikidza munhu anenge achida kunyoresa kuvhota kuti aburitse tsamba inoratidza paanogara. MDC-T inoti ZEC haifanirwe kushandisa mutemo uyu sezvo uchizotadzisa vanhu vakawanda kuvhota. Mashoko eMDC-T aya atsigirwawo nesangano rinoongorora sarudzo, reZimbabwe Election Support Network, ZESN, iro rinotiwo ZEC inofanirwa kushandura mutemo uyu, sezvo uchinyima vanhu vasina dzimba kodzero dzekunyoresa kuti vazove vavhoti. Masangano maviri aya anoti vakawanda vevanhu vanovhota mumaguta vanhu vanoroja kana kuti vana vevaridzi vedzimba, izvo zvichazoita kuti vanetseke kuwana magwaro anodiwa aya. Mutauriri weMDC-T, VaObert Gutu, vanotiwo bato ravo rakatonyorerawo kuZEC richirambawo hurongwa uhwu sezvo huchitooresa mwoyo vanoda kuzonovhota, pane kuti huvakurudzire. Mukuru weZESN, Amai Rindai Chipfunde-Vava, vanoti sangano ravo rakanga rakapa pfungwa dzaro kuZEC richiramba hurongwa uhwu, asi zvinenge zvave kuratidza kuti ZEC haina kutambira pfungwa idzi. “Saka tatoshamisika taakuchiona kuti zvinhu zvatopfuurira mberi zvakutoitwa, apa havana kunge vakatideedza sema stakeholders kuti ndizvo here zvatinobvumirana takawanda,” Amai Chpfunde-Vava vanodaro. Vanoti vanofunga kuti ZEC inofanirwa kushevedza vose vane chekuita nesarudzo, vakaita semapato ezvematongerwo enyika, masangano akazvimirira, pamwe nevemakereke, kuitira kuti vaite muonera pamwe chuma chemuzukuru. No media source currently available
title: MDC-T, ZESN Voshoropodza Hurongwa hweZEC hweMatsamba ePekugara

text: America yawedzera mari yerubatsiro kuZimbabwe nemadhora anosvika mamiriyoni makumi mana nemaviri iyo iri kutarisirwa kubatsira mukuwanisa vanhu zvekudya vakatarisana nenzara. Mari iyi iri kubva kubazi re United States Agency for International Development, kana kuti USAID. Vachitaura pamusagano wavaita nevatori venhau muHarare, mumiririri weAmerica muZimbabwe, Ambassador Brian A Nichols, vati America yawedzera rubatsiro urwu mushure mekunge United Nations yaparura chirongwa chekutsvakira Zimbabwe rubatsiro rwekuti ibude munzara. VaNichols vati mumwaka we2019/2020, America yabatsira Zimbabwe nemamiriyoni anoda kusvika makumi masere nemanomwe emadhora ekuAmerica. VaNichols vati vari kutarisira kuti vanhu vanosvika miriyoni imwe chete vacabatsirwa nechikafu mumatunhu gumi nematanhatu emunyika muno kutanga muna Gumiguru 2019, kusvika muna Kubvumbi 2020. VaNichols vati vanhu vachatengerwa chikafu, vamwe vachipihwa iri mari kuitira kuti vatenge zvekudya pamwe nezvekudya zvinovaka muviri kusvika Kubvumbi wegore rinouya. Vachitaura pamusangano mumweyo, mukuru we World Food Program muZimbabwe, rinova sangano riri kupiwa mari yerubatsiro iyi neAmerica, VaEddie Rowe, vati Zimbabwe yakatarisana nematambudziko anoti kusanaya zvakanaka kwemvura, kuderera kwehupfumi, pamwe nemafashamu eCylcone Idai, izvo vati zviri kuwedzera kutambura kwevanoshaya. Zimbabwe Vulnerability Assessment Committee inoti vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni mashanu vakatarisana nenzara munyika nekuda kwekusanaya zvakanaka kwemvura, pamwe nemafashamu eCyclone Idai akaitika kuManicaland. America ndiyo ari pamberi panyika dzose dzinobatsira vanhu vemuZimbabwe, mungave munyaya dzechikafu, kana dzehutano. Mwedzi wapera, America yakabvisa mamiriyoni makumi mana nemashanu emadhora ekubatsira Zimbabwe nechikafu. USAID inoti ine hurongwa hwekubatsira Zimbabwe kutenga chikafu chinokosha mamiriyoni zana nemakumi matanhatu nemana emadhora ekuAmerica, iyo inoti ichashandisa mumakore manomwe ichitengera vanhu vemuZimbabwe chikafu. No media source currently available  Mune imwewo nyaya, hutungamiri hweMDC hwaita musangano nevatungamiri vekanzuru yeHarare kuti vazeye dambudziko rekushayikwa kwemvura muHarare zvichitevera kuvharwa kwakaitwa nzvimbo inocheneserwa mvura yeMorton Jaffray Water Works nezuro nechikonzero chekushayikwa kwemishonga inoshandiswa mukuchenesa mvura. Mashoko aburitswa nemutevedzeri wemutauriri weMDC, VaLuke Tamborinyika, anoti kanzuru yeHarare iri kuedza napose painogona napo kugadzirisa dambudziko iri kunyange hazvo vachiti hurumende haisi kupa kanzuru mari inokwana kuti vatenge mishonga iri kudiwa iyi. Vakafanobata chigaro chameya weguta reHarare, Va Enock Mupamawonde, vaudzawo vatori venhau kuti kanzuru yawana mishonga yemvura huye vavhura mapombi ekuMorton Jaffray ayo aive avharwa nezuro kanzuru yashaya mishonga yemvura. VaMupamawonde vati vari kutarisira kuti vamwe vanhu vatange kuwana mvura nemusi weChipiri. Kanzuru yeHarare iri kutadza kuwanisa vagari mvura nguva dzese, izvo zviri kupa kuti vagari vagare vakachema chema nguva dzose sezvo vasina mvura yemupombi mudzimba dzavo. Zvichakadai, rimwe sangano ravanachiremba reDoctors Without Borders razivisa kuti richachera zvibhorani munzvimbo dzakawanda muHarare kuitira kuti veruzhinji vakwanise kuwana mvura yakachena.
title: America Yotengera Zimbabwe Chikafu Chinoita US$41.9 Million

text: Mutungamiri weMDC Alliance, VaNelson Chamisa, vavhota neMuvhuro paKuwadzana 2 Primary School, vachivimbisa kukunda. VaChamisa vavhota pachikoro ichi apo vanhu vanga vari mumitsetse vabva mumitsetse iyi vachimhanyira kuti vaone VaChamisa ndokuzodzokera havo kunovhota VaChamisa pavanga vaenda. VaChamisa vataura nevatori venhau vasati vaenda, vakaudza vatori venhau kuti zviri kuitwa neZec zvekuti vakatyora mutemo zvinoratidza kuti Zec haizive mitemo yesarudzo. Izvi zvinotevera mashoko aburitswa nasachigaro veZec, Amai Priscilla Chigumba, avo vati vaendesa mazita evatungamiri vaviri vavanofungidzira kuti vakatyora mutemo. Zec haina kudoma mazita evatungamiri ava, asi mumwe mukuru anoona nezvesarudzo, VaUtoile Silaigwana, vakadoma zita raVaChamisa vachiti vakanga vatyora mutemo nekuita musangano nevatori venhau mukati memaawa makumi maviri nemana sarudzo dzisati dzaitwa. Vamwe vevanhu vavhota muHarare ndiAmai Chenai Chikandira avo vanoti vafara zvikuru kuti vavhota vasina dambudziko ravasangana naro kunyange hazvo vamuka mambakwedza kuti vanovhota. Sachigaro weMDCT yaVaChamisa, VaMorgan Komichi, vaudza Studio7 kuti vatambira mashoko ekuti vamwe vanga vachivhota vanga vachipihwa mapepa ekuvhotera akavhoterwa kare. VaKomichi vatiwo pawanikwa imwe nzvimbo yekuvhotera isiri pamutemo pane rimwe purazi riri munharaunda yekwaSeke yanga ine vanhu vakapfeka mbatya dzekomisheni inowona nezvesarudzo yeZimbabwe Electoral Commission, Zec. VaKomichi vatiwo Zanu PF yanga ichipawo chikafu kune mamwe maruwa ekuGokwe uye vati masabhuku gumi nemashanu anga akamirira bato reZanu PF kuGokwe kwakare sema polling agents. Vamwe vatsigiri veMDC-T vati vachaenda kunzvimbo dzvavahotera pachapera kuvhotwa manheru ano kuti vadzivirire kubiririrwa kwesarudzo. Vaimbova mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vavhotawo nemhuri yavo paMhofu Primary kuHighfield zuva rorova nhongonya uye panga paine vakawanda vanga vakamirira kuona VaMugabe avo vasiri kunyanyoonekwa paruzhinji kubva zvavakabviswa pachigaro gore rapera. No media source currently available
title: Mutungamiri weMDC Alliance, VaNelson Chamisa, Vanovhota muKuwadzana

text: Hurumende neChitatu yakazivisa kuti ine hurongwa hwekuvhura zvitoro mumakamba emauto zvinenge zviine mitengo iri pasi kuitira kuti mauto asanetseke kuwana zvaanoda pazuva nezuva, zvakaita sehupfu nezvimwe zviri kunetsa kuwana munyika. Veruzhinji vanonzi vachange vachiwanawo zvinhu izvi muzvitoro zviri kunzi nehurumende ma Silo Shops, izvo zvinonzi zvinenge zviine mitengo iri pasi zvakare. Pamusoro pekuvhura zvitoro zvemauto izvi, izvo zvinonzi ma garrison shops muChirungu, hurumende yakazivisawo kuti ine hurongwa hwekuti inge ichiumba homwe yemari ichange ichipindwa nevashandi vehurumende vanoda zvavo, yeMutual Savings Fund. Hurumende inoti iyo ichaisa zana remamiriyoni emadhora muhomwe iyi, vashandi vachiisawo zvikamu zviviri nezviga zvishanu kubva muzana zvemihoro yavo, kana kuti 2.5%. Homwe iyi inonzi inozobatsira vashandi vanenge vapinda ava kuburikidza nekuvakweretesa mari yavanozobhadhara yabereka nezvikamu zvishoma. shoma kana zvichienzaniswa nevamwe vanokweretesa mari kana vanoita zvechimbadzo. Asi hurongwa hwehurumende huviri uhwu hwakoka mhepo yakaipa kubva kumasangano evashandi pamwe nevanhuwo zvavo vari kuti hurumende haifanirwe kungotora mari kubva kuvashandi ichiita madiro aJojina. Mumwe wevari kushora izvi ibato rinopikisa reMDC, iro rinoti hazvisati zvamboitwa munhoroondo yenyika zvekuti mushandirwi anoti vamwe vashandi vabatsire nemari yekupa mumwe mushandi. Munyori anoona zvevashandi nemabasa muMDC, VaGideon Shoko, vanoti hurumende haifanirwe kupindira munyaya dzekuumbwa kwehomwe dzemari nevashandi. Vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kugara pasi nemasangano evashandi akaita seApex Council, kwete kuda kupinza maoko ayo muhomwe dzevashandi, avo gara vachitambira mari shoma nechakare. Panyaya yekuti kuchave nezvitoro zvemauto, VaShoko vanoti iyi inzira yekuda kupatsanura vashandi kuti vasawirirane. Asi nhengo yeZanu PF vari munyori anoona nezvedzidzo mudunhu reHarare, VaGilbert Muponda, vanoti vanhu vari kushoropodza hurongwa uhwu havana kunzwisisa zvakakwana nezvahwo. VaMuponda vanoti hapana chakaipa kuti hurumende ibatsire vashandi vayo, uye chinofanirwa kunzwisiswa nevanhu ndechekuti vashandi vanopinda muchirongwa chehomwe yemari ndevanenge vachida zvavo. Panyaya yezvitoro zvemauto, VaMuponda vanoti hapana chitsva apa nekuti hurumende yakagara ichibatsira mauto nekuapa chikafu nepekugara. No media source currently available
title: Hurongwa hweHurumende hweKuda Kuvhura Zvitoro zveMauto Hwoshoropodzwa neVakawanda

text: Mutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica VaDonald Trump neChipiri vakashora zvikuru nyika yeChina vachiti ndiyo yakakonzera chirwere cheCovid-19. VaTrump vainge vachitaura pavhihiyo kugungano reUnited Nations General Assembly sezvo vatungamiri venyika vakakundikana kuenda kumuzinda weUnited Nations muNew York nekuda kwekupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19 . Vakati China inofanira kutorerwa matanho akaomarara nekukonzera kupararira kwechirwere ichi uye kubatana neWorld Health Organization kunyebera pasi rose pakatanga chirwere ichi kuti i hachaitapuriranwa pakati pevanhu. No media source currently available Asi mumashoko avo kugano iri neChipiri chakare, mutungamiri wenyika yeChina VaXi Jinping vakati vainge vasiri kuda kutanga hondo yemashoko neAmerica. MuAmerica ndimo mafa vanhu vakawandisa nechirwere cheCovid-19 avo vadarika zviuru mazana maviri kana kuti 200, 000. VaTrump vakati America iri pachidanho chepamusoro soro kutsvaga mushonga wekurapa chirwere cheCovid-19. Kunetsana pakati peAmerica kuri kuenderera mberi zvichisanganisirawo pakusagadzikana kwezvinhu kuHong Kong uye kutyorwa kunonzi kuri kuitwa kodzero dzevechitendero chechiMuslim mudinhu reXinjiang muChina. Vamwe vatungamiri vakataura kungano iri vanosanganisira VaEmmanuel Macron vekuFrance uye VaVladimir Putin vekuRussia.
title: VaTrump Vopumha China Huroyi paNyaya yeCovid-19

text: Vakadomwa nehurumende kuti vatungamire bara rekumutsiridza kambani yemarasha yeHwage Colliery, VaBekithemba Moyo, vanogona kutongwa nemhosva yekushora paramende mushure mekunge varambidza mabharani mukuru wekambani iyi, VaAllan Masiya, kuti vape humbowo kuparamende maererano nemashandiro aiita kambani iyi. Sachigaro wekomiti yeNational Assembly inoona nezvemigodhi nezvicherwa, VaTemba Mliswa, vakaudza VaMoyo kuti komiti yavo ine humbowo hwekuti VaMoyo vakarambidza VaMasiya kumira pamberi pekomiti yavo. Vati vane gwaro rakanyorwa naVaMoyo uyewo pane humwe humbowo huchanzikwa neMuvhuro svondo rinouuya hunoratidza kuti VaMoyo vakashorawo nhengo dzeparamende kuti hadzina simba pamusoro pebasa ravo rakavakapihwa nehurumende kuHwange VaMliswa vakayambira VaMoyo kuti paramende ine simba rekukoka ani nani zvake kuraparamende. VaMoyo vakasetsawo nhengo dzekomiti iyi apo vakatai vakatanga basa vasina kana gwaro rekuratidza kuti vainge vapihwa basa. Vakati vari kushandisa gwaro reGovernment Gazette kuita basa ravo uyewo varamba kutaura kuti vachabhadharwa marii pabasa ravari kuita. Zvichakadai gurukota rezvemutemo, VaZiyambi Ziyambi, vakati danho ravakatora rekumutsiridza kambani yeHwange vakaritora zviri pamutemo uye mushure mekunge vagutsikana nezvikonzero zvainge zvataurwa negurukota rezvemutemo VaWinston Chitando. Vakatiwo vese vane chekuita nekambani iyi vachakokwa kunopa humbowo pamberi pemutongi wedare reHigh Court, uyo anotarisirwa kupa mutongo wekuti danho ravakatora riri pamutemo here kana kuti kwete. Izvi zvino tarisirwa kuitwa mukati memazuva makumi matatu kubva padomwa VaMoyo nechikwata chavo. Asi VaMliswa zviri kuitika kuHwange zvinoratidza pachena kuti zvido zveveruzhinji nenyika hazvisi kukosheswa. Vati gurukota rezvemigodhi, VaChitando pachavo, vaive sachigaro weHwange Colliery vasati vave gurukota uye matambudziko ari kuHwange aiveko panguva yavo asi hapana kumbotorwa danho rekuti kambani iyi imutsiridzwe. Zvichitevera danho rakatorwa nehurumende, kambani yeHwange Colliery yakamiswa pamusika wemakambani weZimbabwe Stock Exchange uye inotarisirwa kumiswawo kuita basa pamisika yeJohannesburg Stock Exchange neLondon Stock Exchange. Zvichakadai mune imwewo nyaya mumwe mukuru wekumahofisi emutungamiriri wenyika, VaDouglas Tapfuma, nezuro vakaramba kuti vakashanda nemumwe muzvina bhizimisi, VaShepherd Tundiya, mukuvhundutsira nhengo dzebhodhi reHwange. Nhengo dzebhodhi reHwange dzakaudza komiti yaVaMliswa kuti VaTundiya vainge vava tyityidzira vakatoenda navo kuState House uko vakanosangana naVaTapfuma. Asi nezuro VaTundiya vakaramba kuti vakakoka nhengo dzebhodhi reHwange KuState House vachiti sachigaro vebhodhi reHwange Amai Muskwe ndivo vainge vakumbira kubatsirwa kunoona mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa. Asi Amai Muskwe vataura kuti VaTundiya ndivo vainge vava vofenera vachiti vaida kuonekwa nemutungamiri wenyika Nhengo dzekomiti iyi dzayambira VaTundiya kuti havasi kuzobvumidzwa kushandisa zita remutungamiriri mumabasa avo. Vatiwo zviripa chena kuti VaTundiya havasi kutaura chokwadi. Mumiriri weBikita West VaElias Musakwa ndemumwe akataurira VaTundiya kuti vanofanira kutaura chokwadi kwete kunyepera paramende. VaMliswa vatiwo komiti yavo iri kuda kuchenura zita remutungamiriri wenyika. Komiti iyi yakaita chisungo chekuti VaTundiya vauye zvekare kudare iri nemusi weMuvhuro unotevera vakagadzirira kupindira mubvunzo yese ine chekuita nemashandire avaiita nekambani yeHwange. VaMliswa vakati komiti yavo iri kuongorora nyaya yeHwange nekuti inoda kuona kuti zvido zvevashandi zvachengetedzwa uye kuti kambani iyi yatanga kushanda zvakare kuti ibatsire nyika.
