Hurumende ine zvikamu makumi matatu nezvinomwe mukambani yeHwange kozotiwo vamwe zviuru zvina ndivo vane zvimwe zvikamu zvasara mukambani iyi. Kambani iyi ine zvikwereti zvinodarika mamiriyoni mazana mana uye danho rakatorwa nehurumende rinoreva kuti haigoni kusungiswa nekuda kwezvikwereti izvi. No media source currently available
title: Mukuru weHwange Colliery Opomerwa Mhosva Yekuzvidza Dare reParamende

text: Nyika ichange yakavharwa kwemazuva makumi maviri nerimwe chete kubva neMuvhuro senzira yekuedza kurwisa kupararira kwechirwere che Coronavirus, icho chabata vanhu vanomwe muZimbabwe, pamwe nekuuraya munhu mumwe chete. Danho rakatorwa nehurumende iri rIri kutambirwa nevakawanda, asi rasiya vamwe vachichema. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vakazivisa neChishanu manheru kuti hapana achabvumidzwa kubuda mumba make kuenda kubasa kusara kwevashandi vemuzvipatara vanenge vachishanda kurwisa chirwere cheCoronavirus pamwe nevakuru-vakuru vemamwe mapazi ehurumende. Danho rehurumende iri rarumbidzwa nemutungamiri webato reMDC, VaNelson Chamisa, vachiti hurumende yaita zvavaga vachikurudzira kuitira kuti chirwere cheCoronavirus chisarambe chichipararira munyika. Mutungamiri wesangano revezvitoro reConfederation of Zimbabwe Retaliers, VaDenford Mutashu, vari kukurudzirawo vezvitoro zvakapihwa mvumo yekuvhura mabhizimisi kuti vasakwidze mitengo yezvinhu panguva iyi vachiti sangano ravo richatora matanho akaomarara kune vachawanikwa vachikwidza mitengo zvisina mwero. Kunyange hazvo VaMnangagwa vakakurudzira kuti vashandirwi vabhadhare vashandi vavo panguva iyo nyika ichange yakavharwa, vamwe vashandi vakaita saAmai Mercia Muchichwa vanoshanda pane imwe kambani iri muEastlea muno muHarare, vanoti vatoziviswa nevakuru kubasa kwavo kuti vachabatirwa mari nekambani pamazuva avachange vasiri pabasa zvichitevera danho rakatorwa nehurumende iri. Izvi zvashorwa enmutungamiri wesangano guru rinomirira vashandi munyika reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, kana kuti ZCTU. Mutungamiri weZCTU, VaPeter Mutasa, vati vachatora matanho akasimba kuvashandirwi vanenge varegedza kubhadhara vashandi panguva yekuvharwa kwenyika iyi. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nemutungamiri wesangano rinomirira vashandirwi reEmployers Confederation of Zimbabwe, VaIsrael Murefu, kuti tinzwewo divi ravo sezvo vanga vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo uye vasina kupindura mibvunzo yatavatumira. Mutungamiri wesangano revanorarama nekutengesa mumigwagwa reVendors Initiative for Social and Economic Transformation, VaSamuel Wadzai, vati vari kutambira danho ratorwa nehurumende mukurwisa chirwere cheCovid-19 asi vakurudzira hurumende kuti ibvumidze vanotengesa mumigwagwa kuita basa ravo vari munzvimbo dzavanogara sezvo vachiti vanhu vazhinji vari kurarama nekutengesa pamwe nekuita mabasa emaoko. Zvichakadai, VaChamisa vakurudzira hurumende kuti itaure nedzimwe nyika, vedzisvondo pamwe nevamasangano anoshanda akazvimirira kuti vabatsire veruzhinji nechikafu kuitira kuti veruzhinji vasaziye nenzara panguva iyo nyika ichange yakavharwa. VaMnangagwa vakakurudzirawo makanzuru ose munyika kuti aone kuti abvisa marara mumisha inogara veruzhinji panguva iyo nyika ichange yakavharwa senzira yekuti nyika yose inge yakachena. VaMnangagwa vakatiwo hurumende ichaonawo kuti vashandi vemuzvipatara vachange vari pabasa vawana mbatya dzekuzvidzirira kuti vasabatire zvirwere uye vakatiwo hurumende ichaona kuti veruzhinji vachange vaine mvura panguva iyi. Veruzhinii vaswera vari mumitsetse vachitenga zvokudya segadziriro yekuvharwa kuchange kwakaitwa nyika kubva neMuvhuro. Chirwere cheCovid-19, icho chakatangira kuguta reWuhan kuChina, chauraya vanhu vanodarika zviuru makumi maviri nezvisere pasi rose. Hurumende inoti muZimbabwe chirwere ichi chabata vanhu vanomwe kusanganisra Zororo Makamba, uyo akaurayiwa nechirwere ichi neMuvhuro. Nyika dzakawanda pasi rose dzakatora matanho ekuti veruzhinji vagare mudzimba senzira yekuedza kumisa kupararira kwechirwere ichi, icho chabata vanhu vanodarika mazana matanhatu ezviuru pasi rose. No media source currently available
title: Vakawanda Vanotambira Kuvharwa kweNyika Kuitira Kuti Covid-19 Isapararire

text: Zvichitevera kudomwa kwezuva resarudzo nemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, boka reZimbabwe Election Commission, ZEC, rinoti vanhu vane mazuva maviri chete kunyoresa kuti vavhote musarudzo dzegore rino. Vachitaura nevatori venhau pamuzinda wavo muHarare, sachigaro veZEC, Amai Priscilla Chigumba vanoti bazi ravo rave kuzadzisa zviga zviri mumbiro remutemo wesarudzo sezvo vave kuziva zuva resarudzo. Amai Chigumba vanoti chekutanga ndechekuti vanhu vazive kuti vanofanirwa kunyoresa kuvhota kana kuona kuti mazita avo akanyorwa zvakanaka here kuti vakwanise kuvhota musarudzo dzegore rino. Vanoti mutemo unosungira ZEC kuti ivhare kunyorwa wemazita evanhu vanoda kuvhota musarudzo dzegore rino mazuva maviri mushure mekuziviswa kwezuva resarudzo nemutungamiri wenyika. ZEC ichamira kunyora mazita evanhu vanoda kuvhota gore rino neChishanu svondo rino, asi vanoda kuzovhota musarudzo dzichatevera vanokwanisa kuramba zvavo vachinyoresa. Amai Chigumba vanoti dare rekutambira mapepa evachakwikwidza musarudzo, kana kuti Nomination Court, richagarawo musi wa14 Chikumi. ZEC yazivisa kuti vose vanoda kupinda musarudzo vakasununguka kutora mapepa padandemutande ravo vonyora zvinodikanwa voenda nawo kumahofisi eZEC kwete kungomirira musi wa14 Chikumi. Amai Chigumba vazivisawo kuti gwaro riri kunyorwa vavhoti, iro richapedzwa kunyorwa mavhiki maviri ari kutevera, richapihwa nhengo dzose dzinenge dzanyoresa kupinda musarudzo pachena asi veruzhinji vanoritenga nemutengo wakaderera kana vachirida. Vasingaone vachayamurwa kuvhota nemunhu wavanoda kwete zvaimboitwa musarudzo dzapera zvekuyamurwa nevashandi veZEC vanenge vachivhotesa paine mupurisa. Amai Chigumba vanoti manyepo ekuti vachawedzera nzvimbo dzekuvhotera, kana kuti ma polling station, vachiti nzvimbo 10 800 dzakakwana. Vachipindura mibvunzo mushure mekutaura, Amai Chigumba vanoti boka ravo rine mari yakakwana yekufambisa sarudzo sezvinodiwa nemutemo. Vanoti pari zvino vakawana mari inosvika mamiriyoni zana nemakumi mana nematatu emadhora ($143 million) pamari mamiriyoni zana namakumi mapfumbamwe nemasere ($198 million) yavainge vakumbira. Amai Chigumba vanopedzesera nekuzivisa kuti zvinenge zvabuda musarudzo zvichaziviswa mukati memazuva mashanu vanhu vavhota. No media source currently available
title: ZEC Inotara Zuva Rekugumisira Kuti Vanhu Vachavhota muSarudzo dzeGore Rino Vanyorese

text: Muzinda weamerica muSouth Africa uri kuyambira kuti une humbowo hwekuti pane vamwe vanopfurikidzwa mwero vari kuronga kurwisa nzvimbo yeSandton, Johannesbug muSouth Africa. Muzinda uyu wakurudzira zvizvarwa zveAmerica kuti zvisaende pamagungano kubva musi wa29 kusvika 30 mwedzi uno. Vachitaura nenhepfenyuro yeSABC news, gurukota muhofisi yemutungamiri wenyika yesouth Africa, VaCyrila Ramaphosa, VaMondli Gungubele vati havana humbowo hwavapihwa nezvevanopfurikidza mwero asi vati vanochengetedza nyika vatanga kuferefeta nyaya iyi. MuAfrica mune zvikwata zvinopfurikidza mwero zvakawanda zvinosanganisira ISIS, Al Qaida, Boko Haram, A Shabaab nezvimwe. Chikwata chinodyidzana neISIS chiri kuMozambique chakamboyambira kurwisa South Africa makore maviri adarika ikapindira muhondo yekuchirwisa kuCabo Delgado, kuMozambique. Chikwata ichio chinozivikanwa nemazita akawanda kusanganisira Ahlu Sunna Wa-Jamo kana kuti ASWJ. Vamwe vanochiti ISIS Mozambique-ISIS-M. Vari muMozambique vanochiti zvekare Al Shabaab.
title: America Yoyambira Kuti Vanopfurikidza Mwero Vari Kuda Kuuraya Vanhu Vakawanda muSouth Africa

text: Varwiri vekodzero dzevanhu vakaungana muHarare neChipiri vachirangarira VaItai Dzamara, avo vakapambwa makore matatu apfuura nevanofungidzirwa kuti vasori. Vanhu vanosvika makumi mashanu vakaungana muAfrica Unity Square zuva rodoka neChipiri vachirangarira VaItai Dzamara avo vanonzi vakapambwa nevasori makore matatu apfuura vaimbova mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vachiri pachigaro. VaDzamara vanozivikanwa nekuratidzira kakawanda vachiti VaMugabe vabve pachigaro panguva yavakange vachiri kutonga. Munin'ina waVaDzamara, Doctor Patson Dzamara, vakati ivo semhuri vanoziva kuti mukoma wavo ari mumaoko evari muhurumende. Mufundisi Evan Mawarire, avo vakanga vari mumwe wevatauri pagungano iri, vakati Mwari havafari kana vanhu vachinyangaditswa sezvakaitwa VaItai Dzamara. Mutungamiri webato rinopikisa, Muzvare Barbara Nyagomo, avo vakanga vari pakati pechita ichi, vakati hurumende inofanira kuona kuti mwoyo yemhuri yekwaDzamara yanyaradzwa nekutora matanho akasimba kuti VaItai Dzamara vazivikanwe kwavari. Zvichakadai, Doctor Dzamara vakati vari kudawo kuti hurumende ipindure tsamba dzavakainyorera pamusoro pekushaikwa kwemukoma wavo. Vakaenderera mberi vachiti pachaitwa gungano rakakura kwazvo musi wa9 Kurume rekurangarira mukoma wavo, vachitiwo hurumende inofanira kuita sarudzo dzakachena gore rino, vachiti ndizvo zvimwe zvairwirwa naVaItai Dzamara. Doctor Dzamara vakatiwo hurumende inofanira kuona kuti mhuri yemukoma wavo yachengetwa naiyo hurumende. Vamwe vevaishanda naVaItai Dzamara vakati vachaedza kuti vasangane nemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa nechinangwa chekuti nyaya yekupambwa kwaVaDzamara igadziriswe. No media source currently available
title: Varwiri veKodzero dzeVanhu Vanorangarira VaItai Dzamara muHarare

text: Mutungamiri we South Africa, Va Cyril Ramaphosa, vanoti hurumende yavo haisi kuzopa izvozvi Zimbabwe rubatsiro rwemari kudzamara nhaurirano pakati pehurumende yavo neyaVa Emmerson Mnangagwa, dzapera. Danho iri rinonzi rasiya hurumende yaVaMnangagwa isina kumira zvakanaka, sezvo pange paine tarisiro huru yekuti South Africa ichabatsira Zimbabwe nemari, panguva iyo hurumende yeZanu PF iri kutatarika munyaya dzemari. VaRamaphosa, avo vakatarisanawo nematambudziko munyaya dzehupfumi munyika mavo, vakaudza vatori venhau neChipiri kuti hapana hurongwa hwati hwavapo hwekukweretesa Zimbabwe. Asi vakabvuma kuti nyaya iyi yakataurwa zvakadzama mumisangano yavaipinda vari muZimbabwe. VaRamaphosa vakapinda muZimbabwe neMuvhuro kuzoita musangano weBi-National Commssion nemumwe wavo, VaMnangagwa. VaRamaphosa vaiperekedzwa nemakurukota avo matanhatu anomirira mapazi akasiyana siyana. Asi South Africa inonzi yakakwanisa kubatsira Zimbabwe nemari yekushandisa mukudzidzisa mapurisa pamwe nekutenga mbatya dzekuzvidzivirira munguva yemvonga mupopoto sekurudziro yakaitwa neMotlanthe Commission iyo yakaongorora mhirizhonga yakaitika munyika muna Chikunguru gore rapera. Hazvina kujeka kuti Zimbabwe yakapihwa uri musvo wemari ye 55 million Rands here kana kuti kwete. Rubatsiro urwu hachisi chikwereti. South Africa yakapawo Zimbabwe zvikwanisiro munyaya dzehutano nezvimwe serubatsiro. Gore rapera, Zimbabwe yakakumbira chikwereti che 1,2 billion Rands, asi South Africa haina kukwanisa kupa Zimbabwe mari iyi. Pamusangano weBi National Commission muHarare, South Africa neZimbabwe dzakapedzisa kunyorerana zvibvumirano makumi mana nezvishanu zvakanga zvava nenguva zvisati zvasainiranwa. VaChitaura vasati vasimuka muZimbabwe, VaRamaphosa vakati hukama hweZimbabwe nenyika yavo hucharamba hwakasimba, uye vakabuda pachena kuti vanotsigira nemazvo kusarudzwa kwaVaMnangagwa gore rapera. Vakatiwo zvirango zvakatemerwa hurumende yaVaMnangagwa zviri kuvhiringa zvikuru budiriro muZimbabwe, nokudaro zvinofanirwa kubviswa. Asi MDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa inoti haicherechedzi VaMnangagwa semutungamiri akasarudzwa neruzhinji rwevanhu ichiti mutungamiri weZanu PF uyu akabiridzira sarudzo gore rapera. Asi Zanu PF inoti VaMnangagwa vakasarudzwa zvine mutsindo, uye vakatambirwa nedare reConstitutional Court kuti ndivo vakakunda musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika mushure mekunge MDC yapikisa zvakanga zvaburitswa neZimbabwe Electoral Commission. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rehurumende panyaya yayo yekuda kukwereteswa mari neSouth Africa, sezvo tisina kukwanisa kubata munyori webazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, Va Nick Mangwana. Asi nyanzvi inoongorora zvematongerwo enyika yakazvimirira, uye ichigara muAmerica, VaTakawira Kapikinyu, vanoti gakava rezvematongerwo enyika riri muZimbabwe, rinogona kuva riri iro rakakonzera kuti South Africa iomerwe nekweretesa Zimbabwe mari. VaKapikinyu vanoti sezvo Zimbabwe iri kukundikana kubhadhara zvikwereti zvayo, izvi zvinogonawo kunge zvakapawo kuti South Africa isave nechivimbo chekukweretesa Zimbabwe mari. Panyaya dzezvirango, VaKapikinyu vanoti VaRamaphosa munhu ari kutaura pamire SADC neAfrican Union, nokudaro havangataure zvinopesana nemasangano aya sezvo nyika yavo iri nhengo yemasangano maviri aya. No media source currently available
title: VaRamaphosa Vanoti Hapasati Pave neHurongwa hweKukweretesa Zimbabwe Mari

text: Mutevedzeri wemupepeti mukuru webepanhau reDaily News, VaMaxwell Sibanda, avo vakashaya nemusi weSvondo manheru mushure mekurwara neshuga varumbidzwa nevamwe vavo semunhu aive akazvinipisa uye aigona basa rake pamwe nekufarira kudzidzisa vatori venhau vachidiki basa. Muzukuru waVaSibanda, Muzvare Belinda Chivizhe, vaudza Studio 7 kuti VaSibanda vairwara neshuga izvo zvakaita kuti itsvo dzavo dzitadze kushanda. Vanoti Sibanda vakaendeswa kuchipatara nemusi wechitatu apo hutano hwavo hwakaramba huchidzikira. Muzvare Chivhizhe vaudza Studio 7 kuti VaSibanda vacharadzikwa kumusha kwavo kuZvichemo kuChivhu nemusi weChitatu. Sanganoi reMedia Alliance of Zimbabwe kana kuti MAZ rati rarasikirwwa zvikuru nekushaya kwaVaSibanda richiti munhu aifarira basa rake zvakanyanya uye achifarira nyaya dzemimhanzi nemitambo. MAZ yatiwo VaSibanda munhu akaita basa guru panyaya dzekukurudzirwa kwekuvandudzwa kwemitemo yekutapwa kwenhau munyika vari mumasangano akaita seMAZ, National Editors Forum pamwe neMedia Institute of Southern Africa- Zimbabwe. VaSibanda avo vange vave nemakore anodarika makumi maviri nemashanu vari mubasa rekutapa nhau munhuwo airemekedzwa nenyaya yekudzidzisa vatapi venhau vechidiki basa. VaRegan Mashavave ndemumwe wevatapi venhau anoti akadzidziswa zvakawanda naVaSibanda. Imwe nenhengo yekomiti yeNational Editors Forum, VaBarnabas Thondlana, vatsanagurawo mufi semunhu aive akazvinipisa. Mutungamiriri weZimbabwe Union of Journalists, VaMichael Chideme, vatiwo VaSibanda ndemumwe wevapepeti venhau vakuru vange vasara munyika uye vange vakatarisira kuti VaSibanda vaende kunodzidzisa kutapwa kwenhau mumumayunivhesiti. VaSibanda avo vange vave nemakore makumi mashanu nematatu vakatanga basa rekutapa nhau muna 1994 uye vakashandira mapepanhau akawanda vasati vaenda kuDaily News. Vasiya mudzimai nevana vatatu. No media source currently available
title: Mutevedzeri weMupepeti Mukuru weBepanhau reDaily News Maxwell Sibanda Anoshaya

text: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinosvika makumi maviri nezvitanhatu zviri kuBritain, svondo rapera zvakafamba kwemakiromita zana nemashanu, kubva kuBrighton kunosvika kuLondon senzira yekuburitsa pachena dambudziko renyaya dzekodzero dzevanhu riri muZimbabwe. Rwendo urwu rwakashandiswawo zvakare kupemha mari yekubatsira vari kushungurudzwa nehurumende kumusha. Rwendo urwu rwakarongwa nesangano rakazvimirira rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu reZimbabwe Human Rights Organisation, ZHRO riri kwakare kuBritain. Mumwe wevakafamba ava, VaKingstone Jambawo, avo vataura vakazvimirira, vanoti vakatanga nekuungana muBrighton mangwanani emusi weChishanu, vakazosvika muLondon nemusi weMugovera. VaJambawo vanoti ivo zvavo havana kuzokwanisa kupedza rwendo rwose, asi vanoti padiki pavakafamba ipapo pakavafadza zvikuru kuti vakanga vaitawo bandiko ravo rekuburitsa kushupika kwevana veZimbabwe. Vakatungamira muhuruongwa uhwu, Amai Rashiwe Bayisayi, vanove zvakare mumwe wevanhu vatatu chete vakakwanisa kupedza rwendo rwose, vanoti rwendo urwu rwaive rwakavaomera kwazvo, asi vakabudirira nekuda kwekuti vakanga vangozvipira. No media source currently available
title: Sangano reZHRO Roburitsa Pachena Dambudziko reKodzero dzeVanhu kuMusha

text: Kusawirirana pakati pemapato anopikisa eMDC-T iri kufanotungamirwa naMuzvare Thokozane Khupe neMDC Alliance inotungamirirwa naVaNelson Chamisa kuri kuramba kuchidzika midzi zvichitevera kudzingwa zvakare kudare reparamende kwedzimwe nhengo pfumbamwe dzeMDC Alliance. Izvi zvinotevera tsamba yakanyorwa nebato reMDC-T kumutauriri weparamende, VaJacob Mudenda, ichiti nhengo idzi dzidzingwe sezvo dzisiri kutevera bumbiro remitemo reMDC-T. Kudzingwa kwenhengo pfumbamwe uku kunotevera kudzingwa kwedzimwe nhengo ina dzedMDC Alliance muna Chivabvu, izvo zvasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vadzingwa muparamende hwasvika pagumi nevatatu. Asi nhengo dzeMDC-Alliance dzinoti danho riri kutorwa neMDC-T iri nderekuda kuparadza bato rinopikisa iri, sezvo bato ravo risineyi nechekuita neMDC-T, iyo yakakwikwidza musarudzo dzemuna 2018 sebato rakazvimirira, ukuwo, MDC Alliance ichikwikwidzawo yakazvimirira semubatanidzwa wemapato manomwe. Asi MDC-T inoti hakuna bato rinonzi MDC Alliance asi kuti mubatanidzwa, uyo bato reMDC-T raivewo nhengo munguva yesarudzo. MDC Alliance iri kupomerawo MDC-T mhosva yekushandiswa nebato reZanu PF mune zvese zvairi kuita izvi nechinangwa chekuda kuparadza vanopikisa munyika. MDC Alliance iri kupomerawo zvakare MDC-T mhosva yekutsigirwa nemapurisa nemauto, sezvinonzi zvakaitika apo MDC-T yakatora muzinda weMorgan Richard Tsvangirai, ichinzi yakabatsirwa nemapurisa nemauto. Asi veMDC-T vanoti havana kubatsirwa nemapurisa kana nemauto, asi kuti vakashandisa mutemo wenyika kutora chavo chakanga chapambwa neMDC Aliance. Kunetsana uku kunosiya papi vanhu vakasarudza nhengo dzeparamende idzi kuti dzivamirire kudare reparamende? Nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika, VaRejoice Ngwenya vanoti mutemo unofanirwa kuteverwa asi vanhu vane masimba ekuenda kumatare edzimhosva vachipikisa danho rekubvisirwa vamiriri wavo muparamende. Imwe nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika, VaTendai Reuben Mbofana, vanoti kudzingwa kwenhengo dzeparamende uku kunokanganisa matunhu adzinomirira nekuti dzinenge dzisisina vamiriri. No media source currently available
title: Nyanzvi dzeMatongerwo eNyika Dzopa Maonero Adzo paGakava Riri muMDC-T neMDC Alliance

text: Hurumende inoti nyaya huru nhasi yakurukurwa nezvayo ndeye dutumupengo Cyclone Idai iro rakasiya raparadza hupenyu, zvivakwa pamwe nemigwagwa. Gurukota rezvematunhu, VaJuly Moyo, vati rubatsiro kunzvimbo dzakarohwa nedutumupengo reCyclone Idai rwuri kunonoka kusvika nekuda kwekuti nzvimbo dzakanyanyokanganiswa nedutumupengo iri, hadzisi kusvikika. VaMoyo vatiwo neMuvhuro vakakwanisa kuviga mitumbi makumi mana nemishanu kuChimanimani East vachiti kwanga kusisina pekuchengetera zvitunha nekuda kwekusavepo kwemagetsi. Asi VaMoyo varamba mashoko ekuti hurumende yanga ichiviga mitumbi yakawanda muguva rimwe chete vachiti vakawana vakabatsira kuchera makuva evanhu vavakaviga. Vatsanangurawo kuti mai vamwechete ndivo vakavigwa pamwechete nemwana wavo. VaMoyo vati vaudzawo dare remakurukota ehurumende kuti vatambira mashoko ekuti pane mitumbi iri kuerera munzizi kusanganisira kunyika yeMozambique inofungidzirwa kuti vanhu vakayeredzwa kunzvimbo dzakadai seCopa munyika muno. VaMoyo vati kunyange hazvo pari zvino vanhu makumi mapfumbamwe nevasere vari ivo vari kuzivikanwa kuti vakashaya nekuda kwedutumupengo iri, vati huwandu hwevakashaya huri kuramba huchichinja uye pane vanhu vakawanda kupfuura apa vakarasikirwa nehupenyu. Vatiwo kunzvimbo dzisiri kusvikika masoja ari kufamba netsoka vachiendesa rubatsiro. VaMoyo vati pamusoro pemari yakabva kuhurumende, makambani akazvimiririra ari kubatsira zvakanyanya akabatana nehurumende. VaMoyo vatiwo nekuda kwekuti dutumupengo iri rave kufamba richienda kunyika yekuMalawi, vanhu vari kunzvimbo dzakaita seMutoko vanofanirwa kungwarira. Vatiwo nyaya yemvura yekunwa inofanirwa kugadziriswa nechimbichimbi senzira yekudzivirira zvirwere kunzvimbo dzakakanganiswa nedutumupengo iri. No media source currently available
title: Paramende Inoziviswa Zviri Pamutemo Dambudziko reCyclone Idai

text: Mutungamiri webato rinopikisa reZAPU VaDumiso Dabengwa avo vange vave nemakore makumi manomwe nemapfumbamwe vashaya kuNairobi, Kenya vachibva kunorapwa kunyika yeIndia. Munguva yehondo yeChimurenga VaDabengwa vaizivikanwa nezita remadunhirirwa rekuti “Black Russian” uye ndivo vaitungamira divi rekusora muZAPU mushure mekunge vadzidziswa zvechiuto kuRussia. Munguva yeGukurahundi kuma 1980, VaDabengwa nevamwe vakuru vebato reZAPU General Lookout Masuku, vakasungwa vachipomerwa mhosva yekuda kupidigura hurumende yevaive mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe asi vakazosunungurwa. VaDabengwa vakamboitawo gurukota rezvemukati menyika mushure mekubatana kweZanu-PF neZapu muna 1987 asi vakazobudazve mumubatanidzwa uyu vachidzokera kuZapu…Tichakupai zvizere muzvirongwa zvedu zveStudio 7 nhasi.
title: VaDumiso Dabengwa Vanoshaya kuKenya

text: Murongi wekufambiswa kwemabasa muMDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa, uye vari mumiriri weMkoba muparamende, VaAmos Chibaya, vanyimwa mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso pamhosva yavari kupomerwa yekuita mhirizhonga uye kukurudzira vanhu kuti vaite zvemhirizhonga. Mutongi wedare ramejasitireti muGweru, Amai Charity Maphosa, varasa chikumbiro chaVaChibaya chekuti vabhadhare mari yechibatiso kuitira kuti vagotongwa vachibva kumba. Amai Maphosa vati hapana zvange zvasanduka panyaya yavo kubvira musi weChina apo vakarambirwa chikumbiro chimwe chete pavakatanga kumiswa pamberi pedare, vachipomerwa mhosva yekutyora chikamu chemutemo weSection 187 vachinzi vakaita mhirizhonga uye vakakurudzira vamwe vanhu kuita zvemhirizhonga. VaChibaya vakasungwa nemusi weChitatu uye nyaya yavo iyi ndeimwe yenyaya dzine chitsama dzine chekuita nemhirizhonga yakaitika munyika pashutdown svondo rapera dzakanzi dzichatongwa nechimbi-chimbi. Nyaya yaVaChibaya yakatanga kutongwa nemusi weChishanu vachiramba mhosva yavari kupomerwa yekuti vakaita musangano pamba pavo nedzimwe nhengo gumi neshanu dzechidiki dzebato reMDC vachidzikurudzira kuti dziite mhirizhonga. Asi mutongi wedare akaramba kuti VaChibaya vabvise mari yechibatiso achipa zvikonzero zvine chitsama kusanganisira kuti mhosva yavakatarisana nayo yakakura zvikuru uye vaizogona kukanganisa vafakazi. Kutanga kutongwa kwenyaya iyi kwakambo tsviriridza gweta raVaChibaya, VaReginald Chidawanyika, vachipikisa nyaya yemuchuchisi yekuti vaive nevafakazi vaviri avo vasina kukwanisa kuuya kudare vachinzi vaive vasisawanikwe kwavaive. Muchuchisi aive akumbira dare kuti apiwe kusvika Muvhuro kuti vafakazi ava vagounzwa kudare asi nezuro wacho haana kukwanisa kuuya zvekare nechikonzero chimwe chete chekuti vaive vasiri kuwanikwa. Nezuro muchuchisi akaitazve chimwe chikumbiro chekuti nyaya iyi iendeswe mberi kusvika musi wa28 Ndira svondo rinouya. VaChidawanyika vakazoitawo chikumbiro chekuti sezvo muchuchisi ainge asina kukwanisa kuunza vafakazi vake panguva yaive yakatarisirwa, VaChibaya vaifanirwa kubvumidzwa kubhadhara mari yechibatiso. Vakatiwo kuti VaChibaya varambe vari muhusungwa kwakamirirwa vafakazi vanogona kuve vasiri vechokwadi, kutyora kodzero dzavo. Asi muchuchisi akaudza dare kuti kuchitariswa mafambisirwo akanaka ekutongwa kwemhosva, uye hudzamu hwemhosva yavakarisana nayo, hazvinganzi VaChibaya vari kutyorerwa kodzero dzavo nekuramba vari muhusungwa achiti vange vasati vagara muchitokisi kwenguva inganzi yakareba. Mutongi ati anobvumirana nemaonero aya akati VaChibaya vanogona kukwira kudare reHigh Court kunoita chikumbiro chekubvisa mari yechibatiso. VaChidawanyika vatsanangura kuStudio7 zvaturwa nemutongi wedare uye danho ravave kutora. Zvichakadaro mumiriri weChiwundura mudare reparamende, variwo sachigaro weboka revechidiki veMDC mudunhu reMidlands South, VaLivingstone Chimina, vakarambirwawo neMuvhuro chikumbiro chavo chekuti vabvise mari yechibatiso nemutongi wedare, Amai Phathekile Msipa. Kutongwa kwaVaChimina, avo vari kupomerwa mhosva yakafanana neyaVaChibaya, kuchaenderera mberi nemusi weChipiri svondo rinouya, uye gweta ravo, VaBrian Dube, vati vari kukwirawo kudare reHigh Court Sachigaro weMDC, Muzvare Thabitha Khumalo, vanoti bato ravo rine nhengo dzeparamende nhanhatu dziri muhusungwa, uye vamwe vari kutsvagwa nemapurisa. Vatiwo pane vatsigiri vebato ravo vanopfuura mazana mashanu vakasungwa munyika mose mushure mekuratidzira kwakaitika svondo rapera zvichitevera kurudziro yakaitwa neZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions. Mutauriri wemapurisa munyika yose, Amai Charity Charamba, vanoti vanhu vanodarika mazana manomwe, kusanganisira Pastor Evan Mawarire, vakanga vaungwa svondo rapera vachipomerwa mhosva ine chekuita nemhirizhonga yakaitika munyika kwemazuva matatu. Vamwe vasungwa kusvika pari zvino vanosanganisira mumiriri weMbizo muparamende, VaSettlement Chikwinya, pamwe nemumiriri weRedcliff, Va Lloyd Chikwinya. Vose ava vari mutirongo. Hurumende inoti kuratidzira pamwe nemhirizhonga yakaitika zvakakonzerwa neMDC kunyange hazvo ZCTU yakabuda pachena kuti ndiyo yakadaidzira kuratidzira kwemazuva matatu uku. Asi MDC inoti haineyi nekuratidzira uku, ichitiwo zviri kuitwa nehurumende zvinoratidza kuti yapererwa nemazano. Gweta riri kumirira VaMawarire, Amai Beatrice Mtetwa, vakaudza vatori venhau muHarare kuti zviri pachena kuti munhu wese akasungirwa mumhirizhonga yakaitika svondo rapera, ari kunyimwa mukana wekubvisa mari yecvhibatiso, izvo vakati zvinhu zvinoshamisa pakatariswa nyaya dzemitemo nekodzero dzevasungwa. No media source currently available
title: VaAmos Chibaya Vanonyimwa Mukana weKubvisa Mari yeChibatiso

text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi nevambhizimisi vati nzira dziri kutorwa nehurumende mukugadzirisa hupfumi nekubhadhara zvikwereti dzinofanira kutevedzwa zvakadzama kuti hupfumi hwenyika husimuke nekufambira mberi. Vachitaura pamusangano wekutarisa remangwana reZimbabwe munyaya dzezvehupfumi pamwe nekudyidzana kwayo nenyika nemasangano ekunze anopa mari akaita seWorld Bank, nyanzvi idzi dzati hurumende inotofanira kutora mamwe matanho akadzama pakugadzirisa hupfumi nekubhadhara zvikwereti zvayo zvese. Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube vekuOxford University, kuBritain vati Zimbabwe inotoda hurongwa hwakadzama kudarika hurongwa hweStaff Monitored Program uhwo huri kutungamirwa neInternational Monetary Fund. Mukuru weLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe VaGodfrey Kanyenze vati kunyange hazvo masangano akaita seIMF nenyika dzekunze dzichi uya kuzobatsira, nyika inofanira kuve nehurongwa hwayo hwekugadzirisa hupfumi hwayo. Vati pari zvino nyika iri kutadza kuwana mari kubva kumasangano akaita seIMF, World Bank nenyika dzinobatsira nekuda kwezvikwereti zvisiri kubhadharwa. Vaenderera mberi vachiti itsika yakashata yekuti nyika inokwereta mari asi isingabhadhare zvikwereti izvi. Mukuru weConferderation of Zimbabwe Industries, VaBusisa Moyo vatiwo zvakakosha kuti pave nemitemo inonakira hurumende nevamabhizismisi kuti hupfumi husimuke. Vati pari zvino zvinhu hazvisi kufamba zvakanaka sezvo pasina kuwirirana pane zvinotaurwa nehurumende nezvairi kuzoita. Vanotiwo nyaya dzezvikwereti zvenyika dziri kutadzisa vemabhizimisi kuwana mari nemutengo wakaderera kubva kumabhanga ekunze. Vamwewo vataura pamusangano wanhasi mukuru webhanga guru renyika reRBZ, VaJohn Mangudya avo vati vari kuita zvese zvavanokwanisa kugadzirisa zvinhu munyaya dzemabhanga pamwe nekutaurirana nenyika nemasangano ekunze kuti vachitange kudyidzana neZimbabwe zvekare. Gurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, vatiwo zvakakosha kuti Zimbabwe idyidzane nedzimwe nyika vachiti kana ikaisaita izvi haigona kuwana rubatsiro rwemari izvo zvinoita kuti isabudirire. Mashoko aVaChinamasa ano pindirana neakataurwa paStudio 7 negurukota rezvemaindasitiri VaMike Bimha vari kuItaly ekuti Zimbabwe inoda kudyidzana nemunhu wose. Mukuru wechikwata cheIMF chiri kushanya munyika, VaDominico Fanizza vapindawo mumusangano uyu, vakati zvakakosha kuti nyika ibhadhare zvikwereti zvayo kuitira kuti ikwanise kuwana mari kubva kumasangano akaita seAfrican Development Bank, IMF, World Bank nedzimwe nyika. Musangano uyu wange wakarongwa neIMF yakabatana nehurumende yeZimbabwe. No media source currently available
title: Hurumende yoKurudzirwa Kubhadhara Zvikwereti Zvayo Nemazvo Kuti Hupfumi Husimuke

text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vari kusimuka neMugovera vachienda kuNew York, America, kumusangano weUnited Nations General Assembly, uko vari kutarisirwa kutaura svondo rinouya. Asi rwendo rwaVaMugabe urwu rwuri kukonzera mitauro munyika vanhu vakawanda vachiti VaMugabe vari kushandisa mari yehurumende zvisina musoro panguva iyo nyika iri kutatarika. Vanoziva zviri kuitika vanoti rwendo urwu rwuchadya mari inodarika mamiriyoni gumi emadhora. Vanoziwa zviri kuitika vanoti VaMugabe vari kuenda kuNew York nevanhu vanodarika makumi manomwe, avo vanosanganisira mudzimai wavo, Amai Grace Mugabe, vana vavo, Amai Bona Chikore, Chatunga Bellermine, Russell Goreraza, mukuwashawa wavo, Simba Chikore, pamwe nemakurukota nevamwe vakuru vakuru muhurumende. Mamwe makurukota nevamwe vakuru muhurumende vanonzi vatove muNew York, kuitira kuti vazotambira VaMugabe pavanosvika panhandare muguta iri nemusi weSvondo. Vanhu vakawanda vataura neStudio7 vatsanangura VaMugabe semunhu ane humbimbindoga uye anoda kuguta iye nemhuri yake nyika yose ichiyaura nenhamo. Mumwe anorwira kodzero dzevanhu, uye ari mumwe wechidiki muchirongwa cheMandela Washington Fellowship, VaTerry Mutsvanga, vati VaMugabe vave kuita nyika sekambani yavo. Vatiwo vana vaVaMugabe vaifanirwa kunyimwa magwaro ekupinda mu America nekuti havasi kunoita basa rehurumende. Munyori mukuru musangano rinomirira vadzidzi muzvikoro zvepamusoro, Va Makomborero Haruzivishe, vanoti mari iri kutambiswa naVaMugabe yaikwanisa kubatsira vadzidzi vakawanda nemari yedzidzo pamwe nekutenga mishonga yemuzvipatara. Mumwe mugari wemuHarare, VaEdgar Gweshe, vanotiwo kuita kwaVaMugabe kunozvidza nyika, uye kunoburitsa makaro ane nemhuri yavo panguva iyo nyika yese iri kuchema. Mutauriri weMulti Radicial Christian Democrats, VaSebastian Mubvumbi, vanoti vatungamiri havafaniri kuita zvinhu zvakadai zvinhu zvisina kumira zvakanaka munyaya dzehupfumi. Vanoongorora nyaya dzehupfumi, VaMasimba Kuchera, vatiwo vashamiswa nekuita kwaVaMugabe, vachitiwo bhanga guru rinofanira kutsanangura kuti mari yakawanda kudai yakabvepi iyo nyika isina mari. Mashoko aya atsinhirwa naVaMasimba Manyanya avo vakamboshanda mubazi rezvemari. Vatiwo nemamiriri akaita zvinhu, VaMugabe vaifanira kuenda nevanhu vashomanana senzira yekuchengetedza mari. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura negurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaChris Mushowe, kuti tinzwe kuti sei VaMugabe vari kuita izvi. Vazhinji vati zviri pachena mhuri yaVaMugabe inenge ichitenga zvinonaka nekudya mari yevanhu veZimbabwe apo ivo vanenge vari kumusangano weUN. Musangano wepagore weUNGA unoitwa gore rega rega muna Gunyana, uye VaMugabe nevamwe vavo vakatemerwa zvirango neAmerica, vanobvumidzwa kuenda kumusangano uyu, asi havabvumirwe kubuda muNew York sezvo vachibvumidzwa chete kunge vari munharaunda isingapfuure makiromita makumi mana. No media source currently available
title: Vakawanda Vanoti VaMugabe Havafanirwe Kuenda neMhuri Yavo kuNew York

text: Mumwe mutongi wedare repamusoro muBulawayo ati mutevedzeri wameya weguta reBulawayo, VaTinashe Kambarami, havakodzeri kuve kanzura sezvo vakapinda pachinzvimbo ichi mushure mekunge vabatwa nemhosva yekuba. Justice Thompson Mabhikwa vatura mutongo uyu zvichitevera chikumbiro chakaitwa pakupera kwegore rapera naMuzvare Nomalanga Dabengwa nesangano re1893 Mthwakazi Restoration Movement Trust chekuti kusarudzwa kwakaitwa VaTinashe Kambarani sakanzura weWard 3 musarudzo dzegore rapera, kusendekwe parutivi. Justice Mabhikwa vati zviri pachena kuti VaKambarami vaive vabatwa nemhosva yekuba iyo inoratidza kusavimbika vakati nekudaro havakodzeri kuve nechinzvimbo chehukanzura vachitwo dare haringavhari maziso aro pakadai asi kuti riwone kuti mutemo watevedzerwa. VaKambarami vakabatwa nemhosva yekuba muna Ndira wegore rakapera vakatongerwa kugara mujeri kwemazuva gumi nemasere kana kubhadhara faindi yemadhora makumi masere. VaKambarami vakazokwira kudare repamusoro vachipikisa kubatwa kwavo nemhosva mushure mekunge sangano re1893 Mthwakazi Restoration Movement Trust raisa chikumbiro charo chekuti vabviswe pahukanzura, izvo Justice Mabhikwa vati zvinoratidza pachena kuti vange voda kuyedza kuzvidzivirira. Bumbiro remutemo wenyika rinoti munhu anenge abatwa nemhosva ine chekuita nekusavimbika inenge ichiita kuti agare mujeri kwemwedzi mitanhatu kana kupfuura kana kubvisawo faindi inoenderana nenguva iyi, haafanirwi kupinda pachinzvimbo chehutungamiri. Gweta raVaKambarami, VaMaqawe Mpofu, varamba kutaura neStudio 7 pamusoro pemutongo uyu. Studio7 hainawo kukwanisa kunzwa kuna ivo VaKambarami zvichitevera mutongo uyu. Asi gweta re1893 Mthwakazi Restoration Movement Trust, VaGodfrey Nyoni, vati vafara nemutongo wapiwa nedare. VaNyoni vati VaKambarami vanogona kupikisa mutongo wapiwa nedare kudare repamusoro-soro. Imwe nhengo yesangano re1893 Mthwakazi Restoration Movement Trsut, Muzvare Cora Ndebele, vati vafarawo nezvabuda mudare vachiti izvi zvinofanirwa kudzidzisa mapato ezvematongerwo enyika kuti vasarudze vanhu vakavimbika pazvinzvimbo zvekuve vamiririri vevanhu. Mune imwewo nyaya, dzimwe nhengo dzesangano reMthwakazi Republic Party dzakasungwa nezuro panze pedare repamusoro dzichipomerwa mhosva yekukonzera mhirizhonga kana kuita ruzha runokanganisa veruzhinji, dzinotarisirwa kumiswa pamberi pedare nemusi weChishanu. Gweta VaDumisani Dube vatsinhira zvimwe chetezvo kuStudio7 parunhare. Mukupeta nyaya dzemuBulawayo, muguta iri mange muine mapurisa akawanda zvikuru munzvimbo dzakasiyana-siyana kusanganisira mapurisa ange vari muma water canon. Vanoziva zviri kuitika vaudza Studio7 kuti kuvepo kwemapurisa aya kwange kuri kugadzirira kuratidzira kwaive kwadeedzerwa nebato reMDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa uko kwange kwakanzi kuchaitika mumaguta nemadhorobha akasiyana-siyana kutanga nhasi. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kumapurisa panyaya iyi. No media source currently available
title: Dare Rinoti VaKambarami Havakodzeri Kuva Kanzura

text: Meya weguta reBindura, VaBrian Kembo, vanoti vanhu gumi vari kutyirwa kuti vakashaya mushure mekunge mumwe mugodhi wadhirika paKitsiyatota kuMashonaland Central. Mumwe mugodhi wakambodhirikawo gore rapera muna Mbudzi paRan Mine mudunhu iri uye vanhu vanofungidzirwa kuti makumi matatu vakatsakatikiramo mushure mekunge vatadza kuburitswa nekushaikwa kwemichina. Hatina kukwanisa kubata mutauriri wemapurisa Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi sezvo nharembozha yavo yange isiri kudairwa. No media source currently available
title: Vanhu Gumi Votyirwa Kuti Vakafa Mushure meKudhirika kweMugodhi kuMashonaland Central

text: Vaimbova mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vanonzi vave nemumwe muzukuru mushure mekunge mwanasikana wavo Amai Bona Chikore vabatsirwa nemumwe mwana. Uyu mwana wechipiri mushure mekunge vabatsirwa nemumwe mwana mukomana Simbanashe muna 2016. Asi hapana anoziva kuti muzukuru mutsva uyu mukomana here kana musikana. Amai Bona Chikore nemurume wavo Simbarashe Chikore vave nenguva vari kunze kwenyika kunofungidzirwa kuti kuDubai. Amai Grace Mugabe avo variwo kunze kwenyika vanonzi vakaenda kunogamuchira muzukuru wavo mutsva uyu asi VaMugabe vachisara vari munyika. Vachinyora kuvatori venhau, VaPatrick Zhuwao vakati Amai Mugabe vainge vaenda kunze kwenyika kuno gamuchira makomborero. Asi VaZhuwao havana kutaura kuti mwana mutsva here ari kuenda kuno gamuchirwa. VaZhuwao vari kurambawo kuti Amai Mugabe vane hurongwa hwekupinda munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika vachiti vachaenderera mberi nekuchengeta nherera uye kugadzirisa nhaka yaVaMugabe kuburikidza neRobert Mugabe Foundation.
title: VaMugabe Vave neMuzukuru Mutsva

text: Zvikoro zvavhurwa munyika paine mashoko ekuti hutungamiri hwezvimwe zvikoro hwanga hwuchidzosera kudzimba vana vasina kubhadhara mari dzechikoro kana dzeruvako. Izvi zvinoitika panguva iyo mari dzeruvako itsva dzakatarwa nehurumende dzatangawo kushanda kubva patanga kotoro itsva yegore rino. Bazi rezvedzidzo rakazivisa kuti kutanga temu ino, mwana wega wega ari kupuraimari anosungirwa kubhadhara madhora maviri semari yeruvako, kuchitiwo ari kusekondari achitarisirwa kubhadhara madhora mashanu pakotoro. Hurumende inoti yakatora danho iri senzira yekuunganidza mari yekuvaka zvimwe zvikoro pamwe nekugadziridza zviripo. Mukuru werimwe sangano revarairidzi, reTeachers’ Union of Zimbabwe, VaManuel Nyawo, vanoti ivo sesangano havatambiri danho rekuti vana vadzoserwe kudzimba nepamusana pekusabhadhara mari idzi. VaNyawo vanoti bumbiro remitemo rinoti hapana mwana anofanirwa kudzingirwa mari dzechikoro. “Tichaona kuti tatsvaga tsananguro kugurukota rezvedzidzo, VaLazarus Dokora, nekuti sevarairidzi hatinawo kuudzwa pamusoro pemari itsva idzi kuti mubereki upi anobhadhara,” VaNyawo vanodaro. Ukuwo sangano reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe rinoti rakabuda nechisungo chekuti varairidzi vachange vari muzvikoro, asi vasingaite basa nemwoyo wese, kana kuti vachiita zvavo basa zvishoma nezvishoma. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kubata vakuru vesangano iri kuti tinzwe kuti kushanda pashoma nepashoma kwavakaronga kwabudirira here kana kuti kwete. Studio 7 yakundikanawo kubata gurukota rezvedzidzo, VaLazarus Dokora, kuti tinzwe pamire bazi ravo panyaya iyi. No media source currently available
title: Zvikoro Zvinovhurwa Vana Vasina Kubhdadharirwa Mari Vachidzingwa

text: Mutauriri weMDC-T, VaObert Gutu, vanoti havasi kubuda mubato ravo asi vachakwikwidza muHarare East musarudzo dzichaitwa gore rino. VaGutu vanoti havasi kuzochinja pfungwa dzavo pahurongwa hwekuda kumirira Harare East muparamende. Mashoko aVaGutu anouya panguva iyo MDC Alliance yakawirirana kuti Harare East ichapihwa kubato re People’s Democratic Party. VaGutu vataura izvi mushure memashoko avaisa pa Twitter vachiti havachada kuramba vachimira nebato rinoita zvimhirizhonga. Mashoko aya anotevera mhirizhonga iri kuitika muMDC, iyo yakatanga nekuHarvest House svondo rapera, pamwe nekurufu rwevaive mutungamiri webato iri, VaMorgan Tsvangirai, kuBuhera. Asi VaGutu vanoti vanoshora zvikuru mhirizhonga inonzi iri kukonzerwa nevechidiki mubato ravo. VaGutu vanoti havawirirane nemunhu wese anotsigira mhirizhonga, kana anoda kumira nevanhu vanoita zvemhirizhonga nekuti bato ravo nderevanhu vanoremekedza mitemo yenyika pamwe nekodzero dzevanhu vose. VaGutu vaudza Studio7 kuti: “Handidi kushanda nguva zhinji ndakangotarisa kumashure kuti ndiani ari kunditevera, ndiani anoda kundiponda; pose pawasvika uchitukirirwa dzimwe nguva nezvinonyadzisira nevana vadoko doko vamwe vanotova nezera kana kuve vadoko kuvana vangu; hazvina nechimiro.” America yakashoropodzawo zvikuru mhirizhonga yakaitwa nevechidiki veMDC kuBuhera. No media source currently available
title: VaGutu Voshora Vechidiki Mubato Ravo Vakaita Mhirizhonga kuRufu rwaVaTsvangirai

text: Chikwata cheWorld Council of Churches icho chiri kushanya munyika chinoti hachisi kufara nekudzikira kwaita hupfumi hwevanhu muZimbabwe izvo zviri kukonzera kuti vakawanda varambe vachibuda munyika vachinotsvaga chekubata kune dzimwe nyika. Munyori mukuru weWorld Council of Churches, Reverend Dr Olav Fykse Tveit, vati kuwondomoka kwehupfumi kunoshusha vedzisvondo pasi rose uye vaudza mutevedzeri wemutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, kuti vanotarisira kuti hurumende ichagadzirisa hupfumi kuitira kuti vanhu vagare munyika mavo uye vachirarama zvakanaka. Vachitaura nevatori venhu muHarare, Rev Tveit vati chikwata chavo, icho chine nhengo gumi nenhatu, chauuya kuzotsigira basa riri kuitwa nedzisvondo muZimbabwe zvikuru sei munyaya dzekurwirwa kodzero dzevanhu, dzidzo nezvimwe. Munyori mukuru weZimbabwe Council of Churches, Reverend Kenneth Mtata, vatiwo rutsgiro urwu rwakakosha chose sezvo rwauya nyika yatarisana nesarudzo dzegore rinouya. Vatiwo vafara chose kuti VaMnangagwa vavaudza kuti vedzisvondo vane basa guru pasarudzo zvikuru sei mukudzisisa veruzhinji kuti nyika iite sarudzo dzisna mhirizhonga. Rev Mtata vati hurumende inotsigira mabasa edzisvondo uye VaMnangagwavatenda rutsigiro rwakapihwa nevedzisvondo kuvarwi vehondo yerusununguko. Panyaya yekushungurudzwa kwevamwe vedzisvondo vakaita saPastor Evan Mawarire naPastor Patrick Mugadza, Rev Mtata vati vedzisvondo havafari kana vamwe vavo vachishungurudzwa pamusoro pekurwira kodzero dzevanhu kana kutaura zviri kuitika munyika. Chikwata ichi chinotarisirwa kusangana nevamapato anopikisa nemasangano anoshanda akazvimirira chisati chabuda munyika. No media source currently available
title: Sangano reDzisvondo Pasi Rose Roshushikana neKushupika Kuri Kuita Vanhu muZimbabwe

text: Zvinhu mubato reZanu-PF hazvina kumira zvakanaka kuChegutu East, Mashonaland West pakuti ndiyani ari kukwikwidza akamirira bato pakati pavaWebster Shamu naVaVengai Musengi. VaShamu vaimbove gurukota rezvematunhu mudunhu reMashonaland West vasati vadzingwa basa nemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa pasina zvikonzero zvakapihwa. Mangwana ndiro zuva rekupedzisira kuti vanhu vari kuda kukwikwidza musarudzo vanyorese mazita kuZEC. Mapepa aburitswa neZanu-PF evanhu vanofanira kunoyoresa kuti vakwikwidze ane zita raVaShamu asi pavazoenda kuti vanonyoresa zvinenge zvakona n’anga murapwa achida. VaShamu vakaenda kumahofisi ebato ravo muChinhoyi asi vakataurirwa nevashandi vepamahofisi kuti magwaro avo haasi kusainwa nebato. Mutevedzeri wasachigaro wedunhu reMashonaland West, VaDexter Nduna vakabvuma kuti vasaina magwaro aVaVengai Musengi kuti vakwikwidze vakamirira Zanu PF kuChegutu East. VaShamu vakakunda VaMusengi musarudzo dzainge dziine mhirizhonga yakawanda zvekuti sarudzo idzi dzakadzokororwa kaviri vaShamu vachingokunda. VaMusengi vabvuma kuti mapepa avo asainwa kuti vamirire Chegutu East sezvo zvakabuda pachena kuti vaShamu vaibirira sarudzo. Asi VaShamu vakaramba kutaura nezvenyaya iyi vachiti vakuru vedunhu ndivo vanofanirwa kutaura. Zvichakadaro, Imwe nhengo yakarambidzwa kukwikwidza mumaprimary ebato reMDC-T muwadhi 5 VaMutema Benjamin Mutongodzwa vanoti vaisa mapepa avo ekukwikwidza vakazvimirira. VaMutongodzwi vanoti vari kukwikwidza vakazvimirira nekuti vanhu vakanyimwa mukana wekutsvaka mumiriri wavanoda sezvo kusina kuitwa sarudzo dzemaprimary. Dzimwe nhengo dzemakanzura nedzeparamende dzinoti dzakakundwa zvechitsotsi mumapato eZanu PF neMDC-T dzinoti dzichapinda musarudzo dzakazvimirira. No media source currently available
title: VaWebster Shamu Vorambidzwa Kukwikwidza muSarudzo Vakamirira Zanu-PF

text: Vanochera goridhe munharaunda yeRedwing kuPenhalonga vanoti vazvipira kunyoresa kuhurumende kuitira kuti vaite basa ravo zviri pamutemo, izvo zvinozoita kuti vasagare vakanetswa nemapurisa. Vanochera goridhe munharaunda yeRedwing kuPenhalonga vanoti vazvipira kunyoresa kuhurumende kuitira kuti vaite basa ravo zviri pamutemo, izvo zvinozoita kuti vasagare vakanetswa nemapurisa. Vacheri vegoridhe ava vanoti vane hurongwa hwekunyoresa kubazi rinoona nezvezvicherwa nechinangwa chekuti vazvidzivirire kumapurisa anogara akavanetsa pose pavanenge vachichera goridhe zviri kunze kwemutemo. Mamwe madzimai anosvika makumi maviri nemashanu akaumba zvikwata zvishanu vaine chinangwa chokunyoreswa kuhurumende. No media source currently available Asi madzimai naya anoti haana mari inodiwa yekunyoresa kuti zvinhu zvive mugwara. Vanoti kuti zvose zviitwe, panodiwa mari inodarika zviuru zviviri zvemadhora. Mumwe wemadzimai aya, ndi Amai Lydia Magamba, avo vanoti zvinhu zvikaitwa zviri pamutemo, zvinovanakira sezvo vanenge votengesa goridhe ravo zviri pamutemo, vachiwana mari yakanaka. Amai Keresenzia Chimwanerangu mumwewo wevanoita basa rekuchera goridhe asi vachibva kuHeadlands. Amai ava vanoti vanosangana nematambudziko ekuti nguva zhinji vanenge vachiita hwakiti nagonzo nemapurisa. Amai Chimwanerangu vanoti vanovimba kuti vakabatsirwa nekunyoreswa kuti vaite zviri pamutemo, vanokwanisa kutenga michina yekuita basa rekuchera kuitira kuti basa iri rireruke uye kuti rive nechiremera. Mumwe wemadzimai aya, Amai Shylet Rwodzi, vanotiwo vari kurarama nekuchera nekutengesa goridhe, zvisineyi kuti mari yavari kuwana inenge iri shoma. Amai Rwodzi vanoti chakakosha pari zvino kuwana pekushandira vakasununguka uye vaine zvekushandisa zvakakwana. Mumwe anochera goridhe kuTsvingwe, Amai Munashe Marwa, vanotiwo havachadi kushanda vachitiza mapurisa mazuva ose, sezvavari kuita pari zvino izvo zviri kuvashingisa kuti vaunganidze mari yekunyoresa. Amai Sifelane Zuze vanotiwo sebasa ravajaira, vanoshuvira kuti vachengetedzwe nemutemo kana vachinge vagadzirisa mapepa avo. Vanoti vanoda kuita izvi sezvo vanzwa nekutsotsiwa nevamwe vavanoshanda navo sezvo vachiziva kuti hapana kwavanoenda nekuda kwekuti vari kuita zviri kunze kwemutemo. Mukuru werimwe sasangano riri kuda kubatsira madzimai aya kuti vanyorese kuhurumende kuitira kuti vakwanise kuchera goridhe zviri pamutemo, uye kuti vakwanise kuwanirwa chikwereti chekuti vatenge michina yekushandisa, VaFarai Maguwu, vanoti vari kubatsira zvakare vanhu ava kuti varongekane voshanda vari muzvikwata nezvikwata kuitira kuti vataure neizwi rimwe chete.
title: Vacheri veGoridhe Voronga Kuita Zvinhu Zviri paMutemo

text: Kiriniki yekanzuru iri mumusha weMbare yeEdith Opperman inonzi yave diki zvakanyanya pachitarisiwa huwandu hwevanhu vanobatsirwa panzvimbo iyi, Kanzuru yavimbisa kuti ichagadzirisa dambudziko iri. Vachitaura mushure mekushanyira kirinika iyi nhasi kunobatsirwa avo vanenge vakazvitakura, Meya weguta reHarare vaJacob Mafume vati kiriniki iyi iri kubatsira vanhu vakawanda zvakanyanya vakati vanoshushikana nemadzimai akazvitakura anenge akamanikidzirana mukamuri imwe chete. VaMafume vati sekanzuru vachaona kuti kiriniki iyi yavandudzwa kuburikidza nekushandisa zvivakwa zvekanzuru zviri pedyo nekirinika iyi zve Carter nePaget House. Vati zvivakwa izvi zviri kushandiswa nevanhu vasina chavari kubvisa kukanzuru, dzinofungidzirwa kuti inhengo dzebato reZanu PF dzinogaropomherwa mhosva yekushandisa zvivakwa zvekanzuru zvisiri pamutemo zvichitora mari. Asi bato iri rinoti riri kuzorwa mafuta enguruve yarisina kudya. Mukoti mukuru anoona nezvekirika iyi pamwe nemamwe makirinika ekanzuru kumusha weHopley, Waterfalls, Hatfield Arcadia neSunningdale Amai Lorraine Mukwemu vati vanoona vanhu vanosvika zvuru zvina pamwedzi wega wega uyewo pakirinika apa panobatsirirwa vana vanodarika mazana mashanu pamwedzi. VaChuckie Makaza vanova sachigaro wekomiti inomiririra vagari munyaya dzezvehutano vatambira nemufaro mashoko aVaMafume ekuvandudza kirinika iyi. Amai Linda Sherekete mugari wemuMbare avo vachangobatsirwa vanga vauya nemwana kukirinika vabvumawo nzvimbo iyi yave kuda kuvandudzwa. VaMafume vashanyirawo kirinika yeNazareth pamwe neyeMabvuku vachiti ishuviro yavo kuvandudza makirinika ekanzuru kuti avewo nemichina yechizvino zvino nepekugara pevarwere pakanaka. Vati vanoda kuti vanhu vave nehutano hwakanaka vachiti izvi zvinogoneka. No media source currently available
title: Kanzuru yeHarare Yoronga Kutora Zvivakwa "Zvakapambwa" neveZanu-PF Kuti Iwedzere Kiriniki yekuMbare

text: VaObert Gutu, avo vanoti ndivo mutauriri we MDC-T, kunyange hazvo bato ravo richiti rakambovamisa basa, vanoti vakarwiswa muBulawayo neSvondo nevanhu vanotsigira chikwata chiri mubato ravo, icho chiri kupikisa mumwe wevatevedzeri vemutungamiri webato, Doctor Thokozani Khupe. Mhirizhoinga iyi yakaona vanhu vanodarika gumi nevashanu vachikuvadzwa, vamwe vakaendeswa kunorapwa kuzvipatara. Motokari dzakapwanywa nematombo pamwe nezvidhinha. Mhirizhonga iyi yakazopera zvichitevera kusvika kwakaita mapurisa anodzivirira mvongamupopoto. VaGutu vanoti ivo nevamwe vavo vanosanganisira Muzvare Khupe, havana kuenda kumusangano wekuChinhoyi weMDC Alliance nekuti vakange vane musangano wavo weMDC-T kuBulawayo wekuzeya zviri kunetsa mubato iri. No media source currently available
title: VaGutu Vanoti Ndivo Vachiri Mutauriri weMDC-T

text: Zimbabwe iri kuita musangano mukuru wemhuka dzemusango we Africa Wildlife Economy Summit kuVictoria Falls kutanga musi wa23 kusvika 25 Chikumi. Musangano uyu uri kukokerwa neUnited Nations neAfrican Union. Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa ndivo vari kutarisirwa kuparura musangano uyu zviri pamutemo. Gurukota rinoona nezvezviwanikwa Amai Priscah Mupfumira vaudza Studio 7 kuti nyika dzinosvika makumi matatu dziri kutarisirwa kupinda mumusangano uyu. Amai Mupfumira vanoti Zimbabwe iri kudawo kuti ibvumidzwe kutengesa nyanga dzenzou vachiti dzawandisa. Asi dzimwe nyika dziri kutsika madziro dzichiti kutengesa nyanga idzi kunozopa vanovhima zvisiri pamutemo kuti vatoita madiro aJojina sezvo vanenge vaine musika wekutengesa nyanga idzi. No media source currently available
title: Zimbabwe Yoiita Musangano Mukuru weKuchengetedza Mhuka muAfrica

text: Dambudziko remafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari rinonzi riri kuramba richiwedzera munyika kunyange hazvo gurukota rezvemhando dzemhoto, VaJoram Gumbo, vari kuti munyika mune mafuta akawanda. VaGumbo vazivisa kuti munyika mune mafuta akawanda akachengeterwa kumatangi ekuMabvuku nevanotengesa mafuta vakazvimirira, asi anoda mari yekunze yekuti abhadharwe. Vanoti zvinhu zvakamboreruka mazuva adarika mushure mekunge vabvumidzwa nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, kushandisa mafuta aive mumatura avo, ayo aive akachengeterwa nguva dzechimbichimbi. Dambudziko remafuta iri riri kuwedzera panguva iyo kambani yemagetsi yeZimbabwe Electricity Transmission and Distribution yakazivisawo nemusi weChina kuti magetsi angangonetsa munyika sezvo mvura yadzikira zvakanyanya kudhamu reKariba kunogaiwa magetsi. Kambani iyi inoti dambudziko iri riri kuwedzerwawo nekusashanda zvakanaka kwemagwenya anoshanda nemarasha sezvo achembera, izvo zvave kuderedza huwandu hwemagetsi anogaiwa. VaGumbo vanoti zvakare hurumende ichawedzera huwandu hwemagetsi airi kutenga kubva kuMozambique, uye ine hurongwa hwekuwedzerawo moto unobva muzuva. Nyanzvi mune zveupfumi, VaJohn Mufukare, avo vanoti vaswerawo vari mumutsetse wekutsvaga mafuta, vanoti dambudziko iri riri kudzorera kumashure budiriro mumakambani sezvo vashandi vave kuswera vari mumitsetse vachitsvaga mafatu edzimotokari. VaMufukare vanoti kushaikwawo kwemagetsi kunorevawo zvakare kuti dambudziko remafuta richatowedzera, sezvo vanhu vanenge voshandisa dhiziri nepeturu zvakawanda kuti vakwanise kushandisa majenareta mukugaya magetsi. No media source currently available Asi gavhuna veReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, Doctor John Mangudya, vanoti nyika haina dambudziko remafuta mushure mekunge bhanga ravo radira mari inoita mamiriyoni makumi mashanu emadhora emari yekuAmerica kuburikidza ne avanoti ma letters of credit, yekutenga mafuta. Doctor Mangudya vanoti mari iyi ichawanisa nyika mafuta anosvika marita mamiriyoni makumi masere nemashanu, ayo anokwana masvondo maviri, panguva imwecheteyo mamwe mafuta anenge achibhadharirwa. No media source currently available
title: Mafuta eDzimotokari Oramba Achinetsa, Hurumende Ichiti Nyika Haina Dambudziko

text: Sangano reZimbabwe Peace Project kana kuti ZPP rinoti mhirizhonga iri kuenderera mberi mubato reZanu-PF pakati pevanonzi vanotsigira mutungamiri webato iri VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vanozivikanwa nekuti Team Lacoste nevaitsigira chikwata chakadzingwa chainzi chaitsigira Amai Grace Mugabe cheGeneration 40. Vanofungidzirwa kuti ndeveG40 vanonzi vari kunyimwa chikafu uye kutyisidzirwa. Nyaya yesarudzo dzemaprimary elections inonziwo iri kukonzera kunetsana kunotyisa zviri kupa kuti zvinhu zvisagadzikane. ZPP iri kukurudzira vatungamiri vemapato ezvematongerwo enyika kuti vamise mhirizhonga iyi. Ongororo iyi yakatarisa mwedzi waZvita na Ndira ikaona kuti mhirizhonga iri kuwedzera. Mukuru weZPP Muzvare Jestina Mukoko vanoti vakuru vemapato ezvematongerwo enyika vanofanira kutora matanho akaomarara kune vanoita zvemhirizhonga. EU Yokurudzira Sarudzo Dzakachena Zvichakadaro, mutevedzeri wemukuru wedare reEuropean Union Plenary VaFederica Mogherini vakaudza dare iri nemusi weChipiri kuti European Union inoda kuti Zimbabwe iite sarudzo dzakachena uye kuchengetedza kodzero dzevanhu kuburikidza nekuremekedza bumbiro remutemo. EU inoti kuti paitwe sarudzo dzakachena, yave kushanda nesangano reZimbabwe Electoral Commission zvikuru muchirongwa chekunyoresa vavhoti chebiometric voter registration. Sangano iri rinoti riri kubatsirawo vatori venhau kuti vanyore nemazvo nyaya dzine chekuita nesarudzo. VMogherini vanotiwo vanoda kuti EU itumire vaongorori ndokunge yakokwa neZimbabwe kusarudzo. Eu inoti inodawo kuti Zimbabwe itange kushanda zvakanaka neWorld Bank neIMF. Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vanonzi vakatotaurawo naCommssioner weEU VaNeven Mimica kumucheto wemusangano weAfrican Union. No media source currently available
title: ZPP Inoti Team Lacoste Yoonesa Chitsvuku Vaitsigira G40 muZanu-PF

text: Mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, nemusi weChina vakavhura chikamu chechina cheparamende yechipfumbamwe vachiti hupfumi hwenyika huri kukura kunyange hazvo nyika yakatemerwa zvirango zvehupfumi uye kuine denda reCovid-19. Vachitaura vari kumuzinda wavo weState House, VaMnangagwa vati vanofara chose kuti hupfumi wenyika huri kukuru vakati gore rino huchakura nezvikamu zvinodarika makumi manomwe kubva muzan. Vati zvese izvi zviri kuitika kunyange hazvo nyika iri pasi pezvirangop zvayakatemerwa nedzimwe nyika. Vati hupfumi huchakwira nekuda kwegoho rakanaka mwaka uno, mitengo yezvicherwa yakanaka pamisika yepasi rese pamwe nematanhi ekumisa kupararira kweCovid-19 ari kuitwa nehurumende yavo. Vatiwo zvimwe zviri kuita kuti hupfumi hukure inyaya yekuti musika wemari uri kushanda zvakanaka uye vachaisa mari yakawanda kumusika uyu urambe uchishanda zvakanaka. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi vachishanda vakazvimirira, VaJames Johwa vaudza Studio 7 kuti havabvumirane navaMnangagwa kuti hupfumi hwenyika huri kufamba zvakanaka. VaMnangagwa vati hurumende iri kutsigira mabasa ekurima izvo zvaita kuti nyika ive nechikafu chakakwana pamwe nekusimbaradza hupfumi hwenyika. Vatiwo varimi vanofanira kutora kurima sebhizimisi vakavakurudzira kuti vachitanga kugadzirira mwaka unotevera. Vatiwo zvichitevera kubudirira kwechirongwa chehurumende chekubaya vanhu nhomba yeCovid-19, masangano akawanda ekunze kwenyika ari kukumbira Zimbabwe kuti aiite misangano yavo kuVictoria Falls uko kwakatanga kubayiwa vanhu vakawanda nhomba. VaMnagagwa vatiwo vanoshushikana zvikuru kuti dambudziko rekushandisa zvinodhaka rapararira mune vechidiki vakati vakatoumba komiti yemakurukota avo kuti irwise dambudziko iri. Vati pasi pechikamu chavavhura nhasi, paramende inotarisirwa kupasisa mitemo inechekuita kuendesa masimba kumatunhu. Vakati nekuda kwaizvozvo paramende inofanira kupasa mabhiri anoti Provincial Councils Bill, Urban Councils Amendment Bill, Rutal Councils Amendment Bill, Traditiona Leaders Amendement Bill nemamwe. Vatiwo pamitemo yese yaida kuvandudzwa kuti ienderana nebumbiro remutemo pasara mitemo makumi matatu nemviri chete uye mitemo iyi ichavandudzwa muchikamu chechina cheparamenee yepchipfumbamwe. Mitemo iyi inosanganisira mitemo ine chekuita nemashandire emauto ne mapurisa. Mimwe mitemo inotasiriwa kuvandudzwa mitemo inoona nezvevanorarama nehurema, kuchengetedzwa zvakanaka kwevana pamwe nemutemo unoona nezvemasangano anoshanda akazvimirira. Sachigaro webato rinopikisa reMDC T Seneta Morgan Komichi vaudza Studio 7 kuti havana kufara nemashoko aVaMnangagwa nekuti havana kuburitsa pachena kuti hurumende ichaita sei kupedza matambudzika akatarisana nevanhu. Asi vati vafara kuti hurumende yave kudzika mitemo yekuendesa masimba kumatunhu kana kuti Devolution. Mutevedzeri wasachigaro webato reMDC Alliance VaJob Sikhala vati havana nguva yekuteerera zvinotaurwa naVaMnangagwa Nhengo yeZanu PF, Muzvare Tatenda Mavetera vanova mumirira weSeke-Chikomba vaudza Studio 7 kuti vafara kuti mutungamiriri wenyika ave kugadzirisa nyaya yekushandiswa kwezvinodhaka nevechidiki pamwe nekodzero dzevana. Vanoongorora nyaya dzematongerwe enyika vakazvimirira, VaGibson Nyikadzino vaudza Studio 7 kuti kunyange hazvo VaMnangagwa vataura mabhiri anofanira kupaswa neparamende, havaoni paramende ichipasa mabhiri aya ese sezvo yakatadza kuita izvi muchikamu chapfuura. Mamwe mabhiri asina kupaswa chikamu chechitatu cheparamende yechipfumbabwe ave kutarisirwa kupaswa muparamende yavhurwa nhasi anosanganisira Independent Complaints Commission Bill,nePolice Amendment Bill. No media source currently available
title: VaMnangagwa Vanoti Hupfumi Huri Kugadzikama Kunyangwe Vamwe vari Kuti Havasi Kuzviona

text: Hurumende yeBritain inonzi yakazivisa kuti ichabhadhara mari inoita zviuru makumi matanhatu zvemapaunzi kumhuri dzavanamukoti nevamwe vari muboka rezvehutano vanoshaya vari pamabasa zvichikonzerwa neCovid-19. Izvi zvinonzi zvakaziviswa svondo rino negurukota rezvehutano, VaMatt Hancock, avo vakati hurumende yavo ine chikwereti chikuru kuvanhu ava nekuzvipira kwavo kushanda munguva yakaoma kudai. Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvine chitsama zvinoshanda muboka rezvehutano muBritain zvaurayiwa neCovid-19, izvo zvinonzi nenyanzvi mune zvehutano zvinogona kunge zvichizoenda kure sezvo vanhu ava vachigona kunge vakatapurirawo hama dzavo chirwere ichi. Gweta rinorwira vashandi muboka rezvehutano kuEngland, Doctor Simba Mavaza, vanoti vana veZimbabwe vakawanda vari kushaya vanogona kunge vakashanda mune varwere vane coronavirus vasina zvinovadzivirira. Doctor Mavaza vanoti kunyange hazvo mhuri yakasara ichipiwa mari iyi, haizofi yakadzosa baba kana amai vemba vanenge vashaya ava.ngatinzweyi vachitsanangura. Vashandi vezvehutano muBritain vakatomboratidzira vachiti vanoda kupiwa mbatya dzinovadzivirira kubva kuhutachiwana hwe coronavirus. No media source currently available
title: Hurumende yeBritain Yovimbisa Kubhadhara Mhuri Dzevashandi Vakafa neCOVID-19

text:
Zvikoro zvakawanda zvakavhurwa neMuvhuro asi zvinhu zvichiratidza kuti hazvina kunyatsorongeka nekuda kwekuramwa mabasa kwevarairidzi uye kutyira kwavo nevabereki kuti hurumende iri kukurumidza kuvhura zvikoro pasina gadziriro yakakwana yekuti chirwere cheCovid-19 chisapararire. Vavhura vana vari kunyora bvunzo dzeGrade 7, Form 4 neUpper 6. Mumavhiki mana vachanyora gore rinouya vachatangawo kuenda kuchikoro. Kudzanai musengi anotipa nyaya inotevera. 

Muzvikoro zvashanyirwa neStudio 7 muguta reBulawayo kusanganisira Coghlan Primary, Lobengula Primary, Evelyn High School, Mzilikazi Secondary, neMpopoma High School, vana vari kuzonyora bvunzo
pakupera kwegore pamwe nevadzidzisi vashoma vaenda kuzvikoro sekurudziro yehurumende. Wose ange achipinda muzvikoro izvi kusanganisira vana vechikoro, vadzidzisi pamwe nevabereki vange vachiongororwa kupisa kwemiviri yavo uye kugezeswa maoko sezvinokurudzirwa nevezvehutano kudzivirira kutapuriranwa kwehutachiwana hwecoronavirus hunokenzera chirwere
cheCovid-19.

Kunyange hazvo vadzidzisi vose kusanganisira vanodzidzisa vana vasiri kunyora bvunzo vange vakanzi vauyewo kubasa, ongororo yaitwa neStudio 7 inoratidza kuti vakawanda vavo havana kuenda kumabasa.

Mumwe mudzidzisi anodzidzisa pane chimwe chikoro muBulawayo uyo asina kuda kudomwa nezita sezvo achityira basa rake, ati anotodzidzisa vana vari kunyora bvunzo asi ati atadza kuenda kubasa nekuda kwekushaya mari.

Izvi zvatsinhirwawo nemumwewo mudzidzisi anodzidzisa kumaruwa mudunhu reMatabeleland South, uyo angozvidoma nezita rekuti Muzvare Moyo.

Mukuru wesangano reProgressive Teachers’ Union of Zimbabwe VaTakavafira Zhou vati ongororo yaitwa nesangano ravo yaratidza kuti muzvikoro zvakawanda vadzidzisi vakawanda vange vasina kuenda kumabasa vachitiwo muzvikoro zvizhinji, vadzidzi vange vauya vadzorerwa kumba sezvo vadzidzisi vange vasina kuuya kubasa.

Mukuru wesangano reAmalgamated Rural Teachers’ Union of Zimbabwe, ARTUZ, VaObert Masaraure vatsinhira zvimwe chete vachiti zvikoro zvekumaruwa ndizvo zvayanya kuve nevadidzisi vasina kuenda kumabasa.


Murongi wemabasa musangano reNational Association of School Development Associations and Committees VaBanny Manokora vati vanonzwisisa zvichemo zvevadzidzisi asi dai vaita nemoyo
wekunzwira vana tsitsi, vachitiwo vabereki pachavo vakazvipira kuita zvose zvavanogona kuti vadzidzisi vaite basa ravo vachifara.

Kunze kwekunyunyuta pamusoro pemari yemuhoro vadzidzisi vanotiwo havagutsikane kuti hurongwa hwakaitwa nehurumende hwekuvadzivirira ivo pamwe nevadzidzi kuti vasatapurirane hutachiwana hweCovid-19 hwakakwana.

Vakafanobata chigaro chemurongi wemabasa musangano reEducation Coalition of Zimbabwe VaClemence Nhliziyo vanoti sangano ravo range riri muchikwata cheboka raitungamirwa negurukota redzidzo chekuona kuti gadziriro yekuvhurwa kwezvikoro yakakwana here. Vati vanogutsikana kuti zvakawanda zvinodiwa kuitwa kudzivirira kutapuriranwa kwehutachiwana hwecoronavirus zvakaitwa. Asi vanoti dai hurumende yagadzirisa nyaya yemuhoro wevadzidzisi kuti vakwanise kuita
basa ravo nemazvo. Asi vachitaurawo neStudio 7 neSvondo, gurukota rezvedzidzo VaCain Mathema vakati hurumende yainge yaita zvose zvinodiwa kuti zvikoro zvivhurwe uye kuti pasatapuriranwe chirwere cheCovid-19. Vakatiwo vari kutoshamisika kuti vadzidzisi vari kuda kuti vatambiriswe nemadhora ekuAmerica. Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vakatiwo zvikoro zvakagadzirira zvakakwana zvekuti vabereki nevarairidzi havafanire kutya kutapurirwa chirwere cheCovid-19. Asi zvimwe zvikoro zvinonzi zvange zviri kumanikidza vana kutenga mamask azviri kutengesa zviri kurambidzwa nehurumende sezvo vamwe vabereki vange vatotengera vana vavo kare. Mumwe anoshanda muhofisi yezvekudyidzana neveruzhinji mubazi rezvedzidzo uyo asina kuda kudomwa nezita kana kutaura pamhepo sezvo asingabvumidzwe kutaura nevatapi venhau ati bazi redzidzo richiri kuita ongororo yekuti zvinhu zviri kufamba sei pakuvhurwa kwezvikoro rozobudisa maonero aro pakupera kwesvondo. No media source currently available
title: Zvikoro Zvovhurwa Asi Varairidzi Vakawanda VaChiramwa Mabasa

text: Mutungamiri webato guru rinopikisa reMDC VaNelson Chamisa vanoti vachabatana nemhuri yevaive mutungamiri webato iri wekutanga VaMorgan Tsvangirai, kuvarangarira kumusha kwavo kwaHumanikwa kuBuhera. VaChamisa vati bato ravo rinoremekedza VaTsvangirai zvikuru nebasa ravakabata mukuumba bato nekuri tungamira kubva muna 1999. No media source currently available Hurongwa uhu huri kutarisirwa kuitwa musi wa4 Chivabvu svondo rinouya nemusi weMugovera. Mutauriri wemhuri yaVaTsvangirai, VaManase Tsvangirai vanoti vakokawo munhu wose nemapatao ose munyika kusanganisa mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa nebato riri kutonga reZanu-PF. No media source currently available Izvi zviri kuuya apo VaChamisa vachangobva mukudomwa nematunhu ose gumi nematatu ebato ravo kuti varambe vari mutungamiri kwemamwe makore mashanu. Nezuro dunhu reSouth Africa rinova rekugumisira rakasarudza VaChamisa kuti vatungamire bato zvichireva kuti hakuna achavakwikwidza kukongiresi yebato iri kutanga kuitwa musi wa 24 mwedzi unouya.
title: VaChamisa Vobatana neMhuri yaMuchakabvu Morgan Tsvangirai Kuvarangarira

text: Nhengo dzebato reMDC-T rinotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa dziri kuda kukwikwidza musarudzo dzekutsvaga vachamirira bato musarudzo dzematare eparamende neSenate dziri kutarisirwa kuungana muHarare neChishanu kuti dzizeye zvadzinotarisirwa kuita kana dzakabudirira musarudzo. Murongi wemabasa muMDC-T inotungamirirwa naVaChamisa, VaAmos Chibaya, vanoti musangano uyu uri kutanga mangwanani wozopera masikati. VaChibaya vanoti musangano wavo uyu wakanangana nekudzidzisa nhengo dzavo kuti nyaya dzekukwikwidzana hakusi kurwisana, asi kuti kutsvaga vanhu vanokwanisa kutungamira vanhu. Mapato mazhinji munyika akatotanga kare kuita gadziriro dzesarudzo. Bato reZanu-PF riri kuvhota musarudzo dzema primary nemusi weSvondo. No media source currently available
title: Vachakwikwidza muSarudzo dzePrimary muMDC-T yaVaChamisa Vosangana

text: Mumwe wevakashaya ava mudzidzisi VaRobert Manono vakayeredzwa nemvura kuChipinge vachibva vazoonekwa vakashaya. VaManono avo vaidzidzisa paSouthdown Primary School vasiya mudzimai nevana vana. Mhuri yaVaManono inoti yakakundikana kuwana rubatsiro kubva kumapurisa kana kubazi rinobatsira munjodzi reCivil Protection Unit. Izvi zvapa kuti vakawanda vati hurumende inenge yange isina kugadzirira zvakakwana dambudziko rakadai. Munin’ina wavo VaEffort Manono vanoti vari kutarisira kuradzika mukoma wavo nemusi weChina sezvo nzira dzisiri kufambika. No media source currently available
title: Mumwe Mudzidzisi Ofa Mushure Mekuyeredzwa neRwizi

text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, nemusi weMuvhuro vakapa sangano reAfrican Union, AU, chipo chemari inosvika miriyoni imwe yemadhora. VaMugabe vakaita izvi pakutanga kwemusangano wepakati pegore wevatungamiri venyika dzemuAfrica kumuzinda wesangano reAU kuAddis Ababa, Ethiopia. Musangano uyu unopera nemusi weChipiri. Muna 2015, VaMugabe vakavimbisa kuti vaizotengesa mombe mazana matatu kuti vabatsire bazi reAfrican Union Foundation. Mari yakabva pakutengeswa kwemombe idzi ndiyo inonzi yapihwa sangano iri. Dingidira remusangano uyu rakanangana nekusimudzira vechidiki kana kuti “Harnessing the Demographic Dividend through Investments in Youth.” Dzimwe nyaya dziri kutarisirwa kuzeyiwa kumusangano uyu dzinosanganisa kuvandudza sangano reAU, United Nations Security Council uye nyaya yekuyedza kuunza runyararo muAfrica. Mutungamiri weGuinea, VaAlpha Conde, ndivo sachigaro weAU pari zvino. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika, VaJoy Mabenge, avo vanoshanda nesangano reCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition kuchamhembe kweAfrica vanoti chipo chabviswa naVaMugabe chiri kuvashamisa zvikuru sezvo vanhu vakawanda muZimbabwe vari kunonga svosve nemuromo.  No media source currently available
title: VaMugabe Vopa African Union Chipo cheMiriyoni yeMadhora

text: Vatsigiri venhabvu vatarisana nemitambo miviri yemhando repamusoro iyo iri kutambwa zuva rimwechete mukupera kwesvondo. Chikwata chenyika chemaWarriors chirikusanga neZambia mumutambo wehushamwari, zuva rimwechete FC Platinum Stars iri kubandana neNgezi Platinum Stars mufainari yeChibuku Super Cup munhandare yeBaobab Stadium nemusi weMugovera. Asi chiri kushamisa ndechekuti veZifa vasarudza kuti mutambo wemaWarriors utambwe apo fainari yeChibuku ichangopera panzvimbo yekuti mutambo uyu utambwe neSvondo apo pasina mimwe mitambo yenhabvu iri kutambwa munyika. Murairidzi wemaWarriors Kalisto Pasuwa ari kushandisa mutambo uyu kugadzira chikwata chake akatarisana nemakwikwi e 2017 Africa Cup of Nations ayo ari kuitirwa kuGabon muna Ndira. Pasuwa ari kushandisa vatambi vanotambira zvikwata zvemunyika chete uyezve adaidza vatambi vari kutungamira pakunwisa zvibodzwa muPremier Soccer League Leonard Tsipa weCaps United naGift Mbweti weHwange. Asi veruzhinji varikunyanyotaura nezvefainari iyo irikusangana zvikwata zviviri zvinopihwa mari nemakambani anoita zvekuchera platinum. Sachigaro weNgezi Platinum Stars VaJeremiah Getiseni vanoti vaita rombo rakanaka rekuti vataridze nyika yese zvavanokwanisa kuita. Vanotevera nhabvu vane maonero avowo ekuti chikwata chavanofunga kuti chichatora mukombe uyu ndechipi. Muongorori wezvemutambo wenhabvu VaAndrew Rwodzi vanoti Ngezi Platinum Stars inogona kutora mukombe uyu nemhaka yekuti ine vatambi vatamba muPremier Soccer League kwemakore akawanda. Asi muteveri wemutambo uyu vaMisheck Chisaga vanoti vanonakidzwa zvikuru nematambiro anoita FC Platinum iyo inodaidzwa neveruzhinji kunzi Kugona Kunenge Kudada. Mutsigiri weKugona Kunenge Kudada VaNorman Machando vanoti zviri pachena kuti chikwata chavo ndicho chirikuenda nemukombe. Chikwata chirikutora mukombe uyu chirikupihwa mari inoita zviuru makumi manomwe nezvishanu uyezve chinobudirira kumirira nyika mumakundano emuAfrica e2017 Caf Confederation Cup. Vanokundwa mufainari iyi vanowanawo zviuru makumi mashanu zvemadhora.
title: Zimbabwe Warriors Yotamba neChipolopolo yekuZambia

text: Vemabhizimisi nevashandi vane muonero wakasiyana panyaya yekushomeka kwemari nemanetsero ari kuita zvinhu munyika. Vemabhizimisi nevashandi vane muonero wakasiyana panyaya yekushomeka kwemari nemanetsero ari kuita zvinhu munyika munyaya dzezvehupfumi. Munguva yakare, panguva ino yekisimusi vemabhizimisi ndipo pavaiita mari yakawanda zvinhu zvichifamba. Asi munyori mukuru weZimbabwe Congress of Trade Union, VaJaphet Moyo, vanoti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka kuvashandi nekuda kwekushaya mari yemuhoro uye mabhonasi. Vati nekuda kwekushaya mari uku, hapana chekufarira pakisimusi. VaMoyo vanoti kushomeka kwemari mumabhanga kuri kupawo kuti zvinhu zvinetse kumushandi sezvo vashandi vari kupedza nguva yakawanda vachitsvaga mari. Asi mukuru weConfederation of Zimbabwe Retailers, VaDenford Mutashu, vanoti ivo semaonero avo zvinhu zviri kufamba zvakanaka. VaMutashu vanoti vanhu vari kukurudzirwa kuti vashandise makadhi emaATM kwete mari chete. Mashoko aya atsinhirwawo nemutungamiri weZimbabwe National Chamber of Commerce VaDavison Norupiri. VaNorupiri vatiwo vari kufara nemafambiro ari kuita zvinhu mumaindasitiri sezvo zviri kutengwa semakore akare. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika, Doctor Godfrey Kanyenze, vanoti kana vashandi vasiri kubhadharwa zvinonetsa kuti hupfumi hwenyika hufambe zvakanaka. Doctor Kanyenze vanoti zviri pachena kuti mabond notes haana kubatsira matambudziko akatarisana nevanhu munyika. Vayambirawo kuti mabond notes akangoparurwa neReserve Bank of Zimbabwe kunenge kuri kusvisikira moto muziso sezvo zvichizoguma zvaita kuti mari ishaye simba. Zimbabwe yave nemakore akawanda ichitatarika kugadzirisa hupfumi zvapa kuti hurumende itadze kubhadhara vashandi vayo mari yemuhoro nenguva. Hurumende inoti izvi zviri kukonzerwa nenyaya yezvirango zvakatemerwa nyika nehurumende yekunze. Asi vanopikisa vanoti kutadza kutonga kweZanu-PF ndiko kwapa kuti nyika iite seyakageza negoka munyama. No media source currently available
title: VeMabhizimisi neVashandi Vopesana Maonero paNyaya yeZororo reKisimusi

text: Sangano reNational Association of Youth Organisations nhasi raparura zvekare chirongwa cheLeave No Youth Behind 2023 icho chine chinangwa chekuwedzera huwandu hwevechidiki vachavhota nekukwikwidza musarudzo dza2023. Vachiparura zvekare chirongwa ichi, icho chakamboitwa zvekare pasarudzo dza2018, mutauririri wechirongwa ichi, VaLiam Takurakanhenga, vati vachaita chirongwa ichi vasingashande nemapato ezvematongerwo enyika. Vati chinangwa chavo ndechekuti vechidiki vabude nehuwandu hwavo musarudzo dza2023. Vaenderera mberi vachiti vanhu vechidiki ndivo vakawanda munyika nekudaro vanofanira kuvhota kuti vagadzirise remangwana ravo. Vati vachafamba munzvimbo dzese munyika, mumaguta, madhorobha nekumaruwa vachikurudzira vechidiki kuti vanyorese kuvhota pamwe nekutora zvigaro musarudzo dza2023. VaTakurakanhega vati vachashanda nemapazi ane chekuita nesarudzo akaita seZimbabwe Electoral Commission neRegistrar-General’s Office kuti arerutsire vechidiki kunyoresa kuvhota. Ari kutungamira chirongwa ichi, Muzvare Lisa Mauwa, vaudza Studio 7 kuti chirongwa ichi chinokurudzirawo kuti vanhukadzi vechidiki vatorewo zvigaro musarudzo dzinotevera. Vati musarudzo dzapfuura vechidiki zvikamu makumi matatu nezvisere kubva muzana ndivo vakavhota chete uye vanoda kuti zvikamu makumi mashanu kana kudarika zvevechidiki zvivhote musarudzo dzinotevera. VaTakurakanhenga vati kunyange hazvo vari kutambira zvigaro gumi zvakapihwa vechidiki muNational Assembly neConstitutional Amendment Number 2, vanoda kuti vechidiki vatorewo zvigaro mudare reSeneti. Pari zvino munhu anofanira kuve nemakore makumi mana kuti apinde muSeneti uye makore gumi nemasere kuti apinde muNational Assembly kana kuve kanzura. Chirongwa che #LeaveNOYouthBedhind2023 Campaign, chinouuya apo mamwe masangano akaita seZImbabwe National Students Union ari kuitawo zvirongwa zvekukurudzira vechiki vari muzvikoro zvepamusoro kuti vanyorese kuvhota. Munyori muZinasu, VaTapiwanashe Chiringa, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vakatoparura chirongwa che#Students Decide 2023, apo vari kukurudzira nekubatsira vadzidzi kuti vanyorese kuvhota. Zvikamu makumi manomwe kubva muzana munyika zvevanhu vese munyika ndevechidiki asi vazhinji vavo vange vasiri kuvhota musarudzo dzapfuura. Mapato makuru munyika eZanu PF neMDC Alliance ari mushishi rekunyoresa nhengo nevatsigiri vawo kusanganisira vechidiki kuti vavhote muna 2023. MDC Alliance iri kutarisira kunyoresa vanhu vanosvika mamiriyoni matanhatu, ukuwo Zanu PF ichitaririsira kunyoresa vanhu mamiriyoni mashanu kuti vavhote musarudzo dza 2023. No media source currently available
title: Vechidiki Vanoparura Zvakare Chirongwa Chinokurudzira Vamwe Vavo Kuvhota

text: Sangano rinomiririra varairidzi, reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, PTUZ, rinoti kana hurumende ikasagadzirisa zvichemo zvevarairidzi, nhengo dzaro dzabvumirirana kusadzoka kumabasa panovhurwa zvikoro kotoro inouya. Mutungamiriri wesangano iri, Doctor Takavafira Zhou, vaudza Studio 7 kuti varairidzi havasi kurwira kuti vawedzerwe mari dzemihoro chete, asi kuti vari kudawo kuti hurumende idzorere huremu hwemari yavanotambira kuti huenderane nehuremu hwemazana mashanu emadhora ekuAmerica. No media source currently available
title: Hurumende Inoyambirwa Kugadzirisa Zvichemo Zvevarairidzi Panguva Yezororo

text: Mutungamiri wechimwe chikwata cheMDC T Muzvare Thokozani Khupe vati zvakakosha kuti mapato anopikisa abatane pamwe chete kuti akwanise kuunza shanduko inoshuvirwa neveruzhinji munyika. Pane runyerekupe rwekuti Muzvare Khupe vari kuda kupinda mubato reCCC. Taedza kunzwa kubva kune mutauriri weCCC Muzvare Fadzayi Mahere asi nharembozha yavo yange isingadavirwe. Asi mutauriri webato iri mudunhu reBulawayo VaSwithern Chiroodza vati kunyange hazvo nyaya iyi isati yasvika kudunhu ravo, ivo havawirirane nekuti Muzvare Khupe vapinde mubato reCCC. Amai Khupe mwedzi wapera vakaita musangano nemumwe mutevedzeri weCCC Muzvinafundo Welshman Ncube naVaAbednico Bhebhe wakafungidzirwa nevakawanda vaive nechinangwa chekuti vabate ndima naVaChanisa. Vachitaura pamusangano wavaita nevatapi venhau muBulawayo nhasi Doctor Khupe vati bato reZanu PF riri kuramba riine nemasimba zvisinei nekwavati kutadza kutingamira nyika kwaro vakati izvi zviri kukonzerwa nekuti mapato anopikisa ari kuita mazvake mazvake achitadza kubatana. Vati bato ravo rakatora danho rekusakwikwidza musarudzo nekuti havasi kuda kupatsanura mavhoti uye vachataura munguva inotevera kuti vari kutsigira ani pasarudzo dzema by election. Vati zvakakosha kuti mapato anopikisa neveruzhinji vanoda shanduko munyika vabatane. Muzvare Khupe vatiwo pane zvakawanda zvakatadzwa nevatungamiri vemapato anopikisa kubva zvakavambwa bato reMDC vakati zvakakosha kudzidza kubva kunhoroondo iyi. Vati kupatsanuka kwemapato anopikisa kune chekuita nekushaya nekushaya hanya kwave kuita veruzhinji panyaya dzekunyoresa kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota, vakatsinhira kuti zvakakosha kuti mapato anopikisa abatane. Muzvare Khupe vakurudzira komisheni inoona nezvesarudzo yeZimbabwe Electoral Commission kuti ifambise sarudzo nenzira yakanaka isingaite kuti pave nemakakatanwa, vakashora mhirizhonga yakaitika pamisangano yebato reCitizens’ Coalition for Change vakati mapurisa anofanirwa kushanda zvakasimba kuti vari kuita izvi vatongwe nemutemo. Mutauriri webato reMDC T inotungamirwa naVaDouglas Mwonzora VaWitness Dube vati vanobvuma kuti zvakakosha kuti mapato anopikisa abatane. Asi vati Muzvare Khupe ndivo mumwe wene mhosva yekukonzera kupatsanuka kwemapato anopikisa. Taedza kunzwa kubva kumutauriri weZanu PF VaChristopher Mutsvangwa pamashoko aMuzvare Khupe ekuti bato ravo riri kutadza kutungamira nyika asi nharembozha yavo yange isingadavirwe. Asi vachitaura pamusangano wekutsvaga rutsigiro rwemaby election muKwekwe nemusi weMugovera mutungamiri wenyika variwo mutungamiri weZanu PF VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vakati mapato anopikisa haana hurongwa hwakajeka hwekuti nyika ibudirire, vachitiwo kutadza kutungamira kwemapato aya ndiko kwaita kuti zvinhu zviwondomoke mumadhorobha emunyika mune makanzura emapato anopikisa. Zvichakadaro, VaNelson Chamisa, mutungamiri webato reCCC vanotarisirwa kuita musangano wekutsvaga rutsigiro rwemaby election muBulawayo musi weMugovera. VaChiroodza vati gadziriro yemusangano uyu yasvika pachidanho chepamusoro soro.
title: Doctor Khupe Vounza Kusawirirana muCCC Apo Vodaidzira Kuti Vanopikisa Vabatane

text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vanonzi havana kuenda kuGhana sezvange zvakatarisirwa. Kusaenda kwaVaMugabe uku kuri kuuya kunyangwe hazvo Ghana yange yatoisa mifananidzo muguta rose reAccra ichiti VaMugabe vari kushanya. VaMugabe vange vachitarisirwa kusvika muGhana nezuro nenguva dza 4.00 masikati murwendo rwemazuva mana. Mutungamiri weGhana vaJohn Mahama vange vachitariswirwa kupa VaMugabe chiremera cheMillennium Lifetime Achievement Award nebasa ravakabatwa muhondo yeChimurenga muZimbabwe. Kunyangwe hazvo VaMugabe vasina kuenda, mabiko ange akarongwa anonzi ari kuenderera mberi. Vamwe vari kupihwa mubayiro uyu vanosanganisa Dr Kwabene Dafuor, Dr Joseph Siaw Agypong, Emmanuel Adebayo nevamwe. Mapepa nhau emuGhana anoti haasi kuziva kuti sei VaMugabe vasina kuuya achiti hapana chikonzero chapihwa. Asi vamwe veCity News kuGhana vanoti vasina kuda kudomwa mazita ku muzinda weZimbabwe kunyika iyi vati VaMugabe vakundikana nekuda kwekusamira zvakanaka kwezvinhu munyika. Asi svondo rapera bepanhau reZimbabwe Independent rakti vana chiremba vaVaMugabe vakauya kubva kuSingapore sezvo vange vasinganzwe zvakanaka. Vemapepanhau nenhepfenyuro dzose dzehurumende munyika havana kutaura nezve kukundikana kuenda kuGhana kwaVaMugabe uku.
title: VaMugabe Vokundikana Kuenda kuGhana Asi Hapana Chikonzero Chapihwa

text: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvakawanda zvave kuenda kunyika dzakaita seZambia neSouth Africa kunorapwa sezvo zvinhu muzvipatara zvemunyika zvaramba zvakaita manyama amire nerongo nekushaya mishona uye vakoti navanachiremba vave kuenda kumafuro manyoro. Hurumende yeZimbabwe yave kunetsaba neSouth Africa nezvezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kuenda kunorapwa kunyika iyi. South Africa inoti haichakwanise kutakura mutoro weZimbabwe vamwe vachiti SADC yave kufanira kutarisa Zimbabwe yoonekwa sendonda mudunhu . Mukuru mubazi reChemical Pathology paUniversity of Zimbabwe Muzvinafundo Hilda Matarira vanoti kunyangwe havo munyika muine makirinika nezvipatara zvakawanda, zvizhinji zvacho zvave kuda kuvandudzwa. Vanoenderera mberi vachiitiwo kusiya basa kwevashandi vemuzvipatara vakawanda vachienda kuBritain, America, Australia nedzimwe nyika dzakapoteredza kwave kupa kuti vashoma vasara varemerwe nemutoro wekurapa varwere. Izvi zvatsinhirwa nemukuru weCommunity Working Group on Health VaItai Rusike. VaRusike vatiwo zvipatara hazvisi kukwanisa kurapa magomarara, itsvo nezvimwe sezvo michina yacho ichigara yakafa. Vakurudzira kuti mari iri kuenda muhomwe yeHealth Levy kubva kumitero yenharembozha ishandiswa kugadzira kana kutenga michina mitsva. VaIshe Mwale vanogara kuIreland kuBritain vaudza Studio kuti pane hama yavo yakazonogurwa makumbo aiva anyenga maronda nechirwere cheshuga kuZambia nokuti mari dzavainge vanzi vabhadhare munyika dzainge dzakawandisa. Imwe nhengo yekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvehutano Dr Peter Mataruse vatiwo zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka munyaya dzezvehutano munyika. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dzinoti rimwe dambudziko guru munyika nderekuti hurumende haipe bazi rezvehutano mari yakakwana mubhajeti. Mari zhinji inoshandiswa mubazi iri inobva kumasangano akazvimirira oga kunyanya ekuAmerica. Bhajeti rakapiwa bazi rezvehutano gore rino zvikamu zvinodarika gumi nezviviri kubva muzana kana kuti 12,7% inova iri pasi pane yakatenderanwa nehurumende dzemuAfrica kuti inofanira kuenda kubazi rezvehutano inova zvikamu gumi nezvishanu kubva muzana kana kuti 15%. Chibvumirano ichi chinonzi Abuja Declaration chakanyoreranwa muna 2001.
title: Zimbabwe Yokonzera Mutauro muSADC neVanhu Vayo Voenda Kunorapwa Kune Dzimwe Nyika
