text: Mutungamira webato rinopikisa reAfrican National Party, VaEgypt Dzinemunhenzva, vanoti vari kutarisira kuti musarudzo dzemuna 2018 vachakunda mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, avo vanoti vari kutonga nedemo izvo zvapa kuti nyika itatarike. Vanhu vakawanda munyika vari kugunun'una vachiti hupfumi hwaenda kumawere vanhu vakawanda vachibuditswa mabasa vamwe vachishaya zvekudya. VaDzinemunhenzva munhu anonzi nevakawanda munyika anounza mufaro muvanhu munguva yesarudzo kwete nekuti vanenge vachida kuvavhotera, asi kuti vanhu vanenge vachitovaseka. Asi VaDzinemunhenzva vanoti rwendo rwuno vanokunda kunyangwe vachiti havadi kufukura hapwa kuti vachaita sei vachiti vangazochenjedza nyamukuta kuzvara vachada. VaDzinemunhenzva vane makore ekuberekwa makumi matanhatu nemapfumbamwe. Kubva muna 1990 vange vachingokwikwidza musarudzo dzemutungamiri wenyika asi vachiwana vanhu vanovavhotera vashoma zvikuru. No media source currently available
title: VaDzinemunhenzva Vanoti Vari Kuzokunda VaMugabe Musarudzo dza2018

text: Chirongwa cheOperation Restore Legacy, icho chakaita kuti vaimbova mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vasiye chigaro, chasvika kwamvura yacheka makumbo, paine kurudziro yekuti mapurisa aite basa rawo nemazvo. Vachitaura vakamirira mauto ose pamusangano wavaita nevatori venhau pamuzinda wemauto muHarare, Lieutenant General Phillip Valerio Sibanda vati chirongwa ichi chasvika kumagumo vachiti mauto akabudirira kubvisa makoronyera akanga akomberedza VaMugabe. VaSibanda vati vamwe vaiva muchikwata cheZanu PF cheG40 vakusvibisa zita renyika vari kunze kwenyika vakakurudzira kuti veruzhinji vamhan’arire vanhu vakadai avo vavanoti vanogona kukanganisa kugadzikana kwenyika. VaSibanda vakurudzirawo mapurisa kuti aite basa rawo achitevedzera mutemo. Mumwe mugari wemuHarare, VaAlbert Chidhakwa, vati vanotyira kuti mapurisa anogona kudzoka mumigwagwa nehuori sechigariro chawo. Mumwe wevatedzeri vemutungamiri weMDC-T, VaNelson Chamisa, vanoti vari kufara nedanho ratorwa nemasoja. Masoja akapindira mune zvematongerwo enyika musi wa 13 Mbudzi vakamanikidza VaMugabe kusiya basa izvo zvakazoita kuti vakanga vadzingwa mubato, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vatore matomhu avo mushure mekudomwa neZanu PF kuti vatore chigaro ichi sezvinotaurwa nebumbiro remitemo yenyika. Chirongwa cheOperation Restore Legacy change chiri munyika kwemazuva makumi matatu nemashanu. No media source currently available
title: Chirongwa cheOperation Restore Order Chinosvika kwaMvura Yacheka Makumbo

text: Bazi rezvehutano razivisa kuti mumwe ainge abatwa nechirwere checoronavirus munyika ndokuchitapurirawo kumudzimai wake nevana vaviri kuRuwa, Mashonaland East, apora kubva muchirwere ichi. Kunyange hazvo bazi rehutano risina kuzivisa zita remunhu uyu, Studio 7 yakwanisa kubata munhu uyu, VaSaul Sakudya avo vati vakavhenekwa kaviri sezvinokurudzirwa neWorld Health Organization vakaonekwa kuti vainge vasisina chirwere ichi. Vanoti vamwe vatatu mumhuri yavo vakambovhenekwa kekutanga vakaonekwa kuti havasisina chirwere uye vamirira kunzwa kuti zvakavhenekwa nezuro zvinobuda zvakaita sei. VaSakudya vati vanotenda Mwari nekupona kwavo asi vakakurudzira vanhu munyika kuti vagare mudzimba kuitira kuti chirwere ichi chisapararire. No media source currently available Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus munyika hwasvika pavanhu makumi nevatatu mushure mekunge vamwe vanhu vashanu vabatwa zvekare nechirwere ichi kuBulawayo. Bulawayo yave nevanhu gumi vabatwa nechirwere ichi ichiteverwa neharare ine vasere, mashonaland east vana uye matabeleland north mumwe chete. Mukuru mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko VaNick Mangwana vanoti hurumende iri kuvhura nzvimbo dzekuvhenekwa vanhu dzine chitsama kuBulawayo nekune mamwe matunhu. Zvichakadaro, mumashoko atumirwa kuStudio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kusangano rinoongorora nyaya dzezvirwere muAfrica reAfrica Centres for Disease Control Prevention anoratidza kuti huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi muAfrica hwakwira kusvika pachuru gumi nematanhatu ane mazana maviri nemakumi masere nemashanu. Vanhu vafa muAfrica vanosvika mazana masere nemakumi masere nemana. Vapora vamosvika zviuru zvitatu ne zana rimwe chete nemamakumi mana nemaviri. South Africa ndiyo ine vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nechirwere ichi muAfrica. Vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi pasi rose vave mamiriyoni maviri uye vakawanda vacho vari muAmerica. Vanhu vafa pasi rose vave chiuru zana nemakumu matatu nematatu.
title: VaSakudya Voita Munhu weKutanga Kupora Kubva Kuchirwere cheCoronavirus muZimbabwe

text: Vanga vari nhengo huru yeZanu PF, Professor Callistus Ndlovu, varadzikwa zvine mutsindo kuNational Heroes, mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vachishora mhirizhonga yakaitika kuHarare South svondo rapfuura vachiti vanhu vanofanira kutevedza mabasa akanaka emushakabvu, avo vaida runyararo nekuti vanhu vagare zvakanaka. Vachitaura pakuvigwa kwaVaNdlovu, VaMangagwa vati vanhu vemuZimbabwe vanofanirwa kubatana, uye vachishanda pamwe chete kuchengetedza runyararo rwakaunzwa naVaNdlovu nemamwe magamba akarwira rusununguko. Vatiwo hururmende yavo haisi kuzopa mukana kune avo vanoda kukonzera mhirizhonga munyika. VaMnangagwa vashora vanhu vakakonzera mhirizhingo kuHarare South vakapfeka mbatya dzebato ravo reZanu PF vachiti vanhu ivavo vacharangwa zvakaomarara. Mutevedzeri wenyori wevechidiki muZanu PF, VaLewis Matutu, vatambira mashoko emutungamiri wenyika ekuti vanhu vagare murunyararo uye vashorawo zvakaitika kuHarare South vachiti zvakakonzerwa nenhengo dzebato rinopikisa reMDC Alliance. Asi mutauriri weMDC Alliance, VaJacob Mafume, vaudza Studio7 kuti MDC Alliance hainei nekurwisana kuri kuitwa muZanu PF uye vati nhengo dzebato ravo hadzishandise mbatya dzeZanu PF. Vati zviri pachena kuti zvinhu hazvin kumira zvakanaka muZanu PF kuHarare South kubva pasarudzo dzemaPrimary ebato iri zviri kupa kuti nhengo dzaro dzigare dzichirwisana. VaMnangagwa vakurudzirawo vechidiki kuti vadzidze kubva kuna mushakabvu Ndlovu, nekupinda mizvirongwa zvekusimudzira nyika munyaya dzehupfumi. Vati muzvikoro zvepamusoro ndimo munofanira kubva nyanzvi ndinotungamira hurongwa kwekusimudzira maindasitiri nehupfumi izvo zviri kupa kuti hurumende yavo itsigirire zvikoro izvi. KuHeroes Acre kwanga kwakazara masoja zvakanyanya nhasi apo VaMnangagwa vanga vachitaura. VaNdlovu vakashaya musi wa13 Kukadzi kuSouth Africa vave nemakore makumi masere nematatu. Vakadzidza muZimbabwe nyika isati yawana kuzvitonga, kuLesotho nekuAmerica. VaNdlovu vakatanga zvematongerwo enyika kuma1950s vakave nehengo dzemapato akaita seNational Democratic Party, ZAPU neZanu PF. Vakabata zvigaro zvakawanda mudare remakurukota ehurumende yeZimbabwe vakavewo nhengo yematare eparamende eNational Assembly neSenate. Muna 1988, VaNdlovu mumwe wevakuru vakuru muZanu PF vakanzi vakaita zvehuori hwekutenga nekutengeswa kwemotokari hwakaburitswa nevaive mupepeti weChronicle, VaGeoff Nyarota nemutevedzeri wavo, VaDavison Maruziva. Nyaya yeWillowgate scandal yakaita kuti mutungamiri wenyika panguva iyi, VaRobert Mugabe, vagadze komisheni yakaferefeta huori hwakanga hwaburitswa nebepanhau reChronicle. Asi vose vakanga vaita zvehuori vakaregererwa naVaMugabe, izvo zvakasiya vanhu vakawanda vasingafare. VaNdlovu ndivo vange vari sachigaro weZanu PF mudundu reBulawayo. Mune imwewo nyaya, vaimbove mupepeti webepanhau reSunday Mail, VaEdmund Kudzayi, avo vakasungwa nezuro vamiswa pamberi pedare ramejisitireti muHarare nhasi vachipomerwa mhosva yekuwanikwa vaine mbatya dzechiuto. VaKudzai vawanikwa vaine Ambrella ine rudzi rwembatya dzemauto mumotokari mavo. VaKudzayi vabhadhara zana remadhora semari yechibatiso kuti vatongwe vachibva kumba kwavo uye nyaya yavo ichadzoka mudare musi wa 8 Kurume. VaKudzayi vange vachimiririrwa naVaObey Shava veZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights. Zvichakadai, vaive mutungamiriri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vari kuita mhembererero dzekusvitsa makore makumi mapfumbamwe nemashanu ekuzvarwa kumba kwavo kuBlue Roof kuBorrowdale muHarare muchiitiko chiri kupindwa nevemhuri nevakakokwa chete. No media source currently available
title: Muzvinafundo Callistus Ndlovu Vanoradzikwa Zvine Mutsindo kuHeroes Acre

text: Musangano weGlobal Initiative for Responsible Mining, uyo uri kutsvaka kubvumirana kwenyika pasi pose mirairo yekubatwa kwevanhu vanoita basa rekuchera zviwanikwa pamwe chete nenzizi dziri kuparadzwa nekuchera uku, uri kuitwa muguta re Vancouver kuCanada. Musangano uyu waunganidza varidzi vemakambani emigodhi, masangano anomiririra vashandi ne anorwira kodzero dzevanhu, vatengi vezvicherwa nevamwe vanechekuita nezvezvicherwa kuti vakurukure nekubvumirana nzira nemitemo yakanaka, inochengetedza vanhu vanoita basa rekuchera, vana nenzizi dziri padyo nepanocherwa. Mukuru weHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kwe Africa, VaDewa Mavhinga, avo vari kumusangano uyu, vaudza Studio 7 kuti musangano uyu une basa zvikuru kunyika yakaita se Zimbabwe ine migodhi yakawanda uye ine vanhu vazhinji vanorarama nekuchera zviwanikwa. VaMavhinga vati chimwe chinhu chikuru chiri kukurukurwa pamusangano uyu, inyaya ye kuchengetedzwa kwevana vanomanikidzwa nenhamo kuchera zviwanikwa kuti vararamise mhuri dzavo. Vati mamwe emakambani ari pamusangano uyu anosanganisa Anglo American, de Beers, Microsoft, Tiffany’s, nemamwe. No media source currently available
title: Musangano Wekubvumirana Mitemo Yekuchengetedzwa KweVanhu Nenzvimbo Dzine Zvicherwa Uri Kuitwa kuCanada

text: Vamwe vevafakazi vapa humbowo hwavo kukomisheni yakagadzwa nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, kuti iongorore zvakaitika mumhirizhonga yakaitaika muHarare musi wa1 Nyamavhuvhu, vati havatarisiri kuti komisheni iyi ichabuda nezvisungo zvine kumeso sezvo dzimwe nhengo dzekomisheni iyi dzine mativi adzakarerekera. Vachipa humbowo hwavo kukomisheni iyi neChina muHarare, munyori mukuru muboka revechidiki reMDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa, VaLovemore Chinoputsa, vati havaone komisheni iyi ichikwanisa kuita basa rayo zvakanaka sezvo dzimwe nhengo dzekomisheni iyi dzine divi radzakarerekera. VaChinoputsa vati havaone dzimwe nhengo dzekomisheni iyi dzichiita basa radzo nemazvo sezvo vari vanhu vanozivikanwa kuti inhengo dzemapato ezvematongerwo enyika. Vati Amai Charity Manyeruke inhengo yeZanu PF inozivikanwa uye havatarisiri kuti vangakoshesa humbowo huchange huchisungirira bato ravo pamwe nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa. Vatiwo mutungamiri weNational Constitutional Assembly, VaLovemore Madhuku, munhu akakwikwidza musarudzo dzemusi wa30 Chikunguru dzakakonzeresa mhirizhonga yakazoitika iyi, uye Amai Vimbai Nyemba munhu ari kungogadzwa mumabhodhi akawanda nehurumende yaVaMnangagwa. Nokudaro, VaChinoputsa vati maoko evatatu ava akasviba kuti varambe vari mukomisheni iyi. Zvataurwa naVaChinoputsa zvatsinhirwa naVaIslam Madhosi vanove munyori anoona nezvesarudzo mupurovhinzi yeHarare muMDC yaVaChamisa. VaMadhosi vati VaMnangagwa pachavo ndivo vanofanira kumiswa pamberi pekomisheni iyi sezvo vari ivo mukuru wemasoja enyika anonzi ndiwo akaridza pfuti vanhu vakafa musi wa1 Nyamavhuvhu. Vatiwo ongororo iri kuitwa nekomisheni iyi inzira dzekuedza kuchenura VaMnangagwa kuti Zimbabwe idzoserwe mugungano reCommonwealth. Asi sachigaro wekomisheni iyi, VaKgalema Motlanthe, avo vaimbova mutungamiri weSouth Africa kwechinguvana, vati VaMadhuku, Amai Manyeruke pamwe naAmai Nyemba, vanhu vakatora mhiko dzekuita basa mukomisheni yavo saka nokudaro vanosungirwa kuita basa ravo nemazvo. VaMadhuku pachavo vaudza Studio7 kuti munhu akatwasuka uye anoita basa sebasa. Vamwe vapa humbowo hwavo kokomisheni iyi, VaZakeo Mutimutema, avo vanove chipangamazano chezvemitemo musangano revashandi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, ZCTU, vati vakapindwa nemabhodhoro mumaziso mushure mekupfurwa kwakaitwa mahwindo emahofisi eZCTU pamhirizhonga iyi ivo vari mukati memahofisi aya. VaMutimutema vatiwo vanhu vose vakakuvara kana vane hama dzakafa mumhirizhonga iyi, vanofanira kuripwa. Izvi zvatsinhirwa naVaTinei Zhuwao avo vakashaikirwa nemukoma wavo, VaBrian Zhuwao, mumhirizhonga yanetsa munyika iyi. VaZhuwao vati mukoma wavo vairarama nekutengesa pakati pedhorobha. Vafakazi vazhinji vapa hufakazi vati zviri pachena kuti masoja ndiwo akauraya vanhu musi uyu sezvo pane mavhidhiyo akabuda achiratidza masoja achiridza pfuti musi uyu. VaMadhuku vaudza Studio 7 kuti vari kutarisira kuti vari muchiuto vachapa humbowo hwavo kuomisheni yavo neChishanu. Zvichakadai, komisheni iyi yashanyira nzvimbo dzinonzi dzakaitikira mhirizhonga iyi dzinosanganisira muzinda weZanu PF, mahofisi eZanu PF mupurovhinzi yeHarare pamwe nemuzinda wekomisheni inoona nezvesarudzo, Zimbabwe Electoral Commission. Zvinonzi pane vanhu vatanhatu vakafa mumhirizhonga iyi mushure mekupfurwa nevari kufungidzirwa kuti masoja. Asi masangano anoshanda akazvimirira anoti vanhu vakafa musi uyu vanodarika gumi sezvo vamwe vevanhu ava vakafira munzira vachiendeswa kuzvipatara. VaMotlanthe vanoti vachasvitsa gwaro rezvavachawana muongororo yavari kuita iyi kumutungamiri wenyika mukati memwedzi mitatu kubva pakagadzwa komisheni yavo. No media source currently available
title: Vanhu Vakawanda Vanoti Havana Chivimbo neKomisheni yaVaMotlanthe

text: Veruzhinji vanoti Dickson Chingaira, uyo aizivikanwa nezita rekuti Comrade Chinx munyaya dzemimhanzi, anofanirwa kuvigwa kumakuva anovigwa magamba enyika zvichitevera kushaya kwaakaita neChishanu chapfuura. Veruzhinji vaswera vachibata mawoko pamba pemufi mumusha weMabelreign muno muHarare vakamirira kunzwa kuti Chinx achapihwa ruremekedzo rwakadii nehurumende. Mumwe wevanhu vauya kuzochema Chinx igurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, avo vati nyika yarasikirwa zvikuru nekushaya kwakaita Chinx. Mashoko aVaChinamasa atsinhirwa nemumwe muimbi akamboita mukurumbira, Knowledge Kunenyati, uyo anoti anoita zvekuimba pamwe nebato reZanu PF, anoti arasikirwawo negamba. Vamwe vaimbi vakaita saOliver Mtukudzi naSulumani Chimbetu ndevamwe vevakauyawo pakupera kwesvondo kuzochema nemhuri yekwaChingaira. Imwe nhengo yechikwata cheDzimbabwe icho chaiimba na Chinx uye vari mumwe wevakashanda pamwe chete nemufi kubva vachiri kuhondo, Amai Beauty Kachidza, vati vakarwa muhondo yeChimurenga vakapihwa hushingi pamwe nekuvaraidzwa nenziyo dzaChinx. VaChinamasa vati ruzhinji rweZimbabwe rwune zvakawanda zvekudzidza kubva munziyo dzakaimbwa naChinx munguva yehondo uye nyika yawana kuzvitonga kuzere. Mumwe anoteerera nziyo dzaChinx, Muzvare Mavis Kambunda, vati havaone chiri kunetsa kuti hurumende itore nguva ichizeya kuti yopa mufi ruremekedzo rwegamba renyika here kana kuti kwete kana pakatariswa nhoroondo yake. Muzvare Kambunda vati pamarinda anovigwa magamba enyika pakazara vanhu vakawanda vasingakodzere kuvapo vasina chavakaita chinobatika, nokudaro vati hapana chekuti hurumende imboswerozeya pamusoro paChinx. Vehukama vatataura navo vati havana zvavangakwanisa kutaura kudzamara vanzwa kuti hurumende ichatora danho ripi zvichitevera chikumbiro chakasvitswa nehutungamiri hwepurovhinzi yeHarare mubato Zanu PF pamwe nemuboka revaimbova varwi muhondo yerusununguko. Asi pataenda pamhepo, gurukota rinoona nezvinoitika mukati menyika, VaIgnatius Chombo, vanga vachiti havasati vatambira zvikumbiro izvi kuti vaone kuti votora danho ripi. Chinx akashayika musi weChishanu muHarare mushure mekurwara kwenguva refu nechirwere chegomarara. Muimbi asiya madzimai maviri nevana gumi nevana. No media source currently available
title: Zanu PF Yoramba Yakanyarara Pakuti Chix Chingaira Oitwa Gamba Here Kana Kuti Kwete

text: Kamwe kamhando kechirwere ichi kanonzi omicron stealth subvariant BA.2 kanonzi kave kupararira zvinotyisa munyika dzemuEurope dzakaita seGermany, Britain, France, Italy, muAmerica nedzimwe. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dzinonzi dziri kuongorora kamhando katsva aka kanonzi kanogona kunetsa kubatwa kana munhu achinge avhenekwa hutachiona hweCovid-19. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvirwere zvekutapuriranwa Muzvinafundo Davison Sangweme vanodzidzisa paUniversity of North Georgia muAmerica vaudza Studio 7 kuti chirwere chemhando yeCovid-19 chinoramba chichinja chinja nekudaro vanhu vanofanira kubayiwa nhomba yeCovid-19. Munhu mumwe chete akafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika nezuro zvasiya vafa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kupararira muna 2020 vave zviuru zvishanu nemazana mana negumi nevanomwe kana kuti 5 417. Vanhu mazana mana nemakumi mashanu nematanhatu vakabatwawo nechirwere ichi nezuro kusanganisira vana vechikoro makumi mapfumbamwe nevanomwe.
title: Imwe Mhando yeCovid-19 Yotanga Kupararira Zvinotyisa

text: University of Zimbabwe neChipiri yakambovharwa zvichitevera kuratidzira kwevarairidzi, vadzidzisi nevamwe vashandi. Mapurisa anodzivirira mhirizhonga akanda hutsi hunokatyidza achimanikidza vadzidzi kuti vabve pachikoro ichi sezvo vange vapihwa maawa mashoma kusvika nenguva dza 3 masikati kuti vabve pauniversity of Zimbabwe. Mukuru weuniversity of zimbabwe, Muzvinafundo Levi Nyagura, vanonzi vaita tsoka ndibereke vachitiza mushure mekunge vadzidzi vange voda kuvaita kanyama kanyama. Tsamba yanyorwa nemunyori wepaUniversity inoti chikoro ichi chichavhurwa nemusi wa24 svondo rinouya. Zvinhu zvinonzi zvakaitawo manyama amire nerongo paMidlands State University kuGweru nenational University of Science and Technology kuBulawayo. Hurumende iri kutatarika kubhadhara vashandi mari nekuda kwekuderera kwemitero sezvo makambani akawanda ari kuvharwa. Mukuru wesangano revadzidzi reZimbabwe National Students Union VaGilbert Mutubuki vanoti vadzidzi havasi kufara nezviri kuitika muzvikoro zvose zvepamusoro soro. No media source currently available Hatina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvedzidzo yepamusoro Amai Oppah Muchinguri Kashiri kuti tinzwe divi ravo.
title: University of Zimbabwe Inombovharwa

text: Rimwe sangano rinomirira varairidzi, reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe (PTUZ) rinokurudzira hurumende kuti igadzirise zviri kunetsa muzvikoro nekukurumidza kuitira kuti vana vechikoro vasarasikirwa nedzidzo yegore rose. Mutungamiri wePTUZ, Doctor Takavafira Zhou, vaudza Studio 7 kuti masangano ose anomirira varairidzi, kunze kwerimwe chete, akabvumirana kuenderera mberi nekuramwa mabasa kusvika hurumende yagadzirisa zvichemo zvavo, zvinosanganisa mihoro yavo nezvikwanisirozvekudzivirira vadzidzi nevarairidzi kuti vasabatwa nechirwere che Covid-19. Doctor Zhou vanoti chimwe chichemo chaendeswa kuhurumende ndechokuti hurumende ibvume kuti munguva yedzidzo yasara gore rino, paitwe matemu maviri chete, kwete matatu, vachiti izvi zvinopa varairidzi nguva yakakwana yekudzidzisa uye yekuzokwanisa kunyoresa vana bvunzo. No media source currently available Mutungamiri weZimbabwe Teachers Association, VaRichard Gundani, vaudzavo Studio 7 kuti shuviro yesangano ravo ndeyekuti sezvo zvikoro zvavhurwa kudai, vana vawane mukana wekudzidza, vachiti asi mukana uyu unogona kusavepo mushure mekunge varairidzi vashaya mari yekuenda kubasa. No media source currently available Tatadza kubata mutauriri webazi redzidzo yepasi, VaTaungana Ndoro, sezvo nharembozha yavo yange isingadavirwi.
title: Varairidzi Vanoti Vacharamba Vachiramwa Mabasa Kusvika Zvichemo Zvavo Zvagadziriswa

text: Mutungamiri weMDC Alliance, VaNelson Chamisa, vanoti vachapinda musarudzo dzesvondo rinouya kunyange hazvo vachigunun'una nemafambisirwo ari kuitwa sarudzo idzi nekomisheni inoona nezvesarudzo yeZimbabwe Electoral Commission. Vachitaura nevatori venhau pamuzinda webato ravo paMorgan Tsvangirai House muHarare, VaChamisa vati vachapinda musarudzo dzemusi weMuvhuro kunyange komisheni inoona nezvesarudzo isina kugadzirisa nhuna dzavo. VaChamisa nemubatanidzwa wavo veMDC Alliance vari kuda kuti vapihwe gwaro revavhoti rine mifananidzo yevanhu vakanyoresa kuvhota pamwe nekuti nekuti chimiro chebepa richashandiswa pakuvhota chichinjwe. VaChamisa vatiwo kunyange hazvo hwaro hwesarudzo husina kugadziriswa zvakanaka pamberi pesarudzo idzi, vane chivimbo chekuti vachakunda musarudzo idzi. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika uye vachishanda vakazvimirira, VaSydney Masamvu, vati VaChamisa pamwe neMDC Alliance vakaiswa panguva yakawomarara nekuramba kuri kuita Zec kugadzirisa nhuna dzavo pamwe nezviri kutarisirwa neveruzhinji avo vavanoti vari kuona sekuti sarudzo ndidzo chete dzinokwanisa kupedza nhamo yave kuita kuti vanhonge svosve nemuromo sezvo hupfumi hwenyika hwavakuita kunge juzi raTizirai rinoti uku riri kurukwa uku riri kurudunurwa. Zvichakadai, vaimbova mutungamiri weGhana, VaJohn Dramani Mahama, avo vari kutungamirira chikwata cheCommonwealth chiri kuongorora sarudzo, vati Zec inofanira kutambirawo zvichemo zvemapato ose ari kukwikwidza yoedza kuzvigadzirisa sarudzo idzi dzisati dzaitwa kuitira kuti zvichabuda musarudzo zvitambirike. VaMahama vaudza vatori venhau kuti Commonwealth ichatarisawo mafambisirwo achaitwa sarudzo dzemusi weMuvhuro kuti ione kuti Zimbabwe yodzoserwa here muCommonwealth kana kuti kwete. No media source currently available
title: VaChamisa Vanoti MDC Alliance Hairamwire Munda kuMakudo

text: Gurukota rezvemari, Va Patrick Phinamasa, vari mu Washington DC umo vari kupinda misangano ye World Bank ne International Monetary Fund. VaChinamasa vanoti vachange vachisangana nebazi rezvekudyidzana kweAmerica nenyika dzekunze vachizeya nyaya yekuti zvirango zvakatemerwa nyika zvibviswe sezvo zviri kukanganisa hupfumi hwenyika. VaChinamasa vari America pamwechete nagavhuna webhanga guru renyika, VaJohn Mangudya, avo vachange vachipindawo mumisangano iyi. VaChinamasa vati kunyange hazvo zvinhu zvakawoma munyika, vachayedza kubhadhara mabhonasi evashandi vehurumende sekutaura kwavakaita. Panyaya yekudzingwa basa kwavanamukoti kwakaitika neChipiri mushure mekunge varatidzira, VaChinamasa vati vari kukatyamadzwa nezviri kuitika sezvo pavakabva munyika izvi zvakange zvisati zvaitika. Vaenderera mberi vachiti sangano rinomirira vanamukoti rinofanirwa kutaurirana nenhengo dzaro sezvo chinguva chapfuura sangano iri rakaita misangano nehurumende pakamboramwa vana chiremba mabasa vakawirirana pamusoro pemihoro yevashandi ava. VaChinamasa vati zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika zvinofanirwa kutora mukana uripo pari zvino kuti vaite mabhizimusi kumusha. No media source currently available
title: VaChinamasa Vanoti Vari muWashington Vachipinda Misangano yeWorld Bank neIMF

text: Vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu vanoti kongiresi yakaitwa ne Zanu-PF haina zvizhinji zvekuyemura sezvo mubato iri machine makakatanwa. Vanotiwo havasi kufara kuti mauto ari kubuda pachena kuti achange achitsigira Zanu-PF musarudzo. Mukuru weHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica, VaDewa Mavhinga, vanoti hazvifadzi kuona munhu akaita semukuru wemauto, VaConstatino Chiwenga, nevamwe vakuru muchiuto vari pakongiresi yebato sezvo mauto achifanirwa kunge achimirira munhu wese. “Mauto akabata chikamu chikuru, nevaimbove varwi verusununguko, ma War Veterans, ndivo vakanyatso kwidziridzwa pagungano re Zanu-PF rakaitwa muHarare,” VaMavhinga vaudza Studio 7. Vatiwo zviri kuitwa neANC kuSouth Africa zvakasiyana nezviri kuitika muZimbabwe nekuti kuSouth Africa hauone musoja panenge pachiitwa misangano yezvematongerwo enyika. No media source currently available
title: Kupindira kweMauto Munyaya dzeMatongerwo eNyika Kwoshorwa

text: Mwana ane mwedzi gumi nemumwe chete ashaya nhasi kuchipatara cheParirenyatwa mushure mekushaya rubatsoro sezvo pachipatara apa pasina vana chiremba vakakwana. Studio 7 yasangana nezvinorwadza apo yanga ichiongorora mamiriro akaita zvinhu paParirenyatwa. Mwana aonekwa neStudio7 achifa, afira mumupanda unoitirwa resuscitation, umo manga muina chiremba mumwe chete. Vamwe varwere vanga vari mumupanda uyu, vachema vachiona mwana uyu achirasikirwa nehupenyu hwake. Amai vemwana uyu nedzimwe hama dzanga dzauya, vachema zvinopisa tsitsi. Kunyange hazvo amai vemwana uyu vasina kuda kutaura pamhepo, vaudza Studio7 kuti mwana wavo anga achidurura, uye vakange vambouya naye kuchipatara Chipiri chapfuuura, asi vakashaya rubatsiro sezvo kwaive kusina vana chiremba. Amai vemwana uyu vatiwo dai mwana wavo anga aonekwa nana chiremba, angadai asina kufa. Imwe hama yange iripo yatiwo kunyange hazvo mwana uyu akauya kuParirenyatwa nezuro, afa asati aonekwa nachiremba. Kushaya kwaita mwana uyu, munongedzo kune zvakawanda zviri kuitika muzvipatara zvehurumende munyika yose. VaStanley Pasi, avo vanga vaine mudzimai wavo, vati vatozorapwa mushure mekunge mumwe murwere audza mukoti ange avataurira kuti chiremba haachakwanisi kuona vamwe vanhu kuti ange ave kufonera gurukota rezveutano. VaPasi vati dai vana chiremba vaita mwoyo murefu kuitira kuti vabatsire varwere. Pazopinda Studio7 mudzimba dzevarwere panguva dzemasikati, varwere vakawanda vange vachisiririsa vachiti vave nemazuva ane chitsama vasina kuonekwa navanachiremba. Mumwe murume anga auya kuzoona murwere ada kuzivikanwa nezita rekuti Tawanda, ati murwere wavo ave nemazuva mana asina kumboona chiremba. Tawanda ati muWard mune hama yake muri kufiwa zvinotyisa. Atiwo dai hurumende yapa vanachiremba mari dzavari kuda kuitira kuti vadzokere kumabasa. Izvi zvatsigirwawo naVaEl Gibboo vataurawo kuti mai vavo vari muchipatara vari kurwadziwa. VaGibbo vati kunyangwe zvazvo mamwe mapiritsi aimwiwa naamai vavo apera, havasi kukwanisa kutenga mamwe sezvo vachifanirwa kunyorerwa nachiremba kuti vagone kuatenga. Vamwewo amai vada kuzivikanwa nezita rekuti Kukuwe vati zvinosuwisa kuti hapana rubatsiro rwavanokwanisa kupa hama yavo iri muchipatara. Vana chiremba vanoti havana zvikwanisiro zvekuti vaende kumabasa. Asi izvi zvakazowedzerwawo nekupambwa kwakaitwa vakafanobata chigaro chemutungamiri weZimbabwe Hospital Doctors’ Association, Dr. Peter Magombeyi, avo vakazowanikwa neChina manheru. Vakasanobata chigaro chemutevedzeri wemutungamiriri weZimbabwe Hospital Doctors’ Association, Dr. Masimba Ndoro, vati kunyange hazvo Dr. Magombeyi vakawanikwa, vanachiremba havana mari yekuti vaende kumabasa. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata gurukota rezveutano, VaObadiah Moyo, kuti tinzwe matanho ari kutorwa nehurumende. Asi VaMoyo vakati vachaisa vana chiremba vekumauto nemapurisa muzvipatara zvehurumende kuitira kuti vabatsire mukurapa varwere. No media source currently available
title: Zvinhu Zvoramba Zvichioma Muzvipatara zveHurumende

text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa svondo rino vari kutarisirwa kutungamira chikwata chemapato madiki anopikisa kuChimanimani neChipinge, Manicaland kunooona kuparadzwa kwakaitwa nzvimbo iyi detumupengo kana kuti tropical cyclone Idai. VaMnangagwa vari kuenda nevatungamiri vakaita savanna Muzvare Thokozani Khupe, Muzvinafundo Lovemore Madhuku, VaBrian Mteki nevamwe vari muchikwata chavari kuita nacho nhaurirano. Vamwe vatungamiri vakaisa semutungamiri webato guru rinopikisa VaNelson Chamisa veMDC, Amai Joyce Mujuru, VaNoah Manyika, VaDaniel Shumba havasi muhurongwa hwavaMnangagagwa uhu. Hurumende inoti vanhu mazana maviri nemakumi masere vakafa uye vamwe mazana matatu havasi kuzivikanwa kuti vari kupi. Pavanhu ava makumi masere nevaviri vanonzi vakavigwa kuMozambique mushure mekuyeredzwa nemvura. Aka ndekechipiri vamnangagwa vachishanyira nzvimbo iyi. Kunyangwe hazvo rubatsiro rwuri kuuya kubva kumativi mana ose enyika nekunze, vamwe vagari vemunharaunda iyi vanoti havana matende, chikafu kana mvura yekunwa yakachena. VaMadhuku vaudza Studio 7 kuti vari kuenda kechipiri asi vanotarisira kuti rwendo rwuno vachaenda kumberi pane kwavakambosvika sezvo migwagwa yaisafambika zvakanaka. VaMadhuku vati zuva rekusimuka harisati razivuswa asi ivhiki rino. No media source currently available
title: VaMnangagwa, Muzvare Khupe, VaMadhuku neVamwe Vobatana Kuenda kuManicaland

text: Rimwe sangano rinomirira vanozviitira mabasa emaoko, reQueen of Grace Zimasset Trust, iro ranga riine hurongwa hwekuchenesa guta reHarare pamwe nekutanga kubvisa vanotengesera mumigwagwa mukati meguta, rinoti hurongwa hwekuchenesa guta hwabudirira. Asi hurongwa hwekuti sangano iri riburitse vanotengesera mumigwaga hahuna kuitwa nezvikonzero zvisina kuzivikanwa. Mukuru wesangano iri, VaEphraim Chizola vanoti zviuru nezviuru zvevanhu zvabatana nesangano ravo mukuchenesa guta, uye hurongwa hwavo hwafamba sematarisiro avo. Asi varamba mashoko ekuti vanhu vamanikidzwa vachiti vanhu vose vabuda pasina kumanikidzwa, chiratidzo chekuti vari kutambira sangano ravo. Sangano iri rinonzi ranga richitengesawo makadhi ekuti vanhu vave nhengo, danho rinonzi naVaChizola nderekuunganidza mari yekuti sangano ravo rizobatsira nhengo mune remangwana. Vanhu ava vanonzi vazoungana paHarare Main Post Office apo gurukota rezvemakambani madiki neepakati, Amai Sithembiso Nyoni vanonzi vazotaura kuvanhu ava. Asi mukuru werimwe sangano revanotengesera mumigwagwa, reNational Vendors Union Zimbabwe VaSamuel Wadzayi vanoti sangano reQueen of Grace ZimAsset Trust ramanikidza vanhu kuenda kumusangano waro, richishanda nevechidiki vebato reZanu PF. Vanoti nhengo dzavo hadzina kupinda muhurongwa uhwu sezvo hwanga huri hwezvematongerwo enyika. VaWadzayi vanoti vanhu vanoshandira mumigwagwa vanga vachimanikidzwa kutenga makadhi esangano iri, ayo anonzi anga achitengwa nedhora rimwechete. Vanoti Queen of Grace Trust iri kushandiswa nevezvematongerwo enyika kutora mari dzevanhu kuburikidza nekuvabhadharisa mitero nezvimwe zvakadaro. Bepanhau reSunday Mail remusi wa 7 Chikumi gore rino rakati kune masangano ari kunyuka akawanda anosanganisira iro reQueen of Grace ZimAsset Trust, arikuyedza kusvisebedza pedyo nemudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika Amai Grace Mugabe nezvinangwa zvekuedza kuwana kucherechedzwa uye kuti asanan’anidzwa nevemutemo. Asi VaChizola varamba muonero uyu vakati sangano ravo harina kana rimwe zuva rarakamboshandisa zita remudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika kuendesa mberi zvido zvaro. Vanoti zita ravo rine chekuita nenyasha dzeMusiki kwete Amai Mugabe. No media source currently available No media source currently available
title: Sangaro reQueen of Grace ZimAsset Trust Rinoramba Mashoko eKuti Riri Kumanikidza Vanhu Kuve Nhengo

text: Mapato anopikisa mudunhu reMashonaland West anopesana nehurongwa hweZimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, hwekusavhura nzvimbo dzekunyoresa kuvhota mune mamwe matunhu avanoti akakosha. Mapato aya anoti anoshamiswa zvikuru kuti ZEC yakatadza kuvhura kana nzvimbo imwechete zvayo yekunyoresa kuvhota muChinhoyi vachiti kune nzvimbo dzemigodhi dzakaita seAlaska neShackleton Mine, idzo dzinogara vanhu vakawanda vaisabvumirwa kuvhota vachinzi hazvisi zvizvarwa zvizere zvemunyika. Nhengo yeMDC-T inotungamirirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai inoona nezvesarudzo VaEdward Kadewere vanoti ZEC haina kubvunza vemapato ezvematongerwo enyika pavakasarudza nzvimbo dzekudzokorora kunyoresa kuvhota. VaKadewere vanoti humbimbindoga hweZEC uhu ndihwo hunoita kuti zvinhu zvisafambe zvakanaka munyaya dzesarudzo munyika. Sachigaro wevechidiki mubato reNational People’s Party, NPP, inotungamirirwa nevaimbove mutevedzeri wenyika Amai Joyce Mujuru, VaShepherd Matsose vanoti zviri kuitwa neZEC zvekusavhura nzvimbo dzekunyoresa kuvhota munogara vanhu vaisabvumirwa kuvhota vachinzi hazvisi zvizvarwa zvizere zvemunyika kubirira sarudzo. VaMatsose vanoti bato ravo harivimbe nekufambiswa kwesarudzo kunoitwa neZEC. Patavayeuchidza kuti muChinhoyi mune nzvimbo yedunhu inogara yakavhurwa, VaKadewere vanoti nzvimbo dzakavhurwa kunyoresa kuvhota dzose dzine nzvimbo dzematunhu dzinogara dzakavhurwa uye vanhu vanotokwira zvekufambisa kuuya muChinhoyi kuzonyoresa. Asi mukuru weZEC mudunhu reMashonaland West VaAustine Ndlovu vanoti kunyoresa kuvhota kwakawedzerwa nguva kuri kuitwa uku kwakasarudzwa nzvimbo dzekunyoresa vachitarisa nzvimbo dzakapihwa vanhu zvitupa nemagwaro ekuzvarwa chirongwa chekunyoresa kuvhota chatanga kare. Kunyoresa kuvhota kwekupedzisira uku kwakatanga musiwa 10 Ndira uye kuchapera musiwa 8 Kukadzi. Vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni mana vanonzi vakakwanisa kunyoresa kuvhota muzvikamu zvina zvekunyoresa zvakaitwa gore rapera kunyange ZEC yaitarisira kunyoresa vanhu mamiriyoni manomwe. No media source currently available
title: Mapato ezveMatongerwo eNyika Opomera ZEC Mhosva Yekuita Zanondega

text: Thomas Chiripasi Vagari ava vatakura mvura ine tsvina kuenda nayo kumusangano uyu iyo yavaratidza kuna meya weguta reHarare VaBenard Manyenyeni. Mumwe mugari wemuHarare uye vari mumwe wevanorwira kodzero dzevanhu munyika, Mufundisi Evan Mawarire vaudza VaManyenyeni kuti havasi kufara nemvura iri kubuda mudzipombi iine ruvara rwakasviba. Mumwe mugari zvakare, VaSharon Mumbula, vanoti vakuru-vakuru vekanzuru yeHarare kusanganisira meya, vanofanira kusiya basa vachiti vanhu ava vaisa hupenyu heve veruzhinji panjodzi. Zvichakadai, VaManyenyeni vaudza musangano uyu kuti kanzuru yavo haina mari yekunze yekutenga mishonga yekuchenesa mvura vakayambira veruzhinji kuti vashandise mvura yekanzuru vakangwarira. VaManyenyeni vatiwo vanhu vawandisa mudhorobha reHarare zvavekupa kuti kanzuru ikundikane kuwanisa vagari vese mvura yakachena. VaManyenyeni vakurudzirawo hurumende kuti iisewo mari mubhajeti rekanzuru yavo kuti ikwanise kuwanisa vanhu mvura yakachena vachiti kanzuru yavo ndiyo yoga munyika iri kurarama nemari dzemitero inobviswa nevagari. Vatiwo chimwe chinoda kuitwa kuona kuti kanzuru yakwanisa kutora mvura kubva kune mamwe madhamu akaita seKunzvi Dam kuitira kuti mvura ikwanire vagari avo vavanoti vawandisa muHarare kudarika vakanga vakatarwa kuti vagare muguta iri. Pari zvino kanzuru yeHarare iri kuwana mvura kubva kudhamhu reChivero, asi Meya Manyenyeni vanoti kanzuru yavo yawandirwa sezvo yakanga yakagadzirirwa kuwanisa vanhu vanoita mazana matatu ezviuru mvura, asi pari zvino yave kumanikidzwa kupa vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni mana. Kanzuru yeHarare inowaniwaso mvura kuvagari veChitungwiza, Norton, neRuwa.
title: Vagari vemuHarare Vanonyunyuta Pamusoro peMvura Ine Tsvina

text: Nyaya yekuti Zimbabwe iri kutadza kuita sarudzo dzema by-election kutsiva nhengo dzeparamende pamwe nemakanzura dzakadzingwa nebato reMDC-T inotungamirirwa naVaDouglas Mwonzora, nezvikonzero zvedenda reCovid-19 yasimudza zvakare mutauro munyika zvichitevera kuitwa kwesarudzo muZambia. Vamwe vanoti hurumende yeZanu PF iri kungohwanda nemunwe ichishandisa denda reCovid-19 sechikonzero asi iyo ichiziva zvayo kuti uyu mukana wekuti bato reMDC Alliance, rinove bato guru rinopikisa munyika, risave nemasimba kwese kumakanzuru nemuparamende. Rimwe gweta rekodzero dzevanhu uye vari mukuru weHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica, VaDewa Mavhinga, vanoti hurumende inokwanisa kuitawo kuti sarudzo idzi dziitwe pachingoteverwawo mitemo inokurudzirwa yekudzivirira kupararira kweCovid-19, sezvo zvigaro zvisina humiriri zvichifanirwa kuzadziswa. VaMavhinga vanoti dzimwe nyika dzisiri Zambia, dzakaita seMalawi neUganda dzakabvawo kuita sarudzo munguva imwe cheteyo yeCovid-19, zvichireva kuti hapana chinotadzisawo Zimbabwe kuita zvimwe chete. Asi rimwe gweta uye vari nhengo yeZanu PF kuBritain, Doctor Simba Mavaza, vanotiwo Zanu PF kana hurumende havasi ivo vari kumisa sarudzo idzi, asi kuti pari kuteverwa kurudziro yakabva kunyanzvi dzezvehiutano. Doctor Mavaza vanotiwo Zimbabwe inyika yakazvimirira uye haifanirwe kutevedzera zvaitwa nedzimwe nyika kunyange zvichiisa hutano hwevanhu munjodzi. Bato reMDC-Alliance riri kuti rakagadzirira kupinda musarudzo dze by-election idzi chero nguva uye rinoti rinoziva kuti rinokunda zvine mutsindo. Asi vamwe vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vanoti kanaMDC Alliance yakapinda zvakare musarudzo nezita iri hapana chinozomisa bato reMDC-T kudzinga zvakare vamiriri vanenge vasarudzwa ivavo richishandisa mutemo mumwechete iwoyo warakamboshandisa pakutanga. Vachipawo maonero avo panyaya yezita iyi, VaMavhinga vanoti zvinogona kuitika zvakare kuti MDc-T inoshandisa mutemo iwoyo kana MDC Alliance yakadzokera zvakare musarudzo nezita iroro, vachitiwo zvakare zvainonetsa kuti vamiriri ava vapinde vari vakazvimirira, sezvo zvichizoita kuti bato iri rinyimwe mari dzinopiwa mapato anenge aine humiriri muparamende. Asi Doctor Mavaza vanoti MDC Alliance yaikwanisa kunge yakaita kongiresi yayo ichichinja zita, asi haidi kudaro nekuti haizowana mukana wekupomera kuti sarudzo dzabiridzirwa kana ichinge yakundwa neZanu PF. No media source currently available
title: Maonero Akasiyana Obuda paNyaya yeKusendekwa kweSarudzo dzeBy-Election

text: Zanu PF yasangana nevanotengesera mumigwagwa muHarare ikavavimbisa kuti havasi kuzovadzinga panzvimbo dzavanoshandira kana ichinge yakunda musarudzo. Vanotengesera mumigwagwa vaudza hutungamiri hweZanu PF hwanga huchitungamirwa nasachigaro webato iri, Amai Oppah Muchinguri Kashiri, kuti havasi kufara nekutorerwa zvinhu zvavanotengesa nevashandi vemakanzuru ari pasi peMDC-T inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa. Mutungamiri wesangano reNational Vendors Union of Zimbabwe, VaSten Zvorwadza, avo vakabuda pachena kuti vave kutsigira Zanu PF, vati vanhu vane chitsama vanorarama nekutengesera mumigwagwa vave zvirema zvichitevera kukuvadzwa kwavanoti vakaitwa nemapurisa emakanzuru ari pasi peMDC-T. Amai Muchinguri Kashiri, avo vataura vakamirira mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, avo vanga vaenda kuSouth Africa, vati hurumende ichaumba komisheni ichaongorora makanzura ose anga ari pazvigaro kubva muna 2013 kusvika pari zvino. Amai Muchinguri Kashiri vaenderera mberi vachiti hurumende ine hurongwa hwekuvaka nzvimbo dzekuengesera dzakanaka vachiti hapana munhu achadzingwa panzvimbo yaanenge achitengesera kana Zanu PF ikakunda musarudzo vachiti vachatanga vavaka nzvimbo dzokutengesera dzakanaka vasati vatanga kubvisa vanhu munzvimbo dzavari kutengesera. Vanotengesera mumigwagwa vanogara vachinetsana nemapurisa emakanzuru ayo anenge achishanda pamwe chete nemapurisa enyika avo vanenge vachida kuti vanotengesera mumigwagwa ava vatengesere munzvimbo dzakatarwa nekanzuru. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika uye vachishanda vakazvimirira, VaBlessing Vava, vati mashoko eZanu PF aya ndeekutsvaga rutsigiro chete pamberi pesarudzo asi bato iri rozoshungurudza vanhu kana sarudzo dzapera. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nemutauriri weMDCT, Amai Thabitha Khumalo, kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi. Asi mutevedzeri wemutungamiri webato iri, VaElias Mudzuri, vakaudza vanotengesera mumigwagwa mwedzi mishoma yadarika kuti bato ravo hariwirirane nekushungurudzwa kunoitwa vanotengesera mumigwagwa nemapurisa enyika kunyanya pamwe nemapurisa ekanzuru. VaMudzuri vakati chinofanirwa kuitwa kugadzirisa hupfumi hwenyika kutanga kwete kuti mapurisa aswere achiita hwekiti negonzo nevanotengesera mumigwagwa vanenge vachitsvagawo raramo. No media source currently available
title: Zanu PF Yovimbisa Vanotengesa Mumigwagwa "Mutambara Kede" Kana Ikakunda

text: Vanotengesera zvinhu zviri kunze kwemutemo paMakoni Shopping Centre, kuChitungwiza vanonzi vakarwisana nemapurisa ekanzuru mangwanani emusi weChipiri. Izvi zvinonzi zvakaitika mushure mekunge mapurisa anosvika gumi nemashanu ayedza kuvabvisa nechisimba panzvimbo dzavari kushandira vari. Mukuru wesangano revagari reChitungwiza Residents Trust, VaMarvellous Khumalo vanoti mapurisa aya, ayo anonzi anga akapakata mboma, ainge aine chinangwa chekubvisa vanotengesa zvinhu ava panzvimbo iyi vachivaendesa kune imwe nzvimbo yakatarwa nekanzuru. Asi izvi zvinonzi zvakaita kuti vanhu ava vararambe kubva vachiendeswa kunzvimbo iyi vachiti hakusviki makasitoma. VaKhumalo vanotiwo vane humbowo hwekuti kanzuru yeChitungwiza yakatsvaga imwe kambani inonzi Clyna Private Limited kuti ironge patsva, yogadzirisa pamwe nekufambisa hurongwa hwekubvisa vanotengesa ava ichivaendesa kunzvimbo dzakatarwa nekanzuru. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kukambani yeClyna Private Limited. VaKhumalo vanotiwo kambani iyi ndiyo inenge yotora mari kubva kune vanotengesa zvinhu ava ichizoendesa kukanzuru, danho ravanoti sevagari havawirirane naro. Kanzuru inonzi iri kupomera vanotengesera paMakoni ava mhosva yekuvaka misika panzvimbo iyi zvisiri pamutemo. Studio 7 yabata mutauriri wekanzuru yeChitungwiza VaZephaniah Mandirahwe kuti tinzwewo divi rekanzuru, asi vati ivo havakwanise kutaura nezvazvo, vakati titaure nemunyori mukuru wekanzuru, VaGeorge Makunde, asi nhare yavo yanga isiri kudairwa. Taedzawo kubata meya weguta iri VaPhilip Mutoti asi nharembozha yavo yanga isingadairwe zvekare. No media source currently available Hurumende kuburikidza nebazi rinoona nezvematunhu inoti makanzuru ose munyika anofanira kubvisa vanhu vari kutengesera mumigwagwa panzvimbo dinonzi hadzina kufanira.
title: Vanotengesera Zvinhu kuChitungwiza Vanorwisana neMapurisa eKanzuru

text: Rimwe sangano rinomirira varairidzi, reZimbabwe Teachers’ Association (ZIMTA) razivisa kuti kubva musi weChipiri, 6 Kubvumbi, nhengo dzaro dzichange dzave kushanda mazuva matatu pasvondo anoti Muvhuro, Chipiri neChitatu chete. Zimta, iyo yakapinda mumusangano wanezuro iri pasi peZimbabwe Confederation of Public Sector Trade Unions, inoti yatora danho iri zvinotevera kutadza kuwirirana pakati pehurumende nevashandi vayo kwakaitika mumusangano weNational Joint Negotiating Council. Mutauriri weZimbabwe Confederation of Public Sector Trade Unions, VaGibson Mushangu, vakaudzawo Studio7 kuti musangano wavakaita nehurumende hauna chawakabuda nacho. Vakafanobata chigaro chemunyori mukuru we ZIMTA, VaGoodwell Taderera, vanoti vazivisa nhengo dzavo kuti vakaramba kutambira zvakaiswa patafura nehurumende. Hurumende inonzi yakati yaikwanisa kuwedzera mihoro yevashandi vayo nezvikamu makumi maviri nezvishanu kubva muzana, inova mari shoma pane iri kudiwa nevashandi vehurumende. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvevashandi, VaPaul Mavima, kuti tinzwe divi ravo. Asi vachitaura neStudio7 marimwezuro, VaMavima vakati hurumende yakazvipira kugara pasi ichikurukura nevashandi vose vehurumende kuitira kuti zvinenge zvichinetsa zvigadziriswe.. No media source currently available
title: ZIMTA Yokurudzira Nhengo Dzayo Kushanda Mazuva Matatu paSvondo

text: Vasungwa vechidzimai vari kuChikurubi Female Prison vanoti hutano hwavo huri panjodzi sezvo vasiri kuwana zvekudya zvinovaka muviri. Vanoonawo nezveutano kujeri iri vanotiwo vane zvikwereti zvakakura zvikuru kuzvipatara zvinorapwa vasungwa. Pashanyirwa nzvimbo yeChikurubi Female Prison iyi nekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvevanhukadzi, pajeri iri panga pakacheneswa zvikuru kusiyana nemamwe mazuva. Kunyange hazvo panga pakachena, zvanga zvichibuda pachena kuti pane zvimwe zvisina kumira zvakanaka kusanganisira pombi dzemvura muzvimbuzi zvemujeri zvanga zvisingashandi, mvura yacho kwanga kusina uye mapoto anobikirwa vanhu vakawanda mumba yekubikira, anga asingashandi, vamwe vevasungwa vachibikira panze nemapoto madiki ayo anoda kubikwa akawanda. Vasungwa vasangana nenhengo dzeparamende vati dai hurumende yabatsira vasunga nezvekudya zvakasiyasiyana. Vasungwa ava vati vakapedzisira kuwana nyama neshuga muna Zvita gore rapera. Mumwe wevasungwa ava, ndiYvonne Musarurwa nhengo yebato yeMDC-T yakatongerwa kugara mujeri kwemakore makumi maviri. Musarurwa anoti akawanawo zvekudya zvinovaka miviri zvinoita kuti arerukirwe. Angela Chipiti ndemumwewo ari kupika jeri paChikurubi. Chipiti ane mwana ane gore nemwedzi mishanu. Chipiti ashorawo zvekudya zvavari kupiwa akati zvinonzwisa tsitsi ndezvekuti vana vasina mhosva dzavakapara, vanongodyawo panodya vana mai vavo. Chipatara chepajeri iri hachinawo mishonga yakakosha yekubatsira vanorwara. Mumwe mukoti wepachipatara apa, Amai Dudzirai Dziva, vati kirinika yavo yakaratisana nematambudziko akawanda. Kunyange hazvo varwere vanenge vachida kugara muzvipatara vachiendeswa kuzvipatara zvekunze kwejeri,mukuru anoona nezvehutano paChikurubi Maximum Prison, VaEvidence Gaka, vaudzawo nhengo dzeparamende kuti hutano hwevasungwa huri parumananzombe. VaGaka vati chipatara cheParirenyatwa chakavanyorera kuti vanenge vasingachagamuchiri varwere vekujeri kutanga mwedzi waKubvumbi sezvo Zimbabwe Prisons and Correctional Services, ZPCS, iine chikwereti chechipatara ichi chikuru. Mashoko ari kubuda anoti ZPCS ine chikwereti chemamiriyoni matatu emadhora kuzvipatara zviri munyika. Mubhajeti regore rino 2017, ZPCS yakapihwa mari inoita mazana mashanu ezviuru zvemadhora, asi iyo yakanga yakumbira mamiriyoni matatu ane chidimbu chemadhora semari yekubhadhara zvipatara zvinenge zvichirapa varwere. VaGaka vatendawo kuti kusawana zvekudya zvakakwana huye zvinovaka miviri zviri kubata hutano hwevanhu. Vasungwa ava vagunun’unawo nekupiwa mitongo yakareba, vakatiwo vari kugariswa kujeri uku kwenguva ndefu nyaya dzavo dzisati dzatongwa sezvo mapurisa anenge achiri kuongorora nyaya dzavo. Vasungwa vazhinji vataura vanga vachida kuchema nekurwadziwa, uye vati vanobva kunyika dzakadai seDRC, Burundi neZambia. Vasungwa ava vatiwo vari kufa nenzara sezvo vasingadyi zvinobikwa kujeri uku zvakaita sesadza uye havanawo hama dzinokwanisa kuvashanyira nekuvabatsira nezvekudya. Mukuru weChikurubi Female Prison, Amai Mary Chikarakara Misihairambwi, vati kunyange hazvo madzimai ane zvekushandisa zvakakwana panguva yekuteera, jeri iri harina ma tissue, uye vanoshuvirawo kuwana mibhedha nemamwe maunifomu avasungwa. Nhengo yeNational Assembly, Amai Sabhina Mangwende, ndivo vanga vakasanobata chinzvimbochasachigaro wekomiti iyi. Amai Mangwende vati vachagara pasi vozeya matambudziko ari kusanganwa nawo nevasungwa vari kuChikurubi vozosvitsa zvavaona kuhurumende kuitira kuti patorwe matanho. No media source currently available
title: Vasungwa Vari kuChikurubi Female Prison Voyaura neNzara

text: Vamwe vanopikisa, vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu nevemasangano akazvimirira oga vari kupomera hurumende nebato reZanu-PF mhosva yekushungurudza vanopikisa ichishandisa mapurisa nematare edzimhosva pamberi pesarudzo dza2023. Vamwe vari kunzi vari kushungurudzwa vanosanganisira nhengo dzebato reCitizens’ Coalition for Change dzinosanganirisa mumiriri weZengeza West vari mutevedzeri wasachigaro VaJob Sikhala, mumiriri weChitungwiza North pamwe nenhengo nhatu dzeCCC, idzo dzakasungwa kuChimanimani dzichipomera mhosva yekupamba sachigavo vevechidiki mubato reZanu PF, VaNicholas Madzianike. Vamwe vanonzi vari kushungurudzwa vanosanganisiranhengo dzesangano revadzidzisi reAmalgamated Rural Teachers’ Union of Zimbabwe, VaObert Masaraure nemunyori wesangano iri VaRobson Chere nevamwe. Hurumende iri kupomerwawo mhosva yekuvandudza mitemo yakaita seyemashandiro emasangano akazvimirira oga kana kuti Private Voluntary Organization Act kuambunyikidza. Asi vehurumende nebato reZanu-PF vanoti mutemo hautarise kuti munhu wabuda mumba maani. Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika uye vari nhengo yeZanu PF, VaGadzira Chirumhanzu vanoti vanhu vari kunyunyuta kuti hurumende neZanu PF kushungurudza vanopikisa ivavo varipo asi vana veZimbabwe vanoziva kuti vatengesi vari kuda kufadza varungu. VaChirumhanzu vanoti nyika inovakwa nevene vayo saka vana veZimbabwe vari kuziva kuri kuenda nyika vakatora minda kuvaka nyika yavo asi vanopikisa vachirega kutora nekuti vanoda kufadza varungu. Asi vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vakazvimirira, VaTendai Reuben Mbofana, vanoti nyika yave kutoputswa nevene vayo panzvimbo yekuti vange vachiivaka. VaMbofana vanoti chiri nkudiwa iye zvino munyika ndechekuti muve nehutongo hwejekerere, kwete zvekutyorerana kodzero munhu achinzi mutengesi. No media source currently available
title: Hurumende neZanu PF, Vopomerwa Mhosva yeKushungurudza Vanopikisa Pamberi peSarudzo dza2023

text: Masangano anorwira kodzero dzevanhu munyika anoti ari kushushikana zvikuru nekuwedzera kuipa kuri kuita zvinhu munyika vachiti vachazenge vachiratidzira pamwe nekutora mamwe matanho anotenderwa nebumbiro remitemo yenyika. Vachitaura pamusangano wavakokera nhasi muHarare, sachigaro wesangano reCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition VaPeter Mutasa vati zvinhu zvaipisisa munyika munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika pamwe nezvehupfumi nekudaro vanhu vanofanirwa kushandisa nzira dziri pamutemo kuratidzira kunyunyuta kwavo. VaMutasa vakurudzira zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe kuti zvibatane mukugadzirisa nyika. Vatiwo masangano akazvimirira ari kuchema chema nehurumede iri kuramba ichityora kodzero dzeveruzhinji. Vakurudzirawo hurumende kuti igadzirise matambudziko ari munyika. Mukuru weZimbabwe Divine Destiny, Bishop Ancellimo Magaya vataurawo pamusangano uyu vatiwo semakereke vari kukutsigira nyaya yekuti vanhu varatidzire zvinyunyuto zvavo vachiti izvi zvinogadzirisa nyika. VaMagaya vapomera hurumende mhosva yekusashandisa mutemo zvejekerere. VaFortune Kuhudzehwe vanoshanda neZimbabwe Human Rights NGO Forum vatiwo nyaya dzekushungurudzwa kwevanorwira kodzero dzevanhu munyika dzatekeshera. VaKuhudzehwe vatiwo vanoda kuti hurumende irase bhiri rePrivate Voluntary Organisation iro vanoti rakanangana nekumbunyikidza vemasangano akazvimirira oga. Asi vachitaura neStudio 7 mazuva adarika, gurukota rinoona nezvemitemo VaZiyambi Ziyambi vakaramba kuti hurumende iri kushandisa kumbunyikidza vanopikisa vachiti Zimbabwe inyika inotevedzera mutemo nekusunga vanenge vautyora. Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vakanyorawo mubepanhau reSunday Mail kuti hapana kudududza panyaya yekuvanduza mutemo une chekuita nemasangano akazvimirira vachiapomera mhosva yekuda kukonzera kusagadzikana munyika. Asi vemasangano akazvimirira oga vanoti sezvo nyika yatarisana nesarudzo, hurumende yave kuda kuvambunyikidza senzira yekuti vasadzidzise vanhu nezvekodzero dzavo. No media source currently available
title: Masangano Akazvimirira Oga Oronga Kuratidzira

text: Kanzuru yeHarare yatanga neChiatatu kubvisa vanotengesera mumigwagwa asi paita makatanwa pakati pevanotengesera mumigwagwa ava avo vanga vachida kutorerana nzvimbo dzekutengesera. Mutauriri wekanzuru ye Harare, Va Michael Chideme, vaudza Studio 7 kuti kanzuru yavo yaparura hurongwa hwekubvisa vanhu vanotengesera mumigwagwa kuitira kuti vaende kunoita basa ravo vari munzvimbo dzakatarwa nekanzuru. Zvichitevera mashoko aVa Chideme aya, mapurisa ekanzuru anga akapakatira tsvimbo abva apinda mumigwagwa achirambidza vatengesi ava kuti vavhure zvinhu zvavo kuti vatengese vachiti vanofanira kuenda kunvzimbo dzakatarwa nekanzuru idzi. Mapurisa ekanzuru paabvisa vanhu vanotengesa vari panze pemahofisi ekanzuru kuti vanotengesa vari pamusika wepa Copa Cabana, vagara vachitengesa panzvimbo iyoyo vabva varamba kubva vachiti havana kwekuenda. text: Mumwe wevanotengesera mumigwagwa ava, Va Richmond Nhevedzo, vati havana kwavari kuzobva vachienda kana kanzuru isina kuvapa pekuetengesera pavanogutsikana napo. Izvi zvatsinhirwawo naAmai Leocadia Nyajena avo vanoti hakusi kuda kwavo kuti vange vari mumigwagwa. Vamwewo vakaita saVa Liberty Machongwe vanoti vanoda kwazvo kuve nezvitoro zvekutengesera asi zvitoro izvi zvakazadzwa vanozivikanwa munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika pamwe nezvizvarwa zvedzimwe nyika. Zvichakadai, mutungamiri wesangano reZimbabwe Informal Sector Organization, Va Promise Mkwananzi, vashora zvaitwa nekanzuru ye Harare izvi. Zvataurwa naVa Mkwananzi zvatsinhirwawo nemutungamiri wesangano re Unemployed Mobile Youth Foundation, Va Peter Jack. Sachigaro musangano reNehanda Vendors Association, Va Keith Charumbira, vatiwo chinodikanwa ndechekuti hurumende igare pasi nevekanzuru pamwe nevemasangano ese anomirira vanotengesera mumigwagwa kuti vabude nehwaro hungatshandiswa kugadzirisa nyaya dzevanotengesera mumigwagwa. Zvichakadai, VaMkwananzi vaudza Studio 7 kuti vari kuronga kuenda kumatare kuedza kumisa zvatangwa nekanzuru ye Harare izvi. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura negurukota rinowona nezvematunhu, Va Savior Kasukuwere, kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi. Asi Va Kasukuwere vakaudza nhepfenyuro ye ZBC nezuro kuti kanzuru ye Harare inofanira kuwona kuti yabvisa vese vanotengesera mumigwagwa vakatyisidzira kuti vangangodzinga makanzura ese kana akarega kuita izvi. Tichiri panyaya yekubviswa kwevanhu vanotengesera mumigwagwa yeguta reHarare, bato reMDC T rinoti rinoshora zvikuru danho iri sezvo hurumende ichiziva zvikonzero zvakaita kuti vanhu vapinde mumigwagwa vachiswera vachitengesa zvinhu zvavo. Mutauriri weMDC T , VaObert Gutu, vanoti hurumende yeZanu PF yakavimbisa vanhu mabasa anodarika mamiriyoni maviri asi chiri kuwanikwa nevana veZimbabwe inhamo yekuvharirwa makambani mashoma anga asara achishanda. Vanoti izvi ndizvo zvinovasiya vasina imwe nzira yekuriritira nayo mhuri dzavo, kunze kwekupinda mumigwagwa vachitengesa. VaGutu vanoshorawo mashoko egurukota idzva rekutongwa kwematunhu, VaSavoir Kasukuwere, ekuti vachatwasura mashandiro emakanzuru, zvikuru kanzuru yeHarare, kana ikatadza kutora matanho panyaya yevanotengesera mumigwagwa. No media source currently available
title: Kubviswa kweVanotengesera Mumigwagwa Kokonzera Mitauro Yakawanda

text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vasimuka munyika neChishanu vakananga kuSouth Africa kumusangano wechimakumi maviri neshanu wevatungamiri venyika nedzihurumende dzemuAfrica dziri musangano reAfrican Union. Musangano uyu uri kuitirwa muJohannesburg. Vatungamiri venyika vari kutanga kusangana neSvondo kusvika Muvhuro. Asi vatungamiri ava vasati vatanga kusangana, pange paine misangano yakati kuti yakatanga musi weSvondo. Gwaro reAU rinoti VaMugabe sasachigaro ndivo vanenge vachitungamira misangano iyi. Musangano uyu uri kuitwa pasi pedingira rine chekuita nekuremekedzwa kwekodzero dzemadzimai nenyaya dzebudiriro mu Africa. Dzimwe nyaya dzichazeyiwa dzinosanganisira hondo dziri muSomalia, Nigeria, kusagadzikana muBurundi, nyaya yekurwiswa kwezvizvarwa zvekune dzimwe nyika muSouth Africa uye kudyidzana kweAU nedare repasi rose re International Criminal Court. No media source currently available No media source currently available  Mamwe masangano akazvimirira oga gumi nemaviri achitungamirwa ne Amnesty International ari kukurudzira vatungamiri vemuAfrica kuti vatarisise nyaya yemhirizhonga iri kuramba ichiitika muSouth Africa yakanangana nezvizvarwa zvekune dzimwe nyika. Mukuru weAmnesty International kuchamhembe kweAfrica, VaDeprose Muchena, vanoti zvakakosha kuti vatungamiri vemuAfrica vaone kuti munyika dzavo mune runyararo pamwe nekuremekedzwa kwekodzero dzemunhu wese, zvisineyi kuti anobva kupi.
title: Amnesty Yokurudzira Africa Kuremekedza Kodzero dzeVanhu Vose Zvisina Rusarura

text: Kanzuru yeguta reHarare nhasi yafumira kuputsa zvivakwa zvisiri pamutemo mumusha weGlen View 8. Nzimbo yaputswa zvivakwa inozivikanwa nekunzi Glen View Home Industry. Mumwe wevaputsirwa pavanga vachishandira, VaGodfrey Machinga, vati vasiiwa vari panyanga dzamushore sezvo vanga vari kuraramiswa nekugadzira masofa vachiatengesa vari paHome Industry apa. Mumwe muzvinabzizimusi angoda kuzivikanwa nekunzi Tinashe audza Studio 7 kuti vakanzwa runyerekupe madeko rwekuti kanzuru ichazoputsa asi ati pavamukira makuseni kuti vabvise midziyo yavo vawana kanzuru yatotanga kupwanya. Mumwe murume ati anonzi VaTachiona, ati arasikirwa nemari yakawanda zvikuru sezvo pazvinhu zvaanogadzira pasina chaakwanisa kubudisa. Mumwe mugari, VaHardlife Mpezeni, vatiwo varasikirwa nezvigadzirwa zvavo mushure mekubirwa vachiti kune motokari dzatakura masofa nemibhedha yavo vasati vaputsirwa. Mutauriri wekanzuru yeHarare, VaMichael Chideme, vati kanzuru yeguta reHarare yaputsa misasa yevemabhizimusi ava nekuti yakavakirwa muberevere menzira. Mukuru anoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa mudunhu reHarare nenzvimbo dzakaipoteredza, VaTafadzwa Muguti, vakapa yambiro kuti vachange vachizochenesa guta reHarare kuburikidza nekuparadza zvivakwa zvese zvisiri pamutemo. No media source currently available
title: Zvivakwa Zviri paGlen View Home Industry Zvinoputswa

text: Mhirizhonga inotyisa iri kuitika kuHurungwe West uko vanhu vakawanda vari kushungurudzwa kana vachizivikanwa kuti vari kutsigira VaTemba Mliswa, avo vari kukwikwidza vakazvimirira. VaMliswa vakadzingwa muZanu PF vachinzi vaitsigira vaive mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Joice Mujuru. Mhirizhonga inonziwo iri kuitika mudzimwe nzvimbo dziri kuitwa ma by elections musi 10 Chikumi. Asi kuHurungwe West ndiko kunonzi kune mhirizhonga yakanyanyisa, uye vanhu vari kutyisidzirwa negurukota rezvematunhu, Va Ignatius Chombo. Muvhidhiyo itsva iri mumaoko eStudio 7, VaChombo vanoonekwa nekunzwikwa vachiudza masabhuku kuti atungamire vanhu kunovhota izvo zviri kunzi nemasangano anoona nezvesarudzo zvinotyora bumbiro remitemo rinoti masabhuku, nemadzishe haafanire kushandiswa munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika uye ikodzero yemunhu kuvhotera munhu waanoda. No media source currently available Zanu PF inosigara ichiramba kuti inokurudzira mhirizhonga, asi nehunyanzvi hwavako mazuva ano, VaChombo vakatorwa vhidhiyo nembozhare umo vari kuonekwa vari vachitaura mashoko anokurudzira mhirizhonnga. VaMliswa vari kukwikwidzana naVaKeith Guzah veZanu PF Hatina kukwanisa kubata VaGuzah sezvo nharembozha yavo yange isinganzwike zvakanaka patataura navo zvishoma. Sangano reZimbabwe Human Rights Commission rinonzi raenda kuHurungwe West nekupurazi raVaMliswa reSpring Field kunoongorora nyaya dzemhirizhonga dziri kuitika. Izvi zvinotevera mashoko eZimbabwe Peace Project, ZPP neZimbabwe Election Support Network , Zesn, ekuti komisheni iyi neZimbabwe Electoral Commission, dzipinde munzvimbo iyi sezvo mune mhirizhonga inotyisa iri kuitika. ZPP inoti nhengo dzeZanu-PF dzichitsigirwa nevasori dzinonzi dziri kuudza vanhu kuti vakavhotera VaMliswa vanogona kutsakatika zvorova, uye hapana anosungwa. Zvinonziwo nhengo dzeZanu-PF idzi dzavakawo misasa pazvikoro zvakawanda munzvimbo iyi. Mashoko emhirizhonga aya atsinhirwawo nemukuru wesangano reElection Resource Centre, VaTawanda Chimhini. No media source currently available Vanotaura vakamirira bato idzva reProgressive Democrats of Zimbabwe, VaLeornad Kone, vanoti vanofungidzirwa kuti vatsigiri veZanu-PF vari kuvashaisa mufaro. No media source currently available
title: VaChombo Votyisidzira Vanhu kuHurungwe West

text: Masangano anobatsira anonzi ari kuramba achienderera mberi nekubatsira vanhu vakavhiringwa nedutumupengo reCyclone Idai mumatunhu eChimanimani neChipinge kuManicaland, izvo zvaita kuti mimwe migwagwa nemazambuko zvichifambika. Mumiriri weChimanimani West mudare reparamende vari nhengo yeZanu PF, Amai Nokuthula Matsikenyere, vanoti zvinhu zvinenge zvave kutanga kuratidzika mudunhu ravo zvichitevera mabasa ari kuitwa nemasangano anobatsira akasiyanasiya pamwe nehurumende. Vanoti hurumende yakabatana nemasangano aya, iri kugadzirisa migwagwa pamwe nemabhohoro zvakanga zvaparadzwa nedutumupengo. Amai Matsikenyere vanotiwo vanhu vakawanda mudunhu ravo vave kuwaniswa chikafu nekuda kwekugadziriswa kwemigwagwa nemazambuko zvakanga zvaparadzwa. Varambawo mashoko ekuti chikafu chiri kugoverwa pachishandiswa zvematongerwo enyika, vakati mudunhu mavo vezvematongerwo enyika havasi ivo vari kusvitsa chikafu kuvanhu. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, vagari vekwaMutsvangwa kuChimanimani East vanoti vaswera vakagarira guyo sembwa sezvo chikafu chavanga vavimbiswa kuti chichadonhedzwa nendege kudunhu mavo chisina kuuya. Kanzura veWard 23, VaJoel Dhumakwezu veMDC inotungamirirwa naVaNelson Chamisa vanoti chikafu chazouya nendege duku mukudoka kwezuva chadonhedzerwa pakiriniki yepaMutsvanga, uye chinonzi changa chiri chishomashoma. Vanoti kunyange hazvo vazovimbiswa kuti rumwe rubatsiro rwuchadonhedzwa kunzvimbo yavo nekukasika, vari kutadza kunzwisisa kuti sei rubatsiro urwu rwusiri kutakurwa nedzimotokari, sezvo vakagadzirisa migwagwa mizhinji yakanga yakanganiswa nemvura. No media source currently available
title: Zvinhu Zvinonzi Zvotanga Kutarisika kuChimanimani West Mushure meKuparadzwa neCyclone Idai

text: Mutungamiri weMDC, VaMorgan Tsvangirai, varumbidza mabasa akaitwa nemushakabvu, VaMisheck Tofamangwana Kagurabadza, apo vavigwa kumusha kwavo kwaMundenda, Manica Bridge kuManicaland. No media source currently available Vachitaura pakuvigwa kwaVaKagurabadza pamberi pemazana nemazana evanhu vaungana kuzoonekana nemufi, VaTsvangirai vati mushakabvu akanga ari munhu akatsiga, uye aive nechinangwa chekuunza shanduko yakanaka muhupenyu hwevanhu vose. VaTsvangirai vati panguva yakapatsanuka bato ravo, VaKagurabadza vakashingaira nemusangano zvisinei nezvinetswa zvaivepo. Vati kuita uku kunoratidza kuti vainge vari munhu ane hwaro hwakajeka hwekuti pange paine hutongo hwejekerere munyika. Vatsanangudza VaKagurabadza semunhu aishuvira kubatana kwevana veZimbabwe kuitira remangwana rakanaka izvo vashaya vachingoita nekuda kwemabasa avo akanaka. VaTsvangirai vati apo VaKagurabadza vange vari mumiriri weMutasa South, vakaitira vagari vedunhu iri zvakawanda zvakanangana nebudiriro yenharaunda yavo. Vaimbove mutauriri weMDC-T muManicaland, VaPishai Muchauraya, avo vave nhengo yerimwe boka rezvematongerwo enyika, vatiwo vanoshushikana nekushaya kwaVaKagurabadza avo vati yange iri shamwari yavo. Mumiriri weMutasa South mudare reparamende, uye vari nhengo yeZanu PF, Muzvare Irene Zindi, avo vange vari pakuvigwa kwaVaKagurabadza, vatiwo mufi yaiva hama yavo, zvisineyi kuti vakakwikwidzana navo musarudzo dzemuna 2013. Mutevedzeri wemutungamiriri weMDC, Muzvare Thokozani Khupe, vakurudzira vanhu kuti vagamuchire zvavapo uye kufambira mberi vaine tariro. Vamwe vange vari pakuvigwa kwaVaKagurabadza vanosanganisira munyori mukuru mubato iri, VaDouglas Mwonzora, murongi wemisangano, VaAbednigo Bhebhe, vamiriri veparamende vematunhu akasiyana-siyana, vemachechi pamwe nevagari vemunharaunda. VaKagurabadza vakashaya vava nemakore makumi manomwe, uye vasiya mudzimai nevana vatatu.
title: VaTsvangirai Vanorumbidza VaKagurabadza Apo Vanga Vachiradzikwa kwaMundenda

text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vatumira mashoko enyaradzo kumhuri yaVaTsvangirai vachivimbisa kuti hurumende ichashanda nemhuri yavo muhurongwa hwekuradzikwa kwavo. VaMnangagwa vati VaTsvangirai munhu aikwanisa kushanda nemapato ose zvakabudawo pakuumbwa kwakaitwa hurumende yemubatanidzwa muna 2008. VaMnagagwa vati vanogona kunge vasingawirirane nezvimwe zvakaitwa nebato reMDC, asi vanoremekedza zvikuru chido chaVaTsvangirai chekuti munyika muitwe sarudzo dzakachena. Mutungamiri wenyika ati nekuda kuzadzikisa chishuwo chaVaTsvangirai ichi ave kudaidzira musangano wezuva rose wevatungamiri vemapato ezvematongerwo enyika kuti vazeye nyaya iyi. VaMnangagwa vatiwo hurumende ichabatsira mune zvose zvinodiwa parufu rwaVaTsvangirai sezvo vari munhu akashanda muhurumende yemubatanidzwa. Mutauriri waVaMnangagwa, VaGeorge Charamba, vatenda kuti nyika yarasikirwa nemunhu aida runyararo nekurwira hutongo hwejekerere. No media source currently available Mumwe mwanakomana waVaTsvangirai, VaEdwin Tsvangirai, vanoti mhuri ichiri kurovana masoro kuti ione kuti VaTsvangirai vangaradzikwe rinhi. VaEdwin Tsvangirai nevamwe vemhuri vari kuJohannesburg, South Africa pari zvino. Asi pari zvino, mhuri yaronga kuti neMugovera paitwe hurongwa hwekurangarira VaTsvangirai kune imwe kereke muSouth Africa vasati vatakura mutumbi wavo kuenda kuZimbabwe. No media source currently available Mumwe mutevedzeri waVaTsvangirai, VaElias Mudzuri, vanoti havana kupinda mumusangano waitwa neChina nevamwe vatsigiri veMDC kuHarvest House vachiti vaona zvisina kukodzera kuda kuita zvinokonzera mutauro parufu. Vati pari zvino hurongwa hwavo hwakanangana nekuona kuti VaTsvangirai varadzikwa murunyaro. No media source currently available
title: VaMnangagwa Votumira Mashoko eNyaradzo kuMhuri yaVaTsvangirai

text: Zimbabwe neUNICEF zacherechedza makore makumi matatu echisungo chekucherechedzwa kwekodzero dzevana pasi rose, cheUnited Nations Convention on the Rights of the Child, mutungamiriri wenyika wevechidiki, Mukudzeishe Madzivire, achiti vechidiki vanodawo kupa pfungwa dzavo pakuumbwa kwemitemo pamwe nepanotorwa matanho ese ane chekuita navo. Achitaura pamhemberero dzaitwa pamuzinda weparamende neChishanu, Madzivire, ati vechidiki vari kusiiwa nehurumende pamwe neparamende panoumbwa mitemo pamwe nepanotorwa matanho ane chekuita navo uye izvi hazvina kunaka. Ati panofanira kuve nehwaro hwekuti vechidiki vakwanise kupa pfungwa dzavo panoumbwa mitemo uyewo kuti vapihwe mukana wekutora matanho ane chekuita navo. Pamusangano wemusi weChishanu uyu, vechidiki vapihwa mukana wekubvunza zvese zvine chekuita navo kubva kumapazi ehurumende nemasangano anoshanda akazvimirira, makomisheni pamwe neUNICEF. Vechidiki vapinda mumusangano uyu vati vanoda kuti vapihwe mukana wekudzidza zvakanaka, kuve nehutano, kuchegetedzwa, kuwana chikafu pamwe nekugara zvakanaka. Makurukota ehurumende akawanda ange akakokwa kumusangano wanhasi kuti azopindure mubvunzo kubva kune vechidiki haana kuuya izvo zvatsamwisa sachigaro wekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvedzidzo, Amai Priscilla Misihairambwi Mushonga. Amai Misihairambwi-Mushonga vaudza Mutauriri weparamende, Advocate Jacob Mudenda, kuti vamhan’arire makurukota aya kumutungamiri wenyika. Makurukota asina kuenda kuparamende aya ndeanoti VaObadiah Moyo vezvehutano, VaCain Mathema vezvedzidzo yepasi, VaKazembe Kazembe vezvemukati menyika, naVaZiyambi Ziyambi vanove gurukota rezvemutemo, pamwe naVaPaul Mavhima vanoona nezvevashandi nekugara zvakanaka kwevanhu. Asi zvisinei nekusauya kwavo, vechidiki vanoti vadzidza zvakawanda kubva kunhengo dzeparamende nemasangano auya. Nhengo dzapinda mumusangano wanhasi dzaita chitsidzo chekuti dzichavandudza mitemo yese ine chekuita nevana vadiki kuti ienderane nebumbiro remutemo wenyika pamwe nezvisungo zvakaita seU-N Convetion on the Rights of the Child. Vataura vakamirira nhengo dzeparamende, VaKindness Paradza, vatiwo paramende ichapasisa nechimbi-chimbi mabhiri ane mitemo ine chekuita nevana akaita seChild Justice Bill. Vachitaurawo pachiitiko ichi, VaMudenda, vati masangano akaita seUnited Nations pamwe nenyika dzakapfuma vanofanira kutsigira Zimbabwe vachiti pari zvino nyika yakaomerwa nekuda kwenzara. Vati hazviratidzi hunhu kuti nyika dzakapfuma dzinochengeta mari yakawanda mumabhanga dzichitadza kubatsira nyika dzakaomerwa. No media source currently available
title: Zimbabwe Inobatana neUNICEF Mukucherechedza Zuva reKodzero dzeVana

text: Chikonzi chedare repamusoro (sheriff) chinonzi hachisati chakwanisa kupa vakuru vakuru vemapurisa magwaro aturwa nedare redzimhosva zvichitevera mutongo wapihwa naVaGeorge Chiweshe. VaChiweshe vapa mutongo wekuti mapurisa haana mvumo yekurambidza Dr. Peter Magombeyi, kubva pachipatara cheAvenues Clinic kuitira kuti vakwanise kuenda kunorapwa kuSouth Africa. Rimwe remagweta ari kumirira Dr. Magombeyi, VaAlec Muchadehama, vaudza Studio7 kuti chikonzi hachisati chasvitsa mapepa aturwa nedare kuitira kuti Dr. Magombeyi varegedzwe vachibuda muchipatara mavari. VaMuchadehama vati chikonzi hachisati chakwanisa kuwana vanhu vakadomwa mumagwaro ane mutongo waVaChiweshe. Dr. Magombeyi, avo vanova vakafanobata chigaro chemutungamiri weZimbabwe Hospital Doctors' Association, vanonzi vakapambwa musi wa Gunyana 14, vakazowanikwa vari kuNyabira musi waGunyana 19. Vari kuziva zviri kuitika vanoti Dr. Magombeyi vakatochwa apo vaive muhunhapwa. Hurumende inoti iri kuchengetedza Dr. Magombeyi kuitira kuti hupenyu hwavo husavhiringwa. Asi magweta aVaMagombeyi anoti zviri kuitwa nemapurisa zviri pachena kuti aisa Dr. Magombeyi muhusungwa sezvo ari kuvarambidza kubuda muchipatara cheAvenues Clinic.
title: Chikonzi Chonetseka Kuwana Vanhu Vakadomwa neMutongo waVaChiweshe

text: Mumwe murume wemuHarare, VaIgnatius Mhuriro, avo vakambobatwa batwa nemhirizhonga yezvematongerwo enyika, vakavamba sangano rinobatsira vanhu vanowirwa nedambudziko remhirizhonga nekurapwa pamwe nekuti vatange hupenyu hutsva vachiita mabasa akasiyana siyana. VaMhuriro vanoti vakaumba sangano, reCommunity Development Initiatives Management Association, CODIMUS, mumusha weBudiriro makore matatu apfuura mushure mekuona kutambura kunoita vanhu vanenge vakuvara mumhirizhonga zvikurusei yezvematongerwo enyika. VaMhuriro vanoti pane vazhinji vairarama nemabasa emaoko vakakuvadzwa zvekuti havachakwanisi kuenderera mberi nemabasa avo. VaMhuriro, vachishanda nemamwe masangano akazvimirira, vakatobatsira vanhu vane chitsama vakaita saVaChamunorwa Ngamurami avo vakatyorwa ruoko pakuraitidzira kwakaitaika muHarare muna Chikunguru gore rapfuura. VaNgamurani, avo vairarama nekutema vachitengesa huni, vanoti kukuvara kwavakaita kwave kuvatadiza kuita basa ravo. VaNgamurani vanotiwo vanotenda nekurapiswa kwavakaitwa neveCODIMUS uye vanoti havana kwavaiwana mari inodarika zviuru zvitatu zvemdhora iyo yaidiwa kuchipatara. VaEmmanuel Mashava, avo vairarama nekuveza uye vakatyorwawo maoko mumhirizhonga yezvematongerwo enyika, vanoti havachakwanisi kuenderera mberi nebasa ravo. VaMhuriro vanoti sangano ravo riri kubatsira vanhu vakaita saVaNgamurani naVaMashava kutanga mamwe mabasa matsva sezvo vasisakwanise kuenderera mberi nemabasa avo avaiita vasati vavhiringwa hupenyu hwavo nemhirizhonga. Vanotiwo zvimwe zvavanoita kushanda nemhuri dzevanhu ava pamwe nevechidiki kuti vasarambe vachishungurudzika sezvo izvi zvichikwanisa kuitika kana vakashanda vari vega. Vanoti zvimwe zvavanoita kupa rubatsiro rwemari kuti vanhu vatange mabasa ekutengesa nekuita mikando vachiwedzera mari dzemabhizimisi nemisika yavo kuti hupenyu hwavo huenderere mberi zvakanaka mushure mekuvhiringidzwa mumhirizhonga. VaMhuriro vanoti mumisha inogora veruzhinji hamuna runyararo uye izvi ndizvo zvinoita kuti mhirizhonga iwande munyika zvikuru sei panguva yesarudzo. Vanotiwo vanoshushikana zvikuru nekuti kunyange hazvo bumbiro remitemo yenyika richiti panofanira kuve nekomisheni inooona nezverunyararo, kuregererana nekugarisana zvakanaka munyika, komisheni iyi haisati yavepo. No media source currently available
title: Vakatochwa Vowana Rubatsiro muBudiriro

text: Boka revechidiki rebato reMDC inotungamirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai inoti rine hurongwa hwekubatsira dzimwe mhuri dzenhengo dzebato iri kuti dzive nezororo reKisimisi negore idzva rakanaka. Boka revechidiki rebato reMDC inotungamirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai inoti rine hurongwa hwekubatsira dzimwe mhuri dzenhengo dzebato iri kuti dzive nezororo reKisimisi negore idzva rakanaka. Panguva yezororo kudai vanhu vakawanda vanenge vachifara vachidya nekunwa vari pamwe chete nemhuri dzavo. Asi nekuziva kuti kune vamwe vanotadza kuita izvi nekuda kwekushaya,vamwe vechidiki veMDC T vakaita hurongwa hwekutenga chikafu pamwe nezvimwe zvakasiyana siyana siyana, izvo vari kuzopa dzimwe mhuri dzenhengo dzavo dziri mumatambudziko akasiyana-siyana Munyori wezvehutano nekuchengetedzwa kwevana muMDC T Youth Assembly, arizve mutauriri wechirongwa cheMDC T Christmas Goodies Initiative, Muzvare Vimbai Mavherudze, vanoti chirongwa ichi chakatanga muna 2012 uye mhuri dzevanhu gumi ndidzo dzichabatsirwa gore rino. Zvinhu zvinokosha mari inopfuura zviuru zvitatu zvemadhora zvinosanganisira zvekudya pamwe nema-uniform evana vechikoro, zvichagoverwa kuvanhu gumi ava kana kuvamiriri vavo pachiitiko chichaitwa pamuzinda MDC T muHarare mangwana. Vamwe vachawana rubatsiro urwu vanosanganisira mhuri dzaMuzvare Yvonne Musarurwa, avo vanove mutevedzeri waOrganising Secretary muboka revechidiki naVaTungamirai Madzokere. Munguva pfupi yapfuura vaviri ava pamwe chete naVaLast Maingehama vakatongerwa kugara mujeri kwemakore makumi maviri mushure mekubatwa nemhosva yekuuraya mupurisa Inspector Petros Mutedza mugore ra2011. Asi vatatu ava vairamba mhosva yavari kutambira, uye magweta avo ari kupikisa nyaya iyi mumatare. Mutevedzeri wemutauriri weboka revechidiki veMDC T, VaVusumuzi Moyo, vanoti kunyange hazvo bato ravo rine bazi rinoona nezvekubatsira nhengo dzaro nenzira dzakasiyana-siyana, vechidiki vebato iri vakazviona zvakakosha kuita chirongwa ichi senzira yekuratidza kukoshesa gwara rebato iri rekutsigira nekusimbisa vanhu vanenge vari mumatambudziko. Mutauriri webato reMDC-T, VaDouglas Mwonzora, vabvuma kuStudio 7 kuti chiitiko ichi chiri kuitwa pamuzinda webato ravo mangwana vakarumbidza vechidiki vebato ravo nedanho iri rekubatsira dzimwe nhengo dzebato ravo.
title: MDC-T Yobatsira Vanoshaya Kuti Vafarewo paKisimusi

text: Sangano reEuropean Union razivisa kuti ramutsiridza zvirango zvarakatemera kukambani inogadzira zvombo muZimbabwe, yeZimbabwe Defence Industries kuburikidza nekurambidza kutengeswa kana kutengwa kwezvombo kukambani iyi pamwe nekumbobata pfuma yekambani iyi. Mugwaro raraburitsa, sangano iri rinoti kusavepo kweshanduko dzinooneka kwabvumidza kudzikira kwemagariro evanhu akanaka, kodzero dzevanhu pamwe nyaya dzehupfumi. Sangano iri rinoti riri kushushikana zvikuru nekusungwa uye kupomerwa mhosva kwevatori venhau, vemapato anopikisa pamwe nevanhuwo zvavo vanenge vasimudza musoro vachitaura zviri kuitika munyika vachizopomerwa mhosva dzekuda kufurira vanhu kuita zvemhirizhonga. European Union inoti inoona kuvandudzwa kwemutemo une chekuita nesarudzo sedanho rakakosha zvikuru mukusimbisa hutongo hwejekerere uye icharamba ichitsigira Zimbabwe panyaya iyoyo. Sangano iri rinotiwo zvirango zvamutsiridzwa izvi hazvisi kuzobata vana veZimbabwe kana kukanganisa hupfumi hwenyika kana kutengeserana kweZimbabwe nedzimwe nyika kwagara kuripo. Rinoti rakagadzirira kutsigira nyaya dzehupfumi nezvematongerwo enyika kana chete hurumende yeZimbabwe yakaratidza kuzvipira kwayo. Razivisawo kuti zvirango zvekufamba zvakanga zvakatemerwa vanhu vatatu vemuZimbabwe zvakazosendekwa parutivi zvicharamba zvakaasendekwa, kunyange hazvo risina kudoma vatatu ava nemazita. Zvirango izvi zvinotariswa gore rogaroga mumwedzi waKukadzi. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata munyori mubazi rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, Amassador James Manzou, gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa kanawo munyori mubazi rekuburitswa kwemashoko VaNick Mangwana, kuti tinzwe divi rehurumende panyaya iyi. Asi vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vari nhengo yeZanu PF kuBritain, Doctor Simba Mavaza, vanoti danho reEuropean Union iri harina zvarinoreva nekuti pariri kuti kodzero dzevanhu dziri kutyorwa hurumende inenge ichitotevera bumbiro remitemo kuburikidza nekusunga vanenge vatyora mutemo yenyika. Doctor Mavaza vanotiwo zvinoshamisa kuti European Union iri kutemera zvirango kambani inogadzira zvombo asi ivo vanhu vairi kuti vari kutyorerwa kodzero dzavo vachisungwa nemapurisa, kwete nemauto. Asi Eurioopean Union inopomerawo mauto kuti ane chekuita nekutyorwa kwekkodzero dzevanhu munyika. No media source currently available
title: European Union Inomutsiridza Zvirango Zvayakatemera Kambani yeZimbabwe Defence Industries

text: Mubato ReMDC-T rinotungamirirwa naVaDouglas Mwonzora munonzi maita kusawirirana pamwe nekufungirana kwakanyanya izvo zvinonzi nevamwe vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika zvinogona kukanganisa mashandiro ebato rinopikisa iri. Nekuda kweizvi, nhengo nhatu dzeMDC-T dzinoti mutevedzeri wemutungamiri webato Muzvare Thokozani Khupe, meya veGweru VaJosiah Makombe pamwe nameya veChitungwiza VaLovemore Maiko vakakwira kudare reHigh Court muBulawayo dzichida kuti dare iri rimise hurongwa hwebato ravo hwekuda kuvadzinga muzvigaro zvavo muparamende nemumakanzuru. Vatatu ava vanonzi vamwe venhengo dzinonzi dziri kupomerwa mhosva yekudyidzana nerimwe bato rinopikisa reMDC Alliance. Vakakwirirwa kudare vanoti VaMwonzora, sachigaro vebato reMDC-T, VaMorgen Komichi, munyori mukuru Amai Paurina Mupariwa, mutauriri weparamende VaJacob Mudenda pamwe negurukota rezvekutongwa kwematunhu, VaJuly Moyo. Mamwewo mapoka enhau anoti vamwe venhengo dzinonzi dziri kuda kudzingwa idzi dzakatotanga kare hurongwa hwekudzokera kuMDC Alliance. Mutauriri weMDC-T, VaWitness Dube, vanoti idzi inyaya dzavange vasingade kuti vataure nezvadzo asi vanoti nekuda kwekuti inyaya dzave mumadandemutande, vachangotaura pavanogona. Asi VaDube vanoti chekutanga bato ravo reMDC-T harisi kupomera bato reMDC Alliance mhosva yekuve nechekuita nezviri kuitika mubato ravo, vachiti zvinozivikanwa kuti MDC-T haicherechedzi MDC Alliance sebato uye kuti vanhu ndivo vari kutaura izvi nekusaziva. VaDube vanoti ivo sebato vaita matambudziko nemutewedzeri wavo, Muzvare Khupe uye vanotiwo manyepo ekuti bato ravo rine hurongwa hwekudzinga dzimwe nhengo, vachiti nhengo idzi dzakangomhanya kudare redzimhosva dzisina kana kupira nyaya yadzo kubato ravo. Ukuwo, nhengo yeMDC Alliance uye vari meya weguta reHarare vakambomiswa basa , VaJacob Mafume, vanoti VaMafume vanoti bato ravo harineyi nemapishapisha ari kuitika muMDC-T vachiti zvinozvikanwa kwese kuti chekuba kazhinji kacho chinozvimbira anenge achiba. Vanoti MDC-T yakatora mavhoti eMDC Alliance asiri ayo ichisasana nebato reZanu PF. No media source currently available
title: VeMDC-T neMDC Alliance Vokweshana paNyaya yeKunetsana Kuri muBato reMDC-T

text: Mumwe mugari wemuMarondera akapfurwa nemapurisa akafa VaSolomon Nyaruwa vanonzi vakaradzikwa kuChimanimani nemusi weSvondo. VaNyaruwa vanonzi vakangobatanidzirwa mumhirizhonga yekuratidzira kwaiitika apo vaienda kunotora chikwereti chavo mudhorobha reMarondera nemusi weChipiri. Kuratidzira munyika kwakatanga nemusi weMuvhuro vanhu vachiti havasi kufara nekukwidzwa kwemitengo yemafuta zvapa kuti zimbabwe ive nyika pasi rose ine mafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari anodhura zvakanyanyisa. Muzukuru wavaNyaruwa, VaDarlington Vambe vanoti muchakabvu asiya vana vaviri mumwe asati atombosvika kana gore azvarwa. No media source currently available
title: VaNyaruwa Vanonzi Vakapfurwa neMapurisa Mumhirizhonga Vanoradzikwa

text: Kuonekwa kwemutungamiriri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, kekutanga vari paruzhinji apo vaive munyarikani kuchikoro cheZimbabwe Open University, nemusi weChishanu, kubva zvatorwa masimba nemauto nemusi weChipiri zvatambirwa zvakasiyana siyana vamwe vachiti hazvirevi kuti mauto haasisina simba, asiwo vamwe vachiti vava kutyira kuti VaMugabe vangangorega kubviswa pachigaro chehutungamiriri hwenyika. Mumwe mugari wemuHarare, VaFarai Mabeza, varumbidza zvakaitwa nemauto vakati kuenda kwaVaMugabe kuZimbabwe Open University, idanho rakanaka kuratidza kuti mutungamiriri wenyika haana kubviswa nechisimba. VaMabeza vati kuwonekwa kwaVaMugabe paruzhinji kunoratidzawo masangano akadai seSADC kuti VaMugabe vachiri mutungamiriri wenyika. Izvi zvatsigirwa nenyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika uye vari mukuru weMedia Centre, Va Earnest Mudzengi, avo vati kunyange hazvo zvakaitwa nemauto zviri kunze kwemutemo, vari kuda kuratidza veruzhinji pamwe nenyika dzekunze kuti VaMugabe vachiri pachinzvimbo chavo. Asi VaMudzengi vatiwo kuenda paruzhinji kwaVaMugabe hazvirevi kuti vanopunyuka muhapwa dzemauto. Mumwe aimbova murwi werusununguko, Amai Karen Kazingizi, vatiwo vakamirira VaMugabe kuti vabve vega pachigaro pasina kubviswa nechisimba semunhu mukuru ndosaka mauto arega vachiita basa ravo. Asi Muzvare Petronella Zhou vaudza Studio 7 kuti vakavhundutswa zvikuru nekunzwa kuti mauto apa VaMugabe mukana wekuonekwa paruzhinji ivo vachifungidzira kuti mutungamiri wenyika anga dai akatosiya chigaro. Nhaurirano pakati pemauto nemutungamiriri wenyika dzichiri kuenderera mberi huye pari zvino mauto haasati azivisa veruzhinji kuti nhaurirano idzi dzave papi huye zvii zvabvumiranwa nezviri kunetsa. Asi vaimbove varwiri verusununguko vati vari kuita musangano neruzhinji rweZimbabwe kuZimbabwe Grounds kuti paitwe chibvumirano chekuti veruzhinji vodii. No media source currently available
title: Vakawanda Vanoti Mauto Akagona Kusiya VaMugabe Vachienda kuZimbabwe Open University

text: Zviuru nezviuru zvezvirwa zvevanhu zvaratidzira muHarare zvichirumbidza zvakaitwa nemauto enyika vachitiwo mutungiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vasiye basa. Migwagwa yemuguta reHarare yanga isingafambiki nekuda kwevanhu nedzimotokari avo vanga vakarasa miswe nemufaro. Veruzhinji vanga vachiimba nziyo yemumwe muimbi wechidiki, Jah Prazah, yekuti "Mudhara Vachauya" huye vamwewo ndovanga vachiridza pamwe nekuimba nziyo dzekurumbidza mauto. Kunyange hazvo migwagwa yemudhorobha yanga yakazara, zvimwe zviuru nezviuru zvaungana kuZimbabwe Grounds kumusha weHighfields kwanga kune musangano wakarongwa nevaimbove varwiri verusununguko. Veruzhinji vazobva kumusha weHighfields vamwe vachifamba netsoka kusvika vasvika pamuzinda unoshandira mutungamiriri wenyika weState House Varatidzira ava vange vari vemazera ese.
