Sekuru Clemence Chako, avo vabva kwaChurumanzi, vati kunyange hazvo vachifamba nemudonzvo, vati zuva ranhasi ranga rakavakoshera kuti vabatane nezvimwe zvizvarwa kuratidza mufaro wavo nezvakaitwa nemauto. Mumwe wevanga vari kuratidzira kekutanga muhupenyu hwavo, VaTafadzwa Mugabe, vati kumiswa kwenyonga nyonga nemauto neChipiri ndozvavasunda kuti vabude vabatane nevamwe. Amai Catherine Makunere, avo vati vafamba kubva kuKuwadzana, kuenda kuHighfields, pamwe nekuzoenda kuState House, vati rudo rwekusunungura nekugadzira ramangwana ravo ndozvaita kuti vazvipire kunyange vanga vasina mari yekufambisa. Amai Makunere vati VaMugabe vanofanirwa kusiya basa nechimbi chimbi. Mumwe mukuru wemauto, Major General Sibusiso Moyo, vatenda veruzhinji varatidzira vachirumbidza zvakaitwa nemauto. KuZimbabwe Grounds mamwe makurukota ehurumende akaita saAmai Oppah Muchinguri naVaPatrick Chinamasa vashoropodzaVaMugabe vakati nguva yakwana yekuti vasiye basa. VaChinamasa vatiwo mudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Grace Mugabe, vanofanirwa kuferefetwa nehuori hwavakara, pamwe nedzimwe mhosva dzavari kupomerwa. No media source currently available
title: Vanhu Vanobatana Mukuratidzira Vachiti VaMugabe Vasiye Basa

text: Dzimba dzakawanda nemahofisi muChinhoyi hadzina vanhu sezvo vakawanda vavekushanda vakawanda muhofisi imwechete nekugara vakawanda mumba imwechetqe vachibatsirana kubhadhara mari dzekugara. Vemabhizinisi vakawanda vari kuomerwa nekubhadhara mari dzepavanoshandira izvo zvavekupa kuti vashandise hofisi imwechete vakawanda. Nekune rimwe rutivi vanhu vakawanda zvikuru sei vasati vawanikwa nekuwana vave kugara pamwechete kuti vayamurane kubhadhara mari yemitero yedzimba. Vanoti mari dzavanotambira ishoma uye dzimwe nguva vanonoka kutambira izvo zvinopa kuti vaomerwe nekubhadhara mari dzepekugara nenguva. Vazhinji vanorojesa vanotarisa kuti munhu anogara pamba pavo abhadhare mari yepekugara zuva rekupera kwemwedzi kana zuva rekutanga remwedzi risati rapera. VaTineyi Nyamukacha avo vanoita basa rekugadzira mafoni nemacomputer vanoti vakaona kupinza vamwe vanhu vanoita basa rakasiyana neravo kuti vabatsirike kubhadhara hofisi yavo iyo inoita zana nemakumi maviri emadhora. VaNyamukacha vanoti munhu haafanirwa kubhadhara hofisi yakakura iye achishandisa nzvimbo duku sezvo kuri kutambisa mari iyo iri kunetsa mazuva ano. VaNyamukacha vanoti zvimwe zvinoita kuti vashande vakawanda muhofisi imwechete ndechekuti vave kuwana mari shoma zvikuru zvekuti kubhadhara mari yakawanda yepekushandira kunovasiya vasisina mari yekudya nemhuri. Izvi zvinotsigirwa naVaSimbarashe Mhizha avo vanoti kumisha inogara vazhinji hakunavarikuroja vakawanda sezvo vanhu vasina mari. VaMhizha vanoti mari haisi kutenderera muvanhu nekuda kwehupfumi hwaenda kumawere. Mumwe muridzi wemba kuChinhoyi VaWillie Nyambe vanoti maroja avo ave kutadza kubhadhara mari dzepekugara nenguva. VaNyambe vanoti vave kupiwa mari dzepekugara muzvidimbu zvidimbu. Asi VaNyamukacha vanoti kushanda vanhu vakawanda zvinedambudziko rekubirana sezvo mumwe nemumwe anenge aine svombonoro(keys) dzake. Mumwe mushandi ane kambani yake yekudhinda mapepa VaAdam Mwase vanoti kunyange kushanda vanhu vakawanda kuchivayamura kuti vabhadhare mari shoma yepekusevenzera vanoti dambudziko ndere marezinesi ekanzuru. VaMwase vanoti kanzuru inosungirwa kuti munhu wese kana kambani imwe neimwe ive nerezinesi rayo rega. Vanoona nezvemabhizinisi vanoti vanhu vakawanda vachapedzisira vave kushandira munzira sezvo mari dzavanobhadhara dzepavanoshandira pamwe nemari dzemitero dzakawanda. Izvi zvinogona kuzopawo mapazi akaita seZIMRA matambudziko ekuunganidza mari dzemitero.
title: Vanhu Votadza KuBhadhara Mitero yeDzimba neMahofisi

text: Bato reMDC T rinotungamirwa naMuzvare Thokozani Khupe neMuvhuro rakadzinga basa makanzura gumi nemumwe eMDC Alliance muHarare uye mamwe mameya kune mamwe madhorobha. KuGwanda bato iri radzingawo meya wedhorobha iri VaJastone Mazhale. Meya weguta reBeitbridge VaMorgan Ncube vadzingwawo basa mushure mekuramba kubatana naMuzvare Khupe. Mutauriri webato reMDC-T VaKhalipani Phugeni vaudza Studio 7 kuti makanzura nemameya aya azvidzinga mubato nekuramba kwavo kudyidzana naMuzvare Khupe. No media source currently available Bato reMDC-T iri rakanyora tsamba kugurukota rezvematunhu VaJuly Moyo richiti vainge vadzinga makanzura emuHarare anoti VaEnoch Mupamawonde ward 35, Va Lovemore Makuwerere (Ward 24), VaGilbert Hadebe (Ward 39), VaMunyaradzi Kufahakutizwi (Ward 19), VaSimon Mapanzure (Ward 34), VaCharles Chidhagu (Ward 30), VaKeith Charumbira (Ward 8), VaSteven Dhliwayo (Ward 40), VaBarnabas Ndira (Ward 21), VaChihoma Runyowa (Ward 29) uye VaCharles Nyatsuro (Ward 6). Kanzuru yeHarare yasarirwa nemakanzura makumi maviri nevanomwe uye inoda makanzura gumi nevanomwe kuti irambe ichishanda zvakanaka. Meya weguta reHarare vari kuMDC Alliance VaJacob Mafume vanoti zviri kuitwa naMuzvare Khupe ndezvemugotsi matsuro uye hazvisi kuzovakanganisa kuita basa ravo. No media source currently available
title: Mameya neMakanzura eMDC Alliance muHarare, Gwanda neBeitbridge Odzingwa neMDC T

text: Dare repamusoro rapa nhengo dzebato reCitizens Coalition for Change gumi neina mukana wekutongwa dzichibva kumba zvichitevera kusungwa kwadzakaitwa kuNyatsime dzichipomerwa mhosva yekuita zvemhirizhonga yezvematongerwo enyika. Chikwata chesangano renyika dzaive pasi pehutongo hweBritain kunyanya icho chiri munyika kuzoongorora kuti Zimbabwe yodzorwa musangano iri here kana kuti kwete, chiri kusangana nehurumende, mapato anopikisa nemasangano anoshanda akazvimirira, nyanzvi dzichiti zvakakosha kuti hurumende iremekedze kodzero dzevanhu pamwe nehutongi hwejekerere kuti itambirwe zvakare muCommonwealth. Mutauriri wemutungamiri wenyika uye vari mutevedzeri wemunyori mukuru mudare remakurukota VaGeorge Charamba vanoti kupihwa motokari nezvimwe kwakaitwa mutungamiri weMDC-T VaDouglas Mwonzora kuyedza kwehurumende kupomhodza gakava nevanopikisa kuti nyika ifambire mberi. Kirinika yekanzuru iri mumusha weMbare yeEdith Opperman inonzi yave duku zvakanyanya zvichitarisiwa huwandu hwevanhu vanobatsirwa panzvimbo iyi, kanzuru ichiti ichagadzirisa dambudziko iri. Tichsakupai nezvegadziriro iri kuitwa nezvikwata zviri kuenda kumakwikwi eQatar World Cup 2022 nezvinofungwa nevatsigiri vemutambo wenhabvu nezvemakwikwi aya. Muchirongwa chedu cheLiveTalk- The Connection chatinotaura nevechidiki, Ntungamili Nkomo weStudio 7 ari kutaura nezvemakore mashanu kubva hurumende yamushakabvu Robert Mugabe yapidigurwa nemauto. Pane zvachinja here kune vechidiki kubva zvabviswa VaMugabe pachigaro? Kodzero dzevanhu dziri kuremekedzwa here? Tichatarisa nezvekusungwa nekupihwa mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso kwaitwa vatsigiri vebato rinopikisa reCCC vakasungwa kuChitungwiza. Kana muchida kupinda muchirongwa ichi, kanawo kutumira mashoko kuStudio7, shandisai WhatsApp nhamba dzinoti 001 202 465 0318. Vanoda kutererera Studio7, tibateyi na7pm pamasaisai anoti 909 am 4930; 13860, 15460 Kilohertz paShort Wave mazuva ose
title: Misoro yeNhau dzaNhasi, Chipiri, Mbudzi 15, 2022

text: Dare reHigh Court nemusi weChitatu rakambomisa kutongwa kwemhosva iri kupomerwa nhengo nhatu dzeMDC Alliance Muzvare; Joana Mamombe, Muzvare Cecilia Chimbiri naMuzvare Netsai Marova, kuitira kuti ritange rapedza kuzeya chikumbiro chavo chekuti mejasitireti nemuchuchisi pamhosva yavo vabvisve sezvo vachiratidza kuti pane divi ravakarerekera. Vatatu ava vanoti Amai Bianca Makwande nemuchuchisi wenyaya iyi, VaMichael Reza, vanofanirwa kubviswa panyaya iyi kuitira kuti iongwe nevanhu vanoita basa nemazvo. Izvi zvava kureva kuti dare repamusoro richanzva chikumbiro chevatatu ava zvizere rozopa mutongo waro wekuti zvinokodzera here kana kuti kwete kuti Amai Makwande naVaReza, vabviswe panyaya. Mutauriri weZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights, iyo iri kumirira nhengo dzeMDC Alliance idzi, VaKumbirai Mafunda, vakaudza Studio7 kuti vari kufara nemutongo uyu. No media source currently available
title: High Court Yambomisa Kutongwa kwaMuzvare Mamombe neVamwe Vavo Vaviri

text: Vamwe vagari vekuChimanimani vari kukurudzira hurumende kuti iuye ivatorese zvitupa vachiti izvi zviri kuvakanganisa kuwana chikafu sezvo vamwe vevari kupa chikafu vari kuda kuti vaburitse zvitupa pakuvatambirisa chikafu zvichitevera Mafashamu eCyclone Idai. Vamwe vagari vekuChimanimani vakaita saAmai Sarudzai Kubvenyika vanoti vari kutadza kutambira chikafu chiri kutambiriswa vanhu nehurumende nemamwe masangano ari kubatsira nechikafu nepamusana pekuti havana zvitupa. Amai Kubvenyika vanoti vanhu vazhinji vakasara vasina mapepa anoita kuti vazikanwe kuti ndivanani zvichitevera mafashamu eCyclone Idai ayo akayeredza zvinhu zvavo zvese zvinosanganisira zvitupa, chikafu, mbatya nezvipfuwo. Izvi zvakatsinhirwa naVaHerbert Mapuka vekuChipinge. VaMapuka vanoti hurumende inofanira kuuya kunzvimbo dzavagere nekukasika yopa vanhu pachena zvitupa nekukasika kuitira kuti vakwanise kuwana chikafu chiri kutambiriswa vanhu. Vamwe vanhu vanotiwo zvakanetsa kuviga hama dzavo dzakafa mumafashamu aya sezvo mapepa ainge asipo. Asi hurumende yakatenda kuti pane dambudziko ikavimbisa kuti ichatumira vanhu vekwamudzviti kuti vashande vari kuChimanimani neChipinge. Zvichakadai, mumwe wemasabhuku emuChimanimani uye vachimirira bhuku rekwaManzou kunzvimbo yeSkline muChimanimani, VaCharles Manzou vanoti dai hurumende yaendesera vanhu chikafu munzvimbo dzavanogara kupihwa kwechikafu kuvanhu kotungamirirwa nemasabhuku sezvo vachiti masabhuku ndiwo anoziva vanhu vaanogara navo pane kuti vanhu vanobva kunzvimbo dzakasiyana-siyana vaungane panzvimbo imwechete. Gurukota rinoona nezvemagariro evanhu Doctor Sekai Nzenza vaunza Studio 7 kuti kuendesa chikafu kune dzimwe nzvimbo kwange kuchinetsa asi zvave nani sezvo nzvimbo dzakawanda dzave kufambika sezvo mauto ari kugadzira mazambuko. No media source currently available
title: Kushaya Magwaro Akakosha Kwoshungurudza Vanhu Vakawirwa neDambudziko reDutumupengo

text: Zimbabwe Media komishini inoti apo nyika yatarisana nesarudzo dza2023, vatori venhau vanofanirwa kuita basa ravo nemazvo ichiti izvi zvinobatsira muhutongi hwejekerere nekusimudzira nyika. Vachitaura nevatori venhau nhasi muKadoma kumusangano wakakokerwa neZimbabwe Election Support Network, uyo uri kudzidzisa vatori venhau zvinotarisirwa pakuganhurwa kwematunhu nezvesarudzo, mukuru wekomishini yeZMC, VaAcademy Chinhamora, vati nguva yesarudzo inguva yakakosha zvikuru uye vatori venhau vane basa guru rekufambisa mashoko. VaChinhamora vati vatapi venhau vakaita basa nemazvo zvinobatsira nyika pamwe nekukurudzira hutongi hwejekerere. VaChinhamora vakurudzirawo vatapi venhau kuti vanzwisise mitemo inovabata pavanopepeta nhau. Vatiwo komisheni yavo panguva dzesarudzo inoitawo misangano nevatori venhau, vezvemitemo, vanoita zvesarudzo pamwe nevari munezvematongerwo enyika senzira yekuderedza kushungurudzwa kwevatori venhau, uye izvi ndizvo zvavachange vachiita. VaMalvern Mukudu, vanoshanda neMedia Institute of Southern Africa-Zimbabwe, vatsinhirawo kuti vatapi venhau vanofanirwa kunzwisisa mutemo kusanganisira weData Protection Act. Vatiwo nekuda kwekuti ndekekutanga kuitwa sarudzo mutemo uyu wavepo, pane njodzi yekuti mutemo uyu unogona kushandiswa zvakanyanya kuvatori venhau. VaMukudu vakurudzirawo vatori venhau kuti vaite zvinotevera senzira yekuzvichengetedza panguva ino vanhu vogadzirira sarudzo. Mumwe mutori wenhau anga ari pamusangano uyu, VaChengetai Murimwa, vati sarudzo dzinounza kutyisa kukuru kuvatori venhau nekuda kwemhirizhonga yezvematongerwo enyika, iyo inovabatanidzira nguva zhinji. ZESN inotiwo zvakakosha kuti vatapi venhau vapiwe ruzivo nezvesarudzo kuti vakwanise kunyora zvine ruzivo rwakadzama nezvesarudzo, zvigobatsira vese vane chekuita nesarudzo kusanganisira vavhoti. Vachitaurawo kumusangano wevatori venhau wakaitwa kuBulawayo nezuro, we2022 Africa Journalism and Media Summit, gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko Amai Monica Mutsvangwa vakakurudzirawo vatori venhau kuti vaite basa ravo nehunyanzvi, vachiburitsa nhau dzechokwadi. No media source currently available
title: Zimbabwe Media Commission Yokurudzira Vatori veNhau Kuita Basa Ravo Nemazvo Ichiti Zvinobatsira muHutongi hweJekerere neKusimudzira nyika.

text: Gurukota rinoona nezveAfrica muBritain, Amai Harriett Baldwin, vanoti vari kufara zvikuru nevanhu vavakasangana navo apo vange vari kushanya kekutanga muZimbabwe. Vachitaura muvhidhiyo yavatumira kuruzhinji rwevanhu, Amai Baldwin, vati hurumende yavo icharamba ichishanda nevanhu vemuZimbabwe, kuitira kuti ibudirire. Amai Baldwin, avo vakasangana neChishanu nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vanotiwo vapa mari inoita mamiriyoni mashanu emapaunzi kumasangano akazvimirira senzira yekutsigira zvirongwa zvesarudzo. Amai Baldwin vanoti vanoshuvira kuti muZimbabwe muchaitwa sarudzo dzinotambirwa nemunhu wese. Asi Amai Baldwin havana kutaura kuti vachashanda seyi nehurumende yaVaMnangagwa, kunze kwekungoti hurumende yeBritain ichashanda nevanhu vemuZimbabwe. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi, Amai Chipo Mukonza, vanoti rwendo rwa Amai Baldwin hunoratidza kuti Britain inoda kudyidzana neZimbabwe, asi inoda kutanga yagutsikana nezviri kuitwa nehurumende yaVaMnangagwa. Hukama hweBritain neZimbabwe hwakatanga kushata muna zvakanyanya muna 2002, zvichitevera kutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu muZimbabwe, pamwe nekubiridzirwa kwesarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika. Izvi zvakazowedzerwa apo hurumende yaVaRobert Mugabe yakatanga kubvuta mapurazi evachena, pamwe nemhirizhonga yakadeura ropa rakawanda apo mapurazi aibvutwa nevatsigiri veZanu PF. No media source currently available
title: Britain Inobatsira Masangano Akazvimirira neMari Yakangana neSarudzo

text: Nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika vachitungamira bato rinopikisa reDemocratic Party, Doctor Urayayi Zembe vanoti mashoko ataurwa nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa pakuvhura kwavo paramende yechipfumbamwe mashoko akanaka chose, asi chikuru ndechekuti anozoteverwa nezviito here. VaMnangagwa vaudza nyika pamashoko avo kuvana veZimbabwe kuti hurumende yavo icharwisana zvikuru nehuwori, vachiti hapana munhu achange ari pamusoro pemutemo. Vatiwo vachaona kuti nyika yave nemari yayo pamwe nekuwanisa vanoda kutanga mabhizimusi munyika mikana yekuita izvi. Doctor Zembe vanoti VaMnangagwa vaita zvakanaka chose pakukurudzira kuti magariro emunyika ave magariro asina bopoto, uye vanorumbidzwo nyaya yekuti matunhu atungamirirwe nevanhu vemumatunhu aya. Asi vanoti vaoona sekunge VaMnangagwa vavimbisa vanhu zvakawandisa, izvo hurumende yavo ichatadza kuzadzisa. Ngatinzweyi hurukuro yataita naDoctor Zembe pamusoro penyaya iyi. No media source currently available
title: Vamwe Voti Vanotenda Maruva Vadya Chakata paVimbiso yaVaMnangagwa

text: Mumiriri weMutasa Central mudare reparamende VaTrevor Saruwaka vanova nhengo yeMDC Alliance vabatana nevamwe vemunharauda yavo kutsvaga mari yekubatsira chipatara cheBonda Mission Hospital. VaSaruwaka vanoti mari iri kudiwa pachipatara ichi yakawanda zvikuru asi vanoti mushure mehurukuro yavakaita neStudio 7 vanhu vakawanda vakabva vauya kuzobatsira kusanganisira mumwe akauya nezvuru zviviri zvemadhora. Vanotiwo vanhu vari kunzwa zvimwe zvirongwa zviri kubuda paStudio 7 kubatsira mukurwisa chirwere checoronavirus vobva vaitawo manyuku nyuku ekuda kubatsira nharaunda dzavo. VaSaruwaka vati kambani yeWattle Company yakavimbisa kuti ichavakiridza imba ichachengeterwa vanenge vabatwa necoronavirus muManicaland. No media source currently available Vanoti vanodawo kutenga zvikwanisiro zvekubatsira vanachiremba kurapwa varwere sezvo hurumende iri kukundikana. Zvichakadaro, Bhanga rinokweretesa mari nyika dzose dzepasirino reWorld Bank rapa Zimbabwe mari inosvika mamiriyoni manomwe kana kuti 7 million dollars yekuAmerica mukubatsira kurwisa chirwere checoronavirus. Zimbabwe yapihwa mari iyi kunyangwe hayo iine chikwereti kubhanga iri nemamwe ekunze chinodarika bhiriyoni imwe chete yekuAmerica. Mumwe seneta wemuAmerica VaJim Risch vanyora padandemutande reTwitter kuti mari iyi inofanira kunyatsoongororwa kuti yasvika kuvanhu veZimbabwe kwete kuti ishandiswe zvisizvo nehurumende yeZimbabwe.
title: Vagari vekwaMutasa Central Voumba Homwe yeKubatsira Chipatara cheBonda Mission

text: Mutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica, vaDonald Trump, vanotarisirwa kuenda ku Texas nemusi weChipiri kunozvionera matambudziko akakonzerwa ne mhepo nemvura iyo yave kuzivikanwa nezita rekuti Hurricane Harvey. Izvi zvakaitika kunzvimbo yeTaxas mumaguta akaita seHuston nemamwe. Zvivakwa zvizhinji, kusanganisa dzimba, zvikoro, migwagwa nezvimwe zvakaparadzwa nemafashamu nedutumupengo iri. Vakuru veguta iri vanoti vanhu vanoita zviuru zvishanu nemazana mashanu vakatsvagirwa pokugara mushure mokutiza nzvimbo dzavaigara. Asi vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni matanhatu kusanganisa zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri munzvimbo iyi vakasangana nematambudziko makukutu. Dr Prisca Ngondo, avo vanodzidisa paTexas State University iri muAustin, vanoti mvura nenhepo zvinenge zvavekuderera zvishoma uye havasati vanzwa kana paine chizvarwa chekuZimbabwe chakakuvadzwa kana kuurawa nemafoshoma emvura aya. “Kwanga kuchinaya kubva nemusi weChishanu uye nhasi kunotarisirwa kunaya zvekare. Kuno kwatiri kuAustin tiri maawa maviri kubva kuHouston saka mvura nemhepo pazvakazosvika kuno uku kwakange kuine mvura nemhepo mazuva ese kubva musi weChishanu. Nhasi ndiko kwambotomirawo kunaya zvishoma asi inotarisirwa kunaya zvekarae nhasi uno.” Dr Ngondo vakapamidzirazve vachiti,”Zvikoro zvese zvakavharwa. Taifanirwa kutanga basa nhasi asi vakatovhara chikoro chese nokuti kwatinogara kuno uku kunoita mafoshoma emvura. Kuchiri kunaya zvako asi mhepo yadzikirira.” Dr Ngondo vanoti change chichinyatsonetsa kwavanogara migwagwa yange ichiyerera mvura zvokuti vanhu vaitosheyedza mapurisa kuti vazobatsira kuvabudisa mumvura. “MuAustin mune zvizvarwa zvekuZimbabwe uye tineboka redu asi vazhinji vavo vange varimudzimba dzavo uye havana kubuda panze.” Hurumende yeTaxas yasheyedzera kuti dzimwe nzvimbo dziripasi penjodzi zvekuti dzinofanira kuwana rubatsiro kubva kuhurumende. Pamusoro pezvo, hurumende yatoita zvokumanikidza vamwe vanhu kuti vabve mumatunhu avanotyira kuti angangonyombewa nemafashanu emvura aya.  No media source currently available
title: Zvimwe Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe Zvinobatwa neMafashamu neDutumupengo reHurricane Harvey

text:
Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dziri kukurudzira hurumende kuti isimbaradze kudzidzisa nekubaya nhomba yeCovid-19 vanhu vari kumaruwa sezvo chirwere ichi chave kupararira zvinotyisa munzvimbo idzi. Kumaruwa ndiko kunogara vanhu vakawandisa munyika. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano uye vakambotungamira chipatara cheChitungwiza Hospital Dr Enoch Mayida vanoti kamhando katsva keCovid-19 kanonzi Delta variant kave kupararira muZimbabwe, Namibia, South Africa, Congo, Mozambique neUganda ndiko kave kupa kuti zvinhu zviite manyama amire nerongo mumaruwa nedzimwe nzvimbo. Vanamazvikokota munyaya dzezvenhomba vachiri kuzeyawo kuona kuti nhomba dzeCovid-19 dziri kubayiwa vanhu dzinoshanda here kudzivirira Delta variant iyi. Imwe yanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano uye vari nhengo yesangano reZimbabwe Association for Doctors for Human Rights, Doctor Norman Matara, vati denda rave kupararira kumaruwa nekuti mwaka wekurima wakapfuura nekudaro vamwe varimi vari kushanyira kumadhorobha vachitengesa zvirimwa zvavo nokudaro vanogona kubva vabatira chirwere vozondopomera vamwe kumusha. Bazi rezvehutano riri kushushikanawo nekuungana kwevanhu zvikuru parufu zvinogona kukonzera kuaparira kwechirwere ichi kumaruwa. Vanhu vanonzi havafanire kudarika makumi matatu pakuchema mufi. Vamwe vagari kumaruwa zvikuru kuMasvingo vaudza Studio 7 kuti havasi kufara sezvo hurumende isiri kuvapa nhomba dzakawanda dzekudzivirira kupararira kwedenda reCovid-19 uye vachiti zviri pachena kuti nzvimbo idzi hadzinawo zvipatara zvakakwana zvekubatsira vanenge varwarisa.

Vagari vakaita saAmbuya Rosina Gonese, vekwaBhasera, kwaGutu, vanoti chirongwa chenhomba hachisati chasvika kunzvimbo yavo nekudaro vanonamata kuti dai chakurumidza kuuyiswa.

Izvi zvatsigirwa VaAbraham Moyo vatiwo zvakakosha kuti vari kumaruwa vapihwewo nhomba dzakawanda.

Mutauriri weCovid-19 taskforce muMasvingo, VaRogders Irimayi, vanoti hurumende iri mubishi rekusvitsa chirongwa chekubaya vanhu nhomba munzvimbo dzese dzedunhu ravo. VaIirmayi vanoti svondo rapera kwakauya nhomba inosvika chiuru gumi nemakumi mashanu, 15 000 uye vakamirirawo kuzopihwa imwe yakawanda kubva pamamirironi maviri akapindawo munyika mazuva adarika.

Vaenderera mberi vachiti hurumende iri kufara kuti vanhu vakawanda vave kuda kubaiwa nhomba vachiti izvi zvichabatsira kudzivirira kutapuriranwa kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Nezuro vanhu makumi mapfumbamwe vakabatwa nechirwere ichi mudunhu rose
reMasvingo, Gutu,yaive nemakumi matatu nevatanhatu, Masvingo ine makumi matatu nevashanu, Chiredzi ine gumi nevasere uye Mwenezu ine mumwechete. Hurumende inoti inoda kubaya vanhu mamirioni gumi nenhomba munyika
yose kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana senzira
yekudzivira denda iri. Bazi rezvehutano rinoti dzimwe nzvimbo dziri kumaruwa dzasangana nedambudziko guru rechirwere cheCovid-19 dzinosanganisira Mazowe kuMashonaland Central, Kasimure kuMashonaland West uye Murehwa kuMashonaland East neGokwe kuMidlands.
title: Covid-19 Yopararira Zvinotyisa kuMamisha

text:
Nhengo nhatu dze MDC-Alliance dzakasungwa nezuro dzamiswa pamberi pedare redzimhosva nhasi ndokubhadhariswa mari yechibatiso inoita zviuru zvishanu zvemadhora pamunhu kuitira kuti dzitongwe dzichibva kumba. Nhengo idzi nhatu dzinoti, VaAleck Tabe, avo vanoda kumirira MDC Alliance inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa musarudzo yakanzura weWard 4; nhengo ye MDC A national executive, Amai Magret Chakabuda, pamwe naVaVingisai Nerupandai Vatatu ava vakasungwa nezuro ndokuvata muchitokisi husiku hwese vachinzi vakaita musangano pasina mvumo, kwaAphiri mu Ward 4 mudhorobha reMasvingo. Rimwe remagweta evatatu ava, VaPhillip Shumba, vati vatatu ava vapihwa mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso nemutongi, Amai Patience Madondo, avo vati vabvise zviuru zvishanu zvemadhora eRTGS pamunhu, kuitira kuti vatongwe vachibva kumba

Rimwe gweta ravo, naVaMartin Mureri, vati vatatu ava havasi kubvuma
mhosva yavari kupomerwa vachiti vari kushugurudzirwa zvine chekuita
nezvematongerwo enyika sezvo sarudzo dzekutsviva vakadzingwa muparamende nemumakanzuru dzava kuitwa musi wa26 Kurume.

Mutevedzeri wemutauriri weMDCA muMasvingo, Muzvare Lee Mahachi,
vashoropodza kusungwa nekushungurudzwa kuri kuitwa vatsigiri vavo.

Kusungwa nekupinda mudare kwevatatu ava kunoitika pasina svondo mbiri imwe nhengo yeMDC Alliance, VaJohn Mupanduki,v ekuBikita, vakapambwa vakatochiwa kwemazuva maviri ndokuzosiyiwa vakandwa padivi pemugwagwa kuMashava. Gore rapera mumwedzi waMbudzi, imwe nhengo yeMDC-A, VaNyasha Zhambe Mawere, vakafa kwaGutu mushure mekurohwa nevanonzi vatsigiri veZanu PF. Asi sachigaro weZanu PF muMasvingo, VaRobson Mavhenyengwa,, vanoti bato ravo hariiti zvemhirizhonga vachiti vanokoshesa kuchengetedza mutemo. No media source currently available
title: Nhengo dzeMDC Alliance Dzinobvisisa Mari yeChibatiso kuMasvingo

text: Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri weAmerica, VaMike Pence, vari kutarisirwa Chtatu manheru kutatsurana nevari kuda kuzoitwa mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, vakamirira bato reDemocratic party, Senator Kamala Harris, mudhibheti ravo rekutanga. Gakava pakati paVaPence naAmai Harris riri kuuya panguva iyo mutungamiri weAmerica, pamwe nevamwe vevavanoshanda navo, kumuzinda weWhite House vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19. Dhibheti iri riri kukokerwa nemutori wenhau, Susan Page, uyo anoshanda neUSA Today. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika, Dr Moses Rumano, vanoti gakava pakati pevaviri ava rakatarisirwa neveruzhinji kuti riburitse gwara re America panyaya dzezvehupfimi, nyaya yerusarura ganda pamwe nechirwere cheCovid-19. "Vazhinji vachada kunzwa kuti vaviri ava vachabata seyi nyaya yehupfumi hwenyika sezvo vanhu vakawanda vakarasikirwa nemabasa panguva ino yeCovid-19." Doctor Rumano vaudza Studio7. Dhibheti raVaPence naAmai Harris riri kuitika svondo rimwe chete mutungamiri wenyika, VaDonald Trump, vaitawo gakava ravo nevaimbove mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, uye vari mumiriri weDemocratic Party musarudzo yemutungamiri weAmerica, VaJoe Biden. Dhibheti revaviri ava rinonzi nevakawanda harina kuvafadza sezvo mativi ose apindira panguva iyo mumwe aive nemukana wekutaura. No media source currently available
title: VaMike Pence veRepublican Party Votatsurana naAmai Kamala Harris veDemocratic Party Manheru eChitatu

text: MDC inotungamirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai yanyorerana chibvumirano chekushanda pamwe nebato neTransform Zimbabwe munzira yekuumba mubatanidzwa wemapato anopikisa pamberi pesarudzo dzegore rinouya. VaTsvangirai pamwe nemutungamiri weTransform Zimbabwe, VaJacob Ngarivhume, vanyorerana chibvumirano chekushanda pamwe chete pamberi pevatori venhau pamusangano waitirwa pamba paVaTsvangirai muHarare. Vachitaura mushure mekusainirana chibvumirano ichi, VaTsvangirai vati nhaurirano nemamwe mapato anopikisa dzekuumba mubatanidzwa wemapato anopikisa pamberi pesarudzo dzegore rinouya dzinofanira kupera mukupera kwemwedzi uno kuitira kuti mapato anopikisa akwanise kushandisa nguva shoma yasara sarudzo dzisati dzaitwa mukutsvaga rutsigiro. Zvataurwa naVaTsvangirai zvatsigirwawo naVaNgarivhume avo vaudza vatori venhau kuti mapato anopikisa anofanira kushanda zvakasimba kuti akwanise kubvisahurumende yeZanu PF mumasimba. VaNgarivhume vatiwo mapato anopikisa anofanira kubatana zvichienderana nekuti ari kuunzei patafura kwete kuti vanhu vanongomuka vawumba mapato avo nechinangwa chekuda kungopinda mumumbatanidzwa wemapato anopikisa uyu. VaTsvangirai vati havasati vataura naVaNkosana Moyo avo vanoti vachada kukwikwidza musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika vakazvimirira uye vachitsigirwa neboka riri kuzvidaidza kuti Alliance for the People’s Agenda kana kuti APA. VaMoyo vakaudza vatori venhau svondo rapera kuti havasi kuzopinda mumubatanidzwa nemamwe mapato anopikisa vachiti mubatanidzwa uyu ndewevanhu vari kutsvagirana mabasa chete usina zvaunoreva. VaTsvangirai vakanyoreranawo zvibvumirano zvekushandira pamwe nemamwe mapato akaita seMDC inotungamirwa naVaWelshman Ncube, Zanu Ndonga, pamwe nebato reNational People’s Party riri kufanotungamirirwa nevakadzingwa muhurumende semutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Joice Mujuru. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika uye vachishanda vakazvimirira, VaPhilani Zamchiya, vanoti mapato anopikisa ane mukana wakakura wekunda VaRobert Mugabe nebato ravo musarudzo kana akashanda ose pamwe chete. Asi VaZamachiya vati mamiriro akaita zvinhu panyaya dzenhaurirano dzekuwumba mubatanidzwa wemapato anopikisa ari kuratidza kuti pachave nemibatanidzwa yemapato anopikisa miviri umwe uchange uchitungamirwa naVaTsvangirai, umwe uchitungamirwa naAmai Mujuru. Mashoko aVa Zamchiya anouyawo apo Amai Mujuru vakanyorerana chibvumirano chekushanda pamwe nemapato ari mumubatanidzwa weCoalition of Democrats, kana kuti Code, une mapato anosanganisira ProgressiveDemocratic Party yaVaTendai Biti neRenewal Democrats of Zimbabwe yaVaElton Mangoma. Asi VaTsvangirai vati vachiri kushanda pamwe naAmai Mujuru nebato ravo reNPP vachiti vane chivimbo chekuti VaMugabe neZanu PF vachakundwa musarudzo dzegore rinouya. Vakurudzirawo kuti veruzhinji vanyorese kuvhota nehuwandu hwavo vachiti rwendo rwuno vachasunga dzisimbe kuti vasape Zanu PF mukana wekubirira musarudzo. VaTsvangirai vatorawo mukana wanhasi kuudza veruzhinji kuti komiti yepamusoro yebato ravo yeNatinal Executive yakabudawo nechisungo chekuratidzira munyika yose munguva pfupi iri kutevera vachiti mafambisirwo esarudzo munyika anofanira kuvandudzwa. VaTsvangirai vanoti bato ravo rakabirirwa neZanu PF zvemhando yepamusoro-soro musarudzo dzapfuura asi Zanu PF inoti sarudzo idzi dzaive dzakachena semukaka. No media source currently available
title: MDC-T Yoronga Mushandira Pamwe neTransform Zimbabwe

text: Mutungamiri weMDC Alliance VaNelson Chamisa vashora zvikuru tsika yehurumende yekuenda kunorapwa kunze kwenyika vachisiya varombo vachiyaura munyika nekuti havana mari. VaChamisa vakataura mashoko aya kuMvurwi, Mashonaland Central uko vange vachiita musangano nemusi weSvondo. Mashoko avo anotevera mutauro wasimuka munyika mushure mekunge hurumende yasimudza mumwe mutevedzeri wemutungami wenyika VaKembo Mohadi negurukota rezvezviwanikwa Amai Oppah Muchinguri-Kashiri kuSouth Africa mushure mekuputikirwa nerinofungidzirwa kuti igirinedhi kuWhite City Stadium. Vaimbova mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe nemhuri yavo vaienda kunorapwa kunze kwenyika zvikuru kuSingapore. Kunyangwe vaviri ava vakatakurwa nendege kunorapwa, vamwe vanhu vanodarika makumi mana vakakuvarawo havana kuwana mukana uyu sezvo vari kurapwa muzvipatara zvemunyika. Vamwe vaviri vakatoshaya. VaChamisa vatiwo VaChamisa semusambangwena kuona kuti sarudzo dzegore rino hadzisi kuzobiridzirwa. Vavimbisawo kuti vakasarudzwa kuti vatungamire nyika vachagadzirisa nyaya dzezvehupfumi. VaChamisa vakataurawo nyaya yeminda vachiti vakakunda hurumende yavo haisi kuzobvutira vanhu mumapurazi. Vakataurawo nyaya yekuti vane hurongwa hwekuwanisa vanhu mabasa. Vashorawo mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa nemumwe mutevedzeri wavo VaConstantino Chiwenga nekungoita gudzira mukanwa vasingagadzirise matambudziko akatarisama nenyika. VaChamisa vakavimbisawo vanhu kuti vachapihwa mari yemudyandigere. Sarudzo dzemutungamiri wenyika dziri kutarisirwa kuitwa musi wa 30 mwedzi uno. Pane vanhu makumi maviri nevatatu vari kukwikwidza musarudzo dzemutungamiri wenyika gore rino. No media source currently available
title: VaChamisa Voshora Hurumende neKutumira Vakuru Vakuru Kunorapwa Kunze

text: Mutevedzeri wasachigaro weMDC, VaTendai Biti, vatanga kutongwa nemusi weMuvhuro nemhosva yavari kupomerwa yekuzivisa zvavanoti ndizvo zvakabuda musarudzo zvinonzi zviri kunze kwemutemo vachiti maoko avo akachena. Pavakapirwa mhosva yavari kupomerwa pakutanga kutongwa kwenyaya yavo, VaBiti vakati maoko avo akachena semukaka. Rimwe remagweta aVaBiti, Amai Beatrice Mtetwa, vakati VaBiti havafanire kutombotongwa vachiti vakaunzwa kumatare zvisiri pamutemo nokudaro mhosva yavari kupomerwa inofanirwa kuraswa. Izvi zvakatsinhirwa nerimwe remagweta aVaBiti, VaAlec Muchadehama. VaMuchadehama vakatiwo VaBiti vari kupomerwa mhosva imwechete kaviri vachiti zvakaitwa nehurumende izvi zvinoratidza kushungurudza VaBiti. VaMuchadehama vakatiwo vakafara nekubvumidzwa kwakaitwa nedare kuti vatori venhau vatepfenyure zvanga zvichiitika panguva yanga ichinzwikwa nyaya yaVaBiti zvichitevera chikumbiro chavakasvitsa semagweta. Mumwe wevatori venhau vanga vachitevera nyaya iyi mudare uye achishandira kambani yeSly Media, VaRobert Tapfumaneyi, vakati itarisiro yavo yekuti vatori venhau vabvumidze kutepfenyura kana kutora mifananidzo pose panonzwikwa nyaya dzakadai. VaBiti vakatarisirwa kudzoka mudare mangwana apo magweta ehurumende akatarisirwa kupa mhinduro pachikumbiro chasvitswa kudare nemagweta aVaBiti chekuti nyaya yavari kupomerwa iraswe. Pakaitwa sarudzo dzemuna Chikunguru VaBiti vanonzi vakazivisa kuti mapepa avainawo airatidza kuti mutungamiri weMDC Alliance VaNelson Chamisa ndivo vakakunda musarudzo kunyange hazvo komisheni inoona nezvesarudzo yeZimbabwe Electoral Commission yakazoti VaEmmerson Mnangagwa ndivo vakakunda musarudzo ye mutungamiri wenyika izvo zvakazotsinhirwawo nedare repamusorosoro munyika reConstitutional Court. Kunyange hazvo dare reConstitutional Court rakatura mutongo waro panyaya iyi, VaChamisa vari kuramba vakatsika madziro vachiti vakabirirwa zvemhando yepamusorosoro. Nyaya yaVaBiti iri kuteverwa nevakawanda pasi rose kusanganisa kubva kuAmerica iyo yakabuda pachena nemusi weChina kumusangano wakaitwa kudare repamusoro seSenate kuti inoona sekunga VaBiti vari kukngoshingurudzwa semunhu anopikisa hurumende. Asi hurumende yakati haiudzwe zvekuita neAmerica. Zvichakadaro vaimbova gurukota rezvemhando dzemoto Doctor Samuel Undenge vanzi nedare havana mhosva yavakapara panyaya yavange vachipomerwa yekuti vakaita zvehuori pakupa basa mumwe muzvinabhizimisi VaWicknel Chivhayo kuti vagadzire gwenya remagetsi ezuva kugwanda. Mune imwe nyaya yange iri kumatare, vaimbova gurukota rezvehumhizha mukufambiswa kwemashoko VaSupa Mandiwanzira vanzi vadzoke kudare nemusi wa18 Zvita sezvo vati vachuchusi vakanonoka kuvapa mapepa. VaMandiwamzira vari kupomerwawo mhosva yehuori. No media source currently available
title: VaBiti Vomiswa Pamberi peDare

text: Mutungamiri wenyika mutsva, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vari kutarisirwa kutoresa mhiko neMuvhuro makurukota avo avakadoma svondo rapera. VaMNangagwa vari kuita izvi kunyange hazvo paine maonero akasiyanasiyana pamusoro pedare remakurukota iri. Vamwe vane maonero ekuti makurukota aya vanhu vakaratidza kukundikana kwavo kare sezvo vakashanda muhurumende yevaive mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vachiti hapana zvitsva zvavachaita. Vamwewo vanoti kutora masimba kwakaitwawo naVaMunangagwa munongedzowo wekuti hapanawo zvitsva zvinotarisirwa kuhurumende yaVaMnangagwa avo vakashanda naVaMugabe muhurumende kwemakore makumi matatu nemanomwe. Asi vamwewo anoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vakarerekera kubato reZanu PF, VaGadzira Chirumhanzu, vanoti vanhu ngavarege kukasika kumedza kutsenga vachada sezvo VaMnangagwa vachangotanga basa vasati varatidza nyika zvavakapfumbata. No media source currently available
title: Vamwe Vanoti Ipai Nguva VaMnangagwa Pane Kuvashora

text: Vanhu vana vafa nechirwere chekorera muChegutu vamwe gumi nevasere vakarapwa chirwere ichi. Mukuru mubazi rezvehutano mudunhu reMashonaland West, VaWensilus Nyamayaro, vazivisa nhasi kuti vanhu vana vakafa kubvira musiwa 8 Ndira kusvika 18 Ndira. VaNyamayaro vatiwo pari zvino vanhu gumi nevasere vakarapwa chirwere chekorera mwedzi uno, vanomwe vavo vari madzimai, gumi nemumwechete vari varume. Mudzimai ane makore makumi masere, Amai Laita Mungulisia, avo vanopinda chechi yechiMoslem, ndivo vakatanga kufa musiwa 8 Ndira. Zvinonzi nekuda kwechitendero chavo icho chinosungira kuti munhu anenge afa asvinwe matumbu, varume vatatu vakasvina matumbu Amai Mungulisia, vakazorwarawo nemudumbu vaviri vavo vakafa. Mumwe murume akazofawo nezuro nechirwere chekorera mushure mukuendeswa kuchipatara chemuChegutu nemusiwe Chitatu svondo rino. VaNyamayaro vari kukurudzira vemachechi kuti vaungane panenge paine zvimbudzi nemvura yakachena uye kuti vanhu vasabhabhatidzirane mumvura. VaNyamayaro vati cholera yawanikwa muChegutu haina kubva kuZambia asi ndeye muChegutu uye vanhu vachadzidziswa kuviga munhu anenge afa nekorera. Hurumende yekuZambia yakazivisa kuti chirwere chekorera chatekeshera munyika iyi uye vanhu chiuru vakarapwa chirwere ichi. Mugore ra2009 vanhu vanosvika mazana maviri vakarwara nekorera vamwe makumi matatu nevanomwe vakafa muChegutu. No media source currently available
title: Vanhu Vana Vanofa neKorera kuChegutu

text: Mutungamiri werimwe boka reMDC-T uye vari mutungamiri weMDC Alliance, VaNelson Chamisa, vakurudzira sangano renyika dziri kuchamhembe kweAfrica reSADC kuti ripindire pagakava riri muZimbabwe panyaya dzemafambisirwo esarudzo. Vachitaura nevatori venhau pamuzinda webato ravo paMorgan Tsvangirai House, VaChamisa vakurudzira SADC kuti iite musangano wechimbichimbi ichitarisa nyaya dzesarudzo dzemuno. VaChamisa vati hurumende yeZimbabwe pamwe nekomisheni inoona nezvesarudzo vanofanira kuona kuti nyaya yemapepa ekuvhotera kana kuti ma ballot paper pamwe negwaro revavhoti zvagadziriswa sarudzo dzisati dzaitwa. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika uye vachishanda vakazvimirira, VaVivid Gwede, vaudza Studio 7 kuti SADC yatononoka kupindira munyaya yeZimbabwe kubva pakapindira masoja mune zvematongerwo enyika gore rapera zvakazoita kuti vaimbova mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vasiye basa. Kutaura kuno, MDC Alliance iri kuchemachemawo nemasoja anonzi ari muZimbabwe Electoral Commission, Zec. VaChamisa vatiwo vari kuronga kuratidzira kana pasina chafamba kubva kudivi reSADC, Zec pamwe nehurumende. Vati vari kupa Zec svondo rimwe chete kuti igadzirise nhuna dzavo. VaChamisa vati vachasvitsawo nhuna dzavo kune vaimbova munyori mukuru weUnited Nations, VaKoffi Annan, pamusangano wavakatarisira kuita navo muHarare neChishanu. VaChamisa vatiwo havasi kufara nekusaziva kune pfimbi yemashoko evanhu vachavhota musarudzo dzemusi wa30 Chikunguru vachiti zvakakosha kuti vari kukwikwidza musarudzo vazive zvese zvine chekuita nesarudzo. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nasaschigaro weZec, Amai Priscilla Chigumba, kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi. Asi Amai Chigumba vakataura kare kuti hapana wavachazivisa pane pfimbi yemashoko iyi vachiti ivo sekomisheni ndivo voga vari kuziva kune sevha iyi iyo yavakachengeta sepfimbi yegudo. Amai Chigumba vanoti zvese zvavari kuita sekomisheni zviri pamutemo nokudaro vanoti vari kutarisira kuti pachave nesarudzo dzakachena. Asi VaChamisa vati Zec haina kumira pachokwadi vachiti Amai Chigumba vanofanira kutevedzera mhiko yavakatora pavakapinda basa yekuti vachaita basa ravo pasina divi ravakarerekera. No media source currently available
title: VaChamisa Vanoti SADC Ngaigadzirise Dambudziko Riri muZimbabwe Sarudzo Dzisati Dzaitwa

text: Vakafanobata chigaro chemutungamiri wenyika, VaConstantino Chiwenga, vari kupomerwa mhosva yekuzvidza mutongo wedare mushure mekushandisa mauto kudzivirira mudzimai wavo wavari kunetsana naye, Muzvare Marry Mubaiwa, kupinda mumba yavo yekuBorrowdale Brooke sezvakataurwa nedare apo vakapihwa mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso. Mudzimai waVaChiwenga ari kupomerwa mhosva yekuda kuvaponda uye kuburitsa mari munyika zvisiri pamutemo. Ari kuramba nyaya iyi. VaKen Mubayiwa, baba vaMuzvare Mubayiwa, vaudza Studio7 kuti ichokwadi kuti havana kubvumidzwa kudzokera kumba asi vati tizotaura navo zvizere neChishanu. Asi rimwe gweta raMuzvare Mubaiwa, VaTaona Nyamakura, vanoti vari kuronga kukwidza VaChiwenga kumatare kana vakaramba vakatsika madziro. Vamwe vemhuri vanonzi vari kuti pamboitwa nhaurirano nyaya iyi isati yakwidzwa kumatare zvekare. Hatina kukwanisa kubata VaChiwenga sezvo munhu adaira nharembozha yatinomboshandisa kuvabat, ati haachashande kuhofisi kwavo. Rimwe gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu, uye vari mukuru weHuman Rights kuchamhembe kweAfrica, VaDewa Mavhinga, vanoti vatungamiri venyika vanofanira kuremekedza mitemo yenyika. No media source currently available
title: VaChiwenga Vorambidza Mudzimai Wavo Kupinda Mumba neKuona Vana

text: Mutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica, VaDonald Trump, vanonzi vari kupembera nezvakaburitswa mugwaro reongororo yakaitwa nevakasarudzwa kuti vaferefete kana paive nekudyidzana pakati pechikwata chaivatsvagira rutsigiro nenyika yeRussia munguva yesarudzo dza 2016. Vaitungamira kuferefetwa uku, VaRobert Mueller, vanonzi vakaburitsa gwaro reongororo yavo svondo rapera, uye gweta guru renyika, VaWilliam Barr, vakazoburitsawo chidimbu cheongororo iyi nemusi weSvondo, icho chinotaura kuti mutungamiri wenyika haana mhosva yaari kupomerwa. Izvi zvinonzi zviri kutambirwa nemufaro naVaTrump pamwe nebato ravo reRepublican Party. Asi vebato rinopikisa re Democratic party, vanonzi vari kuda kuziva kuti VaBarr vakasvika sei pakusarudza zvikamu zveongororo iyi zvavakaburitsa, uye kuti vanodawo kuti zvose zviri mugwaro raVa Mueller zviburitswe. Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vakazvimirira, Doctor Wangu Mazodze, vanoti vanoonawo sekuti ongororo iyi yakaburitsa kuti Russia haina chikamu chayakaita kana kupindira musarudzo dzemuAmerica. asi Doctor Mazodze vanoti panyaya yekuti VaTrump vakapindira here muongororo iyi, VaMueller havana kubuda pachena, izvo zvinoita kuti vanhu vasave nevimbo nehutungamiri hwavaTrump. No media source currently available
title: Mutungamiri weAmerica, VaTrump, Vanochenurwa neZvakabuda muGwaro raVaMueller paNyaya yeRussia

text: Mandla "Malax" Katuli uyo akaimba kambo kanonzi Wakanda naRoki anoti ari kufara zvikuru nekutambirwa kuri kuitwa kambo aka nevanhu. Kambo aka kanotora zita kubva pafirimu rakaita mukurumbira zvikuru pasi rose gore rapera rinonzi Black Panther rinotaura nezvenyika yemuAfrica yegudziramukanwa hayo inonzi “Wakanda.”  Malax anoimba nechikwata cheAfroblacks uye akatoburitsa mamwe madambarefu matatu. Gore rino anoti anoda kuburitsa dambarefu nevaimbi vakawanda vanosanganisa Seh Calaz, Sani Makhalima, Ngoni Kambarami, Willis Wataffi, Garry Tight nevamwe. Malax akaburitsawo vhidhiyo inonzi Song yeKudonha apo akaimba neShona kambo kaKing Monada kakanetsawo gore rapera kanonzi Malwedhe Idibala. No media source currently available
title: Muimbi Malax naRoki Vonetsa neKambo Kanonzi Wakanda

text: Vamwe vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vari kushoropodza danho rakavimbiswa nehurumende rekuda kuwedzera rubatsiro rwunopiwa kumadzishe vachiti hazvina kusiyana nekutenga mavhoti pamberi pesarudzo dzegore rinouya. Vanhu ava vanoti pane zvakawanda zvinoda kugadziriswa nekukasika munyika zvinokunda kupa madzishe zvemahara zvose izvi. Izvi zvinotevera kuziviswa kwakaitwa svondo rino nemutevedzeri wegurukota rezvekutongwa kwematunhu, Amai Marian Chombo, kuti hurumende ichapa madzishe mari dzekubatsirikana dziri mumadhora ekuAmerica, mafuta edzimotokari, mari dzekufonesa, kugadzirisirwa kwedzimotokari dzavo kana dzafa nehurumende uye kutengerwa dzimwe motokari itsva mushure memakore mashanu oga oga. Pamusoro pezvo madzishe ose anenge orapwa pasi pechirongwa chehurumende. Madzishe agara achipiwa motokari nehurumende uye mafuta edzimotokari pamwe nekuisirwa magetsi mudzimba, asi izvi zvinombomira kuitwa zvichizodzorwa zvakare kazhinji munguva iyo nyika inenge yatarisana nesarudzo. Mumwe wevari kupokana nedanho iri, VaRejoice Ngwenya, vanoti madzishe anorarama nevanhu, muvanhu, nekudaro hurumende haifanirwi kupindira nekuti mukupedzisira ichada kuti vaite zvido zvavo ivo votadza kuramba nekuti vanenge vakasungwa maoko nezvinhu zvavari kutambiriswa izvi. VaNgwenya vanoti kunyange hazvo hurongwa uhwu hwanga hwakanaka, nguva yahwaitwa ndiyo yakaipa, izvo zvinobva zvaita kuti chiitiko chacho chinziwo chakaipa. Nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika vachitungamira bato re Democratic Party, VaUrayayi Zembe vanoti zviri pachena kuti matanho aya akanangana neketenga mavhoti, vachiti hazvina kusiyana nekuisa mbwirembwire mumukanwa memadzishe. VaZembe vanotiwo izvi zvinogona kuita kuti madzishe akundikane kugarisana nevanopikisa hurumende nekutya kutorerwa zvinhu izvi. Asi vamwe vanotsigira hurongwa uhwu vanoti hapana chakaipa kuti hurumende ichengete madzishe, vachiti hazvina kusiyana nekuti mwana achengete mubereki wake. Muna 2021 Zimbabwe yaive nemadzishe mazana maviri nemakumi masere nevatanhatu, kana kuti 286. No media source currently available
title: Danho reHurumende reKuda Kuwedzera Kupa Madzishe Zvemahara Roonekwa seHuwori Hwekuda Kutenga Mavhoti

text: VeRoman Catholic Church pamwe nedzisvondo dziri musangano reZimbabwe Council of Churches neMuvhuro manheru vakanyorerana chibvumirano chekunamata nekushanda pamwe chete mushure mekunge dzisvondo idzi dzapatsanuka kubva muCatholic Church makore mazana mashanu apfuura. Izvi zvakaitika pamunamato wakaitwa paAnglican Cathedral muHarare apo veCatholic Church vainge vakamirirwa nemabhishopi esvondo iyi eZimbabwe Catholic Bishops Conference. Munyori mukuru weZimbabwe Catholic Bishops Conference, Baba Frederick Chiromba, vanoti vakaona zvakakodzera kubatana nekushanda pamwe kunyange hazvo vanhu vaine maonero akasiyana. Baba Chiromba vanotiwo kubatana kwevedzisvondo kunofanira kupa chidzidzo kune veruzhinji pamwe nevezvamatongerwo enyika kuti zvinhu zvinofamba chete kana vanhu vakabatana. Munyori mukuru musangano reZimbabwe Council of Churches, Reverend Kenneth Mtata, vanoti kunyange hazvo makereke akapatsanuka kubva muCatholic Church muna 1517, zvakaonekwa kuti makereke aya anofanira kushanda pamwe. Vamiriri vedzisvondo dziri muEvangelical Fellowship of Zimbabwe nevamiriri vedzimwe nyika vakapinda mumunamato wanezuro menheru. Vachitaura pachiitiko ichi, meya veguta reHarare, VaBen Manyenyeni, vakati Zimbabwe inyika ine vanhu vakatarisana nenhamo, vari kuchema, vanoda runyararo uye vezvematongerwo enyika vanofanira kudzidza kubva mukubatana kwaitwa nevedzisvondo. Mumiriri wenyika dziri musangano reEuropean Union, VaPhillipe Van Damme, vakatiwo vedzisvondo varatidza gwara rakanaka uye vanovimba kuti vatungamiriri veZimbabwe vachatevedzerawo gwara resvondo. No media source currently available
title: Machechi Anonyorerana Chibvumirano Chekuti Ashande Pamwe

text: Zimbabwe yabatana nepasi rose mukucherechedza zuva rechikafu pasi rose reWorld Food Day, veruzhinji munyika vachichema kuti havana zvekudya zvinokwanira mhuri dzavo. Panguva iyo pasi rose racherechedza zuva reWorld Food Day, iro rinokoshesa kuti veruzhinji vange vaine zvokudya zvakakwana, veruzhinji munyika vakaita saAmai Nancy Gondongwe vemuHarare vanoti vari kunetseka nekuraramisa mhuri yavo sezvo hupfumi hwenyika husina kumira zvakanaka. Izvi zvatsinhirwawo nemumwe murimi wekuGoromonzi, Amai Marcia Kanengoni, vanove mumwe wevakapihwa munda nehurumende pasi pechirongwa chekugoverwa kwevhu kuvanhu vatema, avo vati dambudziko rekuraramisa mhuri yavo rabva rawedzera gore rino sezvo vachiti havana kukohwa zvakanaka kuburikidza nekusanaya zvakanaka kwemvura pamwe nekudhura kuri kuita zvikwanisiro zvavanoda mukurima. Gurukota rezvekurima, VaAnxious Masuka, vaudza Studio 7 parunhare kuti hurumende iri kusimbaradza nyaya yemaguta vachiti varimi vazhinji vari kupihwa zvekushandisa zvakaita sembeu nefetereza pachena kuti vabatsirikane, uye vamwe vari kuwanawo zvinhu izvi nechikwereti pasi pechirongwa cheCommand Agriculture kuitira kuti nyika ikwanise kuva nechikafu chinokwanira munhu wese. Sangano reWorld Food Program, iro rakapihwa mubayiro weNobel Peace Prize mazuva mashoma adarika, rinoti vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni mashanu munyika zvikuru sei kumaruwa, vakatarisana nenzara yakakomba. Zvichakadai, munyori anoona nezvekurima muMDC Alliance, VaRasty Markham, vanoti chinodiwa ndechekuti varimi vanofanira kupihwa zvekushandisa mukurima paine nguva uye vanenge vatora zvikwereti pakurima vadzoserewo zvikwereti zvavanenge vapihwa. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvekurima uye vachishanda neUniversity of South Africa, VaToendepi Shonhe, vanoti varimi vanofanira kuwana mari inonyatsokwana mukuita basa ravo. VaShonhe vanoti mari yakanangana nechirongwa cheCommand Agriculture ishoma zvikuru zvekuti nyika ingave nemaguta. VaShonhe vatiwo nyaya yemitengo yezvirimwa ndiyo iri kukonzera zvakanyanya kuti varimi vasaise simba ravo rose mukushanda muminda yavo. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinoti hupfumi hwenyika hwakatanga kuwira pasi muna 2000 apo hurumende yeZanu PF yakatanga kutora mapurazi kubva kuvarimi vechichena ichipa kuvarimi vatema, avo vanonzi nenyanzvi idzi havana mari yakakwana pamwe nezvimwe zvinoshandiswa pakurima zvakaita semichina nemishonga. No media source currently available
title: Zimbabwe Inobatana nePasi Rose kuCherechedza Zuva World Food Day

text: Nhasi tiri kuparura chirongwa chiri kutarisa nyaya yenzara iyo yapfunya chisero kuti bwa munyika. Ko chii chakonzera nzara iyi, uye inganzi here yasvika panganzi hapana mukare akamboona zvakadai? Sangano reWorld Food Programe rakabatana neZimvac anoti vanhu vanoda kusvika mamiriyoni masere vakatarisana nenzara inotyisa muZimbawe. Ukuwo bazi reUnited Nations rinoona nezvevana reUnicerf nereZimbabwe National Statistics Agency akaburitsawo gwaro rinoratidza kuti vana vanodarika zvikamu makumi manomwe kubva muzana vakatarisana nenzara, vana vari kumaruwa vanodarika makumi manomwe nematanhatu kubva muzana havana chekudya. Nzvimbo dzine vana vakatarisana nedambudziko iri kunyanya iMashonaland Central, Manicaland neMatabeleland North. Tichitarisa mamiriro ezvinhu aya, Zimbabwe haisati yasvika here pekuti vanhu vakawanda vanogona kufa kana kuti inganzi famine? Mukuru anoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko muWFP kuchamhembe kweAfrica VaGerald Bourke vanoti nyaya yechikafu ikasagadziriswa nechimbi chimbi vanhu vanoenda kwamupfiganebwe. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvekudya dzinoti kusamira zvakanaka kwekunze uye kutadza kutungamira ndizvo zvinokonzera kuti vanhu vafe nenzara pasi rose. Vakanzvera magwaro enhoroondo vanoti nzara yekutanga pasi rose yakauraya vanhu vakawanda yakanyorwa munhoroondo yakatanga kuRome muna 441 BC. Dzimwe nyika dzakaita nzara dzakauraya vakawanda dzinosanganisira North Korea kubva muna 1994 kusvika 1998 apo vanhu mamiriyoni matatu vakafa. Kubva muna 1932 kusvika 1933 vanhu mamiriyoni gumi vakafa muSoviet Union. KuChina panzara inonzi Great Chinese famine yekubva muna 1959 kusvika 1962 vanhu mamiriyoni makumi mana nevashanu vakafa zvose izvi zvichikonzerwa nemitemo yehurumende yekutora minda ichiisa pasi payo uye mafashamu emvura. Dambudziko remamiriro ekunze rinonzi El Nino, rakauraya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi nemumwe kuIndia kumakore ekuma1783. MuZimbabwe chiri kupa kuti zvinhu zvinyanye kuita mhidigari inyaya yekuti hupfumi hwenyika haunawo kumira zvakanaka. WFP inombopa vanhu mari yekugayisa chibage, asi mukuru weWFP muZimbabwe VaEddie Rowe vanoti vakaregedza kupa vakawanda mari nekuda kwekushaya mari kubva kuReserve Bank of Zimbabwe. Mamwe masangano amira kupa rubatsiro rwemari anoti Red Cross uye Catholic Agency for Overseas Development. Asi gurukota rezvevashandi nemagariro akanaka evanhu Muzvinafundo Paul Mavima vanoti hurumende ichiri kubatsira nemari. Mukuru weRed Cross kuchamhembe kweAfrica Doctor Michael Charles vanoti vanhu mamiriyoni makumi mana nemashanu vakatarisana nenzara kunyika dzekuchamhembe kweAfrica kusvika muna Kubvumbi zvinonzi naVaBourke zvinonetsa kutsvaga mari yekubatsira Zimbabwe. Hurumende inenge isiri kuziva pfumo roibaya. Mamwe makurukota anoti iri mugwara uye hapana anofa nenzara. Asi svondo rapera gurukota rezvekurima VaPerrance Shiri vakati nyika yasarwa nematani zviuru zana chete echibage mudura kwete miriyoni yematani iri kutarisirwa. Chibage chasara ichi hachipedze mwedzi. WFP inotiwo Zimbabwe iri kungoti yakagadzirira asi hapana chiri kubuda. Gore rapera WFP yakati Zimbababwe yainge iri kukundikana kupa vanhu mamiriyoni matatu chikafu sezvayainge yavimbisa kunyangwe VaMavima vakaramba mashoko aya. Gurukota rezvemaIndustry Doctor Sekai Nzenza vanoti hurumende iri kubatsira kuti mutengo wehupfu hudzike kunyangwe hazvo vamwe vari kuti hapana chachinja. Sangano reIntergovermental Panel on Climate Change rinoti nyika dzekuchamhembe kweAfrica dziri kuchinja mamiriro ekunze kuchipisa zvakapetwa kaviri zvichienzaniswa nedzimwe nyika pasi rose. VaBourke vanotenderana nemaonero aya. WFP inoti inombotenga chibage kuZambia, asi chinorwadza ndechekuti varimi vakawanda vari kurima chibage chave kutengeserwa Zimbabwe nenyika iyi vakadzingwa muZimbabwe pahondo yeminda. Asi nekuda kwekuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka, VaBourke vanoti vave kutenga chibage kuUkraine neMexico nedzimwe nyika. VaMavima vanoti Zimbabwe yakapihwawo mupunga neChina uyo uri kupihwa vanhu. VaRowe vanotiwo Zimbabwe haidi chikafu chakarimwa nemishonga kana kuti genetically modified zvopa kuti kutenga chigagekunyika dzakaita seSouth Africa kunetse. WFP inoti kubva pakati paZvita yange yapa vanhu mamiriyoni maviri chikafu asi kubva muna Ndira muno kusvika muna Kubvumbi iri kutarisira kupa vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni mana. Asi havasati vawana chikafu chekupa vanhu muna Ndira zvichienda kumberi. Kunze kwekuyaura kwevanhu, nzara iyi yauraya mhuka dzemusango nezvipfuyo zvakawanda. Nzou dzinodarika zana dzakafa nekushaya zvekudya uye kushaikwa kwemvura sematauririo emutauriri weZimparks VaTinashe Farawo muna Zvita apo mvura yairambira mudenga. Sangano reFamine Early Warning System riri kuyambira kuti nzvimbo dzakawanda munyika dzicharamba dzakatarisana nedambudziko rechikafu iri zvichikonzerwa nekusanaya kwemvura uye kushaya zvikwanisiro kwevarimi. Hurumende yakatenderawo vanoga chibage kuti vatenge chibage kunze uye Grain Millers Association inoti nhengo dzayo dzakwanisa kutenga matani zviuru zana ichit pamwedzi panodiwa matani zviuru makumi masere. Kare vanasorojena vaye varere muhapwa dzemakomo vaiti kana mvura yarambira mudenga vaiita mukwerera. Vamwe vaienda kumakomo ekuMatobo kuBulawayo panzvimbo inoyera yeNjelele, vachibva kumativi mana enyika kunokumbira mvura. Apa vanhu vaibika doro rezviyo voteterera kuna Marwi, Mlimo, Musiki kana kuti Nyadenga kuti mvura inaye. Pakauya vasina mabvi nebhaibheri vaye vevhangeri vanoti zvichida nyika yave kusvika kumagumo nekuti zvivi zvanyanya. Asi dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzemamiriro ekunze dzinotiwo zviri kukonzerwa nekushanduka kwemamiriro ekunze. Vamwe vanoti kutadza kutonga kwehurumende kuri kusiya vanhu vakagarira mapadza mushure mekutora mapurazi uye kusavaka madhamu nekutsvaga nzira dzechizvino zvino dzekurima kwapa kuti nyika iite seyakageza negoka munyama. Aiwaka, pose pafa munhu hapashaike muroyi. Idzi ndidzo dzimwe nyaya dzinenge dziri mudariro muhurukuro yedu iri kutarisa chaunza nzara mumusha nezvidoda kuitwa kugadzirisa dambudziko iri. No media source currently available
title: WFP Yoyambira Kuti nzara inogona kusvika pakaipisisa Zimbabwe ikasawana chikafu nechimbi chimbi

text: Mubatanidzwa wemaparamende emuSADC, weSADC Parliamentary Forum, unoti vatori venhau vanoita basa guru munguva dzesarudzo uye nyika dzese dzemudunhu iri dzinosungirwa kudzika mitemo inoita kuti vashande vakasununguka pasina kumbunyikidzwa. Vachitaura pamusangano wekuzeya gadziriro dzegore rino uyo wakarongwa neMedia Alliance of Zimbabwe muHarare, munyori mukuru weSADC PF, Doctor Esau Chiviya, vanoti masangano ose anoongorora sarudzo anotarisa mashandiro evatori venhau uye kushanda kwavo vasingambunyikidzwe kunowedzera mukana wekuti pave nesarudzo dzakachena. Doctor Chiviya vanoti zvakakosha kuti vatori venhau vaitewo basa ravo zvakanaka vasinga buritse nhau dzinogona kukonzera mhirizhonga munyika. Vanotiwo makambani enhau ehurumende anosungirwa kupa mapato ese mikana yakaenzana. Vanoti zvakabuda musarudzo dzese dzavakaongorora munyika zhinji muSADC zvinoratidza kuti makambani ehurumende anenge achitsigiria bato rinotonga ukuwo makambani akazvimirira mazhinji achitsigira mapato anopikisa. Doctor Chivhiya vanoti havana zvavangataura pamamiriro akaita zvinhu muZimbabwe pari zvino vachiti vachatuma chikwati chesangano ravo kuzoongorora sarudzo mwedzi miviri sarudzo idzi dzisati dzaitwa. Murairidzi wepaUniversity of Zimbabwe, VaLawrence Mandara, vanoti kunyange hazvo kuenda kwaVaRobert Mugabe kwakaunza tariro yekuti nyika inokwanisa kuita sarudzo dzakachena uye VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vachivimbisa kuti vachaita sarudzo dzakajeka, hapana chiri kuitika chinoratidza kuti sarudzo dzichange dzakachena. VaMandara vanoti mitemo yesarudzo nekutapwa kwenhau haisati yavandudzwa uye pane kunyunyuta muvanhu nemapato anopikisa maererano nemamiriro pamwe nemashandiro eZimbabwe Electoral Commission. Sachigaro veMedia Institute of Southern Africa-Zimbabwe, VaGolden Maunganidze, vaudza Studio 7 kuti havasi kufara nekuti hurumende yaVaMnangagwa haina zvairi kuita kuvandudza mitemo yemashandiro evatori venhau kunyange hazvo SADC muongororo yayo pasarudzo dza2013 yakati mitemo iyi inofanira kuvandudzwa. VaMaunganidze vanotiwo havasi kufara nenyaya yekuti mhirizhonga mumapato ezvematongerwo enyika yave kubata batawo vatori venhau. Vanoti vanofara chose kuti MISA nemamwe masangano anomirira vatori venhau vari kuita misangano nemapurisa nechinangwa chekunatsururdza hukama hwavo pamwe nekuti vashande zvakanaka pasina kushungurudzana. Mukuru weMedia Alliance of Zimbabwe, VaNigel Nyamutumbu, vanoti musangano uyu wange uri wekuongorora kuti vatori venhau vangaite sei apo vari kugadzirira sarudzo pamwe nekuti chii chavangaite kuti mitemo yemashandiro avo yavandudzwa sarudzo dzisati dzaitwa. Zimbabwe ichaita sarudzo yemutungamiriri wenyika, sarudzo dzeparamende nemakanzuru mumwedzi mishoma inotevera. No media source currently available
title: SADC Parliamentary Forum Yokurudzira Kushanda kweVatori veNhau Kwakasununguka

text: Mutauriri webato iri, VaObert Gutu, vaudza Studio 7 kuti VaMwonzora vasungwa pamusuwo weHigh Court mushure mekunge vaudza vanochengetedza dare iri kuti vange vari kudzikisira VaTsvangirai sezvo ari munhu anozivikanwa uye aimbove mutungamiriri wehurumende. Mapurisa eZimbabwe Republic Police asunga munyori mukuru we MDC inotungamirirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai, VaDouglas Mwonzora, padare redzimhosva repamusoro, mushure mekunge VaMwonzora vaudza vanochengetedza dare iri kuti vange vari kudzikisira VaTsvangirai nekuti vaburitse chitupa chavo vasati vapinda mudare iri. VaMwonzora vange vachiperekedza VaTsvangirai kudare iri uko vange vachida kunonzwa nyaya yavakakwirirwa kumatare naColonel Christopher Mayoyo avo vanoti zita ravo rakasvibiswa naVaTsvangirai pamusoro pemhirizhonga yezvematongerwo enyika yakaitika kuMasvingo muna 2008. Mutauriri webato iri, VaObert Gutu, vaudza Studio 7 kuti VaMwonzora vasungwa pamusuwo weHigh Court mushure mekunge vaudza vanochengetedza dare iri kuti vange vari kudzikisira VaTsvangirai sezvo ari munhu anozivikanwa uye aimbove mutungamiriri wehurumende. VaGutu vanoti ivo semaonero avo hapana nyaya uye kusungwa kwavo kwanakangana nekuvashungurudza chete. VaMwonzora vazoregedzwa vachienda kumba mukuvira kwezuva. Asi zvinonzi vanzi vazodzoka kumapurisa zvakare. VaMwonzora vari kumiririrwa naAdvocate Eric Matinenga avo tisina kukwanisa kubata. Hatinawo kukwanisa kubata VaMwonzora kuti tinzwe zvataurwa nemapurisa. Mutauriri wemapurisa, Senior Assistant Commissioner Charity Charamba, vati vange vachiri kutsvaga kuona kuti VaMwonzora vasungirwei. Zvichakadai, mutongi wedare reHigh Court, Justice Amry Tsanga, vati nyaya yaVaTsvangirai naColonel Mayoyo ichanzikwa musi wa 14 Chikunguru gore rino. Colonel Mayoyo vari kuda kuti VaTsvangirai vavabhadhare mazana mashanu ezviuru zvemadhora sezvo vachiti vakavasvibisa zita ravo nekuvadoma kuti vainge vakurudzira kufa, kupondwa nekushungurudzwa kwevanhu mumhirizhonga yezvematongerwo enyika yakaitika kuMasvingo muna 2008.
title: VaMwonzora Vanosungwa Ndokuzoregedzwa

text: Mutungamiri webato rinopikisa reMDC, VaNelson Chamisa, vashanyira jeri reChikurubi Maximum Prison, kunoona nhengo dzebato ravo dziri kupika mujeri iri, Last Maengahama naTungamirai Madzokere. Vaviri ava vakatongerwa kugara mujeri kwemakore makumi maviri mushure mekuwanikwa vaine mhosva yekuponda mumwe mupurisa mumusha weGlen View muna 2011. VaChamisa vanoti vamboita dambudziko rekurambidzwa kupinda mujeri iri kwemaawa anoda kusvika matatu vachengetedzi vepajeri iri vachiti vanga vachida kutanga vapiwa mvumo nevakuru vavo. VaChamisa vanoti vazokwanisa kuonana nevarume vaviri ava pamwe nevamwe vasungwa, kunyange hazvo vachiti vashushikana zvikuru kuti vabva vasina kuzokwanisa kuonawo Robert Martin Gumbura, uyo ari kupikawo pajeri iri. VaChamisa vanoti vasungwa vavataura navo vachemachema zvikuru nenyaya dzechikafu, mvura pamwe nemagariro ekumanikidzana kunge mbeva. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi reZimbabwe Prisons and Correctional Services panyaya yekunonotswa kwaVaChamisa kuona vanhu vavanga vafambira. No media source currently available
title: VaChamisa Vanoshanyira Vasungwa kuChikurubi Maximum Prison

text: Muzvare Mary Mubaiwa vaimbova mudzimai wemutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika VaConstantino Chiwenga vanzi nachiremba vavo vadimburwe ruoko sezvo vasisakwanise kurapika. Izvi zvinotevera kurambidzwa kunorapa kunze kwavakaitwa nematare. Muzvare Mubaiwa vainge vakatarisirwa kumira pamberi pedare neChipiri asi magweta avo ati vari kurwara zvakanyanya uye havakwanise kumira pamberi pedare. Dzimwe nguva vaimanikidzwa kuenda kudare vachirwara zvaizopa kuti vagume vadonha kana kufenda. Muzvare Mubaiwa vakarambidzwa kunorapwa kunze kwenyika kwavakaitwa nematare vachinzi vanozotiza sezvo vakatarisana nemhosva dzinogona kuti vagare mujeri kwenguva yakareba. Dare repamusoro reHigh Court nerepamusoro soro reSupreme Court akaramba kutambira chikumbiro chekuti vanorapwa kunze kwenyika. Vamwe vatongi vakaramba vanosanganisira VaTendai Uchena avo vakati Muzvare vane vakawanda vavanoziva kuSouth Africa nekudaro vanogona kuzotadza kudzoka. Rimwe gweta ravo Amai Beatrice Mtetwa vaudza Studio 7 kuti ichokwadi kuti vanachremba vati kuti Muzvare Mubaiwa vararame vave kufanira kudimburwa ruoko. Studio 7 yayedza kubata amai waMuzvare Mubaiwa, Amai Helga Mavo vati vange vasina kusungunuka kutaura sezvo vange vachityaira motokari uye vatiwo vakamirira kupirwa zvizere kubva kuna vanachiremba. Muzvare Mubaiwa vari kupomerwa mhosva dzakawandawanda dzinosanganisira kuti vaida kuita vachiwenga kafiramberi uye kuti vakayedza kuda kuita huori pakuti vaviri ava vachate. Asi vari kuramba mhosva dzose dzavari kupomerwa idzi uye vari kutevera zviri kuitika mumatare vanoti zvapupu zvehurumende zviri kutatarika kuvaroverera mhosva.
title: Hurwere hwaMuzvare Mary Mubaiwa Hwokomba Mushure Mekurambidzwa neMatare Kunorapwa neNyanzvi dzeKunze keNyika

text: No media source currently available Mumwe mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, nemusi weChina vaudza vatori venhau muHarare kuti vainge vaisirwa muchetura kunyange hazvo vasina kudya ice cream kubva kukambani yeGushungo Holdings inova yemhuri yemutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe. Vachitaura nevatori venhau vehurumende chete mushure mekudzinga vanoshandira makamabani enahu akazvimirira, VaMnangagwa vati havana kumbobvira varamba kuti vainge vaisirwa muchetura sezvakataurwa panhepfenyuro yeZBC uye zvikazotaurwawo nemumwe mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika VaPhelekezela Mphoko. VaMnangagwa vati vanachiremba vavo vakavaudza kuti vainge vaisirwa muchetura asi nyaya iyi yainge ichiri kuda kuongororwa. Vati havo havana kudyira muchetura uyu kuGwanda kumusangano weZanu-PF asi vakazongororwara vaveko. Vachitaura kunyaradzo yamuchakabvu Shuvai Mahofa nemusi weMugovera, VaMnangagwa vakati vainge vaitwawo zvakaitwa Amai Mahofa kumusangano weZanu-PF wepagore kuVictoria Falls. Vachitaurawo pamusangano nevechidiki vebato ravo kuHarare International Conference Centre nemusi weChina manheru, Amai Grace Mugabe vashorawo VaMnangagwa zvikuru vachiti vari kuvapumha huroyi. Amai Mugabe vati VaMnangagwa vaimbenge vati havana kuisirwa muchetura asi iko zvino vave kuimba rwumwe ruye. Vatiwo VaMnangagwa munhu akangosarudzwawo naVaMugabe kuti avashandire. Amai Mugabe vatiwo kusina Amai hakuendwe uye VaMnangagwa vainge varasika gwara. Vakayambirawo vanhu vavanoti vanoda kupidigura hurumende havana kwavanosvika bachiti dai VaMugabe vasina moyo munyoro vanga dai vari mumajeri. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika dzinoti nyaya yekurwira chigaro chaVaMugabe, avo vave nemakore makumi mapfumbamwe nematatu ndiko kwapa kuti zvinhu zviite manyama amire nerongo mubato reZanu-PF. Mubato iri mune kunetsana kunotyisa pakati pezvikwata zviviri chimwe chinonzi Team Lacoste chinonzi chiri kutungamirwa naVaMnangagwa uye cheGeneration 40 chine vanhu vakaita saVaMphoko, Amai Mugabe, gurukota rezvedzidzo yepamusoro, Muzvinafundo Jonathan Moyo uye gurukota rezvekudzivirirwa kwenyika, VaSydney Sekeramai, nevamwe. Vaimbova sachigaro weZanu-PF Youth League kuMashonaland West, VaGodfrey Gomwe, vanoti hapana chakaipa kuti VaMnangagwa vadewo kutungamira nyika. Vati nyakanyaka iri kuitika munyika yakakonzerwa neveG40. Asi vanotsigira Amai Mugabe kuti vatore chigaro kana vachida kuzokwikwidza mune remangwana, uye vari sachigaro weZanu-PF Youth League kuManicaland, VaMubuso Chinguno, vati vanhu veTeam Lacoste ndivo vari kukonzera nyonga nyonga mubato.
title: VaMnangagwa Vanotsika Madziro Vachiti Ichokwadi Kuti Vakaisirwa Muchetura

text: Vagari vemuChinhoyi vanoti hupenyu huri kuramba huchioma munyika zvekuti vakawanda vavo vave kurarama nekutenga kana kutengesa upfu, mafuta kana usavi hunokwana musi mumwechete. Pamusana pekuda kwenhamo yapfunya chisero mudzimba dzakawanda, vazhinji havachakwanisa kutenga zvekudya zvinokwana mhuri panguva imwechete. Vakawanda vave kutenga zvekudya zvinokwana kudya musi mumwechete zvino zivikanwa nezita rekuti "tutsaona". Kana huri hupfu, hunenge huri muzvigaba zviduku zvakasiyana siyana kubva pa 500grams, 1kilogram kana 2kilograms. Mafuta anotengeswa mumabhodhoro madiki kubva pa100ml kusvika pa500ml. Izvi zvave kuita kuti vakawanda vaite bhizinesi rekutengesa zvekudya mudzimba nemumigwagwa. VaBenard Kaseke, avo vano gadzira shangu vari pamba pavo, vanoti vanotengesa zvekudya izvo zviri kuvararamisa. VaKaseke vanoti vanotengesera pamba sezvo vasingakwanise kubhadhara rendi iyo vanoti inodhura. Muzvare Janet Marongwe vanotengesa zvekudya kuti vawane kurarama asi vanoti mari yavanowana ishoma zvekuti vari kutadza kubhadhara pekugara. Amai Thembise Moyo avo vanotengesa zvekudya kuvana vechikoro cheNemakonde, vanoti zvakavanakira nekuti havabhadhare pekutengesera. Amai Moyo vanoti madhora makumi matanhatu emudyandigere anopihwa murume wavo mashoma uye mari iyi haisi kuuya nenguva. Japhert Mutandarika mwana wechikoro wepaNemakonde anoti zvinhu zviri kuomera vabereki zvekuti havachapihwa mari yekutenga zvekudya kuchikoro sezvavaimboita nguva yakare. Muzvare Marongwe vanoti havatarisire kunaka kwezvinhu munguva pfupi inotevera sezvo makambani akawanda akavhara. Kanzuru yeChinhoyi inoti iri kunzwira tsitsi vagari vayo nekuda kwekuoma kwehupenyu. Vachitura bhajeti reguta mwedzi wapera, kanzura Ignatious Zvigadza vakati kanzuru yavo ichabvumira vanhu kutengesa chero vachibhadhara mari inoita masendi makumi mashanu pazuva. No media source currently available
title: Hupenyu Hwoomera Vagari veMuchinhoyi, Avo Vokwanisa Kutenga Zvekudya Zvenguva Imwechete

text: Mutungamiri wenyika yeNamibia varizve sachigaro weSADC VaHage Geingob havasati vataura nezvemamiriro akaita zvinhu muzimbabwe kunyangwe hazvo masangano anorwira kodzero dzevanhu uye masangano anomiririra vashandi munyika dzakasiyana siyana siyana. Mutauriri waVaGeingob Doctor Alfredo Hengari vaudza Studio 7 kuti havasi kutaura nezveZimbabwe parizvino vakati titaure nemunyori mukuru weSADC kana kuti executive secretary Doctor Stergomena Lawrence Tax. Asi Amai Tax vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. Mukuru mubazi rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika muNamibia Amai Selma Ashipala-Musavyi vakarambawo kutaura nyaya iyi vachiti Zambia inova sachigaro weSADC Troika inoona nezvematongerwo enyika nekuchengetedzwa kwenyika itaura nezviri kuitika muZimbabwe. Asi munyori mukuru weTrade Union Congress of Namibia VaMahongora Kavihuha vanoti mutungamiri wenyika yavo sasachigaro weSADC anofanira kutaura achishora zviri kuitika muZimbabwe. Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vanoti nemusi weMugovera vakaita hurukuro nevatungamiri venyika dzemuSADC vachivaudza nezvemamiriro akaita zvinhu muZimbabwe. Vebato reMDC rinotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa, vesangano reZCTU uye vemasangano akazvimirira vari kupomera hurumende mhosva yekuvashungurudza. Sangano reZimbabwe Association of Doctors for Human Rights rinoti vanhu gumi nevatanhatu vakapfurwa nevanofungidzirwa kuti mapurisa kana mauto vakafa. Vamwe vanhu makumi masere nemumwe vari kurapwa mushure mekupfurwa uye vanhu vanodarika chiuru vakasungwa. Hurumende ichiti kungoti vanhu vana ndivo vakashaya chete. Vanoongorora nyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika VaPromise Sande vanoti mapato akarwa hondo yerusununguko anoita chirwirangwe zvokanganisa hutongo hwejekerere muAfrica. No media source currently available
title: Sachigaro weSADC VaGeingob vekuNamibia Voramba Kutaura neNyaya yeZimbabwe

text: Vagari vekuUzumba mudunhu reMashonaland East vanyora tsamba yenyunyuto pamusoro pekambani yeHeijin kumukuru anoona nezvekupiwa kwemarezinesi ezvezvicherwa pamwe nebazi rezvekuchengetedzwa kwezviwanikwa reEnvironmental Management Agency of Zimbabwe vachiti havasi kuda kuti kambani iyi ishande munzvimbo dzavanogara. Vagari vemubhuku rekwaKaseke vachibatsirwa nemagweta anorwira kodzero dzevanhu eZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights, ZLHR, vanoti vanoshamiswa kuti kambani yeHeijin yakatotanga kutara pekuisa migodhi yayo mumusha wavo vasina kana kumboziviswa. Mutauriri weZLHR, VaKumbirai Mafunda, vati VaLovemore Kaseke, avo vari kumirira vamwe vavo, vanoti vari kushamiswa zvikuru nekutarwa kuri kuitwa nzvimbo ichange iri pasi pekambani iyi. Vanonti nzvimbo iri kutorwa nekambani iyi inosanganisira minda yavo, mafuro ezvipfuwo zvavo pamwe nedzimba dzavo. VaMafunda vati vanyorera kumukuru anoona nezvezvicherwa kuti vawane ruzivo kuti kambani iyi yakapiwa rezinesi here, uye kuti pakatevedzwa here mitemo yenyika. ZLHR inotiwo kunyange hazvo dai kambani iyi ikave nerezinesi, panenge pakatyorwa mitemo inosungira kuti kuti vanenge vawana marezinesi munzvimbo inogarwa neveruzhinji vanofanirwa kutanga vaita hurukuro nevagari vobvumirana. VaMafunda vatiwo vanyorerawo kuEMA kuti vaziviswe nesangano iri kuti rakapa here kambani iyi magwaro anoratidza kuti kuita migodhi yayo munzvimbo iyi hazvina njodzi here kuvagari. Hatina kukwanisa kubata mukuru anoona nezvekupihwa kwemarezinesi ezvezvicherwa kuMashonaland East huyewo tatadza kubata gurukota rezvezvicherwa, VaWinston Chitando, kuti tinzwe divi ravo. Mutauriri weEMA, Amai Amkela Sidange, vati vanga vari kuita tsvakurudzo nezvenyayi iyi sezvo tsamba yakanyorwa nemagweta yakasvika kuhofisi yavo yeMarondera. Asi kanzura weWard 14, VaFagio Zvondai Marowa, vakaudza Studio7 vagari vemunzvimbo yavanomirira havasi kuda kuti kambani iyi ichere matombo munzvimbo iyi. Mabhuku ari kubatwa muhurongwa uhu anosanganisirawo Chimina, Mukonzi, Manyani neGotora. Mukuru weHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica, VaDewa Mavhinga, vaudza Studio7 kuti nyaya yekubviswa kwevanhu munzvimbo dzemadzitateguru avo inofanirwa kugadziriswa. VaMavhinga vatiwo zviri kuitika kuUzumba zviri kuitikawo munzvimbo dzakawanda munyika. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kuHeijin, iyo inonzi ine zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe pamwe nezvekuChina. No media source currently available
title: Vagari Voramba Kutorerwa Nzvimbo Yavo neKambani yeVanhu vekuChina

text: Mutungamiriri webato rinopikisa reAlliance for People’s Agenda, Doctor Nkosana Moyo, vanoyambira vatsigiri vebato ravo kuti vasarudze vatungamiri vanokwanisa kuita zvido zvevanhu, uye vanozivikanwa nekugona kuita basa. Mumwe murwiri wekodzero dzevanhu, VaGastaff Kativu, vanoti mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vanofanirwa kusungwa votongwa nedare rinotonga mhosva dzinoparwa pasi rose reInternational Criminal Court, sezvo vakapara mhosva dzakawanda dzakavhiringa hupenyu hwevanhu vakawanda munyika. Sangano reHeal Zimbabwe roshushikana nemashoko aIshe Fortune Charumbira avo vakabuda pachena kuti vanotsigira bato reZanu PF izvo sangano iri rinoti zvinozoita kuti vanhu vari pasi pemadzishe vasasununguke munyaya dzematongerwo enyika. Vagari vekuMasvingo vononokerwa nemibatanidzwa yemapato iyo vanoti haisati yatanga kupinda muvanhu ichivaudza kuti zvinhu zvichafamba seyi musarudzo dzichaitwa munyika. Sangano reZimbabwe Elections Support Network roita mangwana hurongwa hwekuzeya nyaya dzesarudzo muchirongwa chinenge chichikokerwa nemutori wenhau, Violet Gonda. Hurumende yosangana nevemaindasitiri ichivakurudzira kuti vasakwidze mitengo yezvinhu, iyo inonzi neveruzhinji kukwira kwayo kwava kuita chamuramba mhuru. Muchirongwa cheLiveTalk na 8pm, tiri kutarisa kodzero dzekuvhota dzezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika. Kana muchida kupinda muchirongwa ichi, kanawo kutumira mashoko kuStudio7, shandisai WhatsApp panhamba dzinoti 001 202 465 0318… Vanoda kuteerera Studio7, tibateyi na7pm pamasaisai anoti 909 am 4930; 13860, 6080, 15580 ne 15460 Kilohertz paShortwave mazuva ose. Musakanganwe kuteerera zvimwe zvirongwa zvedu na 6am, uye 2pm mazuva ose. Musakanganwe kutifarira paFacebook peji redu re VOA Shona. Kurudzirai hama neshamwari kuti dzitifarire paFacebook yedu. Endai pa link iyi: https://www.facebook.com/voa.shona/
title: Misoro yeNhau dzaNhasi, Chitatu, Ndira 17, 2018

text: Vemabhazi vari kurwisana nevemakombi maMutare vachirwira vanhu vavanotakura nepamusana pekuti vashomeka zvikuru mazuva ano. Izvi zvakatanga neSvondo pamusika wemabhazi wemuguta wepaMurahwa vemabhazi vachirwisana vachida kutakura vanofamba sezvo vashomeka zvakanyanya. No media source currently available Mumwe ane makombi anotakura veruzhinji kubva maMutare achienda kuHarare mazuva ose, VaPatrick Chinowaita, vanonyunyuta kuti vamwe vavo vane mabhazi akawanda vari kuvakanganisa vachishandisa zvematongerwo enyika. VaChinowaita vanoti vanoshuwira kuti pange pachienzaniswa pakushanda kune vose vanotakura vanhu zvisinei kuti mumwe ane mabhazi mangani, uye kuti anozivana nani. Mukuru wesangano revemabhazi anotakura veruzhinji, VaIsau Mupfumi, avo vari kupomerwa mhosva yekuita pamadiro avo nevamwe vavo, havana kuwanikwa kuti vatipewo divi ravo panyaya iyi.
title: Makombi neMabhazi Zvorwira Vanhu Vekutakura

text: African Union nemusi weChitatu yakapeta chirongwa chekuzeya dambudziko rekuroorwa kwevana vasati vabva zera muZambia. Musangano uyu wakatanga nemusi weMuvhuro. Chirongwa ichi chakaparurwa makore maviri apfura. Zimbabwe iri kumirirwa nevakuru muhurumende uye Amai Nyaradzayi Gumbodzvanda avo vanove munyarikani kana kuti "Goodwill Ambassador" muAU vachiona nezvekuroodzwa kwevana vasati vabva zera. Amai Gumbodzvanda vanoti Zimbabwe iri kurmbidzwa nezvimwe zvirongwa zvairi kuita kupedza kuroodzwa kwevana vasati vabva zera kunyanya kuvandudza mitemo kuti ichengetedza kodzero dzemwanasikana. "Tiri kufadzwa nezviri kubuda kumusangano uyu nyanya Zimbabwe iyo ine zvirongwa zvairi kuita kuyedza kupedza dambudziko iri munyika," Amai Gumbodzvanda vaudza Studio 7. Dambudziko rekuroodzwa kwevanasikana rinonzi riri kunyanya kuwanikwa kunzvimbo dzakaita seMashonaland Central uye riri kunyanya kukonzerwa nekuwondomoka kwaita zvinhu munyika nedzimwe tsika nemagariro evanhu. No media source currently available
title: Zimbabwe Yorumbidzwa neZvirongwa Zvekuyedza Kupedza Kuroodzwa kweVanasikana Vasati Vabva Zera

text: Nhengo dzeparamende kubva kuzvikwata zveMDC dzinoti hadzisi kufara nekunonoka kuri kuita paramende kupedza ongororo nyaya yadziri kupomerwa yekuzvidza mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, apo vakauya kuparamende gore rapfuura. Nhengo dzeparamende dzeMDC dzairamba kusimuka kana VaMnangagwa vapinda muparamende uye pane dzimwe nguva dzaitadza kuenda kudare apo mutungamiri wenyika anenge arimo sezvo dzichiti hadzicherechedzi hutungamiriri hwavo. Muna Mbudzi gore rapera, komiti inotungamira mabasa eparamende yeStanding Rules and Orders Committee kana kuti SROC yakaumba komiti inotungamirirwa, naVaJonathan Samkange veZanu PF kuti ioongorore nyaya iyi uye kusvika pari zvino komiti iyi haisati yapedza basa rayo. Munyori mukuru muMDC T iri kufanotungamirwa naMuzvare Thokozani Khupe, VaDouglas Mwonzora, vanove mumwe wevari kuongororwa vaudza Studio 7 vakabvunzurudzwa kare uye havana mhosva yavakapara. VaMwonzora avo vanove seneta vati vakaudza komiti yaVaSamkange kuti havanganzi vakapara mhosva yekuramba kusimukira VaMnangagwa pavakauuya kudare sezvo VaMnangagwa vakapinda mudare reNational Assembly kwete reseneti. Mutevedzeri wemutauriri weMDC Alliance, VaClifford Hlatshwayo, vaudza Studio7 kuti havana zvavanotarisira kubva kukomiti iyi sezvo iine nhengo dzeZanu PF chete. Vatiwo ongororo iyi haina zvaichabatsira sezvo dzimwe nhengo dzebato ravo dzinodarika makumi maviri dzakatodzingwa muparamende. VaSamkange vaudza Studio 7 kuti ongororo yavo ichiri kuenderera mberi uye vachazokwanisa kutaura zvakawanda kana vachinge vatura gwaro ravo kuparamende. Makomiti ese akaumbwa muchikamu chechipiri muparamende yechipfumbabwe aifanirwa kuti achimira basa pakapera chikamu ichi kuitira kuti paumbwa mamwe makomiti pachikamu chechitatu icho chakaparurwa nemutungamiri wenyika svondo rapfuura. Asi mutevedzeri wemutauriri weparamende, Amai Tsitsi Gezi, vati makomiti ese emuchikamu chechipiri achaenderera mberi nebasa kudzamara SROC yadoma nhengo itsva dzemakomiti aya. Zvichakadai muNational Assembly mamboita kupopotedzana mushure mekunge mumiriri weBuhera South, VaJoseph Chinotimba, vati varairidzi vari kuramwa mabasa vari kubhadharwa nemapato anopikisa munyika. Asi mumiriri weNorton, VaTemba Mliswa, pamwe nemumiri we Kambuzuma, VaVaWillas Madzimure veMDC Alliance, varamba izvi vachiti hakuna murairidzi anotambiriswa nemapato anopikisa. Mune imwewo nyaya gurukota rezvemitemo, VaZiyambi Ziyambi, vakumbira dare reNational Assembly kuti ritambire chikumbiro chedhorobha reVictoria Falls chekuti rive guta. Dhorobha iri rakanyorera kubazi rezvematunhu muna 2017 kuti rive guta, uye komisheni yakadomwa kuti iongorore nyaya iyi yakabvuma kuti Victoria Falls iitwe guta. Kana paramende ikatambira chikumbiro ichi, ichanyorera kumutungamiri wenyika kuti vatare zviri pamutemo Victoria Falls seguta. No media source currently available
title: Nhengo dzeMDC Dzinoti Paramende Ngaipe Mutongo Wayo paNyaya Yekuti Dzakazvidza VaMnangagwa

text: Vamwe vagari vemuGweru vanoti vave kutyira kupararira kwechirwere checoronavirus kana kuti Covid-19 zvichitevera kuchengetedzwa muguta iri kwezvimwe zvizvarwa zvemuno zvakabva kunze kwenyika. Vanhu vanoda kusvika zana nemakumi maviri vakachengetedzwa paGweru Polytechnic kutanga nemusi weChishanu svondo rapera. Kune vamwezve vanhu vanosvika makumi matatu vakachengetedzwa paMkoba Teachers’ College kutanga nezuro. Vanhu ava ndevamwe vari pakati pezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kudzorwa kubva kunyika dzeSouth Africa neBotswana. Munyori mukuru mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko VaNick Mangwana vachinyora padandemutande ravo reTwitter vanoti Mkoba Teachers College inokwanisa kugara vanhu mazana mashanu vari kubva kunze kwenyika. Vakatiwo Gweru Polytechnic yatozara. Mumwe mugari Amai Enita Nyati vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanotyira kupararira kwechirwere checoronavirus nekuti vamwe vevanhu ava vanogona kuve vainacho vachitiwo vanhu ava vanogona kutiza munzvimbo dzavakachengetedzwa. Asi mumwewo mugari Muzvare Nyasha Mahwende vati vanhu ava vanofanirwa kubatwa zvakanaka sezvo zviri zvizvarwa zvemuZimbabwe uye vari hama neshanwari dzevamwe vanhu. Vatiwo kunze kwekutyira kupararira kwechirwere vari kutyirawo kuti vamwe vevanhu ava vanogona kuita zviri kunze kwemutemo vakatsinhirawo kuti vanofanirwa kuchengetedzwa zvakasimba. Studio 7 yanyimwa mvumo yekupinda panzvimbo mbiri idzi nevange vakachengetedza vachiti tinofanirwa kupiwa mvumo kubva kumahofisi ehurumende emudunhu reMidlands. Taedza kunzwa kubva kugurukota redunhu reMidlands VaLarry Mavima pamwe nevakafanobata chigaro chemukuru wedunhu munyaya dzezvehutano kana kuti Provincial medical director Dr Reginald Mhene asi patasvika kumahofisi avo vanzi vange vari mumusangano. Vanoziva zviri kuitika vanoti kuBotswana nekuSouth Africa kwavaive vari vamwe vevanhu ava vainzi vari munyika idzi zvisiri pamutemo vakambosungwa, izvo zvakavaisa panjodzi yekubata chirwere checoronavirus. Meya weguta reGweru VaJosiah Makombe vabvuma kuStudio 7 kuti chipatara chinorapwa varwere vecoronavirus kana kuti Isolation District Hospital chichiri kunadzurudzwa pari zvino. Vakurudzira vagari kuti vatevedzere zvinokurudzirwa pakudzivirira chirwere checoronavirus asi vati havafanirwe kutya vachiti vane chivimbo chekuti kana pakaitika vanowanikwa vaine chirwere ichi vanokwanisa kurapwa. Mukuru webato rePeople’s Democratic Party Amai Lucia Matibenga avo vanovewo mugari wemuguta reGweru vati ibasa rehurumende kuchengetedza vanhu vari kudzoka ava zvakanaka uye kuwonawo kuti vamwe vagari vose vakachengetedzeka. Mudunhu reMidlands hamusati maita munhu akabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus. Asi kudzoka kumusha kuri kuramba kuchiita zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe kubva kunyika dzakatipoteredza kuri kuita kuti vamwe vabatire hura mumaoko vachityira chirwere ichi. No media source currently available
title: Kudzoka muNyika kweVamwe Kwokonzera Kusagadzikana muGweru neNyaya yeCoronavirus
