text: Gurukota rinoona nezvezvivakwa nekutakurwa kwezvinhu, VaJoram Gumbo, vanoti mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vari kuzoparura zviri pamutemo kutangwa kuvakwa nekugadziriswa kwemugwagwa waurayisa vanhu vakawanda weHarare-Beitbridge musi wa18 Chivabvu. Kambani yekuChina, yeGeiger International, ndiyo iri kuvaka mugwagwa uyu unonzi wakakosha bhiriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana maviri zvemadhora. Asi nyaya yekugadzirwa kwemugwagwa uyu inonzi nenyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika yave kushandiswa nebato riri kutonga reZanu-PF kutsvaga rutsigiro. Mugwagwa uyu uri kutanga kugadzirwa kubva paChaka Growth Point kuMasvingo. Gurukota rinoona nezvedunhu reMasvingo,Amai Shuvai Mahofa, vakazivisa svondo rapera kuti vakuru vebato reZanu-PF muMasvIngo vainge vawirirana kuti makambani nevanhu vakarerekera kuZanu-PF ndivo vanofanira kutanga kuwana mabasa. Vachibvunzwa neStudio7 nezvekutyora mutemo wenyika usingakurudzire rusaruro rwakadai, VaGumbo vatanga vaita pamunhondo pamusasa asi vakazoti havanyanye kuona chakaipa kuti vanhu veZanu-PF vatange kuwaniswa mabasa. Mutauriri weMDC-T, VaObert Gutu, vashora zvikuru mashoko eZanu-PF vachiti Zanu-PF haizive mutsauko pakati pehurumende nebato. Vati izvi kutyora bumbiro remutemo. Mutauriri wePeople’s Democratic Party, VaJacob Mafume, vati uku kutyorawo mutemo wePublic Finances Act uyo unotara mari inopihwa mapato ezvematongerwo enyika nehurumende. Vati kuda kushandisa nyaya dzekugadzirwa kwemigwagwa kupa Zanu-PF mari imhosva. Mutauriri weZapu, VaIphithule Maphosa, vati mashoko aAmai Mahofa anoburitsa pachena kuti bato reZanu-PF rinoda kuwana rutsigiro nenzira dzisiri pamutemo. Vatiwo nehuwandu hwevanhu vasina mabasa munyika zvinoratidza kushaya hanya. No media source currently available
title: Kugadziriswa kweMugwagwa weHarare-Beitbridge Kwoparurwa Musi waChivabvu 18

text: Vanhu vakawanda mudunhu reMashonaland West vanoti kunetsana kuri kuitika mubato riri kutonga reZanu PF kuchaita kuti risave nesimba musarudzo dzichauya. Asi vamwe vanoti izvi zvachaita kuti risimbe sezviri kuonekwa nekukunda musarudzo dzema by elections dzakaitika munzvimbo dzakawanda munyika. Zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka mubato reZanu PF zvichitevera kupinda mune zvematongerwo enyikwa kwakaitwa nemudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Grace Mugabe. No media source currently available Mubato iri mune kurwisana kukuru pakati penhengo dzaro idzo dziri kuda kuzotora chigaro chemutungamiri weZanu PF, VaRobert Mugabe, kana mukana wacho wavapo. Kurwisana uku kwakatanga gore rapera zvichitevera misangano yakaitwa Amai Mugabe avo vakafamba nyika yose vachinyomba dzimwe nhengo dzakaita sevaimbove mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Joyce Mujuru, nevamwe. Izvi zvakakonzera kuti nhengo dzakawanda dzidzingwe mubato reZanu PF mumatunhu ose munyika. Kunyange hazvo Amai Mujuru nevamwe vakaita sevaimbove mutauriri weZanu PF, VaRugare Gumbo, vaimbove makurukota ehurumende VaDidymus Mutasa, VaWebster Shamu naVa Slyvester Nguni, vakatosvorwa nechamupupuri chiri mubato iri, kurwisana kuri kuramba kuchienderera mberi mubato iri. Vakawanda vanoti kurwisana uku nekudzingana mubato kuchaita kuti Zanu PF ishaye samba musarudzo dziri kutarisirwa kuitwa muna 2018. Munyori webepa nhau reMirror mudunhu reMashonaland West, VaDennis Kagonye, vanoti kurwisana kuri kuita nhengo dzeZanu PF kuchaita kuti ishaye simba sezvo kurwisana uku kwatekeshera nyika yose. VaKagonye vanoti izvi zvasiyana nekare apo kurwisana kwainge kuri kwedunhu rimwe chete zvikuru sei reMasvingo. Mumwe mugari wemuChinhoyi, VaTapiwa Neshambe, vanoti kudzingana kuri kuitika mubato reZanu Pf imviro mviro dzekuparara kwebato iri. VaNeshambe vanoti VaMugabe ndivo chete vakabata musangano zvekuti vakabva pachigaro nenzira ipi zvayo, ndipo panoparara bato reZanu PF. Izvi zvinotsigirwa nemugari wekuBanket, VaBlessed Katyamaenza, avo vanoti kunetsana kuri muZanu PF uko kwatapurira kune avo vaimbove varwiri verusununguko, kuchasiya bato iri riri,parumananzombe. Asi VaWillie Nyambe, avo vaimbove nhengo yeZanu PF vasati vave nhengo yeMDC-T mugore ra2000, vanoti vanhu vasafunge kuti Zanu PF yaparara nekuti ichabuda munyonganyonga iyi yave nehuturu hwakaipa. VaNyambe vanotsigirwa naVaPeter Liwanda avo vanoti zviri kuitika muZanu PF ndezvechinguva chidiki asi hazviparadze bato iri nekuti simba rese muZanu PF riri pamutungamiri waro, VaMugabe. VaKagonye vanoti kukunda kuri kuita Zanu PF muma by-elections inyaya yekuti haisi kukwikwidzana nemapato makuru akaita seMDC inotungamirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai. Vamwe vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vanoti Zanu PF yakaparara kare asi inoshandisa vari muchiuto, vasori nemapurisa kuti irambe yakamira semuzamba.
title: Vakawanda kuMashonaland West Vanoti Zanu PF Yaparara

text: Poita kusawiriana pakati pevagari nekanzuru yeMasvingo zvichitevera kuburitswa kwemashoko ekuti kanzuru yakumbomira kuita mamwe mabasa akakosha mudhorobha iri nekuti yave nemavhiki matatu ichishaiwa mafuta edhiziri edzimotokari dzebasa. Chiziviso ichi, chakaitwa namabharani wedhorobha iri, Engineer Edward Mukaratirwa, nezuro. Kanzuru ichambomisa kutakurwa kwemarara, kufambiswa kwenhakura varwere kana kuti ambulance pamwe, motokari inodzima moto, uye kuendesa vashandi vayo kunogadzira masuweji nemapaipi emvura anenge adhuuka mudzimba. Mashoko aya agamuchirwa nekunyunyuta nevagari vachiti kana kanzuru yadai zvinoreva kuti yakonewa basa uye zvinogona kukonzera kupararira kwezvirwere mudhorobha ragara rine dambudziko remvura. Mugari wemu musha weMustaf, kuward 2 VaRichard Munyene vanoti kanzuru inenge yaisa hupenyu hwevagari parumananzombe nekuti zvirwere zvakawanda zvinogona kupararira. Mumwe mugari wekuRujeko, VaMaxwell Zenda, vanoti kana kanzuru yamira kuita zvose izvi zvinoreva kuti yavharwa nekudaro vakuru vayo nevashandi vanofanira kumira basa nekuti vakonewa. VeSangano rinomirira vagarai reMasvingo United Residents and Rate Payers Alliance(MURRA), VaAnoziva Muguti, vanoti kanzuru haifaniri kusvika pakushaisisa mazano ekuwana zvikwanisiro zvebasa nekudaro inofanira kuita misangano nevagari kuti ipuwe pfungwa dzekukunda dambudziko iri. Meya weguta reMasvingo, VaCollen Maboke vati dambudziko iri riri kuvashungurudza asi vari pakati pekukumbira hurumende kuti ipe vemakanzuru dhiziri kubva kukambani yenyika ye NOCZIM kuti vasamirire zviteshi zvemafuta izvo zviri kunetsekawo. VaMaboke vatiwo magaraji ane mafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari ari kuatengesa nechikero chemari yepamukoto uye kanzuru haibvumidzwe kutenga kumagaraji aya. Vaenderera mberi vachiti magaraji avanotenderwa nemutemo kutenga mafuta aya ave nemavhiki akawanda asina. Vatiwo vachayedza kusimudza nyaya iyi kugungano remakanzura reUrban Councils of Zimbabwe kuti vaone kuti vangaite sei sezvo makanzuru ose asangana nedambudziko iri. Gurukota rinona nezvematunhu munyika, VaJuly Moyo, vati vange vari mumusangano pavabatwa kuti vatipe pfungwa dzavo padambudziko riri kusangana nemaguta akawanda munyika iri. No media source currently available
title: Kanzuru yeMasvingo Yotadza Kuita Basa neKushaya Dhiziri

text: Mapurisa ekanzuru anonzi afumopisa zvinhu zvevanhu vanotengesera mumigwagwa senzira yekuti vanhu ava varege kutengesera munzvimbo dzisina kutarwa nekanzuru kuti dzitengeserwe izvo zvinonzi zvasiyaa zvaita kuti hupenyu hwevanhu vazhinji huende pakawomarara. No media source currently available Vamwe vevanhu vanotengesera mumigwagwa vanoti vawana mbatya dzavo dzavanga vachirara vakachengetesa pabhiriji riri pedyo nemahofisi ekanzuru vachibhadhara mari dzapiswa nemapurisa ekanzuru. Kanzuru ye Harare yapinda muzuva rechitatu ichibvisa vanotengesera mumigwagwa ichivaendesa kunzvimbo dzayakatara idzo dzinonzi nevanotengesa ava hadzina kugadzirwa zvakakwana. Mumwe wevanhu ava, Amai Nyadzisai Chinyani, vanoti hupenyu hwavo hwave parumananzombe zvichitevera kupiswa kwaitwa zvinhu zvavo nemapurisa ekanzuru. Amai Chinyani vati mapurisa ekanzuru amuka runyanhiriri kuti apise mbatya dzavo. Mumwe wevatengesi ava, Va Tekesure Mataruse, vatsinhirawo zvataurwa na Amai Chinyani vachiti zvaitwa nekanzuru izvi kuvapinza mudziva rinonyudza ravasingazokwanise kubuda mariri. Mutungamiri werimwe remasangano anomirira vanotengesa mumigwagwa re Zimbabwe Informal Sector Organization, Va Promise Mkwananzi, vati zvaitwa nemapurisa ekanzuru izvi zvavarwadza zvikuru vachiti kanzuru inofanira kubata vanhu zvine mwero. Asi mutauriri wekanzuru, Va Michael Chideme, varamba kuti mapurisa ekanzuru yavo ndiwo apisa mbatya idzi idzo dzinonzi nevaridzi vadzo dzinokosha zviuru nezviuru zvemadhora. Zvichakadai, mautauriri wemapurisa, Amai Charity Charamba, vanoti vapisirwa zvinhu ava vamhan’ara nyaya iyi kumapurisa uye mapurisa ari pakati pekuferefeta nyaya iyi. Amai Charamba vatiwo vamwe vevanotengesa mumigwagwa ava vakasungwa nezuro, vakabhadhariswa mari dzefaindi mushure mekupomerwa mhosva dzekuita hunhu hwaigona kukanganisa runyararo uye vatatu ndivo vachiri muhusungwa vachipomerwa mhosva yekurova mapurisa ekanzuru aibvisa tende riri muna Speke Avenue pavaitengesera vachiramba kubva ipapo. Zvikadai, mutauriri weMDC inotungamirwa naVa Morgan Tsvangirai, Va Obert Gutu, vati bato ravo riri kukurudzira kuti vanotengesa mumigwagwa varambe vari mumigwagwa kudzamara hurumende yagadzirisa nyaya yemabasa. MDC yakamboti vanotengesera mumigwagwa ava vabviswe asi mudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Grace Mugabe, vakati hapana munhu aifanirwa kubviswa mumigwagwa. Asi hurumende yakazofuma yopandukira vanotengesa mumigwagwa ava ichiti ngavabviswe sezvo vanga vave kuzadza tsvina mudhorobha uye mudhorobha musisafambike zvakanaka. Va Gutu vati makanzura ebato ravo haasiwo ari kukonzera kuti vanotengesera mumigwagwa vabviswe vachiti hurumende ye Zanu PF ndiyo iri kuita izvi. Gurukota rinowona nezvematunhu, Va Saviour Kasukuwere, vakakurudzira vashandi vekanzuru yeHarare kuti vabvise mumiogwagwa vanhu vanotengesera mumigwagwa vakavatyisidzira vachiti vakarega kuita izvi vaizorasikirwa nemabasa. Nyanzvi munyaya dzemitemo dzinoti pasi pemitemo yemaguta, kanzuru yeHarare ndiyo ine masimba pavachandi vose vekanzuru, uye vashandi vekanzuru vanoita basa ravo sezvinenge zvatarwa nezvisungo zvemakanzura. Nyanzvi idzi dzinoti zviri kuitika muHarare zvinoratidza pachena kuti kurwa kwenzuo dzinosiya huswa nemiti zvaparadzwa.
title: Mapurisa eKanzuru yeHarare Anopisa Zvinhu Zvinotengeserwa Mumigwagwa

text: Hurumende yatanga neChitatu kuparura hurongwa hwekupa vanhu mushonga wenhomba kuyedza kudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere chekorera kuvagari vemuHarare kuGlen View, Budiriro, Glen Noarah neMbare. Mushonga uyu unotarisirwa kushanda kwemakore mashanu uye chirongwa ichi chiri kutarisirwa kupera nemusi weSvondo munzvimbo dzekutanga idzi. Mushonga uyu wakawanikwa kuburikidza nemasangano anoti reWorld Health Organization neInternational Cholera Group. Mukuru wezvekurwisa zvirwere zvinotapuriranwa mubazi rezvehutano, Dr Portia Manangazira, vanoti vanhu vekune dzimwe nzvimbo havafanire havo kuenda kunzvimbo dzavari kupa vanhu mishonga ikozvino nekuti pane mimwe mishonga iri kuuya inokwanira vose vanoida.  No media source currently available
title: Vanhu Vopihwa Mushonga Unodzivirira Korera muHarare

text: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinorarama nekuita mabhindauko akasiyana siyana muBotswana zvinoti danho rekunyevenutswa zvishoma nezvishoma kwemutemo wekuvharwa kwenyika iyi rinopa tarisiro yekuti zvinhu zvichanaka kwazviri munguva pfupi. Senyika dzose, Botswana yakavharawo nyika musi 2 Kubvumbi kwemazuva makumi maviri nemasere senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCoronavirus. Mumashoko avakapakurira nyika neMuvhuro manheru, mutungamiri weBotswana, VaMokgweetsi Masisi, vakati kuvharwa kwenyika kunotarisirwa kutanga kunyevenutswa kubva musi wa 8 Chivabvu mushure mekuwedzera mamiriro aya nevhiki rimwe chete. VaMasisi vakatiwo kuvharwa kwenyika kwakawedzerwa nesvondo rimwe chete senzira yekuti nyika iyi igutsikane kuti yakwanisa kumisa kupararira kweCoronavirus. Chizvarwa cheZimbabwe, VaBenjamin Chikomba, avo vanoita zvekuvaka mudhorobha reFrancistown, vanoti mashoko emutungamiri wenyika anoratidza kuti Botswana yakazvipira kuvhura nyika yose. Muzvare Mothyleen Nyakayembe vaudza Studio7 kuti vakaramba vakamira semusambangwena apo zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvakasarudza kudzokera kumusha panguva yakaoma ino nokuti vaiona kuti zvinhu zvakarongeka muBotswana kudarika kumusha. Muzvinabhizinesi ane chitoro chineotengeswa doro, VaMetheew Moyo, vanoti munguva yekuvharwa kwenyika, vadzidza kuti insurance yakakoshera bhizinesi. Nyanzwi munyaya dzemainsurance, VaFrancis Ndudzo vari kukurudzira vose vane mabhizinesi kunyanya avo vemabhizinesi madiki kuti vaite ma insurance kuitira kuti vasawire mugomba renyati panguva yakaoma. Chirwere cheCOVID-19 chabata vanhu makumi maviri nevatatu muBotswana nekuuraya munhu mumwe chete munyika iyi, iyo inogara zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvakawanda zvikuru. No media source currently available
title: Kuvhurwa kweBotswana Kotarisirwa Zvakanyanya neZvizvarwa zveZimbabwe Zviri Munyika Iyi

text: Mutungamiri weMDC Alliance, VaNelson Chamisa, svondo rapera neChishanu vakadoma VaClifford Hlatywayo semunyori anoona nezvezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika anenge achishandira kuhofisi mavo, reDiaspora Affairs and Mobilization. VaHlatywayo vanoti bato ravo rakatora danho rekuumba bazi idzva iri senzira yekusimbisa kudyidzana kwavo nevana veZimbabwe vari kunze kwenyika, uye kuti vanzwe zvichemo zvavo. Vanoti zvakakosha kuti zvichemo zvevanhu vari kunze kwenyika zvigadziriswe, kwete kungomirira mari dzavanotumira kumusha asi vasiri kupiwa nzeve. Vana veZimbabwe vari kunze kwenyika vagara vari kuchema kuti vabvumidzwe kuvhota vari munyika dzavagere, uye kuti vakwanise kuve zvizvarwa zvenyika mbiri, Zimbabwe nekwavanenge vari. Asi hurumende inoti pari zvino haina mari nezvikwanisiro zvingaita kuti izvi zvibudirire. Imwe nyaya inochemwa ndeyezvirango zvinonzi nevamwe muhurumende zvakatemerwa nyika vachiti zvinotadzisa vebato reZanu PF kupinda mune dzimwe nyika dzine zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe kuti vatsvage rutsigiro. Izvi zviri kuuyawo panguva iyo hurumende iri kugadzira hwaro hwemutemo unobata vana veZimbabwe vari kunze weZimbabwe Diaspora Policy, uyo unonzi wakanangana nekuvapa mikana mune zveupfumi nemabhizimusi pamwe nekuvhota vari kunze, uye kuve zvizvarwa zvenyika mbiri. No media source currently available
title: MDC Alliance Inoumba Bazi Rinoona nezveZvizvarwa zveZimbabwe Zviri Kunze kweNyika

text: Mabatirwo ari kuitwa sarudzo neZimbabwe Electoral Commission, Zec, ari kuramba achikonzera mutauro wakanyanya munyika vanopikisa vakawanda vachiti iri kukundikana kuita mutongi gava. Asi veZanu-PF vanoti vanopikisa vari kungorova bembera nekuti vari kutya kurakashwa musarudzo. Nyaya iri kunyanya kunetsa pari zvino inyaya yegwaro rine mazita evavhoti kana kuti voters roll. MDC Alliance inoti Zec haisi kutevedzera mutemo pakubuditsa gwaro rakachena nenguva uye rine zviso zvevanhu sezviri muhurongwa hutsva hweBVR. Asi sachigaro weZec, Amai Priscilla Chigumba, vanoti vari kuita zvose zvinodiwa kunyange hazvo paine zvimhingamupinyi pano neapo. Sachigaro weZanu-PF kuBritain, VaNick Mangwana, vanoti havataure vakamirira Zec asi zvimwe zviri kudiwa neMDC Alliance ndezvekuda kungovhiringa mabasa ekomisheni inoona nezvesarudzo. Mutauriri wePeople's Democratic Party, uye vari nhengo yeMDC Alliance, VaJacob Mafumo, vanoti Zec yakundikana kuva muyananinisi musarudzo. No media source currently available
title: MDC Alliance Yoramba Yakanetsana neZec neNyaya yeGwaro reVavhoti

text: Mutongi wedare ramejastiriti muHarare, VaVakai Chikwekwe, nemusi weMuvhuro vakarasa chikumbiro chegweta guru renyika, VaJohannes Tomana, chekuti nyaya yavari kupomerwa yekutadza kuita basa nemazvo vachiregerera vanhu vaipomerwa mhosva yekuti vaida kubhomba kambani yemutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe yeAlpha and Omega Dairy mwedzi wapera. VaTomana vakati vainge varegerera varume ava, VaSolomon Makumbe pamwe na VaSilas Pfupa sezvo vainge vabvuma kuita zvapupu zvehurumende. Mutongi atiwo VaTomana vakaburitsa varume vaviri ava vari muchiuto vasati vaverenga dhoketi ravo. Panyaya yaVaTomana yekuti havangachuchuswe nevanhu vari pasi pavo, dare rati vanhu ava vakabairwa zvitupa uye rari zviri kutaurwa naVaTomana zvekuti havafanire kusungwa vari pabasa hazvishande nekuti bumbiro remitemo rinoti mutungamiri wenyika chete ndiye asingaendeswe kudare ari pachigaro. Gweta raVaTomana, VaThabani Mpofu, vanoti vane zvavari kuronga asi havasi kuzofukura hapwa parizvino. No media source currently available
title: Dare raMejastiriti Rinoti VaTomana Ngavachuchuswe

text: Sangano revakarwa hondo yerusununguko, reZimbabwe National Liberation War Veterans Association riri kukurudzira kuvandudzwa kwemutemo wemakore evanhu vanoda kukwikwidza musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika. Sangano iri riri kuda kuti makore aya abve pamakore makumi mana kuenda pamakore makumi mashanu nemaviri ekuberekwa. Vachitaura pamusangano wavaita nevatori venhau muHarare, munyori mukuru wesangano iri, VaVictor Matemadanda, vati sangano ravo riri kuda kuti mutemo uyu uvandzwe kuitira kuti ani nani zvake anokwikwidza musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika, ange ari munhu abva zera zvekunzwisisa hudzamu hwezvinorehwa nekutungamira nyika. VaMatemadanda vatiwo sesangano vari kukurudzira kudzikwa kwemutemo unoranga vanhu vanokurudzira kuiswa kwezvirango pamwewo nevanopomerwa mhosva yekukanganisa hupfumi hwenyika. Studio7 yakundikana kubata VaMatemadanda kuti tinzwe zvizhinji. Asi mutauriri weMDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa, VaJacob Mafume, vanoti hurongwa hwekuvandudza makore evanoda kukwikwidza musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika uhwu hwakanangana chete nekuda kurambidza mutungamiri webato ravo, VaChamisa. VaChamisa vave nemakore makumi mana ekuberekwa. Muna Mbudzi wegore rino, munyori anoona nezvekuchengetedzwa kwenyika muZanu-PF, VaLovemore Matuke, vakakurudzirawo kuti mutemo uyu uvandudzwe, vachipomera VaChamisa mhosva yekuita zvehupwere mushure mekukundwa musarudzo nemutungamiri weZanu PF, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa. Nyanzvi munyaya dzematongerwo enyika dzinoti Izvi zvinogona kuita kuti mutemo uyu usanetse kuvandudza sezvo bato riri kutonga ragarawo richida kuti uvandudzwe, uye riine huwandu hwunokwanisa kutambira kwevandudzwa kwebumbiro remitemo yenyika mumatare ose eparamende ari maviri anoti reNational Assembly neSenate. No media source currently available
title: Vakarwa Hondo Vokurudzira Kuvandudzwa kweMutemo Unotara Makore eVanokwikwidza Sarudzo yeMutungamiri weNyika

text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vakasvika muNew York, muAmerica neMugovera kumusangano wechimakumi manomwe neina weUnited Nations unopindwa nevatungamiri venyika pamwe nedzihurumende,kana kuti 74th United Nations General Assembly, UNGA, uyo wakatanga svondo rapera. Musangano wegore rino wakanangana nekushanduka kwemamiriro ekunze. VaMnangagwa vanonzi vachatorawo mukana wemusangano uyu kukurudzira kuti zvirango zvavanoti zvakatemerwa Zimbabwe nenyika dzekumawirira zvibviswe. NeMugovera mutungamiri wenyika vakasangana nevatsigiri vebato ravo reZanu PF kwakare kuNew York. Vatsigiri veZanu PF vakabatana nechikwata cheDecember 12 Movement vari kuratidzirawo kumusangano uyu vachikurudzirawo kuti zvirango izvi zvibviswe. Nhengo dzebato rinopikisa reMDC pamwe nevamwe vemasangano akazvimirira vari kuratidzirawo vachida kuzivisa pasi rose nekwavanoti kutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu nehurumende yaVaMnangagwa. VaMnangagwa vari kuperekedzwa nechikwata chemakurukota anosanganisira gurukota rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika VaSibusiso Moyo, gurukota rezveupfumi Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube pamwe negurukota rezvehutano, Doctor Odadiah Moyo, uyewo gavhuna veReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, Doctor John Mangudya. VaMnangagwa vari kutarisirwa kutaura pamusangano uyu nemusi weChitatu. Aka kava kechipiri VaMnangagwa vachipinda mumusangano uyu semutungamiri wenyika.
title: Mutungamiri weNyika VaMnangagwa Vanosvika kuMusangano weUNGA kuNew York

text: Zimbabwe nemusi weChishanu yakabatana nenyika dzepasi rose kucheredza zuva remadzimai kana kuti International Women’s Day, madzimai akawanda achiti ari kuramba achidzvinyirirwa nekushaiswa mikana nekuda kwekuti vatungamiriri munyika havana hanya nekuvasimudzira kuti vave nemikana yakaenzana neyevarume. Kunyange hazvo Zimbabwe ine bumbiro rinosungira nekuenzana kwemikana pakapati pemadzimai nevarume, madzimai akawanda atataura nawo ati hapana chido kana hanya kubva kuvatungamiriri wehurumende, mapato ezvematongerwo enyika, vedzisvondo kana makambani yekuona kuti izvi zvaitika. Vaimbove nhengo yeparamende zvakare vari gweta, Muzvare Jessy Majome, vaudza Studio 7 kuti madzimai ari kutambura zvakanyaya munyika nekuda kwekushaya hany’a kwevanhurume vari pazvigaro zvehutungamiriri. Vanoti pane mukana mukuru wekuti nyika ivhare mukaha uri pakati pevakadzi nevarume kana bumbiro remutemo rikanatsotevedzerwa. Mukuru wesangano Zimbabwe Women Lawyers Association, Amai Abigail Matsvai, vaudza Studio 7 kuti zuva ranhasi rakakosha chose uye vari shandisa kukurudzira vatungamiriri zvikuru sei muhurumende kuti vatevedze mitemo inoenzanisa mikana pakati pevarume nevakadzi. Mumwe komishina weGender Commission, Amai Tsungirirai Hungwe-Chimbunde vaudza Studio 7, kuti panodawo dzidziso yakasimba kuti veruzhinji vaone kukosha kwekuenzanisa mikana pakati pemadzimai nevarume. Vati komisheni yavo iri kuedza napose painogona kutaura nemapato ezvematongerwo enyika akasiyana siyana kuti ape nenhengo dzawo mikana yakaenzana musarudzo kuti pave nemadzimai akawanda anopindawo muzvinzvimbo zvehutungamiriri. Mbembero dzegore rino dziri kuitwa pasi pedingindira rekuti, Think Equal, Build Smart, Innovate for Change. Muzvare Majome vati zvichienderana nedingindira iri, komisheni yesarudzo inofanira kushandisa masimba aya kupa zvigaro zvakaenzana kuvakadzi nevarume musarudzo dza2023. Amai Matsvai vatsigira izvi zvikwata zvinovandudza mamiriro ezvinhu pazvigaro zvehutungamiriri. Muzvare Majome vatiwo zvakakosha zvikuru kuti vanhukadzi vabatane vorwa hondo dzawo pamwe chete kwete kushandiswa nevanhurume. Vatiwo zviri pachena kuti varume vakawanda vari muzvigaro havadi kusiya zvigaro izvi ndosaka vachirwisanisa memadzimai nekuapa mikana midiki yekupinda muzvigaro zvehutungamiriri.  Zuva reInternational Women’s Day rinorangarirwa gore rega rega musi wa8 Kurume senzira yekucheredza budiriro yemadzimai munyaya dzehupfumi, matongerwo enyika nezvimwe pamwe nekukurudzira kuenzanisw kwemikana pakati pavakadzi nevarume pasi rese. Mhemberero dzange dzakarongwa nehurumende dzaitirwa kuGokwe mudunhu reMidlands uye masangano akawanda aitawo mhemberero munzvimbo dzakasiyana siyana. Mutungamiri weMDC VaNelson Chamisa vange vachicherechedza zuva iri vari kuChitungwiza. Mamwe masangano aburitsa mashoko pazuva ranhasi anosanganisa reZimbabwe Human Rights Commission rati zvinonetsa kuti madzimai asimukire nemamiriro akaiita zvinhu munyaya dzezvehupfumi sezvo pasina ari kuvawanisa mukana. Sangano reZimbabwe peace Project raburitsawo mashoko richicherechedza zuva ranhasi ari richigunun’una nenyaya yekutyorwa kwekodzero dzemadzimai kusanganisa vakatyorerwa kodzero muna Ndira mushure mekuratidzira kwakaitwa munyika. No media source currently available
title: Zimbabwe Yocherechedza Zuva reMadzimai

text: Sangano rinomirira vashandi munyika, reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, ZCTU, rinoti riri kuronga kuita musangano mukuru wekuzeya matambudziko ari kusangana nevashandi nemhuri dzavo. Mutungamiri weZCTU, VaPeter Mutasa, vanoti sangano ravo raona zvakakodzera kuti paitwe musangano uyu sezvo vanhu vari kutambura zvikuru panguva iyo vezvematongerwo enyika vari kuratidza kuti havana hany’a nemushandi. VaMutasa vanoti vari kuronga kuita musangano uyu sezvavakaita muna 1999 apo ZCTU yakaungana ichizeya rakanaka remangwana remushandi nekuti vezvematongerwo enyika vainge vakundikana kuchengetedza kodzero dzevashandi. Asi VaMutasa vanoti musangano wavo mukuru uyu uchange wakasiyana newakaitwa muna 1999, uyo wakabuda nechisungo chekuti vatungamiri veZCTU vapinde mune zvematongerwo enyika, izvo zvakaona vachakabvu VaMorgan Tsvangarai naVaGibson Sibanda nevamwe vachiumba MDC. VaMutasa vanoti sevatungamiri veZCTU havakwanisi kuita zvakaitwa naVaTsvangirai naVaSibanda nekuti havasati vapihwa masimba ekuita izvi nevashandi. No media source currently available
title: ZCTU Yoronga Kuita Musangano Mukuru weConvention

text: Vagari vemumusha weSakubva kwaMutare varatidzira pamuzinda wekanzuru yeguta iri vachiti vanoda kuvhurirwa mvura nemagetsi izvo zvakavharwa nekanzuru yavo. Mazana nemazana evagari vange vachiimba nziyo dzehondo yerusununguko uye vaine zvinyorwa zvekunyomba vakuru vekanzuru apo vange vachiratidzira vari pamuzinda wekanzuru yasvo. Vagari ava vapfiga gedhi rekanzuru kubva mangwanani kuzvika masikati apo vanga vachiimba vachiratidzira. Vagari ava vari kunyunyuta nenyaya yekuti vakavharirwa magetsi nemvura vasina kuziviswa. Zvimwe zvezvinyorwa izvi zvange zvakanzi, “Rape in darkness”, “its our right to have electricity”, “ Magetsi kuvanhu today”, Vanhu veSakubva taneta”, “tirivo vanhu, finance director must go.” Amai Elizabeth Chagumachii vanoti nyaya dzekushungurudzwa kwemadzimai dzava kuwanda zvichitevera kuvharwa kwemagetsi. “Tiri kubatwa mazamo mumatida umu, usiku mudima ndakatobatwa manheru zamo ranhu taguma hatichadi izvi,” Amai Chigumira vaudza Studio7. Mumwe wevange vachiratidzira, VaEdward Mutendi, vanoti mari yechikwereti chavanonzi vanacho nekanzuru chemadhora mamiriyoni mashanu manyepo. “Kanzuru inoti tine chikwereti che $5m, asi isusu tinoti hatina mari yakadaro dzimba dzatinogara hadzina kunaka dzine maburi matoilets ari kure uye tinofamba chinhambwe kuendako, dzimba dzine maburi uye apa kunombonaya, tinoda kuona World Cup apa hatina magetsi,” vadaro VaMutendi. VaTinashe Pachedu vanoti zvichitevera kuvharwa kwemagetsi munharaunda mavo uye nemudzimba, vanhu vava kupara mhosva sezvo panenge pasina anovaona. VaEdson Dube veUnited Mutare Residents and Ratepayers Trust, vanoti kanzuru inofanirwa kunzwisisa kuti vanhu vakawanda vari kuomerwa nehupenyu sezvo vazhinji vari kurarama nekutengesa zvinhu zvakasiyana siyana zvinoshandisa magetsi acho akavharwa. “Takanzwa kuti vanhu vakambozana kuda kuita nhaurirano kana kutaurirana neMutare City Council asi izvezvi pave nevhiki nemazuva anoraudzira pasina chati chafamba vachiti vanhu ava vanoita mabasa ekuzvibatsira akaita sekubika masamusa, kutoinhodza mafreezita saka apa zvovharwa ukuwo zvikoro zvakavhurwa mazuva apfura apa ndopanodza raramo saka hameno kuti kanzuru inenge ichida kuti vanhu vadini.” Mutauriri weguta reMutare, VaSpren Mtiwi, vanoti kanzuru iri kunetseka kuwana mari yechikwereti isiri kubhadharwa nevagari saka ikasatora danho, hapana chainowana. VaMtiwi vanoti vagari vane mari yechikwereti inosvika madhora mamiriyoni mashanu uye havazi kuratidza chido kana shungu dzekubvisa mari iyi. Asi gweta rinoshanda nesangano reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights, VaPassmore Nyakureba, vanoti kanzuru kana ani zvake haana kodzero yekuvharira vagari mvura kana pasina mvumo inopihwa nematare edzimhosva sezvo mvura iri kodzero yemunhu wose. No media source currently available
title: Vagari Voratidzira kwaMutare Zvichitevera Kudzimirwa Magetsi neMvura

text: Kusawirirana mu Zanu PF kuri kuramba kuchienderera mberi zvichitevera chisungo chedunhu reMashonaland East, chekuti gurukota rezvekudzvirirwa kwenyika, VaSydney Sekeramayi, pamwe negurukota rezvehutano, VaDavid Parirenyatwa, vasave nhengo dzeCentral Committee yedunhu iri. Chisungo chabuda nekomiti inoona nezvemafambisirwo ezvinhu mudunhu re Mashonaland East, ye Provincial Coordinating Committee, chinoreva kuti VaSekeramayi pamwe naVaParirenyatwa havasi kupinda mu Central Committee yebato. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika uye vachishanda vakazvimirira, VaBlessing Vava, vanoti kubviswa kwaitwa Va Sekeramayi mu Central Committee kwave kureva kuti havachakwanisa kudomwa nemutungamiri webato, VaRobert Mugabe, kupinda mu politiburo yebato. Vane ruzivo nezvaitika pamusangano uyu vanoti dzimwe nhengo dzaburitswa mu Central Committee dzinosanganisira mutevedzeri wegurukota rinowona nezvekurima, Va Paddy Zhanda, Va Jericho Gotora, Amai Zvikomborero Mangowo pamwe naVa David Kanjere. Vachipeta kongiresi neMugovera, VaMugabe vakakurudzira nhengo dzebato ravo mudunhu re Mashonaland East kuti dzinogara pasi zvakare dzisarudze dzimwe nhengo dzichapinda muCentral Committee. Va Mugabe vakati izvi zvinotevera kunyunyuta kwedzimwe nhengo pamusoro pekusarudzwa kwakaitwa nhengo dze Central Committee dzinonzi dziri kutsigira mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Joice Mujuru. Pataenda pamhepo, nhengo dze Zanu PF dzanga dzichiri kuwunza mazita evanhu vavari kuda kuti vatsive vanhu ava avo vakasarudzwa pamberi pekongiresi. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kumutauriri weZanu PF pari zvino, uye vari sachigari vebato, VaSimon Khaya Moyo, kuti tinzwe pamire bato ravo panyaya iyi. Uku veruzhinji vari kuti VaMugabe vakatyora bumbiro rebato ravo nekusadoma vatevedzeri vavo pakapera kongiresi yebato ravo, bato rinopikisa re MDC-T harisati raita musangano wekomiti yepamusoro we national council kunyange hazvo bumbiro rebato iri richiti musangano uyu unofanira kunge waitwa mukati memwedzi mumwe chete. Asi mutauriri webato iri, Va Obert Gutu, vanoti musangano uyu uchaitwa neMugovera svondo rino uye varamba mashoko ekuti bato ravo riri kutyora bumbiro raro. Va Gutu vati nhengo dzichapinda mukomiti ye National Executive yebato ravo dzichadomwawo zvakare. Vane ruzivo nezviri kuitika mu MDC-T vanoti mutungamiri webato iri, Va Morgan Tsvangirai, vangangodoma vaimbova murongi wemisangano mubato iri, Va Nelson Chamisa, kuti vapinde mu National Executive. Pari zvino, Va Chamisa vangosara vave nhengo yeparamende inomirira Kuwadzana zvichitevera kukundwa kwavakaitwa naVa Douglas Mwonzora pavakakwikwidza chigaro chemunyori mukuru webato pakongiresi ye MDC-T. No media source currently available
title: Mash East Inobvisa VaSekeramayi naVaParirenyatwa muZanu PF Central Committee?

text: Kusarudzwa kwevanhu vachanzwa kutongwa kwemhosva iri kupomerwa Derek Chauvin, mupurisa anonzi akauraya gore rapera munhu mutema muAmerica, VaGeorge Floyd, kwakatanga muguta reMinneapolis nezuro, Chipiri. Zviuru zvemauto nemapurisa zvakange zvakazara muguta iri zvichityira kuti pangaita mhirizhonga seyakawonekwa gore rapera pakafa Va Floyd. Gore rapera vanhu vazhinji pasi rose vakaona mavhidhiyo emupurisa wechichena, Derek Chauvin, akatsimbirira neibvi rake pahuro paVaFloyd kusvika vafa. Izvi zvakakonzera mhirizhonga nekupiswa kwedzimba nemabhizimisi mumaguta mazhinji muAmerica. Vanhu vemunyika dzakasiyana siyana vakaratidzirawo vachishora zverusarura ganda zviru kuitika muAmerica. Kusarudzwa kwevanhu vachanzwa nyaya iyi, kana kuti ‘jury’, kunonzi kunogona kutora masvondo matatu. Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika, VaCalvin Manduna, vanoti nyaya iyi inyaya yakamirirwa nevanhu vazhinji pasi pose, vachiti haasi Chauvin ega ari kutongwa asi kuti mapurisa anoitawo rusarura pamwe nemitemo yemuAmerica zvichatarisiswa. No media source currently available
title: Kutongwa kweMupurisa Ari Kupomerwa Mhosva yeKuuraya George Floyd Kotanga muMinnesota

text: Mutungumiriri webato reZanu PF vari zvakare mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vaudza musangano weCentral Committee yebato ravo kuti hapafanire kuve nemhirizhonga apo nhengo dzebato ravo dzinenge dzonotsvaga rutsigiro musarudzo dzegore rinouya. VaMnangagwa vaudza nhengo dzebato ravo kuti dzinofanira kubatana dzotsvaga rutsigiro murunyararo vachiti hapana kudzokera kumashure panyaya iyi. Vatiwo Zanu PF ndiro bato rega rinomiriria zvido zvevanhu muZimbabwe uye hapana angaritadzise kukunda musarudzo. Mashoko aVaMnangagwa anouuya apo bato ravo riri kupomerwa mhosva yekukonzera mhirizhonga musarudzo dzichangobva mukukuitwa dzemaBy-Election kuInsiza neMatabo. Vanoongorora nyaya dzesarudzo vachishanda nesangano reElection Resource Centre, VaSolomon Bhobhosibhunu, vati mashoko aVaMnangagwa akanaka chose asi hazvifaniri kuperera mukutaura chete. Zvichakada kune vamwe vatori venhau kubva kumakambani akaita seNewsday, Newshawks neNewZimbabwe asiri kufara nekuti akanyimwa magwaro ekuti ange achinyora pamusoro pengiresi yeZanu PF. Mupepeti wenhau weNewsDay, VaWisdom Mudzangairi, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vatori venhau vavo vakanyimwa magwaro ekupinda mukongiresi nekuti bato reZanu PF harisi kufara nemanyorero avari kuita nhau dzebato ravo. Asi mutauriri weZanu PF, VaChris Mutsvangwa vakaudza vatori venhau mushure memusangano wePolitiburo nezuro kuti vatori venhau vakawanda vakapihwa mvumo kunze kwevavati vanoyora manyepo. Masangano anomirira vatori nevenhau munyika akaisa seMedia Insitute of South Africa- Zimbabwe neZimbabwe National Editors Forum ashora zvikuru kurambidzwa kwevatori venhau kuita basa ravo achiti achaita zvaanokwanisa kugadzirisa nyaya iyi. Kongiresi yeZanu PF iri kuenderera mberi mangwana apo pachagadzwa nhengo itsva dzeCentral Committee. VaMnangagwa vachadomawo nhengo dzePolitiburo kubva mudare reCentral Committee nemusi weMugovera. No media source currently available
title: VaMnangagwa Vokurudzira Kubatana muZanu-PF, Ukuwo Vamwe Vatori veNhau Vachirambidzwa Kupinda kuKongiresi Vachinzi "Vanoreva Nhema"

text: No media source currently available Vakafanobata chigaro chegurukota rezvemigodhi, VaJorum Gumbo, pamwe nevakuru-vakuru vekambani yeZimbabwe Mining Development Corporation, vatadza kutsanangura hurongwa hwekucherwa kwegoridhe nekoromu nemakambani ekunze kwenyika mushure mekunge nhengo dzeZanu PF mukomiti yezvemigodhi dzakatanga kupopotedzana nenhengo yeNorton yakazvimirira VaTemba Mliswa pamusoro penyaya dzehuwori. VaMliswa, avo vanove sachigaro wekomiti iyi, vakambosuduruka kutungamira komiti iyi mushure mekunge paramende yati yave kuongorora nyaya dzehuwori dzavanonzi vakaita ivo nedzimwe nhengo nhatu dzekomiti iyi. VaMliswa vapinda mukomiti iyi senhengowo zvayo uye dzimwe nhengo dzekomiti iyi dzakaita saVaRoy Bhila dzati sezvo VaMliswa nevatatu ava, vanoti, VaLeonard Chikomba veZanu PF, VaAnele Ndebele naVaPrince Sibanda veMDC, avo vari kuongororwa nenyaya dzehuwori, vanofanirawo kumbomira kupinda mukomiti iyi. VaChikomba veZanu PF vabvuma kubuda mumusangano uyu vachitenda kuti vainge vakafonerwa namuzvinabhizimisi, VaShepherd Tundiya, kuti vazotora mari yechiokomuhomwe. Asi VaMliswa varamba kubuda mumusangano uyu izvo zvabva vaita kuti vatange kupopotedzana nedzimwe nhengo dzekomiti iyi dzakaita saVaDexter Nduna veZanu PF. VaMliswa, avo vari kupomerwa mhosva yekutsvaga mari yechiokomuhomwe inoita mazana mana ezviuru zvemadhora kubva kuna muzvinabhizimisi VaJR Goddard, varamba kubuda mukomiti vakatangawo kuudza VaNduna, VaBhila nevamwe vavo kuti vanoitawo huwori hunotyisa uye kuti vari kuba mari dzemakomiti. Paita kukandirana makobvu nematete pakati paVaMliswa naVaNduna, VaNduna vazoudza VaMliswa kuti vaizovagadzirisa panze peparamende, vachitiwo havachatombozivi kuti vakauraya vanhu vangani. Asi VaMliswa varamba kunyarara kunyange hazvo VaNduna vazobuda panze. Zvese izvi zvaitika mumaziso aVaGumbo nechikwata chavo uye mukati memaminitsi akati kuti, VaGumbo nevatori venhau vazoburitswa mudare kuti nhengoi dzekomiti dzisare dzichigadzirisana. Aka hakasi kekutanga nhengo dzekomiti iyi dzichipopotedzana pamberi pevanyarikani. Gore rapfuura nhengo dzekomiti iyi kubva kuZanu PF dzakapopotedzana naVaMliswa dzikarambidza muzvinabhizimisi, VaNick Van Hoogstraten, avo vane chikamu mukambani yeHwange Colliery, kupa humbowo pamusoro pehuwori huri kuitika kukambani iyi. Kune rimwewo divi, hakasi kekutangawo zvakare kuti VaNduna vatyisidzire dzimwe nhengo dzeparamende. Gore rapera VaNduna vakatyisidzira nhengo dzeMDC vachiti vanogona kudzipfura nepfuti mushure mekunge vasveveredzwa zvichitevera kuzvizivisa kwavakanga vaita mudare vachiti ndivo mumiriri weChegutu West, kunyange hazvo paive nemakakatanwa pakusarudzwa kwavo ayo aive kumatare edzimhosva.
title: Kukandirana Makobvu neMatete kwaVaMliswa naVaNduna Kunomisa Musangano weKomiti yeZvicherwa

text: Zimbabwe Electoral Commission (ZEC) iri kutarisirwa kuva nemakomishina matanhatu matsva ekutsiva makomishina ari kusiya zvigaro zvawo zvichitevera kupera kwetemu yemakomishina aya muna Chikunguru gore rino. Muchiziviso chayo kune veruzhinji, komiti inoona nezvekufambiswa kwebasa muparamende yeStanding Rules and Orders, iri kukoka veruzhinji kuti vadome vanhu vavanoda kuti vapinde muZEC kuti vatore zvigaro zvenhengo nhanhatu dzekomisheni idzo dziri kusiya basa musi wa6 Chikunguru apo panopera nguva yadzo yekuve nenhengo dzebhodhi rekomisheni. Komiti iyi inoti panodiwa vakadzi vana nevarume vaviri kuti vatore zvigaro izvi. Komiti iyi inoti veruzhinji vanofanira kudoma vanhu vane chiremera pamwe nehunyanzvi munyaya dzekukufambiswa kwesarudzo. Vanhu vanobvumidziwa kudoma vanhu vavanoda kuti vapinde muZEC kusvika musi 18 Kukadzi uye komiti iyi inozoita bvunzo dzekuona kuti vanenge vadomwa vanokodzera here kana kuti kwete. Komiti iyi inozoendesa mazita evanenge vakunda kumutungamiri wenyika uyo anotambira mazita aya kana kuaramba. Nyanzvi munyaya dzesarudzo vachishanda nesangano reElections Resource Centre, VaSolomon Bhobhosibunu, vati zvakakosha kuti pave nenhengo itsva dzekomisheni iyi. Asi vati vanhu vanodomwa ava vanofanira kunge vakazvimirira kuitira kuti nyika ikwanise kuita sarudzo dzakachena. Sachigaro werimwe sangano rinoongorora sarudzo munyika, reZimbabwe Election Support Network, VaAndrew Makoni, vaudza Studio 7 kuti kuvepo kwevanhu vatsva muZEC kunogona kusandura maitirwo ebasa muZEC. VaMakoni vatiwo zvakakosha kuti mutemo wemafambisirwo esarudzo ushandurwe kuitira kuti ZEC ikwanise kushanda yakazvimirira. Mapato anopikisa nemasangano anoshanda akazvimirira munyika anogaro chema chema achipomera ZEC mhosva yekuita basa rayo yakarerekera kuhurumende nebato riri kutonga. Vanoongorora zvematongerwe enyika vachidzidzisa kuAfrica University, Dr Wellington Gadzikwa, vaudza Studio 7 kuti ZEC haina chimiro chakanaka kune veruzhinji uye kasandura vanhu hakuna zvakunagadzirisa. Vanoti semaonera avo mutemo wesarudzo unofanira kusandurwa uye mutungamiriri wenyika hafaniri kune vechekuita nekusarudzwa kwenhengo dzeZEC. Mutungamiriri webato rinopikisa reDemocratic Party, Dr Wurayayi Zembe, vaudza Studio 7 kuti ZEC inofanira kuumbwa patsva kuitira kuti veruzhinji nemapato ematongerwo enyika vavimbe nayo. Vanenge vadomwa kuve nhengo dzeZEC vanoita makore matanhatu vari pachigaro uye vanokwanisa kudomwa kuti varambe vari pabasa kwemamwe makore matanhatu zvekare. Pari zvino Amai Priscillah Chigumba ndivo sachigaro wekomisheni iyi. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nemutauriri weZEC Amai Letitia Kazembe, kuti tinzwe kuti ndivanani vari kusiya zvigaro zvavo muna Chikunguru.
title: Komisheni yeSarudzo Yotarisirwa Kuva neMakomishina Matsva Matanhatu

text: Musangano wevakaremara weGlobal Disability Summit uri kukokerwa neUnited Nations wakatanga nemusi weChina uye uri kutarisirwa kupetwa nemusi weChishanu. Musangano wekutanga hwemhando iyi wakaitwa muna 2018 uchi kokerwa neUNited Kindgdom Department for International Development nehurumende yeKenya nesangano reDisability Alliance. Misangano iyi yakanangana nekuzadzikisa zviga zveUnited Nations kana kuti Agenda 2030 chakanangana nekuti pasave neanosarira munyaya dzebudirro kana kuti ‘Leave No One Behind’ (LNOB) pasi pechisungo cheUnited Nations Convention of Rights of Persons with Disabilities. Pakatoumbwa komiti yekuongorora kuona kuti zvisungo zvekusimudzira kodzoro dzevakaremara dzaremekedzwa. Zimbabwe yange ichimirirwa mumusangano weChina nemunyori mukuru mubazi rezvedzidzo VaSimon Masanga. Asi vanhu vakawanda vakaremara munyika vari kuchema chema kuti havasi kuona kodzero dzavo dzichiremekedzwa uye vari kusarurwa mumabasa. Mumwe akaremara anogara mumusha weRimuka kuKadoma VaTavengwa Kamuchokoto vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kutora danho rekupa chikamu chemabasa vakaremara mumapazi ehurumende. VaKamuchokoto vanoti vakaremara vanehunyanzvi vanofanirwa kutanga kutorwa pamabasa aya. Vanotiwo vakasaririrawo munyaya dzezvehutano vakapa muenzaniso wekuti zviziviso zvechirwere cheCovid-19 hazvina kunyorwa nezvavanonzwisisa kana kuti Brail. Amai Edith Mandishona avo vasingaone vanoti kurarama kwevakaremara kunorwadza sezvo vakawanda vavo vasina pekugara pakanaka. Vanoti dzimba dzavanogara dzine zvimbuzi zvinoshandiswa nevanhu vakawanda zvinoita kuti vagare vachitsika tsvina muzvimbudzi izvi pose pavanoenda kunozvibatsira. Amai Muchaneta Ngwerume vanoti munyaya dzekurarama vakasaririra zvikuru sezvo vasingapihwe mikana yemabasa. Amai Ngwerume vanoti panyaya yekupihwa rubatsiro rwakaita serwe zvekudya vanonyenyeredzwa uye vanoti kushaiswa mikana uku kunopa kuti vazhinji vararame nekupemha. Mukuru wesangano revanhu vasingagone kutaura kana kunzwa reZimbabwe Deaf Trust, Amai Babra Nyangairi vakurudzirwa hurumende kuti iiendese vanokwanisa kududzira mutauro wemaoko kunzvimbo dzakaita sezvipatara, makiriniki, kumapurisa nedzimwe. Gurukota rezvemagariro evanhu Muzvinafundo Paul Mavima vanoti hurumende iri kuyedza nepainogona kubatsira vakaremara. VaMavima vanoti vanhu vanosvika miriyoni imwechete nemazana mana ezviuru vanofungidzirwa kuti vanorarama nehurema munyika. Sedanho rekukurudzira kunzwikwa kwezvichemo zvevakaremara munyika, mutungamiri wenyika anosungirwa nemutemo kudoma nhengo inovamiririra muparamende. Musangano weGlobal Disability Summit uyo uri kuitwa padandemutande reZOOM, uri kuunza pamwe chete hurumende, vemasangano anoshanda akazvimirira, nevamwe vane chekuita nevanhu vanorarama nehurema kuti vave nechekuita munyaya dzebudiriro uye kuti kodzero dzavo dziremekedzwe pasi pechibvumirano che United Nations. Sangano re World Health Organisation inoti vanhu bhiriyoni rimwechete kana kuti zvikamu gumi nezvishanu kubva muzana vanorarama nehurema pasi rose.
title: Zimbabwe Yobatana neDzimwe Nyika paMusangano weVakaremara Kana Kuti Global Disability Summit

text: No media source currently available No media source currently available Masangano anoona nezvekodzero dzevanhu anoti kutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu kuri kuenderera mberi, uye vezvematongerwo enyika vari kupindira muchirongwa chekunyoresa kuvhota. Sangano re Zimbabwe Human Rights Association rinoti izvi zviri kuitika zvikurusei mudunhu reManicaland uko rinoti nhengo yeParamende, Va Joseph Chinotimba, vari kuvhiringa vanonyoresa vanhu uye vachimanikidza vanhu kuenda kunonyoresa. Mukuru weZimbabwe Peace Project, Muzvare Jestina Mukoko, vanoti kupindira mukunyoreswa kwevavhoti kwave kunyanya zvikuru sei nemadzishe nemasabhuku avo vari kutyityidzira vanhu munzvimbo dzavo kuti vazovhotere Zanu-PF vachinyepa kuti michina yekuvhotesa inoona wese wavhotera bato risiri Zanu-PF. VaChinotimba vanoramba zvese zvavarikupomerwa vachiti chavarikuita kukuridzira vanhu kuti vaende kunonyoresa kuti vazokwanisa kuvhota gore rinouya.
title: VaChinotimba Voramba Kuti Vari Kumakidza Vanhu Kunyoresa Kuvhota

text: Kirinika yekanzuru yeHarare, yeMufakose Polyclinic, iri kurasa musana, kana kuti chevakuru chinobva pamadzamai anenge abatsirwa, kana kuti placenta, mugomba riri pakirinika iyi izvo zvinonzi zviri kunze kwemutemo. Pasi pemutemo weHuman Tissues Act, misana, kana zvevakuru zvinobuda mushure mekunge madzimai asununguka, zvinofanira kupiswa pachishandiswa muchina unopisa zvakanyanya. Asi vamwe vashandi vepaMufakose Polyclinic vanoti kirinika yavo yave nemwedzi yakati wandeyi ichipisa zvinhu izvi mugomba repachipatara ichi sezvo ‘Incinerator’ yepo isiri kushanda. Vashandi ava, vasina kuda kutaura mazita avo sezvo vasingabvumidzwe kutaura nevatapi venhau, vati vakuru vanoona nezvekirinika iyi vakaudzwa nezvedambudziko iri asi havana matanho avati vatora. Patakasvika pakirinika iyi nezuro, Studio7 yakaona hutsi huchipfungaira pagomba riri kuseri kwewadhi remateneti pakirinika iyi. Vashandi vepo vakati izvi ndizvo zviri kuitika mazuva ose. Mumwe mudzimai ane munin’ina wake akabatsirirwa pakirinika iyi, uyo ati anonzi Amai Tambudzai, audza Studio 7 kuti kunyange hazvo asina ruzivo rwekuti zvinhu izvi zvinoraswa sei, zvinofanira kuitwa zvine chiremerera. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano, vari zvakare mutungamiri wesangano reMedicaal and Dental Private Practitioners of Zimbabwe Association, Dr Johannes Marisa, vati zvingave zvakanaka kuti patevedzwe mutemo wekurasa zvinhu zvakadai. Vati kunyange kirinika kana chipatara chikasave nemichina yekupisa izvi, pane makambani akawanda anotakura tsvina yakadai. Dr Marisa vati makunzuru akaita seHarare City Council neveHealth Professions Authority ndivo vanosungirwa kunge vachiona kuti makirika kana zvipatara zvine hurongwa kwekuti tsvina yakadai inoraswa sei vasati vapihwa marezenisi. Hatina kukwanisa kubata veHealth Professions Authority kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi. Hatinawo kukwnisa kunzwa kubva kumukuru anoona nezvehutano muHarare City, Dr Prosper Chonzi, sezvo vange vasiri kudaira nhare mbozha yavo. Mutauriri wekanzuru, VaMike Chideme, vakaudza Studio7 nezuro manheru kuti vainge vakamirira kunzwa kubva kubazi rezvehutano mukanzuru yavo vasati vatipa divi rekanzuru yavo panyaya iyi. No media source currently available
title: Mufakose Polyclinic Yopisa Chevakuru neNzira Dzisiri paMutemo

text: Kunetsana pakati pezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe nezveBotswana kumuganu wenyika mbiri kuri kuenderera mberi paine kurudziro yekuti paitwe nhaurirano nevatungamiri vehurumende venyika mbiri idzi kuti nyaya yekubiwa kwemombe nezvinofungidzirwa kuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe isarambe ichienderera mberi. Kurudziro iyi yakaitwa nemusi weSvondo nasachigaro wekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvemabasa nemukati menyika muBotswana VaCaterpillar Hikuama mushure mekuita musangano nevagari wemisha yeJackalas 1, Jackalas 2, Butale, Moroka neRamokgwebana iyo yatarisana nedambudziko rekubirwa mombe. VaHikuama vakaudza Studio7 kuti paita ropa rakaipa pakati pezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe neBotswana zvinogona kuzokonzera kurwisana. Vakurudzira zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe kuti zvimire kushandisa nzira dzemusango pakupinda nekubuda munyika iyi vachiti vamwe vari kuzopomerwa mhosva dzekuba zvipfuyo nekuda kwekuti havana magwaro ekufambisa. Mumiri wenzvimbo yeBobonong mudare reparamende, VaTaolo Lucas vanoti vanopfuya mombe vane makore anodarika makumi mana vachingobirwa nevanofungidzirwa kuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe izvo zvoita kuti vamwe vaise mutemo mumaoko. Vaimbove mumiriri weBotswana muZimbabwe, VaKenny Kapinga, avo vave mumiriri weOkavango mudare reparamende muBotswana uye vari nhengo yekomiti iyi vakaudza Studio7 kuti Zimbabwe yakafanira kuedza nepainogona kugadzirisa hupfumi wenyika kuitira kuti zvizvarwa zvavo zvisangopembera nenyika nokuda kwenzara. Nyanzvi munyaya dzekodzero dzevanhu uye vari mudzidzisi wemutemo paUniversity of Botswana, VaTimothy Muchadehama vanoti nzara yapfunya chisero munyika nokuda kwekushaikwa kwemabasa ndiyo yoita kuti zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvirarame nekuita zvehumbavha. Studio7 haina kunzwa divi rehurumende panyaya iyi sezvo gurukota rinoona nezvekudzivirirwa kwenyika, Amai Oppah Muchinguri-Kashiri vati vange vari mumusangano. Mutauiriri wemapurisa Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi vaudza Studio 7 kuti vange vari mumusangano vasingakwanisewo kupa divi ravo. Asi mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vakaumba chikwata chemakurukota kuongorora nyaya iyi. Bepanhau reChronicle rinoti mapurisa akakwanisa kuwana mombe dzakabiwa dzimwe kubva kuBotswana kunzvimbo dzekuMatabeleland dzinotiTshanyaungwe. Makhado, West Nicholson, John Dip, Collen Bawn nedzimwe. Gurukota rezvekurima VaAnxious Masuku vanoti VaMnangagwa vari kunetseka zvikuru nekubiwa kwezvipfuyo uku.
title: Kubiwa kweMombe kuBotswana neZvinofungidzirwa Kuti Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe Kwotyirwa Kuti Kuchakonzera Kurwisana

text: Vanorwira kuti munyika muve nesarudzo dzakachena vanoti vanotambira chirongwa chekutarwa kwematunhu pamberi pesarudzo dzegore rinouya chakaziviswa neZimbabwe Electoral Commssion, ZEC, nemusi weChipiri, vachiti vanotarisira kuti chirongwa ichi chichaitwa zviri pachena. Sachigaro veZimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, Amai Priscilla Chigumba, vakazivisa kuburikidza nechiziviso chakaburitswa mumapepanhau, vachiti chirongwa ichi chichatanga musi wa 01 Chikumi unove mwedzi unouya, chichipera musi wa 31 Zvita gore rino. Amai Chigumba vakazivisawo kuti gwaro revavhoti richashandiswa mukutara matunhu richavharwa musi wa 30 mwedzi uno. Vakatiwo panopetwa chirongwa ichi panozoburitswa gwaro rine matunhu anenge atarwa iro rinozoendeswa kumutngamiri wenyika. Mukuru anoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa musangano rinoongorora mafambisirwo esarudzo munyika, reElection Resource Centre, VaSolomon Bobosibunu, vanoti hurongwa hwekuchekwa kwematunhu uhwu hwakanga hwatogara hwave kumashure. No media source currently available
title: Hurongwa hweKutarwa kweMatunhu Pamberi peSarudzo dza 2022 Hwotarisirwa kuParurwa Musi wa 01 Chikumi

text: Nhengo dzeZanu PF kwaMutare dzaswera zvakare dzakangomirira kuvhota kumaprimary elections ekusarudza vachamirira bato iri musarudzo dzemakunzura nevamiriri vedare reparamende dzichazoitwa gore rino. Kuvhota uku kwange kusati kwatanga nekuda kwekuti mapepa ekuvhotesa, kana kuti maballot paper ange asati asvika kunzvimbo dzokuvhotera uye gakava rekuti vanhu vaizovhota seyi uye kuti anokodzera kuvhota ndiyani. Nzvimbo zhinji dzashanyirwa neStudio 7 sarudzo dzange dzisati dzatanga paine makatanwa ekuti nhengo dzeZanu PF dzinobvumirwa kuvhota paWard dzinenge dzakaita seyi. Dzimwe nzvimbo zvakare dzange dzisati dzave nemapepa anoshandiswa pakuvhota kwacho. KuChikanga-Dangamvura kuward 17 uko kune nhengo sere dziri kuda hukanzura, vanhu vange vangori panzvimbo inozivikanwa kuti Muone, pasina chiri kufamba kubva mangwanani. Vanhu ava vakaswera zvakare vakamirira nezuro pasina zvakaitwa nenyaya yemapopoto emavhotero evanhu. Nhengo sere idzi dziri kukwikwidza dzinosanganisira VaDadirayi Mutasa, VaBen Moyo, VaTonderai Nengome, VaDan Rusinga, Amai Elizabeth Nyatoti, Amai Cecilia Razerera, VaInnocent Chidhuma, naVaIsheanesu Ziteya. Vazhinji vange vauya kuzovhota vange vari kuchema nenyaya yekuswera muzuva nenzara vakangomirira kuti vavhote asi pasina chiri kufamba. Vange vari kuchemawo nenyaya yekushaya nzvimbo dzekuti vazvibatsire. Amai Rebecca Ziweya mugari wemumusha weHobhouse kwaMutare avo vaswera zvakare vari pamutsetse. "Nezuro takasvera futi pano nenzara, hapana kana matoilets, tasiya vana kudzimba, ngatiiteyi sevanhu vakuru tongoswerera here chinhu chimwe? Ngavatinyarewo." Amai Cleopatra Mangezi vanoti vanorwadzikana nekugarira guyo sembwa vachisiya mabasa avo akakosha kudzimba dzavo. "Kubvira nezuro kuma 5 tingori pano kusvika kuma 7 pasina zviri kufamba saka tanetawo nazvo. Hatina kana matoilets futi." Asi imwe nhengo yeZanu PF, Amai Babra Rigomeka, avo vanga vari panzvimbo yekuvhotera nhasi vaudza Studio 7 kuti kunonoka kuri kuitwa kuvhotesa zvinenge zvine chinangwa chekuda kubiridzira sarudzo idzi sezvo pari kuvhoterwa pacho pasina chiedza kana kwazove nerima. "Delay iyi ndeyekuti vanhu vaore moyo vaende kudzimba kuti vakwanise kuisa munhu wavo, manje isusu hapana kwatiri kuenda tiri kutogara pano kusvikira taisa candidate yedu yatiri kuda." Amai Lina Mtetwa vanoti vachangorindira chete kusvikira vazadzikisa chinangwa chavo chekuvhota. "Uku kuita kwekuti tisiye zvekuvhota tiende kumba. Mamiriro azvo aya vanhu vachavhota vanenge vava vangani so sezvo vanhu vazhinji vaenda kumba? Isisu tine candidate yedu yatiri kuda kuvhotera, tichaivhotera chete." VaTawanda Mukodza ndivo sachigaro wevechidiki mubato reZanu PF kudunhu reManicaland, uye ndivo mukuru ari kuona nezvekufambiswa kwesarudzo dzemaPrimary mubato iri. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kutaura naVaMukodza kuti tinzwe kuti kunonoka kuitwa kwesarudzi idzi kuri kukonzerwa neyi. Sarudzo idzi dziri kuitwa kumaWard gumi nemasere emuguta. No media source currently available
title: Nhengo dzeZanu PF kwaMutare Dzinoswera Zvakare Dzakangomirira Kuvhota

text:
Mamiriro akaiata zvinhu munyaya dzematongerwo enyika ari kuramba achiita manyama amire nerongo panguva iyo paine hurongwa hwekuratidzira munyika uye vamwe vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu vachiti vari kushushikana kuti zvinhu zvinogona kuipisisa zvachose munyika. Kudzanai Musengi anotipa nyaya inotevera.

Mukuru wesangano reHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica, VaDhewa Mavhinga, vanoti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka munyika sezvo kumbunyikidzwa kwekodzero dzevanhu kuri kuramba kuchiwedzera.

Mumazuva mashoma apfuura, imwe nhengo yeboka revechidiki mubato reMDC Alliance, VaTakunda Madzana vanonzi vakapambwa kubva pamba pavo kuMagwegwe husiku nevanhu vasingaziikanwe kuti ndivanaani vakashungurudzwa ndokubva vasiiwa musango.

Mumazuva mashoma apfuura vamwezve vanhu vasingaziikanwe kuti ndivanani vakasvika pamba peimwezve nhengo yeMDC Alliance, VaArnold Batirai, avo vanovewo kanzura weguta reBulawayo vakavhundutsira mudzimai wavo.

Mutauriri webato reMDC Alliance mudunhu reBulawayo, VaSwithern
Chiroodza, vati zviitiko izvi pamwe nezvimwe zvakadai zvakaitika munguva pfupi yapfuura kune dzimwe nzvimbo munyika zvinoratidza kuti
hurumende yeZanu PF ishiri yagara ine muririro wayo pakumbunyikidza
kodzero dzevanhu.

Asi mumashoko avakatura kuvatapi venhau muHarare nezuro, vakafanobata chinzvimbo chemutauriri weZanu PF, VaPatrick Chinamasa, vakati MDC Alliance ine tsika yekutaura manyepo nezvekushungurudzwa kwenhengo dzayo, vachiti iyi inzira yekuda kusvibisa zita remutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, nehurumende yeZanu PF.

Murongi wemabasa musangano reCivil Society and Churches Joint Forum, Muzvare Abigail Mupambi, vati kunyange hazvo mamiriro ezvinhu asina kumira zvakanaka, vanobvumirana nemaonero ekuti kune vari kupiwa mari kuti vasvibise zita renyika.

Vakadzingwa muZanu PF muboka revechidiki, VaGodfrey Tsenengamu, vaudza Studio 7 kuti ivo ndemumwe wevaimbove nepfungwa yekuti nyaya dzekushungurudzwa kwevanhu kunyanya avo vane maonero akasiyana neZanu PF ndedzekunyepa. Asi vati vakazozvionera pamhuno sefodya mushure mekushungurudzwa ivo pachavo vakatiwo vanhu havafanirwe kubvuma kutyisidzirwa nemaitiro akadai pakurwisa huwori nemamwe matambudziko akatarisana neveruzhinji munyika.

VaTsenengamu, VaJob Sikhala, VaPromise Mkhwananzi, VaPeter Mutasa
veZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, naVaObert Masaraure evAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe ndevamwe vevanhu vane chitsama vari kunzi vari kutsvagwa nemapurisa kuti vabvunzurudzwe nenyaya yekuda kuratidzira kwakarongwa kuitwa nemusi weChishanu.

Vakafanobata chigaro chemukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Human Rights NGOForum, VaMusa Kika, vashorawo nyaya yekumbunyikidzwa kwekodzero dzevanhu munyika vachiti ikodzero yevanhu kuti varatidzire murunyararo.
Vashorawo kwavati kusashanda zvakanaka kwemapurisa.

Asi mutauriri wemapurisa, Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi, vaudza
Studio 7 parunhare kuti hapana chakaipa pakuti mapurisa ashambadze
mazita evanhu vaanoda kubvunzurudza. Pamubvunzo wekuti zvii zvavari kuita panyaya dzekushungurudzwa kana kupambwa kwevamwe vanhu munyika, Assistant Commissioner Nyathi vati nyaya dzose dzakamhang’arwa kwavari dziri kuferefetwa.

Sangano reEvangelical Fellowship of Zimbabwe rabudisa gwaro
rekuratidzawo kusafara kwaro nemamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika. Rati kunyange hazvo zvakakosha kuti pave nematanho akasimba ekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19, kusamira zvakanaka kwezvehupfumi munyika uye huwori, zviri kuita kuti veruzhinji vatsutsumwe.

Rakurudzira kuti munyika muve nenhaurirano dzechokwadi senzira
yekuedza kugadzirisa matambudziko akatarisana nenyika.

Hurumende iri kuti hurongwa hwekuratidzira haufanirwe kuenderera mberi
sezvo kuita izvi kuchigona kuisa veruzhinji panjodzi yekutapurirana
hutachiwana hwecoronavirus.

Murongi wekuratidzira uku, VaJcob Ngarivhume, pamwe nemutapi wenhau, Hopewell Chin’ono, vari muhusungwa vachipomerwa mhosva yekukurudzira veruzhinji kuita zvemhirizhonga. Vaviri ava vakanyimwa mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso, uye magweta avo eZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights, akapikisa mutongo uyu nezuro mudare reHigh Court, iro riri kutarisirwa kupa mutongo waro neChitatu. No media source currently available
title: Varwiri veKodzero dzeVanhu Voshushikana neZviri Kuitika Munyika

text: Vakweguri vanoti zvinhu zviri kuvaomera muhupenyu hwavo nepamusana pekushaya mari yekushandisa muzvinhu zvizhinji zvavanoda kuita. Vakweguri vanoti zvinhu zviri kuvaomera muhupenyu hwavo nepamusana pekushaya mari yekushandisa muzvinhu zvizhinji zvavanoda kuita. Mbuya Nyaradzo Masiiwa vanogara kwaSeke kuDema. Mbuya Masiiwa vaimborarama nekurima asi pari zvino havachakwanisi kuita izvi sezvo vachembera. Mbuya ava vanoti vari kushupika zvikuru sezvo vasiri kuwana rubatsiro kubva kuhurumende, iyo vanoti inofanirwa kunge ichivabatsira sezvinodiwa nebumbiro renyika. No media source currently available Mbuya Masiiwa vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kuvabatsira sezvo munyika muine nzara inotyisa zvikuru. Mumwe mukweguri ari kushupika, Sekuru Major Makote, vanoti kushaya gurukota rinomirira vari pamudyandigere chimwe chezvinhu zviri kupa kuti vanhu vakaita saivo, kunyange vaibatirwa mari dzemudyandigere pavaishanda, vatambure zvakanyanya kudai. Sekuru Andrew Chivi vanogara mumusha unochengetwa vakwegura we Waterfalls Old Age Home. Sekuru Chivi vanoti boka reNational Social Security Authority ndiro riri kuvapinza parumananzombe zvisineyi kuti mari dzinobatirwa veruzhinji pamabasa dzichienda kuboka iri. VaNicholas Mathonsi vanogara mumusha unochengeta vakwegura. VaMathonsi vanoti kunyange hazvo vaishanda vachichengeta mari yekuzoshandisa vakura, vakabudira ziya mahara sezvo pasina rubatsiro rwavari kuwana rwunovakwanira. Muzvare Sarudzai Zvoushe vanoshandira rimwe sangano rinochengeta vakwegura kuMarondera. Muzvare Zvoushe vanotiwo kuondomoka kwehupfumi ndiko kuri kukonzera kuti vanochengeta vakwegura vashaye pekutangira Nyanzvi munyaya dzemitemo dzinoti hurumende inosungirwa kuchengeta vose vakwegura sezvinodiwa nechikamu 82 chebumbiro remitemo yenyika. Pasi pemutemo uyu, vose vane makore anodarika makumi manomwe vanofanirwa kuwana rubatsiro kubva kuhurumende munyaya dzemari dzekubatsirikana, mishonga nezvimwe zvinodiwa mukuchengetedza hutano hwavo. Asi hurumende inoti haina mari izvo zviri kuitadzisawo kubhadhara vashandi vayo nenguva. Kudzamara hurumende yagadzirisa nyaya dzehupfumi pamwe nekuremekedza bumbiro rayo remitemo, vana sorojena vakaita saMbuya Masiiwa, Sekuru Makote nevamwe, vacharamba vachinonga svosve nemuromo, uku vakuru vakuru muhurumende vachigara matumbu akazvimba nekuguta.
title: Vakweguri Voyaura neNhamo muZimbabwe Yakasununguka

text: Vaimbova mutevedze wemutungamiri wenyika Amai Joice Mujuru avo vave kutungamira bato rinopikisa reZimbabwe People First-ZPF, nemusi weMugovera vakaita musangano muHarare vakapika kuti havasi kuzofa vakadzokera kubato reZanu-PF. “Bato iri (ZPF) haridyidzane zvachose ne Zanu-PF. Ndapota inzwai izvi kubva kwandiri. Handisi kuzofa ndakadzokera kuZanu-PF. Bato rino rine vatsigiri kubva kumapato akawanda uye vamwe vaizviti havadi zvematongerwo enyika” vakadaro Amai Mujuru. Ama Mujuru vakadzingwa mubato reZanu-PF muna 2014 vachipomerwa mhosva yekuda kuita kafiramberi mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe. Asi vachitaura kuvatsigiri vavo, Amai Mujuru vakati vari kushamisika kuti sei vasiri kusungwa kana vachinzi vakapara mhosva huru yakadai. Amai Mujuru vakaudza vanhu ava kuti nyaya huru iripo yakaita kuti vadzingwe yainge iri nyaya yekuti vainge vofumura vanhu vainge vachiita zvehuori. Mutungamiri webato reZimbabwe People First akatiwo zvinhu zvinoodza moyo kuti vatungamiri venyika vanopedza nguva vachidzidzisa vechidiki kutuka vanhu vakarwa hondo yerusununguko vachitadza kuuya nemazano ekunyukura nyika mumadhaka mairi. Vakatiwo vari kushushikana zvikuru nekubatwa neseri kweruoko kwavanoti kuri kuitwa vanhu vakarwa hondo yerusununguko.
title: Amai Mujuru Vopika kuti Havafe Vakadzokera kuZanu-PF.

text: Kushaikwa kwemishonga inoshandiswa pakuvhiya varwere muzvipatara zvehurumende kwave kumanikidza kuvharwa kwezvimwe zvipatara, danho rinonzi rave kusiya varwere vari pamhene. Chimwe chipatara chave kuvharwa ndecheUnited Bulawayo Hospitals kana kuti UBH. Svondo rapera chipatara ichi chakazivisa kuti chave kumbomira kuvhiya varwere nekuda kwekushaikwa kwemushonga werudzi rwe pethidine, uyo unopodza marwadzo pamunhu anenge achivhiyiwa. Gwaro rakaburitswa naDoctor N.B.T. Dzvanga, vanove mukumuru wezchipatara cheUBH richiendeswa kuvakuru vemapoka akasiyanasiyana ezvipatara izvi rinoti kubva musi wa 14 Gumiguru zchipatara ichi chinenge chambomira kuvhiya varwere. Gwaro iri rinoti iri harisi dambudziko repa United Bulawayo Hospitals chete, asi kuti idambudziko rabata nyika yose. Mwedzi wapera chipatara cheHarare Central Hospital chakazivisawo kuti chakanga chambomira kutambira varwere vanenge vachida kuvhiyiwa nekuda kwekushaya mishonga inodiwa pakuita basa iri. Mumwe chiremba anoshandira muchipatara chehurumende, Dr Martin Mlilo vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka muzvipatara sezvo isiri mishonga yekushandisa pakuvhiya varwere chete iri kushaikwa. Dr Mlilo vanoti kana mimwe mishonga yekupa varwere iri kushaikwawo muzvipatara zvehurumende, izvo zviri kusiya varwere vakawanda vachishaya rubatsiro. Hurumende inonzi iri kutatarika kuwana mari yekuti itenge mishonga inodiwa muzvipatara iyi nekuda kwekuti mari iri kupinda muhomwe yayo ishoma zvakanyanya. Asi vamwe vanoongorora nyaya dzehutano vanoti hurumende haisi kukoshesa nyaya dzehutano nekuti iri kushandisa mari kune zvimwe zvirongwa zvisina kukosha kana zvichienzaniswa nehutano. No media source currently available
title: Dambudziko reMishonga Inodiwa paKuvhiya Varwere Robata Zvipatara zveHurumende

text: Vakwegura munyika vanoti vanorumbidza zvikuru gwaro rakaparurwa muHarare neChishanu chapera rakanangana nehutano hwavo vachiti vane tarisiro yekuti hurumende itevere zviri mugwaro iri kuitira kuti vatana munyika vakure vaine hutano hwakanaka. Gwaro iri, iro rinonzi “The National Healthy Ageing Strategy,” ndiro rekutanga munyika rinotarisa hutano hwevakwegura. Mumwe wevakwegura vakakurukurwa navo neStudio 7, VaJonathan Mandaza, vesangano reZimbabwe Older Person’s Organisation, vakati tarisiro yavo ndeyekuti hurumende izadzikise zviri mugwaro iri. VaMandaza vakatiwo vanoda kuti vanhu vakuru vakure vari muutano, vakachemachemawo nekushomeka kwaanachiremba vane hunyanzvi hwekunzwisisa zvirwere zvevanhu vakura. Mumwe mukweguru, Amai Plaxedes Tavengwa, vakaudzawo Studio 7 kuti vafadzwa nekukosheswawo kwevanhu vakura munyaya dzehutano. Amai Tavengwa vakatiwo change chichinyanyoshungurudza vanhu vakuru kushaya mari yekurapwa kuzvipatara sezvo vaibvisiswa mari dzekutenga mishonga nekuvhenekwa. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa musangano reNational Age Network of Zimbabwe, VaMarck Chikanza, vakati gwaro iri rinovapa mukana wekupota vachibvunza hurumende zvainenge ichiita mukusimudzira hutano hwevanhu vakuru. VaChikanza vakatiwo gwaro iri rinopa ruzivo kuvanhu vakura kuti vangawanepi rubatsiro kana hutano hwavo husina kumira zvakanaka. Bazi rezveutano rinoti hutano hwakanaka kuvanhu vakwegura hunobatsira kuti varambe vachibatsirana nemhuri dzavo mukutsvaka raramo. No media source currently available
title: VaKwegura Vorumbidza Gwaro Rakanangana neHutano Hwavo Rakaparurwa muHarare

text: Mutungamiri weMDC, VaMorgan Tsvangirai, nemusi wemusi weChipiri vakaita musangano nemumiriri weAmerica muZimbabwe, VaHarry Thomas, kumuzinda webato ravo weHarvest House muHarare. Mutungamiri weMDC, VaMorgan Tsvangirai, nemusi wemusi weChipiri vakaita musangano nemumiriri weAmerica muZimbabwe, VaHarry Thomas, kumuzinda webato ravo weHarvest House muHarare. Ambassador Thomas vaudza Studio 7 kuti vari kusangana nevatungamiri vemapato ose ezvematongerwo enyika munyika uye vakatosangana nevakuru veZanu-PF, mutungamiri weMDC, VaWelshman Ncube, mutungamiri wePeople’s Democratic Party, VaTendai Biti, nevamwe. Ambassador Thomas vati izvi vari kuzviita kuti vakwanise kuumba hukama pakati peAmerica neZimbabwe munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika. Mutauriri waVaTsvangirai, VaLuke Tamborinyoka, vatenda kuti musangano uyu wakaitwa vachitiwo VaTsvangirai vane chido chekusangana nevamiriri vedzimwe nyika sezvo vari mutungamiri webato guru munyika. No media source currently available
title: VaTsvangirai Voita Musangano neMumiriri weAmerica muZimbabwe VaThomas

text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, nemutungamiri webato guru rinopikisa reMDC, VaNelson Chamisa, havasi kuwirirana panyaya yekuti matambudziko atarisana nenyika munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika uye hupfumi ogadziriswa sei. Chiri kuwiriranwa nevaviri ava inyaya yekuti panoda nhaurirano, asi kuti dzoitwa sei ndipo paita kuti vave makara asionane. VaChamisa, avo vainge vari kuSouth Africa nemusi weChitatu, vanoti panoda mutongigava sezvakamboitwa nevaimbova mutungamiri weSouth Africa, VaThabo Mbeki, pakazoumbwa hurumende yemubatanidzwa kubva muna 2009 kusvika 2013. Asi VaChamisa vanoti havasi kuda hurumende yemubatanidzwa asi kuti nhaurirano dzekuunza hutongo hwejekerere munyika uye kuti paitwe sarudzo dzakachena. VaMnangagwa vanoti nhaurirano hadzidi mutongigava kuti apindire vachiti ngadziitwe pasi pePolitical Actors Dialogue, Polad, iyo ine mapato madiki akawanda anopikisa akakwikwidza musarudzo dza 2018. Mutevedzeri wemunyori wezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika muMDC, VaDouglas Mwonzora, vanoti mutongigava akakosha nekuti VaMnangagwa havangaite mutongi uye muchuchisi panyaya iyi. Asi munyori wezvemitemo muZanu-PF, VaMunyaradzi Paul Mangwana, vanoti hapadiwe mutongigava sezvo paine gungano rePolad rakaumbwa munyika kuitira kuti riitirwe nhaurirano dzose dzemunyika. No media source currently available
title: Nyaya yeMutongigava Younza Mutauro Pakati peMDC neZanu-PF

text: Vedzisvondo pamwe nevemasangano anoshanda akazvimirira nhasi vaita munamato wekunamatira zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kuSouth Africa zviri pakati kushungurudzwa nevagari venyika iyi. No media source currently available Vanhu vanodarika mazana mashanu vanosanganira machechi akasiyana-siyana pamwe nevemasangano anoshanda akazvimirira vaungana neChitatu paTrinity Methodist Church mu Harare pavaita munamato wekunamatira zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kuSouth Africa uko kuri kudzingwa zvizvarwa zvedzimwe nyika nezvizvarwa zvenyika iyi. Vachitaura pamunamato uyu, mutungamiri weZimbabwe Council Churches, Va Ishmael Mukwanda, vati zviri kuitika kuSouth Africa zvinhu zviri kurwadza vedzisvondo zvikuru. Vataura vakamirira masangano anoshanda akazvimirira uye vachishanda nesangano re Zimbabwe Students Christian Movement, Va Douglas Mudereki, vati chiri kuvarwadza ndechekuti pane zviuru nezviuru zvezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri muzvikoro zvekuSouth Africa zvichatadziswa nebongozozo riri kuitwa nezvizvarwa zveSouth Africa. Vati kutumira masoja nemapurisa kunzvimbo dziri kuitwa bongozozo kuri kuitwa nehurumende ye South Africa hakuna zvakunobatsira kana hurumende yaVa Jacob Zuma isina kutsvaga nzira dzekupedza nyaya yekurwiswa kwezvizvarwa zvedzimwe nyika mu South Africa. Vanhuvazhinji vanonzi vakakuvara vamwe vakafa mumhirizhonga iri kukonzerwa nezvizvarwa zveSouth Africa izvo zviri kuti vanobva kune dzimwe nyika vanofanira kubuda munyika mavo vachivapomera mhosva yekuvapedzera mabasa. Zvichakadai, hurumende yakatumira mabhazi pamuganhu weSouth Africa ne Zimbabwe ku Beitbridge kunotuta zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvakatiza kushungurudzwa uku uko kuri kudaidzwa kuti xenophobia. Va Mudereki vakurudzirawo kuti vedzisvondo vabatsire vanhu ava pamweya pamwe nekutaura navo kuti pfungwa dzavo dzigadzikane zvichitevera mhirizhonga yavakasangana nayo ku South Africa. Zvichakadai, mutungamiri we Evangelical Fellowship of Zimbabwe, Va Shingi Munyeza, vakurudzira mutungamiri wenyika, Va Robert Mugabe, nehurumende yavo kuti igadzirise kusamira zvakanaka kwakaita hupfumi munyika nechimbichimbi vachiti ndizvo zviri kukonzera kuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvibatwe senhapwa kune dzimwe dzakaita seSouth Africa. Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvizhinji zvakatizira kuSouth Africa pakatanga kuita zvinhu manyama amire nerongo munyika zvichinotsvaga maufuro manyoro. Gurukota rezvemari, Va Patrick Chinamasa, vaudza Studio7 parunhare kuti hurumende yeZimbabwe iri kuedza nepose painogona napo kuti ivandudze hupfumi hwenyika kuburikidza nechirongwa chayo chekuvandudza che Zimbabwe Agenda for Sustainable Socio-Economic Transformation kana kuti Zimasset. Va Munyeza vakurudzirawo Va Mugabe avo vanove sachigaro wesangano remubatanidzwa wenyika dziri kuchamhembe kweAfrica, SADC, pamwe chete ne African Union, kuti vashandise zvigaro zvavo izvi kupedza matambudziko ari mu Africa kuitira kuti nyika dziri muAfrica dzive nerunyararo pamwe nehupfumi hwakasimba. Kunyange hazvo Va Munyeza vaita kurudziro iyi, Va Mugabe vakabuda munyika vachienda ku Indonesia kwavari kupinda musangano we Non Aligned Movement pamwe newe Asia Africa Summit izvo zvakashorwa neveruzhinji pamwe nedzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika avo vanoti Va Mugabe vaifanira kuenda ku South Africa kuti vanobatsirana naVa Zuma kupedza nyaya yemhirizhonga iyi. Nekune rumwe rutivi, Va Zuma havana kuenda kumisangano iyi vachiti vari kuda kuedza kugadzirisa nyaya ye xenophobia kunyange hazvo mutungamiri werimwe remapato anopikisa mu South Africa, re Economic Freedom Fighters, Va Julius Malema, vari kupomera Va Zuma mhosva yekukonzera xenophobia mu South Africa. Va Malema vanoti Va Zuma munhu anoda zvemhirizhonga saka nokudaro vane ruwoko munyaya ye xenophobia iri kuitika mu South Africa mazuvano. Va Zuma havasati vapindura zvakataurwa naVa Malema muparamende ye South Africa izvi uye hatina kukwanisa kutaura naVa Mac Maharaj vanove mutauriri waVa Zuma.
title: Machechi neMasangano Vonamatira Runyararo muSouth Africa

text: Misika yefodya yavhura nhasi mitengo iri pasi izvo zvisina kufadza varimi vakawanda avo vazivisa kuti vave kumbomira kutengesa fodya yavo kudzamara mitengo yasvika pari nani. Mwaka wekutengesa fodya waparurwa nhasi nemumwe mutevedzeri wemutungamiriri wenyika, VaKembo Mohadi pamusika weTobacco Sales Floor, apo mutengo wepamusoro wange uri madhora mana nemasenzi makumi mashanu pakirogiramu mutengo wepasi uri pamasenzi makumi maviri pakirogiramu. Mitengo iyi haina kufadza varimi vakawanda avo vati kana mitengo iyi ikasawedzera varimi vakawanda vanogona kutadza kurima fodya. VaCosta Kapudza vekuMvurwi, vaudza Studio 7 kuti mitengo yanhasi inoita kuti varege kurima fodya zvachose. VaKapfudza vanoti vambomira kutengesa fodya yavo uye vave kunoitengesa pamukoto. Vamwewo vasina kufara nemitengo yefodya ndiIshe Musarurwa vekuMashonaland East avo vati vambomirawo kutengesa fodya yavo. Varimi havasi kufarawo nenyaya yekuti kunyange hazvo fodya yavo ichitengeswa kunze kwenyika ivo havasi kuzoiphwa mari yavo yese ari madhora ekuAmerica. Pasi pechibvumirano chakaitwa neReserve Bank of Zimbabwe nekambani yeTobacco Industries Marketing Board, varimi vachipihwa zvikamu makumi mashanu kubva muzana zvemari yavanenge vatengesa ari maRTGS uye zvimwe zvikamu makumi mashanu zviri madhora ekuAmerica. Asi varimi vakaita saAmai Margret Dhambeni vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanoda mari yavo yese ari madhora ekuAmerica. Vatiwo vakatenga zvekurimisa vachishandisa mari yekunze uye nekudaro vanoda kubhadharwawo nemari yekunze. VaKapfudza vati vanotsigira vamwe vavo vari kuti vapihwe mari yavo yese ari madhora ekuAmerica sezvo iri iyo yavakashandisa kutenga zvekurimisa.  Sachigaro weTIMB, Amai Monica Chinamasa, vati mitengo yakaderera sezvo vanotenga fodya kana kuti maTobacco Merchants vari kuchajwa mutero we Intermediated Transaction Tax wezvikamu zviviri kubva muzana apo vanotenga fodya nekubhadhara varimi. Vati pane nhaurirano dziri kuitwa pakati pavo, nevatongesa fodya nehurumende dzekugadzirisa nyaya iyi uye vanoona sekuti izvi zvinogona kupedza dambudziko remitengo iri pasi iri. Amai Chinamasa vazivisa kuti mwaka uno wange wakaoma chose sezvo kwakapisa zvakanyanya uyewo vati vamwe varimi kuManicaland vakaparadzirwa fodya yavo nedutumupengo Cyclone Idai. Vati kusvika parizvino havasati vave kuziva kuti ifodya yakawanda zvakadii yakaparadzwa nedutumupengo Idai. Zimbabwe inotarisirwa kutengesa mamiriyoni mazana maviri nemakumi mana (240million kgs) emakirogiramu efodya inove fodya shoma pane yakatengeswa mwaka wapfuura. Gore rapfuura Zimbabwe yakatengesa mamiriyoni mazana maviri nemakumi mashanu nemaviri emakirogiramu (252million) efodya ikawana mari ingangosvika bhiriyoni remadhora ekuAmerica. Vachivhura misika yefodya zviri pamutemo, VaMohadi vati hurumende yavo inotsigira varimi vefodya uye vati inoda kuti varimi ava vabatwe zvakanaka sezvo fodya ichipinza mari yekunze yakawanda munyika. Pane misika mitatu yefodya munyika inoti Tobacco Sales Floor, Boka nePremier uye misika yese iyi iri muHarare. Kunze kwezvicherwa zvakabatanidzwa, fodya ndiyo inopinza mari yekunze yakawanda kudarika zvimwe zvose muZimbabwe. No media source currently available
title: Misika yeFodya Yovhurwa Varimi Vachichema neMutengo

text: Mhuri yeZimbabwe nemusi weChina iri kupemberera makore makumi matatu nemapfumbamwe yawana kuzvitonga kubva kuBritain, asi vamwe vanoti hapana chikuru chekupemberera sezvo vanhu vasati vawana rusununguko mune zveupfumi. Rimwe gamba rehondo yerusununguko, VaBernard Manyadza, avo vaizivikanwa nerekuti Parker Chipoyera munguva yehondo yeChimurenga, vanoti vana veZimbabwe vachiri kurwisana nehondo yekuti vabude muhurombo hwavanoti hwakakonzerwa nehuwori pamwe nekutadza kutonga hwehurumende yeZanu PF kwemakore akawanda. VaManyadza, avo vaivewo mumwe wevakuru vemauto eZanu, eZanla, vanoti hurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa haina zvayati yaitira vanhu zvinovaburitsa mumatambudziko ezvehupfumi pamwe nezvematongerwo enyika avanoti akasiiwa nehurumende yaVaRobert Mugabe, avo vakabviswa pahutongi nemauto muna Mbudzi 2017. Vanoti hurumende iripo iye zvino hainganzi ihurumende itsva sezvo vatungamiri vose vaivepo munguva yaVaMugabe, vachiti chakangoshanduka chete zviso zviri pachigaro. VaManyadza vanoti chinofanirwa kuitwa hurwiswa kwehuwori pamwe nekutorera matanho avo vari kuwondomora hupfumi hwenyika vachidya voga ruzhinjni rwuchinonga svosve nemuromo. No media source currently available
title: Nyika Yopemberera Kuzvitonga Vamwe Vachiti Ichiri muHunhapwa Mune zveUpfumi

text: Vanhu vanga vachiratidzira mukati meguta rePretoria muSouth Africa neChitatu, vapedzisira vorwisana nemapurisa mushure mekunge vanhu ava vatanga kupaza zvitoro vachitora zvinhu pamwe nekupisa zvimwe zvitoro. Kurwisana uku kunotevera mhirizhonga inonzi yakatanga neChipiri pakati pevatyairi vemichovha nevamwe vanonzi vari kutengesa zvinodhaka munzvimbo dzinokwirirwa michovha iyi. Vemichovha ava vanonzi vari kupomera vekune dzimwe nyika vari muguta rePretoria mhosva yekutengesa zvinodhaka, zvikuru rudzi rwunonzi nyaope. Kurwisana neChipiri uku kunonzi kwakasiya mutyairi wemuchovha mumwe chete afa zvichifungidzirwa kuti angadai akapfurwa nevanoita zvekutengesa zvinodhaka ava. Sachigaro wesangano reZimbabwe Exiles Forum, Advocate Gabriel Shumba, avo vari muPretoria makare, vanoti izvi ndizvo zvaita kuti vemichovha vashandise mabhazi avo kuvhara migwagwa mukati meguta. Advocate Shumba vanoti mapurisa azokwanisa kudzikamisa mhirizhonga iyi mushure mekushandisa hutsi hunokachidza pamwe chete nemabara erhabha ayo asingauraye, asi vachiti muguta manga muchakazara hutsi. Vanoti mhirizhonga iyi yakanganisa zvikuru hupenyu hwezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvakawanda zvinoshandira mukati meguta, izvo zvatadza kuenda kumabasa, sezvo manga musisatsikiki. No media source currently available
title: Mhirizhonga Mukati meGuta rePretoria Yokanganisa Zvizvarwa zveKunze

text: Central Committee yebato reZanu PF iri kutarisirwa kusangana neChishanu kuti itambire kana kuramba kurudziro yePolitburo yekuti bumbiro rebato rivandudzwe kuitira kuti mutungamiri webato iri, VaRobert Mugabe, vapiwe ivo masimba ekudoma vatevedzeri vavo vari vaviri pamwe nasachigaro webato. Politburo, iyo yakasangana nemusi weChina, inonzi yakatambirawo zvakabuda musarudzo dzekutsvaga nhengo dzichange dziri muCentral Committee. Sarudzo idzi, idzo dzinonzi nevakawanda hadzina kuitwa nenzira kwayo, dzakasiyawo vamwe vaive mukomiti iyi vasina kudomwa kana kurambwa nevanhu, vachipomerwa mhosva yekutsigira mutevedzeri wemutungamiri webato iri uye nyika, Amai Joice Mujuru. Amai Mujuru vari kupomerwa mhosva yekuda kubvisa VaMugabe pachigaro nechisimba. Zanu PF iri kutarisirwa kuita kongiresi yayo muHarare svondo rinouya, apo VaMugabe vari kutarisirwa kudoma vavachazoshanda navo kusvika musarudzo dzemuna 2018. Izvi vachazviita kana Central Committee vabvuma kuti mitemo yebato ivandudzwe. Nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika, uye vachishanda vakazvimirira, VaCharles Mangongera, vanoti nemamiriro akaita zvinhu muZanu PF, havaoni Central Committee ichiramba kutambira zvakasungwa nePolitburo. VaMangongera vanoti nhengo dzeCentral Committee dzakatotyisidzirwa kare zvichitevera sarudzo dzakaitwa mumatunhu, idzo dzakaona vazhinji vachisiiwa kana kurambwa. No media source currently available
title: Zanu PF Central Committee Yozeya neChishanu Kuvandudzwa kweBumbiro reBato

text: Varidzi vedzimotokari muguta reMutare vari kunyunyuta zvikuru nezviri kuitwa nebazi rehurumende reZimbabwe National Road Authority, ZINARA rekushanyira mudzimba dzevanhu mumagaraji munopakwa motokari vachibhadharisa vanhu mari dzemitero yemotokari. Svondo rino, Zinara yakamuka chibhebhenenga muguta reMutare ichitsvaga vanhu vane motokari dzisina mitero. Mugari wemaMutare VaElisha Musabayana vanoti zviri kuitwa neZInara zvinoodza moyo sezvo vange vave kungobhadharisa chero motokari dzisiri kufamba. “Ini ndinofunga kuti zvirikuitwa neveZINARA izvi hazvina kunaka nekuti kufamba kwavari kuita vachitarisa mota dzakapakwa mudzimba dzine mitero iri behind asi dzimwe dzacho dzakatofa asi vari kungoti bhadharai bhadharai inini hangu ndinoti tarwadziwa sevanhu vemuZimbabwe hatina mare, vanhu vose varwadziwa,” VaMusabayana vanodaro Mumwe mutyairi VaWalter Murisi vashorawo zviri kuitwa neZinara. “Zvimwe zvacho zviri kuitwa hazvisi normal nekuti varikuti vanoda kuteresa nyangwe motokari iri pamapuwe kuti tiri kuda mutero zvingaita here nhai vakuru. Dzimwe mota dzinenge dzakatopaka nekuti pamwe dzinenge dzakatonoka kana kuti dzinenge dzakatofa. Apa yonzi ngaibhadhare mutero apa inenge yakamira saka tikanga takazvitarisa kutoshungurudza vanhu nekuti mumwe anenge akatoitenga yakafa achida kuti awane pekutangira. Tavakufunga kuti dzimwe nguva mari idzi dzimwe dzatove dzavo dzemuhomwe.” Vanodaro VaMurisi VaMurisi vanoti dzimwe motokari dziri kunzi dzitere ndedzekare kare zvavanoona zvisina kutwasuka. “Dzimwe mota dziri kunzi dzitere dine maOld number plates of which mota yacho yakafa. Saka senyika uye hurumende tinoshaya kuti vanozviona seyi nekuita kwakadai.”VaMurisa vakaudza Studio 7. Muzvina garaji kuno kwaMutare VaEdwin Sigauke vanoti kuita kweZinara kwava kutsvaga uta nemugate chaiko. “Kana ndisina mare handiti handikwanisi kuti ndinde kunoterera mota yangu handiti saka ndinopaka pamba handiti saka zvino ndinouya kuteverwa ndotorerwa mota yangu pamba pacho it doesn’t make sense.” Vakaenderera mberi vachiti, “Asi kana kuri kuti vakandibata ndiri paroad zvinonzwisisika its fine. Asi kuti ndakapaka pamba hazvibatsiri kuti ndibvise mutero nekuti mare yacho handina, sekuti iyi iri apa yave nethree months yakapaka haifaniri kubvisiswa mutero because it is not fair. Pamusoro pezvo vanodazve mare yekuidhonza ini ndisina mare yemutero.” VeZinara vanonzi vari kudhonzawo motokari dzisina mitero kubva mudzimba asi vachibhadharisa madhora makumi masere pamusoro pezvo vozobhadharisa madhora gumi pazuva pavanenge vakachengeta motokari idzi. Mumwe mushandi wekuZinara uyo aramba kudoomwa nezita rake sezvo asingatenderwi kutaura nevatori venhau audza Studio 7 nhasi kuti akaudzwa kuita izvi nevekubazi rinoona nezvekutakurwa kwezvinhu. Mushandi uyu anoti vane motokari dzinenge dzakafa vanosungirwa kunotsvaga matsamba anonzi eExemption yekubvisa mutero wemotokari kumahofisi eVehicle Inspectorate Department kana kuti VID.
