No media source currently available
title: ZINARA Yofamba Mudzimba Ichimanikidza Vanhu kuBhadhara Mitero yeMotokari

text: Zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri muBritain zvinoti zviri kuronga kuungana pamuzinda weZimbabwe uri muLondon neMugovera zvichiratidzira kunyunyuta kwazvo kupambwa kunonzi kwakaitwa vakafanobata chigaro chemutungamiri weZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association, Dr. Peter Magombeyi, nevanhu vasingazivikanwe kuti ndivanani. Dr. Magombeyi vakapambwa nemusi weMugovera wapfuura munguva dzemanheru, asi vakakwanisa kutumira mashoko vachiti vainge vapambwa nevarume vatatu vainge vakavhara zviso zvavo. Mumwe wevari kuronga kuratidzira uku, uye vari nhengo yeMDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa, Amai Chenai Mutambasere, vanoti vari kukoka zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvese zvisineyi nekuti ndezvemapato api ezvematongerwo enyika kuitira kuti zvipindewo mukuratidzira uku kana Dr. Magombeyi vasina kunge vawanikwa panosvika Mugovera. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi reZanu PF mudunhu reunited Kingdom and Ireland. Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika zviri kurongawo kuratidzira kumuzinda weUnited Nations kuNew York uko kuri kuitirwa musangano wepagore weUnited Nations General Assembly. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vachange vari kumusangano uyu uko vachasangana nevamwe vatungamiri venyika dziri muUnited Nations. Kupambwa kwaDr. Magombeyi kunoitika panguva iyo nhumwa yeUnited Nations munyaya dzekodzero, VaClement Voule, vari kushanya muZimbabwe kwemazuva gumi. VaVoule vachaita misangano nehurumende, masangano epasi rose, masangano anorwira kodzero dzevanhu muZimbabwe, mapato ezvematongerwo pamwe nevose vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu. Chinangwa chaVaVoule ndechekuona mamiriro akaita zvinhu munyaya dzekodzero pamwe nekutevedzwa kwemitemo yenyika. No media source currently available
title: Kuratidzira Korongwa Kuitwa muLondon ne New York

text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vari kushorwa nevakawanda mushure mekunge vaudza komiti yepamusorosoro mubato ravo reZanu PF kuti vakakomberedzwa nemakoronyera muhofisi mavo. Vachitaura pamusangano wekomiti yepamusorosoro mubato ravo yeCentral Committee wakaitirwa pamuzinda weZanu PF neChitatu, VaMnangagwa vakati vakakomberedzwa nematsotsi muhofisi mavo ari kuita zvehuori. VaMnangagwa vakati pane vanhu vari muhofisi mavo vavasina kudoma nemazita vavakati vari kubhadharisa vanhu mari dzechiokomuhomwe kuti vemabhizimusi vanenge vachida kusangana navo vavaone. Asi mumwe mugari wemuHarare, Muzvare Sekai Chirundazi, vanoti VaMnangagwa vanofanira kuona kuti vanhu vakadai vasungwa kana vakamira pachokwadi semutungamiri wenyika panyaya yekurwisa nehuori. Mumwe wevatevedzeri vemutungamiri weMDC yaVaNelson Chamisa, VaMorgan Komichi, vaudza Studio 7 kuti zviri kuitika izvi zvinoratidza kuti hove inotangira kuora kumusoro. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika uye vachishanda nesangano reHuman Rights Watch kuchemnehembe kweAfrica, VaDewa Mavhinga, vanoti mashoko aVaMnangagwa aya anoratidza kuti nyika yakapambwa. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nemutauriri waVaMnangagwa, VaGeorge Charamba, kuti tinzwe kuti matanho achatorwa naVaMnangagwa panyaya iyi ndeapi. Vaimbova mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vakabviswa pachigaro nemasoja zvechisimba masoja achiti paive nematsotsi akange akavakomberedza zvakazopedzisira zvaita kuti VaMnangagwa vatore matomhu kubva kuna VaMugabe. No media source currently available
title: VaMnangagwa Voshorerwa Mashoko Avakati "Vakakomberedzwa neMatsotsi"

text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzematongerwo enyika dziri kutambira nenzira dzakasiyana siyana danho rakatorwa nebato riri kutonga muSouth Africa, reAfrican National Congress rekutuma nhumwa dzaro kuZimbabwe kunotsvaga nzira dzekugadzirisa matambudziko ari munyika iyi. Izvi zvinotevera mashoko aziviswa nemutungamiri weSouth Africa, VaCyril Ramaphosa, mushure memusangano mukuru webato ravo wakaitwa neMuvhuro, uyo wakabuda nechisungo chekuti bato ravo ribatsire muhurukuro dzekutsvaga runyararo muZimbabwe. VaRamaphosa vaudzawo vatori venhau kuti bato ravo reANC rakawirirana kuti paitwe nhaurirano pakati peZanu PF neANC senzira yekutsvaga nzira dzekubatsira kugadzirisa matambudziko akatarisana neZimbabwe, uye ANC ichataurawo nemamwe masangano ari muZimbabwe. Asi imwe nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika, VaMasimba Kuchera, vati havaoni hurukuro idzi dzichifamba zvakanaka sezvinotarisirwa neveruzhinji muZimbabwe kana mapato ari kutonga muSouth Africa neZimbabwe kana ari iwo ari kuiswa pamberi penhaurirano idzi. VaKuchera vati bato reZanuPF rinofanira kutanga rabvuma kuti munyika mune matambudziko anoda kugadziriswa kwete naiyo chete, asi kuti nemamwe mapato anoipikisa pamwe nemasangano akazvimirira ari munyika. Imwe nyanzvi inodzidzisa paTswane University of Technology, VaRick Mukonza, vatiwo havaone hurukuro idzi dzichibudirira kana dzisingaise pamberi zvido zvemapato anopikisa muZimbabwe . Chipangamazano musangano re Political Economy of South Africa, VaGedion Chitanga, vatiwo kana dambudziko riri muZimbabwe risina kugadziriswa nekuchimbidza, zvichaita kuti vanhu vakawanda vemuZimbabwe varambe vachitsvaga hupoteri muSouth Africa, nedzimwe nyika dzakapoteredza nyika iyi. Asi mutauriri weZanu PF muSouth Africa,VaKennedy Mandaza, vati ichokwadi kuti Zimbabwe ine matambudziko, naizvozvo yakazvipira kuita hurukuro nemunhu wese. Asi VaMandaza varamba mashoko ekuti hurumende yeZanu PF iri kutyora kodzero dzevanhu munyika. Mwedzi wapera, Va Ramaphosa vakatumira nhumwa nhatu kuZimbabwe dzinoti VaSydney Mufamadi, Amai Baleka Mbete naVa Ngoako Ramatlhodi, idzo dzakasangana chete nehurumende yaVaMnangagwa, dzikadzokera kuSouth Africa dzisina kuita hurukuro nevatungamiriri vemapato anopikisa hurumende, kusanganisirawo masangano akazvimirira.
title: ANC Yotumira Nhumwa kuZimbabwe Kunotaura neZanu PF Pamwe neMamwe Mapato

text: Vana mukoti vari kuramwa mabasa vaungana neChishanu muAfrica Unity Square muHarare vachipa ruzivo kune veruzhinji munyaya dzehutano asiwo vachitsidza kuti havasi kuzodzokera kuzvipatara zvehurumende kana zvichemo zvavo zvisina kugadziriswa. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa musangano rinomiririra vakoti reZimbabwe Nurses Association (ZINA), VaEdwin Nhema, vati vanamukoti havasi kuzovhundutsirwa nekudzingwa mabasa sezvakataurwa nehurumende. VaNhema vati hurumende haisi kukoshesa hutano hweveruzhinji kana vachida kutora vana mukoti vange vave pamudyandigere vachivapinza basa. VaNhema vati vanamukoti ava vakura zvekubata basa nemazvo. Mumwe mukoti, VaHilliary Tapiwa Mboko, vaudza Studio7 kuti vana mukoti vari kurararama hupenyu hunorwadza nekusiririsa zuva nezuva. VaMboko vati varikuda kuti hurumende ivapewo mari inoenzana neinopihwa vamwe vana mukoti munyika dzirimudunhu reAfrica. Nyamukuta Tsitsi Darare vatiwo mashoko ari kutaurwa nehurumende ekuti kuramwa mabasa kwavo kune chekuita nezvematongerwo enyika handizvo. Nyamukuta Darare vati vanongoda kukosheswa nekupiwa zvikwanisiro zvekuti vaite basa ravo nemazvo. Mumwezve nyamukuta, Amai Hamu Chipinduko, vati sezvo vachipiwa mari yavo iri mabhondi, inenge yakadereresa zvakanyanya sezvo mitengo yezvinhu yakasiyana nekuti urikushandisa mari ipi. Amai Chipinduko vatiwo havana musiyano wavari kuona pakati pehurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa neyavaimbove mutungamiriri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe. Sangano reZINA raudzawo nhengo dzaro kuti vachiri muhurukuro nehurumende uye vavimbiswa kuti hakuna achadzingwa basa nekuda kwekuramwa mabasa uku. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rehurumende nekuda kwenharembozha dzanga dzisiri kudairwa. MuAfrica Unity Square maiswawo makadhibhokisi ekuti vane zvinyunyuto panyaya yana mukoti vanyorere kuhurumende. No media source currently available
title: Vana Mukoti Voungana muAfrica Unity Square Vachibatsira Veruzhinji

text: Mutori nhau, Hopewell Chin’ono, achamira kusvika nemusi weChitatu svondo rinouya kuti anzwe kuti dare richapa mutongo upi pachikumbiro chake chekuti dare ramajisitireti rirase nyaya yaari kupomerwa. Chin’ono ari kupomerewa mhosva yekuburitsa mashoko emanyepo pandemutande rake reTwitter, inova nyaya yakaraswa nedare repamusoro. Asi yakadzoka mudare mushure mekunge muchuhusi mukuru wenyika, VaKumbirai Hodzi, vapikisa mutongo weHigh Court. Nyaya iyi yatadza kunzwikwa mudare nhasi mushure mekunge mutongi wenyaya iyi, Amai Vongai Muchuchuti Guvuriro, avo vainge vatara zuva ranhasi kuti vape mutongo panyaya iyi, vatadza kuuya kudare vamwe vavo vachiti vange vakabatikana nerimwe basa. Zvichakadai, magweta aChin’ono anosanganisira, VaMtisi, Amai Beatrice Mtetwa, VaDoug Coltart nevamwe vange vauya kunzonzwa nyaya iyi mumiriri weZengeza West muNational Assembly, VaJob Sikhala, vavhiringidzwa nemapurisa panze padare vachirambidzwa kutaura nevatori venhau pamberi pedare iri. VaMtisi varatidzawo kusafara nekuita kwemapurisa nhasi. VaSikhala avo vanovewo gweta, vashorawo kuita kwemapurisa uku. Hatina kunzwa divi revakuru vepamatare ekuRotten Row kuti sei mapurisa atora matanho aatora, kanawo kumutaruri wemapurisa, VaPaul Nyathi. Asi mumwe mushandi wepamatare aya ati kutanga svondo rino magweta anobvumidzwa kutaura nevatoriu venhau kunze kwedare kana kunzvimbo dzavanopaka motokari dzavo kwete pamberiu pedare. Mutauriri wesangano remagweta anomirira kodzero dzevanhu, reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights, VaKumbirai Mafunda, vaudza Studio 7 kuti magweta ane kodzero yekutsanangurira vatori venhau neveruzhinji zvinenge zvaitika mudare. Mune imwewo nyaya yange iri mudare nhasi, kutongwa kwenyaya yemudzidzi wepaUniversity of Zimbabwe, Allan Moyo,uyo ari kupomerwa mhosva yekukurudzira veruzhinji kubvisa hurumende nechisimba pamwe nemumwe wechidiki weMDC Alliance, Makomborero Haruzivishe, kwatadza kutanga nhasi sezvo vachuchusi vange vasati vagadzirira. Nyaya yave kutarisira kunzikwa mangwana. No media source currently available
title: Zuva Rekuti Dare Ripe Mutongo Waro paNyaya yaChin'ono Rinosvika, Asi Mutongi weDare Anoshaikwa Mudare

text: Mamwe madzimai akazvitakura anoti ari kumanikidzwa kubatsirwa naana nyamukuta sezvo asina mari dzinodiwa kuti atange abhadhara kumakiriniki. Madzimai akawanda anogara mumakomboni emapurazi ari pedyo neTynwald North, anoti kana achinge aita pamuviri, ari kubatsirwa naana nyamukuta pakusununguka sezvo asina mari dzinodiwa kumakiriniki ari pedyo. Mumwe wemadzimai aya, Amai Nyarai Mugava, vanoti makiriniki ave kuvadhurira uye mari yeamburenzi yakakwira zvakare zvokuti vazhinji vavo vanopedzisira vabatsirwa vari kudzimba dzavo. Amai Mugava vanoti vakasunungukira mwana wavo pamusika wemuTynwald North, uko vakabatsirwa nemamwe madzimai emunharaunda mwedzi miviri yapfuura. Asi vanoti vakazovaendesa kukiriniki yekuDziresekwa kuti vanonyoresa gwaro rokuti vazokwanisa kupiwa gwaro rekuberekwa kwemwana wavo. Gogo Tenesi Mauzhenti, avo vanogara papurazi riri pedyo nekuDzivaresekwa Extension, vanotiwo kunyange hazvo hurumende iri kukurudzira kuti madzimai abatsirwe kumakiriniki, madzimai mazhinji, vanhu vanotambura vasingakwanise kubhadhara mari dzinenge dzichidiwa. Mbuya Elizabeth Zisengwe, avo vanogara kuCaledonia Farm, vanoti vari kusunungutsa madzimai akawanda anenge asina mari yokbhadhara kumakiriniki. Mbuya Zisengwe vanoti vanosangana nemadzimai akawanda anongoerekana ave kurwadziwa nenhumbu zvokuti vanotozoshandisa mapepa echingwa chaiwo nokuti vanenge vasina kutakura zvishandiso zvekusunungutsa vakazvitakura. Mutevedzeri wemukuru noona nezvezvirwere zvisingatapuriranwe mubazi rehutano, Dr Justice Mudavanhu, vanoti zvakakosha kuti vana nyamukuta vanyorese zviri pamutemo, kuitira kuti vashande basa ravo zvakanaka, pamwe nekupihwawo zvidzidzo nebazi rezvehutano. Dr Mudavanhu vanoti ichokwadi kuti vanhu vakawanda havachakwanisi kubhadhara mari kumakiriniki nekuzvipatara zvisiri zvehurumende nepamusana pekuoma kwaita zvinhu munyaya dzehupfumi. Kanzuru yeHarare yakakwidza mibhadharo yokurapwa kumakiriki ayo zvokuti vana amai vakazvitakura vanofanira kubhadhara mari yekunyoresa inoita zana nemakumi maviri emadhora emunyika, inova mari yakawanda kumadzimai akawanda anotambura. Mumiriri wekomiti yehutano muparamende, Dr Ruth Labode, vanoti mamiriro ezvehupfumi hwenyika ari kuvhiringidza zvinhu zvakawanda, kusanganisirawo madzimai anenge akazvitakura. Sangano reWorld Health Organisation rinoti madzimai anodarika zviuru zvitatu vanofa pagore munyika nokuti vazhinji vavo havaende kunoongororwa hutano hwavo kana vakazvitakura. No media source currently available
title: Mamwe Madzimai Osunungukira Kudzimba neKushaya Mari

text: Vanhu vakawanda vari kushora zvikuru sangano reSADC vachiti harifanirwi kupindira pagakava remuZimbabwe sezvo munyika muine runyararo. Mashoko aya anotevera zvakabuda pamusangano wechimbi chimbi wakaitwa neSADC Troika muBotswana nemusi weChina. Musangano uyu wakati SADC inofanirwa kudaidzira musangano mukuru wevatungamiri venyika idzi kuti vazeye dambudziko remuZimbabwe. Mutungamiri weBotswana, Va Ian Khama, vaudza vatori venhau kuti VaMugabe ngavachibva pachigaro nekuti vagarisa. Asi nyanzvi yezvematongerwo enyika inovanodzidzisa paAmherst College muAmerica, Doctor Chipo Dendere, vanoti hapana chakaipa kuti SADC ipindire. No media source currently available
title: Vakawanda Vanoti SADC Haifanirwe Kupindira Pane Zviri Kuitika muZimbabwe

text:
Komiti yeparamende inoona nezvekutongwa kwematunhu, iyo inotungamirwa naChief Ngungumbane, yakasangana nemakanzura pamwe nevakuru vakuru vekanzuru muBulawayo neMuvhuro, kuti inzwisise nezvedambudziko remvura ranetsa muguta reBulawayo.

Nekuda kwekushomeka kwemvura kanzuru iri kukwanisa kupa vagari mvura kamwe chete pasvondo, uye pane vanhu gumi nevatatu vafa kusvika pari zvino nekuda kwechirwere chemudumbu.

Kanzuru inoti inoda mari inosvika mamiriyoni makumi manomwe nemanomwe emadhora ekuAmerica kuti igadzirise dambudziko remvura. Asi bazi rekutongwa kwematunhu rinoti panodiwa mamiriyoni masere chete emadhora ekuAmerica.

Vachipindura mubvunzo wekuti sei pane musiyano wakadai, vakuru vekanzuru vakaudza komiti iyi kuti mari inodiwa ndeyehurongwa hunogona kugadzirisa dambudziko remvura kwenguva refu, kwete zvekungogadzirisa kwechinguva chidiki.

Imwe nhengo yekomiti iyi, VaBramwell Bushu, vanove mumiriri weShamva South mudare reparamende, vakaudza Studio 7 kuti komiti yavo yakaona zvakakosha kuita musangano uyu, mushure mekunge vasangana negurukota rezvekutongwa kwematunhu, VaJuly Moyo, munguva pfupi yapfuura, kuti vanzwe zviri kuitwa nehurumende pamusoro pedambudziko riri muBulawayo. VaBushu vakati dambudziko rekushaikwa kwemvura rinofanirwa kugadziriswa nekukasika.

Mukuru wezvehutano mukanzuru yeguta reBulawayo, Dr Edwin Sibanda, vakaudza komiti iyi kuti ongororo yavo yakaratidza kuti pane zvirwere zviviri zvemudumbu zviripo zvinoti dysentery netyphoid asi havasati vaziva kuti chii chakakonzera zvirwere izvi.

Zvinofungidzirwa kuti pane kusangana kwemvura ine tsvina neyakachena nekuda kwekudhuuka kwemapaipi kunyanya mumusha weLuveve umo muri kunyanya kutekeshera chirwere ichi.

Meya weguta reBulawayo, VaSolomon Mguni, vakaudza Studio7 kuti kanzuru yakatanga chirongwa chekubvisa mapaipi anofambisa mvura esimbi vachitanga nemumusha wemuLuveve asi izvi zvichaitwawo muguta rose.

Nezuro mangwanani meya nemamwe makanzura vakange vashanyira musha weLuveve kuti vaone basa riri kuitwa uye kushanyira mhuri dzevamwe vakafa nechirwere chemudumbu. Kanzuru yakatora danho rekuti vanhu vose vari kurwara nemudumbu varapwe pachena.

Munyori mukuru werimwe remasangano anomoririra vagari, reBulawayo Residents Association, kana kuti BURA,Amai Louisa Mangisi vanoti sangano ravo rinotambira zviri kuitwa nekanzuru mukugadzirisa dambudziko remvura.

Vakambove gurukota rezvehutano muhurumnebde yemubatanidzwa, Dr Henry Madzorera, vanoti pave nenguva yakareba dambudziko rekushaikwa kwemvura muBulawayo riripo uye hurumende inofanirwa kubatsira kugadzirisa dambudziko iri pasati pave nevamwe vanhu vakawanda vanorasikirwa nehupenyu.

Kanzuru yeguta reBulawayo inowana mvura kubva kumadhamu matanhatu ari kunze kweguta asi mamwe emadhamu aya haasisina mvura. Pakurudziro yekuti kanzura inofanirwa kuwana dzimwe nzvimbo dzingawanise gutmvura, kanzuru inoti kunze kwekuwana mvura kubva kuzvibhorani zvekuNyamandlovu Acquifer, inogona kuwanawo mvura nekuchenesa mvura ine tsvina inopinda mudhamu reKhami kuti igokwanisa kushandiswa nevagari.

Kuvepo kwedhamu reGwayi-Shangani kunogona kubatsirawo kupedza dambudziko rekushaikwa kwemvura asi kupera kuvakwa kwaro kuri kutora nguva nekuda kwekuti hurumende inogara ichichema-chema nekushaya mari. No media source currently available
title: Komiti yeParamende Yoshanyira Bulawayo Zvichitevera Dambudziko reMvura

text: Zvikonzi zvedare redzimhosva zvaenda kumba kwemutungamiri weMDC, Va Morgan Tsvangirai, pamwe nekumahofisi ebato iri zvichida kutora midziyo zvichitevera nyaya yakakwidzwa kudare nevamwe vashandi vaimboshandira bato iri, asi zvakakundikana. Zvikonzi izvi zvanga zvakachengetedzwa nemapurisa anga ari mumarori maviri akapakatira zvombo zvafumira kuenda kumba kwaVa Tsvangirai nekumuzinda we MDC-T pa Harvest House zvichida kutora midziyo yaVa Tsvangirai pamwe nebato ravo. Izvi zvinotevera nyaya yakanzwikwa mudare rinotonga nyaya dzevashandi iro rakatura mutongo wekuti Va Toendepi Shonhe nevamwe vashandi gumi nevatanhatu, avo vakadzingwa basa ne MDC-T vaikwanisa kutora midziyo yebato iri kuti vatengese kana vapedzerana mumatare neMDC-T panyaya dzemari yemihoro. Gweta re MDC-T panyaya iyi uye varivo munyori mukuru mubato iri, Va Douglas Mwonzora, vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvaitwa izvi zvanga zvakanangana nekuzvidza Va Tsvangirai nebato ravo sezvo vachiti vakapihwa mutongo wekuti pasawane midziyo yavo inotorwa. Va Tsvangirai vanga vari pamuzinda webato ravo pasvika zvikonzi izvi. Va Mwonzora vati vachakwidza nyaya iyi kumatare zvakare vachichema nerokuti mutongo wedare wekuti midziyo yebato ravo isatorwe naVa Shonhe nevamwe vavo wazvidzwa. Vaenderera mberi vachiti magweta ava kushandiswa naVa Shonhe nevamwe vavo e Consultancy Bureau Services haana kunyoresa kusangano rinowona nezvekunyoreswa kwemagweta munyika re Law Society of Zimbabwe. Gweta rakamirira Va Shonhe nevamwe vavo pakanzwikwa nyaya iyi nedare rinotonga nyaya dzevashandi nevashandirwi, Va Wilson Manase, vati havakwanise kutaura nezvenyaya iyi sezvo vasisiri kumirira Va Shonhe nevamwe vavo. Studio 7 yakundikana kutaura nemagweta e Consultancy Bureau Services kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi. VaShonhe nevamwe ava vakasiya basa ku MDC-T vachienda nechikwata chevaimbova munyori mukuru mu MDC-T, Va Tendai Biti, avo vave neravo bato ravari kudaidza kuti MDC Renewal Team asi vakazoenda kumatare vachiti vanoda kubhadharwa mari dzemihoro neMDC-T kunyange hazvo vanga vasisashandire pa Harvest House izvo zvaipikiswa neMDC-T. Mune imwewo nyaya nyaya ine chekuita nematare, vatungamiri vesangano rinomirira vanotengesa mumigwagwa re National Vendors Union of Zimbabwe, Va Samuel Wadzai, pamwe naVa Stan Zvorwadza, vanyimwa mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso panyaya yekukonzera mhirizhonga kwavanonzi vakaita pamahofisi ekanzuru ye Harare svondo rapera. Mutongi wedare ramejasitiriti, Va Tendai Mahwe, vati Va Wadzai naVa Zvorwadza nevamwe vavo gumi nevana vanogona kukonzeresa mhirizhonga zvakare kana vakapihwa mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso sezvo nyaya yekubviswa kwevanotengesa mumigwagwa nekanzuru ichiri kutsviriridza. Va Zvorwadza naVa Wadzai nevamwe vavakasungwa pamwechete navo vari kuramba mhosva yavari kupomerwa vachiti ivo ndivo vakatorohwa nemapurisa ekanzuru pakatorererwa vanhu vanotengesera mumigwagwa zvinhu zvavo. Va Mahwe vati vasungwa ava vadzoke kudare musi 4 Nyamavhuvhu pachaenderera nyaya yavo mudare iri.
title: Zvikonzi Zvinotadziswa Kutora Midziyo yaVaTsvangirai neBato Ravo

text: Gurukota rinoona nezvekutongwa kwematunhu VaSaviour Kasukuwere vari kuramba kutambira munyori mukuru wekanzuru yeHarare akadomwa nemusi weChina nekanzuru yeHarare. Kanzuru yeHarare yainge yadoma VaJames Mushore vaimbova mukuru webhanga re NMB VaJames Mushore. VaMushore vari kuda kunzi vatsive VaTendai Mahachi avo vakamanikidzwa kuenda pamudyandigere. Meya weguta reHarare VaBernard Manyenyeni vaudza Studio 7 kuti kanzuru ichangopedza kupa VaMushore basa, VaKasukuwere vabva vanyora tsamba vachiti kanzuru yainge yatyora mutemo nekudaro zviitwa vange vasiri kuzvitambira. VaKasukuwere vanonzi vati kanzuru yaifanira kuendesa mazita matatu kuBhodhi rebazi ravo vasati vapa munhu basa. VaManyenyeni vati nekuda kwekuti vanhu vave pazororo reEaster hakuna zvimwe zvinjinji zvavangaite parizvino.
title: VaKasukuwere Voramba Kutambira Munyori Mukuru weGuta reHarare Ange Adomwa neKanzuru

text: Imwe nhengo yesangano revarairidzi vekumaruwa, reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, ARTUZ, Amai Sheila Chisirimunhu, vanove munyori anoona nezvekuyenzaniswa kwemikana pakati pevanhurume nevanhukadzi mudunhu reMasvingo musangano iri, vanoti vari kuronga kuendesa vamwe vakuru muhurumende kuti varipwe. Amai Chisirimunhu vanoti vari kuronga kuendesa kumatare gurukota rezvemukati menyika VaKazembe Kazembe nevamwe vakuru vemapurisa mushure mekunge vasungwa vachiratidzira gore rapera ndokutongerwa kugara mujeri kwemwedzi gumi. Asi mutongo uyu nekuwanikwa kwavo vaine mhosva zvakasendekwa parutivi nedare repamusoro reHigh Court nemusi weChitatu. Amai Chisirimunhu vanoti kusungwa kwavo kwakavashungurudza zvikuru ivo nemhuri yavo. Vakasungwa mushure mekuratidzira pamahofisi edzidzo paMucheke, kuMazsvingo musi wa 22 Chikumi gore rapera vachitsutsumwa nemari dziri kutambiriswa varairidzi. Hatina kukwanisa kubata VaKazembe kuti tinzwe divi ravo sezvo vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. No media source currently available
title: Nhengo yeARTUZ Yoronga Kukwirira kuMatare Gurukota rezveMukati meNyika neMapurisa

text: Masangano anomiririra vemakereke, anosanganisira Zimbabwe Council of Churches neZimbabwe Heads of Christian Denominations, arikurumbidza vanhu zvikuru nekuzvibata kwavakaita pazuva rekuratidzira muHarare vachiti vanhu vakaedza kuzvibata, vachitiza mapurisa pachinhambo chekurwisana navo, kuti pasaita mhirizhonga nekupunzwa kwezvinhu. Mutauriri wemasangano aya, Mufundisi Kenneth Mtata, vaudza Studio 7 kuti masangano aya anoshora mapurisa pamabatiro avakaita vanhu, vachiti mapurisa ndiwo aitorova vanhu asi vanhu vachiedza kutiza kuti pasaita bongozozo. Vati mapurisa aifanirwa kuzivisa vanhu nguva ichipo kuti kuratidzira kwarambidzwa asi havana kubudisa mashoko ekurambidzwa kwekuratidzira kusvika hwave husiku. Asi Mufundisi Mtata vati kunyange hazvo hurumende yakaita izvi pasina svondo mushure memusangano wavakaita naVaChamisa pamusoro penhaurirano naVaMnangagwa, masangano avo haadzokeri shure, vachiti vachaenderera mberi vachitsvaka kubudirira kwemusangano pakati pevaviri ava. No media source currently available
title: Vemakereke Vanoshora Hurumende Vachirumbidza Vanhu Pazuva Rekuratidzira

text: Vamwe vagari vemuChinhoyi pamwe nevezvematongerwo enyika vari kushoropodza Zimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, nekupinza basa vechidiki veZanu PF kuti vashambadzire kunyoresa kuvhota pasi pekomisheni iyi. ZEC, iyo iri pakati pekushambadzira nezvehurongwa hwekunyoresa kuvhota huri kupinda muchikamu chechipiri neSvondo, iri kupomerwa mhosva yekupinza vechidiki veZanu PF basa rekushambadzira chirongwa ichi veruzhinji vachiti havaite basa nemazvo sezvo vaine kwavakarerekera. Vazhinji vataura neStudio7 vanoti havasi kufara nekuona nhengo dzebato reZanu PF dzakapfeka nhumbi dzebasa dzeZEC vachifamba mudzimba vachidzidzisa vagari nezvehurongwa hwekunyoresa kuvhota. VaDanson Mapfumo vanoti vari kushushikana zvikuru nekuona vechidiki veZanu PF vachidzidzisa vagari nezvenyaya yekunyoresa kuvhota vari pasi pebazi reZEC. VaMapfumo vanoti izvi zvinokonzera kuti vasagamuchire dzidziso yavanenge vachipa. Mumwe mugari wemuChinhoyi aramba kudomwa nezita sezvo achityira hupenyu hwake anoti ZEC yakanganisa kutora nhengo dzemapato ezvematongerwo enyika. Mugari uyu anoti ZEC ingadai yakapinza vanhu mabasa nekuda kwemapepa efundo kwete kuti anotsigira bato ripi. Munyori mukuru webato reMDC inotungamirirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai mudunhu reMashonaland West, VaKadewere, vanoti zviri kuitwa neZEC mucherechedzo wekuti ZEC iri kuramba kurumurwa kubva kuZanu PF. VaKadewere vanoti zviri kuita ZEC kukanganisira vanhu vanenge vachida dzidziso yakakwana yavanopakurirwa nevanhu vakadzidzira basa ravo. Asi nhengo yeZanu PF yechidiki, VaBrian Nhokwara, vanoti havashamisike nemashoko ekuda kusvimbisa zita reZEC nemapato anogara achikundwa musarudzo akafanana neMDC. VaNhokwara vanoti munhu wese ane kodzero yekutsigira bato raanoda nekudaro hazvishamise kuti pangaite vanhu vanoshanda kuZEC vanotsigira mapato ose kusanganisira bato reZanu PF. Mukuru weZEC mudunhu reMashonaland West, VaAustin Ndlovu, vanoti vakapinza basa vanhu vakabva mumapazi ehurumende kusanganisira bazi revechidiki sevashandi vehurumende kwete senhengo dzemapato. VaNdlovu vanoti ZEC haipinze basa nhengo dzemapato ezvematongerwo enyika dzine zvinzvimbo mumapato avo. Vashandi veZEC vari kufamba mudzimba mumatunhu madiki eMakonde neZvimba vachiudza vanhu kuti vaende kunonyoresa kuvhota muchikamu chechipiri chekunyoresa icho chiri kutanga neSvondo kusvikira musi wa13 Mbudzi. Mune imwewo nyaya, ZEC yambomisa kuita musangano wayanga yakaronga nemapato wekuzeya matambudziko avakasanga nawo muchikamu chekutanga vachiti wave kuitwa neMuvhuro. Asi VaKadewere vanoti musangano uyu wanga wakanaka zvikuru kuti vagadzirise zvakakanganisika muchikamu chekutanga. VaKadewere vanoti imwe nyaya yavanga vachida kuturira ZEC ndeyekuti ZEC ikwanise kudzokorora kunyoresa munzvimbo dzakarasikirwa nenguva nekuda kwekuti ZEC yakanonoka kutanga chikamu chekutanga mune dzimwe nzvimbo uye dzimwe nzvimbo dzakambogara mazuva dzisinga nyorese kuvhota nekuda kwezvekushandisa zvakanga zvisipo. No media source currently available
title: ZEC Yopa Vechidiki veZanu-PF Mabasa?

text: Mapurisa emuMasvingo nemusi weChishanu akadzivisa vanhu vakaremara kuratidzira kunyangwe hazvo vaimbenge vavapa mvumo. Vanotungamira sangano reDisabled Amalgamated Community Trust kana kuti DACT VaHenry Chivhanga nevamwe vavo vakadaidzwa kukamba yemapurisa yeMasvingo Central vachibva vaudzwa kuti vamire kuratidzira kwavange vakaronga vachitsutsumwa nehutongo hwemutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe. VaChivhanga nevamwe vavo vabva vachengetedzwa nemapurisa. Imwe nhengo yeDACT VaCover Mugwadhi vati vashushikana nezvaitwa nemapurisa. “Ndofunga tinetsamba iyi inotiratidza kuti vakatitendedza, saka nhasi tati tichitanga vabva vatora hutungamiriri hwedu vakatirambidza, zvinoratidza kuti mapurisa hahana hanya nehupenyu hwevanhu vakaremara uye hurumende hainei nesu inongotida pasarudzo.” VaChivhanga vazobuditswa mukamba yemapurisa vakawana nhengo dzavo zhinji dzatoenda asi ivo nevamwe vatungamiriri vashoma vazongoenderera mberi nekuratidzira. Kunyangwe varatidzira vari vashoma vati vabudirira mune zvavange vachiita. “Isu tinoti tabudirira nekuti at least tagona kureva zvinotishungurudza, asi tatsamwira mapurisa apinza kutya muvamwe vedu vazoenda tisati tatanga vanzwa kuti tave kutirambidzwa,” Vanodaro VaChivhanga Imwe nhengo ye DACT yaramba kudomwa nezita yati izvi zvinoratidza kuti hurumende yavakutya kunyangwe vakaremara avo iri kudzvinyirira. “Mapurisa anoratidzira kuti arikushandisiwa ne hurumende, uye zvinoratidza kuti vave kutya vanhu vakaremara nekuti havakwanisi kuzadzisa zvido zvavo,” inodaro nhengo iyi. VaDenis Mudzingwa vanovanhengo ye DACT vange vabva kudhorobha re Zvishavane uye vari munyori mukuru wevanhu vakaremara munyika kumusangano we MDCT vati zvaitwa nemapurisa nehurumende zvinoshoresa. “MuZimbabwe zvava kuzivikanwa kuti havachadi kuona vanhu vanoratidzira, chinhu chashamisa mapurisa kuti vanhu vakaremara vanoda kuratidzirira vachiti vave kunonga svosve nemuromo, asi tafara nekuti zvaratidza kuti mapurisa ne hurumende vavhunduka vanhu vakaremara,” VaMudzingwa vanodaro. VeDACT vati kunyangwe hazvo vavhiringidzwa vachaenderera mberi nekuratidzira vachikurudzira kuti hurumende yeZanu PF nemutungamiriri wayo vachibva pachigaro nekuti vakonewa kutungamirira nyika. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nemapurisa ekuMasvingo kuti tinzwe kuti sei vazorambidza vakaremera ava kuratidzira. No media source currently available
title: Vakaremara Vorambidzwa Kuratidzira kuMasvingo Vachiti VaMugabe Vakundiakana Kutonga

text: Munyori mukuru wedare remakurukota VaMisheck Sibanada nemusi weChina vakazivisa kuti vaimbova gurukota rezvemitambo VaAndrew Langa vainge vadzingwa basa nemutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe. VaMugabe vabva vadoma VaMakhosini Hlongwani kuti vatore chigaro ichi. VaLanga vagara vange vachipomerwa mhosva yekuti vaishanda nevaive mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika Amai Joyce Mujuru avo vakadzingwawo basa nekuva nhengo yebato reZanu-PF. VaHlongwani avo vanonzi vari muchikwata cheZanu-PF chinotsigira mumwe mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vange vangodomwa kuita gurukota asi vasina bazi ravanomirira. Asi VaMnangagwa vanoramba kuti vane chikwata chavanotungamira muZanu-PF. VaLanga vanova nhengo yedare reparamende inomirira Insiza South kuMatabeleland South vakamiswa kuva nhengo yebato iri muna Chikumi kwemakore maviri. VaLanga vakadzingwawo pachigaro chekuva sachigaro weZanu-PF kuMatabelaland South. VaLanga vakambomiswa kuvanhengo yebato pamwe nevamwe vakaita sevaiva makurukota vanosanganisa VaWebster Shamu naVaSylvester Nguni.
title: VaAndrew Langa Vodzingwa Basa seGurukota naVaMugabe

text: Mukuwasha wemutungamiri wenyika VaSimba Chikowore, avo vakaroora mwanasikana oga waVaRobert Mugabe, Amai Bona Chikore vadomwa kuita Chief Operations Officer kukambani yeAir Zimbabwe izvo zvakonzera mutauro wakanyanya munyika vamwe vachiti paitwa zvehuori. Kambani iyi yave kutungamirwa nemwana wamuchakabvu Simon Muzenda avo vaimbova mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, Captain Ripton Muzenda vakadomwa mazuva mashoma apfuura. Asi gurukota rinoona nezvekutakurwa kwezvinhu VaJoram Gumbo vaudza Studio 7 kuti vari kuvandudza hutungamiri weAir Zimbabwe uye hapana huori hwaitika. Vatiwo VaChikore vane mapepa akakwana ekuti vatungamire kambani iyi sezvo vakambosevenza kuQatar. Asi mutauriri webato reMDC-T VaObert Gutu vanoti kudomwa kwaVaChikore kunoratidza chizivano nehuori muhurumende. No media source currently available VaGutu vati zvekudya nehama izvi zvaiitwa naVaMobuto Sese Seko kuZaire uye vamwe vatungamiri vanoita zvehudzvinyiyira pasi rose. No media source currently available
title: Mukuwasha waVaMugabe, VaSimba Chikore Vopihwa Basa rePamusoro kuAir Zimbabwe

text: Sangano reWorld Justice Project raburitsa gwaro rayo ra2015 rinoratidza kuti panyaya yekutyora kodzero dzevanhu Zimbabwe iri pamusoro soro. Sangano iri rine muzinda muno muWashington DC Pachikero chesanganoo iri Zimbabwe iri pachidanho chezana panyika zana nembiri dzakatariswa. Ongororo iyi inotarisa nyaya dzekodzero dzevanhu, huori , runyararo, mashandiro ehurumende nezvimwe. Nyika iri pekugumisira iVenezuela ichiteverwa neAfghanistan. Nyika iri pamusoro pakuremekedza kodzero dzevanhu iDenmark, ichiteverwa neNorway neSweden. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinowanzoyambira kuti ongororo dzakadai dzinokanganisa zvikuru hurongwa hwekukwezva vemabhizimisi vekunze kuti vauye kuzimbabwe. Gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu vachishanda nesangano reHuman Rights Watch VaDewa Mavhinga vanoti hurumende yeZimbabwe inofanira kuzadzikisa zvakarwirwa nevanhu Chimurenga zvekuti vagare hupenyu huri nani. Asi vaimbova mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko VaBright Matonga vanoti nyaya yekuti Zimbabwe inotyora kodzero dzevanhu ndeye mugotsi matsuro.
title: Zimbabwe Inonzi Iri Pamberi paKutyora Kodzero dzeVanhu

text: Vagari vekuTokwe Mukosi vanosvika zviuru zviviri vanyora tsamba yenyunyuto kumutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vachigunun’una kuti vave kuziya nenzara uye kuti makurukota avo ehurumende ari kupota achireva nhema pahurongwa hwekugadzirisa matambudziko avo. Vanhu ava vakabviswa kumahombekombe kwedhamu reTokwe Mukosi muna 2013. Mutsamba iri mumaoko eStudio 7 iyo yakaendeswa kuhofisi yaVaMugabe yeMunhumutapa neChitatu, vanhu ava vanoti pari zvino vanenge vari kugara mujeri chaimo nenyaya yekuomerwa nehupenyu. Vanhu ava vanoti nzvimbo yavakanzi vagare yeNuanetsi haigariki sezvo isina mvura yekunwa. Vanhu ava vakumbira VaMugabe kuti vashanyire nzvimbo iyi vazvionere voga kuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka. Vari kutungamira vagari vepaChingwizi, VaKenneth Mlavo, vanoti vari kushishikana zvakanyanya.
title: Vakabviswa kuTokwe Mukosi Vopa VaMugabe Tsamba yeNyunyuto

text: Sangano reGrain Millers Association of Zimbabwe riri kuyambira kuti mitengo yechibage nehupfu ichakwira zvakanyanya mumazuva mashoma anotevera sezvo pasina kunyatsowirirana pakati pesangano iri nehurumende panyaya yekutenga chibage kunze kwenyika. Sangano iri rinoti harisi kukwanisa kupihwa mvumo negurukota rezvekurima, VaJoseph Made, kuti vatenge chibage kunyika dzakaita seSouth Africa neBrazil. Sangano iri range richitenga chibage kuZambia asi riri kuti riri kukundikana kuti ripinze chibage kubva kuZambia nekuti marori ekutakura chibage ichi mashoma. Sangano iri rinotiwo Zambia yamira kutengesa chibage, asi izvi hazvina kujeka nekuti sangano reMillers Association of Zambia chete ndiro rakapa kurudziro iyi kuhurumende. Asi gurukora rezvekurima munyika iyi, VaGiven Lubinda, vainge vati Zambia ine chibage chakawandisa icho inofanira kutengesa. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura naVaLubinda sezvo vadaira nharembozha yavo vati vange vasiri kunzwa zvakanaka. VaMade havanawo kudaira nhare yavo. Asi gurukota rinoona nezvegwara rehurumende, VaSimon Khaya Moyo, avo vanonzi vakanyorerwa tsamba neGrain Millers Association of Zimbabwe, vati vari pazororo. Vakafanobata chigaro chemutungamiri wenyika, VaPhelekezela Mphoko, havanawo kudaira nharembozha yavo. Sachigaro weGrain Millers Association of Zimbabwe, VaTafadzwa Musarara, vanoti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka mumatura enyika uye pave kuda kuti hurumende igadzirise zviri kunetsa. Vashorawo VaMade vachiti havasi kuda kutaura navo nezvekugadzirisa dambudziko rekushomeka kwechibage. No media source currently available
title: Grain Millers Association of Zimbabwe Yoyambira Kukwira kweMutengo weChibage

text: Gurukota rezvemari, Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube, vanonzi vanyorera tsamba VaAcie Lumumba vachivamisa basa ravakanga vambovapa mazuva matatu adarika. Muzvinafundo Ncube vakanga vadoma VaLumumba kuti vave sachigaro wekomiti inoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko mubazi ravo, asi kudomwa uku kunonzi mutsamba yaVaNcube iyi kwakanga kusingafambirane nehurongwa hwekupinzwa basa kwevashandi vehurumende. Patataura naVaLumumba, vati vanga vasati vatambira mashoko ekuti vamiswa basa aya vachiti vachiri kuita basa ravakadomerwa, kunze kwekunzwa nebepanhau reHerald pamwe nemashoko akaburitswa nebazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko. VaLumumba vakafumura huwori hwavanoti huri kuitwa nevakuru-vakuru vekuReserve bank of Zimbabwe. Vanhu ava vanoti VaMirirai Chiremba, VaNorman Mataruka, VaGresham Muradzikwa naVaAzvinandawa Saburi, avo vanonzi vakatombomiswa mabasa nagavhuna veRBZ, Doctor John Mangudya, kuitira kupa mukana wekuti vaferefetwe. VaLumumba vanoti vachaenderera mberi vachifumura vanhu vavanoti vari kudzosera nyika kumashure nekuita zvehuwori. No media source currently available
title: Gurukota rezveMari, VaMthuli Ncube Vanomisa VaLumumba Basa

text: Mitambo yenhabvu yeWorld Cup iri kutambirwa kuRussia iri kuenderera mberi nhasi. MuGroup A Saudi Arabia ichatamba neEgypt kochizoti Uruguay neRussia. Mitambo iyi iriko panguva imwe chete na 4 masikati. Mimwe mitambo iri muGroup B na8 manheru inoti, Iran ichatamba nePortugal kochiti Spain neMorocco. Pamitambo yakatambwa nezuro, Japan 2-Senegal 2, England 6-Panama 1 kochizoti Columbia 3-Poland 0. Kusvika parizvino, zvikwata zvinotevera zvabudirira kuenda muchikamu chechipi zvinoti Russia, Uruguay, France, Croatia, England neBelgium.
title: Zvikwata Zvitanhatu Zvopinda muChikamu Chechipiri cheWorld Cup

text: No media source currently available
title: Vamwe Vanobva kuZimbabwe Vari kuEast Plastic View, Pretoria kuSouth Africa Vorasikirwa nePekugara

text: Mutungamiri weAmerica, VaBarack Obama, vawedzera negore zvirango zvakatemerwa mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, pamwe nevamwe vavo vari muZanu PF nemuhurumende. Mutungamiri weAmerica, VaBarack Obama, vawedzera negore zvirango zvakatemerwa mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, pamwe nevamwe vavo vari muZanu PF nemuhurumende. VaObama vazivisawo dare reAmerica reCongress nezvekuwedzera kwavaita negore zvirango zvakatemerwa hurumende yaVaMugabe. Zvirango izvi zvakatanga kutemerwa VaMugabe nevamwe vavo mugore ra 2003 naVaGeorge Bush, avo vaimbova mutungamiri weAmerica panguva iyi. Gwaro raburitswa naVaObama, Executive Order 13288, rinoti maitiro evanhu vawedzerwa negore zvirango izvi anovhiringa gwara reAmerica pazvinhu zvinoitika kunze kwayo. Hurumende yeAmerica inoti haisi kufara nekutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu muZimbabwe pamwe nehudzvanyiriri huri kuitika pasi pehurumende yaVaMugabe. VaObama vati zvirango izvi zvicharamba zviripo kudzamara pava neshanduko mumaitiro evanhu vakatemerwa zvirango izvi.
title: VaObama Vanowedzera neGore Zvirango Zvakatemerwa VaMugabe neVamwe Vavo muZanu PF

text: Apo zuva resarudzo yemutungamiri weAmerica riri kusvika nemusi we Chipiri, vari kumirira bato reDemocratic Party musarudzo iyi, Va Joe Biden, vari kutungamira zvishoma muongororo dziri kuitwa munyika yose, vari pamberi pemumiriri we Republican Party musarudzo iyi, uye vari mutungamiri we America pari zvino, Va Donald Trump. Vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni makumi masere nemaviri vanonzi vakatovhota kare, vamwe vachishandisa posvo, vamwe vachivhotera munzvimbo dzekuvhotera mumatunhu avo anobvumidza kuvhota zuva resarudzo risati rasvika. Nyanzvi munyaya dzematongerwo enyika, uye vari mudzidzisi pa Friends University, mudunhu reKansas, Professor Moses Rumano, vanoti sarudzo dzemuAmerica dziri kuitwa vanhu vakasununguka kunyange vari kukwikwidzana ava vaine rionero yakasiyana zvakadzama. Professor Rumano vanoti vanoona gwara reAmerica rinobata nyika dzekunze richishanduka zvikuru kana VaTrump vakavhoterwa kuti vapinde mutemu yechipiri.  VaTrump vakakunda Amai Hilary Clinton musarudzo yakaitwa muna 2016, vakagadzwa semutungamiri mutsva muna Ndira 2017. Professor Rumano vanotiwo VaBiden, avo vakambove mutevedzeri wemutungamiri weAmerica kwematemu maviri vachishanda nevaive mutungamiri munguva iyi, uye vari munhu mutema wekutanga kutora basa iri, VaBarack Obama, munhu anofarirwa nevanhu sezvo vaine muonero wakasiyana naVaTrump panyaya yevabvakure vari muAmerica.  Vanotiwo VaTrump vakasarudzwa, vanogona kufarirwa nevemabhizinesi mukubuda nehurongwa hwekusimbaradza nyaya dzemabhizinesi ayo avhiringwa zvakanyanya nechirwere cheCovid-19, icho chaparadza hupfumi hwenyika pasi rose. Professor Rumano vanoti vanoona VaBiden vachibatanidza vanhu vose vemuAmerica pasina kuti uri mutema, muchena, mubvakure here kana ani zvake, sezvo gwara iri, ragara riri rebato reDemocratic Party. No media source currently available
title: VaTrump Vokweshana naVaBiden Musarudzo yeMutungamiri weAmerica neChipiri

text: Rimwe sangano revagari vemuguta reHarare, reHarare Residents Trust, rinoti harisi kuzotambira hurongwa hunonzi huri kuda kuitwa nekanzuru yeHarare, hwekuisa mamita emvura mudzimba kuitira kuti vanhu vabhadhare mvura vasati vaishandisa. Mamita aya anoita kuti vagari vashandise mvura yavanenge vabhadharira chete mari ikapera votadza kuwana mvura sezvo inenge yavharwa. Mukuru wesangano iri, VaPrecious Shumba, vanoti danho rinonzi riri kuda kutorwa nekanzuru iri richaita kuti mvura iwanikwe nevane mari chete, chinova chinhu chinotyora bumbiro remitemo. Bumbiro remitemo yenyika rinoti mvura ikodzero yemunhu wese zvichireva kuti kuve nemari kana kusava nayo munhu ane kodzero yekuwana mvura yakachena. Meya weguta reHarare, VaBernard Manyenyeni, vanoti chirongwa chekuisa mamita aya mudzimba hachichadzokeri shure uye hapachina imwe nzira yekuchinzvenga nacho. VaManyenyeni vanoti chasara pari zvino kutsvaga nzira dzekuti danho iri risaomesere vanoshupika nevane matambudziko. Meya vanotiwo mvura imwe yenzira dzekupinza nayo mari muhomwe yekanzuru. Vanotiwo vagari vanofanirwa kubuda pachena kuti vari kuramba mamita emvura here kana kuti vari kuramba kubhadhara mvura yavanoshandisa. Asi VaShumba vanoti kanzuru yaifanirwa kutanga yaedza chirongwa ichi munzvimbo duku isati yaita kuti chiitwe muguta rose. Vanotiwo kanzuru haisati yagara pasi nevagari kuti vapewo pfungwa dzavo, uye kunzwa kubva kukanzuru kana yakaita ongororo inotambirwa nevagari. Asi vamwe vagari, zvikuru vave nemakore vasiri kuwana mvura nguva dzose, vanoti zvimwe danho iri ringaita kuti vakwanisewo kuwana mvura mudzimba dzavo, kana kanzuru ikazokwanisa kutengesera mvura vanenge vachikwanisa kuitenga.
title: Harare Residents Trust Inoramba Hurongwa hweMamita eKutenga Mvura

text: Sangano remagweta anorwira kodzero dzevanhu, reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights rasvitsa kudare reHigh Court magwaro ekupikisa kudomwa kwaVaBramwell Bushu kuti vamirire bato reZanu PF mudunhu reShamva South musarudzo dzenyika dziri kuitwa musi wa30 Chikunguru gore rino. Magweta aya, ayo ari kumirira VaLemani Pwanyiwa veMDC-T inotungamirirwa naVaNelson Chamisa, ari kuti VaBushu, avo vakafanobata chigaro chaIshe Bushu, vari kutyora chikamu 281 (2) chebumbiro remitemo yenyika, icho chinorambidza madzishe nemasadunhu kuita zvematongerwo enyika kana kuve nhengo yebato rezvematongerwo enyika. Muzvare Roselyn Hanzi, veZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights vanoti kurega Ishe Bushu vachimirira bato reZanu PF musarudzo kunokanganisawo magariro akasununguka evanhu vari pasi pavo. Vanotiwo sezvo dare rekudoma vachakwikwidza kusarudzo riri kugara musi wa 14 Chikumi 2018, nyaya iyi inofanirwa kunzwikwa nechimbichimbi. Mumagwaro avo kudare, magweta aya ari kukurudzirawo Zimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, kuti isatambire magwaro aVaBushu ekuvadoma kuti ndivo vachamirira Zanu PF musarudzo dzekuShamva South. Vamwe vakwirirwa dare ibato reZanu PF pamwechete nebato reZEC. Mwedzi wapera, dare repamusoro rakawana mukuru wemadzishe, Ishe Fortune Charumbira vaine mhosva yekupindira mune zvematongerwo enyika, mushure mekunge Ishe Charumbira vati madzishe ose achatsigira vachamirira Zanu PF musarudzo. Dare iri rakapa ishe Charumbira mazuva manomwe kuti vaturure mashoko avo aya, uye vatuare kuvanhu kuti mashoko avo asatambirwe neveruzhinji. No media source currently available
title: Ishe Bushu veZanu PF Vokwirirwa Matare Kuti Vasakwikwidze Musarudzo

text: Bato reZanu PF rinoti vari kuzviti inhengo yebato iri, VaSybeth Musengezi, avo vakaenda kumatare edzimhosva vachipikisa kusarudzwa kwaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa kuti vafanobata matomu vachiti kwaive kunze kwemutemo, havachisiri nhengo sezvo vakabuda mubato iri kare. Mukuru anoona nezvekufambiswa kwemashoko muZanu PF, VaTafadzwa Mugwadi, vanoti bbato ravo haritombozivi kuti VaMusengezi ndiyani. "Zita iroro handisati ndambosangana naro mu membership yeZanu PF. Zvekare, mungangoda kuziva kuti kana muchida kuona kuti inhengo yeZanu PF tarisai chiso chake, mutarise mapfekero, matauriro nemafambiro, nezvaanorwira, nezvinomutorera nguva, zvinokuratidzai kuti haasi nhengo yeZanu PF." VaMugwadi vanoti nhengo dzebato ravo dzine dzidziso yadzinopiwa kuChitepo School of Ideology dzinoziva mafambisirwo anoitwa basa. "VaSybeth tinomuziva chiri chikomana chakapandukira musangano panguva yakapanduka VaTsenengamu vakanofoma bato ravo. Handizivi kuti nyaya dzekuZanu PF unodziwanepi? asizve kune vari kumutuma kana vanoshanda naye vangangoda kuziva kuti isu hedu nemaziso makuru atinawo anpfamba masikati neusiku tichange tichiongorora kuti anoziva here mwana iyeyu nevari kumutuma kuti zvaari kuita zvine ma disastrous legal consequences nokuti ari kutanisha zita remusangano kwaasiri," VaMugwadi vanodaro. Vanoti zvinhu zvinosungisa, vachiti zvakakosha kuti VaMusengezi vange vachizviziva. Asi vaMusengezi vanoti havana chakutya panyaya iyi sezvo vari nhengo yeZanu PF izere. "Inini ndakajoina Zanu PF ndiri mwana mudiki, ndiri Form 3. Nhoroondo yangu yemu party haide kuti ndiudzwe nemumwe munhu kuti handisi munhu weZanu PF nekuti zvandakaita ndinozviziva, ende zvizhinji zvine evidence. Ndine mapepa ekubva ndichitanga kurejisita ma membership cards. Zvese zvinochengetwaka, zviripo." VaMusengezi vanoti vakamirira kuti ivo vari kuti havasi nhengo yeZanu PF kuti vachienda kumatare edzimhosva vachinootaura kutimunhu uyu haasi nhengo yedu, vozotangira kubva ipapo. Vanoti vachakamirira kunzwa divi raVaMnangagwa panyaya yavakasvitsa kudare iyi, vachiti magweta aVaMnangagwa ane mazuva gumi ekuti ange asvitsa kudare divi ravo vachipikisa kana kutambira zvavakasvitsa kudare zviri mumagwaro avo. VaMusengezi vakaenda kudare repamusoro reHigh Court vachinyunyuta kuti musangano weZanu PF weCentral Committee wakaitwa muna 2017, uyo wakasarudza VaMnangagwa kuti vafanobata matomu, wakaitwa zvisiri pamutemo sezvo VaMnangagwa vakanga vasisiri nhengo yebato iri mushure mekudzingwa kwavo. Vanotiwo zvakare musangano uyu waifanirwa kutungamirirwa nevaive mutungamiri webato mushakabvu VaRobert Mugabe kana kuti vaive mutevedzeri vavo VaPhelekezela Mphoko. VaMusengezi vanoti vari kutambira pano nepapo mashoko nenhare kubva kuvanhu vavanoti vari kuvatyisidzira, asi vanoti izvi hazvisi kuvavhundutsa sezvo izvi zviri kuitwa nevanhu vavanoti vari kuda kungoonekwa nemukuru wavo kuti vane zvavari kuita zvekuvatsigira. Vanoti havasati vaenda kunomhang'ara kumapurisa kuvhundutsirwa kwavari kuitwa sezvo zvisiri zvinhu zvavangati zvakanyanya kukura. No media source currently available
title: Zanu PF Inoti VaSybeth Musengezi ,Vari Kupikisa Kudomwa kwaVaMnangagwa Kuti Vabate Matomu, Vakabuda muBato Iri Kare

text: Vamwe varimi vari kunyunyuta zvikuru vachiti havasati vabhadharwa chibage chavakaendesa kudura renyika kuGrain Marketing Board kana kuti GMB. Varimi ava vanoti kusapiwa mari dzavo nenguva uku kuri kudzosera shure mabasa avo kurima, uye vari kugara vachinetswa nevanhu vakatakura chibage chavo vachichiendesa kuGMB. Mumwe wevarimi ava, Amai Juliet Moyo vekuGokwe, vanoti zvinovashungurudza kuti gore rave kutopera vachingofambira mari yechibage chavakaendesa kuGMB muna Chikunguru. Amai Moyo vanoti pavakaendesa chibage chavo vakamanikidzwa kuvhura bhuku rekubhanga kuAgribank Amai Moyo vanoti kusapiwa mari yavo kwakavhiringidzawo mabasa avo ekurima egore rino sezvo vasina mari yekutenga mbeu nefetiraiza. Amai Moyo vanoti pamusoro pezvo vari kutadza kubhadhara vakavatakurira chibage izvo zvotokanganisa magariro avo. Vanotiwo vari kuzonobatana nevamwe varimi vane dambudziko seravo vogarira mari yavo kukambani yeGMB muHarare. Mumwe murimi, VaBooker Dliwayo, vashora zvikuru maitiro eGMB. VaDliwayo vanoti varimi pavaiendesa chibage, vaimanikidzwa kuvhura bhuku rekubhanga vachiti dai vanhu vaingoisirwa mari munhamba dzefoni sezvaiitwa gore rapera. Studio 7 yataurawo parunhare nemumwe murimi, VaLawrence Gweru, avo vati havasati vabhadharwawo chibage chavakaendesa mugore ra2017. VaGweru vati vakapinza chibage chavo kuGMB yekuShurugwi kunonzi kuTongogara. Studio7 haina kukwanaisa kubata vakuru vakuru vekuGMB kuti tinzwe divi ravo.
title: GMB Yotadza Kubhadhara Varimi Mari Dzavo

text: Mapurisa emuSouth Africa anoti akakwanisa kumisa kubuda munyika iyi kwezvimwe zvezvinhu zvakabiwa muzvitoro mumhirizhonga yakaitika munyika iyi kubva musi wa 08 Chikunguru zvichitevera kukandwa mujeri kwevaive mutungamiri wenyika, VaJacob Zuma, vachipomerwa mhosva yekuzvidza dare. Mugwaro raakaburitsa neMuvhuro padandemutande reTwitter, mapurisa aya anoti zvinhu izvi zvakakwanisa kuwanikwa kumuganho wenyika iyi neZimbabwe weBeitbridge, uye muganhu neBotswana weGrodlersbrug, zvave kuda kuburitswa muSouth Africa kupinda muZimbabwe. Gwaro remapurisa iri raikurudzirawo veruzhinji kuti vasatenga zvinhu zvakabiwa izvi, uye kuti vazivise mapurisa nezvevanhu vanenge vachitengesa zvinhu izvi. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kubata mapurisa eSouth Africa kuti tinzwe kuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvingani zvakasungwa zviine zvinhu zvinofungidzirwa kuti zvakabiwa izvi. Mukuru wesangano revanorarama nekutenga pamwe nekutengesera zvinhu kunze kwenyika, reInternational Cross-Border Traders Association, VaDenis Juru, vanoti ichokwadi kuti mapurisa ari kusunga vanhu vanenge vasina mapepa ezvinhu zvavanenge vainazvo. VaJuru vanoti pane zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvakasungwa mushure mekuwanikwa zviine zvinhu zvakawanda zvisina humbowo hwekuti zvakatenga kupi zvinhu izvi. VaJuru vaudza Studio7 kuti vanhu vagare vaine mapepa anoratidza humbowo kwavakatenga zvinhu nekuti vakawanikwa vasina magwaro aya, vanosungwa. No media source currently available
title: Vanhu Vari Kuwanikwa Vaine Zvinhu Zvisina Magwaro Anoratidza Kuti Vakazvitenga Kupi Vari Kusungwa muSouth Africa

text: Studio7 yasvitsa neMugovera makore gumi nemashanu kubva zvayatanga kutepfenyura musi wa 27 Ndira 2003 muchirongwa cheChirungu. Payakaenda pamhepo uyu, vashamarari vayo muWashington vaiva Ray Choto na Ndimyake Mwakalyelye. Vatori venhau pakaparurwa chirongwa cheStudio7 musi uyu waive Michael Kariati, David Mutomba naStanley Karombo, nevamwe vakazotangawo kushandira Studio7 mushure mekuparurwa kwechirongwa ichi. Chirongwa cheShona neNdebele chakazotanga musi wa 7 Kubvumbi, 2003. Vatereri veStudio7 vakawanda varumbidza zvikuru nhau dzavari kupakurirwa neStudio7 asi vakurudzirawo kuti dai nhepfenyuro iyi yawedzera zvirongwa zvenhau pamwe nekuenda kune dzimwe nzvimbo dzisina vatori venhau kunyanya kumamisha. Mumwe mutereri weStudio7, VaJames Chidhakwa, vati vanofarira Studio7 nekuti vanowana nhau dzejekerere. Asi VaChidhakwa vati shuviro yavo ndeyekuti dai Studio7 yawanikwayo paterevisheni dzinoonekwa mahara. Mumwe mutereri weStudio7, VaKeith Charumbira, vatiwo Studio7 inovapa nhau dzekunzvimbo dzakasiyasiyana vakati izvi zvinovapa ruzivo rwezviri kuitika kunzvimbo dzakasiyana siyana munyika. Mumwe mutereri, VaLovemore Chitsa, vatiwo chavanonyanyofarira paStudio7 inhau dzisina divi radzinorerekera dzavanowana. Mutauriri weMDC inotungamirirwa naVaWelshman Ncube, VaKurauone Chihwayi, vatiwo chinonyanyovafadza paStudio7 mukana uri kupiwa kumapato ese ezvematongerwo enyika kuti vabude panhepfenyuro iyi vachipa pfungwa dzavo. Asi VaChihwayi vatiwo shuviro yavo ndeyekuti nhepfenyuro Studio7 iwedzere vatori venhau, zvikuru kumamisha. Vanoronga mabasa eMDC inotungamirirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai muMbare, VaRichard Bvirindi, vatiwo vanofadzwa nezvirongwa zveStudio7 nekuti inhepfenyuro inopa mukana kumapato ese ari munyika. VaBvirindi vati nhepfenyuro dzehurumende hadzitori nhau kubva kumapato avo. Vatiwo Studio 7 iri kubatsira kuwanisa vagari nhau kunyanya kumusha kwavo kuNyamapande uko vati hakusviki masai sai enhepfenyuro dzehurumende. Mumwe anorarama nekutengesa zvinhu, VaMoyo Watidhii, vakurudzira kuti dai Studio 7 yawedzera zvirongwa zvayo zvenhau. Mumwe mudzimai anofarira Studio7, Amai Otilia Chikandire, vatiwo vanoona sekuti Studio7 ine chokwadi panhau dzainoburitsa zvichienzaniswa nenhepfenyuro dzehurumende idzo vati dzinonyepera veruzhinji kunyanya panyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika. Vatereri veStudio7 ava vatiwo havachatyi kuterera nhepfenyuro iyi kunyange hazvo hurumende ichiti haisi pamutemo asi makurukota ayo achitaura neStudio7. No media source currently available
title: Studio7 Inosvitsa Makore Gumi neMashanu Ichitepfenyura kuZimbabwe

text: Basa rekununura vanhu vakadhirikirwa nemugodhi weRan Mine kuBindura rakambokanganiswa nemusi weChitau nemvura yakawanda iri kunaya munzvimbo iyi. Vanhu vanodarika makumi matatu vanonzi vari mumugodhi uyu kunyangwe vamwe vachiti huwandu uhu hunogona kunge hwakawanda kana kuti huri hushoma. Mumwe kanzura wekuBindura VaBrian Kembo vanoti muvura iyi yave kupa vanhu kuti vashaye tarisiro yekuti hama dzavo dzichabuda dziri dzipenyu. VaKembo vanoti vari kuyedza kununura vanhu vatomira vachiti pave nenjodzi yekuti vari kuda kubatsira vanogona kurasikirwa nehupenyu. No media source currently available
title: Kunaya kweMvura Kwopa Hama dzeVakadhirikirwa neMugoghi kuBindura Kuti Dzishaye Tarisiro yeKuti Pane Anopona

text: Dare repamusoro reHigh Court rarasa chikumbiro chevagari vekuChilonga kuChiredzi chekuti vasabviswe panzvimbo yavari. Pamutongo wavakanyora nezuro ukaziviswa nhasi mutongi weHigh Court, VaJoseph Mafusire, varasa chikumbiro chevagari chekuti vasabviswe pavagere. Vagari vanoti Va Livison Chikutu, VaPheneas Chitsange naVaAlbert Dhumela vainge vaendesa gurukota rezveminda, gurukota rezvematunhu, muchuchisi mukuru pamwe nemutumgamiri wenyika kumatare vachiti havaifanirwa kubviswa panzvimbo yavagere yeChilonga kuChiredzi. Hurumende iri kuda kubvisa vagari vanosvika zviuri gumi nezviviri kuitira kuti nzvimbo iyi ipihwe imwe kambani inoita zvemukaka yeDendary kuitira kuti mombe dzayo dziwane mafuro. Gweta revagari ava, VaTendai Biti, vati pamutemo havabvumirwe kutaura pamusoro penyaya yavaimirira, nokudaro vati titaure neZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights. Mutauriri weZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights, VaKumbirai Mafunda, vati vachapikisa mutongo uyu sezvo vasiri kufara nawo. Mukuru weCenter for Natural Resource Governance, VaFarai Maguwu, vati zvinosuwisa senyika kuti zvipfuyo zvinokosheswa kudarika vanhu. Asi mukurasa chikumbiro chevagari ava, VaMafusire vati hurumende ndiyo inoziva zvainoda kuita nenzvimbo dzakagara vanhu ava uye nekuchinja mitemo. Vati pari zvino hurumende ine kodzero yekubvisa vanhu ava panzvimbo dzavagere. No media source currently available
title: Dare Rinorasa Chikumbiro cheVagari vekuChilonga

text: Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vanoti mapato anopikisa muZimbabwe anofanirwa kubatana kana achida kubudirira. Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika, VaTakura Zhangazha, vanoti parizvino vanhu havasi kunyatsoona kuti zvinhu zvichafamba sei sezvo mapato mazhinji aine zvinoanetsa mukati mawo. Vanotizve kubato guru rinopikisa, reMDC-T, hazvisi pachena zvichaitika sezvo nenyaya yehutungamiri kana mukuru webato iri uye mukuru we MDC Alliance, VaMorgan Tsvangirai vakasanaya zvakakwana kutungamira mapato aya. “Opposition, kana kuti vanopikisa Zanu-PF, vari parumana nzombe. Vanofanira kugadzirisa zvinhu zvavo mukati meba yavo vasati vatanga kufunga kuti vangakunda Zanu-PF pasarudzo dzirikuuya idzi,” vakadaro VaZhangazha. “Pari zvino, hazvisikunyatso zikanwa kuti mutungamiri MDC-T, anove futi mutungamiri weMDC Alliance, VaTsvangirai, varikunzwa sei uyezve kuti vachakwanisa here kutungamira bato ravo neMDC Alliance pasarudzo dziri kutevera.” VaZhangazha vanoti nguva ishoma zvekuti mapoka anopikisa anofanira kukurumidza kugadzira zvinhu kupa nguva kuvanhu vanovatsigira kuti vavone pavamire. No media source currently available
title: Mapato Anopikisa Anokuridzirwa Kugadzirisa Zviri Kuanetsa

text: Gurukota rinoona nezvemitemo VaZiyambi Ziyambi vanoti vari kufara zvikuru nekuparurwa kwematare anotonga nyaya dzehuori nezuro nemutongi mukuru wematare VaLuke Malaba. Kune matare matatu akavhurwa muHarare uye mamwe maviri kuBulawayo. Judiciary Services Commission yakatodoma vatongi gumi nevaviri kuti vatonge nyaya dzehuori idzi. Sangano rinoongorora nyaya dzehuori pasi rose reTransparency International rinoti Zimbabwe panyaya dzehuori iri pachidanho chezana nemakumi mashanu nemanomwe (157) panyika zana nemakumi masere (180) dzakaongororwa zvichireva kuti huori hwatekeshera. No media source currently available
title: Hurumende Inoparura Matare Anotonga Nyaya dzeHuwori

text: Mumiriri weChimanimani East mudare reparamende, VaJoshua Sacco, vanoti dunhu ravo pamwe nemamwe matunhu akawirwa nedambudziko redutumupengu Cyclone Idai anoda rubatsiro nekukasika. Vanoti hudzamu hwekuparadzwa kwakaitika mudunhu ravo reChimanimani East hwakakurisa zvekuti zvichatora mazuva akawanda kuti vakwanise kuziva kuti vanhu vakashaya mutsaona iyi vangani. VaSacco vanotiwo vamwe vevanhu vakashaya vachiri kufukunurwa kubva muzvivakwa zvakawondomoka, pamwe nemadhaka, ayo anonzi akafushira dzimba dzakawanda, zvikuru muNgangu. Panyaya yekusveweredzwa kwavo nevanhu nemusi weChipiri, VaSacco vanoti zvakadai zvinowanikwa mune zvematongerwo enyika, vachiti panenge paine vamwe vanhu vanongoda kunyadzisa vamwe panguva dzinenge dzakaita saidzodzi. Vanoti chakakonzera kuti vanhu vemunharaunda yavo vatsamwe ndechekuti musi waitika tsaona iyi ivo havana kuzokwanisa kuti varare muChimanimani nekuda kwekuti nzira dzakanga dzisisafambiki. Vanoti izvi ndizvo zvakatsamwisa vanhu, avo vanofunga kuti vakavatiza munguva yetsaona. Asi vanoti vakazomhanyira kwMutare kuitira kuti vakwanise kuzivisa mapoka ehurumende anopa rubatsiro nezvetsaona yakanga yavawira iyi. No media source currently available
title: Matunhu Akawirwa neCyclone Idai kuChimanimani East,Otarisira Rubatsiro neChimbichimbi

text: Mushure memusangano wavakaita nezuro negurukota rezvehutano, Dr David Parirenyatwa, mukuru wesangano rana chiremba, reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association, Dr Mxolisi Ngwenya, vanoti havasi kuzodzokera kubasa kusvika zvichemo zvavo zvagadziriswa. Dr Parirenyatwa vakaita musangano nevatungamiri vesangano ranachiremba vakavaudza kuti mari ndiyo inonetsa nekuti nyaya yehupfumi hwenyika haina kumira zvakanaka. VaParirenyatwa vakakumbira vana chiremba kuti varape vanouya kuzvipatara vachirwarisa. Vakavaudzazve kuti vanzwa zvichemo zvavo uye vachazvikwidza kumusoro kunyange vasina chavanovimbisa. Asi Dr Ngwenya vanoti hapana kudzokera kumashure kusvika zvichemo zvavo zvose zvagadziriswa. No media source currently available
title: Dr Parirenyatwa Vokundikana Kukurudzira VanaChiremba Kuti Vasaramwe Mabasa

text: Zimbabwe nemusi weChipiri yakabatana nedzimwe nyika pasi rose kucherechedza zuva rekupedza chirwere chekutsemuka dundira chinosangana nemadzimai akawanda. Vanhu vakaungana pachipatara cheChinhoyi apo pakatanga kuparurwa chirongwa chekurapa chirwere chekutsemuka dundira mugore ra2015. Kusvika parizvino, madzimai anopfuura mazana mana akarapwa chirwere ichi. Vakarapwa ava vakauya pagungano iri vachitaridza kufara kwakanyanya. Mumwe wevamwe vakarwara nechirwere ichi kwemakore makumi matatu nemaviri Amai Christine Godzi vanoti vari kufara zvikuru sezvo vanga vosemwa nehama neshamwari. Amai Shamiso avo vakarapwa mushure mekurwara kwemakore mashanu vanoti kunonoka kuwana rubatsiro munguva dzekusununguka ndiko kwakapa kuti dambudziko ravo rikombe. Mumiriri weUNFP munyika VaCheik Tidiane Cisse ndivo vange vari munyarikani pachiitiko ichi uye vati madzimai masere anofa pazuva vachisungunuka. Vakaenderera mberi vachiti madzimai ane chirwere chedundira anoda rubatsiro rwakanyanya. Vakataura vakamirira gurukota rezvehutano VaDidydmus Madzima vanoti zvipatara zvinofanirwa kubatana nemasangano akazvimirira kuti zvivandudze nyaya dzezvehutano munyika sezvo hurumende isina mari. Sangano reWorld Health Organisation (WHO) rinoti madzimai anosvika mamiriyoni maviri ari kurarama nemaronda anowanikwa pakusununguka. Mhemberero dzekucherechedza kupedzwa kwechirwere chekutsemuka dundira kwakatanga mugore ra2003. Mhemberero dzegore rino dziri kuitwa pasi pedingindira rinoti:”Hope, healing and Dignity for all” No media source currently available
title: Zimbabwe Yobatana neDzimwe Nyika Mukurwisa Chirwere cheDundira

text: Bato reMDC rinoti kuratidzira kwarakaronga kuti kuitwe neChishanu kuri kuenderera mberi zvisinei nemashoko ari kutenderera ekuti kuratidzira uku kwakanzurwa. Vachitaura nevatori venhau pamuzinda webato ravo paMorgan Tsvangirai House, mutauriri weMDC, VaFortune Daniel Molokele, vati kuratidzira kwavakaronga sebato kuri kuenderera mberi neChishanu kunyange hazvo pane vari kutenderedza mashoko paWhatsapp, Facebook neTwitter ekuti kuratidzira uku kwakanzurwa. VaMolokele vati kuratidzira uku kuchaparurwa muHarare neChishanu kozoenda kuBulawayo neMuvhuro, kuGweru nemusi weChipiri, kuKwekwe nemusi weChitatu uye Mutare nemusi weChina. Vatizve kuratidzira uku hakusi kuzomira kudzamara zvavari kuda sebato zvazadziswa nehurumende. Izvi zvatsinhirwa nemurongi wemisangano muMDC, VaAmos Chibaya. MDC inoti pane runyerekupe rwekuti Zanu PF irikudhinda mbatya dzakafanana nedzinowanzopfekwa nevatsigiri vebato rayo kuti vagozokonzeresa mhirizhonga. VaChibaya vati vatora matanho akasimba kuti varatidziri vasaite zvemhirizhonga uye vakurudzira vatsigiri vavo kuti vasapfeke mbatya dzebato sezvo vachiti kuratidzira uku ndekwezvizvarwa zvese zveZimbabwe zvakaomerwa nehupenyu parizvino. Vatiwo kuratidzira uku kuchapera chete kana nyaya yekusamira zvakanaka mune zvehupfumi hwenyika yagadziriswa pamwe nenyaya yegakava rine chekuita nezvakabuda musarudzo dzegore rapera. Mutungamiri weMDC, VaNelson Chamisa, vanoti ndivo vakakunda musarudzo dzegore rapera kunyange hazvo komisheni inoona nezvesarudzo yeZimbabwe Electoral Commission ichiti VaEmmerson Mnangagwa ndivo vakakunda musarudzo idzi izvo zvakatsinhirwa nedare reConstitutional Court. Kuratidzira kwakaronga neMDC uku hakusati kwabvumirwa nemapurisa asi MDC inoti yakaita zvese zvinodiwa pasi pebumbiro remitemo yenyika pamwe nemimwe mirawu yemunyika inobata nyaya dzekuratidzira. Zvichakadaro, nhengo yesangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu reCitizens Manifesto, VaTatenda Mombeyarara, vanonzi vakapambwa neChipiri husiku pamba nevanofungidzirwa kuti vakasiya vakandwa kuHatfield mushure mekuzvindikitwa zvakaomarara. Mashoko aburitswa nesangano iri anoti VaMombeyarara vaendeswa kuchipatara sezvo vakakuvara zvakaipisisa. Sangano iri ratiwo VaMombeyarara vaibvunzurudzwa nevakavapamba nezvekuratidzira kurikuda kuitwa neMDC uku. Mune imwe nyaya yakadai, sachigaro weMDC kuMufakose, VaBlessing Kanotunga, vanotiwo vakapambwa pamba pavo husiku hwanezuro nevanofungidzirwa kuti vasori vakavazvindikita zvakaomarara vasati vavasiya kuChitungwiza. VaKanotunga vati kurohwa kwavaitwa kwatovasimbisa kuti vaenderere mberi nekuratidzira. Vachitaura padandemutande ravo reTwitter, munyori mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaNick Mangwana, vati havazive kuti ndiyani ari kupamba vanhu nekuvarova asi vakati vari kuita izvi havasi kudivi remutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa sezvo vasingadi mhirizhonga. Gurukota rinoona nezvekudzivirirwa kwenyika, Amai Oppah Muchinguri Kashiri, vaudza Studio7 parunhare kuti kuratidzira kunobvumirwa nemutemo asi kunofanira kuitwa murunyararo. Vati mapazi anoona nezvekuchengetedzwa kwemutemo achange achishanda zvakasimba kuona kuti mutemo hausi kutyorwa here uye zvivakwa zve hurumende pamwe nemidziyo yeveruzhinji hazvisi kuputswa. Mapurisa aswera achimisa nekusecha motokari dzose dzange dzichipinda mudhorobha. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nemutauriri wemapurisa, VaPaul Nyathi, kuti tinzwe divi remapurisa pakupambwa nekurohwa zvakaipisisa kwakaitwa vaviri ava, pamire mapurisa nezvekuratidzira kuri kuda kuitwa neMDC uku pamwe nekusechwa kwanga kuchiitwa motokari nemabhazi. VaNyathi vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. No media source currently available
title: MDC Inoti Kuratidzira Kwayo Kuri Kuenderera Mberi neChishanu

text: Dare repamusoro nhasi rapa mutongo wekuti mapurisa asarambidze vana veZimbabwe vanoda kuratidzira neChitatu apo vachange vachipinda mumigwagwa vachiramba mari dziri kuda kuparurwa dzema bond note. Mutongo uyu, uyo wapiwa naAmai Lavender Makoni, unotevera nyaya yakwidzwa kudare iri nebato reTransform Zimbabwe richida kuti mapurisa asarambidze vanhu kuratidzira uku. Vapinda mudare vakamirira bato retransform Zimbabwe magweta eZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights anoti VaSharon Hofisi pamwe naVaKennedy Masiye. Transform Zimbabwe inonzi iri kuda kuti vanhu vaforea vakananga kumahofisi egurukota rezvemari VaPatrick Chinamasa uko vachanosiya gwaro ravo renyunyuto. VaMasiye vanoti vazotora nzira yekudare repamusoro iyi sezvo mapurisa akanga anyima bato rinopikisa iri mvumo yekufora achiti izvi zvaizokanganisa kufamba kwevanhu pamwe nedzimotokari mukati meguta. No media source currently available   Ukuwo masangano akazvimirira anosanganisira reRestoration for Human Rights pamwechete nevamwe vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu varatidzira muguta reHarare kunyangwe vange vasina mvumo kubva kumapurisa. Vange vachiratidzira muguta reHarare vaudza Studio 7 kuti kubatwa neseri kweruoko pamwechete nekushungurudzwa nemapurisa kwezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe kana vachitura nhuna dzavo kubudikidza nekuratidzira ndizvo zvavasunda kuti varatidzire.\n\nVachitungamirirwa neSangano reRestoration of Human Rights ROHR, pamwe nevechidiki vasina mabasa reUmployed Youth Organisation, vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu ava vati vanoda kuti mapurisa anzwisise kuti vanhu havarohwe kana vane zvavanoda kuratidzira kuhurumende. VaDonald Mavhudzi mumwe wevaratidzira ava vataurira Studio 7 kuti vaneta nemapurisa anorova vanoratidzira ivo varikutamburawo pasi pehurumende yemutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe. VaIshmael Kauzani , vanova sachigaro we Unemployed Youth Organisation vatsigirawomashoko aya. Vanoon nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko mu Rohr VaTinashe Zhakata vati varatidzira nhasi sezvo mangwana kune kumwe kuratidzira muguta reHarare uko vechidiki vasina mabasa vacharatidza kunyunyuta kwavo nekusawana mabasa ivo vakadzidza. VaZhakata vati mapurisa anofanirwa kurega zvekushungurudza veruzhinji. Varatidziri ava vazopararira pavawana vakavharirwa nemapurisa panosangana mugwagwa waJason Moyo naJulius Nyerere kunyangwe zvazvo vange vachida kusvika pakamba yemapurisa yeHarare Central. Zvichakadaro vakaenda kuchikoro vasina mabasa vange varambidzwa nemapurisa kuratidzira mangwana vazobvumidzwa nedare. No media source currently available
title: Dare rePamusoro Rinopa Bato reTransform Zimbabwe Mvumo yeKuratidzira Richiramba maBond Notes

text: Madzimai edunhu reManicaland anoti ari kushushikana zvikuru nekushungurudzwa kwaanoitwa mudzimba. Izvi zvabuda pamusangano waitwa kwaMutare uyo wakarongwa nesangano reTransparency Zimbabwe rakabatana nereConscious Development and Empowerment Trust, kana kuti CODET. Mumwe wevange vari pamusangano maMutare, Amai Violet Murove Mugadza, vati nguva zhinji madzimai anoshungurudzwa haaendi kunomhan’ara kushurudzwa kwavo kumapurisa nepamusana pekuti mapurisa haatori matanho akakodzera. Amai Mugadza vatiwo vanenge vashungurudzwa vanoudzwa kuti vanotore munhu avarova voenda naye kukamba izvo zvisingakwanisike. "Tinosangana nematambudziko emadzimai anorohwa navanababa vasinganomhangari nyaya idzi sezvo dambudziko riri kumapurisa kuti vanoti oyi tsamba iyi, endai munouya nemunhu kana murume wakurova pamwe zvinonzi horaiti tauriranai asi apa ndinenge ndashungurudzwa monzi garai apa munzwanane. Apo tinodzoka zvakare kumba ndinonotanga zvakare kurohwa," vadaro Amai Mugabe. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kutaura nemapurisa vanoona nezvekugarisana zvakanaka kwevanhu munharaunda, vePolice Community Relations Liaison Office, kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi. Mumwe ataura pamusangano uyu, Amai Samatha Marowe, vatiwo vadzidza zvakawanda zvinosanganisira kuti ivo vakainzana nevanhurume pane zvese sezvo zviri mubumbiro remitemo yenyika. Amai Marowe vati madzimai anosungirwa kushanda sezvipangamazano kune vamwe vavo vanenge vachishungurudzwa zvakare vasakurudzire kuroodzwa kwevana vasati vokodzera. "Ndadzidza kodzero dzangu semudzimai kuti ndine masimba ekuve ani nani wandinoda kuita kana zvichiita, ini zvakare ndadzidza kuti ndinokwanisa kuva nekodzero dzangu kuva mudzidzisi, mutungamiriri wenyika uye kusaabhiyuza vana kuti vasaroorwe vari vadiki," vadaro Amai Marowe. Amai Gace Siyahamba vatiwo semadzimai vanosungirwa kubatana nevamwe vachiyamura vakatarisana nekushungurudzwa mudzimba. VaPaul Shekede veCODET vaudza Studio7 kuti musangano wavo wakanangana nekupa dzidziso kumadzimai pamusoro pekodzero dzavo munyaya dzezveupfumi, matongerwo enyika nezvimwe kuitira kuderedza nyaya dzekushungurudzwa kwavo. Madzimai anodarika makumi mana apinda mumisangano wanhasi vachibva kumatunhu anoti Dora, Murowe, Zimunya neRowa mudunhu reManicaland. No media source currently available
title: Madzimai Otaura Nhunha Dzawo kuManicaland

text: Mapato anopikisa anoti haasi kumbovhundutswa nekuchinjwa kwehutungamiriri hwemubato reZanuPF achiti ane chivimbo chekukunda musarudzo dza2018. Mutauriri webato rinopikisa reMovement for Democratic Change, VaObert Gutu, vati vari mubishi rekukurudzira ruzhinji rweZimbabwe kuti vanyorese kuvhota kuti vazovhotera shanduko zvisinei nekuti bato reZanuPF rakachinja mutungamiriri. VaGutu vawedzerawo vakati vari kuramba vachirwisa nyaya dzekuti mitemo ine chekuita nesarudzo ishandurwe kuti kuitwe sarudzo dzine jekerere. Vawedzerawo vakati vachatora mukana uyu kurwisa kusununguka kwenhepfenyuro dzehurumende kuti vakwanisewo kushambadza mashoko ebato ravo zvakasununguka. Mutauriri weMDC inotungamirirwa naVaWelshman Ncube, VaKurauone Chihwayi, vatiwo vane chivimbo chekukunda musarudzo dza2018. VaChihwayi vati mubatanidzwa wavo weMDC Alliance ndodanho guru raive rakamirirwa nevana veZimbabwe saka nekudaro vane chivimbo chekuti mubatanidzwa uyu uchavabatsira mukukunda. VaChihwayi vatiwo kunyange hazvo vaimbove mutungamiriri wenyika nebato reZanu PF, VaRobert Mugabe, vaive dambudziko, vati dambudziko guru munyika ibato reZanu PF. VaChihwayi vati vana veZimbabwe vachakatarisira shanduko chaiyo kwete yekungochinja mutungamiriri weZanu PF. Mutauriri webato rePeople's Democratic Party, VaJacob Mafume, vatiwo kuchinjwa kwemutungamiri weZanu PF hakuchinji huipi hwebato iri. VaMafume vati vachiri kufamba vachitsvaga rutsigiro kuvanhu nemashoko eshanduko yezvokwadi. Mutungamiriri mutsva wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, avo vave kutungamira bato reZanu PF, vari kuvimbisa kugadzirisa matambudziko ari kusanganwa nawo munyika akadai sekushaikwa kwemabasa, huori runyararo, sarudzo dzejekerere huye kushandira ruzhinji izvo zvaigarovimbiswa nemapato anopikisa. No media source currently available
title: Mapato Anopikisa Anoti Achakunda Musarudzo Gore Rinouya

text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vange vachitarisirwa kusvika muJapan nemusi weChina murwendo rwavo rwemazuva mashanu. Asi VaMugabe nemutungamiri weJapan VaShinzo Abe vari kushorwa vose nevamwe nezvekudyidzana kwavo. VaMugabe vari kunzi nevanopikisa vari kusiya munyika nemubato ravo reZanu-PF muine kunetsana kwakanyanya vachienda kunosasana havo kuJapan. KuJapan mamwe mapapepanhau akaita se Japan Times ari kushora VaShinzo achiti varikudyidzana sei naVaMugabe avo vanonzi nevamwe vanotyora kodzero dzevanhu. Bepanhau iri rinoti vakuru muhurumende yenyika yeJapan vati VaMugabe vakakosha mukudyidzana kwenyika iyi neAfrica sezvo vaine chiremerera muAfrica. VaMugabe vari kuenda pamberi pemusangano we Tokyo International Conference on African Development uri kuitwa ku Kenya muna Nyamavhuvhu. KuZimbabwe vehurumende yaVaMugabe vanoti kumutsiridza hukama neJapan kunobatsira kusimudzira hupfumi hwenyika pasi pechirongwa cheZimasset. VaMugabe vakapedzisira kuenda kuJapan muna Kurume gore rapera kumusangano we United Nations World Conference on Disaster and Risk Reduction. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika VaJoy Mabenge vanoti rwendo rwaVaMugabe harwuna charwunoburitsa. Vati zviri nani kuti VaMugabe vaite mushandirapamwe nemhuri yeZimbabwe kuti vagadzirise matambudziko akatarisana nenyika. No media source currently available
title: Rwendo rwaVaMugabe kuJapan Rwoshorwa neVamwe

text: Hurumende, nevemasangano ekunze kusanganisa United Nations, iri kusimbaradza zvirongwa zvehutano kuti zvirwere zvakaita semalaria necholera zvisapararire kuChimanimani neChipinge kwakawirwa nedambudziko recyclone Idai. Cyclone Idai yakauraya vanhu, kuparadza dzimba uye kupwanya zvinhu zvakaita semadhamu, zvibhorani nezvimwe. KuMozambique kune vanhu vakatobatwa nechirewre checholera mushure medutumupengo iri. Hurumende ichishanda neWorld Health Organisation kana kuti WHO iri kupa vanhu mushonga wekunwa kudziviira cholera uye inoti ichaparura chimwe chirongwa chechipiri kubatsira vanhu kudzivirira cholera. Dr Maxwell Rupfutse vanoshanda neWHO vari kukurudzira vanhu kuti vatambire mushonga wavari kupihwa kuti vasatapurirwe chirwere checholera. No media source currently available Vanhu vanosvika zviuru mazana mashanu vari kutarisirwa kupihwa mushonga uyu kuManicaland.
title: Hurumende Ichishanda neWHO Yopa Vanhu vekuManicaland Mushonga weKudzivirira Cholera

text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vayambira vashandi vehurumende kuti vashande nemoyo yavo yose mukusimudzira zvinangwa zvehurumende zvekumutsurudza hupfumi hwenyika. Vachitaura pakuvhura gungano reZimbabwe International Trade Fair zviri pamutemo, VaMnangagwa vati kutaura kusina mabasa kana zviito zvinobatika, hakubatsire nekudaro zvakakosha kuti vashandi vehurumende vazvipire mukusimudzira chinangwa chehurumende yavo chekumutsurudza hupfumi. VaMnangagwa vati avo vanowanikwa vachiramba kushanda sezvinotarisirwa vachaburitswa muhurumende. VaMnangagwa varumbidza ZITF vachiti inobatsira kusimudzira hupfumi hwenyika nekupa hwaro hwekuratidza zvakasiyana-siyana zvinogadzirwa kana kuitwa munyika pamwe nekupa mukana wekuzeya matambudziko ari kusangana nevemabhizimisi. Vati donzvo reZITF rinoenderana nerehurumende yavo rekuti nyika ibudirire munyaya dzezvehupfumi. Vatiwo kunyange hazvo hurumende yavo iri kukoshesa kuvaka hushamwari nenyika dzepasi rose, zvakakosha kuti vemabhizimisi vemuno vasapeta maoko avo asi vatore mikana iripo yekuvandudza makambani avo. Vasati vavhura ZITF, VaMnangagwa vambotora nguva yekushanyira zviratidzwa zvakasiyana-siyana vakati vafadzwa zvikuru nezvavaona. Zvichakadaro vamwe vevari kuratidzira zvigadzirwa zvavo varumbidza gungano iri vachiti rinovapa mukana wekushambadza zvinhu zvavo kuvanhu vakawanda. Mumwe weavo ndiMuzvare Rosemary Vambe avo vanogadzira mbatya dzinoziikanwa kuti African Attire avo vati kambani yavo iri kukura nekuda kwekuti vave nemakore akawanda vachiratidza zvinhu zvavo paZITF. VaBukhosi Ncube vanoshanda neimwe kambani yekuSouth Africa inonzi Voltex iyo inogadzira zvinhu zvemagetsi zvakasiyana-siyana, vati aka ndekekutanga kambani iyi ichiratidza zvainogadzira vachitiwo vanofunga kuti izvi zvichabatsira kuti bhizimisi ravo rikure. Gungano reZITF regore rino ndere chimakumi mashanu nepfumbamwe uye vakuru vakuru vekambani yeZITF vanoti vari kufadzwa nekuti gungano iri riri kuramba richikura kana kuchitariswa huwandu hwevanouya kuzoratidza zvinhu zvavanoita kana kugadzira. No media source currently available
title: VaMnangagwa Vanoti Vachadzinga Vashandi Vanodhonzera Shure Zvinangwa zveHurumende

text: Vadzidzisi vesangano reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, ARTUZ, vapinda muzuva reChina vachifamba netsoka kubva kwaMutare vachienda kuHarare chinangwa chavo chiri chekunosvitsa zvichemo zvavo kuhurumende. Varairidzi ava vanoti kunyange hazvo vari kusangana nezvimhingamupini murwendo rwavo, havasi kuzodzokera shure nekufora kwavo. Kufamba netsoka uku kwakatanga kwaMutare nemusi weSvondo wapfuura. Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri we ARTUZ, Amai Gaundencia Mandiopera, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vadzidzisi ava vari kusangana nematambudziko ezvehutano, zvinosanganisira maronda pasi petsoka, kurwadza kwetsinga dzemakumbo, pamwe chete nehutano hwemadzimai avari kufamba navo. Amai Mandiopera vati vasvika nhasi muHeadlands umo vacharara vachizorora, vozosimudzira rwendo rwavo mangwana kwachena. “Kunetseka kwatasangana nako kushoma zvako nekuti vamwe vadzidzisi vatange tichifamba navo vakakuvara vachiita maronda pasi petsoka nekurwadza netsinga, kana kuti cramps,” Amai Mandiopera vaudza Studio 7. “Chimwe chirikuita sekunetsa zvinhu zvinoshandiswa pahutsanana hwevechidzimai. Zvisinei, vanenge vabatikana tinoti vapinde mumota vachinotimirira mberi vambozorora. Asi tinotenda zvikuru nerutsigiro rwatiri kupiwa nevanhu munzira neavo vanogara padyo nemugwagwa watiri kufamba tiri.” Vadzidzisi ava vanotarisira kusvika kuHarare ne musi weChitatu, 19 Zvita apo vachazoda kusangana negurukota rezvemari, Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube. No media source currently available
title: Vadzidzisi Vanoti Zvimhingamupini Hazvivatadzisi Kupedza Rwendo Rwavo

text: Mumiriri weChiwundura mudare reparamende, VaLivingstone Chimina, vanove zvekare sachigaro wevechidiki mubato reMDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa mudunhu reMidlands South, vamiswa pamberi pedare muGweru nhasi vachipomerwa mhosva yekurova mumwe munhu. VaChimina vamiswa mudare nevamwe vanhu vaviri vanoti Muzvare Leticia Muteliso naVaCharles Machaingira vachipomerwa mhosva yekurova VaThomas Moyo. VaMachaingira mushandi wekanzuru yeGweru. VaChimina naVaMachaingira vakabvunzurudzwa nemapurisa neChishanu paGweru Central Police Station ndokuzonzi vauye kudare asi Muzvare Muteliso vakarara muchitokisi. Vatatu ava vanonzi vaive pakati pevamwe vanhu mazana maviri vari kunzi vakarova VaMoyo nemusi weChina paKudzanai Bus Terminus. Gwaro remapurisa rinoratidza kuti VaMoyo nevamwe vaviri vanoti, VaOshea Mavhiki naMuzvare Rumbidzai Waungana, vakasvika paKudzanai Bus Terminus musi weChitatu vakazodzokerazve panzvimbo iyi musi weChina vachiti vaifanirwa kutora mitero kubva kuma bhazi nemakombi anopinda panzvimbo iyi. Gwaro remapurisa iri rinotiwo nemusi weChina wekare pakauya mhomho yevanhu yakanangana naVaMoyo ichibvunza kuti vaive vapiwa nani mvumo yekutora mitero iyi uye mukusawirirana kwakazoitika pashure VaMoyo vakazorohwa nevamwe vevanhu ava, vakakwanisa kuwona vamhang’arirwi vatatu vari pakati pevanhu ava. Gweta riri kumirira VaChimina naMuzvare Muteliso, VaWellington Davira, vaudza dare kuti Muzvare Muteliso vakatyorerwa kodzero dzavo nekurariswa muchitokisi vakatiwo zvinoshamisa kuti vaviri ava vari kupomerwa mhosva ivo vari ivo vakatanga kuenda kumapurisa kunomhang’arira VaMoyo vacho kuti zvavaive vachiita zvekutora mitero kubva kumakombi nemabhazi zvakange zvisiri pamutemo sezvo VaMoyo vasiri mushandi wekanzuru. Mutongi wedare, Amai Beauty Dube, vabvunzawo muchuchisi wenyaya iyi, VaBernard Nyoni, kuti sei Muzvare Muteliso vakarariswa muchitokisi izvo zvisina kuitika kune vamwe vaviri vari kupomerwa mhosva imwe chete. Muchuchisi Nyoni vati vachaongorora nyaya iyi. VaDavira vatiwo zvinoshamisa kuti mapurisa aunza nyaya iyi kudare pasina humbowo hunobva kumadhokotera hunoratidza kuti VaMoyo vakarohwa sezvavari kutaura vakati vanoshushikana nemaitiro akadai sezvo achiratidza kuti mapurisa haana akuita basa rawo nemazvo. Gweta riri kumirira VaMachingaira, VaShephered Mafa, vati maonero avo ndeekuti mapurisa akabata nyaya iyi aine divi raakarerekera. Vati pavakamhang’arira VaMoyo kumapurisa, VaMachingaira vakaudzwa kunzi nyaya iyi yaive ine zvematongerwo enyika mukati vakatadza kunzwisisa kuti izvi zvairevei. Mutongi wedare ati nyaya iyi ichaunzwa kudare rezvakare musi wa25 Ndira apo panotarisirwa kutarwa zuva rekutanga kutongwa kwayo vakatiwo vatatu ava vachauya kudare vachibva kumba pasina kubhadhariswa mari yechibatiso. Nyanzvi munyaya dzemitemo dzinoti VaChimina vakawanikwa vaine mhosva yavari kupomerwa vanogona kubvisiswa faindi, kana kukandwa mujeri kwemwedzi isingapfuure mitatu. Izvi zvikaitika hazvivhiringi chigaro chaVaChimina muparamende sezvo mutemo uchiti munhu anobviswa pachigaro kana akatongerwa kugara mujeri kwemwedzi mitanhatu kana kudarika. No media source currently available
title: Nhengo yeMDC Inomirira Chiwundura Inomiswa Mudare Ichipomerwa Mhosva yeKurova Munhu

text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe avo vange vachitarisirwa kudzoka munyika nemusi weChitatu kubva kuSingapore kwavakaenda kunorapwa nemusi weChishanu svondo rapera vanonzi vanogona kudzoka nemusi weChishanu kana Mugovera. VaMugabe vanoenda kunorapwa kuchipatara chinonzi Gleneagles chemuSingapore uye aka ndeke chitatu gore rino mutungamiri weenyika achienda kuchipatara ichi. Bazi rinoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko ndiro rakazivisa kuti VaMugabe vaizodzoka pakati pevhiki. Mutauriri waVaMugabe VaGeorge Charamba vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. Asi vanhu vanofanira here kuziva nezvehutano hwemutungamiri wenyika? Gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu VaDewa Mavhinga vanoti vanhu munyika vanofanira kuziva nezvehutano hwemutungamiri wenyika. Vanoti bumbiro remutemo rinotaura kuti munhu anotungamira nyika anofanira kunge aine hutano hwakanaka.
