VaMavhinga vanoti VaMugabe vanoendawo kunorapwa nemari yemitero inobhadharwa nevanhu kuhurumende. Gore rapera VaMugabe vakashandisa mari inodarika mamiriyoni makumi mashanu nematatu kuenda kunze kwenyika kunyangwe bhajeti yavo yainge iri yemari inosvika makumi maviri nematatu.  No media source currently available
title: VaMugabe Votadza Kudzoka Kubva kuSingapore Sezvange Zvataurwa neHurumende

text: Gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu uye vari mukuru we Human Rights Watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica, Va Dewa Mavhinga, vari kushora zvikuru mashoko emutungamiri wenyika, Va Emmerson Mnangagwa, ekuti vanhu vanenge vasina kubayiwa nhomba vanogona kuzotadza kuwana mabasa muhurumende munguva inotevera. Vachitaura vari kuNyamandlovu nemusi weChina, VaMnangagwa vakati zvakare vanhu vasina kubaiwa nhomba iyi vanokwanisa kuzotadza kukwira mabhazi eZupco izo zvashorwa navamavhinga. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rehurumende pamashoko ava Mnangagwa. No media source currently available Asi VaMavhinga vanoti bumbiro remitemo yenyika haribvumidze kuti vanhu vamanikidzwe kuita zvinhu zvakaita sekubaiwa nhomba.\n\n"Pane zvizhinji zvinoitisa kuti munhu ange achitadza kubaiwa nhomba yeCovid-19 zvino zivikanwa pakati pemunhu nachiremba wake saka zvakakosha kuti kodzero dzevanhu dziremekedzwe pasina kutyisidzirwa," VaMavhinga vaudza Studio7. VaMavhinga vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kukoshesa kurudziro inobva kuna Vanachiremba pamusoro penhomba iyi ye Covid-19 kuti veruzhinji vawane vimbo yekuti vabaiwe senzira yekurwisa hukasha wechirwere ichi. No media source currently available
title: Mashoko aVaMnangagwa Kune Vasina Kubayiwa Nhomba yeCovid-19 Oshorwa neVanorwira Kodzero dzeVanhu

text: Sangano rinomirira vanotakura vanhu nezvinhu, reZimbabwe Union of Drivers and Conductors (ZUDCO), rinoti rinofara zvikuru nedanho ratorwa nebazi rinoona nezvekutakurwa kwezvinhu, rakurudzira bazi rekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika kuti ritaurirane nevamwe varo muSouth Africa mushure mekunge South Africa yazivisa kuti vatyairi vekune dzimwe nyika vanoshanda muSouth Africa vanosungirwa kuve nemarezenisi ekutyaira motikari anopiwa nehurumende yeSouth Africa. Mugwaro ravo kumunyori mubazi rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, Ambassador James Manzou, munyori mubazi rezvekutakurwa kwezvunhu, Engineer Thadeus Chinyanga, vakakurudzira kuti bazi rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika ritange hurukuro nevamwe vavo muhurumende yeSouth Africa pamusoro penyaya iyi, vachiti mutemo unoda kudzikwa neSouth Africa uyu ungakonzera kusagadzikana muhupenyu hwevatyairi uye unogona kuvhiringa matakurirwo nemafambisirwo anoita zvunhu mudunhu reSADC. Hurumende yeSouth Africa inonzi iri kuda kudzika mutemo unosungira vatyairi vekune dzimwe nyika vose vanoshanda muSouth Africa kuti vatore marezenisi ekutyaira dzimotikari emu South Africa. Mutungamiri weZimbabwe Union of Drivers and Conductors, VaFredrick Maguramhinga, vanoti vatyairi havakwanisi kutora marezenisi awa muSouth Africa sezvo pachizodiwa magwaro anoratidza kuti mutyairi uyu anogara nekushanda muSouth Africa zviri pamutemo, izvo zvinoda magwaro, vachiti vatyairi vazhinji vanongotumwa kuendesa zvunhu kuSouth Africa vachidzoka, naizvozvo havana magwaro anovakwanisira kuti vatore marezenisi emuSouth Africa. VaMaguramhinga vati sangano ravo rinofara nekutenda zvikuru hurumende mukuteerera kwayaita zvichemo zvevatyairi. Vati, kunyange hazvo pane zvichemo zvizhinji zvinoda kugadziriswa, nhengo dzesangano ravo dzafara kuona kuti hurumende ine chido chekuterera nekuedza kugadzirisa zvichemo zvavo. No media source currently available
title: Sangano reVatyairi Rinotenda Hurumende Mukuedza Kugadzirisa Zvichemo Zvaro neSouth Africa

text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnanangwa vakasimuka nemusi Svondo vakananga kuGlasgow, Scotland kumusangano weUnited Nations wezvemamiriro ekunze kana kuti COPE 26. Kunyangwe hazvo nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika dzichiti misangano yeUnited Nations inoendwa kana nevakatemerwa zvirango, VaMnangagwa nevebatao reZanu-PF vanonzi vari kuita sekunge vakokwa neBritain. Asi VaMnangagwa vanoti vari kutarisira kuita musangano nemutungamiri wehurumende yeBritain vaBoris Johnson nevamwe vatungamiri venyika kumucheto wemusangano uyu. Kumusangano uyu kuri kutarisirwa vatungamiri venyika zana kusanganisira mutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica vaJoe Biden. Vachitaura nezvemusangano uyu, pavhidhiyo padandemutande ravo reTwitter mazuva mashoma adarika, VaMnangagwa vakati Africa yave kutoona kuipa kwekushanduka kwemamiriro ekunze kunyangwe isiri pamberi mukuzvibiswa mweya unofemwa. No media source currently available Asi mukuru wesangano rioona nezvekodzero dzevanhu vari munharaunda dzine zviwanikwa reCentre for Natural Resource Governance VaFarai Maguwu vanoti muromo hauzarirwe nerwizi sezvo VaMnangagwa vari kungotaura zvinhu zvisiri kuitwa nehurumende yavo. No media source currently available
title: VaMnangagwa Voenda kuScotland kuMusangano weZvekushanduka kweMamiriro eKunze

text: Vaimbove vachuchisi vanodarika chiuru nezana vakamboshandira bazi remitemo muAmerica vari kukurudzira kuti muchuchisi mukuru wenyika, Attorney General Willaim Barr, vasiye basa zvichitevera kupindira kwavakaita pakupihwa kwemutongo munyaya yehuori hwakaitwa naVaRoger Stone, vanove shamwari yemutungamiri wenyika, VaDonald Trump. Nyanzvi munyaya dzemitemo idzi dziri kuti Va Barr vakakanganisa zvikuru apo vakapindira mukuderedza mutongo uri kufanirwa kupihwa VaStone nemusi weChina. Vachuchisi vana mubazi rezvemitemo vakanga vakurudzira kuti Va Stone vatongerwe kugara mujeri kwemakore mapfumbamwe, apo vachamiswa mudare nemusi we China. Asi Va Barr nevamwe vakuru vakuru mubazi ravo vakati mutongo uri kuda kupihwa Va Stone wainge wakanyanyisa. VaStone vakawanikwa muna Mbudzi gore rapera vaine mhosva pamhosva nomwe dzavaipomerwa, idzo dzinosanganisira kunyepa pamberi pedare re Congress pamwe nekuvhiringidza humbowo pakuferefetwa kwenyaya inobata sarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika muna 2016. Vachuchisi ava, avo vakashanda muhurumende dzose pasi pebato reRepublican Party nere Democratic Party, vanoti zvakaitwa naVaBarr zvinoratidza kuti vari kuitira dzvene kuna VaTrump Nyanzvi munyaya dzematongerwo enyika, uye vachidzidzisa pa Malone University ku Ohio, Professor Moses Rumano, vanoti zvakaitwa naVaBarr zvinhu zvisingatambirwe munyika ine hutongo hwejechetere. VaRumano vanoti VaBarr vanofanirwa kusiya basa nekuti vari kuratidza kuti vanotora mativi panyaya dzinenge dzichibatwa nebazi ravo. No media source currently available
title: Muchuchisi Mukuru muAmerica, VaWillaim Barr, Vokurudzirwa Kusiya Basa

text: Chirongwa chekunyoresa mazita pachishandiswa mishina yechizvino zvino, kana kuti Biometric Voter Registration, kuitira kuti vanhu vazovhota musarudzo dzegore rinouya, kwaparurwa Harare neChina, pasi rose richiona. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe nemudzimai, Amai Grace Mugabe, ndivo vatanga kunyoresa kuState House, vachizoteverwa nevatevedzeri vemutungamiri wenyika vaviri, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa naVa Phelekezela Mphoko. Chirongwa ichi chatanga kuparurwa kuState House nemutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, avo vati vaparura chirongwa ichi vachitevedzera bumbiro remitemo yenyika. Mushure mekuparura chirongwa ichi kuState House, chirongwa ichi chazoparurwawo kuHarare International Conference Center uko kwanga kuine veruzhinji. Sachigaro weZimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, Amai Rita Makarau, vati sangano ravo ragadzirira zvakakwana kuti vanhu vanyorese senzira yekuti vaumbe gwaro revavhoti idzva. Vatiwo mishina yavanayo ndiyo ichasanoshandiswa vakamirira imwe ichauya. Amai Makarau vati chirongwa ichi chichatanga neMuvhuro mumatunhu makumi matanhatu nematatu. Amai Makarau vati kupiwapachena kwezvitupa nemagwaro ekuzvarwa pamwe nekupiwa magwaro kune avo vane zvitupa zvakanzi Alien kuchabatsira veruzhinji kuti vakwanise kunyoresa pasina mubhadharo, izvo zvichaitwa kwemwedzi mitatu chete. Asi mapato anopikisa aratidza kunyunyuta zvikuru nekutangwa kwegwaro rekuvhota ZEC yacho isina zvakakwana. Amai Makarau vaudza vanhu pavaparura chirongwa ichi kuHarare International Conference Center uko kwanga kwakokwa vemapato anopikisa, vedzisvondo nevamwewo kuti vane mishina mazana mana yekunyoresa vavhoti iko kuchidiwa mishina zviuru zvitatu nemazana mana. Vatiwo havasati vava nedura rekuchengetera zvinenge zviri mugwaro revavhoti, kana kuti servers Munyori mukuru mubato reMDC T, VaDouglas Mwonzora, vati kuparurwa kwechirongwa ichi zvinhu zvisina kukwana imviro-mviro dzekuda kubirira pasarudzo. VaMwonzora vati vatoendesa nyaya iyi kudare redzimhosva. VaMwonzora vatiwo vari kushamiswa kuti sei mapato anopikisa asina kukwokwa kwaparurwa chirongwa ichi naVaMugabe kuState House. Mukuru wesangano rakazvimirira reElectoral Resource Center, VaTawanda Chimhini, vatiwo kunyange hazvo chirongwa ichi chaparurwa vange vaine tarisiro yekuti zvinhu zvese zvinodiwa zvinge zvavapo. Amai Makarau vati panopera chirongwa ichi musi wa15 Ndira 2018,vanhu vachaenderera mberi nekunyoresa asi vanenge vononyoresera kumahofisi akasiyana siyana eZEC. No media source currently available
title: Chirongwa cheBVR Chinoparurwa muHarare

text: Bazi reZimbabwe National Statistics Agency razivisa nhasi kuti inflation kana kuti mutengo wekukwira kwezvinhu wasvika pazvikamu zvishanu nezviga zvina kubva muzana kana kuti 5,4% kubva pazvikamu zvina nezviga zvisere kubva muzana kana kuti 4,8%. Aka ndekekutanga kubva muna 2010 inflation ichikwira zvakanyanya kudai. Mitengo yezvinhu zvekudya kunyanya yakakwira zvakapetwa kaviri mwedzi wapera zvichikonzerwa nekudhura kwedhora rekuAmerica zvichinenzaniswa nemari dzemaBond notes. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi Muzvinafundo Steve H. Hanke, vanodzidzisa zvemari nehupfumi kuJohns Hopkins University, muno mu Amerika vanoti kusvika musi wa 12 mwedzi wakapera, inflation yainge yasvika pa zvikamu mazana vaviri nemakumi mashanu nemashanu kana kuti 225%. Bhanga rinokweretesa mari nyika dzepasirino reInternational Monetary Fund-IMF rinoti kuzosvika mukupera kwe gore kusakosha kwemari kuchange kwave kusvika kuzvikamu zvitanhatu nezvitatu muzana. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Prosper Chitambara vanoti kuzopera kwegore inflation inogona kukwira kupfuura zvikamu zvitanhatu kubva muzana. No media source currently available
title: Inflation Yokwira Zvakanyanyisa neKudhura kweZvinhu

text: Vagari vakawanda vekuMasvingo vanoti vanotarisira kuti hupenyu hwavo huchashanduka mugore idzva ravatarisana naro, sezvo zvinhu zvanga zvisina kumira zvakanaka mugore ra 2017. Vanhu vakawanda vanoti hurumende iri kutunganirirwa na Va Emmerson Mnangagwa ingona kushandura hupenyu hwavo ikapuwa nguva yakakwana gore rinouya nekuti inotaridza kuti iri kuda kuisa mitemo mitsva inogona kuvandudza hupfumi hwenyika. Asi vamwe vanoti hurumende iyi haina mazano ekuvandudza hupfumi hwenyika sezvo VaMnangagwa nevamwe vavo vaive makurukota makuru ehurumende yaitungamirwa naVaRobert Mugabe avo vakabviswa nemautopasi pechirongwa cheOperation Restore Legacy. Mugari vemumusha weRhodene, VaZivanai Chikwanda, vanoti havana tarisiro yekuti hupenyu huchanaka vachiti zvinhu zviri kuwedzera kukwira nekuoma munyika apo hurumende itsva yava nemwedzi iri panyanga. "Mamiriro akaita zvinhu so far, ndikatarisa zvazvakaita pakirisimasi ndiri kuona zvinhu zvazvichinetsa, fuel ichikwira, cash ichishaikwa zvinhu zvichinetsa kutengeka muma shops haa tarisiro yekuti zvinhu zvichanaka becoz ma signs so far anoratidza kuti kwatiri kuenda kunotova nebasa, zvakafita kuti zvichangotiomera nekuti hurumende iri kunzi itsva ndoyanga ingoripo mutongi kubva kare saka inongova sharu yavapo iya," vadaro VaChikwanda. Asi vamwe vane mafungiro akasiyana vachiti hurumende iripo inogona kudzosa hupenyu hwavo sezvo kwave nemazano matsva anogona kuvaka hupfumi hwenyika. VaMunamato Chemhuru mudzidzsi wepachikoro che Great Zimbabwe University, ndemumwe wevamwe vanotarisira shanduko mumararamiro evanhu munyika. Mumwe mugari, VaLovemore Manyanga, vatsigirawo izvi vachiti muna 2018 vanotarisira hupenyu kwahwo, uye mabasa sezvakavimbiswa nemutungmiriri wenyika. Asi VaAlfred Munemo vekwaMucheke vanoti hupenyu huchatooma gore rinouya uye vanotarisira shanduko kana sarudzo dzegore rinouya dzaitwa zvakachena. Nyanzvi munyaya dzeupfumi hwenyika dzinoti zvinhu zvinokwanisa kungonaka chete kana munyika mune mari yekunze uye muchigadzirwa zvekutengesera kunze kwenyika. VaMnangagwa vakavimbisa kuvandudza hupfumi hwenyika pamwe nekugadzirisa zvose zviri kutadzisa nyika kubudirira. No media source currently available
title: Vamwe Voita Tarisiro Yakanaka ya2017 kuMasvingo

text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vasangana neChishanu nemadzishe emumatunhu eMatabeleland North, Matabeleland South pamwe nevamwe vashoma vemudunhu reMidlands vachizeya nyaya dzakasiyana siyana kusanganisira yeGukurahundi pamwe nematambudziko anosangana neveruzhinji kumaruwa. Vachitaura kuvatapi venhau mushure memusangano nemadzishe, VaMnangagwa vati vaita musangano uyu mushure mekunge vakumbirwa nemadzishe ekumatunhu eMatabeleland neMidlands kuti vasangane navo. VaMnangagwa vati vafara kuwana mukana wekusangana nemadzishe kuti vazeye nyaya dzakasiyana siyana kusanganisira nyaya yeGukurahundi pamwe nematambudziko ari kusangana neveruzhinji kumaruwa kusanganisira kushaikwa kwechikafu chakakwana. Vatiwo mamwe matambudziko avakurukura nezvawo anosanganikwa nawo nevamwe vanhu munyika mose vakatiwo mamwe ematambudziko aya anogona kugadziriswa munguva diki asi mamwe anoda nguva yakareba kuti agadziriswe. Asi vatori venhau vabudiswa mumusangano uyu sezvo wanzi wange uri pakati pemutungamiri wenyika nemadzishe aya chete. Mutevedzeri wemukuru wedare remadzishe, Ishe Mtshane Khumalo, avo vataura vakamirira mamwe madzishe, vatenda mutungamiri wenyika nekuwana nguva yekusangana navo. Vati kunyange hazvo madzishe akawanda ange asina kunge agara akaudzwa nezvechinangwa chemusangano uyu, vafara kuti madzishe aya akwanisa kutaura matambudziko aari kusangana nawo mumatunhu avo. Mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvekutongwa kwematunhu, Amai Jennifer Mhlanga, pamwe nemakurukota ematunhu eBulawayo, Matabeleland North neMatabeleland South vange varipowo pamusangano uyu. Mutauriri webato reZAPU, VaIphithule Maphosa, vaudza Studio 7 kuti maonero avo ndeekuti misangano yakadai haina zviri kunyanya kubatsira kana kwakatariswa nyaya yeGukurahundi. Vati zvakakosha kuti VaMnangagwa vatange vakumbira ruregerero uye kuti vaite misangano yakadaro kumamisha uko kunove ndiko kune vanhu vakawanda vakabatwa nenyaya yeGukurahundi. Mumwedzi mishoma yapfuura, VaMnangagwa vakambosangana nevemamwe masangano anoshanda akazvimirira ega vemumatunhu eMatabeleland vachizeya nyaya yeGukurahundi nezvimwe. Asi dzimwe nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika dzinoti kusvikira VaMnangagwa vanyatsobuda pachena pamwe nekukumbira ruregerero pamusoro penyaya iyi, zvimwe zvose zvavanenge vachiita kupedza nguva. Pakaitika Gukurahundi kubva muna 1982, VaMnangagwa ndivo vaive gurukota rezvevasori, iro raive pamberi pakufambiswa kwenyaya dzeGukurahundi. Vanhu vanodarika zviuru makumi maviri vanonzi vakaurayiwa nemauto eFifth Brigade munguva iyi. Nhengo dzeMthwakazi People's Republic dzaratidzira zvisina mutsindo dzichiti VaMnangagwa havakwanise kutungamira munyaya dzine chekuita neGukurahundi. Vaimbove mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vakatsanangura nguva yeGukurahundi senguva yekupenga munguva iyi, asi havana kukumbira ruregerero sezvaitarisirwa nevakawanda. No media source currently available
title: VaMnangagwa Vazeya Nyaya yeGukurahundi neMadzishe ekuMatabeleland neMidlands

text: Mapato anopikisa anoti kusiya basa kwevaimbove mutungamiriri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, kwaavhurira mukana wekutsvaka rutsigiro kumaruwa murunyararo, pasina anokonzeresa mhirizhonga sezvaiitika kare. Mutungamiri weTransform Zimbabwe, VaJacob Ngarivhume, vanoti pari zvino vari kukwanisa kuita misangano yavo vakasununguka kumaruzevha kunyange hazvo pachine kutya muvanhu. VaNgarivhume vanoti panguva yehutongi hwaVaMugabe misangano yezvematongerwo enyika iyi yainetsa kuita sezvo nguva zhinji vainyimwa mvumo nemapurisa yekuungana. VaNgarivhume vanotiwo kunyange masabhuku aivapomera mhosva yekushandiswa neZanu PF kuita zvido zvebato iri, vanoti havasi kunzwisisa kuti vofamba sei mushure mekugadzwa kwaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa. "Nemasabhuku zvakare, havana clear cut instruction yekunzi rambidzai MDC sezvavaipihwa kare. Saka vanhu havasi kunyatsokuziva kuti chii chiri kuitika. Saka kumaruzevha kuri kupindika," vadaro VaNgarivhume. Mutauriri weMDC inotungamirwa naVaWelshman Ncube, VaKurauone Chihwayi, vanoti vari kukwanisa kupinda muvanhu kumaruwa vachinotaura nyaya yekunyoresa kuvhot, " vadaro VaNgarivhume. VaChihwayi vanotiwo vane tarisiro yekuzonosangana nemutungamiriri mutsva wenyika semapato anopikisa kuti vaite nhaurirano dzesarudzo dzejekerere. Mutevedzeri wasachigaro mubato reMDC inotungamirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai, VaMorgan Komichi, vanoti kunyange hazvo kumamisha kuri kupindika, vanhu vachiri kutya huye kunofanirwa kuita zvirongwa zvekugadzirisa dambudziko iri. "Saka ikozvino ukaenda kumaruzevha, element ye fear ichiripo. Hakuna kana munhu aive nemutemo..Mapurisa aitotyawo. Kutya ikoko kunofanirwa kugadziriswa," VaKomichi vanodaro. Sachigaro wesangano rinoongorora mhirizhonga rakazvimirira reZimbabwe Peace Project, VaOkay Machisa, vanotiwo semasangano akazvimiririra vari kutarisira kuti hurumende yaVaMnangagwa ichinje itendedze vamwe vemapato kunotsvaka rutsigiro. Asi VaMachisa vati chimwe chakakosha kubvimidzwa kwemapato anopikisa, kutsvakawo rutsigiro vachishandisa nhepfenyuro nezvivhitivhiti zvehurumende. Vachitaura pakugadzwa kwavo, VaMnangagwa vakavimbisa runyararo munyika huye vakavimbisa sarudzo dzakachena. No media source currently available
title: Mapato Anopikisa Opinda Mumaruwa Akasununguka

text: Muimbi vari mufundisi, Baba Charles Charamba, vanoti vari kufara zvikuru nemafambiro ari kuita zvinhu kukereke idzva yavakaparura mukupera kwegore rapera. Asi vanoti vari kuramba vachinamata kuti Mwari varambe vachivakomborera. Kereke itsva iyi iri kusangana paDavid Livingstone School kuna 9th Steet muHarare inonzi Rooted in Christ Ministries kana kuti RCM. Vanoti chido chavo kuti vakwanise kuvaka kereke chaiyo vachibva pavari ikozvino. Baba Charamba vanoti vakadaidzwawo naKristu kuti vabatiranewo nevamwe vanoda kushumira. Vanotiwo vari kukomborerwa nekuti vanhu vakawanda munyika nemhiri kwemakungwa vari kuratidza kuvatambira asi vati havadi kushandisa mukurumbira wekuimba wokurumidza kumedza kutsenga vachada pakuti kereke yavo ipararire kune dzimwe nzvimbo. Vanoti munguva yaMwari zvichagoneka. No media source currently available
title: Baba Charles Charamba Votaura nezveKereke Yavakavamba

text: Bato reZanu PF rinoti riri kushandisa mbeu, chikafu pamwe nemadzishe kuti vakunde musarudzo ye by election iri kuitwa neMugovera ku Bikita West. Vachitaura pamusangano waitwa paaGwindindwindi Secondary School ku Bikita, VaSavior Kasukuwere, avo vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwebasa muZanu PF, vati vanotenda kuti Zanu PF yakapinza mbeu nechikafu muBikita izvo zvichaita kuti ikunde mamwe mapato musarudzo. Vakasukuwere vati chikafu nembeu zvakabetsera bato ravo kuti rikwezve vatsigiri vanosvika zviuru gumi nezviviri uye vanovimba kuti Zanu PF yatotora nzvimbo ye Bikita West muparamende. VaKusukuwere vatenda basa rakaitwa nevatungamiriri vemauto vaitungamirirwa na Major General Engelbert Rugeje, avo vaifamba vachitsvagira bato rutsigiro. Vachitaurawo pamusangano uyu, sachigaro weZanu PF muMasvingo, Va Amasa Nenjana, vati vanovashoropodza kuti vari kashandisa chikafu vane godo rekuti havana mari uye kana vane mari yavo ngavatengerewo vatsigiri vavo. Mutungamiri wevechidki muBikita anopinda chechi yemapositori, VaJadie Ziki, vatiwo vanhu vasingatsigiri Zanu PF vanotsakatika nekuti inouraya sezvo ine mapurisa nemasoja. Vachitaurawo pamusangano uyu, mumwe wevatevedzeri vemutungamiri wenyika, Va Mpekezela Mphoko, avo vanga vari munyarikani pamusangano uyu, vatiwo vanhu vanofanira kutsigira Zanu PF kuti vape VaMugabe sechipo pabhavhade ravo rekusvitsa makore makumi mapfumbamwe namatatu mwedzi unouya. No media source currently available
title: Zanu PF Yobvuma Kuti Inoshandisa Chikafu neMbeu Ichikwezva Mavhoti

text: Sekuvimbisa kwarakaita svondo rapera kuti raizodira pamusika mapeni egoridhe e Mosi-oa-Tunya ane mutengo wepasi uye huremu hwepasipasi hwe one tenth ye ounce anosvika zviuru zvina nemazana mashanu, kana kuti 4 500, bhanga guru renyika reReserve Bank of Zimbabwe razivisa kuti mapeni aya ave kuwanikwa pamusika. Bhanga guru iri rati mapeni aya ave kukwanisa kutengwa kubva kumabhanga, kuHomelink, pamwe nezvitoro zveAurex kutanga nChipiri 15 Mbudzi 2022. Izvi zvinotevera kutengeswa kwemapeni egoridhe makuru kutanga muna Chikunguru wegore rino pahurongwa hwehurumende neR-B-Z hwekudzikamisa hupfumi hwenyika. Imwe nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi inoshanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Developemnt Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Prosper Chitambara, vanoti vanoona kuuya kwemapeni madikidiki aya kuchipawo mukana kune veruzhinji wekuti vange vachikwanisawo kuchengetedza mari dzavo kuburikidza nemapeni aya. Ukuwo, mukuru werimwe sangano revanotengesera mumigwagwa, reVendors Intiative for Social and Economic Transformation, VISET, VaSamuel Wadzai Mangoma, vanoti hurongwa uhwu hwakanaka chose kana hwakaitwa zvakajeka. Asi vanoti veruzhinji vanotya kuhutambira kana vakacheuka shure vachitarisa zvakamboitika apo hurumende yakadzika zvirongwa zvakazotsvaira nekurovesa mari dzavo dzaive mumabhanga. Izvi zvinotsinhirwa nemunyori mukuru wemumwe mubatanidzwa wemasangano evashandi, weZimbabwe Federation of Trade Unions, ZFTU, VaKennias Shamuyarira, avo vanoti sevashandi, vanotarisira kuti hupfumi hwenyika hunovakwa pamwe nekudzikamiswa nezvigadzirwa zvinobva kumakambani emunyika, kwete kuburikidza vezvirongwa zvakanangana nekudzimura rimi remoto nguva iyoyo chete. VaShamuyarira vanoti zvizhinji zvezvirongwa zvinodzikwa nehurumende izvi zvinogumisira zvatosiya vashandi vave varombo kudarika pazvinenge zvisati zvadzikwa. Hatina kukwanisa kubata gavhuna veR-B-Z, Doctor John Mangudya kuti tinzwe kuti mapeni aya atambirwa sei neveruzhinji. Asi bhanga guru renyika rakavimbisa kare kuti hurongwa hwemapeni egoridhe uhwu hahuna wahunosiya shure, uye huchasvika nzvimbo dzose dzenyika. R-B-Z inoti kutenga mapeni ndeimwe nzira yekudyara nayo mari yakanangana nemunhu wese. Bhanga iri rinoti kubva muna Chikunguru wegore rino kusvika pari nhasi mapeni anodarika zviuru gumi nechimwe, kana kuti 11 000, anokosha madhora emunyika $11,4 billion atengeswa munyika uye mapeni egoridhe aya akwanisa kutsvaira mari dzanga dzichitenderedzwa pamusika mutema izvo zvadzikamisa hupfumi hwenyika pamwe nekuderedza inflation. No media source currently available
title: RBZ Yotanga Kutengesa Mapeni Madukuku eGoridhe Kune Veruzhinji.

text: Vanhu vave kuchema chema nedambudziko rekushomeka kwemafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari mumaguta akawanda munyika zvikuru muHarare. Hurumende yaimbenge yavimbisa kuti ikawadzera mutengo wemafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari zvichabatsira kuti iwanikwe asi izvi zvinenge zvakona n’anga murapwa achida. Nyaya yekuwedzera mafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari nezvikamu zana nemakumi mashanu kubva muzana zvakapa kuti munyika muite kuratidzira zvakazopa kuti mauto apindire vanhu vanosvika gumi nevanomwe vachibva varasikirwa nehupenyu mushure mekupfurwa nevanofungidzirwa kuti mauto nemapurisa. Hurumende ichiri kutatarika kuti iwane mari yekunze yekutenga mafuta aya sechave chigariro musoro wetsuro kushaya nyanga. Gurukota rezvemhando dzemoto Doctor Joram Gumbo vanoti ivo vari kuita basa ravo rekuti mafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari ave mumatura ari pedyo asi panodiwa dhora rekuAmerica iro riri kunetsa kuwana. No media source currently available
title: Dambudziko Rekushomeka kweMafuta Rodzoka Zvekare muNyika

text: Gurukota rezvemari Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube vanoti chirongwa chavo cheTransitional Stabilization Programme chavakaparura makore maviri apfuura kudzikamisa hupfumi chabudirira zvoonekwa nekugadzirwa kwezvivakwa uye mabasa ekubatsira vanoshupika. Asi dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinoti Zimbabwe ichiri kutatarika munyaya dzezvehupfumi. Vachitaura nebepanhau reHerald, VaNcube vanoti chikuru chavakaita kuita kuti musika wekutengeserana mari kana kuti foreign currency auction zvavanoti zvadzikamisa mitengo yezvinhu. Mutungamiri wesangano reConfederation of Zimbabwe Retailers VaDenford Mutashu vanoti ichokwadi mitengo yadzikira. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvemabhanga vari nhengo yeZanu-PF VaGilbert Muponda vanoti ichokwadi kuti pane ziya pane dovi uye nyika yave kukohwa pakuru mushure mekuvandudza zvinhu. Vapa semuenzaniso kugadzirwa kwemigwagwa, uye mabhazi eZUPCO avati ane mutengo wakaderera. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi Muzvinafundo Gift Mugano vanodzidzisa paDurban University of Technology vanoti chirongwa ichi hachina kubudirira nekuti mitengo yezvinhu kana kuti inflation yakatonyanya kukwira uye dhora remunyika rakatowedzera kushaya simba. Chirongwa cheTSP ichi chakaparurwa muna Gumiguru 2018 uye chiri kutarisirwa kupetwa muna Zvita gore rino. Chirongwa ichi chakanzi ihwaro hwekuti Zimbabwe isvike pamuono wayo kana kuti Vision 2030 kuti ive nyika ine vanhu vanokwanisa kuwana mari inosvika zviuru zvitatu nemazana mashanu pamwedzi kana kuti per capita income ye US$3500. Chirongwa ichi chaitarisirawo kuti pavandudzwe mashandiro ehurumende uye kudzikamisa mari inoshandiswa munyika uye kuendesa masimba kumatunhu, kuripa varimi vachena nekuvandudza makambani ari pasi pehurumende uye kukwezva vekunze. Pachinopera panenge pave nezvirongwa zvemakore mashanu kana kuti 5-year development programme kutanga muna 2021 kusvika 2025. Ko chirongwa ichi chave nemichero here sezviri kutaurwa naVaNcube kana kuti inongova gudziramukanwa. No media source currently available
title: Chirongwa chaVaMthuli Ncube Chekugadzira Hupfumi Chokonzera Makakatanwa

text: Mapurisa nhasi arova zvakaipisisa nekusunga vadzidzi vepaUniversity of Zimbabwe vange vachiratidzira kusafara kwavo nemari dzechikoro dzakawedzerwa. Mutauriri wemapurisa Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi vati vange vasati vapirwa nezvenyaya iyi. Gweta revadzidzi ava Amai Nontokozo Dube Tachiona vanova nhengo yeZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights vaudza Studio 7 kuti vadzidzi gumi vasungwa uye vaendeswa kuHarare Central Police Station kwavari kupomerwa mhosva dzekutyora mutemo we Maintenance of Peace and Order Act kana kuti MOPA. Munyori anoona nezvemitemo musangano rinomiririra vadzidzi munyika yose reZimbabwe National Students Union VaBoris Tadiwanashe Muguti vaudza Studio 7 kuti kunyangwe vakasungwa havasi kuzodududza panyaya yekuti mari dzechikoro dzidzikiswe. No media source currently available
title: Vadzidzi Gumi VepaUniversity of Zimbawe Vosungwa Mushure Mekuratidzira

text: Vemasangano akazvimirira akawanda anosanganisira Crisis in Zimbabwe Coalition, Zimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, neZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights vakurudzira neChishanu kuti hurumende iburitse muhusungwa hutungamiri hwerimwe remasangano anomirira vanotengesera mumigwagwa. No media source currently available Vari muhusungwa vri kunzi vaburitswe pasina mhosva dzavapomerwa mukuru weNational Vendors Union of Zimbabwe, VaSamuel Wadzayi pamwe nemutungamiri wesangano iri, VaStan Zvorwadza. VaMarvellous Khumalo, avo vanove mutauriri wesangano remubatanidzwa wemasangano evagari munharaunda yeHarare, Chitungwiza, Ruwa neNorton, reHarare Metropolitan Residents Forum, vanoti semasangano akazvimirira, vaita musangano nevatori venhau kuMedia Center muHarare, vakazoenda kujeri re Harare Remand Prison uko kwakachengeterwa VaZvorwadza, naVaWadzayi, pamwe nevamwe vanotengesa ava vechirume. Madzimai anonzi akachengeterwa kuChikurubi Remand Prison. Vanhu ava vakasungwa masvondo maviri apfuura vachipomerwa mhosva yekukonzera mhirizhonga, mushure mekunge varamba kubuda mumigwagwa mavari kutengesera. Pari zvino vanotengesa vanosvika makumi maviri ndivo vanonzi vachiri muhusungwa, uye vari kutarisirwa kudzokera kudare musi wa 4 Nyamavhuvhu.
title: Hurumende Yokurudzirwa Kuburitsa Mujeri Vanotengesa Mumigwagwa

text:
Vanhu vairarama nekutakura vanhu nemichovha yavo vanoti vakashaya bhizinisi nguva yekuvharwa kwenyika senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kweCovid-19, izvo zvakakonzera kuti vakawanda vavo vatengese motokari dzavo vamwe vachitozorwara. Vachitaura pamusangano wavaita nevatori venhau wakakokerwa neboka revapepeti venhau reZimbabwe National Editors Forum-ZINEF, mukuru wevemabhizinisi evanotakura vanhu nemotokari muChinhoyi VaEnirod Kawunda vanoti dzimwe nhengo dzavo dzakatengesa motokari dzadzo kuti dziwane mari yekurarama. VaKawunda vanoti vamwewo ndivo vave kurwara nezvirwere zveshuga BP kana kuti Hypertension. VaKawunda vanoti nhengo dzavo dzinosvika zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana dzakatadza kudzoka kumabasa pakazovhurwa nyika zvakare. Mumwe wevanotyaira motokari avo vakatanga kutakura vanhu mwedzi wapera vanoti vari kutadza kuterera marezinesi ekufamba mumigwagwa sezvo vakatora nguva vasingashande. Vanotakura vanhu nedzimotokari vanosungirwa kubhadhara mari dzemarezinesi dzinosvika madhora mazana matatu emari yemunyika, kana kuti ZWL$300.00 negwaro remvumo yekutakura vanhu, kana kuti permit, rinoita madhora mazana mana nechidimbu kana kuti ZWL$450,00 Hurumemende yakazivisa kuti vose vanoita bhizinisi rekutakura vanhu vanofanirwa kunyoresa nekambani yeZimbabwe United Passengers Company, ZUPCO, iyo yagara ndiyo inotakura veruzhinji. Asi vanotakura vanhu ava vanoti havakwanise kunyoresa sezvo motokari dzavo dzichibvumidzwa kutakura vanhu vashoma, munhu mumwechete kana vaviri. Vachitaura pamusangano mumwechete mukuru wevemabhizinisi madiki mudunhu reMashonaland West, VaJoconiah Choto, vati nhengo dzavo dzinosvika mazana matatu dziri kutambura sezvo pasina kana nhengo yavo yakayamurwa nehurumende kunyangwe vakanyoresa mazita sezvakakurudzirwa nebazi rezvemabhizinisi madiki neari pakati nepakati. Hurumende yainge yavimbisa kuti vanhu vose vakakanganisirwa raramo yavo nechirwere cheCovid-19 vaizoyamurwa nemari yekutenga zvekudya. Gurukota rezvekugara zvakanaka kwevanhu, VaPaul Mavima vakabvuma kuti hurongwa hwekuyamura vanhu huri kutora nguva husati hwatanga, danho ravanoti vachagadzirisa. No media source currently available Mune imwewo nyaya, paita ropa rakaipa pakati pemakanzura
ebato reMDC Alliance muChinhoyi zvichitevera sarudzo dzameya weguta dzaitwa nhasi masikati. Kunyange hazvo nhengo yebato reMDC Alliance, VaGarikayi Dendera, vakunda nhengo yeZanu PF VaVoster Mashevedzanwa nemavhoti mashanu,
VaMashevedzanwa vachiwana mavhoti mana, mamwe makanzura havana kufara kuti pane vamwe wavo, mumwechete kana vaviri, vavhotera kanzura weZanu PF uyu. Chinhoyi ine makunzura gumi nemashanu, bato reMDC Alliance rine
makanzura gumi nevaviri, Zanu PF iine vaviri pamwe nakanzura mumwechete akazvimiririra. Mukokeri wemisangano mubato reMDC Alliance mudunhu
reMashonaland West uye vari mumwe wemakanzura akadzingwa basa, VaMukudzei Chigumbura, vanoti bato ravo richatora matanho nezvabuda musarudzo dzameya idzi. VaChigumbura vanoti bato ravo rinofara kuti makanzura akawanda ari
kutsigira mutungamiri webato VaNelson Chamisa.

Vasarudzwa kuva meya, VaDendera, vanoti zvaratidza kuti pane dzimwe
nhengo dzavo dzinove mukanzuru dziri kunyepera kuti dzinotsigira VaChamisa idzo dzsiri. Munyori mukuru mubato reMDC-T, VaDouglas Mwonzora vati vanhu vari
kutyisidzirwa nekumanikidzwa kuvhotera nhengo dzavasingade nebato
reMDC Alliance. Asi mutevedzeri wemutauriri weMDC Alliance, VaClifford Hlatswayo vanoti
bato ravo rinochengetedza kodzero dzevanhu.

Sarudzo dzanhasi dzaitwa zvichitevera kudzingwa kwemakanzura matanhatu kusanganisira meya, VaMakumbe nemutevedzeri wavo Amai Chipo Mlotswa, nebato re MDC-T. Amai Mercy Mada vasarudzwa kuve mutevedzeri wameya.
title: Vemichovha muChinhoyi Vochema Kuti Vakarasikirwa neBhizinesi Nekuda kweCovid-19

text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vaburitsa mashoko kuvatori venhau vachiti vaimbova mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vari muchipatara kuSingapore. VaMnangagaw vati vanachiremba vavo rwendo rwuno vati vanoda nguva yekuvavheneka nekudaro vange vari muchipatara kubva muna Kubvumbi. VaMnangagwa vati svondo rapera vakatumira nhumwa dzavo kuSingapore kunoona kuti VaMugabe vari kunzwa sei. Vakatumirwa vanosanganisa munyori mukuru mudare reparamende Doctor Misheck Sibanda, chiremba waVaMugabe kwenguva yakareba Muzvinafundo Jonathan Matenga uye mukuru muhofisi yaVaMnangagwa VaIsaac Moyo. VaMnangagwa vati vanhu ava vakavaudza kuti VaMugabe vave kunzwa zviri nani. Nhumwa idzi dzinonzi dzakati VaMugabe vanogona kuburitswa muchipatara chero nguva. VaMnangagwa vakurudzira vemachechi kuti varambe vachinamatira VaMugabe.
title: VaMnangagwa Vanoti VaMugabe Vave neMwedzi Mina Vachirapwa kuSingapore

text: Komiti yedare reSenate inoona nezveHIV/AIDS pamwe nekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvehutano dzaratidza kusafara mushure mekunge kambani yehurumende yemishonga, yeNational Pharmaceutical Company of Zimbabwe, Natpharm,, yapa huchapupu hwekuti mishonga inotorwa nevanorarama nehutachiona hweHIV/AIDS munyika iripo inokwana. Komiti mbiri idzi dzanga dzadaidza vanhu vakasiyana-siyana vane chekuita nekuwaniswa kwemishonga yema Anti-Retroviral Therapy, kana kuti ART, munyika kuti vanzwe pamusoro petsamba yenyunyuto yakanyorwa nesangano revanorarama neHIV/AIDS vachiti mishonga yavanonwa iri kunetsa munyika. Vanga vadanwa kuzopa huchapupu vanosanganisira National Aids Council, Natpharm, Medicines Control Authority of Zimbabwe pamwe ne Zimbabwe Country Coordinating Mechanism for Global Fund. VaLameck Chipo Mwaramba, avo vanga vakamirira NatPharm, vati havana dambudziko remishonga yeART iyi. Asi izvi zvarambwa naVaOscar Mundida, vanove murongi wezvirongwa zveGlobal Fund munyika kana kuti Zimbabwe Country Coordinating Mechanism for Global Fund, avo vanoti mishonga mishoma uye zviri kuitwa zvekupa vanhu mishonga yemavhiki maviri hazvitarisirwi. VaMundida vati kana zvinhu zvakanaka munyika vari pamishonga iyi vanofanirwa kupiwa mishonga yemwedzi miviri kana mitatu. VaMundida vatorawo mukana kutsanangura kuti mari yakawanikwa neZimbabwe kubva kuGlobal Fund (2018-2020) inodarika zvishoma madhora mamiriyoni mazana mashanu inopiwa yese asiwo vakati hurumende yeZimbabwe yakavimbisawo kuti parubatsiro rwavakapiwa urwu ichaisawo madhora mamiriyoni makumi matatu ane mazana matanhatu kubatsira munyaya yehutano. No media source currently available Asi Nationa Aids Council yati pamari iyi hurumende yakaisa madhora zviuru mazana matatu chete kusvika pari zvino VaAlbert Manenji, vanove vakafanobata chigaro chemukuru weNational Aids Council, vanga vataurawo kuti sangano ravo harina mari yekunze yekutenga mishonga inozivikanwa kunzi ye 2nd line drugs. Kusabuda pachena kweNatpharm uku kwasiya dzimwe nhengo dzeparamende neseneti dzichitsutsumwa nekusabuda pachena uku. Senator Lilian Timveous vekudunhu reMidlands vari veMDC vayeuchidza VaMwaramba kuti vanofanirwa kutaura chokwadi sezvo vanga vatora mhiko izvo zvatsigirwa nedzimwe nhengo. Zvichakadaro kune vamwewo vari kunyunyuta nekuenda kwegurukota rezveutano Doctor Obadiah Moyo kuNewYork kumusangano weUnited Nations zvinhu zvakaita panyama amire nerongo muzvipatara zvehurumende. VaVivid Gwede vanoti VaMoyo vanga vachifanirwa kutanga vaona kuti kuzvipatara kwave navanachiremba. Vanachiremba havasi kuenda kumabasa vachiti havana zvikwanisiro zvekuti vashandise kuenda kunzvimbo dzavanoshandira.
title: Kambani yeNatPharm Inoramba Kuti Nyika Yopererwa neMishonga yeHIV/Aids

text: Mapato ose anopikisa ari kurwira kuti mitemo ine chekuita nesarudzo ivandudzwe anonzi ane hurongwa hwekusangana nemutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, munguva pfupi inotevera, kuti asvitse zvinyunyuto zvaainazvo pamusoro pemitemo ine chekuita nesarudzo. Munyori anoona nezvesarudzo muMDC T, VaMurisi Zwizwai, vanoti mapato anopikisa aya ari kutarisirwa kusangana nemusi weChina svondo rino kuti arovane misoro pamusoro pehurongwa hwekusangana naVaMugabe uhwu. VaZwizwai vanoti zvavanotarisira kusvitsa kuna VaMugabe inyaya dzakaita sekumbunyikidzwa kwevanhu, zvikuru nemadzishe nemasabhuku, kupindira kwemauto nemapurisa musarudzo, pamwe nenyaya yekushaiswa kwemapato anopikisa mikana yekushandisawo nhepfenyuro yeZBC pamwe nemapepanhau ari pasi pehurumende. VaZwizwai vanoti sebato reMDC-T vagutsikana nezvabuda mukuedzwa kwemichina yeBVR iyi muzuva repiri pachikoro cheMurape High chiri kumaruwa ekwaSeke, uye neMuvhuro paMabvuku High School. Vanotiwo vanoona sekunge pachine nguva inokwana yekuti michina iyi itengwe, igopinzwa munyika, vanhu vachizotanga kunyoresa sarudzo dzisati dzasvika. No media source currently available
title: Mapato Anopikisa Oronga Kusangana neMutungamiri weNyika VaMugabe

text: Munyori anoona nezvekurongwa kwemisangano muZanu PF, VaSaviour Kasukuwere, varamba chikumbiro chebato ravo muManicaland chekuti nhengo dzeparamende dzinonzi dzinotsigira VaDidymus Mutasa, dzidzingwe mubato. Izvi zvinotevera musangano waitwa kwaMutare neMuvhuro. No media source currently available VaKasukuwere vaudza Studio7 mushure memusangano uyu kuti hapana nhengo yeZanu PF ichadzingwa mubato sezvo Zanu PF yakabuda nechisungo chekuti haichadzinga vanhu zvichitevera kupera kwakaita kongiresi muna Zvita. VaKasukuwere vati vakadzingwa mubato ndiVaJabulani Sibanda, avo vaive mutungamiri wevaimbove varwiri verusununguko, pamwe nevaimbove mutauriri weZanu PF, VaRugare Gumbo. VaKasukuwere vanoti Zanu PF haina humwe hurongwa hwekudzinga nhengo dzakabviswa nyembe mumazuva apera kwete. VaKasukuwere vanoti zviri kuitwa kunhengo dzisati dzadzingwa mubato iri kurangwa chete nezvavanopomerwa kuti vakaita, asi havasi kuzodzingwa mubato iri sezviri kutaurwa nevamwe vemuZanu PF. Mashoko aVaKasukuwere anotevera mashoko evakasanobata chigaro chasachigaro weZanu PF mudunhu reManicaland, VaSamuel Undenge, avo vaudza musangano uyu kuti dunhu reManicaland rainge rabuda nechisungo chekuti vose vaitsigira vaimbove mutevedzeri wemutungamiriri wenyika. Amai Joice Mujuru, uye vaiva munyori wezvemabasa, VaDiydymus Mutasa, vadzingwe mubato reZanu PF. VaUndenge vaudza VaKasukuwere kuti dunhu reManicaland rinoda kuti nhenge dzeZanu PF dzakaita saVaMunacho Mutezo, mumiriri weChimanimani West mudare reparamende vadzingwe mubato uye vasamirire Zanu PF muparamende. VaUndenge vanga vaudzazve VaKasukuwere kuti dunhu reManicaland rinoda kuti VaMutasa vadzingwe zvachose mubato reZanu PF nekupamusana pemashonga avainge vanyora vachitsoropodza kongiresi yechitanhatu yeZanu PF yakaitwa muna Zvita. Asi kurudziro iyi yarambwa kutambirwa naVaKasukuwere vachiti bato haringaputsi chisungo charakaita. Zvichitevera kusataura neinzwi rimwe chete mudunhu reManicaland maererano nezviri kuda kuitwa kunhengo dziri kupomerwa mhosva yekuti dziri kuchikwata chinozivikanwa nekuti Gamatox, Amai Oppah Muchinguri Kashiri, imwe nhengo yeCentral Committee, varamba kutaura nezvenyaya iyi vachiti zvakataurwa naVaUndenge ndiwo maonero edunhu ravo. Imwe nhengo yeCentral Committee, VaSupa Mandiwanzira, varamba kutaura pamusoro penyaya iyi vachiti titaure nemutevedzeri wemutauriri webato, VaOliver Mandipaka, avo tisina kukwanisa kutaura navo. Dzimwe nhengo dzeZanu PF dzange dziri pamusangano uyu dzinosanganisira VaPatrick Chinamasa, VaKudzi Chipanga, VaChris Mushowe nevamwe.
title: VaKasukuwere Vanoudza Dunhu reManicaland Kuti VaMutasa Havadzingwe muZanu PF

text: lMutungamiri wenyika yeSri Lanka VaGotabaya Rajapaksa nevanotungamira hurumende VaRanil Wickremesinghe vanoti vakagadzirira kusiya basa mushure mekunge vanhu vemunyika iyi varatidzira zvakasimba muguta guru renyika iyi reColombo. Vanhu ava vapinda zvine chisimba pamuzinda wemutungamiri wenyika iyi. Vanhu vemunyika iyi havasi kufara nemamiriro ezvehupfumi
title: Vanhu Vopinda Zvine Chisimba paMuzinda weMutungamiri weNyika yeSri Lanka

text: Vanhu vakawanda vashanyira mapako emuChinhoyi kudarika mamwe mazuva ezororo. Vakawanda vevanhu vapinda mumapako ane mukurumbira wepasi rose vagari vemunyika, kwete vanhu vekunze kwenyika. Vanhu vabvakachira mapako emuChinhoyi vanga vachiita zvakasiyana siyana zvinosanganisira kuona dziva riri mumapako rinonzi Fallen Pool iro rinonzi rinoera, kushambira pamwe nekufara vachigocha nyama nekudya twunonaka. Mumwe wevashanyira nzvimbo iyi nhasi ndiAmai Benhilda Svosve avo vanobva kuKadoma. Amai Svosve vanoti vasarudza kubvakachira mapako emuChinhoyi nekuti kune nzvimbo yakakura yekuti vana vanotamba vakasununguka. Amai Svosve vanoti mapako eChinhoyi ane nhoroondo inodzidziswa muzvikoro zvekuti mwana wavo musikana aona zvaakadzidza kuchikoro. Mumwe abvakachira nzvimbo iyi mudzimai anoda kudanwa kunzi Amai Cleopatra. Amai Cleopatra vanoti kunyange zvinhu zvakaoma mari isingakwane, vanoti vakazvipira kuti vaende kuzororo kunofara nemhuri yavo. Mumwe wechidiki uyo anga achishambira muduhwino riri pamapako eChinhoyi, VaVincent Nyengerai, vanoti vakwanisa kuenda kunoona mapako eChinhoyi kubva kwaMutare sezvo vaichengeta mari iyi zvishoma nezvishoma gore rose. VaMacdonald Chirenje vanoti vafarawo kuti mari yekupinda kunoona mapako yanga yakadzika zvanga zvichikwanisika. Bazi reZimbabwe Parks and Wildlife ranga rakadzikisa mari yekuona mapako kubva pamadhora mashanu kusvika pamadhora matatu uye mari yekushambira kubva pamadhora matatu kusvika pamadhora maviri kana munhu ari mukuru. Vana vanga vachibhadhara dhora rimwechete kushambira uye rimwe dhora kuona mapako. Mukuru anoona nezvemapako eChinhoyi vachishanda nebazi reZimbabwe Parks and Wildlife, VaJohannes Munetsi, vanoti vanofara kuti nzvimbo yavo iri kukwanisa kukwezva vanhu vemunyika. VaMunetsi vanoti zvakakosha kuti vatange kufadza vanhu vemunyika kutanga vozotevera vekunze sezvo vakawandisa. No media source currently available
title: Vanhu Vanoshanyira Mapako eChinhoyi Caves

text: Chechi yeCentral Methodist muJohannesburg South Africa iyo yange ichichengeta zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri muhupoteri zvinodarika mazana mashanu yave kubvisa vapoteri ava mukupera kwemwedzi uno. Chechi iyi yave nemakore gumi nemana ichichengeta zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri muhupoteri muSouth Africa. Bishop Paul Verryn avo vange vachibatsira kuchengeta vapoteri ava vanoti vari kushushikana zvakanyanya nekuvharwa kwechechi iyi. Vamwe vakuru vechechi iyi kuchamhembe kweAfrica vanonzi vange vachigunun'unawo kuti chechi yainge yaita chikwereti chemamiriyoni maviri emaRands nekuda kwevapoteri ava. Vakuru ava vanoti ikozvino vave kuda kuti chechi ifambire mberi pasina vapoteri vanenge varipo. Vamwe vari kugara pachechi iyi, VaNoel Muguti, vanoti pari zvino havasati vawana pekugara uye vari kushungurudzika kuti vachaita seyi mumazuva maviri anotevera. VaMuguti vanoti vange vagara pachechi iyi kwemakore akawanda uye vange vachiwana rubatsiro rwekuti vakanganwe kushungurudzwa kwavanoti vakaitwa muna 2008 munguva yesarudzo. VaMuguti vaimiririra MDC kuGokwe neMbudziya uye vanoti vakaitwa kafiramberi zvakapa kuti vaende muhupoteri. Mumwe mukomana akapfuurawo nepachechi iyi, Brian Moyo, uyo akambogara mumugwagwa asi ave kuita zvidzidzo zvemitemo anoti vanhu vakawanda vachanonga svozve nemuromo nekuti chechi iyi yange iri chirera nherera. No media source currently available No media source currently available Bishop Verryn vanoti vachayedza nepose pavanogona napo kuitira kuti vakwanise kuwanira vapoteri ava pamwe pekugara.
title: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe Zvoshushikana neKubviswa paChechi yeMethodist muSouth Africa

text: Vanoongorora mashandisirwo emari nehurumende makambani ayo nemakanzuru kana kuti Auditor-General, Amai Mildred Chiri, vanoti huwori, kusatevedza mutemo pakushandiswa kwemari pamwe nekushandisa mari yakawandisa kudarika yaive mubhajeti, zvimwe zvezvinhu zvavakabata muongororo yavakaita. Vachiparura gwaro reongororo yavo yegaore rapera, Amai Chiri vati hurumende yakapfurikidza mari yayaifanira kushandisa nemadhora mabhiriyoni maviri nechidimbu uye kusvika pari zvino, haisati yaenda kuparamende kunogadzirisa nyaya iyi sezvinodiwa nemutemo. Hurumende yafanira kushandisa mabhiriyoni mana nemazana matanhatu ezviuru zvemadhora asi iyo ikashandisa madhora mamabhiriyoni manomwe nechidimbu isina mvumo yeparamende. Vatiwo mapazi ehurumende aishandisa mari zvisina mwero kana zvaisina kurongerwa uye mune mamwe mapazi, vakatoshaya humbowo hunoratidza kuti mari yakashandiswei. Semuenzaniso, Amai Chiri vati pane mamiriyoni maviri nechidimbu chemadhora akashandiswa nemapazi ehurumende kutenga motokari, majenerata nezvimwe asi zvinhu izvi hazvina kuendeswa kumapazi aya. Vatiwo bazi redzidzo yePrimary neSecondary rakapihwa mamiriyoni matanhatu emadhora eku America kuti rigadzirise nyaya dzekuronga zvidzidzo kana kuti Curriculum Development asi mari iyi yakashandiswa zvimwe. Vatiwo pazana rezviuru zvemadhora rafanira kupihwa vana sorojena, zviuru makumi matatu nezvisere ndiyo yega yavakapihwa uye imwe yese yakashandiswa nevekumahofisi egurukota rezvevashandi kubhadhara mahotera nekufamba kuenda kumisangano Amai Chiri vatiwo zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka mumakambani ehurumende umo vanhu vari kuita madiro eJojina vachipfachura mari inofanira kubatsira veruzhinji nenyika. Semuenzaniso vati Grain Marketing Board yakabhadhara miriyoni yemadhora yekutenga chibage gore rapfuura, uye kusvika nanhasi chibage ichi hachisati chauya uye hapana anoziva kuti chichauya here. Vatiwo ZESA yakabhadhara mamiriyoni mashanu emadhora ekuAmerica kukambani yePito Investments, iri mari yekutenga maTransformer makore mapfumbabwe apfuura, asi kusvika nhasi maTransformer aya haasati auya. Vatiwo zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka kumakunzuru uko makanzuru akawanda munyika asiri kufambisa basa zvakanaka pamwe nekushandisa mari zvisina mwero. Asi vati muhuwori hwese huri kuitika kune mamwe makakanzuru akaita sePfura iyo iri kuita basa rinodadisa. Vatiwo zvinosuwisa kuti mari dziri kushandiswa zvisina mwero, kubiwa kana kushandiswa zvisina mature, asi vanhu vachitambura munyika. Amai Chiri vati kushaikwa kwemari kwakakanganisa mabasa ehutano munyika uyewo pamaAmbulance ese ari mubazi rezvekutano 242, 134 chete ndiwo aishanda. Vatiwo kushaikwa kwemari kwakaita kuti bazi iri rirasikrwe nevarapi pamwe nekutadza kutenga mishonga. Vanoongorora nyaya dzepfumi vakazvimirira, VaMasimba Kuchera, vaudza Studio 7 kuti hapana chinoshamisa pagwaro raAmai Chiri nekuti ndizvo zvavanogaro taura gore rega rega pasina anovateerera. Vati gwaro iri rinofanira kushandiswa mukurwisa huwori. Vati zvinosuwisa kuti vanhu vanoita huwori vanoregwa vachingofamba asi paine humbowo hwakaita sehuri mugwaro raAuditor – General. Amai Chiri vati gwaro ravo rakaendeswa kuparamende uyewo vachiriendesa kukomisheni inorwisa huwori yeZimbabwe Anti-Corruption Commission. No media source currently available
title: Huwori Hunotyisa Hworamba Hwuchiitwa neMapazi eHurumende

text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, nhasi vanyevenutsa zvikuru mitemo yeCovid-19 kubva paNational Lockdown Level Four kusvika paNational Lockdown Level Two. Vachizivisa nezvedanho iri, VaMnangagwa vati mabhimisi ave kuvhura kutanga nguva dza8 mangwanani kusvika kunguva dza7 manheru kozoti mabhawa emu mahotera achavhura na8 mangwanani achivhara na10 manheru. Zvitoro zvinotengeswa doro zvava kubvumidzwa kushanda kubva na10 mangwanani kusvika na4 masikati kozotiwo mamwe mabhawa acharamba akavharwa. Vatiwo vanhu vave kubvumidzwa kufamba vachienda kumadhorobha akasiyana siyana. VaMnangagwa vati magungano ave kubvimidzwa kuve nevanhu vasingadarike zana uye pamabasa pachange pave kubvumidzwa zvikamu makumi mashanu kubva muzana zvevashandi vese. Vatiwo vanouya munyika vachibva kune dzimwe nyika vanosungirwa kunge vaongororwa hutachiwona hweCovid-19 vachishandisa PCR mukati memaawa makumi mana nemasere vasati vapinda munyika. VaMnangagwa vati denda reCovid-19 richipo nekudaro vanhu vanofanirwa kuchenjerera nekutevedza nzira dzekudziviriri denda iri zvikuru sei mushure mekunge bazi reWorld Health Organisation razivisa kuti pave neimwe mhando yeCovid-19 inobata vanhu nyore. VaMnangagwa vati vachaongorora kuti zvinhu zvinenge zvakamira sei mukati memasvondo maviri anotevera. Mutungamiriri wesangano reConfederation of Zimbabwe Retailers, VaDenford Mutashu, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vafara nedanho ratorwa nehurumende vachiti vange vakatoisa chikumbiro chekuti nguva yekuita basa iwedzerwe. Vati vemabhizimisi vange vari kubayisa vashandi vavo nhomba yeCovid-19 uye chasara kuti vatengi vabayiwewo kuitira kuti chirwere ichi chisarambe chichipararira munyika. Sachigaro wemachiremba anoshanda akazvimirira, Dr Johannes Marisa, vaudza Studio 7 kuti danho ratorwa nehurumende rakanaka chose asi vakati vanhu havafaniri kurasa muswe sezvo denda reCovid-19 richiripo. Vaive gurukota rezvehutano panguva yehurumende yemubatanidzwa zvakare, uye vari munyori wezvehutano muMDC Alliance, Dr Henry Madzorera, vaudza Studio 7 kuti dai nyika yavhurwa kuitira kuti vanhu vaite mabasa anovararamisa asi vachitevedzera mitemo yeCovid-19. Hurumende yakazivisa nezuro kuti vanhu gumi nemumwe chete vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19, uye vanhu zana nemakumi maviri nemumwe chete vakabatwa neCovid-19 nezuro vwakare. Vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vakanga vava zviuru zvina nemazana mana nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevatatu (4 493), uye vabatwa nechirwere ichi vakanga vava zviuru zana nemakumi maviri nezvishanu nemazana matanhatu nemakumi manomwe nemumwe chete, (125 671). Kusvika mukupera kwezuva nezuro vanhu mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana manomwe nemakumi maviri nezvipfumbabwe nemazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi mashanu nemashanu,( 2 729 955) vainge vabayiwa nhomba yekutanga uye miriyoni nezviuru zvinomwe nemakumi maviri nezvisere nemazana manomwe nemakumi mapfumbabwe nevanomwe, (1 728 797) vainge vabayiwa nhomba yepiri. Huwandu uhu hunogona kukwira nhasi manheru apo hurumende ichazivisa zvayawana muongororo dzaitwa nhasi. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana kuitira kuti Covid-19 isarambe ichipararira munyika. Zimbabwe yava nenhomba mamiriyoni gumi nematatu dzapinda munyika. No media source currently available
title: Hurumende Inonyevenutsa Mitemo yeLockdown

text: Rimwe sangano revanotengesa mumigwagwa rinoti nhengo dzaro hadzisi kuzobvuma kumbunyikidzwa nevezvematongerwo enyika avo vanonzi vari kuda kuti vanotengesera mumigwagwa yemukati medhorobha reHarare vabviswe vachinzi vari kukanganisa mafambiro ezvinhu. Vachipindura kukurudziro yedzimwe nhengo dzeparamende dzinonzi dzakati vanhu vanotengesera mumigwagwa vanofanirwa kubviswa, mukuru wesangano reNational Vendors Union Zimbabwe, VaSamuel Wadzayi, vanoti vezvematomngerwo enyika vari kukanganwa kuti ndivo vakonzeresa matambudziko ari kutarisana nevanhu zvaita kuti munhu wese atengese kuti ararame. VaWadzayi vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kushanda nemakanzuru pamwe nevanotengesa kuti pawanikwe nzira dzekushanda pamwe zvakanaka, pasina kunetsana. “Asi vakada kushandisa simba mukutibvisa, isu tichashandisawo simba kuramba kubva mumigwagwa. Ticharamba kuenda seshumba ine nzara, ndokana takasarwa senyoka yakatsamwa”, vanodaro VaWadzayi. Mukupera kwesvondo dzimwe nhengo dzeparamende dzakakurudzira kuti patorwe matanho panyaya yevanotengesa zvinhu ava avo vanonzi vari kutengesera kana nepamavheranda ezvitoro zviri kubhadhara mitero, asi ivo vasina chavari kubhadhara. Migwagwa mizhinji yekumuguta reHarare inonzi haichafambika nekuda kwevanotengesa zvinhu ava, avo vanonzi vave kutengeserawo kana nepakati pemigwagwa chaipo. Vazhinji vavo vanonziwo havachakoshesi varidzi vezvitoro pavanotengesera, izvo zvinonzi zvava kukonzera kunetsana pakati pevanotengesa nevaridzi vezvitoro. No media source currently available
title: Vanotengesa Mumigwagwa Voshora Mashoko eNhengo dzeParamende Dzinoti Vabviswe muGuta reHarare

text: Dare repamusoro nemusi weChitatu rakasendeka parutivi mutemo wakagadzwa nemapurisa wekurambidza kuratidzira muHarare richiti zvakaitwa izvi hazvisi pamutemo. Mutongi wedare repamusoro, Amai Priscilla Chigumba vakatura mutongo wekuti mutemo wakadzikwa nemapurisa unorambidza veruzhinji kuti varatidzire kana kuti Statutory Instrument 101A uyo wanga uchidzivisa vanoda kuratidzira muguta reHarare mukati memasvondo maviri usendekwe parutivi. Vachitura mutongo uyu, mutongi wedare ati mapurisa haana kodzero yekuumba mitemo munyika uye vati bumbiro remitemo rinotaura pachena kuti maStatutory Instrument kana achidzikwa haafanire kunge achityora kodzero dzevanhu dziri mubumbiro remitemo yenyika. Vati mitemo yakadai kana ichidzikwa panofanirwa kutanga paziviswa sezvakatarwa pamutemo kuitira kuti mapoka anenge achida kupikisa mitemo iyi apewo pfungwa dzawo mitemo iyi isati yadzikwa. Amai Chigumba vaturawo zvakare kuti mapurisa, kubudikidza nemukuru-mukuru wemapurisa VaAugustine Chihuri, havafanire kunganisa vanhu vanenge vachiratidzira zviri pamurawo uye murunyararo. Gweta ranga rakamirira nyaya iyi mudare, VaTendai Biti vati vafara zvikuru nemutongo waturwa nedare. VaStern Zvorwadza vati vavakutoronga kumwe kuratidzira zvichitevera mutongo waturwa nedare uyu. Mumutongo wavo, Amai Chigumba vati ibasa rematare kuona kuti mitemo yatevedzerwa saka nokudaro vati matare haature mitongo achitya kana kuti aine divi raakarerekera. Mashoko aAmai Chigumba aya anouyawo apo mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vakasvora vatongi vematare nekutura mitongo yakabvumidza kuti vemapato anopikisa varatidzire vachiti zvimwe zvacho zvave kukonzera kusagadzikana munyika. Zvichakadai, VaBiti varumbidza Amai Chigumba nemashoko avataura mumutongo wavo. Nyaya iyi yakakwidzwa kudare nevemubatanidzwa wemapato arikurwira kuti mitemo inobata sarudzo ivandudzwe varikushanda vari pesangano riri kudaidzwa kuti National Election Reforms Agenda kana kuti Nera, sangano revagari vemuHarare reCombined Harare Residents Association (CHRA) bato reDare pamwe naVaZvorwadza. Kukwidzwa kwenyaya iyi kumatare kwaiteverawo kurohwa pamwe nekurambidzwa kwakaitwa varatidziri nemapurisa muHarare mwedzi wapera. No media source currently available
title: Dare rePamusoro Rosendeka Parutivi Nyaya yeMapurisa yeKurambidza Vanhu Kuratidzira

text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vati nyika yava kufanira kusendeka parutivi nyaya dzesarudzo yoenderera mberi nekuvandudza hupfumi hwenyika. Mashoko aVaMnangagwa aya anouya panguva iyo MDC Alliance iri kupikisa zvakabuda musarudzo dzemusi wa30 Chikunguru. Vachitaura pamarinda anovigwa magamba enyika paHeroes Acre apo panga pachirangarirwa magamba enyika, VaMnangagwa vati yave nguva yekutarisa hupfumi hwenyika sezvo sarudzo dzakapfuura. Rimwe gurukota rehurumende yaVaMnangangwa, VaSupa Mandiwanzira, vati chakakosha ndechekuti hurumende ione kuti vechidiki vaenda kumabasa uye maindasitiri avhura zvavati ndirwo rugare rwakarwirwa nemagamba enyika muhondo yeChimurenga. Chipangamazano chaVaMnangagwa, VaChristopher Mutsvangwa, avo vakakundwa musarudzo yemumiriro weNorton muparamende, vaudza Studio7 kuti mutungamiri weMDC Alliance, VaNelson Chamisa, avo vari kukwikwidza zvakabuda musarudzo dzemusi wa30 Chikunguru kumatare, vanofanira kusiyana nenyaya dzekumatare vouya voshanda pamwe chete navo mukusimudzira hupfumi hwenyika. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika uye vachishanda vakazvimirira, VaVivid Gwede, vati hapana chingafambe munyika munyaya dzehupfumi kana paine makakatanwa ezvematongerwo enyika. KuHeroes Acre kwanga kuine vanhu vashoma zvichienzaniswa nezvinomboitika makore apfuura, asi kwanga kwakazarisa nemauto nemasoja. No media source currently available
title: VaMnangagwa Vanoti Sarudzo Dzakapera Yava Nguva yeKuvandudza Hupfumi hweNyika

text: Mazana nemazana evanhu anonzi akatambura neMuvhuro manheru munzvimbo dzakasiyana-siyana muHarare nemamwe maguta nekuda kwekunetsa kwemabhazi nedzimotokari zvinotakura veruzhinji, izvo zvinonzi zvakakonzerwa nekushaikwa mwedhiziri mumagaraji akawanda. Dambudziko remafuta ekufambisa iri rinonzi rakatambirwawo nevemichovha nemaoko maviri sezvo vakachikwidza mari dzavanobhadharisa vanhu pakufamba munzvimbo dzakawanda kubva padhora rimwe chete kuenda pamadhora ari pakati pematatu nemashanu, zvichienderana nekuti rwendo rwakareba zvakadii. Vamwe vanoti dambudziko iri rakawedzerwa nekubuda kunonzi kuri kuita vemabhazi vakawanda muhurongwa hwehurumende nevemabhazi ava huri pasi pekambani yehurumende yeZUPCO. Zvinonzi vemabhazi ava vainyunyuta nekusabhadharwa sezvakanga zvawiriranwa neZUPCO, izvo zvaivasiya vasina mari dzekugadzirisa mabhazi avo. Ukuwo, dambudziko remafuta ekufambisa rinonzi rawedzera zvekusvika pakaipa, hurumende ichinzi iri kutatarika kuwana mari yekunze yekuti ishandise kutenga mafuta aya, ayo anonzi atori munyika nechakare. Studio7 yakundikana kubata gurukota rezvekutakurwa kwezvinhu, VaJorum Gumbo, kuti tinzwe mamiriro akaita zvinhu, kunyange hazvo vaudza New Zimbabwe.com kuti zvinhu zvakagadzikana munyaya dzemafuta ekufambisa. Mutauriri wesangano revemabhazi reChitungwiza Commuter Omnibus Operators' Association, VaFarai Muza, vanoti dambudziko remafuta ekufambisa iri rave kuita kuti vemabhazi varare vari mumitsetse vachitsvaga dhiziri. VaMuza vanoti izvi zvave kupawo kuti vafambi vakanganisike mumarongero avo, sezvo vanenge vasina kugadzirira shanduko dzave kukonzerwa nekukwidzwa kwemari dzemabhazi.
title: Kunetsa kweMafuta Kwokonzera Dambudziko kuVafambi

text: Bato guru rinopikisa munyika, reMDC Alliance, rinoti chibvumirano chekuripa varimi vechichena vakatorerwa minda, cheGlobal Compensation Deed, chakaitwa pakati pehurumende nevarimi ava chiri kunze kwemutemo sezvo chakaitwa kunze kweparamende sezvinodiwa nembumbiro remitemo yenyika. Mutauriri weMDC Alliance, Advocate Fadzayi Mahere, vaudza vatori nevenhau kuti chimbumirano ichi chakaitwa muchihwande pasingatevedzwe mutemo yenyika. Vati paramende inofanirwa kuve nechekuita nechibvumirano chekuripa varimi. Vati kunyange hazvo bumbiro remitemo yenyika risangasungire kuti vaishanda mumapurazi varipwewo, hazvina kunaka pachivanhu kuti vanhu ava vasaripwa nekuti vakarasikirwa nemabasa uye vazhinji vacho havana chekubata. Munyori mukuru musangano rinomirira vashandi veZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, VaJaphet Moyo, vaudza Studio 7 kuti kunyange hazvo bandiko resangano ravo rinomirira vashandi vemumapurazi, rakataura pakunyorwa kwebumbiro remitemo yenyika kuti raida kuti nhengo dzaro dziripwewo, izvi hazvina kutambirwa pakanyorwa bumbiro nezvikwata zviviri zveMDC neZanu PF muna 2013. Vati shuviro yavo ndeyekuti pachabhadharwa varimi vachena, vaive vashandi vavo vachabhadharwawo. Munyori mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaNick Mangwana, vaudza Studio 7 kuti hurumende inonzwisa kutambura kwakaita vashandi vakarasikirwa nemabasa avo pakatorwa minda. Asi vati vanotarisira kuti varimi vachabhadhara vashandi vavo kana vachinge vawana mari dzavo. Pasi peGlobal Compensation Deed hurumende ichabhadhara vachena vakatorerwa minda yavo mabhiriyoni matatu nemazana mashanu ezviuru zvemadhora ekuAmerica. Advocate Mahere vati zvakakosha kuti zvibvumirano zvakadai zviitwe pajekerere nekuti mangwana verezhinji ndivo vanozopedzesera vobhadhara zvikwereti zvinenge zvatorwa nehurumende muchihwande. Asi vachipindura mumiriri weHarare East muNational Assembly vanove mutevedzeri weMDC Alliance, VaTendai Biti muparamende nezuro panyaya imwe cheteyo,gurukota rinoona nezvmitemo, VaZiyambi Ziyambi, vakati paramende haineyi nechekuita nezvechibvumirano chekuripa varimi vachiti iri ibasa rehurumende. VaZiyambi vakati paramende ichazodiwa chete kuti itambire chibvumirano ichi kana vakazoda kushandisa mari yekubva mubhajeti renyika. VaZiyambi vakatiwo haisi kudzorera minda kuvachena vachiti vanhu vachadzorerwa ivhu varimi vatema vemuno vakatorerwwa minda pamwe nevachena vane minda yainge yakachengetedzwa nemaBilateral Investment Promotion and Protection Agreements nemaBilateral Investment Treaties. Chibvumirano cheGlobal Compensation Deed chakasaimwa muna Chikunguru pakati pehurumende yakamirirwa negurukota rezvemari, VaMthuli Ncube, pamwe nemasangano anomirira varimi vachena anoti Commercial Farmers Union of Zimbabwe, Southern African Commercial Farmers Alliance neValuation Consortium Private Limited. No media source currently available
title: MDC Alliance Inoti Chibvumirano cheHurumende neVarimi Vachena Hachisi paMutemo

text: Vakuru vakuru vaviri vekambani yemagetsi yeZimbabwe Electricity Transmission and Distribution Company vasungwa vachipomerwa mhosva yekuita zvehuori hunonzi huri kubatanidzira kambani yekuIndia. Mapurisa anoshandira bazi rinorwisana nehuori reAnti Corruption Unit anonzi asunga vakuru vaviri vekambani yeZETDC vachipmerwa mhosva yehuori hune chekuita nemari inosvika mamiriyoni makumi matatu nemashanu emadhora ayo anonzi akatsakatika mukutengwa kwemichina yemagetsi inodaidzwa kuti ma transformer. Vaviri ava ndevanoti VaJulian Chinembiri vanove mukuru wekambani iyi pamwe naAmai Thoko Dhliwayo vanove mukuru anoona nezvemari muZETDC. Mutauriri wemapurisa, Senior Assistant Commissioner Charity Charamba, vati tibvunze mutevedzeri wavo, VaPaul Nyathi, nezvenyaya iyi avo vabvuma kuti vaviri ava vasungwa mambakwedza nhasi. VaNyathi vati zvizere nezvenyaya iyi zvichaburitswa mugwaro ravachaburitsa maererano nenyaya iyi, asi pataenda pamhepo gwaro iri ranga risati rabuda. Asi mumwe mupurisa ari kuferefeta nyaya iyi uyo asina kuda kudomwa nezita ati vasungwa vaviri vari kuferefetwa nekusafambiswa zvakanaka kwemari inoita mamiriyoni makumi matatu nemashanu yaifanira kutengeswa ma transformer emagetsi neZETDC aifanira kutengwa kubva kune imwe kambani yavati inonzi PME. Mupurisa uyu atiwo vaviri ava vari kuferefetwawo kuti vakaenda ku tender here kana kuti kwete kuitira kuti pasarudzwe kambani yaizotengesera ZETDC ma transformer aya. Mutauriri weZESA, VaFullard Gwasira, vati havakwanise kutaura kuti bhodhi ravo raiziva here kana kuti kwete nezvekusafambiswa zvakanaka kwemari kunonzi kwakaitwa nevasungwa ava. Vatiwo vasungwa muromo nekuferefetwa kuri kuitwa nyaya iyi nemapurisa. Kusungwa kwevaviri ava kunouyawo apo kambani yemagetsi iyi iri kutadza kuwanisa veruzhinji magetsi munzvimbo dzakawanda ichiti haina ma transformer anokwana kuti magetsi aendeswe mudzimba dzevanhu vanenge vachida magesti. Dzimwe nzvimbowo dzinonzi dziri kupedzisira dzisisina magetsi sezvo ZETDC ichinzi iri kutadza kutenga ma transformer matsva kutsiva ayo anenge atsva zvekusagadzirika. Kusungwa kwevakuru-vakuru veZETDC ava kunouya panguva iyo pane vaiva makurukota ehurumede vakati wandei vasungwa vakamiswa pamberi pematare vachipomerwa nyaya dzehuori. Vanhu ava vanosanganisira VaSamuel Undenge avo vaimbova gurukota rezvemhando dzemoto, vaimbova gurukota rezvehutano, VaDavid Pareirenyatwa, vaimbova gurukota rezvematunhu, VaIgnatious Chombo, vaimbova gurukota rezvemigodhi, VaWalter Chidhakwa nevamwe. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vakati hurumende yavo haisi kuzorega kusunga vose vachawanikwa vachiita zvehuori zvisinei kuti anenge aita izvi ndiyani. No media source currently available
title: Mapurisa Anosunga Vakuru veZimbabwe Electricity Transmission and Distribution Company

text: Gurukota reChina rinoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaWang Yi, avo vakapinda munyika neMugovera manheru, vasangana nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa kumuzinda weState House muHarare. Musangano uyu, uyo wapindwawo nemutewedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika VaConstantino Chiwenga, gurukota rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaSibusiso Moyo pamwe negurukota rezvemari, Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube, unonzi wanga wakanangana nekusimbaradza kudyidzana pakati penyika mbiri idzi. Musangano uyu unonzi wakurukurawo nezvezvirongwa zvebudiriro zvinonzi zviri kuitwa neChina ichibatsira hurumende yeZimbabwe. Zvirongwa izvi zvinosanganisira zvivakwa zvakaita separamende itsva iri kuvakwa neChina, gwenya remagetsi reBatoka Hydro-Electric, iro rinonzi riri kuvakwa pakati peZambia neZimbabwe pasi pemushandirapamwe weSino-Hydro neGeneral Electric yekuAmerica uyewo kugadzirwa kwemigwagwa pamwe nekubatsira nechikafu, kunyanya mupunga. Zimbabwe inonzi yasvitsawo chikumbiro chekuti China iibatsire nemari yezvirongwa zvitanhatu pasi peRoad and Belt Initiative, icho chinonzi chiri kushandiswa neChina mukubatsira nyika dzemuAfrica Rwendo rwaVaWang urwu rwanga rwuri rwekupedzisira rwekushanyira nyika shanu dzemuAfrica dzinosanganisira Egypt, Djibouti, Eritrea neBurundi. VaMnangagwa, avo vari pazororo ravo repagore, vambosiya zororo iri kuti vasangane nemuenzi anonyarikana uyu, uyo anonzi inhumwa yemutungamiri weChina, VaXi Jingpin. Nhengo yeboka revechidiki muZanu PF, VaTafadzwa Mugwadi, vanoti rwendo rwaVaWang rwakakosha zvikuru sezvo rwuchisimbaradza hukama pakati penyika mbiri idzi. "Chazvinongotiratidza ndechekuti China inyika iri kuzvipira pakubatsira nyika yeZimbabwe nezvakawanda. Ndofunga munorangarira kuti kubva magetsi edu ekuKariba kuti awedzerwe iChina yanga ichipindira Ku resuscitator kana kusimudzirwa kwemadhamu kana kugadzirwa kwemamwe iChina yanga ichiita izvozvo," VaMugwadi vanodaro. No media source currently available Munyori anoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika muMDC inotungamirirwa naVaNelson Chamisa, Muzvare Gladys Hlatywayo, vanotiwo rwendo rwaVaWang rwakakosha, asi panofanirwa kuve nekujeka kuti zvii zvinenge zvakurukurwa nekuwiriranwa pakati penyika mbiri idzi. "Chandinoona chinonyanyoitika ndechekuti panenge pachitaurwa nyaya dzema mega deals apa hadzinyatsoburitswa pachena nekuti nyaya dze investments, nyaya dzezvemabhizimusi, trade nezvimwe zvinhu zvakaita saizvozvo zvinofanirwa kunyatsokuburitswa pachena," Muzvare Hlatywayo vanodaro. No media source currently available
title: Mutungamiri weNyika, VaMnangagwa, Vanosangana neNhumwa yeMutungamiri weChina, VaWang Yi

text: Mashoko atumirwa kuStudio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kusangano rinoongorora nyaya dzezvirwere reAfrica Centres for Disease Control Prevention anoratidza kuti muAfrica mafa vanhu vanodarika mazana mana nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevaviri nechirwere checoronavirus kusvika parizvino. Vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi muAfrica vadarika zviuru gumi. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iri kuongorora chirwere ichi inoti vanhu vanodarika miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana mana vabatwa nechirwere ichi pasi rose. America iyo ine vanhu vanodarika zviuru gumi vafa ndiyo ine vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nechirwere ichi kunyangwe vakawanda vafa pasi rose vachiri vekuItaly.
title: Vanhu Vofa neCoronavirus muAfrica Voda Kusvika paMazana Mashanu

text: Mapurisa nemauto anoti zvinhu zvagadzikana munyika zvichitevera kugadzwa kwemutungamiri wenyika mutsva, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, uye mapurisa atanga zvakare kuita basa rawo rekuchengetedza mutemo asi achibatsirwa nemasoja zvikurusei muHarare. Izvi zvaziviswa nemutauriri weZimbabwe Defence Forces, Colonel Overson Mugwisi, pamwe nemutauriri wemapurisa, Senior Assistant Commissioner, Charity Charamba, pamusangano wavaita nevatori venhau pamuzinda wemapurisa wePolice General Headquarters muHarare. Mapurisa ainge ambobuda mumigwagwa svondo rapfuura apo mauto aiita chirongwa cheOperation Restore Legacy chekusunga vanhu vanonzi vaifurira vaimbove mutungamiriri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe. VaMugwisi naAmai Charamba vati kugadzwa kwaVaMnangagwa neChishanu chapfuura kwakaita zvinhu zvigadzikane munyika uye ivo vanotevedza zvakataurwa nemutungamiriri wenyika kuti munyika munofanira kuve nerunyararo vanhu vachitevedza mutemo. Amai Charamba vati mapurisa achatanga kuita basa ravo zvekare uye achange ave kushanda nemasoja zvikuru sei muHarare. Amai Charamba naVaMugwisi vati vave kutowana mashoko ekuti pane vamwe vanhu vave kutora zvinhu zvevanhu zvakaita sedzimba neminda uye izvi zviri kunze kwemutemo. Vati mapurisa nemauto achasunga vese vari kuita izvi. VaMugwisi vati vachaedza pese pavanogona napo kuona kuti mutemo watevedzerwa. Amai Charamba vakurudzira verruzhinji kuti varemekedze mapurisa nemauto apo anenge achiita basa rawo. Pasi peOperation Restore Legacy mauto ndiwo ange ave kuita basa remapurisa uye izvi zvakafarirwa zvakanyanya neveruzhinji avo vanoti huwori hwakanyanya kumapurisa. No media source currently available
title: Mapurisa Oshanda neMauto Mukuchengetedza Mutemo

text: Vagari vekuBeitbridge vanonzi vanogona kutadza kuvhota musarudzo dzegore rino mushure mekunge mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vanzi nenyanzvi munyaya dzemitemo vainge vatyora bumbiro remitemo nekupatsanura dhorobha iri mumawadhi matanhatu. Magweta anoshanda nesangano reViritas anoti izvi zvakaitwa kuburikidza negwaro rehurumende reGovernment Gazette musi wa 9 Kurume iro rakati Beitbridge haichava manisipariti asi kuti guta. VaMnangagwa vanonzi vaishandisa mitemo midiki yekutongwa kwematunhu yeUrban Councils Act and Rural District Councils Act. Asi mitemo iyi kana isingafambirane nebumbiro guru haishande. Pasi pebumbiro remutemo, Zimbabwe Election Commission chete ndiyo inokwanisa kutara kana kucheka mawadhi panyaya dzekuvhota. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvemitemo Doctor Alex Magaisa vanoti ichokwadi kuti zvakaitwa naVaMnangagwa hazvisi pamutemo uye zvinofanira kugadziriswa. Vanoti aka hakasi kekutanga izvi zvichiitika nekuti vakamboita zvimwe chete pakudoma makurukota ehurumende izvo vakazogadzirisa vamwe voda kuvaendesa kumatare. No media source currently available
title: Magweta Opomera VaMnangagwa Mhosva Yekutyora Bumbiro reMutemo Zvinogona Kutadzisa Beitbridge Kuvhota

text: Muvhimi, VaTheodor Bronkhorst, avo vakanga vari munhau mazuva mashoma apfuura nenyaya yekuurayiwa kweshumba yaive nemukurumbira yainzi Cecil, vadzoka zvakare kumatare vachitongwa neimwe nyaya itsva yekuwanikwa vaine zvigadzirwa zvakabva pamhuka vasina mvumo. Gweta raVaBronkhorst, Advocate Perpetua Dube vaudza Studio 7 kuti VaBronkhorst, avo vakasungwa neMuvhuro, vamiswa mudare muBulawayo vakabvisiswa mari yechibatiso inoita madhora zana. Advocate Dube vati VaBronkhorst vakasungwa vachipomerwa mhosva yekufambisa mhuka dzerudzi rwemharapara dziri pakati pemakumi maviri nenomwe nemakumi maviri nepfumbabwe zvisiri pamutemo. Asi vati mapurisa azosendeka mhosva iyi parutivi munguva yavanga voda kupinda mudare nekuda kwekuti ashaya humbowo hwakakwana hwekuvarovera nyaya iyi nahwo. Vati VaBronkhorst vazopomerwa mhosva yekufambisa zvisiri pamutemo zvigadzirwa zvinobva pamhuka asi mapurisa haana kudoma mhuka dzacho, uye kuti zvingani, vachiti mhosva iyi inenge yazomhanyiswa sezvo yambenge isiri pamagwaro ekuvapomera mhosva. VaBronkhorst vakasungwa neMuvhuro muBulawayo, mutauriri wemapurisa Amai Charity Charamba vakaudza vatori venhau kuti vakanga vasungwa nemhosva yekufambisa mhuka dzesango vasina mvumo. Vari kutarisirwa kudzoka kudare musi wa24 mwedzi uno nenyaya iyi. Vamwe vavanonzi vakapara navo mhosva iyi vatatu vanove zvizvarwa zvekuSouth Africa vakatomiswa pamberi pedare mushure mekusungwa neChishanu chapfuura kuBeitbridge vachiedza kuyambutsa mharapara idzi nepanzvimbo isingabvumidzwi. Panyaya yekuurayiwa kwaCecil, VaBronkhorst vakabvisiswa zvakare mari yechibatiso uye vanotarisirwa kudzokera kumatare mukupera kwemwedzi uno.
title: Muvhimi, VaBronkhorst Vanomiswa muDare Neimwezve Nyaya ine Chekuita neMhuka dzeSango

text: Matsi, kana kuti vanhu vasinganzwi vanokwanisa kutevera zvinenge zvichitaurwa nemunhu vachiona mafambiro anenge achiita muromo wake pakutaura vanoti vari kushushikana zvikuru kubva zvakatanga kupfekwa mamask senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Asi nyika dzakaita seItaly dziri kushandisa mamask ekuti munhu anokwanisa kuona muromo wemunhu kurerutsira matsi. Mumwe wevakaremara ava, Amai Nasper Manyau, vanoti izvi zviri kusiya vanhu vasinganzwe vari panguva yakaoma. Amai Manyau, avo vasina hurema hwekusanzwa, vanoti hapanawo zvavanoziva zvakawanda zvine chekuita nenyaya yeCovid 19. Vanotiwo mashoko edzidziso yenhomba yeCovid-19 haisi kusvika zvine mutsindo kuvanhu vakaremara vese. Mukuru weDeaf Trust of Zimbabwe, Amai Barbara Nyangairi, vanoti zviri kuvanetsa kuti voita sei kuti vanhu vasinganzwe vakwanise kuwana dzidzo nechenjedzo maringe nezvedenda reCovid 19. Amai Nyangairi vanoti vana vasinganzwe vane dambudziko rekudzidza vachiteerera nhepfenyuro dzakasiyana siyana sezviri kuitwa mazuva ano apo zvikoro zvakavharwa zvokuti dzidziso yedenda reCovid 19 inotovapfuura nokuti vabereki vazhinji havanawo ruzivo rwekusaina kuti vakwanise kubatsira vana mudzidzo dzavo. Mumiriri wevakaremara muparamende, Senator Rejoice Timire, vanoti Covid 19 yakauya nokurema nokuti denda iri harisarudze zvokuti vari kutyira zvikuru vanhu vasingataure nokuti miromo yavanoona kuti vakwanise kuziva zviri kutaurwa, inenge yakavharwa nemamasiki nguva dzose. Masangano matatu anoti reCentre for Disability and Development, reDeaf Zimbabwe Trust pamwe nereZimbabwe National League of the Blind, anoti kodzero dzevanhu vane hurema dziri kutyorwa uye kuramba dzichityorwa nehurumende pamwe nenhepfenyuro yeZBC munguva ino yekuvharwa kwenyika. Masangano aya anoti kuburikidza nekusavepo kwenzira dzinonzwisiswa nevanhu vane hurema hwakadai, vanhu ava vari kurasikirwa zvikuru munguva ino yakakosha yekuti munhu wese ave neruzivo pamusoro pechirwere ichi. Zimbabwe yakasaina chibvumirano cheUnited Nations Conventions on the Rights of Persons with Disabilities mugore 2013, asi nyanzvi munyaya dzemitemo pamwe nehutano dzinoti zviga zveUnited Nations izvi hazvisati zvaiswa mumitemo yenyika. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvehutano VaConstantino Chiwenga kuti tinzwe kana paine hurongwa hwakanangana nevakaremara panyaya yedzidziso yezvekubaiwa kwenhomba yeCovid 19. No media source currently available
title: Matsi Dzonetsekana neNyaya yemaMask eKudzivirira Covid-19

text: Sangano reZimbabwe Council of Churches (ZCC) rinoti vatori venhau vane basa rekubatanidza vanhu pamwe nekutanga nhaurirano dzinoendesa nyika mberi richiti pari zvino handizvo zviri kutika sezvo vamwe vavo vari kutora mativi emapato ari kukakavadzana munyika. Vachitaura pamusangano wavaita nenhengo dzeZImbabwe National Editors Forum muHarare, munyori mukuru weZCC , Doctor Kenneth Mtata, vati vapepeti nevatori venhau pamwe nevedzisvondo vanofanira kufambisa mashoko anovaka nyika. Reverend Mtata vati apo zviri pachena kuti vanhu vemuZimbabwe vanoda kutaurirana nekushanda pamwe chete kuti nyika ibudirire, pane vamwe vasiri kuda izvi uye pane vamwe vatori venhau vave kupembembedza vanhu ava. Vati tariro yavo ndeyekuti vatori venhau nevapepeti vadzo vachaita basa ravo nemazvo apo vanhu munyika vari kuedza kutaurirana nekugadzirisa matambudziko ari munyika. Mupepeti webepanhau reThe Observer, VaBarnabas Tondhlana, vati vanotambira maonero eZCC, uye vane matanho avari kutora kuti nhengo dzesangano ravo dziiite basa sezvinotarisirwa neveruzhinji. Mukuru weMedia Centre, VaEnerst Mudzengi, vaudza Studio7 kuti zvingave zvinosuwisa chose kana paine vatori venhau vanyora nhau dzinoparadzanisa vanhu munyika. VaMudzengi vati pane zvikonzero zvakawanda zvinotadzisa vatori venhau kuita basa ravo nemazvo. Reverend Mtata vati mwedzi unoouya varonga musangano uchapindwa nevemapato ese ezvematongerwo enyika, vedzisvondo nemasangano akazvimirira uchazeya kuti nhaurirano dzekuti vanhu vabatane nekushanda pamwe dzingaitwe negwara ripi. VaMtata vati kunyange hazvo sangano ravo riri kukurudzira nhaurirano idzi pamutemo havana mvumo yekutungamira nhaurirano idzi uye vanoona sekuti komisheni yeNational Peace and Reconciliation Commission ndiyo yakakodzera kutungamira nhaurirano idzi. Vati zviri pachena kuti vanhu vanoda nhaurirano nekushanda pamwe chete kuitira kuti nyika ifambire mberi. ZCC yakamboedza kuti mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, pamwe nemutungamiri weMDC, VaNelson Chamisa, vataurirane, asi izvi hazvina kushanda. No media source currently available
title: Makereke Okurudzira Vatori veNhau Kusatora Mativi

text: Sangano reZimbabwe Association of Doctors for Human Rights kana kuti ZADHR rinoti huwandu hwevanhau vashaya pachipomerwa mauto nemapurisa mhosva yekuvapfura kana kuvaita kafiramberi hwasvika pagumi nevatanhatu. Izvi zvinotevera kushaya kwaVaTanaka Bushu vemumusha wevazhinji weMbare. Mufi anonzi akapfurwa akamborapwa ndokuburitswa muchipatara asi ainge arasikirwa neropa rakawanda. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nemutauriri wemapurisa Senior Assistant Commissioner Charity Charamba kanamutauriri wemauto Colonel Overson Mugwisi sezvo vanzi vange vabuda muhofisi mavo. Asi hurumende inoti vanhu vana chete ndivo vakafa. Nhengo yeZADHR Doctor Milton Marowa vanoti VaBushu avo vange vave nemakore gumi nemasere vakambenge vaita sekunge vave kunzwa zviri nani asi vakazongorwarisa ndokushaya. No media source currently available
title: Huwandu HweVanhu Vafa neKupfurwa Kana Kuitwa Kafiramberi neMauto neMapurisa Horamba Huchiwedzera

text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti neChipiri vanhu makumi matatu nevasere vakashaya nechirwere cheCovid-19 zvasiya vafa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kupararira gore rapera vave zviuru zviviri nemazana maviri nemakumi manomwe nevana kana kuti 2,274. Izvi zviri kuuya apo nemusi weChipiri mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vakati mhando yechirwere cheCovid-19 inonzi Delta variant ndiyo yave kupararira zvakanyanya munyika. Nyaya yeDelta variant iyi iri kutemesa nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano musoro nekuti inotapuriranwa zviri nyore nyore. Bazi rezvehutano rinotiwo vanhu zviuru zviviri nemazana masere nemakumi mana nevashanu kana kuti 2,845 vakabatwa nechirwere ichi nemusi weChipiri zvasiya vabatwa nacho kubva zvachatanga kupararira vave zviuru makumi manomwe nezvitatu zvine mazana maviri nemakumi manomwe nemumwe kana kuti 73, 271. Vanhu chiuru chimwe chete nezana nemakumi manomwe kana kuti 1,170 vakapora kubva kuchirwere ichi neChipiri, zvasiya vanhu vapora kubva chirwere ichi zvachatanga kupararira vave zviuru makumi mana nezvisere zvine zana nevaviri kana kuti 48,102. Vachiri kurwara vari muzvipatara nekudzimba vave zviuru makumi maviri nezviviri nemazana masere nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevashanu kana kuti 22,895. Vanhu zviuru mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi mashanu nezvishanu nemazana matanhatu nemakumi mashanu nevatanhatu kana kuti 955, 656 ndivo vabayiwa nhomba yekudzivirira Covid-19 yekutanga. Vabayiwa kaviri sezvinokurudzirwa vave zviuru mazana matanhatu negumi nezvipfumbamwe nemazana masere nemakumi masere nevatatu, kana kuti 619, 883. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya nhomba yeCovid-19 vanhu mamiriyoni gumi kuitira kuti chirwere ichi chisapararire. Vanamazvikokota pasi rose vachiri kuita ongororo yekuona kuti nhomba dziri kubayiwa dzinonyatsoshanda here pamhando yeDelta variant iyi. Delta variant, iyo yakatangira kuIndia muna Gumiguru gore rapera inonziwo nebazi rinoona nezvehutano muAmerica reCenters for Disease Control and Prevention ndiyo yave kupararira zvakanyanya muAmerica nezvikamu makumi mashanu nezvisere kubva muzana kana kuti 58%. Mhando yechirwere ichi iri kuuraya vanhu vakawanda kuSouth Africa, India nedzimwe nyika. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dzinoti kana munhu abatwa neDelta variant anogona kutemwa nemusoro, kuchururuka madzihwa uye kurwadziwa pahuro. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano, uye vakambove mukuru wechipatara cheChitungwiza, Dr Enoch Mayida, vaudza Studio 7 kuti chirwere cheCovid-19 chinonetsa kunyatsorapa sezvo pachikwanisa kungonyuka mhando dzakasiyana siyana. Vakurudzira vanhu kuti vapfeke zvivhara muromo nemhuno uye kusangoenda panzvimbo dzakaunganwa. No media source currently available
title: Mhando yeCovid-19 yeDelta Variant Yobata neKuuraya Vanhu Vakawanda muZimbabwe

text: Sangano guru rinomirira vashandi munyika, reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, ZCTU, rinoti nekuda kwekukwira kuri kuramba kuchiita mitengo yezvinhu munyika, mhuri ine vanhu vashanu yave kutoda mari inodarika zviuru zvisere zvemadhora emunyika pamwedzi. Mutungamiri we ZCTU, VaPeter Mutasa, vanoti mitengo yezvinhu zvakaita semafuta ekufambisa, chingwa, upfu nezvimwe, iri kukwira pazuva kana pasvondo roga roga, izvo zvave kuita kuti vashandi vakundikane kurarama nekuda kwekuti mari dzavo hadzisi kukwidzwawo.
