VaMutasa vanoti hapana mushandi ari kukwanisa kutambira mari iyi pamwedzi, vachiti vashandi vakawanda vari kunonga svosve nemuromo. Vanoti chiri kudiwa kuitwa munyika nekukasika kugadzirisa mamiriro ezvematongerwo enyika pamwe nezveupfumi. "Tinoona kuti nyika iri kuramba ichitoenda kumawere. Pave kudiwa Hutungamiri hunoziva kuti panofanirwa kuti pagadziriswe zvinhu nekukurumidza," VaMutasa vanodaro. Mutengo wechingwa, icho chinotarisirwa nemhuri dzakawanda dzisingadye sadza masikati, wakakwidzwa kubva pamadhora gumi kuenda pamadhora gumi nematanhatu, mutengo unonzi nevakawanda hauchakwanisiki. No media source currently available
title: ZCTU Inoti Mhuri yeVanhu Vashanu Yave Kuda Mari Inodarika Zviuru Zvisere zveMadhora paMwedzi

text: Hurumende inonzi iri kuronga kupa vashandi vayo mari dzemabhonasi mwedzi uno dziri mumadhora ekuAmerica. Tsamba yakabva kumunyori mukuru mubazi rezvemari, VaGeorge Guvamatanga ichinyorerwa mamwe mapoka ehurumende inoratidza kuti vashandi vachapiwa mari yekunze iyi kusvika kumadhora mazana manomwe kana kuti US$700.00 uye vanenge vachihora mari inodarika mazana manomwe vanozpiwa imwe yacho iri mumadhora emunyika. Vari pamudyandigere vanonzi vachapiwawo mari yekunze inosvika zana remadhora, pamusoro pezvo madzimai kana varume vavo vopiwawo madhora ekuamerica makumi masere. Asi mutungamiri werimwe sangano rinomirira varairidzi rePTUZ, Doctor Takavafira Zhou vanoti sangano ravo rinotambira danho iri, asi harione serinogagadzirisa zvinyunyuto zvevashandi, zvikuru vairidzi, avo vavanoti vanoda kutambiriswa mihoro yavaitambira muna 2018 yeUS$540.00 pamwedzi.. Mutevedzeri wemunyori mukuru wesangano rinomirira vashandi vehurumende, reZimbabwe Confederation of Public Sector Unions, VaGibson Mushangu, vanoti vashandi vehurumende vari kutarisira kuti mabhonasi avo achange achisanganisirawo pamari dzekubatsirikanakana kuti allowances. VaMushangu vanotiwo vashandi vari kutarisira kuti vese vachapiwa mari dzavo mumwe uno wambudzi, kwete zvekuti vamwe vopiwa mwedzi uno vamwe vozodzipiwa muna zvita dzisisina huremu. Gurukota rezvevashandi nemabasa, Muzvinafundo Paul Mavima, vanoti nyaya yemabhonasi nemabhadharirwo aachaitwa inyaya iri kuzeyiwa pachinhanho chedare remakurukota, kana kuti Cabinet. No media source currently available No media source currently available No media source currently available
title: Hurumende Yoronga Kupa vashandi Vayo Mabhonasi Gore Rino muMadhora ekuAmerica

text: Vana chiremba vari kurapa mutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica VaDonald Trump vave kunzwa zviri nani muchipatara mavari kurapwa chirwere cheCovid-19 zvekuti vanogona kuburitswa neMuvhuro. Mumwe chiremba waVaTrump Dr Sean Conley vakati VaTrump vakambotadza kufema zvakanaka kaviri vakabatsirwa nemweya wekufema vasati vaendeswa kuchipatara nemusi weChishanu. Asi Dr Conley vanoti iko zvino vave kunzwa zviri nani chaizvo. Vanachiremba vari kurapa VaTrump vanoti vari kuvapa mushonga weremdesivir uyo unonzi nenyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano unobatsira kuti chirwere ichi chisarambe chichipararira zvakanyanya. Asi uchiri kuongororwa mashandiro avo navanamazvikokota. Nyaya yemushonga wekurapa Covid-19 inyaya inoounza makakatanwa akanyaya pasi rose vamwe vachiti havatambire mushonga vamwe vachiti vanoutambira kana uchinge wawanikwa. VaTrump vari muchipatara cheWalter Reed National Military Medical Center mudunhu reMaryland uye vakaburitsa vhidhiyo vachitenda vose vari kuvatumira mashoko ekuti vapore nekukasika. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano Dr Brighton Chireka vaudza Studio 7 kuti hapana dzidziso yakanyatsokwana nezvemishonga yekurapa Covid-19 iri kurapwa zvopa kuti vakwande vatadze kunyatsonzwisisa kuti zviri kufamba sei. No media source currently available Vatungamiri venyika dzakawanda vari kutumira mashoko ekusimbisa mutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica VaDonald Trump avo vakazivisa nemusi weChishanu kuti ivo nemudzimai wavo, Amai Melania Trump vainge vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19. Vatumira mashoko vanosanganisira mukuru weWorld Health Organization VaTedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus, mutungamiri weGermany Chancellor Angela Merkel, mutungamiri weMexico VaAndres Manuel Lopez Obrador, mutungamiri weRussia VaVladimir Putin nevamwe. Vari kukwikwidzana navaTrump musarudzo dzemwedzi unouya, VaJoe Biden vebato remaDemocrats, avo vakaita gakava kana kuti debate naVaTrump svondo rapera vanoti vakaongororwa vakawanikwa vasina chirwere ichi.
title: VaTrump Vanonzi Vave Kuita Zviri Nani Kunyangwe Vakambotadza Kufema Zvakanaka Kaviri

text: Mutungamiri webato reTransform Zimbabwe, VaJacob Ngarivhume, avo vari kupomerwa mhosva yekukurudzira veruzhinji kuti varatidzire zvine mhirizhonga mukati, vanyimwa zvakare mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso. Mune chimwe chiitiko, mutevedzeri wasachigaro weMDC Alliance, VaJob Sikhala, vasungwa nemapurisa. Vachitura mutongo wavo pachikumbiro chaVaNgarivhume chekuti vapihwe mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso vachiti pane zvashanduka kubva pavakambonyimwa mukana uyu, mutongi wedare ramejasitiriti, VaTrynos Utahwashe, vati hapana zvizhinji zvavaona zvashanduka zvingakodzere kuti VaNgarivhume vabusitswe muhusungwa. VaUtahwashe vati boka reJuly 31st Movement ravanoti rinotungamirwa naVaNgarivhume iro rakashevedzera kuratidzira kwemusi wa31 Chikunguru rave boka rakura uye rine chinangwa chekubvisa hurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa pachigaro. Vati izvi zvinobuditswa pachena nevanhu vakaita semutevedzeri wasachigaro weMDC Alliance, VaJob Sikhala, avo vanga vachitsvagwa nemapurisa vanga vari kuramba vachiburitsa mashoko ekutsoropodza hurumende. VaSikhala vanonzi vazosungwa masikati ano mushure memutongo uyu izvo zvatsinhirwa nemutevedzeri wemutauriri weMDC Alliance, VaClifford Hlatshwayo. Asi mutauriri wemapurisa, VaPaul Nyathi, vati vanga vasati vatambiranyaya iyi. VaSikhala ndeumwe weavo vari kuti munyika munofanirwa kuratidzirwa zvakasimba vati huori hwanyanya sezvakataurwa naVaNgarivhume. VaSikhala ndeumwe wevanhu gumi nevana vakaziviswa panhepfenyuro nemapurisa kuti vari kutsvagwa. VaUtahwashe vati kunyange musi wa31Chikunguru wakange washevedzerwa kuratidzira naVaNgarivhume wakadarika, kuburitsa VaNgarivhume muhusungwa kunogona kukanganisa hutano nekuchengetedzeka kweveruzhinji sezvo vachiti July 31st Movement ratove boka rakasimba. Vati kunyange kuratidzira dziri kodzero dzeveruzhinji, mitemo yakadzikwa nemutungamiri wenyika senzira yekurwisana nedenda reCovid19 inoita kuti kodzero idzi dzimbosendekwa parutivi nekuti bumbiro remitemo rimwe chetero rinoti rinobvumidzwa kuti kodzero idzi dzityorwe kana zvichiitirwa kuchengetedza hutano hweveruzhinji. VaNgarivhume, avo vakwanisa mazuva makumi matatu nematatu vari muhusungwa nhasi, vaunzwa kudare vakaiswa ngetani dzemumaoko nedzemumakumbo nguva yapera sezvo vanochengeta majeri vanga vachiti vanga vachishaya svumbunuro dzemukova unopinda nevasungwa pamatare. Nezuro VaNgarivhume vakapinzwa mudare vaine ngetani mumaoko vekumajeri vachiti vainge vatadza kudzibvisa. Gweta raVaNgarivhume, VaMoses Nkomo, vati havasi kufara nemutongo waturwa nhasi nedare uyu. VaNkomo vaiti vave kukwidza zvakare kudare repamusoro iro rakamboramba kupa VaNgarivhume mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso zvichitevera mutongo waturwa naVaUtahwashe. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika uye vari mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Institute of Strategic Thinking, VaEric Muzamhindo, vati kunyimwa kwaitwa VaNgarivhume mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso kunoratidza kuwoma mwoyo kwakaita hurumende yaVaMnangagwa kana zvichienzaniswa nehurumende yevaimbova mutungamiri wenyika, mushakabvu VaRobert Mugabe. Magweta emutori wenhau ,Hopewell Chin’ono, uyo ari kupomerwa mhosva yakafanana neyaVaNgarivhume, anga ari mudare nhasi maapedzisa kusvitsa zvinyorwa zvaakanzi nedare aunze kudare pachikumbiro chekuti Chin’ono awane mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso achitiwo pane zvashanduka kubva paakambonyimwa mukana uyu. Mutongi panyaya yaChin’ono VaNgoni Nduna vakati vachatura mutongo wavo neMuvhuro. Mune imwewo nyaya yanga iri mudare, nyaya yanga ichipomerwa munyori musangano revadzidzisi vekumaruwa reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, kana kuti ARTUZ, VaRobson Chere, gweta reARTUZ, VaDoug Coltart nedzimwe nhengo dzeARTUZ ina yekunzi vaironga zvekupidigura hurumende kubudzikidza nekuverenga bhuku rakanzi “Pedagogy of the Opressed” yaraswa nedare mushure mekunge dare raona pasina humbowo panyaya iyi. VaChere, avo vanga vave nenguva yakareba vachiunzwa kumatare vaine vamwe vavo panyaya iyi, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vafara nemutongo waturwa sezvo vachiti vanga vagara vasina mhosva asi kuti vaingoshungurudzwa nehurumende. Kusungwa kwaChin’ono naVaNgarivhume nevamwe varwiri vekodzero dzevanhu nevashandi kuri kushorwa nemasangano akawanda pasi rose. Asi vakuru muhurumende pamwe nebato reZanu PF vanoti zvinhu zvese zvakamira zvakanaka munyika vachiti vari kuvatsoropodza ava vari kutaura kwavasina kuswera. No media source currently available
title: VaNgarivhume Vanorambirwa Mukana Wekuti Vabhadhare Mari yeChibatiso, Ukuwo VaSikhala Vachisungwa

text: Rimwe sangano revarairidzi, reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, ARTUZ, rinoti nhengo dzaro dzakabatana nevabereki vanyorera mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, gwaro renyunyuto vachinyunyuta nemabatirwo avanoti ari kuitwa bvunzo dziri kunyorwa nevana munguva ino yeCovid-19. Mutungamiri weARTUZ, VaObert Masaraure vanoti vana vachikoro vari kunzi vanyore bvunzo nemuna Mbudzi asi vasina kudidza zvakakwana nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Vanoti zvimwe zviri mugwaro renyunyuto iri zvinosanganisira nyaya yemihoro yevarairidzi, uye vanoti magwaro enyunyuto aya akwanisa kunyorwa mumatunhu akawanda emunyika uye achaiswa kumahofisi edzidzo mumatunhu iwayo, ayo anozoasvitsa kumahofisi emutungamiri wenyika. VaMasaraure vanoti chavari kuda ndechekuti mutungamiri wenyika vamise bvunzo idzi dzozonyorwa gore rinouya. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata mutauriri wemutungamiri wenyika VaGoerge Charamba kuti tinzwe kana magwaro aya atanga kusvika kumahofisi aVaMnangagwa. No media source currently available
title: Sangano reARTUZ Rinoti Rabatana neVabereki muGwaro Renyunyuto kuMutungamiri weNyika

text: Nemusi weChitatu matare eparamende emu America akatambira kuvandudzwa kwemutemo unobata Zimbabwe senzira yekuikudzira kuti iite sarudzo dzakachena, uye kuita hutongi hwejekerere. Mutemo uyu weZimbabwe Democracy and Economic Recovery Act wakadzikwa muna 2001. Bhiri rekuvandudza mutemo uyu rakaunzwa mudare naSenator Jeff Flake vebato reRepublican Party pamwe naSenator Chris Coons veDemocratic Party. Mutemo uyu unoti Zimbabwe ikabata zvakanaka sarudzo, pamwe nekuremekedza kodzero dzevanhu, zvirango zvakatemerwa vakuru vakuru muhurumende pamwe nemakambani anodyidzana navo, zvinobviswa. Sachigaro wekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvekunze kwenyika, uye vari nhengo yeZanu-PF, VaKindness Paradza, vanoti vanotambira nemufaro kudzikwa kwemutemo uyu. No media source currently available
title: America Inodzika Mutemo Unovandudza Zvirango Zvakatemerwa Vakuru veZanu-PF

text: Mumhwanyi ane mukurumbira pasi rose Usain Bolt ari kutarisirwa kumhanya nhasi mumujahwo we200 meters. Bolt akahwina menduru yegoridhe mumakundano aya kuLondon muna 2012. Bolt akatokunda mumakwikwi e100 meters akawana menduru yegoridhe. Mumwe ari kukwikwidza akamirira America Dalilah Muhammed ari kutarisirawo kutora menduru yake yekutanga mumakwi e400 meters. America inemenduru makumi mapfumbamwe neina dziyo ine menduru dzakawanda kumakwikwi aya ichiteverwa neChina ine makumi mashanu neina. Britain ine makumi mashanu nembiri, Russia ine makumi mana neimwe. Panyika dzemuAfrica, Kenya ndiyo iri pamusoro iri pachikamu chegumi nepfumbamwe iine mhenduru sere.
title: Usain Bolt Otarisirwa Kutora Menduru yeGoridhe muMakwikwi e200 Meters

text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vashanyira mutungamiri webato rinopikisa reMovment for Democratic Change, VaMorgan Tsvangirai, avo vasiri kunzwa zvakanaka vari kumba kwavo kuHighlands muHarare. VaMnangagwa vaperekedzwa nemumwe wevatevedzeri vavo, Retired General Constantino Chiwenga. VaTsvangirai vange vaine mumwe wevatevedzeri vavo, VaNelson Chamisa, nevamwe vakuru vakuru vebato ravo. VaMnangagwa naVaTsvangirai vanonzi vazoitawo musangano kwemaminetsi makumi mana nemashanu pasina vatori venhau. Vaviri ava vanzi vataura nyaya dziri kunetsa munyika kusanganisira nyaya dzezvehupfumi. Vachipedza musangano, VaTsvangirai vanonzi vabva vananga kunorapwa kuSouth Africa kwavagara vachienda kunorapwa chirwere chegomarara. Mutauriri waVaTsvangirai, VaLuke Tamborinyoka, vanoti VaTsvangirai vanga vagara vaine rwendo rwekuenda kuSouth Africa. No media source currently available Mutauriri waVaMnangagwa, VaGeorge Charamba, vati mutungamiri wenyika aona zvakakodzera kunoona mumwe wavo asiri kunzwa zvakanaka. VaCharamba vatiwo zvaitwa naVaMnangagwa zvinhu zvinoremekedzwa zvikuru uye zvinoratidza kuti mutungamiri ane hunhu. Vatiwo VaTsvangirai vakaratidzawo zvimwe chete pakagadzwa VaMnangagwa semutungamiri wenyika sezvo vakaendawo kunoona VaMnangagwa vachigadzwa kuva mutungamiri wenyika. No media source currently available
title: VaMnangagwa Vanoshanyira VaTsvangirai Avo Vasiri Kunzwa Zvakanaka

text: Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri weZanu PF uye wenyika VaCostantino Chiwenga nhasi vakumbira vagari vekwaMutare kuti vavhotere nhengo dzebato iri kuitira kugadzirisa maguta emunyika ayo vanoti akanganiswa nehutungamiriri hwemapato anopikisa eCitizens Coalition for Change, CCC. VaChiwenga vakurudzira kuti pave nerunyararo panguva yesarudzo. VaChiwenga vachitaura kumazana nemazana evatsigiri vavo nhasi vati zvakakosha kuvhotera bato ravo reZanu PF nenhengo dzeparamende uye makanzura ebato iri kuitira kutiz viri kukanganiswa nemakanzura aripo zvikwanisie kugadziriswa. Vaenderera mberi vachiti hurumende yeZanu PF iri kuita mabasa akawanda sekugadzirisa migwagwa, kuwanira vanhu zvekudya panguva ino apo nyika yakatarisana nenzara sezvo mvura isina kunaya. VaChiwenga avo vakamboshorwa zvikuru munyika nekunze mushure mekufanidza Tripple C nenda inoda kutswanywa nhasi vakurudzira runyararo munyika munguva yesarudzo. Mutauriri weCCC mudunhu reManicaland VaDavid Panganai vanoti havatenderane nemashoko aVaChiwenga. Musangano wanhasi wanga uri wekutsvaga rutsigiro kunhengo dzeZanu PF dzinoti VaIsau Fungai Mupfumi (Chikanga Dangamvura), VaMisheck Mugadza (Mutasa South) avo vachakwikwidzana nevamwe vanoti VaProsper Chapfiwa Mutseyami (Chikanga Dangamvura), VaHosiah Chipanga Patriotic Party, VaTaurayi Mandipurwa veMDC Alliance, naVaAnesu Zaranyika veTruth Zimbabwe Party. No media source currently available
title: Mushure Mekushorwa neKupesvedzera Mhirizhonga, VaChiwenga Voyimba Rwiyo Rwerunyararo

text: No media source currently available Vagari vemudunhu reMasvingo, zvikuru madzimai, vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kupa bazi rezvehutano mari yakawanda kuitira kuti veruzhinji vasarasikirwe nehupenyu hwavo. Vachitaura nhasi pamusangano weruzhnji waitwa nekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvemari, iyo yanga ichitora pfungwa dzevanhu pakugadzirwa kwebhajeti regore rinouya, vagari vekuMasvingo vati bazi rezveutano munyika raparara izvo zvoita kuti vanhu vazhinji, kunyanya vatungamiriri, vandorapwa kunze kwenyika. Mugari wekuRunyararo West, Amai Dorothy Sibanda, vati bazi rezvehutano rinofanirwa kupihwa mari yakawanda. Amai Marble Chikora vekuZaka vatiwo hurumende inofanira kuisa mari yekuwedzera zvipatara kumaruwa. Mumwe mukoma wechidiki, Oscar Murambiwa, atiwo madzimai ari kuomerwa zvikuru kana vachinge vaenda kunorapwa, zvikuru chirwere chegomarara neshuga. Nhengo yeparamende ye Bulawayo Central uye vari nhengo yekomiti inoona nezvemari , Amai Dorcas Sibanda, vati vanotsigira zvataurwa nemadzimai ekuMasvingo panyaya yekupa chikamu chikuru chebhajeti kubazi rezveutano. Komiti iyi yanga ichitungamirwa naVa David Chapfika, vanove nhengo yeZanu PF inomirira Mutoko South. Komiti yeparamende iyi iri kupinda muvanhu ichinzwa zvavanoshuvira mubhajeti renyika.
title: Vanhu Vokurudzira Mari Yakawanda Mubazi reHutano

text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vanonzi vave parumananzombe sezvo vave kumanikidzwa kuti vozemberana nemudzimai wavo, Amai Grace Mugabe, here kana kuti munhu wavadyidzana naye kwenguva yakareba, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa. Danho iri rinofanira kutorwa muna Zvita pari kuitwa kongiresi yechimbi chimbi muHarare. Matunhu ose atambira chisungo chekuti paitwe kongiresi yechimbi chimbi uye zvatove mumaoko evanoronga mabasa mubato, VaIgnatius Chombo. Amai Mugabe vanonzi vari kuchikwata chinonzi Generatio 40 uye vave makara asionane naVaMnangagwa vanonzi vanotsigirwa nechikwata cheTeam Lacoste. VaMugabe, avo vange vachiramba kubuda pachena kuti vanotsigira chikwata chipi, vanonzi vainge vachida kuti paitwe vatevedzeri vavo vatatu sezvo madzimai ari kuda kuti pave nemudzimai pavatungamiri kana kuti presidium. Asi veG40 vari kuti bato ridzokere kubumbiro raivepo risati ravandudzwa muna 2014 iro raiti vatevedzeri vave vaviri chete asi mumwe ari mudzimai. VaMnangagwa vari kupomerwa mhosva yekuti vave nemakore vachironga tsoro dzekutora chigaro chaVaMugabe. Asi vanotsigira VaMnangagwa vanoti kongirsei iyi inofanira kungozeya nyaya yesarudzo dza2018 uye kusimbisa kuti VaMugabe vatungamire bato kusvika murufu. VaMnangagwa vanonzi vane rutsigiro rwakasimba kubva kuMidlands neMasvingo. Nhengo yeProvincial Cordinating Committee yeMidlands, VaJoram Gumbo vanoti vanoda kungotsigira VaMugabe kuti vatungamire bato musarudzo uye pataurwe nyaya yekunyoresa vavhoti. No media source currently available Sachigaro webato reZanu-PF Youth League kuManicaland, VaMubuso Chinguno, avo vasina kuruma vachifuridzira kuti VaMnangangwa vadzingwe mubato. Vati VaMnangagwa vanenge vari kushanda nevanhu vari kukonzera nyonga nyonga mubato. No media source currently available
title: VaMugabe Vomanikidzwa Kutora Divi Pakunetsana kweMudzimai Wavo naVaMnangagwa

text: America nhasi iri kupemberera zuva rekuwana kuzvitonga kuzere kubva kuBritain. Mutungamiri wenyika VaJoe Biden nemudzimai wavo Amai Jill Biden vari kuita mabiko kumuzinda weWhite House muWashington DC. Mumatunhu akasiyana siyana muri kuitwa mabiko. America yakawana kuzvitonga kuzere muna 1776. Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri muAmerica zviri kupembererawo zuva iri. No media source currently available
title: America Yopemberera Zuva Rekuwana Kuzvitonga Kuzere Kubva kuBritain.

text: Mugari wemuChinhoyi, VaPeter Liwanda, vanoti zvave kuitwa naAmai Grace Mugabe mubato reZanu PF inzira yekuda kuchengetedza hupfumi hwemhuri yavo kana mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vabva pachigaro. Vanhu vakawanda munyika vanoti simba riri kushandiswa nemudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Grace Mugabe, mukuona kuti dzimwe nhengo dzeZanu PF harisi ravo asi kuti ndere murume wavo uyo ave kutadza kutungamira nemazvo hurumende pamwe nebato ravo reZanu PF. No media source currently available Amai Mugabe vakatenderera nyika yose gore rapera vachinyomba nekufumura dzimwe nhengo izvo zvakakonzera kuti nhengo idzi dzidzingwe mubato reZanu PF. Avo vakadzingwa mubato reZanu PF nekuda kwaAmai Mugabe vanosanganisira vaimbove mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Joyce Mujuru, vaimbove makurukota ehurumende vaWebster Shamu, VaDzikamai Mavhaire nevamwe. Mugari wemuChinhoyi, VaPeter Liwanda, vanoti zvave kuitwa naAmai Grace Mugabe mubato reZanu PF inzira yekuda kuchengetedza hupfumi hwemhuri yavo kana mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vabva pachigaro. Mumwe mugari wekuLions Den, VaCaleb Banda, vanoti kunyange Amai Mugabe vari kushandisa simba raVaMugabe, ivo vave nesimba ravo izvo zvinotaridzwa nehuwandu hwemakurukota ehurumende ari kupinda misangano yavo. Izvi zvinotsigirwa nemuongorori wezvematongerwo enyika, uye vari mukuru wesangano re Zimbabwe Democracy Institute, VaPedzisayi Ruhanya, avo vanoti simba raAmai Mugabe rinopera nekufa kwaVaMugabe. VaRuhanya vanoti Amai Mugabe havana chiremerera chinoita kuti vatungamirire nyika ino kana VaMugabe vabva pachigaro. VaRuhanya vanoti kupinda mune zvematongerwo enyika kwaAmai Mugabe zvakarongwa naVaMugabe. Asi vanoti kuenderera mberi kwavave kuita dzave pfungwa dzavo vega dzekuda kutonga kana kukurudzira uyo achazotonga kana VaMugabe vabva pachigaro. VaLiwanda vanoti kushandisa midziyo yehurumende pamisangano yavo zviri kuitwa naAmai Mugabe zvinhu zvagara zvichiitwa mubato reZanu PF. Asi vamwe vanoti zviri kuita Amai Mugabe zvakanakira nyika sezvo vakafumura huwori hwakaitwa nedzimwe nhengo dzakadzingwa mubato reZanu PF. Kunyange hazvo Amai Mugabe vasati vataura kuti vanoda kuve mutungamiri wenyika, vakawanda vanoti zviri pachena kuti vane chishuwo chekutonga nekuda kwekutungamira chimwe chikwata muZanu PF icho chinozivikanwa kuti “G40” chiri kukwikwidzana nechikwata chinonzi chinotungamirirwa nemutevedzeri wemutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa. Vamwe vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vanoti Amai Grace Mugabe munhu anopinda munzvimbo munguva dzinovanakira sezvo vaine mhanza yakanaka. Vanhu ava vanopa mapindiro avakaita muhupenyu hwaVaMugabe apo VaMugabe vaive nemudzimai, muchakabvu Sally Mugabe. Amai Mugabe vakaita vana vaviri naVaMugabe, Bona na Robert Junior, muchato waVaMugabe namuchakabvu Sally Mugabe, uchiripo. Amai Sally Mugabe vakazoshaya muna Ndira 1992. Pakapinda Amai Grace Mugabe muhupenyu hwaVaMugabe, pakaita mutauro mukuru, vamwe vedzisvondo vachiramba kubatanidza vaviri ava sevanhu vakarooranana. Asi vamwe vakabvuma kubatanidza vaviri ava, izvo zvinonzi nedzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzematongerwo enyika, zvinogona zvakare kuitika muhupenyu hwemudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika munyaya dzematongerwo enyika.
title: Amai Grace Mugabe Voenda neNyika?

text: Hurumende neChipiri yakazivisa kuti chirwere chemanyoka che cholera chave chirwere chinoda kubatwa zvechimbichimbi, kana kuti state of emergency, kuitira kuti chikwanise kurwiswa nekukasika pamwechete nechimwe chemanyoka che typhoid. Huwandu hwevanhu vari kufa pamwe nekubatwa nechirwere ichi huri kunzi huri kuramba huchikwira. Vanhu vafa vanonzi vave makumi maviri uye vamwe vanodarika zviuru zviviri nemazana matatu vachinzi vakabatwa nacho muHarare chete. Chirwere ichi chinonzi chave kuonekwawo mune mamwe matunhu emunyika anoti Masvingo, Mashonaland Central, Midlands neManicaland. Bepanhau reHerald rinoti gurukota rezvehutano, Dr. Obadiah Moyo vakashanyira chipatara che Beatrice Road Infectious Diseases kunoona varwere. Dr. Moyo vakaudza vatori venhau kuti kukundikana kwekanzuru yeHarare kugadzirisa nekukasika pombi dzinotakura tsvina dzakaputika mumusha weGlen View ndiko kuri kuita kuti mvura yekunwa isangane netsvina. Chirwere che cholera chinonzi chinoparadzirwa nekushaikwa kwehutsanana uye kunwa mvura inenge yakasangana netsvina, zvikuru inobva muzvimbuzi. Nyanzvi mune zvehutano Professor Davison Saungweme, vanodzidzisa nezvekutapuriranwa kwehutachiwana pamwe nezvimwe zvirwere paUniversity of North Georgia, kuGeorgia muno muAmerica vanoti nzira chete inofanirwa kuteverwa mukudzivirira chirwere ichi kuwanisa vanhu dzidziso yakakwana. "Vana hutsanana vanofanirwawo kunge vachishanda nevagari uye panofanirwa kunge paine dzidziso yakakwana inopiwa vagari," Professor Saungweme vanodaro. Vanokurudzirawo veruzhinji kuti vashandise mvura yakachena kana kutanga vafashaidza mvura vasati vaishandisa kunwa kana kugezesa michero nemirivo zvavanodya. "Chimwe chikuru chinoda kunyatsotarisiswa inzira yekuti tsvina inoitwa sei nayo. Zvikuru panodiwa zvimbuzi zvekuti vanhu vashandise, kugeza maoko kana vanhu vachigadzira chikafu. Zvakare kumhoresana kwedu kwekubatana maoko kuya uku. Vanhu vanenge vachichengeta vane cholera iyoyo vanoda kudzidziswa matanho iwayo," Professor Saungweme vanowedzera. Chirwere ichi chakatanga kuonekwa mumisha yeBudiriro neGlen View kutanga kwemwedzi uno, uye zvinofungidzirwa kuti mvura iri kunwiwa nevagari mumisha iyi, zvikuru inobva mumigodhi, ndiyo iri kusangana netsvina yemuzvimbudzi. No media source currently available
title: Chirwere cheCholera Chinouraya Vanhu Makumi Maviri muHarare

text: Sangano reZimbabwe National Liberation War Veterans Association rinoti harisi kufara nekuzvidzwa kwariri kuitwa nemudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Grace Mugabe. Mutauriri wesangano revakarwira rusununguko, Va Douglas Mahiya, vanoti Amai Mugabe havakodzeri kutaura chinhu chimwe zvacho pamusoro peavo vakarwa hondo. VaMahiya vanotiwo Amai Mugabe havafanirwi kutaura zvinoitika muhurumende nekuti havasi muhurumende. VaMahiya vanotiwo zvakataurwa negurukota rezvekudzivirirwa kwenyika, uye vari munyori anoona nezvevakarwa hondo muZanu-PF, VaSidney Sekeramai, zvekuti vari kuzodeedzera kuti kongiresi yevakarwa muhondo iitwe zvechimbi chimbi sezvo sangano riripo rizere vanhu vakadzingwa muZanu PF, hazvisi kuvatadzisa hope. Mashoko aVa Mahiya anotevera mashoko akabuda kumusangano wakaitirwa kuBindura neMugovera. Musangano uyu wakonzera kusagadzikana muZanu PF. “Handizivi kuti vanhu vanoziva here kuti amai ava (Grace Mugabe) ndivo vokupedzisira kuva munhu weZanu, kupinda muZanu... Amai Grace Mugabe ndivo vakapedzisira kupinda muZanu PF...havana kumbogara mu cell; havana kumbopinda mudistrict. Havambozivi mafambiro emusangano,” VaMahiya vaudza Studio7. No media source currently available
title: Vakarwa Hondo Votosvorana naAmai Grace Mugabe

text: Botswana yaita nyika yekutanga kuchamhembe kweAfrica kutendera vanhu vakabayiwa nhomba yeCovid-19 kaviri kupinda munyika iyi vasina tsamba yekuti vakavhenekwa hutachiona uhu zvakare kana kuti PCR Test. Gurukota rezvehutano muBotswana VaEdwin Dikoloti vakaudza nhepfenyuro yenyika iyi nemusi weChishanu manheru kuti munhu ave kungokwanisa kuratidza tsamba yekuti akabaiwa kana kuti Covid-19 Certificate pamuganhu wenyika kana kuti anokwanisa kubayiwa ipapo sezvo nyika iyi iine nhomba mamiriyoni matatu dzaisati yashandisha. Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe, kunyanya izvo zvinorarama nekutenga nekutengesa zvinhu zviri kutambira nemufaro hurongwa uhu zvichiti nyaya yekumanikidzwa kuvhenekwa kana kuti maPCR Test yange yovapedzera mari sezvo zvichidhura. Amai Florence Manzungu, vanoita zvekutenga nekutengesa vari muguta reGaborone muBotswana vanotiwo vange vanzwa nekunon’onwa mhino pese pavaida kunotora zvekutengesa kuZimbabwe neZambia vachiti mari dzanga dzopererawo kukuvhenekerwa denda iri. Chimwewo chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chinorarama nechamuka inyama muguta reFrancistown VaThomas Marimbe vanoti dai Zimbabwe yatoravo danho ratorwa neBotswana. Mutungamiri wesangano reZimbabe International Cross Border Traders Association, VaDennis Juru vaudza Studio7 parunhare vari muJohannesburg, South Africa kuti matanho ari kutorwa neBotswana akanaka chose asi haarevi chinhu kana hurumende yarerutsa zvimwe zvinoita kuti kufamba kuve nyore. Mashoko aVaJuru atsinhirwa nechimwewo chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chinogara muguta reGaborone, VaInnocent Saidi avo vanoti Zimbabwe inofanira kuva pamberi mukunyewenutsa zvinhu nokuti inyika iri kuda vanhu vakapinda munyika kuti vaunze mari iri kunetsa munyika. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano hweruzhinji inoshanda yakazvimirira muguta reMasunga muBotswana, VaSiyabonga Khuzwayo vanoti dai vanhu vachitevera mitemo yakatarwa maringe nekudzivirira COVID-19, dai nyika zhinji dzanyewenutsa nyaya dzekufamba. Botswana, iyo ine vanhu vangangosvika mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana matatu chete, iri pakati penyika shoma dzemuAfrica yose dzine vanhu vanodarika zvikamu makumi manomwe nematatu kubva muzana vabaiwa nhomba dzose dzeCOVID-19. Morroco ine vanhu vabayiwa nhomba mbiri vanodarika zvikamu makumi matanhatu nezviviri kubva muzana kana kuti 62, 9% ndiyo ine vanhu vakawandisa vabayiwa nhomba muAfrica. Zimbabwe ine zvikamu makumi maviri nezviviri zvabayiwa nhomba mbiri. No media source currently available
title: Botswana Yobvumidza Vanhu Vakabayiwa Nhomba yeCovid-19 Kaviri Kupinda muNyika Iyi Vasina Tsamba yePCR

text: Dare repamusoro rarasa chikumbiro cheMDC inotingamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa chekuti chikwata cheMDC chiri kutsigira Muzvare Thokozani Khupe chimbomira kudzinga nhengo dzeMDC Alliance richiti MDC Alliance harisi bato riri pamutemo. Vachirasa chikumbiro ichi, mutongi wedare, VaTawanda Chitapi, vati MDC Alliance harisi bato riri pamutemo sezvo pasina chinoratidza kuti ibato rakaumbwa zviri pamutemo. VaChitapi vati gwaro rakanyoreranwa nevaive mutungamiri weMDC-T, mushakabvu VaMorgan Tsvangirai nevatungamiri vemamwe mapato matanhatu ari muMDC Alliance, kana kuti Alliance Agreement, richiri benyu uye hapana humbowo hwakasvitswa kudare nebato raVaChamisa hunoratidza kuti gwaro iri rakapera kushanda pakaitwa sarudzo dzemuna 2018 sezvakasvitswa kudare nemagweta eMDC Alliance. VaChitapi vatiwo MDC Alliance haina kana bumbiro remitemo rinoratidza kuti ibato rinogona kumiswa mumatare vachiti vakakwidza nyaya iyi kudare, havana kupa humbowo hunoburitsa pachena kuti MDC Alliance ibato rakavambwa sei. Zvaturwa nedare zvatsinhirwa negweta raMuzvare Khupe, uye vari mutungamiri weNational Constitutional Assembly, Muzvinafundo Lovemore Madhuku. VaMadhuku vati MDC Alliance inofanirwa kuva iri pamutemo kwete kungotaura chete izvo vati kana nyaya dzava mumatare, hapana mutongi angade kunzwa nyaya yechinhu chisipo pamutemo. Asi mutauriri mutsva weMDC Alliance, Muzvare Fadzai Mahere, vaudza Studio7 kuti simba rehove riri mumvura kwete kumutongo waturwa nedare. Muzvare Mahere, avo vakagadzwa naVaChamisa pabasa idzva iri neChina, vati sebato, vanoziva kuti ndivo vane vanhu nokudaro vacharamba vakamira nevatsigiri vebato ravo. VaDouglas Mwonzora, avo vave kuzviti vakadzokera pachinzvimbo chemunyori mukuruweMDC-T zvichitevera mutongo wedare reSupreme Court wekuti VaChamisa havana kusarudzwa zviri pamutemo, vati havasi kuzongodzinga nhengo dzeparamende zvisina tsarukano. Mutongi waVaChitapi unoreva kuti chikwata chaMuzvare Khupe chinogona kudzinga nhengo dzeparamende mudare iri dzakabva kudivi raVaTsvangirai, pamwe nenhengo dzeseneti nemakanzura akasarudzwa muzvigaro izvi achibva kuMDC yakasiyiwa naVaTsvangirai vasati vafa. Dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika dzinoti bato reMDC rinogona kutsemuka nepakati zvakare zvichitevera mutongo wedare reSupreme Court nemutongo waturwa naVaChitapi uyu, inova mitongo iri kupa masimba kuna Muzvare Khupe kudzamara vaita kongiresi zviri pamutemo inosarudza mutungamiri mutsva. Vose Muzvare Khupe naVaChamisa vakanzi nedare reSupreme Court makongiresi avakaita akange asiri pamutemo, nokudaro panofanirwa kuitwa kongiresi itsva inosarudza munhu anotsiva VaTsvangirai. Asi pari zvino Muzvare Khupe vakanzi nedare vafanobata matomu sezvo vari ivo munhu akasarudzwa pakongiresi yemuna 2014 semutevedzeri waVaTsvangirai. No media source currently available
title: Dare reHigh Court Rinoti MDC Alliance Harisi Bato Riri paMutemo

text: Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzematongerwo enyika, uye vari mukuru wezvirongwa musangano re Zimbabwe Network for Social Justice, Va Tendai Ruben Mbofana, vanoti havasi kufara nezvakaitwa nenhengo dze Zanu PF idzo dziri mukomiti yeparamende inoona nezvemari. Nhengo idzi dzakatadzisa nemusi weChishanu musangano wekunzwa zviri kuitika panyaya ye Sakunda Holdings, iyo iri kunzi yakapihwa nehurumende mari inodarika mabhiriyoni mashanu emadhora eku America zvisina mvumo yeparamende. Mari iyi inonzi yakapihwa kambani iyi muna 2017 na 2018 chete. Asi mhemgo yeZanu PF inomirira Buhera Central muNational Assembly, VaMathew Nyashanu, vanoti vakatora danho iri sezvo MDC isiri kucherechedza mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, nokudaro ivo havasi kucherechedzawo VaTendai Biti sasachigaro wekomiti iri kufanirwa kunzwa nyaya yeSakunda Holdings. Asi VaMbofana vanoti havawirirane nedanho rakatorwa neZanu PF, sezvo maitiro akadai achizvidza mashandiro eparamende. VaMbofana vanoti nhengo dzeZanu PF dzakaita izvi nechinangwa chekuona kuti vakuru vekambani yeSakunda Holdings havasi kuzomiswa pamberi pekomiti iyi vachibvunzurudzwa nezvemari yavakapihwa zvisiri pamutemo. VaMbofana vanoti nyaya yemari inonzi yakapihwa Sakunda Holdings nehurumende zviri kunze kwemutemo, inofanirwa kugadziriswa kuitira kuti nyika izive zvakaitika, vanenge vakatyora mutemo, votorerwa matanho akaomarara zvikuru. Sakunda inonzi ikambani yechipangamazano chaVaMnangagwa, VaKudakwashe Tagwirei. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kubata VaTagwirei kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya yekambani yavo iyo iri kunzi yakapihwa mari nehurumende dare reparamende risina kusumwa. Sakunda, iyo inonzi inotsigirwa nevamwe vari muchiuto, yakapihwa mari yaishandiswa pasi pechirongwa che Command Agriculture, icho chaitengera vanhu zvinhu zvekurimisa zvakaita sembeu nefotereza. Chirongwa cheCommand Agriculture chinoshanda chiri pasi pehofisi yemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa. Kambani iyi inonzi yakamboyambirwawo neInternational Monetary Fund mushure mekunge yabhadhara kambani yeTrafigura mari yakawandiswa, uye zvisina kunyatsojeka sezvinodiwa pakufambiswa kwemari pasi rose. Sakunda Petroleum, iyo iri pasi peSakunda Holdings, ine hukama neTrafigura kuburikidza nekambani yeTrafigura Zimbabwe, Sakunda iine zvikamu makumi mashanu nechimwe kubva muzana mukambani iyi, ukuwo Trafigura iine zvikamu makumi mana nezvipfumbamwe kubva muzana sezvinodiwa nemitemo yenyika. Muzinda weSakunda Holdings uri pa Century Towers muHarare, uye kambani iyi ine mahofisi mu 4th, 15th, 16th ne 17th Floors, izvo zvinoratidza kuti ikambani huru ine vashandi vakawanda, uye inogara yakachengetedzwa zvakasimba. No media source currently available
title: VaMbofana Vanoti Mari Yakapihwa Sakunda Holdings Ngaiferefetwe

text: Hurumende iyo yanga yakambomisa kupinza vanhu mabasa ichiti vashandi vayo vakawandisa yatanga kutora vadzidzisi vemuzvikoro zvepasi. Bazi rePublic Service Commission (PSC) iro rinopinza nekuburitsa vashandi vehurumende mabasa rakanyorera munyori mukuru webazi rezvedzidzo yepasi Dr Sylvia Janet Utete-Masango kuti vakasununguka kupinza vadzidzisi basa muzvikoro zvine vadzidzisi vashoma. Mutsamba yavo yakanyorwa musi wa24 mwedzi wapera, munyori mukuru wePSC Amai Pretty Sunguro vanoti bazi rezvedzidzo yepasi rakapiwa mvumo yekupinza vadzidzisi basa kuti vatsive vakamiswa mabasa gore rino. Amai Sunguro vanoti pose panopinzwa basa vadzidzisi ava panofanirwa kunge paine vashandi vebazi ravo kuti pasaite huori. Danho rekupinza vadzidzisi mabasa ratambirwa nemufaro nemunyori mukuru wesangano rinomiririra vadzidzisi reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe (PTUZ) VaRaymond Majongwe. Vatiwo bazi rezvedzidzo rinotoda kuwedzerwa vadzidzisi vanosvika zviuru zana kuti vakwanise kudzidziswa zvakanaka. VaMajongwe vayambira hurumende kuti isapinze nhengo dzevechidiki dzeZanu PF mabasa sezvo zvichizokonzera matambudziko muzvikoro vechidiki ava voita zvematongerwo enyika. Vatiwo parizvino, kune vadzidzisi vanosvika zviuru zana nemakumi matatu. Izvi zvinotsigirwa nemumwe mudzidzisi wekuMakonde VaRosten Mutapwa avo vanoti vadzidzisi vashoma. Vatiwo vadzidzisi vanodiwa muzvikoro zvakawanda kubva kuvana vemagiredhi epasi kusvika kusekondari. Mukuru mubazi rezvedzidzo yepasi mudunhu reMashonaland West VaSylvester Mashayamombe vakaudza musangano waizeya matambudziko emuzvikoro mwedzi wapera kuti munyika mune dambudziko rekushomeka kwevadzidzisi. VaMashayamombe vakati mudunhu ravo chete rinoda vadzidzisi vezvikoro zvepasi vanosvika chiuru chimwe chete nemazana maviri nemakumi mana. Hurumende yainge yakambomisa kupinza vashandi mabasa ichiti vakawandisa sezvo mari yainowana ichiperera kumari dzemihoro. Hatina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvedzidzo VaLazerus Dokora sezvo vange vasingadaire nharembozha yavo.
title: Hurumende Yopinza Vamwe Varairidzi Mabasa

text: Mutauriri webato reMDC-T uye vari nhengo yeNational Electoral Reform Agenda, Nera, VaObert Gutu, vanoti vakagadzirira zvakasimba kuzvidzivirira kubva kusangano riri kuzviti Citizens Against Violence and Anarchy, Cava. Sangano iri mumazuva mashoma apfuura rakapihwa mvumo nedare repamusoro yekuti riendese Nera kumatare kuitira kuti nhengo dzaro dziripwe zvinhu zvadziri kuti zvakapunzwa nenhengo dzeNera dzairatidzira gore rapera. Asi veNera vanotiwo vane humbo hwakasimba hunoratidza kuti nhengo dzeZanu-PF nevasori ndivo vakaita izvi. VaGutu vanotiwo vari kuda kuendesawo kumatare bato reZanu-PF vachiripomera mhosva dzekuponda nhengo dzaro dzinosvika mazana maviri muna 2008 panguva yesarudzo. No media source currently available
title: MDC-T Yoendesa Zanu PF kuMatare Ichiti Yakaponda Vanhu Muna 2008?

text: Vana veZimbabwe kumativi mana enyika vari kurangarira gamba renyika, mushakabvu VaJoshua Nkomo, avo vaive mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, vachitarisa nhaka yavakasiya pamwe nemabasa avakabata mukuunza runyararo munyika, makore makumi maviri nematatu vashaya, kunyange hazvo paine vamwe vane maonero akasiyana nevamwe. Nyika yese yaiziva VaNkomo saBaba veZimbabwe kana kuti “Father Zimbabwe”, kududzira chiremerera chaipiwa gamba iri nevatsigiri vavo pamwe nevose vaitevera mabasa avaibata. Vazhinji vanonti chinhu chavanonyanyorangarirwa nacho kubatanidza nyika mugore ra 1987 pakabatana mapato maviri anotiraitonga reZANU PF ne ZAPU paUnity Accord. Izvi zvakauya mushure mekushungurudzwa kwaVaNkomo pamwe nevatsigiri vavo uye kupondwa kwevanhu vanodarika zviuru makumi maviri kuMatabeleland neMidlands nehurumende yevaive mutungamiri wehurumende panguvayo, mushakabvu VaRobert Mugabe. Mukuru muboka rekufambiswa kwemashoko mubato riri kutonga re ZANU PF, Va Tafadzwa Mugwadi, vanoti VaNkomo vanofanirwa kurangarirwa nekuti vakabata mabasa akakura munyika. Mutauriri webato re ZAPU, Va Msongelwa Ndhlovu, vanoti shoko guru ravakasiirwa naVaNkomo nderekuti vanhu vese dai vabatana munyika zvisineyi nekuti wabuda mumba maani kana kuti unotaura rurimi rupi. Nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika vachirwira kodzero dzevanhu, uye vari mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Democracy Institute, VaPedzisai Ruhanya, vanoti zita raVaNkomo haridzimiki mumagwaro enhoroondo yeZimbabwe. Gweta, vachishanda vari mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Human Rights NGO Forum, VaMusa Kika, vanotiwoVaNkomo vaive nemuono mukuru wekukurudzira vechidiki kuti vapinde muzvigaro zvehutungamiri. Asi havasi vose vari kupembedza mabasa akabatwa naVaNkomo, sezvo kune vamwe vave kuti vakatengesa kuburikidza nekubvuma kupinda muchibvumirano cherunyararo nebato reZanu PF mugore ra 1987. Vamwe vaive nhengo dzebato reZAPU vakazomutsiridza bato iri mushure mekushaya kwaVaNkomo asi ivo VaNkomo vakashaya vari nhengo ye ZANU PF. Mwanakomana Va Sibangilizwe Nkomo, ndivo vave kutungamira bato reZAPU, uye vanonzi vane shungu dzekubvisa mapfupa ababa vavo pamarinda anovigwa magamba enyika pa Heroes Acre kuti vanochengetwa patsva kuKezi kumusha kwavo. VaNkomo vakashaya musi wa 01 Chikunguru 1999 vave nemakore makumi masere nemaviri ekuberekwa mushure mekurwara kwenguva yakareba nechirwere chegomarara. No media source currently available
title: Mhuri yeZimbabwe Yorangarira Nhaka neMabasa Akabatwa neGamba reNyika, Mushakabvu VaJoshua Nkomo

text: Vatsigiri venhabvu varikupemberera nekudzingwa kwakaitwa VaCuthbert Dube semutungamiri venhabvu muZimbabwe. Kubva kunaZambezi kusvika kuna Limpopo nyaya ndiyo imwechete yekudzingwa basa kwavaCuthbert Dube semutungamiri weZifa veruzhinji vachiti izvi zvaifanira kuve zvakaitwa kare. Kunyange hazvo VaDube vaive vati varikuregedza basa musi wa 5 Zvita veZifa Council avo vakasangana mukupera kwesvondo vakabvumirana kuti vaDube pamwe nebhodhi ravo rese vaende ikozvino. VaIgnatius Muzondiwa vanoti vaDube vakauraya nhabvu zvekuti kuenda kwavo kwaive kwavanonokera. Mutsigiri wechikwata cheGunners VaNorman Masiyambiri vanoti VaDube vanga vachishaina nemari yavaipa Zifa iyo vanoti vakaba muPremier Medical Aid Society. Asi VaDube vanoti havana kana kobiri ravakaba kukambani iyi. Muzvare Chipo Nyangoro vanoti veZifa Council vanofanira kuregedza zvekuisa panzvimbo vanhui vane mari vosarudza vanoziva zvanhebvu. Zvichakadaro, chikwata chenhabvu chevanhukadzi chemaMighty Warriors chadongorera kuenda kumakwikwi emitambo epasi rose e 2016 Olympic Games ayo achaitirwa kuRio de Janeiro kuBrazil. Chikwata ichi chave kungoda kukunda Cameroon 1-0 kuti chive chikwata chenhabvu chekutanga muZimbabwe kubudirira kuenda kumabiko emitambo epasi rose aya mushure mekurohwa zvakareruka 2-1 kuYaounde mukupera kwesvondo. MaMighty Warriors achange ari pamusha mumasvondo maviri anotevera izvo zvabva zvasimbisa mukana wavo wekukwanisa kuenda kumakundano ane mutsindo epasi rose aya. Mitambo munyika yakaendererawo mberi kuchitambwa mitambo yeChibuku Super Cup munhandare yeMandava Stadium kuZvishavane. Chikwata cheHarare City chakapinda mufainari yeChibuku Super Cup kwemakore maviri akateverana mushure mekudambura ZPC Kariba 4-1. Chikwata ichi chichasangana neDynmos iyo yakarova Chapungu 1-0 nechibodzwa chakabva kuna Roderick Mutuma. Dynamos yacho yakarovawo Chapungu zvikarwadza vatambi vechikwata chemauto emuchadenga avo vaitarisira kukunda kuti vawedzerwe nyembe kubasa uko vanoshanda kuAirforce of Zimbabwe. Mutambi weChapungu Alan Tavarwisa anoti vakaita zvose zvavanogona kuti vakunde mumutambo uyu asi zvakakona n'anga murapwa achida. Fainrai yeChibuku Super Cup ichatambwa musi we 31 Gumiguru. No media source currently available
title: VaTsigiri veNhabvu Votambira neMufaro Kusiya Basa kwaVaDube kuZIFA

text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa nemusi weChipiri vakaita musangano nemutungamiri wenyika yeIvory Coast VaAlassane Quattara kumucheto wemusangano wevakuru vemabhizimisi muAfrica. Vachitauta nevatori venhau pakapera musangano uyu, VaMnangagwa vakati vatungamiri venyika dzemuAfrica vanofanira kusimbisa nyaya dzezvehupfumi kwete zvematongero enyika.z Vachibva kuIvory Coast, VaMnangagwa vari kutarisirwawo kuenda kuChina musi wa 2 Kubvumbi kusvika 6 Kubvumbi kumusangano nemutungamiri wenyika iyi VaXi Jinping. Zimbabwe inodyidzana zvakasimba neChina. Asi kumisangano yavari kuita kuIvory Coast, VaMnangagwa vari kutaurawo nevakuru kubva kusangano reEuropean Union uye bhanga reAfrican Development Bank. VaMnangagwa vakaitawo hurukuro negurukota rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika muFrance kana kuti Minister of State in the Ministry for Europe and Foreign Affairs, VaJean-Baptiste Lemoyne avo vakati chido chavo kuti vakuru veZimbabwe vabvisirwe zvirango zvavakatemerwa uye kuti Zimbabwe ibatsirwe nenyika dzakabudirira kuti ibude mumadhaka mairi munyaya dzezvehupfumi. Sachigaro wekomiti yezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika mudare reparamende vari nhengo yeZanu-PF VaKindness Paradza vanoti nyika dzakawanda dzave kuda kutanga kudyidzana neZimbabwe. No media source currently available
title: VaMnangagwa Vopeta Musangano kuIvory Coast, Votarisirwa Kuenda kuChina

text: Gavhuna weIndiana VaMike Pence avo vakasarudzwa kuti vave mutevedzeri wemutungamiri webato remaRepublicans, VaDonald Trump vari kutarisirwa kutaura manheru ano pamusangano wemaRepublicans we Republican National Convention ku Cleveland, Ohio. VaTrump vari kukwikwidzana naAmai Hillary Clinton vebato remaDemocrats. Anenge akunda musarudzo dzemuna Ndira idzi ndiye achato ra chigaro chekutungamira nyika yeAmerica kubva kuna VaBarack Obama. VaPence vari kutarisirwa kuti vaudze America kuti sei ivo naVaTrump vachifanira kupihwa mukana wekutungamira nyika yeAmerica. VaPence vane makore makumi mashanu nemanomwe ekuberekwa. VaPence vari kutarisirwa kuudza vanhu kuti VaTrump vakakunda musarudzo vachabatsira zvikuru America kuti ive nebudiriro. VaTrump vakakwanisa kukunda vanhu vanosvika gumi nevatanhatu vainge vachikwikwidza kumirira maRepublicans musarudzo idzi. Vamwe vakakundwa musarudzo idzi vanosanganisa gavhuna weWisconsin VaScott Walker uye Senator Ted Cruz vekuTexas naSeneta wekuFloria VaMarco Rubio vari kutarisira kutaurawo pamusangano wanhasi. Vamwe vakataura pamusangano uyu nezuro vanosanganisa gavhuna weNew Jersey VaChris Christie uye mutauriri wedare reHouse of Assembly VaPaul Ryan. Amai Clinton vari kutarisirwa kusarudzwa zviri pamutemo pamusangano webato ravo uri kuitwawo svondo rinouya. VaTrump vachatambira kusarudzwa kwavaitwa nemusi weChina mangwana. Zvichakadaro, mazana nemazana evanhu vari kuratidzirawo kumusangano wemaRepublicans vachiti havasi kufara negwara riri kutorwa naVaTrump. Vanhu ava vanoti VaTrump vari kuda kupa kuti munyika muite kusawirirana zvikuru nyaya yavo yekushora vechitendero chechiMuslim. Chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chiri muAmerica VaAdmonish Deda avo vari kutevera zviri kuitika vanoti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvisina magwaro akakwana zviri kutya kudzoserwa kumusha sezvo VaTrump vari kuti vachaomesera vanenge vasina magwaro akakwana. No media source currently available
title: Mutevedzeri weMutungamiri weBato remaRepublicans VaMike Pence Votaura paMusangano Mukuru weBato Iri.

text: Sangano rinorwisana nehuwori kuchamhembe kweAfrica, reAnti-Corruption Trust of Southern Africa, rinoti rinotambira nemufaro hurongwa hwemuchuchisi mukuru wenyika, kana kuti Prosecutor-General, VaKumbirai Hodzi, hwekuti vachuchisi vese vemunyika vari pasi peNational Prosecution Authority vaongororwe mararamiro avo senzira yekurwisana nehuwori. VaHodzi vakaudza nhepfenyuro yeZBC kuti hurongwa uhwu huchaita kuti vachuchisi pamwe nevamwe vashandi vekumahofisi evachuchisi vaongororwe hupenyu hwavari kurarama kuti huonekwe kana huchienderana nemari dzemihoro dzavanotambira. Vanenge vaonekwa kuti hupenyu hwavo hahusi kuenderana nemihoro yavo vanonzi vanofanirwa kutsanangura kuti vakawanepi mari dzekuve nepfuma dzinenge dzichiongororwa idzi, kukundikana kwavo kutsanangura voendeswa kumatare edzimhosva, uye pfuma yotorwa nehurumende. VaHodzi vari kukurudzirawo veruzhinji kuti vashande nehofisi yavo vachiiruma nzeve kana pane vashandi vanenge vachiita zvehuwori vavanooziva. Hurumende iri kuferefeta huwori kuvashandi vemapoka akasiyanasiyana senzira yekurwisana kwainoti iri kuita nehuwori, asi vamwe vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vanoti hurumende inenge iri kunyanya kusimbirira kusunga vechimwe chipoka cheZanu PF kana vebato rinopikisa reMDC Alliance, zvikuru vari kumakanzuru. Asi mukuru weAnti-Corruption Trust of Southern Africa, VaObert Chinhamo, vanoti sesangano vanotarisira kuti rwendo ruwno hurumende ichaita sekutaura kwayo sezvo aka kasiri kekutanga kuti izivise kuti yave kuongorora mararamiro evashandi vekumatare edzimhosva asi pasina chainozobuda. Zvichakadaro, vanhu vanofungidzirwa kuti imbavha vanonzi vakapaza nekupinda muhofisi yasachigaro veZimbabwe Anti-Corruption Commission, ZACC, Justice Loice Matanda Moyo iri kuMt. Pleasant mukupera kwesvondo. Bepanhau reHerald rinoti Justice Matanda Moyo vatenda kuti hofisi yavo yakapazwa uye mapurisa ari kuferefeta kana paine zvinokosha zvingadai zvakabiwa muhofisi iyi. Sangano reZACC riri kurwisana zvakasimba nehuwori munyika kuburikidza nekusunga vanhu vari kupomerwa mhosva dzehuwori. No media source currently available
title: Anti-Corruption Trust of Southern Africa Yotambira Hurongwa hweKuongororwa kweHuwori muVachuchisi

text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe nhasi vati havasi kuzosiya chigaro chavo sezviri kutaurwa nevamwe vevakarwa muhondo yerusunguko vachiti vakadzika midzi pahutungamiri hwenyika. Vachitaura pamusangano wavaita nevamwe vakarwa hondo yerusununguko vari muchikwata chesangano revakarwa muhondo reZimbabwe Liberation War Veterans Association chinotungamirwa naAmai Mandi Chimene waitirwa pamuzinda weZanu PF muHarare, VaMugabe vati havasi kuzosiya chigaro sezvo vachiti vakasikirwa hutongi uye veruzhinji vachiri kuvada. VaMugabe vati vakarwa hondo yerusunuguko vari kuti vabve pachigaro vanhu vari kushanda nehurumende yeBritain, America pamwe neFrance kuti hurumende iripo ibviswe. Vamwe vakarwa muhondo yerusununguko vari kuchikwata chinotungamirwa naVaChris Mutsvangwa, avo vakadzingwa muZanu PF, vakaburitsa mashoko svondo rapera achiti VaMugabe vavekufanira kusiya basa sezvo vakwegura uye vari kutadza kutungamira nyika zvakanaka. Zvichakadaro, vamiriri vehurumende idzi vakaudza Studio 7 masvondo mashoma adarika kuti havanei nenyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika muZimbabwe vachiti chavanongotarisira kuhurumende kuremekedza kodzero dzevanhu pamwe nemitemo yenyika. Amai Chimene vashandisawo musangano uyu kutsoropodza mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa nekutungamira kwavanonzi vari kuita chipoka cheZanu PF chiri kuzvidaidza kuti Team Lacoste chinonzi chiri kugadzirira kutora matomhu kubva kuna VaMugabe kana vachinge vabva pachigaro. Amai Chimene vati chinoshamisa ndechekuti VaMnangagwa havasi kuvhura muromo wavo pose parikutaurwa-taurwa nezvekuda kwavo kutora masimba kubva kuna VaMugabe. VaMnangagwa, avo vanga varipowo pamusangano uyu havana kana kumboti bufu kudzamara musangano uye upere. Chimwe chipoka chinonzi chiri kukwikwidzana neTeam Lacoste chirikudaidzwa kuti Generation 40 kana kuti G40 uye chinonzi chinotungamirwa nemudzimai waVaMugabe, Amai Grace Mugabe. Zvichakadai, VaMugabe vati sangano revakarwa muhondo rinofanira kuita sarudzo itsva kuti ritsvage humwe hutungamiri. VaMugabe vatorawo mukana uyu zvakare kutsoropodza vedzisvondo vavati vari kupindira munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika vakatsoropodza mutungamiri weboka reHash Tag This Flag, VaEvan Mawarire zvepiri. Vati hurumende yavo haisi kuzopeta mawoko ichisiya veruzhinji vachiratidzira kusafara kwavo nehutongo hwavo. Mashoko aVaMugabe aya anouya apo vechidiki vebato reMDC-T vakazivisa neMuvhuro kuti vacharatidzira zvakawomarara munyika yose mwedzi unouya kudzamara VaMugabe vabva pachigaro. Zvichakadai, nhengo yeZanu PF, VaEnergy Mutodi vadzingwa pamusangano uyu nevechidiki veZanu PF vanga vachivapomera mhosva yekuti mutengesi. Vamwe vatori venhau vemapepa akazvimirira vanga vachishungurudzwawo nevechidiki veZanu PF. Musangano uyu wapindwa nevaimbova varwi muhondo yerusunguko vashomanana nevatsigiri veZanu PF vane chitsama nyangwe hazvo musangano uyu wanga uchifanira kunge wapindwa nevaimbova varwi muhondo yerusunguko. No media source currently available
title: VaMugabe Vanoti Havasi Kuzosiya Chigaro Ukuwo Vatsigiri Vavo Vachituka VaMnangagwa

text: Vanhu vakawanda vanonzi vatanga kupinda muguta reHarare uku vamwe vachiti vachiri kushungurudzwa nemapurisa nemauto kunyange hazvo dare repamusoro rakati izvi zvinofanira kumira. Vanochengetedza runyararo vanonziwo nevamwe vari kuratidza kuti havana ruzivo rwakakwana pakudzivirira kupararia kwe chirwere checoronavirus. Vakawanda vanoti vari kushamisika kuti sei vari kufamba vakawanda vari mumarori uye vasina zvekuzvidzivirira mhuno nemuromo sezviri kukurudzirwa nevezvehutano pasi rose. Kunyange vanhu vachifanira kufamba netsamba kuti vadarike pane mapurisa nemauto, vamwe vanonzi vave kuguma vobhadhara chioko muhomwe zvopa kuti vanhu vazare muguta reHarare ipo paine kurudziro yekuti vagare mudzimba. Huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa nechirwere checoronavirus huri kutoramba huchikwira zvakanyanya kubva zvanzi vanhu vagare mudzimba. Kuti nyika inzi yakwanisa kudzikisa hukasha hwechirwere ichi, World Health Organization inoti nyika inofanira kupedza mavhiki maviri pasina munhu abatwa nechirwere ichi. Mutevedzeri wemunyori wezvematunhu muMDC, VaClifford Hltyawayo, vanoti mapurisa nemauto anofanira kuita zvidzidzo zvekuchengetedza kodzero dzevanhu. Asi gweta vari nhengo yeZanu-PF, VaTinomudaishe Chinyoka, vanoti mumapurisa nemumauto munogona kunge muine dzimwe nhinhi asi vanhu havafanire kushora vose. Hatina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvekudzivirirwa kwenyika, Amai Oppah Muchinguri Kashiri, sezvo nharembozha yavo yange isiri kudairwa. No media source currently available
title: Vanhu Vakawanda Votanga Kupinda Muguta reHarare neNyaya yeHuori

text: Zvitoro zvikuru zvinotengesa zvekudya muguta reHarare zviri kutora matanho okudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere chekorera icho chanetsa munyika. Zvitoro izvi zviri kuisa pamikova yazvo mishonga yekugezesa maoko kuitira kuti vatengi vatange vachenesa maoko avo vasati vapinda, uye kuchenesa zvakare maoko avo pavanobuda. Studio7 yaona izvi zvichiitika muzvitoro zvakawanda zvakaita sePick and Pay, Bon Marche neSpar. Zvinhu zviri kutengwa zvakanyanya mishonga inodirwa mumvura yekunwa pamwe neyekusukisa ndiro. Maneja wePick and Pay yekuAvondale, VaShepherd Msipa, vaudza Studio7 kuti mishonga inochenesa maoko yava kushaikwa sezvo vanhu vanga vachiita chipatapata kuitenga. Mukuru weZimbabwe Peace Project, Muzvare Jestina Mukoko, vanoti sezvo munyika maita dambudziko rekorera, zvakakosha kuti vashandirwi vakurudzire vashandi vavo kugeza maoko avo pavanosvika pabasa. Mumwe mukomana aramba kutaura zita asi achishanda muchitoro cheBon Marche kuAvondale ati mishonga yakawanda yekuchenesa kana kugezesa maoko yava kunetsa kuwana. Chirwere chekorera chakatanga kubuda mumisha yeGlenview neBudiriro, uye kusvika pari zvino, vanhu vanodarika makumi maviri nevashanu vafa nacho munyika yose, uye vanhu vanodarika zviuru zvitatu nemazana manomwe vakabatwa nechirwere ichi. Gurukota rezveutano VaObediah Moyo, nemamwe makurukota ehurumende vari mushishi rokutsvaga matanho okudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere. Nyanzvi dzezvehutano dzinoti korera iri kukonzerwa nehutsvina, kunwa mvura isina kuchena, pamwe nekudya zvinhu zvisina kuchengetedzwa zvakanaka.
title: Zvitoro Zvotora Matanho eKudzivirira Korera

text: Dare repamusoro rarasa chikumbiro chesangano reCommunity Water Alliance chekuti kunetsa kuri kuita mvura muHarare kutorwe sedambudziko guru ratarisana nenyika. Mutongi wedare repamusoro, VaOwen Tagu, varasa chikumbiro chesangano Community Water Alliance chekuti kanzuru yeHarare pamwe nehurumende vamanikidzwe kupa vagari vemuHarare mvura yakachena uye kuti mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vaise chidhindo chavo chekuti kushayikwa kwemvura yakachena ratove dambudziko guru rakatarisana nenyika, kana kuti national disaster. Vachitura mutongo wavo, VaTagu vati chikumbiro cheCommunity Water Alliance ichi chasara kumashure kwenguva sezvo hurumende iri kubatsirana nekanzuru yeHarare kuti muHarare munge muine mvura yakachena kubudikidza nemari inonzi yakapihwa kanzuru yeHarare. Asi mutauriri wekanzuru yeHarare, VaMichael Chideme, vaudza Studio7 kuti mari yavakapihwa nehurumende yakanga yakanangana nekugadzirisa pombi dzemvura kwete kutenga mishonga yekuchenesa mvura. Mutongo waturwa nedare washorwa nemukuru anoona nezvezvirongwa musangano reCommunity Water Alliance, VaHardlife Mudzingwa. VaMudzingwa vati madhamu anotorwa mvurwa nekanzuru yeHarare ari kupwa zvinoratidza kuti dambudziko remvura muHarare riri kutoramba richikura. Vatiwo mutongo waturwa nedare unotyora kodzero dzeveruzhinji dzekuti vave vanowana mvura yakachena nguva dzose sezvo pombi dzekanzuru dzichiri kubuda mvura ine tsvina. VaChideme vakurudzira vagari kuti vabhadhare mabhiri avo emvura kuitira kuti kanzuru igokwanisa kutenga mishonga yekuchenesa mvura. Asi meya weguta reHarare, VaHerbert Gomba, vakabuda pachena nguva yapfuura kuti kanzuru yavo iri kutadza kutenga mishonga yekuchenesamvura sezvo iri kutadza kuwana mari yekunze inokwana kubva kubhanga guru renyika, reReserve Bank of Zimbabwe. Zimbabwe yakatarisana nadambudziko rekushayikwa kwemari yekunze izvo zviri kutadzisa nyika kutenga zvinhu zvakawanda zvinoda mari yekunze zvakafanana nemagetsi, mafuta edzimotokari nezvimwe zvakadaro. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nagavhuna weReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, VaJohn Mangudya, kuti tinzwe kuti matanho api avari kutora kuti vawane mari yekunze iri kudiwa nekanzuru yeHarare nehurumende kuti patengwe zviri kudiwa kubva kunze kwenyika. No media source currently available
title: Dare Rinorasa Chikumbiro Chekuti Kunetsa kweMvura muHarare Kutarwe seDambudziko Rakurisisa

text: Vatyairi vedzimotokari vanoti havasi kufara nekukwidzwa kwaitwa mitengo yemafuta edzomitokari pamwe nemari dzekupaka motokari dzavo mudhorobha reHarare. Mashoko aburitswa neZimbabwe Energy Regulatory Authority, kana kuti ZERA, anoti mutengo wepeturu wakwira kubva pamadhora manomwe nemasendi makumi mana nemanomwe kusvika pamadhora manomwe nemasendi makumi mashanu nemashanu parita uye dhiziri rakwirawo kusvika pamadhora manomwe nemasendi makumi maviri nemaviri. Kukwidzwa kwaita mafuta edzimotokari uku kwashorwa nevatyairi vakaita saVaFabian Zenda avo vanogara mumusha weBelgravia muHarare. VaClemence Muzoda vatiwo kukwira kuri kuita mafuta hakuenderane nemari dziri kutambirwa neveruzhinji munyika uye vati izvi zviri kuratidza kuti nyika iri kuramba ichienda kumawere. Vatyairi vazhinji vataura neStudio7 vati kukwira kuri kuramba kuchiita mafuta edzimotokari kuchakonzera kuti zvinhu zvakawanda zvikwire mitengo muzvitoro. Gurukota rezvemari, VaMthuli Ncube, vati vachazotifonera vabuda mumusangano asi hatina kuzokwanisa kuvabata pataenda pamhepo. Asi VaNcube vakataura masvondo mashoma adarika kuti mafuta edzimotokari anogona kuramba achikwira zvichienderana nehuremu hwema RTGS pamusika wekubhanga we interbank rate. Zvichakadai, kambani inoona nezvekupakiswa kwemotokari mudhorobha reHarare ye City Parking yaburitsawo mashoko ekuti mutengo wekupakisa motokari wakwira nhasi kubva padhora kuenda pamadhora mashanu paawa imwe chete. Mumwe mutyairi anoshandira pakati peguta, VaNesbert Nyoni, vati mari iyi yakawandisa kana zvichienzaniswa nemari dziri kutamabiriswa veruzhinji. VaNyoni vati kupaka motokari kwezuva rese pavanenge vari pabasa vave kutoda mari zhinji yavanoti haiwirirane nemari yavo yemihoro. Izvi zvatsinhirwa naVaFarai Mukwena avo vanoti mari dziri kubahdhariswa vatyairi hadzienderane nekusagadzirwa kuri kuitwa migwagwa nema robots ari muHarare. Kanzuru yeHarare, iyo inotungamirwa neMDC, yakabvuma mubhajeti rayo kuti mari dzekupakisa motokari dzikwidzwe ichiti mari yekupakisa motokari ichabtsirawo mukugadzirwa kwezvivakwa zvekanzuru muguta. Mune imwewo nyaya, dare remakurukota rabvumirana kubvisa chikamu chebhiri reMarriage Amendment Bill change chichipa masimba ekuti mukadzi asina muchato ave nekodzero yekuwana hupfumi mushure mekufa kwemurume. Chikamu ichi chakaunza mutauro mukuru vanhu vachiti chinokurudzira kugarisana kwevanhu vasina kuroorana, vamwe vachitiwo chaibatsira vana vanenge vaberekwa kunze kwemuchato. Dare remakurukota razivisawo kuti Zesa ichange yowana mazana manomwe ema megawatts kubva ku South Africa zvichitevera kubhadharwa kwakaitwa kambani yeEskom imwe mari yechikwereti chine Zesa kubva kukambani iyi. No media source currently available
title: Vanhu Vochema Zvikuru neMutengo weMafuta

text: Dare repamusoro muBulawayo rakapa mutongo wekuti vaimbove mutevedzeri wameya weguta iri, VaGift Banda, vadzokere pachinzvimbo chavo. Mutongi wedare iri Justice Martin Makonese vakapa mutongo uyu mangwanani emusi weChina. VaBanda vaive vambomiswa basa negurukota rezvekutongwa kwematunhu VaSavior Kasukuwere muna Gunyana gore rapera. Vakazodzingwa basa mushure mekunge tribunal yaive yasarudzwa naVaKasukuwere kuti iferefete nyaya iyi yavati vaive vabatwa nemhosva yavaipomerwa yekushandisa chinzvimbo chavo kuti vatenge imwe nzvimbo yekuvakira zvisiri pamutemo. Mushure mekudzingwa kwazvo, VaBanda vakakwira kudare reHigh Court vachipikisa kudzingwa uku. Mumutongo wavo Justice Makonese vati mushure mekuzeya nyaya iyi, vakaona kuti tribunal yakatadza pakuwana VaBanda vaine mhosva sezvo zvaive pachena kuti hapana mutemo wavaive vatyora mukutenga kwavakaita nzvimbo yekuvakira iyi. Nekudaro Justice Makonese vati VaBanda vanofanirwa kudzorerwa pachinzvimbo chavo chekuve kanzura uye mutevedzeri wameya weguta reBulawayo. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kubazi rezvekutongwa kwematunhu panyaya iyi. Gweta raVaBanda VaKholwani Ngwenya vaudza Studio 7 kuti vange vasati vaona magwaro emutongo uyu asi vati vari kufara zvisiri nekuti vaiziva kuti VaBanda vaisave nemhosva kubvira pekutanga. VaNgwenya vati pavanongowana magwaro emutongo uyu vachaasvitsa kukanzuru yeguta reBulawayo kuti VaBanda vadzokere pachinzvimbo chavo sezvataurwa nedare. Vatiwo vanotarisirawo kuti VaBanda vapiwevo mari yose yavaifanirwa kuwana kubvira pavakamiswa basa kusvikira pair zvino sezvataurwawo mumutongo uyu. Mutauriri webato reMDC T VaDouglas Mwonzora vaudza Studio 7 parunhare kuti mutongo wanhasi uno ratidza pachena zvinogarotaurwa nevebato ravo makanzura avo kunyanya mumaguta, vanopomerwa mhosva dzemanyepo senzira yebato riri kutonga reZanu PF rekushungurudza vatsigiri varo. No media source currently available
title: Dare rePamusoro kuBulawayo Rinoti Mutevedzeri waMeya VaBanda Ngavadzoserwe paBasa

text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vazivisa neChipiri nezvemitemo mitsva inobata denda reCovid-19. Mitemo iyi inosanganisira wekuti kubva izvozvi vose vana veZimbabwe vari kudzoka munyika vanofanirwa kunge vachivhenekwa pachishandiswa michina yePCR uye vachagariswa kwavo voga vachizvibhadharira mari dzavo, kwemazuva anenge akurudzirwa neWorld Health Organisation, WHO. Mutemo unorambidza kufambafamba kwevanhu uchasimbiswawo kuti utange kubva nenguva dzepfumbamwe manheru kusvika nenguva dzenhanhatu mangwanani ruva rinotevera. Huwandu hwevanhu vachange vachibvumidzwa kuungana pagungano ripi zvaro hunofanirwa kucherechedzwa uye huchienderana nemutemo weWHO. Mutungamiri wenyika vazivisawo kuti vezvitoro vave kusungirwa kuvhura nenguva dzenomwe mangwanani vachivhara nenguva dzenomwe manheru. Nzvimbo dzekutandarira usiku nedzekunwira dzinonzi dzinosungirwa kubvumidza kupinda vanenge vaine humbowo hwekuti vakabaiwa nhomba yekudzivirira COVID-19 uye nzvimbo dzekudyira dzinenge dzosungirwawo kuvhara nenguva dzinovhara vezvitoro dzenomwe manheru. Ndufu dzine chekuita nedenda reCOVID-19 dzichange dzichisungirwa kutungamirwa nenyanzvi dzezvehutano dzinobva kubazi rezvehutano. Komiti inotungamira kurwiswa kwedenda reCOVID-19 munyika, yeCOVID-19 National Committee, yatara hutachiwana hutsva hwe Omicron, sechishusho sezvakatarwawo neWHO. Nyika inonzi ichangewo yawedzera kuvhenekwa kweCOVID-19 munzvimbo dzose dzekupinda nadzo munyika pamwe nekusimbisa miganho yayo. Vose vanokodzera kunge vachibaiwa nhomba yekudzivirira COVID-19 vari kukurudzirwa kuti vange vachibaiwa senzira yekuderedza dambudziko redenda iri.
title: Mutungamiri weNyika, VaMnangagwa, Vanozivisa nezveMitemo Mitsva yeKudzivirira COVID-19

text: Komiti inotungamira basa reparamende, yeStanding Rules and Orders yadoma nhengo pfumbamwe dzekomiti ichaongororo zvinonzi zviri kuitwa nenhengo dzeMDC muparamende zvekuratidzira nekubuda mudare iri kana mutungamiriri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa varimo. Amai Priscilla Misiharabwi-Mushonga, avo vaimbove nhengo yeMDC varamba kuve nhengo yekomiti iyi vachiti vachaudza sachigaro wayo, Advocate Jacob Mudenda zvikonzero zvacho. Vamwe vadomwa kuve mukomiti iyi vanosanganisira, VaKindness Paradza, VaLevi Maihlome, Amai Omega Hungwe, VaJoseph Chirongoma, VaCycil Kashiri naVaAljenia Samson. Komiti iyi yakaumbwa zvichitevera chichemo chakakwidzwa kudare nevanokokera nhengo dzeZanu PF VaPupurai Togarepi avo vakati zviri kuitwa nenhengo dzeMDC zvekusaremekedza mutungamiriri wenyika kana kubuda paanoouya hazvienderani nemutemo weparamende. VaMudenda vati vanoona sekuti pane kuzvidza dare kuri kuitwa nenhengo dzeMDC uye izvi ndizvo zvichaongororwa nekomiti yozotura zvainenge yawana nezvirango zvinofanira kupihwa muna Kukadzi gore rinouuya. Asi nhengo dzeMDC hadzina kufara kuti komiti iyi inonzi iongorore nhengo dzeMDC chete asi nhengo dzeZanu PF dzichivhiringa misangano yekomoti yeparamende pamwe nekuvaatadzisa kuita basa. Mumiriri weMbizo, VaSettelement Chikwinya veMDC, avo vakati panofanira kuumbwa komiti yakaitwa seyadomwa nhasi kuongorora nhengo dzeZanu-PF vati VaMudenda havana kujekesa kuti komiti iyi ichaongorora zviri kuitwa nenhengo dzeZanu PF here. Asi VaMudenda vati komiti iyi ichaongorora zvese zvine chekuita nenyaya iyi. Mumiriri weWarren Park, VaShakespear Hamauswa, veMDC ndemumwewo vati hazvina kujeka pakutaura kwaVaMudenda kuti komiti iyi ichaongororawo zviri kuitwa nenhengo dzeZanu PF here. Vatiwo havawoni sekuti komiti iyi ichaita basa rayo isina divi rayakarerekera sezvo iine nhengo dzeZanu PF chete. Vanoongorora nyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika, vachishanda nesangano reZimbabwe Democracy Institute, Doctor Pedzisayi Ruhanya vaudza Studio 7 kuti komiti iyi iite basa rayo nemazvo inofanira kuve nenhengo kubva kumapato ose ari muparamende. Rimwe gweta, VaKudzayi Kadzere vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvave kuitwa neSROC yeparamende zvekudoma nhengo kubva kubato rimwe hazvifambirana nehutongi hwejekerere. SROC ikomiti ine nhengo kubva kumapato ose ari muparamende. Apo komiti iyi yaizeya nyaya iyi, nhengo dzeMDC dzakabuda mumusangano painge pave kuda kusarudzwa nhengo dzePriviledges committee dzichiti dzainge dzisingabvumirane nedanho rainge rave kuda kutorwa. MDC inoti panofanira kuve nekomiti isina divi rayakarerekera inoongorora kunetsana pakati pe Zanu PF neMDC kwete kuti Zanu PF itungamire hurongwa uhu. No media source currently available
title: Nhengo dzeZanu-PF muParamende Dzoferefeta MDC neKuramba Kucherechedza VaMnangagwa

text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmerson Mnangagwa, vakasvika neChipiri masikati muguta reLusaka muZambia mavari kushanya kwemazuva maviri ari kubatanidzira zuva guru reZambia apo iri kupemberera kusvitsa makore makumi mashanu nemana yawana kuzvitonga kuzere. Zambia yakawana kuzvitonga kuzere kubva musi wa 23 Gumiguru 1964. VaMnangagwa vakatambirwa kunhandare yendege yeKenneth Kaunda International Airport nemutungamiri weZambia, VaEdgar Lungu, gurukota rezvekunze kweZambia, VaJoe Malanji, mumiririri weZimbabwe ku Zambia, Ambassador Emmanuel Chenda, pamwe vakuru vemauto nemapurisa ekuZambia. VaMnangagwa vakashanyira vaimbove mutungamiri weZambia, Doctor Kenneth Kaunda, kumba kwavo vasati vananga kumuzinda we Zambia State House uko kwavakanoita musangano naVaLungu. Va Mnangagwa naVa Lungu vakasaina zvibvumirano zveJoint Permanent Commission zvinobata kudyidzana kwenyika mbiri idzi. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika vachiita zvidzidzo zvepamusoro paCezch University of Life Sciences kuPrague, VaWelcome Zimuto, vanoti hukama hweZimbabwe neZambia hwakakosha sezvo nyika idzi dzine nhoroondo yakafanana munyaya yekuwana kuzvitonga. VaMnangagwa vanotarisirwa kudzokera kumusha mukupera kwezuva kana mhemberero idzi dzapera. No media source currently available
title: VaMnangagwa Voshanyira Zambia Panguva Iri Kupemberera Kuzvitonga Kuzere.

text: Vadzidzi gumi vepaUniversity of Zimbabwe vari kuratidza mifananidzo yakasiyana-siyana inoratidza mararamiro ari kuita veruzhinji munyika panguva iyo hupfumi hwenyika huri kuenda kumawere. Mumwe wevari kuratidza mifananidzo yavo, VaMelvin Gwishiri, vane mifananidzo inoratidza nyonga nyonga. Vati chinangwa chavo ndechekuti zvemitambo munyika zvishandiswewo kuudza vatungamiri venyika zviri kunetsa veruzhinji. VaJoseph Muzamani vane mifananidzo yevanhukadzi vachiita mabasa akasiyasiyana kuti vawane chouviri. VaMuzamani vati vari kuratidza mifananidzo yemadzimai iyi nepamusana pekuti madzimai ari kuita zvese zvingakwanisika kuti variritire mhuri dzavo. Mumwe mudzidzi ari kuratidzawo mifananidzo yevatengesi vezvinhu zvakasiya-siyana kusanganisira vasikana vanotengesa miviri yavo, VaArnold Chiringa, vatiwo muZimbabwe, ruzhinji rwuri kurarama nekutengesa. VaChiringa vati nekuda kwekushaikwa kwemabasa, vanhu vanotengesa vawanda kudarika vatengi, izvo zviri kupa kuti vatengesi vawane mari shomana zvikuru. Mifananidzo iyi iri kuratidzwa pasi pedingindira rinoti, “Life as we know it.” Kuratidzira uku kwakavhurwa zviri pamutemo neimwe nyanzvi mune zvekuveza matombo, VaDominic Benhura. Kutaridzira uku kunopera neChishanu svondo rinouya. No media source currently available
title: Vadzidzi paUZ Voratidza Mifananidzo Inodonongodza Hupenyu hwaNhasi

text: Dambudziko rechirwere chekufungisisa kana kuti depression muChirungu, rinonzi nderimwe rezvikonzero zvinoita kuti huwandu hwevanhu vanotora hupenyu hwavo hukwirenmuZimbabwe pamwe nepasi rose. Mashoko aya akataurwa nemumwe chiremba, Doctor Josphat Chiripanyanga, avo vanoshandira paChinhoyi Mall Medical Centre muHarare. Doctor Chiripanyanga vakati vanhu makumi masere kubva muzana vanodzamisa pfungwa zvakanyanyisa vozoguma vaona sokunge munhu wese asinganzwisise zviri kuvashungurudza. Vakati kune chitsama chevana vadiki vari pasi pemakore gumi nemashanu (15) vari kusvika pakuzviuraya mushure mekunge vadzamisawo ndangariro zvakanyanyisa. VaChiripanyanga vakaenderera mberi vachitsanangura zvimwe zvezvinhu zvavakati zvinoita kuti munhu aite chirwere che depression. Vakati dambudziko guru riri maererano nechirwere che depression nderekuti vanhu vazhinji havatozive kuti vane chirwere ichi. Chiremba ava vakaenderera mberi vachiti vanhurume ndivo vazhinji vanonyanya kuzviuraya kudarika vanhukadzi. Vakati chirwere che depression chiri muchikwata chezvirwere zvepfungwa, nekudaro panogona kuita rusarura kubva kuhama neshamwari zvinozokonzera kuti munhu azviuraye. Amai Valeria Mupfumira, vanodzidzisa pachikoro chiri kuMashonaland West, vakakataura neStudio 7 nezvekurwara kwavo uye nenyaya yerusarura. Doctor Chiripanyanga vakataura kuti vanhu makumi mashanu kubva muzana muZimbabwe nepasi rose vanorwara nechirwere che depression. Vanhu vanodarika mamirioni zviuru mazana matatu (300 000 000) vanonzi vanorwara ne depression, iyo inonzi inokonzera kuremara kana kuzviuraya kwevanhu vanodarika zviuru mazana masere (800 000) pasi rose. Nyika yeZimbabwe haisati yave kuziva kuti vanhu vangani vanorwara nechirwere ichi asi tsvagurudzo yakaitwa inoratidza kuti zvimwe zvezvinhu zvakadomwa sezvinokonzera kufungisisa kana kuti depression inyaya yezvakaitika kuvanhu ava munguva yehondo yakasunungura nyika ino. Zvimwewo zvakadomwa zvinonzi zvinokonzera kushushikana kwepfungwa ihondo yeGukurahundi iyo inonzi yakauraya vanhu vanodarika zviuru makumi maviri (20 000) kumatunhu eMatabeleland neMidlands, uye nemhirizhonga yezvematongerwo enyika iyo inogara yakaitika munyika muno panguva dzesarudzo. No media source currently available
title: Chirwere Chekufungisisa Chopa Kuti Vamwe Vazviuraye

text: Hurumende inoti kusvika parizvino chirwere checholera chauraya vanhu makumi maviri nevashanu uye kutapurirwa kuvanhu vanodarika zviuru zvitatu. Nzvimbo dzine chirwere ichi chiri kunzvimbo dzinosanganisa Harare, Manicaland, Midlands, Mashonaland East neMashonaland Central. Nyaya yechirwere checholera yave kuunza mutauro wakanyanya munyika pachinakuriranwa nyoka mhenyu pakati peZanu-PF neMDC. VeZanu-PF vanoti zviri kuitika zviri kuratidza pachena kuti MDC ine makanzura akawanda mumaguta uye yatadza kubata basa nenyaya yehuori. Asi veMDC Alliance vanoti makurukota eZanu-PF anoikanganisa kuita basa uye hurumende haisi kubhadhara mitero kumakanzuru zvopa kuti ashaya kana kobiri rekuita basa. Kanzura weMt Pleasant uye vari mutauriri weMDC Alliance VaJacob Mafume vanoti haisi nguva yekupumhana huroyi asi kunyangwe zvakadaro makurukota eZanu-PF ndiwo anovhiringidza basa mumakaunzuru. Asi vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vakarerekera kubato reZanu-PF VaGadzira Chirumanzu vanoti makanzura eMDC akundikana basa zvopa kuti zvirwere zvipararire munyika. No media source currently available
title: MDC Alliance neZanu-PF Vonakurirana Nyoka Mhenyu paNyaya yeKorera

text: Kupinda kwameya weKariba muchirongwa chekupihwa kwevanhu vanoshaya zvekudya nesangano reWorld Food Program-WFP kwave kukonzeresa mutauro wakanyanya munyika. Vamwe vagari vemuKariba vanoti havasi kufara nekupinda muchirongwa chekupihwa mari kwevanotambura kuti vatenge zvekudya kwameya weguta ravo VaGeorge Masendu. Sachigaro weKariba Residents Association VaSam Mawawo vanoti muKariba mune vanhu vakawanda vari kutambura kudarika meya weguta vakatadza kupinda muchirongwa ichi. Asi VaMasendu vanoti havasi ivo vakapinda muchirongwa ichi asi kuti mudzimai wavo wechipiri ndiye akanyoresa zita ravo vakapinda sasaimba. Vaenderera mberi vachiti hapana chakaipa kuti vapihwe zvekudya nemasangano anobatsira sezvo ivo vachitambura nekuti vari kuwana mari inoita madhora zviuru zviviri chete sameya weguta. Mutevedzeri wemutauriri webato reMDC Alliance VaClifford Hlatywayo vanoti havaone paine chakaipa sezvo zita ravo rakanyoreswa nemudzimai wavo uye mumwe kanzura webato reZanu PF ari kuyamurwawo. Kanzura weZanu PF munzvimbo iyi VaRodric Mugwanhira varamba kuti vari muchirongwa cheWFP. Mumwe mukuru mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko muWFP VaTatenda Macheka vanoti WFP iri kuongorora nyaya dzose idzi. Vati kana paine vakaita chikiribidi vanoendeswa kumapazi ehurumende akakodzera kubata nyaya iyi asi kana vachikodzera vanongopihwawo chikafu sevamwe vari kuchida. Mumwe mushandi wesangano rinoshanda neWFP reLinkages for Economic Advancement of the Disadvantaged-LEAD- asina kuda kudomwa nezita anoti hapana chakaipa kuti vakuru vemaguta vapinde muchirongwa kana vachigara munzvimbo dzinonzi dzine vanhu vari kutambura zvakanyanya kana kuti maHot Spots. Mushandi uyu anoti vose vanogara munzvimbo dzine nzara vane mukana wakaenzana wekusarudzwa kuti vapihwe ruyamuro zvisinei nechigaro chavo munharaunda. Sangano reWFP rinoti huwandu hwevanhu vanoda chikafu mumadhorobha emuZimbabwe huri kutarisirwa kukwira kusvika pamamiriyoni matatu nezviuru mazana matatu kana kuti 3.3 million kubva pamamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana maviri kana kuti 2,2 million. No media source currently available
title: Charova Sei Chando? Meya weKariba Obatsirwa neChikafu neWFP

text: Mutungamiri wekereke yeZimbabwe Divine Destiny, Bishop Ancelimo Magaya, vanoti nhaurirano dzakanaka munyika asi hadzifanirwi kutungamirwa nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, sezvo vari munhu ari mugakava rezvematongerwo enyika. Zvichiteverawo musangano wadaidzirwa naVaMnangagwa kuti vakurukure nevamwe vavakakwikwidzana navo musarudzo dza2018, Bishop Magaya vati nyaya yekutaurirana yakanaka chose asi vakati haifanirwi kutungamirirwa naVaMnangagwa. VaMagaya vati VaMnangagwa vari pakati pegakava riri kunetsa munyika nekudaro hazvigoni kuti vakokere nhaurirano yekutsvaka kugadzirisa zviri kunetsa munyika. Asi imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika, VaOwen Dhliwayo, vaudzawo Studio7 kuti musangano wakokerwa nemutungamiriri wenyika wakanaka zvikuru sezvo wapa mukana vatungamiriri vemapato akasiyana-siyana wekuti vataure nhunha dzavo. Mumagwaro avabudisa, sangano reCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition ratiwo hurukuro hadzifanirwi kungopinda vari munyaya dzematongerwo enyika chete, asi kuti munhu wese ave nechekuita nenhaurirano idzi. Vemapato anopikisa, vedzisvondo pamwe nenyanzvi munyaya dzerunyararo vanoti kusagadzikana kwezvinhu munyika kunopedzwa chete nenhaurirano dzinonanga kugadzirisa zviri kunetsa, kwete nhaurirano dzakanangana nekuchengetedza zvigaro zvevakuru mune zvematongerwo enyika. No media source currently available
title: Bishop Magaya Vanoti VaMnangagwa Havafanirwi Kutungamira Misangano yeNhaurirano

text: Grain Millers Association of Zimbabwe iri kuyambira kuti mutengo wechingwa uri kutarisirwa kukwira zvakanyanya svondo rino mushure mekunge GMB yawedzera mutengo wegorosi rinorimwa munyika nezvikamu makumi matanhatu nemasere kubva muzana. Mutauriri weGrain Millers Association iyo inozogaya gorosi VaGarikai Chaunza vati havana chekuita kunze kwekuwedzerawo mutengo kune vanozobika chingwa. Gorosi iri rinosanganiswa nerimwe rinotengwa kunze kwenyika. No media source currently available Parizvino chingwa chiri kutengwa nemadhora gumi nemanomwe nemasendi mukumi mashanu. Hatina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvekurima VaPerrence shiri sezvo vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo.
title: Chingwa Chotarisirwa Kukwira Zvakanyanya Svondo Rino

text: Nhengo dzedare reparamende dzinoti dzinofara kuti dzakabudirira mukurwisa kwadzo kuti makore emwanasikana anonzi abvume kuita zvepabonde akwidzwe kubva pagumi nemaviri kuenda pamakore gumi nematanhatu. Mukokeri wenhengo dzeMDC T muparamende, VaInnocent Gonese, vanoti mutemo uripo pari zvino unoti kana mwana ane makore ari pakati pemakore gumi nemaviri negumi nematanhatu akaita zvepabonde, pakave nehumbowo hwekuti akabvuma, haana kubatwa chibharo, nokudaro hapana mhosva inenge yaparwa. Vanoti ivo vaitoda kuti makore aya akwidzwe kusvika pamakore gumi nemasere, ayo anobvumidzwa munhu kutanga imba. Asi vanoti vamwe, vachitsigirwa nevanotungamira mabasa eparamende uye vari mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vakaramba. VaGonese vanotiwo kutambirwa kwakaitwa nyaya iyi mudare reparamende zvave kureva kuti nyaya iyi yave kuendeswa kukomiti yeparamende inoona nezvemitemo yozodzoka zvakare mudare iri isati yaenda kudare reseneti. “Kana ikapasa mu seneti zvinenge zvoreva kuti president vanenge vokwanisa kusaina kuti mutemo weCriminal Law Codification, Section 65 uvandudzwe kuti ufambidzane ne Section 70,” vanodaro VaGonese. Izvi zvave kureva kuti nyaya iyi ichaendeswa kukomiti yeparamende inoona nezvemitemo isati yanzwikwa zvakare mudare reparamende. Pari zvino mutemo wenyika unoti munhu anotanga kuita zvepabonde kana achizvida ave nemakore gumi nematanhatu asi mumatare umu munonzi vatongi vari kutarisawo zvakare zvinorehwa nechikamu chebumbiro remitemo che Criminal Law Codification. Mutemo unotiwo munhu anogona kutanga imba yake ave nemakore gumi nemasere. No media source currently available
title: Paramende Yokurudzirwa Kuvandudza Mutemo Unobvumidza Vanasikana Kuita zvepaBonde

text: Vanhu vakawanda vanoti vanowirirana kuti gore ra2020, iro riri kusvika kumagumo pakati peusiku, igore ranga rakaomera vana veZimbabwe zvikuru sezvo riri gore rakauya chirwere cheCovid-19, icho chichiri kunetsa pasi rose. Nekuda kwedenda iri, vanhu vakawanda vakarasikirwa nemabasa raramo dzevamwe dzakashanduka zvachose. Munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika, mutauriri webato rinopikisa reMDC Alliance, VaClifford Hlatywayo vanoti 2020 rakave gore ranga rakaomera bato ravo zvikuru sezvo vakaona nhengo dzavo dzichidzingwa muparamende nemakanzuru. Izvi zvinotevera mutongo wedare repamusorosoro reSupreme Court wekuti MDC Alliance rakanga risiri bato, asi kuti bato raicherechedzwa zviri pamutemo raive bato reMDC-T raifanotungamirwa naMuzvare Thokozani Khupe. VaHlatywayo vanoti 2020 vakaona nhengo dzavo dzichipambwa nevanofungidzirwa kuti vasori, kusungwa zvisina tsarukano, pamwewo nekushungurudzwa senzira yekuda kuparadza bato iri zvichikonzerwa neZanu PF. Vanotiwo nekuda kwekutadza kutonga kweZanu PF, 2020 rakavewo gore rakaona vanhu vanoda kusvika kumamiriyoni masere vachida rubatsiro rwechikafu kuti vakwanise kusvika munguva yekukohwa muna 2021. Asi VaHlatywayo vanoti chikuru chinongofadza ndechekuti vatsigiri vavo vakaramba vakamira nemutungamiri webato reMDC Alliance, VaNelson Chamisa pamwe neto ravo, vachiti vanotarisira kuti muna 2021 vana veZimbabwe vachatora masimba avo kuti vanongedze kunofanirwa kunge kuchienda nyika. Asi sachigaro veZanu PF mudunhu reNorth America, VaRegis Charumbira, vanoti gore ra2020 rakave gore rakabudirira zvikuru vachitarisa zvirongwa zvehurumende yavo, kunyange hazvo nyika yakasangana nechirwere cheCovid-19. VaCharumbira vanoti hurumende yavo kuburukidza nehutungamiri hwaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa, yakakwanisa kudzivirira kupararira zvakanyanya kwechirwere ichi. Vanotiwo hurumende yakakwanisa kugadzirisa migwagwa, kudzikamisa hupfumi hwenyika, pamwewo nekuunza chirongwa chepfumvudza, icho chavanoti chichabatsira zvikuru nekuunza goho rakanaka mwaka uno. Panyaya yekuti bato reZanu PF rine chekuita nematambudziko akatarisana neMDC Alliance muna 2020, VaCharumbira vanoti MDC Alliance iri kuzvikanga nemafuta ayo kuburikidza nekutadza kurongeka kwayo, izvo vanoti zvichaita kuti irasikirwe nevanhu vakawanda muna 2021. Vanoti 2021 richange riri gore rine pundutso, uye vari kufara kuti chirongwa chekurima chePfumvudza chiri kutsigirwa naNyadenga kuburikidza nekunaya zvakanaka kuri kuita mvura munyika yose. No media source currently available
title: Vanoita Nyaya dzeMatongerwo eNyika Voita Maonero Akasiyana Pamusoro pa2020

text: Mukuru webazi reUnited Nations Development Program, VaAChim Steiner, vari kutarisirwa munyika neChina mukushanya kwemazuva mana. Mumashoko kuvatori venhau, UNDP yati inoda kuona kuti ingabatsire sei Zimbabwe kuti iite sarudzo dzegore rino. UNDP yagara iri kubatsira sangano reZimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, nemari nezvimwe. ZEC inoti yakapihwa mari inosvika zviuru mazana mapfumbamwe asi iyo ichida mari inosvika mamiriyoni makumi matanhatu.
