VaSteiner vari kutarisirwa kuita misangano nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, nemakurukota avo, makomisheni ane chekuita nezvesarudzo anosanganisira Zimbabwe Human Rights Commission, Zimbabwe Electoral Commission, National Peace and Reconciliation Commission, Gender Commission uye masangano akazvimirira akaita seZimbabwe Election Support Network neZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights. Sachigaro weZESN, VaAndrew Makoni, vati vari kutarisira kusangana naVaSteiner nemusi weMugovera uye vachavaudzawo nezvemamiriro akaita zvinhu munyaya dzesarudzo. No media source currently available
title: Mukuru weUNDP Oshanyira Zimbabwe Kuzotaura Pamusoro peSarudzo dza2018

text: Vamwe vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika nevanoonawo zvavo, vanoti kunetsana kunonzi kuri kuitika mubato reMDC Renewal Team kunogona kuita kuti bato iri ripedzisire ratsemuka nepakati. Izvi zvinotevera mashoko anonzi akataurwa nemubati wehomwe mu MDC Renewal Team, VaElton Mangoma, kuvatori venhau nemusi weChitatu ekuti kune dzimwe nhengo mubato ravo dziri kuda kuvasvibisa pamwe nekuona kuti vadonha. VaMangoma vairamba mhosva yavari kupomerwa yekudanana nemudzimai weimwe nhengo yebato ravo. MDC Renewal Team ibato rakatsemukawo kubva mubato reMDC-T mushure mekutsemuka zvakare kwebato iri pachiumbwa MDC inotungamirirwa naVaWelshman Ncube. Imo mubato raVaNcube ndimo makabudawo rimwe bato rinopikisa reMDC 99 raitungamirirwa naVaJob Sikhala, avo vakanetsanawo naVaNcube, vakazopedzisira vavamba bato ravo, kunange hazvo vakazodzokera kuMDC-T. Mamwe mapato anopikisa akaita seMavambo-Khusile-Dawn, neZapu akanga atovepowo pachizotevera mamwe matsva akaita seNational Constitutional Assembly, NCA, Zimbabwe Freedom Front nerimwe idzva rakaparurwa svondo rino rinonzi Zimbabweans United for Democracy (ZUNDE), nemamwe madiki. Mutauriri weNCA, VaMadock Chivasa, vanoti kuwanda kwemapato anopikisa munyika mucherechedzo wekuti munhu anenge aine mukana wakakura wekusarudza mutungamiri waanoda. Nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika vachishanda vakazvimirira, VaChrles Mangongera, vanotiwo chinhu chakaipa kuti munyika muite mapato anopikisa akawanda, sezvo izvi zvichiita kuti simba rawo rive shoma. Vanotiwo chimwe chinoita kuti mapato ezvematongewro enyika awande munyika inyaya yekuda kudya pamwe nekuti vacho vanenge vari pahutungamiri havadi kubva pazvigaro, uye kuramba kuudzwa zvekuita. VaMangongera vanoti mapato anopikisa anofanirwa kuchitanga kushanda pamwe chete kana achida kubudirira mukubvisa hutongi hweZanu PF. Mashoko aya atsinhirwawo naVaChivasa, avo vanoti havaoni riri dambudziko ringatadza kugadziriswa nevanopiksa ava kana vakagara pasi. Kunetsana kwenhengo dzemapato ezvematongerwo enyika hakusi mumapato anopikisa chete, sezvo mubato reZanu PF muinewo kukakatirana makobvu nematate uko kwakaita kuti bato iri ridzinge vaive mutewedzeri wemutungamiri waro, Amai Joice Mujuru. No media source currently available
title: Vamwe Vanoti Kuwanda kweMapato Anopikisa Kunononotsa Shanduko

text: Sangano reCollege Lecturers Association kana kuti COLAZ pamwe nerimwe sangano reCouncil for Students Teachers, COST nhasi vasvitsa chikumbiro kubazi redzidzo yepamusoro chekuti zvidzidzo muzvikoro izvi zviitwe pamadandemutande senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwedenda reCovid-19 muzvikoro izvi. Mutsamba dzaendeswa kubazi rezvedzidzo yepamusoro, masangano aya ati zvichitevera kukwira kwehuwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa neCovid-19 anoda kuti bazi iri rimise zvidzidzo muzvikoro zvepamusoro senzira yekudzvirira kuparira kwedenda iri muzvikoro. Mutungamiriri wesangano reCouncil for Student Teachers, VaWalter Muzamani, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vari kutoda kuti zvikoro zvitovharwa nhasi chaiko nekuti vakawandavavo vanogona kubatwa neCovid-19 sezvakaitika kuMorgenster neBondolfi Teachers College kuMasvingo uko kwakabatwa vadzidzi vakawanda nedenda iri zvikoro izvi zvikavharwa. VaMuzamani vati muzvikoro zvizhinji hamuna maSaniter uye vanodzidza vakawanda izvi zvinowedzera mikana yavo yekubatwa neCovid-19. Imwe nhengo yeCOST, VaStephen Marshal Mariwo,vati hurumende inofanira kukoshesa nyaya iyi kwete kumirira kuti vanhu vabatwe neCovid-19. Munyori musangano reCOLAZ, VaNickson Madhovi, vaudza Studio 7 kuti kuuya kweThird Wave yeCovid-19 kunovaisa munjodzi uye bazi redzidzo yepamusoro rinofanira kufambirana nezviri kuitwa nePublic Service Commission iyo yakazivisa kuti zvikamu makumi mana kubva muzana chete zvevashandi vehurumende ndizvo zvinofanira kuramba zvichienda kubasa. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa divi regurukota redziudzo yepamusoro, VaAmon Murwira, panyaya iyi sezvo vange vasiri kudaira nhare mbozha yavo. Asi mukuru anoona nezvezvikoro zvepamusoro soro mubazi iri, VaElizha Ndanga, vakanyorera vakuru vezvikoro izvi vese neMuvhuro vachivazivisa kuti dzidzo yainderera mberi muzvikoro izvi zvisinei kuti hurumende yainge yasimbaradza matanho ekudzivirira kupararira kweCovid-19 kutanga nemusi weMuvhuro. Munyori mukuru weZimbanbwe National Students Union, VaTapiwanashe Chiriga, vaudza Studio 7 kuti dzidzo inofanira kuenderera mberi asi huwandu hwevadzidzi hunofanira kuderedzwa muzvikoro. Zvichakadai zvimwe zvikoro zvepamusoro zvakaita seChinhoyi University of Technology zvave kudzidzisa pamadandemutande. Muchiziviso kuvadzidzi, chikoro ichi chati vadzidzi vese vanenge vachigara pachikoro ichi vanofanira kunge vabuda pachikoro nenguva dza12 masikati. Asi zvimwe zvikoro zvakaita seMidlands State University neGreat Zimbabwe Universirty zvange zvichiri kuenderera mberi nezvidzidzo zvichiti zvichiri kuongorora mamiriro akaita zvinhu pakupararira kweCovid-19. Hurumende yakazivisa nezuro kuti vanhu vaviri vakafa nechirwere ichi, uye vamwe mazana maviri nemakumi mana nemumwe chete vakabatwa neCovid-19 nezuro wakare. Vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika vose vava zvuru makumi mana nemazana matatu negumi nevasere, 40 318, uye vafa vava chiuru chimwe chete nemazana matanhatu nemakumi matatu nevanomwe, 1 637. Vanhu vabayiwa nhomba yekutanga munyika yose vava zviuru mazana matanhatu nemakumi mapfumbamwe nezvina nemazana manomwe nemakumi matatu, 694 730. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kweCovid-19. Senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kweCovid-19, hurumende yakatanga nemusi weMuvhuro kusimbaradza zvakanyanya hurongwa hwavo hwekurwisa chirwere ichi. No media source currently available
title: Hurumende Yokurudzirwa Kuvhara Zvikoro Sezvo Huwandu hweVanhu Vane Covid-19 Hwakwira Zvakare

text: Dzimwe nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi dzinoti dzinotambira nemufaro hurongwa hwemafambisirwo emari munyika hwakaparurwa nebhanga guru remunyika reReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, kunyange hazvo nyanzvi idzi dziri kuti hurongwa uhwu hunofanirwa kufambidzana nemashandisirwo emari nehurumende kuti hubudirire. Gavhuna veReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, VaJohn Mangudya, neMuvhuro vakazivisa nezvehurongwa hwemafambisirwo emari hwavakati kwakanangana nekusunga mashandisirwo emari senzira yekuderedza inflation munyika. Asi imwe nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Prosper Chitambara vanoti kunyange hazvo hurongwa uhwu hwakanaka, havaoni zvinangwa zvahwo zvichibudirira kana pachitariswa zvirongwa zvehurumende zvinoda mari mugore rino, zvinosanganisira sarudzo pamwe nemihoro yevashandi vayo. Imwe nyanzvi yezvehupfumi vari nhengo yePolad, VaTrust Chikohora, vanotiwo kunyange hazvo hurongwa uhwu hwakagadzirisa zvinhu zvine chitsama zvanga zvichibata vanhu mukurarama kwavo zuva nezuva, zvakafanana nekuwedzerwa kwemari dzinokwanisa kutorwa kumabhanga nemunhu pasvondo, VaMangudya vaifanirwa kungoti munhu abvumidzwe kutora mari yaaanobvumidzwa pamwedzi chero nguva. VaMangudya vakasungawo mwena wekuwanikwa kwemari yekunze kune vanotengesa mari yekunze kana kuti beruae de change, izvo vakati zvakanga zvave kushandiswa zvisizvo. VaMangadya vakazopa mukana wekuwana mari yekunze iyi kune mapoka mashomashoma akaita sevari pamudyandigere, vanoda kurapwa kunze kwenyika pamwe nevanorarama nehurema. Asi VaChikohora vanoti apa panoda kujekeswa kuti pachadzivirirwa kusashandiswa kwemukana uyu sei. Vamwe vari kutambira nemufaro hurongwa hwemafambisirwo emari uhwu varimi vefodya nedonje, avo vave kubvumidzwa kuwana zvikamu makumi manomwe nezvishanu kubva muzana zvemari yekunze kubva muzvitengeswa zvavo, zvimwe zvikamu makumi maviri nezvishanu zvove zvemari yemunyika. Mutungamiri werimwe sangano revarimi, re Zimbabwe Integrated Commercial Farmers' Union, Amai Mayiwepi Jiti, vanoti rwendo rwuno hurongwa uhwu hwakanzwawo zvichemo zvevarimi, asi vanoti zvakanga zvakanaka chose kuti varimi vapiwe mari yavo yose iri zvikamu zana kubva muzana sezvo vari kuzorasikirwa neimwe pari pakuchinja yavanenge vapiwa iri mumadhora emunyika. Vamwe vakafadzwawo nehurongwa uhwu ndeavo vari muboka rezvekushanyirwa kwenyika, iro rakapiwa mukana wekuti richengete mari yose iri zvikamu zana kubva muzana zvemari yekunze yarinenge rawana. Asi Doctor Chitambara vanoti dambudziko richiripo inyaya yekuti inflation yemunyika iri pamusoro zvakanyanya izvo zvichaita kuti mari dzinoberekwa kumabhanga kana kuti interest rates, dzinenge dziri pasi zvakanyanya izvi zvisingazokwezvi vanhu kuti vachengetera mari kumatura emari. Kunyange hurongwa hwemafambisirwo emari uhwu huchinzi hune gwara rinenge ringangobatsira kusimudza hupfumi hwenyika kubva mumadhaka mahuri, dzimwe nyanzvi dziri kusarudza kumira dziri kure dzichiona kana huine pundutso dzichiti zvakawanda zvirongwa zvaparurwa neR-B-Z pamwe nehurumende zvinenge zvichiyevedza zviri pabepa asi zvichitadza kuzozadziswa muzviito. No media source currently available
title: Hurumende Yokurudzirwa Kushandisa Mari Zvakanaka Kuti Hurongwa hweMafambisirwo eMari hweR-B-Z Hubudirire

text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa nemakurukota avo ehurumende nhasi vari kuparura musangano nevemabhizimisi vekunze nemunyika vanoda kutanga mabhizimisi munyika. Vamwe vanyarikani vari kutarisirwa pamusangano uyu vanosanganisa mukuru mubazi rezvekudyidzana nekutengeserana nenyika dzemuAfrica muhurumende yeBritain kana kuti Trade Commissioner for Africa, Amai Emma Wade-Smith. Musangano wemazuva matatu uyu wakarongwa neveInvest Africa, kambani inoita zvekudyarwa kwemari munyaya dzemabhizimisi. Vamwe vevari kutarisirwa kupinda mumisangano iyi vane chekuita nezvehupfumi kubva kuBritain, America, Switzerland neSouth Africa vari kutsvaga kwavangadyare mari dzavo. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Godfrey Kanyenze vanoti vaimbova mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vainge vakarimirana kumuganhu nevekunze zvekuti kuda kuumbiridza hukama kunotora nguva. Vati uyu mutoro mukuru kuhurumende yaVaMnangagwa.  No media source currently available
title: VaMnangagwa Voparura Musangano wekuKwezva veMabhizimisi muHarare

text: Vanhu vaviri vakambochengetedzwa muHarare nemusi weChishanu mushure mekuratidzira kwaitwa nevagari vachinyunyuta nekugara kuri kuita mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaPhelekezela Mphoko muhotera kwenguva refu vachishandisa mari yehurumende. Varatidziri vanga vakatakura zvinyorwa zvakasiyana-siyana vakabva kumasangano anoti National Vendors Union of Zimbabwe, Restoration of Human Rights pamwe nemubatanidzwa wemasangano echidiki uri kuzviti Tajamuka vakapinda muhotera yeRainbow Towers vachiti VaMphoko vanofanira kubuda muhotera iyi nechimbichimbi. Mumwe wevaratidziri ava, VaIshmael Kauzani vati vati havasi kufara kuti VaMphoko vave kuda kutosvitsa makore maviri vachigara muhotera iyi kubva pavakagadzwa semutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika muna 2014 vachishandisa mari yemuhomwe yehurumende asi veruzhinji vachinhonga svosve nemuromo. Mashoko aVaKauzani atsinhirwa naMuzvare Value Dick Mgagara avo vati mari irikubhadharirwa VaMphoko kuti vagare muhotera nehurmende zviri nani kuti ishandiswe kugadzirisa zvimwe zvinhu zviri kunetsa munyika zvakafanana nekuwanisa veruzhinji mvura yakachena. Varatidziri ava vaita kuti vanhu vanga vari pahotera iyi vatize mushure mekunge mapurisa anorwisana nemvongamupopoto asvika akavhara mikova yose yehotera iyi ndokusunga sachigaro weNational Vendors Union of Zimbabwe, VaStan Zvorwadza pamwe nemumwe muratidziri watisina kuziva zita rake. Vamwe varatidziri vakwanisa kuvhura mikova yehotera iyi ndokumhanya vakananga kugedhi rinopinda nevanhu nedzimotokari pahotera iyi vachiedza kuvharira motokari dzanga dzatakuriswa vasungwa ava. Asi mapurisa anorwisana nemhirizhonga abva atanga kurova vanhu ava zvabva zvaita kuti vaite rutsoka ndibereke vachiita aziva kwake aziva kwake. Panguva yanga ichiitika zvose izvi, VaMphoko nemhuri yavo vanga vari muhotera iyi. Zvichakadaro, mutauriri wemapurisa, Senior Assistant Commissioner Charity Charamba vaudza Studio 7 parunhare kuti havasi kuzosiya vanhu vachingoratidzira pamadiro vachiti mapurisa achaedza napose paanogona napo kuti achengetedze runyarararo munyika. Amai Charamba vati vose vanoda kuratidzira vanofanira kutanga vapihwa mvumo nemapurisa kwete kuita zvaitwa nevaratidzira ava. Nekune rumwe rutivi, bato rinopikisa reMDC intoungamirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai raburitsa mashoko richishora VaMphoko nekugara kwavo muhotera. MDC-T yati chinhu chinoyadzisa uye kushoresa kuti VaMphoko vagare muhotera vachidya mari yehurumende asi ruzhinji rwusina chekubata uye hurumende ichitadza kubhadhara vashandi vayo. Tsvagiridzo yeStudio 7 yaburitsa pachena kuti VaMphoko nemhuri yavo vari kubhadhara hotera mari inoita madhora mazana mana nemakumi matatu ($430) pazuva inenge ichibva muhomwe yehurumende. Bepanhau reNewsday rakaburitsa mashoko svondo rino ekuti VaMphoko vakaramba dzimba mbiri dzavakatengerwa nehurumende vachiti dzimba idzi hadzina mutsigo. Imwe yedzimba idzi inonzi inokosha mamiriyoni matatu emadhora. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kutaura naVaMphoko kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi sezvo vanga vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. No media source currently available
title: Vanhu Voratidzira muHarare Vachiti VaMphoko Ngavabude muHotera Mavavaka Musasa Nyika Ichitambura

text: Hurumende inoti kugezwa kweitsvo “Renal Dialysis”  kuzvipatara zvehurumende kwave kuitwa pachena veruzhinji vachiti izvi zvichabatsira varombo. Gurukota rezvehutano Dr David Parirenyatwa vanoti sehurumende vanoshuvira kuti veruzhinji vawane hutano hwakanaka uye nemutengo wakaderera. Dr Parirenyatwa vanoti kuburikidza nemari ye”Health Levy Fund,” vanhu kuzvipatara zvehurumende vave kugezwa itsvo pachena vakati tarisiro yavo ndeyekuti izvi zviwanikwe kumakirinika nemahospitari ese ehurumende. VaParirenyatwa vati vanotarisira kuti izvi zvichabatsira veruzhinji. VaParirenyatwa vakurudzirawo kuti avo vanowana uye vanoshandisa ma Medical Aids varambe vachibhadhara kugezwa itsvo kuitira kuti varombo vawane chouviri. Mubatanidzwa wevanorwara nechirwere cheitsvo weKidney Association of Zimbabwe watambira nemufaro danho rakatorwa nehurumende iri. Vachitaura neStudio 7, Amai Rumbidzai Mashinge munyori muKidney Association of Zimbabwe vati danho iri richarerutsa zvikuru mutoro wekurapwa kunhengo dzavo. Vatiwo vane chivimbo chekuti kunyangwe zvinhu zvichakaipa munyaya dzehupfumi, hurumende ichakwanisa kuoona kuti kurapwa pachena uku kwabudirira. VaEvans Masitara munyori musangano rakazvimiririra reZimbabwe Doctors for Human Rights varumbidzawo chirongwa chehurumende ichi vachiti chichaponesa varwere zvikuru varombo. Asi VaMasitara vatiwo zvakakosha kuti hurumende iise mari yakawanda pabhajeti renyika munyaya dzezvehutano kuitira kuti kurapwa pachena uku kusazovhiringwe kana homwe yeHealth Levy Fund ikasapinda mari inokwana. Kugezwa itsvo muzvipatara zvehurumende kunoda mari iri pakati pemadhora makumi masere nezana kozotiwo kuzvipatara zvisiri zvehurumende pakati pemadhora mazana maviri nemazana maviri ane makumi mashanu. Zvinotarisirwa kuti pasvondo munhu anogeswa itsvo rutatu kana aine chirwere ichi. Zimbabwe inoti pagore kune vanhu chiuru chimwe chete vanobatwa nechirwere ichi asi mazana manomwe chete ndivo vange vachikwanisa kunorapwa. No media source currently available
title: Varombo Vorapwa Itsvo Pachena Kuzvipatara zveHurumende

text: Mutungamiri wechechi yeProphetic Healing and Deliverance Ministries VaWalter Magaya vanoti vave kutyira hupenyu hwavo mushure mekunge vawana kuchechi kwavo kuine girinedhi. Vachitaura pamberi pechita chavanhu vakapinda svondo kuchechi yavo iri kuWaterfalls muno muHarare neChitatu manheru, VaMagaya vakati vavakutyira hupenyu zvichitevera kukwanikwa kwavanoti kwakaitika girinedhi kuchechi kwavo muzuva ravasina kudoma pamberi pekereke. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura negurukota rinowona nezvinoitika mukati menyika, VaIgnatius Chombo kuti tinzwewo divi ravo panyaya. Mutauriri wemapurisa Senior Assistant Commissioner Charity Charamba vati nyaya iyi yanga isati yasvika munzeve dzavo. Zvichakadai, VaMagaya vanoti vave kutyira hupenyu hwavo. Vanoti havasi kufara nechitsotsi chiri kuitwa nemamwe makurukota ehurumende avasina kudoma nemazita. Semuenzaniso, vanoti vakaedza kuti vabatsire hurumende nemari inoita mabhiriyoni mana emadhora kuti ishandiswe mukugadzira mugwagwa unobva kuHarare uchienda kuBeitbridge asi rimwe gurukota ravasina kudoma nezita rakati rinoda mari inoita mamiriyoni makumi mashanu yechiokomuhomwe. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura negurukota rinowona nezvekutakurwa kwezvinhu, VaJoram Gumbo, kuti tinzwe divi rehurumende panyaya iyi. Zvichakadaro, VaMagaya vanotiwo vari kushungurudzwa zvikuru nevari muhurumende vakakurudzira nhengo dzesvondo yavo kuti dziise masiginecha pagwaro renyunyuto ravachada kusvitsa kuhurumende. Vanotiwo chinovaradzwa ndechekuti zuva nezuva vari vari kugara vachipombodza moto ungave uchida kusimudzwa neveruzhinji vanouya kuchechi kwavo vari kugunun'una nekusamira zvakanaka kwezvinhu munyika asi vozobatwa nekuseri kwemawoko nehurumende. VaMagaya vanoti vangangopinda mumigwagwa pamwe nevatendi vekereke yavo vachiratidzira murunyararo munguva shoma iri kutevera kana nhuna dzavo dzisina kuteererwa nehurumende. Mumwe mugari wemuHarare, VaKudakwashe Matibiri, vanoti ikodzero yaVaMagaya kuti varatidzire kana kodzero dzavo dzichinge dzatyorwa. Hurumende inowanzoshandisa chisimba pose panoitwa kuratidzira kwakadai sekuri kutaurwa naVaMagaya. No media source currently available
title: Mukuru weChechi yePHD, VaWalter Magaya Votyira Hupenyu Hwavo

text: Zimbabwe yakabatana neMuvhuro nedzimwe nyika kucherechedza zuva rekukurudzira runyararo pasi rose kana kuti International Day of Peace. United Nations yakabuda nechisungo chekuti zuva iri richerechedza musi wa21 Gunyana gore roga roga paine kurudziro yekusimbaradza runyararo. Dingindira regore rino rakanangana nekuunza runyararo vanhu vakabatana. Pazuva iri panokurudzirwa kuti vanhu vose vari kurwisana vambomira kwezuva rimwe chete. Masangano akaita seZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights atumira mashoko kuvatori venhau achiti muZimbabwe zvichiri kunetsa kuunza runyararo nekuti vanhu vachiri kumbunyikidzwa. Sangano reCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition rakurudzira hurumende kuti ibvise mauto mumapazi ehurumende ayo ari kupomerwa mhosva yekumbunyikidza kodzero dzevanhu. Vachitaura neStudio 7, imwe nhengo yeNational Transitional Justice Working Group rinova sangano rakazvimiririra rinokurudzira runyararo Reverend Ray Motsi vati zuva ranhasi ririkupembererwa munyika musina runyararo. VaMotsi vati zvakakosha kuti munyika muite nhaurirano dzinounza runyararo vakatiwo parizvino hamuna kubatana munyika sezvo vanhu vopatsanurana nekuda kwemapato ezvamatongerwo enyika avanotsigira. Mukuru weZimbabwe Divine Destiny, Bishop Ancellimo Magaya vanotiwo zuva ranhasi harisina chiremera. VaMagaya vati kuti nyika iite rugare zvakakosha kuti kodzero dzeveruzhinji dziremekedzwe. Mukuru wesangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu reZimbabwe Human Rights NGO Forum, Doctor Musa Kika vaudza Studio 7 kuti kune zvinhu zvakaitika munyika zvakarwadzisa vamwe uye zvisati zvataurwa nezvazvo zvinoita kuti kushaye rugare munyika sezvo vamwe vachigunun’una. VaKika vati zvinhu izvi zvinosanganisira nyaya yeGukurahundi, kushungurudzwa nekuurawa kwevanhu panguva dzesarudzo, kupambwa kwevanhu nezvimwewo. Vati kusasununguka kunoita vanhu kupa pfungwa dzavo nezvematongerwo enyika ndozvinobuditsa pachena kuti munyika hamuna rugare. Hatina kunzwa divi rehurumende panyaya iyi sezvo gurukota rinoona nezvekubudiswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa vati vanga vari mumusangano nguva yatavafonera vakati tivanyorere mibvunzo asi vanga vasati vapindura pataenda pamhepo. Asi vachitaura neChishanu pamusangano webato ravo, mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vakati munyika hamuna matambudziko ose anotaurwa nevanopikisa. Vakatiwo havasi kuzokumbira vekunze kuti vapindire sezviri kudiwa nevanopikisa. Mashoko aya ari kuuyawo panguva iyo South Africa iri kuti muZimbabwe mune matambudziko uye yakagadzirira kubatsira nyika samutongi gava. Mukuru mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko muZanu-PF VaTafadzwa Mugwadi vanotiwo munyika mune runyararo nekuda kwehutunamiri hwaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa, asi vanopikisa vanoti vari kutonga nechibhakera. No media source currently available
title: Zimbabwe Yobatana neDzimwe Nyika Kucherechedza Zuva reRunyararo Munyika Musina Kugadzikana

text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vazivisa kuti hurumende yavo haisi kuregerera huwori huchitambarara serunyemba. Vachitaura pakuparurwa kwe Procurement Regulatory authority of Zimbabwe muHarare, mutungamiri wenyika vavimbisawo kuti mazuva ezvikwata zvevanhu vari kuita huwori asvika kwamvura yacheka makumbo, vakati huwori hahusi kuzopiwa mukana. Vazivisa kuti vane ruzivo rwemamwe mapazi ehurumende ari kukwidza mitengo yezvinhu, vachiti hurumende yavo haisi kuzorega zvakadaro zvichiitika. VaMnangagwa vatoresawo mhiko Amai Loice Matanda-Moyo, vanove mudzimai wegurukota rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaSibusiso Moyo, sasachigaro wekomisheni inorwisa huwori, yeZimbabwe Anti-Corruption Commission, ZACC. Vakawanda vanoti komisheni iyi haina meno akasimba ekurwisana nehuwori sezvo pasina hove huru dzati dzabatwa mumabure ayo, kunze kwevashona vanoonekwa sekunge vanenge vasiri kudyidzana zvakanaka nehutungamiri hwehurumende. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa kuchamhembe kweAfrica musangango rinorwisana nehuwori, reAnti-Corruption Trust of Southern Africa, VaMunyaradzi Alouis Chaumba, vanoti hapana zvitsva pamashoko aVaMnangagwa ekuti vacharwisa huwori aya, sezvo vakabvira kuataura pavakatora masimba muna 2017. VaChaumba vanoti VaMnangagwa vaifanirwa kuzadzisa mashoko avo kuburikidza nekuatevera nezviito, vachisunga nekumisa pamberi pematare vose vari kuita huwori vari muhurumende yavo nevari mumapazi ehurumende. Panyaya yekugadzwa kwaMai Matanda-Moyo sasachigaro weZACC, VaChaumba vanoti ndipo patotangira huwori ipapo, nekuti havazombofi vakafunga kuti Amai Matanda-Moyo vangazosungisa murume wavo pamwe nevamwe vake kana vakaita zvehuwori. Vanoti mutungamiri wenyika aifanirwa kutsvaga munhu asina kwaakarerekera kuti atungamire komisheni iyi, kwete munhu ane maoko akasungwa kare. No media source currently available
title: Mutungamiri weNyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, Voyambira Vanoita zveHuwori

text: Vanhu vemuAmerica vabatana neMuvhuro nevanhu venyika dzepasi rino vachirangarira murwiri wekodzero dzevanhu, Doctor Martin Luther King Junior. Vanhu vemuAmerica vabatana neMuvhuro nevanhu venyika dzepasi rino vachirangarira murwiri wekodzero dzevanhu, Doctor Martin Luther King Junior. Vaive mutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica, VaRonald Reagan, ndivo vakatara zuva iri kuti ive horidhe muna 1983 yekurangarira mabasa aVaKing Junior ekurwira kodzero dzevanhu muAmerica. Mu America VaKing Junior vanorangarirwa neMuvhuro wetatu muna Ndira gore roga roga, zuva riri pedyo nebhavhidhe ravo chairo. Doctor King Junior vakaberekwa musi wa 15 Ndira 1929 muAtlanta, kuGeorgia, vakafa mushure mekupfurwa muna 1968. Doctor King Junior vakapihwa mubairo wekurwira runyararo weNobel Peace Prize muna 1964. Mushakabvu vaizivikanwa nekufora mumigwagwa nevamwe vachiratidzira kusafara kwavo nerusarura ganda mu America. Mashoko avo avakataura pane mumwe musangano wakaitirwa muWashington DC ekuti "I Have A Dream" akabata moyo yevakawanda nekupa vanhu hushingi hwekurwira kodzero dzavo pasi rose. Nyanzvi munyaya dzematongerwo enyika vari mukuru weZimbabwe Democracy Institute, Doctor Pedzisayi Ruhanya, vanoti VaKing vakapa hushingi kuvanhu vairwira rusununguko rweZimbabwe.
title: Pasi Rose Rorangarira VaMartin Luther King

text: Vagari vemuguta reHarare neNorton vachange vasina mvura kwemazuva neMugovera neSvondo zvichitevera danho rekanzuru rekuvhara mvura kuti igadzire pamwe nekuisa dzimwe pombi itsva pamichina inochenesa mvura iri paMorton Jaffray Water Plant. Mutauriri wekanzuru yeHarare VaMichael Chideme vanoti kuvharwa kwemuvra kuchapa vashandi vekanzuru mukana wekubatanidza pombi dzinotora mvura kubva kudhamu reDarwendale nedzinobva kuLake Chivero zvisina njodzi sezvo vachange vachishandisa magetsi kunama dzimwe simbi, izvo zvisingade kuitwa pane mvura. “Pombi dziri kuiswa idzi dzichabatsira mukutorwa kwemvura yakachena kubva kuDarwendale ichisangana neinobva kuLake Chivero, izvo zvinozochipira vagary sezvo tisingazoshandisi mari dzakawanda mukuchenesa mvura,” VaChideme vanodaro. VaChideme vanoti kanzuru yakwanisa kuita basa iri kuburikidza nemari yechikwereti chakawanikwa kubva kuChina. Vanoti nzvimbo dzichasara dziine mvura misha yakaita seMbare, Sunningdale, Hatfield, Waterfalls neChitungwiza sezvo dzichitora mvura kubva kuPrince Edward Treatment Plant. “Vanhu vakaziviswa, takavapa chiziviso kuti vanhu veduwe, tave kuenda kunovhara mvura pa weekend ingeyi makachereredzera mvura kuti munge muine mvura yakakwana.” Vanoti kanzuru yavo ichange ichibatsira nguva nenguva nzvimbo dzinoshandisa mvura yakawanda dzakaita sezvipatara, kunyange zvipatara zvizhinji zviine matangi ekuchengetera mvura. No media source currently available
title: Vagari vemuHarare neNorton Voshaya Mvura Pachagadzirwa Michina yeMorton Jaffray Mukupera kweSvondo

text: Nhengo dzedare reparamende kubva kumapato ose eMDC ari maviri neZanu PF nemusi weChina dzakaramba kutambira kurudziro yemutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe yekuti pave nekamutemo kanovabvumidza kushandisa masimba avo kuti hurumende itore chikwereti chePremier Services Medical Aid Society, PSMAS. VaMugabe vanonzi vaida kuti vadare ava vatambire Statutory Instrument 77 of 2015, iyo yaizopa kuti vashandise masimba avo kuti hurumende itore chikwereti chePSMAS chinosvika mamiriyoni zana nemakumi mana nemana emadhora yobhadhara iyo. Asi zvinonzi nhengo idzi dzakaita chirwirangwe mukuramba danho iri dzichiti kambani yePSMAS haisi pasi pehurumende kuti ichengetedzwe nemutemo unodzivisa kutorwa kwemidziyo nezvivakwa nevaine zvikwereti navo. Chiziviso chedanho iri chakaverengwa muparamende nasachigaro wekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvemitemo, uye vachimirira Mudzi South muparamende vakazvimirira, VaJonathan Samkange. Nhengo yedare reparamende inomirira Harare West, Muzvare Jessie Majome veMDC T vanoti sekomiti vakaona zvisina kukodzera kuti PSMAS imirirwe ivo vatungamiri vayo vakapfachura mari kusvika yagwadama. No media source currently available Nhengo yeparamende inomirira Buhera South, VaJoseph Chinotimba veZanu PF vanotiwo havaoni kuti paramende yaipasisa mutemo wakadaro wekutsiva mari dzakadyiwa nevakuru vakuru vePSMAS vanotozivikanwa. VaChinotimba vanoti dai mutemo uyu wakapinzwa mudare uchinzi uri kuda kudzivirira midziyo yekambani iyi, zvimwe vadare vaiutambira neimwe nzira. No media source currently available
title: Nhengo dzeParamende Dzobatana Pakuramba Kutambira Danho reKuti Hurumende Itore Chikwereti chePSMAS

text: Mutori wenhau ane mukurumbira munyika, Hopewell Chin’ono, achange achifurwa nemhepo kukutanga zvichitevera kupihwa mukana kwaaitwa nedare redzimhosva kuti anoongororwa ku South Africa kwemazuva makumi maviri nerimwe. Dare rati Chin’ono apihwe pasipoti yake kuitira kuti ashanye kudunhu re Gauteng uko change achiongororwa hutano hwake. Dare rati raona zvakakodzera kuti Chin’ono apihwe mukana wekuvhenekwa navana chiremba vake, uye izvi zvichaitwa mukati memazuva makumi maviri nerimwe chete. Aka ndekekutanga Chin’ono kubvumidzwa kubuda kunze kwenyika kubva paakasungwa achipomerwa mhosva yekukurudzira mhirizhonga. Mune mumwe mutongo warapawo nhasi,dare repamusoro ratura mutongo wekuti Amai Beatrice Mtetwa vadzoke kuve gweta rinomirira Chin’ono pamhosva yaari kupomerwa. Mutongi wedare repamusoro, VaHappias Zhou, vati Amai Mtetwa varambe vari gweta raChin’ono, uye VaNgoni Nduna vasave nechekuita nenyaya yaChin’ono. VaNduna vakatura mutongo wekuti Amai Mtetwa vasave nechekuita panomiswa Chin’ono mudare mushure mekunge vapomerwa mhosva nevachuchisi venyaya iyi yekuburitsa pandandemutande reFacebook zvaiitika mudare kunyange hazvo Amai Mtetwa vairamba mhosva iyi. VaZhou vati hapana humbowo hunoratidza kuti Amai Mtetwa, avo vanoti havasi paFacebook vakanyora papeji reFacebook rinonzi “Beatrice Mtetwa and the Rule of Law” iro rinonzi naChin’ono ipeji refirimu raakaita nekambani yeBoston Videos yekuMassachusetts kuAmerica pamusoro pebasa raAmai Mtetwa. Mutongi wedare ati Chin’ono anofanira kumirirwa negweta raanoda uye vati Amai Mtetwa vanofanira kuita basa ravo rehugweta vakasununguka. Mutongo waturwa nedare unorevawo kuti Chin’ono ave kuzomirirwa negweta raanoda pachatanga kutongwa nyaya yake musi waNdira 18. VaZhou vatiwo VaNduna vageze maoko panyaya yaChin’ono mushure mekunge Chin’ono akwidza nyaya iyi kudare repamusoro achiti haatarisiri kuti VaNduna vangatonga nyaya yake zvakanaka sezvo achiti vakaratidza kuti vane divi ravakarerekera. Izvi zvinoreva kuti nyaya yaChin’ono yave kuzotongwa neumwe mutongi asiri VaNduna. Rimwe remagweta aChin’ono, VaDoug Coltart, vatenda kuti izvi ndizvo zvaitika mudare. VaColtart vati vari kutarisira kuti nyaya yaChin’ono ichatongwa zvakanaka vachiti Amai Mtetwa vakanga vagara vasigakodzere kubviswa panyaya yaChin’ono naVaNduna. Chin’ono ari kupomerwa mhosva yekushandisa dandemutande rake reTwitter kukurudzira kuti veruzhinji kuti varatidzire zvine mhirizhonga mukati mukuratidzira kwakanga kwashevedzerwa nesangano reJuly 31st Movement musi waChikunguru 31 uko kusina kuzobudirira zvichitevera kusungwa kwakaitwa mutungamiri wesangano iri, VaJacob Ngarivhume pamberi pekuratidzira kwavakange vashevedzera uku.
title: Chin'ono Oenda kuSouth Africa Kunorapwa

text: Vanhu vanodarika mazana matatu vaungana neChitatu muBorrowdale pachirongwa chekunamatira nyika kuti ive nesarudzo dzisina mhirizhonga. Munamato wakadai uchange uchiitwa kamwe chete pasvondo rega rega nemusi weChitatu. Vanhu ava vaungana panzvimbo yokunamatira inonzi Mt Zion Prayer Mountain iri kuBorrowdale muHarare vachinamatira nyika kuti isave nemhirizhonga munguva yesarudzo. Mumwe wevanhu vanga vari pamunamato uyu, Va Adelo Nyabanga, avo vanoshanda nesangano reDaily Bread International Ministries, vanoti chinangwa cheminamato yavo ndechekuti Zimbabwe ive nerunyararao sezvakaitika panguva yakaratidzira vanhu zvakazoita kuti vaive mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vabve pachigaro. VaNyabanga vanoti pagomo apa pari kuuya vanhu vanobva kumativi mana enyika vamirira makerekeke akasiyana siyana, chinangwa chiri chokunamatira runyararo muZimbabwe. Amai Anna Gomo vanotiwo chinangwa chikuru chemunamato wemusi weChitatu ndechekuedza kupodza marwadzo ari muvanhu vemuZimbabwe, ayo akakonzerwa nemhirizhonga yezvematongerwo enyika. Nzvimbo inonamatirwa iyi, yaimbozivikanwa se 113 Prayer Mountain, asi zita rakazochinjwa gore rapera kuita Mt Zion Prayer Mountain. Asi vanhu vakatanga kunamatira panzvimbo iyi mugore 2009, zvokuti yave nzvimbo inogara yakazara nevanhu vanobva kuAmerica, Mozambique, Malawi nedzimwe nyika. No media source currently available
title: Vanhu Vonamatira Nyika Kuti Isaite Mhirizhonga Munguva yeSarudzo

text: Apo zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kuedza mazano ose ekuti zvizivise mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe kuti vachibva pachigaro, zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe pasi peboka reUnited Citizens Alliance zvaungana mu Africa Unity Square pedyo neparamende zvichitsigira kuti VaMubage vabviswe pachigaro. Vaungana muAfrica Unity Square vari kutsidza kuti havasi kuzoenda kumba kusvika VaMugabe vasiya chigaro chehutungamiriri hwenyika. Mumwe wevari pagungano iri Muzvare Nicola Tapfumaneyi vaudza Studio 7 kuti mweya wehumwe nekubatana nevamwe ndowavasimudza. Muzvare Tapfumaneyi vatiwo VaMugabe vaondonga nyika vakatiwo ivo vanozvipira kana kuenda kuhondo kanaVaMubage vakasabva murunyararo. Mumwe muratidziri abva kuKuwadzana Extension, Amai Kerita Dzinomwa vatiwo vabatana nevamwe kugadzirisa remangwana revana vavo. Amai Dzinomwa vati kushaikwa kwemabasa, kwemari nemamwe matambudziko avari kusangana nawo munyika ari kuramba achiwedzera, vakati nekukwegura kwaita VaMugabe ngavachizorora. Sachigaro weUCAZ VaJoelson Mugari vati zvakakosha kuti vana veZimbabwe vabatane kusvika VaMugabe vasiya chigaro. Vatiwo havasi kuzobva muAfrica Unity Square kusvika VaMugabe vasiya chigaro. VaMugari vatiwo kuungana kwavo muAfrica Unity Square kunozadzisa zvido zvaVaItai Dzamara avo vakatsakatika muna 2015 mushure mekugara muAfrica Unity Square vachi kurudzira kuti VaMugabe vabve pachigaro. VaMugari vati VaDzamara vaiva nemuono huye vasina kutya vakati vanhu vemuZimbabwe vasunungurwawo mudambudziko rekutya. Mutungamiriri weMovement for Democratic Change VaMorgan Tsvangirai, vaive varwi verusununguko, vedzisvondo nemamwe masangano akasiyana siyana vari kutarisirwa kutaura pagungano iri. No media source currently available
title: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe Zvinoungana muAfrica Unity Square Zvichiti VaMugabe Vaende

text: Mutongi wedare repamusoro reAmerica neChina akatara mutongo unomborambidza boka rinoona nezvekufambiswa kwetsamba muAmerica, reUnited States Postal Service kuisa shanduko dziri kunzi nematunhu inokanganisa kufambiswa kwetsamba nenguva. Mutongi vedare renyika yose, Judge Stanley Bastian vachitonga vari kuYekima kudunhu reWashington, vakati vachapa mutongo uchabata nyika yose panyaya yakakwidzwa nematunhu gumi nemana achipikisana nemutungamiri wenyika VaDonald Trump, mukuru webazi rematsamba, VaLouis DeJoy, pamwe nebazi rematsamba reU.S. Postal Service pamusoro pedanho rakatorwa muna Chikunguru rekushandura mashandiro ebazi iri. Vachitura mutongo wavo, Judge Bastian vakati matunhu aya aratidza pachena kuti vari kupomerwa mhosva vane chekuita chine zvematongerwo enyika mukuda kukanganisa kufambiswa kwematsamba kwakanaka, zvinogona kukanganisa kufambiswa kwetsamba dzekuvhota musarudzo dza 2020 mumatunhu aya. Matunhu aya anonzi aida kuti U.S. Postal Service imanikidzwe kusiya danho rayo rekuti kana dai motokari dzisina chadzakatakura dzisiye mamamwe matsamba kana nguva yadzo yekusimuka yasvika, uyewo kuti bazi iri ridzosere imichina yose yarakanga rabvisa. Chizvarwa cheZimbabwe VaTim Muringai vari mudunhu reOhio vanoti mutongo uyu wakanaka sezvo uchiratidza kuti munyika mune hutongo hwejekerere. Vati kunyange hazvo vawanikwa vaine mhosva ava vachikwanisa kupikisa mutongo uyu, matare emuAmerica anoshanda nemazvo. No media source currently available
title: Dare Rinomisa Bazi reU.S. Postal Service Kuita Shanduko Dzinokanganisa Mafambiro eMatsamba

text: Sangano reHeal Zimbabwe Trust rinoti ongororo yarakaita musvondo mbiri dzapfuura inoratidza kuti kune kushungurudzwa kwevanhu kwakawanda kuri kuitwa nebato riri kutonga reZanu PF, masabhuku, uye nemadzishe mune mamwe matunhu emunyika. Vanoona nezvekubudiswa kwemashoko musangano iri, VaRawlings Magede, vanoti ongororo yavakaita inoratidza kuti kune kushungurudzwa kwakanyanya kumatunhu maduku anoti Mazowe neMt. Darwin, mudunhu reMashonaland Central, richiteverwawo neManicaland. VaMagede vanoti vanonyanya kutyisidzira vanhu ibato riri kutonga, reZanu PF, richiteverwa nemadzishe. Vanotiwo kune mhando nhatu dzekushungurudza nadzo vanhu dziri kushandiswa, dzinoti kutyisidzirwa, vanhu vachiyeuchidzwa zvakamboitika muna 2008, kumanikidzwa kuenda kumisangano yeZanu PF, uye kuparadzwa kwemisangano yemamwe mapato anopikisa Zanu PF. No media source currently available
title: Heal Zimbabwe Trust Inoti Kushungurudzwa kweVanhu Kuri Kukwira Mune Mamwe Matunhu

text: Mutungamiri weZANU PF uye vari mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, nemusi weMuvhuro vakasvitsa mapepa kudare anobata zvavachataura musi weChitatu pachatongwa nyaya yakakwidzwa kudare nemutungamiri weMDC Alliance, VaNelson Chamisa yekuti zvakabuda musarudzo dzemusi wa30Chikunguru zvisendekwe parutivi vachiti sarudzo idzi dzakabirirwa zviri zvemhando yepamusoro-soro. Magweta ari kumirira VaMnangagwa pamwe neari kumirira komisheni inoona nezvesarudzo yeZimbabwe Electoral Commission, kana kuti ZEC, akasvitsa mapepa kudare ekupindura mapepa enhanganyaya kana kuti ma "heads of arguments" akasvitswa kudare nemagweta aVaChamisa nemusi weMugovera. Rimwe remagweta ari kumirira VaMnangagwa, VaTinomudaishe Chinyoka, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vakasvitsa mapepa aya mukati menguva yakatarwa nedare reConstitutional Court iro rakapa VaMnangagwa kusvika na10 mangwanani kuti vange vasvitsa mapepa avo. VaChinyoka vati mapepa avakasvitsa kudare anoratidza pachena kuti VaMnangagwa vakakunda zviri pachena musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika yakaitwa musi wa30 Chikunguru. Mushure mekusvitswa kwakaitwa mapepa aya kudare nemagweta aVaMnangagwa, magweta aVaChamisa pamwe nemagweta ari kumirira VaMnangagwa, ZEC navose vakadomwa kuti vapindure nyaya iyi mudare vaita musangano nemukuru-mukuru wevatongi munyika VaLuke Malaba unodaidzwa kuti pre-trial conference. Rimwe remagweta aVaChamisa, VaSylvester Hashiti, vakaudza Studio 7 kuti pane pavasiri kuwirirana nemagweta aVaMnangagwa panyaya yekuti mapepa achashandiswa mudare pachanzwikwa nyaya iyi ndeapi. VaHashiti vati vacharamba vachitaudzana nemagweta ari kumiririra VaMnangagwa neZEC pamwe naVaMalaba kuti vawirirane kuti mapepa avachabvumirana kushandisa mudare ndeapi. Zvichakadai, VaHashiti vati vasvitsa chikumbiro kudare chekuti vabvumidzwe kushandisa michina inoita kuti vose vachange vari mudare musi weChitatu vakwanise kuona zvinenge zvichitaurwa nemagweta mukusvitsa kwaachaita humbowo kana kuti ma projectors vachiti vatongi vematare pamwe nevanenge vari mudare iri vanofanira kuti vanyatsoona zvinenge zvichitaurwa nemagweta aVaChamisa. No media source currently available
title: Magweta aVaMnangagwa Osvitsa Mamwe Mapepa kuDare reConcourt Vachiti Vakakunda muSarudzo

text: Mutevedzeri wasachiagro weMDC, VaJob Sikhala, vapomerwa mhosva zviri pamutemo yekuronga zvekupidigura hurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa zvichitevera mashoko avakataura pamusangano wavakaita nevatsigiri vavo kuBikita. VaSikhala, avo vanomirira Zengeza West mudare reparamende, vazvipira kumapurisa epaHarare Central vaine magweta avo matanhatu anga achisanganisira mutevedzeri wemutungamiri weMDC, VaTendai Biti, VaObey Shava naVaJeremiah Bamu nevamwe. Izvi zvinotevera kufonerwa kwavakaitwa nemapurisa neMuvhuro maerarano nemashoko avanonzi vakataura pamusangano wavakaita nevatsigiri vebato ravo kuBikita mudunhu reMasvingo mukupera kwesvondo. Rimwe remagweta aVaSikhala, VaObey Shava, vati VaSikhala vapomerwa mhosva yekuronga zvekupidigura hurumende yaVaMnangagwa uye vati vari kutarisira kuti vamiswe pamberi pedare mangwana. VaSikhala vava munhu wechimakumi maviri nemumwe chete kupomerwa mhosva yakadai gore rino chete. Munyori mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaNick Mangwana, vakaudza bepanhau reHerald nezuro kuti hurumende haisi kufara nemashoko akataurwa naVaSikhala ekuti hurumende yaVaMnangagwa inofanira kubviswa pachigaro gore ra2023 risati rasvika. Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvakatarisirwa kuenda kusarudzo zvakare muna 2023 asi VaSikhala vakati havasi kuzomirira kuti nguva yesarudzo isvike VaMnangagwa vari pachigaro vachiti VaMnangagwa vaondonga nyika zvave kupa kuti ruzhinji rweZimbabwe rwunhonge svosve nemuromo. Mutevedzeri wemutauriri weMDC, VaLuke Tamborinyoka, vakaburitsa mashoko nezuro vachiti sebato havawirirane nezvakataurwa naVaSikhala pamusangano wekuBikita uyu vachiti zvakataurwa naVaSikhala zvaive zvemupfungwa dzavo. VaTamborinyoka vakati bato ravo rakazvipira kuunza shanduko munyika richishandisa nzira dziri pamutemo. Asi mutauriri weboka revechidiki muMDC, VaStephen Chuma, vaudza Studio7 kuti boka ravo riri kutsigira VaSikhala nemashoko avanonzi vakataura kuBikita. Nekune rumwe rutivi nhengo dzeMDC dzaswera dzichipa pfungwa dzakasiyana-siyana paFacebook nepaTwitter vamwe vachitsigira VaSikhala vamwe vachivatsoropodza vachiti zvavakaita zvaiva zvisina huchenjeri. VaChuma vati zvakataurwa naVaSikhala mucherechedzo wekushupika kuri kuita ruzhinji rweZimbabwe kuburikidza nehutongo hwaVaMnangagwa. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika uye vachishanda vakazvimirira vaudza Studio7 kuti huwandu hwevanhu vari kusungwa mushure mekuratidza kusafara kwavo nehutongo hwaVaMnangagwa hunoratidza kuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka munyika. VaMukundu vati kusungwa kwaVaSikhala kunoratidza kuti Zimbabwe haisati yasvika pakunzi inyika ine hutongi hwejekerere. Kubva zvakatora VaMnangagwa masimba kubva kuna VaRobert Mugabe vachibatsirwa nemauto, pave nevanhu vakawanda vapomerwa mhosva yekuda kubvisa hurumende pachigaro, makumi maviri nemumwe chete vasungwa gore rino chete vachipomerwa mhosva yekuronga zvekupidigura hurumende yavo. Vanhu ava vanosanganisira hutungamiri hwesangano rinomirira vashandi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade. No media source currently available
title: VaSikhala Vanopomerwa Mhosva yeKuda Kupidigura Hurumende yaVaMnangagwa

text: Vanoita zvekutengesa zvinhu munzira vanoti chishuwo chavo ndechekubatsira nyika kuitira kuti ibude mumadhaka mairi kunyange hazvo ivo vari parumhananzombe. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi dzinoti vanhu vanosvika zvikamu makumi mapfumbamwe kubva muzana vari kuraramna nekutengesa zvakasiya siyana munyika. No media source currently available Mazuva ekare, vanhukadzi ndivo vaive vakawandisa mubasa iri, vanhurume vari vashoma shoma uyezve vari vaibva kuMozambique avo vakadzokera kunyika kwavo. Asi ikozvino zvinhu zvasanduka sezvo vanhurume vawandawo zvekare vachitengesawo muriwo nematomati nezvimwe zvakadaro. Vakawanda vavo vane nhoroondo dzakasiyana dzakapa kuti vaite basa rekutenga nekutengesa zvinhu. Vashoma vavo ndivo vasina gwaro re ‘O’ Level asi vakawanda vacho ndeavo vakasvika ‘A’ Level vamwe vacho vaine madegree kana madiploma kubva kuzvikoro zvepamusoro soro. Va Munyaradzi Muchena ndemumwe wevanotengesa pana Chinhoyi Street naKwame Khurumah mushure mekubviswa paTown House mukutanga kwemwedzi wapera. Mumwe anorarama nekutengesa, Muzvare Rhoda Machingauta, avo vane makore ekuberekwa makumi matatu nematatu, vanoti kutengesa munzira kwavabatsira zvikuru muhupenyu hwavo. Munyori mukuru weNational Education Union of Zimbabwe, VaMathisa Guchutu, vanoti hurumende yeZimbabwe ine mhanza yakanaka nekuti vanhu vakasarudza kuita zvekutengesa pane kuita zvemhirizhonga munyika. Vanotengesa vacho vanoti kamari kashona kavari kuwana nekutengesa zvinhu kari kukwanisa kuisa chekudya patafura kana kukwanisa kuendesa vana kuzvikoro zvekanzuru izvo zvine muripo wakati derereyi. VaZebediah Daka, avo vane makore makumi maviri nemasere ekuberekwa, vanoti vari kuwana mari yakawanda pamwedzi wega kudarika vakawanda vari kuenda kumabasa avo vari kutambira mari inoita iyo mazana matatu nemakumi masere emadhora pamwedzi. Asi chavari kushuwira ndechekuti kutengesa munzira kusimukire zvekuti vakwanisewo kubatsira hurumende yavo kubva mumadhaka ezvehupfumi hwairi pari zvino. VaMuchena vanoti vangade havo kubvisa mutero kuhurumende pane kupa vekanzuru avo vari kuvaripisa mazimari mazhinji asina chaari kushanda. Vanoti hurumende inofanira kupa vanotengesa marezinesi kuti vakwanise kutora mutero wavo pamhunhu wega wega. Vekanzuru vari kubhadharisa munhu wega wega dhora rimwe nemasenzi makumi mashanu pazuva rega rega kuti vatengese zvinhu zvavo. Va Tinotenda Mukungate, avo vanoshandira paCopacabana, vanoti vekanzuru havasi kushandisa mari iyi kuitira kuti vanotengesa vashandire pakachena. VaGuchutu vanoti hurumende inofanira kuita ongororo yakadzama yezvekutengeswa kwezvinhu munzira. Vanoti vanotungamira nyika ava vanofanira kugara pasi nevanotengesa ava voona kuti chii chingaitwe kuti vawanewo mari kubva kuvanhu ava pane kuvamhanyisa mazuva ese. VaGuchutu vanoti Zimbabwe inofanira kudzidza kubva kunyika dzakaita seChina idzo dzavaka hupfumi hwakasimba kubva muvanhu vanoita zvekutengesa. Asi vanotengesa vacho vanoti izvi hazvikwanisike kuitika vachitarisa ivo nzvimbo dziri kure neveruzhinji dzavakaiswa kuti vaitire basa ravo.
title: Vanotengesa Mumigwagwa Vanoti Vanodawo Kusimudzira Hupfumi hweZimbabwe

text: Matunhu ose munyika aita musangano wechimbi chimbi akabuda nechisungo chekuti mutungamiri webato, uye vari mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vasiye basa vega mumazuva maviri ari kutevera, kukundikana kwavo, vachamanikidzwa kusiya basa. Pamusangano waitirwa kuTraining Centre muChinhoyi nhengo dzeboka repamusoro reProvincial Coordinating Committee, PCC, pabvumiranwa kuti VaMugabe ngavasiye basa vachiti vari kutadza basa uye vari kuregedza vanhu vachiita huori vasina zvavanovaita. Vasungawo chisungo chekuti mudzimai waVaMugabe, Amai Grace Mugabe, vanofanirwa kusiya chigaro chekutungamira madzimai emubato reZanu PF sezvo vasina hunhu hunokodzera. Mushandi mukuru weZanu PF mudunhu reMashonaland West, VaChristopher Chikomba, ndivo vaverenga chiziviso chekuti musangano wakamira papi nenyaya yaVaMugabe. Nhengo yeparamende yeZvimba West, VaZiyambi Ziyambi, vabva vasimuka vakati VaMugabe vatadza basa, nokudaro vanofanirwa kumbomiswa basa mubato. Pfungwa yekuti VaMugabe vambomira kutungamira Zanu PF yabva yatambirwa nenhengo dzose dzanga dzichidarika zana kubva kumatunhu madiki ose. Sachigaro weboka revakange vari varwi verusununguko mudunhu reMashonaland West, VaCornilius Muhoni, avo varambidza nhengo dzeZanu PF kuita ma slogans vachidoma zita remunhu nekuti vanhu vanopedzesera vonamata munhu mubato. Imwe nhengo yeZanu PF yapinda musangano wanhasi, VaTichaona Gwembi, vekuHurungwe vanoti chanyanya kurwadza vanhu vakawanda ndechekuti VaMugabe vanga voda kuita mudzimai wavo uyo anozivikanwa nekuita hutsinye mutevedzeri wenyika. VaGwembi vanoti nyika ino yanga yave kuitwa sekambani yemhuri. Patabvunza kuti sei nhengo dzeZanu PF dzave kuramba VaMugabe asi vaipururudza masvondo maviri apera apo dzimwe nhengo dzaidzingwa mubato, VaGwembi vati nhengo dzakawanda dzinofarira zvekunyeperwa sezvo vachitya VaMugabe. Imwe nhengo yedunhu VaMwanza vabva vasimuka vachiti musangano unofanirwa kudzosa vaimbove mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, mubato izvo zvatambirwa nenhengo dzose dzabva dzatanga kushevedzera kuti “ngwena, ngwena ngwena” Vanoona nezvematongerwo enyika muChinhoyi, VaJohn Marava, vanoti danho ratorwa nehutungamiri hweZanu PF mucherochedzo wekuti vasunungurwa sezvo vaizviita mukutya nekunyara. Musangano uyu wakurudzira kuti bazi reZanu PF repamusoro reCentral Committee rigare mukati memazuva maviri kuti vatambire zvisungo zvavo. No media source currently available
title: Matunhu Ose Anobuda neChisungo Chekuti VaMugabe Vasiye Basa

text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vakasvika munyika nemusi weChina vachibva kumusangano weUnited Nations General Assembly wechimakumi manomwe. VaMugabe vakagashirwa panhandare yendege yeHarare International nevechidiki veZanu-PF uye vatevedzeri vavo VaPhelekezela Mphoko naVaEmmerson Mnangagwa. Asi VaMugabe vakasvikotambirwawo nematambudziko mubato ravo kurwisana kunotyisa kuchinzi kuri kuenderera mberi. Zvinonzi mubato iri muri kunetsana pakati pevanonzi vari kutsigira amai Grace Mugabe vanombonziwo Generation 40 nevanonzi vari kutsigira VaEmmereson Mnangagwa. VaMugabe vakakurudzira vatsigiri veZanu-PF kuti vabatane. Vakatendawo kuti nyika yakatarisana nenzara inotyisa asi vakati hurumende iri kuyedza kutenga chikafu kuti vanhu vasaziye nenzara. VaMugabe vakashorawo mapato anopikisa anoti rePeople Democratic Party raVaTendai Biti uye chikwata chePeople’s First chinotungamirwa naamai Joyce Mujuru. Vashorawo vari kuramba kupinda musarudzo vakaita savana MDC-T. Panyaya yanetsa yemagetsi ari kuramba achidzimwa, VaMugabe vati gurukota rezvemhando dzemoto VaSamuel Undenge hakuna kwavari kuenda. Vati VaUndenge havana chavakatadza vakatiwo dambudziko remagetsi riri kubata nyika dzakawanda muSADC. Pane vamwe mubato reZanu-PF vange vachiti VaUndenge ngavasiye basa nekuti vari kukundikana. No media source currently available
title: VaMugabe Vodzoka kuU.N Vachisvikotambirwa neNhamo dzeNyika

text: Mukuru weBroadcasting Board of Governors, BBG, VaJohn F. Lansing, vanoti zuva rimwe chete mushure mekucherechedzwa kwezuva rekufambiswa kwemashoko kwakasununguka, kana kuti Press Freedom Day, uye mazuva gumi sarudzo dzinokwanisa kushandura nguva inofanirwa kutorwa nemutungamiri wenyika ari pachigaro dzisati dzaitwa,Burundi yakabva yambunyikidza kufambiswa kwemashoko kwakasununguka. Hurumende yeBurundi yakazivisa neChishanu, Chivabvu 4 kuti yaizomisa nhepfenyuro yeVoice of America kutepfenyura munyika iyi ichishandisa masaisai eFM kwemwedzi mitanhatu, kutanga neMuvhuro, Chivabvu 7. Mumashoko avo avakaburitsa neMuvhuro, VaLansing vanoti vatori venhau veVOA vari munyika iyi vakazivisa neMuvhuro mangwanani kuti hurumende yakanga yamira neshoko rayo rekurambidza nhepfenyuro iyi. Vanoti kunyange hazvo VOA ichitepfenyurawo pamasaisai eAM, neShortwave, paterevhizheni, pamwe nemadandemutande, FM ndiyo ine mukurumbira usina anopikisa pakusvika kuvanhu veBurundi, vachiti vanhu vanga vasvika pakuvimba neVOA nekuda kwekutema isina divi rayakarerekera kwainoita. Vanoti nekuda kwekuipa kwezvematongerwo enyika pamwe nenyaya dzekubatsira vanotambura, nguva ino ndiyo chaiyo iri kudiwa nhepfenyuro iyi kudarika dzimwe nguva dzose. VaLansing vanoti BBG icharamba ichi tsigira vanhu vemuBurundi nekuvapa zvirongwa zvinovimbika uye zvechokwadi. VaLansing vanoti vari kukurudzira mutungamiri weBurundi, VaPierre Nkurunziza kuti vashandure chisungo ichi kuitira kubatsira kuti pave nekugadzikana kwenyika, kudzivirira mhirizhonga uye kuchengetedza veruzhinji.
title: Mukuru weBBG Okurudzira Burundi Kuti Ibvumidze Zvakare Kushanda kweNhepfenyuro yeVOA

text: Zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinogara munharaunda yeWashington D.C., zvakaumba sangano idzva rinonzi Coalition For Zimbabweans in The D.C. Area, kana kuti COZDA, iro richange richibatsira mukubatanidza zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri muAmerica nekune dzimwe nyika. Sachigaro vebhodhi reCOZDA, VaJona Masiya, vanoti chinangwa chikuru chekuumba kwavakaita sangano iri ndechekuunza pamwe vana veZimbabwe muzvirongwa zvakanangana nebudiriro pamwe nekubatsira vanotambura kumusha. VaMasiya vanoti zvizvarwa zviri mumatunhu anoti Maryland, Washington D.C., Virginia neWest Virginia muno muAmerica zvakaona zvakakosha zvikuru kuti paumbwe hwaro hunobatanidza vana veZimbabwe vagara vaine chido chekubatsira vanotambura vari kumusha nemuno, pamwe nekusimudzira nharaunda dzavanobva. Vanoti kunyange hazvo vana veZimbabwe vakawanda vari kunze kwenyika vagara vachibatsira vari kumusha nenzira dzakasiyanasiyana, vakaona zvakakosha kuti vanhu vaise musoro pamwechete vachipana mazano munyaya dzebudiriro. Vanotiwo munhu wese anokodzera kuve nhengo yeCOZDA, uye hapana mari dzinobhadharwa kusangano iri. Sangano iri richange richibatsirawo kutsvagira vana vanotambura rubatsiro kuti vakwanise kuenda kuchikoro pamwe nekurapwa, uyewo kubatsira munguva ino yeCovid-19. VaMasiya vanoti vari kuparura zviri pamutemo sangano ravo musi wa19 Zvita, unove Mugovera unouya, zvichiitwa vachishandisa dandemutande reZoom, uye vachange vachitandadzwa nemuimbi wechidiki, Julien King, ari mudunhu reTexas. No media source currently available
title: Zvimwe Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe Zviri muAmerica Zvoumba Sangano reCOZDA

text: Gurukota rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaSibusiso Moyo, pamwe negurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa nemukuru webhanga guru renyika reReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, Doctor John Mangudya, vari muNew York mavari kupinda misangano yezvekukwezva vemabhizimisi kuti vazodyara mari dzavo kuZimbabwe. Doctor Mangudya vati vari kuenderera mberi nemharidzo yemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa yekuti Zimbabwe yakavhurika kuita mabhizinesi, kana kuti “Zimbabwe is open for business”, vachiti hurumende yakavandudza mitemo yekuita mabhizinesi nayo munyika. Vatiwo vari kukoka nyika dzese, kwete China chete kuzodyara mari munyika. Vatiwo Zimbabwe ine mikana yezvicherwa zvakawanda zvakaita segoridhe, zvekurima uye kushanyirwa. Uyu hausi musangano wekutanga wemhando iyi sezvo mumwedzi wapfuura hurumende yakatumira nhume zvakare kuBritain kumusangano wakafanana neiwoyu wainzi ZimNdaba 2018. Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinogara muAmerica zvabva kunzvimbo dzakasiyana siyana kuzopindawo mumisangano iyi nemakurukota akabva kumusha aya. Mumwe wevanga vari mumisangano iyi VaSolomon Tembo, vanoti tarisiro yevazhinji ndeyekuti vanzwe kuti zvii zviri kuitwa nehurumende mukuedza kugadzirisa zvinhu munyika, kuitira kuti vanoda kuzosima mari dzavo munyika vasanetseke nekuita izvi, uye kuwana rubatsiro kubva kuhurumende. No media source currently available
title: Makurukota eZimbabwe Opinda Mumisangano Yezvemari kuAmerica

text: Mumwe wevatevedzeri vemutungamiri wenyika, VaKembo Mohadi, neMuvhuro vakashamisa nyika mushure mekuzivisa kwavo kuti vakange vave kusiya basa pakarepo zvichitevera kuburitswa kwenyaya dzavo dzine chekuita nehupombwe dzavanonzi vaiita nevamwe vashandi vemuhofisi yavo pamwe nemamwe madzimai ekunze. Mumashoko avo kumutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa pamwe nekumhuri yeZimbabwe, VaMohadi vakati vakatora danho rekusiya basa iri kwete nekuti vaive mbwende, asi nekuti vairemekedza huremu hwehofisi yemutungamiri wenyika, pamwe nekuchengetedza chimiro chehurumende. Sangano renhau reZimLive ndiro rakatanga kuburitsa nyaya dzekuti VaMohadi vaiita zvepabonde nemadzimai akasiyanasiyana kusanganisirawo nevamwe vakaroorwa. Asi ivo VaMohadi vakaramba mashoko aya vachiti raive basa revavengi vavo vari kuda kuvasvipisa pamwe nekuvaputsa mune zvematongerwo enyika. Vakatiwo vachatora matanho emutemo kugadzirisa nyaya iyi. Masangano anorwira kodzero dzevanhu akawanda akaburitsawo mazwi awo achikurudzira kuti VaMohadi vasiye basa zvichitevera kubuda kwenyaya dzavo dzavari kupomerwa idzi. Nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika, uye vari mutungamiri webato reDemocratic Party, Doctor Urayayi Zembe, vanoti danho rakatorwa naVaMohadi rakakodzera zvikuru uye vanoritambira nemaoko maviri. Doctor Zembe vanoti chitsvambe chasarira vatungamiri vari muhurumende pamwe nevamwe vose vanoita zvematongerwo enyika kuti kana vakatyora bumbiro remitemo yevanhu vanofanirwa kusiya basa sezvakaitwa naVaMohadi. Vanotiwo kubva pakabuda nyaya dzekuti VaMohadi vaiita zvehupombwe nemadzimai akasiyanasiyana, vana veZimbabwe, vanove ndivo bumbiro remitemo, vakabva vangovakurudzira kuti vasiye chigaro. No media source currently available
title: Vaive Mutevedzeri weMutungamiri weNyika, VaMohadi, Vanosiya Basa Mushure Mekubuda kweNyaya dzeHupombwe

text: Sangano rePassengers Association of Zimbabwe rinoti ratanga kutaura nevakuru vezvikoro nezvemabhazi nemichovha inoshandiswa kutakura vana vechikoro vachienda kana kudzoka kuzvikoro. Mutungamiriri wesangano iri, VaTafadzwa Goliati, vaudza Studio 7 kuti kodzero dzevana vechikoro dziri kutyorwa sezvo vachimanikidzwa kukwira mabhazi kana motokari dzisina kodzero yekufamba mumigwagwa uye dzisina magwaro enjodzi kana kuti ‘insuarance’. VaGoliati vati vari kushanda nemapurisa mune zvese zvavari kuita. “Isu sesangano rePassengers Association of Zimbabwe, taona zvakakodzera kuti tidzidzise vezvikoro nema’creche’ kuti vagare vakadzivirira tsaona nokutenga ‘insurance’ kana vaine mabhazi asi kana vasina, vanofanira kuhaya mota dzinayo,” VaGoliati vaudza Studio 7. Sangano iri rinoti gore rino idonzvo ravo rekudzidzisa vakuru vezvikoro pamwe chete nebazi rehurumende rinoona nezvedzidzo zvavanotarisira kuti zviitwe kugadzirira tsaona dzinogona kuitika vachiti chikoro chega chega chinofanira kuve nemitemo inoshandiswa pakutakura vana. No media source currently available
title: Zvikoro Zvokurudzirwa Kutakura Vana neMichovha Ine Magwaro Akakwama

text: Mutungamiri we Movement for Democratic Change, VaMorgan Tsvangirai, vabatana nevamwe vezvematongerwo enyika, masangano akazvimirira nevanorwira kodzero dzevanhu, mukunyora gwaro renyunyuto vachiti havasi kufara nebasa riri kuitwa nesangano rinoona nezvesarudzo reZimbabwe Elctoral Commission kana kuti ZEC. Munyori mukuru muMDC-Renewal Team, VaTendai Biti, vakaisawo ruoko rwavo pagwaro iri. Zvinhu hazvina kumirira zvakanaka muZEC kubva mapato makuru anopikisa zvaakatanga kuramwa kupinda musarudzo achiti haasi kufara nemabasa esangano iri. Mwedzi wapera bato reMDC-T rakati rinoda gwaro revavhoti rakashandiswa musarudzo dzemuna 2013 kubva kuZEC asi haina kuripihwa. Izvi zvakapa kuti MDC-T iende kudare ichiti sarudzo hadzingarambe dzichiitwa vanopikisa vasingapihwe gwaro revavhoti. Bato iri rakatiwo rinoda kuti sarudzo dzose dzimiswe kusvika mapato ose apihwa gwaro iri. Vachitaura mudare reparamende neChitatu, sachigaro ve ZEC, Amai Rita Makaru, vakati kutanga musarudzo dzema by-elections dzichaitwa mwedzi unouya mapato ose anenge opihwa gwaro revavhoti paine nguva. Vakatiwo nyaya yekusagadziriswa kwemitemo yesarudzo kuti ienderana nebumbiro remitemo iri kupa kuti zvinhu zviomere zec sezvo yave kugara ichiendeswa kumatare. Sangano reNational Youth Action Alliance ndiro riri kutunganira hurongwa uhu. Sangano iri mubatanidzwa wemasangano anodarika makumi maviri. Chinangwa chetsamba yenyunyuto iyi ndechekuti sangano reZEC risiye basa nekuti riri kunyanya kurerekera kuZanu-PF. Sachigaro weNational Youth Action Alliance, VaGilbert Mutubuki, vanoti havasi kufara zvachose nemabasa eZEC. No media source currently available
title: Masangano Akazvimirira Anoti ZEC Ngaiputswe

text: Mutungamiriri wesangano rinomirira vadzidzi vemuzvikoro zvepamusorosoro, reZimbabwe National Students Union (ZINASU), VaTakudzwa Ngadziore, avo vari kupomerwa mhosva yekukurudzira veruzhinji kuita mhirizhonga, vaburitswa mutirongo mushure mekubhadhara zviuru zvishanu zvemadhora emuZimbabwe semari yechibatiso. Pamutongo wavo, mutongi wedare repamusoro, Justice Davison Foroma, vatambira chikumbiro chaVaNgadziore chekuti vabvise mari yechibatiso kuti nyaya yavo itongwe vachibva kumba. Gweta raVaNgadziore, VaWebster Jiti, vanoti kunze kwekubhadhara mari yechibatiso, VaNgadziore vanziwo vachengetedze magwaro avo ekufambisa nedare. VaNgadziore vakakwidza nyaya yake kudare repamusoro mushure mekunge vanyimwa mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso nedare ramjisitireti. VaNgadziore vakasungwa kutanga kwemwdzi wapfuura mushure mekuita musangano nevatori venhau pedyo nekambani yeImpala Car Rental. Pakuita izvi VaNgadziore vainzi vakatyora mutongo wedare wekuti vasasvike pedyo nekambani yeImpala Car Rental zvichitevera kusungwa kwavo mushure mekunge ivo nevamwe varatidzira pamahofisi ekambani iyi, iyo ine motokari inonzi yakashandiswa kupamba mumwe mudzidzi, VaTawanda Muchehiwa kuBulawayo musi wa30 Chikunguru. ZINASU inoti Impala Car Rental ngaibude pachena kuti ndiyani aishandisa motokari yekambani iyi pakapambwa Muchehiwa. Sangano iri rinoti richaramba richiratidzira kumahosifi eImpala Car Rental kudzamara kambani iyi yabuda pachena panyaya yaMuchehiwa. Nemusi weChina chaivo nhengo dzeZINASU dzakavharira vashandi veImpala Car Rental mukati pane chimwe chitoro chekambani iyi chinotengesa zvinhu zvinoshandiswa pamotokari mumugwagwa weSpeke Avenue muHarare. Vaimbove munyori musangano reZINASU, VaMakomborero Haruzivishe, vaudza Studio 7 kuti kunyange hazvo Ngadziore abuda mutirongo nyaya yekumurambidza kuita misangano pamwe nekuratidzira pakambani yeImpala kumudzvinyirira. Kudare ramejasitireti, mukuru weTransform Zimbabwe, VaJacob Ngarivhume, avo vari kupomerwa mhosva yekukurudzira kuti varatidzire zvine mhirizhonga munaChikunguru vanzi vadzoke kudare zvekare musi wa30 Mbudzi. Mune imwewo nyaya gurukota rinoona nezvemukati menyika, VaKazembe Kazembe, nemukuru wemapurisa, Commission General VaGodwin Matanga, vaudza vatori venhau nhasi kuti mapurisa ave kuferefeta nyaya yemapurisa manomwe akakanda hutsi hunokatyidza mune rimwe bhazi muHarare nemusi weMuvhuro. Vaviri ava havana kuburitsa mazita emapurisa aya uye kutaura kuti ari muchitokisi here asi kungoti vachatongwa pasi pemutemo wemapurisa wePolice Act. Vanhu vakawanda vakakuvara vachibuda mubhazi nepamahwindo muchiitiko chakashorwa neveruzhinji munyika yose. VaMatanga vazivisawo kuti vachapinza basa mapurisa chiuru gore rino vachiti vakapihwa mvumo yekuita izvi nehurumende, asi vange vakamira kupinza mapurisa aya basa nekuda kweCovid-19. Zimbabwe Republic Police yakapedzesera kupinza mapurisa basa muna 2018. No media source currently available
title: Mutungamiri weZINASU, VaNgadziore, Vanopiwa neDare Mukana weKubvisa Mari yeChibatiso

text: Zanu-PF iri kuita kongiresi yayo yechimbi-chimbi neChishanu, muHarare iine zvisungo zvitatu zvinonzi ndizvo zvichakurukurwa. Kongiresi iyi iri kutarisirwa kutambira VaEmmerson Mnangagwa semutungamiri webato, kupa VaMnangagwa masimba ekumirira bato iri musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika gore rinouya uye kutambira zvisungo zveCentral Committee zvakaitwa musi wa19 Mbudzi. Asi madzimai eboka reZanu PF Women's League anoti anotarisirawo kuti nyaya yekuti mumwe wevatevedzeri vemutungamiri wenyika, ave munhukadzi, sezvazvakanga zvakaita muna 2014. Nyanzvi mune zvamatongerwo enyika, uye vachidzidzisa paTswane University of Technology, kuSouth Africa, Doctor Ricky Mukonza, vaudza Studio7 kuti hutungamiri mubato reZanu-PF hausati hwanyatsogadzikana uye vazhinji havasi kuzuva kuti masimba chaiwo anani. “Zviga kana kuti ma decisions anogona kuva akatoitwa kare. Pane zvakatotaurwa zvikatenderanwa. Pane kutenderanwa kwakatobuda ipapa kuti ngana ndiye achava pakati, ngana ndiye achava pakati. "Saka zvavekutaurwa nemadzimai kuti ivo vanodawo chinzvimbo chekuti umwe wavo avamiririre semutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, zvave kutokanganisa zvibvumirano zvakaitwa,” vanodaro VaMukonza. Vanoti mauto ndiwo atove nechekuita nematongerwo enyika vachiti hurumende ichatevedzera zvido zvemauto, sezvo ari iwo akabatsira kuti hurumende yavepo ipinde pachigaro. No media source currently available
title: Vanoona nezveMatongerwo Enyika Vanoti Zvido zveMauto Ndizvo Zvichaitwa Munyika

text: Musangano pakati pevashandi, vashandirwi pamwe nehurumende weTripartite Negotiating Forum, T-N-F, wakaitwa neMuvhuro muHarare unonzi wakatadza kubuda nechimuko zvakare mushure mekunge mapoka matatu aya apesana panyaya yemihoro. Misangano miviri yakaitwa nemapoka aya mwedzi wapera inonzi yakatadza zvakare kuwirirana panyaya yemari inofanirwa kutambirwa nemushandi wepasi kana kuti minimum wage. Hurumende nevashandi vanonzi vari kuwirirana kuti panofanirwa kuve nemari inonzi ndiyo yemushandi wepasi-pasi, asi vashandirwi vanonzi vari kuramba izvi, izvo zvakaita kuti musangano weMuvhuro uyu usabude nechisungo zvakare. Vaimirira hurumende munhaurirano idzi vanonzi vakatanga vapira musangano uyu zvakasungwa nedare remakurukota, zvinove zviri kuwirirana nezviri kudiwa nevashandi zvekuti pave ne minimum wage, izvo zvakarambwa nevashandirwi. Studio 7 yakundikana kunzwa mativi evashandirwi pamwe nehurumende panyaya iyi. Munyori mukuru weZCTU, VaJaphet Moyo, vanoti vashandi vangosarirwa nekutora matanho avanofunga kuti ndiwo akakodzera sezvo nhaurirano dzatadza kuburitsa chimuko. Asi VaMoyo vanoti vachatanga vambonzwa zvinobva kudare remakurukota vasati vatora matanho akakodzera kutorwa nevashandi. No media source currently available
title: Musangano weT-N-F Wakaitwa neMuvhuro muHarare Unotadza Kubuda neChisungo Zvakare

text: Mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, nhasi vadzinga basa vaimbove mutongi wedare remhosva repamusoro, Amai Erica Ndewere, mushure mekunge vawonekwa kuti havachakodzeri kuti varambe vari mutongi wedare iri nekomiti yakaumbwa kuti ivaongorore. Komiti iyi yaitungamirwa nevaimbove mutongi wedare repamusoro, VaSimbi Mubako, uye munyori wayo ari munyori webazi rezvemitemo, Amai Virginia Mabhiza. Komiti iyi inoti yakawana Amai Ndewere vaine mhosva mbiri dzekutadza basa. Komiti iyi yatambidza VaMnangagwa zvayakawana uye zvichitevera kutambira gwaro iri, VaMnangagwa vazivisa nhasi masikati kuti vabvisa Amai Ndewere semutongi wedare repamusoro. Izvi zvaziviswa nemunyori wedare remakurukota nehofisi yemutungamiri wenyika, VaMisheck Sibanda, avo vati VaMnangagwa vadzinga basa Amai Ndewere vachishandisa simba ravanopihwa nebudmbiro remitemo yenyika. VaMnangagwa nhasi vadomawo imwe komiti kuti iongorore mutongi weHigh Court kuBulawayo, Justice Thompson James Mabhikwa, panyaya yavari kupomerwa yekuti vakadzikisira chimiro chehofisi yevatongi apo vakadanana nemumwe mudzimai wavaishanda naye pamwe nekumutumira mifananidzo yavo vasina kupfeka. Komiti ichaongorora VaMabhikwa inotungamirwa nevaimbove mutongi wedare reHigh Court, VaMafios Cheda. Dzimwe nhengo dzekomiti iyi magweta anoti Mai Phillipa Phillips naVaChaka Mashoko. Komiti iyi yapihwa mwedzi mitatu kuita basa rayo. Zvichakadai, Judicial Service Commission nhasi yazivisa kuti iri kutsvaga vanhu vapfumbamwe kuti vadomwe kuve vatongi vedare reHigh Court. Kuti munhu adomwe kuve mutongi weHigh Court anofanira kunge aiine makore makumi mana kana kudarika uye ari gweta rashanda kwemakore manomwe kana kudarika. No media source currently available
title: VaMnangagwa Vanodzinga Basa Amai Erica Ndewere

text: Meya wedhorobha reChitungwiza, VaLovemore Maiko vanonzi varohwa nevechidiki veZanu PF pamahofisi avo zvichitevera kumbomisa basa kwavaita town Clerk wedhorobha iri, VaGeorge Makunde.  Zvinonzi paita bata murefu bata mupfupi pamahofisi ekanzuru yeChitungwiza nhasi apo vechidiki vasvikorova VaMaiko.  Mutevedzeri waMeya wedhorobha, VaMusa Makweza vaudza Studio 7 kuti VaMaipa vaendeswa kuchipatara zvichitevera kurohwa kwavaitwa uku. Mapurisa emuno muChitungwiza anonzi asungawo vechidiki veZanu PF vaviri zvichitevera mhirizhonga iyi.  VaMakweza vati VaMakunde havasi kufambisa basa ravo zvakanaka mukanzuru uye havasi kuuya kubasa sezvavanotarisirwa kuti vange vachiita.  Zvinonziwo mapurisa anorwisa mvongamupopoto ndiwo azomisa mhirizhonga yanga ichiitika iyi.  Mumwe mushandi wekanzuru aramba kudomwa nezita audza Studio 7 kuti mahofisi ekanzuru pamwe nemahofisi ehurumende anotorerwa zvitupa ayo akabatana nemahofisi ekanzuru azoswera avharwa pasisina basa riri kuitwa mushure mekunge mapurisa adzinga vanhu vese pamahofisi aya.  Mumashoko kuvatori venhau, mutevedzeri wemunyori anoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko muMDC VaLuke Tamborinyoka vanoti VaMakunde svondo rapera vakaronga dhende rekuti VaMaiko naVaMakweza vasungwe iri mushure mekunga vanzwa ruyerekupe rwekuti vainge vachida kumiswa basa nenyaya yehunhubu uye kusauya kubasa. VaTamborinyoka vati vakatenga nzvimbo zvisiri pamutemo ndivo vatsvaga marori ange akatakura vechidiki vanodarika zana vanofungidzirwa kuti ndeveZanu-PF kuzoita mhirizhonga. Mutauriri weZanu-PF VaSimon Khaya Moyo vaudza Studio 7 kuti vange vasati vapirwa nyaya iyi asi vakati bato ravo harikurudzire zvemhirizhonga uye vanoita zvemhirizhonga vanofanira kusungwa. Mutauriri wemapurisa Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi vati vanga vasati vave neruzivo rwezvaitika kukanzuru vakati tigozodzoka kwavari.  VaMakunde vatiwo vari kunenedzerwa mhosva dzavasina kupara vakati tigozovabata mushure meawa imwechete kuti vatipe divi ravo rizere asi pataenda pamhepo nharembozha yavo yanga isiri kupinda.  Vane ruzivo nezviri kuitika mukanzuru yeChitungwiza vanoti pane kusawirirana pakati paVaMaiko naVaMakunde panyaya yekuti VaMakunde, avo vanove nhengo yeZanu PF kuMashonaland Central, vari kudherera VaMaiko vachiti havana zvavanoudza sezvo vari nhengo yeMDC. MDC ndiyo yakakunda muChitungwiza musarudzo dzemakanzuru.  No media source currently available
title: VeChidiki VeZanu-PF Vopomerwa Mhosva yeKurova Meya weMDC

text: Gurukota rinoona nezvemaindustry Doctor Sekai Nzenza vanoti hurumende yatangazve humwe hurongwa kwekutsvaga vekushanda navo kukambani yeZiscosteel iyo yave nemakore yakavharwa ichitadzawo kubhadhara vashandi vayo mari. Ziscosteel yakambonyorerena chibvumirano nekambani yeEssar yekuIndia asi hapana chakabuda. Kusashanda kwekambani iyi kuri kupa kuti dhorobha reRedcliff, Kwekwe rairaramiswa nekambani iyi kubva kumakore ekuma1950 riite sedongo chairo. Asi vhiki rapera Doctor Nzenza vakagadzika bhodhi idzva kuti riedze kumutsiridza kambani iyi. No media source currently available Asi vainge vakabata chigaro chasachigaro webhodhi iri Muzvinafundo Gift Mugano vakabva vasiya basa nekusawirirana nemamwe makurukota ehurumende vachiti havawirirane nepfungwa yekuti vasataure nevatori venhau nekuti ndisachigaro wekambani yehurumende. No media source currently available
title: Hurumende Inoti Yave Kuda kuMutsiridza Ziscosteel

text: Vakaremara vanoti hwaro hutsva hwedzidzo hwakaiswa nehurumende haunei nekusimudzira dzidzo yevakaremara. Vakaremara ava vanoti bazi rezvedzidzo harinawo kumbotora pfungwa dzavo kuti zvii zvavangade kuti zviiswe muhwaro hutsva uhwu. Mumwe wevakaremara, VaManners Mukuviri, vanoti kunyorwa kwegwaro rinobatanidza vana vese kunoita kuti zvinodiwa nevana vakaremara zvisakosheswa munyaya yedzidzo. VaMukuviri vanoti hwaro hutsva uhwu hautsananguri kuti varairidzi vachadzidzisa sei vanehurema hwakasiya-siyana Amai Milka Gombera vane mwana akaremara. Amai Gombera vanotinekuda kwekuti vazhinji vane hurema vanotora nguva ndefu vari pazvikoro, hurumende yaifanirwa kuratidzawo muhwaro hutsva uhwu kuti vachabetsera nekuendesa vana vakaremara ava kuzvikoro pachena sezvo vazhinji vachibva kumhuri dzinoshaya. VaCharles Tsikani, avo vakaremara, vanoti nguva zhinji hurumende haitereri zvichemo zvavo. Nyanzvi munyaya dzekudzidzisa vanhu vanorarama nehurema kuZimbabwe Open University, VaLincoln Hlatshwayo, vashorawo zvikuru hwaro hutsva hwedzidzo. VaHlatshwayo vanoti hwaro hutsva uhwu kunyange hwaiswa mune mimwe mitaurohausati hwanyorwa nemutauro wemaoko kubatsira vasinganzwi nevasingatauri. VaHlatshwayo vanoti hurumende yaifanirwa kuratidza muhwaro uhwu kuti vane hurema hwakasiya-siyana vanobatsirikana sei mukuwana kodzero yedzidzo. VaHlatshwayo vanotiwo kunyange makore anonzi vana vatange chikoro anova pakati pemana nemashanu, anoratidza kuti hwaro uhwu hwakanyorwa pasina pfungwa dzevanomiririra vakaremara. Vanomiririra vanhu vakaremara mudare reSenate, VaNyamayabo Mashavakure, vanoti kushaikwa kwezviga zvakaita segwara remutauro wemaoko ndezvezvimwe zvinoita kuti zvido zvevakaremara zvisarire shure. VaMashavakure vanotiwo muhwaro hutsva uhwu hapana kujeka kuti vakaremara vachange vachiwana dzidzo sei. Vane hurema vanoti kunyange hazvo pave nenguva vanyorera kuhurumende kuti vasangane negurukota rezvedzidzo, VaLazarus Dokora, kuti vakurukure zvinyunyuto zvavo vanoti havasati vapiwa mukana uyu. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kuna VaDokora sezvo vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. No media source currently available
title: Vakaremara Voshungurudzwa neHwaro Hutsva hweDzidzo Hwakaturwa naVaDokora

text: Mutungamiri weMDC, VaMorgan Tsvangirai, vanonzi vaburitsa mashoko kuburikidza nemutauriri wavo, VaLuke Tamborinyoka, vachiti vadoma mumwe wevatevedzeri vavo, VaNelson Chamisa, kuti vafanobata chigaro chemutungamiri webato kudzamara VaTsvangirai vadzokera kumusha. Pari zvino VaTsvangirai vari kurapwa vari muchipatara chiri mu Johannesburg, kuSouth Africa. VaTamborinyoka vati VaTsvangirai vatora danho iri pachitariswa kuti vamwe vevatevedzeri vavo, VaElias Mudzuri naMuzvare Thokozani Khupe, vari ku South Africa pari zvino. VaTsvangirai vatiwo VaChamisa ndivo vachange vachimirira bato muMDC Alliance. Zvichitevera kuburitswa kwemashoko aya naVaTamborinyoka, vanhu vatanga kunyora zvakawanda pamadandemutande vamwe vachirumbidza VaChamisa vamwe vachiti hachisi chokwadi kuti VaTsvangirai vadoma VaChamisa kuti vafanobata matomhu. Vamwe muMDC-T vanga vachitiwo VaMudzuri ndivo vachakabata matomu vachiramba mashoko aVaTamborinyoka vachiti VaTsvangirai havana kuburitsa mashoko aya. Mamwe mashoko anga achiti, VaTsvangirai, avo vari kunzi havasi kubvumidzwa navana chiremba kuti vasangane nevanhu vakawanda, havangawana mukana wekuburitsa mashoko anonzi aburitswa naVaTamborinyoka. Asi VaTamborinyoka vati vataura naVaTsvangirai vakaudzwa kuti vanyore gwaro rekuzivisa nyika zvavaronga. Dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika dzinoti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka muMDC uye bato iri rinofanirwa kugadzirisa zviri kunetsa. Nyanzvi munyaya dzematongerwo enyika, uye vachiona nezvezvirongwa zveCrisis Coalition in Zimbabwe, VaJoy Mabenge, vanoti zviri kuitika muMDC hamuna kugadzikana. No media source currently available
title: VaChamisa Vofanobata Chigaro cheMutungamiri weMDC-T?

text: Mutungamiri wenyika yeRussia VaVladimir Putin vaudza mauto avo kuti asarwise mauto eUkraine zviuru zviviri asara ari panzvimbo ye Azovstal Steel Plant muguta reMariupol. Guta rose reMariupol ratorwa neRussia kunze kwenzvimbpo iyi chete. Asi VaPutin vaudza gurukota ravo rezvekudzivirirwa kwenyika VaSergei Shoigu kuti vasatendere kana nhunzi chaiyo kupinda pane mauto eUkraine aya. Ukraine iri kukurudzira Russia kuti itendere vanhuwo zvavo kuti vabude muguta iri. Vanhu zviuru zana vanonzi vari muguta iri uye vamwe vanonzi vakakuvara. Gurukota rinoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika muAmerica VaAntony Blinken vashora zvikuru mamiriro akaita zvinhu muguta iri vachiti zvinotyisa. Vati zvakakosha kuti vanhuwo zvavo vabvumidzwe kubuda muguta iri. Russia iri kurwisawo dunhu reDonbas kumabuda zuva kweUkraine. Mutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica VaJoe Biden vari kutarisirwa nhasi kuti vataure nezverubatsiro rwunodarika mamiriyoni mazana masere kana kuti 800 million rwavari kupa kuUkraine rwunosanganisira zvombo. America nezuro yakatemerawo zvirango kune vamwe vemabhizimisi vemuRussia nemamwe makambani.
title: VaPutin Vanoti Mauto eUkraine Akomberedzwa kuMariupol Asarwiswe Asi Pavari Pasapinde Kana Nhunzi

text: Vanhu vakawanda vanoti gore rino ranga rakaoma zvikuru uye havatarisire kuti pane zvakawanda zvichashanduka gore rinouya. Vachitaura pamusangano wakarongwa nesangano rakazvimiririra reMass Public Opinion Institute (MPOI) neChina, vakafanobata chigaro chemutauriri wePeople’s Democratic Party, VaJacob Mafume, vakati veruzhinji vanga vorarama neminana nekuda kwekuoma kwehupenyu munyika. No media source currently available VaMafume vakati izvi zviri kukonzerwa nekukundikana kwehurumende yeZanu PF kuwanisa vanhu mabasa, izvo yakavimbisa muna 2013. Mumwe mutauri pamusangano uyu, uye vachiongorora zvematongerwo enyika, VaTakura Zhangazha, vakatiwo mapato ezvematongerwo enyika haasi kuisa zvido zvevechidiki pamusoro, izvo zviri kupa kuti vechidiki vaomerwe nehupenyu. Mutauriri weMDC-T, VaObert Gutu, vakatiwo gore rino ranga rakaomera veruzhinji uye hapana hurongwa hwekugadzirisa hupfumi hwenyika huri kuitwa neZanu PF. Asi VaMafume vakati pane zvakanakawo zvakaitwa munyika gore rino zvinosanganisira kuraswa kwemutemo uyo waipa vachuchusi simba rekusunga musungwa anenge apiwa mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso kuti atongwe achibva kumba. Musangano uyu wakapindwa nevanhu vanodarika makumi masere avo vaitarisa zvinhu zvakanaka nezvakaipa zvakaitika munyika uye kuti gore rinouya rinenge rakamira sei.
title: Nyanzvi Dzozeya Mamiriro Anga Akaita Gore Rino

text: Vamwe vakuru muhurumende pamwe nemakambani anodyidzana nayo vakatemerwa zvirango mushure mekutyora kodzero dzevanhu, kusaremekedza zvivakwa zvevanhu, uye kugadziridza hupfumi hwenyika. Zvirango izvi zviri kunzi nehurumende zviri kuremera vana veZimbabwe zvakanyanya, zvekuti kuramba kwazvo zviripo hakuna kusiyana nekutongera munhu rufu, nekudaro zvinofanirwa kubviswa nekukasika. Munyori anoona nezvemutemo mubato riri kutonga reZanu PF, VaMunyaradzi Paul Mangwana vanoti hurumende yavo yakafadzwa zvikuru nechidanho chakatorwa neSADC chekukurudzira kuti zvirango zvibvise sezvo zvarwadza vana veZimbabwe. VaMangwana vanoti Zimbabwe yakaita sarudzo dzakachena dzakarumbidzwa nevakawanda, kunyange hazvo paine zvishoma zvakanzi zvinoda kuzogadziriswa. Vanoti nyaya hombe yakaita kuti nyika itemerwe zvirango haisi yekutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu sezvinotaurwa, asi kuti inyaya yekutorwa kweminda kuvachena ichipiwa vatema. VaMangagwa vanoti hapana chavanofanirwa kunzi nenyika dzekumawirira idzi vagadzirise, kunze kwekungoti nyika idzi dziri kuda kungoti Zanu PF ibviswe pamasimba ekutonga. Bato rinopikisa reMDC inotungamirirwa naVaNelson Chamisa ragarawo richiti Zimbabwe haina zvirango zvinganzi zviri kuomesera nyika, asi kuti kutadza kutonga kweZanu PF ndiko kwaita kuti nyika iite seyakageza negoka munyama. Munyori anoona nezvesarudzo muMDC, VaJacob Mafume, vanoti zvirango zviri munyika zvakatopiwa kuvana veZimbabwe nehurumende yeZanu PF kuburikidza nehuwori pamwe nekutyora kodzero dzevanhu. Izvi zvinotsigirwawo negweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu uye vari mukuru weHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica, VaDewa Mavhinga, avo vanoti hurumende yeZimbabwe haisati yasvika pachinhanho chinoita kuti zvirango zvibviswe, sezvo ichiri kuramba ichityora kodzero dzevanhu. Kufora kuri kuitwa musi weChishanu hakusi kwekutanga kuitwa munyika panhau yezvirango iyi. Muna 2011 zviuru nezviuru zvevanhu zvakaungana muHarare pakaparurwa nevaive mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe chirongwa chekuti zvirango zvibviswe, paine chinangwa chekuunganidza masiginecha anosvika mamiriyoni maviri. Masiginicha aya ainzi aizosvitswa kunyika dzekumawirira dzakatemera vamwe muhurumende zvirango, izvo zvinonzi nehurumende ndizvo zviri kukonzera kutambura kweveruzhinji munyika. Gore rapera masangano anoti reZimbabwe National Elders Forum nereFaith for the Nation Campaign akabatana mukukurudzira hurumende yeAmerica pamwe neEuropean Union kuti vabvise zvirango zvinonzi vakatemera hurumende yeZimbabwe izvi. Masangano maviri aya akaparurawo chirongwa chekuunganidza masiginecha anosvika miriyni imwe chete evanhu vanoshoropodza zvirango. America yakadzika mutemo weZimbabwe Democracy and Economic Recovery Act (ZIDERA) muna 2001, ukuwo European Union ichidzikawo zvirango muna 2002 zvakanangana nevamwe muhurumende yevaive mutungamiri wenyika VaMugabe. Zvirango izvi zvairambidza vanhu ava kufamba, pamwe nekuvavharira mari dzavo dzaive mumabhanga ekunze kwenyika uyewo zvaibata makambani aidyidzana nehurumende. Chasara kuonekwa ndechekuti kufora kuri kutungamirwa neSADC uku kuchaburitsa chimuko here kana kuti kwete, uye kuti vakadzika zvirango ava vachangoramba vakaisa zvimiti munzeve here? No media source currently available
title: Hurumende Yokurudzirwa Kugadzirisa Zvakamboita Kuti Zvirango Zvidzikwe

text: Hurumende yeJapan yapa Zimbabwe mari inopfuura mamirioni mashanu emadhora ekuAmerica kuti ishandiswe mukutenga chikafu chevanhu vakatarisana nenzara munyika. Mari iyi yaiswa mumaoko esangano rinobatsira mune zvechikafu pasi pose, reWorld Food Programme (WFP), iro richatenga chibage nekuona kuti chasvika kuvanhu vakatarisana nenzara muZimbabwe mwedzi wa Chikumi usati wapera. Kusanaya kwemvura, pamwe chete nemamiriro akaita nyaya dzezvehupfumi muZimbabwe, zvakonzera kuti Zimbabwe itarisane nedambudziko guru munezvekudya. Ongororo ichangoitwa muZimbabwe yese ne Integrated Food Security Phase Classification (IPC) inoratidza kuti vanhu vakatarisana nedambudziko gurusa rechikafu munyika vave kupfuura mamirioni mana, zvinorevava kuti vanhu vatarisana nedambudziko rezvekudya vawedzera kubva pavakange vari pakupera kwe gore rapfuura apo vakange vari mamirioni matatu. Ongororo ichangopedziswa kuitwa iyi, inoratidzavo kuti vanhu vakatarisana nedambudziko rechikafu munyika vave padyo nemamirioni masere.
