Nyanzvi munyaya dzechikafu uye vakambotungamiravo sangano reChristian Care, Reverend Forbes Matonga, vaudza Studio 7 kuti Japan yaratidza chido chikuru kuvanhu veZimbabwe nekuti yavarangarira panguva iyo nyika zhinji pasi pose, kusanganisira iyo Japan, dziri kunetseka nekubatsira zvizvarwa zvadzo mudambudziko re kuchirwere cheCovid-19. Reverend Matonga vati hurumende yeJapan inofanirwa kutendwa zvikuru. No media source currently available
title: Japan Inopa Zimbabwe Mamirioni Gumi neMashanu Emadhora EkuAmerica Kutenga Chikafu Chevanonetseka

text: Zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri muAmerica zvakaungana pamuzinda weZimbabwe uri muWashington D.C. zvichitsigira zviitiko zviri kuitika kumusha, zvichitevera kupindira kwemauto mune zvematongerwo enyika, uye kumanikidzwa kwaVaMugabe nebato ravo reZanu PF, kuti vasiye chigaro. Zviitiko izvi zviri kutsigirwawo neveruzhinji munyika pamwe nekunze kwenyika, uko kune zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinodarika mamiriyoni matatu. Mumwe wevakaronga kufora uku, Muzvare Shingi Mangwiro, vanoti vakashamiswa nekubuda kwakaita zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe, kunyange hazvo kunze kwaitonhora zvekukwidza hamba mumuti. Vanoti vanhu vakabva kumatunhu akasiyanasiyana, anosanganisira Pennsylvania, New Jersey, New York, Virginia, West Virginia neMaryland. No media source currently available
title: Zvimwe Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe Zviri muAmerica Zvinoti Zvinotsigira Zviri Kuitika Kumusha

text: Vaimbove murongi wemisangano yevechidiki muZanu PF, VaGodfrey Tsenengamu, vanoti kurwisa huori munyika kunobudirira chete kana vana veZimbabwe vakaita chirwirangwe zvisinei kuti vanobva kubato ripi rezvematongerwo enyika. Vachitaura nevatori venhau muHarare, VaTsenengamu, avo vakabviswa pachinzvimbo chavo musi weChitatu, vati havakendenge nekumiswa basa kwavakaitwa. VaTsenengamu vatiwo kunyange hazvo vakabviswa pachigaro chavo, havasi kuzonyarara munyaya dzekurwisa huori. VaTsenengamu vati chido chavo chekurwisa huori ndicho chapa kuti vatange sangano rinonzi Zim First Agenda iro rine chinangwa chekurwisa huori. Asi VaTsenengamu vati hondo yekurwisa huori inobudirira chete kana vana veZimbabwe vabatana. Vati izvi zvinobudirira kana mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vakaita hurukuro nemutungamiri weMDC, VaNelson Chamisa. VaTsenengamu vati vane chinangwa chekuunganidza vatungamiriri vaviri ava kuti vasangane musi wa21 Kukadzi kuti vataurire veruzhinji zvikonzero zviri kuvatadzisa kuita hurukuro kuti vagadzirise matambudziko ari munyika. VaTsenengamu varamba mashoko ekuti pane vari kuvashandisa mubato reZanu PF vakati vana veZimbabwe vese vane chido chekurwisa huori ngavabatane navo kuti vapanane mazano ekuti vangapedza sei huori munyika. VaTsenengamu vaudzawo vatori venhau kuti vanokatyamadzwa zvakanyanya nekumiswa basa kwavo mushure mekutsoropodza vamwe vana muzvinabhizimusi vasiri mubato reZanu PF. VaTsenengamu vati vanoshamiswa nehutungamiriri hweZanu PF uhwo husina kuvamisa basa pavakamboita musangano nevatori venhau gore rapera vakadoma vamwe vakuru mubato iri kusanganisira VaObert Mpofu naVaJoram Gumbo panyaya dzehuori asi vozomiswa basa vadoma vanhu vasiri nhengo dzebato iri. Vaimbove mukuru wevechidiki muZanu PF mudunhu reHarare, VaJim Kunaka, vaudza Studio7 kuti kumiswa basa kwaVaTsenengamu naVaLewis Matutu mucherechedzo wekuti vakuru mubato reZanu PF ndivo vari kuita zvehuori. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kutaura nemutauriri waVaMnangagwa, VaGeorge Charamba, sezvo nharembozha yavo yanga ichinetsa kubata. Asi gurukota rezvekubudiswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, vaudza Studio7 parunhare kuti hurumende haina zvaingataura pamusoro pemashoko ataurwa naVaTsenengamu sezvo vanga vachitaura pfungwa dzavo. Mutauriri wevechidiki mubato reMDC inotungamirirwa naVaNelson Chamisa, VaStephen Chuma, vati seMDC vakabvira kare vachitaura nyaya dzekurwisa huori. VaChuma vapomera vaMnangagwa mhosva yekuva nehuori vakati havangagoni kurwisa nyaya dzehuori munyika. VaTsenengamu naVaMatutu vakaita musangano nevatori venhau neMuvhuro vakapomera mukuru weSakunda Holdings, VaKuda Tagwirei, VaBilly Rautenbach veGreen Fuels nemutungamiri weGrain Millers Association of Zimbabwe, VaTafadzwa Musarara, mhosva dzekuita huwori hwakanyanyisa munyika. Kunyange hazvo VaTsenengamu vataura nevatori venhau vega, vati vachiri pamwe chete naVaMatutu. No media source currently available
title: VaTsenengamu Vokurudzira VaMnangagwa naVaChamisa Kuita Nhaurirano

text: Rimwe sangano rinomirira zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri mumatunhu anoti D.C., Maryland, Virginia ne West Virginia muno muAmerica, reCoalition of Zimbabweans in the DC Area, COZDA, rinoti rinotambira nemufaro mashoko egurukota rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaFrederick Shava, ekuti vana veZimbabwe vari kunze kwenyika vari kuita bandiko guru kwazvo mukusimudzira hupfumi hwenyika kuburikidza nemari dzavanotumira kumusha. Asi sachigaro wesangano iri, VaJonah Masiya, avo vanoti bato ravo harineyi nezvematongerwo enyika, vanoti hurumende inofanirwawo kupa vemasangano anomirira vana veZimbabwe vari kunze mukana wekugara navo pasi ichinzwawo zvavanoshuvira kuti zviitwe, kwete kuti zviite sezvine zvematongerwo enyika mukati. VaMasiya vanoti vanotarisirawo kunge hurumende ichizovacherechedzawo kuburikidza nekuvawanisa mikana yekutangawo mabhizimusi kumusha uye kupa vari kunze mukana wekuvhota pamwe nezvimwe zviri zvavanoshuvira. Vachitaura kumusangano weDiplomats Forum wakaitwa parutivi pe Zimbabwe International Trade Fair manheru emusi weChina chapfuura, VaShava vakati hurumende iri kufadzwa nemari iri kutumirwa nezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika, izvo vakati zvakatumira mari inosvika US$1.4 Billion yemari yekuAmerica mugore rapera, iyo inonzi yakawanda kudarika mamwe makore ose. Vana veZimbabwe vari kunze vari kunziwo vari kutora mikana yekutanga mabhizimusi kumusha, asi vachikurudzirawo hurumende kuti ipe mukana uyu kune vanhu vose zvisineyi nezvematongerwo enyika. No media source currently available
title: Sangano reCOZDA Rokurudzira Kuti Pave neKutaurirana Pakati peHurumende neZvizvarwa zveZimbabwe Zviri Kunze Pamusoro peNyaya dzeBudiriro

text: Hukama pakati pehurumende nemasangano akazvimirira hunenge hwaramba husina kumira zvakanaka kunyange hazvo mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vakavimbisa kuti matongero avo achange akasiyana serima nechayedza nematongero aita vaimbove mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe. Kubva zvavatora mhiko yekutungamira nyika, VaMnangagwa vasangana nemasangano akasiyana siyana kusanganisira emadzimai, varairidzi, vakarwa hondo yerusununguko, madzishe nevamwe. Asi havana musangano wavati vamboitwa nemasangano akazvimirira. Nemusi weChina bepanhau reHerald rakaburitsa mashoko ekuti vemasangano akazvimirira pasi pesangano reCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition vakaita musangano nechinangwa chekuda kupidigura hurumende. Asi masangano aya anoti aya mashoko enhema akanangana nekuti kupomera masangano akazvimirira mhosva dzaasina kupara. Nhengo yeZanu-PF, VaTafadzwa Mugwadi, vanoti vemasangano akazvimirira oga vanoshandiswa nenyika dzekunze kuda kukanganisa hurumende. Asi mutauriri weCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition, VaTabani Moyo, vanoti mashoko aya ndeemugotsi matsuro. No media source currently available
title: Masangano Akazvimirira Oramba Kuti Anoda Kupidigura Hurumende

text: MDC inotungamirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai, MDC-T, inoti yave kutarisira kudzoserwa midziyo yayo yakatorwa nechikonzi nemusi weChishanu svondo rapera, mushure mekuita musangano nemagweta ari kumirira Muzvare Sally Dura, avo vanonzi havana kubhadharwa nebato iri panguva yavairishandira. Munyori mukuru weMDC-T, VaDouglas Mwonzora vanoti sebato havana kumbobvira vakaona magwaro aibva kumagweta aMuzvare Dura ane chekuita nenyaya iyi. "Tataura nemagweta anomirira Ms. Sally Dura vanonzi ivo vatine chikwereti navo, takaonesana nemagweta iwavo kuti hatina kumbobvira taona magwaro anobva kwavari. "Ms. Dura vakaenda naTendai Biti, eeh, pakabuda Biti naMangoma muMDC vakabva vangoenda ikoko. Vanga vari member of staff ikoko. Isu hatina chatanga tichi dealer navo," VaMwonzora vanodaro. Muzvare Dura vari kumirirwa nemagweta ekambani yeSibanda Mawere. MDC-T inonzi ine chikwereti chemari inodarika zviuru zana zvemadhora kuna Muzvare Dura ichibva mumari dzemihoro yavasina kutambiriswa. NeChishanu chapfuura, chikonzi chichiperekedzwa nemapurisa akanga akapakata zvombo, chakatsvaira mahofisi ebato rinopikisa iri chichitora midziyo inosanganisira masofa, matafura, makombiuta nezvimwe. VaMwonzora vanoti midziyo yebato ravo yakatorwa nechikonzi chedare inokosha mari inodarika mazana matatu ezviuru zvemadhora. Vanoti vanoona sekunge danho iri rakatorwa nechinangwa chekunyadzisa mutungamiri wavo, VaTsvangirai pamwewo nekukanganisa nhaurirano dzekuumba mushandirapamwe nemamwe mapato anopikisa hurumende. Studio7 yaedza kunzwa divi remagweta eSibanda Mawere, asi mumwe wemagweta anonzi ari kufambisa nyaya iyi, VaAlec Muza, vati havana mvumo yekutaura nezvenyaya iyi nevatori venhau kubva kune wavari kumirira. No media source currently available
title: MDC-T Inoti Yotarisira Kudzorwa kweMidziyo Yakabvutwa neChikonzi

text: Mutungamiriri wenyikaVaEmerson Mnangagwa, avo vari ku Davos, Swirtzerland, kumusangano we World Economic Forum (WEF), nhasi vatungamira musangano weFriends of African Continental Free Trade Area.  VaMnangagwa vange vaine vamwe nevatungamiri venyika dzemuAfrica vanoti VaPaul Kagame veRwanda, VaLazarus Chakwera vekuMalawi uye VaHage Geingob vekuNamibia. Musangano uyu waitwa pakudya kwemangwanani nevatungamiriri venyika dzakasiyana siyana, vakuru vemasangano akazvimiririria, vakuru vemakambani nevanobata zvigaro zvemasangano makuru epasi rese. Gurukota rinoona nezvemaindasitiri Amai Sekai Nzenza vanoti Zimbabwe ine chivimbo chekuti ichakwanisa kukwezva vemabhizimisi vekunze kuti vazouchika mari munyika. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachishanda nesangano reThe Economists Zimbabwe, VaGideon Mabhunu havaone paine chinobuda kumusangano uyu vachiti nyika inofanora kutanga yagadzirisa mumusha isati yaenda kunze. Izvi zvatsinhirwa neimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvemabhizimisi vari mukuru wesangano reCEO Round Table Zimbabwe VaKipson Gundani vatiwo nyaya dzezvirango zvakatemerwa vatungamiri venyika zvinopa kuti kukwezva vekunze kunetse. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvemabhizimisi, vari mukuru we sangano reZimbabwe Institute of Directors, Doctor Proctor Nyemba vanoti shuviro ye mabhizimisi ndeyekuti pabude chinobatika mukupera kwemusangano uyu. Vemapato anopikisa nedzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vari kuti musangano uyu uchatosiya Zimbabwe yanyura muzvikwereti nekuti wose anoenda kumusangano weWorld Economic Forum anofanira kubhadhara mari inosvika zviuru gumi nemakumi mapfumbamwe kana kuti 19 000 US Dollars. Mutungamiri wenyika nechikwata chake vari kunzwiwo vari kubhadhara mari inosvika zviuru makumi matatu zvemadhora ekuAmerica paawa kana kuti 30 000 per hour pakuhaya ndege. No media source currently available
title: VaMnangagwa Voenderera Mberi neMisangano kuDavos Vamwe Vachiti Ngavagadzirise Nhamo Yavasiya kuMusha

text: Hurumende inoti iri kushushukana zvakanyanya nekukura kuri kuita dambudziko remhirizhonga ine chekuita nevanhukadzi pamwe nevanhurume, kana kuti Gender Based Violence. Vachitaura pamusangano wavaita nevatori venhau muHarare senzira yekugadzirira kutanga kwekucherechedzwa kwemazuva gumi nematanhatu ekurwisa mhirizhonga iyi, mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvevanhukadzi nekusimudzirwa kwemabhizimusi madiki, Amai Jennifer Mhlanga, vati dambudziko iri rakakura zvakanyanya huye munhu wese anofanirwa kuzvipira kurirwisa kuitira kuti ripere munyika. Amai Mhlanga vatiwo denda reCovid-19 rakawedzerawo kukwira kwe mhirizhonga iyivakatikuroodzwawo kwevana vasati vabve zera kwakakwirawo zvakanyanya. Amai Mhlanga vatiwo mapurisa emunyika akazivisa kuti gore rino kubva muna Kubvumbi kusvika muna Chikumi, mapurisa akatambira vamhangari vemhando iyi yemhirizhonga zviuru zvina nezana nemakumi mashanu nevatatu. Vatiwo munguva imwe chete iyi kwakamhangarwa mhosva chiuru chimwe chete nemazana maviri nemakumi masere nepfumbamwe dzine chekuita nekubatwa kwevanhu chibharo . Munyori mubazi iri, VaMoses Mhike, vatsinhirawo vakati nyika inofanirwa kukoshesa kupedza nyaya yemhirizhonga iyi. VaMhike vatiwo nyika haigoni kuenderera mberi kana madzimai achiri kushungurudzwa munyika. Vatiwo zvakakosha kuziva kuti mhirizhonga iyi haibati vanhukadzi chete sezvo varumewo vari kushungurudzwawo. Vachitaura pamusangano uyu, vakafanobata chigaro chemumiririri weUnited Nations muZimbabwe, VaAlex Gasasira, vatiwo dambudziko remhirizhonga yakadai riri kukwira uye mapazi eUnited Nations akazvipira kushanda nehurumende mukupedza dambudziko iri. Mazuva gumi nematanhatu ekurwisa mhirizhonga iyi anotanga mangwana kusvika musi wa10 Zvita. Hurumende yati kunyange hazvo ichaita zviitiko zvakawanda pamazuva aya, zuva guru richange riri mangwana apo vachaenda kumusha weEpworth kunovhura One Stop Center, iyo ichange ichibatsiravanhu vanoshungurudzwa. Kuchavhurwawomusikauchabatsira madzimai akarasikirwa nemabasa nekuda kweCovid-19. Zimbabwe yave nenzvimbo nhanhatu dzinobatsira vanenge vasangana nemhirizhonga iyi idzo dzakaumbwa kuburikidza nerubatsiro rwunobva kumasangano akasiyana siyana pamwe neUnited Nations. No media source currently available
title: Hurumende Inoti Iri Kushushikana neNyaya yeMhirizhonga

text: Vashandi vehurumende dzenyika dzemuAfrica vari kusangana kuVictoria Falls kwemazuva matatu, kutanga nezuro, Muvhuro. Musangano uyu ndewekucherechedza kukosha kwemabasa anobatwa nevashandi vehurumende muAfrica yose. Musangano uyu, uyo wakarongwa nesangano reAfrican Union, ndewechisere kuitwa, uye uri kupindwa nevamiriri vanobva kunyika pfumbamwe chete. Dzimwe nyika dzose dziri kutevera musangano uyu kuburikidza nedandemutande nekuda kwemitemo inodzivirira kupararira kweCovid-19, iyo inorambidza kuungana kwevanhu vakawanda. Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaConstantino Chiwenga, ndivo vakavhura musangano uyu zviri pamutemo nezuro vachitauramashoko avo padandemutande vari muHarare. VaChiwenga vakakurudzira kuti vashandi vehurumende vange vachipiwawo mihoro inovagutsa, vachiti hurumende yavo iri kugadzirisa zvichemo zvevashandi vayo kuburikidza nekuita nhaurirano .Nyika dzine vamiriri kumusangano uyu dzinosanganisira Zimbabwe, South Africa, Rwanda, Kenya, Algeria, Tanzania neZambia. Mutevedzeri wemunyori mukuru wesangano rinomirira vashandi vehurumende re Zimbabwe Confederation of Public Sector Trade Unions, VaGibosn Mushangu, avo vari kuVictoria Falls, vanoti musangano uyu wakavakoshera zvakanyanya sezvo uchivapa mukana wekudzidzawo kubva kune vamwe vashandi vemuAfrica. No media source currently available
title: Vashandi veHurumende dzemuAfrica Voita Musangano weMazuva Matatu kuVictoria Falls

text: Gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu munyika vachishanda nesangano reHuman Rights Watch VaDewa Mavhinga vanoti mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe havafanire kurambira pachigaro vachiti vachena vangazodzoka. VaMugabe vakataura mashoko aya nemusi weChishanu kumhemberero dzekusvitsa makore zana kweUniversity of Fort Hare kuEastern Cape, South Africa kunova kwavakadzidza. VaMugabe vakati varikuramba vari panyanga nenyaya yekuti vakabva vapambepfumi vanodzoka votanga kutungamira nyika. Vakati vakaramba vari pachigaro hazvife zvakaita kuti vachena vade kudzoka zvekare. VaMugabe ndivo mutungamiri wenyika akwegura kudarika vamwe vose pasi rino sezvo vave nemakore makumi mapfumbamwe nemaviri.  No media source currently available  Munyori mukuru musangano reZimbabwe National Students Union VaMakomborero Haruzivishe vashora VaMugabe nekuramba vachitumira vadzidzi kuFort Hare vamwe vari munyika vachinonga svosve nemuromo. VaHaruzivishe vanoti pane huori hwakanyanya hunoitwa pakupa vadzidzi mukana wekuenda kuFort Hare. No media source currently available
title: VaMugabe Voshorwa neKurambira paChigaro Vachiti Varungu Vanogona Kudzoka

text: Vamwe vagari vemudunhu reMasvingo pamwe nemamwe matunhu munyika vane hama dzinoshandira mudunhu reCabo Delgado kuMozambique uko kune hondo iri kukonzerwa nechikwata chinopfuririkidza mwero vanoti vave kugara vakabartira hana mumaoko. Hondo iyi iri kukonzerwa nechikwata chinopfurikidza mwero chinodyidzana neIslamic State kana kut ISIS. Nyaya yekusagadzikana muhana kwevakawanda muMasvingo iri kuuya apo chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe VaNyasha Mugwagwa vaishanda mudunhu rine hupfumi hwezviwanikwa zvakaita semafuta edzimotokari negas reCabo Delgado chapondwa nevarwi veISIS ava masvondo maviri adarika. Vakawanda muMasvingo zvikuru kuChiredzi kwakaganhurana neMozambique vanoti vane hama dzakawanda dziri muMozambique dzimwe dziri munyika iyi zvisiri pamutemo. Mumwe mugari wekwaMajange, Amai Docas Maruta, vane mwana anoshandira mudhorobha rePemba kudunhu Cabo Delgado, vanoti vanogara vachityira mwana wavo kunyange vachigara vachitaura naye parunhare. Izvi zvatsinhirwawo, naVaCaleb Mambo, avo vane munin’ina anoshandira kuPalma kwakapiswa nekugurwa vanhu misoro.\n\nMugari wekuRujeko, VaNickson Kwirirai, vati hurumende inofanira kuita chirongwa chekuchengetedza nekubudisa zvizvarwazvayo zviri muCado del gado. Munyori mubazai rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, Ambassador James Manzou, mumashoko avakatura kuvatori venhau svondo rapera vakati hurumende iri kushanda nenyika yeMozambique pamwe nemakambani eikoko kuti vawane mazita evanhu vemuZimbabwe vari kushandira kwamuka hondo uku kuti vava batsire. Vakakurudzira vanhu munyika vane hama dziri kushaikwa kudunhu reCabo Delgado kunyanya kuguta rePalma kuti vabate bazi ravo vabatsirikane pakutsvakwa kw vadikani vavo. Vamwe vagari vemudunhu reManicalanda kunyanya kuChipinge kunovawo nemuganhu neMozambique zvekare vanoti vari kutyirawo hama dzavo dzinogaroenda nekushandira kuMozambique. Mukuru wesangano rePlatform for Youth and Community Development kuChipinge, VaClaris Madhuku, vanoti vanhu vanogara pedyo nemiganhu neMozambique kuChipinge, vakutyirawo kuti zvikwata zviri kuita hondo zvichapedzisira zvosvika munzvimbo dzavo. Hondo irii kuMozambique inonzi yakaita kuti vanhu vanopfuura zviuru mazana manomwe vatize misha yavo uye vatarisane nenzara. Vatungamiri vesangano renyika dzekuchamhembe kweAfrica reSADC vakatotenderana kuti vapindire vachibatsira Mozambique. Nyika yeSouth Africa yakatombotumira mauto kunonunura zvizvarwa zvayo zvainge zvapinda munjodzi nekuda kwehondo iyi. Tichiri panyaya iyi, Marvellous Mhlanga-Nyahuye weStudio 7 akaitawo hurukuro nechimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chainge chiri kuabo Del Gado VaDomingos Manhise. No media source currently available No media source currently available No media source currently available
title: Vari kuMasvingo neChipinge Votyira Hama Dzavo Dziri Kushanda kuCabo Delgado kuMozambique

text: Mhuri dzinopfuura gumi nembiri dzinosanganisira yaVaPhilemon Johwani Kambeni avo vane madzimai gumi nemana neMuvhuro dzakaungana pamuzinda wamudzviti weMutare VaCosmas Chiringa dzichiratidzira nekutsutsumwa kwadzo nenyaya uekushayirwa dzimba dzekugara dzinovakwanira kubva padzakatamiswa kuenda kuArda Transau dzichibva kwaChiadzwa. Mhuri idzi dziri kusungirwa kubuda mudzimba dzavakabvuta kuArda Transau idzo dzaifanirwa kunge dzichigarwa nevadzidzisi, Asi kambani iyi yakakwira kumatare zvakapa kuti mhuri idzi dzitumirwe masamanisi ekuti dzibude mudzimba idzi. Asi mhuri idzi dzakabva dzatakura mikwende ndokuenda pamuzinda wamudzviti weMutare VaCosmas Chiringa uri pedyo nenzvimbo inokwirirwa mabhazi yeMurahwa vaine vana vacheche, madzimai nevakweguru uye tutundu tune mbatya, dzekupfeka zvekudya pamwechete nehuni. Parizvino vanhu ava vagere pagedhe rinopinda pamuzinda wamudzviti. VaKambeni vaudza Studio 7 kuti vauya pamuzinda waMudzviti nemamwe emadzimai avo kuzoisa musasa senzira yekutaridza nyunyuto yavo nekusagadziriswa kwedambudziko rekushaya pekugara panokwanira madzimai avo. VaKambeni vanoti mhuri yavo ine madzimai anokwana gumi nemana avo vainge vakavimbiswa kuwanirwa imba pamudzimai woga woga asi izvi zvakava zviroto. Vanoti panguva ino vatove nechinangwa chekugara pamuzinda uyu kudzimara nyaya yavo yagadziriswa. Vanoti chimwe chiri kuvarwadza inyaya yekuti vakanyorerwa masamanisi ekuti vange vabuda mudzimba dzinofanirwa kunge dzichigara vadzidzisi nemusi weChipiri. Nemusi uyu zvakare vari kutarisirwa kunge vachimiswa pamberi pemutongi wedare pamusoro pemasamanisi avakapihwa. Vamwe vari pamuzinda waMudzviti ndiAmai Elizabeth Gamera. Amai Gamera ichirikadzi uye vanoti zvichitevera masamanisi avakanyorerwa ekuti vabude mudzimba idzi havana kumwe kwekuenda. VaJingo Mangiza mumwe wevanhu vari pamuzinda waMudzviti maMutare avo vanoti havanachina kumwe kwekuenda, uye vanoda kuti mudzviti avape pekugara sekuvimbiswa kwavakaitwa pavakatamiswa kubva kwaChiadzwa. Mudzviti weMutare VaChiringa vanoti dambudziko remhuri iri rinozivikanwa nevakuru vemuhurumende kunyanya kuhofisi yekwa Provincial Administrator, VaFungai Mbetsa uye kugurukota rezvekutongwa kwedunhu reManicaland muzvare Mandi Chimene. VaChiringa vanoti hofisi yavo yakamboedza kubatsira mhuri yaVaKambeni nevamwe vavo asi vaingoita zvokusarura pekugara vachisiya nguva ichifamba dzimba dzichipera. Kambani yeAnjin Investments yakavimbisa dzimba dzinokwanirana dzakatamiswa asi izvi hazvina kuzozadzikiswa pavakatamiswa. Mhuri dzinosvika churu nemakumi matatu dzakatamiswa nemakambani anochera mangoda anosanganisira matatu anoti Anjin, Mbada Diamonds, uye Diamond Mining Company DMC. Asi makambani aya kusvika parizvino pane zvimwe zvakawanda zvaasati akwanisa kuzadzikisa mhuri dzakatamiswa idzi zvinosanganisira dzimba dzakaringana, minda yekurima yemadiridzo, mafuro ezvipfuyo, chikoro, chipatara uye kuwanira mabasa vanhu venharaunda iyi. Gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu vachishanda neZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights Amai-Peggy Tavagadza vanoti vachapikisa mudare neChipiri kutandwa kwemhuri idzi mudzimba dzinonzi ndedzevadzidzisi. No media source currently available Chimwe chonetsawo pakuzadzikiswa kwezvivimbiso izvi inyayay yehurumende yekuti mangoda ave kupera zvekuti hakuna kana kobiri rowanikwa kwaChiyadzwa.
title: Vanhu VekwaChiyadzwa Voratidzira neKushaya peKugara

text: Apo pasi rose riri kushushikana nekuchinja kwemamiriro ekunze, uko kwave kukonzera kusanaya zvakanaka kwemvura, vamwe varimi vekuLupane vari kukwanisa kuramba vachirima zvisinei nekushomeka kwemvura vachidhandisa hunyanzvi hunoita kuti vazive huwandu hwemvura inodiwa muzvirimwa zvavo -kana kuti climate-smart technology muChirungu. Amai Linda Ncube, avo vane makore makumi mashanu nemasere ekuberekwa vanoratidza kufara vachibatsirwa nevamwe kupepeta nekupakicha mumasaga goho ravo regorosi. Amai Ncube ndeimwe yenhengo makumi matanhatu nemumwe dzeTshongokwe Irrigation Scheme iyo iri kumaruwa ekuLupane mudunhu reMatabeleland North. Varimi vemubatanidzwa uyu vaive vambomira kurima gorosi kwemakore matatu apfuura nekuda kwekushomeka kwemvura yavanoshandisa kudiridzira kubva mudhamu reTshongokwe. Kunyange havo vachifara kuti vakawana goho rakanaka regorosi, Amai Ncube vanoshushikana nenyaya yekuti mvura yemudhamu inokasika kupera nekuda kwekusanaya zvakanaka kwave kuita mvura uyewo nekuti vanodiridzira minda yavo vachishandisa migero izvo vanoti zvinopedza mvura yakwanda. Nekuda kwekuona dambudziko rekushaikwa kwemvura paTshongokwe, mamwe masangano anoshanda akazvimirira ega ari pasi pemubatanidzwa weSizimele Consortium, achitungamirwa nesangano reDanChurchAid reluDenmark, akachera migodhi miviri iyo yave kushandiswa nevarimi kudiridzira nenzira yedrip irrigation, chimwe chikamu chemahekita makumi maviri nemana chinorimwa nevarimi ava Pasi pachirongwa chimwe chete varimi ava vakadzidziswawo kushandisa michina midiki uye isinganetse kushandisa, uye Amai Ncube vanoti izvi zviri kuvabatsira mukurima kwavo. Amai Kethiwe Ndlovu ndeimwe nhengo yeTshongokwe Irrigation Scheme. Amai Ndlovu vanotsinhira kuti kushandisa ruzivo rwechizvino-zvino kuri kubatsira kuti varimi nenzira inovabatsira kuti vachengetedze mvura vachikwanisawo kurima zvirimwa zvakasiyana siyana kana zvichienzaniswa nemarimiro avachiita kare. Kunze kwekurima zvirimwa zvakadai sechibage negorosi, varimi veTshongokwe vave kurimawo muriwo, madomasi, mabutternut magake nebhinzi izvo vanotengesa kuHwange, Victoria Falls neBulawayo. Varimi ava vanorima minda mina uye munda mumwe chete mahekita matanhatu nechidimbu, murimi mumwe chete aine chidimbu chake muminda iyi. Amai Ndlovu avo vaimbogara nemurume wavo muguta reBulawayo vanoti zvisinei nedambudziko rekushomeka kwemvura vanoona vachiwana pundutso mukurima. VaChristopher Moyo avo vane makore makumi mana nemashanu ekuberekwa vakasiya basa ravaiita rekuchengetedza nzvimbo muguta reBulawayo makore gumi apfuura kuti vavewo nhengo yeTshongokwe Irrigation Scheme. Vanhurume vechidiki vakawanda munzvimbo dzemumatunhu ekuMatabeleland vanowanzoenda kunotsvaga mafuro manyoro kuSouth Africa neBotswana asi VaMoyo vanoti havana kumboita pfungwa iyi. Senzira yekuvandudza chirongwa chekurima kuchishandiswa ruzivo runoita kuti varimi varime zvine hungwaru, paTshongokwe lane inonzi muChirungu automated weather station iyo inoshandisa magetsi anobva kusimba rezuva. Nzvimbo iyi inoongorora zvose zvine chekuita nemamiriro ekunze kusanganisira kupisa kana kutonhora, kunaya kwemvura nekuvhuvhuta kwemhepo. Zvose izvi zvinotumirwa necomputer iri pachiteshi ichi zuva nezuva kumuzinda weMeteorological Services kuHarare uye muzinda uyu unozozvishandisa kuzivisa varimi ava nezvemamiriro ekunze. VaThandanani Ndlovu murimisi nebazi reAgritex kuLupane. Vanoti zvose zviri kuitika izvi zvinobatsira varimi zvikuru nekuti vanokwanisa kukohwa pakuru vasina kushandisa mari mari yakawanda. Zimbabwe yave nemakore akawanda yakatarisana nedambudziko renzara nekuda kwezvikonzero zvakawanda kusanganisira kusanaya zvakanaka kwemvura. Chikamu chesangano reUN cheUnited Nations Development Programme chinoti gore rakapera vanhu vanosvika mamiriyoni manomwe nezviuru mazana manomwe vaive vakatarisana nenzara munyika. Dzimwe nyannzvi dzinoti kushandisa hunyanzvi hwechizvinozvino kunogona kubatsira zvikuru kuti varimi varwise kushanduka kuri kuita mamiriro ekunze. No media source currently available
title: Varimi vekuLupane Vokohwa Pakuru neKushandisa Hunyanzvi Hutsva Mukurima

text: Vazhinji vane zvekuita nemotikari neavo vanotenga nekutengesa motikari muZimbabwe vari kuti mutemo mutsva wakadzikwa nehurumende svondo rapera wave kuvakanganisa, zvikuru makambani eavo vanotengesa motikari sezvo vasisakwanisi kufambisa motikari dzekutengesa kubva kumabhodha eZimbabwe kuenda kumaguta kwavanoda kuendesa motikari mukati menyika. Svondo rapera, hurumende yakadzika mutemo wekuti motokari dzisina kunyoreswa kana dzisina ma ‘number plates’, hadzichabvumidzwa pa ma’tollgate’ munyika. Muzvinabizimisi, VaObert Masvotore, avo vanotengesa dzimotokari, vanokurudzira hurumende kuti dai yambomisa mutemo uyu kuti ipe vanhu nguva yekugadzirira sezvo ma’number plates’ asiri kuwanikwa nekukurumidza kubva ku Central Vehicle Registry. Vatiwo vanhu vazhinji havasi kukwanisi kuwana mari yekunze inodiwa neCentral Vehicle Registry kana munhu achida kutenga ma’number plates’ emotokari yake. Taedza kubata gurukota rinoona nezvekubudiswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, pamwe chete nemunyori mubazi rezvekubudiswa kwemashoko, VaNick Mangwana, asi vese havana kukwanisa kudaira nharembozha dzavo kana kupindura mibvunzo yatavatumira. No media source currently available
title: Hurumende Yokurudzirwa Kumbomisa Mutemo Unorambidza Motokari Dzisati Dzanyoreswa

text: Seneta wemuAmerica anomirira dunhu reArizona, VaJeff Flake, avo vanova zvakare sachigaro wekomiti yedare reSeneti inoona nezvekudyidzana nenyika dzemuAfrica, vaburitsa mashoko anotevera zvichitevera sarudzo dzakaitwa muZimbabwe musi waChikunguru 30, 2018. “Mumazuva akawanda apfuura, ndakaita rombo rakanaka kuongorora sarudzo dzemuZimbabwe. Zvichitevera makore akawanda ehutongi husina kunaka hwaVaRobert Mugabe, Zimbabwe inofanirwa kuva nehurumende inoremekedza vanhu vayo. “Zvichitevera kuvhota murunyararo musi waChikunguru 30, mhirizhonga yakaitika musi Nyamavhuvhu1, iyo yakatora hupenyu hwevanhu vatanhatu, uye ikakuvadzisa vanhu vakawanda, yakadzora nyika shure kumakore ekare. “Kushandiswa kwemauto mukupindira kana kumisa mhirizhonga yezvematongerwo enyika, kanawo kushandiswa kwesimba rakanyanya remapurisa mukuvhiringidza misangano yemapato ezvematongerwo enyika nevatori venhau, hazviratidzi gwara idzva rehurumende, asi kuti zvinoratidza maungira emanyakare anotyiwa nevakawanda.   “Senzira yekuti vanhu vavimbe nezvakabuda musarudzo, Zimbabwe Electoral Commission inofanirwa kuzadzisa vimbiso yayo yekuburitsa zvose zvakabuda musarudzo nenzira iri pachena inosanganisira zvose zvakabuda panzvimbo yekuvhotera uye zvakaiswa runyoro nevese vaimirira vaikwikwidza vakaona kuverengwa nekupenengurwa kwezvakabuda musarudzo. "Zvipingaidzo zvakasanganwa nazvo musarudzo zvinofanirwa kugadziriswa nenzira dzakatarwa nemitemo. “Apo ndaishanyira nzvimbo dzakawanda dzaivhoterwa munyika yose kumaruwa emuZimbabwe, ndakaona zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe, vechidiki nevakwegura vachifamba nzendo dzakarebesa vachienda kunovhota.  “Ndakaona vamiriri veZanu PF neveMDC Alliance vakagara vose vachitaura vachiwirirana pamwe nekubatsirana kuti huwandu hwevanhu vavhota huburitse chokwadi. “Munhu wese wandakasangana naye munguva iyi, ndakaona muzviso zvavo ramangwana rakajeka renyika, uye rine hutongo hwejekerere nebudiriro yakanaka yeremangwana eZimbabwe. “Ndinokushuvirai kuti remangwana racho rakajeka, rava kusvika.”
title: Seneta Jeff Flake Voshuvira Zimbabwe reMangwana Rakajeka

text: Nhepfenyuro yeStudio7 yasvitsa makore gumi nemana itipfenyura zviri kuitika muZimbabwe. Vanhu vazhinji munyika vanoti vari kufarira zvikuru nhepfeunyuro iyi, vamwe vachiti Studio7 inofanira kuwedzera nguva dzekutepfemyura. Asi vamwe vanoti Studio7 inofanira kutepfenyura iri munyika sezviri kuitwa nedzimwe nhepfenyuro vachiti pari zvino zvairi kuita zviri kunze kwemutemo. Mutauriri weMDC inotungamirirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai, VaObert Gutu, vakorokotedza Studio7 nekusvitsa kwayaita makore gumi nemana iri pamhepo. VaGutu nevamwe vakawanda munyika vanosanganisira vanhuwo zvavo, pamwe nemasangano akazvimirira, vanoti Studio7, inhepfenyuro inopa vanhu vese mukana wekutaura zvisinei nekuti vakarerekera divi ripi. Mumwe mugari wemuHarare, Amai Winnie Mambo, vanoti Studio7 inhepfenyuro inovapa nhau dzakasiyana nedzimwe nhau dzavanonzwa pane dzimwe nhepfenyuro dzemuZimbabwe. Vanotiwo vanonzwa paStudio7 nhau dzezvinhu zvinotika munyika dzichipakurwa pachena. Mutauriri weMDC inotungamirirwa naVaWelshman Ncube, VaKurauone Chihwai, vanoti Studio7 inhepfenyuro inowanzopa mukana kumapato ese ezvematongerwo enyika uye inosvikawo kunzvimbo zhinji munyika dzisingasvikwe nedzimwe nhepfenyuror dziri munyika. VaGutu vanoti mukurumbira une Studio7 kumaruwa unoratidza kune inofarirwa neveruzhinji zvakanyanya. Asi kunyange hazvo paine mufaro nemabasa eStudio7, vakawanda vanotiwo dai nhepfenyuro iyi yavandudzawo mashandiro ayo. Asi Amai Mambo vanoti nhepfunyuro yeStudio 7 iri kuwanza nyaya dzemuHarare uye dai yatepfenyurawo nhau dzekumaruwa. Ukuwo VaChihwai vanoti shuviro yavo ndeyekuti dai Studio7 yatepfenyurawo nemimwe mutauro inotaurwa munyika. VaGutu vanoti kunyange hazvo pane nhepfenyuro dzakawanda dzakapihwa marezenisi makore mashonana apfuura, nhepfenyuro idzi dzinenge dzinotaura neizwi rimwe chete. Chikumbiro chaVa Gutu nebato ravo ndechekuti dai yawedzera nguva yekutepfenyura uyewo kuti dai yatepfenyura nemimwe mitauro yakaita seVenda, Tonga nemimwe. Mumwe wevechidiki muHarare, VaDenford Ngadziore, vanoti dai Studio7 yatotanga terevhizheni chaiyo. Asi nhengo yeZanu PF zvakare vachimirira Makonde muparamende, VaKindness Paradza, vanoti ivo nebato ravo havafariri Studio7 nekuti inotepfenyura zvisiri pamutemo uye ichitepfenyura kubva kunyika inovengana neZimbabwe. Vati Studio7 kana ichida kuwirirana nehurumende yeZanu PF, inofanira kunyoresa kuZimbabwe Media Commission yoshanda zviri pamutemo. Vati semaonero avo nhepfenyuro yeStudio7 inotaura manyepo uye inotsigira mapato anopikisa. Kunyange hazvo VaParadza vati bato ravo harifariri Studio7, vazhinji kusanganisira makurukota ehurumende, vatsigiri pamwe nenhengo dzeparamende, kusanganisira dzeZanu PF, dzinoteerera nhepfenyuro iyi, kana kutaura paStudio7. Asi VaParadza vanoti havanganyarari kana vabvunzwa mubvunzo. Asi veStudio7 vanoti vari kutepfenyura zviri pamutemo sezvinodiwa nemitemo yekutepfenyura pasi rose kunyange hazvo vamwe muhurumende yeZimbabwe vasingazvifarire. Mukuru weMedia Centre, VaEnerst Mudzengi, vanoti Studio7 inhepfenyuro iri kuita basa guru munyika zvikurusei pakupakuranhau dzine mativi ese mungava munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika, hupfumi nezvimwe. Vanoti dai zvaibvira nguva inotepfenyura Studio7 yawedzerwa. Mukuru weZimbabwe Democracy Institute, Doctor Pedzisai Ruhanya, avo vaive mutapi wenhau kuDaily News apo pakatanga Studio7 muna 2003, vanoti nhepfenyuro iyi yakaita basa guru panyaya yekuburitsa nyaya yeZimbabwe. VaRuhanya vanobvumirana naVaMudzengi vachiti Studio7 iri kutorwadzisa vateereri vayo nekutepfenyura kwenguva pfupi. Vanoti dai Studio7 yaitawo nhau dzemangwanani nemasikati kwete kutepfenyura manheru chete. VeMedia Insitute of Southern Africa - Zimbabwe Chapter, vatenda zvikuru Studio7 nekuramba yakashinga nebasa ravo zvisinei nekuti hurumende yakamira mira zvikuru sei panguva yehurumende yemubatanidzwa kuti nhepfenyuro iyi ivharwe. Vanoona nezvekushambadzwa kwezvirongwa musangano iri, VaTabani Moyo, vanoti chimwe chasimbisa Studio7 inyaya yekuti nhepfunyuro iyi yaramba ichiburitsa nyaya dzinofarirwa neveruzhinji. Vatsinhirawo mashoko evamwe ekuti Studio7 inofanirawo kupinda mumaruwa ichiburitsa nyaya dzevanhu vakawanda munzvimbo idzi avo vari kushaya kwekutaura nhunha dzavo. Vatiwo kunyange hazvo munyika mave nenhepfenyuro dzakawanda, zhinji dzacho dzakarerekera divi rimwe izvo zvisingabatsire nyika neveruzhinji. Studio7 yakaparurwa nechirongwa cheChirungu musi wa 27 Ndira, 2003 apo zvinhu zvakange zvakaoma munyika munyaya dzekutora nhau, kutepfenyura pamwe nekufambiswa kwemashoko munyika. Zvirongwa zveNdebele neShona zvakazotanga kutepfenyurwa musi wa 7 Kubvumbi 2003. No media source currently available
title: Studio7 Inosvitsa Makore Gumi neMana Ichitepfenyura

text: Vechidiki veZimbabwe neve kune dzimwe nyika dzemu Africa vari muchirongwa cheMandela Washington Fellowship kana kuti YALI vapedzisa zvidzidzo zvavo kuzvikoro zvepamusoro soro zvakasiyana siyana muAmerica. Vechidiki ava vave kutarisirwa kudzokera kunyika dzavo svondo rinotevera mushure mekusangana nemutungamili wenyika yeAmerica VaBarack Obama. Kubva kuZimbabwe kune vechidiki vanosvika makumi matanhatu vange vari muchirongwa ichi. Vakapedza zvidzidzo zvavo kuchikoro cheWilliam and Marry University kuVirginia vanobva kuZimbabwe nemusi ndiVaAbel Chemura, VaTerry Mutsvanga naMuzvare Tinashe Mutsonziwa. Vatatu ava vanoti vakadzidza zvakawanda zvakanangana nehutungamiri hwejekerere, kuremekedzwa kwekodzero dzevanhu nezvimwe zvakawandawanda. VaMutsvanga, avo vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu vachishandisa mafirimu avanogadzira vanoti vavhurwa maziso pane zvakawanda. Vanoti zveZimbabwe inofanirwa kusimbisa nyaya dzekuremekedzwa kwekodzero dzevanhu. Vachemura, avo vanova mudzidzisi kuChinhoyi University of Technology, vanoti vadzidzawo zvakawanda. Mumwe wechitatu muzvare Tinashe Mutsonziwa vanorwirawo kodzero dzevanhukadzi uye vanoshanda neafrican union. Vachitaura pakupedza zvidzidzo zvavo Muzvare Mutsonziwa vakati vechidiki vanofanirwa kurwira kodzero dzavo sezvo vari ivo musimboti webudiriro neremangwana. No media source currently available
title: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe Zvopedza Zvidzidzo muAmerica Zvotarisira Kusangana naVaObama

text: Vanamukoti navanachiremba vanga vasati vawana mari dzavo dzemabhonasi vanonzi vatanga kuwana mari idzi mumabhanga avo. Mutungamiri wesangano ravanachiremba, reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association, Doctor Fortune Nyamande, vanoti nhengo dzavo dzatanga kuwana mari dzemabhonasi idzi. Sangana ravana mukoti reZimbabwe Nurses Association mudunhu reHarare rakanga razivisa kuti nhengo dzaro dzaizoramwa mabasa kana hurumende ikakundikana kubhadhara mari dzavo dzemabhonasi. Gurukota rezvevashandi, Amai Priscah Mupfumira, vanonzi vavimbisa kuti vashandi vehurumende vasara vose vasati vawana mari dzavo dzebhonasi vachadzitambira musi wa 23 Ndira rinova svondo rinouya nemusi weChishanu. Zvichakadaro, hutungamiri hwesangano remubatanidzwa wemasangano evashandi vehurumemnde reApex Council, hwasangana negurukota idzva rezvevashandi nemabasa, Amai Mupfumira, muchiitiko chinonzi changa chakanangana nekuti vazivane. Vakafanobata chigaro chasachigaro weApex Council uye vari mutungamiri wePublic Service Association, Amai Cecilia Alexander, vanoti musangano uyu wavapawo mukana wekusvitsa zvinetswa zvavo kuna Amai Mupfumira uye vanoti vafadzwa zvikuru nekutambirwa kwavaitwa pamwe nekutambirwa kwaitwa zvichemo zvavo izvo vanoti zvanzi zvichatariswa. Amai Alexander vanotiwo musangano uyu wajekesawo pamusoro pekusavepo kwemisangano yeNational Joint Negotiating Council, iyo inoitwa pakati pehurumende nevashandi vayo. Hatina kukwanisa kubata Amai Mupfumira kuti tinzwewo divi ravo panyaya iyi. No media source currently available
title: Bhonasi yaVanamukoti Yazobhadharwa

text: Mutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica VaDonald Trump vatura mashoko kunyika yavo kumuzinda wavo weWhite House muWashington DC vachiti vamwe vapoteri vave kukanganisa magariro evanhu nekuponda uye kutengesa zvinodhaka. VaTrump vanoti nekuda kwemabasa akaipa aya vave kuda kuti pavakwe mudhuri kumuganhu weAmerica neMexico. Mexico iri kuchamhembe kweAmerica uye kunopinda vanhu vanenge vachibva kunyika dzakaita se El Salvado, Hondurus nedzimwe kuzopotera. Asi vebato rinopikisa remaDemocrats vanoti aya haasi mashoko echokwadi. Kunetsana kwaVaTrump nemaRepublicans kwapa kuti hurumende yeAmerica ivhare mamwe mapazi sezvo bhajeti risati ratambirwa naVaTrump. VaTrump vanoti vari kuda mari inosvika mabhiriyoni mabhiriyoni mashanu kuti vavake mudhuri uyu vachiti izvi zvikasaitwa havasi kuzoisa runyoro rwavo pabhajeti. Izvi zzvapa kuti mamwe mapazi ehurumende arambe akavharwa. Vashandi vehurumende vanosvika zviuru zvisere vari kungoenda kumabasa asi vasingatambiriswe mari. VaTrump vati kunetsana uku kuri kukonzerwa nevebato remaDemocrats VaTrump vati vanhu vemuAmerica vari kufa nenyaya yevanhu vari kungopinda munyika mavo zvisina mvumo vaine zvinodhaka. VaTrump vatiwo vana vadiki nemadzimai vanenge vachida kuzotsvaga hupoteri muAmerica vari kutyorerwa kodzero dzavo. Vatiwo vamwe vari kupinda munyika yeAmerica zvisiri pamutemo vari kuponda nekubata chibharo. Mutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica vatiwo mangwana vanenge vachisangana nevedare reCongress kuti vayedze kuita nhaurirano dzekuti vavhure mapazi ehurumende akavharwa. Asi vachipindura mashoko aya, mutauriri wedare reHouse of Representatives vari nhengo yemaDemocrats Amai Nancy Pelosi vati handi chokwadi kuti kune dambudziko kumuganhu weAmerica neMexico. Vatiwo VaTrump vari kubata hunhapwa vashandi vehurumende nekuti vashande vasingapihwe mari. Vanotungamira bato remaDemocrats mudare reSenate VaChuck Schumer vataura vachishoropodza mashoko aVaTrump. VaSchumer vati zviri kuitwa naVaTrump hazvienderana nezvinomirira nyika yeAmerica. Vatiwo zviri nani kuti hurumende ivhurwe nhaurirano dzichiitwa. Gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu Muzvare Lucy Chivasa vari kuTexas, muAmerica pasi pechirongwa cheHubert H. Humphrey Fellowship Program vaudza Studio 7 kuti America inokwanisa kungodzika mitemo inoomesera vanopinza vanhu mabasa vasina mapepa akakwana. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi Muzvinafundo Elliot Masocha vari kuOhio, muAmerica vati kunetsana uku nekuvharwa kwemamwe mapazi ehurumende kuri kukanganisa hupfumi hwenyika sezvo vashandi vehurumende vasingakwanise kutenga zvinhu zvakawanda kana vasina kutambiriswa. Mukuyedza kusimbisa nyaya yavo yekuvaka mudhuri uyu, VaTrump vatri kutarisirwa kushanyira guta reMcAllen kuTexas. Mamwe mapazi ehurumende ave nemavhiki matatu akavharwa. No media source currently available
title: VaTrump Vanoti Havasi Kuzodududza Pakuvaka Mudhuri Kunyangwe Mamwe Mapazi eHurumende Avharwa

text: Zimbabwe nemusi weMuvhuro yakabatana nedzimwe nyika mukucherechedza zuva rechirwere chepfari vanorarama nechirwere ichi munyika vanoti vanosangana nematambudziko akasiyana siyana kusanganisira kudhuura kwemishonga pamwe nekusarurwa. Muzvare Charity Mugawa vane makore makumi maviri nemaviri ekuberekwa vanoti vakabatwa chirwere chepfari vaine makore gumi nemanomwe uye vanotiwo vanhu vazhinji havanzwisise nezvechirwere ichi. Muzvare Mugawa vatiwo mishonga yepfari idambudziko guru munyika sezvo ichinetsa kuwana uye kudhura zvakanyanya. Izvi zvatsinhirwa naVaTaurai Kadzviti vanoshanda nesangano reEpilepsy Support Foundation Zimbabwe variwo mutungamiriri we Epilepsy Alliance Africa vachiraramawo nechirwere ichi. VaKadzviri vatiwo vazhinji vari kupedzisira vasingachanwi mushonga nenyaya yekudhura nekusawanikwa kwayo. VaKadzviti vatiwo kunyangwe hazvo muZimbabwe muchinzi pavanhu zvikamu zviviri kubva muzana vane chirwere chepfari vanoti vanofunga kuti huwandu hunodarika apa sezvo dzimwe mhando dzepfari dzisingaonekwi nemaziso. VaKadzviti vatiwo kurudziro yavo kuhurumende ndeyekuti mishonga yepfari igadzirwewo munyika. Nyanzvi munezvezvirwere zvepfungwa Dr Anesu Chinoperekwei vatsigirawo kuti mishonga idambudziko munyika zzvikuru kumaruwa. Dr Chinoperekwei vatiwo vanhu vanepfari vanosarurwawo nekusabatwa zvakanaka munharauda zhinji. Vatiwo chirwere ichi chinoitawo kuti vanhu vasakwanise kuita mamwe mabasa akadai sekutyaira kana kushandisa michina yakasiyana-siyana. Dr Chinoperekwei vakurudzirawo veruzhinji kuti vatsvake kubatsirwa kuzvipatara vachiti munhu akanwa mishonga anorarama hupenyu hwakanaka. Vatiwo munyika munodawo kuitwa dzidziso nezvechirwere ichi. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kubazi rezvehutano nezvechirwere chepfari ichi sezvo vanoona nezvezvirwere zvisingatapuriranwi mubazi rezvehutano Dr Justice Mudavanhu vakati titaure naDr Patience Mavunganidze mukuru anoona nezvezvirwere zvepfungwa. Dr Mavunganidze vati vaida kutanga vapiwa mvumo yekutaura nesu uye vanga vasati vapindura mibvunzo yedu pataenda pamhepo. Sangano reWorld Health Organisation rinoti munyika dzichiri kubudirira zvikamu makumi mapfumbamwe kubva muzana zvevanhu zvine chirwere chepfari hazvisi kuwana mishonga. Sangano iri rinotiwo muAfrica vanhu vanosvika mamiriyoni gumi vane chirwere ichi uyewo vanosarurwa nekuti vamwe vanofunga kuti chirwere ichi chinotapuriranwa. Zuva rechirwere chepfari iri rinocherechedzwa Muvhuro wepiri mumwedzi waKukadzi gore negore.
title: Zimbabwe Yobatana neDzimwe Nyika Kucherechedza Vanorarama neChirwere chePfari

text: Vagari vemuChinhoyi vanoti vari kurwadziwa nezvave kuita vanotengesa zvinhu avo vave kupa mitengo miviri kuchinhu chimwe chete nekuda kwekuti mumwe munhu anenge achitenga nema bond notes mumwe achitenga nemari yekuAmerica. Veruzhinji vanoti kupa mitengo miviri kuchinhu chimwe chete mucherechedzo wekuti mari yakaparurwa nebhanga guru renyika muna Mbudzi yema bond notes haina huremu hwakafanana nemari yekuAmerica. Vagari vemuChinhoyi ava vanoti zvave kuitika zvave kukonzera kuti mitengo yezvinhu ikwire sezvo mari yekuAmerica yave kuita shoma munyika. Mumwe mugari wemuChinhoyi, VaTonderai Makaya, vanoti mari yema bond notes yave kuita kuti zvinhu zvive nemitengo miviri uye kuti zvidhure sezvakamboitika nguva yakare yemugore ra2008. Mumwe mugari wemuChinhoyi, VaStewart Mwamuka, avo vanoita basa rekutakura vanhu nemotokari yavo, vanobvumirana naVa Makaya kuti mitengo miviri pachinhu uye kushandiswa kwemabond notes kwave kukwidza mitengo yezvinhu munyika. VaMakaya vanoti mabhangi ndiwo ari kukonzera kuipa kwezvinhu munyika sezvo vachiti munhu anoda kutumira kunze kwenyika anofanirwa kuunza mari yekuAmerica kunyange ane mari mubhangi vachiti ma bond notes. VaMakaya vanoti zvave pachena kuti manyepo ekuti mari yema bond notes ine huremu hwakafanana nemari yekuAmerica. VaMwamuka vanoti vanotengesawo vachibvuma makadhi kana kuti Swipe vari kubira vanhu sezvo vachiwedzera mitengo pazvinhu. Asi gurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, vakaudza paramende neChitatu kuti vati vese vasiri kubatwa zvakanaka nevezvitoro kana mabhangi vanofanira kuenda nehumbowo hwavo kubhanga guru renyika. Kushaikwa kwemari yekuAmerica munyika kwave kukonzera kuti mari yekuAmerica itengeswe pamisika mitema nekune rumwe rutivi kushandiswa kwemari yema bond notes kwave kukonzeresa kukwidzwa kwemitengo yezvinhu. No media source currently available
title: Kutenga neBond Note Kwava Kudhurira Vakawanda

text: Sangano ravanachipangamazano, reCato Institute riri mu Washington, D.C, muno muAmerica, neMuvhuro rakazeya nyaya yeZimbabwe, zvikuru matambudziko akatarisana nenyika, uye zvingaitwe mukugadzirisa nyaya dzezvehupfumi pamwe nezvematongerwo enyika. Nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi uye vachinyorera bepanhau reWashington Post, VaBarry Woods, avo vakange vari muZimbabwe pakapfurwa vanhu vamwe vakafa mushure mesarudzo dzegore rapera, vakati zvakakosha kuti hurumende ive nehutongo hwejecherere uye iremekedze kodzero dzevanhu kuitira kuti zvirango zvakatemerwa nyika zvibiswe. VaWoods vakaenderera mberi vachiti nguva haisati yanyatsokwana yekuti nyika dzekunze dzidyidzane neZimbabwe, sezvo pachiri nezvizhinji zvinoda kugadziriswa. Muzvinafundo Steve Hanke, avo vanodzidzisa paJohn Hopkins University, vakaudza musangano uyu kuti Zimbabwe inokwanisa kubuda mumadhaka mairi kana ikagadzirisa mimwe mitemo inombunyikidza kodzero dzevanhu panyaya yevhu nezviwewo, nekugadzirisa nyaya yehupfumi hwenyika. Professor Hanke vakaenderera mberi vachiti Zimbabwe inokwanisa kushandisa hwaro sehwakashandiswa nenyika yeSingapore, iyo yakakwanisa kubuda munyatwa yekuwondomoka kwehupfumi hwenyika yayakanga iri yakanga yakadzama kutodarika matambudziko akatarisana neZimbabwe. No media source currently available Vakashorawo zvirango zvehupfumi zvakatemerwa nyika, vakakurudzira hurumende dzekunze kuti dzibvise zvirango izvi sezvo zvisiri kubatsira kushandura zviri kuitika muZimbabwe. Chimwe chizvarwa chekuAfrica, VaGyude Moore, vakatsinhirawo zvakataurwa naMuzvinafundo Hanke pamusoro pezvirango zvakatemerwa nyika. Vachitaurawo pamusangano uyu, gurukota rezve mari Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube vakati hurumende yavo iri mushishi kugadzirisa mimwe mitemo kuti hupfumi hwenyika huvandudzike. Musangano uyu wakapindwa nenhengo dzemasangano akazvimirira, hurumende yeAmerica nezvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinogara muWashington D.C., kusanganisirawo Muzvare Pearl Matibe, avo vakati vakafadzwa nemafambiro aita musangano uyu. Asi vamwe vakapindawo mumusangano uyu vakati kana hurumende yeZimbabwe yakatevedzera zvakakurudzirwa nezvipangamazano zvakataura pamusangano uyu, nyika inokwanisa kusimuka zvakare ichimira yoga sezvayaive mumakore ekuma 1980 payakawana kuzvitonga kuzere.
title: Matambudziko eZimbabwe Anozeyiwa neNyanzvi kuCato Institute, kuAmerica

text: Gurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, vaudza paramende neChipiri kuti chikwereti chehurumende kunyika nemabhanga ekunze chichakwira kusvika pamabhiriyoni manomwe emadhora kana hurumende ikatora chikwereti chebhanga guru renyika sezvairi kuronga pasi pebhiri remutemo weReserver Bank Debt Assumption Bill. No media source currently available Vachitaura mudare reNational Assembly apo bhiri iri raverengwa kwechipiri, VaChinamasa vati chikwereti chekunze cheRBZ chave pamamiriyoni mazana matanhatu emadhora uye kana bhiri iri rikapasa zvinoreva kuti chikwereti chenyika chekunze chichakwira kubva pamabhiriyoni matanhatu nechidimbu kusvika pamabhiriyoni manomwe emadhora. Vatiwo kutorwa kwechikwereti cheRBZ nehurumende kuchakwidza chikwereti chehurumende chemukati menyika kusvika kubhiriyoni nechidimbu chemadhora kubva pamamiriyoni mazana mana nechidimbu. Asi VaChinamasa vati hurumende isati yatora chikwereti cheRBZ ichatanga yaongorora kuti chikwereti chakamira sei uye vati bazi rezvemari rave kutoita izvi. Bhanga reRBZ rakaita chikwereti che$1.35 billion apo raita mabasa asineyi naro, asi araitumwa nehurumende, kana kuti quasi fiscal, uye chikwereti ichi chave kutadzisa kuti bhanga iri rite basa raro remazvo. Mamwe mabasa aiitwa nebhanga iri pasi pechirongwa ichi kutenga zvekurimisa, matarakita, motokari nezvimwe richizvipa kuvanhu pachena. Pasi pemutemo uri kuzeyiwa muparamende hurumende iri kuda kutura mutoro kubva kuRBZ nekutora chikwereti ichi. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi, VaNyasha Muchichwa, vanoti zvinoshanisa kuti hurumende iri kuda kutora chikwereti ichi asi iyo ichitadza kubhadhara zvikwereti zvaiinazvo nechakare. VaMuchichwa vati vese vakatora zvinhu kuRBZ vanofanira kubhadharwa kwete kuremedza hurumende nezvikwereti asi vakatora zvinhu varipo. Zvichakadai, pame chikwata chevemabhizimisi vekuFrance vapinda munyika nechinangwa chekuzoongorora mikana yekutanga mabhizimisi muno. Vari kutungamiri chikwata ichi, VaGerard Wolf, vati Zimbabwe ine mukana wekuita bhizimisi wakanaka chose uye makambani ekuFrance anoda kutora mukana uyu kutanga mabhizimisi muno. Chikwata ichi chichange chiri munyika kwemazuva matatu. VaMuchichwa vati vanobvumirana nemukuru wechikwata ichi kuti Zimbabwe ine mukana wakanaka wekuita mabhizimisi asi vakati chakashata chete mitemo yenyika yakaita semutemo wekupa masimba munyaya dzehupfumi kuvatema vemuno inovhiringidza vemabhizimisi vekunze.
title: VaChinamasa Vovandudza Mutemo Kuitira Kuti RBZ Ikwerete Mari

text: Sangano remagweta anorwira kodzero dzevanhu, reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights, ZLHR, raparura hurongwa hwekupinda muvanhu richitsanangura nezvebumbiro remitemo yenyika. Sangano iri raparura hurongwa uhu muChitungwiza neBulawayo. Pahurongwa uhu, sangano iri ranga richipawo vagari magwaro ebumbiro idzva iri akarerutswa mururimi rweShona, Ndebele neChirungu. Mumusha weChitungwiza, sangano iri ranga rakabatana nesangano rinomirira vagari vemuguta iri, reChitungwiza Residents Trust. Mutauriri wesangano ZLHR, VaKumbirai Mafunda, vanoti misoro yenyaya yanga yakanangana nemisangano iyi iri mukodzero dzevanhu panyaya dzemvura, hutano, dzidzo, pekugara pamwe nekodzero sezvizvarwa mune zvakasiyanasiyana. VaMafunda vanoti chirongwa ichi chichapindawo mumatunhu ose emunyika mushure mekuona chidokwadokwa charatidzwa nevagari vekuChitungwiza chekuda kunzwa zvizhinji pamusoro pebumbiro ravo remitemo. No media source currently available
title: Sangano reMagweta reZLHR Rodzidzisa Vanhu Kunzwisisa Bumbiro reMitemo

text: Dare reSenate muAmerica rakavhota kekupedzisira neChina rikatambira Amai Ketanji Brown Jackson kuti vave mutongi wedare repamusorosoro reSupreme Court. Judge Jackson vakavhoterwa nemaseneta makumi mashanu nematatu kusanganisira vose vebato remaDemocrats. Asi vebato rinopikisa remaRepublicans makumi mana nevanomwe vakaramba kuvatambira Nhengo nhatu dzemaRepublicans dzakavavhotera dzinoti Amai Susan Collins, Amai Lisa Murkowski naVaMitt Romney. Amai Jackson vamirira kutoreswa mhiko nemutongi mukuru wedare reSupreme Court. Izvi zvichapa kuti vave mudzimai mutema wekutanga munhoroondo yeAmerica kuva mutongi wedare reSupreme Court. Judge Jackson vakadomwa nemutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica VaJoe Biden kutora chigaro chaJustice Stephen Breyer avo vakaenda pamudyandigere. Vakatora mhiko vanenge vave wechina pamadzimai anenge ave vatongi mudare reSupreme Court sezvo parizvino paina Amai Sonia Sotomayor, Amai Elena Kagan naAmai Amy Coney Barrett.
title: Judge Ketanji Brown Jackson Vovhoterwa neSenate Kuti Vave Mudzimai Mutema weKutanga Kuva Mutongi weDare reSupreme Court muAmerica

text: Vanhu vakawanda vari kushushikana zvikuru nehuwandu hwevanhu vakadomwa kuti vakaperekedze chikwata chenhanbvu yevanhukadzi, cheZimbabwe Netball Team, kumakwikwi emutambo uyu pasi rose ari kuitirwa kuBritain. Kunyange hazvo huwandu hwemari ichashandiswa nevanhu ava husiri kuzivikanwa, nyanzvi munyaya dzekufamba dzinoti izvi zvichadya zviuru nezviuru zvemadhora sezvo pachida mari dzendege, mari dzekugara mamahotera, mari dzechikafu mazuva ose nezvimwe zvinenge zvichidiwa nevanhu ava. Kuchema chema uku kunouya panguva iyo vanhu vachiri kutaura zvakaitika kumakwikwi enhabvu yevanhurume muAfrica, yeAfrica Cup of Nations, Afcon, kuEgypt. Vanhu vakaratidza kusafara nehuwandu hwevanhu vasingatambe bhora vakaendawo kumakwikwi e2019 Afcon panguva iyo Zifa yainetseka kubhadhara mari vatambi vechikwata chemaWarriors. Vakawanda vanoti hurumende yaifanirwa kunge yakashandisa mari iyi kubhadhara vatambi ava mumakwikwi avo eNetball World Cup. Vatambi veZimbabwe Netball Team vakambobuda mumapepanhau vasati vaenda kuBritain vachinzi vaishupika sezvo vakange vasingawane rutsigiro rwemari yakakwana kubva kuhurumende. Mushure mekunzwa mutauro wainge wasimuka zvakare neChishanu, hurumende yakaedza kuda kugadzirisa chimiro chayo ichiti kune vanhu makumi mashanu nevana chete vakaenda kumakwikwi aya kunyange hazvo vatambi chaivo vari makumi maviri chete. Izvi zvinoreva kuti vanhu makumi matatu nevashanu vanhuwo zvavo vakaperekedza chikwata ichi kuburikidza nemabasa avachange vachiita vari ikoko. Mashoko akaburitswa nebazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko nemusi weChishanu anoti vatambi gumi nevana vakabhadharirwa mari dzavo dzerwendo urwu nehurumende, vamwe vacho vatanhatu vari kubhadharirwa neZimbabwe Netball Association. Mashoko akaburitswa aya anotiwo pane vakuru vakuru vatanhatu veZimbabwe Netball Association vari kubhadharirwa mari dzerwendo urwu nesangano ravo reZimbabwe Netball Association. Chikwata chenyanzvi nomwe pamwe nevamiriri vehurumende vana vanonzi vakabhadharirwa mari nehurumende. Chikwata che Zimbabwe Netball Team chakasvika neChishanu muBritain. Vamwe vasina kudomwa kuti ndivanani vari muchikwata ichi vanosanganisira vatsigiri vechikwata che Zimbabwe Netball Team pamwe nevatori venhau. Chikwata cheZimbabwe chichange chichitungamirwa naAmai Yeukai Simbanegavi, vanone mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvemitambo. Mamwe makurukota anonzi ari kuBritain anosanganisira gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, gurukota rezvekushanyirwa kwenyika, Amai Prisca Mupfumira pamwe negurukota rezvevanhukadzi, Amai Sithembiso Nyoni. Nyanzvi munyaya dzemitambo nemari dzinoti hurumende haifanirwe kunge ichishandisa mari yakawanda yekutakura vanhu kuenda kunze kwenyika, vanodarika huwandu hwevatambi vacho vari kunomirira nyika mumitambo iyi. Nyanzvi idzi dzinoti kuita kwakadai kunoratidza kuti hurumende haina hany’a nekutambisa mari yenyika panguva iyo zvinhu zvisina kumira zvakanaka munyika. Studio7 yakundikana kubata munyori mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, Va Nick Mangwana, kuti tinzwe divi rehurumende panyaya iyi. Asi mukuru wezvirongwa musangano re Zimbabwe Network for Social Justice, Va Tendai Rueben Mbofana, vanoti nemamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika, hurumende inofanirwa kuongorora zvakadzama kuti vanhu vangani vangaende kunotsigira nekubatsira chikwata chenyika. VaMbofana vanoti mari iri kushandiswa iyi inobva mumitero iri kubviswa nevanhu, nokudaro, hurumende inofanirwa kukoshesha matambudziko akatarisana nenyika iyo isina mishonga nemafuta edzimotokari. No media source currently available
title: Hurumende Yoshorwa Zvakare Zvichitevera Kutumira Vanhu Vakawandisa kuMakwikwi eNetball World Cup

text: Zichitevera musangano waitwa nevamiriri vemasangano evarairidzi ose muHarare nhasi, varairidzi varonga kuratidzira pamuzinda wemutungamiriri wenyika we State House musi wa 27 Kubvumbi uye kuramwa mabasa muna Chivabvu kana hurumende ikasagadzirisa zvichemo zvavo. Mutungamiri werimwe remasangano aya, re Amalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, ARTUZ, VaObert Masaraure, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vadzidzisi vane zvichemo zvinofanira kugadziriswa zvinosanganisira zvekuti vadzidzisi, zvikuru vari kumaruwa, vasashungurudzwa nevezvematongerwo enyika, zvikuru vatsigiri veZanu-PF. No media source currently available
title: Vadzidzisi Voronga Kumbomira Mabasa Kusvika Zvichemo Zvavo Zvagadziriswa

text: Sangano rinomirira vashandi vemumigodhi, reNational Mine Workers’ Union of Zimbabwe rinoti riri kushora zvikuru kushandiswa kwechisimba nemapurisa mukuparadza kuratidzira kwakaitwa nevashandi pamwe nemadzimai avo nezuro pamughodhi weTurk Mine uri kuBubi, kunze kweguta reBulawayo kuMatabeleland North. Vashandi vemugodhi uyu vanonzi vakatanga kuratidzira vachinyunyuta nekusabhadharwa kwavo mihoro yavo kwemwedzi mitatu, sezvo kambani yavo iri kunzi iri kuti haisi kuwana mari. NeChitatu madzimai evashandi ava anonzi akazobatanawo nevarume vavo mukuratidzira uku, izvo zvinonzi zvakazoita kuti vakuru vemugodhi uyu vadaidze mapurisa, ayo anonzi akakundikana kumisa kuratidzira uku. Mapurisa aya anonzi akazoshevedza chikwata chinodzivirira mhirizhonga, icvho chinonzi chakasvikokonzera zhowezhowe mukomboni yose mushure merova chero munhu aisanganikwa naye uye kukanda utsi hunokachidza pamwe nekuridzira pfuti mudenga. Utsi hunokachidza hwakakandwa nemapurisa aya hunonzi hwakakanganisawo zvakare vana vechikoro cheTurk Primary School, avo vanonzi vakamanikidzwa kusiya zvidzidzo zvavo votiza. Studio7 yakundikana kubata vakuru vakuru vemugodhi uyu pamwe nemapurisa kuti tinzwewo divi ravo panyaya iyi. Asi VaNdodana Sithole, vanotungamira sangano reNational Mine Workers’ Union of Zimbabwe, vanoti havaoni chikonzero chekuti mapurisa ashandise chisimba sezvo kuratidzira uku kwaiitwa murunyararo. VaSithole vanoti pazoitwa musangano pakati pevamiriri vevashandi nevebazi rezvevashandi nemabasa, izvo zvinonzi zvazoita kuti vashandi vambodzokera pamabasa nyaya yavo ichizeyiwa. No media source currently available
title: Mapurisa Oshorwa Nekushandisa Chisimba kuVashandi veMugodhi weTurk Vairaitidzira

text: Munyori mukuru mudare remakurukota Doctor Misheck Sibanda vaburitsa gwaro rinokurudzira makurukota ehurumende, vatevedzeri vavo, uye vamwe vakuru muhurumende vanofanira kuzivisa kuti vane hupfumi hwakaita sei. Izvi zvinowanzoitwa kudziviririra nyaya dzehuori. Zvinhu zvagara zvichitaurwa zvakanyaya nemapato anopikisa maererrano nezvanoda kuti zviitwe nehutungamiriri hwenyika. Mutauriri weMDC-T VaObert Gutu vanoti muromo hauzarirwe nerwizi nekudaro mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vanofanira kunyatsorwisa huori kwete kungotaura nekusunga vanhu vavasingawirirane navo. No media source currently available
title: Makurokota eHurumende Anonzi Azivise VaMnangagwa nezveHupfumi Hwavo Kuyedza Kudzivirira Nyaya dzeHuori

text: Vatsigiri veMDC-T vari kumba kwaVaMorgan Tsvangirai kuHighlands muHarare vanoti panofanirwa kuitwa musangano wechimbichimbi wekutsvaga achatsiva VaTsvangirai pahutungamiri hwebato ravo. Vatsigiri veMDC ava vaswera vakaungana kumba kwaVaTsvangirai vachiimba vachichema mutungamiri webato ravo uyo akafa nemusi weChitatu kuSouth Africa mushure mekurwara nechirwere chegomarara. Vamwe vevatsigiri veMDC vanga vari parufu apa vakaita saVaTendai Kanokanga vati zvakakosha kuti paitwe musangano wechimbichimbi kana kuti extraordinary congresswekusarudza munhu achatungamira bato vachiti VaTsvangirai munhu aida hutongi hwejekerere. Izvi zvinotevera musangano wakaitwa wekomiti yepamusoro-soro yebato iri yeNational Council uyo wakapa VaNelson Chamisa basa rekufanobata chigaro chemutungamiri webato kwegore rimwe chete. Izvi zvatsinhirwa naVaRutendo Bvute avo vati vabva kuRuwa kuzochema VaTsvangirai. Asi VaDenford Ngadziore vati hapasisina nguva yekuita kongiresi yechimbichimbi sezvo sarudzo dzave pedyo. VaChamisa vaudza Studio7 kuti kongiresi iyi ichaitwa chete kana komiti yavo yeNational Council yabvuma. Asi munyori mukuru muMDC-T, VaDouglas Mwonzora, vati bumbiro remitemo ndiro rinofanirwa kutevedzerwa. Ari kutaura akamirira mhuri yekwaTsvangirai uye ari munin’ina wemufi, VaManase Tsvangirai, vati hurongwa hwekuwunza mutumbi hwave pachinhano chepamusoro uye veruzhinji vachapihwa mukana wekuonekana naVaTsvangirai mune imwe nhandare yebhora muHarare . Mutumbi waVaTsvangirai wakatarisirwa kuradzikwa kumusha kwavo kuBuhera. No media source currently available
title: Vakawanda Votsigira Kuitwa kweKongiresi yeChimbichimbi muMDC

text: Sangano rinomiririra varairidzi vekumaruwa, reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, ARTUZ, rinoti hurumende yaisa varairidzi pa rumananzombe nenyaya yekuti vange vanyoresa nenzira ye ‘Biometric Registration’ mahofisi ehurumende asati avharwa nhasi, 30 Gunyana, 2019. Hurumende inoti inoda kubvisa mumabhuku ayo vanhu vari kubhadharwa vasingashandi. Mutungamiriri weARTUZ, VaObert Masaraure, vaudza Studio 7 kuti varairidzi havana mari yekufambisa kuenda pamahofisi ehurumende ari padyo navo uye nguva yekuti vakwanise kunonyoresa ishoma. VaMasaraure vati hurumende yaifanirwa kuonavo kuti vana vechikoro vari mumazuva ekunyora bvunzo naizvozvo varairidzi havangasiye vana vechikoro vega panguva iyi. No media source currently available
title: ARTUZ Inoti Hurumende Yaifanirwa Kupa Varairidzi Nguva Yakakwana Yekunyoresa

text: Mutungamiri weAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaObert Masaraure, vanoti sangano ravo rabatana nemamwe masangano anomirira varairidzi mukuparura chirongwa chekuti hurumende isavabatira mari dzemapenjeni sezvo varairidzi vari kutambira mari shoma. VaMasaraure vati masangano abvumira kuti hurumende ndiyo inofanirwa kunge ichibhadharira vashandi vayo mari dzepenjeni. VaMasarura vanoti vari kutora danho iri sezvo zvinhu zvisina kumira zvakanaka munyaya dzehupfumi kumushandi wese. Vatiwo mari dzavari kubatirwa pari zvino, hadzisi kubhatwa zvakanaka izvo vanoti zvinotyora kodzero dzavo pamwe nebumbiro remitemo yenyika. Pari zvino vashandi vari kubatirwa mari inosvika zvikamu zvinomwe nechidimbu kubva muzana semari yepenjeni. Vatiwo masangano avo achatsvaga zviuru nezviuru zvevanhu kuti zvisaine petisheni ichazoiswa kuhurumende. Vati pachaitwa hurongwa mushure mekuenganidza magwaro anenge asainwa hwekuenda kunoratidzira kubazi rinotambirisa vashandi vehurumende yeSalary Service Bureau. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa mamwe masangano evarairidzi kana achinge apindawo musangano waitirwa kwaChikwanha, kuChitungwiza, uyo wabuda nechisungo ichi. Studio7 hainawo kukwanisa kunzwa kubazi rezvevashandi vehurumende kuti richaita seyi nedanho ratorwa nevarairidzi iri. No media source currently available
title: Varairidzi Voronga Kuti Vasabatirwa Mari dzePenjeni

text: Kuramwa mabasa kwevashandi veNational Railways of Zimbabwe, NRZ, kuchaenderera mberi zvichitevera kusabudirira kwemusangano pakati pasachigaro vebhodhi reNRZ, VaLarry Mavima, hutungamiri hwekambani iyi pamwe nevamiriri vemasangano evashandi nemusi weChina. VaMavima, avo vanonzi ndivo vakadaidzira musangano uyu, vanonzi vakakumbira vashandi vari pakuramwa mabasa kuti vadzoke kubasa kambani yavo ichitsvaga nzira dzekuunganidza nadzo mari dzavo. Asi mutungamiri werimwe sangano revashandi veNRZ, reZimbabwe Amalgamated Railways Workers Union, VaKamurai Moyo vanoti hapana chakabuda mumusangano uyu sezvo vashandi vari kuti vanoda kutanga vabhadharwa mari dzavo kuitira kuti vakwanise kuwana chekufambisa kuenda kumabasa, sezvo vave nemwedzi gumi nemitanhatu vasati vapiwa mari dzavo. “Nyaya iyi ndiyoyoka inongoripo yevashandi vari kuti havana mari yekudzokera kubasa. Saka board chairman vaiti izvo endai mukumbira vashandi vadzoke pabasa,” VaMoyo vanodaro. VaMoyo vanoti vashandi vari kuda zvikuru kuti vange vari pamabasa avo, asi havana mari dzekuti vafambise kuenda kumabasa. Vanoti VaMavima havana chavakavimbisa kupa vashandi kunze kwekungoudza vashandi nezvezvirongwa zvehurumende zvekuti hurumende iri kuzama kutora chikwereti cheZisco Steel pamwe nekuzama kuti itakure chibage kuti igopa vashandi mari. Svondo rapera NRZ yakapa vashandi vari kuramwa mabasa ava maawa makumi maviri nemana ekuti vange vadzokera pamabasa, kukundikana kwavo vaizotorerwa matanho. Asi kusvika pari zvino zvinonzi hapana mushandi ati amiswa basa kana kutorerwa matanho Studio 7 yaedza kubata mutauriri weNRZ VaFanuel Masikati kuti tinzwe divi rekambani yavo panyaya iyi, asi vati vanga vasati vapirwa nezvakabuda mumusangano uyu sezvo vasina kupindawo mumusangano uyu. No media source currently available
title: Kuramwa Mabasa kweVashandi veNRZ Kwoenderera Mberi Nekutadza Kuwirirana

text: Nhepfenyuro yeVoice of America neChipiri yapemberera kusvitsa makore makumi masere kubva zvayakaparurwa muna 1942. Voice of America inotepfenyura kuvanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni mazana matatu ane gumi nerimwe kana kuti 311 million pasvondo rega-rega pasi rose mumitauro makumi mana neminomwe, kana kuti 47, munyika dzinoda kusvika zana, kusanganisira muZimbabwe, umo inotepfenyura seStudio 7. Zvirongwa zvayo zvinoburitswa pamasaisai anosanganisira marhedhiyo, materevhizheni, nharembozha nepamadandemutande pasi rose. Chizvarwa cheZimbabwe uye vari muteereri mukuru weVoice of America, VaFrenk Guni, vanoti nhepfenyuro iyi yabatsira zvikuru kuwanisa vanhu mukana wekunzwa nhau dzakaringana dzine hunyanzvi zvaita kuti vaive nepfungwa yekuti yakanangana nekushandura dzihurumende, zvikuru mubato riri kutonga reZanu PF nemuhurumende, vave nemaonero matsva. No media source currently available
title: Voice of America Inopemberera Makore Makumi Masere Yaumbwa

text: Dare ramejastiriri muHarare rapa hurumende simba rekutengesa imba yekuNyanga yevaive gurukota VaSaviour Kasukuwere. Imba iyi inoita zviuru mazana maviri nemakumi mashanu iri kutengeswa sezvo muchuchusi VaZivanai Macharaga vari kuti vakasukuwere vari kupomerwa mhosva dzehuori havasi kuuya kudare vachinyepera kurawara. Vange vachitarisirwa kupinda mudare musi wa 17 Ndira asi vainge vakumbira kuti nguva iwedzerwe sezvo vasiri kunzwa zvakanaka.
title: Dare Rinoti VaSaviour Kasukuwere Vatorerwe Imba

text: Mutongi wedare ramajasitiriti, Amai Gloria Takundwa, nemusi weChipiri vakati vachaenda kudare repamusoro kuti vapihwe mazano ekuti vobata sei kutongwa kwenyaya yemutevedzeri wasachigaro weMDC, VaTendai Biti. Vakaita izvi mushure mekunge pabuda mashoko ekuti mumwe muchuchusi, VaMichael Reza, vainge voyedza kuda kupindira nekutora divi panyaya iyi. VaBiti vari kupomerwa mhosva yekutaura zvavaiti zvabuda musarudzo Zimbabwe Electoral Commission isati yazvizivisa. Asi VaBiti vari kuramba mhosva iyi. VaReza vanonzi vakanyora mashoko panharembozha yavo kuna VaThabani Mpofu vanotungamira bazi rekurwisa huori muhofisi yemutungamiri wenyika, kana kuti Special Anti-corruption Unit in the Office of the President and Cabinet, vachishora Amai Takundwa. VaReza vaiti zvainge zvaitwa naAmai Takundwa zvekubvumidza vatori venhau kuti vatepfenyure nyaya iyi vasina kupihwa mvumo nemutongi mukuru wematare. Gweta raVaBiti, Amai Beatrice Mtetwa, vati vareza vanofanira kuferefetwa nemapurisa uye mashoko avo anoratidza sekuti vematare havana kuzvimirira. Asi vekuhofisi yevachuchusi, VaJonathan Murombedzi, vati vanoda kuti patange paitwa ongororo yekuti VaReza vakatumira mashoko aya here zvechokwadi. Nyaya iyi yabva yanzi ichanzwikwa musi wa 21 Zvita asi Amai Mtetwa vabva vaisa chikumbiro chekuti VaBiti vapihwe gwaro ravo rekufambisa iro rakabatwa sechibatiso nematare. Mutauriri weMDC VaJacob Mafume vati havasi kufara nemabatirwo ari kuitwa nyaya iyi zvikuru zviri kuitwa naVaReza zvavati zvinota sekunge mhosva inotongwa ichitariswa kuti wabuda mumba maani. No media source currently available
title: Muchuchusi Ozvimbirwa neMaitiro Ake Mukutongwa kwaVaBiti

text: Vanhu vakawa munyika vari kurasikirwa nehupenyu nekuda kwezvirwere zvakaita sechegomarara, asi vamwe vanamazvikokota munyaya dzezvehutano vanoti huwandu hwevari kufa nechirwere ichi hunogona kudereredzwa nekudya cikafu chine hutano zvikuru chechinyakare. Mukuru weDepartment of Chemical Pathology paUniversity of Zimbabwe School of Medicine, Muzvinafundo Hilda Matarira, vaudza Studio 7 kuti tsvagurudzo yakaitwa nenyanzvi munyaya dzezvirwere yakaburitsa kuti chikafu chinokuiwa paguyo chinobatsira mukudzivirira vanhu kuti vasarware nechirwere ichi nezvimwe zvizhinji zvinonzi hazvirapike. Muzvinafundo Matarira vanoti vane shungu chaizvo yokudzidzisa ruzhinji maringe nezveongororo iyi iripasi pechirongwa cheCancer Nutrietics Cure Campaign, iyo yakaburitsa gwaro rinotaura kuti zvirwere zvese zvinokwanisa kurapwa nechikafu chinobva paguyo nokuti panopfupfunyuka anonzi nechirungu ma ‘minerals’, ayo anobatsira pakugadzirisa hutano hwemunhu pasina kunwa mishonga inodhura. Tsvagurudzo iyi yakatora makore masere ichiitwa naana Muzvinafundo vemapazi akasiyana siyana paUniversity of Zimbabwe School of Medicine, avo vakaona kuti zvinopfupfunyika paguyo nehuyo zvinokwanisa kubatsira pakuraramisa vagari vemunyika muno nemuAfrica yese kwemakore akawanda. Muzvinafundo Matarira vanoti vakajekeserwa kuti matombo anopfupfunyuka kubva paguyo ndiwo mushonga mukuru unorapa zvirwere zvinonzi hazvirapike. VaMatarira vaenderera mberi vachiti zvinopfupfunyuka izvi zvinogona kuiswavo mumvura yakachena kuti munhu anwe, zvichibatsira mukupora kwake. Vakurudzira vagari vekumaruwa kuti vadzokere mukudya chikafu chaigadzirwa pasichigare, vakaenderera mberi vachiti vagari vemumadhorobha vanokwanisa kusanganisa zvinobva paguyo nehupfu hunogaiwa nemichina yedhizhiri. Muzvinafundo Matarira vati vanoda kuti vanhu vazive kuti chikafu chine shuga chinotowedzera chirwere chegomarara. Gurukota rezvehutano, Doctor Obediah Moyo, vakaparura chirongwa cheCancer Nutrietics Cure Campaign musi wa19 Mbudzi. Parizvino, pave nevanhu vanodarika zana vari kufambisa mashoko etsvagurudzo iyi muZimbabwe nenyika dzemuAfrica. Muzvinafundo Matarira vakanyora gwaro rekuti vanhu veZimbabwe vazive nezvekudya zvinobva paguyo nehuyo, vachiti zvimwe zvidyiwa zvemazuva ano zvakapepetwa hazvina hutano zvachose. Vanotizve, kunwa mutuvi, uyo unowanikwa panovodzekwa mukaka wakakora, chimwe chezvinhu chinobatsira pakudzivirira chirwere chegomarara. Vana mazvikokota nenyanzvi dzinoona nezvechirwere chegomarara dzinoti vanhu vanodarika zviuru zvishanu varikubatwa nechirwere ichi pagore rega rega, vachitizve vazhinji vacho vanozoenda kunoona anachiremba chirwere chatopararira zvekuti chinenge chavekunetsa kurapa. No media source currently available
title: Vanhu Vokurudzirwa Kudya ZveChinyakare Kudzivirira Kubatwa neGomarara

text: Mutauriri wemutungamiri wenyika VaGeorge Charamba vashora zvikuru zvirango zvakatemerwa mwanakoma wemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa Junior uye vamwe vanoshanda neshoroma yakatemerwa zvirango kare VaKudakwashe Tagwirei vachiti zvinokanganis hupfumi. Asi America inoti zvakanangana nevanoita huwori nekutonga nedemo. Musangano mukuru pakati peAmerica nevamwe vatungamiri venyika dzemuAfrica watanga muWashington DC nhasi mutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica VaJoe Biden vachiti nyika yavo yaisa parutivi mari inosvika mabhiriyoni makumi mashanu nemashanu-US$55 billion mumabasa ekudyidzana neAfrica munyaya dzezvehupfumi. Mushashakabvu, Reverend Ndabaningi Sithole, vakarangarirwa segamba renyika nezuro manheru pachiitiko chekuparura kudhindwa kwebhuku ravo kechitatu rinonzi African Nationalism. Nyanzvi muanya dzezvehupfumi dzozeya rwendo rwechimwe chikwata cheIMF chiri munyika umo chinonzi chiri kuita misangano nemapoka akasiyanasiyana kusanganisira vehurumende nemasangano akazvimirira yekuzeya nezve mamiriro ehupfumi kana kuti 2023 Article IV. Misangano iyi iri kubatsira Zimbabwe nenzira dzipi? Nyanzvi idzi dzichatipa mhinduro. Muchirongwa chedu cheLiveTalk, The Connection na8 pm nhasi, Ntungamili Nkomo weStudio 7 ari kutarisa nezvemusangano mukuru wevechidiki uri kuitwa kumucheto kwemusangano mukuru weUS-Africa Leaders' Summit muWashington DC. Musangano wevechidiki uyu uri kutarisa zvikuru vechidiki vemuAfrica vari muAmerica nedzimwe nyika dziri kunze kana kuti diaspora. Munhau dzemitambo, tichazeya nezvemasemi-finals emitambo yeWorld Cup iri kutambirwa kuQatar. Kana muchida kupinda muchirongwa ichi, kanawo kutumira mashoko kuStudio7, shandisai WhatsApp nhamba dzinoti 001 202 465 0318. Vanoda kutererera Studio7, tibateyi na7pm pamasaisai anoti 909 am 4930; 13860, 15460 Kilohertz paShort Wave mazuva ose
title: Misoro yeNhau dzaNhasi, Chipiri, Zvita 13, 2022

text: Zimbabwe yasvitsa makore maviri neMugovera kubva musi wakapfurwa vanhu vatanhatu vakafa muHarare mushure mekunge vanhu vakawanda vapinda mumigwagwa vachiratidza kusafara kwavo nemafambisirwo aitwa sarudzo dzegore ra 2018. Kuurayiwa kwevanhu ava kwakaitika pasi rose richiona sezvo vatori venhau vakabva kunyika dzakasiyana siyana, vakange vari muZimbabwe vachiona mafambiro aiita sarudzo yekutanga mutungamiri weZanu PF, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vachikwikwidza musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika zvichitevera kubviswa pachigaro nechisimba kwakaitwa vaive mutungamiri webato iri, muchakabvu Robert Mugabe. VaMnangagwa vaikwikwidzana naVaNelson Chamisa veMDC Alliance, kusanganisirawo vatungamiri vemapato madiki anopikisa. Mushure mekupfurwa kwevanhu ava, hurumende yakamanikidzwa kuumba komisheni yekuti iferefete zvakaitika. Komisheni iyi yaiva nevaimbove mutungamiri weSouth Africa, VaKgalema Motlanthe, sasachigaro wayo. Komisheni iyi yakaburitsa gwaro rinoratidza kuti mauto nemapurisa ndiwo akauraya vanhu vatanhatu ava, ikati vakauraya vanhu ava vanofanirwa kumiswa pamberi pematare edzimhosva. Yakatiwo hurumende iripe hama dzevanhu vakaurayiwa ava. Komisheni yaVaMotlanthe yakatiwo hurumende inofanirwa kuendesa vana vevafi ava kuchikoro, uye kuti mapurisa nemauto asaise mutemo mumaoko awo kana vanhu vachinge vachiratidzira. Nyanzvi munyaya dzekodzero dzevanhu dzinoti hurumende haisati yatevedzera zviri muMotlanthe Commission. Asi gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, vanoti hurumende inoziva zviri muMotlanthe Commission uye ine hurongwa hwekuona kuti zvakatarwa nekomisheni iyi, zvazadziswa. Mumwe wemakomishina akanyora gwaro iri, VaLovemore Madhuku, avo vanove zvakare mutungamiri weNational Constitutional Assembly, vanoti komisheni yavo yakaita basa rayo ikapedza, chitsvambe chasarira kuhurumende yaVaMnangagwa kuona kuti yatevedzera zviri mugwaro ravakanyora. VaMadhuku vatiwo komisheni yavo yakabuda nechisungo chekuti hurumende iripe hama dzevafi nekuti vanhu ava vakapfurwa nemasoja nemapurisa. No media source currently available Nyanzvi munyaya dzekodzero dzevanhu uye vari mukuru weHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica, VaDewa Mavhinga, vanoti hurumende haisi kuratidza chido chekuzadzisa zviri muMotlanthe Commission Report. VaMavhinga vanoti pava nemakore maviri gwaro iri raburitswa, asi hapana kana musoja ati asungwa sezvakakurudzirwa nekomisheni yaVaMotlanthe. No media source currently available
title: Nyanzvi Dzokurudzira Hurumende Kuripa Vakaurayirwa Hama Dzavo neMauto Muna Nyamavhuvhu 2018

text: Zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kugara muSouth Africa zvinonzi zviri kukundikana kuwana mabasa nekuda kwekunonoka kwebazi rezvemukati menyika kuzvigadzirira magwaro eZimbabwe Exemption Permit, ayo anozvibvumidza kugara pamwe nekushanda munyika iyi zviri pamutemo. Vamwe vevanhu vanonzi vari kuita dambudziko iri varairidzi, avo vanonzi vave nemwedzi inosvika mipfumbamwe vasati vatambiriswa mihoro yavo nebazi rezvedzidzo iro rinonzi riri kuti rakamirira kuti vatange varisvitsa magwaro aya kuti rikwanise kuvabhadhara. Sachigaro wesangano rinomirira zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri muSouth Africa, reZimbabwe Global Forum, VaSolomon Chikowero vanoti vari kutambira zvichemo zvakadai zuva nezuva kubva kuzvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvakamirira magwaro aya. Asi VaChikowero vanoti sesangano havana masimba ekumanikidza bazi rezvemukati menyika kuti rikasike kugadzirisa magwaro aya, kunze kwekungorikumbira chete kuti rivayeukewo. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kubazi rezvemukati menyika reSouth Africa panyaya iyi. No media source currently available
title: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe muSouth Africa Zvomirira neMaziso Matsvuku maGwaro eZimbabwe Exemption Permit

text: South Africa iyo ine vanhu vanodrika zviuru mazana maviri nemakumi matanhatu nevana kana 264,000 vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 ndiyo myika ine vanhu vakawandisa muAfrica yose vabatwa nechirwereichi. Nemusi weSvondo, mutungamiri wenyika iyi VaCyril Ramaphosa vakazivisa kuti vainge vodzora mamwe matanho akaoma kuyedza kuderedza kutapuriranwa kwechirwere ichi. Doro rarambidzwa uye munhu wose ave kusungirwa kuti ange akapfeka chekudzivirira muromo nemunho kana kuti mask. Vanhu vari kunzi vange vave mudzimba pakati penguva dzepfumbamwe kusvika dzeina mangwanani. Pavanhu ava pane zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvine chitsama zvabatwa nechirwere ichi zvikuru muGauteng umo marura chirwere ichi. Mumwe abatwa nechirwere ichi mutungamiri wesangano reInternational Cross Border Traders Association VaDenis Juru avo vanoti vanofungidzirwa kuti vakatapurirwa chirwere ichi neimwe hama yavo. No media source currently available  Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa Studio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika zviuru mazana mashanu nemakumi manomwe nemasere kana kuti 578 000 vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus muAfrica, vanhu vafa vanosvika zviuru gumi nezviviri nemazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi masere nemapfumbamwe kna kuti 12, 989. Vanhu vapora kubva kuchirwere ichi vadarika zviuru mazana maviri zvine makumi masere nemana kana kuti 284, 000. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus pasi rose hwadarika mamiriyoni gumi nezviviri zvine zviuru mazana manomwe kana kuti 12,7 million. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose inoti muamerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi ichiteverwa nebrazil. Vanhu vafa muAmerica vadarika zviuru zana zvine makumi matatu nemashanu kana kuti 135, 000, vabatwa nechirwere ichi vachidarika mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru mazana maviri kana kuti 3,2 million. Pasi rose vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vadarika zviuru mazana mashanu nemakumi matanhatu nemasere kana kuti 567,000. Vapora vachidarika mamiriyoni manomwe kana kuti 7 million.
title: Chizvarwa cheZimbabwe Chiri kuSouth Africa VaDenis Juru Votaurwa nezveKubatwa neCovid-19

text: Nhengo mazana mashanu nemakumi matatu nemasere kana kuti 538 dzedare rinozivikanwa nekuti Electoral College dzakatanga kuvhota nemusi weMuvhuro kuti dzisarudze zviri pamutemo vakasarudzwa kutungamira nyika yeAmerica VaJoe Biden vebato remaDemocrats. Asi kune mamwe matunhu kunonzi kuri kutyirwa mhirizhonga sezvo vamwe vatsigiri vemutungamiri wenyika VaDonald Trump vasiri kufara vachiti sarudzo dzakabirirwa kunyangwe vari kukundikana kuuya nehumbowo kumatare. VaTrump vari kungonyorawo padandemutande reTwitter kuti vakakunda kunyangwe ari manyepo. Dare reCongress richatambidzwa zviri pamutemo zvinenge zvabva kuElectoral College musi wa 6 Ndira. Mamwe maRepublicans anonzi ari kudazve kuyedza kuvhiringidza VaBiden mudare reHouse Of Representatives asi izvi zvinonetsa nekuti maDemocrats ndiwo akawanda mudare iri.​ VaBiden avo vari kumba kwavo muguta reWilmington, Delaware vari kutarisirwa kutura mashoko kunyika manheru eMuvhuro ano nezveElectoral College uye kusimba kwehutongo hwejekerere muAmerica. Nyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika Va Frank Chatonda vari kuSouth Carolina, muAmerica vanoti vari kutarisira kuti VaBiden vachasvitsa mavhoti anodiwa sezvo matunhu achisungirwa kutevera zvakabuda musarudzo dzemusi wa 3 Mbudzi. No media source currently available .
title: Dare reElectoral College Rotarisirwa Kudoma VaBiden Zviri paMutemo Munzira Yavo Yekunotoreswa Mhiko Yekutungamira America

text: Dare reparamende remuAmerica neChitatu manheru rakapomera zviri pamutemo mutungamiri wenyika iyi, VaDonald Trump, mhosva yekuzvidza dare reCongress pamwe nekushandisa masimba avo zvisiri izvo. Izvi zvava kureva kuti VaTrump vachatongwa nedare reseneti mwedzi unouya, iro rinenge riine mukuru wevatongi vematare edzimhosva, ari sachigaro mukutongwa kwaVaTrump. Dare reparamende remuAmerica rine nhengo dzebato rinopikisa reDemocratic Party dzakawanda, asi nhengo dzebato riri kutonga reRepublican Party, rinove bato raVaTrump, ndidzowo dzine huwandu mudare reseneti. Izvi zvinonzi nevamwe zvinogona kuona nyaya dziri kupomerwa VaTrump dzichiraswa.
