Pamhosva yekutanga, VaTrump vari kunzi vakakumbira mutungamiri wenyika yeUkraine, VaVolodymyr Zelenskiy, kuti vavabatsire kuferefeta vaimbove mutewedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika munguva yehutongo hwaVaBarrack Obama, VaJoe Biden, pamwe nemwanakomana wavo. VaTrump vanonzi vakaita izvi vakabata mari inoda kusvika kumamiriyoni mazana mana yaifanirwa kupiwa serubatsiro kuUkraine, inove mhosva yechipiri yavari kupomerwa. VaBiden vari kutarisirwa kukwikwidzana naVaTrump musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika gore rinouya. Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika, vari mudzidzisi wepachikoro chepamusoro cheMalone University, kuOhio muno muAmerica, Doctor Moses Rumano, vanoti vanofadzwa nedanho rakatorwa nenhengo dzeDemocratic Party iri sezvo richiratidza kuti muAmerica hapana ari pamusoro pemutemo. Doctor Rumano vanoti kana dai VaTrump vakasazosiiswa basa, zvinenge zvave munhoroondo yenyika iyi kuti ndemumwe wevatungamiri venyika vakambopomerwa mhosva muhupenyu hwavo. No media source currently available
title: Dare reParamende remuAmerica Rinopomera Mutungamiri weNyika, VaTrump, Mhosva Zviri paMutemo

text: Vatori venhau nhasi varatidzira muguta reHarare vachitsutsumwa nenyaya yekurohwa nekukanganiswa kana vachiita basa ravo nemapurisa eZimbabwe Republic Police pamwechete neekanzuru. Bazi rinoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko ranyora padademutande rayo reTwitter kuti hapana chakaipa kuti vatori venhau varatidzire murunyararo. Kuratidzira uku kunouya mushure mekunge mumwe mutori wenhau akuvadzwa nemusi weChina svondo rapera apo mapurisa akakanda hutsi hunokachidza mumahofisi enpfenyuro inwanobuditsa nyaya padandemutande reinternet ye263 Chat. Mapurisa eZRP nekanzuru vainge vachitandanisa VaLovejoy Mutongwizo vaitora mifananidzo yekunetsana pakati pevanotengesa mumigwagwa nemapusa aya. VaMutongwizo avo vanga vari pakuratidzira kwanhasi vaudza Studio 7 kuti vaneta nekura vachingorohwa pamwe nekushungurudzwa nemapurisa ekanzuru neeZRP. Mumwe mutori wenhau VaAndreas Josephs ati vafadzwa zvikuru nekuti vakwanisa kuendesa tsamba yenyunyuto kumapurisa epaCentral. Mumwe mutori wenhau zvakare VaTafadzwa Muranganwa vati mapurisa anofanirwa kuziva kuti vatori venhau iziso revanhu nekudaro vanofanirwa kuita basa ravo vakasununguka. Vatori venhau vanosiya tsamba yenyunyuto kuna Meya weguta reHarare VaHerbert Gomba avo vavimbisa kuti vachaongorora zvakaitika vozvigadzirisa. Imwewo tsamba yenyunyuto yaendeswa kumapurisa paCentral payatambirwa mushure mekunge vatori venhau vamira kwechinguva chakati rebei pasina ange achitambira tsamba iyi. Mapurisa azovimbisawo kuti vachaongorora nyaya iyi. MISA Zimbabwe iyo inorwira kodzero dzevatori venhau inoti mapurisa anofanirwa kuremekedza kodzero dzevatori venhau. No media source currently available
title: Vatori veNhau Voratidzira muHarare Vachiti Havasi Kufara neKushungurudzwa neMapurisa

text: Sangano rinotungamira vadzidzi muzvikoro zvepamusoro reZimbabwe National Students Union kana kuti Zinasu riri kupomera mapurisa mhosva yekutyora kodzero dzavo nekuvarambidza kuita misangano. Munyori anoona nezvekuenzaniswa kwemikana pakati pevanasikana nevanakomana musangano reZinasu muzvarwe Joana Mamombe vanoti mapurisa ari kutyora kodzero dzavo achishandisa mutemo wePublic Order and Security Act unonzi nevakawanda unotyora kodzero dzevanhu. Mapurisa ekuChinhoyi mukupera kwesvondo akatomboyedza kudzivisa musangano waida kuitwa neZinasu pachikoro cheChinhoyi University. Mapurisa akati musangano uyu usaitwe nekuti ainge asina vanodzivirira mhirizhonga vakakwana. Asi vadzidzi vanonzi vakaenderera mberi vachiita musangano wavo panze peUniverisity. Mapurisa paakanzwa nezvemusangano uyu anonzi akauya nemarori maviri akazara mapurisa anodzivirira mhirizhonga asi vadzidzi vakatsika madziro vakaenderera mberi nemusangano wavo. Hatina kukwanisa kubata mutauriri wemapurisa Senior Assistant Commissioner Charity Charamba kuti tinzwe divi remapurisa sezvo nharembozha yavo yange isiri kudairwa. Muzvare Mamombe vanoti neMuvhuro mapurisa akatumira shoko rekuti vanodiwa kukamba vakati vachaita izvi neChipiri. No media source currently available
title: Sangano reZINASU Rinoti Mapurisa Ari Kutyora Kodzero dzeVadzidzi

text: Vamwe vaimbove vashandi vepamugodhi weOld Nic Mine kunze kweguta reBulawayo vapinda muzuva rechitanhatu vachigara panze mushure mekunge chikonzi nemapurisa vavadzinga mudzimba dzavange vachigara pamugodhi uyu. Vashandi ava, avo vanosvika makumi maviri nevasere pamwe nemhuri dzavo, vakadzingwa mudzimba dzepamugodhi wepaOld Nic Mine nemusi weChitatu svondo rapera vachinzi havachafanirwe kuramba vari mudzimba idzi sezvo vasingachashande pamugodhi uyu. Asi vamwe vevashandi ava vaudza Studio7 kuti hapana kwavangaenda nekuti havasati vapiwa mari dzavo dzavakashandira kwemakore akawanda vasati vasiya basa. Mumwe wevanhu ava, VaSayinozi Ariyeri, vanoti vakashandira kambani yeOld Nic Mine kwemakore anopfuura makumi matatu asi kusvika nanhasi havasati vawana mari yavo. VaAriyeri vanotiwo vakabhadharira imba yavaigara kwemakore akawanda saka havawone zvakakodzera kuti vadzingwe mumba umu. Amai Mabel Chipazera vane murume wavo aishanda paOld Nic Mine ivo pachavo vaiitawo basa remumba vachishandira mumwe wevakuru vakuru vepamugodhi uyu. Amai Chipazera vanoti kudzingwa kwakasiya midziyo yavo yapunzika uye kwave kuita kuti vana vavo vatadze kuenda kuchikoro. Amai Grace Mavhangira avo vane mwana wavo ange achishanda pamugodhi uyu achivachengeta ivo pamwe nevamwe vana vavo, vatsinhirawo kuti kudzingwa mudzimba uku kwavaunzira matambudziko uye vave kutyira hutano hwavo sezvo vasingakwanise kuwana mvura yakachena yakakwana yekushandisa zuva nezuva. Mumwe mwana waAmai Mavhangira, Tendayi, uyo ari kuita Form 4 pane chimwe chikoro muBulawayo, anoti ave kutadza kugadzirira bvunzo dzake zvakanaka mushure mekudzingwa mumba uku. Old Nic Mine mugodhi wegoridhe waive pasi pekambani yeFalcon Gold. Pakupera kwegore ra2015 kambani iyi yakazivisa kuti yaive yave kuvhara mugodhi uyu nekuda kwekuti goridhe range rave kutengwa nemari shoma pamusika wepasi rose. Izvi zvakasiya vashandi vanosvika mazana matatu vatarisana nekurasikirwa nemabasa. Vanoziva nezviri kuitika vanoti pane imwe kambani yakazouya ikati ichazoramba ichiita basa pamugodhi uyu asi vakuru vakuru vekambani iyi vakati vaizotora vashandi vanenge vabvuma kuti vaisazopiwa mari yavo yavaifanirwa kupiwa nekambani yeFalcon Gold. Mumwe wevashandi, VaMaxmillan Taruvinga, vati chavonoda ndechekuti vapiwe mari yavo kuti vagokwanisa kuenderera mberi nehupenyu hwavo. Pari zvino nyaya yevashandi veOld Nic Mine iri mudare reHigh Court uko magweta evashandi ava ari kurwisa kuti vasadzingwe mudzimba vasati vapiwa mugove wavo wakakwana. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kuvakuru vakuru veOld Nic Mine kana kumagweta evashandi ava. No media source currently available
title: Vakamboshandira Old Nic Mine Vodzinga Mudzimba

text: Sachigaro vesangano revaimbove varwiri verusununguko, reZimbabwe Liberation War Veterans Association, VaChristopher Mutsvangwa, vanonzi havachina rutsigirwo rwedunhu reMashonaland West, nekudaro dinhu iri rava kuti vabviswe pachigaro chasachigaro. VaMutsvangwa, avo vari kurwisana kuti vakunde musarudzo dzema primary munzvimbo yeNorton mushure mekumbokundwa, vanzi vambomira kumiririra vaimbove varwiri verusununguko vachinzi hapana zvavari kuita panyaya dzematambudziko ari kusangana nevaimbove varwiri verusununguko ava. Nhengo dzekuMashonaland West dzakawirirana neChitatu kuti VaMutsvangwa vambomira kuvamiririra sezvo vatadza kugadzirisa zvichemo zvavo kunyange vari chipangamazano chemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa. Munyori mukuru mudunhu reMashonaland West, VaNyikadzino Mudarika, vabvuma kuti dunhu ravo rakawirirana kubvisa VaMutsvangwa sasachigaro wavo vachiti hapana zvavari kuita mukupedza datambudziko avo. VaMudarika vati vana vavo havasi kubhadharirwa mari dzechikoro uye mari dzavo dzemudyandigere hadzisi kuwedzerwa izvo vainge vawirirana kuti hurumende itsva igadzirise nekukurumidza. VaMudarika vati vakafunga kuti zvavo zvazoita apo VaMutsvangwa vakaitwa chipangamazano chemutungamiri wenyika asi vanoti vari kushamiswa kuti nanhasi hapana zvati zvaitwa. Sachigaro wevarwi verusununguko muMash West, VaCornelius Muoni, vabvuma kuti nhengo dzavo mudunhu hadzisi kufara nehutungamiri hwaVaMutsvangwa, vakati vachataura nemamwe matunhu kuti nyaya yaVaMutsvangwa vanoiona sei. VaMuoni vati dunhu rimwe chete harigone kudzinga VaMutsvangwa pasina kutsigirwa nemamwe matunhu. VaMuoni vati boka ravo rinofanirwa kungwarira vanhu vari kuda kuputsa boka ravo vachishandisa dzimwe nhengo dzavo vachiti vachapa VaMutsvangwa mukana wekutura nenhengo dzavo vasati vasangana naVaMnangagwa. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi raVaMutsvangwa panyaya iyi. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika, VaButler Tambo, vati simba raVaMutsvangwa riri kuenda richipera muhurumende itsva. VaButler vati zvave kuitika muboka revaimbove varwi verusununguko zvinoratidza kuti VaMutsvangwa vanokundwa musarudzo dzekuNorton dziri kudzokororwa. Vaimbove varwi verusununguko avo vaigara vachiita hwakiti nagonzo nevaimbove mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vanoti hurumende haisi kukoshesa magariro avo sezvo mari dzechikoro dzavanofanirwa kupihwa zviri pamutemo dzisiri kuuya uye mari dzavo dzemudyandigere ishoma uye hadziuye nenguva. No media source currently available
title: Dunhu reMash West Roti Harichina Chivimbo naSachigaro veZLWVA, VaMutsvangwa

text: Kanzuru yeguta reHarare inoti yabatana nekambani yekuFrance, yeVitens Evides International, kuti ibatsire mukuderedza huwandu hwemvura inorasika mupombi dzemvura isati yasvika kuvagari. Mutauriri wekanzuru iyi, VaMichael Chideme, vanoti zvakaonekwa kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu nezvishanu kubva muzana zvemvura yakachena zvinorasika zvisati zvasvika kuvanhu, nekudaro kanzuru yakafunga kutsvaka rubatsiro kubva kukambani yekuFrance iyi. VaChideme vanotizve kanzuru yavo iri kutanga kuisa mamita emvura ekuti vagari vangoshandisa mvura yavanenge vabhadharira chete, kana kuti ma pre-paid water meter anosvika zviuru makumi masere. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, sangano revagari vemuHarare, reHarare Residents Trust, rinoti kanzuru iri kutambisa mari pazvinhu zvisina basa zvainofanira kugona kuita yoga. Mutungamiri wesangano iri, VaPrecious Shumba, vanoti mvura iri kurasika isati yasvika kuvanhu iri kubiwa nnevanhu vari kusungirira pombi dzavo zviri kunze kwemutemo, izvo zvatsinhirwawo naVaChideme. VaShumba vati dai kanzuru yaedza kuisa pombi itsva dzemvura kana kiromita imwe chete zvayo pamwedzi pachinhambo chekutambisa mari ichishevedza vanhu vekuFrance kuzovabatsira. No media source currently available
title: Kanzuru Yeguta reHarare Yabatana Nekambani YeFrance Kudzidziswa Kuchengetedza Mvura

text: Mamwe masangano anomirira vatori venhau pamwe neanorwira kodzero dzevanhu munyika anoti haasi kufara nedanho rehurumende rekuongorora zvinonyorwa nevanhu pamadandemutande eindaneti bhiri rinoona nezvemashandisirwo emasaisai nemadandemutande reCyber Security and Data Protection Bill risati radzikwa kuve mutemo wenyika. Mubatanidzwa wemasangano anorwira kodzero dzevanhu munyika weCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition unoti hausi kufara nehurongwa hwekuumba chikwata chichange chichiongorora kuti veruzhinji vanenge vachitaura kuti chii pamadandemutande kana kuti pa social media. Gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, vakaudza bepanhau reNewsday kuti vanhu vanofanira kuisa mashoko anovaka kwete kuputsa nyika pamadandemutande avo. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura navo pamwe nemunyori mukuru mubazi ravo,VaNick Mangwana kuti tinzwe kuti mashoko avasiri kuda kuti vanhu vataure paindaneti ndeapi sezvo vanga vasiri kudaira nharembozha dzavo. Asi mutauriri weCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition, VaMarvelous Khumalo, vati danho ratorwa nehurumende iri rinokanganisa veruzhinji kuti vasataure zvavanoda vakasununguka vachiti izvi zvinotyora kodzero dzevanhu. Mutungamiri wesangano reMedia Institute of Southern Africa muZimbabwe, VaTabani Moyo, vati danho rehurumende iri rinokanganisawo vatori venhau mukuita basa ravo vakasununguka. Izvi zvatsinhirwawo naVaNigel Nyamutumbu avo vanoshanda nesangano reZimbabwe Union of Journalists pamwe nereMedia Alliance of Zimbabwe. Zvichakadai, VaKhumalo vashora hurumende nekuumba chikwata ichi panguva iyo mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vasati vasaina bhiri iri kuti rive mutemo wenyika vachiti kana. Sangano reCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition ratiwo riri kutyira kuti hurumende ichashandisa mutemo uyu kana VaMnangagwa vachinge vaisa runyoro rwavo kuti bhiri iri uve mutemo wenyika kuzombunyikidza kodzero dzevanhu zvikuru sei vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu, vatori venhau pamwe nevemapato anopikisa. Bhiri iri kana rave mutemo richange richibvumidza hurumende kuti ipote ichidongorera mumadandemutande evanhu ichiona kuti vari kutaura zvipi. Bhiri reCyber Security and Data Protection iri rakapasiswa nedare reparamende rikazopasiswa zvakare mudare reseneti muna Chikunguru. Bhiri iri ramirira kuti mutungamiri wenyika asaine kuti rive mutemo wenyika. Hurumende yakambosunga mutori wenhau Hopewell Chin’ono, mutungamiri webato reTransform Zimbabwe, VaJacob Ngarivhume, mutauriri weMDC Alliance Muzvare Fadzayi Mahere pamwe nemutevedzeri webato rinopikisa iri VaJob Sikhala nevamwewo mushure mekuburitsa mashoko ainzi nehurumende aisvibisa zita renyika. No media source currently available
title: Vanorwira Kodzero dzeVanhu Voshushikana neHurongwa hweHurumende hweKusora Zvinoiswa paMadandemutande

text: Bato reMDC-T rinotungamirirwa naVaDouglas Mwonzora rinoti riri kushushikana zvikuru nekubviswa kwevanga vakafanobata chigaro chameya weHarare, VaStewart Mutizwa, pachigaro nemakanzura ebato reCitizen’s Coalition for Change (CCC) musarudzo yakaitwa neChishanu muHarare. Sarudzo iyi yakaona VaEnock Mupamawonde vebato reCCC avo vachangobva kusarudzwa musarudzo dzema by-election dzakaitwa mwedzi wapera, vachitora chigaro ichi. Mutauriri webato reMDC-T, VaWitness Dube, vanoti bato reCitizens’ Coalition for Change harina mvumo yekudzinga meya werimwe bato, vachiti zvakaitwa nebato iri zviri kunze kwemutemo,. Vanotiwo zvinopikisana nezvakaziviswa negurukota rezvekutongwa kwematunhu VaJuly Moyo, zvekuti hutungamiri hwemakanzuru hahufanirwe kushandurwa mushure memusarudzo dza 26 Kurume idzi, zvichireva kuti makanzura matsva eCCC haafanirwe kubata zvigaro. VaMupamawonde vari kubata chigaro chaVaJacob Mafume vebato reCCC zvakare, avo vari pazororo. VaMafue vakaudza Studio 7 neChishanu kuti bato ravo rakanga risiri kuzotevera tsamba yaVaJuly Moyo iyi vachiti ivo nemaziviro avo emutemo vachatevera chikamu 96 chemutemo wekutongwa kwemaguta, kana kuti Urban Councils Act. Asi VaDube vanoti kana CCC yaipikisa danho regurukota iri, yaifanirwa kuenda kumatare, kwete kudzinga meya webato ravo. VaDube vanoti bato ravo richambozeya nezvenyaya iyi rozoona kuti rotora matanho api ari pamutemo. No media source currently available
title: Bato reMDC-T Roshoropodza Kubviswa paChigaro kweVanga Vakabata Chigaro chaMeya weHarare, VaMutizwa, neMakanzura eBato reCCC

text: Vamwe vanhu vanoti kuwanda kuri kuramba kuchiita nyaya dzevanhu vanonzi vari kubira vanhu, kuponda pamwe nekuita zvemhirizhonga vachishandisa mabhemba, avo vave kuzivikanwa nerekuti “mashurugwi”, kunogona kuita kuti munyika mupedzisire musingachatevedzerwi mutemo zvachose.\n\nVamwe vataura neStudio 7 vati vave kutyira hupenyu hwavo nekuda kwekuwanda kwenyaya dzevanhu vari kuba kana kuponda vanhu vachishandisa mabhemba ayo anozivikanwa muChirungu kunzi “machetes”. Zvikwata izvi zvakatanga zvichinyanyowanikwa munzvimbo dzinowanikwa zvicherwa, asi pari zvino zvapararira nenyika yose. Mazuva mashoma adarika chimwe chikwata chevemabhemba ava chakarwisa vanhu vashanu muChegutu, madzimai maviri akafa, mamwe madzimai matatu akakuwara zvakaipisisa. Musvondo rapera irori zvakare chimwe chikwata chevanhu vanodarika makumi mashanu chinonzi chakanorwisa Kamba yemapurisa kwaNembudziya kuGokwe chichida kununura mumwe wacho akanga asungwa nemapurisa. Mukurwisana nemapurisa uku, vaviri vevanhu ava vanonzi vakapfurwa nemapurisa vakakuwara, vamwe makumi mana vakasungwa. Chimwe chikwata zvakare chemashurugwi chinonzi chakanorwisana nevanochengetedza mugodhi weGoodhope kuKadoma, mumwe wavo akapfurwa akafa. Ongororo yakaitwa nemapurisa inonzi inoratidza kuti akapfurwa akafa uyu yaive nhengo yechiuto, uye nhumbi dzechiuto dzakawanikwawo mumotokari yavaishandisa. Izvi zvakaitika mazuva mashoma shoma chimwe chikwata chevemabhemba ava chauraya mupurisa kuKadoma kwakare. Kunyange hazvo pave nenguva nyaya dzakadai dzichiitika, mumazuva mashoma apfuura veruzhinji muguta reGweru vakashamisika zvikuru mushure mekunge chikwata chevanhu vaive nemapanga akadaro chakasvika pachechi yeZAOGA mumusha weMkoba 16 ndokutorera vanhu vaive muchechi umu mafoni nemari. Studio 7 yaedza kutaura nemurume anochengetedza pachechi iyi kuti tinzwe zvizere asi aramba kutaura nesu achiti haabvumidzwi kutaura nevatori venhau. Asi mumwe mudzimai anogara pedyo nechechi iyi, uyo angozvidoma nezita rekuti Amai Moyo, ati nyaya iyi yakavhundutsa vanhu vakawanda zvikuru. Mumwe mugari wemuGweru, Muzvare Nozipho Rutsate vati maonero avo ndeekuti kuregererwa kwezvikwata zvave nenguva zvichirwisana nenyaya dzegoridhe munzvimbo dzakasiyanasiyana mudunhu reMidlands nekune dzimwewo nzvimbo munyika ndiko kwave kuita kuti dzimwe mbavha dzitevedzerewo hubhinya hwakadai. Amai Jennifer Chimange vanoti maonero avo ndeekuti vanhu vari kuita hubhinya nemhirizhonga yakadai vari kuregerwa vachiita madiro aJojina nekuti vane vakuru-vakuru vanovatsigira. Mumazuva mashoma apfuura paramende yakazivisisa kuti ichaita ongororo yekuedza kutsvaga kuti chii chiri kukonzera nyaya dzezvikwata-zvikwata zvevemabhemba izvi. Veruzhinji vanoti vari kushamisika kuti sei zviri kutorera mapurisa nguva yakareba kuparadza "mashurugwi", izvo zvinonzi zviri kuzoita kuti vafunge kuti pane vari kuvachengetedza. Mumiriri weGweru mudare reparamende, VaBrian Dube, avo vanovewo gweta vari nhengo yeMDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa, vanoti zviri kuitika izvi zvinoratidza kuti munyika hamutevedzerwi mutemo sezvinogara zvichitaurwa nevebato ravo. VaDube vanotsigirawo maonero ekuti vanhu vari kuita izvi havasungwi nekuti vanoshandiswa nevamwe vakuru mubato riri kutonga reZanu PF mukuita mhirizhonga yezvematongerwo enyika. Taedza kunzwa divi remutauriri webato reZanu PF mudunhu reMidlands VaCornelius Mpereri vakati tiite zvekunyora mibvunzo yedu pasi asi vange vasati vapindura panguva yekuenda pamhepo. Asi vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vari nhengo yeZanu PF, VaGadzira Chirumhanzu vanoti zvikwata zvevanhu ava hazvineyi nebato riri kutonga, asi kuti imbavha dziri kungobirawo veruzhinji. Vanoti bato reZanu PF ndiro rine huwandu muparamende zvekuti haringatadzi kumisa vanhu vari kuita zvehubhinya ava. VaVincent Chakunda mudzidzisi wezvidzidzo zvepamusoro zvekutongwa kwematunhu pamwe nebudiriro uye muongorori wezvehupfumi akazvimirira. Vanoti nyaya iyi haigoni kupera kana pakasave nekutaura nenzwi rakasimba kwevakuru venyika vachishora nyaya iyi. VaChirumhanzu vanoti mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vakatotaura kare nezwi guru pamusoro penyaya iyi, izvo zvave kuita kuti “mashurugwi” asungwe nehuwandu hwavo. Kunyange hazvo vamwe vevanhu vari kuita humbavha nemhirizhonga yemabhemba vari kusungwa, vamwe vanhu havazi kugutsikana kuti mapurisa ari kuita basa rawo nemazvo panyaya iyi. nekune rumwe rutivi, mapurisa mumatunhu akati kuti kusanganisira muGweru, akatodzika mutemo unorambidza kutakurwa kwemabhemba aya kanawo mapanga kwemwedzi mitatu. Kusvika paonekwa nzira yekugadzirisa dambudziko iri risati rakomba, veruzhinji vacharamba vachifamba vakabatira ura mumaoko vachityira hupenyu hwavo kuti vangapondwa nemashurugwi aya. No media source currently available
title: Veruzhinji Votyiswa neKuwanda kweNyaya dzeKushandiswa kweMabhemba neMashurugwi

text: Vatsigiri vakawanda veMDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa mudunhu reMarondera vanonzi havana kukwanisa kuenda kuRufaro stadium kumhemberero dzekusvitsa makore makumi maviri kubva pakaumbwa bato iri muna 1999, sezvo vari kuchema kushaya kwemudzimai wameya weMarondera, VaChengetai Murova. Amai Murova vakashaya nemusi weChishanu mangwanani. Mutauriri weMDC mudunhu reMarondera Central, VaFarai Nyandoro, avo vaimbove meya weMarondera, vanoti bato ravo rarasikirwa zvikuru neamai vaive nerudo nevana vavo. VaNyandoro vanoti vatsigiri vebato ravo vari kurwadzikana zvikuru nekushaya kwaAmai Murova, avo vatsanangudza semunhu aifarirwa nemunhu wese, zvikuru vagari vemuDombotombo. Amai Murova vari kutarisirwa kuradzikwa kumusha kwemurume wavo kuMadziva mudunhu reMashonaland Central. No media source currently available
title: Marondera Yochema Kushaya kweMudzimai waMeya weGuta

text:
Vakarema mudunhu reMasvingo vari kuchema chema kuti chirongwa chekunyoreswa kuvhota chiri kuitwa neZimabwe Election Commission hachisi kunyatsvovika kwavari, sezvo vari kutadza kusvika munzvimbo dziri kunyoresa nekuda kwematambudziko akasiyana siyana anoenderana nekuremara kwavo, Masangano anomirira kodzero dzevakaremara ataura neStudio 7 anoti kodzero dzavo dziri kutyorwa sezvo vazhinji vavo vari kutadza kunyoresa kuvhota nekuda kwezvimhingamupinyi zvakawanda. Vemasangano ayo vanoti dzimwe nzvimbo dziri kunyoreswa hadzisvikiki nevanhu vanofamba nemawheelchair kana madondoro sezvo zvimwe zvikoro
zviri kushandiswa neZEC, zvisina zvivakwa zvekuti vashandise kana vasvika. Sachigaro wesangano reZimbabwe Disability Advocacy Empowerment and Rehabilitation Technology, (ZIDAET), Pastor Cover Mugwadi, vanoti kunyange ZEC iri kupinda mumaruwa haisi kusvika munzvimbo dzine vanhu
vakaremara.

Izvi zvatsinhirwa nemukuru webasa musangano reDisability Amalgamated Community Trust (DACT), VaHenry Chivhanga, vati mashoko ekushambadza chirongwa ichi haasi kusvika kune vakaremara zvekuti vamwe havatozivi kuti kune chirongwa chakadai. Vemasangano aya vanoti mamwe matambudziko anosanganisira kushaikwa kwezvitupa muvanhu vakaremara avo vasingakwanisi kufamba nzendo
refu kuenda kwana mudzviti zvovotadzisa kunyoresa kuvhota. Pastor Mugwadi vati varikushushikana nenyaya yekushaya zvitupa zvakanyanya. 

Mukuru webasa musangano rinomiria kodzero dzevanhu musarudzo, reElection Resource Centre(ERC), VaSolomon Bobosibunu, vati vakaremara vanofanira kupuwa kodzero dzavo dzekunyoresa kuvhota pachiromgwa chiri kuitwa neZEC.


Mukuru webasa musangano reZEC muMasvingo, VaZEX Pudurai, vati vari kuzama chose kupinda pose pane vanhu vakaremara kuti vanyorese kuvhota. Sangano reZEC rakaparura richirongwa chekupinda muvanhu kuti vakwanise kunyoresa kuvhota musi wa 1 Kurume uye chichapera musi wa 28 mwedzi uno.
title: Vakaremara Vanoti Havakwanise Kusvika Kune Dzimwe Nzvimbo Dzekunyoresa Kuvhota

text: Gurukota rinoona nezvehunyanzvi mukufambiswa kwemashoko, VaSupa Mandiwanzira, vazivisa kuti vakuru vekambani yeTelecel International i vari kupinda munyika neChipiri kuzoita musangano nehurumende zvichitevera kukanzurwa kwerezezinisi yekambani iyi svondo rapfuura. No media source currently available Telecel International ine zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana mukambani yembozhanhare yeTelecel Zimbabwe Vachitaura kukomiti yeparamende inoona nezvemakambani embozhanhare pamusoro pezviri kuitika mukambani yembhozhanhare yeTelecel Zimbabwe, VaMandiwanzira vati Telecel ine mukana wekudzorerwa rezenisi rayo kana ichinge yatevedza mitemo yenyika ino. Vazvivisa kuti vachaita musangano nevakuru vakuru vekambani yeTelecel International pamusoro penyaya iyi. Vati rezenisi reTelecel rakatorwa nePost and Telecommunications Regulatory Authority, POTRAZ, svondo rapfuura mushure mekunge kambani iyi yatadza kutevedza mutemo wePost and Telecommunications Act uyo unosungira kuti zvizvarwa zvemuno zvive nezvikamu makumi mashanu nechimwe kubva muzana mumakambani anoita zvembozhanhare. VaMandiwanzira vati kwemakore gumi nemashanu apfuura, kambani iyi yatadza kutevedza mutemo zvisinei neyambiro dzakawanda dzayaipihwa nePOTRAZ. Vanoti zviri pachena kuti kambani iyi iri kuzvidza mitemo yenyika ino. Vati mutemo wakatevedzwa pakutora rezenesi yeTelecel. Asi sachigaro wekomiti iyi, VaNelson Chamisa, vaudza VaMandiwanzira kuti danho rakatorwa nehurumende harifadzi veruzhinji sezvo zvichireva kuti vashandi vanodarika chiuru vacharasikirwa nemabasa uye hurumende icharasikirwa nemari yemitero. Vatiwo danho iri rinoita kuti vekunze vasade kuzotanga mabhizimisi munyika. Telecel Zimbabwe inoti yakabhadhara zana remamiriyoni emadhora semari yemutero kubva muna 2009 kusvika pari zvino. Vanhu vanoshandisa mbozhanhare dzeTelecel vakapihwa mazuva makumi matanhatu kuti vatore mari dzavo dziri muTelecash pamwe nekuenda kune mamwe makambani embozhanhare sezvo Telecel ichamira kushanda panopera mazuva makumi matatu. Zvichakadai vashandi VeTelecel vanoti vanoshushikana zvikuru nedanho rekuvhara Telecel. Mumashoko avaburitsa neMuvhuro, vashandi ava vati varwadziwa chose kuti POTRAZ yakaramba kutambira hurongwa hwavo hwekutenga zvikamu gumi nechimwe zvekambani iyi kuti kambani iyi isvike pazvikamu zvinodiwa nehurumende.
title: Mandiwanzira: Vakuru veTelecel Vopinda Munyika neChipiri Kuzotaurirana neHurumende

text: No media source currently available Mutauriri wemutungamiri weMDC Alliance VaNelson Chamisa VaNkululeko Sibanda vanoti bato ravo rakakwanisa kuendesa mapepa avo kudare reconstitutional court pachiri nenguva uye kwete zviri kutaurwa mumabepa nhau ehurumende. Va Sibanda vanoti MDC Alliance yakato kwidzwa nyaya yenyunyuto dzavo sezvo vane humbowo hwakawanda unoratidza kuti vakabiridzirwa uye mutungamiri wavo VaNelson Chamisa ndivo vakakunda musarudzo zvinemutsindo kwete Va Emmerson Mnangagwa sezvakataurwa nesangano reZimbabwe Electoral Commission. VaSibanda vanoti vaChamisa vatori mushishi mekuronga hurumende yavo yemangwana kuitira kuti pachazozeyewa nekupedzwa nyaya yavo vange vakarongeka. VaSibanda vanoti vachaziva zvichabuda mumavhiki maviri inotevera. "VaChamisa nhasi vaenda kusvondo semunhu anonamata, asi vatori mushishi mekuronga hurumende yavo yamangwana kutiira pavachakunda mumatare vozowanikwa vachigadzwa semutungamiri mutsva wenyika sezvo vari ivo vakakunda," VaSibanda vaudza Studio7. VaMnangagwa vange vakatarisirwa kutoreswa mhiko nhasi asi izvi zvakambomiswa sezvo MDC Alliance yakakwidza nyaya iyi kumatare.
title: MDC Alliance Inoti Yakasvitsa Mapepa Ayo kuConstitutional Court neNguva

text: United Nations iri kuenderera mberi nekuzeya matambudziko akatarisana nemadzimai pasi rose kana kuti UN Commision on the Status of Women. Musangano uyu wakatanga svondo rapera uye uri kupera nemusi weChishanu kumuzinda weUN kuNew York muAmerica. Nhengo yeparamende inomirira bato re MDC-T kuMufakose Amai Paurina Mpariwa Gwanyanya mumwe wemadzimai ari kumusangano mukuru uri kutarisa nhunha dzemadzimai uyu. Amai Mpariwa Gwanyanya vanoti vane zvizhinji zvavadzidza pamusangano uyu zvavachada kunoparurira mamwe madzimai ari kumusha pachapera gungano iri. "Ndadzidza kuti mimwe mitemo yedu munyika yakanangana nenyaya yekuremekedzwa kwekodzero dzemadzimai nevanasikana inofanirwa kuvandudzwa kuti ienderane nebumbiro remutemo idzwa renyika. Tikatarisa kuti dare guru remunyika rakapa mutongo wekuti kuroodzwa kwevanasikana vasati vabve zera kwave mhosva hapasati pave nemutemo unozadzikisa mutongo uyu munyika," Amai Mpariwa Gwanyanya vaudza Studio7. Zimbabwe yakamirirwa pamusangano uyu negurokota rinomirira madzimai Amai Nyaya Chikwinya, sachigaro ve Women's Parliamentary Committee Amai Monica Mutsvangwa uye nhengo dzedare reparamende dze kubva kumapato ose ezvematongerwo enyika. Amai Mpariwa Gwanyanya vanoti mafambiro ari kuita musangano uyu ari kuvafadza zvakanyanya. "Ndiri kufadzwa ne ruzivo rwatiri kuwana nyanya nzira dzekuyananisa mikana inopihwa madzimai zvingave zviri panyaya yemabhizinesi, nyaya yekuwana mvura yakachena, nyaya yedzidzo nedzimwe nhunha dzinotarisana nevanhukadzi," Amai Mpariwa Gwanyanya vaudza Studio7. No media source currently available
title: Madzimai emuZimbabwe Obatana Nevamwe kuUnited Nations Kuzeya Matambudziko Akatarisana Nawo muNew York

text: Zimbabwe Revenue Authority kana kuti ZIMRA inoti mari yemutero yawedzera nezvikamu makumi maviri nemapfumbamwe kubva muzana kana kuti 29% kusvika pabhiriyoni imwe nezviuru zana rimwe chete kana kuti US$1,1 billion mumwedzi mina yekutanga kwegore. Mumashoko kuvatori venhau, sachigaro weZIMRA Amai Wilia Bonyongwe vakati mari yemutero iyi yakawanda kudarika gore rapera panguva imwe chete. Gore rapera rose, mari yemitero yakange iri mabhiriyoni matatu nemazana makumi mapfumbamwe nemasere kana kuti US$3,98 billion. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi Muzvinafundo Elliot Masocha vanodzidzisa paDevry University kuOhio muno muAmerica. No media source currently available
title: ZIMRA Inoti Mari yeMutero Yowedzera

text: Apo nyika yatarisana nesarudzo nemusi weMuvhuro, zvinhu munyaya dzezvehupfumi zvaramba zvakaita manyama amire nerongo. Mari yave kunyanya kushaikwa uye mitengo yezvinhu yave kuramba ichiita chamurambamhuru. Mapato ari kupinda musarudzo idzi ose ari kuvimbisa kuti akasarudzwa achaita maminimini ekugadzirisa hupfumi. Asika muromo hauzarirwe nerwizi. Mapato ari kunzi neongoro yeAfrobarometer anokwanisa kukunda musarudzo iMDC Alliance iri kutungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa neZanu-PF iri kumirirwa naVaEmmerson Mnangagwa musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika. Munyori mukuru muMDC-T inotungamirwa naVaChamisa, VaDouglas Mwonzora, vanoti Zanu-PF yakundikana kugadzirisa nyaya dzezvehupfumi. Asi munyori wezvemutemo muZanu-PF, VaMunyaradzi Paul Mangwana, vanoti vatotanga kugadzirisa nyaya dzezvehupfumi. No media source currently available
title: Ndiyani Angagadzirise Hupfumi Zanu-PF Kana MDC Alliance?

text: Vakaremara vobatana nevari kuratidzira muAfrica Unity Square muHarare vachichema chema nemamiriro aita zvinhu munyika. Hurumende yotora mimwe minda kubva kumakambani enzimbe kuChiredzi. MDC-T yochinja zuva rekuratidzira kuManicaland kuti VaMorgan Tsvangirai vapindewo mukuratidzira uku Munhau dzemitambo, tichatarisa gadziriro yeZimbabwe pamutambo weAFCON 2017 neMalawi uchatambirwa kunhandare yeNational Sports Stadium nemusi weSvondo. Muchirongwa cheWomens Round Table na8.30 pm tiri kutarisa nyaya yekupambwa kwemadzimai achiendeswa kuKuwait neSaudi Arabia. Kana muchida kupinda muchirongwa ichi, kanawo kutumira mashoko kuStudio 7, shandisai whats app panhamba dzinoti + 1 202 465 0318. Vanoda kuteerera Studio7, tibateyi na 7pm pamasaisai anoti 909 AM ne 4930 Kilohertz pa ShortWave. No media source currently available
title: Misoro yeNhau – China, Chikumi 02, 2016

text: Vagari vekuDomboshawa mudunhu reMashonaland East havasi kuwirirana pahurongwa hweimwe kambani yekuChina iri kuda kuparadza gomo rinoyera riri munharanda yavo kuti igaye matombo ekuvakisa. Vagari vemuDomboshawa vatadza kuwirirana pamusangano wavaita nenhengo inovamirira muparamende, VaEnergy Mutodi, kanzura weWard 4, VaTapiwa Murima, Mambo Chinamhora vanomirira dunhu pamwe nevamiriri vekambani iyi. VaMurima vaudza Studio7 kuti vari kuda kuti kambani yemaChina iyi ienderere mberi nekuchera gomo iri vachiti kuuya kwekambani iyi kuchasimudzira nzvimbo yavo. Asi VaMutodi, avo vabva panga pachiitirwa musangano uyu tisati tataura navo, vanonzi havasi kuda kuti kambani yemaChina iyi ibvumidzwe kugaya matombo emugomo reGarimo. VaMutodi vaudza Studio7 parunhare kuti kambani iyi ikabvumidzwa kugaya matombo emugomo iri, zvichakanganisa nyaya dzekushanyirwa kwemapako emuDomboshawa ayo akabatana negomo iri uye zvichakanganisa hutano hwevanhu vari munzvimbo yakakomberedza gomo iri sezvo pachizobuda huruva pakugayiwa kwematombo aya. Mambo Chinhamhora varamba kutaura pamusangano uyu vachiti vachatevedzera zvinenge zvabvumiranwa nevagari venzvimbo iyi. Mumwe mugari wemubhuku rekwaZimbiru, VaFungai Chimugoti, vatsinhirawo zvataurwa parunhare naVaMutodi. Mumwe mugari wenzvimbo iyi, VaBarnabas Machadu, vatiwo gomo reGarimo ndiro ravanoitira chivanhu chavo, nokudaro kambani yemaChina iyi haifanire kubvumidzwa kuenderera nehurongwa hwayo. Asi VaWilliam Moss, vanoshanda nekambani yeGeo Global iyo inova chipangamazano chekambani yemaChina iyi ye China Ayou Jialli, vati kucherwa kwegomo iri kuchabatsira vagari vemuDomboshawa mune zvakawanda uye zvichaita kuti vazhinji vavo vawane mabasa., Zvichakadai, vamwe vagari vanga vachibvumirana nehurongwa hwekambani yemaChina vasaina magwaro avati vachaendesa kune vanoona nezvemagariro akanaka munharaunda veEnvironmental Management Agency kana kuti EMA vachitsigira hurongwa hwemaChina uhwu. Vasiri kubvumiranawo nehurongwa uhwu vatiwo vachanyorawo tsamba yenyunyuto yavachaendesa kuEMA. No media source currently available
title: Vagari Vopesana kuDomboshawa Pamusoro peHurongwa hweMugodhi weMatombo

text: Vatsigiri vemapato anopikisa hurumende yeZanu PF vaungana muHarare vakaita kurudziro yekuti mafambisirwo esarudzo avandundzwe munyika pamberi pesarudzo dzegore rinouya. Vemapato anopikisa vaungana paFreedom Square muHarare vachiti komisheni inowona nezvekufambiswa kwesarudzo yeZimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, inofanira kuvandudza mashandiro ayo pamwe nemafambisirwo esarudzo munyika. Vachitaura pamusangano uyu, mutngamiri weMDC, VaMorgan Tsvangirai, vati yakwana zvino nguva yekuti ZEC ishandure mashandiro ayo vachiti semubatanidzwa wemapato aro pasi peboka riri kuzvidaidza kuti National Election Reform Agenda, kana kuti NERA, havasi kuzobvuma kuti sarudzo dzifambiswe nenzira dzinoita kuti zvido zvevanhu zvisatevedzerwe. Mutungamiri wePeople’s Democratic Party, VaTendai Biti, vati sarudzo dzichaitwa idzi dzinofanira kuita mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vabve pachigaro vachiti yakwana nguva yekuti vachinozorora. Vamwe vatungamiri vemapato vakaita saVaDidymus Mutasa veZimbabwe People First, naMuzvare Sifiso Sithole, veZanu Ndonga, vaudza vanhu vanga vari pamusangano uyu kuti vari kutsigira kuti VaTsvangirai vave ivo vachakwikwidzana naVaMugabe vakamirira mubatanidzwa wemapato anopikisana nehurumende yeZanu PF. Papera musangano uyu, vanhu vanga vari pamusangano uyu vafora vachipinda mudhorobha kunyange hazvo mapurisa nematare vakaramba kuti vanhu ava vafore. Vanga vachiratidzira ava vazomhanyiswa nemapurisa asi hapana kana mumwechete watanzwa asungwa. Zvichakadai, pane motokari mbiri dzemapurisa dzatemwa nematombo nevaratidziri ava asi hadzina kukuvara zvakanyanya. Varatidziri ava vazonoungana pamahofisi eZec pazosvitswa gwaro renyunyuto dzemapato aya nemunyori muMDC-T, VaDouglas Mwonzora, uku mapurisa anga akapakatira zvombo achirambidza veruzhinji kupinda mumahofisi aya. VaMwonzora vaudza Studio 7 kuti havana kukwanisa kuona sachigaro weZEC, Amai Rita Makarau, asi vati gwaro ravo renyunyuto ratambirwa. Gwaro renyunyuto ramapato aya iro riri mumaoko meStudio 7 riri kukurudzira kuti paumbwe imwe komisheni inofambisa sarudzo uye kuti mitemo yose inofambisa sarudzo ivandundzwe. Gwaro iri rinotiwo zvichashandiswa mukunyoresa vanhu sevavhoti kana kuti biometric voter registration zvinofanira kupinzwa munyika nesangan reUnited Nations Development Program sezvakambobumiranwa nemapato anopiksa pamwe nehurumende kwete kuti hurumende yeZanu PF iite izvi. Gwaro rinotiwo komisheni iyi inofanira kuchinjwa poiswa imwe sezvo komisheni iripo iri kupomerwa mhosva yekudyidzana neZanu PF. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura naAmai Makarau kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi. Zvichakadai, vamwe vanga vari pamusangano wanhasi vakaita saVaPromise Mkwananzi vesangano reTajamuka vanoti havasi kuzorega mavhoti achibirirwa. Mapato anopiksa anoti sarudzo dzakapfuura hadzina kufambiswa zvakanaka kunyange hazvo Zanu PF ichiti sarudzo idzi dzakaitwa zviri pachena. Amai Joice Mujuru nehutungamiri hwebato ravo reNational People's Party havana kubatana nevamwe vavo pachitiko ichi. No media source currently available
title: Mapato Anopikisa Ari muNera Anoti Zec Ngaivandudzwe

text: Mutungamiri weAmerica, VaDonald Trump vanonzi havasi kuda kusiyana nepfungwa yavo yekudzinga basa muchuchisi mukuru ari kuferefeta kupindira kweRussia musarudzo dzemuAmerica, Va Robert Mueller. Nyaya iyi yave negore ichiferefetwa, uye zviri kubuda zvishoma zvinonzi hazvinyatsofadza VaTrump. Dzimwe nyanzvi mune zvematongero enyika dzinoti zviri kuitwa kuna VaTrump ndizvo zvinofanira kuitwa kuvatungamiri venyika pasi rose kana vasingaiti zvinhu nemutemo. Imwe yenyanzvi idzi uye vachidzidzisa paHuddersfield College kuUnited Kingdom, Doctor Nkululeko Sibanda, vanoti zvinofadza kuti apo South Africa iri mubishi rekutongesa vaimbove mutungamiri wenyika, VaJacob Zuma nenyaya dzehuwori, komiti yeparamende yeZimbabwe inoona nezvezvicherwa, iri kushevedzawo vaimbove mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, kuti vazopindura mibvunzo pamusoro pemari inosvika mabhirioni gumi nemashanu emadhora inonzi yakabva mukutengeswa kwemangoda yavakati yakatsakatika. No media source currently available
title: Mutungamiri weAmerica, VaTrump, Vosimbirira Nerekuda Kudzinga Muchuchisi Mukuru Basa

text: Mutongi wedare ramejasitiriti, VaLanzini Ncube, varasa chikumbiro chemutori wenhau, Hopewell Chin’ono, chekuti nyaya yaari kupomerwa yekuburitsa manyepo iraswe vachipa chikonzero chimwe chete chakapihwa panyaya yaVaJob Sikhala nemusi weChipiri chokuti mutemo uri kushandiswa nehurumende kumupomera mhosva uri pamutemo kunyange hazvo magweta ake achiti mutemo uyu wakaraswa nedare repamusorosoro munyika reConstitutional Court. Rimwe remagweta ake, VaHarrison Nkomo, vatenda kuti izvi ndizvo zvaitika mudare. Chin’ono pachake audza mutongi wedare paapihwa mukana wekupa hufakazi mudare kuti vanochengetedza vasungwa havasi kutevedzera zvakaturwa nedare kuti asakwidzwe mumotokari ine vamwe vasungwa sezvo achifungidzira kuti anogona kunge akabatira chirwere cheCovid 19 paaive kuSouth Africa. Chin'ono ati aunzwa kudare ari mumotokari yanga ine vasungwa makumi mashanu nevaviri vamwe vacho vanga vasina kupfeka zvipfeko zvekuzvidzivirira kuchirwere cheCovid 19 zvakaita semamasiki zvaati zvinogona kuisa vasungwa pamwe nevanochenegetedza vasungwa panjodzi yekubatira chirwere cheCovid 19. Chin’ono ati ave kuita mapundu kubva paakatanga kuiswa ngetani idzi. VaNkomo vatsinhira kuti dare raratidza kushushikana zvikuru nezviri kuitwa nevekumajeri izvi. Chin’ono asvitsawo chikumbiro chekuti atongwe achibva kumba chikumbiro ichi changa chichipikiswa nemuchuchisi wenyaya iyi, Amai Nancy Chandakaona. VaNcube vati vachatura mutongo wavo mangwana pachikumbiro chaChin’ono ichi. Zvichakadai, VaSikhala vanzi naVaNduna vadzoke kudare mangwana apo pachatanga kunzwikwa chikumbiro chavo chekuti vatongwe vachibva kumba kwavo. Rimwe remagweta avo, VaPaidamoyo Saurombe, vatenda kuti VaSikhala vasvimha misodzi padare vachigunun’una nemabatirwo avari kuitwa nevekumajeri. Chin’ono naVaSikhala pamwe chete nemutauriri weMDC Alliance, Muzvare Fadzai Mahere, vari kupomerwa mhosva yekunzi vakaburitsa mashoko emanyepo ekuti pane mwana akarohwa nemboma nemumwe mupurisa wemuHarare akafa zvichitevera imwe vhidhiyo yakatenderedzwa nevanhu vakawanda paindaneti. Asi mutauriri wemapurisa, VaPaul Nyathi, vakaburitsa mashoko vachiti mwana uyu haana kufa, haana kurohwa uye haana kana kukuvara zvakazoita kuti vatatu ava vasungwe. Asi vasungwa ava vanoti vari kushungurudzwa zvine chekuita nezvematongerwo enyika. No media source currently available
title: Dare Rinorasa ChIkumbiro chaHopewell Chin'ono

text: Nyika yeRwanda neSvondo iri kucherechedza kusvitsa makore makumi maviri nemashanu vanhu vangangosvika mazana masere ezviuru vapondwa mukurwisana kwemarudzi. Vazhinji vevanhu vakaurayiwa ava ndeverudzi rwechiTutsi, avo vakarohwa, kutemwa nemapanga nematemo, uye kupfurwa nepfuti neverudzi rwechiHutu, mumazuva zana ekupondana uku. Kupondana kwemarudzi uku, uko kwakaitika muna 1994, kwakasiya vanhu vakawanda vatiza misha yavo, uye misha yakawanda yaparadzwa, izvo zvakazoita kuti nyika iyi ivakwe patsva mushure mekumira kwekurwisana uku. Mutungamiri weRwanda, VaPaul Kagame, vanotendwa zvikuru nekukwanisa kwavo kuunza runyararo munyika yakanga yaparadzwa nekurwisana uku, runyararo urwo rwakaita kuti marudzi airwisana aya agarisane zvakare murunyararo. Nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika vachitungamira sangano revarairidzi rePTUZ, Doctor Takavafira Zhou, vanoti izvi zvakakwanisa kuitika chete nekuti hurumende yaVaKagame haina kuviga chokwadi chezvakaitika, sezvavanoti zviri kuitika muZimbabwe pamusoro peGukurahundi. Doctor Zhou vanoti munhu akataura nezveGukurahundi muZimbabwe anoita seamutsa ngozi, sezvo vari muhurumende vasingade kuti zvakaitika izvi zvitaurwe pachena. Vanotiwo zvakakosha chose kuti nyika dzose dzemuAfrica dzitevedzere zviri kuitwa nehurumende yaVaKagame, izvi zvaburitsa budiriro inotyisa munyika yakanga ichirwisana zuro uno. No media source currently available
title: Nyika yeRwanda Yopembedzwa neKusaviga Chokwadi Pamusoro peKupondana kweMarudzi

text: Mamwe madzimai ekuMasvingo anoti atotanga kupindwa nekutya kuti sarudzo dzegore rinouya dzinogona kuita mhirizhonga yakawanda ichava kanganganisa. Vachitaura pamusangano waitwa mudhorobha reMasvingo, madzimai abva kunzvimbo dzakasiyana siyana ati nyaya dzekutyisidzirana dzakatotanga nekudaro mhirizhonga inogona kukanganisa kuitwa kwesarudzo dzakanaka gore rinouya. Madzimai aya atizve mashoko ari kubuda mudunhu ravo ndeekuti Zanu PF yatotanga kudzidzisa vechidiki mhirizhonga, uye madzishe nemasabhuku mumaruwa atotanga kutyisidzira vanhu. Mumwe mudzimai apinda musangano wanhasi, Amai Sungano Zvarebwanashe, vati vari kuona ropa richideuka gore rinouya sezvo Zanu PF yavhundutswa nemaubatanidzwa wemasangano anopikisa uri kurongwa. Nhengo yeMDC-T inogara kuMucheke, Amai Patricia Ngezi, vatiwo mhirizhonga yegore rinouya inogona kuwedzera sezvo zvinhu zvisina kumira zvakanaka muZanu PF. Asi nhengo yeZanu PF, Amai Tsitsi Mudumo, avo vaive murwiri werusununguko munguva yehondo, varamba mashoko emhirizhonga vachiti bato ravo riri kuzopinda musarudzo murunyararo. Asi vamwe vakaita saAmai Florence Gwede vati mhirizhonga ichange iripo uye madzimai anosangana nematambudziko akawanda panguva yakadai akaita sekubatwa chibharo. Vamwe vataura vati mhirizhonga inogona kuititka sezvo yakatotanga muZanu PF apo vatsigiri vayo vakarakashana kuBulawayo masvondo mashoma apfuura. Musangano wanhasi wanga wakarongwa nesangano reHeal Zimbabwe Trust uine chinangwa chekuti vanhu vataure pamusoro pekodzero dzavo, uye kugara murunyararo. No media source currently available
title: Madzimai Otyira Mhirizhonga Musarudzo dza 2018

text: Nyika zhinji, zvikuru dzeku Europe, hadzisi kufara nemabatirwo ari kuitwa kuedza kumisa kupararira kwechirwere che Covid-19 mu America. Nyika idzi dzinoti zviri kuitwa muAmerica mukuedza kumisa kupararira kwechirwere zvave kukonzera kuti nyika zhinji dzisatambire vashanyi vanobva kuAmerica. America ndiyo nyika ine vanhu vakawandisa vari kubatwa nechirwere ichi uye ndiyo ine vanhu vakawandisa vari kufa nacho kudarika dzimwe nyika dzepasi rose. Dzimwe nyika dzave kuti America haisi kurwisa chirwere ichi nesimba sezvadziri kuita idzo, naizvozvo dzave kutya kubvumidza vanhu veku America kuti vapinde munyika dzavo. Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika, uye vari nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano, Doctor Rhoderick Machekano, vanoti nyaya iyi haisi yezve coronavirus bedzi, asi kuti ine zvematongerwo enyika mukati. Doctor Machekano vanoti kubva paita VaTrump mutungamiri wenyika, America yakatanga kurasikirwa nemadzisahwira akawanda, naizvozvo nyika idzi hadzioni zvichibatsira kumira pamwe chete neAmerica panguva iyo nyika dzose dzichifanirwa kushanda pamwe chete mukurwisa denda iri. No media source currently available
title: Vashanyi Vanobva kuAmerica Varambidzwa Kushanyira Dzimwe Nyika nePamusoro peCoronavirus Yawandisa muAmerica

text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa nemusi weMuvhuro vakati hapana chakaipa pakuti vanhu vabvise masendi maviri padhora rega rega kana vachishandisa makadhi ekubhanga. VaMnangagwa vakataura mashoko aya pamusangano wavakaita nemadzimai ari mumabhizimisi ari pasi pesangano re Professional Women, Women in Business ne Business Women Forum muHarare. Gurukota rinoona nezvemari Muzvinafundo Muthuli Ncube rakaparura hurongwa hwekuwedzera mutero uyu. VaNcube vanoti mari yemutero iyi inobatwa pamari iri pasi pemadhora gumi. VaMnangagagwa vakati vanoziva kuti zvinhu zvakaomera vanhu asi havana zvakanyanya zvokuita sezvo nyika yakatarisana nematambudziko uye chikwereti chakakura zvikuru munyika nekunze. VaMnangagwa vavimbisa kuti vachagadzirisa zviri kunetsa munyika munyaya dzezvehupfumi asi vachiyambira kuti zvichamboremera vanhu vakawanda. Asi mutauriri webato rinopikisa reMDC VaJacob Mafume vanoti hurumemende yaVaMnangagwa yaremerwa nezvinhu. Mumashoko avo kuvatori venhau, vamafume vati Zanu-PF haikwanise kugadzirisa zvinhu munyaya dzezvehupfumi nekuti haina mazano acho. Mutungamiri wesangano reConfederation of Zimbabwe Retailer’s VaDenford Mutashu vanoti kusanyatsojeka kwegwara rekutora panyaya dzezvehupfumi ndiko kuri kupa kuti mitengo yezvinhu isagadzikane.
title: VaMnangagwa Vanoti Vanotsigira Mutero Urikuwedzerwa naVaMthuli Ncube

text: Vechidiki vebato reMDC-T vatanga kuungana pamuzinda webato iri weHarvest House muHarare usiku huno vachichema kushaya kwemutungamiri webato ravo, VaMorgan Tsvangirai. Mukuru wevechidiki mubato iri, VaHappymore Chidziva vanoti vane kurwadziva kukuru, zvikuru sevechidiki, nekushaya kwaVaTsvangirai uku. VaChidziva vanoti tarisiro yavo sevechidiki yakanga iri panaVaTsvangirai. “Zvese zvakaitika munyika yeZimbabwe kusvika pano nhasi kuti vanhu titi kwakuitika mapato akasiyanasiyana, tinozviziva kuti zvaibva nekuda kwekutanga kwavakaita ivo bandiko ratakaita reMovement for Democratic Change. Saka tine kurwadziwa kwakanyanya nekurasikirwa nemutungamiri wedu,” VaChidziva vanodaro. Mumwe wevechidiki vaungana paHarvest House, VaMorgan Ncube, avo vanoona nezvekurongwa kwemusangano muboka revechidiki vachibva kuMateleland South, vanotsinhirawo mashoko aVaChidziva ekuti varasikirwa aya, vachiti VaTsvangirai vakapa vana veZimbabwe chivindi chekurwisana nehurumende yevaive mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe. “Tiri kuchema Baba VaTsvangirai. Baba vakarakidza vanhu veZimbabwe vakavapa chivindi chekurwisana [nevaive mutungamiri wenyika] naRobert Mugabe. Baba vakapa kuti vana veZimbabwe tive netariro yekuti munyika muno munogona kuvawo nemumwe mutungamiri asiri Mugabe. Tiri kuchema. Tiri kurwadziwa,” VaNcube vanodaro. VaTsvangirai, vashayira kune chimwe chipatara chemuSouth Africa neChitatu uko vanga vachirapwa chirwere chegomarara change chavatambudza kwenguva yakareba. Mutevedzeri waVaTsvangirai, VaElias Mudzuri, vatenda kuStudio7 kuti ichokwadi kuti mutungamiri webato ravo ashaya. VaMudzuri ndivo vakanzi nemhuri yaVaTsvangirai vanotaura nezvehurwere hwaVaTsvangirai vakamirira bato. Mashoko ekushaya kwaVaTsvangirai atsinhirwawo nehama yepedyo yaVaTsvangirai, iyo yati haikwanisi kutaura zvakawanda panguva ino. VaMudzuri vati bato ravo rarasikirwa zvikuru nekushaya kwaVaTsvangirai VaTsvangirai, avo vakamboita mutungamiri wehurumende munguva yehurumende yemubatanidzwa nebato reZanu PF, vashaya vave pedyo nekusvitsa makore makumi matanhatu nematanhatu ekuberekwa, uye vashaya panguva iyo mubato ravo muine makakatanwa ekuti ndiyani akafanobata chigaro chemutungamiri webato iri pakati paVaNelson Chamisa naVaElias Mudzuri. MDC-T yanga yakatarisirwa kuita musangano wechimbi chimbi nemusi weChina muHarare wekuzeya makakatanwa ari mubato iri. Zvichakadaro, mizinda yeAmerica neBritain muZimbabwe yaburitsa mashoko ekunyaradza zvichitevera kushaya kwaVaTsvangirai. Mashoko aburitswa nemizinda iyi padandemutande reTwitter anoti inobatana nevana veZimbabwe munyika yose mukuchema kushaya kwemutungamiri wezvematongerwo enyika akanga asinganeti kurwira rusununguko pamwe nehutongo hwegutsa ruzhinji. Muzinda weAmerica wati unoremekedza kurwira kwavo kuti mapato ose ezvematongerwo enyika abatwe zvakaenzana, uye kurwira kwavo kuti izwi remwana weZimbabwe wese rinzwikwe. No media source currently available
title: Vechidiki veMDC-T Voungana paHarvest House Vachichema Kushaya kwaVaTsvangirai

text: Mutongi wedare kwaMutare ramejastiriti kwaMutare VaPoterai Gwezhira nemusi weChipiri vakaburitsa muhusungwa nhengo gumi neshanu dzesangano revadzidzi reZimbabwe National Students Union dzakasungwa nemusi weMugovera dzichiita musangano kuPenhalonga. Vadzidzi ava vakasungwa vachiita musangano paForestry Industry Training Centre. Asi vamwe vadzidzi vaviri vanzi vadzoke kudare nemusi weChitatu kuti paonekwe kuti vopihwa mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso here kana kuti kwete. Vadzidzi ava vange vachimirirwa nemagweta anova nhengo dzeZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights anoti VaTinoziva Bere, VaBlessing Nyamaropa naVaChris Nldovu. VaBere vanoti mapurisa ange achivapomera mhosva yekutyora mutemo wePublic Order and Security Act kana kuti POSA. No media source currently available Magweta aya anoti vadzidzi vechisikana vange vachityorerwa kodzero dzavo vari muhusungwa sezvo vange vasingakwanise kuona zvinhu zvekuti vachengetedze hutsanana hwavo uye vachityisidzirwa.
title: Vadzidzi VeZINASU Voburitswa Mutirongo

text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vakasimuka nezuro vakananga kuUganda kumabiko ekugadzwa kwemutungamiri wenyika iyi, VaYoweri Kaguta Museveni, avo vari kugadzwa nhasi kumabiko ari kuitirwa kuKololo Independence Grounds. Vatungamiri venyika makumi maviri neimwe vari kutarisirwa kunge vari pamabiko aya. VaMnangagwa vakaperekedzwa negurukota rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaFrederick Shava. VaMuseveni vakakunda musarudzo dzakaitwa muna Ndira wegore rino, idzo dzine zvakabuda zvaipikiswa nevavaikwikwidzana navo, Va Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu avo vanonyanyozivikanwa nerekuti Bobi Wine, vachiti sarudzo dzakabirwa zvemhando yepamusoro uye dzakakanganiswa nemhirizhonga. VaMuseveni vatonga Uganda kubva muna 1986 kusvika pari nhasi. Gweta rinoongorora zvematongerwo enyika uye vari mukuru weHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica, VaDewa Mavhinga, vanoti VaMnangagwa vari kunyanya kufamba izvo vanoti zvinopedza mari yenyika. VaMavhinga vanoti VaMnangagwa vaikwanisa kungomirirwa nemumiriri weZimbabwe kuUganda ikoko. No media source currently available Asi vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vari nhengo yeZanu PF, Doctor Simba Mavaza, vanoti hapana chakaipa pakuenda kwaVaMnangagwa kuUganda, kunze kwekuti kune vamwe vanongoshoropodza zvose zvaitwa nemutungamiri wenyika. No media source currently available
title: VaMnangagwa Vari muUganda kuMabiko eKugadzwa kwaVaMuseveni paNyanga

text: Vanhu vakawanda vari kubvunza mibvunzo yekuti mamwe mapato madiki nevanhu vakazvimirira vega vacharamba vachiita zvematongerwo enyika here kana sarudzo dzapera. Mumwe wechidiki uye vari murwiri wekodzero dzevanhu, VaNkosilathi Moyo, vanoti zvisineyi nekuvepo kwemapato akawanda ezvematongero enyika pamwe nevari kukwikwidza vakazvimirira vega, vanoona makwikwi chaiwo ari pakati pemutungamiri wenyika nebato reZanu PF, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa ,nemutungamiri weMDC Alliance, VaNelson Chamisa. VaMoyo vanoti kana kuchitariswa zvinhu zvakasiyana-siyana kusanganisira ongororo yemapoka akaita seMass Public Opinion Institute pamwe neAfrobarometer, vanoona mubatanidzwa unopikisa waVaChamisa uine mukana wakakura wekukunda musarudzo. VaMoyo, avo vanotungamira Zimbabwe Organisation for Youth in Politics, vanoti kuvepo kwemapato akawanda pamwe nevanokwikwidza vakazvimirira vega vakawandawo, kunogona kuve mucherechedzo wekuti munyika mave nekusununguka munyaya dzekuti vanhu vaite zvematongerwo enyika vakasununguka, izvo zvainetsa panguva yehutongi hwaVaRobert Mugabe. VaMoyo vanoti hapana chinobatika kana kubatsira veruzhinji nekuvepo kwemapato akawanda kana vanhu vakawanda vari kukwikwidza vakazvimirira vega sezvo vachiti havaone kure kwavanosvika. Asi mutauriri webato reZimbabwe Partnership for Progress, VaInnocent Mupanganyama Netanyahu, vanoti bato ravo harina kuvepo kuti ringopinda musarudzo dzemusi weMuvhuro unouya chete asi kuti rine chinangwa chekuda kuunza shanduko yechokwadi munyika. Mutauriri webato reZapu, VaIphithule Maphosa, vanoti kuve nemapato anopikisa akawanda munyika chinhu chakanaka chinogona kuvandudza hutongi hwejekerere, asi vanoti maonero avo ndeekuti zviri kuitika munyika zvinotovhiringidza hutongi hwejekerere uhu. Sekutaura kwevakuru, ruzhinji ruchaona kunowira tsvimbo nedohwe mushure mesarudzo kuti mapato madiki acharamba ari mune zvematongerwo enyika here kana kuti kwete. No media source currently available
title: Vakawanda Vobvunza Remangwana Remapato Madiki Pamwe neVari kuKwikwidza Vakazvimirira

text: United Nations inoti Protais Mpiranya uyo ange achitsvagwa nemhosva dzekuponda vanhu muRwanda muna 1994 ainge akahwanda muZimbabwe nguva yose iyi achinzi aitodyidzana nehurumende. Mpiranye ndiye munhu aidiwa kusungwa kudarika vamwe vose muAfrica yose nenyaya yemhosva dzaaipomerwa. Asi hurumende yeZimbabwe yange ichiramba kuti ari munyika. Hatina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvekuchengetedzwa kwenyika Amai Oppah Muchinguri kuti tinzwe divi rehurumende. United Nations yakasimbaradza kumutsvaga mushure mekusungwa kweaibatsira nemari vaiponda vanhu muRwanda, Felicien Kabuga ainge ari kuFrance. United Nations kuburikidza nesangano reMechanism of International Criminal Tribunals inoti Mpiranya ainge ari muHarare umo akazobatwa nechirwere cherurindi kana kuti TB muna 2006 ndokufa gore rimwe chete iroro. Mhuri yake yakayedza kuvanza nezverufu rwake kusanganisirawo kunyora zita risiri iro paguva rake kuGranville muHarare. Mpiranya ainge ave nemakore makumi mashanu ekuberekwa anonzi ndiye akatungamira mauto ekudivi remutungamiri wenyika kana kuti Presidential Guard raaitungamira kuponda vanhu zvakasiya vanhu zviuru mazana masere kana kuti 800,000 vafa. Mauto aya akatungamira kupodwa kwevanhu verudzi rwechiTutsi nevamwe vechiHutu mukurwisana kwemarudzi. Mpiranya anonzi ndiye akati mutungamiri wehurumende yenyika iyi Amai Agathe Uwilingiyimana, vapondwe pamwe nemauto gumi ekuBelgium aiva chengetedza. Izvi zvakaitika muna Kubvumbi zuva rimwe chete ndege yainge yakatakura mutungamiri wenyika iyi mushakabvu Juvenal Habyarimana isati yadonhedzwa nezvombo zvehondo. United Nations inoti pahondo yemuDRC, Mpiranya akarwa achibatsira mauto emunyika iyi airwisana nevainge vapandukira hurumende iyi vachitsigirwa nemauto eRwanda. Zimbabwe yaibatsira DRC muhondo iyi ichitsigirwawo neAngola nedzimwe nyika/ Mpiranya anonzi akamboenda kuZimbabwe senhumwa yeDemocratic Forces for the Liberation of Rwanda (FDLR) yaive nevaive mauto vechiHutu vaipomerwa mhosva dzekuponda vanhu uye kuba zviwanikwa kuDRC. FDLR yaipikisa hurumende yeRwanda. Vachuchusi veUnited Nations vakatanga kutsvaga Mpiranya muna 2002 zvakapa kuti abve atizira kuHarare achishandisa zita remadunhurirwa. Mudzimai nevana vake vanonzi vaive kuBritain. United Nations inoti mumazuva ake ekupedzisira aigara akabatira hana mumaoko achitya kubatwa nekutongerwa mhosva dzekuponda.
title: United Nations Inoti Zimbabwe Yaichengeta Mpiranya Aitsvagwa kweMakore neKutungamira Kupondwa kweVanhu kuRwanda

text: Dare ramejasitiriti muHarare rakatura neChipiri mutongo wekuti bato reMDC-T iri kufanotungamirwa naMuzvare Thokozani Khupe ribvise vechidiki vanonzi ndivo vakabvuta muzinda weMorgan Richard Tsvangirai House uri muHarare neSvondo vachiti vanobuda chete mumuzinda uyu kana vakuru vemapato eMDC-T neMDC Alliance iri kutungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa vatauarirana kuti vashande pamwechete zvakare. Vechidiki ava vanoti vari kutevera mutongo wedare reSupreme Court wekuti vaive nezvigaro muna 2014 vafambise mabasa muMDC-T, vachiti ndivo vaive pazvigaro gore iri. Bato reMDC-T pamwe nemunyori mukuru waro, VaDouglas Mwonzora, vakakwira dare neMuvhuro vachikwirira bato reMDC Alliance, VaChamisa, VaPaul Gorekore, VaHappymore Chidziva, VaDenford Ngadziore pamwe nemukuru wemapurisa mudunhu reHarare. MDC-T yakatora muzinda uyu kubva kuMDC Alliance muna Chikunguru ichibatsirwa nemapurisa. Mutongi wedare akati vashanu vekutanga vakakwirirwa dare vanofanirwa kudzosera muzinda uyu kuMDC-T, uye vaburitse muhutapwa vanhu vanonzi vakavharirwa mumuzinda uyu. Tabata VaMwonzora kuti tinzwe divi rebato ravo panyaya iyi. No media source currently available Asi mutevedzeri wemutauriri weMDC Alliance, VaClifford Hlatywayo, vanoti vakatoshamiswa nekuona mutongo uyu uchiisawo bato ravo pamwe nemutungamiri wavo VaChamisa mukati sezvo vasineyi nechekuita nezviri kuita pamuzinda weMorgan Richard Tsvangirai House. VaHlatywayo vanoti vakangonzwawo kuti muzinda uyu wakatorwa nevechidi vaiti ndivo vaive pazvigaro muna 2014 pakaitwa kongiresi yebato iri. No media source currently available
title: Dare Rinopa Mutongo Unoti Vechidiki Vakatora Muzinda weMorgan Tsvangirai House neSvondo Vabviswe

text: Mutumbi waAmbassador Trudy Stevenson avo vakashaya kuSenegal nemusi wa24 Nyamavhuvhu uri kutarisira kusvika munyika nhasi. Amai Stevenson ndivo vaimirira Zimbabwe kuSenegal neGambia. Mwanakomana wavo VaGraham Stevenson audza Studio 7 kuti nemusi weChishanu vanhu vachaungana pakereke yeOur Lady of the Wayside Catholic Church kuMt Pleasant muHarare kutanga na10 mangwanani vachinekena kekupedzisira nemufi. Amai Stevenson vakamboita nhengo yedare reparamende uye vakambodzidzisawo paArundel muHarare. Vakasarudzwa kumirira Zimbabwe kuSenegal muna 2010 panguva yehurumende yemubatanidzwa vakamirira bato re MDC inotungamirwa naMuzvinafundo Welshaman Ncube. Mutauriri webato reMDC yaVaNcube VaKurauone Chihwai vanoti Zimbabwe yarasikirwa nemunhu aigona kushanda nevamwe murunyararo uye ainge akazvipira kushanda nemapato ose. No media source currently available
title: Mutumbi waAmbassador Trudy Stevenson Wosvika muNyika Nhasi

text: Chikwata cheDyanamos chabuba mukanwa mamupere mumakwikwi eCastle Premier Soccer League mushure mekurova chikwata cheCaps United 2-1 nemusi weSvondo. Zvibodzwa zveDynamos zvakamwiswa naKingston Nkata (49’) naValentine Kadonzvo (75’). Chibodzwa cheCaps United chakanwiswa naJoel Ngodzo (43’). Dynamos iyo yainge iri pachidanho chechi gumi neshanu iri pakati pezvikwata zvina zvange zvakatarisina nekubuda mugungano iri. Asi nekukunda uku Dynamos yasimuka kusvika pachidanho chegumi nerimwe. Zvikwata zvina zviri pasi pasi iShabanie. Bulawayo City, Mutare City neYadah. Zviri pamusoro soro iFC Platinum. Ngezi Platinum, Chicken Inn neTriangle. Mimwe mitambo yakatambwa nesvondo yange yakamira kudai: Shabanie 1-1 Highlanders Black Rhinos 1-1 Harare City
title: Dynamos Yorova Caps United Ichibuda paZvikwata Zvina Zvatarisana neDivision One

text: Vanhurume vakawanda munyika vanonzi havakoshesi nyaya yekuzvipinza munyaya dzekuronga mhuri kana kuchitariswa huwandu hwevanhurume vanotsvaka zvirongwa izvi kana kuperekedza madzimai avo. Mushandi kuZimbabwe National Family Planning Council, VaDennis Mlambo, vanoti kunyange hazvo vachikurudzira kuti vanoda kuronga mhuri vauye vari vose murume nemukadzi, varume vashoma vari kupinda munyaya dzekuronga mhuri. Mumwe mugari wekuBudiriro, VaJoshua Simango, vati ivo havapindi munyaya dzekuronga mhuri sezvo nzira zhinji dzekuronga mhuri dzakadai seJadelle, Loop nemapiritsi dziri nzira dzinoshandiswa nevanhukadzi chete. VaLeon Moyo vanotiwo nzira yenguva refu yekusunga machubhu (vasectomy) inogona kushandiswa nevarume kweupenyu hwese. Asi vanoti izvi zvinotyisa varume kuti vapinde munyaya dzakadai dzekuronga mhuri. VaMoyo vakurudzira kuti kutsvakwe dzimwe nzira dzakawandawo dzinogona kushandiswa nevanhurume asi dzisiri dzehupenyu hwese. Mumwe mugari wemuHarare, Amai Chido Madziya, vatiwo vanhurume nguva zhinji vanosaidzira madzimai ari ega kunyaya dzekuronga mhuri. Amai Madziya vati varume havadi kubatsirana nemadzimai mudzimba mukuronga mhuri. Asi VaHarrison Dube vanoshanda nesangano rakazvimirira reChiedza Childcare vaudza Studio7 kuti vanokoshesa zvikuru nyaya yekuronga mhuri sezvo zvichivabatsira kuti vana vavo vakure zvakanaka vakavasiyanisa. VaDube vati pamusoro pekusungwa zvachose, vanhurume vane mukana wekushandisawo makondumu chero hazvo achishandiswa zuva nezuva. Vanhurume vazhinji vaudzawo Studio 7 kuti havana ruzivo rwakanyanya nezvekuronga mhuri, kanawo nzira dzinogona kushandiswa nemadzimai avo. Vakurudzira masangano anodzidzisawo nezvekuronga mhuri kuti vaitewo zvirongwa zvekudzidzisa vanhurume zvakawanda. No media source currently available
title: Varume Vanonzi Havafarire Kuronga Mhuri

text: Vaive mutongi gava panhaurirano dzekuti vaimbova mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugave vasiye basa, Father Fidelis Mukonori veRoman Catholic, vanoti Amai Grace Mugabe vaimbopindawo munhaurirano daiitwa pakati pemauto naVaMugabe. Vaive mutongi gava panhaurirano dzekuti vaimbova mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugave vasiye basa, Father Fidelis Mukonori veRoman Catholic, vanoti Amai Grace Mugabe vaimbopindawo munhaurirano daiitwa pakati pemauto naVaMugabe. VaMukonori vanoti pane pamwe paidaidzwa Amai Mugabe kana paine zvaida kutsanangurwa zvikuru panyaya dzine chekuita nezvemashoko ekuti pane vaida kusunga kana kupfudza General Constantino Chiwenga. VaMugabe mbune vanonzi vakambodaidzawo mudzimai wavo kuti atsanangure nezvemashoko akaverengwa nevaive mukuru weZanu-PF Youth League, VaKudzai Chipanga, ekushora General Chiwenga, mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, nevamwe vakuru vemauto vachivapomera mhosva yekuita zvehuwori. VaChipanga vanonzi vakaudza vakuru vemauto kuti gwaro ravakaverenga rainge rabva kuna Amai Mugabe. Asi Amai Mugabe vanonzi vakaramba vachiti Havana gwaro ravakapa VaChipanga VaChipanga vakaverenga mashoko avo aya mushure mekunge General Chiwenga vashora mabatirwo aiitwa vaive varwi vehondo yerusununguko mubato reZanu-PF. Pari zvino VaChipanga vari mujeri reChikurubi vachipomerwa mhosva yekuzvidza vakuru vemauto. Panyaya yekuti VaMugabe vakanzi vapihwe mari inosvika mamiriyoni gumi emadhora yekuti vaende pamudyandigere, VaMukonori vanoti havana ruzivo nezvenyaya iyi. No media source currently available
title: Father Mukonori Vanotaura Zvaiitika Nguva Yavaiyananisa VaMugabe neMauto

text: Sachigaro wesangano reZimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, Amai Rita Makarau, vanoti vakaswera Chitatu chese vachitenderera kuChitungwiza neEpworth uko vange vachiona kuti hurongwa hwekunyoresa vavhoti huri kufamba sei. ZEC yakatanga kusimbaradza kunyoresa vavhoti nemusi weChipiri yavari kuti “blitz” ichivhura nzvimbo dzekunyoresa dzakati wandei. Asi mapato anopikisa uye mamwe masangano akazvimirira anoti chirongwa ichi hachisi kufamba zvakanaka sezvo sangano reZEC riri kunzi harina kunyatsogadzirira. Vanhu vari kuchema chema kuti mamwe mahofisi eZEC ari kunonoka kuvhurwa, kana kuti pane pasina zvikwanisiro kana vamwe vanhu vanodiwa zvikuru pakutoresa vanhu mhiko kana vauya nemapepa akanyorwa pavanogara kana kuti maaffidavits. Asi Amai Makarau vanoti panogona kunge paine kunonoka mune dzimwe nzvimbo asi vakagadzirira zvikuru uye pavatenderera vaona kuti zvinhu zvose zviri mugwara nekudaro vanokwanisa kunyoresa vanhu mamiriyoni manomwe. No media source currently available
title: Amai Makarau Vanoti Chirongwa cheBVR Chiri Kufamba Zvakanaka

text: Zimbabwe yakapembererera kusvitsa makore makumi matatu nemanomwe yawana kuzvitonga asi zvinhu munyaya dzezvehupfumi hazvina kumira zvakanaka. Vamwe vanoti izvi zviri kukonzerwa nekutadza kutonga kwemutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachitungamira sangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Godfrey Kanyenze, vanoti chapa kuti hupfumi huende kumawere inyaya yekutadza kutungamira nyika kwehurumende. Asi vanotsigira VaMugabe vanoti nyaya yezvirango ndiyo yapa kuti hupfumi hwenyika huende kumawere. Munyori mukuru wevechidiki mubato reZanu-PF, VaKudzai Chipanga, vanoti chauraya Zimbabwe inyaya yezvirango zvakatemerwa nyika nenyika dzekunze. Asi mutungamiri webato reMavambo Kusile Dawn, Doctor Simba Makoni, uye vaimbova gurukota rezvehupfumi, vanotiwo kutadza kutungamira kwete zvirango kwauraya nyika. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinoti kubva muna 1980 kusvika muna 1990, hupfumi hweZimbabwe hwainge hwakasimba zvikuru. Musimboti wehupfumi hwaibva mukurima, zvigadzirwa uye mahotera kuburikidza nekushanyirwa kwenyika. Asi kubva kuma1998 zvinhu zvakabva zvatanga kuita manyama amire nerongo munyika zvakapa kuti kubva muna 1991, Zimbabwe iparure chirongwa cheEconomic Structural Adjustment Program, kana kuti ESAP. Pakapera chirongwa ichi pakabva paparurwa chimwe cheMillenium Economic Recovery Program kubva muna 1998 kusvika muna 20000. Zvirongwa zvose izvi hazvina kubudirira kusvika paumbwa hurumende yemubatanidzwa muna 2009 apo pakaparurwa chirongwa cheShort Term Emergency Recovery Program, kana kuti STERP. Hupfumi hwenyika panguva iyi hwakawedzera nezvikamu zvina nezviga zvinomwe kubva muzana kana kuti 5.7%. Pakapera chirongwa ichi pakaparurwa chimwe cheMedium Term Policy. Muna 2013 pakapera hurumende yemubatanidzwa pakaparurwa chirongwa cheZimAsset asi hupfumi hwenyika hunenge hwatonyanyaya kuenda kumawere. Zimbabwe haisi kupihwa zvimwe zvikwereti nenyika dzekunze uye inoti izvi zviri kukonzerwa nezvirango izvi. Asi vaimbova gurukota rezvehupfumi vari mutungamiri webato rinopikisa rePeople's Democtratic Party, VaTendai Biti, vanoti Zimbabwe haisi kubhadhara zvikwereti nekudaro ndokusaka pari kushaya anoibatsira. Pakawana Zimbabwe kuzvitonga muna 1980, mari yemunyika yainge yakasimba zvikuru asi iko zvino Zimbabwe yave kushandisa mari dzekune dzimwe nyika. Hurumende inoti kushomeka kwemari kuri kukonzerwa nevamwe vezvitoro vasiri kuendesa mari kumabhanga. Asi VaMakoni vanoti handiro dambudziko chiri kupa kuti zvidai inyaya yekutadza kufambisa zvakanaka nyaya dzezvehupfumi. Asi gurukota rinoona nezvehumhizha mukufambiswa kwemashoko, VaSupa Mandiwanzira, vanoti VaMugabe vari kuzorwa mafuta enguruve yavasina kudya. VaMandiwanzira vanoti VaMugabe vakwanisa kuendesa hupfumi kuvatema. Muimbi ane mukurumbira munyika, Doctor Thomas Mapfumo, anoti nyaya yehuwori ndiyo yapa kuti nyika iende kumazivandadzoka. Hongu Zimbabwe iri kupemberera kuzvitonga kuzere asi munyika zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka sezvo kusina mabasa, zvipatara hazvina mishonga nezvimwe zvinokosha muhupenyu hwevanhu. Asi hurumende inoti vanhu vane minda uye makambani akawanda ave mumaoko evatema. No media source currently available
title: Zimbabwe Yopembera Kuwana Kuzvitonga Hupfumi Huri kuMawere

text: Bato rinopikisa reCitizens Coalition for Change rinoti munhu mumwe chete afa kuKwekwe mushure mekunge vanofungidzirwa kuti vatsigiri veZanu-PF varwisa vatsigiri veCCC. Muzvare Mahere vanyora padandemutande ravo reFacebook kuti pane munhu afa uye vamwe gumi nevanomwe vakuvara zvakaipisisa mushure mekurwiswa nemakano, matemo nesimbi. Vashorawo zvikuru hurumende nekupesvedzera mhirizhonga. Hatina kukwanisa kubata mukuru mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko muZanu-PF VaTafadzwa Mugwadi sezvo vange vasiri kudaira nherembozha yavo kana kupindura mubvunzo watavatumira. Gurukota rezvemukati menyika VaKazembe Kazembe kana mutauriri wemapurisa Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi vange vasiri kudairawo nharembozha dzavo Mumwe wevakuvara ava uyo ange ari mumwe wevechidiki weCCC Nelson Chaima ati angozoona ave kutemwa nebhodhoro nevanhu vaange asingazivi kuti ndivanaani.VaChamisa vasati vataura munyori wezvekufambiswa kwemabasa mubato reCCC VaAmos Chibaya vange vati bato ravo range richiziva kuti kune vamwe vanhu vange vauya pamusangano uyu kuzoita zvemhirizhonga vakakurudzira vatsigiri vavo kuti vasaita zvemhirizhonga. Vamwe vanhu vakawanda vataura neStudio 7 vashora zvikuru mhirizhonga iyi vachiti vanhu vanofanirwa kuregerwa vachitsigira mapato avanoda pasina zvemhirizhonga. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kumapurisa panyaya iyi. Mushure mekumbomiswa kwemusangano uyu nekuda kwemhirizhonga iyi, mapurisa anodzivirira mhirizhonga azombotenderera pange pachiitirwa musangano uyu kwechinguva chidiki. VaChamisa vashora zvemhirizhonga yezvematongerwo enyika vakati zvinogona kuita kuti vanhu vazopedzisira voisa mutemo mumaoko avo izvo zvinogona kukonzera kusagadzikana munyika. Vati bato ravo harisati raparurwa zviri pamutemo asi vakaona zvakakodzera kuti vapinde musarudzo dzemaby election nekuti izvi ndizvo zvido zvevanhu. VaChamisa vati havana kumboti vanoda kuendesa nyika kuvarungu sezvavari kupomerwa nemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa asi kuti vakati bato ravo richakwezva vekunze vachasima mari munyika. Vaenderera mberi vachiti musangano wavo une hurongwa hwakajeka hwekuti hupfumi hwenyika husimukire vakakurudzira vanhu kuti vavhotere bato ravo musarudzo dzema by elections dzichaitwa musi wa26 Kurume. Zviuru nezviuru zvevatsigiri veCCC zvaunganawo kuSt Mary’s muHarare uko kwataurawo mutevedzeri wasachigario webato iri VaJob Sikhala. VaSikhala vanotiwo mangwanani anhasi pane vanofungidzirwa kuti vatsigiri veZanu-PF vamboyedza kuda kupisa tendi yavo husiku pavanga vachida kuitira musangano. Nezuro VaMnangagwa vakaitawo musangano muKwekwe mekare. Dunhu reMidlands rine maconstituency mashanu ari kuitwa sarudzo dzevamiriri veparamende. No media source currently available
title: CCC Yopomera Zanu-PF Mhosva yeKuuraya Mutsigiri Wayo kuKwekwe paMusangano waVaChamisa

text:
Vadzidzisi vakawanda vanoti havasi kuenda kubasa panovhurwa zvikoro nemusi weMuvhuro sezvo nyaya dzemihoro yavo dzisati dzagadziriswa uye vasina zvikwanisiro zvekushandisa kana vari pabasa, ukuwo vabereki vachiti havana mari dzekubhadharira dzidzo yevana vavo.

Vachitaura pamusangano wakokerwa nemasangano anomiririra vadzidzisi eZimbabwe Amalgamated Rural Teachers of Zimbabwe, ARTUZ, neProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, PTUZ, padandemutande reFacebook vadzidzisi vakawanda vati havana mari dzekudzokera kuchikoro nemusi weMuvhuro. Vadzidzisi avo vati pamusoro pemihoro isingakwane iyo inopera musi wavanoipihwa, havana zvikwanisiro uye zvikoro zvakawanda hazvina mvura. Mutungamiri wePTUZ, VaTakavafira Zhou, vati vadzidzisi vabuda pachena kuti zvakona n’anga murapwa achida vachiti havakwanise kuenda kuzvikoro neMuvhuro. VaZhou vati hurumende inokanganwa kuti vadzidzisi vaberekiwo vanofanirwa kubhadharira vana vavo mari dzechikoro.

Mumwe mudzidzisi, VaRosten Mutapwa, avo vati ivo semubereki vanofanirwa kubhadharira vana vavo mari yechikoro, kutenga nhumbi dzechikoro uye kuzowana mari yekuenda kubasa. Mumwe mudzidzisi ari nhengo yeARTUZ, Amai Linia Nkiwane, vati hurumende inofanirwa kushandisa imwe mari yayakapihwa serubatsiro neInternational Monetary Fund kubhadhara vadzidzisi nekuvawanisa zvikwanisiro. Mutungamiri weARTUZ, VaObert Masaraure, vatiwo zvikoro zvichavhurwa mikova asi hapana kudzidzwa kunenge kuchiitwa. Mumwe mubereki akataura pamusangano uyu, Amai Mildred Kambaira, vati havaone vachikwanisa kuunganidza mari yevana vavo vatatu vanoenda kuchikoro.

Gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, vakataura nezuro muSenate kuti vabereki vasina mari vanofanirwa kutaura nevakuru vezvikoro kuti vapihwe mukana wekubhadhara mari yechikoro pashoma nepashoma. Asi Amai Kambaira vati mashoko Amai Mutsvangwa haana musoro sezvo zvavanotaura zvisingateererwe nevakuru vezvikoro avo vanoda mari dzechikoro mwana asati atanga kudzidza.

Mutungamiri webato rinopikisa Labor Economists and Afrikan Democrats, Muzvare Linda Masarira, vati vanofarira danho rekuvhurwa kwezvikoro sezvo vana vanga voita misikanzwa yekunwa nekuputa zvinodhaka. Asi vati hurumende ingadai yakapa vabereki nguva yekutsvaga mari dzechikoro kwete kuvapa nguva pfupi sezvayaita izvi. Muzvare Masarira vati hurumende inofanirwa kuona kuti mitemo
yekudzivirira Covid-19 yachengetedzwa muzvikoro kusanganisira kubayiwa
nhomba kwevadzidzisi muzvikoro. Asi vati havakurudzire kuti vadzidzisi varamwe mabasa. Mutauriri webazi redzidzo yepasi, VaTaungana Ndoro, vati vanokurudzira vadzidzisi vose kuti vang vari muzvikoro pazvinovhurwa nemusi weMuvhuro. Hurumende inoti zvikoro zviri kuvhurwa musi Nyamavhuvhu 30 zvichivharwa musi wa Zvita 17, 2021. No media source currently available
title: Zvikoro Zvovhurwa Paine Makatanwa Pakati peVarairidzi neHurumende

text: Mutungamiri webato reMDC, VaDouglas Mwonzora vanonzi vashanyira mumiriri weZengeza West muparamende vari zvakare mutevedzeri wasachigaro vebato rinopikisa reCitizens Coalition for Change, VaJob Sikhala pamwe nedzimwe nhengo dzebato reCCC dziri muhusungwa kujeri reChikurubi muHarare. Mukuru muboka rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko muMDC, VaChengetayi Guta, vanoti sebato, vakaona zvakakodzera kuti vashanyire vasungwa ava vachivasimbisa munguva yavari yakaoma kudai, zvakaita kuti vakumbire mvumo mwedzi maviri yadari. VaGuta vanoti VaMwonzora vakanyorera kubazi rezvemitemo vachikumbira mvumo uye gwaro rekuti vaende kundoona VaSikhala vakazoriwana neChisnu chadarika. Havana kuda kutaura kuti zvii zvakurukurwa pakati pemutungamiri webato ravo naVaSikhala. No media source currently available Asi mutauriri wemhuri yekwa Sikhala vari gweta, VaFreddie Masarirevu, vanoti semaziviro avo VaMwonzora havana kusangana naVaSikhala, vachiti vaSikhala vakataura kare kuti havasi kuzosangana navo. VaMasarirevu vanoti VaSikhala vane zvikonzero zvakasiyanasiyana zvinoita kuti vasada kusangana naVamwonzora, zvinosanganisira chekutyira hupenyu hwavo. No media source currently available Vamwe vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vanoti VaMwonzora vave kushandisa kutambura kwaVaSikhala nevamwe vavo vari mujeri kuwana nazvo mbiri mune zvematongerwo enyika, izvo zvarambwa naVaGuta vachiti zvavaitira VaSikhala zvinhu zvavanogona kungoitira mwana weZimbabwe wese. VaSikhala nevamwe vavo gumi nevashanu vanosanganisira mumiriri weChitungwiza North, VaGodfrey Sithole, vave nemwedzi mina vari muhusungwa vachipomerwa mhosva yekukurudzira mhirizhonga kuNyatsime zvhcitevera kupondwa kwaMuzvare Moreblessing Ali vebato reCCC.
title: Mutungamiri weMDC VaMwonzora, vanoti Vashanyira VaSikhala neVamwe Vavo kuJeri reChikurubi

text: Sangano reZimbabwe National Liberation War Veterans Association kana kuti ZNLWVA nemusi weChishanu rakaita musangano nevatori venhau rikazivisa kuti harisi kuzotenda kuti hutungamiri webato reZanu-PF huiite kunge humambo hwekuti mhuri imwe chete yemutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe ndiyo inoramba ichitonga. Vachitaura nevatori venhau kuHarare Sports Club, vakuru vesangano reZNLWVA vakati havana kufara nemashoko aAmai Grace Mugabe panyaya yehutungamiri.  No media source currently available Amai Mugabe vakaudza musangano webazi reWomen’s League kumuzinda weZanu-PF muHarare nemusi weChina kuti mutungamiri wenyika VaMugabe vanofanira kudoma munhu achatora chigaro chavo. Mumashoko avo Amai Mugabe vakati, “Hakuna succession inoitwa without the involvement of Mugabe. Hakuna! Vane say as a citizen of this country.” Asi Munyori mukuru wesangano reZNLWVA VaVictor Matemadanda vakati zviri kutaurwa naAmai Mugabe kutyora bumbiro remutemo weZanu-PF sezvo vatungamiri vachisarudzwa paCongress. Vakatiwo havasi kufara nemashoko ari kutaurwa pamadandemutande ekuti Amai Mugabe vave kuda kutungamira nyika. VaMatemadanda vakati izvi zviroto, “Hope dzakanaka, asi chadzinozonakira ndechekuti kana wamuka unoona chokwadi.” Vakati VaMugabe vainge vasina masimba anodarika evamwe vakarwa hondo yerusununguko nekudaro havafanire kuita kunge hushe ndehwemhuri yavo. Asi Amai Mugabe vakati hapana chitsva pane chavari kutaura panyaya yehutungamiri, “Kune dzimwe nyika tiri kunzwa kuti mamwe mapresident vanenge vachiti ndinosiya nhingi. Imimi President musatye, tiudzei wamunoda kuti bhiza iri ngatifambe naro.” Vakaenderera mberi vachiti, “Fanike inini President mukandiudza kuti iri bhiza iri, unoonerera! Nekuti Zanu-PF tinoda zvinhu zviripachena. President mukangotiudza kuti, nyeu, ndobhiza racho iri, aha, tasimuka naro bhiza, pachena munhu wese achiona.” Asi vachipindira mashoko aya, VaMatemadanda vakati VaMugabe havana simba rekudoma achavatsiva uye vhoti yavo ingori imwe chete semunhu wose mubato. Vakarwa hondo yerusununguko ava vanonzi vanotsigira mumwe mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa. Vakashorawo Muzvinafundo Jonathan Moyo vachiti igonye rapinda mubato reZanu-PF. VaMatemadanda vanotiwo vanhu vose vemuZimbabwe vanofanira kubatana zvisineyi nekuti vari kubato ripi kuti varwise nyaya yekushaya hutongo hwejekerere munyika. Munyori mukuru weZNLWVA uyu akashorawo mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe nenyaya yekuti vanhu vasapindire munyaya dzezvematongerwa enyika vachiti VaMugabe vaitendera vachakabvu VaSolomon Mujuru uye VaJosiah Tungamirai kupinda mumisangano yePolitburo vari muchiuto. Vatiwo vanotsigira mashoko akataurwa nemukuru wemauto General Constantino Guveya Chiwenga ekutuka VaMoyo. No media source currently available Vachitaura panhepfenyuro yeStudio 7, VaMahiya vakatsinhira mashoko aVaMatemadanda vachiti havasi kufara nezviri kuitika muZanu-PF. No media source currently available
title: Vakarwa Hondo yeRusununguko Voshora Mhuri yaVaMugabe neKuda Kuita Hutungamiri Kunge Hushe hweMhuri Yavo

text: Kushomeka kwevashandi vezvehutano muzvipatara zvehurumende kunonzi kuri kukanganisa kurwiswa kwedenda reCOVID-19 ratekeshera munyika. Izvi zviri mugwaro raburitswa nechipatara chehurumende cheParirenyatwa zvichitevera ongororo yakaitwa nechipatara ichi. Gwaro iri rinoti kunyange hazvo chipatara ichi chakavandudza nzvimbo yekurapira varwere vanobatwa neCoronavirus, chipatara ichi chiri kukundikana kubatsira varwere vakawanda nekuda kwekushomeka kwevashandi vezvehutano. Mushure mekubudisa gwaro rinobata mafambiro ehurongwa hwekurapa chirwere ichi nematambudziko avakasangana nawo kubva musi wa1 kusvika 24 Chikunguru, mutauriri wechipatara ichi, VaLinos Dhire, vati dambudziko guru kushaikwa kwevashandi vezvehutano. VaDhire vati nekuda kwedambudziko iri, Parirenyatwa haisi kukwanisa kutora varwere mazana mana ane makumi maviri nevashanu panguva imwe chete kana vashandi vezvehutano vakakwana. VaDhire vati chipatara ichi chinoti pari zvino chiri kutora varwere makumi matatu panguva imwe chete. VaDhire vatiwo ongororo yakaitwa nechipatara ichi inoratidza kuti vanhu vazhinji vanozouya kuchipatara chirwere cheCovid-19 chadzika midzi izvo zvinokanganisa itsvo pamwe nekukwidza chirwere cheshuga. Chipatara ichi chiri kuchema-chemawo nekushomeka kwemishonga yekubatsira varwere pamwe nekushaikwa kwezvekushandisa mukudzivirira kutapurirwa kwechirwere kuvashandi vezvehutano. Sangano rinomirira vanachiremba vose munyika, reZimbabwe Medical Association (Zima), rinoti kuva nevashandi vakakwana muzvipatara zvehurumende kunobatsira kuti nyika ikunde kurwisa chirwere cheCOVID-19 ichi. Mutevedzeri wemutungamiriri weZima, Doctor Kudzai Masinire, vakurudzira bazi rezvehutano kuti rikurumidze kugadzirisa matambudziko evashandi vezvehutano vachiti izvi ndozvingasimbisa kurwisa chirwere ichi. Vaimbova gurukota rezvehutano muhurumende yemubatanidzwa, Dr Henry Madzorera, vanotiwo kunonoka kuenda kuzvipatara kwevarwere kunogona kuri kukonzerwa nekusamira zvakanaka kwezvinhu munyaya dzezvehutano vachiti zvipatara zvizhinji zvehurumende hazvina vashandi, sezvo vari kuramwa mabasa. VaMadzorera vatiwo avo vanofanirwa kuzoongorora vanofungidzirwa kuti vane hutachiona hweCoronavirus vari kutora mazuva akawanda vasati vaenda kwavanenge vadeedzwa, vakati izvi zvinoita kuti chirwere chikombe. Hurumende inotiwo zvekushandisa pakuongorora kuti munhu ane hutachiona hwecoronavirus kana kwete zvishoma munyika. Vashandi vezvehutano vari kuramwa mabasa vachinyunyuta nenyaya dzemihoro isingakwani pamwe nekushaya zvekushandisa zvakakwana. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kudivi rehurumende kuti pane zviri kuitwa here kugadzirisa matambudziko evashandi vezvehutano. Patafonera munyori mubazi rezvehutano, Dr Jasper Chimedza, vati tinyore mibvunzo yedu asi yanga isati yapindurwa pataenda pamhepo. Asi masangano eSenior Hospital Doctors Association neZimbabwe Nurses Association audza Studio7 kuti kubva pakagadzwa mutecedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaConstantino Chiwenga, segurukota rezvehutano, hapana musangano wati waitwa nemasangano anomirira vashandi vezvehutano senzira yekuratidza kuti hurumende ine chido chekugadzirisa zviri kunetsa bazi iri.
