Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi raVaChiwenga sezvo nharembozha yavo yanga ichinetsa kubata. Mune imwewo nyaya, zvinhu zviri kuwedzera kuipa munyaya dzezvehutano munyika sezvo kanzuru yeHarare yavhara mamwe makirinika ayo nekuda kwekushaikwa kwevashandi. Makirinika ekanzuru ndiwo anonyanyoshandiswa nevagari kunyanya mumisha inogara vazhinji. Mukuru anoona nezvehutano mukanzuru yeHarare, Dr Prosper Chonzi, vati kuramwa mabasa kwevashandi pamwe nekubatwa kwevamwe vashandi vavo nedenda reCOVID-19 kwasiya makirinika asina vashandi vakakwana izvo zvakaita kuti vavhare mamwe makirinika aya vachisiya kirinika imwe chete mudunhu rega-rega Vanhu vakawanda vaziva nezvekuvharwa kwemakiriniki aya pavanga vaenda kumakiriniki ekanzuru vachida kurapwa. No media source currently available
title: Chipatara cheParirenyatwa Chinoti Chiri Kukundikana Kubatsira Varwere veCovid-19 Sezvo Zvikwanisiro Zvisipo

text: Zimbabwe yabatana nenyika dzemuAfrica mukucherechedza zuva reDay of the African Child ichikurudzirwa nevanorwira kodzero dzevana kuti iremekedzewo zvibvumirano zveAgenda 2040, izvo zvinosanganisira hupenyu hwakanaka hwevana pamwe nehutano hwavo hwakanaka. Vachitaura neStudio7 vari muHarare, mukuru wesangano rakazvimiriria reYouth Forum Zimbabwe, VaAshton Bumbira, vakurudzira hurumende kuti iparure zvirongwa zvekusimudzira vana vechidiki, zvikuru vari kumaruwa. Mumwe murwiri wekodzero dzevana, Amai Chinga Govhati, vati zuva ranhasi rakakosha zvikuru sezvo richipa Zimbabwe nedzimwe nyika dzemuAfrica mukana wekuzvibvunza kuti zvii zvaitwa mukusimudzira kodzero dzevana. Amai Govhati vati kunyange hazvo Zimbabwe yakasaina chibvumirano cheAgenda 2040 chine zvisungo gumi zvinosimudzira hupenyu hwakanaka hwevana, vati Zimbabwe iri mumashure mukuzadzikisa zvibvumirano izvi. Mumwe wevechidiki, VaPride Mukono, vatiwo zuva ranhasi rinoyeuchidza vechidiki kuti vave nehushingi hwekurwira kodzero dzavo. Vati izvi ndizvo chete zvinounza budiriro yevechidiki. Asi mukuru we Zimbabwe National Council for the Welfare of Children, Reverend Taylor Nyanhete, vati Zimbabwe iri kuedza mukuzadzisa zvibvumirano zveAgenda 2040 vakapa muenzaniso wemutemo wedzidzo wakagadziriswa uyo wava kubvumirawo vanasikana vanoita nhumbu vari muzvikoro kuramba vachidzidza. VaNyanhete vatiwo zvirongwa zvekuwanisa vanasikana zvekushandisa munguva yekutevera zvasimudzirawo hutano hwevanasikana apo vanenge vachiita zvidzidzo zvavo muzvikoro. VaSungano Chisina, avo vanoshanda nesangano reZimbabwe Youth Council, vatiwo Zimbabwe iri kuedza kusimudzira vana sezviri mubumbiro remitemo yenyika. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kuziva kana panga paine hurongwa hwehurumende hwekucherechedza zuva sezvo sezvo takundikana kubata munyori mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaNick Mangagwa. Zuva reDay of the African Child rinocherechedzwa musi wa16 Chikumi gore rega rega kubvira muna 1991. Zuva iri rakavambwa senzira yekukurangarira vana vakaurayiwa kuSouth Africa muSoweto vachirwira kodzero yedzidzo. No media source currently available
title: Vakawanda Vanocherechedza Zuva reVana muAfrica, Day of The African Child

text: Mapurisa atadzisa vashandi vehurumende kuratidzira kwavanga vachida kuita kunyange hazvo vashandi vehurumende ava vakambenge vapihwa mvumo yekuratidzira. Vashandi vehurumende nhasi vawana nzvimbo yavanga vakazivisa kuti vachatangira kuratidzira yakakombwa nemapurisa anga akapakatira zvombo uye aine motokari dzanga dzizere mvura inovava. Zvisinei, vashandi vehurumende vane chitsamba vakwanisa kusvika pamahofisi ePublic Service Association pavanga vachifanira kusangana apa pasina avadzivisa ndokutanga kuimba zvakaomarara vachigadzirira kuti vanosiya magwaro enyunyuto kumahofisi egurukota rezvemari, VaMthuli Ncube, pamwe negurukota rezvevashandi, Amai Sekai Nzenza. Pavatanga kufamba vachibva pamahofisi ePSA aya vakatakura zvinyorwa zvakasiyanasiyana, mapurisa abva avavharidzira achishandisa chisimba mushure mekunge varatidziri ava vaedza kumanikidzira kuti vapfuure pamudhuri wevanhu wanga wagadzirwa nemapurisa. Vamwe vevaratidziri ava vabva vagara pasi zvazoita kuti mapurisa avazvuzvurudze achivadzosera kwanga kuine vamwe vavo. Sachigaro weApex Council, Amai Cecelia Alexander, nehumwe hutungamiri hwemasangana anomirira vashandi vehurumende vamboedza kutaura nemapurisa aya asi mapurisa aramba akatsika madziro achiti audzwa nevakuru vavo kuti kuratidzira uku hakusi kuzoenderera mberi. Amai Alexander vashora zvaitwa nemapurisa izvi vakabva vabvarura magwaro enyunyuto avanga vachida kunosvitsa kuhurumende. Mutungamiri wesangano rinomirira vadziddzisi vekumaruwa reAmalagamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaObert Masaraure, vati chanetsa ndechekuti hurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa yave kufunga kuti yave kupandukirwa nevashandi vayo kunyange hazvo vashandi vakangomira nenyaya yekuda kuwedzerwa mari dzemihoro. Munyori mukuru musangano reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaRaymond Majongwe, vati vashandi vehurumende vave kunhonga svosve nemuromo zvekuti havachatokwanisi kuenda kubasa kubva zvino zvichienda mberi. Zvichakadai, VaMunyaradzi Gwisai avo vanoshanda nesangano reInternational Socialist Organization, vati chave kudikanwa ndechekuti vashandi nevarombo vachibatana voita chinhu chimwe chete mukuedza kumanikidza hurumende kuti igadzirise matambudziko akatarisana nenyika. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nemutauriri wemapurisa, VaPaul Nyathi, kuti tinzwe kuti sei mapurisa azorambidza vashandi vehurumende kuratidzira iwo akambenge avapa mvumo sezvo vanga vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. Asi Amai Alexander vati vave kukwidza nyaya yekurambidzwa kuratidzira kwavaitwa nemapurisa kusangano reInternational Labour Organization. Gurukota rezvemari, VaMthuli Ncube, vati tigovafonera zvakare kuti tinzwe pamire hurumende panyaya dzemihoro yevashandi vayo. Asi VaNcube vakaudza nhengo dzeparamende kumusangano wekugadzirira bhajeti renyika wakaitirwa kuVictoria Falls kuti homwe yehurumende yakabooka zvekuti hurumende haikwanise kubhadhara vashandi vayo mari yavari kuda yakaringana ne interbank rate. Vashandi vehurumende vanoti yakwana zvino nguva yekuti vabatane vataure nezwi rimwe chete sezvo vachiti hurumende iri kungochinjachinja serwaivhi panyaya dzemihoro nemari dzemabhonasi. Vashandi vehurumende vanotiwo havasi kufara kuti hurumende haisi kuvabudira pachena panhaurirano dzavanoita pasi peNational Joint Negotiating Council, NJNC, pamusoro penhau dzekuwedzera vashandi mari dzemihoro nemabhonasi vachiti hurumende inozongozwikwa yotaura pfungwa dzayo mumapepanhau isingashandise misangano yeNJNC kuisa pfungwa dzayo patafura. Vashandi vehurumende vanoti mari dzavari kutambiriswa nehurumende hadzichavakwaniri kuenda kumabasa pamwe nekuraramisa mhuri dzavo pakatariswa kusamira zvakanaka kwezvinhu munyika munyaya dzezvehupfumi. Hatina kukwanisa kutaurawo naAmai Nzenza kuti tinzwe pamire bazi ravo panyaya iyi sezvo vanga vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. No media source currently available
title: Mapurisa Anotadzisa Vashandi veHurumende Kuratidzira

text: Nhandare yeHarare International Airport yapihwa zita idzva uye ichange yave kudaidzwa kuti Robert Gabriel Mugabe International Airport. Vachitaura pakuchinjwa kwaitwa zita renhandare yeHarare International Airport kupinda muzita ravo panhandare yendege iyi, mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vati vanofara zvikuru kuti vapihwa ruremekedzo urwu. Nhengo yeboka revechidiki muZanu PF, VaTongai Kasukuwere, vanoti kuchinjwa kwaitwa zita renhandare yendege hombe munyika kupinda muzita raVaMugabe, chinhu chakakodzera pakatariswa nhoroondo yaVaMugabe neruremekedzo rwavanovapa mubato ravo. Gurukota rinowona nezvinoitika kunze kwenyika, VaWalter Mzembi, vati hapana chinoshamisa kuti nhandare yendege iyi yapihwa zita remutungamiri wenyika sezvo zviri zvinhu zvakaitikawo kune dzimwe nyika idzo dzakapa mazita enhandare dzendege kuvanhu vakashanda zvikuru munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika munyika dzavo. Mashoko aburitswa nebato guru rinopokisa munyika reMDC inotungamirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai anoti hazvikodzere kuti nhandare iyi ipihwe zita remutungamiri wenyika nepamusana pekuipa kwavanoti kwakaita hutongi hwavo. MDC T inoti zvinotoshamisa kuti nhandare yendege iyi yachinjwa zita kuiswa muzita raVaMugabe avo bato iri rinoti vane migwagwa yakaiswa muzita ravo mumaguta nemadhorobha mazhinji munyika. MDCT inoti izvi zvava kuita sekuti VaMugabe vave kutora nyika yose kuisa muzita ravo. Mutauriri webato iri, va Obert Gutu, vanoti zviri kuitwa mu Zanu-PF ndezvokuda kuti Zimbabwe ive mumaoko emhuri yekwa Mugabe zvachose. Vanoshorawo zvavanoti zvirongwa zve Zanu-PF zvekuda kuti mudzimai wava Mugabe arambe achikwiridzirwa kuti ave mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika kana kutozova mutungamiri wenyika kana vaMugabe vabva pachigaro. No media source currently available No media source currently available
title: Nhandare Huru yeNdege Yopihwa Zita raVaMugabe

text: Mudzimai wemutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika VaConstantino Chiwenga, Amai Marry Chiwenga, vamiswa pamberi pedare vachipomerwa mhosva yekuda kuuraya murume wavo, kubuditsa mari kunze kwenyika zviri kunze kwemutemo pamwe nekuita chikiribidi kuti vachatiswe murume wavo achirwara. Amai Chiwenga, avo vakasungwa neMugovera, vamiswa pamberi pedare ramejasitiriti muHarare vachipomerwa mhosva yekuda kuuraya VaChiwenga pavaive muchipatara kuSouth Africa, kuburitsa mazakwatira emari kunze kwenyika zvisiri pamutemo pamwe nekuita chikiribidi chekuti vagochatiswa nemurume wavo iye ari muhurwere. Muchuchisi wenyaya iyi, Michael Reza, vaudza dare kuti Amai Chiwenga vairambidza VaChiwenga kuti vabude muhotera kuSouth Africa kwezuva rimwechete vakazotorwa zvechisimba nevanovachengetedza vakazovaendesa kuchipatara. VaReza vatiwo Amai Chiwenga vakazobvisa zvaishandiswa navanachiremba muchipatara kuSouth Africa kwakare vachiedza kuraramisa VaChiwenga zvakazoita kuti murwere abude ropa zvakanyanya. VaReza vati izvi vaizviitira kuti VaChiwenga vafe uye vaive vasina mvumo yekuita izvi. Mutongi wedare VaCrispen Mberewere vatura mutongo wekuti Amai Chiwenga vadzoke kudare musi wa30 mwedzi uno uye vati Amai Chiwenga vakumbire kudare repamusoro reHigh Court kana vachida kutongwa vachibva kumba sezvo vati dare ravo harina masimba ekunzwa chikumbiro ichi pakatariswa huremu hwemhosva yavari kupomerwa. Zvichakadai, VaReza vaudza dare kuti Amai Chiwenga vakaburitsa mari kunze kwenyika inodarika miriyoni imwechete nezviuru mazana mapfumbamwe zvemadhora ekuAmerica zvisiri pamutemo mumazuva akasiyana vakatenga dzimba mbiri pamwe nemotokari nhatu kuSouth Africa. VaReza vati mhosva idzi dzakaparwa kubva gore rapera kusvika gore rino Amai Chiwenga vachishandisa kambani yavo yeEast Town Holdings, uye vakaburitsa mari inoita zviuru zana negumi nezvina zvemadhora ekuAmerica kuenda kuChina vachishandisa mutyairi wavo VaCarrington Kazingizi nemumwe anzi anonzi Terrance Mutandwa, uyo asina kutaurwa kuti anoita nezveyi. VaReza vaudzawo dare kuti Amai Chiwenga vakanyepera mukuru wevatongi kana kuti Judge President, VaGeorge Chiweshe, kuti vakange vabvumirana nemurume wavo kuti vachate zvakapa kuti mukuru wemamejasitiri VaMunamato Mutevedzi varonge kuchatisa vaviri ava panguva iyo VaChiwenga vaiva muchipatara, izvo zvakazopa VaChiwenga kuti vamhan’are nyaya iyi vadzoka kubva kuChina uko kwavakazopedzisira vave kurapwa. VaReza vati Amai Chiwenga vakange vatogadzirisa mhete dzemuchato mbiri dzengoda dzavaizopfekedzana nemurume wavo musi wemuchato usina kuzoitwa uyu. Mutongi wedare aramba kutambira chikumbiro chegweta raAmai Chiwenga, VaTaona Nyamakura, chekuti Amai Chiwenga vatongwe vachibva kumba kwavo achiti Amai Chiwenga vanogona kutiza munyika vakasamirira kutongwa kwenyaya idzi vachiti kuve ne diplomatic passport hakuvatadzise kubuda munyika zvisiri pamutemo. VaMberewere, avo vati Amai Chiwenga vadzoke zvakare kudare musi wa30 Zvita, vati matare anofanira kutura mitongo inotsigira hurumende pakurwisana nehuwori sezvo huwori chiri chinhu chakaipa kwazvo. No media source currently available Pavabuda mudare VaNyamakura varamba kutaura zvakawanda nevatori venhau vachiti havana kupihwa mvumo nemusungwa yekutaura nevatori venhau asi vati vachakwidza nyaya idzi kudare repamusoro nekuchimbidza. VaChiwenga vakatokwidza nyaya yekurambana kwavari kuita nemudzimai wavo kudare repamusoro uko kwavari kuda kuti vagovaniswe hupfumi hwavo. Zvichakadai, hama dzaAmai Chiwenga dzinonzi dzatyisidzira vatori venhau pamatare apa avo vanga vachidzivera. Mumwe mutori wenhau anoshanda nekambani yeNewZimbabwe.com Costa Nkomo audza Studio 7 kuti apotsa arohwa naamai vemudzimai waVaChiwenga. Mune imwewo nyaya yanga iri mumatare, vaimbova mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika panguva yehutongi hwaVaRobert Mugabe, VaPhelekezela Mphoko, vanyimwa mukana wekuti vakwidze nyaya yavo kudare repamusorosoro munyika reConstitutional Court pamhosva yehuwori yavari kupomerwa. Mutongi wedare, VaHosea Mujaya vatura mutongo wekuti hapana chikonzero chekuti VaMphoko vanzwikwe nedare reConstitutional Court sezvo mutemo wekuti havamiswe pamberi pematare usisashande kwavari nekuti havasisiri pachigaro. VaMphoko vakange vasvitsa chikumbiro chekuti vanzwikwe nedare reConstitutional Court vachiti havafanire kutongwa nemhosva yavanonzi vakapara vachiri mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika. VaMphoko vari kupomerwa mhosva yekushandisa masimba avaive nawo zvisirizvo pavanonzi vakakonzeresa kubuditsa muhusungwa kwevakuruvakuru mukambani yehurumende inoona nezvemigwagwa, yeZINARA, avo vaipomerwa mhosva dzehuori. VaMphoko vanzi vagodzoka kudare musi wa23 Ndira apo pakatarisira kutanga kutongwa kwemhosva yavari kupomerwa iyi.
title: Amai Marry Chiwenga Vanomiswa muDare Vachipomerwa Mhosva Yekuda Kuuraya Murume Wavo, VaConstantino Chiwenga

text: Gurukota rinoona nezvedunhu reManicaland zvakare vari sachigaro wekomiti yehurumende inoona nezvekupa vanhu minda mudunhu iri, Doctor Ellen Gwaradzimba vakaudza paramende neChipiri kuti hapana chavakatadza apo vakanyora tsamba kune vaimbove gurukota rezvekurima, muchakabvu Perence Shiri, kuti mwana apihwe munda papurazi reFarefell Coffee Estate kuChipinge muna 2018. Komiti yaVaJustice Wadyajena iri kuda kuziva kuti sei Amai Gwaradzimba vakanyora tsamba kunaVaShiri kuti mwana wavo, Rememberance Mbudzana, apihwe munda papurazi reFarefell pasina kutevedzwa gwara. Mukuru anoona nezveminda kuManicaland, VaClifford Mukoyi, vaudza komiti iyi kuti kunyange hazvo VaMbudzana vainge vanyorera kuti vaida munda, komiti inoona nezvekupa minda, haina kunge yagara kuti izeye nyaya yavo uye vakotozoona tsamba yekuvapa munda ichibva kukumahofisi aVaShiri. VaMukoyi vati Amai Gwaradzimba vakazovivisa komiti vatopedzerana naVaShiri. Amai Gwaradzimba vati ivo sachigaro wekomiti inoona nezvekupa vanhu minda kuManicaland vane mvumo yekumirira komiti iyi vachiti ndozvakaita pavaitsvagira mwana wavo munda. Vati zvese zvavakaita zvaiva pamutemo. Kupihwa munda kwaVaMbudzana, paFarfell Coffee Estate, kwakamutsa mutauro munyika sezvo muridzi wepurazi iri , VaRichard Le Vieux, vakatangawo kuchema chema vachiti vainge vave kunganganiswa bhizimisi ravo rekutengesa Coffee kunze kwenyika. Izvi zvakazoita kuti dare remakurukota ritsvagire VaMbudzana rimwe purazi kuChipinge kwekare. Dr Gwaradzimba vati havaoni chikonzero chekuti paramende irambe ichivabvunzurudza pamusoro penyaya iyi sezvo yakatopedzwa nedare remakurukota. Asi VaWadyajena vaudza Dr Gwaradzimba kuti paramende inota basa rayo zvisineyi nezvinege zvaitwa nedare remakurukota. Vati havana kufara nekuti Dr Gwaradzimba pamwe naVaMukoyo havana kuuya nehumbowo hwange hwakatarisirwa uye vavati vadzoke zvekare nematasamba anoratidza magwaro aVaMbudzana ekutsvaga munda, maOffer letters avo ekuFarfell nekupurazi kwavati vakazvipa pamwe nemamwe magwaro anoratidzawo misangano yese yeProvincial Lands Committee kuManicaland. VaWadyajena vatiwo komiti yavo haina kufara kuti Dr Gwaradzimba naVaMukoyi vakatora nguva inodarika gore kuti vauuye kuzopindura mibvunzo kuparamende. No media source currently available
title: Gurukota reManicaland Amai Gwaradzima Voramba Kuti Vakaita Huori paKuti VaPerrance Shiri Vape Mwana Wavo Purazi

text: Mutungamiri webato rinopikisa, reMDC Alliance, VaNelson Chamisa, vanoti vanokumbira ruregerero kubva kuruzhinji rwevanhu pamusoro penzira yange ichishandiswa nebato ravo mukusarudza vanomirira bato iri. VaChamisa vanoti vanoona kuti vanhu vazhinji mubato iri, vanhu vanotsvaka hupfumi vasina basa nezvido zvevanhu. Vachitaura panhepfenyuro yesangano re Centre For Innovation & Technology (CITE) nezuro, VaChamisa vakati bato ravo richazivisa nzira itsva ichashandiswa mukusarudza vanomirira bato iri musarudzo dziri kuuya. Vakati chinangwa chevamiriri vazhinji ndechekuchengetedza zvinzvimbo zvavo muparamende kana mukanzuru, kwete kumirira vanhu, vachiti mitemo mitsva iri kugadzirwa nebato ravo ichaita kuti pasarudzwe vamiriri vevanhu vechokwadi. Vakati vakadzidza zvinhu zvizhinji, kusanganisira kuti vanhu vazhinji vakauya kubato ravo havana kuuya kuzobatsira kugadzirisa zvinhu asi kuzoshandisa bato mukutsvaka hupfumi hwavo. Mashoko aVaChamisa anouya mushure mevamiriri vazhinji vebato ravo muparamende nemumakanzuru vadzingwa basa uye vamwe vavo vachibuda mubato ravo vachipinda mune mamwe mapato. Nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika, VaRejoice Ngwenya, vanoti VaChamisa vakazviziva kare kuti vanhu vazhinji vari kushandisa bato ravo mukutsvaka mari, vachiti kubvuma kwavaita uku kuchabatsira bato nekukurudzira vazhinji vanovatsigira. VaNgwenya vanoti pane mutsauko mukuru pakati pevanhu vanomirira bato neavo vanomirira vanhu vachiti, kazhinji vanomirira bato ndivo vanosarudzwa, izvo vanoti zvikonzera kuti vanhu vagumbuke nekuti anenge asarudzwa nebato haasi iye anodikanwa nekuziviwa nevanhu. VaNgwenya vaanoti izvi ndizo zvinokonzera kuti vanhu vasiye bato vachienda kune rimwe bato nekuti vanenge vasineyi nezvido zvevanhu vavanomirira. Asi vanoti chinhu chikuru ndechekuti VaChamisa vazviona vega uye vazvitaura pachena, vachiti izvi zvichakurudzira vatsigiri vavo nevamwe. No media source currently available
title: MDC Alliance Inoti Iri Kushandura Nzira Dzinoshandiswa Kusarudzwa kweVamiriri Vayo

text: Gore rimwechete mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vatora matomhu kubva kuna VaRobert Mugabe kuburikidza nekupindira kwakaita mauto munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika, bato rinopikisa reMDC rinoti zvinhu hazvisisina kumira zvakanaka kana zvichienzaniswa nepaiva naVaMugabe muhutongi. Asi bato riri kutonga reZanu PF rinoti pane zvakawanda zvashanduka munyaya dzehupfumi zvinoratidza kuti hupfumi hwenyika huri kukura. MDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa inoti hupfumi hwenyika huri kuramba huchiwira pasi zvisinei nekuti ruzhinji rweZimbabwe rwakabatana muna Mbudzi gore rapera mukuratidzira zvichitevera kupindira kwakaita masoja munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika zvakazopedzisira zvaita kuti VaMugabe vasiye basa. Muaturiri weMDC, VaJacob Mafume, vanoti hurumende yaVaMnangagwa yatadza ktungamira nyika zvakanaka sezvo vachiti makambani mazhinji arikuvhara magonhi awo kubva pakapinda VaMnangagwa panyanga. VaMafume vanoti kuvhara kuri kuita makambani uku kubudikidza nekusamira zvakanaka kwehupfumi hwenyika kwakonzera kuti mabasa anyanyonetsa munyika. Kunyange hazvo tatadza kutaura nemutaurir weZanu PF VaSimon Khaya Moyo nezvenyaya iyi sezvo vanga vachiti vari mumusangano, imwe nhengo yeZanu PF, VaTafadzwa Mugwadi vanoti pane zvakawanda zvinobatika zvaitwa nehurumende yaVaMnangagwa zvinoratidza kuti hupfumi hwenyika huri kukura. VaMafume vanotiwo chimwe chiri kunetsa inyaya yehuori hwavanoti hwatekeshera muhurumende asi VaMnangagwa vasingatore matanho akasimba kuti vauraye honye iyi. Asi VaMugwadi vanoti kusungwa kwakaitwa vamwe vaimbova makurukota ehurumende yaVaMugabe kunoratidza VaMnangagwa vakazvipira kurwisana nehuori. Zvichakadai, VaMafume vanoti chiri kukonzera kuti zvinhu zvisafambe munyika inyaya yesarudzo dzemusi wa30 Chikunguru vachiti chinodiwa ndechekuti akakunda chaiye musarudzo iyi ave iye anotungamira nyika. VaChamisa vanoti ndivo vakakunda musarudzo idzi kunyange hazvo komisheni inoona nezvesarudzo yeZimbabwe Electoral Commission yakazivisa kuti VaMnangagwa ndivo vakakunda izvo zvakatsinhirwa nedare repamusorosoro munyika reConstitutional Court. VaMafume vanotiwo nyaya yekucherechedzwa kwekodzero dzevanhu iri kuramba ichitarisirwa pasi sezvaingitwa nehurumende yaVaMugabe vachitiwo vemapato anopikisa vari kuramba vachingopomerwa mhosva dzavasina kupara. Zvichitevera kuramba zvakabuda musarudzo kuri kuitwa naVaChamisa, imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika uye vachiwanzotaura vakarerekera kuZanu PF, VaGadzira Chirumhanzu vanoti veruzhinji vakataura kuti wavanoda kuti avatungamirire ndiVaMnangagwa vachiti kugadzwa kwakaitwa VaChamisa neveruzhinji mwedzi wapera semutungamiri wevanhu kana kuti People’s President hakuna zvakunoreva. VaChirumhanzu vanoti veruzhinji vanenge vachitambisa nguva yavo kana vakaswera vachiteerera zvinoitwa pane nekutaurwa naVaChamisa neMDC. Zvichakadai, muaturiri wemubatanidzwa wemasangano anoshanda akazvimirira weCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition, VaTabani Moyo, vanoti chinodikanwa kuti zvinhu zvinake munyika ndechekuti vemapato ezvematongerwo enyika, vemasangano anoshanda akazvimirira, vedzisvondo pamwe nevemabhizimusi vaite musangano mukuru wekuzeya kuti chii chingaitwa kugadzirisa gakava riri munyika. Dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika pamwe nehupfumi dzinoti zvinhu zvicharamba zvakawoma munyika kudzamara gakava rezvematongerwo enyika rine chekuita nesarudzo ragadziriswa. Nekune rumwe rutivi, VaMnangagwa, avo vanoti vakakunda zviri pachena musarudzo dzapfuura, vanoti hurumende yavo yakazvipira kuti nyika idyidzane nedzimwe nyika munyaya dzemabhizimusi uye kugadzirisa mitemo yose inoita kuti kodzero dzevanhu dzicherechedzwe kubudikidza nekunanganisa mitemo iyi nebumbiro idzva remitemo yenyika.
title: VeMDC neZanu-PF Votatsurana neMaonero paHutongi hwaVaMnangagwa

text: Ukraine inoti Russia yatanga kurwisa nemuchadenga nzvimbo yeAzovstal Steel Factory muguta reMariupol mushure mekunge mutungamiri wenyika iyi VaVladimir Putin vamboudza mauto avo akakomberedza nzvimbo iyi amire kurwisa. Zvichakadaro, sangano reInternational Committee of the Red Cross mumashoko kuvatori venhau razivisa nhasi kuti riri kushushikana nemamiriro akaita zvinhu muMariupol umpo vanhu vasina zvekudya uye vakawanda vakakuvara vasina nzira yekubuda muguta iri. Sangano iri rati rinoda kupihwa mukana wekubatsira vanhu ava. Kurwiswa kweUkraine kuri kuuya apo mutungamiri wenyika iyi VaVolodymyr Zelenskyy vari kutarisira kuita musangano muguta guru renyika iyi reKyiv nemakurukota emuAmerica anoti gurukota rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika VaAntony Blinken uye gu rezvekudzivirirwa kwenyika VaLloyd Austin.
title: America Yotumira Makurukota Ayo kuUkraine

text: Kambani yeZimbabwe National Water Authority inoti yave kutadza kuita basa rekutsigira varimi nemvura nemazvo nekuti varimi munyika vari kuramba kubhadhara mvura yavanenge vashandisa. ZINWA inoti varimi ava vane chikweti chisati chabhadharwa chemamiriyoni makumi matatu nemapfumbamwe emadhora. Mashoko aya akataurwa nevakuru vakuru vekambani iyi apo vaitaura zviri kuitwa nekambani yavo mukusimudzira mabasa ekurima kukomiti yeseneti inoona nezvekupa masimba ehupfumi kuvatema mazuva mashomanana apfuura. Vakuru veZINWA vakati varimi havasi kubhadhara mvura kunyange hazvo bazi rezvemvura rakadzikisa mutengo wemvura kuvarimi vese zvisinei nekuti vanorima vari kumarruwa here kana kumapurazi makuru. Mumwe mukuru anoona nezvemari muZINWA, Amai Ellen Chivaviro, avo vaive nemukuru mukuru wekambani iyi, VaJeffter Sakupwanya, nevamwe vakuru mukambani iyi vakaudza maseneta kuti dambudziko guru nderekuti varimi havasi kubhadhara mvura. Vakati izvi zviri kuitika kunyange hazvo ZINWA ichipa varimi mukana wekuti vabhadhare mvura kana vachinge vatengesa zvirimwa zvavo. Amai Chivaviro vakati izvi zvave kukanganisa basa reZINWA rekuchengetedza madhamu nemidziyo yavanoshandisa. Vanoongorora nyaya dzehupfumi vakazvimirira, VaMasimba Kuchera, vaudza Studio7 kuti nyika haigoni kubudirira kana varimi vasingade kutenga mvura. VaKuchera vati kusashanda zvakanaka kweZINWA kunogona kukanganisa hupfumi hwenyika sezvo hupfumi huchirarama zvakanyanya nemabasa ekurima. Imwewo nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi uye vakamboshanda mubazi rezvemari, VaMasimba Manyanya,vanoti hurumende yakadzidzisa varimi tsika yakaipa yekuti vanofanira kupihwa zvinhu zvese mahara. Vati kuramba kuri kuita varimi kubhadhara hakuvashamisi nekuti makore apfuura hurumende yakapa nyika mutoro wekubhadhara chikwereti chevarimi che$1.5 billion chembeu, fotireza, magejo, matirakita nemimwe michina yakapihwa vanhu neReserve Bank of Zimbabwe pasi pechirongwa cheFarm Mechanisation Programme. Vanoti mabasa ekurima haagoni kusimukira munyika kana varimi vachifunga kuti vanokwanisa kurima pachena vasingabhadhare mvura nemagetsi. Mukuru werimwe remasangano anomirira varimi munyika, reZimbabwe Farmers Union, VaPaul Zakariya, vanoti zvakaoma kuita murimi vachiti murimi anobhadhariswamitero yakawanda zvekuti anotadza kubhadhara mitero yese kunyange atengesa zvirimwa zvake. Vanoti nyaya yekurima yave kuda kuti vanhu vese munyika vagare pasi kuti varonge kuitira kuti kurima kungafamba zvakana sei munyika pasina kuomesera murimi. Bazi rezvemvura rakatoderedza mutengo wemvura kuvarimi zvisinei nekuti munhu anorima ari kupi. No media source currently available
title: Varimi Votadza Kubhadhara Zvikwereti kuZinwa

text: Dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika dzinoti mutongo wabuda mudare re Constitutional Court haurambiki nekuti ndiro dare repamusorosoro munyika. Asi nyanzvi idzi dzinoti kutmbira mutongo uyu hazvirevi kuti wakanaka. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika, uye vachidzidzisa ku Kent University, Doctor Alex Magaisa, vanoti dare harina kuzeya nyaya iyi zvakanaka sezvo vatongi vasina kutora mativi ose enyaya zvakaenzana. Vachipa mutongo wavo, mutongi mukuru wematare edzimhosva, Justice Luke Malaba, vati magweta aVaChamisa akakundikana kuburitsa pachena humbowo hunobatika hunotaridza kuti vakabirirwa musarudzo. Asi Doctor Magaisa vati magweta aVaChamisa akaita zvese zvavaikwanisa kuita kuratidza divi ravo renyaya chero hazvo vatongi vakati zvavakaisa pamberi pedare hazvina kukwanisa kuratidza huchapupu hwevaitaura. Vati dare rakazadzisa zvinodiwa pamutemo kuti nyaya iyi ezeyiwe asi harina kuzadzisa zvido zvevanhu. Doctor Magaisa vatiwo pasvika nyaya iyi zvava kuda kuti vatungamiri vemapato ezvematongerwo enyika kunyanya maviri anokwikwidzana re Zanu PF nereMDC Alliance, vagare pasi vowirirana kuti vashande vese kuitira kuti nyika ienderere mberi zvakanaka sezvo vaine huwandu hwevatsigiri husina kunyanyosiyana No media source currently available
title: VaMagaisa Vanoti Kutambira Mutongo Hazvirevi Kuti Wakanaka

text: Dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzemitemo dzinoti kupikisa kuri kuita hurumende mutongo wakapihwa nedare repamusoro richimanikidza kuti mukuru wevatongi vematare edzimhosva, VaLuke Malaba, vaende pamudyandigere, kuchaita kuti nyaya iyi ishaye anotonga. Imwe yenyanzvi idzi, VaAlex Magaisa, vati mutongo uri kupikiswa nehurumende uyu unonetsa kuti nyaya yacho inzwikwe nematare sezvo vatongi vanotarisirwa kutonga nyaya iyi vari munyaya iyi. Imwe nyanzvi mune zvemutemo vari mutungamiriri weMDC T, VaDouglas Mwonzora, vati vanoona nyaya iyi ichiora iri kumatare pasina anoitonga. VaMwonzora vati vakaenda kumatare vachiti VaMalaba vamanikidzwe kuenda pamudyandigere sezvo kuwedzerwa mamwe makore vari pabasa kwaityora bumbiro remitemo vakakanganisa nekuisa vatongi vese vekumatare epamusoro eSupreme Court neConstitutional Court mumapepa avo. Gweta rinoshanda neZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights, VaMarufu Mandevere, vatiwo sezvo nyaya iyi iri kubata vatongi vese vekumatare epamusorosoro, panotoda kugadzirwa rimwe dare rinonzwa nyaya iyi. VaMagaisa vatiwo hurumende yakakanganisa kuendesa nyaya kudare reSupreme Court vachiti nyaya dzine chekuita nebumbiro remitemo yenyika, dzinofanirwa kunzwika kudare reConstitutional Court. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kugurukota rebazi remitemo, VaZiyambi Ziyambi. Asi mushure memutongo wakamanikidza VaMalaba kuenda pamudyandigere, VaZiyambi vakati vatongi venyaya iyi Justice Happias Zhou, Justice Edith Mushore naJustice Helena Charewa vainge vari muhomwe yehurumende dzekunze kunyaya America neEuropean Union. Asi munyori mubazi rezvemutemo, Amai Virginia Mabhiza, vaburitsa gwaro kuvatori venhau vachiti hurumende inoremekedza kusununguka kwematare uye inoremekedza mutongo wakapiwa nemusi weMugovera. Asi vati havawirirani nemutongo uyu uye vasiira matare kuti anzwezvakarenyaya iyi. Judicial Services Commission yakadoma vaive mutevedzeri waVaMalaba, Amai Elizabeth Gwaunza, kuti vafanobate chigaro chemutongi mukuru wematare kudzamara padomwa mutongi mukuru mutsva. No media source currently available
title: Magweta Obvunza Kuti Ndiyani Achatonga Nyaya Iri Kupikisa Kuendeswa kwaVaMalaba kuMudyandigere

text: Sachigaro wevechidiki muMDC-T, Va Happymore Chidziva, vanoti vakarohwa zvakawomarara nemasoja neMuvhuro manheru mu Harare. Va Chidziva vaudza Studio7 vachibva kuchipatara kwavaenda kunorapwa kuti vakazvindikitwa nemasoja mudhorobha re Harare neMuvhuro manheru mushure mekunge vamira pane rimwe garaji rinotengeswa mafuta emotokari. No media source currently available Va Chidziva vakurudzira hurumende kuti ione kuti masoja nemapurisa vachengetedza veruzhinji kwete kuti vawanikwe vari ivo vari pamperi pekutyora kodzero dzeveruzhinji. Vaenderera mberi vachiti munyika mungangoita kusagadzikana kana masoja nemapurisa akasiiwa achishungurudza vanhu. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika uri vari mukuru wesangano re Zimbabwe Democracy Institute, Va Pedzisayi Ruhanya, vanoti kushungurudzwa kuri kuitwa vanhu nemasoja nemapurisa kunosvibisa zita remutungamiri wenyika, Va Robert Mugabe, vanove zvakare sachigaro weSADC pamwe ne African Union. Va Ruhanya vanoti zvose zviri kuitika munyika izvi zvave kutoda Va Mugabe pachavo kuti vazvimise sezvo vari ivo mutungamiri wehurumende. Mutauriri wemapurisa, Amai Chairty Charamba, vati mapurisa haasati atambira chichemo chekurohwa kwaVa Chidziva saka nokudaro havana zvavanokwanisa kutaura nezvenyaya iyi. Kurohwa kwaVa Chidziva, avo vakakuvadzwa ziso, kunouyawo apo mutungamiri we Occupy Africa Unity Square, Va Itai Dzamara, vasiri kuwanikwa zvichitevera kupambwa kwavakaitwa nevari kufungdzirwa kuti vasori masvondo maviri adarika. Va Dzamara nesangano ravo vari kurudzira kuti Va Mugabe vasiye basa vachiti hurumende yavo yatadza kutungamira nyika zvakanaka vachiti hurumende iyi iri kuputsira hupfumi hwenyika pasi. Kupambwa kwaVa Dzamara, avo vakambosiya basa ravo semutori wenhau kuti varwire kodzero dzevanhu munyika, kuri kushorwa nemasangano emuno anoshanda akazvimirira pamwe nehurumende dzekunze dzinosanganisira America pamwe ne European Union.
title: Sachigaro weMDC Youth Assembly Chidziva Anorohwa neMasoja?

text: Gurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, vakumbira dare reNational Assembly kuti risangane kwenguva refu kuitira kuti ripasise bhajeti ra2017 pamwe nemutemo wekushandiswa kwemari yemaBond Notes vachiti nguva yapera uye hurumende inogona kushaya mari yekushandisa. Zvichitevera chikumbiro chaVaChinamasa, dare iri raita chisungo chekuti richasangana kwenguva yakareba pazuva rega rega kudzamara mabhiri maviri aya apasiswa. Dare ratanga nekuzeya mabhiri eReserve Bank of Zimbabwe Amendment Act pamwe nere bhajeti ra2017 ayo VaChinamasa vati anofanira kupasiswa nekukasika sezvo nguva yapera. Asi nhengo dzeMDC inotungamirirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai dzati nyaya yekuita zvinhu nechimbi chimbi haina kunaka vachiti nyaya dzakaita sebhajeti dzinoda kuti vanhu vaise pfungwa pamwe chete vachizeya sezvo dziri nyaya dzehupfumi hwenyika. Vanokokera nhengo dzeMDC T muparamende, VaInnocent Gonese, vati bhajeti ringadai rakapasiswa muna Zvita gore rapfuura asi izvi zvakatadza kuitika nekuti dare iri rakavhara nekukasika richipa nhengo dzeZanu PF mukana wekuenda kumusangano wadzo wekupera kwegore kuMasvingo. Mumiriri weGlen View North, VaFanni Munengami, vati zvakaipa chose kuti nhengo dzeparamende dziite zvinhu nechimbi chimbi asi paive nemukana wekuzeya bhajeti gore rapfuura. Asi dzimwe nhengo dzedare iri dzakaita saVaJoseph Chinotimba veZanu PF dzati hadzione chakashata pakuti paramende igare kwenguva yakareba ichizeya bhajeti. VaChinamasa vati nhengo dzedare iri dzakava neguva yakareba chose yekuongorora bhajeti kubvira pavakaritura muZvita gore rapfuura uye chavave kuda kunhengo idzi ipfungwa dzavo chete. Vati nhengo dzese dzichapihwa mukana wekupa pfungwa dzadzo pamusoro pebhajeti ra2017 risati rapasiswa. Bhajeti ra2017 rinofanira kupasiwa musi wa 31 Ndira sezvo hurumende inenge isisina mvumo yekushandisa mari kana bhajeti risati rapaswa musi wa31 Ndira. Zvichakadai, mumuriri weWarren Park muNational Assembly, VaElias Mudzuri, vatiwo hurumende inofanira kujekesa mutemo wemaBond Notes vachiti pari zvino vezvitoro vari kuisa mitengo yakasiyana siyana pavanhu vanotenga nemaBond Notes kana madhora ekuAmerica kana kushandisa makhadhi. Asi vamwewo vakaita saAmai Sarah Mahoka vekuHurungwe East vanoti maBond Notes akanaka chose uye vatenda hurumende nekuunza mari iyi. Mutemo weRBZ Act uri kusandurwa kuti utambire kushandiswa kwemaBond Notes. Mari iyi yakatanga kushandiswa gore rapfuura pachishandiswa mutemo Statutory Instrument uyewo panodiwa mutemo weparamende kuti arambe ichishanda zviri pamutemo. No media source currently available
title: Paramende Yozeya Bhajeti Chimbi Chimbi

text: Kunyange hazvo hurumennde yakazivisa kuti yave kumotora zvipatara zvekanzuru yeHarare zvinorapa zvirwere zvekutapuriranwa zveWilkins Hospital neBeatrice Infectious Hospital kuitira kurwisa chirwere cheCoronavirus, kanzuru inoti haisati yapihwa mari inosvika mamiriyoni masere yekuAmerica yakavimbisa nehurumende kusimudszira mabasa pazvipatara izvi. Meya weguta reHarare, VaHerbert Gomba, vakatonokumbira muzinda weChina muZimbabwe kuti uvabatsire kugadzirisa zvivakwa rinova basa rakapera. Makambani nevamwe vanhu vari kukabatsirawo nezvimwe zvinhu zvakasiyana siyana kuti zvipatara izvi zvishande zvakanka sezvinotarisrwa nebazi reunited Nations rinoona nezvehutano reWorld Health Organization rinokurudzira kuti pave nezvipatara zvakakwana zvekurapa vane coronavirus hurumende isati yati vanhu ngavadzokere kumabasa. Gweta rinombomirira mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, riri nhengo yeZanu-PF, VaTinomudaishe Chinyoka, vanoti danho rehurumende rakanaka chose sezvo richibatsira kusimbaradza nyaya yekurwisa chirwere cheCoronavirus nehutungamiri hwakajeka. Asi mutevedzeri wemunyori wezvematunhu muMDC, VaClifford Hlatywayo, vanoti hurumende iri kungotora zvipatara zvekanzuru iyo yatadza kugadzira zvipatara zvehurumende. No media source currently available
title: Kanzuru yeHarare Inoti Hurumende Iri Kutora Zvipatara Zvayo Asi Isiri Kuzvisimudzira

text: Sangano guru rinomiririra mabhizimisi muSouth Africa, reBusiness for South Africa, kana kuti (B4SA) rayambira hurumende yava Cyril Ramaphosa, kuti ivhure makambani nekukasika munguva yelockdown sezvo vanhu vakawanda vachapedzisira varasikirwa nemabasa. Imwe nhengo yepamusoro musangano iri, VaMartin Kingston, vanoti vanhu vanosvika mamirioni mana, kusanganisira vanobva kunze kwenyika, vacharasikirwa nemabasa kubva mukuvharwa kwemakambani nehurumende, ichiedza kuderedza kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Chikumbiro chavo, chinouyawo mushure mekunge hurumende yeSouth Africa, yazivisawo kuti iri kugadzirisa mutemo uchashandiswa, nemakambani emunyika iyi mukupinza zvizvarwa zvekune dzimwe nyika mabasa. Gurukota rezvevashandi munyika iyi, VaThulas Nxesi vakati mutemo uyu unofanira kudzikwa nechimbichimbi. Mutemo uyu, uyo uchashandiswa nevarimi, vemumahotera, nevanoita zvekuvaka, pamwe nevemudzimba, uchaomesera zvikuru vanobva kunze kwenyika sezvo ari iwo Mabasa akawanda anoitwa nezvizvarwa izvi.  Mudzidzisi pachikoro chepamusoro che Tswane University of Technology, Dr Rick Mkonza, vanoti chirwere cheCovid-19 chichaita kuti mhuri yeZimbabwe inorarama nekushanda iri muSouth Africa, itambure zvakanyaya. Mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Cross Border Traders Association, kana kuti ICBTA, vaDenis Juru, vatsigirawo mashoko aya, vakati sangano ravo rinofanira kutsvaga nzira dzekubatsira nhengo dzaro. Vati sangano ravo richakurudzira mhuri yeZimbabwe ine mabhizimisi muSouth Africa, kuti vaedza nepose pavano kwanisa kubatsira nhengo dzeICBTA, kana zvinhu zvaita manyama amire nerongo. VaWellington Manyonda, avo vanomiririra sangano reZim Truckers Association, vanoti hurumende yeZimbabwe inofanira kukasika kugadzirisa mamiriro ehupfumi hwayo, sezvo nhengo dzesangano ravo dzinoshandira dziri muSouth Africa, dzave panguva yakaoma. VaNesbert Mahanya, vanobva kuMasvingo vanoti varikufunga zvekudzokera kumusha uko vanoti vachano zvitangira mabasa emawoko. Kutanga muna Ndira 2018, South Africa yakaparura chirongwa chinonzi Zimbabwe Exemption Permit kana kuti ZEP chekupa mapepa kune vanoda kudzidza nekushanda munyika iyi. Magwaro aya ari kutarisirwa kushanda kusvika muna Zvita gore rinouya uye zvinotaridza kuti kuda kuwedzera nguva kuchanetsa. Chirongwa cheZEP chakatsiva chimwe chainzi Zimbabwe Special Permit chakasvika kumagumo muna 2017. Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinoda kusvika zvuru zana nemakumi manomwe 170 00 ndizvo zvine magwaro ekugara muSouth Africa pasi peZEP. Mutauriri werimwe sangano rePeople Against Suffering, Oppression and Poverty (PASSOP) Muzvare Tendai Bhiza vanoti vatotanga kuona kushanduka kwezvinhu. Hapana anonyatsoziva kuti muSouth Africa mune zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvingani sezvo zvakawanda zvacho zvisina magwaro ari pamutemo ekugara munyika iyi. Asi vamwe vanofungidzira kuti zvinogona kusvika kana kudarika mamiriyoni matatu. No media source currently available
title: South Africa Yoronga Kuomesera Vanhu Vekune Dzimwe Nyika paNyaya yeMabasa

text: Chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chinogara muJacksonville mudunhu reFlorida muAmerica, Doctor Emmanuel Nzuzu, avo vanove nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano hwepfungwa pamwe nezvekubatsira vane dambudziko nezvinodhaka, vanoti vakazvipira kubatsira vane dambudziko rezvinodhaka vari kumusha. Doctor Nzuzu pari vari zvino vari kumusha kuZimbabwe uko vari kushanda nevanhu vane matambudziko ekutadza kusiya zvinodhaka zvakasiyanasiyana zvinosanganisira mbanje, mapiritsi nedoro, kuburikidza nekuita misangano. Doctor Nzuzu, avo vave nemakore anodarika gumi nemanomwe vachiita basa rekudzidzisa vane matambudziko nezvinodhaka kuburikidza nekushanda muzvipatara zvakasiyanasiyana pamwe nedandemutande ravo, vanoti vakaenda kuZimbabwe nekuona kukura kwedambudziko nezvinodhaka ravanoti rabata nyika. Vanoti kubva pavasvika kuZimbabwe muna Mbudzi, vaita misangano miviri muHarare, uye vane tarisiro yekuti vachange vachiita mimwe misangano kunze kweHarare. Doctor Nzuzu vanoti kune vanoda kubatsirwa vanokwanisa kuvabata panharembozha yavo yavari kushandisa muZimbabwe inoti + 263 776 505 052, kanawo kutsvaga bhuku ravo rakanangana nekubatsira vanenge vaine matambudziko ekukundikana kusiya zvinodhaka rinonzi, “How to Stay Sober”. Vanoda rubatsiro vanokwanisawo zvakare kuenda padandemutande ravo rinoti https://www.howtostaysober.info, apo vanhu vanogona kuenda vachiwana zvidzidzo zvekuti vangakwanise sei kusiya zvinodhaka. Doctor Nzuzu vakaberekerwa kuChipinge vakazoenda kuAmerica muna 2003. No media source currently available
title: Nyanzvi muNyaya dzeHutano hwePfungwa, Doctor Nzuzu, Vobatsira Vane Matambudziko eZvinodhaka Vari kuZimbabwe

text: Madzimai mana anove vamwe vevanhu makumi maviri nevatatu vari kukwikwidza musarudzo yemutungamiriri wenyika anoti anoda rubatsiro rwemari rwekuti akwanise kutsvaga vanhu vachaamirira panzvimbo dzekuvhotera pasarudzo dzichaitwa kupera kwemwedzi uno. Vachitaura pagungano rekuzeya sarudzo range rakarongwa nesangano reZimbabwe Election Support Network richikokerwa naMuzvare Violet Gonda neChina manheru, mutungamiri webato reMDC-T, Muzvare Thokozani Khupe, vakati kunyange hazvo vaine zvichemo zvakawanda pamusoro peZimbabwe Electoral Commission, Zec, chikuru chavanokoshesa kuchengetedzwa kwevhoti uye vanoda vanhu kana kuti ma elections agents maviri panzvimbo yega yega yekuvhotera munyika kuti vachengetedze mavhoti aya. Pane nzvimbo zviuru gumi dzekuvhotera uye Muzvare Khupe vakati vanoda vanhu zviuru makumi maviri kuti vange vari panzvimbo idzi. Vakati vanoda miriyoni yemadhora kudzidzisa vanhu ava basa pamwe nekuvaendesa kunzvimbo dzekuvhotera. Amai Violet Mariyacha vebato reUDM vakatiwo nyaya yevachavamirira panzvimbo dzekuvhotera kana kuti ma agents iri kuvanetsa uye vari kudawo rubatsiro kuti vakwanise kuendesa vanhu ava kunzviumbo dzekuvhotera. Amai Melbar Dzapasi ve#1980 Freedom Movement Zimbabwe vakati vano bvumirana nevamwe vavo kuti mari inodiwa kuendesa ma agents yakawandisa chose asi kuti vachashanda nezviripo. Amai Joice Mujuru vakati kunyange hazvo vachida rubatsiro rwemari, vachatsvaga vamiriri vanobva munzvimbo dzavanovhotera kuti vasanetseka nemari yezvekufambisa. Vana ava vakashora mashandiro eZEC vakati vacharamba vachishanda kuti komisheni iyi ishandure mashandiro ayo kuti nyika iite sarudzo dzakajeka. Vakatiwo kunyange hazvo mauto akaramba kuti haasi kupindira munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika pane humbowo hwekuti mauto ari kuita izvi. Amai Mujuru vakati vakatovhiringidzwa kuChitsungo, kuMashonaland Central nevasori nevamwe vanofudzingirwa kuti masoja. Vana ava vakatura hurongwa hwazvavachaita kana vachinge vasarudzwa asi zvakabuda pachena kuti veruzhinji vakapinda pahurukuro iyi vanoona sekuti Zimbabwe haisati yagadzirira kuve nemumutungamiriri wechidzimai. Mumwe wevanhu ava ndaVaTafadzwa Mugwadi avo vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vakarerekera kuZanu PF. Murairiridzi wepaUniversity of Zimbabwe, Muzvinafundo Charity Manyeruke, vakati zvakanaka kuti vanhukadzi vakwikwidze musarudzo dzemutungamiriri wenyika, vachiti asi zvakakosha kuti vapinde musarudzo vaine zvikwanisiro. Vakati havaoni nyika ichitungamirirwa nemunhukadzi pakupera kwesarudzo mwedzi uno. Vakatiwo kunze kwekushaya mari mhirizhonga nemabatirwo anoitwa madzimai mumapato ezvematongerwro zvinoderedza mikana yavo yekukunda kana kuwana zvigaro zvakawanda musarudzo. No media source currently available
title: Madzimai Ari Kukwikwidza Musarudzo yeMutungamiri weNyika Otsvaga Rubatsiro rweMari

text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, nezuro vakazopindura kutsamba yakanyorwa nemabhishopu ekereke yeRoma ari pasi pesangano reZimbabwe Catholic Bishops Conference (ZCBC) achikurudzira hurumende kuti igadzirise nekukasika matambudziko ari munyika anosanganisira nyaya dzekutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu. Vachitaura pamusangano wePolitiburo yebato ravo reZanu PF, VaMnangagwa vakati bato ravo rine hukama hwakanaka chose nevemakereke hunobva munguva yehondo yerusununguko. Asi mutungamiri wenyika vakati vanokatyamadzwa kuona kuti kune vamwe vemakereke vatanga kuda kushandisa kereke dzavo kuendesa mberi zvinangwa zvakahwandika zvekuda kubvisa hurumende vachishandiswa nenyika dzekunze. VaMnangagwa vakati vemakereke vanoda kupinda mune zvematongerwo enyika vanofanirwa kubuda pachena voumba mapato ezvematongerwo enyika anozokwikwidzana neZanu PF musarudzo dza 2023. Hurumende yagara iri kuramba kuti munyika mune matambudziko. Vachitaurawo kumusangano wemakereke kwaMutare nezuro, mutungamiri wekereke yeZion Christian Church (ZCC) uye vari mutungamiri wemubatanidzwa wemachechi emunyika, weZimbabwe Indigenous Interdenominational Council of Churches, VaNehemiah Mutendo, vakashoropodza danho resangano reZCBC rekutaura nezvenyaya yeGukurahundi vachiti makereke haafanirwe kuvhura mavanga akapora kare. VaMutendi vakati makereke anofanirwa kupedzera simba rawo mukubatanidza vanhu. Studio7 hainakukwanisa kunzwa divi reZCBC. Nyanzvi yezvematongerwo enyika vachidzidzisa paTswane University of Technology kuSouth Africa, Doctor Munyaradzi Ricky Mukonza, vanoti vanoona sekunge mhinduro yemutungamiri wenyika inoratidza kuti VaMnangagwa havasi kunzwisisawo dambudziko riri munyika pari zvino. No media source currently available
title: Mamwe Makereke Oshorawo Tsamba Yakanyorwa neZCBC

text: Mapurisa eZimbabwe Republic Police ari kuyambira vanhu kuti vasachengeta mari yakawanda mudzimba dzavo, mumahofisi ebasa kana kufamba vakatakura mari zhinji, vachiti kuswera zuro muHarare, mbavha dzakanga dzakapakata pfuti dzakabira mumwe muzvinabhizimisi mari inoita zviuru makumi mana nezvishanu zvemadhora ekuAmerica (US $45,000) paakanga akamirira kuti robhoti richinje. Kwemwedzi mishoma yapfuura, huwandu hwembavha dzakapakata pfuti dzichipinda mudzimba dzevanhu dzichitora mari yakawanda zvikuru pamwe nekuuraya vanhu huri kuwedzera, izvo zvakonzera mapurisa kuti ayambire vanhu kuti vasachengeta mari mudzimba dzavo kana kunzvimbo dzekubasa. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi, Muzvare Chenayi Mutambasere, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanhu havachavimbi nemabhanga, vachiti kazhinji vanhu vanotadza kuwana mari yavo pavanenge vava kuida, sezvakaonekwa mazuva maviri Christmas isati yasvika, apo vanhu vakatadza kutora mari dzavo. Muzvare Mutambasere vati vanhu havakanganwi zvavakamboitirwa apo vakamuka rimwe zuva vakaudzwa kuti huremu hwemari yavo yakanga iri mumabhanga hwakanga hwaenzana, dhora padhora, nedhora remuZimbabwe, izvo zvakakonzera kuti vazhinji varasikirwe nemari yavo, pamwe chete nemari dzemudyandigere dzakasiyiwa dzisisina basa. Vanoti chimwe chinonetsa ndechekuti vanhu vane mari yavo, vanogona kuitengesa kana kuitenga pamusika mutema, izvo vanoti zvinovabatsira kupfuura zvirikuitika kumabhanga. No media source currently available
title: Vanhu Vokurudzirwa Kuti Vasachengeta Mari Yakawanda Mudzimba Dzavo

text: Panguva iyo nhengo dzemamwe masangano evarairidzi ari pasi pemubatanidzwa weFederation of Zimbabwe Educators Union, FOZEU, dzakapinda mukuramwa mabasa kubva neMuvhuro dzichida kuti hurumende iwedzere mihoro yevashandi vayo, mumwe mubatanidzwa wemasangano evashandi vehurumende, weZimbabwe Confederation of Public Sector Trade Unions, unoti hausi kumhanyira kupinda mukuramwa mabasa. Sachigaro vemubatanidzwa uyu, Amai Cecilia Alexander, vanoti vari kumboda kupa mukana kuhurukuro nehurumende dzakatangwa Chipiri chadarika, vachiti mutemo wenhaurirano unoti kana madzitanga chimbopedzai nezvadzo musati matora matanho ekuramwa mabasa. Amai Alexander vanoti vanotarisira kuti svondo rino hariperi hurumende isati yashevedzera mumwe musangano kuitira kuti vapedze hurukuro dzavakatanga svondo rapera, apo hurumende yakazivisa kuti ichawedzera vashandi vayo mari dzavari kutambira dziri mumadhora ekuAmerica nezvikamu makumi maviri nezvishanu kubva muzana. Asi vashandi vanonzi vakati vari kuda kuti mihoro yavo yavanopiwa iri mumadhora emunyika iwedzerwewo zvakare, uye kuti mari dzekubatsirika dzinopiwa vashandi dzitarisiswewo. No media source currently available
title: Mubatanidzwa weVashandi veHurumende weZCPSTU Unoti Uchambopa Mukana kuNhaurirano neHurumende Vashandi Vasati Vatanga Kuramwa Mabasa

text: Kuramwa mabasa kwavana chiremba vachangopedza zvidzidzo zvavo kwakonzera kuvharwa kwenzvimbo inosvikira varwere kuchipatara cheHarare Central sezvo vana chiremba vashoma vari kushanda pachipatara apa vachinzi vawandirwa nebasa. Mukuru wechipatara ichi, icho chinozivikanwa zvakanyanya nekuti paGomo, Amai Peggy Zvavamwe, vanyora tsamba ichienda kuvakuru vemapoka ose echipatara ichi vachizivisa kuti kutanga musi wa1 Kubvumbi 2016, vanenge vasisatambiri vanhu ku outpatient clinic. Vati vanenge vave kungotora vanhu vanenge vachirwara zvakanyanya chete. Amai Zvavamwe vati izvi zvakonzerwa nekutadza kuwirirana kuripo pakati peHealth Services Board navana chiremba ava pamusoro pezvibvumirano zvekupinda mabasa, izvo vari kuramba kusaina vachiti zvinotyora kodzero dzavo sevashandi. Vana chiremba vakakanda mapadza pasi mukutanga kwemwedzi waKurume vachiramba zvimwe zviri muzvibvumirano izvi, kusanganisira kusabuda pachena kwehurumende kuti vanenge vachitambiriswa marii pamwedzi. Hurumende svondo rapera yakabuda nerimwe gwaro rakavandudzwa rave kutaura kuti vanachiremba ava vanenge votambira mazana nasere nemakumi mapfumbamwe emadhora nemadhora mashanu asi vana chiremba vahciri kungoramba kuasaina. Chipatara cheMpilo Central Hospital kuBulawayo chakavharawo kunosvikira varwere svondo rapera nezvikonzero zvimwechetezvo. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kubata vakuru vechipatara cheharare central kanawo gurukota rezvehutano Dr. David Parirenyatwa sezvo vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. Asi Dr. Martin Mlilo vanove mumwe chiremba ane ruzivo nezviri kuitika pachipatara apa vanoti kuvharwa kwechipatara ichi kuchatoomesera vanhu zvakanyanya sezvo vazhinji vanga vachimhanyirako kana vawirwa nematambudziko. No media source currently available Izvi zvatsinhirwawo naDr. Rutendo Bonde vanowe sachigaro weZimbabwe Association of Doctors for Human Rights, avo vanoti vari kunyanyoomerwa varombo avo vanga vachiponera pazvipatara zvikuru zvavharwa izvi. “Chiitiko chinosiririsa panguva imwecheteyo chiri chiitiko chinonzwisisika kana takatarisa nyaya dzine chekuita nehutano hwakanaka dziri kusimudzwa nevashandi vehutano vari kushandira pachipatara apa,” Dr. Bonde vanodaro. Vanoti kana vanachiremba vachinge vawandirwa nevarwere vasisakwanisi kuvaona nekuvabatsira, vashoma vachiri pabasa ivavo vanoremerwa izvo zvinopedzisira zvokanganisa zvavanotarisirwa kunge vachiita. Dr. Bonde vanoti zvakakosha zvikuru kuti bazi rezvehutano ribate nyaya iyi sechimbichimbi kuburikidza nekutora matanho anodzivirira njodzi. “Gurukota rezvehutano ringadai rakatotora matanho echimbichimbi akaita sekushevedza vanachiremba vekuchiuto kuti vapinde muzvipatara zvehurumende nekuti hapana anga asingazivi nyaya yekuramba kutambirwa kwezvibvumirano zvemabasa izvi navanachiremba ava kubva gore rapera chairo,” vanodaro Dr. Bonde. No media source currently available
title: Chipatara cheHarare Central Chovhara Divi reKunosvikira Varwere

text: Mamwe mapato matatu anopikisa hurumende anoti MDC-T inotungamirwa naMuzvare Thokozane Khupe, CODE iri kutungamirirwa naVaTrust Chikohora, nePDP inotungamirwa naAmai Lucia Matibenga, ari kusangana muHarare kuti ayedze kukurudzira nhaurirano munyika. Mapato aya anoti atora danho iri mushure mekuratidzira kwapa kuti munyika musagadzikane semakaberekera ingwe, mauto nemapurisa achipomerwa mhosva yekutyora kodzero dzevanhu. Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri weMDC-T, VaObert Gutu vanoti vamiriri vemapato matatu aya vachange vachizoitawo musangano nevatori venhau vachipawo maonero avo pamusoro penyaya nenhaurirano iyi. No media source currently available
title: Mamwe Mapato Anopikisa Osangana Pamusoro Pekuti Munyika Muitwe Nhaurirano

text: Komiti yedare reparamende muAmerica inoona nezvemitemo yatanga nhasi kubvunzurudza Amai Ketanji Brown Jackson kuti vakakodzera here kuti vave mutongi wedare repamusoro soro reSupreme Court. Vachitaura pamberi pekomiti iyi, Amai Jackson vavimbisa kuti vachatevedzera bumbiro remutemo pakupa mitongo yavo. Sachigaro wekomiti yezvemitemo iyi VaDick Durbin vati kusarudzwa kwavo kwakakosha zvikuru munhoroondo yeAmerica. Vakatambirwa ndivo vanenge vari mudzimai mutema wekutanga kuva mutongo wedare iri munhoroondo yeAmerica. Sangano remagweta reAmerican Bar Association rakatovatambira nemusi weChishanu pasina kupokana rikati vakakodzera kuva mutongi wedare reSupreme Court.
title: Amai Jackson Votarisirwa Kuva Mudzimai Mutema weKutanga Kuva Mutongi weDare rePamusoro Soro muAmerica

text: Musangano wevashandi vehurumende wanga wakatarisirwa kuitwa pasi pesangano reApex Council watadza kubudirira mushure mekunge mamwe masangano arega kuenda nezvikonzero zvisati zvazivikanwa. Vane ruzivo nezvemusangano uyu vanoti wanga uchitarisirwa kubuda nechisungo panyaya yekuti vashandi voramwa mabasa here kana kuti kwete. Zvinonzi masangano mashanu chete kubva mumasangano gumi nemana anomirira vashandi vehurumende ndiwo aenda kunzvimbo yanga ichitarisirwa kuitirwa musangano uyu, iyo inonzi yanga yakakiyiwa. Mumwe musangano wakaitwa masvondo maviri apfuura unonzi wakanga wasunga kuti masangano aende kunhengo dzawo kunonzwa kana dzakanga dzichitsigira pfungwa yekuramwa mabasa, ozosangana neChipiri kuti azeye zvinenge zvabva kunhengo dzawo. Asi zvinonzi masangano evashandi aya haasi kuwirirana panyaya yekuramwa mabasa iyi. Mukuru weZimbabwe Teachers Association, ZIMTA, VaSifiso Ndlovu, vanoti kunyange hazvo musangano uyu wakundikanda kubudirira, vanotarisira kuti vashandi vehurumende vachawirirana mune zvisungo zvavo. Asi VaNdlovu vanoti semaonero avo nzira yekuramwa mabasa haisi iyo yoga inogona kushandiswa. Munyori mukuru weProgressive Teacheras Union of Zimbabwe, VaRaymond Majongwe, vanoti vakatyamadzwa nedanho ratorwa nemamwe masangano anoti anomirira vashandi rekusaenda kumusangano uyu. VaMajongwe vanoti vanofunga kuti paita kufurirana pakati pemamwe msangano kuti asapinda mumusangano uyu sezvo humwe hutungamiri hweApex Council hwatadza kuenda kumusangano uyu kunze kwasachigaro VaRichard Gundani. No media source currently available No media source currently available
title: Musangano weVashandi veHurumende Unokundikana Kuitwa

text:
Vagari vemudhorobha reMasvingo vatosvorana neKanzuru yavo iyo yavari kupomera mhosva yekuisa hupenyu hwavo munjodzi mushure mekupedza mavhiki anodarika maviri vachiwana mvura yakasviba mupombi dzavo. Mumwe mugari wemumuhsa wekuRujeko, Muzvare Cecilia Makono, anoti vave nenguva yakareba vachiisa zvichemo kukanzuru kuti mvura iri kubuda mudzimba yakasviba asi vakuru vedhorobha vari kuisa zvimiti munzeve. Vamwe vagary vanoti havasi kunzwisira kuti sei kanzuru isiri kutenga mishonga yekuchenesa mvura ivo vachibhadhara mitero mwedzi wega wega.

Ambuya Ropafadzo Tabe, vekuMucheke D, vanoti chiri kuvarwadza inyaya yekuti kanzuru haisi kuvaudza kuti chii chiri kunetsa. Meya weguta reMasvingo, VaCollen Maboke, vati vane hurombo nekubuda kwemvura yakasviba izvo vati zviri konzerwa nemapaipi akadhuuka ave kupinza jecha mumvura uye vakurudzira vagary kuti vambomira kunwa mvura iyi. Asi vaonona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa musangano revagari reMasvingo United Residents and Rate Payers Allaince(MURRA), Muzvare Rumbidzai Magururpira, vapikisa meya vachiti dambudziko iri rave neguva yakareba risina kugadzirwa.

Muzvare Magurupira, aenderera mberi achiti kanzuru inofanira kukoshesa hupenyu hwevanhu nekudaro inofanira kugadzirisa dambudziko iri nechimbi chimbi. Zvichakadaro vagari vemudhorobha reMasvingo vakurudzira bazi rinoona nezvesarudzo kuti risvitse mashoko echirongwa chekunyoresa vanhu kuvhota muvanhu sezvo vazhinji vasingazivi nezvacho. Vachitaura pamusangano wakaitwa neMurra pakati pevagari ne ZEC nezuro, vagari vazhinji vakati havasi kuziva nezve chirongwa ichi nekuti hachisi kunyatsoshambadzirwa zvakakwana. Mumwe mugari Amai Tracy Musakaruka, vanoti vechidiki vazhinji vanofanira kunyoresa kuti vavhote havasi kuenda munzvimbo dziri kunyoreswa neZEC dzinogara veruzhinji nekuti havana ruzivo nezvechirongwa ichi. Chirongwa ichi chinova chechipiri chakatanga musi wa 11 uye chinopera musi wa30 mwedzi uno. Pachirongwa chekutanga chakaitwa muna Kukadzi, ZEC yakakwanisa kunyoresa vanhu zviuru zvitanhatu chete mudunhu rese reMasvingo vanova vanhu vashoma shoma. Hatina kukwanisa kubata mukuru weZEC muMasvingo VaZex Pudurai kuti tinzwe divi ravo sezvo vashandi veZEC vange vari pamusangano vakaramba kutaura nevatori venhau vachiti havabvumidzwe.
title: Vamwe Vagari veMasvingo Vogunun'una neMvura Yakasviba Yobuda Mupombi Dzavo

text: Kuverengwa kwemavhoti ezvakabuda musarudzo dzekutsvaga mutungamiri mutsva wenyika yeKenya kwapinda muzuva retatu sangano rinowona nezvesarudzo reIndependent Electoral and Boundaries Commission (IEBC) risati razivisa kuti ndiani akunda. VaWilliam Ruto naVaRaila Odinga ndivo vari kutatsurana mumakwikwi asati azivikanwa kuti achakunda ndeupi aya. Sachigaro vebato reJubilee party raVaKenyatta nhasi yazivisa kuti pangangove nekubiridzirwa kwesarudzo izvo zvinonzi zvingangotadzisa kuverengwa kwemavhoti kwaksununguka munyika iyi. Sangano reIEBC riri kurambidza vatori venhau nemakambani avo kuti vadome ari kukunda musarudzo idzi. Mutungamiri wesangano reZimbabwe Peace Project, Muzvare Jestina Mukoko, avo vakanga vari kuKenya, vanoti vakakokwa nesangano re Zimbabwe Elections Support Network (ZESN) kuti vaende kunowongorora sarudzo idzi. Vanoti Zimbabwe inogona kudzidza zvakawanda kubva kuKenya panyaya yekufambiswa kwesarudzo. No media source currently available
title: Kuverengwa kwemaVhoti Koenderera Mberi muKenya

text: Vamwe vagari vemuGweru vanoti vakahadzika zvikuru uye vari kutsutsumwa nekukwidzwa kwakaitwa mitero nekanzuru yavo zvisinei kuti kanzuru yaive yati ichakwidza mitero iyi zvishoma nezvishoma.\n\nVagari vakawanda vataura neStudio7 vati zvinoshamisa kuti kanzuru yasarudza kukwidza mitero panguva iyo vanhu vakaomerwa nehupenyu nekuda kwechirwere cheCoronavirus. Mumumwe mugari, Muzvare Florence Dube, avo vanogara mumusha weMkoba 1 vati vange vachibhara mari yemvura nemitero isingasvike mazana maviri emadhora pamwedzi, asi ikozvino vave kunzi vabhadhare mari inopfuura mazana mashanu emadhora. Mumwezve mugari, Muzvare /Va Nyasha Mahwende, avo vakaremara uye ari murwiri wekodzero dzevakaremara vati vanhu vakawanda vakaita saivo vanoroja sezvo vasina dzimba dzavo pachavo. Vati kuwedzerwa kwemitero uku kuchaita kuti hupenyu hwavo huwedzere kuoma. Mukuru werimwe remsangano anomiririra vagari, reGweru Residents and Ratepayers Association, VaCornelia Selipiwe, vati vanonzwisisa kuti kanzuru inoda mari yekuti ikwanise kuta nemazvo mabasa ainofanirwa kuita. Asi VaSelipiwe vati dai mitero iyi yakwidzwa zvishoma nezvishoma. Meya veguta reGweru, VaJosiah Makombe, vati mushure mekunge bhajeti ravo regore rino remadhora bhiriyoni imwe nemazana masere ezviuru zvemadhora ratambirwa nehurumende, vakatora danho rekuti vakwidze mitero zvishoma nezvishoma nekuziva kuomerwa kwevagari. Vatiwo vari kuziva nezvekunyunyuta kuri kuita vanhu nekuda kwemitero vakati vachaona zvekuita, Tatadza kunzwa divi rehurumende panyaya iyi sezvo gurukota rezvekutongwa kwematunhu, VaJuly Moyo, vange vasingadavire nharembozha yavo ukuwo yemutevedzeri wavo, Amai Marian Chombo, yange isingabatike. Zvichakadaro vamwe vana mukoti vanoshandira kanzuru yeGweru nezuro vakaita sit-in sekuratidza kusafara kwavo nekushanda vasina mbatya dzinobatsira kuvadzivirira kuti vasabatwe nechirwere cheCoronavirus kana kuti Personal Protective Equipment. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi ravana mukoti panyaya iyi. Asi VaMakombe vati vanoziva nezvenyaya iyi uye vari kugadzirisa kuti vashandi vanoshanda mumakiriniki ekanzuru ari manomwe vawane zvipfeko izvi. Zvichakadaro, hupfu hwasvika kunzvimbo dzakasiyana-siyana muguta reGweru pasi pechirongwa cheGrain Millers Association of Zimbabwe chekuti vanhu vawane hupfu husingadhure. Asi vamwe vagari vanoti chirongwa ichi hachizi kubastira sezvo hupfu uhu huri kudhuriswa. Mumwe mugari angozvidoma nezita rekuti Amai Tata vati kuSengwa kwavanogara hupfu hwange huchitengeswa nemari chaiyo chaiyo kwete mari yepafoni kana yepamakadhi. Hupfu huri kunetsa kuwana munyika nekuda kwekuti nyika haina kuwana goho rakanaka rechibage zvichitevera kusanaya zvakanaka kwemvura Sangano reWorld Food Program rinotiriri kupemha mari inoita zana nemakumi matatu emamiriyoni emadhora kuitira kuti ritengera vanhu chikafu chinosvika muna Nyamavhuvhu. Sangano iri rinotiwo vanhu vanoda rubatsiro rwechikafu muZimbabwe vanosvika mamiriyoni manomwe nemazana manomwe ezviuru. No media source currently available
title: Kanzuru yeGweru Inokwidza Mitero Inodarika Zvikamu Makumi Mana Kubva muZana

text: Hurumende neChitatu yakatsigira kutengeswa kwemhuru dzenzou kunyika dzakaita seChina ichiti izvi zviri kuitwa pamutemo kupedza dambudziko renzou idzo inoti dzakawandisa kudarika dzainokwanisa kuchengeeteka. Gurukota rinoona nezvekushanyirwa kwenyika zvakare vakasanobata chinzvimbo chegurukota rezvekuchengetedzwa kwezviwanikwa, VaWalter Mzembi vati pane nzira dzakawanda dzekupedza dambudziko rekuwandisa kwenzou uye imwe nzira yacho kudzitengesa kunyika dzinokwanisa kudzichengeta. Vachitaura apo Zimbabwe yange iri kupihwa zana rezviuru zvemadhora nenyika yeNetherlands kuti indoratidzira pazviratidzwa zvekukoka vashanyi vekunze chekunyika iyi chinonzi Vakantiebeurs, VaMzembi, vati mari inowanikwa pakutengeswa kwenzou idzi inoshandiswa mukuchengetedza zviwanikwa. Vati zviri kuitwa nemamwe masangano emuno neekunze zvekupikisa kutengeswa kwenzou hazvina maturo uye masangano iwawo haana zvaarikuita mukubatsira nyika kuchengeta nzou nezvimwe zviwanikwa. Vati imwe nzira yekupedza dambudziko rekuwandisa kwenzou kuti dzivhimwe nevanodzida asi vati nyika haikwanisi kutora nzira iyoyo sezvo America yakaisa zvisungo zvekuti nzou dzemuZimbabwe dzisavhimwe gore rapfuura. Zimbabwe iri kutengesa nzou diki kunyika dzakaita seChina neUnited Arab Emirates asi vemasangano anoona nezvekuchengetedzwa kwemhuka akaita seZimbabwe Conservation Taskforce vari kuda kuti Zimbabwe irambidzwe kutengesa nzou idzi uye vari kutofamba pasi rese vachikumbira maparamende akaita seenyika dzekuEurope ne America kuti idzike mitemo inorambidza kutengeswa kwenzou. Asi VaMzembi vati nzou idzi dziri kutengeswa pachitevedzwa mutemo wepasi rese. Zvichakadai VaMzembi vatenda Netherlands nekupaZimbabwe mari yekuti iiende kuzviratidzwa zve Vakantiebeurs vachiti izvi zvichaita kuti nyika ikwanise kukwenezera vashanyi kana kuti vauye vachibva kunyika dzekumawirira. Vatendawo Netherlands nekubatsira Zimbabwe kutsvaga kambani ichange ichishambadza Zimbabwe kunyika iyi nedzinwe nyika dzeku Europe Mumiriri weNetherlands muZimbabwe, Amai Gera Sneller, vati nyika yavo yakaona zvakakodzera kubatsira Zimbabwe kuti izvishambadze vakati izvi zvinoita kuti vanhu vanoshanyira Zimbabwe vawande. Vati izvi zvino simudzira makambani emuZimbabwe neNetherlands uye zvinoita kuti hupfumi hwenyika mbiri idzi husimukire. No media source currently available
title: Hurumende Yotsigira Kutengeswa KweNzou Dzainoti Dzawandisa

text: Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chiri muno muAmerica, Doctor Tawuya Katso, vannoti kurima ndiyo chete nzira inokwanisa kusimudzira hupenyu hwevanhu muZimbabwe kuburikidza nekutengesa zvirimwa zvavo kumisika mikuru inosanganisira yenyika dzekunze. Doctor Katso, avo vakaita zvidzidzo zvekurima, pari zvino vari kushanda samaneja anoona nezvekutengeserana muzvitoro zvinotengesa zvekudya vari kudivi rekutengwa nekutengeswa kwezvirimwa, kana kuti Agri-Business, vari mudunhu reMaryland muAmerica. Doctor Katso vanobva kuBocha mudunhu reManicaland asi vakazokurira kuBulawayo. Pavakapedza zvidzidzo zvavo zvesekendari, vakazoenda kuBritain uko vakanoita zvidzidzo dhigirii ravo rekutanga rakanangana nezvekurima. Muna 1998 vakazoenda kuAmerica uko vakazoita zvimwe zvidzidzo zvepamusorosoro zvePublic Administration nePublic Policy vakanangana nekurwisana nehurombo, kana kuti poverty alleviation. No media source currently available
title: Nyanzvi yezveKurima, Doctor Katso, Vanoti Kurima Ndiyo Chete nzira Inoburitsa Zimbabwe muHurombo

text: Hurongwa hwekugadzirisa nhandare yeRufaro Stadium uri kuenderera mberi panguva iyo mabasa akawanda ambomiswa nekutya kupararira kwechirwere checoronavirus. Vashandi vane chitsama vekanzuru yeHarare havana kumira basa panguva ino yezororo remazuva makumi maviri nerimwe chete yakatarwa nemutungamiri wenyika iyi. Asi vashandi ava vaparadzirwa kushanda panzvimbo dzakasiyana- siyana kuedza kudzvivirira kupararira kwechirwere chashura mare pasi rese ichi. Mutauriri weguta reHarare VaMichael Chideme vanoti havana kumisa basa rekugadzirisa Rufaro neGwanzura Stadium asi kuti vakangodzikisa huwandu hwevashandi ava zvichienderana nezvakatarwa nehurumende. Nhandare yeRufaro pamwe nedzimwewo dzakaita seNational Sports Stadium neGwanzura muHarare dzirikugadziriswa mushure mekuonekwa dzisingakodzere kutambirwa nhabvu yepamusoro nezvikwata zvenyika uye mitambo yePremier Soccer League. Mutsigiri weDynamos VaOliver Musongoro vanoti nhandare yeRufaro inofanira kupera nechimbi-chimbi kuti vasazonoshandisa musha wevamwe. Studio Seven yashanya kuRufaro Stadium ndokuona magedhe akavharwa asi muchiratidza kuti mune basa ririkuitwa. Mumwe mushandi wekanzuru abuda munhandare iyi ataurira nhepfenyuro yeStudio 7 kuti havana kumbobvira vamira basa kubvira musi wa 30 Kurume apo pakatanga lockdown. Mushandi uyu, uyo aramba kudomwa nezita sezvo asingatenderwe kutaura nevatori venhau ati havasi kushanda vakaungana panzvimbo imwechete asi kuti vamwe nevamwe vane basa ravo ravarikuita. Mumwe mugari wemuHarare VaTapuwa Jakarasi vanoti vese vari kuenda kumabasa panguva ino vanofanira kuzvidzivirira coronavirus kuti vasazotapurire chirwere ichi kune vamwe VaChideme vanoti vakaita kuti vashandi ava vauye kubasa nekuti rimwe basa rakatangwa rinofanira kupedziswa richiri nyoro nekuti kusaita izvi kunozoda kutangisa patsva zvekare. Sekutaura kwavaChideme nhandare dzeRufaro neGwanzura dziri kutarisirwa kuve dzapera kugadziriswa makundano enhabvu emwaka uno asati atanga. Zvinhu zvikafamba zvakanaka, makwikwi aya ari kutarisirwa kutanga muna Nyamavhuvhu.
title: Kanzuru yeHarare Yoenderera Mberi neKugadzirisa Nhandare yeRufaro

text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dzinoti huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa nechirwere chekuoma mutezo huri kuramba huchikwira zvakanyanya munyika zvinonzi zviri kukonzerwawo nezvirwere zvemoyo kana kuti Blood Pressure uye cheshuga. Vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni mazana matatu kana kuti 300 million pasi rose vane chirwere chemoyo chinogona kuti vagume vaoma mutezo. Pavanhu ava, panawo VaObert Murwira vanobva kwaNyashanu kuBuhera. VaMurwira avavo vari kugara nemwana wavo muHarare kuSouthlea Park parizvino vanoti vari kurapwa chirwere chemoyo necheshuga zvakapa kuti vazoguma vaoma mutezo. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvemitezo VaHelkias Mbiru Chourombo vanoti kuoma kwemitezo kunokonzerwa netsinga dzinenge dzabvarukira muhuropi. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutao Dr Josephat Chiripanyanga vanoti kune vane chirwere chemoyo neshuga, kuoma mutezo kanodarika kaviri zvinoreva kuti zvirwere izvi zvine zvisiri kurapika zvakanaka. Vati zvakakosha kuti vane zvirwere izvi vadye chikafu chavanenge vakurudzirwa navanachiremba kuchengetedza hutano hwavo. Ko munhu angazive sei kuti ave kuda kuoma mutezo? Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dzinoti munhu anogona kutanga kunzwa kupera simba, kutadza kusimudza ruoko, uye kutadza kunyemwerera zvakanaka. Kazhinji izvi zvinoitika kudivi rimwe chete remuviri. Vanhu vanogona zvekare kutadza kunzwa kurwadziwa kana vakabaiwa netsono chaiyo uye kutadza kutaura zvakanaka vachikweva mazwi. Vamwe vanotadza kumira zvakanaka kana kutadza kumedza. Kune vamwe vanonzwa musoro uchirwadza votadza kuziva kuti zvinhu zviri kufamba sei. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dzinoti kana zvadai, zvakakosha kuti varwere vamhanyiswe kuchipatara.
title: Nyanzvi Dzoyambira Nezvekuipa kweChirwere Chekuoma kweMutezo

text: Gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, vakazivisa nezuro kuti kubayiwa kwenhomba yekudzivirira Covid-19 yakabva kuChina neMuvhuro kuri kutanga munyika yose nemusi weChina, 18 Kukadzi 2021. Hurumende inoti ichabaya vanhu vanozvipira zvavo kubayiwa nhomba iyi. Vachizivisa zvakabuda mumusangano wemakurukota, Amai Mutsvangwa vakatiwo kugoverwa kwenhomba iyi kuchatevera hurongwa hwemagoverwo hwagara huripo nechakare. Hurumende dzeZimbabwe neChina dzakazivisa neMuvhuro kuti nhomba iyi inoshanda sezvinotarisirwa, dzichiti veruzhinji havafanirwe kutya kuishandisa. Asi dzimwe nyanzvi mune zvehutano dzinoti hapana humbowo hunoratidza kuti nhomba iyi inokwanisa kudzivirira hutachiwana hutsva hunonzi hwakawanikwa kuSouth Africa. Dare remakurukota rakazivisa nezuro kuti hutachiwana hwekuSouth Africa uhwu hwave munyika, uye ndihwo hune chekuita nezvikamu makumi matanhatu nechimwe kubva muzana zvevanhu vari kubatwa neCovid-19. Nyanzvi mune zvehutano vachidzidzisa zvehutano paNottingham Trent University kuBritain, Doctor Mathew Nyashanu, vanoti kubaiwa kwevanhu nhomba iyi kwakanaka chose, asi vanhu vanofanirwa kubaiwa nemushonga unozivikanwa kuti unoshanda zvakadii. Doctor Nyashanu vanoti nhomba yekuChina iyi haina nhoroondo yekuti yakaongororwa nenyanzvi dzakazvimirira, kana kuti peer reviewed. Ngatinzweyi hurukuro yavaita naJonga Kandemiiri weStudio 7. No media source currently available
title: Nyanzvi dzeHutano Dzovhunza Nhoroondo yeKushanda kweNhomba yeSinopharm Yakabva kuChina

text: Mutevedzeri wemunyori wevechidiki muZanu-PF Youth League VaKudzai Chipanga nemusi weChitatu vanonzi vakayambira vamwe vakuru mubato iri zvikuru vakarwa hondo kuti vanogona kudzingwa mubato sezvakaitwa vamwe vakavamba bato iri. VaChipanga vanoonekwa nevamwe sevanotsigira chikwata cheGeneration 40 icho chinerutsigiro rwaAmai Grace Mugabe. Chikwata ichi chiri kunetsana nechikwata chinotsigira mumwe muetevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa. Izvi zvinoratidza pachena kuti zvinhu muZanu-PF zvinenge zvaramba zvakaita manyama amire nerongo sezvo mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vakakurudzira kuti vanhu vamire kukandirana makobvu nematete uye kudzingana mubato. Asi hapana ari kuzviterera. Vachitaura paCooksey Hall muChinhoyi VaChipanga vakati munhu wese anorasa gwara remusangano anodzingwa mubato reZanu- PF sezvakaitwa vaimbove munyori mukuru mubato iri VaEdgar Tekere kunyange vari mumwe wevakavamba bato reZanu PF muna 1963. VaChipanga vati musangano weZanu PF mukuru kudarika dungamunhu uye havatye kudzinga ani zvake anorasa gwara remusangano sezvakaitwa vaimbove mutauriri webato VaRugare Gumbo nevamwe. VaChipanga vati vaneta nevanhu vavanoti vanonyepedzera kuda mukuru webato varizve mutungamiri wenyika VaMugabe. Vati munhu anoda VaMugabe anofanirwa kuda mudzimai wavo Amai Mugabe, vana vavo vose pamwe nembwa dzavo zvakare. VaChipanga vayambira vechidiki kuti vasashandise ruzivo rwechimanjemanje rwedandemutande kutuka nekushoropodza mudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika Amai Mugabe. Vamwe vechidiki vapinda musangano uyu vanosanganisira VaInnocent Hamandishe murongi wemisangano, VaTungamirai Mutonhodza anowona nezvekuchengetedzwa kwevanhu muboka revechidiki munyika naVaLotius Takarusikirwa vanoona nezvekukwiridzirwa kwemadzimai echidiki munyika. Zvichakadaro munyori mukuru musangano reZimbabwe National Liberation War Veterans Association VaVictor Matemadanda vati havaone paine chakaipa kuti nhengo dzavo dziende kumatare kana pasina kuwirirana zvikuru pahutungamiri. Bepanhau reHerald range richitungamira mukushora nhengo dzebato reZanu-PF idzo dziri kuendesana kumatare nenyaya dzekunetsana idzi.
title: VeZanu-PF Youth League Voshorazve Vamwe Vakuru muBato neVakarwa Hondo

text: Vanhu vakawanda munyika vanoti mutungamiri mutsva, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vanofanirwa kuzadzisa mashoko avo ekurwisa huori munyika kuburikidza nokuona kuti mari inonzi inosvika mabhiriyoni gumi nemashanu emadhora yakatsakatika kumangoda ekwaChiyadzwa. Mumwe wevanhu vari kuda kuti nyaya iyi iburitswe pachena, Amai Sungano Zvarebgwanashe, vanoti hurumende yaVaMnangagwa inofanirwa kuferefeta zvose zvine huori pasi pehutongi hwaVaMugabe, sezvo VaMugabe pachavo vakakundikana kusungisa vanhu vakaita kuti mari yakawanda kudai itsakatike. VaZivai Chaendera vanotiwo VaMnangagwa vanofanira kutsinhira mashoko avo ekurwisa nekubvisa huori munyika nekutanga kuferefeta nyaya dzakaitika kare uye vaipara mhosva vachisungwa zvisina rusarura. Asi vamwe vanoti zvinonetsa kuti VaMnangagwa vaongorore nyaya iyi nekuti vari kupomerwawo mhosva yekuti ruoko rwavo rwuripowo panyaya iyi. Aya mashoko akambobudiswa neaiva mukuru wevechidiki muZanu PF, VaKudzanai Chipanga, avo vakati vakuru vemauto pamwe naVaMnangagwa ndivo vakatora mari iyi. VaChipanaga vakatosungwa uye vari kumirira kutongwa vari mujeri. Asi VaTimitia Dziva vekwa Neshuro kuMwenezi vanoti VaMnangagwa vanofanira kuchenesa zita ravo nekuferefeta nyaya iyi vanhu voziva zvakaitika pamari iyi. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kubata VaMnangagwa kana mutauriri wemauto kuti vatipewo maonereo panyaya iyi. Asi nhengo yekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvwmigodhi munyika, Muzvare Thabhita Khumalo, vanotiwo VaMnangagwa vanofanirwa kuona kuti nyaya iyi yaferefetwa nechimbi chimbi, vakapara mhosva vosungwa. Muzvare Khumalo vaudza Studio 7 parunhare kuti komiti yavo ichiri kunetseka nekuwana mhinduro kubva kubhazi rezvemigodhi kuti mari yakafamba sei kubva zvakataurwa naVaMugabe kuti haisi kuowonekwa, nokudaro vanoti VaMnangagwa zvakavati vanoda kubvisa huori munyika, ngavachitanga nekutsvaka kwakaenda mari yemangoda iyi. Nyanzvi munyaya dzekodzero dzevanhu, uye vari mukuru weCenter for Natural Resource Governance, VaFarai Maguwu, vanoti VaMnangagwa vanofanira kutsvaga kwakaenda mari iyi kuitira kuti iwanikwe yobatsira kusimudzira nyika. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi dzinoti mari inonzi yakatsakatika iyi yakawanda zvikuru zvekuinifambisa mabasa ose ehurumende kwemakore mana pachitariswa bhajeti rehurumende pagore rega rega. No media source currently available
title: VaMnangagwa Vokurudzirwa Kuferefeta Zvakaitika pa$15 Billion yeMangoda Yakatsakatika

text: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika zviri pasi pesangano reZimbabwe Citizens Initiative zviri kuungana paManchester University kuBritain neMugovera uno zvichirangarira murwiri wekodzero akapambwa akatsakatika, VaItai Dzamara. Vakafanobata chigaro chasachigaro wesangano iri, VaPromise Sande, vanoti vachatoravo mukana wekuungana uku kuti varangarirewo vose vakashungurudzwa kana kutyorerwa kodzero dzavo nehurumende, kusanganisira Gukurahundi. Murwiri wekodzero anoita zvemitambo, Silvanos Mudzvova, ari kutarisirwawo kutandadza vanhu nemutambo wake unonzi "The Dungeon". Nemusi weChina 9 Kurume gore rino, VaDzamara vari kusvitsa makore maviri kubva pavakambwa nevanhu vanofungidzirwa kuti vasori mumusha weGlen View muHarare musi wa 9 Kurume 2015. No media source currently available
title: Zimbabwe Citizens Initiative Yorangarira VaItai Dzamara neVamwe

text: Mutungamiri weMDC, VaMorgan Tsvangirai, varamba mashoko ekuti vakaita chibvumirano nemutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, chekuti vaumbe hurumende yemubatanidzwa kana mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vabva pachigaro. VaTsvangirai varamba mashoko akaburitswa nesangano renhau reReuters nezuro ekuti vakabvumirana naVaMnangagwa kuti vagozoumba hurumende yemubatanidzwa kana VaMugabe vabva pachigaro. Mashoko aburitswa naVaTsvangirai anoti havasati vasangana naVaMnangagwa kubva pakapera hurumende yemubatanidzwa muna 2013. Mashoko aburitswa naVaTsvangirai aya atsinhirwa nemutauriri weMDC, VaObert Gutu. VaGutu varambawo mashoko ekuti pasi pechibvumirano chinonzi chakaitwa naVaTsvangirai naVaMnangagwa varungu vachawanikwa vachizodzoka mumapurazi avakatorerwa. Mashoko akaburitswa neReuters aya anotiwo hurumende yeBritain iri kutsigirawo chibvumirano ichi icho charambwa naVaTsvangirai. Mumwe muzvinahofisi pamuzinda weBritain muHarare uyo asina kuda kudomwa nezita ati hurumende yeBritain, iyo iri kumiririrwa naAmai Catriona Laing, inoshanda isina divi rayakarerekera,nokudaro mashoko akaburitswa neReuters aya haasi echokwadi. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika uye vari mutungamiri wesangano reZimbabwe Democracy Institute, Doctor Pedzisayi Ruhanya, vati hazvingaite kuti VaMnangagwa vanzi vangaite chibvumirano chakadai naVaTsvangirai sezvo VaMugabe varivo vachakwikwidza vakamirira Zanu PF musarudzo dzegore rinouya. VaRuhanya vanoti kuburitswa kwakaitwa mashoko aya zviri kuratidza pachena kuti pane vari kuda kusvibisa zita raVaMnangagwa pamwe neraVaTsvangirai pamberi pesarudzo. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kuna VaMnangagwa avo yakundikana kubata. MuZanu PF mune zvikwata zviviri zviri kurwira kutora matomhu kubva kuna VaMugabe uye chimwe chezvikwata izvi, icho chiri kudaidzwa kuti Team Lacoste, chinonzi chiri kutsigira VaMnangagwa kuti vatore masimba kana VaMugabe vabva pachigaro. Chimwe chikwata chiri kuzvidaidza kuti Generation 40 chinonzi chiri kutsigira mudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Grace Mugabe, kuti vatadzise VaMnangagwa kutora matomhu kubva kuna VaMugabe. No media source currently available
title: VaTsvangirai Vanoti Manyepo Kuti Vari Kuita Hurukuro Muchivande naVaMnangagwa

text: Nhengo ina dzinorwira kodzero dzevanhu dzakasungwa neMuvhuro manheru dzichibva kumusangano wemasangano akazvimirira wakaitirwa kuMaldives dzapomerwa mhosva yekuronga zvekupidigura hurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa. Nhengo idzi, idzo dzinoti VaTatenda Mombeyarara vanoshanda nesangano reCirizens Manifesto, VaGeorge Makoni vesangano reCentre for Community Development in Zimbabwe, VaNyasha Frank Mpahlo vesangano reTransprency International - Zimbabwe; pamwe nemutungamiri wesangano reCommunity Tolerance and Development Trust, VaGamuchirai Mukura, vakasungwa pavakasvika panhandare yendege yeRobert Gabriel International Airport pavakamhara vachibva kuMaldives kumusangano wemasangano anoshanda akazvimirira. Mutauriri wemapurisa, Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi, vaudza Studio7 parunhare kuti vasungwa ava vakachengetwa mutirongo pakamba yeHarare Central vakati tinzwe zvakawanda kumunyori mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaNick Mangwana, avo vanga vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo pataenda. Rimwe remagweta evasungwa, VaJeremiah Bamu vaudza Studio7 vari pakamba iyi manheru emusi weChipiri kuti vasungwa ava vapomerwa mhosva yekuronga zvekupidigura hurumende yaVaMnangagwa pamwe nekukurudzira veruzhinji munyika kuti vaite zvemhirizhonga vachigunun’una nemamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika dzezvehupfumi. VaBamu vati mhosva iri kupomerwa vasungwa ava inonzi yakaparwa vari kunze kwenyika kwavanga vachipinda musangano uyu uye vati vasungwa ava vakatarisira kumiswa pamberi pedare nemusi weChitatu. Mutauriri wesangano reCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition, iro rinotungamira masangano mazhinji anoshanda akazvimirira muZimbabwe, VaTabani Moyo, vashora kusungwa kwevarwiri vekodzero dzevanhu ava. Vana ava vasungwa zvichitevera mashoko akaburitswa nebepanhau reHerald anoti vemasangano anoshanda akazvimirira ava vari kushanda pamwe chete neMDC yaVaNelson Chamisa mukuronga zvekupandukira hurumende. Asi MDC yakaramba mashoko akaburitswa neHerald ichiti manyepo. Mutauriri weMDC, VaJacob Mafume ,vaudza Studio7 kuti hapasisina musiyano pakati pehurumende yaMnangagwa neyevaimbova mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, avo vakatsiviwa naVaMnangagwa muna Mbudzi 2017 pakapindira mauto munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika. Zvichakadai, VaBamu vati vari kutarisira kuti vasungwa ava vamiswe pamberi pedare neChitatu apo vakatarisirwa kuramba mhosva dzavari kupomerwa. No media source currently available
title: Varwiri veKodzero Vana Vopemerwa Mhosva yeKuda Kupidigura Hurumende yaVaMnangagwa

text: Zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinogara muHuston kuTexas uko kwakarohwa nedutumupengo rine mafashamu, Hurricane Harvey, zvinoti kunyange zvazvo vamwe vavo vakakuvadzirwa dzimba dzavo, vanotenda Nyadenga kuti hapana kana munhu mumwe chete pakati pavo ati azivikanwa kuti akafa kana kukuvadzwa. Pari zvino dutumupengo iri rauraya vanhu vanoita makumi matanhatu nevatatu pamusoro pekupunza dzimba nezvivakwa mudunhu iri. Zvikoro nemakambani zvakavharwa uye migwagwa izere mvura zvekuti vazhinji vanotoshandisa zvikepe kusvika kuvanhu vanoda rubatsiro. “Inini ndinoda kutenda Mwari kuti handina kunyanya kushungurudzwa nedutumupengo iri. Harvey yakaita zvatisati tamboona; mvura kunge yaNoah chaiyo. Nemusi weChishanu ndakaona dambudziko guru chaizvo kuuya kumba ndichibva kubasa nokuti takange taudzwa kuti mvura nenhepo zvichasvika kuno uku pamwe neSvondo,” vanodaro Muzvare Muchuro. “Vese vekuZimbabwe vandinoziva vakapona. Kumativi kwavanogara hakuna kunyanya kuvhiringwa asi vamwe vandinoshanda navo vakapinda pakaoma, vakarasikirwa nezvinhu zvavo,” Muzvare Muchuro vanowedzera.
