No media source currently available Mumwe mugari wekuTexas, Muzvare Orissa Williams, vanotiwo mune dzimwe nzvimbo mvura yaisvika pamatenga edzimba. “Kwandinogara nzira dzema ‘highway’ dzange dzakavharwa zvekuti vamwe vaitoshandisa zvikepe kuenda kumabasa nekuti mvura muneimwe migwagwa yaisvika mumabvi,” Muzvare Williams vanotsanangura. Muzvare Williams vanoti vari kugara nedzimwe hama dzavo nokuti denga reimba yavo rakadonhera mumba yekutandarira mushure mekunge mvura nemhepo zvaparadza nharaunda yavo kwemazuva mashanu. “Inini pachangu handina kunyanya kuvhiringwa asi hama dzangu ndidzo dzakasvitswa pakaoma nokuti mvura haisi kudzika mumba mavo uye hapana rubatsiro rwavari kuwana pari zvino asi kungomirira vanhu ve Federal Emergency Management Agency, vanobatsira vanhu munguva dzakadai. Vanozviziva; takavaudza,” vanotsanangura Muzvare Williams. No media source currently available Muzvare Tariro Muchuro vanoti ivo nevamwe vekuZimbabwe vanogara muHuston vanorwadziwa chose kuona zvakaitika kune vamwe muguta iri, avo vakasara vasisina dzimba. Zvichitevera dambudziko iri, hurumende yaVaDonald Trump inoti ichabatsira vanhu vakaradzirwa dzimba dzavo neHurricane Harvey, uye hurumende inoti iri kutarisira kubatsira vanhu ava nemari inosvika mabhiriyoni masere emadhora. Asi kuti mari iyi ipihwe vanhu ava, dare reCongress rinofanirwa kubvumirana kuti hurumende ishandise mari iyi. Dare reCongress riri pazororo uye rinotarisirwa kuzeya nyaya iyi parinodzoka kuti riite basa raro.
title: Vanhu Vanobva kuZimbabwe Vanopona Mudutumupengo reHurricane Harvey kuTexas

text: Pastor Evan Mawarire avo vakazvipira kumapurisa nezuro vachibva vasungwa vave kupomerwa mhosva yakakomba yekuda kutyora bumbiro remutemo nekukurudzira kupidigurwa kwehurumende. Vamwe vechidiki vari muAmerica vanoti vachakumbira mutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica VaBarack Obama kuti vapindire panyaya dzekutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu. Dare repamusoro soro rinoti vasungwa vakatongerwa kugara mujeri hupenyu hwose pasina mukana wekusunungurwa vanokwanisawo kugerererwa nemutungamiri wenyika kana kuti Presidential Pardon. Muchirongwa cheLiveTalk na8.30 pm tiri kutarisa nyaya yekusungwa kwaPastor Evan Mawarire. Kana muchida kupinda muchirongwa ichi, kanawo kutumira mashoko kuStudio 7, shandisai whats app panhamba dzinoti + 1 202 465 0318. Vanoda kuteerera Studio7, tibateyi na 7pm pamasaisai anoti 909 AM ne 4930 Kilohertz pa ShortWave. No media source currently available
title: Misoro yeNhau, Chitatu 12 Chikunguru, 2016

text: Vakafanobata chigaro chemutungamiri weZimbabwe People First, Zim PF, VaAgrippa Mutambara, vanoti vanotsigira hurongwa hwekuti mapato ezvematongerwo enyika anopikisa abatane mukubvisa hurumende yeZanu PF. Vachitaura kuchitsama chevatsigiri vebato iri nemusi weMugovera kwaMutare, VaMutambara vakati vanoda hurongwa uhu kuedza kusapatsanura mavhoti musarudzo dzegore rinouya. VaMutambara vakati kuva nenhengo imwe chete inomirira mapato anopikisa musarudzo dzegore chinhu chakanaka chose kana veruzhinji vachida kubvisa hudzvanyiriri hweZanu PF. VaMutambara vakati bato ravo riri kusangana nematambudziko sezvo vasori nenhengo dzeZanu PF vari kupinda mubato iri vaine chinangwa chekuriparadza. Vakatiwo huwori hwakomba mumapazi ose ehurumende, zvikuru kumapurisa uye nekumatare edzimhosva. Vakatiwo hutsinye uye kusatonga zvakanaka kwaVaMugabe kwakatanga pavakawana mudzimai wechikidi, Grace Marufu.Vakati panguva yemudzimai wavo wekutanga, Sally Mugabe, VaMugabe vaive mutungamiri ane gwara, chiremera, uye rudo neruzhinji. VaMutambara vakati nyika yave mumaoko aAmai Grace Mugabe nevamwe vakauya kuZanu PF manje-manje. Mumwe wevatsigiri weZim PF vaive pamusangano uyu, VaMabhobho Zhamba, vanoti vakafarira mashoko aVaMutambara sezvo akapa hushingi kuti vamisidzane neZanu PF pamwe chete nemamwe mapato ezvematongerwo enyika musarudzo dzegore rinouya. VaMutambara, avo vaive Brigadier muchiuto, vaitsigirwa pamusanmgano uyu naVaKudakwashe Bhasikiti, VaClaudius Makova nevamwewo. No media source currently available
title: VaMutambara veZim PF Votsigirawo Mubatanidzwa weMapato

text: Kunyange hazvo mutengo we bond note neRTG’s uyo wange uchiita chamurambamhuru, waderera zvichinzaniswa nedhora rekuAmerica, zvinhu zvakawanda muzvitoro zvichiri kuramba zvichishaikwa uye zvimwe zvitoro zvichiri zvakavharwa. Nemusi weChishanu huremu hwemari yebond note neRTG’s hwange hwave pamadhora zana nemakumi masere kubva pamazana mashanu kana kudarika mumazuva mashoma apfuura zvichienzaniswa nedhora rekuAmerica. Asi zvinhu zvakaita sehuku, mafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari, mafuta ekubikisa, furawa, shuga, Mazowe nezvimwe zvichiri kunetsa kuwana. Zimbabwe iri kutatarika kuti iwane mari yekutenga zvinhu kunze zvopa kuti zvidhure. Vemabhizmisi vari kuchema chema kuti mutero wakadzikwa negurukota rezvemari, VaMthuli Ncube, wekuti vanhu vabhadhare masendi maviri padhora rega rega, uri kuvaomesera uye mitemo yacho iri kudzikwa pasina nhaurirano. Mutungamiri weConfederation of Zimbabwe Industries, VaSifelani Jabangwe, vanoti Zimbabwe inofanira kugadzira zvakawanda zvekutengesa kunze kuti igadzirise hupfumi hwayo. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, vamwe vanamuzvinabhizimisi kubva kuZimbabwe vari muAmerica umo vari kuyedza kukwezva vamwe vanamuzvinabhizimisi kuti vashande navo. Pari zvino vari kuTexas uye vari kutarisirwawo kuenda kuWashington DC. Muzvinabhizimisi vari sachigaro weChief Executives Officers Africa Roundtable, VaOswell Binha, vanoti vane chivimbo chekuti vachakwanisa kukwezva vemabhizimisi vekunze. No media source currently available
title: Huremu hweBond neRTG's Hwoderera Zvakanyanya

text: Bato rinopikisa reMDC T rinoti riri kutambira danho rinonzi rakatorwa nekomisheni inorwisana nehuwori, yeZimbabwe Anti-Corruption Commission, ZACC, rekuti makambani akawanda pamwe nevanhuwo zvavo vakaita zvehuwori vave kuongororwa. Asi bato iri rinoti harioni paine chikukutu chinobuda kubva mumashoko aya sezvo aka kasiri kekutanga kunzwa komisheni iyi ichiti iri kuongorora vanhu nemakambani vakaita zvehuwori asi zvichizongofa zvakadaro. Mutauriri weMDC T, VaObert Gutu vanoti chino shamisa ndechekuti komisheni iyi yakasarudza kusataura nezvemari inosvika mabhiriyoni gumi nemashanu emadhora yemangoda ekwamarange inonzi yakangotsakatika. “Hakasi kekutanga kunzwa veZimbabwe Anti-Corruption Commission ZACC pamwe nehurumende yeZanu PF vachitaura nezvekuti aah, iye zvino tave kuda kuzogadzirisa nyaya dze corruption. Vanhu vanoita zve corruption takuzovasunga, asi nekupera kwenguva hapana chaizoitwa hapana aisungwa,” VaGutu vanodaro. Bepanhau reSunday Mail neSvondo rakaburitsa mazita emakambani nevanhu vanonzi vakaita zvehuwori vari kuferefetwa, avo vanosanganisira VaWicknell Chivayo, vanove mukuru wekambani yeIntratrek, VaPhillip Chiyangwa vekambani yePinnacle Holdings, pamwe naVaPaddy Zhanda veVeracity Private Limited. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata VaChiyangwa, VaChivayo pamwe naVaZhanda kuti tinzwewo mativi avo panyaya iyi. Takundikanawo kubata vakafanobata chigaro chemutauriri weZACC, Senior Assistant Commissioner Silence Pondo kuti tinzwe divi rekomisheni yavo. No media source currently available Mumwe wevanonzi vari kuferefetwa neZACC, meya weguta reHarare VaBenard Manyenyeni vaudza Studio 7 kuti vari kufereretwa nenyaya yekupinza kwavobasa VaJames Mushore. VaManyenyeni vanoti vatoshanyirwa kumahofisi kwavo nechikwata cheZACC, uye vavapa zvose zvavanga vachida kuziva pamusoro penyaya iyi. “Asi ini ndinoramba ndakamira pakuti hapana chatakakanganisa pakupinza VaMushore basa. Ndingati kubva 1980 kusvika nhasi hapana munhu ati apinzwa basa semapinziro ataita VaMushore,” Vanodaro VaManyenyeni. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, VaManyenyeni vadzoka kubasa mushure mekupera kwemazuva makumi mana nemashanu vambomiswa basa negurukota rezvekutongwa kwematunhu, VaSavior Kasukuwere. VaManyenyeni vanoti kudzoka kwavaita kubasa kwasanganawo netsamba yanyorwa nevakafanobata chigaro chegurukota rezevkutongwa kwematunhu, Professor Jonathan Moyo vachinzi vadzoke pabasa. Vanoti hapana zvataurwa mutsamba iyi pamusoro pezvanga zvaita kuti vambomiswa basa, kunze kwekungonzi vadzoke pabasa. No media source currently available
title: MDC T Yokurudzira Kuti Zimbabwe Anti-Corruption Commission Itore Matanho paNyaya dzeHuwori

text:
Chirwere chekorera icho chakauraya vanhu vana mwedzi wapera muChegutu, chava kukonzeresa mutauro pakati penhengo dzechitenderano cheMuslim nevakuru vezvehutano pamwe nevematongerwo enyika. Mugwaro raro rekubvuma kuti chirwere chekorera chainge chauraya vanhu vana muChegutu, bazi rezvehutano rakati mavigirwo anoitwa vafi nenhengo dzechitendero cheMuslim, zvimwe zvezvinhu zvakakonzeresa kuti chirwere chekorera chipararire muguta iri.

Gwaro iri rinoti pakafa Ambuya Laita Mungulisia, pavanhu vakageza mufi, vatatu vavo vakafawo, mumazuva mashoma akatevera, zvichikonzerwa nemagezero avakaita mufi.

Nhengo dzechitendero cheMuslim dzinoti hadzina kufara nemashoko akaburitswa nebazi rezvehutano.

Munyori mukuru wechitendero ichi muChegutu, VaIdhi Chiutila, vanoti magezero avanoita nhengo dzavo dzinenge dzafa akasiyana nezvinoitwa nemamwe makereke kana pachivanhu. Asi vanoti havasvine matumbu sezvinotaurwa nevakawanda.

VaChiutila vanoti vanogeza mufi semagezero aayiita achiri mupenyu uye mvura inenge yageza munhu anenge afa inoraswa zvine hutsanana sezvo zvichiitirwa mumba yakagadzirirwa izvozvo.

VaChiutila vanoti manyepo kuti nhengo dzavo dzinosvina matumbu emunhu anenge afa sezvinotaurwa nevanhu vakawanda. VaChiutila vanoti manyepowo zvakare kuti varume ndivo vakageza mudzimai akatanga kufa, sezvo mudzimai achigezwa nemamwe madzimai, murume achigezwa nevarume.

Izvi zvinotsigirwa nemumwe wechitendero cheIslam, VaBenjamin Yusuf, avo vanoti murume anogezwa nevarume, mukadzi nevakadzi sezvinoitwa kutsika nemagariro evanhu vakawanda.

VaYusuf vanoti zvinhu zvavanoita kune munhu anenge afa vanozviita pachena hama dzemunhu anenge afa dziripo. VaYusuf vanoti vanhu vakaburitsa mashoko ekuti vanosvina matumbu emunhu anenge afa akatadzira maMuslim pasi rose.


VaChiutila vanoti havasi kufara nemashoko akaburitswa uye vanokurudzira vanhu vakaburitsa mashoko emanyepo aya ivavo kuti vavakumbire ruregerero sezvo vakatadzira chitendero cheIslam.

Kunyange vatendi veIslam vachibvuma kuti chirwere chekorera chirimo muChegutu, vanoti nhengo yavo haina kufa nekorera, asi nechirwere cheshuga.

Imwe nhengo yechitendero cheMuslim, VaDavid Salim, vanoti Ambuya Mungulisia vakafa nekuda kwechirwere cheshuga.

Patabvunza VaChiutila kuti sei vanhu vakafa vari vechiMuslim chete pari zvino, VaChiutila vanoti kune vanhu vakawanda vari kufa vasiri kutaurwa nezvavo vasiri nhengo dzavo, uye vanhu vari kurapwa vakawanda hadzisi nhengo dzavo.

Gurukota rezvehutano, Dr David Parirenyatwa, vanoti vanoremekedza zvitendero zvose zviri munyika, vachiti zvitendero izvi zvinofanirwawo kuita zvine zvinobatsira vatenderi vazvo.

Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvitendero, VaTonderayi Makaya, vanotiwo tsika dzezvitendero hadzifanirwe kuisa hupenyu hwenhengo dzavo panjodzi munyaya dzehutsanana. No media source currently available
title: Chirwere cheCholera Chokonzera Kunetsana Pakati peHurumende nevechiMuslim

text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vakapeta musangano wekudyidzana munyaya dzezvehupfumi nemutungamiri wenyika yeSouth Africa VaCyril Ramaphosa muHarare nezuro,asi dzimwe nyanzvi dzinoongorora nyaya dzezvehupfumi dziinoti hadzione paine zvichabuda. Mutungamiri wesangano reCoalition For Market and Liberal Solutions VaRejoice Ngwenya vanoti misangano yakadayi havawone ichiunza pundutso munyika yakatarisana nematambudziko ezvematongerwo enyika yakaita seZimbabwe. Vanoti kurudziro yaVaRamaphosa yekuti zvirango zvakatemerwa vamwe vakuru venyika zviviswe haina zvainobatsira kana Zimbawe ichiramba ichityora kodzero dzevanhu. VaNgwenya vanoti sezvo South Africa yakatarisana nesarudzo gore rino havaone ichizokwanisa kugadzirisa nhamo dzeZimbabwe panyaya yekuda chikwereti. "Hurumende inokwanisa kugadzirisa zviga zviri kudiwa nehurumende yeAmerica nedzimwewo mukubvisa zvirango zvakatemerwa nyika pane kumirira misangano yekudyidzana nenyika dzakaita seSouth Africa" VaNgwenya vaudza Studio 7. No media source currently available
title: Hurumende Yokurudzirwa Kuti Igadzirise Zvematongerwo Enyika Kwete Kukoshesa Misangano

text: Mutauriri wemutungamiri wenhyika VaEmmerson VaMnangagwa, VaGeoge Charamba vaudza New Ziana kuti VaMnangagwa havasi kuenda kuBritain kurufu rwaMambokadzi Elizabeth. VaCharamba vati gurukota rinoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika Va Fredrick Shava. Mukuru mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko muZanu-PF VaTafadzwa Mugwadi vaudza Studio 7 kuti ichokwadi kuti VaMnangagwa havasi kuenda kuBritain sezvataurwa naVaCharamba sezvo vario kugadzirira kuenda kumusangano weUnited Nations General Assembly kuNew York. Asi vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu vachishanda nesangano reRestoration of Human Rights Zimbabwe VaPanyika Karimanzira vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvange zvakaoma kuti VaMnangagwa vaende kuBritain sezvo vaigona kusungwa vachipomerwa mhosva dzekutyora kodzero dzevanhu. Vatiwo zvekuti vauye nendege yeruzhinji sezviri kukurudzirwakune vari kuenda kunyika iyi zvinogona kunge zvichivaremera. Britain iri kukurudzira vatungamiri venyika vari kuenda kunyika iyi kuti vasaende nendege dzavo. Asi vamwe vatungamiri venyika dzemuAficavakaita semutungamiri wenyika yeSouth Africa VaCyril Ramaphosa nemutungamiri weNamibia VaHage Geingob vari kuenda kurufu urwu. Vamwe vanoona nezvematongerwo enyika vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvinogona kurevawo kuti Britain yange isiri kuda kuti VaMnangagwa vange vari parufu urwu. Izvi vanoti zvakaitwa neAmerica mwedzi wadarika apo yakadaidza VaShava zvekare kwete VaMnagagwa pamusangano wekudyidzana uchaitwa muna Zvita nevatungamiri venyika dzemuAfrica. Hatina kukwanisa kubata muzinda weZimbabwe muBritain kuti ujekese nyaya iyi. Asi pambenge paita mashoko ekuti mutungamiri wenyika VaMnangagwa havana kukokwa azonzi padandemutande remuzinda weBritain munyika ange ari enhema. Mambokadzi Elizabeth vari kutarisirwa kuradzikwa musi weMuvhuro. Vakashaya kuScotland nemusi weChina. No media source currently available
title: Kusaenda kwaVaMnangagwa Kurufu rwaMambokadzi Elizabeth Kwokonzera Mutauro

text: Makambani akawanda ange achitarisirwa kutanga basa neMuvhuro mushure mekuvheneka vashandi vavo kuti havana chirwere checoronavirus here uye kuona kuti vashandi vanenge vasiri pedyo nepedyo pavanenge vachishanda. Asi nyaya yekushaikwa kwezvekuvheneka vanhu chirwere ichi kana kuti matest kits inenge iri kudzosera basa kumashure. Hurumende yakatara nzvimbo dzine chitsama kuti dzivhenekwe vashandi hutachiona uhu asi munyori mukuru mubazi rezvehutano Dr Agnes Mahomva vanoti kuti zvikurumidze, makambani anofanira kutenga zvekuvheneka vashandi kana kuti matest kits oga. Asi mutungamiri weEmployers Confederation of Zimbabwe Doctor Israel Murefu vaudza Studio 7 kuti zviri kukurudzirwa nehurumende zvdekuti vabhadhare mari yekuvheneka vashandi vose zvakaomera makambani nekuti vari kuvheneka vashandi ava vari kuda mari iri pakati pemadhora makumi maviri nemashanu nezana remadhora ekuAmerica. Vati makambani mazhinji ayo ange akavharwa ari kutotatarikawo kuwana mari kana yekutobhadhara vashandi yacho. No media source currently available
title: VeMabhizimisi Vanoti Havana Mari yeKuvheneka Vashandi Coronavirus Sezviri Kukurudzirwa neHurumende

text: Kanzuru yeHarare iri kukurudzira vose vakakwikwidza musarudzo dzichangopera kuitwa kuti vabvise magwaro avo ekuzvishambadza, sezvo akapedza basa rawo. Mutauriri wekanzuru, VaMichael Chideme, vanoti mutemo wekanzuru unoti magwaro ekushambadza kana kuti ma poster, anofanirwa kubviswa mukati memazuva mana kana sarudzo dzapera, asi vakawanda vakakwikwidza havasi kubvisa magwaro avo. VaChideme vanoti ma ‘poster’ aya yatove tsvina mukati meguta vachiti vacharamba vachiyeuchidza vanhu ava pamwe nemapato avo kuti vaabvise pasina kunetsana. No media source currently available
title: Kanzuru yeHarare Yokurudzira Kubviswa kweZvinorwa Zvakashaniswa Musarudzo

text: Masangano emakereke akabatana achishanda neZimbabwe Devine Destiny anonzi ari kuronga kusvitsa gwaro renyunyuto kumutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe iro riri kuvakurudzira kuti vasiye chigaro nekuti vakundikana kutungamira nyika. Vari kutungamira hurongwa uhwu, Bishop Ancelimo Magaya, vanotungamira zvakare Zimbabwe Devine Destiny, vanoti gwaro ravo ravari kusvitsa neMuvhuro kuna VaMugabe iri rine zvinyunyuto zvikuru zvitatu zvinoti kuparara kweupfumi, kutyorwa kwekodzero uyewo kutambura kwevanhu. Bishop Magaya vanoti VaMugabe vanofanirwa kubvuma kuti havachakwanisi kugadzirisa Zimbabwe, vopa mukana kuvanhu vemuZimbabwe kuti vaite hurukuro inobvumidza kuti vanhu vagadzirise zvinhu pamwechete. Vanoti kana VaMugabe vakasatambira kuti vakundikana, vemakerekere ava vachaenda kudare reparamende kuti ribvise mutungamiri wenyika pachigaro, kana kuti impeach. Bishop Magaya vanoti vachasangana zvakare muHarare mukutanga kwaGumiguru vachitsinhira kurudziro yavo yekuti VaMugabe vabvume kuti vakundikana kufambisa nyika. Mamwe masangano ari muhuruongwa uhwu anosanganisira reChristian Voice, Prayer Network, neZimbabwe Pastors Forum. No media source currently available
title: VeMakereke Voronga Kusvitsa Gwaro reNyunyuto Kuna VaMugabe

text: Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika uye vari mukuru wesangano rinorwira budiriro yenharaunda, reFastforward Community Development Centre, VaAkson Potera, vanoti musangano waitwa pakati pemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, navanachiremba, vanamukoti nevamwe vari mumapoka akakosha musangano wakanaka chose. Asi VaPotera vanoti havaoni hurumende ichizadzisa nekukasika zvose zviri kukurudzirwa nemapoka aya nekuda kwemamiriro ezvehupfumi hwenyika. VaPotera vanoti hurumende ine dambudziko remari zvekuti kuti ikwanise kuvhura nzvimbo dzekuongororera hutachiwana hwe coronavirus mumatunhu akawanda enyika pamwe nekukasika kuburitsa zvinenge zvawanikwa zviroto chaizvo, kunze kwekunge paita vamwe vanobatsira venenge vapindira. Vanotiwo zvakakosha zvikuru kuti vanachiremba navanamukoti vari kumberi mukurwisana nedambudziko rechirwere che COVID-19 ivo pachezvavo vaongororwewo kana vaine hutachiwana hwe Coronavirus, sezvo vachisangana nevarwere vakasiyanasiyana, Panyaya yekurudziro yaVaMnangagwa yekuti vanhu varemekedze mutemo wekugara kudzimba, VaPotera vanoti ruzhinji rwevanhu munyika rwunorarama nekupemha zuva nezuva, zvinove zvichanetsa kuti mutemo uyu uteverwe. No media source currently available
title: Vamwe Vanoti Hurumende Haikwanise Kuzadzisa Zvichemo Zvinobata COVID-19

text: Vakuru vakati “panorwa nzou uswa ndihwo hunoparara.” Izvi ndizvo zvinonzi zvinoitika nguva zhinji kana hurumende ichinge yadzika mimwe mitemo inonzi inopedzisira yakanganisa mashandiro emamwe mapoka. Izvi ndizvo zvinonzi nevashandi pamwe nevemabhizimusi zviri kuitika mushure mekusimbiswa kwemutemo unorambidza kufambafamba kwevanhu senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechiwere cheCovid-19, uyo wakatanga kushanda neMuvhuro. Munyori mukuru wesangano revashandi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, ZCTU, VaJaphet Moyo, vanoti mutemo uyu hachisi chinhu chitsva kwavari uye vave neruzivo kuti unorwadzisa vashandi zvakanyanya, sezvo vazhinji vavo vachirasikirwa neraramo dzavo. "Nenyaya yema lockdowns taona matambudziko anouya nema lockdowns nenyaya yekuti hapana rubatsiro rwunoonekwa rwunozopiwa vanhu panguva yakaoma yema lockdown," vanodaro VaMoyo. Mutemo uyu haukanganisi vashandi chete, asi kuti kanawo vashandirwi, sezviri kutsanangurwa nemutungamiri wesangano revashandirwi, reEmployers Confederation of Zimbabwe, EMCOZ, Doctor Israel Murefu. "Ma measures awa ma measures anoafekita bhizinesi nekuti mabhizinesi kana asingaoparete at full capacity yavanoda ivo zvinoita kuti production yavo idzikire, zvinozoita kuti production yavo idzikire." Doctor Murefu vanoti chimwe chinoitwa nemutemo wekudzivirira kupararira kweCovid-19 uyu kupatsanura mabhizimusi uchiaisa mumapoka maviri, mamwe onzi anobatsira zvakanyanya mamwe onzi haana kukosha, kunyange vari kunzwisisa zvavo kuti sei matanho aya ari kutorwa. "Hakuna bhizinesi rinonzi riri non-essential. Ese ari essential. Kana riri non-essential zvinoreva kuti harina zvarinobatsira'" Izvi zvinotsinhirwawo neimwe nyanzvi mune zveupfumi vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Prosper Chitambara, avo vanoti mitemo yose, ingava inorambidza zvishoma kana zvachose kuvhurwa kwemabhizimusi, inotokanganisa mashandiro emabhizimusi. Asi munyori mukuru werimwe remasangano anomirira vanorarama nekutengesa, reSurvival Vendors’ Union of Zimbabwe, VaEmmanuel Kwamira, vanoti vanotambira nemufaro mutemo uyu, sezvo uri kuvapawo kamukana kekutengesa kana zvichienzaniswa nemimwe mitemo yakatombovharisa misika nemabhizimusi nyika yose. Asi imwe nyanzvi, vachishanda vakazvimirira, VaMasimba Kuchera, vanoti kunyange hazvo mutemo uyu usina kubva wavharisa nyika sezvakamboitika pakutanga, unotokanganisa raramo dzevanhu vakawanda sezvo ruzhinji rwevanhu munyika rwave kuzvishandira rwega. Saka zvingakanganisa zvakadii kukura kwehupfumi hwenyika, uhwo hunonzi negurukota rezvemari, Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube, hwave kusimukira? VaKuchera vanoti, "Zvinokanganisa zvikuru nekuti kana makazvitarisisa muchaona kuti vanhu vanga vave kudzoka kumabasa. Eeh, industry yanga yaita sekuti simukeyi." Studio 7 yakundikana kubata gurukota rezvemaindaisitiri, Amai Sekai nzenza, kuti tinzwewo maonero avo pane zviri kutaurwa nevashani pamwe nevashandirwi pamusoro pemutemo uyu. Hurumende inonzi yakatora matanho aya mushure mekuona kukwira kuri kuita huwandu hwevanhu vari kufa pamwe nekubatwa neCovid-19, asi nenyaya yekuti hupfumi hwenyika hahuna kusimba, vakawanda vanonzi vanogona kutambura kuti vazviriritire nekuda kwenguva dzavanobvumidzwa kunge vachiri kumabasa, pangave pakambani, kana kwavanozviitira emaoko. No media source currently available
title: Mutemo weCovid-19 Unorambidza Kufambafamba kweVanhu Wonzi Unokanganisa Makambani, Vashandi neVanhuwo Zvavo

text: Dare repamusoro remuBulawayo ramisa kugadzwa kwaVaBulelani Khumalo saMambo Lobengula mukumutsurudzwa kwehumambo hwerudzi rwemaNdebele kwange kuchida kuitwa muBulawayo. Mapurisa anodzivirira mhirizhonga vashandisa hutsi hunokachidza kuti vadzinge vanhu vange vachiimba vari panze peHigh Court vakamirira kunzwa kuti dare iri rinoti kudii panyaya yange yakwidzwa zvechimbi-chimbi pamusoro pekugadzwa kwashe uyu. Mutauriri we Royal Crown Trust, VaEffie Ncube, vaudza Studio7 kuti mutongi wedare, VaMartin Makonese, vati kugadzwa kwaVaKhumalo hakufanirwe kuenderera mberi sezvo kuve naMambo wemaNdebele kuri kunze kwemitemo yenyika. Vati havasati vaziva kuti vachakwira kudare reSupreme Court here kana kuti kwete kuti vapikise zvaturwa nedare reHigh Court. Nemusi weChitatu gurukota rezvematunhu, VaJuly Moyo, vakazivisa kuti kugadzwa kwamambo uku kwaisafanirwa kuenderera mberi. Panguva dzekuma 10 neMugovera makurukota ehurumende anosanganisira VaMoyo negurukota rezvemukati menyika, VaObert Mpofu, mukuru wemadzishe, Ishe Fortune Charumbira, nemamwe madzishe emumatunhu eMatabeleland vange vambosangana kuti vazeye nezvenyaya iyi. VaMoyo vati musangano uyu wanga uri wekuda kutsanangurira madzishe nezvedanho rehurumende asi vati hauna kuzoenderera mberi nekuda kwekuti nyaya iyi yange yakwidzwa kudare. VaMthandazo Ndlovu vati havazi kufara nekupindira kwehurumende munyaya yehumambo hwemaNdebele. Pane makakatanwa agara aripo panyaya yehumambo hwemaNdebele. Gore rakapera VaRaphael Tshuma Khumalo vakazviti ndivo Mambo Mzilikazi II. Masvondo maviri apfuura, VaPeter Zwide Khumalo, vakazvigadzawo saMambo. Ukuwo neMugovera, VaBulelani Khumalo, vange vachida kugadzwa saMambo zvekare. No media source currently available
title: Matare Omisa Kugadzwa kwaMambo weMandevere

text: Nyanzvi dzezvehutano dzinonzi dziri kuronga kuita ongororo kana kuti postmortem chero nguva kubva nhasi yekutsvaga chakauraya murwiri wekodzero ane mukurumbira uye vaive mukuru weHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica, VaDewa Mavhinga, avo vakashaya neMugovera vari muSouth Africa. Mumwe wemhuri ane ruzivo nezvri kuitika audza Studio 7 danho iri rinogona kuitwa neMuvhuro kana kuti neChipiri, shure pezvo mutumbi wavo wozotarisirwa kutakurwa kuenda kumusha uko vanotarisirwa kuzoradzikwa. Izvi zviri kuitika panguva iyo vemasangano akasiyanasiyana akashanda pamwechete naVaMavhinga vari kutaura pamusoro pekurasikirwa kwavo nekushaya kwegamba rekodzero dzevanhu iri. Mumwe wevari kuchema kushaya kwaVaMavhinga ndaVaDenis Juru, vanove mutungamiri wesangano revanorarama nekutenga pamwe nekutenga kunze kwenyika, reInternational Cross Border Traders Association. VaJuru vanoti kushaya kwaVaMavhinga ipfumo rakabaya vanhu vakawanda pamwoyo sezvo vakanga vari munhu akanga achibatsira vamwe asingatarise kuti wabuda mumba maani uye vakanga vasiri munhu aitarisa matambudziko ezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe chete, asi kuti nezvekune dzimwe nyika dzakaita seEswathini, uko vanoti vanga vachibatsira zvikuru. VaMavhinga vakashaya vave nemakore makumi mana nemaviri ekuberekwa, uye vakasiya mudzimai nevana vana. No media source currently available
title: Vakawanda Voenderera Mberi neKuchema Kushaya kweMurwiri weKodzero, VaDewa Mavhinga

text:
Vamwe vagari mudunhu reMasvingo vanoti vave kuyaura nenzara
sezvo zvikafu zvavakange vakachegeta zvopera apo nyika yapinda muzuva
rechisere yaparura chirongwa chekuti vanhu vagare mudzimba vasingaende
kumabasa senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere checovid-19 kana
kuti coronavirus. Vagari vataura neStudio 7 vanoti vari panguva yakaoma sezvo zvitoro
zvinotengesa chikafu zvave kuvhurwa kwema awa mashanu uye mamwe mapurisa achimbovarambidza kubuda mudzimba. Vanhu vanonziwo vanofanira kutenga pazvitoro zviri pedyo pedyo navo chete. Amai Entrance Takaedza vashorawo nyaya yekukurumidza kuvhara zvitoro zvinotengesa mishonga kana kuti mapharmacies vachiti zvinoisa varwere munjodzi Vamwewo vekumaruwa vakaita saVaHery Makusha vanogara kuNemamwa vanoti kunze kwenguva diki iri kuvhurwa zvitoro vanhu vazhinji vave kutarisana ne nhamo yesadza sezvo hupfu huri
kudhuriswa kubva pakatanga chirongwa chekuti vanhu vagare mudzimba.
VaEdward Jacob Mnzanga vanorarama nekutengesa zvinhu mumigwagwa vanoti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka nekuti havachina chekubata. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rehurumnede panyaya iyi, sezvo gurukota
rezve kufambiswa kwemashoko , Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, vati vange vari
mumusangano. Asi mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, nezuro vakaudza vatori venhau mushure mekutenderera munzvimbo dzinogara veruzhinji kuHarare kuti vachaongororazve nezvechirongwa ichi. Mune imwewo nyaya sagano rinomirira vagari reMasvingo United Residents
and Rate Payers Alliance(MURRA) nhasi raendesa kanzuru yeMasvingo
kudare repamusoro richipa chikumbiro chekuti kanzuru, bazi rezvehutano nerematunhu manikidzwe kupa vagari mvura mudzimba nguva dzose kuti vakwanise kudzivirira chirwere cheCovid-19 icho chinoda kuhatsanana hwakawanda.

Gweta reMURRA VaMartin Mureri vanoti mvura yakakosha kuvagari panguva ino.

Mutongi wedare VaNeville Wamambo, vambosendeka nyaya iyi parutivi kusvika magwana vachiti vakamirira magweta emapazi ehurumende ayo atadza kuuya kudare nhasi. Dhorobha iri rave nemwedzi yakawanda vagari vasingawane mvura mudzimba izvo zvinoita kuti vararame nemvura yemuzvibhorani. MuHarare dare repamusoro rakatotonga svondo rapera kuti kanzuru nemapazi ehurumende aya vaone kuti vanhu vawaniswa mvura yakachena munyaya yainge yakwidzwa kumatare nerimwe sangano rinomirira vagari reCombined Harare Residents Association
title: Vagari vekuMasvingo Vanoti Nzara Yopfunya Chisero Apo Vari Kunzi Vagare Mudzimba

text: Ongororo yakaitwa neMass Public Opinion, kana kuti MPOI, ichibatsirana nemamwe masangano akaita seAfrobarometer, yakaburitsa kuti vanhu vemuZimbabwe vane chivimbo zvikuru nemutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, yakonzera mutauro wakanyanya munyika. Zvimwe zvakabuda muongororo iyi zvichabuditswa nemusi weChitatu. Vatsigiri veZanu-PF vanoti ongororo iyi inoratidza zvavagara vachitaura kare kuti VaMugabe vanodiwa nevanhu. Asi vanopikisa vanoti ongororo iyi yakareva nepasipo. Ongororo iyi inoti vanhu vemuZimbabwe vane chivimbo chakanyanya nevakuru vemachechi uye masangano akazvimirira oga. Vanhu makumi matanhatu nevana kubva muzana vanonzi vane chivimbo naVaMugabe asi vanhu makumi mashanu nevatanhatu vachiti vane chivimbo nebato reZanu-PF. Vanhu makumi mashanu kubva muzana vanonzi vane chivimbo neZimbabwe Electoral Commission sangano rinoona nezvesarudzo munyika. Vanhu zvikamu makumi matatu nezvitanhatu kubva muzana vanonzi vane chivimbo nevanopikisa. Vanotungamira ongororo musangano reMPOI, VaStephen Ndoma, vanoti vakabvunza vanhu vanodarika churu nemazana maviri. No media source currently available Mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Democracy Institute, Doctor Pedzisayi Ruhanya, vanoti ongororo dzakadai dzinonetsa sezvo muZimbabwe musina kugadzikana nekuti vanhu vanotya. No media source currently available
title: Ongororo Inoti VaMugabe Vanodiwa neVanhu Yokonzera Mutauro

text: Sangano re Zimbabwe Tourism Authority rinoti gadziriro ye musangano mukuru wepagore we Sanangani – Hlanganani iri kufamba zvakanaka uye vanyarikani vari kubva kune dzimwe nyika vatotanga kusvika. Musangano uyu uchaitwa kuBulawayo svondo rinouya kubva musi wa 16 kusvika musi we Mugovera musi wa 18. Musangano uyu unoitwa panguva iyo nyika yakatarisana nedambudziko rekushaikwa kwemari asi vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemashoko musangano iri VaSugar Chagonda vanoti vari kutaura nemakurokota anoona nezvekufambiswa kwemari kuti vaone kuti pane zvingaitwe here kuti vashanyi vasatarisane nedambudziko iri. “Isu tinoshuwira kuti vese vachashanya vakwanise kusiya mari dzamo munyika nekushandisa macredit card kuitira kuti mari iyi ishande mukurandudza hupfumi hwenyika yedu,” VaChagonda vaudza Studio 7. VaChagonda vonoti zvakakosha kuti musangano uyu uitirwe kuzvimbo dzakasiyana siyana saka gore rino uchange uri kuitirwa kuBulawayo senzira yekupa mukana kune vanyarikani vachange vari pamusangano uyu kuti vamboonawo dzimwe dzvimbo dziri muguta iri. Vamwe vanyarikani vakabva kuSouth Africa vanonzi vari kukurudzira kuti kuve nemari inoshandiswa ne nyika dzemu SADC sezvo mari yekuAmerica iri kuita kuti kushanya munyika kudhure. No media source currently available
title: Zimbabwe Tourism Authority Yokurudzira Vashanyi Kuti Vashandise maCard Pavanoshanya

text: Mukuru weAlbino Trust of Zimbabwe, VaBrian Nyoni, vanoti vanhu vanodarika zviuru mazana matatu, 300 000, vachawana rubatsiro rwekupiwa magirazi okuverengesa pachena pachirongwa cheSight To the World. Sangano iri riri kushanda nebazi rezvehutano mukanzuru yeHarare. VaNyoni vanoti chirongwa ichi chichabatsira vanhu vanemazera ari pakati pemakore makumi mana nemashanu, 45, nemakumi matanhatu nemashanu, 65. Vaendera mberi vachiti chirongwa ichi chichaendawo kumatunhu mashanu enyika kwemakore mashanu anotevera. VaNyoni vatiwo chirongwa ichi hachisi kunangana nevanhu vanorarama nehusope chete. Vaendera mberi vachiti zvakakosha kuti munhu wese apinde muchirongwa ichi pasina rusarura izvo zvinozoita kuti vanhu vaone kukosha kwemasangano anomirira vanorarama nehusope uye nekunzwisisawo matambudziko avanosangana nawo. Imwe nyanzvi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano isina kudomwa nezita yaudza Studio 7 kuti kune zvakawanda zvinokonzera kuti vanhu varware maziso uye vaendera mberi vachiti vanosanganawo nevana vari pasi pemakore gumi nemashanu, 15, vanenge vavhiringidzwa maziso nenzira dzakasiyana siyana. Vati rimwe donzvo rechirongwa ichi nderekudzikisa huhwandu hwevanhu vanoita tsaona pamigwagwa nenyaya yekusaona zvakanaka. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano Dr Chiripanyanga vatsanangura zvimwe zvezvirwere zvinokonzera kupofomara kwemaziso. Bazi rezvehutano rinoti kune vanhu vakawandisa vanoda magirazi okuonesa zvekuti vari kukurudzira varapwi kuti vaende kumakiriniki anosanganisira Sekuru Kaguvi iri paParirenyatwa Hospital, Norton Eye Hospital, Sakubva Clinic kwaMutare ne Richard Morris Hospital kuBulawayo. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano hwemaziso ine mukurumbira pasi rose Dr Solomon Guramatunhu vanoti zvinorwadza kuona varwere vachishaya rubatsiro munyika, asi dzimwe nyika dzichisimbaradza zvipatara zvehurumende kuitira kuti veruzhinji vakwanise kubatsirwa.
title: Vasope neVamwe Vasingaone Zvakanaka Vobatsirwa neMagirazi Pachena

text: Mutungamiri weMDC, VaNelson Chamisa, vanoti mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vanofanira kutanga vakumbira ruregerero kana vachida kugadzirisa nyaya yeGukurahundi iyo vakati vanhu vanofanira kusungunuka kutaura nezvayo. No media source currently available Kubva muna 1983 kusvika 1987, vanhu vanogona kusvika zviuru makumi maviri vakaurayiwa kuMatabeleland neMidlands nemauto eFifth Brigade. VaMnangagwa ndivo vaive gurukota revasori panguva iyi. Vaive mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vanoti iyi yaive nguva yekumbopenga asi vakaramba kukumbira ruregerero. Asi VaMnagagwa kubva zvavakasarudzwa kuva mutungamiri wenyika, vakavimbisa kugadzirisa nyaya yeGukurahundi. Asi mutauriri waVaMnangagwa, VaGeorge Charamba, avo vakamboti VaMnangagwa vainge vasineyi nezvakaitika vachipomera VaMugabe mhosva vanoti iyi yaive hondo uye kwakafa vanhu kumativi ose. Studio7 yakundikana kubata VaCharamba kana gurukota rezvemutemo, VaZiyambi Ziyambi, sezvo vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha dzavo. Mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaEnergy Mutodi, vanoti zvakataurwa naVaCharamba ndizvo chaizvo zvinomirira pfungwa dzehurumende zvekuti iyi yaive hondo. No media source currently available
title: VaChamisa Vanoti VaMnangagwa Ngavakumbire Ruregerero paNyaya yeGukurahundi

text: Panonzi pave nekusawirirana mumasangano evarairidzi zvichitevera mashoko anonzi akataurwa negurukota rezvemari, Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube, ekuti hurumende yakakumbirwa nevarairidzi kuti imise kushandiswa kwemari yekunze munyika pamusangano wakaitwa nevamiriri vevarairidzi nemutungamiri wenyika, Vaemmerson Mnangagwa svondo rapera. Hurumende yakazivisa neMuvhuro svondo rino kuti mari yekunze yakanga isisabvumidzwi kushandiswa munyika, asi kuti mari yeBond Note neRTGS ive chete iyo inoshandiswa munyika mukutengeserana. Masangano evarairidzi ari pasi peApex Council anoti reZimbabwe Teachers’ Union of Zimbabwe, Teachers’ Union of Zimbabwe neZimbabwe Democratic Teachers Union pamwe nevamiriri vemamwe masangano evashandi akasangana nemutungamiri wenyika svondo rapera achipira zvichemo zvine vashandi vehurumende. Zvichemo izvi zvinosanganisira nyaya dzemihoro yavo, iyo vanoti haichina chainotenga, izvo varairidzi vainyunyutawo vachiti vanoda kuti vabhadharwe mihoro yavo nemari yekuAmerica. Sangano reProgressive Teachers’ Union of Zimbabwe, PTUZ, nemamwe masangano evarairidzi havana kupinda mumusangano uyu. Asi masangano asina kupinda mumusangano uyu anonzi ave kupomera masangano akasangana naVaMnangagwa mhosva yekutengesa Chimurenga chevarairidzi. Munyori wePTUZ, VaRaymond Majongwe, vanoti vakapinda mumusangano nemutungamiri wenyika vakanga vasingafanirwe kukurudzira zvekubviswa kwemari yekunze pasina dzimwe nzira dzekugadzirisa nadzo zvichemo zvevarairidzi. VaMajongwe vanoti hazvibatsire kuti nyika itore matanho akadai iyo isina mari yekunze yairi kupinda munyika kubva muzvicherwa nezvirimwa. Mukuru weTeachers union of Zimbabwe, VaManuel Nyawo, vanoramba kuti havana kukumbira kuti mari yekunze irambidzwe kushandiswa munyika, asi chete kuti vakati vanoda kutambiriswa nemari inotenga. Vanoti vakaudza VaMnangagwa kuti kana vezvitoro vachiti vanoda kuti vanhu vatenge nemari yekunze, vashandi vanofanirwawo kubhadharwa nemari yekuAmerica. No media source currently available
title: Varairidzi Vopesana neNyaya yeKurambidzwa kweMari yeKunze Kushandiswa Munyika

text: Sangano guru revashandi, reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, rinoti hurumende haikwanise kudzinga basa vashandi ichishandisa mitemo yechimbi chimbi, kana kuti Statutory Instruments, sezvairi kutaura sezvo kuri kutyora bumbiro remitemo. Hurumende yakazivisa kuti kutanga nhasi, Muvhuro, vashandi vayo vose vanenge vasina kubayiwa nhomba vachamiswa basa vonyimwa mari yemihoro kunze kwekunge vaine zvikonzero zvakati tsvikiti. Vanenge vagarisa vasina kubayiwa vanonzi vanogona kudzingwa basa. Hurumende yakatoburitsa kare mugwaro rayo, reGovernment Gazette, kuti vashandi vose vange vabayiwa nhomba kusvika musi wa 15 Gumiguru. Mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaKindness Paradza, vaudza Studio 7 kuti hapana kudududza panyaya iyi. Asi munyori mukuru weZCTU VaJaphet Moyo vaudza Studio 7 kuti kudzinga vashandi kutyora bumbiro remitemo uye vashandi vanokwanisa kuenda kumatare No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, rimwe sangano rinomirira varairidzi, reProgressive Teachers’ Union of Zimbabwe, rinoti rinokurudzira nhengo dzaro kuti dzirambe dzichienda kuzvikoro kusvika dzazonyorerwa tsamba dzekuvamisa basa nehurumende. Mutungamiri wesangano iri, Doctor Takavafira Zhou, vanoti pane zvikonzero zvizhinji zvinotadzisa vamwe vanhu kuti vabaiwe nhomba, vachiti iyi haisi nyaya yekumanikidza vanhu asi kuti hurumende ione kuti chii chiri kukonzera kuti vamwe vatsike madziro pakubayiwa nhomba yeCovid-19. No media source currently available
title: ZCTU Inoiti Hurumende Haikwanise Kushandisa Mitemo yeChimbichimbi Kudzinga Basa Vashandi

text: Tarisiro yemusangano pakati pevari kumirira mubatanidzwa weMDC Alliance VaNelson Chamisa nemutungamiri weZanu PF uwe vari mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmerson Mnangagwa kuti vakurukure maererano nesarudzo dziri kuuya musi wa 30 Chikunguru yoshaya basa sezvo VaMnangagwa vari kunzi vakaramba zvachose kusangana naVaChamisa sarudzo dzisati dzaitwa. Mutauriri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaGeorge Charamba vanoti VaMnangagwa havana hurongwa hwekusangana naVaChamisa kunze kwekumirira musi wesarudzo nekuti havaoni zviine chazvinovabatsira kusangana naVaChamisa pari zvino. VaCharamba vanoti kana VaChamisa vachida kusangana nemukuru wenyika ngavabatane nevamwe vavo vese vari kukwikwidza voita musangano mumwechete, kwete wavo ivo vari vega. Asi mutauriri waVaChamisa, Doctor Nkululeko Sibanda, vanoti uyu wanga uri mukana wekuti vaviri ava vawirirane kuita sarudzo dzakachena uye kuonesana mune zvinoda kugadziriswa nekuti ndivo vatungamiriri vakatarisirwa neruzhinji rwevanhu. VaSibanda vanoti Zanu PF iri kuratidza kuti iri kutya kukundwa musarudzo. Murongi wemusangano muMDC-T inotungamirirwa naVaNelson Chamisa, VaAmos Chibaya, vaudza Studio 7 kuti nguva yekugadzirisa zvinoda kugadziriswa yapera mazuva esarudzo atosvika, vachitiwo zvanga zvakanaka chose kuti VaMnangagwa naVaChamisa, sevatungamiriri vemapato ane mukurumbira munyika, vagare pasi kuitira kuti vaonesane zvinodiwa nezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe. No media source currently available
title: VaMnangagwa Voramba Zvachose Kusangana NaVaChamisa Sarudzo Dzisati Dzaitwa

text: Mutungamiri weMDC-T, VaMorgan Tsvangirai, vanoti nhengo dzavo hadzingarambi dzichirohwa mazuva ose dzakapeta maoko nenhengo dzeZanu PF. Vachitaura pamusangano mumusha weAlaska, muChinhoyi, VaTsvangirai vati zviri pachena kuti mapurisa havasi kudzivirira nhengo dzavo kumhirizhonga zvichitevera kuda kunganganiswa kwemusangano wavo nenhengo dzeZanu PF neChishanu. No media source currently available VaTsvangirai vayambira mapurisa neZanu PF kuti ivo nevamwe vatungamiri vebato ravo havafanirwe kuwanirwa mhosva kana nhengo dzavo dzave kuzvidzivirira kana dzorwisa nenhengo dzeZanu PF sezvaitika neChishanu kuAlaska. VaTsvangirai vati vanga vofunga kuti nyaya yemhirizhonga yainge yapera. Musangano weMDC-T waitwa zvechisimba mushure mekunge nhengo dzeZanu PF dzaedza kutadzisa kuti musangano uyu usaitwe apo vanga vachiimba nekutyisidzira nhengo dzeMDC-T. Mapurisa anodzivirira mhirizhonga anga achingombeya mbeya kusvikira musangano wapera. Mashoko aVaTsvangirai atsigirwa nemukuru wevechidiki mubato reMDC-T, VaHappymore Chidviva Gondo, avo vati hakuna munhu anonzi ndiye ega anogona kuita mhirizhonga. VaTsvangirai vataurira nhengo dzavo kuti vanyorese kuitira kuti vave vavhoti nekuti kuvhota chete ndiko kunoita kuti Zanu PF ibve pachigaro. Vaenderera mberi vachiti ivo chete ndivo vane zano rekuti nzara ipere munyika sezvo mutungamiri weZanu PF, VaRobert Mugabe, vakundikana. VaTsvangirai vati kunyange VaMugabe vakanyorerana zvibvumirano zvakawanda zvekuti vapiwe ruyamuro rwemari, hakuna mari yavanowana kunyange kubva kushamwari dzavo dzeku China. VaTsvangirai vari kushanya kwemazuva mana muMashonaland West vachisangana nevatsigiri vavo...
title: VaTsvangirai Vanoti Nhengo Dzavo Hadzirohwe Dzakapeta Maoko

text: Musarudzo dzakaitwa neChipiri, vadzidzi vepa University of Zimbabwe vakasarudza munhu wechikadzi kuti ave mutungamiriri wekanzuru inomiririra vadzidzi, yeStudent Representative Council. Muzvare Abiona Mataranyika veZINASU vakawana mavhoti zviuru zviviri zvine mazana mashanu negumi nerimwe (2,511) vachikunda vamwe vaviri avo vakawana mavhoti chiuru nezana, mumwe ndokuwana mavhoti ari pasi pechiuru chimwe chete. Aka ndiko kekutanga chikoro ichi chichisarudza munhukadzi kuti abate chigaro ichi. Muzvare Mataranyika ave munhu wechikadzi wekutanga kuve mutungamiriri we Students Representative Council. Pakaita mhirizhonga mushure mekuverengwa kwemavhoti vamwe vakakuvadzwa uye pakapunzwa mahwindo. Muzvare Mataranyika vaudza Studio7 kuti chekutanga chavanoda kuita kuona kuti vadzidzi vechikadzi vapiwa zvehutsanana pachena nekuti iyi nyaya irkunetsa vadzidzi vechikadzi zvikuru. Muzvare Mataranyika vanoti vachaona kuti nyaya yemagetsi pachikoro ichi yagadziriswa nekukurumidza sezvo kudzimwa dzimwa kwemagetsi kuri kukanganisa vadzidzi pakudzidza nekuverenga. No media source currently available
title: Muzvare Mataranyika Vanosarudzwa Kutungamirira UZ Student Representative Council

text: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvechidzimai zvinogara nekushanda muBotswana zvinoti kushaikwa kwemukana wekucherechedza zuva revanhukadzi pasi rose reInternational Women’s Day kunovatadzisa kuti vave nemazano angavabatsira kuti vabatsirikane. Vachitaura neStudio7 muFrancistown, Botswana pazuva reMadzimai kana kuti International Women's Day, Amai Priscilla Katsenga vanoti vanhukadzi vanobva kuZimbabwe nedzimwe nyika muBotswana neSouth Africa vanosangana nematambudziko makuru asi kwekuchemera hapana. Amai Tinotenda Mutungagore vaudza Studio7 kuti zvizvarwa zvechidzimai zvinobva kuZimbabwe hazvikwanisi kurakidzira kumbunyikidzwa kwazvo munyika dzazvinogara nekuti ruzhinji rwugere munyika idzi zvisiri pamutemo Muzvare Ethel Jairos avo vane makore makumi mana nerimwe vanorarama nekutenga zvinhu muBotswana vachinozvitengesa kumusha vanoti nhamo ndiyo inoita kuti vasafunge nezvekucherechedzwa kwezuva iri kunyangwe hazvo vachisangana nematambudziko. Zvichakadaro, Amai Memory Mlotshwa vanoti kusamira zvakanaka kwezvinhu muZimbabwe kunopa kuti madzimai agume opembererera nenyika kunge mombe dzemashanga. Musi wa 8 Kurume gore rega rega, vanhukadzi pasi rose vanocherechedza mabasa anoitwa nemadzimai. No media source currently available
title: Madzimai emuZimbabwe Anogara muBotswana Ochema neKushaya Mukana weKutaurawo Nhamo Dzavo

text: Gweta rakaendesa mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe kumatare richiti havachafanire kuramba vari pachigaro nekuti vakwegura uye hutano hwavo hauna kumira zvakanaka, VaTinomudaishe Chinyoka, vanoti vari kutarisira kuti nyaya yavo ichanzwikwa mudare muna Kubvumbi. Asi vanoti havasati vawana tsamba kubva kumagweta aVaMugabe kupikisa zvavakatura kudare repamuso. No media source currently available  Asi gweta rine mukurumbira munyika vari mutungamiri webato rinopikisa reNational Constitutional Assembly muzvinafundo Lovemore Madhuku vanoti zviri kuitwa naVaChinyoka kupedzera hoko padehwe retsindi nekuti bumbiro remutemo rinopa masimba ekuti mutungamiri wenyika haachakwanise kutonga kudare reparamende kweete kumnhuwo zvake. No media source currently available Asi dare reparamende parizvino rakazara nenhengo dzakawanda dzebato riri kutonga reZanu-PF dzinonzi nedzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika hadzina chidokwa dokwa chekuda kubvisa VaMugabe pachigaro.
title: Dare Rotarisirwa Kuzeya Nyaya Yekuti VaMugabe Havachakwanise Kutonga Muna Kubvumbi

text: Veruzhinji vanoti vari kukatyamadzwa zvikuru nekukwira kuri kuita mitengo yezvinhu munyika zvichitevera kurambidzwa kwemari dzekunze kushandiswa munyika. Vanhu vazhinji vanoti vaifunga kuti zvakaiswa mutemo mutsva nehurumende wekushandisa mari yemunyika chete, mitengo yezvinhu yaizogadzikana, asi vari kushamisika zvikuru vachiona mitengo ichiita chamurambamhuru kukwira. Vamwe vatengi vakaita sa Amai Chipo Murambiwa vanoti mitengo yezvinhu, kunyanya chikafu, yafuma yakaita chamuramba mhuru muzvitoro zvakaita seOK ne Pick & Pay nezvikamu zvinopfuura zana kubva muzana. Muchitoro che OK makeyiji makumi mashanu ehupfu aiita makumi matatu emadhora eRGTS, nhasi afuma achiita zana nemadhora maviri. Mafuta ekubikisa aiita madhora gumi nemashanu, ave kuita madhora makumi matatu, makeyiji maviri emupunga aiita madhora masere, ave kuita madhora makumi maviri nemanomwe, ukuwo keyiji yenyama yaiita madhora gumi nemashanu, yave kuita madhora makumi matatu emaRTGS. VaJohanes Chihwani, avo vanogara mumusha we Sisk, vanoti mutemo wakaiswa uyu watovaipira. Sachigaro weConsumer Council of Zimbabwe muMasvingo, VaProsper Muzambi, vanoti kukwira kuri kuramba kuchiita mitengo yezvinhu kunokonzera mutauro munyika. Vatiwo vemabhizimusi vakaramba vachidai, vanokurudzira vatengi kuti varatidzire nekuti vaifunga kuti mutemo wakauya uchaita kuti zvinhu zvidzike. VaTatenda Matumba, avo vane chitoro mudhorobha, vati vari kuramba vachikwidza mitengo nekuti vanozondotenga mari yekunze pamukoto nekuti kumabhanga haiwanikwi. Vanoongorora nyaya dzehupfumi hwenyika vakazvimirira, VaPardon Tshuma, vanoti mutemo wakaiswa nehurumende handiwo mhinduro yedambudziko rekukwira kwezvinhu muzvitoro kana nyika isina maindasitiri anogadzira zvinhu achitengesawo kunze kwenyika. Muzvinafundo pachikoro cheGreat Zimbabwe University, VaMunashe Shoko, vanoti mitengo ichiri kukwidzwa nekuti vatengesi vazhinji vakange vakahodha zvinhu nemari yekunze nekudaro pazvichapera mitengo ichadzikama. Asi vamwe vanoti kuti zvinhu zvigadzikane nyika inofanira kushandisa mari yekunze yeku nyika yeAmereka kusvika zvinhu zvazonaka. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata gurukota rezvemari, VaMthuli Ncube, avo vanonzi vari kunze kwenyika. Asi gurukota rinoona nezvekugadzirwa kwezvinhu nekutengeserana, VaMangaliso Ndlovu, vashora zvikuru vemabhizimusi nekukwidza mitengo yezvinhu zvisina tsarukano kubva pakarambidzwa mari yekunze kushandiswa munyika svondo rino. VaNdlovu vaudza vatori venhau pamusangano wavaita muHarare kuti hapana chikonzero chingapa kuti vemabhizimusi vakwidze mitengo yezvinhu. No media source currently available .
title: Mitengo yeZvinhu Muzvitoro Yorwadza Vakawanda

text: Makakatanwa ekurwira chigaro cheanofanotungamira bato reMDC-T chakasiiwa nevaive mutungamiri webato iri, VaMorgan Tsvangirai, ari kutowedzera zvichitevera kubuda pachena kwemumwe wevatevedzeri vemutungamiri webato iri, Muzvare Thokozane Khupe, vachiti ndivo vakafanobata chigaro ichi, sezvo vari mutevedzeri akasarudzwa nekongiresi yebato ravo muna 2014. Muzvare Khupe vanoti izvi ndizvo zviri mubumbiro remitemo yebato ravo. Vanoti vamwe vose vari kuzviti ndivo vakafanobata matomu vari kutaura zvemugotsi matsuro sezvo vari kunzvenga chokwadi, chinove bumbiro rebato. Vachitaura kekutanga pamusoro penyaya iyi neStudio7, Muzvare Khupe vanoti vacharamba vachiremekedza bumbiro remitemo yebato ravo, asi vanofanirwa kujekesera nyika kuti ndivo vakafanobata chigaro chekutungamira bato zviri pamutemo. No media source currently available Ukuwo mumwe wevatevedzeri vemutungamiri webato, VaNelson Chamisa, vari kutiwo ndiwo vakafanobata chigaro ichi, zvichitevera kusarudzwa kwavo neNational Council yebato ravo. VaChamisa, avo varamba kunzi mutevedzeri wemutungamiri vachida kunzi vakafanobata chigaro chemutungamiri, vanotiwo vanhu vari kuti Muzvare Khupe ndivo vakafanobata matomu vari kutadza kunzwisisa zvikamu zvebumbiro remitemo yebato iri. Vanoti havadi kunyepera nyika kuti pakatyorwa bumbiro remitemo yebato, vachiti vanofamba nemutemo, uye ndomurawo zvaunotaura. VaChamisa vanoti havadi zvavo kuti vange vachifukura hapwa vachiburitsa zviri mubato ravo, asi vanoti vachashevedzera musangano wechimbichimbi pamuzinda webato ravo weHarvest House kuti vagadzirisane nevamwe vavo pamusoro penyaya iyi. Dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzemitemo dzinoti bumbiro remitemo reMDC-T rinoburitsa pachena kuti mutungamiri webato akasarudzwa nekongiresi, anotsiviwa nemutevedzeri wake mubato. Izvi zvinoreva kuti munhu uyu anofanirwa kunge akasarudzwa nekongiresi panguva imwe cheteyo bato rakasarudza mutungamiri waro. Kongiresi yeMDC-T yakaitwa muna 2014 iyo yakaona VaTsvangirai naMuzvare Khupe vachisarudzwa sevatungamiri vaviri vepamusoro mubato. Mushure memakore maviri kongiresi yaitwa, VaTsvangirai vakadoma VaElias Mudzuri naVaNelson Chamisa kuti vave vatevedzeri vavo kuitira kuti vavabatsire mukufambisa basa munguva iyo vainetseka nehurwere. Makakatanwa ehutungamiri mubato reMDC-T akatanga kuonekwa pakati paVaChamisa naVaMudzuri, asi kupindawo kwaMuzvare Khupe mudariro kwave kuita kuti makakatanwa aya akure. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi raVaMudzuri panyaya iyi. Asi vamwe muMDC-T vari kuti kudomwa kwaVaChamisa kuri kunze kwebumbiro remitemo, vachiti panofanirwa kuitwa kongiresi yechimbichimbi yekusarudza mutungamiri mutsva. VaTsvangirai, avo vakashaya neChitatu chapfuura kuSouth Africa, vavigwa neChipiri kumusha kwavo kwaHumanikwa, kuBuhera mudunhu reManicaland. No media source currently available
title: Muzvare Khupe Vopika Kuti Ndivo Vari paNyanga muMDC-T, Kwete VaChamisa

text: Mapurisa anodzivirira nyonganyonga kana kuti Anti-Riot Police apinda zvine chisimba munzvimbo inoshandira vatapi venhau yeMedia Centre akasunga nhengo yeTakajamuka mushure mekunge vaita musangano nevatori venhau vachishora zviri kuitwa nemapurisa zvekurova vanotengesa mumigwagwa. Mapurisa ange aine mboma, pfuti nezvombo zvehutsi hunokachidza apinda muMedia Centre nechisimba achirova madziro nemboma dzawo nekukanganisa vatori venhau vange vachizviitira basa ravo. Paapinda muMedia Center, mapurisa aya asunga nechisimba VaMakwananzi ndokuvaisa cheni mumaoko ndokuvasunda nechisimba vachibuda navo vakananga kuHarare Central Police. Zvaitika ndezvekuti pane mamwe mapurisa ePolice Internal Security kana kuti PISI apinda mumusangano wanga uchitwa naVaMkananzi nevatori venhau achinyepedzera kunge vatori nenhau uye papera musangano vabva vaedza kusunga VaMkananzi uye pavaramba, mapurisa ePISI abvaa azokoka mapurisa ekudzivirira nyonga nyonga. Mumwe mutori wenhau aona zvaitika, Sofia Mapuranga, ati haana kufara nemaitiro emapurisa aya kusunga munhu wavange vachitaura naye. Mutauriri wesangano rinomirira vatapi venhau vechidiki, reYoung Journalists Association, VaLeopold Munhende, vati vange vave kutoenda apo vaona mapurisa achipinda nechisimba kuti azosunga VaMkwananzi. Mukuru weMedia Centre, VaEnerst Mudzengi, avo vange vasiri pabasa apo pauya mapurisa, vashora kuita kwemapurisa uku uye vati vachasvitsa chichemo kumapurisa mushure kana vachinge vanzwa zvizere pane zvaitika nhasi. Sachigaro veMedia Institute of Southern Africa-Zimbabwe, VaGolden Maunganidze, varatidzawo kusafara nekuita kwemapurisa. Vati mapurisa anemvumo yekusunga vanhu asi kwete panzvimbo dzinoshandira vatapi venhau. Vatiwo havatarisiri kuita kwakadai kubva kumapurisa zvikuru sei panguva ino apo mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vari kuti vashandi vehurumende vanofanira kuremekedza vanhu nekuita basa nemazvo. Mutauriri wemapurisa, Senior Assistant Commissioner Charity Charamba, vati vange vasati vave neruzivo rwezvaitika kuMedia Centre nhasi. Zvichakadai, mapurisa aenderera mberi achirova vanhu vanotengesa mumigwagwa nhasi uye arova mumwe munhu zvakapisisa vakamusiya achibuda ropa mumusoro nemumhuno uye atozendeswa kuchipatara nevamwe vake. Kanzuru yeHarare nemapurisa vari kubvisa vanhu vanotengesa mumigwagwa nechisimba vachiti vanhu ava vanofanira kuenda kunzvimbo dzakatarwa nenzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere chekorera icho chauraya vanhu vanodarika makumi matatu. No media source currently available
title: Mapurisa Anosunga VaPromise Mkwananzi

text: Mutauriri wedare reNational Assembly, VaJacob Mudenda, vanoti vane mvumo yekurambidza nhengo dzedare iri kuti dzisapfeka zvadzinoda nekuti mudare munogona kuita nyonga nyonga kana nhengo dzikauya dzakapfeka zvadzinoda. Mutauriri wedare reNational Assembly, VaJacob Mudenda, vanoti vane mvumo yekurambidza nhengo dzedare iri kuti dzisapfeka zvadzinoda nekuti mudare munogona kuita nyonga nyonga kana nhengo dzikauya dzakapfeka zvadzinoda. VaMudenda vakataura izvi mugwaro ravakanyorera kudare repamusoro soro vachipindura nyaya yakakwidzwa nemumiriri weMutasa South, VaTrevor Saruwaka veMDC-T, avo vari kuda kuti dare iri rivape mvumo yekupfeka bhachi ravo rakafana nemureza wenyika mushure mekunge vadzingwa muparande vapinda mudare vakapfeka bhachi iri. Muna Chivabvu gore rapfuura VaMudenda vakarambidza kupfekwa kwemabhachi kana kuunzwa kwemireza yanyika muparamende mushure mekunge nhengo dzebato guru rinopikisa munyika reMDC inotungamirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai dzauya dzakapfeka mabhachi ane mavara emureza yenyika pamwe nemireza yacho mudare. Vakaita izvi mushure mukuratidzira kwamufundisi, Evan Mawarire,pasi pechirongwa chavo cheHashtag This Flag. Asi kunyange hazvo VaMudenda vakange varambidza kupfekwa kwemabhachi ane mavara emureza wenyika, nhengo dzeMDC-T dzakaita saVaSaruwaka dzakaramba dzichiiuya kudare dzakapfeka mabhachi aya izvo zvakazoita kuti dzidzingwe mudare. Mushure mekudzingwa mudare kaviri, VaSaruwaka vakazokwidza nyaya yavo kudare repamusoro vachiti havawoni chakaipa pabhachi ravo, uyewo vachitiwo semutenderi wechiRasta vanopfeka bhachi rine mavara echitendero chavo awo akafananawo nemavara emureza wenyika. VaSaruwaka vanotiwo VaMudenda vari kutyora kodzero dzavo nekuvadzinga pamwe nekuvarambidza kupinda muparamende. Asi VaMudenda vanoti vakatopa mutongo panyaya iyi uye vanopiwa simba rekuita izvi nemutemo weparamende weStanding Rules and Orders. Asi gweta raVaSaruwaka, VaKudzayi Kadzere, vanoti hapana chakashata pabhachi raVaSaruwaka uye vanoda kuti dare repamusoro ripe mutongo wekuti zvakashata here kuti munhu apfeke hembe kana bhachi rinoenderana nechitendero chakeuyewo kuti chii chakaipa kuti vanhu vapfeke hembe dzine mavara emureza wenyika yavo. Pamashoko aVaMudenda ekuti vanopihwa simba rekurambidza nhengo idzi kupfeka zvadzinoda, VaKadzere vanoti maStanding Rules and Orders eparamende anotaura chete kuti nhengo dzedare dzinofanira kupfeka mabhachi asi haataure ruvara rwemabhachi anofanira kupfekwa. Asi VaMudenda vanoti hapana chinoshamisa pakudzingwa kwaVaSaruwaka mudare iri vakapfeka zvisingadiwe pamutemo vachiti handiwo vega vakadzingwa mudare nekuda kwaizvozvo. Vanoti semuenzaniso VaJustice Mayor Wadyajena veZanu PF vachimiriraGokwe Nembudziya muNational Assembly, vakadzingwa mudare iri mushure mekunge vapinda vakapfeka zvipfeko zvebato ravo muna Chikunguru. VaKadzere vanoti vapedza kugadzira musoro wenharo kana kuti Heads of arguments uye vanotarisira kuti nyaya yavo ichanzikwa mwedzi unouya. Muna Gumiguru mapurisa akapinda mudare iri nechisimba mushure mekunge mamuka mhirizhonga apo mumiriri weBudiriro muNational Assembly, Va ……..,vakapinda mudare vakapfeka bhachi rakaita seraVaSaruwaka vakaramba kubuda mudare mushure mekunge vanzi vabude vanobvisa bhachi ravo. VaMudenda neparamende vari kumiririrwa negweta VaSimplicius Chihambakwe panyaya iyi. Studio7 haina kunzwa divi raVaChihambakwe panyaya iyi. No media source currently available
title: VaSaruwaka Vopikisa Kudzingirwa Bhachi Ravainge Vakapfeka Muparamende

text: Sarudzo dzekutsvaga hutungamiri hwematunhu makuru muZanu PF dzakaitwa svondo rapera dzinonzi nevamwe dzakaunza kusawirirana kukuru mubato iri, vamwe vachiti hadzina kufambiswa zvakanaka, asi vamwewo vachiti sarudzo idzi dzakafambiswa negwara remusangano uyu regutsaruzhinji. Izvi zvinotevera kunyunyuta kwakanyaya kwedzimwe nhengo dzeZanu PF dzichiti sarudzo idzi dzakabirirwa uye dzaive dzizere nechikiribidi mune mamwe matunhu. Asi neChitatu komiti yepamusoro muZanu PF yePolitburo yakatambira zvakabuda musarudzo idzi kunyange hazvo paine vamwe vainyunyuta vachida kuti dzidzokororwe. Matunhu anonzi haana kufambisa sarudzo zvakanaka anoti Harare, Masvingo, Manicaland pamwe neMashonaland Central, achinzi akaitwa chikiribidi pakaitwa sarudzo idzi. Kunyange hazvo Politburo yakatambira zvakabuda musarudzo idzi, mutungamiri webato iri, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vakatoudzawo musangano uyu kuti vakanga vasiri kufara nechikiribidi chinonzi chakaitwa mumatunhu aya, kunyange hazvo vakakurudzira kuti vakakundwa vatambire zvakabuda musarudzo idzi, uye kuti nhengo dzebato ravo dzibatane. Vamwe vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika pamwe nevebato rinopikisa reMDC Alliance vanoti kusafambiswa zvakanaka kwesarudzo muZanu PF uku mucherechedzo wemafambisirwo anoitwa sarudzo munyika, kunyange hazvo dzichitungamirwa neZimbabwe Electoral Commission. Sachigaro veMDC Alliance mudunhu reNorth America, VaTawanda Dzvokora, vanoti kunyunyuta kuri munhengo dzeZanu PF uku ndiko kunyunyuta kuzere muvana veZimbabwe vavanoti vanogara vachibirwa sarudzo nehurumende yeZanu PF. VaDzvokora vanoti chokwadi chiri kutoonekwa nekubirana kuri kuitika muZanu PF, zvichireva kuti vana veZimbabwe vanofanirwa kutosimba kuchengetedza mavhoti avo. Asi nhengo yeZanu PF, Doctor Masimba Mavaza, avo vari kuBritain, vanoramba kuti sarudzo dzakabiridzirwa vachiti zvinoitika muZanu PF hazvineyi nezvinoitika muhurumende sezvo zvinhu zviviri izvi zvakasiyana. Doctor Mavaza vanoti musiyano uripo pakati pebato ravo neMDC Alliance ndewekuti vanenge vakundwa musarudzo vanotambirra zvabuda musaruddzo havabude mubato vachinotanga mapato avo voga. No media source currently available
title: Vanopikisa Vofananidza Chikiribidi Chavanoti Chakaitika Musarudzo dzeZanu PF neSarudzo dzeNyika

text: Sangano revechidiki, reTajamuka/Sesijikile, rinoti chinangwa charo chikuru ndechekuona kuti kuratidzira mumigwagwa kunochengetedzwa sezvo iri iyo nzira yega yasara yekuti vanhu varatidze zvavanoda nezvavasingade. NeMuvhuro, nhengo dzesangano iri dzakaratidzira pamatare edzimhosva eRotten Row Court muHarare, dzichitsigira mutungamiri weZimbabwe National Students Union (ZINASU), VaTakudzwa Ngadziore, avo vaimira mudare vachikumbira mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso kuti vatongwe vachibva kumba kwavo. VaNgadziore vakapiwa mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso vakabudiswa mujeri asi vakanzi havabvumidzwi kusvika padyo pekambani yeImpala Car Rental, apo vari kupomerwa mhosva yekuratidzira vari zvichitevera kushandiswa kwemotokari yekambani iyi mukupaambwa kwaVaTwanda Muchehiwa, avo vanonzi vakatochwa zvakaipisisa nevanofungidzirwa kuti vasori. Dzimwe nhengo dzeTajamuka/Sesijikile dzinonzi dzakasungwawo panze pedare apa dzichipomerwa mhosva yekuratidzira. Mutauriri weTajamuka/Sesijikile, VaGift Ostallos Siziba, vanoti sangano ravo rakamirira kuona kuti vamwe vavo vakasungwa neMuvhuro ava vachimiswa mberi kwematare neChipiri here, vachiti zvekare vanoda kuonavo kuti avo vakarohwa nemapurisa vakakuvara zvakadini. Studio 7 yakaedza kubata mutauriri wemapurisa Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi asi vakati tivabate kwaedza sezvo hakaange hwave husiku uye vasisiri kumahofisi avo. No media source currently available
title: Tajamuka/Sesijikile Inoti Kuratidzira Mumigwagwa Ndiyo Nzira Yega Yasara Kuzivisa Zvinonetsa muNyika

text: Mutongi wedare repamusoro muMasvingo, Justice Nevile Wamambo, nhasi vati mutevedzeri wa sachigaro weMDC, VaJob Sikhala, vabudiswe mutirongo votongwa vachibva kumba mushure meku bhadhariswa mari ye chibatiso inoita zviuru mashanu zve madhora ema RTGS. VaWamambo varamba chikumbiro chemuhuchusi, Amai Chiedza Muhwandavaka chekuti VaSikhala vabhadhare mari inosvika zviuru makumi mashanu emadhora emaRTGS. Amai Muhwandavaka vange vatizve VaShikala vasabvumidzwe kutaura pamisangano yezvematongerwe enyika kusvika nyaya yavo yapedzwa kutongwa. Asi mutongi wedare abvumirana ne gweta raVaSiikhala, VaAleck Muchadehama avo vati mari yange ichidiwa nehurumende yakawandisa uye VaSikhala vane kodzero dzavo dzekuita basa rezve matongerwe enyika nekudaro kutongwa kawavo hakunga vatadzisi kuita basa iri. VaMuchadehama vati pamusoro pekubhadhra mari yechibatiso kudare redzimhsova kuBikita, VaSikhala, vanzizve vagare pamba pavo ku St Marys’, Chitungwiza uye vaende kukamba yemapurisa eko kamwechete pavhiki Munyori mukuru webato reMDC, VaCharlton Hwende, avo vange vari padare pamwe chete ne chaunga che vatsgiri vebato ravo vati vanotambira nemufaro kuti mumwe wavo apuhwa mukana wekutongwa achibva kumba. Izvi zvatsinhirwa nasachigaro webato re MDC muMasvingo, VaJames Gumbi, vati VaSikhala vari kushungurdzwa nenyaya isina basa ne hurumende irikutadza kuita basa rayo. Mushure mekupuhwa kwaVaSikhala mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso, vatsigiri ve MDC vange vauya kuzovatsigira vabva vatanga kuimba vari panze pedare vachipembera. Izvi hazvina kufadza mapurisa anga akawanda padare apa ayo ayedza kuvanyararidza asi vakudikana. VaSikhala vari kupomerwa mhosva yekuda kupidigura hurumende, apo musi wa 6 Chikunguru, vanonzi vakati vachabvisa mutungamiriri wenyika VaEmerson Mnangagwa, panyanga gore ra2023 resarudzo risati rasvika. VaSikhala vanotarisirwa kudzoka kudare reBikita, musi wa 24 Mwedzi uno. Vakawanikwa vane mhosva vanogona kutongerwa kugara mujeri kwemakore makumi maviri. No media source currently available
title: VaSikhala Vanopihwa Mukana weKubvisa Mari yeChibatiso

text: Vagari vemudhorobha reMasvingo vari kunyunyuta pamusoro pemashandiro ekambani yemagetsi yeZESA, iyo yavari kupomera mhosva yekuvashaisa magetsi zvisina tsananguro kwenguva yakareba, izvo zvave kuita kuti vafunge kuti dambudziko rekudzimwa dzimwa kwemagetsi radzoka. Vagari ava vanoti vave nemwedzi magetsi achienda zuva nezuva kwemaawa akareba munzvimbo dzinogara veruzhinji pamwe nemudhorobha umo munoshandirwa nevakawanda. Vamwe vanoti kuenda kuri kuita magetsi kunovarangaridza zvaiitika mugore ra 2008, ukuwo kambani yemagetsi iyi isiri kuvapa tsananguro yekuti seyi magetsi ari kushaika. Amai Samantha Mundawarara, vanoti ivo vari kurwadziwa zvikuru nekuenda kwemagetsi sezvo vachizopedzisira vave kuzotsvaga dzimwe nzira dzinodhura dzekuti vabikire mhuri chikafu kunyange hazvo vakagara vakatenga magetsi ekushandisa kare. VaHardlife Tangire vanoti kuenda kwemagetsi kunovashungurudza apo hupenyu huri kuoma munyika nekushaikwa kwezvimwe zvinhu zvakawanda. Vanoita zvemabhizimusi nevanoshanda mudhorobha vanoti kumboendwa kwemagetsi zvisina tsarukano kunoita kuti vashaiwe cheuviri mumabasa avo. VaZivanai Chikwanda, vanoti kuenda kuri kuita magetsi pakati pedhorobha kuri kuita kuti varasikirwe nemari yakawanda nekuti bhizimusi ravo rinenge rambomira kufamba sezvo richishanda nemoto wemagetsi. Mutauriri weZesa,VaFullard Gwasira, vange vasingadairi runhare rwavo kuti vatipe divi rekambani yavo, asi vanhu vanoti kambani yavo inofanira kuvapa tsananguro yezvirikuitika. Vagari vanoti havafaniri kushaiwa magetsi nekuti mazuvano kwave nemamita ekugara watenga moto wako kare, nekudaro vanofanira kuwana magetsi avanenge vakatenga nguva dzose. Sachigaro wesangano rinomirira vagari, reMasvingo United Residents and Rate Payers Alliance (MURRA) , VaThomas Mbetu, vanoti kambani yeZESA inofanira kubuda pachena kuti kureshenwa kwemagetsi kwadzoka munyika here pane kungonyarara. Mamwe mashoko anoti kureshenwa kwemagetsi kunogona kudzoka nekuti zvinonzi dhamu reKariba, uko kunobva mamwe magetsi enyika, rave nemvura shoma nekuti gore rino mvura haina kunaya zvakanaka. Mamwewo mashoko anoti kambani yekuSouth Africa, yeESKOM inotengeserawo nyika magetsi, iri kusangana nematabudziko akasiya-siyana, izvo zviri kuita kuti imbopota ichitapudzira magetsi anofanirwa kunge achienda kuZimbabwe.
title: Vagari veDhorobha reMasvingo Vochemachema neKudzimwa kweMagetsi

text:
Vamwe vagari vemuGweru vari kutsutsumwa nenyaya yekushaikwa kwemvura, dzimwe nzvimbo dzichinzi dzave nenguva inopfuura mwedzi dzisingawane mvura, panguva iyo pane mashoko ehuwori mukanzuru. 

Vagari vemunzvimbo dzakasiyana siyana muguta reGweru vakaudza Studio 7 kuti dambudziko rekushaikwa kwemvura idambudziko rave kuvashaisa hope sezvo vachimuka pakati pehusiku kuti vanochera mvura kune dzimwe nzvimbo dzainobuda husiku kusanganisira pane zvimwe zvibhorani
zvishoma.

Ambuya Thandiwe Matinyenya avo vanogara mumusha weMkoba 1 umo mave nenguva inopfuura mwedzi musina mvura vakati vanosiwana mvura pakamba yemapurisa paMkoba 1 asi pave kurambidzwa. Ambuya Matinyenya avo vanogara nevazukuru vavo vakati vave kutyira kutekeshera kwezvirwere.

Mumwe murume uyo akangozvidoma nezita rekuti Moyo anoti varume vanosiira vanhukadzi basa rekutsvaga mvura asi iko zvino vave kutobatsirawo nekuda kwekuti vanotyira kuti madzimai nevanasikana vanogona kuwira munjodzi pavanotsvaga mvura husiku.

Muzvare Florence Madzikura vanoti vamwe vagari vashoma vanowana mvura nekuda kwekuti dzimba dzavo dziri pakaderera vave kutengesera vamwe mvura nemari yekunze.

Sachigaro wesangano reWomen’s Coalition of Zimbabwe , WCoZ, mudunhu reMidlands, Amai Alice Maqatha vanoti dambudziko rekushaikwa kwemvura rinonyanya kubata vanhukadzi vachitiwo dai kanzuru yaona zvekuita sezvo vagari vave kushaya zano nekuda kwedambudziko iri

Mumwewo mugari VaJohn Divala vanoti kunyange hazvo vachinzwisisa matambudziko akatarisana nekanzuru, havagutsikane nekuti kanzuru inoramba ichibhadharisa vagari mutero wemvura wakakura.

Dambudziko rekushaikwa kwemvura muguta reGweru riri kuuya panguva iyo paine nyaya dzehuwori dzinonzi dziri kupomerwa makanzura eguta iri.

Meya weguta reGweru VaJosiah Makombe vabvuma kuti guta reGweru rakatarisana nedambudziko remvura vakati izvi zviri kunyanya kukonzerwa nekushomeka kwemvura mumadhamu uyewo kufa kwepombi dzinopomba mvura kubva kudhamu rimwe chete riri kushandiswa pari zvino.

Panyaya yehuwori hwavari kupomerwa VaMakombe vati aya manyepo. Munguva pfupi yapfuura bazi rekutongwa kwematunhu rakanyorera makanzuru emunyika kuti aendese magwaro kubazi iri anoratidza nzvimbo dzekuvakira dzakatengwa nemakanzura mumaguta nemadhorobha emunyika uye mari dzavakabhadhara.

VaMakombe, avo vanovewo mukuru weUrban Councils Association of Zimbabwe, vati kanzuru yavo nemamwe yakaendesa magwaro aya.

Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kune munyori webazi rezvekutongwa kwematunhu VaZvinechimwe Churu sezvo nharembozha yavo yange isingabatike.

VaCharles Mazorodze avo vanove mukuru wesangano reGweru Residents Forum vati dambudziko rekushikwa kwemvura harizi muGweru chete asi mumaguta nemadhorobha akwanda emunyika vakatiwo zvakakosha kuti hurumende ive nehwaro hwakajeka hwekubatsira makanzuru panyaya iyi.

Zvichakadaro mune imwewo nyaya, kanzuru yeguta reBulawayo inoti dambudziko rekushakwa kwemvura muguta iri iro rakawedzerwa nekuda kwekubiwa kwakaitwa tambo dzemagetsi pane imwe nzvimbo inochengeterwa mvura yakachena, richaita nani pakupera kwemwedzi uno apo kanzuru inotarisira kuti tambo idzi dzinenge dzagadzirwa.

Kanzuru yeguta reBulawayo yange ichipa vagari mvura kamwe chete pavhiki nekuda kwekushomeka kwemvura mumadhamu anopa guta iri mvura asi dambudziko iri rakawedzera munguva pfupi yapfuura nekuda kwekubiwa kwetambo dzemagetsi uku.
title: Vagari vemuGweru Vochema Chema neKushaya Mvura

text: Kanzuru yeHarare inoti iri kukundikana kuita zvirongwa zvebudiriro nepamusana pekuti vamwe vagari pamwe nemamwe makambani vane zvikwereti zvakakura zvavasiri kubhadhara zvinodarika mabhiriyoni mashanu emadhora emunyika. Gwaro raburitswa nekanzuru rinoratidza kuti vagari ndivo vane chikwereti chakanyanya kukura, chinodarika mabhiriyoni maviri nemamiriyoni mazana mana emadhora emunyika, (ZWL$2.4 billion), vachiteverwa nevemabhizimusi, avo vane chikwereti chinodarika bhiriyoni imwechete nemamiriyoni mazana matanhatu emadhora emunyika (ZWL$1.6 billion). Makambani ane chikwereti chinodarika mamiriyoni mazana matanhatu nemakumi manomwe nematanhatu (ZWL$676 million) emadhora emunyika, kuchitiwo hurumende iine chikwereti chinodarika mamiriyoni zana nemakumi manomwe nepfumbamwe emadhora kana kuti (ZWL$179 million). Vemisika vane zvikwere zvinodarika mamiriyoni mazana maviri nemakumi maviri nematatu emadhora (ZWL$223 million), kuchitiwo mamwe makanzuru ane zvikwereti zvinodarika mamiriyoni makumi mapfumbamwe nematanhatu emadhora emunyika (ZWL$96 million. Mukuru werimwe sangano rinomirira vagari, reCombined Harare Resident Association, CHRA, Amai Loreen Mupasiri-Sani, vanoti nyaya yekusabhadharwa kwemitero inyaya yave nemakore muguta reHarare. Asi Amai Mupasiri-Sani vanoti chikuru chiri kutaurwa nevamwe vagari sechikonzero chiri kuita kuti vasabhadhara mitero yavo inyaya yemashandisirwo anonzi ari kuitwa mari nekanzuru asina kujeka. Vanotiwo chimwe chiri kunyunyutwa nacho nevagari inyaya yekuti kanzuru yavo iri kutungamidza mberi zvinhu zvisina kukosha ichisiya zvinonzi nevagari zvakakosha, zvakaita sekuwaniswa kwemvura yakachena, kutakurwa kwemarara nekugadzirwa kwepombi dzinorasa tsvina. No media source currently available  Amai Mupasiri-Sani vanoti sesangano, vari kuklurudzira kuti kanzuru nevagari vagare pasi vachiwirirana pazvinhu zvavanoona sezvakakosha, uye vanoti vari kukurudzirawo vagari kuti vabhadhare mitero yavo kuitira kuti kanzuru ikwanise kuvawanisa zvavanofanirwa kuwana.
title: Kanzuru yeHarare Inoti Vagari neMakambani Vane Zvikwereti Zvinodarika Mabhiriyoni Mashanu

text: Nhengo yebato rinopikisa reCitizens Coalition for Change, CCC, vari zvakare mumiriri weChitungwiza North mudare reparamende, VaGodfrey Sithole, avo vakabuda mujeri reChikurubi neChina manheru vanonzi vave kutarisirwa kuongororwa hutano hwavo navanachiremba mushure mekugara mutirongo kwemwedzi ingada kusvika kumishanu. VaSithole vakaburitswa mushure mekubhadhara mari yechibatiso inoita madhora emunyika zviuru mazana matatu, (ZWL$300 000.00) kuitira kuti vatongwe vachibva kumba kwavo pamhosva yavari kupomerwa yekukonzeresa mhirizhonga. Pamusoro pekubhadhara chibatiso, vakanzi vange vachizviratidza kumapurisa eSt. Mary's Chitungwiza kamwechete pasvondo, vasakanganise vafakazi uye vape mumaoko edare gwaro ravo rekufambisa. VaSithole vakasungwa muna Chikunguru pamwechete nemumiriri weZengeza West VaJob Sikhala nedzimwe nhengo dzebato reCCC gumi neina vachipomerwa mhosva yekukonzera mhirizhonga mushure mekuwanikwa kwemutumbi wenhengo yebato ravo, Muzvare Moreblessing Ali, avo vakapondwa.
title: Nhengo yeBato reCCC, VaGodfrey Sithole, Votarisirwa Kuonekwa naVanachiremba Mushure meKuburitswa kuJeri reChikurubi

text: Kunyange hazvo veruzhinji muHarare vachiti havana ruzivo rwakanyaya pamusoro pemumwe wevatevedzeri vemutungamiriri wenyika vadomwa, VaReport Phelekezela Mphoko, ongororo yataita inoratidza kuti VaMphoko igamba rehondo yerusunungujo uye vakashanda muhurumende kwenguva yakareba vachimirira Zimbabwe kunyika dzakasiyana siyana. Vaimbova kanzura muHarare, VaWarship Dumba, vanoti havana chavanoziva pamusoro paVaMphoko uye vakatanga kunzwa nezvavo painge pave kuda kuitwa kongiresi yebato reZanu PF. VaWashington Ngirazi vekuMbare vanotiwo hapana zvavanoziva kunze kwenguti vaimbomirira Zimbabwe kunze kwenyika. Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vakazvimirira, VaTakura Zhangazha, vanotiwo ndezvechokwadi kuti veruzhinji havana ruzivo ruzhinji pamusoro paVaMphoko uye zvakakosha kuti vazivikanwe neveruzhinji. Asi vanoti vane chivimbo chekuti vachaita basa ravo nemazvo sezvo vadoma nemutungamiriri wenyika. VaZhangazha vanotiwo chimwe chinofanira kuziva VaMphoko ndechekuti VaMugabe havapikiswe uye vanogona kusiya basa zvakaita vaimbove mutevedzeri waVaMugabe, Amai Joice Mujuru, kana vakada kukura musoro. Vanodzidzisa zvidzidzo zvematongerwo enyika paUniversity of Zimbabwe, Amai Charity Manyeruke, vanotiwo vanhu havangazive vanhu vese vakaenda kuhondo uye chakakosha ndechekuti VaMphoko igamba rehondo. Vanotiwo VaMphoko inhengo yeZanu pF yakavimbika ndosaka vasarudzwa nemutungamiriri wenyika. VaMphoko ndemumwe weavo vaitungamira mauto eZimbamwe People’s Revolutionary Army kana kuti ZIPRA uye vakambomirira ZAPU kuMozambigue Zimbabwe isati yawana kuzvitonga. Vari ikoko vakashanda nedzimwe nhengo dzebato reAfrican National Congress yeSouth Africa dzakaita semutungamiriri wenyika iyi, VaJacob Zuma. VaTjenesani Ntungakwa avo vanoongorora mashaindiro aiita bato reZAPU vanotiwo VaMphoko munhu aive nechinzvimbo chikuru munguva yehondo. VaMphoko vakambomirira Zimbabwe kunyika dzakaita seRussia uye vange vachimirira nyika kuSouth Africa kubva muna 2011 kusvika pavakasiya basa mwedzi mishonana yapfuura. No media source currently available
title: VaReport Phelekezela Mphoko Vanoitwa Mutevedzeri weChipiri waVaMugabe

text: National Blood Services Zimbabwe neChishanu yakaparura hurongwa hwekuunganidza ropa mudura rayo ichiti pazororo reKisimusi ratarisirwa kunodiwa ropa rakawanda zvikuru. Vachitaura neStudio 7 mushure mekuparura chirongwa ichi, mutauriri weNBSZ, Muzvare Esther Masunda vakati zororo reKisimusi rine tsaona zhinji, uyewo madzimai anosunguka anowanda. Muzvare Masunda vanoti izvi zvinosanganisirawo zvimwe zvirwere zvinoda kuti munhu apiwe ropa vachiti ndizvo zvakavasunda kuti vaparure chirongwa chekuunganidza ropa ichi. Muzvare Masunda vakatiwo kunyangwe zvazvo vanhu vari pakurwisana nechirwere cheCovid 19, kuwanikwa kweropa rakakwana kwakakosha sezvo zvichibatsira hupenyu hwevamwe. Vakati vari kutarisira kutsvaka ropa rinosvika mapainzi zviuru zvipfumbamwe nemazana manomwe nemakumi mashanu, kana kuti 9750, rekushandisa kubva pari zvino kusvika panopera zororo munaNdira gore rinouya. Muzvare Masunda vakatiwo NBSZ ichange ichitsvaka ropa nenzira dzakasiyana-siyana kusanganisira kuenda kudzisvondo nekumwe kunounganiwa kuti vakwanise kuwana ropa rinodiwa. Vakatiwo sangano reNational Blood Services Zimbabwe riri kukumbira veruzhinji kuti vari batsire neropa remhando ye Blood Group “O” sezvo ropa iri richinyanyodiwa zvakanyanya. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano huye vaimbove gurukota rezvehutano Doctor Henry Madzorera vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvakakosha kuti nyika ive neropa rakakwana panguva dzakadai sezororo reKisimusi kuitira kuchengetedza hupenyu hwevamwe. Sangano reNBSZ rinowana ropa rekuisa mudura reropa kune veruzhinji vanopa pachena uye rinoita zvirongwa zvekufamba richitsvaka ropa iri kunzvimbo dzakasiyanasiyana. NBSZ inotiwo kupa ropa kunochengetedza hupenyu hweavo vanenge vachida ropa. Asi gore rino nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19, vamwe vanoti tarisiro yekuwana ropa rakawanda inogona kudzikira zvichienzaniswa nemakore adarika. No media source currently available
title: NBSZ Yotanga Hurongwa hweKuunganidza Ropa Kugadzirira Zororo reKisimusi

text: Mumwe muzvina bhizinesi wechidiki, vaNigel Mugamu, avo vanozivikanwa nerekuti Sir Nigel ve263 Chat, vanoti vari kufara nekunge vari mumwe wevanhu vakawana mubayiro we Young Achievers Award wakakokerwa nebepa re Techno Mag. Mumwe muzvinabhizinesi wechidiki, VaNigel Mugamu, avo vanozivikanwa nerekuti Sir Nigel ve263 Chat, vanoti vari kufara nekunge vari mumwe wevanhu vakawana mubayiro we Young Achievers Award wakakokerwa nebepa re Techno Mag. VaMugamu vanoti izvi zviri kuvabatsira kuti basa ravari kuita rienderere mberi nemutsindo kunyangwe zvazvo zvinhu zvakawoma manyika. Mibairo iyi yakapihwa vakaita mabasa anonwisa mvura munyaya dzehumhizha mugore ra 2016. Vakokeri vemubairo uyu vakange vakabatana nehurumende nemakambani akazvimirira pachiitiko ichi. "Tiri kutarisira kuita mabasa akawanda gore rinouya mubasa redu rehumhizha nekuti vanhu vari kuda kuwana nyaya dzakasiyana siyana dzichango burwa. Nzira dzirikunyanyo farirwa nevanhu mukuwana nhau dzinosanganisira Facebook ne WhatsApp pari zvino asi mubairo watakawana ndewekuve kambani ine hunyanzvi munyaya dzekupakura nhau paTwitter," Va Mugamu vaudza Studio 7. VaMugamu vanoti vakawana rumwe ruzivo kubva kune zvidzidzo zvavakawana kubva kuzvirongwa zvaikokerwa nemuzinda weAmerica uri muZimbabwe zvakava tumidzira kunyika yeAmerica munguva yapfuura. No media source currently available
title: Nigel Mugamo we263 Chat Anowana Mubayiro we Young Achievers Award

text: Hama dzevaimbova mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, dzinoti mutumbi waVaMugabe uchavigwa chete kana vachinge vapedza kuita chivanhu chavo. Hama dzaVaMugabe dzinoti kuradzikwa kwemufi kuchaitwa mushure mekunge zvose zvinodiwa kuitwa muchivanhu chedzinza ravo zvazadziswa. Mumwe wehama idzi ndiVa Dominic Matibili, avo vanoti babamukuru kuna VaMugabe. Vati pachaunzwa mutumbi waVaMugabe pamusha pavo, vesvondo vachapihwa mukana wekuita zvechechi, asi chivanhu ndicho chichange chiri pamberi. Vari kutaura vakamirira mhuri yemufi, VaLeo Mugabe, vakati VaMugabe, avo vakashaya svondo rapera kuchiptara cheGlenEagles kuSingapore, vacharadzikwa kwapera mazuva makumi matatu. Asi veruzhinji vari kubvunza kuti mutumbi waVaMugabe uchachengetedzwa sei kwenguva yakareba kudai. Vamwe vasingaite zvechivanhu vanoti hapana chinotadzisa kuti mutumbi uyu ugare kwenguva yakareba kudai uri mumba ine chando inochengeterwa vanhu vakafa kana kuti mochari. Asi munin’ina waVaMugabe, VaAugustine Chidhakwa, vaudza Studio7 kuti kunyange hazvo pasati pave nehurongwa hwakati tsvikiti hwekuti mutumbi uyu uchachengetedzwa sei kuti usaipe, vati pachivanhu pane mukana wekuti mutumbi uyu unoiswa muninga. Ishe Dununu Zvimba, avo vanezita rekuzvarwa rekuti Raphael Zvikaramba, vaudza Studio 7 kuti chivanhu chichaitwa pamutumbi waVaMugabe hachisi kuzoziviswa veruzhinji. Vati kuradzikwa kuchaitwa mutumbi waVaMugabe kumarinda anovigwa magamba enyika muzuva risati ranyatsozivikanwa, hakutadzise vehukama kuita chivanhu chavo pahama yavo. Pane mashoko anga achitenderera ekuti VaMugabe vaive mambo pachivanhu chekumusha kwavo zvichapa kuti vavigwe pachivanhu sezviri kutaurwa nemhuri yavo asi VaChidhakwa vati mufi akaramba hushe. Studio 7 yabva kwaZvimba yaendawo kumba kwaVaMugabe kuHarare iyo inozivikanwa nekuti Blue Roof kwatasvika madzishe achinzi anga ari mumusangano nevehukama vachizeya mafambisiro avachaita chivanhu chavo pakuvigwa kwaVaMugabe. Pataenda pamhepo tanga tisati taziva kuti ndechipi chaizvo chivanhu chichaitwa pakuvigwa kwaVaMugabe. Kumusha kwaVaMugabe migwagwa inoenda kumakuva yanga ichigadzirwa netarakita kunyange hazvo hurumende iri kuenderera mberi nekuita gadziriro dzekuviga VaMugabe paHeroes Acre. No media source currently available
title: Mutumbi waVaMugabe Wovigwa Mushure Mekunge Chivanhu Chaitwa kwaZvimba?

text: Apo pasi rose riri kucherechedza zuva rekodzero dzevanhu pasi rose neChina, mukuru weZimbabwe Peace Project, Muzvare Jestina Mukoko, vanoti vachiri kuedza kuvaka hupenyu hwavo zvichitevera kupambwa kwavakaitwa makore mashoma apfuura. Apo pasi rose riri kucherechedza zuva rekodzero dzevanhu pasi rose neChina, mukuru weZimbabwe Peace Project, Muzvare Jestina Mukoko, vanoti vachiri kuedza kuvaka hupenyu hwavo zvichitevera kupambwa kwavakaitwa makore mashoma apfuura. Muhurukuro yedu yeWomen's Forum, Marvellous Mhlanga Nyahuye weStudio7 ataura naMuzvare Mukoko pamusoro pezvinoreva zuva rekuremekedza kodzero dzevanhu takatarisa zvakaitika kwavari vari mumaoko ehurumende apo vakatochwa. No media source currently available
title: Muzvare Mukoko Votaura Pamusoro peKodzero dzeVanhu

text: Mutungamiri weMDC, VaNelson Chamisa, vakurudzira kuti paumbwe hurumende inombofanofambisa basa kwechinguvana zvichitevera kubirirwa kwanoti vakaitwa musarudzo dzemusi wa30 Chikunguru. Vachitaura nevatori venhau pamuzinda webato ravo paMorgan Tsvangirai House muHarare, VaChamisa vati kusafambiswa zvakanaka kwakaitwa sarudzo ndiko kuri kukonzera kuti zvinhu zvisafambe zvakanaka munyika izvo zvave kupa kuti veruzhinji vaomerwe nehupenyu.
