VaChamisa vati chave kudikanwa ihurumende inombofanobata matomhu kana kuti national transitional authority kwakamirirwa kuti paitwe sarudzo dziri pachena. VaChamisa vati zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka muzvipatara,izvo vati zvinofanirwa kugadziriswa. Vanhu vanosvika makumi mashanu vakafa nechirwere chekorera, uye vanhu vanodarika zviuru zvina vakabatwa nechirwere ichi. Mitengo yezvinhu iri kukwira mazuva ose izvo zviri kuisa hurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa parumananzombe. VaMnangagwa vakatora masimba mushure mekubatsirwa nemauto muna Mbudzi gore rapera,ayo akabvisa pachigaro vaive mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe. VaMnangagwa vakanzi neZimbabwe Electoral Commission ndivo vakakunda musarudzo yemutungamiri, asi izvi zvakaramba kutambirwa neMDC Alliance kunyange hazvo dare reConstitutional Court rakatiwo VaMnangagwa ndivo vakakunda. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nemutauriri webato riri kutonga reZanu PF, VaSimon Khaya Moyo, kuti tinzwe pamire bato ravo panyaya iyi. Asi VaMoyo vakamboudza bepanhau reHerald mazuva mashoma adarika kuti bato ravo rakasarudzwa musarudzo dzemuna Chikunguru kuti rizadzise zvido zvevanhu munyika vachiti zvakasarudzirwa bato ravo ndizvo zvavari kuita. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika uye vari mudzidzisi paGreat Zimbabwe University, VaTakavafira Zhou, vaudza Studio 7 chinhu chakanaka kuti paumbwe hurumende inombofanofanmbisa zvinhu munyika kwechinguvana asi havaone Zanu PF ichibvuma kuita izvi nekukara masimba kwavanoti kunoitwa nevari muhutongi. VaChamisa vakatokwidza nyaya iyi kukomisheni yesangano reAfrican Union inoona nezvekodzero dzevanhu yeAfrican Commission on Human and People’s Rights. Mune iwmewo nyaya, mukuwasha wevaimbova mutungamiri, VaRobert Mugabe, VaSimba Chikore, vamiswa pamberi pedare nhasi vachipomerwa mhosva yekupamba mumwe mudzimai wavaishanda naye kukambani yendege yeZimbabwe Airways. Gweta raVaChikore, VaJonathan Samukange, vaudza Studio7 kuti mutongi wedare ramejajasitiri apa VaChikore mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso pamhosva yavari kupomerwa iyi. Nyaya iyi yanzi ichadzoka mudare musi wa9 Mbudzi apo VaSamukange vakatarisirwa kusvitsa chikumbiro chekuti nyaya iyi iraswe zvichitevera kuzivisa dare nhasi kuti izvi ndizvo zvavachaita pachadzoka nyaya iyi kudare mwedzi unouya. VaChikore vaperekedzwa kudare nemudzimai wavo Bona Mugabe Chikore. No media source currently available
title: VaChamisa Vokurudzira Kuumbwa kweHurumende Itsva Inofanobata Matomhu

text: Sangano reCitizens’ Initiative Zimbabwe rinoti riri kurova shiri mbiri nedombo rimwechete sezvo riri kupinda mumisha inogara veruzhinji richichenesa nzvimbo pamwe nekurasa marara, panguva imwechete richidzidzisa vechidiki kuita mabasa ekuzviriritira. Mukuru anoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa musangano reCitizens’ Initiative Zimbabwe, VaChengetai Guta, vanoti kubva zvavatanga kuchenesa nzvimbo pamwe nekurasa marara, vakwanisa kunge vachishandawo nevechidiki vane makore anobvira pamana kusvika pagumi nemasere. VaGuta vanoti vakwanisa kushanda nevechidiki mumisha inoti Epworth, Mbare neKuwadzana, uye vari kushanda pamwechete nekanzuru yeHarare mukuchenesa nzvimbo dzairi kuvapa kuti vashandire. Vanoti vakatora danho iri mushure mekunzwa chikumbiro chekanzuru chekuti vanokwanisa kuibatsira vapindirewo mukutakurwa nekuraswa kwemarara uyewo kuchenesa nzvimbo dzavanozokwanisa kushandisa kuita zvinorgwa zvemabasa emaoko, vachiti vakaitawo zvakare izvi senzira yekudzivirira zvirwere zvinobva mumarara. No media source currently available
title: Sangano reCitizens’ Initiative Zimbabwe Riri Kushanda NeKanzuru Mukuchenesa Nzvimbo

text: Muzvinabhizimisi VaMutumwa Mawere avo vari kunetsana nehurumende nemakambani avo avanoti akatorwa nechisimba vanoti shoroma yekuNigeria VaAliko Dangote vanofanira kutamba vakachenjera mukudyidzana neZimbabwe. VaDangote vakazivisa mazuva apera kuti vanoda kuvamba mabhizimisi emari inosvika bhiriyoni imwe chete yemadhora munyika. Vari kuronga kuvamba mabhizimisi munyaya yesimende, kuchera marasha nemagwenya emagetsi. VaMawere nehurumende vave nemakore vachinetsana nenyaya yemigodhi yeShabanie Mashaba Mines. Zimbabwe yagara ichitadza kukwezva vekunze kuti vatange mabhizimisi ichipomerwa mhosva yekusakoshesa kodzero dzavana muzvinabhizimisi. Asi hurumende inoti chapa kuti nyika itatarike inyaya yezvirango zvainoti yakatemerwa nenyika dzekunze dzakaita seAmerica neBritain. Asi nyika idzi dzinoti Zimbabwe inotyora kodzero dzevanhu. No media source currently available
title: VaMutumwa Mawere Voyambira VaDangote Kuti Vangwarire nezveKuvamba Mabhizimisi muZimbabwe

text: Magonyeti maviri apiswa kuSouth Africa zvichitevera gakava riripo pakati pevatyairi vemunyika iyi nevatyairi vekune dzimwe nyika vari kugara nekushanda muSouth Africa. Mumhirizhonga inonzi inotyisa, vatyairi vemagonyeti muSouth Africa vavharidzira motokari dzinotyairwa nezvizvarwa zvekuZimbabwe vachiti vanhu ava vari kuvatorera mabasa avo. Vanhu ava vavhara mugwagwa pa Van Reenen Pass, mumugwagwa we N2 unova mumwe wemigwagwa mikuru mu South Africa. Zvimwe zvizvarwa zvekuZimbabwe zvawirwa nedambudziko iri zvinoti pavari hapana zvitoro, kana zvimbuzi, izvo zvavasiya vari panguva yakaoma. Vatyairi vemu South Africa vanoti vatyairi vese vekune dzimwe nyika ngavadzoserwe kunyika dzavo sezvo vari kuvatorera mabasa avo. Vatyairi ava vanonzi vanga vachipika kuti havasi kubva panzvimbo iyi kudzamara hurumende yaVaCyril Ramaphosa, yazivisa kuti vatyairi vekune dzimwe nyika vachabuda riini munyika iyi. Mumwe wevatyairi vavharirwawo pa Van Reenen Pass, VaEdgar Sigauke, vaudza Studio7 kuti vaswera vakangogara padondo apa vasina chavangaite kubatsirika nekuti nzvimbo yacho inonetsa kusvika, kana mapurisa auya angomira mira zvishoma ndokuvasiya vakadaro No media source currently available Vagona kusvika pedyo vanonzi vapinda mumusangano wevatyairi ava vakavavimbisa kuti havazoita zvekurwisana navo asi vanoda kuti gurukota rezvekufamba muSouth Africa riuye rizovaudza kuti zvizvarwa zvekunze, kunyanya zvekuZimbabwe, zvichadzoserwa riini kumusha kwazvo, izvo zvisina kuitika kusvika mukuvira kwezuva. Mukuru wesangano re International Cross-Border Traders Association, Va Denis Juru, vati vatyairi vazhinji ndeve kuZimbabwe uye panze pekutyira kupererwa nemabasa, vari kutyirawo hupenyu hwevanhu. VaJuru vati pakamboitika dambudziko rakadai makore apfuura, vanhu vakawanda vakarasikirwa nehupenyu hwavo. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi remapurisa panyaya iyi, kanawo kunzwa kuti hurumende yemuSouth Africa ichafambisa seyi nyaya iyi. No media source currently available
title: Magonyeti Maviri Anopiswa muSouth Africa Zvichitevera Kunetsana kweVatyairi veMunyika neVekunze

text: Veboka revechidiki muZanu-PF, avo vaimbenge vazivisa kuti vanodawo kufora neChipiri vachiratidzawo kuti vanotsigira zvakasimba mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vanoti vave kuzoita izvi nemusi weChitatu. Pange pave kutyirwa kuti paizogona kuita bata murefu bata mupfupi vatsigiri vechidiki ava vachirwisana nevemapato anopikisa, sezvo vemubatanidzwa weMDC Alliance vakazivisawo kuti vachafora neChipiri. asi veZanu PF varamba kuti kufora kwavanga vari kuronga kuita kwanga kwakarongerwa kuvhiringidza kuratidzira kweve MDC Alliance, avo vari kuda kuratidzira muguta reHarare senzira yekuratidza kusafara kwavo nezvavanoti mabatirwo ari kuitwa nyaya dzesarudzo neZEC, iyo yavari kupomera mhosva yekusaita zvinhu pajekerere. Mumwe wevari kuronga kufora uku VaGodfrey Tsenengamu vanotungamira vechidiki veZANU PF kuMashonaland Central vaudza Studio 7 kuti vaona zvisina kukodzera kuti vaite chiitiko chavo musi mumwechete ne veMDC Alliance, vachiti izvi zviri kuratidza kukura kwavo mune zvematongewro enyika nekunzwisisa kuti zvinhu zvachinja kubva papinda VaMnangagwa panyanga. Vanotiwo vazviita vachiteerera mashoko evakuru vavo vebato ekuti vari kuda kuita sarudzo dzakachena dzisina kurwisana ne mhirizhonga. Chirongwa chavo vati chichatanga na 9 mangwanani muHarare paRovert Mugabe Square kusvika masikati zuva rimwechetero. Kunyange hazvo vezanu PF vari kuratidza sevamisa kufora kwavo uku nenyaya yekuti kwanga kuchisangana neveMDC Alliance, mashoko atiri kutambira anoti mapurisa ndiwo amisa kufora uku mushure mekunge anyima vechidiki ava mvumo yekufora achiti zuva ravakasarudza rakatorwa kare nevakatanga, vanove veMDC Alliance. No media source currently available
title: Vechidiki veZanu PF Vogadzirira Kufora neChitatu Vachitsigira VaMnangagwa

text: Vakuru vakuru veZimbabwe Republic Police, kana kuti ZRP, vanoti vari pakati pekuvandudza mashandiro emapurisa kuitira kuti atevedzere zvinodiwa nemitemo inotara mashandiro emapurisa. Vachitaura muChinhoyi pamusangano wavaita nevatori venhau, mumwe mukuru wemapurisa, Assistant Commissioner Martin Nyirenda, vati mashandiro avange vachiita muhutongi hwevaimbove mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, haasi anofanirwa kunge achiitwa nemapurisa, nekudaro vave kuvandudza mashandiro avo. VaNyirenda vati mukuvandudza mashandiro emapurisa, vari kudzidzisa kana kuyeuchidza mapurisa ose mashandiro akanaka sezvinodiwa nemutemo. Asi VaTendai Musonza, avo vane nyaya iri kumatare edzimhosva yekunyomba VaMugabe, vati havaone mapurisa achichinja mashandiro avo. VaMusonza vati chingangoshanduka pamashandiro emapurisa, kungoti vanenge votevedzera zviri kuda hurumende iripo yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vachisiya zvaaiita pasi paVaMugabe. VaMusonza vati mapurisa anofanirwa kuita basa rawo asingarerekere kumapato ezvematongerwo enyika, asi kutevedzera zvinodiwa nemitemo inobata mashandiro emapurisa. Mukuru weboka reMedia Institution of Southern Africa kana kuti MISA Zimbabwe, VaTabani Moyo, vati kudzidziswa patsva kuri kuitwa mapurisa hakuyamure kana vakasashandura mashandiro avachaita. VaMoyo vati vakatombotaura nemapurisa muna 2016 vakamboita sevashandura mashandiro avo, asi vati dzidziso itsva iyi yakatadza kugamuchirika sezvo mapurisa akatangazve mabasa avo asina kunaka ekusunga vanhu vanenge vasina mhosva vakaita sevatori venhau, vanoita zvemitambo pamwe nevanotengesa mumigwagwa kuti vararame. Kunyange hazvo mapurisa ari kudzidziswa nzira dzakanaka dzekuita mabasa awo, nyanzvi munyaya dzekodzero dzevanhu dzinoti mapurisa achiri kushandiswa mune zvematongerwo enyika. Mwedzi wapera, vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu vanomwe, vakasungwa vachibva kumusangano wekodzero dzevanhu kuMaldives, vakapomerwa mhosva yekuda kupidigura hurumende, muchiitiko chinoonekwa nevakawanda vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu, sekushandiswa kwemapurisa munyaya dzematongerwo enyika. No media source currently available
title: Mapurisa Anobvuma Kuti Mashandiro Avo Munguva yaVaMugabe Ainge Asina Kunaka

text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvekurima, mamiriro ekunze pamwe nenharanyika dzinoti Zimbabwe inofanira kuregedza kushandisa mhando dzemoto dzinosvibisa mweya watinofema dzinokonzera kushanduka kwemamiriro ekunze yoshandisa mhando dzemoto dzinokwanisa kudzokorodzwa kushandiswa, kana kuti renewable energy. Vachitaura nepamusangano weUnited Nations unoona nezvekushanduka kwemamiriro ekunze kana kuti United Nations Climate Change Summit uyo uri kuitirwa kuGlasgow, Scotland, VaMnangagwa vakati Zimbabwe ine hurongwa hwekuona kuti yadzikisa kusvibiswa kwemhepo yatinofema kuburikidza nekudzikisa hutsi hwe carbon dioxide kana kuti ma greenhouse gas emissions nezvikamu makumi mana kubva muzana, 40%, panosvika gore ra2030. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvemamiriro ekunze, VaByron Zamasiya, avo vanoshanda nesangano reZimbabwe Environmental Lawyers Association, vaudza Studio 7 kuti zviri kutaurwa naVaMnangagwa izvi zvinoshanda kana pakatorwa matanho akasimba nehurumende. Asi mudzidzisi wezvenharanyika kana Geography, Muzvinafundo Desmond Manatsa, vati Zimbabwe inokwanisa kuita zvakataurwa naVaMnangagwa panosvika gore 2030 nekuti vanhu vazhinji vave kukwanisa kushandisa dzimwe mhando dzemoto dzisingasvibise mhepo. Mutungamiri wesangano reCentre for Natural Resource Governance, VaFarai Maguwu, vati nyaya yekutemwa nekupiswa kwemiti munyika, zvikuru sei mumadhorobha nezvimbo dzakapoteredza maguta, iri kukonzerawo kusviba kwemhepo yatinofema. VaManatsa vati kushanduka kwemamiriro ekunze kuri kukonzerwa zvinhu zvakawanda uye nyika yave kufanira kushandisa mhando dzemoto isingasvibise mhepo senzira yekuedza kudzivirira kushanduka kwemamiriro ekunze. Zvichakadai, nyanzvi munyaya dzezvekurima uye vachishanda neUniversity of South Africa kana kuti Unisa, VaTondepi Shonhe, vati kurimwa kwefodya iyo inozoita kuti vanhu vapise miti kwanyanya munyika zviri kubatsirawo mukushanduka kwemamiriro ekunze. VaShonhe kuti varimi vanoda kudzidziswawo kuti zvirimwa zvavangarime zvisingakonzere kushanduka kwemamiriro ekunze ndezvipi. Musangano weCOP26 wabvumiranawo kuti kutemwa kwemiti kunge kwapera panosvika gore 2030 uye musangano uyu wabvumirana zvakare kuti kudyarwe miti yakawanda senzira yekuchenersa mhepo inofemwa neveruzhinji. Musangano uyu waenderera mberi nhasi mutungami weCOP26, VaAlok Sharma, vachiudza varikupinda musangano uyo uri kuitirwa kuScotland uyu kuti nhaurirano dzekuti mari inodiwa kurwisana nekushanduka kwemamiriro ekunze ichawanikwa kupi kuti inoshanda kunyika dzichiri kubudirira dzatanga masikati ano kubudikidza nemisangano iri kuitwa nemakurukota ezvemari kubva kunyika dzakasiyana-siyana. Nyika dzakaita seAmerica, Britain, France neGermany neEuropean Union dzakazivisa nezuro kuti dzichapa South Africa mari inoita mabhiriyoni masere nechidimu emari yekuAmerica (US8.5 billion) ichashandiswa kuti South Africa iregedze kushandisa marasha asi isime mari iyi mukushandiswa kwemhando dzemoto unogona kushandiswa kakawanda, kana kuti renewable energy, senzira yekuderedza kusviba kwemhepo. No media source currently available
title: Zimbabwe Yokurudzirwa Kushandisa Mhando dzeMoto Dzisingavandudze Mamiriro eKunze

text: Nemusi weChipiri 09 Kukadzi, nhengo dzese dzedare reseneti remuAmerica dziri zana dziri kutarisirwa kusangana mudare iri kuti dzitange kutonga vaimbove mutungamiri wenyika iyi, VaDonald Trump, pamhosva yavari kupomerwa yekutyora bumbiro remitemo yenyika. VaTrump vari kunzi vakapesvedzera vatsigiri vavo kuti varatidzire zvine mhirizhonga pamuzinda weparamende, weCapitaol Hill musi wa 06 Ndira gore rino, izvo zvakasiya vanhu vashanu vafa. Aka kanenge kave kepiri kuti VaTrump vatongwe nedare iri, izvo zvinovaisa munhoroondo yeAmerica yekuve mutungamiri wenyika akatongwa kaviri. VaTrump vakanga vakumbirwa kuti vazomira pamberi pedare iri vachipa humbowo hwavo, asi magweta avo akaramba kutambira chikumbiro ichi. Kuti VaTrump vawanikwe vaine mhosva, maseneta anodarika makumi matanhatu, kana kuti two-thirds, anofanirwa kuvhota achivaroverera nemhosva, danho rinogona kusabudirira sezvo vebato reRepublican, rinove bato raVaTrump, vasingatarisirwe kuvhota vachivarovera nemhosva. Vebato reRepublican vakawanda VaTrump munhu asisiri muhofisi nekudaro haafanirwe kunge achitongwa. Ukuwo, nhengo dzebato riri kutonga, dzeDemocratic Party, hadzina huwandu hunodiwa uhwu, izvo zvinozoita kuti dzitarisire kunhengo dzinopikisa dzeRepublican Party. Chizvarwa cheZimbabwe uye vari vakafanobata chigaro chemutungamiri webato idzva rezvematongerwo enyika, rePatriotic Zimbabweans Party, VaCharles Mutama, vanoti hurongwa hwekutonga VaTrump idanho rakanaka chose sezvo pari kuteverwa bumbiro remitemo, asi havaoni zvichibudirira. VaMutama vanoti kupesana pamaonero kuri pakati penhengo dzedare seseneti zvichiendarana nekuti dzinobva kubato ripi ndizvo zvichaita kuti vaive mutungamiri wenyika ava vasakwanise kutongwa. Asi vanoti izvi zvakanakira hutongo hwejekerere, uye dzimwe nyika kusanganisirawo Zimbabwe, dzinowanawo zvekutorawo kubva mazviri. No media source currently available
title: Dare reSeneti muAmerica Rotarisirwa Kutonga Kepiri Vaive Mutungamiri weNyika, VaDonald Trump

text: Vanotengesera mumigwagwa mudhorobha reHarare vanoti havasi kufara nekubhadhariswa mari yechiwokomuhomwe kwavanoti vari kuitwa nemapurisa ekanzuru kuti vakwanise kutengesa zvinhu zvavo mumigwagwa. Mumwe wevanhu ava, Amai Lynette Marongwe vati havachatokwanisa kutengesa mumigwagwa kana vasina mari yechiwokomuhomwe. Izvi zvatsinhirwa naMuzvare Tendekai Mashavira avo vanoti vashandi vekanzuru vave kuzvimba matumbu nekuguta nemari dzechiwokomuhomwe ivo vachidya nhoko dzezvironda. Sachigaro webhodhi resangano rinomirira vanotengesera mumigwagwa reNational Vendors Union Zimbabwe, VaStan Zvorwadza vati mapurisa ekanzuru ari kushanda pamwe nevamwe vakuru-vakuru mukanzuru zviri kukonzera kuti mapurisa ekanzuru aya asasungwe kana vachinge vamhan’ara nyaya dzakadai kumapurisa. Asi mutauriri wekanzuru, VaMichael Chideme vati zviri kutaurwa nevanotengesera mumigwagwa ava hachisi chokwadi, vachiti mapurisa avo anoita basa zvemandorokwati. VaZvorwadza vati chimwe chiri kunetsa vanotengesera mumigwagwa inyaya yekuti kanzuru haisi kukwanisa kupa nzvimbo dzekutengesera kuvanhu vese vayakanyoresa kuti vatengesere munzvimbo dzakatarwa. VaZvorwadza vati uku kubirwa kuri pachena vachiti vanotengesera mumigwagwa vari kuramba vachingobhadhariswa mari nekanzuru asi pasina chinobatika chavari kuitirwa nekanzuru yacho. Asi VaChideme varamba mashoko aya vachiti vanhu vakanyoresa kukanzuru vanofanira kunoshandira kunzvimbo dzavakapihwa nekanzuru. Kanzuru yeHarare yakabvisa vanhu vakawanda mumigwagwa ichiti vaizadza tsvina pose pose uye vanhu vakanga vasisakwanise kufamba zvakanaka mudhorobha. Kusvika parizvino, nzvimbo zhinji dzakatarwa nekanzuru kuti vanhu vatengesere hadzina kugadzirwa zvakanaka uye vanotengesa ava vanoti havasi kuzoenda kune dzimwe dzenzvimbo idzi vachiti dziri kure nevatengi uye hadzina kushambidzika. Zvichakadai, vazhinji vevanotengesa ava vati havasi kuzobvuma kubuda mumigwagwa mavanotengesera vachiti vanoda kuti hurumende itange yavapa mabasa. No media source currently available
title: Vanotengesera muMigwagwa yeHarare Vochemachema nekuBhadhariswa Chiokomuhomwe.

text: Dare repamusoro rapa mumiriri weHarare West muparamende, Muzvare Joanna Mamombe nevamwe vavo vaviri, Cecilia Chimbiri naNetsai Marova, mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso kuitira kuti vatongwe vachibva kudzimba dzavo. Mutongi wedare, VaDavison Foroma, vatura mutongo wekuti Muzvare Mamombe, Muzvare Chimbiri naMuzvare Marova vabhdhare zviuru gumi zvemadhora ari maRTGS pamunhu wega wega semari yechibatiso pamhosva yavari kupomerwa yekunzi vakanyepa kuti vakapambwa vakatochwa vari mumaoko ehurumende. Vatatu ava vanziwo vazvipire kumapurisa katatu pasvondo, vasiye magwaro avo ekufambisa kudare uye kuti vasataure nevatori venhau kana kuenda pamadandemutande e social media vachitaura zvavanoda. Mutauriri weMDC Alliance, Advocate Fadzai Mahere, vaudza Studio7 kuti vafara nekusungunurwa kwaitwa vatatu ava nedare. Asi vatiwo havasi kufara nezvaturwa nedare zvekuti vasataure nevatori venhau pamwe nekuenda pa indaneti vachiti izvi zvinotyora kodzero dzavo. Vatatu ava vanoti vakapambwa vari mumaoko emapurisa mwedzi wapera vakatochwa ndokuzosiyiwa vakandwa kuBindura. Asi hurumende inoti haina chainoziva nezvekupambwa nekutochwa kwevatatu ava kunyange hazvo mutauriri wemapurisa munyika, VaPaul Nyathi, vakambobvuma kuti vatatu ava vakanga vasungwa uri vari mumaoko emapurisa musi wavanoti vakasungwa nemapurisa. Asi mapurisa akazochinja achiti akanga asingazive kwaive nevatatu ava. No media source currently available
title: Madzimai Matatu eMDC Anobvisiswa Mari yeChibatiso Kuitira Kuti Atongwe Achibva Kudzimba Dzawo

text: Imwe nyanzvi mune zvemutemo, uye vari munyori mukuru webato rinopikisa reMDC-T, VaDouglas Mwonzora, vanoti kunyange hazvo bato reZanu PF radzinga mutungamiri waro uye vari mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, kubva mubato, bumbiro remitemo rinovabvumidza kuti varambe vari mutungamiri wenyika kusvika vasiya basa vega kana kuti vapomerwa mhosva nenhengo dzeparamende izvo zvinozoita kuti vasiye basa. Asi VaMwonzora vanoti mumwe mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaPelekezela Mphoko, kudzingwa kwavaitwa mubato raeZanu PF kunoreva kuti havachina chigaro, sezvo vanga vari nhengo yeparamende. VaMwonzora vanoti kana VaMugabe vakanga vasiya basa, mutauriri wedare reparamende, VaJacob Mudenda, ndivo vanofanirwa kufanobata matomu kana kuti mutongi mukuru, kusvika Zanu PF yapa dare reparamende munhu anenge achitsiva VaMugabe.
title: VaMugabe Vokonzera Mutauro Zvichitevera Kutorerwa Chigaro muZanu PF

text: Knazuru yeChitungwiza inoti haisi kufara nekupambwa kuri kuitwa masitendi mazhinji mudhorobha iri izvo inoti zvine chekuita nezvematongerwo enyika. Vachitaura nevatori venhau mu Harare, meya weChitungwiza, Va Phillip Mutoti, vati kanzuru yavo haisi kufara nekupambwa kuri kuitwa masitendi munzvimbo yeNyatsime zvine chekuita nezvematongerwo enyika vanhu vopedzisira vavaka dzimba zvisina mvumo yekanzuru yavo. No media source currently available Va Mutoti varamba kutaura kuti vezvematongerwo enyika vari kukonzera dambudziko iri ndivanani vachiti vave kutyira hupenyu hwavo nemhuri yavo zvichitevera kurwisana kwakaita vechidiki ve Zanu PF pamwe nevechidiki ve MDC-T masvondo mashoma adarika mumhirizhonga ine chekuita nenyaya dzemasitendi. Mhirizhonga iyi yakazobatanidzirwa nyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika apo vechidiki veZanu PF vaiti hapana mutsigiri weMDC-T anofanirwa kugara ku Nyatsime. Va Mutoti vati kunyange hazvo kanzuru yavo yakapa vamwe vanhu masitendi eku Nyatsime mashomanana, vazhinji vari kugara kunzvimbo iyi vari kugara zviri kunze kwemutemo. Vaenderera mberi vachiti kune huzvu dziri kuramba dzichitengesera vanhu masitendi zvisiri pamutemo vanhu vachidyirwa mari dzavo. Va Mutoti vatiwo nyaya yenzvimbo ye Nyatsime haisati yanyatsojeka sezvo kanzuru isati yapedzerana nehurumende panyaya yekutorwa kwepurazi iri iro riri kumahombekombe kwedhorobha reChitungwiza. Va Mutoti vakurudzira veruzhinji muChitungwiza kuti vashande nekanzuru yavo kana vachida masitendi vachiti veruzhinji vanogona kudyirwa mari vakasvinura sematemba. Zvichakadai, sangano rinomirira vagari mu Chitungwiza, re Chitungwiza Residents Trust, kana kuti Chitrest, rinoti harisi kufara nekupwanywa kwemba yemumwe mugari mu Chitungwiza makare kwakaitwa naVa Mutoti avo vanonzi vari kuda kuvaka imba yavo ipapo. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa mu Chitrest, Va Marvelous Khumalo, vati zvakaitwa naVa Mutoti izvi kushandisa masimba pasipo uye vanoti vave kutora matanho nezvenyaya iyi. Asi Va Mutoti varamba mashoko aya vachiti haasi echokwadi. Asi tsvagiridzo yaitwa ne Studio7 yaburitsa pachena kuti imba iyi ndeya Va Sakhelene Mudunge avo vakatenga sitendi iyi iyo iri ku Manyame Park kubva kukanzuru yeChitungwiza muna 2007. Mushure mekutenga sitendi iyi, vakavaka imba yavo ikapera. Va Mudunge vakatomhan’ara nyaya iyi kukamba yemapurisa yeSt Mary’s muChitungwiza makare. MDC-T yakambodzinga mamwe makanzura ayo muChitungwiza ichiapomera mhosva dzehuwori hune chekuita nenyaya dzemasitendi nezvimwe zvakadaro. Va Mutoti vakasarudzwa kuve meya weChitungwiza senhengo ye MDC-T.
title: Meya Mutoti Voshupika neKutengeswa kweMasitendi muChitungwiza Zviri Kunze kweMutemo

text: Hurumende inoti nyika inofanirwa kutanga yaita mari yayo isati yapinda mumubatanidzwa wemari dzekuchamhembe kweAfrica we Common Monetary Area, uyo unoshandisa mari yekuSouth Africa yeRand pasi pe common monetary union. Izvi zvaziviswa nemutevedzeri wegurukota rezvemari, VaTerence Mukupe, avo varamba mashoko ari kubuda ekuti mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa nemutevedzeri wavo, VaConstantino Chiwenga vakaenda kunosangana nehutungamiri hweSouth Africa nemusi weSvondo. Mashoko anga achibuda ndeekuti vatungamiri venyika ava vaida kuti vaone kuti Zimbabwe ingabvumidzwe here neSouth Africa kushandisa zviri pamutemo mari yenyika iyi yeRand, iyo iri kushandiswawo munyika pakati pedzimwe mari dzekunze kwenyika. VaMukupe vanoti kunyange hazvo hurongwa hwekubatana nedzimwe nyika mumubatanidzwa wecommon monetary union hwakanaka, pane basa rakawanda rinofanira kutanga ragadziriswa neZimbabwe, rinosanganisira kuumba hupfumi hwenyika, uye kudzosa mari yemunyika, isati yapinda mumubatanidzwa uyu. Pari zvino mubatanidzwa weCommon Monetary Area une nyika dzinoti South Africa, Namibia, Lesotho, neSwaziland, kunyange hazvo dzimwe nyika dziri kushandisawo Rand idzi dziine mari dzadzowo. No media source currently available
title: VaMukupe Vanoti Nyika Inofanirwa Kuve neMari Yayo Kuti Ipinde muCommon Monetary Area

text: Gurukota rezvemari, Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube, vati hurumende yashandisa mari shoma pane yavaifungira kuti vachange vashandisa kusvika pari zvino vakati zvinoratidza kuti hurumende ichangoshandisa mari yakatarwa yegore rino pamabasa ayo. Vachitura ongororo yavo yemashandisirwo emari yehurumende yegore rino inoitwa pakati pegore, VaNcube vati zvisinei nedenda reCOVID-19 riri munyika, pamari yaifanirwa kunge yakashandiswa kusvika muna Chikumu, pakasara mari inosvika mamiriyoni mazana masere emadhora emaRTGS. Va Ncube vazivisawo kuti mari inotambirwa nemushandi ichange ichizobatirwa mutero yakwidzwa kubva pamadhora zviuru zviviri kuenda pamadhora zviuru zvishanu. Vatiwo pamari yevashandi vehurumende yavari kupiwa nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19, ichange isingabatirwi mutero kwegore rese kutanga mwedzi waKubvumbi. VaNcube vatiwo kunyange hazvo pavakazivisa bhajeti regore rino vaitarisira kuti hupfumi hwenyika hukure nezvikamu zvitatu kubva muzana,vati izvi hazvichagoneki nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19 vakati hupfumi huchadzokera shure nezvikamu zvina nechidimbu kubva muzana. Dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi hwenyika dzinoti VaNcube havana kutaura kuti nyika ichapedza sei matambudziko aripo. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi musangano re Labour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, VaNyasha Muchichwa, vati vanoshamiswa kunzwaVaNcube vachiti pane mari yakasara asi munyika muine matambudziko akawanda asina kugadziriswa sekuramwa mabasa kwaana chiremba huye kuwanisa vanhu zvekudya. Vatiwo mari isingabatirwi mutero ichiri shoma zvakanyanya. Mumwe mugari wemuHarare, VaOwen Dhliwayo ,vatiwo zvataurwa naVaNcube hazvishanduri hupenyu hweveruzhinji avo vanga vari kutarisira kurerutsirwa munyaya dzehurombo Mukuru wesangano reVendors Initiative for Social and Economic Transformation, VaSamuel Wadzayi, vatiwo VaNcube vanga vaine nhava yanga izere mhepo. Vati vanga vakatarisira kuti paunzwe hurongwa hwekubatsira vanoita mabasa emaoko avo vakakanganiswa zvakanyanya nechirwere cheCOVID -19. Vamwewo vatiwo vanga vachitarisira kuvandudzwa kwebhajeti renyika pachinzvimbo chekuudzwa kuti zvirongwa zvehurumende zviri kufamba zvakanaka nemari iripo. No media source currently available
title: Hurumende Inotadza Kupedza Mari Yayakabhajeta

text: Nhengo dzevechidiki dzebato riri kutonga reZanu PF dzinoti dzichamira nemutungamiri webato uye vari mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa dzichipesana nevanhu vari kuda kuratidzira vachinyunyuta nemamiriro ezvinhu, zvikuru sei vechidiki vebato reMDC inotungamirirwa naVaNelson Chamisa. Vachitaura nhasi muChinhoyi pamusangano weboka revechidiki, sachigaro wevechidiki mudunhu reMashonaland West, VaVengai Musengi, vanoti vachatsigira VaMnangagwa nepose pavanogona uye vakaramba vachigona basa ravo vachavapa mumwe mukana wekutungamira nyika. VaMusengi vanoti bato reMDC riri kushandiswa nevanhu vavasina kudoma nemazita vachiti kunyange vakaratidzira hapana chinoshanduka pahutungamiri huripo, vachiti kunyange VaMnangagwa vakabva MDC hapana chainowana sezvo nhengo yeZanu ndiyo inongotonga. Imwe nhengo yevechidiki inoona nezvekuchengetedzwa kwemusangano muboka revechidiki, VaSilas Chimbiru, vanoti vachabvisa matanda anenge aiswa nevanhu nevanenge vachiratidzira pamwe nevanhu vacho. Vechidiki veZanu PF vasungawo chisungo chekuti vachatora motokari dzose dzebato dzakabviswa mufananidzo webato nenhengo dzebato ravo dzavanoti dzave kunyara kufamba nemotokari dzine mucherechedzo weZanu PF nekuda kwekuoma kwakaita zvinhu munyika. Panyaya yekubviswa pachigaro kwaVaMnangagwa nevhoti yemuparamende kana kuti impeachment, VaMusengi vanoti havaone izvi zvichiitika kunyange paine nhengo dzeparamende dzakapinda nechitsotsi. Asi nhengo yevechidiki yeMDC, VaDavid Malunga, vanoti havatyisidzirwe nemapanga emashanga vachiti vachaenderera mberi nekuratidzira sezvo vari kuda kununura munhu wese kusanganisira nhengo dzeZanu PF. Vechidiki veZanu PF vanotiwo vanofara nekupihwa chigaro chekurongwa kwemisangano mubato ravo kwakaitwa VaVictor Matemadanda naVaMnangagwa. VaMusengi vakurudzira vechidiki kuti vasanyare nemusangano weZanu PF nekudaro vanofanirwa kupfeka nhumbi dzebato nguva dzose. Vanoti vataura izvi nekuda kwekuti nhengo dzevechidiki dzapinda musangano wanhasi dzakawanda dzanga dzisina kupfeka nhumbi dzebato. No media source currently available
title: Vechidiki veZanu PF kuMashonaland West Vopika Kuti Vachamira naVaMnangagwa

text: Mutungamiri weSouth Africa, VaCyril Ramaphosa, vakakurudzira European Union kuti ichibvisa zvirango zvakatemerwa Zimbabwe, vachiti iri kuvandudza zvinhu. Vakatiwo mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vanofanirwa kutsigirwa mubasa ravari kuita kunyukura Zimbabwe mumadhaka mairi. Bepanhau reChronicle rinoti VaRamaphosa vakataura izvi pamusangano uchangoitwa wechinomwe we South Africa European Union ku Brussels. Asi vamwe vanotevera zvematongerwo enyika vanoti manyepo eSouth Africa ndiwo anokonzera kutambudzika kweZimbabwe vachiti VaRamaphosa vanonyatsoziva kuti zvirango zvakatemerwa vamwe vakuru mubato reZanu-Pf kwete vanhuwo zvavo. Vanoti izvi zvakaitwea sezvo vakuru ava vachipomerwa mhosva yekutyora kodzero dzevanhu. Mumwe wevanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika, VaWilbert Mukori, vanoti VaRamaphosa varikurova imbwa vakaviga mupini. Vanoti zviga zvakatemerwa vakuru ava kuti zvirango zvibviswe hazvisati zvazadzikiswa. No media source currently available
title: VaCyril Ramaphosa Vokurudzira European Union kuti Ibvise Zvirango Zvayakatemera Zimbabwe

text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa nemusi weChitatu vari kutarisirwa kuparura chirongwa chechipiri chekuti vanhu vabayiwe nhomba yecovid-19 kuVictoria Falls. VaMnangagwa vari kutarisirwawo kubayiwa nhomba musi uyu nevamwe vatungamiri vari mugungano rePOLAD. Bazi rezvehutano rinoti riri kuda kubaya vanhu nhomba vanosvika zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana kuti chirwere ichi chisapararire. Asi kusvika parizvino, bazi rezvehutano rinoti kusvika neSvondo, vanhu zviuru makumi mana nemaviri zvine mazana manomwe nemakumi maviri nepfumbamwe kana kuti 42,729 ndivo vainge vabayiwa nhomba yeCovid-19 muchikamu chekutanga chine nhomba inosvika zana rezviuru kana kuti 100 000 yakapihwa Zimbabwe neChina. Chikamu ichi chinevashandi vemuzvipatara, vatori venhau, vanoshanda kumabhodha uye vanochengetedza majeri. Asi huwandu hwevabayiwa huchiri pasi zvakanyanya. Vakatanga kubayiwa munyika vanosanganisira vatori venhau, vakoti, vanachiremba nevamwe vashandi vemuzvipatara. Pasi rose ongororo yakaitwa neAmnesty International neUNI Global Union inoratidza kuti vashandi vemuzvipatara vanodarika zviuru gumi nenomwe kana kuti 17 000 vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19. Asi vachitaura neStudio 7, mutungamiri weZimbabwe Nurses Association VaEnoch Dongo vanoti kushaya ruzivo kunopa kuti dzimwe nhengo dzesangano ravo dzizengurire kubayiwa. Kunyangwe hazvo paine vatori venhau vane chitsama vafa nekubatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika, vakawanda vavo vachiri kuzengurira kubayiwa nhomba. Mutungamiri wesangano rinomirira vatori venhau reZimbabwe Union of Journalists kana kuti ZUJ VaMichael Chideme vanotiwo kushaya ruzivo ndiko kuri kupa kuti vashoma vazvipire kubayiwa nhomba kunyangwe vari munjodzi huru yekutapurirwa chirwere. Komisheni yeZimbabwe Media Commission –ZMC- yazivisa padandemutande ravo nhasi kuti vatori venhau vanoda kubayiwa nhomba vanosungirwa kuenda panzvimbo dziri kubayiwa vanhu nhomba vaine kadhi rinovabvumira kushanda kana kuti press card kuti vabayiwe. VaChideme vanoti izvi zvakaitwa mushure memusangano wavo neZMC. Sachigaro werimwe boka revatori venhau reMedia Institute of Southern Africa kana kuti MISA, VaGolden Maunganidze vanoti vanofara kuti vatori venhau vakaiswa pachikwata chekutanga kubayiwa chevashandi vanosangana neveruzhinji mukushanda kwavo kunyangwe vari kuti vamwe Havana chivimbo nenhomba yeSinopharm yekuChina. Mumwe mutori wenhau akabayiwa nhomba yekutanga akamirira yechipiri VaConrad Mapesa vanoti vanonetsekana nehuwandu hushoma hwevatori venhau vari kuzvipira kubayiwa nhomba. VaMapesa vanokurudzira vatori venhau vose kuti vabayiwe nhomba yekudzivirira chirwere cheCovid-19 sezvo vachisangana nekutaura nevanhu vakawanda mukuita basa ravo.\n\nKunyangwe hazvo vanhu vashoma vari kubayiwa nhomba pazuva parizvino, mutauriri webazi rezvehutano VaDonald Mujiri vanoti hurumende ine chivimbo chekuti vakawanda vachabayiwa nhomba iyi. MuChinhoyi vatori venhau vana chete pavatori venhau makumi mana vakabayiwa nhomba. Asi mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa mumashoko avo kunyika svondo rapera vakati vanhu vanofanira kubayiwa nhomba iyi sezvo iri iyo nzira yakanaka yekumisa nyaya yekuti vanhu vagare mudzimba kuti chirwere ichi chisapararire. Vanoti chirwere ichi chatora hupenyu hwevanhu vakawanda munyika. No media source currently available
title: Zimbabwe Yotanga Kubaya Nhomba Muchikamu cheChichipiri Asi Vatori veNhau Vashoma Vachizvipira

text: Mupepeti mukuru webepanhau reChroncle VaMduduzi Mathuthu vakadzingwa basa nemusi weChina vakabva vanzi vaende kunoshandira bepanhau reSouthern Times Newspaper riri kuWindhoek, Namibia. Mutsamba yakanyorerwa VaMathuthu nemukuru weZimbabwe Newspapers VaPikirai Deketeke iyo yainge iine zuva remusi weChipiri, Chivabvu 17 vakanzi kutanga musi wa 23 Chivabvu vanofanira kunge voenda kunoshanda kubepanhau reSouthern Times. VaDeketeke vakati VaMathuthu ndivo vanenge vave mupepeti mukuru webepa iri uye vaivashuvira kuti vashande zvakanaka. Vakabva vazivisawo mutsamba imwe cheteyo kuti mutevedzeri wavo kuChronicle VaInnocent Madonko ndivo vanenge vofanobata matomu kuChronicle. VaMathuthu avo vaimboshandira vakamboshandirawo bepanhau reDaily News uye repandemutande reinternet re New Zimbabwe.com. Vakadomwa kuita mupepeti mukuru weChronicle muna 2013. Vane ruzivo nezviri kuitika muhurumende vanoti nyaya yaVaMathuthu yekunyanya kudyidzana nevechikwata chinozivikanwa nekuti Generation 40 chinosanganisa gurukota rezvedzidzo yepamusoro Muzvinafundo Jonathan Moyo ndizvo zvapa kuti vagume vave mukanwa mamupere. Vanotsigira chimwe chikwata chinotsigira mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa chinozivikana nekuti Team Lacoste vanonzi vairwa sengwena kuti VaMathuthu vabviswe kuChronicle. Zvikwata zviviri izvi zviri kurwira kutora chigaro chemutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe avo vave nemakore makumi mapfumbamwe nemaviri ekuberekwa. Hatina kukwanisa kubata VaMathuthu kana VaDeketeke kuti tinzwe kuti chii chainge chapa kuti vaendeswe kuNamibia.
title: VaMduduzi Mathuthu Vodzingwa Basa kuChronicle

text: Mazuva ano zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka munyika, umo vanhu vemapato ezvematongerwo enyika, vemasangano akazvimirira pamwe nevedzisvondo vari kupinda mukuratidzira vachiti hurumende yaVaRobert Mugabe isiye chigaro sezvo yatadza kutonga. Hurumende pamwe nevamwe vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vanoti vanhu vari kuratidzira ava vari kushandiswa nehurumende dzekumawirira kuti vamukire hurumende yaVaMugabe. Asi mashoko aya akarambwa nemizinda yeAmerica neFrance iri muZimbabwe, ichiti hurumende yave kungoda kuzora vanhu mafuta enguruve yavasina kudya. Zvizvarwa zvezimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika zvakawanda zvinonzi zviri kupindawo mukuratidzira uku nenzira dzakasiyanasiyana, dzakaita sekuratidzirawo munyika dzavagere, kutumira mashoko ekusimbisana nezvimwe zvakadaro. Asi vamwe vanoti kuita kwakadai kufurira vanhu vari kumusha asi ivo vari kunze kwenyika vari kumafura mhepo asi vachi kurudzira vari kumusha kuti varatidzire kuburikidza nemadandemutande akaita se Facebook neWhatsapp. Mumwe wevari kunze kwenyika ndiMufundisi Richard Sabvute vechechi yeZAOGA, avo vari mumusha weFrederick, muMaryland muAmerica. Mufundisi Sabvute vanoti hapana chitsva pane zviri kuitika kumusha sezvo izvi zvakataurwa kare nebhaibheri. "Ini samufundisi ndinoona sekuzadzisika kwezvinhu zvakawanda zvakataurwa naJesu mubhaibheri. Saka handitendi kuti chinhu chitsva chiri kuitika kuZimbabwe," vanodaro Mufundisi Sabvute. Vanoti chinhu chakanyorwa kare mushoko raMwari kuti pachasvika mazuva ezhove-zhove, achasvika mazuva ekusagutsikana kwevanhu panyika, izvo zvichazoita kuti vasimuke vachida kunzwikwa nehurumende dzavo. No media source currently available
title: Vari Kunze kweNyika Votaurawo Pamusoro peZviri Kuitika Kumusha

text: Hurumende inoti mitengo yemafuta edzimotokari inofanira kudzika zvakanyanya sezvo mitengo yemafuta aya yadzika zvakakomba pamisika yepasi rose. Vachitaura nevatori venhau muHarare neChishanu, gurukota rinoona nezvemhando dzemoto, VaSamuel Undege vakati mutengo wemafuta wakadzika zvikuru pamusika wepasi rose nekudaro vanotengesa mafuta munyika vanofanira kudzikisa mitengo. Mutengo wemafuta pamisika yepasi rose yadzika nezvikamu makumi mashanu kubva muzana kwemwedzi mitanhatu yapfuura. VaUndenge vakaudza vatori venhau mu Harare kuti vemakambani anotengesa mafuta edzimotokari vanofanira kunge vadzikisa mitengo yepeturu nedhiziri musi wa 14 Ndira usati wadarika uye vati vachatora matanho akawomarara kumakambani anenge asina kudzikisa mutengo uyu. VaUndenge vatiwo vemakambani anotengesa mafuta kune veruzhinji vanofanira kuzokwidza mitengo yepeturu nedhiziri mushure memasvondo maviri kana mitengo iyi yakwira pamisika yepasi rose. Parizvino, makambani anotengesa peturu anoti haasati adzikisa mitengo yepeturu nedhiziri achiti achiri kutengesa mafuta aakatenga mitengo isati yadzika pamisika yepasi rose. Asi VaUndenge vati zvinotora masvondo maviri chete kuti makambani apedze kutengesa mafuta aanenge ahodha. Parizvino, peturu iri kutengeswa ne $1.50 parita rimwe chete uye dhiziri ririkutengeswa ne $1.40 parita rimwe chete. VaUndenge vati kana makambani anotengesa mafuta akadzikisa mitengo, peturu inogona kudzika kusvika pamari isingadarike $1.20 parita rimwe chete. Pavabvunzwa kuti sei mutengo wepeturu uchiramba uri pamusoro iyo peturu yacho yavekusanganiswa ne ethanol inogadzirwa muno, VaUndenge vati chinokonzera izvi inyaya yekudhura kunoita kutakura peturu yacho kubva kwainosanganisirwa kuenda kune veruzhinji. Zvichakadaro, nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinoti mitengo yezvinhu inotarisirwa kudzikawo muzvitoro kana mitengo yemafuta ichinge yadzikiswa. No media source currently available Sachigaro weLong Distance Bus Operators Association mudunhu reManicaland VaEsau Mupfumi vanoti vari kutambira nemaoko maviri danho ratorwa naVaUdenge. No media source currently available
title: Hurumende Inoti Makambani Ngaadzikise Mutengo weMafuta eMotokari

text: Nhengo dzebato rinopikisa muSouth Africa, reEconomic Freedom Fighters, EFF, dzinonzi dzambonetsana zvakasimba nenhengo dzechikwata cheOperation Dudula, icho chiri kurambidza vekunze kurapwa munyika iyi. Nhengo dzeEFF dzinonzi nhasi dzakwanisa kuvhurira vekunze kuti varapwe pakiriniki yeHillbrow iri muJohannesburg, iyo yakambenge yavharirwa vekunze neOperation Dudula kuti vasapinde. Chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chiri mu Pretoria, Mufundisi Richard Moyo vanoti kuchipatara chikuru cheKalafong Provincial Tertiary Hospital chiri muPretiora mapurisa arara akachengetedza kuti chisakanganiswa mashandiro. Vanotiwo vebato reEFF vanga vachibatsirawo kudzivirira vanobva kunze kwenyika zvazomboita kuti vakandirane zvibhakera neveOperation Dudula. Kutanga svondo rino veOperation Dudula vanga vachirambidza vekunze kupinda muzvipatara nemakirini ari pasi pehurumende vachiti vekunze havafanirwe kurapwa pachena muSouth Africa nekuti vari kupedzera zvizvarwa zvenyika iyi zvikwanisiro. No media source currently available
title: Nhengo dzeBato Rinopikisa muSouth Africa reEFF Dzonetsana neChikwata cheOperation Dudula Icho Chiri Kurambidza veKunze Kurapwa muNyika Iyi

text: Vakuru vakati mushonga wechironda kuchirapa. Izvi ndizvo zviri kukurudzirwa nevamwe kuti hurumende iite kana ichida kubvisirwa zvirango zvainoti zvakatemerwa nyika nenyika dzekumawirira. Vanhu ava vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kugadzirisa zvacho zviri kunzi ndizvo zvakakoka zvirango izvi zvinosanganisira kuremekedza kodzero dzevanhu, kwete kumhanyira kuti vanhu vafore mumigwagwa vachiratidzira. Vanhu ava vari kuti vanoda kuona kana paine chinoshanduka mushure mekufora uku, vachiti havaoni izvi zvichiita kuti America neEuropean Union vabvise zvirango zvavakatemera vamwe vakuru muhurumende pamwe nemakambani ainodyidzana nawo. Asi vamwe ndivo vari kuti zvinhu zviedzwa, chembere yekwaChivi yakabika mabwe yakanwa muto, zvinoramba mazama. SADC yakatara zuva remusi weChishanu, 25 Gumiguru sezuva rekutaura nezwi rimwechete kuti zvirango izvi zvibviswe. Hurumende yakatotara zuva iri sezororo renyika, uye iri kukurudzira kuti vanhu vese vabatane mukufora vachikukrudzira kuti zvirango izvi zvibviswe. Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika uye vari nhengo yebato riri kutonga reZanu PF, VaGadzira Chirumhanzu, vanoti MDC ndiyo yakanokumbira zvirango izvi kuAmerica neEuropean Union mushure mekutorwa kwevhu richipiwa kuvatema. Asi mumiriri weAmerica muZimbabwe, VaBrian Nichols varamba kuti nyika yavo yakadzika zvirango nekuda kwenyaya yevhu, vachiti zvirango zvikuru zviri muZimbabwe zvirango zvayakazvitemera yoga kuburikidza kusaremekedza kodzero dzevanhu pamwe nehuwori. VaNichols vapa semuenzaniso mabhiriyoni matatu emadhora anonzi haana tsananguro yakajeka kuti akashandiswa sei mushure mekunge adirwa kuzvirongwa zvekurima zveCommand Agriculture nePresidential Input Scheme, izvo zvinofanirwa kunge zvichibatsira varimi. Munyori anoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika muMDC, Muzvare Gladys Hlatywayo, vanotsinhirawo mashoko aVaNichols aya, vachiti huwori nekutonga nedemo kweZanu PF ndizvo zvauraya nyika, kwete zvirango zviri kutaurwa izvi. Muzvare Hlatywayo vanoti chinongodiwa munyika kuti hurumende yeZanu PF igadzirise zviri kukurudzirwa nenyika dzekumawirira dzacho kana ichida kuti zvirango zvibviswe, kwete kufora vachitambisa imwe mari. Asi VaChirumhanzu vanoti zvinozivikanwa nemunhu wese kuti MDC ndiyo yakakoka zvirango, vachiti zvinoonekwa nekuramba minda kwakaitwa nenhengo dzebato iri dzchitya kutsamwisa varungu. \
title: Nyaya yeZvirango Yotsviriridza veZanu PF neveMDC Vachinakurirana Nyoka Mhenyu

text: Murume wekuKariba ari kupomerwa mhosva yekudzikisira hofisi yemutungamiri wenyika nekutuka mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, nemumwe mutevedzeri wavo, VaConstantino Chiwenga, akambomiswa nemusi weChitatu pamberi pedare ramejasitiriti kuKariba asi akazonzi adzoke kudare iri nemusi weChitatu svondo rinouya. VaAlexander Samuel Chidzedzere, avo vane makore makumi maviri nemasere ekuberekwa, vakasungwa nemapurisa pasi pemutemo weCriminal Law (Codification and Reform) Act vachinzi vakataura mashoko aya paNyamhunga Business Centre musi wa16 Nyamavhuvhu vachivapomerazve mhosva yekubirira sarudzo pamwe nebato ravo reZanu-PF. Mapurisa anoti mashoko aya akanangana nekuunza ruvengo nekushorwa kwemutungamiri wenyika. Vanhu vakawanda vari kusungwawo munzvimbo dzakawanda vachipomerwa mhosva imweyo yekukutuka mutungamiri wenyika. Vamwe vakasungwa vanosanganisira VaGustiv Kativhu, VaNorman Machipisa, VaMunyaradzi Shoko naVaDavid Ndlovu. Vamwe vanonzi vanenge vatuka VaMnangagwa padandemutande reFacebook vanosungwawo. Gweta raVaChidzedzere, VaUnit Saize, vanova nhengo yesangano reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights, vanoti vari kuramba mhosva yavari kupomerwa. No media source currently available
title: Nyakunzi Akatuka VaMnangagwa naVaChiwenga Omiswa Pamberi peDare

text: Gurukota rinoona nezvehutano Dr David Parirenyatwa vari kukurudzira vanamukoti vari kuramwa mabasa kuti vadzokere kumabasa zvichemo zvavo zvichigadziriswa. Mumashoko kuvatori venhau VaParirenyatwa vanoti zvichemo zvinavanamukoti ava vano zvitambira uye kutenda kuti zvinoda kugadziriswa. Vanotiwo vari kutaura nebazi rezvehupfumi kuti rione kuti ringape vanamukoti ava mari here. Vanamukoti vakatanga kuramwa mabasa nezuro vachiti hurumende yakundikana kugadzirisa zvichemo zvavo kubva muna 2010 zvinosanganisa mari yemihoro, kushaikwa kwemishonga muzvipatara uye zvimwe zvikwanisiro. Kuramwa mabasa uku kuri kuuya apo chirwere checholera chiri kuramba chichipararira muHarare nemuChitungwiza. Vanhu vanosvika makumi maviri nevana vabatwa nechirwere ichi kusvika parizvino.
title: Dr Parirenyatwa Vokumbira VanaMukoti Kuti Vadzokere kuMabasa Uko Cholera Ichipararira

text: Paitazve ropa rakaipa pakati pekomisheni inoona nezvesarudzo reZimbabwe Electoral Commission, Zec, nesangano rinomirira mamwe mapato anopikisa reNational Electoral Reform Agenda, kana kuti Nera nezvemitemo yesarudzo. Zec yakaburitsa zviga zvesarudzo zvekuti vanhu vazeye kana kuti draft voter registration regulations. Zec inoti yapa mapato ose ezvematongerwo enyika pamwe nevane chekuita nesarudzo mavhiki maviri ekuti vape pfungwa dzavo. Zvimwe zviri kuda kunzi zvizeyiwe inyaya yehuwandu hwevanhu vanokwanisa kuvhota panzvimbo kana kuti polling station. Nera inoti yainge vatenderana neZec kuti vanhu ava vave churu chete asi Zec yave kuda kuti pavhote churu nemazana mashanu zvinonzi nevanopikisa zvinogona kupa kuti vamwe vatadze kuvhota. Vanopikisa vanoti mari iri kudiwa kuti vawane gwaro revavhoti yakawandisa. Nera inotiwo inoda kuti vana veZimbabwe vari kunze kwenyika vavhote. Mutauriri weNera, VaDouglas Mwonzora, vanoti havasi kufara nezviri kutaurwa neNera sezvo zvichizotadzisa vamwe vanhu kuvhota. No media source currently available Asi sachigaro weZec, Amai Rita Makarau, vanoti vasiri kufara nezvakatura komisheni yavo vakasununguka kuzotaura navo kuti vagadzirise pakakodzera kugadziriswa. No media source currently available
title: Zec Yotatsurana Zvakare neNera

text: Nyaya yekudzingwa kwameya weGweru, VaHamutendi Kombayi, pamwe nakanzura Kenneth Sithole, yatora rimwe danho zvichitevera mutongo wakapiwa nedare repamusoro nezuro muBulawayo rekusendeka parutivi sarudzo dzinofanirwa kuitwa dzekutsiva VaKombayi naVaSithole. Gweta riri kumirira VaKombayi, VaBrian Dube, vaudza Studio 7 parunhare kuti dare reHigh Court rakatambira chikumbiro chavo chekuti sarudzo dzekutsiva VaKombayi, avo vaive kanzura aimirira Ward 1, pamwe naVa Sithole, avo vaimirira Ward 4, dzimbomira kuitwa, kusvika dare iri rapa mutongo waro pakupikisa kuri kuita vaviri ava kudzingwa kwavakaitwa. VaKombayi naVaSithole vakadzingwa negurukota rezvematunhu, VaSaviour Kasukuwere, pakupera kwaKukadzi mushure mekunge dare rakazvimirira kana kuti independent tribunal yavaive vasarudza yanzwa mhosva yaipomerwa vaviri ava pamwe nemamwe makanzura gumi nematatu eguta reGweru. Asi VaDube vati mutongi wedare repamusoro, Justice Nicholas Mathonsi, vakabvuma chikumbiro chekuti sarudzo dzekutsiva VaKombayi naVaSithole dzimbomiswa. VaDube vati vanotarisira kuti dare repamusoro richatanga rapa mutongo waro pachikumbiro chavo chekuti mutongo wekuti VaKombayi naVaSithole vadzingwe wakapiwa neIndependent Tribunal waive usina kufanira. VaKasukuwere vakamisa makanzura eGweru basa mugore ra2015 vachivapomera mhosva yehuwori pamwe nekutadza basa. Kunyange hazvo dare repamusoro raive rapa mutongo wekuti izvi zvaive zvisiri pamutemo, VaKasukuwere havana kukasika kuteerera izvi. Zvichakadaro, sachigaro wekambani ye Zimbabwe International Trade Fair, ZITF, Amai Ruth Ncube, vanoti gadziriro yechirongwa chavo chegore rino iri kufamba zvakanaka. Amai Ncube vakaudza vatapi venhau munguva pfupi yapfuura kuti kusvika pari zvino zvikamu makumi mapfumbamwe kubva mazana zvenzvimbo yeZITF zvainge zvabhukwa, uye pane nyika gumi neina dzemhiri kwemakungwa dzinosanganisira China, Germany, Japan, Indonesia pamwe nedzemuAfrica dzinosanganisira South Africa, Namibia neTanzania dzakatozivisa kuti dziri kuuya kuchiitiko ichi. ZITF yegore rino ndeye chimakumi mashanu nesere kubva zvakatanga chirongwa ichi. Chirongwa cheZITF chakangana nekuratidza vekune dzimwe nyika zvigadzirwa zvemuZimbabwe kuitira kuti zvitengwe kunze kwenyika - izvo zvinozoita kuti nyika iwane mari yekunze, iyo iri kutsvagwa nemaziso matsvuku, kuitira kuti ibatsire mukuvandudza hupfumi hwenyika. No media source currently available
title: Dare Rinomisa Sarudzo dzeBy-Elections Mukanzuru yeGweru

text: Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa nemusi weChina kuti vanhu vaviri vakafa neCovid-19, mumwe kuMidlands nemumwe kuMasvingo, uye vanhu makumi maviri nevatatu vakawanikwa vaine chirwere ichi. Vese vanhu vakawanikwa vaine chirwere ichi vanhu vagara vari munyika, vasina nhoroondo yekubuda kunze kwenyika. Kushaya kwevanhu vaviri uku kwakasiya huwandu hwevanhu vafa neCovid-19 kubva patanga denda iri hwazvika pachiuru chimwe chine mazana mashanu nemakumi masere nevashanu, kana kuti 1 585. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa neCovid-19 hwakasvikawo pazviuru makumi matatu nezvisere zvine mazana matanhatu nemakumi matatu nevashanu, kana kuti 38 635. Kusvikawo nemusi weChina, vanhu vanosvika zviuru mazana matanhatu negumi nezvishanu nemazana maviri ane makumi mapfumbamwe mevatanhatu, kana kuti 615 296, vabaiwa nhomba yekudzivirira COVID-19 kubva zvatanga chirongwa ichi.
title: Vanhu Vaviri vanofa neCovid-19, Vamwe Makumi Maviri neVatatu vachiwanikwa Vaine Denda Iri

text: Vemakereke muZimbabwe vanoti hurongwa hwavo hwekuti mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, nemutungamiri weMDC, VaNelson Chamisa, vaite hurukuro dzekuti nyika yotora gwara ripi, huri kuenderera mberi. Munyori wesangano remakereke, reZimbabwe Council of Churches, Reverend Doctor Kenneth Mtata, vanoti kunyange hazvo bato reMDC riri pakati pekugadzirira kongiresi yaro, hurukuro idzi dziri kuenderera mberi. “Tinotarisira kuti panguva inotevera kana zvinhu zvagadzikana tinoziva kuti mamwe mapato ange ane kongiresi yavo irikuuya tinotarisira kuti kana kongiresi yavo yapera pamwe tingatsvaka nzira yekuti mapato ese avepo patafura panyaya yekutsvaka nzira inofanirwa kutorwa nenyika,” Doctor Mtata vaudza Studio 7. No media source currently available  Nyanzvi mune zvematogero enyika vachidzidzisa pa University of Pretoria School of Public Management and Administration kuSouth Africa, uye vari nhengo yeMDC, Doctor Tyanai Masiya, vanoti vemakereke havangakwanisi kuyananisa vakuru vemapato vari kunetsana nekuti vakuru vemakereke vanoonekwa sevakarerekera kudivi reZanu-PF. Doctor Masiya vanoti SADC neAfrican Union dzinofanirwa kusheedzwa kuti dzivewo pakati pevayananisi. “Masangano eSADC neAfrican Union anofanira kuudzwavo. Kana vasimo munhaurirano idzi, hazvigone kuti zvifambe,: Doctor Masiya vakaudza Studio 7. Bato reMDC riri kuramba kutambira VaMnangagwa semutunagmiriri wenyika richiti havana kusarudzwa nevanhu kunyznge hazvo dare reConstitutional Court rakati ndivo vakakunda musarudzo. Ukuwo VaMnangagwa vari kuramba vakatsika madziro vachiti MDC inofanirwa kuvacherechedza semutungamiri wenyika kana ichida kuti paite nhaurirano. No media source currently available
title: Makereke Anoti Acharamba Achitsvaga Nzira Dzekuti VaMnangagwa naVaChamisa Vataurirane

text: Mutungamiri webato rinopikisa reMDC Alliance VaNelson Chamisa vari kushora zvikuru hurumende nekusunga mutevedzeri wasachigaro webato iri VaJob Sikhala, meya weguta reHarare akamiswa basa VaJacob Mafume uye mutori wenhau VaHopewell Chin’ono nevamwe vachiti izvi hazvifanire kuitwa apo vanhu vari kuyedza kurwisa kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. VaChamisa vanoti zvekusunga vanopikisa inzira yekuda kuvasvokosva uye kuda kuti vakandwe mumajeri umo musina kumira zvakanaka parizvino nenyaya yechirwere cheCovid-19. Asi vati vacharamba vakamira semusambangwena kusvika nyika yave nehutongo hwejekerere vachiita izvi murunyararo. VaSikhala avo vari mutirongo kuHarare Central Police Station pamwe naChin’ono vari kupomerwa mhosva yekugovera vamwe vhidhiyo yaiti mumwe mupurisa ainge arova mumwe mwana akafa muHarare amai vake vachinzi vainge vatyora mutemo wekuti vanhu vagare mudzimba. Mapurisa anoti mwana uyu haana kufa kunyangwe hake akarohwa nemagirazi ewindscreen yekombi payakarohwa nemboma yemupurisa uyu. Gurukota rezvemukati menyika VaKazembe Kazembe vanoti tsika yekuputsa mawindscreen inofanira kumiswa vachikurudzira vanhu kuti vagare mudzimba. VaMafume vanonzi vari kurwara vari mujeri umo muri kunzi mune vanhu vakawandisa. No media source currently available
title: VaChamisa Voshora Kusungwa kwaVaSikhala, VaMafume naVaChin'ono Vachiti Hurumende Iri Kuvasvokosva

text: Panguva iyo vemapato anopikisa vari kurwisa kuti mitemo yesarudzo ivandudzwe sarudzo dzisati dzaitwa, uye kuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika zvibvumidzwe kuvhota zviri munyika dzazvigere, veZanu PF vari kuti zvirango zvakatemerwa vamwe vakuru mubato iri zvinofanirwa kutangawo zvabviswa. Munyori anoona nezvemitemo muZanu PF, VaMunyaradzi Paul Mangwana, vanoti kubviswa kwezvirango kunobatsira bato ravo kuti rikwanise kuenda kunyika dzekumawirira kunotsvaga rutsigiro, kana vari kunze vakabvumidzwa kuvhota vari kwavari. VaMangwana vanoti seZanu PF, vakatozvisa vemapato anopikisa kuti havasi kuzobvumidza vari kunze kwenyika kuvhota kana zvirango zvisati zvabviswa. Asi munyori mukuru weMDC-T, VaDouglas Mwonzora, vanoti Zanu PF ndiyo yakakoka zvirango kuburikidza nekutonga kwayo nedemo, saka ndiyo inofanirwa kuona kuti yagadzirisa zvakamboshevedza zvirango izvi. Vanoti vari kudawo kuti vazive kuti kuchadhindwa mapepa mangani ekuvhotesa, achadhindwa nani, uye kuti vabvumidzwe kuvepo paanodhindwa. VaMwonzora vanotiwo semapato anopikisa, vari kuda kuti mauto nevasori vanonzi vari kushanda kuZimbabwe Electoral Commission vamiswe basa, uye ZEC ibvumidze kuongororwa kwegwaro revavhoti nevari kunze kwekomisheni iyi, kwete kuti izviongorore basa rayo. No media source currently available
title: Zanu PF Inoti Zvirango Ngazvibviswe Vari Kunze Vasati Vabvimudzwa Kuvhota

text: Zimbabwe yaita mangange nhasi nemusi weSvondo neCongo Brazaville mumutambo wemakundano eAfrica Nations Cup. Mutambo uyu watambirwa kuLibreville, guta guru renyika iyi. Zimbabwe iri muGroup G pamwe chete neDR Congo neLiberia. Liberia neDRC dzakaitawo mangange 1-1 zvakasiya Zimbabwe iri panhongonya. Zvikwata zviviri zvinenge zviri pamusoro ndizvo zvichaenda kumakwikwi aya kuCameroon gore rinouya. Zimbabwe neDRC dzine mapoinzi mana mushure memutambo miviri ukuwo Liberia neCongo Brazzavile dziine poindi imwe chete.
title: Zimbabwe Yoramba Iri paNhongonya yeGroup G muAfrica Nations Cup

text: Dare repamusoro reHigh Court rapa mutongo unomisa danho rakanga ratorwa neHealth Services Board, rekurambidza mutungamiri wesangano ravanamukoti reZimbabwe Nurses Association, VaEnock Dongo, kumirira vakoti munhaurirano dzemihoro dzinoitwa pasi peHealth Services Bipartite Negotiating Panel. Health Services Board yakanga yatora danho iri ichipa chikonzero chekuti VaDongo, avo vaimboshanda semukoti pachipatara cheSally Mugabe muHarare, vakanga vasisiri mushandi wehurumende mushure mekunge vasiya basa. Asi sangano reZimbabwe Nurses Association pamwechete naivo VaDongo vakapikisa danho iri kuburikidza nekuenda kudare reHigh Court vachiti danho iri rakanga rakanangana nekunyaradza VaDongo, avo vakanga vaendesa mushandirwi kumatare mune imwe nyaya vachipikisa danho rekurambidza mashandiro evakoti aivepo nguvayo akanga akasununguka, kana kuti flexible hours. Vachipa mutongo wavo, mutongi wedare repamusoro, Justice Webster Chinamora, vanonzi vati hapana mutemo unorambidza vakoti kumirirwa munhaurirano nemutungamiri avanoda, zvisineyi nekuti anoshanda muhurumende here kana kuti kwete. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata gweta reHealth Services Board, VaChitekuteku avo vabva kuhofisi yegweta guru renyika, kana kuti kwaAttorney-General. Asi VaDongo, avo vanga vachimirirwa mudare naVaTinotenda Matonhodze vekambani yemagweta yeMatizanadzo and Warhurst, vanoti vanotambira nemufaro mukuru mutongo wedare repamusoro uyu, sezvo wasimbisa mashandiro avo mukumirira vakoti. No media source currently available
title: Dare rePamusoro Rinomisa Zvakaitwa neHealth Services Board Kuna VaDongo.

text: Kubva mugore ra 2017, China iri kuenderera mberi nekushungurudza kwayo vanhu verudzi rwechi Uyghur, vechi Kyrgyz, pamwe chete nevechitendero chechi Moslem mudunhu reXinjiang. Izvi zvinotevera kugadzwa muna 2016, kwa VaChen Quanguo, senhengo yedare rePolitburo, pamusoro pekuve kwavo munyori mukuru webato re Communist Party mudunhu rinofanirwa kuzvitonga re Xinjiang Uyghur, uko vari mukuru zvekare we masangano ari pasi pehurumende yeChina. Kubva pavakasvika, VaChen Quanguo, vakatanga kusora vanhu, kuvavharira muhusungwa pamwe nekuvamanikidza kudzidza gwara rebato riri kutonga. Zvese izvi vaizviita vakanyanya kunangana nevanhu verudzi rwechi Uyghur nevatendi vemakereki madiki. Panguva ino, mazana nemazana evanhu vechiUyghur, vechiKyrgyz nevechitendero chechi Moslem vari muhusungwa pamusoro pezvinhu zvisina maturo, zvakaita sekuregera ndebvu dzichikura, kana kuramba kunwa hwahwa. Hurumende yaVaDonald Trump muAmerica yakazvipira kuchengetedza kodzero dzevanhu kwese kwese. Nepamusana pekushungurudzwa vanhu kuri kuitwa uku, mapazi eAmerica anoona nezvemari, pamwe nerezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, akatemera zvirangopavakuru vanoona nezvekugadzikana mudunhu iri, VaChen Quanguo naVaWang Mingshan; mumwe wevakuru vebato muXinjiang, VaZhu Hailun; vaimbove mumwe wevakuru vaiona nezvekuchengetedzwa kwedunhu, VaHuo Liujun; vaimbove munyori webato mudunhu iri, VaSun Jinlong; uye nevaimbove mutevedzeri wemunyori mudunhu iri, VaPeng Jiarui. Bazi rezvemari muAmerica rakatemeravo zvirango pamakambani ehurumende paishandwa nevanhu ava, zvinoreva kuti havachabvumidzwa kupinda muAmerica uye mari dzemakambani aya dziri muAmerica, pamwe nenyika dzinodyidzana neAmerica, hadzichakwanisi kutorwa kana kushandiswa. America iri kurwira kuchengetedza kodzero dzevanhu veku China kupfuura nyika ipi zvayo. Gurukota reAmerica rinoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaMike Pompeo, vanoti kutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu kuri kuitwa neChinese Communist Party chitema chikuru chisati chambonekwa kwemakore mazhinji. “Hurumende yaVaTrump iri kutungamirira dzimwe nyika mukuranga China pamusoro pakudzvanyirira vanhu, kusunga vanhu, kuvavharira, kuvasora, kuvashandisa zvisina mubhadharo, pamwe nekuvamanikidza kusaita mhuri,” vanodaro VaPompeo. VaPompeo vatiwo America ichaenderera mberi ichitora matanho ekuranga vari kushungurudza pamwe nekudzvanyirira vanhu. No media source currently available
title: Mashoko Aya Anoburitsa Pamire America Pane Zviri Kuitika muChina.

text: Vamwe vagari vekuPenhalonga vopomera mugodhi weRedwing uri pasi pekambani yeMetallion Management Pvt Limited, mhosva yekusakoshesa hupenyu hwevanhu. Izvi zvinotevera kupfurwa kwevarume vaviri nevanochengetedza mugodhi uyu vachiuraya mumwe murume pamwe nekukuvadza mumwe mugari anonzi aiedza kubatsira shamwari yake yakanga yapfurwa. Vaviri ava vaipomerwa mhosva yekuchera goridhe mumunda wekambani iyi zvisiri pamutemo. Amai Violet Munorwei, mudzimai wemushakabvu VaTafadzwa Lewani vaudza Studio 7 kuti kubva zvaurawa murume wavo vakangowana mazana manomwe emadhora uye vanoti vakuru vemugodhi weRedwing havachadi zvehurukuro dzavaive vavimbisa. VaDavid Madzikatire ndemumwe wevakapfurwa musi waurawa VaLewani. VaMadzikatire vanoti vakapfurwa vaenda kunotora mushakabvu VaLewani avo vaive shamwari yavo. Kunyangwe zvazvo vakakuvara zvakaipisisa VaMadzikatire vanoti havana kana rubatsiro rwavakawana kubva kumugodhi weRedwing. Vaviri ava vanoti vave kuzoendesa mugodhi uyu kumatare edzimhosva kuti varipwe sezvo vakuru vemugodhi uyu vari kuramba kutaura navo. VaJacob Mafume vanova gweta rave kubatsira vaviri ava kuenda kumatare vanoti kuurawa nekushungurudzwa kwevanhu vanogara munharaunda mune zvicherwa kuri kuramba kuchikwirira nekudaro vachange vachibatsira vaviri ava kuti mimwe migodhi idzidze kukosha kwehupenyu. VaFarai Maguwu mukuru wesangano rakazvimiririra reCentre for Natural Resources Governance (CNRG), vari murwiri wekodzero dzevanogara kunowanikwa zviwanikwa vanoti makambani ari kuchera zvicherwa muZimbabwe ari kuregwa achiita madiro aJojina asi vachikonzera ndufu zhinji. Pavakanyorerwa tsamba nemagweta ekuti vachasungiswa nekutadza kubatsira mhuri mbiri idzi mushure mepfumvu yakakonzerwa nevanochengetedza mugodhi uyu, vakuru vekambani yeMetallion, inova murudzi wemugodhi weRedwing vakaramba kuti vane chekuita nevaviri ava kuburikidza netsamba iri mumaoko eStudio 7. VaCleton Matsika, avo vari kupomerwa mhosva yekuuraya VaLewani pamwe nevamwe vavo vanoti VaWilliam Mutuswa naVa Benedict Chikanda vari kupomerwa zvakare mhosva yekuda kuuraya VaMadzikatare, uye pari zvino vari kunze mushure mekubhadhara mari yechibatiso inoita zana remadhora pamunhu yakatarwa nedare. No media source currently available
title: Kambani yeMetallion Yopomerwa Mhosva yeKuramba Kuripa Vanhu Vakapfurwa Vachichera Goridhe muMinda yeRedwing

text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinoti nyaya yehuori hwatekeshera mukucherwa nekutengeswa kwegoridhe iri kupa kuti nyika irasikirwe nemari yakawanda zvopa kuti kugadzirisa hupfumi kurambe kuchinetsa. Vachitaura gore rapera apo vaishanyira makamba emapurisa muBulawayo, gurukota rinoona nezvekuchengetedza kwemukati menyika VaKazembe Kazembe vakati nyika inorasikirwa nemari inosvika bhiriyoni rimwe chete nemazana maviri emamiriyoni emadhora kana kuti US$1,2 billion pagore nekuda kwehuori mukutengeswa kwezvicherwa kunyanya goridhe. Asi sangano rakazvimirira reInternational Crisis Group rinoti Zimbabwe iri kurasikirwa nemari inosvika bhiriyoni rimwe chete nemazana mashanu emamiriyoni emadhora kana kuti US$1,5 billion pagore nekutengeswa kwegoridhe zvisiri pamutemo. VaKazembe vakavimbisa kuti vachatenga michina yekuona kuti hapana vanoburitsa goridhe munyika nemukoto zvikuru pamabhodha. Mashoko aya akatsinhirwawo nemutevedzeri wegurukota rezvemigodhi, VaPolite Kambamura, vaudza Studio 7 kuti hurumende ichasimbaradza mabhodha kuona kuti hapana vanobusitsa zvicherwa nemukoto. Asi kusungwa kwemutungamiri wesangano reZimbabwe Miners Federation, Muzvare Henrietta Rushwaya, negoridhe rinosvika makirogiramu matanhatu remari inosvika zviuru mazana matatu nemakumi matatu nezvitatu kana kuti US$333, 000 panhandare yeR.G Mugabe International muHarare uye kusungwa kwaVaTashinga Nyasha Masimire panhandare yendege yeOliver Tambo International kuSouth Africa negoridhe remari inosvika mamiriyoni gumi nerimwe kana kuti R11 million kunoratidza kuti dambudziko iri riri kuramba richikomba. Mukuru wesangano reCentre for Natural Resource and Governance, VaFarai Maguwu, vanoti hurumende haina kuzvipira kurwisa huori. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinoti zvinonetsa kugadzirisa zvinhu sezvo vari kuchera goridhe vachisanganisira vekuChina, vatungamiri vemauto, mapurisa nevakuru muhurumende. Mauto nemapurisa ane chitsama ari kuurayiwa mukurwira kana kurwisana nevari kumigodhi yegoridhe. Muna 2019, sangano reZimbabwe Peace Project rakatiwo vanhu zana nvashanu vakaurayiwa nevanochera goridhe vachizviti mashurugwi asi hapana vakawanda vakasungwa sezvo vakaponda vaitsigirwa nevakuru munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika. Asi VaKazembe vakazotumira mapurisa kuyedza kumisa kudeuka kweropa Vachipawo pfungwa dzavo nyanzvi munyaya dzezvemabhanga vari nhengo yeZanu-PF, VaGilbert Muponda, vati mapurisa an fanira kupihwa zvikwanisiro uye kudzidziswa basa rekuona kuti hapana vabuda munyika nezvicherwa zvisiri pamutemo. Nhengo yeAnti-Corruption Trust of Southern Africa, VaAlois Chaumba, vanoti zviri kuitika zvinokatyamadza zvikuru vachiti nyaya yehuori ichatora nguva yakareba kuigadzirisa kana pasina kuzvipira kwevatungamiri. Mukuru wesangano eYoung Miners Foundation, VaPayne Farai Kupfuwa, vati havo kunyangwe paine matambudziko, kuchera goridhe kwabatsira vechidiki vakawanda. Reserve Bank of Zimbabwe, RBZ, inoti huwandu hwegoridhe rakaendeswa kukambani inobvumidzwa kutenga goridhe yeFidelity Printers and Refiners hwakadzikira gore rapera nezvikamu makumi matatu nechimwe kubva muzana kusvika pamatani gumi nemapfumbamwe chete sezvo vanochera goridhe vachiita zvekukorokoza vasina kuunza goridhe raitarisirwa. Huwandu hwegoridhe riri kutengeswa zviri pamutemo huri kuramba huchiderera kubva muna 2018 apo pakatengeswa matani makumi matatu nematatu neanoraudzira. Vakawanda vanochera goridhe ava vanoti kunonoka kubhadharwa mari neFidelity Printers and Rifenery kuri kupa kuti vatengese goridhe pamukoto. Mukuzeyedza kuti vanotengesa goridhe vawane mari dzavo nenguva, RBZ yakazivisa kuti ichapatsanura Fidelity Printers and Refiners kuitira kuti vanochera goridhe vakwanise kuve nechekuita nekutengeswa kwaro nekutenga zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana zvekambani iyi. No media source currently available
title: Zimbabwe Yoramba Ichirasikirwa neMari Inodarika Bhiriyoni Imwe Chete reMadhora paGore neNyaya yeHuori paGoridhe

text:
Vana vevaimbove mutungamiri wenyika, muchakabvu Robert Mugabe, vakazivisa matare kuti vari kupikisa mutongo wakapihwa naVaStanley Wurayayi Mhondoro, vanove Mambo Zvimba kuti vari kupikisa mutongo wavakapa wekuti VaMugabe vafukunyurwe kuitira kuti vavigwe kumarinda anovigwa magamba eHeroes Acre.

Vana vanoti Bona Mutsahuni Mugabe, Bellarmine Chatunga Mugabe
naTinotenda Robert Mugabe vakanyorera dare ramejasitiriti muChinhoyi
kuti vari kupikisana nemutongo waMambo Zvimba. Mugwaro rekuzivisa matare kana kuti Notice of Appeal rakadhindwa nezuro vana vaVaMugabe vanoti Mambo Zvimba vakaita zvisiri pamutemo
nekunzwa nyaya iyi yainge yaunzwa naVaTinos Manongovere. Gweta revana vaVaMugabe, VaFungai Chimwamurombe, vabvuma kuti ndivo vari kufambisa nyaya yaVaMugabe. Vati vari kupikisa mutongo vachiti Mambo Zvimba havaifanirwa kunzwa nyaya yakadai sezvo vasina masimba acho uye hurumende yakabatsira mukuvigwa kwaVaMugabe.

VaChimwamurombe vati nyaya iyi ichanzwikwa muChinhoyi musi wa29 Chikumi. Taedza kubata Mambo Zvimba kuti tinzwe kuti vachaita sei sezvo mutongo
wavo wave kupikiswa asi munhu adavira mbozhanhare yavo asina kuda
kuzivikanwa, ati Mambo havana chekutaura sezvo vasiri ivo vakazvipa
nyaya achiti tibate mumhan’ari VaManongovere avo vanga vasingadavire
mbozhanhare yavo. VaManongovere vakamhan’arira Amai Grace Mugabe kudare raMambo vachivapomera mhosva yekuti vainge vaviga VaMugabe pamba pavo izvo
zvisingabvumirwe netsika yemaZvimba. Mambo Zvimba vakawana Amai Mugabe vaine mhosva ndokupa mutongo wekuti varipe matsiru mashanu nesheshe yembudzi, uye kuti mutumbi waVaMugabe ufukunurwe kuitira kuti uvigwe kuNational Heroes Acre. No media source currently available
title: Mambo Zvimba Vaendeswa kuMatare neMhuri yaVaMugabe

text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vadzokorora mashoko avo ekuti munyika hamuna dambudziko, vachiti mashoko ekuti munyika mune dambudziko ari kufambiswa pamadandemutande akanangana nekuzvidza kana kushoropodza hurumende yavo. Vachitaura pamusangano wevakakwikwidza musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika wePolitical Actors Dialogue, kana kuti POLAD wechina waitirwa kumuzinda wavo weState House, VaMnangagwa vatiwo hurongwa hwekugoverwa kwevhu kuvatema hahufi hwakashandurwa vatema vachizotorerwa zvakare minda yavo. Mutungamiri wenyika vatiwo zviri kuitika iye zvino zvekubhadhara vachena vakatorerwa minda yavo kuzadzisa zviri mubumbiro remitemo yenyika. VaMnangagwa vatorawo mukana uyu kukoka vatungamiri vemapato anopikisa vasati vapinda muPOLAD kuti vatorewo mukana wekupinda muboka iri kuitira kuti vapewo mazano avo mukugadzirisa nyika, kwete kuti vataure vari kunze. Panyaya yekuti munyika hamuna dambudziko, mashoko emutungamiri wenyika aya anogona kutsamwisa vakawanda, zvikuru vanopikisa hurumende nevanorwira kodzero dzevanhu, avo vari kuchema kuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka munyika. Vanoti munyika hamuna kugadzikana vanoti nyaya dzekodzero dzevanhu, dzematongerwo enyika, pamwe nedzehupfumi ndezvimwe zvezvinhu zvinofanirwa kugadziriswa nekukasika. Kusagadzikana kwezvinhu uku ndiko kwasvitsa kuti mutungamiri weSouth Africa, VaCyril Ramaphosa varonge kutumira chikwata chenhengo dzebato ravo reANC kuti chinzwisise kuti zvinhu zvakamira sei munyika. Chikwata ichi chiri kutarisirwa munyika chero nguva, uye chinotarisirwa kuti chichasangana nemapato anopikisa, vemakereke pamwe nevemasangano akazvimirira. Chikwata chakambotumwa munyika naVaRamaphosa chakangosangana naVaMnangagwa chete chakadzokera chisina kusangana nevanopikisa. Nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika vachishanda vakazvimirira, VaRejoice Ngwenya, vanoti kana VaMnangagwa vasiri kuona kuti munyika mune matambudziko hazvirevi kuti hamuna matambudziko. VaNgwenya vanoti mutungamiri wenyika anofanirwa kunzwa kuchema kuri kuita vanhu nekusungwa, kupambwa, kushaya chekudya pamwe nemamwe mapoka ose ari kuti munyika mune dambudziko votora matanho, kwete kungoramba vachiti zvinhu zvakagadzikana. No media source currently available
title: Mutungamiri weNyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, Vanodzokorora Kuti Munyika Hamuna Matambudziko

text: Mutungamiri weMDCT, VaMorgan Tsvangirai, vanoti vachaita misangano mumatunhlu ose enyika yakanangana nekubvuunza veruzhinji pavamire nenyaya yehurongwa hwekuwumbwa kwemubatanidzwa wemapato pamberi pesarudzo dzegore rinouya. VaTsvangirai vakatarisirwa kuparura misangano iyi neChishanu mudunhu reMatabelaland South vasati vaenda kuMatabeland North, Bulawayo, Masvingo pamwe nemamwe matunhu ose munyika. Mashoko aburitswa nemutauriri waVaTsvangirai, VaLuke Tamborinyoka, anoti kunyange komiti yepamusoro yebato ravo ye National Council yakatambira hwaro hwekuwumbwa kwemubatanidzwa wepato anopikisa pamberi pesarudzo, VaTsvangirai vanoda kupa mukana kuvatsigiri vavo wekupa pfungwa dzavo panyaya yemubatanidzwa uyu. Mumwe mugari wemuHarare uye ari mutsigiri webato reZimbabwe People First, Amai Leonorah Matutu, vanoti vanotsigira danho riri kutorwa naVaTsvangirai iri. Asi Amai Virginia Nhepure vanogara mumusha weWarren Park muno muHarare vaudza Studio 7 kuti chinhu chakanaka kuti vatungamiriri vatange vaenda kuvanhu kunovabvunza zvavanoda kuti zviitwe vasati vatora matanho ane chekuita neramangwana ravo. Kunyange hazvo vanhu vakawanda vachiti mapato anopikisa anofanira kupinda musarudzo idzi akabatana, pane vamwe vatsigiri veMDCT vakaita saMuzvare Kundai Vambe vanoti VaTsvangirai vanofanira kupinda musarudzo idzi vari vega sezvo vachiti vane mukana wakakura kwazvo wekukunda musarudzo idzi vari vega. MDC-T inoti yakakunda musarudzo dzose dzapfuura asi iri kupomera mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, nebato ravo reZanu PF, mhosva yekubirira musarudzo idzi. Nekune rumwe rutivi, Zanu PF inotiwo yakakunda musarudzo idzi zviri pachena. Mapato anopikisa anoti nhaurirano dzekuwumba mubatanidzwa pamberi pesarudzo dzegore rinouya dzave pachinhanho chepamusoro asi vanoziva nezviri kuitika munhaurirano idzi vanoti vatungamiri vemapato anopikisa aya vari kuita makakatanwa nekuti achange achitungamirira mubatanidzwa uyu ndiyani. Zvichakadaro, dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika dzinoti Zanu PF inogona kuramba iri muhutongi kana mapato anopikisa akapinda musarudzo dzegore rinouya akapatsurana. No media source currently available
title: VaTsvangirai Vopinda Muvanhu Vachinzwa Zvavanofunga Pamusoro peMubatanidzwa Musarudzo

text: Mwaka wekutengeswa kwefodya uri kutarisirwa kutanga neChitatu misika yefodya ichivhurwa, ukuwo varimi vachiti vanotarisira mutengo unovagutsa pamwe nekuti vazokwanisawo kugadzirira kudzoka mumunda mwaka unotevera. Mutungamiri werimwe sanganonrinomirira varimi, reZimbabwe Integrated Commerciial Farmers’ Union, uye varimi murimi kuMacheke, Amai Maivepi Jiti, vanoti mwaka nemwaka varimi vanenge vachingochema nemutengo unozotengwa nawo fodya yavo, izvo zvinozoita kuti vakundikane kudzora mari dzavanenge vakashandisa, uye kutengawo zvikwanisiro zvekuzorima nazvo mwaka unotevera. Amai Jiti vanoti nekuda kwekunaya zvakanaka kwemvura mwaka uno vanotarisirawo goho rakanaka richazopa varimi mutengo wakanaka. Asi vanokurudzira kuti mabhanga aiswe munzvimbo dzinorerukira varimi, uye kuti vasazonetseka kuwana mari dzavo kumabhanga pavanenge vodzida. Gurukota rezvekurima, VaAnxious Masuka, vanoti mwaka uno varimi vefodya vachawana zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana zvemari iri mari yekunze uye zvikamu makumi mana kubva muzana iri mari yemunyika yema RTGS. Mashoko aVaMasuka aya anouya apo varimi vefodya vakawanda vachinzi vanga vasiri kuziva kuti vachabhadharwa sei mukutengeswa kwefodya gore rino. Ukuwo, mutevedzeri wavo, VaVangelis Haritatos svondo rapera vakaudza bepanhau reThe Herald kuti bazi ravo rakanga ragutsikana negadziriro yemisika yefodya, uye kutevera kwavo mitemo yekudzivirira kupararira kweCovid-19. Amai Jiti vari kuyambirawo varimi kuti vangwarire kuchirwere cheCovid-19, uye kuti vasafamba usiku sezvo izvi zvikwezva mbavha. No media source currently available
title: Mwaka weKutengeswa kweFodya Wotarisirwa Kutanga neChitatu Varimi Vachitarisira Mutengo Unogutsa

text: Vari kunze kwenyika vanoti mamiriro ezvinhu munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika pamwe nehupfumi kuZimbabwe ari kuvakanganisawo zvakanyanya, sezvo zvichiguma zvowedzera mitoro iri pamapfudzi avo wekuriritira mhuri. Vanhu ava vanoti kuoma kwezvinhu zvikuru munyaya dzeupfumi kuri kuita kuti hama neshamwari dziri kumusha dzitadze kuita zvinhu zvakawanda. Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chiri kunze kwenyika, VaSolomon Chikowero, avo vari muJohannesburg, South Africa, vanoti kusagadzikanawo kwezvinhu munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika kuri kuita kuti vamwe vanhu vatadze kusununguka munyika. VaChikowero, avo vanove sachigaro wesangano reGlobal Zimbabwe Forum, vanoti nhamo yevari kumusha yakafanana neya amai vatsva kumusana, mwana achitsva dumbu. “Hurumende inofanirwa kucherechedza mune zvese vana vayo vari kunze kwenyika, kwete kungotida pamari yedu chete,” VaChikowero vanodaro. Vanoti chave kudiwa pari zvino ndechekuti vari kunze kwenyika vagare pasi nehurumende vawirirane panyaya dzakati kuti dziri kubata vari kunze dzakaita seyekuve chizvarwa chekune imwe nyika usingaraisikirwi nekodzero dzako dzekuve chizvarwa cheZimbabwe, kukwanisa kuvhota, nezvimwe zvakadaro. No media source currently available
title: Vari Kunze kweNyika Voremerwawo neMamiriro Akaita Zvinhu Munyika

text: Zimbabwe yakarukurwa nezvayo neChina muWashington DC, pasi pechirongwa cheGLobal Press Influencers Series. Musangano uyu waive wekuzeya zviri kuitika muZimbabwe panguva iyo nyika iri kugadzirira kuita sarudzo. Vachitaura pamusangano uyu, mukuru weZimbabwe Diaspora for Democracy, Va Charles Mutama, vakati sangano ravo riri kushanda zvakasimba nechinangwa chekuti hurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa inzwisise zvakakoshera kuremekedza kodzero dzevanhu dzakachengetedzwa mubumbiro remitemo yenyika. VaMutama vakati zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika zvine kodzero dzekuvhota musarudzo zviri munyika madziri, asi hurumende haasi kuratidza chido chekuti izvi zviitike. Achitaurawo pamusangano uyu, mutori wenhau anoshanda neGlobal Press, Linda Mujuru, akatiwo zvinhu hazvina kunyatsojeka muZimbabwe, asi semauonero ake, mapato anopikisa akakunda musarudzo dzichaitwa gore rino, mauto anogona kupindira sezvaakaita gore rapera apo akabvisa pachigaro vaive mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe. Mumwe mutori wenhau anoshandira muNew York, Wadzanayi Mhute, akatiwo vari kunze kwenyika vanoda kunovhota vanofanirwa kuenda kuZimbabwe kuti vanoita izvi sezvo mukana wekuvhotera kunze kwenyika usati waiswa nehurumende. Musangano wezuva rimwe chete uyu waive wekuzeya nzira dzingatorwe nezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe mukusarudza vamiriri vazvinoda pasi pedingindira rinoti Zimbabwe Take Action. Pane zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvakaendesa hurumende kumatare zvichida kuti matare amanikidze hurumende kuronga hurongwa hwekuti vari kunze kwenyika vakwanise kuvhota vari munzvimbo dzavari. Matarere haasati atura mutongo panyaya iyi. Kunyange hazvo Zimbabwe Exiles Forum yakamirira mutongo wayo panyaya yayakakwidza iyi, pane mumwe mutongo wakaitwa muna 2013 hurumende ikabvuma kuti inofanirwa kubvumidza vari kunze kwenyika kuvhota, asi ikati yakanga yakasungwa mbira dzakondo munyaya dzemari kuti ikwanise kuita basa rakadai kunze kwenyika. Izvi zvakatambirwa nedare sechichemo chinonzwikwa. No media source currently available  No media source currently available
title: Zimbabwe Yokurukurwa Pamusoro Payo muWashington DC

text: Zviuru nezvezviuru zvevanhu zvaratidzira mumaguta akasiyana siyana eAmerica zvichiratidzira kusafarira mutungamiri wenyika VaDonald Trump avo vakasvika gore vari muhofisi nemusi weMugovera. Asi vatsigiri vaVaTrump vari kushora vanhu vari kuratidzira ava vachiti havana kufara nekuti Amai Hillary Clinton vemaDemocrats avo vaitsigira musarudzo dzemutungamiri wenyika vakakundwa. Mukuru weSangano reCentre for the Study of Presidency and Congress vakaudza VaDan Mahafee Voice of America kuti muAmerica mune kunetsana kwakanyanya pakati pemaRepublicans nemaDemocrats. Vanoti kusawirirana uku kwanyanyisa pasi pehutongo hwaVaTrump. Ongororo yakaitwa neWashington Post/ ABC News svondo rino inoratidza kuti munhoroondo yeAmerica VaTrump ndivo mutungamiri wenyika asingadiwe nevanhu vakawandisa. Vanhu makumi matatu nemasere kubva muzana ndivo vanoti VaTrump vari kuita basa rakanaka. Kunyangwe vamwe vatsigiri vavo vachitendawo kuti VaTrump havana kukodzera kutungamira, vamwe vacho vakaita saVaEugene Bourque vekuColarado vanoti vano vatsigira nekuti vanorwira kodzero dzevechiKristu uye dzevemabhizimisi. Mutauriri waVaTrump Amai Sarah Huckabee Sanders vachitaura paGeorge Washington University muWashington DC vakati kunyangwe hazvo VaTrump vachidiwa nevanhu vashoma munhoroondo yevatungamiri venyika yeAmerica, zviri nani nekuti vatori nevakavanda vane chivimbo chavo kudarika dare reCongress. Amai Huckabee Sanders vanoti chinopa kuti VaTrump vasadiwe nevanhu vakawanda inyaya yevatori venhau vanonyora nhau dzakaipa pamusoro pavo. Muzvinafundo Theodore Glasser vepaStanford University vanoti VaTrump vanoshandisa dandemutande reTwitter nenyaya yekuti havafarire zvinonyorwa nemapepanhau. Vanoti havasati vamboona mutungamiri wenyika akarimirana kumuganhu nevatori venhau saVaTrump. Ko Zvii Zvakaitwa naVaTrump Vachitungamira Nyika? Vebato remaRepublicans vanoti VaTrump vakabudirira kusarudza mutongi wedare reSenate anokoshesa zvido zvebato ravo. Vanotiwo vakabudirira kugadzirisa nyaya yekuvandudza nyaya yemitero kana kuti Tax reform. Asi Amai Sarah Huckerbee Sanders mutauriri waVaTrump vanoti vakabudirirawo mukusimbaradza nyaya dzekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika dzakaita seJapan neChina kuti dzitsiurewo North Korea iyo inogara ichinetsana neAmerica nenyaya dzezvombo zvemhando yenuclear. VaTrump vanotiwo paTwitter vabudirira kupa kuti hupfumi hwenyika hunge hwakasimba vakawanda vachikwanisa kuwana mabasa.
title: VaDonald Trump Vosvika Gore Vachitungamira Nyika yeAmerica

text: Varairidzi vakawanda vanonzi havana kuenda kumabasa neChipiri vachiti havana mari dzekufambisa pamwe nezvikwanisiro, pazuva repiri zvichitevera kuvhurwa kwezvikoro neMuvhuro. Varairidzi vari kuti vanoda kuti vapiwe mihoro yavo iri mumadhora ekuAmerica, uye kuti vawaniswe zvikwanisiro zvekuzvidzivirira kubva kuchirwere cheCovid-19. Mutungamiri wesangano revarairidzi vekumaruwa, reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaObert Masaraure, vanoti zvikamu makumi mapfumbamwe nezvitanhatu kubva muzana zvenhengo dzavo dzinosvika zviuru zvitanhatu nemazana mashanu ane imwe, hazvina kuenda kumabasa. VaMasaraure vanoti ongororo yaitwa nesangano ravo inoratidza kuti zvikoro zviri mumatunhu anoti Mashonaland East, Matabeleland North neMatabeleland South ndizvo zvanyanya kusangana nedambudziko rekushaya varairidzi. No media source currently available Munyori werimwe sangano revarairidzi, reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaRaymond Majongwe, vanotiwo vanofadzwa nekubatana kwaita varairidzi rwendo rwuno zvekuti vataure nezwi rimwe chete, rekuti havasi kukwanisa kuenda kumabasa nekuti havana mari. VaMajongwe vanoti vane tarisiro yekuti kubva neChitatu varairidzi vagare pasi vatsvage nzira dzekuti vasangane nehurumende kugadzirisa dambudziko iri.
