Munyori mukuru weZimbabwe National Teachers Association, VaTapson Nganunu Sibanda, vaudzawo Studio 7 kuti nhengo dzavo dzingangosvika kuzvikamu makumi masere kubva muzana hadzina kuenda kumabasa nekuti hadzina zvikwanisiro. Asi gurukota rezvedzidzo, Ambassador Cain Mathema, vaudza Studio 7 kuti pamire hurumende ndepekuti zvikoro zvakavhurwa neMuvhuro, uye varairidzi vari kuenda kumabasa. No media source currently available
title: Varairidzi Vanotadza Kuenda Kubasa Muzuva Repiri Zvikoro Zvavhurwa

text: Mumwe munyori wemabhuku anobva kuZimbabwe asi achishandira muguta reGaborone muBotswana semudzidzisi wevana vakaremara, Amai Sarah Mude Mberengo, vanoti chido chekuunza shanduko muhupenyu hwevanhu ndicho chakaita kuti vatange kunyora mabhuku. Amai Mberengo, avo vakaberekwa kuZhombe mudunhu reMidlands makore makumi mashanu nematanhatu apfuura, vanoti chido chavo chekufadza vana nengano ndicho chakaita kuti vatange kunyora mabhuku vachikurudzirwawo nekumoma pamwewo murume wavo. Vanoti mabhuku avo maviri ekutanga anoti A Means To An End nerimwe rinonzi Such Is Life akanyorwa nechirungu ndookutsikiswa nnekambani rekuAmerica ine mukurumbira mukutsikisa yeAmazon. Sezvo kuverenga kuchipa vanhu masimba, Amai Mberengo, avo vanova mudzidzisi pachikoro cheAl-Nur International Primary School muGaborone, vaudza Studio7 parunhare kuti vakatangawo kunyora mabhuku nerurimi rwaamai kuitira kukurudzira madzimai nevamwe vanorarama muhurombo. Pari zvino, Amai Mberengo vanyora mabhuku matatu nerurimi rwechiShona asi rimwe chete rinonzi Ndoziya Nenzara ndiro ratsikiswa parizvino. Amai Mberengo, avo vane vanasikana vana nevazukurusikana vaviri, vanoti vanhu vazhinji kunyanya madzimai vanopererwa netariro kana vachirarama hupenyu hwekunonga svosve nemuromo vachiti shuviro yavo kuona mabhuku avo achishandura hupenyu hwevanhu. Amai Mberengo vanoti havo chishuwo chavo kukurudzira vakawanda kuti vatange tsika yekuverenga mabhuku. No media source currently available
title: Mumwe Mudzimai wekuZimbabwe Ari muBotswana Onyora Mabhuku Kusimudzira Vamwe

text: Masangano evashandi ari kuramba achiratidza kusafara kwawo nemutongo wakapa masimba vashandirwi kuti vadzinge vashandi vavo kana vangovapa zviziviso zvemwedzi mitatu chete. Rimwe sangano revashandi, reCongress of Zimbabwe Trade Unions, COZITU, rasvitsa magwaro enyunyuto mazana matatu nemakumi mashanu kunhengo dzeparamende. Ukuwo Zimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, ZCTU, yakazivisawo kuti ichapinda mumigwagwa mumaguta mashanu makuru emunyika nemusi weMugovera senzira yekuratidza kusafara nezviri kuitika uye kuti hurumende ikasike kutora matanho. Nekune rimwe divi, bato reZanu PF rakazivisa kuti hurumende yave kutora matanho ekugadzirisa dambudziko iri kunyange hazvo ichinzi yakaudza makambani ari pasi payo kuti agumure vamwe vashandi. Vachitaura parutivi pemusangano wePolitiburo yebato ravo reZanu PF nemusi weChitatu, mutauriri webato iri, VaSimon Khaya-Moyo, vakati dare remakurukota rakatambira kurudziro yekuti mutemo wezvemabasa uyu uvandudzwe senzira yekudzivirira vashandi nevashandirwi pamwe chete. VaMoyo vakati bato ravo rinotarisira kuti mutemo uyu uchavandudzwa nekukasika kuitira kudzivirira vashandi avo vari kuoneswa chitsvuku nevashandirwi kubva pakaturwa mutongo nedare reSupreme Court mwedzi wapera. Asi mutauriri weMDC T, VaObert Gutu, vanoti hurumende yeZanu PF ndiyo yakonzeresa matambudziko ose aya nekuda kwekutadza kutonga kwayo. VaGutu vanoti kuti mutemo uyu uvandudzwe unofanirwa kuzopinda mudare reparamende, danho ravanoti rinogona kutora nguva yakareba, panguva iyo vashandi vanenge vachiramba vachidzingwa mabasa. Vamwewo vanoti bato reMDC rakaumbwa kubva muvashandi, asi hapana zvikuru zvarati raita kuratidzawo kuti riri kumira nevashandi pakuchema kwavo. Asi VaGutu vanodzivirira bato ravo vachiti riri kuita zvakwanda kuedza kumanikidza shanduko yemutemo uyu, zvinosanganisira kusimudza nhaurirano mudare reparamende. Nhengo yeZanu PF Central Committee uye vachimirira Pelandaba-Mpopoma mudare reparamende, VaJoseph Tshuma, vanoti bato ravo riri kushanda zvakasimba kudzivirira matambudziko akatarisana nevashandi aya, sezvo pasina bato rezvematongerwo enyika ringada kuona vanhu vachazorivhotera vachitambura. VaTshuma vanoti bato reMDC ndiro rinofanirwa kunopiwa mhosva iyi sezvo riri iro rakanokumbira zvirango kunyika dzekumawirira. Vanoti ino haichisiri nguva yekuti vemapato vaswere vachinongedzana asi kuti vanofanirwa kuchishanda pamwe chete kuitira kuti vagadzirise matambudziko aya. No media source currently available
title: Vashandi Voramba Vachishushikana neMutongo weKudzingwa Basa

text: Chirongwa chesangano reWorld Food Programme(WFP) chekubatsira vanoshaiwa nemari yechikafu mudhorobha reMasvingo nemamwe che "Urban Food Security and Resilience", chiri kutambirwa nemhuri dzinodarika zvuru gumi dzinoti dzanunurwa murushava-shava rwenzara iyo yakawedzerwa nedenda re Covid-19. Mutauriri we WFP, munyika, Muzvare Clare Nevile, vati chirongwa ichi chakapaururwa mushure mekuona kuti vamwe vagari vemu madhorobha vari kuyuvira nenzara nekuda kwe kushaikwa kwe mari yechikafu zvichikonzerwa ne mamiriro ehupfumi hwenyika uye zvichiwedzerwa nedenda re Covid-19. Muzvare Nevile, vati pasi pe chirongwa ichi munhu wega wega mumhuri anopuwa mari inosvika madhora gumi nemaviri eku America, asi iri pakadhi rinozotengeswa muzvitoro zvakasarudzwa ne sangano ravo. Vagari vari pasi pechirongwa ichi vanoti nenyaya yekushaikwa kwechikafu nekuoma kwehupenyu, pamwe nenyaya yeCovid vakange vave kutambura zvikuru, asi chirongwa ichi chakazovanunura. Amai Janet Mukwendi, vemumusha weMucheke muward one, vanoti chirongwa ichi chakauya panguva yakanaka sezvo vange vave kushaya chekubata apo mabasa avo akavharwa neCovid-19. Chirongwa ichi chinobatsira avo vanotambura vasina nzira dzekuwana mari kuti vararamise mhuri dzavo uye vakaremara mudhorobha rose. Mhuri dzine vanhu vanosvika gumi dzinowana mari inopfuura zana remadhora ekuAmerica, izvo zviri kuita kuti vawane raramo yakanaka sezvo vachitenga chikafu chakawanda kutopfuura vashandi vehurumende. VaMoses Rutombo, vakaremara, uye vane vana vapfumbamwe, nemudzimayi ndevamwe vari kuwana mari inopfuura zana vachiti chirongwa ichi chakavabudisa munzara. Vagari ava vanopuwa mari iyi mwedzi woga woga voenda muzvitoro zvakafanana neOk, Tsungayi Supermarket ne MSF inowanikwa kunzvimbo dzeve ruzhinji uko vanoenda nema khadi avo ekutengesa chikafu. Vamwe vanoti nenyaya yekushaikwa kwe chikafu vana vavo vakange vasisaende kuzvikoro asi ezvino vave kuenda kubudikidza nechirongwa ichi. Amai Rhoda Chinyasa, vanoti chikafu chavatenga nhasi chakawanda zvekuti mhuri yavo yakudya ichiguta kupfura zvavaiita. Kunze kwe kubatsira vagari vaitambura nenzara chirongwa ichi chiri kubatsirawo vemabhizmusi ezvitoro zvakasarudzwa avo vari kupura mari yekuAmerica nemusana. Mutevedzeri wemukuru webasa kuchitoro che MSF, Mai Chiedza Mhike, vanoti chitoro chavo chiri kurova mari inopfuura zviuru gumi zve madhora ekuAmerica izvo zvakudza bhizimusi ravo. Muzvare Nevil veWFP, vati kunze kwekubatsira mhuri zviururu gumi mudhorobha reMasvingo vanosangana nedambudziko rekushaiwa chikafu, sangano ravo riri kubatsira mhuri dzinosvika zviuru mazana matatu mumadhorobha akasiyana siyana munyika yose. No media source currently available
title: Vagari vemuGuta reMasvingo Vobatsirwa neChikafu neWFP

text: Nhengo nomwe dzesangano reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, Artuz, idzo dzakaramba nemusi weChishanu kubvisa faindi pamhosva yadziri kupomerwa nemapurisa, dzakamiswa nemusi weMugovera pamberi pedare ramajisitireti muHarare. Gweta renhengo idzi, Va Jeremiah Bamu, vanoti vasungwa ava, pamwe negweta ravo, Va Doug Coltart, nemumwewo asiri nhengo yeArtuz, vakabvisiswa mari yechibatiso inoita madhora makumi mashanu pamunhu, ndokubva vaburitswa muhusungwa kuitira kuti vatongwe vachibva kudzimba dzavo. VaBamu vanoti nhengo dzeArtuz idzi dziri kuramba mhosva yadziri kupomerwa izvo zvakapa kuti dzirambe kubvisa mari yefaindi kumapurisa epaHarare Central Police Station. Mutungamiri weArtuz, VaObert Musaraure, vakasungwa nevamwe vavo apo vairatidzira pamahofisi egurukota rezvemari, VaMthuli Ncube, vachiti vari kuchema nekufa kwaita mari dzavanotambira. Varairidzi ava vanoti mari yavaitambira hurumende isati yamisa kushandiswa kwemadhora ekuAmerica, yaiva mazana mashanu emadhora, asi iye zvino mari yavari kutambira iri yemaRTGS yaenzana nemadhora makumi matatu ekuAmerica izvo vanoti zviri kuvasiya vakaomerwa nehupenyu. Varairidzi ava vanoti vacharamba vachiratidzira musi wavatambiriswa mari dzavo kudzamara hurumende yagadzirisa zvichemo zvavo. Vanotiwo pasi pemitemo yenyika, havakumbire mvumo yemapurisa kana vachida kuratidzira. Mutauriri wemapurisa, VaPaul Nyathi, vakaudza Studio7 nemusi weChishanu kuti nhengo dzeArtuz dzainge dzasungwa mushure mukutyora mitemo yenyika, vakati mhosva yavari kupomerwa yaiva ye public nuisance. VaBamu vanoti kunze kwekusungwa, vanhu vavari kumirira ava vakarohwa zvakaipisisa nemapurisa, zvikuru VaColtart. No media source currently available
title: VaObert Masaraure neVamwe Vavo Vanobvisiswa Mari yeChibatiso

text: Gurukota rinoona nezvekuendeswa kwehupfumi kuvatema, VaPatrick Zhuwao, vanoti hurumende haisi kuzodududza pachirongwa chekuendesa hupfumi kuvatema icho chave kushorwa nevakawanda munyika. Gurukota rinoona nezvekuendeswa kwehupfumi kuvatema, VaPatrick Zhuwao, vanoti hurumende haisi kuzodududza pachirongwa chekuendesa hupfumi kuvatema icho chave kushorwa nevakawanda munyika. Dare remakurukota rinoti makambani ose evekunze panosvika musi wa 1 Kubvumbi anofanira kunge apa hurumende magwaro anoratidza kuti achaita sei kuzadzikisa mutemo wekuti vatema vawane zvikamu makumi mashanu nechimwe kubva muzana. Hurumende inonzi haisi kufarawo kuti hapana makambani ati aisa mari muhomwe yekupa vatema mukana wekuita hupfumi, kana kuti “empowerment levy” yakaumbwa naVaZhuwao yekuti vaise zvikamu gumi kubva muzana zvemari yavanowana pagore muhomwe iyi. Sachigaro wesangano reZimbabwe National Liberation War Veteran’s Association, VaChris Mutsvangwa, avo vakadzingwa kuva gurukota vanoti havatenderani nehurumende nedanho rekukanzura marezinesi. Bepanhau reNewsDay rinoti VaMutsvangwa vakati vakarwa hondo vacharwisa chirongwa ichi vachiti chinopfumisa vashoma. Sangano revashandi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions rakatonyorawo tsamba kuna VaZhuwao svondo rapera richiti chirongwa chavo kukokera mhepo wakatakura mamera mutswanda. IMF neWorld Bank, mabhanga anokweretesa mari pasi rose akatiwo mutemo wekuendesa hupfumi kuvatema uyu unofanira kugadziriswa nekuti uri kukanganisa vekunze vanoda kuvamba mabhizimisi munyika. VaZhuwawo vaudzawo Studio 7 kuti kana paine vasiri kunzwisisa chirongwa chavo vakasununguka kuuya kuhotera yeRainbow Towers uko vachange vachitaura nevemabhizimisi nemusi weChitatu. No media source currently available
title: VaZhuwao Vanoti Havadududze paMakambani Asiri Kutevera Mutemo

text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vasvika munyika nhasi vakashora zvikuru vanhu vange vachifambisa shoko rekuti vakashaya kana kuti varwara zvakaipisisa. Vaudza vatori venhau kuti sechave chigariro musoro wetsuro kushaya nyanga, pose pavanongobuda munyika vanobva vanzi vafa. Asi vaseka havo vachiti vakangosvika muZimbawe vanobva vamuka. VaMugabe vakasiira musangano weSADC summit kuSwaziland panzira vachibva vasimuka husiku vakananga kuDubai. Mutauriri wavo VaGeorge Charamba pavakabvunzwa nezverwendo urwu vakaramba kutaura nezvazvo neStudio 7. Asi vachitaura nevatori venhau nezuro kuBulawayo, gurukota rezvedzidzo yepamusoro Muzvinafundo Jonathan Moyo vakati VaMugabe vange vachitarisirwa kudzoka nhasi vozonotaura pamusangano wevechidiki webato ravo uri kuitwa muHarare. VaMugabe vaudza vatori venhau kuti vange vaenda kuDubai kunoona mwanakomana wavo Robert Junior ari kudzidza kunyika iyi, "Ndakanga ndaenda kunogadzirira mwana zvekuchikoro kwake." VaMugabe vatambirwa panhandare yendege nevatevedzeri vavo vaviri, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa naVaPhelekezela Mphoko nemamwe makurukota ehurumende.
title: Mutungamiri weNyika VaRobert Mugabe Vodzoka Kumusha

text: Dzimwe nhengo dzebato reMDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa dzakakundwa kana kurambidzwa kukwikwidza musarudzo dze primary elections dzinoti dziri kupinda musarudzo dzemwedzi unouya dzakazvimirira. Vatsigiri veMDC-T vanosvika gumi nevaviri vaswera pamapurisa muChinhoyi vachigadzirisa mapepa anoratidza kuti havasi vapari vemhosva sezvinodiwa nemutemo wesarudzo. Imwe nhengo iri kuda kukwikwidza yakazvimirira, VaNicholas Phiri vemuwadhi 9, vati bato ravo rakavarambidza kukwikwidza musarudzo pasina zvikonzero. VaPhiri vati sarudzo hadzina kuitwa mumawadhi akawanda nekuda kwekusarudzirwa vamiriri nevakuru vebato. Mumwe wevari kuda kukwikwidza vakazvimirira ndiVaTaperesa Shumba vekuWadhi 10, avo vati mapepa avo ekuda kukwikwidza avakaendesa kumahofisi ebato haana kupindurwa asi vanoti vakazoona paiswa munhu asiri wemuwadhi mavo. Patabvunza vamwe vavo kuti danho ravatora haripe here mukana kubato reZanu PF kuti rikunde , VaShumba vati hongu vachapa mukana kune mamwe mapato asi pachinzvimbo chemutungamiri wenyika vanenge vachitsigira VaChamisa. Imwe nhengo isina kuda kudomwa nezita inoti vari kutoda kupatsanura mavhoti kuitira kuti bato reMDC-T risakunde pamakanzura senzira yekunyadzisa hutungamiri hwedunhu. Mumwe mugari wemuwadhi 10, Amai Tracy Goko, vati vanotsigira nhengo dziri kuda kukwiwidza dzakazvimirira nekuti sarudzo dzemudunhu hadzina kufambiswa zvakanaka sezvo pasina jekerere yakaitwa. VaEdward Kadewere, avo vakabuda musarudzo ye primary yekutsvaga anomirira Chinhoyi muparamende vachiti pane chitsotsi chakawanda chaiitika, vati vachafunga nezvazvo vachiti nhengo dzakawanda dzinovatsigira dziri kuda kuti vakwikwidze vakazvimirira. Mutauriri weMDC-T mudunhu, VaBlessing Mandava, vanoti nhengo inenge yakwikwidza yakazvimirira inenge yazvidzinga mubato ravo. Muneimwewo nyaya nhengo dzebato reZanu PF muChinhoyi hadzisi kufara nekudzokororwa kechipiri kwesarudzo dzemuwadhi 7 ne 3 vachiti zvinoratidza kuti nhengo dziri kutsigirwa nevakuru vakuru dziri kukundwa. Wadhi yanetsa iwadhi 7 iyo inonzi Amai Prisca Mupfumira vari kuti sarudzo dzichadzokororwa kana kazana kusvikira VaCharles Mutisi vakunda. VaMutisi vakadashurwa naVaProsper Mavhunga kaviri uye vachaita dzimwe sarudzo dzechitatu neChina svondo rino. Sarudzo dze primary elections mumapato eZanu PF neMDC-T dzakaitwa zvine mhirizhonga mukati. Kune dzimwe nzvimbo pfuti dzakaridzwa vanhu vakaendesana kumapurisa. Mapato maviri aya ari kuita misangano yekuyananisa vakarovana nekutukana musarudzo idzi kuti vashande vose zvakanaka musarudzo dzichaitwa musi wa 30 Chikunguru. No media source currently available
title: Vamwe muMDC-T yaVaChamisa Voronga Kukwikwidza Vakazvimirira kuMas West

text: Misika yefodya yakavhurwa masvondo maviri apfuura hurumende ichivimbisa kuti varimi vachabhadharwa nechimbichimbi uye nemitengo inofadza asi izvi handizvo zviri kuitika sezvo varimi vakawanda vari kugun’una vachiti vari kunonooka kubhadharwa. Vachivhura misika yefodya muHarare, gurukota rezvekurima, Doctor Anxious Masuka, pamwe nasachigaro wekambani yehurumende inoona nezvekutengeswa kwefodya yeTobacco Industries Marketing Board, VaPat Devenish, vakavimbisa kuti varimi vachabhadharwa nenguva. Asi varimi vanoti zviri kutora mazuva akawanda kana svondo chairo fodya yatengwa vasati vabhadharwa, izvo zvinoita kuti vatambure nepekurara nechikafu. Mumwe asina mufaro ndiVaRenias Chakanyuka vave nemakore gumi nemana vachirima fodya. Vati vano shungurudzwa nekunyimwa zvimbuzi pamisika yefodya pamwe nekurambidzwa kupinda pamisika kuti vanoone fodya yavo ichitengeswa. Vaenderera mberi vachiti varimi vari kutora nguva yakareba vasati vawana mari yavo izvo zvinowedzera mikana yavo yekubata zvirwere zvakaita seCovid-19. VaNathan Shortie vekuMt Darwin, vatiwo havasi kufara kuti zviri kutora nguva kuti vabhadharwe mari yefodya izvo zvino zovapinza mumatambudziko sezvo vasina pekurara muHarare. Vati vanorara panze izvo zvinoita kuti vasangane nematambudziko akawanda anosanganisira mbavha nepfambi. Ambuya Dzamara avo vanorima vari kuMacheke vati zvino suwisa kuti vanoshungurudzwa kumisika mushure mekuisa simba rakawanda vachirima fodya. Vaenderera mberi vachiti havawoni chikonzeero chekuti varamba vachirimba fodya nekuda kwematambudzikko avakatarisa nawo. Mukuru werimwe remasangano anomirira varimi munyika reZimbabwe Farmer Union, VaPaul Zakaria, vaudza Studio 7, kuti chikamu chesangano ravo chinoona nezvekurimwa kwefodya chakatovanyorera tsamba chichivazivisa nezvematambudziko akatarisana nevarimi kumisika nedzimwe nzvimbo dzinotengeswa fodya. VaZakaria vati panoda kuitwa ongororo yekuti zvinhu zviri kufamba sei pamisika kubva zvayavhurwa kuti pari kunetsa pakagadziriswe. Vatiwo zvinoda kuti vese vane chekuita nefodya, varimi, mabhanga, TIMB, misika nevamwe vashande pamwe chete kupedza matambudziko ariko pari zvino. Zimbabwe ine misika mitatu inotenga fodya muHarare inoti Tobacco Sales Floor, Boka nePremier. Kunze kwemisika iyi, kune mamwe makambani akazvimirira kana kuti maContractors anotengawo fodya muHarare nezvimbo dzakaita seMarondera, Bindura, Mvurwi Karoi neRusape. Mukuru wekambani yehurumende inoona nezvekutengeswa kwefodya, Doctor Andrew Matibiri, vaudza Studio7 kuti hazvifaniri kutora mazuva matatu murimi asati abhadharwa. Pachikumbiro chekuti mabhanga avhure pamisika yefodya, VaMatibiri vati izvi hazvibvumidzwe pasi pemitemo yekudzivirira kupararira kweCovid-19. Dr Matibiri vatiwo varimi, vanofanirawo kurongeka nekutevedza zvese zvinodiwa kuti vasasangane nematambudziko kana kunonotswa pakutengesa kwefodya yavo. Huwandu hwevarimi vari kurimwa fodya hwaka kwira kusvika pazviuru zvinodarika zane nemakumi mana nemanomwe ane mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi matatu nerimwe 147, 931 gore rino kubva pazviuru zana nemakumi mana nemashanu ane mazana matanhatu nemakumi maviri nemashanu kana kuti pa145 625 gore rapera, Gore rapfuura nyika yakawana mamiriyoni mazana manomwe nemakumi masere nemaviri emadhora ekuAmerica (US$782) uye gore rino inotarisirwa kuwana mari yakawanda kupfuura apa. No media source currently available
title: Varimi veFodya Vochema Chema Nekunonoka Kubhadharwa neNguva

text: Gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu vachishanda nesangano reHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica, VaDewa Mavhinga, vanoti mashoko emutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa ekuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvisiyane netsika yekuchema nezvirango mashoko makukutu, nekuti vanhu vemuZanu PF vanongochema nezvirango zvisipo. “Dambudziko guru pane zveupfumi hweZimbabwe hazvisi zvirango zvisipo, asi kuondonga nyika pamatongerwo, huwori, ee, chizivano uyezve kusagona basa, ndozvauraya nyika. Kwete zvirango zvinenge zviri muzviroto zvevanhu,” VaMavhinga vanodaro. Vanotiwo panyaya yekurudziro yekuti vanhu vasiyane nemhirizhonga yakataurwa naVaMnangagwa, zvinofanirwa kutangira kubato ravo reZanu PF, uyewo kuti mapurisa atevere mutemo. “Shoko rekuti mhirizhonga kwete pane zvematongerwo enyika ishoko rakanaka, asika muromo hauzarirwi nerwizi. Chakakosha kuita kuratidza nemaitiro kuti mhirizhonga haitenderwi. Kureva kuti VaMnangagwa ngavataurire mapurisa kuti vaite basa sebasa, vanenge vaita mhirizhonga vasungwe.” Bepanhau reSunday Mail rinoti VaMnangagwa vakaudza musangano wemadzishe nemusi weSvondo pavakasangana navo muGweru kuti vanhu vanofanirwa kudzidza kushandisa zviripo kuti zviburitse shanduko. Vakawanda vanoona mashoko aVaMnangagwa aya panyaya yezvirango zvakatemera nyika, sekutsauka kukuru kubva kurwiyo rwehurumende yeZanu PF rwekungochema nezvirango pose-pose. VaMnangagwa vanonzi vakakurudzirawo vana veZimbabwe vasiyane netsika yemhirizhonga apo nyika yatarisana nedzesarudzo, vachiti vanhu vanofanirwa kubatana nekugarisana kunyange hazvo vaine maonero akasiyana mune zvematongerwo enyika. Mhirizhonga inonzi yatotanga mune mamwe matunhu akaita seMasvingo neEpworth, kunyange hazvo isati yapararira nenyika yose. No media source currently available
title: VaMnangagwa Vokurudzira Vanhu Kusiyana neTsika yeKungochema neZvirango

text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa nemusi weChina vakadzokorora kurudziro yavo kumusangano we United Nastions General Assembly kuNew York, yekuti zvirango zvibviswe. Asi vakatemera zvirango izvi kusanganisira America ne Britain vanoti hazvina kutemerwa nyika asi kuti zvakatemerwa ivo VaMnangagwa nevamwe vavo vanotyora kodzero dzevanhu. Vamwe vatungamiri venyika dzemuAfrica vakataurawo kumusangano uyu vakakurudzirawo kuti zvirango izvi zvibviswe. Vanoongora zvematongerwo enyika vachitungamira sangano reCentre for Natural Resource Governance, VaFarai Maguwu, vanoti hongu zvirango zvingangonzi zvakatemerwa vashoma, asi chokwadi chaicho ndechekuti zviri kurwadzawo kusanganisira neveruzhinji. Asi VaMaguwu vanoti VaMnangagwa vanofanirwa kutanga vabvisa ivo zvirango zvikuru zviri kukanganisa vana veZimbabwe zvakaita sehuwori pamwe nekumira kudzika mitemo inombunyikidza kodzero vdzevanhu vasati vachemera kubviswa kwezvirango nenyika dzekumawirira. Vanotiwo vatungamiri venyika dzemuAfrica vakataura kumusangano weUNGA vari kuhukura pamuti usiri iwo, vachiti vanofanirwa kuudza VaMnangagwa kuti vagadzirise zvacho zvakambokoka zvirango. No media source currently available
title: Mutungamiri weNyika, VaMnangagwa Vanodzokorora Kurudziro Yavo kuMusangano weUNGA Yekuti Zvirango Zvibviswe

text: Mutungamiri weSouth Africa, VaJacob Zuma, vapona musarudzo dzaitwa mudare reparamende dzekuti vanopikisa havachina chivimbo nehutongi hwavo kana kuti ‘vote of no confidence’. Dare reparamende mu South Africa ravhota nhasi panyaya yekuti vazuma voramba vari pachigaro here zvichitevera nyaya yakasimudzwa nevanopikisa yekuti havachina chivimbo nemutungamiri wenyika iyi. Nhengo dzeparamende kubva kumapato ose anopikisa dzabatana pamwechete mukupikisana nenhengo dzebato riri kutonga re ANC, rinove bato ravaZuma, mukuvhota kwaitwa muchivande. Vange vachiti vachine vimbo naVaZuma vaita mavhoti198 asi vange vachiti havasisina ruvimbo navo vakaita mavhoti 177. Doctor Ricky Munyaradzi Mukonza, avo vari Senior Lecturer paTswane University of Technology kuSouth Africa, vanoti zvaitwa muparamende yeSouth Africa izvi zvinoratidza kuti South Africa inyika yati budirirei panyaya yekugona kuzvitonga. Vanotizve kuvhota muchivande kwaitwa uku kwange kuri kudzivirira kutyityidzirwa kunoitwa vanhu sezvo vamwe vachitotyityidzirwa nerufu chairwo. “Zviri kuitika muparande kuSouth Africa, handioni zvichiitika kuZimbabwe nokuti kuZimbabwe tikatarisisa tinoona kuti iyo paramende yacho inongoita zvekungotevedzera zvataurwa nomutungamiri wenyika,” Doctor Mukonza vakaudza Studio 7. Vapamhidzira vachiti, “Izvi zvinowedzerwa nekuti Zanu-PF ine nhengo dzeparamende dzakawanda kupfuura mamwe mapoka uye Zanu-PF yakapa masimba akawandisa kuna President Mugabe zvekuti nhengo dzeparamende dzeZanu-PF vane kutya kwakanyanya.” Vanoti ivo zvirikuitika kuna VaZuma zvinotapudza vimbo yeavo vavanenge vachidyidzana navo nekuti mutungamiri wese wese anowana simba kubva kuvanhu venyika yake. No media source currently available
title: Nhengo Zhinji dzeParamende muSouth Africa Dzoratidza Kuti Dzichine Vimbo naVaZuma

text: Kambani yeImpala Car Rental, yaburitsa mashoko ekuti motokari yayo ndiyo yakashandiswa mukupambwa nekutochwa kwemuzukuru wemutori wenhau, Mduduzi Mathuthu, Va Tawanda Muchehiwa. Mathuthu ndiye mupepeti webepanhau repadandemutande, reZimLive. Vakuru vekambani iyi vaburitsa gwaro paTwitter vachiti havakwanisi havo kutaura kuti ndiyani akanga ahaya motokari iyi, uye kambani yavo ichashanda nemapurisa ari kuferefeta nyaya iyi kuitira kuti munhu akatyora mutemo arangwe nemitemo yenyika. Asi vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu vanoti sezvo VaMuchehiwa vakapambwa nevanhu vanofungidzirwa kuti vasori, kambani yeImpala inofanirwa kuzivisa veruzhinji kuti panguva yakapambwa VaMuchehiwa, motokari iyi yaiva mumaoko aani. Asi kambani yeImpala Car Rental inoti ichashanda nemapurisa zviri pamutemo. Hurumende yakaramba kuti VaMuchehiwa vakapambwa vakatochwa vari mumaoko emapurisa. VaMuchehiwa vakapambwa musi 30 Chikunguru muguta reBulawayo vakakandwa mumotokari yemhando rwe Ford Ranger ndokunotochwa kwemazuva matatu. Bepanhau reZimLive, iro ratanga kuburitsa nyaya iyi, rinoti motokari iyi yakadzoswa kukambani yeImpala muHarare musi Nyamavhuvhu 6. VaMuchehiwa vakazosiyiwa vakandwa pakati pehusiku musi wa 1 Nyamavhuvhu panguva iyo mapurisa akanga akomekedzwa nedare redzimhosva kuti auye naVaMuchehiwa mudare mukati memaawa makumi manomwe nemaviri. ZimLive yakawana mavhidhiyo anoratidza kupambwa kwakaitwa VaMuchehiwa ayo ari paCCTV yakawanikwa neZimLive ichida kuziva zvakaitika. Kunyange hazvo Studio7 isina kuona mavhidhiyo aya, ZimLive inoti mavhidhiyo ayakawana anoratidza kupambwa kwakaitwa VaMuchehiwa nevarume vaive nezvombo, avo vakamuisa mumotokari yemhando yeIsuzu ndokufamba mamita anodarika zana ndokubva vamuiswa muFord Ranger, iyo inonzi imotokari yeImpala Car Rentals. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rehurumende panyaya iyi sezvo gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, pamwe nemunyori mubazi ravo, Va Nick Mangwana, vanga vasiri kudaira nharembozha dzavo. Hatinawo kukwanisa kubata vakuru ve Impala Car Rental panguva iyo taenda pamhepo, asi ZimLive inoti mukuru weImpala, VaThompson Dondo, vati ichokwadi kuti motokari iyi yakahayiwa kwemazuva matanhatu kubva muna Chikunguru. Vanonzi vaudzawo ZimLive kuti munhu anogara akahaya motokari iyi munhu avanogara vakaita naye bhizinesi achihaya motokari dzavo, vakati havakwanisi kuburitsa zita rake asi vachazivisa mapurisa Mutauriri wemapurisa, VaPaul Nyathi, vaudza Studio7 kuti vanga vasingakwanisi kutaura sezvo vanga vari mumusangano wakakosha vakati tivafonere kana vapedza musangano wavo.  Pavafonerwa neStudio7 tisati taenda pamhepo, VaNyathi vanga vasisadairi nharembozha yavo. Murwiri wekodzero dzevanhu, uye vari mukuru wesangano re Human Rights Watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica, VaDewa Mavhinga, vanoti ve Impala Car Rental vanofanirwa kubuda pachena kuitira kuti munhu wese azive kuti ndiyani akahaya motokari yavo panguya yayakashandiswa kupamba VaMuchehiwa. VaMavhinga vanoti kambani iyi haifanirwe kungopa zvainazvo kumapurisa chete nekuti zvakaitwa pana VaMuchehiwa zvinhu zvinotyora mitemo yenyika.  Vatiwo Impala Car Rental inofanirwa kuzvichenura kana iri kambani ine chido neveruzhinji kuitira kuti vanhu vagare vakavimba nayo. No media source currently available
title: ZimLive Yofushunyura Zvakavandika Nguva Yaipambwa VaMuchehiwa

text: Zimbabwe yabatana nedzimwe nyika dzemu Africa mukucherechedza zuva re Africa Day vanhu vachiita zvirongwa zvakasiyana siyana. Mukupembererera zuva reAfrica Day, mudzimai wemutungamiri weMDC, Amai Elizabeth Tsvangirai, vashanyira musha weBumhudzo Old People Home kuSt Mary’s Chitungwiza uko kwavanopa zvekudya, zvekupfeka nemachira kuvakweguri vanogara pamusha uyu. Vachitenda Amai Tsvangirai nerubatsiro rwavapiwa, Gogo Betty Samombe, mumwe wevakweguri vanogara paBumhudzo, vati vane tarisiro yekuti nhamo yavo yezvekudya yombotapudzika. Amai Tsvangirai, avo vakakurira mumusha we St Mary’s, vatiwo nekuda kwekuondomoka kuri kuita hupfumi hwenyika, vanhu vazhinji vari kutambura. Amai Tsvangirai vatiwoshuviro yavo ndeyekuti vanhu vasaise zvematongerwo enyika mukati munyaya dzekubatsira vanoshaya. Amai Tsvangirai vakurudzira kuti vanhu varangarire kwavakakurira vakati machechi ane mukurumbira abatsirewo veruzhinji vari kutambura. Vanotungamirira Bumhudzo Old People’s Home, Major Cynthia Nyaruberu, vati vakatarisana nematambudziko akasiyana-siyana nekuda kwemamiriro ehupfumi. Amai Nyaruberu vati pamusoro pedambudziko rezvekudya, Bumhudzo, iyo yakavakwa gore ra1974, yasakara zvikuru zvokuti vanotoda kubatsirwa kunatsurudza nzvimbo iyi. Musha weBumhudzo une vakweguri makumi matatu nemumwe, uye mukurisa aripo ane makore zana nemashanu. Bato reMDC inotungamirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai, rinoti zuva re Africa Day izuva rekucherechedza magamba akarwira kusunungura dunhu re Africa, iro rakatarisana nehudzvanyirira munguva iyo vanhu vachiti vakazvisunungura. MDC inoti mukurangarira zuva ranhasi, pane mufaro pamwe nekusuwa kuri muvanhu vemuAfrica. Bato iri rati Africa ine hupfumi hwakanyanyisa, asi zvinoshamisa ndezvekuti Africa ine vanhu varombo vakawanda, avo vanorarama nemari iri pasi pedhora pazuva. Bato iri rapedzisira richiti Africa inofanirwa kubatsira Zimbabwe kuti iite sarudzo dzakachena gore rinouya. No media source currently available
title: Amai Elizabeth Tsvangirai Vanopa Vakweguri Chikafu neMbatya

text: Vanhu mazana maviri ane makumi mapfumbamwe nemumwe kana kuti 291 vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika mukati memazuva manomwe adarika. Nemusi weSvondo bazi rezvehutano rinoti kwakafa vanhu gumi nevaviri vanova vashoma zvikuru zvichienzaniswa nemamwe mazuva ose. Vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kupararira vave mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi manomwe nevana kana kuti 974. Vanhu vakabatwa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kuparira gore rapera vave zvuru makumi matatu nerimwe zvine vanomwe kana kuti 31, 007. Izvi zvinotevera kubatwa kwevanhu mazana mana nemakumi masere nevana kana kuti 484 nechirwere ichi neMugovera. Vanhu vose ava vakatapurirwa chirwere ichi uye kuManicaland ndiko kune vanhu vakawanda akabatwa nechirwere ichi vanosvika zana nemakumi matatu nemumwe kana kuti 131. Vanhu vapora kubva kuchirwere ichi kusvika parizvino zviuru makumi maviri nerimwe zvine mazana matatu nemakumi manomwe nevanomwe kana kuti 21, 377 mushure mekunge vamwe vanhu mazana maviri nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevanomwe kana kuti 297 vapora neMugovera. Vanhu vachiri kurwara parizvino vave zviuru zvisere nemazana matahatu ane makumi mashanu nevatanhatu kana kuti 8,656. Harare neManicaland ndidzo nzvimbo dzine vanhu vakawandisa vari kurwara nechirwere ichi parizvino. Manicaland yave pachidanho chechitatu pamatunhu ane vanhu vakawandisa vafa nechirwere ichi ichitevera Harare neBulawawayo. Mumiriri weMutasa Central mudare reparamende VaTrevor Saruwaka vanoti havasi kufara kuti vakuru mubazi rezvehutano mudunhu ravo havasi kuvazivisa zvizere nezvedambudziko recoronavirus munharaunda mavo. No media source currently available Sezvo vanhu vakawanda vari kurwara vari kumba, vakawanda vari kuda kunzwa kubva kuna vanachiremba kuti vangaite sei. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano Dr Enoch Mayida vakambotungamira chipatara cheChitungwiza cari munyori weZimbabwe Medical Association mudunhu reMashonaland vanoti zvakakosha kuti vanhu vaende kuchipatara kana votadza kufema. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa Studio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni matatu kana kuti 3 million vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 muAfrica. Vanhu vafa vasvika zvuru makumi masere nezviuru mazana mapfumbamwe nemumwe kna kuti 83, 901. Vapora muAfrica vadarika mamiriyoni maviri nezvuru mazana masere kana kuti 2,8 million. South Africa ndiyo ine vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi muAfrica. Dunhu reSADC ndirozve rine vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nechirwere ichi vadarika miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana matanhatu kana kuti 1,6 million. North Africa ine vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi vadarika miriyoni imwe chete. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus pasi rose hwadarika mamiriyoni makumi mmapfumbamwe nemasere ane zviuru mazana matranhatu kana kuti 98, 6 million. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose inoti muAmerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi. Vafa muAmerica vanodarika zvuru mazana mana ane gumi nenomwe kana kuti 417, 000, vabatwa nechirwere ichi vachidarika mamiriyoni makumi maviri nevana ane zviuru zvinomwe kana kuti 24, 9 million. Pasi rose, vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vanodarika miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana mapfumbamwe kana kuti 1, 9 million. Asi vapora pasi rose vachidarika mamiriyoni makumi mashanu nemana kana kuti 54 million.
title: Vanhu Mazana Maviri neMakumi Mapfumbamwe neMumwe (291) Vofa neCovid-19 Mumazuva Manomwe

text:
Vamwe vagari vemuChinhoyi vanoti vanzwa nekubhadhara mari yenzvimbo dzepekugara kune vanhu vakapihwa nzvimbo nebazi rematunhu kana kuti ma developer asi pasina zviri kuitwa.

Vachitaura muChinhoyi kukomisheni iri kuongorora kutengeswa kwenzvimbo dzehurumende zvisiri pamutemo, VaShylock Mugandari vanoti havasi kufara nemari yavari kubhadhara mwedzi wega wega kuna VaObediah Musindo asi pasina kuvandudzwa kwenzvimbo dzavakapihwa.

VaMugandari vaudza komisheni iyi kuti kunyange vachibhadhara mari inoita madhora makumi masere pamwedzi, nzvimbo yavari kugara haina mapombi emvura neanofambisa tsvina, izvo vanoti zvinoratidza kuti mari yavo iri kushandiswa zvisiri izvo naVaMusindo.

VaMugandari avo vakatanga kubhadhara mari iyi muna 2011, vanoti chave kuvashamisa ndechekuti mushandirapamwe wakapindwa nevanhu vaida nzvimbo dzekugara uyu wave kunzi ndewemunhu mumwechete, vanova VaMusindo.

Mumwe mugari, Amai Chenai Kumwala, vanoti zviri nani kuti vabhadhare mari kukanzuru pane kuti varambe vachibhadhara VaMusindo avo vavanoti vari kudya mari yavo.

Amai Kumwala vanoti vakanyeperwa naVaMusindo kuti vaimbove mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vainge vachitsigira hurongwa hwekuwaniswa nzvimbo dzekugara uhu.

VaMusindo vachashevedzwa kuzopa huchapupu kukomisheni iyi, asi pavakambopa uchapupu kukomisheni imwechete kwaMutare vakati havasati vadarika nguva yekuvandudza nzvimbo dzekugara dzavakapihwa sezvo vakapihwa makore gumi kuti vaise migwagwa, mvura nemapombi etsvina.

Kusafambiswa zvakanaka kwenzvimbo dzekugara kunonzi kuri kuitikawo kuKaroi uko nhengo dzeKubatana Co-operative dzataurira komisheni iyi kuti kanzuru haisi kufambisa zvinhu nemazvo.

Mukuru weKubatana Co-operative, VaRodwell Shangwa, vanoti kugadziriswa kwenzimbo dzavo dzekugara kuri kutora nguva yakareba asi ivo vachibhadhara mari
kubvira muna 2014.

Vachitaura kukomisheni imwechete nhasi, mukuru mubazi rezvematunhu, VaChristopher Shumba, vabvuma kuti kupihwa kwaiitwa nzvimbo dzekugara nebazi iri kwainge kusina kunyatsojeka zvikuru muhofisi yezvekurongwa kwezvinhu kana kuti planning.

Komisheni iyi iri kutarisa nzvimbo dzehurumende dzose kuti
ndivanaani vagerepo, uye kuti vakagara zviri pamutemo here, kana kuti vane magwaro anovapa mvumo yekugarapo here.

Zviri kubuda pachena kuti bazi rezvematunhu rakapa vamwe vanhu nzvimbo dzekugara kuti vadzivandudze vozopa vagari pave nemvura nezvimwe zvinodikanwa, asi hapana chiri kuitwa sezvo dzimwe nzvimbo dzakatotengeswa kune vamwe vanhu pasina zvakaitwa izvo zvinonzi huori.

Vamwe vakapihwa nzvimbo vasina zvavati vaita kwemakore anodarika mashanu ndiMuzvare Tanya Rushesha , mwana wegurukota rezvekudzivirirwa kwenyika Amai Oppah Muchinguri-Kashiri, avo vakapihwa mahekiteya makumi mana, pamwe nenhengo yevechidiki yeZanu PF VaMike Chimombe, avo vakapihwa mahekiteya makumi matatu. VaChimombe vakaudza komisheni kuti vakabhadhara mari yose yekutenga nzvimbo yavakapihwa inoita madhora ekuAmerica zviuru zana nemakumi mashanu uye havasati vasimudzira nzvimbo iyi nekuda kwekuti vakatorerwa zvimwe zvikamu naVaBen Swanepoel uye nyaya iyi iri kumatare edzimhosva. Komisheni iyi, iyo iri kutungamirirwa naJustice Tendayi Uchena ichange iri mudunhu reMashonaland West kusvika musiwa 10 Nyamavhuvhu uye ichafamba mumatunhu madiki ose. No media source currently available
title: Vakatengeserwa Nzvimbo dzeKuvakira muChinhoyi Vanonyunyuta kuKomisheni

text: Mutungamiri webato rinopikisa re reZimbabwe People First Amai Joice Mujuru vari kuita musangano kuRudhaka Stadium kuMarondera neMugovera. Asi vatsigiri vavo varikupomera vatsigiri vebato riri kutonga reZanu-PF muMashonaland East varikuita zvemhirizhonga kuyedza kudzivisa kuitwa kwemusangano uyu. Mumwe wechidiki webato iri VaSetfree Mafukidze vaudza.kuyti vechidiki veZanu-PF vari kubvarura mapepa avari kuisa ekushambadzira musangano uyu uye vange vachipinda munhandare mavanga vachiita gadziriro nemota vachivatyisidzira. No media source currently available Amai Mujuru vakatanga kuita misangano kuBulawayo vasati vaenda kuHarare nekuMasvingo nekwaMutare.
title: Amai Mujuru Voita Musangano kuMarondera

text: Zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri munyika dzakasiyanasiyana zvinoti zvakamanikidzwa kubuda munyika nekuda kwehutongo hwaVaRobert Mugabe, avo vazvinoti vaitonga nedemo. Nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika vachidzidzisa paBergen University kuNorway, uye vari nhengo yesangano reZimbabwe Yadzoka/Mayibuye Zimbabwe, Doctor Victor Chimhutu, vanoti kunyange hazvo VaMugabe vaionekwa semunhu airwira kuti vana vemuAfrica vabatane, imwe mhuri yeZimbabwe yakanga isingavaone saizvozvo. Doctor Chimhutu vanoti kubatana kwaiita VaMugabe nevamwe vatungamiri vemuAfrica ndizvo zvimwe zvakaita kuti varemekedzwe zvakanyanya nevatungamiri venyika dzemuAfrica. Vanoti VaMugabe munhu acharangarirwawo zvakanyanya kuburikidza nekutuka pamwe nekutaura zvavaifunga pamusoro penyika dzekumawirira pamwe nekushoropodza kwavaiita vatungamiri venyika dzakaita seAmerica neBritain. VaMugabe vanonzi vainge vasingarovewo imbwa vakaviga mupinyi kana dzimwe nhengo dzebato ravo reZanu PF dzakatsautsira, kanawo pavaituka vemapato anopikisa. VaMugabe vari kutarisirwa kuradzikwa nemusi weSvondo, kunyange hazvo pasati paziviswa kuti vacharadzikwa kupi. No media source currently available
title: Vamwe Vari Kunze kweNyika Vanoti Vakatiza Munyika Nekuda kwaVaMugabe

text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagawa nhasi vataura pamberi pedare reUnited Nations pamusangano wechimakumi manomwe nemanomwe kana kuti 77th Session. Vachitaura pamberi pegungano iri sechave chigariro musoro wetsuro kushaya nyanga, VaMnangagwa vakudzira kuti zvirango zvavanoti zvakatemerwa nyika zvibviswe. Vatenda SADC nekuvabatsira kukurudzira kuti zvirango zvibviswe. Asi vakatemera zvirango vakait seAmerica vanoti zvirango izvi hazvina kutemerwa nyika asi VaMnangagwa nevamwe vavo vanotonga nedemo. VaMnangagwa vaudza gungano iri kuti vakwanisa kuunza hutongo hwejekere munyika. Vati chavanoda kuti vanhu varatidzire murunyararo. Asi vanopikisa vakaita saVaDavid Siyamupondo vanoti munyika yeZiimbabwe makaberekera ingwe vachiti kusungwa kwmumiriri weZengeza West mudare reparamende VaJob Sikhala nemumiri weChitungwiza North VaGodfrey Sithole nevamwe gumi nevana kwemazuva anodarika zana munongedzo mekuti munyika hamuna rugare. Panyaya yechirwere cheCovid-19, VaMnagagwa vati hurumende yavo yakakwanisa kurwisa chirwere cheCovid-19. Zimbabwe yakabatsirwa hayo neChina nedzimwe nyika dzekunze mukurwisa chirwere ichi. VaMnangagwa vativo nyika yakwanisa kurwisa nzara kunyangwe kusanaya kwemvura kwakanganisa goho. Asi dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi nevanopikisa vanoti kugarira badza kwevarimi vatema vakawanda, nyika iri kutadza kukohwa pakuru. Panyaya yedzidzo, VaMnangagwa vati Zimbabwe yabudirira kuvandudza dzidzo. Vati hurumende yavo iri kukwanisa kuwanisa vanhu vose dzidzo sekodzero yavo. Asi mutungamiri werimwe sangano revarairidzi reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe VaObert Masaraure vati pane ongororo yakaitwa neTransparency International inoti vana vanosvika miriyoni imwe chete muZimbabwe vakakundikana kuenda kuchikoro vazhinji nekushaya mari. Apo VaMnangagwa vange vachitaura chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe VaZvaringeni Samuel Chasi vebato re People's Patriot Party vange vachiratidzira panze pemuzinda weUnited Nations. VaChasi vaudza Studio 7 kuti havasi kufara kuti munyika hamuna rugare nekuda kwekutonga nedemo kwaVaMnangagwa. Vati vakawana mukana vanosunga VaMnangagwa vovaendesa kumapurisa kana kuti citizen arrest. Vachitaura nezvekuratidzira uku, munyori mukuru mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko VaNick Mangwana vati vanhu vakasungunuka kuratidzira asi hazvikanganise VaMnangagwa kuita basa ravo. Musangano weUnited General Assembly uyu uri kuitwa pasi pedingindira rakanangana nekugadzirisa matambudziko akatarisana nenyika dzepasi rino kana kuti  “A watershed moment: transformative solutions to interlocking challenges”. Musangano uyu wakatanga musi wa19 Gunyana uye No media source currently available musi wa 26 Gunyana.
title: Vanopikisa Vanoti VaMnangagwa Vange Vachiita Gudziramukanwa kuUnited Nations

text: Rimwe sangano rinomirira varairidzi, reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, PTUZ, rinoti ranyora tsamba kugurukota rezvedzidzo VaCain Mathema, richikumbira kuti vasangane nechimbichimbi kuti vazeye nzira dzekudzivirira nadzo zvikoro kubva kuchirwere che coronavirus. Munyori mukuru wePTUZ, VaRaymond Majongwe, vanoti kurudziro yavo huru kunaVaMathema ndeyekuti zvikoro zvivharwe uye pombomiswa kuungana kwevanhu mumitambo nezvimwe kuitira kuchengetedza vana nevarairidzi kubva kuchirwere chanetsa pasi rose ichi. VaMajongwe vanoti kunyange hazvo Zimbabwe isati yave nemunhu anozivikanwa ati abatwa chirwere ichi, zvakakosha zvikuru kuti nyika itore matanho ekudzivirira kupararira kwacho sezviri kuitwawo nedzimwe nyika dzakaita seSouth Africa, iyo yave nevanhu vanodarika makumi manomwe vabatwa ne coronavirus. "Chokwadi ndechekuti hapana asiri kuona kuti coronavirus iyi yasvika mudhuze nemusha wedu, ndicho chekutanga. Chepiri ndechekuti dzimwe dzakatipoteredza dzatotora matanho ekuti zvikoro nema public gatherings ngazvimbovharwa nepamusana pekuti zvirwere izvi zvakadzima zvapinda muvana vedu tinogona kunge tatozvisikira moto muziso," VaMajongwe vanodaro. Studio 7 yakundikana kunzwa kubva kugurukota rezvedzidzo VaMathema kana vatambira tsamba yePTUZ iyi. Asi VaMajongwe vanoti zviri nani kudzivirira chirwere pane kuzonetseka nekuchirapa pachitariswa mamiriro akaita zvinhu muzvipatara zvemunyika. No media source currently available
title: Sangano rePTUZ Rokurudzira Kuti Zvikoro Zvivharwe Senzira yeKudzivirira Coronavirus

text: Mutevedzeri wasachigaro weMDC vachimirira Harare East muNational Assembly, VaTendai Biti, nhasi vakumbira mutauriri wedare iri, Advocate Jacob Mudenda, kuti vachengetdza nhengo dzeparamende vachiti nhengo dzedare iri zvikuru sei kubva kubato ravo dziri kusungwa nemapurisa izvo zvave kukanganisa basa radzo pamwe neparamende. Izvi zvaitika apo mumiriri weKuwadzana East, VaCharlton Hwende, vasungwa apo vapinda munyika kubva kuNambia uko vange vari. VaBiti vaudza VaMudenda mudare nhasi kuti kubvira muna Nyamavhvhu gore rapfuura kusvika pari zvino, pane nhengo dzebato ravo dzinodarika gumi dzasungwa nemapurisa dzichipomerwa mhosva dzine chekuita nezvesarudzo dzegore rapfuura uye ivo semukuru weparamende vanofanira kuona kuti nhengo dzedare ravo dzakchengetedzwa. Vatiwo nhengo dzeparamende dziri kusungwa nenzira dzinodzikisira chimiro chadare iri uye vati zvave kukanganisa basa reparamende. VaBiti vati kunyange hazvo nhengo dzeparamende dzichitadza, panofanira kuve nenzira ine chiremerera yekudzisunga nayo. Vati semuenziso mapurisa anokwanisa kutaura nevanokokera mapato ane nenhengo muparamende kwete kusungira munhu pamusangano weparamende sezvakaitwa mumiriri weHarare West, Muzvare Joana Mamombe, nemusi weMugovera wapfuura kuNyanga. VaMudenda vati nhengo dzeparamende hadzisi pamusoro pemutemo asi vati vano bvumirana naVaBiti kuti nhengo idzi dzinofanira kubatwa zvine chiremera kunyange padzinenge dzichipomerwa mhosva. Asi vati kuti izvi zviitike, mutemo wePriviledges Act unofanira kusandurwa kuti unatsodoma matanho anofanirra kutorwa panosungwa nhengo yeparamende. VaMudenda vati kunyange vakanzwa kuti pane nhengo yeparamende iri kutsvagwa nemapurisa pari zvino havakwanisi kurambidza mapurisa kusunga nhengo dzeparamende nekuti vanogona kunzi vave kukanganisa basa remapurisa. Vatiwo Muzvare Mamombe vakasungwa zvine chiremera mushure mekunge vaudza mapurisa pamusangano wavo kuNyanga kuti nyaya dzekungosunga sunga nhengo dzeparamende dzinovhiringa chimiro chenyika apo iri kuedza kunatsurudza hukama hwavo nedzimwe nyika zvekare. VaHwende vaendeswa kukamba yemapurisa yeHarare Central uye pataenda pamhepo tange tisati taziva kuti vari kupomerwa mhosva yei. Dzimwe nhengo dzeparamende dzeMDC Alliance dzakasungwa kubva muna Nyamavhuvhu gore rapfuura dzinosanganisira, VaBiti, Seneta Morgen Komichi, Amos Chibaya, Godfrey Sithole, Lloyd Mkapiko, Livingstone Chimina naVaSettlement Chikwinya. Mune imwewo nyaya, mumiriri weMangwe muNational Assembly VaObedigwa Mguni veZanuPF vazivisa kuti vanoda kuunza mudare mosheni yekukumbira gurukota rezvetemutemo kuti chikamu chebumbiro remutemo chinopa zvigaro makumi matanhatu kumadzimai pasarudzo chirambe chiri mubumbiro remutemo wenyika. Chikamu ichi chinoguma kushanda muna 2013. Zvichakadai VaMudenda vazivisa kuti komiti yeStanding Rules and Orders iyo inotungamira basa reparamende ichadoma nhengo itsva dzekomiti yeyezvezvicherwa mushure mekunge yamisa kushanda komiti yaive nekuda kwekupokana kwenhengo dzekomiti iti. Zvichakadai nhengo inomirira Norton, VaTemba Mliswa nemumiriri weChegutu West, VaDexter Nduna, avo vakapopotedzana komiti yezvezvicherwa isati yamiswa kushanda mwedzi wapfuura vakumbira ruregerero kunhengo dzeparamende vachiti zvavakaita hazvienderane nezvinotarisirwa kunhengo dzeparamende. Vaviri ava vati vane hurombo nezvavakaita uye VaNduna vatai vakatokumbira rureherero kumutungamiriri wenyika pamusoro penyaya iyi. No media source currently available
title: MDC Yochema Chema neKusungwa kweNhengo Dzayo

text: Mutungamiri wesangano revanotenga nekutengesa zvinhu kunze kwenyika, reInternational Cross Border Traders Association, VaDenis Juru, vanoti nhengo dzavo dzinotambira nemufaro danho rakatorwa nehurumende neChipiri, rekunyevenutsa mutemo unorambidza kupinzwa kwezvinhu kubva kunze kwenyika we Statutory Instrument 122. Hurumende yakazivisa kuti yanyevenutsa mutemo uyu kuitira kuti vanhu pamwe nemakambani vabvumidzwe kupinza munyika zvinhu zviri kunetsa kuwana senzira yekurerutsa dambudziko rekushaikwa kwezvinhu zvakawanda muzvitoro zvemunyika. Pari zvino nyika yakatarisana nedambudziko rekushaikwa kwezvinhu zvakawanda zvinodiwa nevanhu zuva nezuva zvinosanganisira mafuta edzimotokari, zvekudya, zvekuvakisa zvekurimisa pamwe nemari yekunze, iyo inodiwa nevemabhizimusi kuti vakwanise kupinza zvitengeswa nezvinodiwa mukugadzirwa kwezvimwe zvinhu munyika. Mutemo we Statutory Instrument 122 uyu wakadzikwa gore rapera wairambidza kupinzwa kwezvinhu zvinotarisirwa kunge zvichigadzirwa nemakambani emunyika senzira yekuchengetedza makambani aya kubva kuzvigadzirwa zvekunze, izvo zvinowanzozara muzvitoro. No media source currently available
title: Vanotenga Kunze kweNyika Votambira Kuvandudzwa kweMutemo weSI 122

text: Gurukota rinoona nezvemaindustry VaMike Bimha vatsinhirawo kuti hurumende yasendeka parutivi chirongwa chekutora zvikamu makumi mashanu nechimwe kubva muzana kumakambani anenge achida kuvamba mabhizimisi munyika. VaBimha vanoti makambani ezvicherwa chete ndiwo ave kusungirwa kupa vatema zvikamu makumi masnanu nechimwe kubva muzana. Mashoko aya akataurwawo negurukota rinoona nezvekuendesa hupfumi kuvatema VaChris Mushowe kubepanhau reSunday Mail. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinoti zvabuda pachena kuti chirongwa chehurumende ichi change chopa Zimbabwe kuti iite seyakageza negoka munyama. VaBimha parizvhino vari kumusangano weMilan Expo kuItaly uko Zimbabwe iri kuratidzirawo zvinhu zvayo panyika dzinosvika zana nemakumi mana nemanomwe.
title: Zimbabwe Yosiyana neChirongwa Chekuendesa Hupfumi kuVatema Kunze KwekuMigodhi

text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzemitemo nevanorwira kodzero dzevanhu vanoti munyika munofanirwa kuva nehurongwa hunonzwa nyunyuto dzevanenge vakanganisirwa nemapurisa nemasoja kuitira kuti kodzero dzevanhu ava dzisarambe dzichimbunyikidzwa. Kunyange hazvo bumbiro remitemo yenyika richikurudzira kuumbwa kweboka rakazvimirira rinonzwa zvichemo zveveruzhinji kana vachinge vatyorerwa kodzero dzavo, izvi hazvisati zvaitwa mushure mekunge bumbiro iri ratambirwa muna 2013. Gweta rinoshanda nesangano rakazvimiririra re Zimbabwe NGO Forum, VaTafadzwa Christmas, vanoti kusavapo kweboka iri kunoita kuti vamwe vanhu vashaye kwekunosvitsa zvichemo zvavo. VaChristmas vanoti sesangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu, vari kutobatsira veruzhinji kuendesa zvichemo kumatare nekukomishini yeZimbabwe Human Rights Commission. Rimwe gweta rinoshanda nesangano reHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica, VaDewa Mavhinga, vanotiwo kuti veruzhinji vasambunyikidzwe kodzero dzavo, boka reIndependent Complaints Mechanism rofanirwa kugadzwa nechimbichimbi sezvo nguva yareba risati ravapo. Murwiri wekodzero dzevanhu, VaDzikamai Bere, vanoti kushaikwa kweboka iri kunoita kuti vanoshaya vanenge vashungurudzwa, vashaye kwekusvitsa zvichemo. Mumagwaro akabudiswa nesangano reZimbabwe Human Rights NGO Forum muna Chivabvu anoratidza kuti mapurisa ndiwo aive pamberi pekutyora kodzero dzeveruzhinji mugore ra2017. Masangano akazvimirira anoti ari kushushikanawo nekuurayiwa nemasoja kwevanhu vanosvika gumi mumhirizhonga yakaitika musi wa Nyamavhuvhu 1, 2018 muHarare. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vakadoma komisheni yevanhu vanomwe kuti iongorore zvakaitika musi uyu, kunyange hazvo vamwe vachiti komisheni iyi yakadomwa zviri kunze kwemitemo, uye ine vamwe vavo vasingavimbike kuti vangaite basa ravo vakazvimirira. No media source currently available
title: Zimbabwe Yokurudzirwa Kuumba Hwaro Hwekuti Mapurisa neMasoja Anoshungurudza Vanhu Arangwe

text: Mutungamiri webato rinopikisa, reTransform Zimbabwe, VaJacob Ngarivhume, avo vakashanyira nemusi nweChitatu nzvimbo dzakaputswa muHarare nemadhorobha akaipoteredza, vanoti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka sezvo vakawanda vasara vasina kana pekutangira. Vanotiwo vamwe vanhu vatori nehumbowo hwekuti vange vachibhadhara mari dzemitero nekudaro vange vasingafunge kuti vachaparadzirwa zvavanotengesa. Asi vachitaura neStudio 7 mukuru anoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa muHarare nenzvimbo dzakaitenderedza, VaTafadzwa Muguti, vakati kupwanywa kuri kuitwa zvivakwa zvevari kutengesera pasina kutarwa zviri pamutemo chisungo chedare remakurukota chakanangana nekuchenesa maguta uye vose vari kuita huori kupa vanhu mvumo yekuvaka pasina kukodzera kana kutengesera, vachasungwa. No media source currently available
title: VaNgarivhume Vanoshanyira Nzvimbo yeMbudzi Yakaputswa neKanzuru Yakabatana neMapurisa

text: Kunzwikwa kwenyay yezvizvarwa zvinomwe zvekuChina kwakatadza kuenderera mberi neChitatu mudare ramejasitiriti kuVictoria Falls nekuda kwekushaikwa kwemuturikiri. Mutongi wedare, Muzvare Rangarirai Gakanje, vakabvumirana nemuchuchisi pamwe negweta revanomwe nenguva dzekuma 6 manheru nezuro kuti nyaya iyi iendeswe mberi, mushure mekunge vaswera zuva rose pasina chabuda nekuda kwekushaikwa kwemuturukiri. Zvizvarwa zvinomwe zvekuChina izvi, zvakasungwa musi wa 23 Zvita zvichipomerwa mhosva yekutyora chikamu chemutemo une chekuita nekuchengetedzwa kwedzimwe mhuka, kana kuti Parks and Wildlife Act, mushure mekunge vawanikwa vaine zvidimbu zvenyanga dzezvipembere zvine huremu hunosvika makirogiramu makumi maviri, uye zvichikosha mari inosvika zviuru mazana mapfumbamwe emadhora. Kutongwa kwenyaya iyi kwaifanirwa kutanga svondo rapera asi pakapinda nyaya iyi mudare muchuchisi, VaBhekimpilo Tshabalala, vakaita chikumbira chekuti kuita izvi kuendeswe mberi. Vakati chikonzero chechikumbiro chavo chaive chekuti pamusoro pemhosva iri kupomerwa vanomwe ava, mapurisa aida kuwedzera imwe mhosva yekuburitsa mari munyika zviri kunze kwemutemo, uye kuti nekuda kwehudzamu hwayo, nyaya iyi inofanirwa kunzwikwa kudare rekuHwange, kwavakati ndiko kune vatongi vakakodzera kunzwa nyaya iyi. Muchuchisi negweta revanomwe ava VaGivemore Mvhiringi, vaive vabvumirana kuti nyaya iyi yaizotanga kutongwa svondo rapera rekare asi izvi zvakazotadza kuitika nekuda kwechikumbiro ichi. VaMuvhiringi vakaudza Studio 7 parunhare kuti vave kutarisira kuti dare richatara zuva rekutongwa kwenyaya iyi nemusi weChina. Mutongi wedare, Muzvare Rangarirai Gakanje, vakabvumirana negweta revanomwe ava kuti vave nenguva yakareba vari muhusungwa, vakati kutongwa kwayo kunofanirwa kutanga nekukasika. Zimbabwe ine mutemo unorambidza kuuraya pamwe nekutengesa kana kuve nenyanga dzemhuka dzakadai sechipembere nenzou zvisiri pamutemo. Kana vakabatwa nemhosva, mumwe nemumwe wevanomwe ava anogona kutongerwa kugara mujeri kwemakore manomwe kana kuraudzira pasina mukana wekubhadhara mari yefaindi. No media source currently available
title: Kushaikwa kweMuturikiri Kunotadzisa Kutongwa kweZvizvarwa zvekuChina

text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vakurudzira mhuri yeZimbabwe kuti ibatane pazororo rekisimusi kunyangwe hazvo vatenda kuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka munyaya dzezvehupfumi. Mumashoko avo kumhuri yeZimbabwe pazororo rekisimusi, VaMnangagwa vakakuridzira vanhu kuti vaise musoro pamwe chete vachiita mushandirapamwe kuti munyika muve nebudiriro. Vanoti matambudziko akatarisana nenyika anokwanisa kupera kana paine mushandirapamwe. Mutungamiri wenyika vatendawo vanobatsira vamwe zvikuru vanoshaya panguva ino yekisimusi. VaMnangagwa vati kisimusi inenge yakaomera vanhu asi zvakakosha kuti varambe vakazvipira, vakagadzika hana pasi uye kuva nerudo kuti nyika ivandudzike zvekare. Gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko Amai Monica Mutsvangwa vaudza Studio 7 kuti VaMnangagwa mutungamiri ane rudo uye akazvipira kugadzirisa zviri kunetsa. No media source currently available
title: Mumashoko Avo Pazuva reKisumusi VaMnangagwa Vokurudzira Kubatana

text: Sangano reZimbabwe Peace Project kana kuti ZPP rashora zvikuru nyaya yekushandisa midziyo yehurumende yakaita sezvikopo kopo inonzi iri kuitwa neZanu-PF musarudzo dzayo dzemaprimary elections.. ZPP yati kana Zanu-PF yakabhadhara mari kuti ishandise zvikopo kopo izvi vanhu vanofanira kuziva chokwadi chakatora nzvimbo sezvo iri mari yavo yemutero. Zvikopo kopo izvi zvakashandiswa kuMberengwa neGokwe Centre kutakura magwaro ekuvhotesa. Sarudzo dzemaprimary elections mubato reZanu-PF dziri kutarisirwa kuenderera mberi kune dzimwe nzvimbo sezvo kune vamwe vasati vavhota nezvikonzero zvakasiyana siyana. Sarudzo idzi dzaitarisirwa kupetwa nemusi weSvondo. ZPP inoti sarudzo dzemaprimary elections dzeZanu-PF dzakaitwa pachida kuyedza kuunzwa jekerere zvinova zvinokudzwa asi sangano iri riri kugunun’una zvikuru nenyaya yemhirizhonga kunzvimbo dzakaita seMazowe uye nyaya yekutenga mavhoti nekupa vanhu doro iri kupomerwa vamwe vari kukwikwidza musarudzo idzi. Asi mutungamiri wenyika vari mutungamiri webato iri VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vanoti kunyangwe hazvo paine zviri kunetsa musarudzo ,vari kuyedza kuumba hwaro hwekuunza jekerere mubato ravo.
title: Zanu-PF Yopomerwa Mhosva Yekushandisa Zvisizvo Zvikopo Kopo zveHurumende muSarudzo Dzayo

text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, nezuro vakadoma vatevedzeri vavo vaviri VaEmmerson Mnangagawa naVaPhelekezela Mphoko. Izvi zvinotevera kumiswa basa kwakaitwa vanga vari mutevedzeri waVaMugabe mubato nemuhurumende, Amai Joice Mujuru, vachivapomerwa mhosva dzakasiyana siyana dzisina hadzo humbowo hwakati tsvikiti uye dzisati dzaenda kumatare edzimhosva. Asi kunyange muZanu-PF muri kuita mashura nezviratidzo, vana veZimbabwe vakawanda vari kutaura paStudio 7 nekunyora matsamba vari kuchema chema kuti hupfumi hwenyika hunofanira kugadziriswa. Kudomwa kwaVaMnangagwa naVaMphoko kunoreva here kuti zvinhu zvave kuzochinja? Ko remangwana renyika rakamira sei tichitarisa vatungamiri ava? Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika, VaBlessing Vava, vanoti hapana chitsva chichaunzwa nevaviri ava. Asi gweta, VaStephen Zvinavakobvu, vanoti zvakaitwa naVaMugabe zvichabatsira mukugadzirisa zvinhu sezvo vari kuunza vatungamiri vatsva. No media source currently available
title: Kukosha kweVatevedzeri Vaviri Vakadomwa naVaMugabe Kozeyiwa

text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa,vati vakazvipira kuti vaite nhauririrano nemutungamiri weMDC Alliance, VaNelson Chamisa. Vachinyora padandemutande ravo reTwitter uye kutaura paZBC, VaMnangagwa vati vari kuda kuti pave nerunyararo nekubatana munyika. Vatiwo mukova wavo wakavhurika uye vakatambanudza maoko avo kuti vaite hurukuro naVaChamisa vachiisa nyika pamberi. Paturwa mutongo nedare, VaMnangagwa vabva vaita musangano nemagweta avo wekuzeya zvakabuda mudare. Hatina kukwanisa kubata VaChamisa sezvo vainge vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. Munyori wezvemutemo mubato reZanu-PF vari rimwe remagweta aVaMnangagwa, VaMunyaradzi Paul Mangwana, vati vafara zvikuru nezvabuda mudare. No media source currently available Mutauriri waVaChamisa, Doctor Nkululeko Sibanda, vanoti havana kufara uye havatambire zvabuda mudare. No media source currently available
title: VaMnangagwa Vanoti Vanoda Nhaurirano Asi VaChamisa Vachiti Pari Zvino Handiyo Nyaya Yakakosha

text: Masachigaro ematunhu ose gumi emunyika muboka reWomen's League yebato reZanu PF, vaungana nevamwe vatsigiri veZanu PF muBulawayo vachitsigira kuti Amai Eunice Sandi Moyo naAmai Sarah Mahoka vadzingwe muboka remadzimai. Vamwe vatsigiri veZanu PF vakatanga kuratidzira nemusi weChipiri mumatunhu akasiyana siyana vachiti vaviri ava vadzingwe mubato. Kwezuva rechitatu neChishanu vamwe vatsigiri veZanu PF varatidzira paDavies Hall unove muzinda webato iri muBulawayo vachiti mutevedzeri weboka remadzimai, Amai Eunice Sandi Moyo, pamwe nemubati wehomwe muboka iri, Amai Sarah Mahoka, vanofanirwa kudzingwa mubato iri. Vose vataura pachiitiko ichi vatuka nekushora Amai Sandi Moyo naAmai Mahoka avo vavari kupomera mhosva dzakawanda kusanganisira kuzvidza mukuru weboka remadzimai, Amai Grace Mugabe, pamwe nekuba mari dzemusangano. Sachigaro weMashonaland Central, avo vangozvidoma nezita rekuti Amai Jonga, vati Amai Mugabe vari kuunza budiriro mudunhu ravo vakatiwo munhu wese anovazvidza haafanirwe kuve mumusangano. Vanhu vange vachiratidzira ava vazoparara pasina kutaurwa kuti chii chichaitika. Kunyange hazvo Amai Sandi Moyo nezuro vakati havasi kutirimuka nezviri kuitika sezvo vachiti havana chavakatadza, vamwe vanoziva zviri kuitika vanoti ivo naAmai Mahoka vachatodzingwa mubato sezviri kutaurwa. Vamwe vatsigiri veZanu PF vasina kuda kubuda pamhepo vati zvinovashamisa kuti Amai Sandi Moyo naAmai Mahoka vave kuburitsirwa mapanga asi ivo vaiziikanwa nekutsigira vechikwata cheZanu PF chinonzi G40 icho chinonzi chinotsigira Amai Mugabe. Amai Mahoka vakamboita mukurumbira mushure mekutuka mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vachivati vanoda kupandukira VaMugabe. VaMunangagwa vanonzi ndivo vanotungamira chikwata chinoziikanwa chichinzi La Coste. VaVusumuzi Moyo avo vati vanoteverera zvikuru zviri kuitika muZanu PF vati hazvivashamise kuti Amami Sandi Moyo naAmai Mahoka vave kuburitsirwa mapanaga vachiti iyi inogona kuve nzira yevamwe vanotsigira Amai Mugabe kuti vasawane angavakwikwidza pakuda kuve mumwe wevatevedzeri vemutungamiri webato reZanu PF. Mumwe murwiri wekodzero dzevanhu, Muzvare Nozipho Moyo, vati zvinhu zvinovarwadza zvikuru kuowna madzimai achidhonzerana pasi. Vamwe vanoti zviri kuitika kuna Amai Sandi Moyo naAmai Mahoka mucherechedzo wekuti makakatanwa ari mubato reZanu PF ekuti ndiani achatsiva VaMugabe pachigaro, ari kuramba achikura. No media source currently available
title: Madzimai eZanu PF Oratidzira Achiti Amai Sandi Moyo naAmai Mahoka Vadzingwe.

text:
Zvikoro zvavhurwa zvakavhurwa neMuvhuro asi vadzidzi vakawanda vavo asiri kufara nemari dzavari kutambiriswa havana kuenda kubasa zvapa kuti vana vakawanda vadzokere kumba. Asi mutauriri webazi rezvedzidzo VaTaungana Ndoro vaudza Studio 7 kuti kazhinji panovhurwa zvikoro varairidzi vanenge vari vashoma vozowanda nekufamba kwenguva. Vati varairidzi vanodarika zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana vange vari pabasa. Asi masangano evarairidzi, vana nevabekere vanoti kusvikoro kwange kusina kana varairidzki Mumwe mudzidzi wegwaro repasi pachikoro cheLomagundi muChinhoyi watisingagone kudoma nezita sezvo achiri mudiki anoti kuchikoro hakuna vadzidzisi vakauya uey vakadzoserwa kumba

Vadzidzisi vari kuti havasi kuzoenda kubasa kana hurumende isati yavapa mari dzemihoro dzinovakwanira. Pamusoro pemihoro inokwana vadzidzisi vanoti vari kuda zvikwanisiro zvekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19 muzvikoro. No media source currently available  Mumwe mudzidzisi wepachikoro cheMhanyame muChinhoyi VaRosten Matapwa vanoti vadzidzisi vakawanda havasati vagadzirira sezvo kugadzirira kuchida mari iyo yavasiri kupihwa.

VaMutapwa vanoti hazvigone kuti vadzidzisi vaende kuchikoro kunodzidzisa vana vevamwe vavo vari kumba.


Izvi zvatsinhirwa nemutungamiri werimwe sangano rino miririra varairidzi reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe-PTUZ-VaTakavafira Zhou avo vanoti kuti zvikoro zvivhurwe vadzidzisi vanofanirwa kupihwa mari yemihoro inovakwanira pamwe nekuti muzvikoro much nezvikwanisiro zvekudzivirira kutapuriranwa kwechirwere cheCovid-19 here.

VaZhou vanoti zvikoro zvavhurwa zvakavharwa nekuda kwekusavimbika munhaurirana dzemihoro kwehurumende.

Mutungamiri werimwe sangano revadzidzisi rekumaruwa reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe-ARTUZ-VaObert Masaraure vanoti hazvishamise kuti vadzidzisi havana kuenda kubasa nhasi sezvo vasina mari yekufambisa.

Asi vachitaura nebepanhau reChronicle, gurukota rezvevashandi Muzvinafundo Paul Mavima vati hurumende yakagadzirira kutaura nevashandi vayo vakakurudzira kuti vadzidzisi vasaramwe mabasa sezvo nyaya dzavo dziri kugadziriswa.

Mumwe mubereki wemuHarare VaNicodemas Kacheru vanoti vadzidzisi nehurumende vanofanirwa kutaurirana vapedzerane sezvo vabereki vari kubhadhara mari dzakawanda asi vana vavo vasingadzidze.

Vamwe vabereki vakaita saMuzvare Hilda Samboko vekuKaroi vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kubhadhara vadzidzisi mari dzemihoro nemadhora ekuAmerica kugadzirisa dambudziko iri, ravanoti rave nenguva yakareba.

Kunyange sangano revakuru vezvikoro reZimbabwe National Union of Schools Heads-ZINUSH-rakange razivisa svondo rapera kuti nhengo dzaro dzainge dzisingaende kubasa nhasi nekuda kwekuti havana mari, vakawanda vavo vaende kubasa nhasi muChinhoyi.

Vadzidzisi vanoti vanofanirwa kupihwa mari dzemihoro dzinosvika madhora mazana mashanu nemakumi mana emadhora ekuAmerica mari yavaihora mugore ra2018.

Vadzidzi vanonzi havana kuenda kubasawo munzvimbo dzakawanda dzino sanganisira Harare, Masvingo, Kadoma, Karoi, Bulawayo neMutare.
title: Varairidzi Vakawanda Voramwa Mabasa Pakuvhurwa KweZvikoro, Asi Hurumende Ichiti Mugariro Vachadzoka Havo

text: Kunyange hazvo zvinhu zvakaoma munyika munyaya dzehupfumi, vatenderi vechiKristu vari kuungana munzvimbo dzakasiyana munyika vachirangarira zuva rekuroverwa pamuchinjikwa kwaJesu Kristu pamwe nekufira kwaakaitira zvivi zvavo. Vatenderi vesvondo yeRoman Catholic yeUganda Matyrs muHarare vafamba nemigwagwa vatakataura chipiyaniso vasati vaenda kuchechi yavo kunoita munamato weGood Friday. Mumwe mutenderi, Amai Eugania Phiri, vaudza Studio 7 kuti nhasi izuva rakakosha zvikuru sezvo ndipo apo Jesu akafa akaenda nezvivi zvevanhu vese. Mumwe wechidiki apinda mumunamato waitwa muHarare, Abraham Moyo, anoti ari kufara zvakanyanya nhasi nekuti ndiro zuva musiki vakaratidza rudo rwavo rukuru kuvanhu vese. Reverand Sam Malunga, veTehillar Christian Network, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vatendenderi vemachechi mashanu ari pasi pemubatanidzwa uyu vakaungana kuMelfort uko vari kunamata vachicherechedza kuroverwa pamuchinjikwa, kufa nekumuka kwaJesu Kristu. VaMalunga vanoti vafara kuti vatenderi vauya nehuwandu hwavo kunyange hazvo zvinhu zvakaoma munyika. Asi Pastor Cover Mugwadi vesvondo yeChrist Life Church vaudza Studio 7 kuti kunyange hazvo Good Friday riri zuva rakakosha sezvo riri zuva rakaunza ruponeso nekuregererwa kwevatenderi vechiKristu, nhengo zhinji dzesvondo yavo dzatadza kuenda kugagano resvondo yavo rekucherechedza zuva iri kwaChivi kuMasvingo nekuda kwekuoma kwezvinhu. Vatenderi kubva kumachechi akawanda vanoungana vachinamata kutanga nhasi kusvika musi weMuvhuro pao vanopemberera kumuka kwaJesu mukufa. No media source currently available
title: Vatenderi Vanounga muHarare Vachicherechedza Zuva reKufa kwaJesu Kristu

text: Gavhuna vebhanga guru renyika, Doctor John Mangudya, vayambira kuti kukwidza mihoro pane ino nguva kunokanganisa hupfumi hwenyika, sezvo zvinhu zvisina kumira zvakanaka munyaya dzeupfumi. Vachitaura nemusi weChina mangwanani muguta reBulawayo pamusangano wakokerwa neZimbabwe National Chamber of Commerce, ZNCC, VaMangudya vati kunze kwekukwidza mari dzemihoro, chinofanirwa kuitwa kuderedza mitengo yezvinhu kuitira kuti ifambidzane nemari dziri kutambirwa nevanhu. Sangano reZNCC ranga rakoka VaMangudya kuti vakurukure nezvekupinzwa kwemari yesimbi yema bond coins, iyo inonzi haisi kutambirwa nevemabhizimusi vakawanda. Doctor Mangudya vakurudzira vemabhizimusi kuti vatambire mari iyi sezvo iine huremu hwemari yekuAmerica iyo iri kunyanyoshanda munyika. VaMangudya vati vanhu vari kupihwa chenji yemari yekuSouth Africa yemarhandi vanogona kunge vari kubirwa sezvo mari iyi iri kuramba ichiderera huremu hwayo. Vamwe vemabhizimusi madiki vapinda mumusangano uyu vakurudziranawo kuti vatambire mari yesimbi iyi senzira yekurerutsira vanhu. Asi nyanzvi mune zveupfumi uye vari mukuru wesangano reCentre for Disability and Development, VaMasimba Kuchera, vanoti chinodiwa pane ino nguva hakusi kudzikiswa kwemitengo yezvinhu chete, asi kuti kuderedzwawo kwemitero nehurumende. VaKuchera vanoti hazvibatsiri kuti hurumende irambe ichibhadharisa mitero yepamusoro kuzvinhu zvakaita semafuta ekufambisa nezvimwe, sezvo mitero iyi ichizongodzikiswa kune vanotenga zvinhu, avo vari kutambira mari shoma. No media source currently available
title: Gavhuna veRBZ Vokurudzira Kusakwidzwa kweMihoro

text: Komisheni inoona nezvekurwisa huori munyikz yeZimbabwe Anti-Corruption Commission kana kuti ZACC inoti yatanga kuongorora gwaro rayakapihwa nemumiri weNorton mudare reparamende VaTemba Mliswa avo vari kupomera gurukota rezvematunhu VaJuly Moyo, mhosva dzehouri papombi dzemvura muHarare. VaMliswa vaudza Studio 7 kuti kunyangwe hurumende yekuNetherlands kuburikidza nemuzinda wayo muZimbabwe yakapa dhorobha reHarare pombi dzemvura pachena, VaMoyo vakaenda kudare remakurukota vakatora mari inosvika mamiriyoni gumi-US$10 million vachiti vaida kutenga pombi. VaMliswa vanotiwo pombi idzi dzinoita mamiriyoni maviri emadhora chete US$2 million. Vatiwo vaishanda naVaMoyo vakangoenda kunogadzirisa dzimwe pombi dzainge dzafa ndokuita sekunge vainge vatenga itsva. Mutauriri weZACC VaJohn Makamure vaudza Studio 7 kuti vakatambira gwaro raVaMliswa uye vave kuita ongororo yavo vasati vatora danho rekuti voendesa nyaya iyi kumuchuchusi mukuru wehurumende here kana kuti kwete. VaMliswa vanoti humbowo hwekuti pane huori hwakaitwa huripo asi dzimwe nguva ZACC haina zvainozoita. Asi VaMliswa vati havasi kufara nehofisi yemuchuchusi. VaMliswa vaendererawo mberi vakati pane vekunze vakapa mari isina kufambiswa zvakanaka. Asi vachipindura, meya weHarare VaStewart Mutizwa varamba kuti pane hupori hwakaitwa naVaMoyo. VaMtizwa vati kanzuru ndiyo yakakumbira kuti pombi dzitengwe. Hatina kukwanisa kubata VaMoyo kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi sezvo nharembozha dzavo dzange dzisiri kudairwa. Studio 7 hainawo kukwanisa kutaura nemumiriri weNetherlands muZimbabwe Amai Margaret Verwijk sezvo nhare yavo yange isiri kudairwa. No media source currently available
title: ZACC Yoongorora Gurukota rezveMatunhu VaJuly Moyo paMhosva yeHuori Yavari Kupomerwa naVaMliswa

text:
Vamwe vatungamiri veboka revechidiki reZanu PF vaviri nhasi vadoma vana muzvinabhizimusi vatatu sevanhu vari kuita huwori hwakanyanya munyika izvo vanoti zviri kukonzera kuti veruzhinji vadye nhoko dzezvironda. Vachitaura nevatori venhau muHarare, munyori muboka revechidiki reZanu PF Youth League VaLewis Matutu pamwe nemurongi wemisangano muboka iri, VaGodfrey Tsenengamu, vapomera VaKuda Tagwirei veSakunda Holdings, VaBilly Rautenbach veGreen Fuels nemutungamiri weGrain Millers Association of Zimbabwe, VaTafadzwa Musarara mhosva yekuita huwori hwakanyanyisa. Vaviri ava, avo vati vanga vachitaura vakazvimirira vasina kumirira bato ravo, vanoti zviri kuitwa nevatatu ava ndizvo zviri kukonzera kuti vashoma vazvimbe matumbu nekuguta veruzhinji vachinhonga svosve nemuromo.

VaMatutu vati vari kuita huwori hwakanyanya ndiVaTagwirei, avo vavapomera mhosva yekupihwa basa rekutenga zvose zvinodiwa nehurumende voshandisa mukana uyu kuita huwori vachitiwo zvinoshamisa kuti VaTagwirei ndivo voga vanongopihwa ma tender nehurumende kuburikidza nebhanga guru renyika reReserve Bank of Zimbabwe. Vatiwo VaTagwirei ndivo vari kuisa mari pamusika mutema zviri kuita kuti huremu hwemari yemunyika hudzikire uye hupfumi hwenyika huwire pasi.

Hatina kukwanisa kutaura naVaTagwirei kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi sezvo nharembozha yanga isiri kudairwa. Nekune rumwe rutivi, VaTsenengamu vapomerawo VaRautenbach mhosva yekukonzeresa kushaikwa kwemafuta edzimotokari munyika sezvo varivo voga vane kambani inobvumidzwa kusanganisa mafuta ne ethanol kana kuti blending.

VaMatutu vapomerawo VaMusarara mhosva yekuita huwori huri kukonzera kushayikwa kwehupfu muzvitoro. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura naVaMusarara naVaRautenbach kuti tinzwe divi ravo pamhosva dzavapomerwa nevaviri ava. Asi mutauriri weGrain Millers Association of Zimbabwe, VaGarikai Chaunza vati havasi kuzotaura nezvenyaya iyi kudzamara VaMatutu naVaTsenengamu vaunza humbowo hwezvavataura.

Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika uye vachishanda nesangano reZimbabwe Democracy Institute, VaBekezela Gumbo, vati zviri pachena nyaya yehuwori ndiyo iri kuwisira hupfumi hwenyika pasi, kwete zvirango izvo zvinogarochemwachemwa nazvo nehurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa.

Mashoko aVaGumbo aya anowirirana neemumiriri weAmerica muno, VaBrian Nichols, avo vakati kupfunya chisero kwaita huwori munyika ndiko kwaita kuti hupfumi hwenyika huende kumawere.

Asi imwe nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika uye vari nhengo yebato reZanu PF, VaTafadzwa Mugwadi, vaudza Studio 7 kuti VaTsenengamu naVaMatutu havana kunyatsobuda pachena zvakanaka nenyaya yavo.

VaTsenengamu naVaMatutu vati vanamuzvinabhizimusi ava vari kufamba vachishandisa mazita evakuru muhurumende kusanganisira VaMnangagwa, izvo zvisiri zvechokwadi kuti vaite zvehuori. VaMatutu vati VaMnangagwa havasi pasi pevavati makoronyera ava. Vatiwo vari kushushikana nekuti vezvemitemo kusanganisira vekomisheni inorwisana nehuori yeZimbabwe Anti-Corruption Commission, havasi kuita basa ravo nemazvo vachiti vari kufungidzirawo zvakare kuti vamwe vavo vari kuita zvehuwori kuitira kuti vanenge vaine mhosva dzehuwori vasabatwe nemhosva dzavanenge vachipomerwa. Sachigaro veZACC, Amai Loice Matanda Moyo vati tigovafonera asi pataenda pamhepo vanga vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. Asi Amai Matanda Moyo vakaudza nhepfenyuro yeZBC svondo rapera kuti komisheni yavo iri kushanda zvakasimba kuti vose vari kupomerwa mhosva dzehuwori vavharirwe mumajeri.

Zvichakadai, VaMatutu naVaTsenengamu vati vachaumba gungano reveruzhinji rakanangana nekurwisana nehuwori risineyi nezvematongerwo enyika, vachiti huwori huri kuitika munyika huri kukanganisa raramo yemunhu wese zvisineyi nekuti munhu anotsigira bato ripi. Vaviri ava vati vanoziva kuti nyaya yekurwisana nehuwori iyi ine makuva pasi asi vati vakagadzirira sezvo vachiti vari kurwira kuti veruzhinji vagute munyika zvisineyi nezvematongerwo enyika. No media source currently available
title: Vechidiki muZanu PF Vofumura Vavanoti Vari Kunyanya Kuita zveHuwori

text: Kuenderera mberi kwedenda reCovid 19 kwapinza vanorarama nehusope munguva yakaoma sezvo zviri kuvashaisa chekudya pamwe nemafuta avanozora senzira yekudzivirira gomarara reganda, rinova ndiro denda rinonyanya kuvhiringidza hutano hwavo. Studio 7 yataura nevakawanda vane dambudziko iri, avo vatiwo havana mufaro munzvimbo dzavanogara sezvo vachisarurwa kana kutsvinyirwa nevanhu vavanogara navo kana vavakidzani navo. Amai Gertrude Alumendo, avo vanogara kuDzivaresekwa Extension, vati vakatizwa nemurume wavo mugore 2014 nekuti haana kutambira zvakanaka kuzvarwa kwevana vavo vaviri avo vanorarama nehusope uye vanofanirwa kugara vakazorwa mafuta anochengetedza ganda ravo. Amai Alumendo vaendera mberi vachiti vapererwa kuti voita sei nekuti hapana chavari kukwanisa kutengesa kubva gore rakapera apo nyika yakavharwa kubudikidza nechirwere cheCovid 19, uye nerumwe rutivi vachioneswawo nhamo nevaridzi veimba yavanoroja. Mukuru wesangano reGlobal Aid Missions, Amai Esther Chasi, avo vane vana vaviri vanorarama nehusope, vatsinhira zvataurwa naAmai Arumendo vachiti mudzimai uyu anorarama nemaricho pamwe nekuwacha mbatya dzevanhu kuDzivaresekwa kwavanogara. Amai Chasi vaendera mberi vachiti ichokwadi kuti mafuta e sunscreen lotion haasi kuwanika sezvaaimboitika zvichikonzerwa nekuvharwa kwenyika kubudikidza nedenda reCovid 19.  Asi VaStephen Nyamapfeka Bandera vekuHatcliffe, avo vane vana vana vanorarama nehusope, vati vakasarudza kumira nemudzimai wavo pakuchengeta vana vavo zvekuti havambozviisa mupfungwa kuti vana ava ndozvavari. Asi vati kunyange hazvo vachimboedza kuriritira mhuri yavo nepose pavanokwanisa, vasvika pakuomerwa nekuti mari yokuti vana vawane zvese zvinodiwa zuva nezuva pamwe nekuzvikoro kwavo haisi kubatika nekuda kwedenda reCovid-19 iro ravhiringidza zvinhu zvakawanda. VaBandera vati pakamboitawo hama neshamwari vakamboedza kuvafurira kuramba mudzimai wavo nekuda kwevana vavo asi vakatsidza kumira naye vachiti vakanzwisisa kuti dambudziko iri harisi remubereki mumwechete, asi kuti nderavo vari vaviri. Muzvare Gamuchirai Uzande, avo vanoshanda nesangano re Alive Albinism Initiative, vati mishonga kana mafuta zvinobatsira vanorarama nehusope zviri kushomeka kana kutoshaikwa zvachose nekuti nyika nemasangano vari mhiri kwemakungwa vanombovabatsira vari kurwisanawo nedenda reCovid 19. Muzvare Uzande vaendera mberi vachiti nekuda kweCovid-19, sangano ravo gore rino harina kukwanisa kupemberera zuva rekucherechedza vanorarama nehusope kana kuti International Albism Awareness Day, iro rinocherechedzwa musi wa13 Chikumi pasi rose, sezvo mitemo yeCovid 19 isingabvumidze kuungana kwevanhu vakawanda. Munyori mukuru weZimbabwe Association of Doctors for Human Rights, Dr. Norman Matara, vati hurumende ndiyo inofanira kuona kuti vanhu vanorarama nehusope vawana mishonga yekuzora miviri yavo uye nemimwe mishonga yemamwe matenda avanosangana nawo. Doctor Matara vati rubatsiro rwuzhinji rwunonyanya kuwanikwa kubva kumasangano asiri ehurumende asi haazi kukwanisa kupedza dambudziko remishonga inodiwa nevarapwa ava nokuti anongowana mishoma. Sachigaro vekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvehutano, Dr. Ruth Labode, vatsigirawo vachiti zvipatara zvehurumende hazvina mishonga inodiwa nevanorarama nehusope, uye vaendera mberi vachiti bhanga reReserve Bank of Zimbabwe rinofanirwa kukurudzirwa kuti ripewo makambani mari yekunze kuti vakwanise kutenga mishonga iyi. Asi vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemashoko mubazi rezvehutano nekurerwa kwakanaka kwevana, VaDonald Mujiri, vaudza Studio 7 kuti pane zviri kuitwa nebazi ravo zvekutsigira masangano akazvimirira kuti akwanise kutenga mishonga iyi kubva kunze kuitira kuti vanhu vanorarama nehusope vabatsirike. Tsvagurudzo yakaitwa nebazi rezvehutano richibatsirwa nesangano reUnited Nations Children’s Fund mugore ra2015 inoratidza kuti Zimbabwe ine vanhu vanodarika zviuru makumi masere vari kurarama nehusope. No media source currently available
title: Vanorarama neHusope Voomerwa neHupenyu muNguva Ino yeCovid-19

text: Vechidiki vebato reMDC inotungamiririrwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai nhasi vapinda mumigwagwa muKambuzuma Constituency vachikurudzira vagari kuti vanyorese kuvhota muchiitiko chatsigirwa nevamwe vavo kubva kubato riri kutonga reZanu PF. Avo ndevamwe vechidiki vachi kurudzira vagari vemuKambuzuma kuenda kunonyoresa kuvhota. Munyori anoona nezvekufambiswa kwezvirongwa muMDC-T Youth Assembly muKambuzuma, VaSimon Mafunga, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vaita chirongwa ichi sezvo pange pasina ruzivo munzvimbo iyi pamusoro pechirongwa chekunyoresa vavhoti patsva cheBiometric Voter Registration kana kuti BVR. VaMafunga vati chirongwa chavo chafamba zvakanaka uye vafara chose nekutambirwa kwavaitwa neveruzhinji. Vechidiki veZanu PF vapinda muchiitiko ichi asi havana kuda kudomwa nemazita avo sezvo vange vasina kupihwa mvumo kubva kubato. Mumwe wechidiki veZanu PF audza Studio 7 kuti afara chose kuti vafamba vachibatsira vanhu kunyoresa kuvhota zvisineyi nekuti munhu anotsigira bato ripi. Mumwewo wechidiki weMDC T asina kuda kudomwa nezita rake sezvo asingabvumidzwe kutaura nevatori venhau zvakare ari gweta audza Studio 7 kuti afara chose nechiitiko chanhasi sezvo abatsira vanhu vakawanda nekuvasainira magwaro anoratidza kuti vanogara papi izvo zvinodiwa kuti munhu anyorese kuvhota. Vechidki ava vati vacharamba vachiita chirongwa chavaita nhasi kusvikira musi wa19 Zvita apo kunyoresa kwevanhu kuvhota kuchapera mudunhu mavo. Vatiwo kushanda kwavaita nhasi kwaratidza kuti vanokwanisa kushanda vose nguva nenguva pasina mhirizhonga. Zimbabwe ichaita sarudzo gore rinouya uye pari zvino komiti inoona nezvesarudzo yeZimbabwe Electoral Commission iri kuumba gwaro idzva revavhoti. No media source currently available
title: Vechidiki veMDC-T neZanu PF Vanokurudzira Vanhu Kunyoresa Kuvhota

text: No media source currently available Dare repamusoro soro muZanu PF, rePolitburo, rakasangana muHarare neChitatu rikabuda nechisungo chekuita kongiresi yechimbichimbi. Zvinonzi vakuru muZanu PF vakati musangano wepagore we National Annual Conference, uyo uri kuitirwa kuGwanda, Matabeleland South muna Zvita, uitwe musangano wekongiresi inokwanisa kudoma vamwe vatungamiri vatsva. Mukuru anoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa mubato iri, VaIgnatius Chombo, vaudza Studio 7 kuti bato ravo richabuda nechisungo chakajeka svondo rinouya apo vachashangana zvakare sedare rePolitburo. VaChombo, avo vanova gurukota idzva rezvemari, vabvuma kuti ichokwadi kuti pane hurongwa hwakadai huri kuitika mubato ravo. Vamwe vakuru veZanu-PF vaudza Studio 7 kuti mukupera kwesvondo rino matunhu ose ebato iri anofanira kuzeya kuti otambira chisungo ichi here kana kuti kwete. Izvi ndizvo zvanzi nerimwe gweta mubato iri risina kuda kudomwa nezita zvinofanira kuitwa kana pachitevedzwa bumbiro remitemo yebato iri. Dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika dzinoti kuvandudza musangano uyu kunogona kunge kwakanangana nekuda kubvisa mumwe mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, avo vari kunetsana zvakanyanya naAmai Grace Mugabe nevamwe vavo vari muchikwata chinonzi Generation 40. Asi vamwe vanotsigira chikwata chinonzi chinotungamirwa naVaMnangagwa cheTeam Lacoste vaudzawo Studio 7 kuti musangano uyu unogona kuitwa wekusimbisa kuti mutungamiri wenyika vaRobert Mugabe ndivo vachatungamira bato musarudzo dzegore rinouya. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika, uye vari mukuru weMedia Center, VaEarnest Mudzengi, vanoti makakatanwa ari muZanu-PF ndiwo ari kupa kuti paitwe musangano wechimbi chimbi uyu.
title: Zanu-PF Yoronga Kuita Kongiresi yeChimbichimbi

text: MDC inotungamirirwa naVaNelson Chamisa yakaita musangano neChitatu muHarare wekurangarira mutungamiri wekutanga webato iri, mushakabvu Morgan Richard Tsvangirai, avo vakashaya makore maviri apfuura. Bato reMDC rakaitawo misangano yakadai yekurangarira VaTsvangirai mumatunhu akasiyanasiyana emunyika, kusanganisira kwaMutoko kuMashonaland East neBindura kuMashonaland Central, uko VaChamisa vakanotaura vatsigiri vebato iri. Musangano wemuHarare uyu unonzi wakapindwa nenhengo dzeZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, vemasangano akazvimirira, pamwe nevamwe vamiriri vemizinda yedzimwe nyika. VaChamisa ndemumwe wevanhu vakataura pamusangano uyu. Mutauriri waVaChamisa, Doctor Nkululeko Sibanda, vanoti VaChamisa vari kusimudzira pakasiirwa basa naVaTsvangirai, uye chido chavo ndechekuti vanhu vawane mabasa, runyararo munyika yavo. No media source currently available
title: Muchakabvu Tsvangirai Vorangarirwa neMDC

text:
Vanhu vakawanda munyika vanoti musangano weUnited Nations General
Assemly, UNGA, wakakosha sezvo uchigadzirisa matambudziko ari munyika dzakasiyana siyana.
