Nyanzvi munyaya dzemitemo, VaAlex Magaisa, vanoti gungano reUNGA rakakosha sezvo richiunganidza vatungamiri venyika dzose vachitaurirana zvavanenge vachida kuti zvinzwikwe nevamwe zvinenge zvichinetsa munyika dzavo.

Asi VaMagaisa, avo vaive chipangamazano chikuru chemutungamiri wehurumende munguva yehurumende yemubatanidzwa, muchakabvu Morgan Tsvangirai, vanoti UNGA inofanirwa kuvandudzwa kuitira kuti imirire
nyika dzose, kwete kupa simba nyika dzinowana kudarika dzinonetseka seZimbabwe. Mukuru wePlatform for Youth Development, VaClaris Madhuku, vanotiwo UNGA yakakosha sezvo ichipa vatungamiri venyika mikana yekuzeya zvinhu zvakawanda zvinosanganisira kuti pave nerunyararo pasi rose,kubudirira kwenyika, uye kuremekedzwa kwekodzero dzevanhu pamwe nekuderedza hurombo pasi rose.

Mutevedzeri wemutauriri weMDC Alliance, VaClifford Hlatywayo, vanotiwo UNGA yakakosha sezvo pasina nyika inogona kurarama iri yega.

Mutauriri webato reMDC T, VaWitness Dube, vanoti mutungamiri wenyika,
VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vanofanirwa kugadzirisa hukama hweZimbabwe nedzimwe nyika, vachiteerera zviri kutaurwa nedzimwe nyika uye kutiwo dzimwe nyika dziteererewo VaMnangagwa kuitira kuti Zimbabwe ibude mumatambudziko airi ezvehupfumi nezvematongerwo enyika.

Musangano weUnited Nations ndewechimakumi manomwe nematanhatu kubva zvawavambwa muna 1945 nenyika makumi mashanu neimwe chete
mushure mehondo yechipiri yepasi rose. No media source currently available
title: Nyanzvi Dzotaura Pamusoro peMusangano weUNGA

text: Vagari vekuMasvingo vanoti pasarudzo dzerwendo runo vachavhotera vanhu vane ruzivo rwemafambisirwo emabasa emakanzuru, kwete kuvhotera munhu wese wese. Vachitaura pamusangano wedzidziso yekuvhota waitwa neMasvingo United Residents and Rate Payers Allance (MURRA), vagari vati nyaya yekuvhotera mapato pasina kutarisa ari kuvhoterwa yaiita kuti maguta asabudirire. Vagari vati rwendo rwuno vachaongorora vanoda kuvhoterwa muzvigaro kwete vanhu vanovimbisa kutenga mabhokisi ekuviga vanhu vanenge vafa muwadhi ravanomirira. Muzvare Susan Zvare vanoti vachatarisisa kanzura ane ruzivo rwekufambiswa kwebasa rekanzuru uye ari mudzimai zvisineyi nekuti anobva kubato ripi rematongerwo enyika. Muzvare Zvare vakaudza Studio7 kuti, “Ini pama elections arikutevera ndiri kutarisa quality yemunhu wandinoda kuvhotera kuti anozokwanisa here kuita articulate service delivery kwete anoti ndizokutengerai coffin, arisi basa rake kuti tengera coffin kune ma insurance companies anoita izvozvo, uyezve ndinotarisa kuvhotera madzimai.” Muzvare Benhilda Ncube vatiwo zvakakosha kutarisa dzidzo dzevanhu vasati vavhoterwa nekuti mabasa ekufambisa zvinhu zveguta anoda ruzivo. Amai Gloria Chirimbana vati makore ano haasi ekuvhotera vemapato vanotsaga rutsigiro nekutengera vanhu doro nesadza, asi vasina zvavanoziva. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa muMURRA, Muzvare Esther Chimanikire, vanoti vakaona zvakakosha kudzidzisa vagari kuti vaongorore vanhu vavanovhotera kuitira kuti basa rizofambiswa zvakanaka mudhorobha. “Mukuinda medu muma communities vanhu havasi kufara ne service delivery mum award avo, saka tapinda se organization tiri kuona kuti hatisi kuwana ma quality councilors anokwanisa kuita basa saka ma political parties anotipa ma candidates asina quality mamwe anozongodzoka after five years saka isu sevagari tinoda vanoziva nezve service delivery this time,” Muzvare Chimanikire vanodaro. Sangano re Murra rinoti riri kuita zvirongwa zvakawanda zvekudzidzisa vagari kuti vanyorese kuvhota kuitira kuti vazokwanise kusaraudza makanzera ane ruzivo rwezvebasa ravo rekuvandudza guta. No media source currently available
title: Vanogara kuMasvingo Vanoti Havachada Zvekusarudzirwa Makanzura

text:
Magweta ane mukurumbira munyika pamwe nemasangano anoshanda akazvimirira ari kuronga kuendesa hurumende kumatare achipikisa matanho akatorwa nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, ekusaina Constitutional Amendment Bill No. 2 kuti rive mutemo, achiti zvakaitwa izvi zvinotyora bumbiro remitemo yenyika. Magweta aya nemasangano akazvimirira ari kuita chipatapata kunyora magwaro ekupikisa zvakaitwa naVaMnangagwa mushure mekunge dare reSenate rapasisa bhiri iri nemusi weChipiri. Magweta ataura neStudio7 anoti magwaro ekupikisa aya achasvitswa mumatare edzimhosva chero nguva kutanga nemusi weMuvhuro mushure mekunge hurumende yadhinda mutemo uyu uye waburitswa zviri pamutemo muGovernment Gazette. Mukuru wesangano rinomirira masangano akazvimirira reZimbabwe Human Rights NGO Forum, VaMusa Kika, vati vari kushanda nemamwe masangano anova nhengo dzavo akaita seVeritas pamwe nemagweta anosanganisira mutevedzeri wemutungamiri weMDC Alliance, VaTendai Biti, pamwe negweta remutungamiri weMDC Alliance, VaNelson Chmaiswa, VaThabani Mpofu nemamwe magweta ane mukurumbira munyika kuitira kuti varuke nyaya yakasimba yekupikisa zvakaitika pabjiri iri. VaKika vati vari kukwidza nyaya iyi kumatare sezvo vanhu vange
vakatarisira kuti bumbiro remitemo rizadziswe kutanga muna 2023 sezviri mubumbiro iri, kwete kuti rishandurwe nevanhu vasina masimba ekuita izvi. Mutauriri wesangano remagweta anorwira kodzero dzevanhu, reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights, VaKumbirai Mafunda,vati magweta avo ari kugadzirira kupikisa zvakaitwa nedare reSenate pamwe naVaMnangagwa vachiti zvinotyora bumbiro remitemo yenyika.

Mukuru werimwe sangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu reZimbabwe Human Rights, VaDzikamai Bere, vatiwo vachaenda kumatare vachipikisa
kugadzwa kwemutemo uyo vanoti unokurudzira hutongi wehumbimbindoga.

Asi VaBere vati zvakakosha kuti zvizvarwa zvose zveZimbabwe zviite zvazvinokwanisa senzira yekuratidza kutsutsumwa kwazvo nemutemo uyu.

Mutauriri wesangano ravana chipangamazano munyaya dzemitemo, reVeritas, VaValentine Maponga, vabvuma kuti ichokwadi kuti sangano ravo riri kuendesa kumatare nyaya yekupasiswa kweConstitutional Amendment Number 2. Munyori wezvemutemo muZanu-PF, VaMunyaradzi Paul Mangwana, vati ikodzero yemunhu wose kuenda kumatare kana paine zvaanofunga kuti hazvina kufambiswa zvakanaka sezviri kuda kuitwa nemasangano aya. Asi VaMangwana vati masangano aya ari kuteya nzou neriva sezvo
asingabudirire nekuti paramende yakatevedzera mutemo sezvinodikanwa. Nyanzvi munyaya dzemitemo uye vari mutungamiri weNational Constitutional Assembly, Professor Lovemore Madhuku, vanoti kubudirira kwenyaya yekuendesa hurumende kumatare kunoenderana nekuti zvikonzero zvavo zvine hudzanu here kana kuti kwete pamberi pedare. VaMadhuku vanoti vari kuenda kumatare vanofanirwa kuziva kuti kumatare uku ndiko kune vatongi vanowana chouviri kuburikidza nemutemo mutsva uyu. Sachigaro veCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition, VaRashid Mahiya, vati sangano ravo rine hurongwa hwekuratidzira kusafara kwaro nezvakaitika pamutemo mutsva uyu. Bepanhau repaindaneti, re The NewsHawks, rinotiwo magweta ari kuenda kumatare aya ari kuda kushandisa chikamu chebumbiro remitemo che Section 328, icho chinosungira kutanga chashandurwa mushure mereferendamu kuti chivandudzwe, izvo zvisina kuitwa. Mutemo uyu unopa VaMnangagwa masimba ekuwedzera makore ekushanda evatongi vematare edzimhosva kubva pamakore makumi manomwe avaifanirwa kuenda pamudyandigere. The NewsHawks rinoti mitemo iyi yakavandudzwa kuitira kusimbaradza masimba aVaMnangagwa kuitira kuti varambe vari panyanga panoitwa sarudzo muna 2023. Musarudzo idzi, VaMnangagwa vava nemasimba ekusarudza mutevedzeri wavo zvichitevera kuvandudzwa kwebumbiro iri, iro raisungira kuti mutevedzeri wavo ange achisarudzwa neveruzhinji kuitira kuti mutungamiri wenyika asawana masimba ekudzinga mutevedzeri wake pamadiro, sekudzingwa kwakaitwa ivo VaMnangagwa namushakabvu, VaRobert Mugabe, muna 2017, izvo zvakaita kuti vabude munyika zvisiri pamutemo vachitiza. VaMnangagwa vakazodzekera munyika mushure mekunge mauto amanikidza VaMugabe kusiya basa.

Mukuru wevatongi vematare edzimhosva, VaLuke Malaba, vanga
vachifanirwa kuenda pamudyangigere musi wa 15 Chivabvu apo vanosvitsa makore makumi manomwe. Sezvo mutemo uyu wava kushanda, VaMnangagwa vari kutarisirwa kudoma zvakare VaMalaba semukuru wevatongi vematare kwemakore mashanu anotevera. No media source currently available
title: Magweta Oronga Kupikisa Kuvandudzwa Kwakaitwa Bumbiro reMitemo yeNyika

text: Zvimwe zvikoro zvakazvimirira zvatanga kunyorera matsamba kuvabereki zvichiti zvave kuda kuti vabhadhare nemari yekuAmerica chete kwete kushandisa mabond notes kana maRTGS izvo zvopa kuti vabereki vakawanda vaomerwe nehupenyu. Zvikoro zvinovhurwa zviri pamutemo musi wa 8 Ndira 2019. Mari iri kudiwa nezvikoro kune vana vari kumabhodhingi inosvika zviuru zvitatu nemazana mashanu emadhora ekuAmerica, uye zvikoro izvi zvoti zvinoda imwe mari yekutenga zvikwanisiro inosvika zana nemakumi mashanu emadhora ekuAmerica. Chikoro cheHellenic chakati vabereki vabhadhare zviuru zviviri zvemadhora ekuAmerica vombomirira kunzwa kuti pachadiwa imwe mari here. Chikoro cheMasaisai Primary kuWestgate muHarare chinonzi chiri kuda mari inosvika mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi mashanu emadhora ekuAmerica kubva pamadhora ekuAmerica zviuru zvisere. Zvimwe zvikoro zvakaita seBryston Primary zviri kuti munhu anobhadhara zvakapetwa katatu kana achida kubhadhara neRTGS. Hatina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvedzidzo, Muzvinafundo Paul Mavima, sezvo vange vasingadaire nharembozha yavo asi vakambozivisa Studio 7 kuti hazvisi pamutemo kumanikidza vabereki kubhadhara madhora ekuAmerica chete. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi uye vachidzidzisa paMetropolitan University kuJohannesburg, South Africa, Muzvinafundo Gift Mugano, vaudza Studio7 kuti zvave kuitika zvekuti zvikoro nevemabhizimisi uye mamwe makanzuru vave kuda dhora rekuAmerica kuratidza kuti nyika yave kudzokera zvishoma zvishoma mukushandisa dhora remuAmerica chete. No media source currently available
title: Zvimwe Zvikoro Zvomanikidza Vabereki Kubhadhara neMadhora ekuAmerica

text: Kunyange hazvo hurumende iri kuti vanachiremba vakadzoka kumabasa, chokwadi chiri kubuda ndechekuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka muzvipatara zvehurumende sezvo varwere vari kushaya vanovarapa. Pakasvika Studio 7 pachipatara cheHarare Hospital neSvondo, varwere vaionekwa navanachiremba ndevaye vane zvirwere zvinoda kurapwa nechimbichimbi, zvikuru vanhu vanenge vawirwa netsaona dzakasiyanasiyana. Baba Nyasha Chandaona mumwe vevarwere vakapiwa mubhedha nemusi weChishanu svondo rapera mushure mekunge varohwa nematsotsi kumugwagwa weBeatrice Road, pavaifamba vachienda kumba kwavo kuHopley. Baba Chandaona vanoti vakatemwa nesimbi paguma vakatozoshevedzerwa amburenzi iyo yakanovasiya pachipatara ichi sezvo vakanga vakuvara zvakaipisisa. Mumwe murwere wechidiki, VaFirst Chisora, avo vakaunzwa neamburenzi kubva kuKaroi muna Chikunguru gore rakapera, vanoti havasati vapedzwa kurapwa nechikonzero chekuti pane zvimwe zvinodiwa paoparesheni yavakaitwa padumbu ravo zvavasiri kukwanisa kuwana kuti vakwanise kuvharwa oparesheni yavo zvachose. VaChisora vanoti havana kana hama yakambouya kuzovaona kubva musi wavakapinda muchipatara nekuti vabereki vavo vanhu vanotambura. Studio 7 yakashanyirawo chipatara cheParirenyatwa nezuro wakare uko kwaiva nevarwere vashomanani kudarika vaive kuHarare Hospital, asi zvairatidza sokunge paiva pasina vanachiremba vaiva pabasa kuti vabatsire varwere ava. Baba David Rugare vanogara kuZimre Park vakaratidza kusafara nemafambiro aiitwa basa pachipatara apa vachiti vaiva vaneta kumirira chiremba kuti aongorore chipfuva chavo sezvo vaitadza kufema zvakanaka. Mumwe chiremba achangopedza zvidzidzo zvake, uyo akaramba kudomwa nezita rake, anoti hapana zvanyanya kushanduka paHarare Hospital sezvo varwere vari kuonekwa pachipatara ichi vari varwere vaya vanenge vaine zvirwere zvinoda kuongororwa nechimbichimbi kusanganisira vanenge vawirwa netsaona. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata gurukota rezvehutano, Doctor Obadiah Moyo kuti tinzwe mamiriro aita zvinhu pari zvino. Asi mukuru anoona nezvezvirwere zvinotapuriranwa mubazi rezvehutano nekuchengetedzwa kwakanaka kwevana, Doctor Portia Manangazira, vanoti vanhu vari kuonekwa kuzvipatara zvikuru zvehurumende vaderera zvikuru. Dr Manangazira vanoti zviri kuitika kuzvipatara zvehurumende ratove dambudziko guru zvokuti bazi rehutano riri kuedza kugadzirisa nyunyuto dzavanachiremba kuburikidza nehurukuro dzavari kuita nevamiriri vehurumende. Mubati wehomwe musangano ravanachiremba vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu, reZimbabwe Doctors For Human Rights, Doctor Norman Matara, vanotsinhira mashoko akataurwa nachiremba vachangopedza zvidzidzo zvavo vari kuHarare Hospital vachiti ichokwadi kuti vanachiremba vepasi ava hapana zvavanokwanisa kuita pasina vanachiremba vakuru. Dr Matara vanoti hurumende iri kupomerwa mhosva yokushaya han’ya nezvichemo zvavanachiremba izvo zvadzosera shure hurukuro dzekugadzirisa nyunyuto dzavo. Vanoti chichemo chikuru chemadhokotera ndechekuti muzvipatara zvehurumende muve nemishonga yekurapa nayo varwere pamwe nemichina yakakosha yekushandisa kuitira kuti vanachiremba vaite basa ravo nemazvo. Vana chiremba vemuzvipatara zvehurumende vave nemwedzi mina vachiramwa mabasa, izvo zvasiya hupenyu hweveruzhinji huri parumananzombe. Kudzamara hurumende yagadzirisa zviri kunetsa muzvipatara pamwe nekuwirirana navanachiremba vari kuramwa mabasa, vanhu vakawanda vacharamba vachirasikirwa nevadikani vavo nenzira dzinogona kudzivirwa nyore-nyore kana hurumende ikazvikapira nemwoyo wese kukoshesa nekuchengetedza hupenyu hweveruzhinji. No media source currently available
title: Zvinhu Zvichiri Zvakaita Manyama Amire Nerongo muZvipatara

text: Mutungamiri we America, VaDonald Trump, vaudza vatori venhau kuti varikutora mushonga unonzi ‘hydroxychloroquine’ kuti vazvidzivirire kubva kuchirwere che Covid-19. Mushonga uyu unoshandiswa mukurapa zvirwere zvakaita se malaria nepanobatana mapfupa, kana kuti ‘arthritis’, asi vanachiremba vanoti hapana humbowo hwekuti mushonga uyu unorapa kana kudzivirira chirwere che Covid-19. VaTrump vati vave nemasvondo matatu vachitora mushonga uyu, vachiti chiremba wavo haana kuvaudza kuti vatore mushonga uyu asi ivo vakaukumbira kubva kuna chiremba wemuzinda weWhite House. VaTrump vaudza vatori venhau kuti, “Ndakatanga kunwa mushonga uyu nekuti ndinofunga kuti mushonga wakanaka uye ndakanzwa zvakawanda zvakanaka pamusoro pemushonga uyu.” Dr Simbiso Ranga, avo vanoshandira mudunhu reNorth Carolina, vanoti pakaitwa ongororo dzakawanda nezvipatara zvepamusoro asi hapana zvakambobuda zvichiratidza kuti mushonga uyu unoshanda paCovid-19. Vanachiremba vazhinji nezvipatara zvizhinji zvakambotauravo kuti hapana humbowo hwekuti mushonga uyu unobatsira asi VaTrump vanotsika madziro vachiti mushonga uyu unobatsira. Dr Ranga vati havakurudziri vanhu kutora mushonga uyu mukudzivirira kana kurapa Covid-19 vachiti mushonga uyu unogona kukuvadza neimwe nzira pachinhambo chekubatsira. No media source currently available
title: VaDonald Trump Vanoti Varikushandisa Mushonga Unonzi Navanachiremba Hauna Humbowo Hwekushanda PaCovid-19

text:
Vamwe vanhu muBulawayo vari kutambira chirongwa cheve chiuto chekubatsira kubaya veruzhinji nhomba sezvo bazi rezvehutano risina vashandi vakakwana. Vanhu vakataura neStudio 7 mushure mekubaiwa nhomba yekudzivirira chirwere cheCovid-19 vanoti vari kufara zvikuru nekuwaniswa mukana wekubaiwa nhomba pasi pechirongwa cheZimbabwe Defence Forces Week icho chakatanga nemusi weMuvhuro mumisha yeCowdray Park neEmganwini muBulawayo.

Mumwe mugari VaCosmos Ncube avo vave ivo munhu wekutanga muCowdray Park kubayiwa nhomba nhasi mangwanani vati vange vave nenguva vachiedza kubaiwa kumakiriniki ekanzuru asi vachitadza.

VaVengai Moyo avo vauya nemudzimai wavo kuzobaiwa vati chirongwa chevechiuto chauya panguva yakanaka sezvo nzvimbo dzakawanda dziri kubairwa nhomba dziri kuwandirwa nevanhu. Vati ivo nemudzimai wavo vatora danho rekubaiwa senzira yekuzvidzivirira.

Mudzimai waVaMoyo, Amai Chiedza Moyo vati vechiuto vanosiwonekwa neziso rakaipa nekuda kwenhoroondo yekushungurudza veruzhinji vakati vafara zvikuru nekuda kwechirongwa ichi. Amai Moyo vati vanhu havafanirwe kutya sezvo kubaiwa nhomba chagara chiri chinhu chinoitwa
zvikuru munyika.

Mumwe wechidiki Musale Dube uyo ane makore makumi maviri nematatu ekuberekwa ati afara zvikuru kuti akwanisa kubaiwa zvisinei nekuti ange asina chitupa sezvo chakarasika.

Mumwezve wechidiki Nomsa Butu uyo ane makore makumi maviri ati aona zvakakodzera kubaiwa nhomba nekuti ari kuona kuti vanhu vakawanda vari kufa nechirwere cheCovid-19.

Andrea Andrea uyo ane makore gumi nemasere atsinhirawo kuti vanhu havafanirwe kutya kubaiwa achiti kubaiwa kunobatsira munhu kuzvidzivirira pachako wega uye kudzivirirawo vamwe.

Chiremba mukuru muZimbabwe National Army Dr Lieutenant Colonel Absolom Dube vaudza Studio 7 kuti chirongwa cheZimbabwe Defence Forces Week chinosinyanya kubatsira veruzhinji nekuvaka zvinhu zvakadai sezvikoro kana kugadzira migwagwa nemabhiriji munzvimbo dzakasiyana siyana munyika.

Asi vati nekuveko kwechirwere cheCovid-19 vaona zvakakodzera kuisa ruoko rwavo kuti vashandi vavo, vachishanda pamwe nebazi rezvehutano pamwe nekanzuru, vabatsire muchirongwa chenyika chekubaya veruzhinji nhomba. Kusvika nguva dza1 masikati vanhu vanopfuura mazana maviri vange vabaiwa panzvimbo mbiri dzinobairwa vanhu kuCowdray Park neEmganwini.

Chirongwa ichi chiri kuenderera mberi kusvika nemusi weChishanu. Hurumende ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi vanove zvikamu zvitanhatu kubva muzana zvevanhu vari munyika. Dare remakurukota rakazivisa kuti rine hurongwa hwekuti makamba emapurisa ashandisweo senzvimbo yekubayira vanhu nhomba. No media source currently available
title: Vakawanda muBulawayo Votambira Chirongwa cheMauto Chekubaya Vanhu Nhomba

text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinoti nyaya yekuwanda kwema roadblocks mumigwagwa yeZimbabwe yave kukonzera kuti nyika irasikirwe nemari zhinji. Mamwe makurukota ehurumende ari kuti ma road blocks aya anofanira kuti aderedzwe asi zvinenge zvokona n’anga murapwa achida. Bazi rinoona nezvemitengo nemamiriro ehupfumi reZimstats rinoti vashanyi munyika yeZimbabwe vanoti nyaya yema road blocks inyaya inoita kuti vabude muZimbabwe vaine kugunun’una kwakanyanya. Muongororo yakaitwa neZIMSTATS ichitaura nevashanyi vanenge vodzokera kumisha yavo inonzi ZimStats 2015-16 Visitors Exit Survey, zvakabuda pachena kuti kunyangwe vashanyi vakawanda vaida kudzoka kuzoshanyazve Zimbabwe vaisafara nenyaya yekudhura kwezvinhu, kushungurudzwa nemapurisa mumigwagwa uye kuparara kwezvivakwa zvenyika. Gurukota rinoona nezvekushanyirwa kwenyika VaWalter Mzembi vanoti mapurisa anofanira kudzikisa huwandu hwemaroadblocks mumigwagwa sezvo zviri kukanganisa kushanyirwa kwenyika. Ko chii chinopa kuti mapurisa aite mavhu nemarara mumigwagwa? Vaimbova gurukota rezvehupfumi uye vachitungamira bato rePeople's Democratic Party, VaTendai Biti, vanoti inyaya yehuwori. Mukuru wemapurisa, VaAugustine Chihuri, vakaudza komiti yeparamende inoona nezvekudzivirirwa kwemukati menyika kuti huwandu hwema road blocks hausi kuzoderedzwa kunyangwe vakatenda kuti pane mamwe mapurisa anoita zvehuwori. Asi VaChihuri vanotiwo vamwe vedzimotokari ndivo vanoda kupa mapurisa chiokomuhomwe. Aya mashoko anombotaurwawo nemutauriri wemapurisa Chief Superintendent Paul Nyathi. VaBiti vanoti imwe nyaya iri kunetsa ndeyekuti mapurisa haasi kuendesa mari inobhadharwa venahu kuhomwe yehurumende sezvinodiwa nebumbiro remutemo. Asi VaChihuri vakaudza dare reparamende kuti mari yose yemapurisa inoendeswa kuhomwe yemari iri kuReserve Bank of Zimbabwe. Vemabhizimi vanoti nyaya yekuwanda kwemapurisa mumigwagwa yave kudzosera basa kumashure zvakanyanya. Gurukota rinoona nezvekuchengetedzwa kwemukati menyika VaIgnatious Chombo vakati vaizotaurira mapurisa kuti aderedze huwandu hwema roadblocks kuita imwe pamakiromita gumi. Mukuru weHospitality Association of Zimbabwe, VaGeorge Manyumwa, vanoti mapurisa anofanira kuterera kurudziro yaVaChombo. Asi vakawanda vanoti hapana ari kuterera mashoko aVaChombo uye pamakiromita gumi acho pane maroadblocks anodarika mashanu. Vaimbotungamira sangano reZimbabwe National Chamber of Commerce uye vari muzvinabhizimisi, VaLuxon Zembe, vanoti kuita bhizimisi munyika kuri kukanganiswa zvikuru nemapurisa akazara mumigwagwa. VaZembe vanoti havo hapana chakaipa kuti mapurisa aite maroadlocks ekuchengetedza nyika sezvaiitwa kare. Asi vanoti zverwendo rwuno zvinokunda ngoma kurira. Vamwe vanhu vari kushaiswawo chekubata nenyaya yekushomeka kwevashanyi ndevaya vanotengesa zvivezwa nezvimwe mumigwagwa avo vanoti bhizimisi raderera zvakanyanya. Makurukota ehurumende anonzi ave mubishi kuti azeye kuti dambudziko iri roitwa sei sezvo mumigwagwa mave kuita semakaberekera ingwe. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi nematongerwo enyika dzinoti ma roadblocks ari muZimbabwe anoonekwa munyika dzine hondo chete. No media source currently available
title: Kuwanda kweMapurisa Mumigwagwa Kwodzosera Shure Hupfumi

text:
Vatenderi vechikirisitu vacherechedza zuva rekufa kwaJesu Kristo nhasi pamwe nekurangarira nyaya dzekumanikidzwa kwevanhu pamwe nehutongi husina kururama pasi rose. Mumwe wevacherechedza zuva ranhasi vakaungana nevamwe ndiVaClifford Chikuya veSalvation Army. VaChikuya vati zuva ranhasi rakakoshera mutendi wese nekuda kwekuti kufa kwaJesu Kristo kwakaita kuti vakwanise kunzi vana vaMwari uye kurarama kwavo kuchikonzerwa neropa raJesu.

VaChikuya vati kunyange vasina kuungana sezvavanotarisira nevamwe
nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19, vati zvakanaka kuti vanhu
vazvichengetedze kwete kungomirira kuchengetedzwa naMwari ivo vasina
zvavari kuita mukuzvichengetedza.

Mumwe mutendi weAnglican Church, Amai Yusitina Goredema, vati zuva
ranhasi vanorirangarira sezuva ravakafirwa neJesu. Munyori mukuru weZimbabwe Council of Churches, Reverend Kenneth Mtata, vati zuva ranhasi riri kupembererwa nevanhu vakawanda vari mudzimba nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Asi vati hazvishamise nekuti paseka (Passover) yekutanga yakaitwa mudzimba apo vana veIsrael vakazviita vasati vabuda kubva muhutapwa kuEgypt.

Reverend Mtata vati zuva ranhasi rakakoshawo nekuda kwekuti kufa kwaJesu kunobatanidza vanhu kuti vawirirane uye kubatanidza vanhu naMwari. Vatiwo kana vanhu vachirangarira zuva iri vanofanirwa kurangarira nyaya dzekumanikidzwa, kufa kusina tsarukano uye nyaya yehutongi husina kunaka munyika dzakawanda. Kunyange hazvo vamwe vatendi vaenda kukereke nhasi mangwanani
nemasikati vakawanda vavo vachaenda manheru sezvo vachiti vanenge
vorangarira kufa kwaJesu nguva dzemasikati dza3pm. Mumashoko avo ezororo reEaster, mutungamiri weMDC Alliance uye vari mufundisi, VaNelson Chamisa, vati nguva ino ngaive nguva yekuwana tariro pakufa nekumuka kwaJesu, uye kuti nyika irambe iri mumaoko aMwari.

VaChamisa vati vanhu vanofanirwa kuremekedza rudo, kuwirirana,
kunzwirana tsitsi, kusaitirana hutsinye, kusashungurudzana, kusarovana
uye kusashorana. Vati vanhu vanofanirwa kubatana kuitira kuti nyika ifambire mberi.

Vachinyorawo padandemutande ravo reTwitter mumiriri weNorton
muparamende, VaTemba Mliswa, vakurudzira vanhu kuti vachengetedze mitemo yekudzivirira chirwere cheCovid-19 vachiti nzendo dzive shoma sezvo chirwere cheCovid-19 chisiri pazororo. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vakakomekedza svondo rino kuti mitemo yekudzivirira chirwere cheCovid-19 itevedzerwe, vadzidzi vezvikoro zve boarding vakanzi vagare muzvikoro zvavanodzidza, uye vakakurudzira vanhu kuti vagare mudzimba dzavo senzira yekuzvidzivirira kuchirwere cheCovid-19. No media source currently available
title: Vakawanda Vanorangarira Kufa kwaJesu Kristo

text: Sangano reAmnesty International raburitsa gwaro rinoratidza kuti nyika zhinji kusanganisira Zimbabwe dzakatyora kodzero dzevanhu zvakanynya munguva yekurwisana nechirwere cheCovid-19. Gwaro iri rinonzi, “The State of the World’s Human Rights, 2021/2022 uye rakaparurwa muSouth Africa nemusi weChipiri. Kodzero dzevanhu dzinonzi dzakatyorwa zvakanyanya hurumende ichisunga nekurova vatori venhau, vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu, vanopikisa nevairatidzira. Covid-19 inonzi yakashandiswa sechombo nehurumende kumbunyikidza vanopikisa ava. Vanodzivirira nyika vari kupomerwawo mhosva dzekuponda vanhu ukuwo vanhu vakawanda vachiputsirwa misha yavo. Mauto matanhau anonzi akauraya vanhu vana kuGweru muna Ndira mushure mekunge vanhu vamisidzana navo pavaitsvaga vainzi vainge vaba waya dzemagetsi. Mauto aya akasungwa vakapomerwa mhosva yekuponda asi vakapihwa mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rehurumende sezvo mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko VaKindness Paradza vaudza Studio 7 kuti vange vasiri muhofisi vakati titaure nemunyori mubazi ravo VaNick Mangwana avo vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. No media source currently available
title: Zimbabwe Yopomerwa Mhosva yeKushandisa Covid-19 seChombo Chekutyora Kodzero dzeVanhu

text: Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri weMDC inotungamirwa naMuzvare Thokozani Khupe, VaObert Chaurura Gutu, vasiya basa ravo rezvematongerwo enyika mubato iri.  VaGutu, avo vanove gweta rine mukurumbira munyika, vanoti vatora danho rekusiya basa iri pachavo, uye vazivisa bato ravo. Asi VaGutu havana kuda kutaura zvakawanda pane remangwana ravo vachiti vachange vachishanda zvavo segweta, sezvo riri iro basa ravakadzidzira. VaGutu vakamira zvakasimba panyaya yekurwira masimba yakaitika muMDC zvichitevera kushaya kwakaita mutungamiri akavamba MDC, muchakabvu Morgan Tsvangirai, musi wa 14 Kukadzi 2018.  VaGutu nevamwe vavo vakati zvichitevera kushaya kwaVaTsvangirai, mutevedzeri wavo akasarudzwa pakongiresi yakaitwa muna 2014, Muzvare Khupe, ndivo vaifanirwa kufanobata matomu kudzamara bato raita kongiresi yechimbi chimbi mukati megore rimwe chete. Asi izvi hazvina kuitika sezvo mumwe wevatevedzeri vemutungamiri webato panguva iyi, VaNelson Chamisa, avo vakadomwa naVaTsvangirai mushure mekongiresi ya 2014 kuti vave mumwe wevatevedzeri vavo pamwe naVaElias Mudzuri, vakati ndivo vaifanirwa kuramba vari panyanga sezvo vakadomwa kuti vafanobata chigaro panguva iyo VaTsvangirai vairapwa kuSouth Africa.  Kudomwa kwaVaChamisa uku kwakasimudza mutauro mukuru muMDC nekunze kwebato iri vamwe vachiramba kutambira mashoko aya vachiti VaTsvangirai vakanga vorwarisa zvakanyanya zvokuti havaikwanisa kunge vakaudza mutauriri wavo, VaLuke Tamborinyoka, kuti vazivise veruzhinji kuti vakanga vadoma VaChamisa kuti vabate matomu kusvika vadzokera kumusha. Asi VaTamborinyoka vakati vakazivisa nyika zvavakange vaudzwa naVaTsvangirai. Panguva yakaitika zvose izvi, VaGutu vaive mutauriri weMDC. Asi vakazosarudzwa kuva mutevedzeri waMuzvare Khupe muna Kubvumbi 2018 zvichitevera kupatsanuka kwakaita MDC.  Munguva yehurumende yemubatanidzwa, VaGutu vakaitwa mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvemitemo, uye vaive nhengo yedare reSenate vachimirira Chisipite. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kuna Muzvare Khupe nezvekusiya basa kwaVaGutu sezvo vanga vasiri kubatika panherembozha yavo. No media source currently available
title: VaObert Gutu Vasiya Basa seMutevedzeri waMuzvare Khupe

text: Kanzuru yepamusoro soro yesangano revashandi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, ZCTU, yasangana muHarare neMugovera ichizeya mamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika, zvikuru nyaya dzinobata vashandi. Musangano weZCTU General Council waitwa zvichitevera kunetsana kuri kuitika pakati pehurumende nesangano revashandi iri, iro riri kuti hurumende haisi kuzadzisa zvinhu zvinenge zvatenderanwa kumusangano weTripartite Negotiating Forum, TNF. Munyori mukuru weZCTU, VaJaphet Moyo, vanoti musangano wavo wabuda nezvisungo zvekuti vatore uye kuzadzisa mukurwira kodzero dzemushandi. VaMoyo vati sezvo hurumende iri kuratidza kusavimbika, vashandi vachashandisa kodzero dzavo dzekuramwa mabasa kana zvichemo zvavo zvisina kugadziriswa. Asi VaMoyo vati vacharamba vachipinda mumisangano yeTNF sezvo hurongwa hwenhaurirano idzi huchitsigirwa nemutemo. Asi vati havasi kuzosiya kodzero dzavo dzichidzvanyirirwa sezvo paine mitemo inochengetedza kodzero dzemushandi wese iyo vachashandisa mukuita zvinodiwa nekodzero dzevashandi. VaMoyo vati hurumende ine mari inokwanisa kugadzirisa zviri kunetsa munyika, asi mari idzi hadzisi kushandiswa nenzira kwayo. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvevashandi nemabasa, Amai Sekai Nzenza, sezvo nharembozha dzanga dzichinetsa kubatika. Asi muhurukuro yavakaita neStudio7 svondo rapera, Amai Nzenza vakati vacharamba vachiita nhaurirano nevashandi kudzamara pawanikwa wirirano. Zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka munyika zvichitevera kuparara kwaita hupfumi hwenyika izvo zvasiya makambani akawanda avharwa. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi dzinoti vanhu vasina mabasa muZimbabwe vava kusvika pazvikamu makumi mapfumbamwe kubva muzana. Zvinhu zviri kuramba zvichikwira mitengo yazvo, magetsi achiwanikwa kwenguva shoma munguva dzemanheru. No media source currently available
title: ZCTU Inoti Ichashandisa Kodzero dzeVashandi dzeKuramwa Mabasa

text: Mutungamiri weMDC, VaNelson Chamisa, vanoti muntungamiri wenyika uye vari mutungamiri weZanu PF, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vari kutadzisa kuti nhaurirano dzitange pakati pevaviri ava dziri kuda kuitwa dzichikokerwa nevedzisvondo. VaChamisa vaudza Studio7 kuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachiti izvi zviri kukonzerwa nekusafamba zvakanaka kwakaita sarudzo dzemusi wa30 Chikunguru. VaChamisa vanoti chave kudikanwa inhaurirano pakati pavo naVaMnangagwa asi VaMnangagwa vari kuita zvehumbimbindoga. VaChamisa vanoti vakatosvitsa gwaro rezvavari kuda kuti zvizeyewe kuna VaMnangagwa kuburikidza nesangano revedzisvondo reZimbabwe Council of Churches, asi VaMnangagwa havasi kumbotsukunyuka kunyange hazvo zvinhu zvose zvakamira nemusoro munyika. Mutauriri weZanu PF, VaSimon Khaya Moyo, vati havana chavanoziva nezvenhaurirano idzi vakati tizotaura navo vabuda mumusangano weCentral Committee yebato ravo uyo wanga uchiri kuitwa pataenda pamhepo. Asi munyori anoona nezvemitemo muZanu PF, VaPaul Mangwana, vakataura mazuva mashoma adarika kuti Zanu PF inogona kugadzirisa zviri kunetsa munyika iri yoga pasina kupindira kwaVaChamisa. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika uye vari nhengo yeZanu PF, VaGadzira Chirumhanzu, vaudza Studio7 kuti havaone chikonzero chekuti paitwe nhaurirano pakati paVaMnangagwa naVaChamisa sezvo vachiti veruzhinji vakataura zvavanoda musarudzo dzemusi wa30 Chikunguru idzo dzinonzi naVaChamisa dzakabirirwa zvemhando yepamusorosoro. VaChirumhanzu vanoti kunze kwekuti vedzisvondo vave ana mutongigava pakati paVaMnangagwa naVaChamisa, vedzisvondo vanofanira kushandisa nguva yavo kuyananisa zvikwata zviviri zveMDC vachiti Zanu PF iri kutozadzisa zvayakasarudzirwa musarudzo. Munyori mukuru muZimbabwe Council of Churches, Reverend Doctor Kenneth Mtata, vaudza Studio7 kuti sevedzisvondo vachiri kuedza kuti vaviri ava vagare patafura vazeye zvose zviri kunetsa munyika. Doctor Mtata vati vakataura naVaMnangagwa vakavaudza kuti vangataura seyi nevanhu vari kuramba kuvatambira semunhu akasarudzwa nevanhu. Vatiwo vakasvitsa mashoko aya kuna VaChamisa. Vamwe vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vanoti zvakakosha kuti VaMnangagwa naVaChamisa vagare pasi vataurirane sezvo vachiti chamurambamhuru chiri kuitwa nemitengo yezvinhu muzvitoro zvizhinji munyika chiri kukonzerwa negakava rezvematongerwo enyika rine chekuita nesarudzo dzemusi wa30 Chikunguru. Muzvipatara hamuna mishonga, uye vanhu havana mabasa anovapa mari yekuti variritire mhuri dzavo. Komisheni inoona nezvesarudzo yeZimbabwe Electoral Commission, Zec, yakazivisa kuti VaMnangagwa ndivo vakakunda musarudzo izvo zvakatsinhirwa nedare reConstitutional Court. Asi VaChamisa nebato ravo varikuramba vakatsika madziro vachiti havasi kutambira zvakaziviswa neZec pamwe nezvakaturwa nedare vachiti simba rehove riri mumvura.
title: VaChamisa Vanoti VaMnangagwa Vari Kutadzisa Kutanga kweNhaurirano

text: Mapurisa muMasvingo nhasi aita hwegondo panhiyo kuvanhu vanotengesa mari pamusika mutema apo anyangira vanhu ava vakavarairwa, izvo zvazoita kuti vaswere vachiita hwakiti nagonzo mapurisa akasunga vakawanda vachivatorera mari dzavo. Hurumende iri kupomera vanotengesa mari mumigwagwa ava mhosva yekushomeka kwemari munyika uye kukonzeresa kukwira kwemitengo muzvitoro. Vanotengesa mari vataura neStudio 7 vanoti vamwe vavo vakawanda mudhorobha vasungwa vakavharirwa muchitokisi chepaMasvingo Central Police Station uye mari yavo ikatorwa nemapurisa sezvo pasina chavapiwa chonoratidza kuti mari dzavo dzatorwa. Vamwe vanoti vakwanisa kupukunyuka asi mari dzavo dzichitorwa uye vanofunga kuti dzinogona kusasvika kuhurumende sezvo mamwe mapurisa munyika achizivikanawa ne nyaya ye huwori. VaTinaye Hondo vanoti nhasi mapurisa ange achiita seakadya gavakava nekupenga kwacho. Vamwewo vada kuzivikanwa nekunzi mukoma Gidza, vanoti kunyange zvisiri pamutemo, vari kumanikidzwa kuita izvi nekuti munyika hamuna mabasa. Mumwewo muzvare aramba kudomwa nezita rake anoti kunyange vakasungwa vacharamba vachidzoka mumigwagwa nekuti mazuva ano basa ravo rine mari sezvo mutengo wemari pamusika mutema uri kukwira zvakare kubva pawakambodonha vhiki yapera. Mumigwagwa yeMasvingo nhasi zana remadhora ekuAmereka ranga richitengeswa nemabhondi anosvika pamazana matatu ane mashanu kana kuti pamazana mana kana mari ichiiswa munharembozha kana kuti eco cash. Vanotengesa mari vanoti mazuva ano kunyange zvinhu zvakaoma munyika ivo vari kupura nyemba nemusana uye vanotarisira kuti mutengo ucharamba uchikwira. Asi vamwe vachema-chema kuti vanga vachitorerwa mari dzange dziri mumabhegi avo dzekutengesa, dzinopfura zviuru zvina zvemadhora uye vachinzi havadzorerwi nekuti yava mari yenyika. Mutauriri wemapurisa muMasvingo, Inspector Charity Mazula, varamba kutaura neStudio7 panyaya iyi, asi vasungwa vanotarisirwa kumira pamberi pedare redzimhosva muMasvingo mangwana. Zvichakadaro, vanhu vana vanotengesa mari pamusika mutema kuChinhoyi vamiswa pamberi pedare nhasi mushure mekusungwa neMuvhuro vachipomerwa mhosva yekutyora mutemo vezvemari. Vana ava, vanoti VaJabulani Sibawo, VaDennis Zibako, VaKudzanai Mugumo naVaAaron Mutekenya, vabvisiswa mari yechibatiso inoita madhora makumi mashanu pamunhu vakanzi vazodzoka kudare musi wa30 Gumiguru vachibva kudzimba dzavo. Vari kupomerwa mhosva yekutengesa mari zvisiri pamutemo mushure mekubatwa nemari dzinotangira pamazana maviri emadhora ekuAmereka kusvika pamazana masere uye mari yema Rand yekuSouth Africa yakawanda, pamwe ne mabhondi emuno munyika. Hurumende iri kupomera vanotengesa mari pamusika mutema mhosva yekuchengeta mari inofanira kunge iri mumabhanga izvo inoti ndizvo zviri kukonzera kushomeka kwemari munyika. Vanotengesa mari ava vari kunzizve ndivo vari kukonzera kukwira kwezvinhu zvave kushaikwa muzvitoro, asi ivo vanoramba vachiti hurumende iri kuvapomera mhosva isiri yavo sezvo iri iyo iri kutadza kutungamirira nyika nemazvo. No media source currently available
title: Vanotengesa Mari Mumugwagwa Vosungwa neMapurisa

text: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe nezvekune dzimwe nyika zviri muSouth Africa zvinodarika zviuru zvishanu zvinonzi zvaungana pamuganhu weZimbabwe neSouth Africa weBeitbridge zvichitaridzira zvichida kuti hurumende ibvise mutemo wekurambidzwa kwekupinzwa kwezvinhu munyika weStatutory Instrument 64 of 2016, uyo wakadzikwa gore rino. VaDenis Juru, vanove mutungamiri werimwe remasangano apinda mukuratidzira uku reInternational Cross Border Traders Association, vanoti hurongwa hwavo hwambovhiringidzwa nemapurisa pamwe nemauto enyika yeSouth Africa pavatanga kuungana panzvimbo yeChina Mall iri kuMusina. Asi vanoti vazobudirira sezvo vazokwanisa kuenda kuBeitbridge uko vazotaura nevanhu vanga vaunganako. VaJuru vanoti vashamiswa nedanho remapurisa rekuvarambidza kuungana sezvo vakanga vanyorera tsamba kukanzuru yeMusina vachiizivisa nezvehurongwa hwavo uhwu. "Takakumbira mvumo kumapurisa vakatizivisa kuti since taiiungana pa private property (paChina Mall) taifanirwa kunyorera kanzuru tsamba tichivazivisa, zvinove zvatakaita, saka tazoshamisika toona mapurisa nemasoja vachiti vanhu parararayi," VaJuru vanodaro. VaJuru vanoti ivo vambosungwa nemapurisa muchiitiko ichi uye vachaenda kunozvipira kukamba yemapurisa vachiperekedzwa nemagweta avo. "Saka tangomirira kuti magweta edu kana auya tobva taenda kumapurisa, zvekuti izvozvi vari kufona vachiti uyai tibva tangozvipedza. Asi ini ndati handingaendi ndoga nekuti magweta ndiwo anonzwisisa mutemo wacho uye kuti tautyora papi." Vanotiwo mashoko avari kutambira kubva kune mimwe miganhu yakaita sePlumtree anoratidza kuti kunyange hazvo vanhu vasina kuungana vachiratidzira, vatambira kurudziro yavo yekuti vasashandisa miganhu iyi. VaJuru vanoti vacharamba vachienderera mberi nekuratidzira uku kudzamara zvinyunyuto zvavo zvanzwikwa. No media source currently available
title: Vanhu Vanoratidzira kuBeitbridge Vachiramba Mutemo weKurambidzwa kweKupinzwa kweZVinhu Munyika

text: Kanzuru yeHarare iri kuronga kubvisa mari yemvura inobhadharwa nemunhu wese kana kuti fixed water charges pamwe nekubvisa muripo wezvikwetereti muhurongwa hwayo hwebhajeti regore rinouya. Vachizisa bhajeti regore rinouya neChitatu manheru, sachigaro wekomiti yezvemari mukanzuru yeHarare, VaLuckson Mukunguma, vakati mari iyi ichabviswa kubva mumisha yese uye mari yemvura inosungirwa kubviswa mwedzi wega wega, ichaderedzwa mumakambani. Vakatiwo zvimwe zvavari kuronga mubhajeti ravo re$320 million ndezve kuderedza mitero yemabizimisi nemaindasitiri, kuderedza mari yemarezenisi emabhizimisi, kuderedza mari dzinobhadharwa nevemakombi pamwe nekuderedza mitero yepamisika yekanzuru. Vakatiwo mari dzinobvisa muzvipatara nemakirinika ekanzuru hadzisi kuzokwidzwa gore rinouuya. Mutauriri wekanzuru, VaMichael Chideme, vanoti kanzuru yakaterera zvichemo zveveruzhinji mukuronga bhajeti iri uye vanofunga kuti richagadzirisa matambudziko akatarisana nevagari veguta. Mukuru werimwe remasangano anomirira vagari vemuHarare, VaPrecious Shumba, vanoti vanofara chose kuti rwendo runo kanzuru yaterera zvichemo zvevagari uye zvingafadze chose kana hurumende ikatambira bhajeti iri. Vatiwo vanofunga kuti kanzuru iyi haisi kuita izvi kuda kufadza vanhu sezvo gore rinouya kuine sarudzo, uyewo vati bhajeti iri rinogona kurambwa nehurumende kana gurukota rezvemadhorobha nematunhu, VaSaviour Kasukuwere vebato reZanu PF, vakaona sekuti makanzura eMDC-T ayo anotonga muHarare ari kuda kuita zvekutsvaga rutsigiro. Asi VaHardlife Mudzingwa, veCommunity Water Alliance, vatiwo pane zvimwe zvisiri kufadza mubhajeti reHarare. Vati hazvifadzi kuti kanzuru iri kuronga kukwidza mutengo wemvura mumisha yese muguta 25 cents pa10 cubic meters kusvika pa 70 cents pacubic meters mumisha inogara veruzhinji kozotiwo kubva pa 40 cents kusvika pa70 cents mumisha inogara vashoma. Meya weHarare, VaBernard Manyenyeni, vachatura bhajeti ravo zviri pamutemo kuna VaKasukuwere, avo vachatambira kana kusatambira bhajeti iri. Zvichakadai, kanzuru yeHarare yatanga chironga chekusangana nevanotengesa mumigwagwa nevevamabhizimisi nechinangwa chekutsvaga nzira dzekupedza dambudziko renyonga nyonga iri ratekeshera neguta. Vachitaura pamusangano waitwa pamuzinda wekanzuru neChina, vakasanobata chinzvimbo chemunyori wekanzuru, Amai Josephine Ncube, vati hazvigoni kuti vanhu vaite madiro aJojina muguta nekutengesera pese vachiti mitemo inofanira kutevedzwa uyewo vanhu havafaniri kuvhara migwagwa pamwe nekutengesera pamberi pezvitoro kana mabhizimisi evamwe. Asi vanotengesera mumigwagwa vaudza kanzuru kuti mitengo yavanobhadhariswa yakawanda chose uyewo kanzuru inongoita zvinhu zvayo isina kunzwa pfungwa dzavo. Vatiwo hapana nzvimbo dzekutengesera dzinokwana munhu wese uye dziripo dzacho hadzina zvikwanisiro zvakaita sezvimbuzi. Amai Ncube vati kanzuru yavo ichishanda nehurumende kutarisa zvichemo zvavo asi pari zvino chirongwa chekubvisa vanotengesera pasingabvumidzwe chichaenderera mberi. No media source currently available
title: Harare Yoronga Bhajeti re$320m Gore Rinouya

text: Kanzuru yeguta reHarare inoti yatotanga kutora matanho ekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheTyphoid, icho chinonzi chabata vanhu vanosvika gumi nevashanu kusvika pari zvino, avo vanonzi vakwanisa kurapwa. Mutauriri wekanzuru yeHarare, VaMichael Chideme vanoti matanho atorwa nekanzuru yavo anosanganisira kugadzirira zvakakwana kwemapoka ekanzuru akaita sere kutakurwa kwemarara pamwe nekuona kuti vanhu vawaniswa mvura yekunwa yakachena. “Hatisati tave kuti zvedu idambudziko guru kwazvo kana kuti outbreak nekuti chirwere ichi hachisati chabata vanhu vanosvika makumi matatu kana makumi mana,” VaChideme vanodaro. Vanotiwo kanzuru iri kuita dzidziso muzvikoro uyewo kutaura neveruzhinji kuti vasatenge chikafu kubva kune nzvimbo dzisina kutsarukana, zvikuru vanotengesera mumigwagwa. VaChideme vanoti rimwe danho ravatorawo ndere kuona kuti zvivakwa zvevanhu vari kutengesa chikafu zviri kunze kwemutemo munzvimbo dzakaita sepamusika weMbare vaparadza nzvimbo idzi. Chirwere cheTyphoid chinonzi chakaonekwa mumisha yeGlen Norah, Glen View, Budiriro, Hopley neHatfield. No media source currently available
title: Kanzuru yeHarare Inoti Yakagadzirira Kupedza Chirwere cheTyphoid

text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzematongerwo enyika dzinoti matare abata nenzira kwayo nyaya yegakava riripo pkati pemutungamiri weMDC Alliance, VaNelson Chamisa, nemutungamiri weZanu PF, uye vari mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa. Izvi zvinotevera kupinda kwaita nyaya iyi mudare reConstitutional Court kunyange hazvo magweta aVaMnangagwa anga achipikisa kuti nyaya yaVaChamisa haifanirwe kunzwikwa sezvo magwaro avo akasvika kuna VaMnangagwa zviri kunze kwemutemo Nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika, vachishanda nesangano re Democracy Institute, Doctor Pedzisayi Ruhanya, vanoti zvaitika mudare ndizvo zvinofanirwa kuitwa kana nyaya dzesarudzo dzita mutauro. Doctor Ruhanya vanoti ikodzero dzemapato anopikisa dzekukwidza nyaya kumatare edzimhosva kana vasina kugutsikana nemafambisirwo anenge aitwa sarudzo. Vanoti dambudziko nderekuti hazvina kunyatsojeka kuti vatongi vedare vakazvimirira here pachokwadi kana kuti vane kwavakarerekera. Vanoti kazhinji nyika dzinozvichengetedza kubva mukukundwa musarudzo nekubata mapazi mana emafambisirwo ezvinhu munyaya dzematongerwo enyika. Vati matare, nhepfenyuro , sangano rinofambisa nyaya dzesarudzo, uye maumbirwo emutemo zvinorerutsira bato rinenge richitonga mukukwikwidza musarudzo. Vanotiwo hutungamiriri hwaVaMnangagwa hawuna kunyanyosiyana nehwaVaMugabe nekuti mabatiro avari kuita nyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika haana kusiyana neaiitwa naVaMugabe. VaRuhanya, avo vaimbove mutori wenhau weDaily News isati yavharwa nechisimba nehurumende muna 2003, vanoti kumanikidzwa kwevanhu, kumbunyikidzwa uye kupisirwa misha nezvikonzero zvekuti vanhu vanotsigira bato rinopikisa, zvichiri kuitika muZimbabwe sezvaingoitika munguva yaVaMugabe. No media source currently available
title: Nyanzvi Dzozeya Mafambiro Aiita Zvinhu Mudare reConCourt

text: Dare remuChiredzi ranyima Andrew Takashinga Bere mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso richiti musungawa akatarisana nemhosva hombe yaanofanirwa kunopika ari mujeri kuAmerica. Mutongi wedare reChiredzi, Amai Geraldine Mutsoto, vati havagoni kupa Bere mukana wekuti agare kumba kwake akamirira kudzoserwa kuAmerica, sezvo aine nhoroondo yekutiza sezvaakaita kuAmerica mushure mekusungwa. Amai Mutsoto vati Bere akatarisana nemhosva huru uye dare harigoni kumubvisa muhusungwa sezvo vasiri kuziva hurongwa hwehurumende hwekuti ichamusvitsa riini mumaoko ehurumende yeAmerica. Vati Bere anogona kutizira kunyika dzakaita seChina, Italy , Mexico kunova kunozonetsa kuvabata. Gweta raBere, VaCharles Vhudzi, vati vachakwidza nyaya iyi kudare repamusoro. Studio 7 yarambidzwa nehama neshamwari dzaBere dzanga dziri padare nhasi kutaura negweta raBere. Hama idzi dzamboda kurova vatori venhau vanga vachida kutora mifananidzo yaBere uyo anga aine cheni mumaoko nemumakumbo. Baba vemusungwa ndivo vanga vachinyanya kupengera vatori venhau, vachida kuvarova. Vatori venhau vazobva padare apa vachiita zvekutandaniswa nemhuri yekwaBere. Bere nevamwe vake vanonzi vaibira vanhu mari dzemitero dzinofanirwa kudzoswa nehurumende kuvanhu ava. Bere anonzi akaita izvi apo aigara kudunhu reOhio kubva muna 2007 kusvika muna 2012. Vachuchisi vemuAmerica vanoti mari inodarika mamiriyoni manomwe emadhora yakabiwa naBere nevamwe vake vanoti Jullius Marimbire na Kudzaiishe Marimbire, avo vakatizawo kuAmerica, uye vachifungidzirwa kuti vari kuMasvingo. America ine chibvumirano neZimbabwe chekubatsirana kuti vanopara mhosva munyika mbiri idzi vatongwe munyika dzavakaparira mhosva dzacho. No media source currently available
title: Bere Anonyimwa Mukana weKubvisa Mari yeChibatiso Dare Richityira Kuti Anotiza

text: Vatungamiriri vesangano rinomirira vadzidzi reCouncil for Student Teachers, COST pamwe nevamwe vadzidzi vepaBelvedere Teachers College vasungwa neMuvhuro mangwanani. Vadzidzi ava vange vari kuratidzira vachitsutsumwa nedanho riri kutorwa nechikoro ichi rekuvharira panze vadzidzi vasina kubhadhara yechikoro pamwe nekuramba kuti vaite hurongwa hwekubhadhara zvikwereti zvavo padi pdiki sezviri kurudzirwa nehurumende. Mapurisa anodzivirira nyonga nyonga arova vadzidzi kubva kumajoreji akasiyana siyana avo vange vachiritidzira paBelvedere Teachers College ndokusunga mutungamiri weCOST, VaWalter Muzamani, nevamwe vadzidzi gumi. Vadzidzi, ava vasere vari madzimai nevarume vatatu, vaendeswa kukamba yemapurisa yeMilton Park ndokuzoendeswa kuHarare Central Rimwe remagweta avo, VaPaidamoyo Saurombe vanova nhengo yeZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights vaudza Studio 7 kuti kunyange hazvo vadzidzi vange vari kuratidzira murunyararo vari kupomerwa mhosva yekukonzera mhirizhonga. VaSaurombe vati vadzidzi ava varohwa zvakaipisisa nemapaurisa. Vati mapurisa anoratidza kuti ari kuda kuti vadzidz ava varare muchitokisi uye vati vanotarisira kuti vachaenda kudare mangwana kana nemusi weChitatu. Munyori musangano rinomirira vadzidzi vezvikoro zvepamusoro reZimbabwe National Students Union, VaTapaiwanashe Chiringa vashora zvaitwa nemapurisa vachiti hurumende inofanira kupa vadzidzi dzidzo kwete mboma. VaChiriga vati ZINASU yave kupindira munyaya iyi uye vachiramba vachiratidzira paBelvedere Teachers College nemamwe makoreji ari kurambidza vadzidzi kuta zvidzidzo zvavo. VaChiriga vati hapana asingazive kuti zvinhu zvakaoma munyika vakatiwo denda reCovid-19 ndiro rimwe riri kutadzisa vadzidzi kubhadhara mari inodiwa yese sezvo vabereki vavao vakarasikirwa nemabasa. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa divi remukuru weBelvedere Teacher College, Amai Julia Ruramai Mbofana sezvo nharembozha yavo yange isiri kubatika. Hatinawo kukwanisa kunzwe kubva kugurukota redzidzo yepamusoro, VaAmon Murwira sezvo vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. Mutauriri wemapurisa Assistant Comissioner Paul Nyathi vato vange vasati vapirwa nyaya iyi zuye vange vasisi muhofisi. No media source currently available
title: Vadzidzi vepaBelvedere Teachers College neVamwe Vorohwa Zvakaipisisa neMapurisa

text: Vagari vekwaMutare vanoti havasi kufara nezviri kuitwa naVaMugabe zvekuda kurambira pachigaro ivo vakadzingwa nebato ravo. Mumwe mugari, VaKenneth Mutimbe, vanoti VaMugabe vanofanirwa kutambira zvido zvevanhu, voenda pamudyandigere murunyararo. VaEvans Sithole vanoti nguva yaVaMugabe yakwana, nokudaro ngavaende kunozorora. VaElton Gowero vanoti VaMugabe vari kutyira hupenyu hwavo nemhuri yavo kana vakabvuma kusiya chigaro chavo pasina zvakasimba zvanyorerwana pasi. Mutungamiriri webato reZimbabwe Christian Alliance, VaGodfrey Nyatombwe, vanoti nyaya yekuti VaMugabe vasiye chigaro yakatanga kare asi vamwe vaisazviona kana kusazvitsigira. VaMugabe vaitarisirwa kunge vakabuda pachena kuti vasiya basa, izvo zvavasina kutaura. No media source currently available
title: VaMugabe Voshatirisa Vanhu kwaMutare

text: Zvinhu zvinonzi zvinogona kuipa munyaya dzehutano zvichitevera chiziviso chapiwa nesangano ravanamukoti reZimbabwe Nurses Association Harare Chapter chekuti vanogona kuramwa mabasa neMuvhuro svondo rinouya kana hurumende yakasavapa mari dzavo dzemabhonasi panopera musi weChishanu svondo rino. Sachigaro weZimbabwe Nurses Assocation Harare Chapter VaEnock Dongo vanoti vanamukoti vatora danho iri nekuti hurumende haisi kuchengetedza zvivimbiso zvainenge yavapa. Vanoti hurumende yakanga yavimbisa kuti vachawana mari idzi muna Zvita asi yakazoshanduka yoti musi wa2 Ndira gore rino, izvo zvakaita kuti vanamukoti vamukire kumabhanga vakanoswerako vakagarira mari dzavo idzo dzisina kuuya kusvika pari nhasi. Izvi zvinotsinhirwawo navanachiremba, avo vasati vapihwawo mari dzebhonasi idzi. Mutungamiri wesangano ranavachiremba reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association Doctor Fortune Nyamande vanoti sezvo nhengo dzavo dzichiri kubva muhurukuro nehurumende vachambomirira kuona kuti zvichafamba sei. Asi Doctor Nyamande vanoti kuramwa mabasa kwavanamukoti kurevawo kuti naivo vanenge votopindawo mukuramwa mabasa uku sezvo vasingazogoni kushanda vasina vanamukoti nevamwe vanovatsigira muzvipatara. Asi vanoti vanotarisira kuti zvavakavimbiswa nehurumende zvinosanganisira kukwidzwa kwemari dzavo dzemihoro nezvimwe zvichazadziswa. Varairidzi vakawana mari dzavo dzemabhonasi neMuvhuro asi hurumende inonzi haina zvayati yataura pamusoro pavanachiremba nevakoti. Vanachiremba vakabva pakuramwa mabasa kwemasvondo matatu vachida kuti vawedzerwe mari dzavanotambira. Zvichakadaro, sangano reZimbabwe Teachers Association , Zimta, rinoti riri kutanga musangano wemazuva maviri wekutsvaga nzira dzekuunza nhaurirano pakati pevashandi vehurumende nehurumende. Mutungamiri weZimta, VaRichard Gundani vanotiwo nhengo dzavo zhinji dzakawana mari dzemabhonasi kutanga neMuvhuro, asi nhau yekunonoka kutambiriswa ichakurukurwa nezvazvo mumusangano weNational Executive uyu. No media source currently available No media source currently available
title: VanaMukoti muHarare Voronga Kuramwa Mabasa neNyaya yeBhonasi

text: Zimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kuyambira hurumende kuti isarambe ichikwereta mari kubva kuChina sezvo ichizogona kuwira mumambure sezviri kuita nyika dzakaita seZambia neGreece. Sanganano reAfrica Confidential rinoti China yakatotora makambani ekuZambia anosanganisa nhepfenyuro yenyika iyi yeZambia National Broadcasting Corporation. China inonziwo iri kutora gwenya remagetsi reKafue Gorge nenyaya yekuti hurumende yeZambia. Imwe nzvimbo inosvikira ngarava kuGreece yePort Piraeus yakatorwa nekambani yekuChina inonzi Chinese Ocean Shipping Company kana kuti COSCO nenyaya yezvikwereti. Asi vachitaura nezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe kuNew York mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa uye gurukota rezvemari Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube vakati havasi kungotora zvikwereti pasina mukana wekuzvidzosera. Asi pamadandemutande akaita seTwitter, Facebook neWhattsApp zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe hazvisi kuratidza kugunun'una netsananguro iyi. Nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika uye vari gweta kuOregon, VaTapiwa Kapurura, vaudza Studio 7 kuti Zimbabwe izere nyanzvi munyaya dzezvemari nehupfumi nekudaro hurumende inofanirwa kugara pasi nadzo ichitsvaka mazano isati yakwereta. “Vanhu vari kutarisa dzimwe nyika dzakatitenderedza dziri kubatsirwa sekuverenga kwatiri kuita mumapepa. Nyika dzakaita saana Zambia nedzimwe vari kungochema chema nekutadza kubhadhara zvikwereti izvi,” VaKapurura Studio 7. Vakaenderera mberi vachiti, “Izvi zvinokonzera kuti nhamo dziwande kudarika pamange muri. Munosara mave kutochema. Zvinhu zvekuti vanhu vanofarira kungwarira izvozvo.”  No media source currently available
title: Hurumende Yoyambirwa Kuti Isarambe iChikwereta Zvakanyanya Kubva kuChina

text: Hutungamiri hwesangano remubatanidzwa wemasangano evagari vemunharaunda yeHarare, reHarare Metropolitan Residents Forum, huri kutarisirwa kusangana nevagari vemuChipinge manheru emusi weChipiri. Izvi zviri kuitwa senzira yekuvatsigira muhurongwa hwavo hwekuramba kutambira hurongwa hwekanzuru yeChipinge hwekuti vagari vashandise mvura yavanenge vatenga chete kuburikidza nema smart pre-paid water meter. Sachigaro wesangano reHarare Metropolitan Residents Forum, uye vari sachigaro weCombined Harare Residents Association, CHRA, VaSimbarashe Moyo, vanoti vatora danho iri senzira yekuratidza kubatana kwavo nevagari vemuChipinge sezvavagara vachingoita nevamwe vagari vemakanzuru ose emunyika. Sangano iri rinobatanidza masangano evagari vemuHarare, Chitungwiza, Ruwa neNorton. Kanzuru yeChipinge yakazivisa kuti musi wa 8 Kubvumbi ichange ichikoka vose vanoda uye kukwanisa kuiwanisa mamita emvura aya kuti vange vari pamahofisi ayo nenguva dzegumi mangwanani. Kanzuru yeChipinge inonzi iri kuda kuisa mamita anosvika zviuru zviviri. Asi sezviri kungoitikawo mune mamwe maguta nemakanzuru, vagari vari kuramba kutambira hurongwa uhwu vachiti ikodzero yemunhu wese yekuti awaniswe mvura pasina zvipingaidzo. Makanzuru akawanda anonzi ambosendeka hurongwa hwekuti vagari vatange vatenga mvura yavachashandisa uhwu sezvo hwakonzera mutauro. Hurumende inonzi inenge iri kutsigira hurongwa hwekuti vagari vashandise mvura yavanenge vatenga uhwu. Hatina kukwanisa kubata vekanzuru yeChipinge kuti tinzwewo divi ravo. No media source currently available
title: Mamita eMvura Oramba Kutambirwa kuChipinge

text: Mutungamiri webato rinopikisa reMovement for Democratic Change, VaMorgan Tsvangirai, neChina vakaparura rwendo rwekunosangana nevatsigiri vavo kudunhu reMashonaland West. VaTsvangirai vange vari paMaumbe Business Centre kuHurungwe Central uko vange vachitaura nezvemamiriro ehupfumi uye nzara iyo yapfunya chisero mumatunhu akawanda munyika. Vatiwo kudzimwa kwemagetsi munongedzo wekuti Zanu-PF yakundikana kutonga. VaTsvangirai vakaudzawo vanhu kuti zviri pachena kuti bato riri kutonga reZanu-PF riri kukundikana kugadzirisa zviri kunetsa munyika nenyaya yekuti nhengo dzebato iri dzave kupedza nguva dzichirwira kuti ndiyani achatora chigaro chemutungamiri webato iri, VaRobert Mugabe. Mutungamiri weMDC-T ari kutarisirwa kuitawo musangano neChishanu kuAlaska kuChinhoyi. Nemusi weMugovera VaTsvangirai vachange vari paDombwe kuChegutu East vachizopeta misangano yavo neSvondo paCassa Grounds kuZvimba East. Mwedzi wapera VaTsvangirai vange vari kuMashonaland Central vachisanganawo nevanhu. Mutauriri weMDC-T kuMashonaland West Province, VaBlessing Mandaba, vanoti musangano wavo wakafamba zvakanaka kunyange hazvo vamwe veZanu-PF vainge voda kuedza kuvakanganisa. No media source currently available
title: VaTsvangirai Voparura Misangano kuMashonaland West

text: Zvichitevera chikumbiro chakaitwa nemutungamiri weMDC-T, VaDouglas Mwonzora, kumutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, chekuti sarudzo dzema ’by-elections’ dzimbomiswa, vazhinji vari kuvashora zvikuru. Nemusi weSvondo, bepanhau reStandard rakabudisa mashoko ekuti mumusangano wakaitwa pakati paVaMwonzora naVaMnangagwa nemutevedzeri wavo, VaConstantino Chiwenga, kumuzinda weState House, VaMwonzora vakakumbira VaMnangagwa kuti vambomisa sarudzo dzema’by-elections’. Vamwe vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vanoti zviri pachena kuti VaMwonzora vanotya kuti bato ravo rinogona kukundwa zvine mutsindo musarudzo idzi, saka vachida kuti kusaitwa sarudzo. Bato reMDC Alliance riri kushora zvikuru chikumbiro chaVaMwonzora, richiti hachienderani nehutongi hwejekerere. Mutevedzeri wemutauriri weMDC Alliance, VaClifford Hlatywayo, vaudza Studio 7 kuti VaMwonzora vari kuratidza pachena kuti vari kushanda nebato reZanu-PF. VaHlatywayo vati dai VaMwonzora vachida kubatsira nekugadzirisa hupenyu hwevanhu havairamba kuti vanhu vatume vanhu vavazvisarudzira kuti vavamirire kudare reparamende kana kumakanzuru. No media source currently available Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi raVaMwonzora sezvo mutauriri webato ravo, VaWitness Dubem vanga vasiri kubatika panharembozha yavo, Asi sachigaro we Zanu-PF mudunhu reNorth America, VaRegis Charumbira Vusango, vanorumbidza VaMwonzora, vachiti VaMwonzora vane chido chekubatsira mukugadzirisa zvinhu zvinonetsa munyika sezvo vapindavo musangano remapoka anopikisa ari kuita hurukuro nemutungamiri wenyika, rePolitical ActorsDialogue. No media source currently available
title: VaMwonzora Voshorwa Mushure Mekukurudzira Kuti Sarudzo Dzimbomiswa

text: Mapurisa nemasoja nemusi weMuvhuro vakapa humbowo hwavo kukomisheni yakagadzwa nemutungamiri wenyika kuti iongorore zvakaitika pamhirizhonga yemusi wa1 Nyamavhuvhu pakapfurwa vanhu vatanhatu nemauto. Sachigaro wekomisheni iyi ndiVaKgalema Mothlante avo vaive mutungamiri wenyika yeSouth Africa. Mukuru mukuru wemapurisa VaGodwin Matanga vakati mutungamiri wenyika ndivo vakati masoja apinde mumigwagwa uye masoja akaramba kuti ndiwo akapfura vanhu musi uyu. VaMatanga vakaudza komisheni iyi kuti mutungamiri weMDC VaNelson Chamisa vanogona kusungwa chero ipi nguva maererano nemhirizhonga iyi vachiti mashoko avakaudza vatsigiri vavo ekuti havazotambira zvainge zvabuda musarudzo kana vasina kunzi ndivo vainge vakunda musarudzo ndizvo zvimwe zvakapa kuti pasaite kugadzikana. VaMatanga vati mapurisa achiri pakati pekuferefeta zvakaitika pamhirizhonga iyi. Vakati zviri pachena kuti VaChamisa vaironga kuti nyika isagadzikane mushure mesarudzo sezvakaitika kuKenya uko kwakafa vanhu vakawanda mushure mesarudzo. Asi vakati vakaona zvakakodzera kuti vambomira kusunga VaChamisa sezvo vachiti kuita izvi kwakanga kwakafanana nekuwedzera peturu parimi remoto VaMatanga vakatiwo mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mngangagwa ndivo vakapa masoja mvumo yekupinda mumugwagwa kuti vabatsirane nemapurisa kupedza kuratidzira kwaiitika pakati pedhorobha zvichitevera chikumbiro chakanga chasvitswa nemapurisa kumutungamiri wenyika sezvinodiwa pamutemo. Mukuru wemapurisa VaMatanga vakati mapurisa mazhinji akanga aendeswa kunochengetedza runyararo munyika yose panguva yaiitwa sarudzo zvakaita kuti muHarare musarare muine mapurisa mashomanana. Vanoti muHarare makasara musina mapurisa akakwana zvakapa kuti vatadze kudzivirira mhirizhonga zvakapa kuti masoja azodaidzwa. VaMatanga vakati mushure mekunge masoja apihwa mvumo naVaMnangagwa yekupinda mumigwagwa hapana kuwanikwa mukana wekuti mapurisa nemasoja vagare pasi kuti vazeye kuti vaizoshandisa nzira dzipi kumisa kuratidzira kwaiitika uku. Asi pavainge vachibvunzurudzwa nenhengo dzekomisheni iyi vakati masoja akapinzwa mumugwagwa aya aifanira kuudzwa zvekuita nemapurisa pasi pemutemo. VaMatanga vakaenderera mberi vachiti pfuti dzakashandiswa nemasoja zvine mwero vachiti mhando dzepfuti dzakanga dzakapakatirwa nemasoja dzemhando yeAK47 dzaikwanisa kuuraya vanhu vakawansda dai dzakashandiswa kudarika vanhu vatanhatu vakafa. Mukuru wemauto eZimbabwe Defense Forces General Philip Valerio Sibanda vakapawo humbowo kukomisheni vachitsinhira VaMatanga. General Sibanda vakati vakanzwa pfuti dzichirira mauto asati ambopinda muguta. Vakatiwo mauto avo haana kupfura vanhu uye vakati vakuru venyika vakaona zvakakodzera kuti mauto apindire sezvo zvinhu zvange zvisisina kumira zvakanaka Mutevedzeri wasachigaro wekomisheni inoona nezvekodzero dzevanhu yeZimbabwe Human Rights Commission, Amai Ellen Sithole, vakaudzawo komisheni iyi kuti kunyangwe hazvo vanhu vairatidzira, zvakanga zvisingakodzere kuti pashandiswe chisimba chakashandiswa musi uyu sezvo varatidziri ava vaive vanhu vakanga vasina zvombo zvehondo. Mumwe mukuru wemauto Brigadier General Ancelom Nhamo Sanyatwe, avo vanove nhengo yeboka reNational Reaction Group inosanganira mauto, mapurisa pamwe nevasori, vakaudza komisheni iyi kuti masoja haana munhu waakapfura kunze kwekuridzira pfuti mudenga achityisidzira vairatidzira ava kuti vapararire. Vachibvunzurudzwa nenhengo dzekomisheni iyi pamusoro pevhidhiyo yairatidza musoja achiridza pfuti akazomiswa nemumwe wake pachiitiko ichi, VaSanyatwe vakati musoja uyu haana munhu waakapfura asi akapfugama akanongedzera pfuti senzira yekuzvidzivirira kubva kumatombo aikandwa uye aridzira pfuti yake mudenga. VaSanyatwe vakati dai masoja akapfura muvanhu vatori venhau vaitora mifananidzo musi uyu vangadai vakakwanisa kutora mifananidzo yacho sezvo vakati vatori venhau vaiva mumashure memasoja nguva dzose pose paiitika mhirozhonga iyi. Vatiwo vanhu vese vakapa humbowo kukomisheni iyi hwekuti masoja ndiwo akapfura vanhu vainyepa. Vakaenderera mberi vachiti vanhu vakapfurwa ava vanogona kunge vakapfurwa nevanhuwo zvavo vasiri masoja sezvo vachiti vamwe vanamuzvinabhizimusi vakawanda muHarare vane pfuti uye vaigona kunge vaidzivirira mabhizimisi avo. VaSanyatwe vakati seboka reNational Reaction Force vakange vatambira mashoko mazuva akati kuti airatidza kuti MDC Alliance yaironga zvekupidigura hurumende ichishandisa vechidiki vebato iri vanozivikanwa nekunzi Vanguard avo vavanoti vakadzidziswa zvehondo. Asi vachipindura nyaya iyi, mutauri weMDC VaJacob Mafume varamba kuti VaChamisa vane chekuita nemhirizhonga iyi. VaMafume vakaudza Studio 7 kuti zviri kutaurwa izvi ndezve mugotsi matsuro. Zvichakadai, vamwe vakapa humbowo kukomisheni iyi, Amai Lilian Chigwedere, vanove mutevedzeri wasachigaro wekomisheni inoona nezverunyararo nekupodzwa kwemaronda yeNational Peace and Reconcilation, vakaudza komisheni iyi pane nhaurirano dziri kuitwa muchivande dzekuedza kuunza VaChamisa naVaMnangagwa patafura asi havana kutaura kuti nhaurirano idzi dzave papi uye kuti dziri kutungamirirwa nani. Koimisheni iyi yakatarisirwa kuenderera mberi nemusi weChipiri ichinzwa humbowo kuvafakazi. Studio 7 haisati yaziva kuti VaMnangwagwa naVaChamisa vachaunzwa pamberi pekomisheni iyi here kana kuti kwete. No media source currently available
title: VaMnangagwa Vanonzi Vaiziva nezveKutumirwa kweMauto Uko Mapurisa Oronga Kusunga VaChamisa

text: Munyori mukuru mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko VaNick Mangwana vanoti pane vatori venhau vakaenda kubazi ravo vachida kuti vavambe sangano rinonzi Journalists For Economic Development semamwe masangano akadai ari kuparurwa nebato reZANU-PF. Asi vati hapana chinobatika chati chaitwa. VaMangwana vaudza Studio 7 kuti , "Pane vatori venhau vakauya vachiti vanoda kutanga chikwata cheJournalists For Economic Development asi nekuti tine zvirongwa zvakawanda zvatanga tichiita vhiki rino handina kukwanisa kunzwa hwaro hwavo." Vaenderera mberi vachiti, " Isu tinowona zvakanaka kuti vatori venhau vapindewo pachirongwa chekuzvi randudza panyaya yezveupfumi sezviri kuitwa nevamwe vashandi." Asi rimwe remasangano anomirira vatori venhau reZimbabwe National Editors forum rinoti riri kushora zvikuru gungano rakatangwa padandemutande reWhatsaApp ririkunzi Journalists For Economic Develpment iri sezvo vamwe vatori venhau vakapinzwa mugungano iri vasina kupa mvumo kune vakaritanga. Ncube anoti akangoona zita rake nenhamba dzake dzakandwa mugungano iri, iro rine vatori venhau vanoshandira hurumende nemamwe masangano akazvimirira. Vaudza Studio 7 kuti, "Vamwe vatori venhu vanoshandira makambani ehurumende vave kutya kuvhunza kana kukumbira kuburitswa mugungano iri sezvo vari kufunga kuti vangango rasikirwa nemabasa." Vaenderera mberi vachiti, "Ini nevamwe vaka kandwa mugangano iri tiri kutsvaga vakaritanga kuti tinzwe kuti vaka pihwa vhumo yekuita izvi nani. Tichange tichitaura zvakare negurukota rekufambiswa kwemashoko pemusoro pechiitiko ichi sezvo tisiri kuwirirana ." Vachitaurawo nezvenyaya iyi, mukuru weStudio 7 (Voice of America) vatiwo vagtori venhau venhepfenyuro yavo haine nechekuita nesangano reJournalists for Economic Development sezvo ichitema isina divi rayakarerekera. Vatiwo vamwe vatori venhau veStudio 7 vakangoona mazita avpo akandwa muchikwata chepaWhatsApp chiri kuzviti Journalists for Economic Development. No media source currently available No media source currently available
title: Vatori veNhau Voita Gakava paNyaya yeSangano re"Journalists For Economic Development "

text: Kanzuru yeHarare nhasi yatura hurongwa wayo hwebhajeti regore rinouya rayo remari inosvika mabhiriyoni mazana maviri negumi nematatu emunyika kana kuti 213 billion ichivimbisa kuti ichakoshesa nyaya yekuwanisa vanhu mvura yakachena kuchenesa guta nezvimwe zviri kushuvirwa nevanhu. Kanzuru yavimbisa kuti haisi kuzowedzera mitero zvakanyanya. Vaparura hurongwa hwebhajeti iri kumuzinda wekanzuru weTown House muHarare ndisachigaro wezvekufambiswa kwemari mukanzuru yeHarare VaCosta Mande avo vati. Vaenderera mberi vachiti mitero yakadai semvura nezvipatara haina kuchinja. Asi kanzuru iri kutarisira kukwidza mitero yemotokari dzinotakura varwere kubva pamadhora makumi maviri emadhora ekuAmerica kana kuti US$20 kusvika kumadhora makumi matatu nemashanu kana kuti US$35. Vati izvi zvinobatsira kuti maamburenzi aya anyatsoshanda zvakanaka. Vachitaura neStudio 7 mushure mekuturwa kwebhajeti ra2023, Meya veguta reHarare, VaJacob Mafume vachema chema nekusapihwa mari iri muhurongwa hwekuendesa masimba kumatunhu kana kuti devolution uye kusabhadhara mitero kuri kuita vamwe vagari. Gurukota rinoona nezvematunhu VaJuly Moyo vakaudza dare reparamende svondo rapera kuti imwe mari yekanzuru yedevolution iri kupihwa kambani yeGeogenix iri kugadzira kunorasirwa marara kuPomona. Kanzuru yakati yabuda muchibvumirano nekambani iyi nekuti nofunga kuti pakaitwa huwori hunotyisa zvekuti kanzuru iri kunzi ibhadhare mari inosvika zviuru makumi maviri nemaviri kana kuti US$22 000 pazuva kuti irase marara kwemakore makumi matatu anotevera. VaMafume vati vari kutarisira kugadzirisa makirinika, migwagwa, kuwanisa vanhu mvura yakachena nemutengo uri pasi pamwe nekutenga mota dzakawanda dzinotakura marara. Mumwe mugari wemuHarare VaTanatsiwa Dambuza vati vafarira hurongwa hwemari uhwu sezvo mitero yakawanda isina kukwira asi vati vanotenda maruva vadya chakata pane zvavimbiswa nekanzuru. Mukuru werimwe sangano rinomiririra vagari reHarare Residents Trust, VaPrecious Shumba vatiwo dzimwe mari dzemitero dzichiri dzakati wandei uye dzinoda kudzorwa. Vagari vemuHarare vachaongorora bhajeti iri kwemwedzi vachipawo pfungwa dzavo. Kana izvi zvapera, bazi rezvematuhu rinozopa shoko rekupedzisira kuti bhajeti rotambirwa here kana kuti kwete.
title: Kanzuru yeHarare Yoparura Bhajeti reZW$213 Billion

text: Apo nyika yakatarisana nekushomeka kwehupfu, paramende nhasi yaudzwa nemamwe makambani madiki anogaya chibage kuti pane mamwe makambani mahombe ari kuendesa chibage chakaderera mutongo kunyika dzakaita seDemocratic Republic of Congo. Izvi zvabuda paongororo yemashandiro esangano reGrain Millers Association of Zimbabwe iri kuitwa nekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvekurima. Mukuru wekambani yeMr Brands, VaWayne Morse Brant, vaudza komiti iyi kuti pane huwori huri kuitwa nemamwe makambani ari kupihwa chibange kuti agaye hupfu hwakachipa ari kutengesa chibage ichi kunze kwenyika. Vatiwo makambani aya ari kushandisa chibage chakachipa ichi kugadzira zvimwe zvinhu zvakaita seporiji nezvimwe zvinodhura. VaBrant vati kambani yehurumende, yeGMB, iri kuita rurasarura uye kusvika muna Zvita yange iri kupa chibage ichi kubva kunhengo dzeGMAZ chete. VaDavies Muhambi vekambani yeUnited Milling avo vaudza komiti iyi kuti vakadzingwa muGMAZ mushure mekupokana nehutungamiriri wesangano iri, vati vanoona sekuti GMAZ inomiriria makambani mahombe chete akaita seNational Foods neBlue Ribbon. Vati makambani iwawa ndiwo ange achibatsirikana nezvirongwa zvese zvinotwa neGMAZ. VaMuhambi vabvumirana naVaBrant kuti mamwe makambani mahombe anogaya hupfu ndiwo ari kutengesa chibage chakachipa kunze kwenyika izvo zvave kukonzora kuti munyika muite dambudziko rehupfu hwakachipa. VaMuhambi vati vakazvipira kushanda neparamende kuburitsa huwori hwese panyaya dzekugayiwa kwehupfu munyika. VaBrant vati havachina chivimbo nesangano rakaita seGMAZ ndosaka vakaumba sangano rinomirira makambani madiki neari pakati nepakati, reSmall and Medium Millers Association. Vachipawo humbowo kukomiti iyi, mukuru weNational Foods, VaMichael Lashbrook, varamba kuti makambani mahombe akaita seyavo ari kutengesa chibage kana hupfu kunze kwenyika. Vati National Foods yakambomira kugaya hupfu hwakachipa mwedzi wapfuura sezvo hurumende yainge isina kuva bhadhara pahupfu hwakachipa hwavainge vagaya kubva musi wa7 Zvita pakatanga chirongwa chekugaya hupfu hune muitengo uri pasi. Asi vati vakazobhadharwa zvekuti vatanga zvekare kugaya hupfu kwakachipa. Imwe yemakambani mahombe anove nhengo dzeGMAZ, Blue Ribbon iyo yange yakamiririrwa naVaYusu Kamau Varambawo kuti iri kutengesa chibange chakachipa kunze kwenyika. Asi vanongororora nyaya dzehupfumi vakazvimirira, Masimba Kuchera, vaudza Stduio 7 kuti panogona kunge painye makambani ari kuita izvi. Hurumende yakamboderedza mutengo wehupfu hwehupfu muna Zvita kubva pamadhora zana kusvika pamadhora makumi mashanu pamakirogriramu gumi. Asi hupfu hwakazowedzerwazve kusvika pamadhora makumi manomwe. Panyaya yemamiriyoni makumi maviri nemanomwe emadhora ekuAmerica anonzi akapihwa GMAZ kuti itenge gorosi, VaLashbrook naVaKamau vabvuma kuti GMAZ yakavabatsira kutsvaga mari yekunze kuReserve Bank of Zimbabwe. Vati ivo senhengo dzeGMAZ vaiunganidza mari vachiisa muAccount yeGMAZ uye RBZ ndiyo yakazobhadhara kambani yaivatengesera gororosi yeHolbud. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwe kubva kugurukota rezvemari, VaMthuli Ncube kana gurukota rezvemabhizimisi nemaindasitiri, VaAmai Sekai Nzenza pamusoro panyaya iyi. Asi vaNcube vanotairisirwa kumira pamberi pekomiti iyi mangwana. Mutangamiriri weGMAZ VaTafadzwa Musarara vanoti zvimwe zvange zvichitaurwa nemakambani aya ndezvekuda kuvasvibisa chete. No media source currently available
title: Vanogaya Chibage Vokandirana Makobvu neMatete paNyaya yeKushomeka kweHupfu

text: Munyika maita kusawirirana kukuru nechisungo chedare remakurukota chekuda kuvandudzwa mutemo weCriminal Law (Codification Reform) Act kuti vanenge vachiratidzira pachiitwa magungano makuru, kutaura nehurumende dzekunze vachifukura hapwa uye kunyepera kuti vapambwa, vasungwe. Gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko Amai Monica Mutsvangwa vanoti pane vanhu vari kuunza kutambura munyika nekusvibisa zita renyika izvo zviri kupa kuti hurumende isimbise mitemo yayo. Asi vanopikisa vanoti chauraya nyika kutonga nedemo uye huori. Hurumende yaimbenge yatiwo iri kuparura bhiri rinonzi Patriot Bill rayaiti rakafanana nemutemo wekuAmerica weLogan Act unorambidza vanhu kutaura nehurumende dzekunze munyaya dzinofanira kutaurwa nehurumende. Gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu, uye vari mukuru weHuman Rights Watch kuchamhmbe kweAfrica, VaDewa Mavhinga, vanoti mutemo uyu unotyora bumbiro remitemo yenyika. Asi nhengo yeZanu-PF, VaGilbert Dzikiti, vanoti mutemo uyu wakakosha nekuti pane vamwe vanoda kuita mari nekusvibisa zita renyika. No media source currently available
title: Vanorwira Kodzero Voshushikana neHurongwa hweHurumende Hunotyora Kodzero dzeVeruzhinji

text: Bazi rezvehutano pamwe nemasangano anoshanda akazvimirira munyaya dzehutano nhasi audza nhengo dzeparamende kuti dzitaurire bazi rezvemari kuti ripe mari yakwanda kunyaya dzehutano vachiti mari zhinji iri kushandiswa mubazi iri inobva kunyika dzekunze pamwe nemasangano anopa rubatsiro. Vachitaura nenhengo dzekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvehutano maererano nezvavanoda mubhajeti regore rinouya, munyori webazi rezvehutano, Dr Gerald Gwinji, vati mari inopihwa kubazi ravo gore rega rega iri kudzikira uye munyika munogona kuita dambudziko guru munyaya dzehutano kana nyika nemasangano anobatsira vakamira kupa mari kuZimbabwe. Dr Gwinji vakurudzira nhengo dzekomiti iyi kuti dzikurudzire bazi rezvemari kuti ripe bazi rehutano mari yakawanda vachiti zvakakosha kuti nyika ikwanise kuti vanhu vayo vawane hutano hwakanaka. Mutungamiriri wesangano rinomira vanachiremba, reZimbabwe Medical Association, Dr Anges Mahomva, vakumbirawo komiti iyi kuti ikurudzire bazi rezvemari kuti riise mari yekawanda kuhutano kuti vanhu vave nehutano hwakanaka. Dr Mahomva vati zvinosuwisa kuti vanhu vave kuenda kunyika dziri kure dzakaita seIndia kunorapwa nekuda kwekuti vari kutadza kuwana hutano hwakanaka munyika. Mukuru wesangano reCommunity Working Group on Health, VaItayi Rusike, vatiwo hurumende inofanira kuisa mari yakakwana kunyaya dzehutano sezvo zvisina kunaka kuti masangano ekunze abhadhare mabasa ehutano. VaRusike vatiwo nyaya yeropa yanetsa munyika uye hurumende inofanira kuona kuti mutengo weropa wadzeredzwa kuti vanhu vasafa nekushaya kana kutadza kutenga ropa muzvipatara. Vatiwo kana mari ikawanda mubazi rehutano, bazi ri rinokwanisa kupinza basa vana mukoti nanachiremba vakawanda izvo zvinoita kuti mabasa ehutano asimukire. VaGwinji vaudza komiti iyi kuti nemanetsero ari kuita mari havafungi kuti vachawana mari yakawanda kupfuura yavakawana gore rino. Vati pamari yavanoda gore rinoouya $273 million, ndeyemihoro, kozoti $29 million ndiyo inenge iri mari yekushandisa. Gore rino bazi iri raida $303 million yekushandisa asi rakapihwa $53 million dollars chete. Nyika nemasangano ekunze ari kubatsira munyaya dzehutano ne$147 million. Dr Gwinji vati vanovimba kuti nyika idzi nemasangano aya acharamba achibatsira nyika munyaya dzehutano gore rinouya. Sachigaro wekomiti iyi, Dr Peter Mataruse, vati vachataura nebazi rezvemari pamusangano wepre-budget nechinangwa chekuti ritarise zvichemo zvavo. Gurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, vanotarisirwa kutura bhajeti ravo regore rinouya mwedzi unouya. Asi vasati vaita izvi, vachaita misangano nemakomiti eparamende vachinzwa zvaanoda kuti zvive mubhajeti iri.
title: Hurumende Yokurudzirwa Kupa Bazi reHutano Mari Inorikwanira

text: Vana, madzimai nevarume vakasiiwa nemagamba akapihwa ruremekedzo rwemagamba enyika vanoti vari kunonga svosve nemuromo sezvo hupenyu huri kuvaomera. Apo nyika iri kurangarira zuva remagamba, dzimwe mhuri dzakasiyiwa nemagamba aya dzinoti hapana chadziri kuwana kubva kuhurumender kuti dzirarame. Amai Josphine Madhakwa Marowa vane murume wavo akavigwa pamarinda emagamba muChinhoyi, VaJameson Madhakwa. Vanoti hapana chavari kuwana kuti vararamise mhuri yakasiyiwa nemurume wavo. Amai Madhakwa, avo vaimbopihwa madhora makumi mashanu pamwedzi muna 1992,vanoti dai hurumende yadzosa mari yemudyandigere wemadzimai kana varume vakasiyiwa nemagamba. Mwana werimwe gamba rakaradzikwa pamarinda emuChinhoyi, Amai Rose Chiku Shepherd, vanoti hapana chavari kuwana. Vanoti vanin’ina vavo vari kuenda kuchikoro havana rubatsiro rwavari kuwana kubva kuhurumende. Amai Shepherd vanoti dai vana vevaimbove varwi verusununguko vakafa vawaniswa mukana pane zvirongwa zvinoyamura vechidiki munyika. Mudzimai waVaBen Gumbe, Amai Clarisa Gumbe, vanoti vakambonyoreswa mapepa ekuti vapihwe mari asi hapana chakauya. Amai Gumbe vanoti vaida kumbosangana nemutungamiri wenyika panyaya dzemari yekuti vararame asi musangano uyu hauna kuzoitika sezvo vaida kutaura zvichemo zvavo zvose. Asi mumwe wechidiki anga ari kumhemberero dzanhasi muChinhoyi, Muzvare Jacquline Moyo, vanoti vana nemhuri dzakasiyawa nemagamba vanofanirwa kushanda kuti vararame sevanhu vose nekuti vanhu vakawanda vakarwa hondo yechimurenga nenzira dzakasiyana. Madzimai kana varume vemagamba akapihwa ruremekedzo rwegamba redunhu hapana chavari kupihwa semunhadharo webasa rakaitwa nevarume kana vakadzi vavo. Hatina kunzwawo kuti varume kana vakadzi vakasiyiwa nevakaitwa magamba enyika vanopihwa marii sezvo vakawanda vavo vanga vasingade kutaura nezvenyaya yemari nepamusana pekutya. No media source currently available
title: Mhuri dzeVakarwira Rusununguko Dzochema Dzichiti Hurumende Haisi Kudzibatsira

text: Mutori wenhau anga ane mukurumbira munyika, Grace Mutandwa, ashaya mushure mekurwara nechirwere chegomarara. Mutandwa ashaya mangwanani eChitatu mushure mekunetseka nechirwere chegomarara kwenguva yakareba. Kushaya kwaMutandwa kwasiya vatori venhau vakawanda vari mukuchema vachirangarira mabasa emumwe wavo. Mutori wenhau, Margaret Chinowaita, ati anonzwa kurasikirwa kwakanyanya semutori wenhau sezvo Mutandwa anga ari chipangamazano kune vanyori vakawanda vechidiki huye mabasa ake aiyemurika zvichipa shungu kune vamwe vatori venhau kuti vabudirire. Mumwe mutori wenhau, Paidamoyo Muzulu, atiwo Mutandwa aive gamba munyaya dzekutorwa kwenhau nekuzivisa nyika zvaitora nzvimbo kunyange panguva yazvaive zvisiri nyore kutapa nhau. Mumwe akashanda naMutandwa kuFinancial Gazette, uye vari mukuru weMedia Center, VaEarnest Mudzengi, vati vakadzidza zvakawanda kubva kunaMtandwa. Vatiwo vanomurangarirawo nezvinyorwa zvake zvaisimudzira kufambiswa kwenhau zvakasununguka munyika. Mutauriri wemhuri yekwaMutandwa, Amai Rosemary Nyahuye, vati hurongwa hwekuratidzwa kwemufi hausati hwavapo. Vamwe vatori venhau varatidzawo kurwadziwa kwavo pamadandemutande nekushaya kwaMutandwa Pamusoro pekushanda kuFinancial Gazette, uko aive nechikamu chininzi Chilling Out, Mutandwa akashandawo kuSunday Mail, New Ziana pamwe nekumuzinda weBritain muZimbabwe. Mutandwa, uyo akanyora mabhuku anoti Whose Daughter My Child?, The Power and The Glory nemamwe, asiya vana vatatu. No media source currently available
title: Mutori weNhau, Grace Mutandwa, Ashaya

text: Mukuru-mukuru wemapurisa VaAugustine Chihuri pamwe negurukota rinowona nezve mukati menyika, VaIgnatius Chombo, vanzi nedare varipe mumwe mugari wekuChingwizi, mudunhu reMasvingo uyo anonzi nedare akashungurudzwa pamwe nekurwadziswa nemapurisa paakasungwa gore rapera. Mutongi wedare ramejasitiriti rekuChiredzi VaTafadzwa Mhlanga vatura mutongo wekuti VaChihuri naVaChombo vabhadhare mugari wekuChingwizi uyu VaZulu Jinya, mari inoita madhora mazana mashanu nemakumi mashanu, zvichitevera kusungwa kusingakodzeri pamwe nekushungurudzwa kunonzi kwavakaitwa. VaJinya nevamwe vagari vekuChingwizi munharaunda ye Mwenezi mudunhu reMasvingo vakasungwa gore rapera. Panzwikwa nyaya iyi neChishanu, dare rakanzwa kuti VaJinya vakarohwa zvakaomarara nemapurisa vari muhusungwa, izvo zvinozni zvaita kuti dare riti VaJinya vabhadharwe kushungurudzwa nekurwadziswa kwavakaitwa nemapurisa. Rimwe remagweta ari kumirira vagari vekuChingwizi ava Amai Peggy Tavagadza, vaudza Studio 7 parunhare vari kuChiredzi kuti vafara zvikuru nemutongo waturwa nedare. Amai Tavagadza vati mutongi wedare aratidza kushushikana zvikuru mumutongo wake nekurohwa kwakaitwa VaJinya vari muhusungwa. Vaudzawo Studio 7 zvakare kuti pane vamwe vagari vekuChingiwizi vachiri mumatare nenyaya dzavari kupomerwa dzemhirizhonga. Zvichakadai, Amai Tavagadza vati hupenyu hwevagari vazhinji vekuChingwizi huri munjodzi sezvo mvura yave pedyo kunaya. Vanhu vakawanda vakasara vasina pekugara uye chekudya zvichitevera mafashamu emvura akaitika kudhamu reTokwe Murkosi muna Kukadzi wegore rapera. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kubata VaChombo naVaChihuri kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi sezvo nharembozha dzavo dzange dzisiri kudairwa. No media source currently available
title: Dare Rinoti VaChihuri naVaChombo Vabhadhare Munhu Akashungurudzwa ari Muhusungwa

text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvirwere zvepfungwa dzinoti huwandu hwevanhu vanorwara nepfungwa huri kuramba huchikura munyika. Mukuru weZimbabwe National Association for Mental Health, VaIgnatius Murambidzi vanoti kuoma kwehupenyu nekushandiswa kwezvinodhaka zvakanyanya ndezvimwe zvezviri kukonzera kukwira kwehuwandu hwevanhu vane chirwere ichi. VaMurambidzi vakurudzira hurumende kuti igadzirise mamiriro ehupfumi hwenyika kuderedza dambudziko rezvirwere zvepfungwa. VaMurambidzi vachema-chemawo nekushomeka kwana chiremba vane hunyanzvi hwekurapa chirwere ichi. Mumwe wevanachiremba vane hunyanzvi mukurapa chirwere ichi, VaNemache Mavedzenge vatsigirawo vakati kutambura kuri kuita vanhu munyika nekushandisa zvinodhaka zvakanyanya kuri kukwidza huwandu hwevarwere vepfungwa. VaMavedzenge vatiwo mishonga yakawanda inoshandiswa nevane dambudziko rechirwere chepfungwa inotengwa kunze kwenyika uye haiwanikwi zvakanyanya kuzvipatara zvehurumende kwainofanirwa kuwanikwa nemitengo yakadzikira izvi zvinowedzera kukura kwedambudziko iri. VaMavedzenge vanotiwo zvimwe zvizviratidzo zvechirwere ichi kuchinja kwemaitiro emunhu achiita zvisingatarisirwi pamwe nekunzwa manzwi asipo. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kubazi rezvehutano kuti vanhu vanorwara nepfungwa munyika vakawanda zvakadii.
