Asiwo vamwe vevakuru vemachechi vataurwa navo neStudio 7 vatsinhira kuti kushaikwa kwemabasa kuri kukonzera kunetsekana kweveruzhinji izvo zvinozoita kuti vafunge zvakanyanya kuti vobatanidza sei hupenyu. Zimbabwe ine zvipatara zvina zvinorapa varwere vepfungwa zvinoti Harare Psychiatric Hospital, Parirenyatwa Annexe, Ingutsheni, neNgomahuru. Sangano reWorld Health Organization gore rapera rakati vanhu vanosvika miriyoni nezviuru mazana matatu muZimbabwe vane chirwere chepfungwa. No media source currently available
title: Vanhu Vakawanda muZimbabwe Vorwara neZvirwere zvePfungwa

text:
Zimbabwe yabatana nenyika dzepasi rose mukucherechedza zuva reWorld
AIDS Day paine kurudziro yekupedza chirwere cheHIV/AIDS panosvika gore
ra2030. Vachitaura pamhemberero idzi nhasi muChinhoyi, mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvehutano, Dr John Mangwiro, vati bazi ravo riri kurwisa chirwere cheHIV/AIDS zvakanyanya zvekuti vachazadzisa chinangwa chekupedza denda iri mugore ra2030.

Dr Mangwiro vati bazi ravo riri kuvaka zvipatara makumi matatu nezviviri munyika yose senzira yekuti munhu wese awane mukana wekurapwa kana ave kurwara.

Vachitaura pachiitiko chahasi, vakafanobata chigaro chemutevedzeri
wemukuru pamuzinda weAmerica, VaArt Brown, vati nyika yavo yakapa Zimbabwe mari inosvika mamiriyoni mazana maviri negumi nematatu emadhora kana kuti US$213m munyaya dzezvehutano.

Mumwe mwana akazvarwa aine hutachiona hweHIV, Tsitsidzashe Mugari,
uyo akapedza zvidzidzo zvake zveA’ Level gore rakapera akurudzira
vanhu vanorarama neHIV/AIDS kuti vararame vaine tariro yekuzadzisa zvishuwo zvavo muhupenyu.

VaGodfrey Kamurai vekuMakonde vanorarama neHIV/AIDS uye vaine vana vapfumbamwe vati vakararamiswa nekunwa mapiritsi anoderedza hukasha hwechirwere ichii pamwe nekurudziro yanachiremba. Pasi rose, vanhu vari kurarama neHIV vanosvika mamiriyoni makumi matatu nemasere, 38 million, uye kubva pakatanga kuzivikanwa HIV muna 1984, vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni makumi matatu nematanhatu, 36 million, vafa nechirwere ichi. Zuva reWorld AIDS Day rinoyeuchidza vanhu kuti HIV haisati yapera kurwiswa. Pari zvino mari zhinji yava kushandiswa mukurwisa chirwere cheCovid-19 mazuva ano, izvo zviri kupa kuti rubatsiro rwemari yekurwisa HIV hudzikire – chiitiko chiri kurwadza nyanzvi dzezvehutano pamwe neavo vanorarama neHIV/AIDS muZimbabwe nepasi rose. No media source currently available
title: Zimbabwe Inobatana neNyika dzePasi Rose Mukucherechedza World AIDS DAY

text: Kuoma kwezvinhu munyaya dzezveupfumi kunonzi nevamwe vagari vekumaruwa kuri kuwedzerawo matambudziko avo, sezvo kazhinji vachizomanikidzwa kutenga zvinhu nemitengo iri pamusoro kudarika mitengo yezvitoro zvemumadhorobha. Semuenzaniso, kana mafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari akakwira mutengo, vezvitoro zvekumaruwa vanonzi vanobva vakwidzawo mitengo yezvitengeswa zvavo, vachipa zvikonzero zvekukwira kwemafuta. Izvi zvinonzi zvave kuita kuti vakawanda mumaruwa vamanikidzwe kusunza zvavanoda zuva nezuva zvakaita sesipo, shuga, mafuta, munyu nezvimwe, vachishandisa chibage kana zvimwe zvirimwa zvavanenge vainazvo. VaAlbert Goremusandu vekuMuzvezve, kuMhondoro, ndemumwe wegari vekumaruwa vave kurarama nekusunza. VaGoremusandu vanoti vari kumanikidzwa nenhamo kuchinjanisa bhagidhi rimwe chete rechibage nepakiti inorema makirogiramu maviri eshuga. Vanoti kuti vakwanise kutenga zvavanoda nemutengo uri pasi, vanofanirwa kukwira kuenda kudhorobha riri padyo navo, zvichireva kuti vanenge voda mari dzekufambisa zvakare. VaGoremusandu vanoti vave kungorarama nekuchinjana nechibage nezvimwe zvavanenge vainazvo nevamwewo vanenge vaine zvakaita seshuga, sipo, mafuta nezvimwe, kunyange hazvo nedzimwe nguva vari kurasikirwa sezvo vaikwanisa kuwana mari yakawanda dai vaitengesa chibage chavo. No media source currently available
title: Vakawanda Votambura Zvikuru kuMaruwa

text: Gurukota rinoona nezvevashandi Muzvinafundo Paul Mavima vanoti vari kutarisira kuti hurumende ichitanga kuita hurukuro dzemihoro wevashandi vayo kutanga vhiki rino. Asi hurukuro idzi dziri kutarisirwa kuti dzinenge dzakaoma zvikuru nekuti mamwe masangano anomirira vashandi ava ave kuti anoda kuti vatambiriswe mari nemadhora ekuAmerica sezvo dhora remunyia riri kushaya simba zvakanyanya uku mitengo yezvinhu ichiita chamurambamhuru. ' Hurumende yakapedzisira kuita musangano nevanomirira vashandi vari pasi peNational Joint Negotiating Council muna Ndira. VaMavima vati vanotenda kuti zvinhu zvaomera vashandi nekuda kwekudhura kwemitengo yezvinhu. No media source currently available Sezvo tichitema tisina divi ratinorerekera tabata munyori mukuru wesangano revadzidzisi vekumaruwa reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe VaRobson Chere avo vati hapana kudududza pachisungo chekuti vashandi vapihwe mihoro nemadhora ekuAmerica sezvo dhora reZimbabwe risisina chariri kutenga. No media source currently available Sangano rinomirira vashandi ava munhaurirano reAPEX Council rinotiwo riri kutsigira hurongwa hwekuti vashandi vabhadharwe nemadhora ekuAmerica.
title: Vashandi veHurumende Vanoti Vave Kuda Kutambiriswa neMadhora ekuAmerica

text: Sangano rinokweretesa mariu pasi rose, reInternational Monetary Fund (IMF) rinoti hupfumi hweZimbabwe hunotarisirwa kukura nezvikamu zvitanhatu kubva muzana gore rino. IMF inoti izvi zvinotevera goho rakanaka gore rino, kuvandudzwa kwemabasa emhando dzemoto, pamwe nemabasa ekuvaka. Mumashoko ayo mushure memisangano yakaitwa nechikwata cheIMF chaitungamirwa naDhaneshwar Ghura negurukota rinoona nezvemari, VaMthuli Ncube, gavhuna webhanga guru munyika, Dr John Mangudya, vakuru vakuru vehurumende nevemakambani akazvirira, IMF inoti kunyange hazvo hupfumi hweZimbabwe hwakadzikira muna 2019 na2020 nekuda kwezvikonzero zvinosanganisira nzara, Cyclone Idai neCovid-19, gore rino hupfumi uhwu huchakura. Asi IMF inoti izvi zvichaenderana nekuti denda reCovid-19 richapararira sei munyika nekutiwo nyaya dzekubaya vanhu nhomba dzichabatwa sei. Inotiwo pane zvirongwa zvekusimbaradza hupfumi zvinofanira kutevedzwa zvakaita sekubhadhare zvikwereti, kuderedza hurombo pamwe nekuona kuti vanhu vagara zvakanaka. IMF inoti nyaya yekudzikamisa mari yemuno nekuisimbaradza pachishandiswa zvirongwa zvakaita seForeign Currency Auction system zvinhu zvakanaka chose uye zvinokurudzirwa. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Dr Prosper Chitambara, vaudza Studio 7 vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanobvumirana nemaonero eIMF pamafambiro ehupfumi hweZimbabwe. Vatiwo ichokwadi kuti Covid-19 inogona kuvhiringa hupfumi. Vati pachine matambudziko akawanda sezvo veruzhinji vari kutambura zvakanyanya, pamwe nekusamira zvakanaka kwenyaya dzehutano. Vatiwo makambani ehurumende pamwe nezvikwereti zvinhu zvinofanira kugadziriswa kuitira kuti hupfumi hufambe zvakanaka. Svondo rapfuura World Bank yakaburitsawo gwaro pamusoro peZimbabwe ichiti hufpumi hwayo huchakwira nezvikama zvitatu nechidimbu kubva muzana nekuda kwegoho rakanaka asi ikati denda reCovid-19 rinogna kuvhiringidza hupfumi uhu. Hurumende inotarisira kuti hupfumi huchakura nezvikama zvinomwe nechidimbu kubva muzana gore rino. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi vachishanda vakazvimirira, VaMasimba Manyaya, vaudza Studio 7 kuti havabvumirane nemaonero ehurumende, IMF neWorld Bank vachiti denda reCovid-19 ravhiringa hupfumi pamwe nekuunza kutambura kuruzhinji munyika. Pari zvino Zimbabwe yakatarisana nedambudziko rekushaikwa kwenhomba yekudzvirira kupararira kweCovid-19 uye inotarisira kutambira nhomba dzinodarika mazana mashanu ezviuru kubva kuChina mwedzi uno. Pane vanhu mazana maviri nemakumi matatu nevasere vakabatwa neCovid-19 nezuro uye pane vanhu vatatu vakafa nedenda iri nezuro wekare. Kusvika nezuro, pane vanhu zviuru makumi mana nemazana mashanu nemakumi mashanu nevatanhatu, 40 556, vainge vabatwa neCovid-19 uye vafa kusvika nezuro vave churu nemazana matanhatu nemakumi mana, 1 640. Kusvika nezuro vanhu zviuru mazana matanhatu nemakumi mapfumbamwe nezvinomwe nemazana matatu nemakumu mapfumbamwe nevapfumbamwe, 697 399, vange vabaiwa nhomba yekutanga uye zviuru ,mazana mana nemakumi maviri nezvitatu nemazana mana nemakumi manomwe nevana, 423 474 vange vabaiwa nhomba yepiri yeCovid-19 Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kweCovid-19. No media source currently available
title: IMF Inoti Hupfumi hweZimbabwe Huchakura neZvikamu Zvitanhatu Kubva Muzana Kana Hukasavhiringwa neCovid-19

text: MDC Alliance yadoma mutungamiri weMDC-T, VaNelson Chamisa, kuti vakwikwidze chigaro chemutungamiri wenyika zvichitevera kushaya kwaVaMorgan Tsvangirai. Pamusangano wavaita nevatori venhau muHarare neChishanu, mutauriri weMDC Alliance, VaWelshman Ncube, vati vanovimba naVaChamisa, kunyange hazvo muMDC T mune makakatanwa munyaya dzehutungamiri hwebato iri. VaChamisa vati vanonzwa kuzvininipisa zvikuru nebasa guru ravapiwa nemapato avari kushanda nawo. VaChamisa vatiwo MDC Alliance ine zvinhu zvitatu zvairi kuvimbisa vavhoti zvinoti shanduko yakakwana yechokwadi, kuwaniswa kwemikana kuvana veZimbabwe vese pamwe nebudiriro. VaChamisa vakumbirawo ruregerero nemabatirwo akaitwa vatori venhau nevechidiki mubato ravo. Vavimbisa kuti vari kuongorora nyaya iyi vakati havawirirani nekushungurudzwa kwevatori venhau. MDC Alliance ine mapato manomwe anoti MDC T, MDC yaVaNcube, People's Democratic Party, Transform Zimbabwe, Zimbabwe People First, Multi-Racial Democratic Party neZanu Ndonga. No media source currently available
title: MDC Alliance Inodoma VaChamisa Kukwikwidza Musarudzo yeMutungamiri weNyika

text: Ongororo yakaitwa nesangano reZimbabwe Human Rights NGO Forum panyaya yekutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu mugore rapera inoburitsa pachena kuti mapurisa ndiwo ari pamberi pakutyora kodzero dzevanhu munyika. Vachitaura pakuparurwa kwegwaro rinonzi State of Human Rights Report Zimbabwe/2017, VaDzikamai Bere vanoshanda kuZimbabwe Human Rights NGO Forum kunze kwekutyora zvakanyanya kwekodzero dzevanhu nemapurisa, sangano reZimbabwe Consolidated Diamond Company rakakonzerawo rufu rwevanhu vashanu kuminda yemangoda kwaMarange. Mukuru weHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica, VaDewa Mavhinga vati zvinosuwisa zvikuru kuti mapurisa anofanirwa kuchengetedza veruzhinji ndiwo ari kutyora kodzero zvakanyanya. VaTrevor Simbanegavi vapawo huchapupu hwavo hwekupfuurwa nemapurisa mushure mekufungidzirwa kuti vaive mbavha dzakapakata zvombo vakarasikirwa negumbo kunyangwe zvazvo vasina kuzobatwa nemhosva. VaSimbanegavi vatetera kuti hurumende inofanirwa kuchengetedza vanhu vanotyorerwa kodzero nemapurisa anenge aita zvisiri pamutemo pamwe nekuona kuti varipwa. Vatiwo mapurisa anofanirwa kutanga aongorora mhosva asati ashandisa zvombo. Gwaro iri rinoratidzawo kuti kodzero dzevana vechikoro vanosvika zviuru makumi mana nemasere nemazana maviri vakatyorerwa kodzero. Sachigaro weZimbabwe Human Rights NGO Forum Muzvare Jestina Mukoko vatiwo izvi havazvitarisiri. Vamwe vakadomwa mugwaro iri mukutyora kodzero vanosanganisira bato reZanu-PF, madzishe nevemauto. No media source currently available
title: Zimbabwe Human Rights NGO Forum Inoti Mapurisa Ndiwo Ari Kunyanya Kutyora Kodzero dzeVanhu

text: Kwakanga kusingadaidzwe anonzwa mukupera kwesvondo apo shasha dzembira dzakasangana kuMukuvisi Woodlands muHarare apo vana gwenyambira vakange vachikwikwidzana pamhemberero dzekucherechedza kupera kwemwedzi wembira, kana kuti Mbira Month, unova Gunyana. Kwaive nemufaro mukuru kuMbira Festival munzvimbo ye Eastley muHarare, vanhu vachitamba nziyo uye kufara nezvaiitwa nezvikwata zvisere zvavana gwenyambira izvo zvaive pamakwikwi aya. Pose pane makwikwi, panowana munhu mumwe chete anonzi ndiye akunda vose. Mukupera kwechirongwa ichi, chikwata che True Bantu Warriors Band, ndicho chakatora mukombe wepamusoro soro, uye chakapihwa mubayiro wembira itsva kubva kusangano reMbira Center. Mutauriri we True Bantu Warriors Bantu, VaWatmore Mchuwe, vanoti vakafara zvikuru nemubairo uyu. VaMchuwe vanoti mbira mucherechedzo wetsika nepasichigare. Amai Christine Shoko, avo vaive nechikwata chevana vanoridza mbira nemarimba paNyava Secondary School kwaMusana, kuBindura, vanoti kuchine vabereki vanorambidza vana vavo kuridza mbira nemarimba, vachiti ndezvemweya wetsvina. Amai Shoko vanoti vana ava vakatora mukombe mukuru vakamirira dunhu reMashonaland Central pamakwikwi eNational Annual Science Sports, Arts Festival akaitirwa kuNational Sports Stadium muHarare svondo rapfuura. No media source currently available
title: Chikwata cheTrue Bantu Warriors Chinotora Mukombe Mukuru

text: Mutambi wenhabvu ane mukurumbira Peter Ndlovu anonzi ndiye akasarudzwa kutungamirira rimwe bato rinopikisa richangoparurwa reAll People’s Party kana kuti APP. Ndlovu uyo ari kuSouth Africa kwaari maneja wechikwata cheMamelodi Sundowns anonzi achazouya kuzotungamira bato panguva yakakodzera asi iko zvino VaSabastian Mubvumbi ndivo vakafanobata chigaro chekutungamira bato iri muZimbabwe. Hatina kukwanisa kubata Ndlovu kuti tinzwe divi rake sezvo nharembozha yake yange isiri kudairwa. Asi vaMubvumbi vatenda kuti ndivo vakafanobata matomu asi Ndlovu ndiye akasarudzwa. Ndlovu akatambira chikwata cheHighlanders asati aenda kuBritain uko akatambira, Coventry City, Birmingham City, Huddersfield ne Sheffield United. Ndiye mutambi wekutanga wemuAfrica kutambira English Premier Soccer League. VaMubvumbi vaudza Studio 7 kuti vakaumba bato iri nekuti havasi kugudzikana nezviri kuitwa nemapato arip ikozvino ayo vanoti ane huori. No media source currently available
title: Peter Ndlovu Osarudzwa Kutungamira Bato Rinopikisa

text: Mutungamiri weMDC Alliance, VaNelson Chamisa, vanoti vachasangana neZimbabwe Electoral Commission, Zec, svondo rinouya kuitira kuti vagadzirisane gakava riripo. Asi vanoti zvinyunyuto zvavainazvo zvikasagadziriswa zvinoreva kuti sarudzo munyika dzichatadza kuitwa. Vachitaura pamusanagano wekutsvaga rutisgiro muBulawayo, VaChamisa vadzokorodza mashoko avari kugara vachitaura ekuti kana sarudzo dzikaitwa zviri pachena, ndivo vanokunda musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika. VaChamisa vati zvinyunyuto zvavainazvo pamusoro pezviri kuitwa neZec hazvizi zvenhando vakatiwo vachasangana nevakauru vakuru veZec nemusi weChipiri svondo kuitira kuti vagadzirise gakava riripo. Asi vati kana pakasave nechinobuda pamusangano uyu, zvinoreva kuti mubatanidzwa wavo uchaenderera mberi nekuratidzira kwawakaronga. Zviuru nezviuru zvevanhu zvauya kumusangano uyu zvaratidza kufara nekuvepo pamusangano uyu kwemutungamiri weZapu, VaDumiso Dabengwa. VaDabengwa vaudza musangano uyu kuti vakaedza kugadzirisa makakatanwa pakati paVaChamisa naMuzvare Thokozani Khupe. Asi vati izvi zvakaramba vakazoona zvakakodzera kutsigira VaChamisa. VaChamisa vati vanoremekedza varwi vehodno yerusununguko vakaita saVaDabengwa nekuti vanoramba vakamira pachokwadi chezvinangwa zvakarwirwa hondo yerusununguko. Vatiwo vanoziva kuti ivo semunhu wechidiki vanoda vanhu vabve zera kuti vavabatsire nemazano. Vanhu pamusangano uyu vafarawo apo VaSibangilizwe Nkomo mwana wamushakabvu Joshua Nkomo varatidzwa kuvanhu. Vanhu vafarawo apo varatidzwa vamwe Ambuya vakaita mukurumbira paWhatsApp mushure mekutaura kuti vanotsigira VaChamisa.\n\nVamwe vatsigiri vaVaChammisa vataura neStudio7 vati vanotarisira kuti MDC Alliance ichakunda musarudzo vachitiwo vanotarisira kuti vachakwanisa kuita kuti munyika muve neshanduko veruzhinji vachiwana hupenyu hwakanaka. Musangano wanhasi ndiwo wekutanga waitwa munhandare yeWhiute City kubvira zvakaputika bhambu rakapotsa rakuvadza, kana kuuraya mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, mwedzi wapera. No media source currently available
title: VaChamisa Vanoti Vachasangana neZec neChipiri Kuitira Kuti Zvinetswa Zvigadziriswe

text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vakurudzira kuti paitwe nhaurirano pakati pevemapato anopikisa pamwe nemasangano anoshanda akazvimirira kuitira kuti hupfumi hwenyika husarambe huchiwira pasi. Kurudziro iyi inouya apo veruzhinji vakaratidzira munyika yose svondo rapera vachiti havasi kufara nemamiriro aita hupfumi hwenyika. Pamashoko avanyora padandemutande reTwitter neChipiri mushure mekupinda munyika mambwakwedza vachibva kunyika ina dzekuEurope, VaMnangagwa vati vemapato ose ezvematyongerwo enyika, vedzisvondo pamwe nemasangano anoshanda akazvimirira, vasendeke parutivi kusawirirana kwavo vobatana poitwa nhaurirano munyika dzavanoti dzakanangana nekusimudzira hupfumi hwenyika. VaMnangagwa vashorawo mauto anonzi ari kurova vanhu munzvimbo dzakasiyana-siyana munyika vachiti iyi inyaya inofanira kuongororwa uye vanenge vawanikwa vari kunze kwemutemo, votorerwa matanho akasimba. Mashoko aVaMnangagwa aya anouya panguva iyo mutungamiri weMDC, VaNelson Chamisa, vagara vachitaura kubva pakaitwa sarudzo dzavanoti hadzina kufambiswa zvakanaka kuti munyika munofanirwa kuitwa nhaurirano. Zvichitevera zvataurwa naVaMnangagwa nhasi, VaChamisa vati VaMnangagwa vanofanira kuzadzisa mashoko avo nezviito kwete kungotaura chete. Mutungamiri weHashtag Tajamuka, VaPromise Mkwananzi, vatiwo panofanira kuvandudzwa mitemo nezvimwe zvakadaro zvinoita kuti munyika muve nehutongi hwejekerere nhaurirano idzi dzisati dzaitwa. Nekune rumwe rutivi, VaChamisa vati havasi kuzopinda munhaurirano idzi kana nhengo dzebato ravo dzinosanganisira nhengo dzepaaramende dzikaramba dzichisungwa dzichipomerwa mhosva dzavanoti hadzina maturo. Vanhu vane chitsama vakafa mukuratidzra kwakaitika munyika svondo rapera vamwe vakasara vakuvara, vamwe vari muhupoteri uye vamwe vakasungwa. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika, VaBekezela Gumbo, vatiwo zviri kutaurwa naVaMnangagwa izvi kungotaurawo kwemunhu apererwa sezvo nyika dzekunze dziri kuda kuti munyika muve nehutongi hwejekerere. Mashoko aVaMnangagwa anopesana neemutevedzeri wavo, VaConstantino Chiwenga, avo vakati havasi kuzoumba hurumende yemubatanidzwa neMDC vachiti VaChamisa vanofanira kutanga vacherechedza hurumende yaVaMnangagwa. Asi VaChamisa vanoti bato ravo harisi kuda kuwumba hurumende yemubatanidzwa kuburdikidza nenhaurirano idzi asi kuti riri kuda kuti nyaya yemafambisirwo akaitwa sarudzo itaurwe nezvayo munhaurirano idzi pamwe nematambudziko akatarisana nenyika pari zvino. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kubata vemasangano emakereke kuti tinzwe kuti vanotambira seyi mashoko aVaMnangagwa. No media source currently available
title: Kuti VaMnangagwa Vangaite Hurukuro naVaChamisa?

text: Vatori venhau nevakuru vakuru vemapurisa vakaita musangano muHarare nemusi weChishanu nechinangwa chekugadzirisa hukama hwawo. Mapurisa akaita chitsidzo chekutora matanho ekuti vashande zvakanaka nevatori venhau vasingatyore kodzero dzevanhu. Musangano uyu, uyo waitirwa kumuzinda wemapurisa wePolice General Headquarters kan kuti PGHQ unotevera chikumbiro chevatori venhau chekuita musangano nemukuru wemapurisa Commissioner General Augustine Chihuri zvichitevera kushungurudzwa zvakanyaya kunonzi nevatori venhau vaiitwa zvikuru sei mukuratdzira kuri kuitika munyika mazuva ano. VaChihuri vatadza kupinda mumusangano sezvo vange vari kumusangano wevakuru vakuru vemapurisa mudunhu rekuchamhembe kweAfrica. Vange vakamiririrwa nemutauriri wemapurisa Senior Assistant Commissioner Charity Charamba, mukuru anoona nezvemabasa kumuzinda wemapurisa Senior Assistant Commissioner Berndard Dumbura vevamwe vakuru vakuru vemapurisa mudunhu reHarare. Amai Charamba vati kunyange hazvo musangano watanga paine kufungirana wafamba zvakanaka chose uye vati Zimbabwe Republic Police inoda chose kushanda zvakanaka nevatori venhau. Vaenderera mberi vachiti vachatura kuna VaChihuri zvabuda mumusangano uyu vakavimbisawo kuti vachatora matanho anoita kuti vatori venhau vaite basa ravo vakasununguka. Sachigaro weMISA Zimbabwe Trustees, VaChris Chinaka, vanoti zvakaitika zvakanaka chose mukuita kuti basa rekutora nhau riitwe zvakanaka munyika. VaChinaka vanoti pachaitwa mimwe misangano munguva pfupi inotevera yekuona kuti pane zvaitwa here pane zvabvumiramwa pamusangano uyu kuti vatori venhau nemapurisa vashande zvakanaka. Zvimwe zvakabuda mumusangano ndezvekuti vatori venhau vanofanira kupfeka mbatya dzinoratidza kuti vatori venhau pamwe nekutakura makhadhi avo ebasa zvikuru panguva yekuratidzira. Patenderanwawo kuti mapurisa kana asina kufara nemaitiro evatori venhau vari pabasa anofanira kumhan’a kumasangano anovamirira akaita seZimbabwe Union of Journalists, MISA-Zimbabwe neVoluntary Media Council of Zimbabwe nemamwe masangano kwete kuvasunga kana kuvarova. Vatori venhau vanodarika makumi matatu vakasungwa kana kurohwa nempurisa nevanhuwo zvavo vari pabasa kubva muna Ndira kusvika pari zvino. No media source currently available
title: Vatori veNhau Vosangana neMapurisa Vachigunu'nuna neKushungurudzwa Vari paBasa

text: Gurukota rinoona nezvevashandi VaPatrick Zhuwao vanovezve muzukuru wemutungamiri wenyika vanoti VaRobert Mugabe havasi kuzomanikidzwa kusiya chigaro chekutungamira nyika kunyangwe hazvo vakakomberedzwa nemauto kumba kwavo kuBlue Roof kuBorrowdale muHarare. Vachitaura vari parunhare neStudio 7 muSouth Africa umo vanoti vambopotera parizvino, VaZhuwao avo vanofungidzirwa kuti vari kutsvagwa nemauto, vashora zvikuru mukuru wemauto General Constantino Chiwenga vachiti vakapidigura hurumende nechisimba. Vati VaMugabe vakazvipira kufa pane kutyora mhiko yavakatora yekuchengetedza bumbiro remutemo wenyika. VaZhuwao vati pane vanhu vane chitsama vakapfurwa nemauto uye vakati pane vamwe vanodarika zana vakapambwa. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kumutauriri wemapurisa Amai Charity Charamba kana mutauriri wemauto kuti ichi ichokwadi here. Vashorawo zvikuru VaPatrick Chinamasa avo vakaudza vanhu kuZimbabwe Grounds nemusi weMugovera kuti mudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika Amai Grace Mugabe vanofanira kuendeswa kumatare vachitongwa nemhosva dzavanonzi vakapara. VaZhuwao vati VaChinamasa ndivo vakatopa kuti hurumende ipidigurwe sezvo vaitya kuongororwa mhosva yekuti ivo nevamwe vavo vakaita zvehuwori panyaya yekubatsira varimi ye“command agriculture.” Vati mari yakawanda yakabiwa pachirongwa ichi. Kuratidzawo chisimba mauto ange achitenderera pamba paVaMugabe nechikopokopo masikati. No media source currently available
title: VaPatrick Zhuwao Vopika Kuti VaMugabe Havasi Kuzosiya Chigaro

text: Vakafanobata chigaro chemutungamiri weMDC-T, Muzvare Thokozani Khupe, vava nhengo yeNational Assembly zvichitevera kuburitswa kwakaitwa gwaro rehurumende rinozivisa zvinhu zviri pamutemo. Muzvare Khupe mumwe wevanhu gumi nevashanu vakasarudzwa neMDC-T kutsiva nhengo dzeMDC Alliance dzakadzingwa mudare reNational Assembly neSenate. Vanoziva zviri kuitika vanoti Muzvare Khupe vari kutarisirwa kudomwa semutungamiri wemapato anopikisa muparamende, kana kuti Opposition Leader of the House, basa rakanga riri ra Muzvare Thabitha Khumalo veMDC Alliance, avo vakadzingwa mudare iri ne MDC-T. Studio7 yatadza kubata munyori mukuru we MDC-T, VaDouglas Mwonzora, sezvo nharembozha yavo yanga ichinetsa kubata. Asi sachigaro veMDC-T, VaMorgen Komichi, vanoti ichokwadi kuti Muzvare Khupe vava nhengo yeNational Assemby, uye izvi zvakanakira bato ravo sezvo rinenge rave nemutungamiri muparamende anenge achiona kuti zvido zvebato zviri kutevedza. VaKomichi vati hachisi chokwadi kuti vari kudyidzana neZanu PF, uye vati vari kuvashora vanhu vasiri kuziva zviri kuitika mubato ravo. No media source currently available Sezvo tichitema tisina kwatinorerekera, tabata mutevedzeri wemutauriri weMDC Alliance, Va Clifford Hlatywayo, avo vati zviri pachena kuti veMDC-T vari kushanda neZanu PF mukudzinga vanhu vakasarudzwa nevanhu. VaHlatywayo vati bato ravo rine hurongwa huchashamisa nyika nokuti havangagari vakabata maoko zvinhu zvichiipa munyika. No media source currently available Studio7 haina kukwanisa kubata vakafanobata chigaro chemutauriri weZanu PF, Va Patrick Chinamasa, kanawo mushandi mukuru anoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko mubato iri, VaTafadzwa Mugadi, sezvo nharembozha dzevaviri ava dzanga dzisingadairwe. Asi sachigaro ve Zanu PF mudunhu reNorth America Province, Va Regis Charumbira, varamba kuti bato ravo riri kushanda neMDC-T mukuvhiringa MDC Alliance. VaCharumbira vadi MDC Alliance inoti ikahwina kumatare, inorova bembera, asi ikakundwa, yozhamba semwana mudiki. No media source currently available
title: Muzvare Thokozani Khupe Vava Nhengo yeNational Assembly

text:
Bato idzva rinopikisa reCitizens Coalition for Change ratadza
kugadzirisa dambudziko raro rekuva nenhengo mbiri dzakanyoresa
kukwikwidza musarudzo dzema by-elections ari kuitwa muWard 4 muMasvingo muna Kurume zvichitevera kuramba kweimwe nhengo kubuda mudariro sezviri kukurudzirwa nehutungamiriri hwebato iri ichiti yakabirirwa. Vakuru vebato iri vaitungamiriwa nemunyori mukuru weCCC, VaCharlton
Hwende, vakashanyira wadhi iyi nemusi weChipiri pakadzokororwa kusarudzwa kwemumiriri mumwe vakasiya vagadzika VaAleck Tabe. Asi Mai Thokozile Muchuchuti, avo vakanzi vakakundwa, vakaramba
kusiira mukana vaTabe vachiti vakabirirwa nekudaro havasi kuzoenda
netsamba kuZimbabwe Electoral Commsssion(ZEC) yekubvisa zita ravo
pabepa rekuvhoterwa. Izvi zvonerava kuti bato reCCC rinenge rine nhengo mbiri kana
dambudziko iri riakasagadziriswa.
Amai Muchuchuti vaudza Studio 7 kuti havasi kuzobvisa mapepa avo
nekuti vakabirirwa sezvo vachiti vanodiwa nevatsigiri vebato ravo
muWard 4. Ukuwo, VaTabe, avo vakadzikwa nehutungamiriri hwebato ravo mushure
mekuwana rutsigiro kunhengo dzavo vanoti ndivo vakasarudzwa nevanhu.
VaTabe vakaenderera mberi vachiti mumwe wavo hafaniri kuramba zvinhu
zvakagadziriswa nehutungamiriri kuti bato ravo risazovhiringike
musarudzo. Mutevedzeri wemutauriri weCCC , VaGift Ostallos Siziba, vatadza
kutipa divi remusangano wavo vachiti tibate VaHwende avo vanga
vasingadairi nharembozha yavo uye vanga vasati vapindura tsambambozha dzedu pataenda pamhepo. Asi vatsigiri veCCC muMasvingo vari kuchema kuti bato ravo
rikasagadzirisa dambudziko iri wadhi iyi inotorwa nebato rinotonga
reZanu PF irio rakasimba. No media source currently available
title: Bato reCitizens Coalition for Change Rotadza Kugadzirisa Dambudziko reVachakwikwidza Vaviri muWard 4 kuMasvingo

text: Bato rinopikisa reMDC inotungamirirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai riri kushora zvikuru gurukota rinoona nezvemukati menyika Doctor Ignatius Chombo, zvichitevera mashoko avanonzi vakataura aburitswa nebepanhau reHerald, ekuti bato iri ndiro rakapisa roga motokari yaro kuKuwadzana mambakwedza emusi weChina. Mutauriri weMDC-T, VaObert Gutu vanoti zvinokatyamadza kuti Doctor Chombo ndivo gurukota rinoona nemashandiro emapurisa, zvichireva kuti havafanirwe kungotaura zvisina maturo iwo mapurisa asati apedza kuferefeta nyaya. Mashoko aDoctor Chombo aya ashorwawo zvikuru nesangano reZimbabwe Peace Project, ZPP, iro rati rakatyamadzwawo. ZPP inoti mashoko aVaChombo aya anogona kukanganisa kuferefetwa kwenyaya yekupiswa kwemotokari iyi, sezvo vari ivo gurukota rezvemukati menyika. Sangano iri rinoti kunyange hazvo Doctor Chombo vaine nguvani mbiri, imwe yekuona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa muZanu PF, mashoko avo aya anogona kukonzera mhirizhonga. VaGutu pamwe chete neZPP vanoti vari kukurudzira kuti vakuru-vakuru muhurumende vasangotaura mashoko anogona kusimudza kusagadzikana mune zvematongerwo enyika. VaChombo Vakaudza bepanhau reHerald kuti vanofunga kuti kupiswa kwemotokari yeMDC-T kwakaitwa nebato iri senzira yekutsvaga kunzwirwa tsitsi, sezvo bato iri risina kugadzikana uye rakatarisana nekukundwa musarudzo dzichauya. Asi VaGutu vanoti, "Zvave kutaridza izvo kuti zvatinofungidzira kuti motokari yedu yakapiswa nema thug eZanu PF, ndicho chokwadi. Nekuti deno changa chisiri chokwadi, VaChombo vaigomhanyira chii kuda kuvhara nyaya vachiti i inside job." Studio 7 yakundikana kunzwa kubva kuna Doctor Chombo sezvo nharembozha yavo yanga isiri kudairwa. No media source currently available
title: MDC-T Yoshora VaChombo neMashoko avo eKuti MDC-T Yakapisa Yoga Motokari Yayo

text: Komisheni inoona nezvekurwiswa kwehuori yeZimbabwe Anti-Corruption Commission inoti iri kuferefeta mapazi ose ehurumende pamwe nemakambani ehurumende akabuda mugwaro raAuditor General kunzi haasi kufambisa mari zvakanaka. Text: Izvi zvabuda pamusangano wepagore wekutanga wekomisheni iyi uyu uyo waitirwa pamadandemutande senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid 19. Vachitaura pamusangano uyu, sachigaro weZACC, Amai Loice Matanda Moyo, vati komisheni yavo haisi kufara kuti huori hwakanyanya mumapazi ehurumende, makambani ehurumende, makambani akazvimirira pamwe nemasangano anoshanda akazvimirira. Amai Matanda Moyo, vati nekuda kwekuti Zimbabwe yakaiswa panyika yezana nemakumi mashanu nepfumbamwe (159) panyika zana nemakumi masere (180) dzakaongororwa munyaya dzehuori zvinoratidza kuti huori hwakapfunya chisero munyika, ivo sekomisheni vakabva vazvitarira basa rakakura kwazvo rekurwisana nehuori vachiti vakagona basa zvisinei kuti dzimwe nyaya dzavaibata dzaimbovhiringidzwa nevamwe vakuru-vakuru vari mumahofisi mahombe vavasina kudoma nemazita. Amai Matanda Moyo vati mushure mekuverenga gwaro raAuditor General Amai Mildred Chiri ra2019 nemamwe avakaburitsa mushure megwaro iri, komisheni yavo yakaona kuti pane nyaya dzakawanda dzehuori, kushandiswa kwemari nezvinzvimbo zvisirizvo muhurumende. Nokudaro, Amai Matanda Moyo vanoti vari kuferefeta mapazi ehurumende akawanda. Mamwe emapazi ehurumende akanzi naAmai Chiri haasi kufambisa mari zvakanaka anosanganisira bazi rezvehutano, bazi rezvekurima, Zimbabwe Revenue Authority nemamwe. Asi mutevedzeri wemutauriri weMDC Alliance, VaClifford Hlatshwayo, vati hapana chavari kutarisira chakanyanya kubva kuZACC sezvo komisheni iyi ichinziwo ine nyaya dzayo dzekusafambisa mari zvakanaka. Mukuru anoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa musangano rinorwisa nyaya dzehuori kuchamhembe kweAfrica reAnti-Corruption Trust of Southern Africa VaAlois Chaumba vanoti dai hurumende yaida kurwisa huori zvakasimba, ZACC yaifanira kushanda naAmai Chiri. Kunyange hazvo komisheni yeZACC yakanziwo naAuditor General haisi kutevedzera mutemo wePublic Finance and Management Act mukashandisa kwayo mari yehurumende, Amai Matanda Moyo vati komisheni yavo yakazvipira kuenda kuparamende kunoratidza dare iri mashandisiro ainoita mari yainenge yapihwa nebazi rezvemari. Munyori mukuru muZACC kana kuti Executive Secretary, Muzvare Sukai Tongogara vaudzawo musangano uyu kuti komisheni yavo haisi kufara kuti paramende iri kunonoka kuvashevedza kuti vazotsanangura mashandisiro avanoita mari yavanenge vapihwa nebazi rezvemari. Amai Matanda Moyo vati komisheni yavo ine hurongwa hwekuvhura mamwe mahofisi kune mamwe matunhu kuitira kuti munyika yose muve nemahofisi eZACC matanhatu senzira yekuedza kuti vabate nyika yose mukurwisa huori. Kusvika parizvino, Amai Matanda Moyo vati komisheni yavo yatambira nyaya dzehuori zana nemakumi mashanu nenomwe (157) uye panyaya dzose idzi ZACC yakwanisa kuferefeta nyaya makumi manomwe nenhanhatu (76). Zvichakadaro, Muzvare Tongogara, vati komisheni yavo iri kusanganawo nematambudziko akawanda anosanganisira kusachengetedzeka kwevanovaridzira pembe kana huwi nenyaya dzehuori pamwe nevafakazi, kunonoka kutongwa kwenyaya dzehuori mumatare, kusafara kwevashandi vekomisheni yavo kubudikidza nekusamira zvakanaka kwemashandiro avo nezvimwe.
title: Zimbabwe Anti Corruption Commission Yovimbisa Kusunga Vakuru muHurumende vari Kuba Mari

text: Vakafanobata chigaro chemutungamiri weMDC, Engineer Elias Mudzuri, vashora kanzuru yeHarare, mapurisa eZimbabwe Republic Police, ZRP, pamwe nemasoja nekusabata zvakanaka kwavanonzi vari kuita vanotengesa zvinhu zvavo mumigwagwa. Vachitaura pamusangano wavaita nevanorarama nekutengesera mumigwagwa ava muHarare neChina, VaMudzuri vati vanotengesera mumigwagwa havafanire kubatwa nekuseri kwemaoko nepamusana pekuti havana kuenda kunoshandira mumigwagwa nokuda asi kuti nekuondomoka kwaita hupfumi hwenyika izvo zvave kukonzera kuti veruzhinji vanhonge svosve nemuromo. Mumwe wevanotengesera mumigwagwa, Muzvare Winnet Mubaiwa, vaudza VaMudzuri kuti mapurisa ekanzuru, mapurisa eZRP pamwe nemasoja vari kuvarova vachivatorera zvinhu zvavanotengesa mumigwagwa uye havazowana zvose zvavanenge vatorerwa nemapurisa ekanzuru pavanozozvitevera vachida kunobhadhara mari dzefaindi. Muzvare Mubaiwa vati pane vanhu vakati kuti varemadzaa mushure mekurohwa nemapurisa ekanzuru yeHarare, masoja pamwe nemapurisa eZRP. Vataura vakamirira meya weHarare, VaBenard Manyenyeni, pamusangano uyu uye vari kanzura muHarare, VaGirison Mandere, vati kanzuru yavo inokoshesa zvido zvevagari asi chiri kunetsa mukanzuru yavo ndechekuti pane vashandi vekanzuru vari kupinza zvematongerwo enyika mukuita basa ravo. VaMandere vati sekanzuru yeHarare havadi kuona vanotengesera mumigwagwa vachishungurudzwa asi Zanu PF yave kushanda nevamwe vashandi vekanzuru yavo kuita zvinhu zvinenge zvisina kubvumiranwa nemakanzura. VaMudzuri vaudza makanzura ose kuti agadzirise nyaya dziri kunetsa vanotengesera mumigwagwa vakakurudzirawo kuti vanorarama nekutenmgesera pakati pedhorobha vanofanira kushanda pamwe chete nekanzuru vachichengetedza hutsanana kuti veruzhinji vasabatwe nezvirwere zvakaita sekorera iyo inonzi yadzika midzi mudhorobha reChegutu. Vati vanotengesa mumigwagwa havafanire kubvuma kubviswa mumigwagwa nekanzuru, mapurisa kana masoja kana hurumende isati yagadzirisa nyaya dzekushaikwa kwemabasa munyika vachiti pundutso iri pakuvhota zvine hungwaru musarudzo dzegore rino.\n\nMutungamiri webato reTransform Zimbabwe, VaJacob Ngarivhume, avo vanga varipowo pamusangano uyu, vati nyika dzakawanda dzakasimudzwa hupfumi hwadzo kubukidza nevanoita mabasa emaoko pamwe nekutengesa mumigwagwa. VaMudzuri, avo vakaita meya weHarare weMDC wekutanga, vakurudzira kanzuru kuti igarewo yakavhura zvimbuzi zvose zviri mudhorobha reHarare pamwe nemumisha inogara veruzhinji vachiti veruzhinji vari kushaya pekuzvibatsira sezvo mikova yezvimbuzi izvi ichigara yakakiyiwa zvave kuita kuti veruzhinji vazvibatsire pose-pose. Panguva yavaiva meya weHarare, VaMudzuri vakashanda zvakasimba vakagadzirisa migwagwa yakange yakazara makomba muguta reHarare, asi vakazobviswa pachigaro chehumeya nehurumende yaiva yaVaRobert Mugabe panguva iyi, vachipomerwa mhosva dzisina musoro. No media source currently available
title: VaMudzuri Vanoti Mabasa Ndiwo Chete Anobvisa Vanotengesa Mumigwagwa

text: Nemusi weChitatu panonzi pakaita mhirizhonga paArnold Farm kana kuti Manzou kuMazowe pakati pevanofungidzirwa kuti vatsigiri vezanu-pf nevagari vepapurazi iri. Vatsigiri veZanu-PF ava vanonzi vaida kuti vagari ava vabve papurazi iri kuti Amai Grace Mugabe mudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika vawedzera purazi ravo. Gavhuna wedunhu reMashonaland Central VaMartin Dinha vakaudza Studio 7 kuti Amai Mugabe vakapihwa purazi iri kuti vachengetere mhuka. Asi matare akamisa Amai Mugabe nemapurisa kubvisa vagari varipo parizvino pasina kwekuvaendesa sezvinodiwa nebumbiro remutemo. Mapurisa akamboputsira vanhu ava dzimba dzavo vasati vamiswa nedare. Munyori wesangano reArnold Farm Residents Association VaInnocent Dube vanoti vari kutaura nemagweta avo kuti vaone kuti vanhu ava vasadzoke kuzovashungurudza. No media source currently available
title: Vatsigiri veZanu-PF Voyedza Kudzinga Vanhu paManzou Kuti Amai Mugabe Vawedzera Munda Wavo

text: Mutungamiri weZanu PF uye vari mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vanoti ivo nebato ravo vachatambira zvichabuda musarudzo. VaMnangagwa vataura mashoko aya pamusangano wavo wekupedzisira wekutsvaga rustigiro pamberi pesarudzo. Vachitaura kuvatsigiri vebato ravo vanoda kusvika kuzviuru makumi matatu munhandare yeNational Sports Stadium muHarare, VaMnangagwa vati kunyange hazvo bato ravo richakunda zvine mutsindo, vachatambira zvinenge zvadiwa nevana veZimbabwe. VaMnangagwa vakurudzirawo kuti vanhu vemuZimbabwe varambe vachikoshesa runyararo, vakati vanofadzwa nekuti mapato akawanda ari kukwikwidza akatevera kurudziro yavo yekuti sarudzo dziitwe murunyararo vachiti mapurisa achatora matanho akakodzera kune vose vachada kukonzera mhirizhonga. Vadzokororawo mashoko avo ekuti boka reZimbabwe Electoral Commission, Zec, iboka rakazvimirira rine makomishina akasarudzwa nemapato ose ane nhengo dziri muparamende, kusanganisira vari kutungamira mubatanidzwa weMDC Alliance, VaNelson Chamisa. Vati hapana bato rezvematongerwo enyika rinofanirwa kuudza Zec zvekuita maringe nemashandiro ayo. VaMnangagwa vayambirawo vari kuongorora sarudzo kuti vasapindire mune zvematongerwo enyika, asi kuti vaite basa ravo nemazvo. Vanoona nezvegwara remusangano muboka revechidiki reZanu PF, VaGodfrey Tsenengamu, vanoti vafadzwa zvikuru nemashoko ataurwa nemutungamiri wavo, zvikuru panyaya yerunyararo. Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika uye vachitungamira sangano revechidiki rePlatform for Youth Development, VaClaris Madhuku vanoti mashoko aVaMnangagwa ekuti vachatambira zvichabuda musarudzo haafanirwi kungotambirwa sezvo vamwe vavo mubato reZanu PF vachigona kuzozviramba. Zimbabwe iri kutarisirwa kusarudza mutungamiri wenyika, vamiriri vedare reparamende pamwe nemakanzura nemusi weMuvhuro. Zec inoti yagadzirira zvose zvinodiwa musarudzo idzi. No media source currently available
title: VaMnangagwa Vovimbisa Kutambira Zvichabuda Musarudzo

text: Gurukota reBritain rinoona nezvekudyidzana neAfrica, amai Harriet Baldwin, nemusi weChina vakadaidza mumiriri weZimbabwe muBritain, Rtd. Colonel Christian Katsande vakavaudza kuti nyika yavo haisi kufara nezviri kuitwa nemauto zvekupfura vanhu nepfuti. Amai Baldwin vakati mauto anofanirwa kushanda zviri pamutemo kunyangwe hazvo vanhu vari kuratidzira vamwe vachinzi vari kuita zvemhirizhonga. Britain inoti hurumende haifanirwewo kuvhara masaisai einternet, uye inoti iri kukurudzira kuti hurumende ivhure masaisai aya nekuchimbidzika. Amai Barbara Nyagomo vebato reProgressive Democrats of Zimbabwe uye vachigara kuLondon kwakare kuBritain vanoti Britain inofanirwa kutsanangurira VaKatsande kuti vana veZimbabwe vane kodzero yekuratidzira kana vachipokana nezvavanenge vasingawirirane nazvo. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, sangano reEuropean Union riri kushoropodzawo kushandiswa kwechisimba nehurumende yeZimbabwe munguva yekuratidzira kwevanhu. Mugwaro ravakaburitsawo nemusi weChina, mutauriri wesangano iri, Amai Maja Kocijancic, vakati vanotarisira hurumende yeZimbabwe kuti iremekedze kodzero dzevanhu pamwe nemutemo, sezviri mubumbiro remitemo. Sangano reEuropean Union rakakurudzirawo kuti paferefetwe zvakadzama kufa kwevanhu pamwe nekushungurudzwa mumazuva adarika.
title: Britain Inoshevedza Mumiriri weZimbabwe neNyaya yeMhirizhonga

text: Mutauiriri wemapurisa Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi vari kuramba mashoko ekuti vadaidza nekuda kusunga mutauriri webato rinopikisa reCitizens Coalition for Change Muzvare Fadzayi Mahere sezviri kutendererera pamadandemutande. VaNyathi vaudza Studio 7 kuti Muzvare Mahere vangodaidzwa nemapurisa eCID Law and Order sezvo vatanga kuferefeta nyaya yekukandwa kunonzi nevanopikisa kwakaitwa bhambo pamusangano webato iri kuChinhoyi mavhiki maviri adarika. Vachinyora padandemutande ravo reTwitter, Muzvare Mahere vati vange vadaidzwa kukamba yemapurisa uye vaenda negweta ravo. VaNyathi vati Muzvare Mahere vange vakavimbisa kuti vachanyora gwaro rezvavakaona zvichiitika musi uyu. Mutori wenhau weStudio 7 Nunurai Jena aMuvare Mahere vapedza awa imwe chete nechidimbu vari kukamba yemapurisa.
title: Mapurisa Anoti Haana Kusunga Muzvare Mahere Asi Ari Kuda Humbowo Hwezvakaitika Panonzi Pakakandwa Bhambo kuChinhoyi

text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi uye vari mukuru wesangano ravana chipangamazano, re Labour and Economic Research Instistute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Godfrey Kanyenze, vanoti Zimbabwe inofanirwa kugadzirisa hupfumi hwenyika kuitira kuti mari yemunyika ive nechiremera. Doctor Kanyenze, avo vanopinda mumusangano we Tripartite Negotiating Forum sechipangamazano munyaya dzevashandi, vanoti zvakakosha kuti hurumende igadzirise zvinonetsa munyika, uye kutevedzera mitemo yenyika isati yatora matanho anobata munhu wese. Mashoko aVaKanyenze anotevera kusagadzikana kwakabuda pamusangano weTNF wakaitwa neChitatu chapfuura, apo vashandi nevashandirwi vakabuda pachena kuti vainge vasina kusumwa pakadzikwa mutemo unorambidza kushandiswa kwemari dzekunze munyika. Vamiriri vehurumende vaive mumusangano uyu vanonzi vakawiriranawo nevamiri vevashandi nevemabhizinesi kuti kutarwa kwemutemo uyu kwainge kwaitwa pasina kutevedzwa mitemo inosunga TNF. Asi gurukota rezvevashandi, Amai Sekai Nzenza, vanoti vachasvitsa zvakabuda mumusangano weTNF kudare remakurukota, kuitira kuti paonekwe matanho ekutora. Amai Nzenza vanoti havagoni kuudza dare remakurukota zvekuita asi chavanokwanisa kuita kusvitsa kudare iri zvisungo zvakabuda mumusangano weTNF wakaitwa nemusi weChitatu. Doctor Kanyenze vanoti zvakakosha zvikuru kuti nyaya iyi yakadzoserwa kudare remakurukota kuti rione kuti ringaite seyi nenyaya iyi. Dare remakurukota rakatobuda kare richiti rakanga richitsigira mutemo mutsva unobata nyaya dzemari. Asi izvi zvakaitwa musangano weTNF usati wabuda nechisungo chawo. Doctor Kanyenze vanoti vanozviziva havo kuti nyoka huru haizvirume, asi chakakosha ndechekuti hurumende inofanirwa kuremekedza mitemo yayo kuitira kuti iremekedzwewo neveruzhinji. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vakasaina bhiri remutemo weTNF svondo rapera kuti uchive mutemo unoshandiswa munyika. Mutemo uyu unosungira hurumende kuti itaurirane nevashandirwi, vashandi pamwe nehurumende pasati pashandurwa mitemo inobata nyaya dziri pasi peTNF. Doctor Kanyenze vanoti zvinoshamisa kuti hurumende yakaenderera mberi nekuuya nemutemo unobata mari mushure memazuva mashoma VaMnangagwa vasaina mutemo weTNF. No media source currently available
title: Doctor Kanyenze Voyambira Kugadziriswa kweHupfumi hweNyika Kuitira Kuti Mari Isimbewo

text: Mutauriri webato rinopikisa reNational People’s Party rinotungamirwa naAmai Joice Mujuru, VaJeffryson Chitando vanoti handi chokwadi kuti bato ravo ratobatana neMDC Alliance. Asi vati vari kuda kuti nhaurirano dzakatangwa namuchakabvu Morgan Tsvangirai naAmai Mujuru dzichipedziswa. Kusanzwisisa zviri kuitika kuri kuuya mushure mekunge Amai Mujuru varatidza chido chekuti vanopikisa vabatane paivigwa VaTsvangirai kuBuhera nemusi weChipiri. No media source currently available VaChitando vanoti vasati vabatana vanoda kuti papedziswe zvimwe zvirehwa rehwa zvakasara panhaurirano dzainge dzichiitwa naAmai Mujuru naVaTsvangirai dzinosanganisa nyaya yezita remubatanidzwa wemapato uye kusarudzwa kwevanomirira bato iri musarudzo. VaChitando varambawo zvimwe zviri kubuda padandemutande retwitter zvekuti vatobatana kare vachiti pane munhu ari kureva nhema kuti ndiye Amai Mujuru patwitter. No media source currently available
title: Amai Mujuru Vanoti Vakagadzirira Kushanda neMDC Alliance Zvirehwa Rehwa Zvikagadziriswa

text: Masangano evashandi vehurumende ari pasi peApex Council, pamwe nevamiriri vevashandi vari muboka rezvehutano vakasangana muHarare nemusi weChishanu vakasunga kuti vashandi vose vehurumende varamwe mabasa kubva musi weChipiri svondo rinouya, senzira yekumanikidza hurumende kuti ivabhadhare mihoro yavo yaChikumi nekukasika. Sachigaro veApex Council, Amai Cecilia Alexander vanoti chisungo chabuda mumusangano wavo uyu chabva mupfungwa dzevashandi dzavakapa kumasangano avo. Asi vanoti kunyange hazvo pave nechisungo chabudiwa nacho pamusangano wavo uyu, vane hurongwa hwekusangana nevashandi vose vehurumende neMugovera kuti varatidze simba ravo rekutaura nezwi rimwechete. Vakafanobata chigaro chegurukota rezvemabasa nevashandi VaSupa Mandiwanzira vaudza Studio 7 nerunhare kuti hurumende iri kuedza napose painogona napo kugadzirisa dambudziko revashandi vayo. VaMandiwanzira vati vanokumbira kuti vashandi vanzwisise kuti dambudziko rekunonoka kwavo kuwana mihoro riri kukonzerwa nekusamira zvakanaka kwezvinhu munyika munyaya dzezvehupfumi, uye riri kubatawo vekamakambani akazvimirira, avo vavewo nemwedzi yakati kuti vasati vawaniswa mihoro yavo. Hurumende yakanga yaronga kupa mushandi mumwe nemumwe zana remadhora yekuti vafanobatsirika nayo panguva iyo vanenge vakamirira mihoro yavo, iyo yakaendeswa mberi kumwedzi waChikunguru sezvo hurumende iri kutatarika kuti iwane mari inokwana kubhadhara mihoro yevashandi vayo vose, avo vanonzi nedzimwe nyanzvi mune zveupfumi vakawandisa. Zvichakadaro, mapurisa muHarare neChishanu arambidza nhengo dzesangano revarairidzi vekumaruwa, reRural Teachers’ Union of Zimbabwe, kuratidzira dziri pamahofisi egurukota rezveupfumi, VaPatrick Chinamasa. Sangano iri ranga richida kuratidzira senzira yekunyunyuta nekunonoka kwavo kuwaniswa mihoro yavo yaChikumi. No media source currently available
title: Vashandi veHurumende Vosunga Kuramwa Mabasa neChipiri cheSvondo Rinouya

text: Vakuru vakuru vekambani yehurumende, yeAgriculture and Rural Development Authority (ARDA), avo vange vari kuramba nemagwaro anoratidza mashandiro avanoita nemamwe makambani emuno neekunze, vazopa paramende magwaro aya mushure mekunge vaudzwa kuti paramende ine simba rekuvakanda mutirongo kana vakaramba vakaomesa musoro. Sachigaro wekomiti inoona nezvekurima iyo iri kuda magwaro aya, Va Justice Mayor Wadyajena, vaudza vatori venhau kuti kunyange hazvo mukuru weARDA, VaWillard Mbona, pamwe nasachigaro wekambani iyi, VaBasil Nyabadza, vakapopotedzana nenhengo dzekomiti yavo neMuvhuro, vaunza neChipiri kuparamende magwaro ese avari kuda. VaWadyajena vati vanofara kuti vakuru vakuru veARDA vazoita sezvinodiwa mushure mekuona simba redare reparamende. VaWadyajena vati komiti yavo ichaongorora magwaro aya kuti vaone kuti zvisungo zviri kuitwa nekambani iyi nemamwe makambani zviri kubatsira nyika here kana kuti kwete. Vati mushure mekuzeya nyaya iyi vachongororawo hunhu hwaVaNyabadza kuti vaone kuti vanokodzera here kuramba vari mubhodhi rekambani yakakosha seARDA. VaWadyajena vati komiti yavo inoda kuongorora zvibvumirano zveARDA neGreen Fuels, Trek Petroleum pamwe nezvimwe zvibvumirano zvese zvayakaita nemakambani ese emuno neekunze. Kubvira svondo rapfuura, vakuru vakuru veARDA, vange vari kuramba nemagwaro ezvibvumirano izvi vachiti hazvifaniri kuzivikamwa neveruzhinji uye mamwe makambani avakaita nawo zvibvumirano izvi anogona kutemerwa zvirango zvehupfumi nedzimwe nyika dzekunze kana akazivikanwa kuti anoshanda nehurumende yeZimbabwe. Chisungo cheARDA neGreen Fuels kuChipinge chichiri kukonzera mutauro uye vagari veko havasi kufara nechisungo ichi sezvo vave kutorerwa minda yavo. Mukuru wesangano rePlatform for Youth Development iro rinoshandira kuChipinge, VaClaris Madhuku, vaudza Studio7 kuti vanofara chose neongororo yave kuitwa neparamende. ARDA ikambani yehurumende inoona nezvekurima uye ine mapurazi mumatunhu ese munyika. ARDA inoshandawo nemakambani akawanda emuno neekunze. No media source currently available
title: Vakuru veARDA Vanopa Paramende Magwaro Ari Kudiwa

text: Kambani yeClean City iyo yange iri kutakura marara muHarare yambomira basa iri zvichitevera danho rakatorwa nekanzuru rekupa nzvimbo yayo inorasirwa marara yePomona kukambani yekuNetherlands yeGeogenix BV iyo inoshandisa zita rekuti Pomona Waste Management. Kambani iyi yabva yakwidza mari yekurasa marara kuPomona izvo zvave kuomera makambani akawanda. Muchiziviso kune veruzhinji, Clean City iyo yange iri kutakura marara kubva kumakambani nemimwe misha, inoti yakamira kutakura marara kubva nezuro zvichitevera kuchinja kwemafambisirwo ebasa kuPomona. Clean City inoti kukwidzwa kwemari kuPomona kwakanganisa basa ravo rekutakura marara sezvo vazhnji vavanotakurira vasinga kwanise mari dziri kudiwa. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nemutauriri wekambani iyi VaFungai Mandivheyi kuti vati tsanangurire zvakawanda pamusoro pedanho rekambani yavo sezvo vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. Mukuru werimwe remasangano anomirira vagari vemuHarare, reHarare Residents Trust, VaPrecious Shumba, vaudza Studio 7 kuti kupinda kwekambani yeGeogenix kuPomona kwakwidza mitengo yekurasa marara uye zvinoreva kuti makambani ange ari kubatsira kutakura marara anosarikirwa nemari yakawanda akaramba achiita basa iri. VaShumba vati vanonzwisisa danho reClean City vachiti rinoita kuti kambani iyi isarasikirwe nemari. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwezvirongwa mune rimwewo sangano rinomirira vagari reCombined Harare Residents Association, VaReuben Akili, vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvave kuitwa nemakambani anotakura marara muguta zvinoratidza kuti hurongwa hwekuPomona hwakaitwa pasina kutaurirana pakati pevagari, kanzuru, nemakambani aya. Vati kumira kwave kuita makambani kutakura marara kunoreva kuti marara achawanda muguta. Mukuru wesangano reCommunity Water Alliance, VaHardlife Mudzingwa, vati zvingave nani kuti chirongwa chekuPomona chimiswe kuti guta risarasikire nemari inosvika mamiryoni mazana matatu emadhora ekuAmerica US$300 million mukati memakore makumi matatu anotevera sezvakanyorwa muchibvumirano ichi. Pasi pechibvumirano ichi, kurasa tani rimwe chete remarara paPomona, panodiwa zviuru makumi mana zvemadhora ekuAmerica. VaMudzingwa vati izvi zvinoshamisa zvikuru nekuti kanzuru yeHarare yangofanira kuita izvi iri yega pasina kupa imwe kambani mari pasina zvayaiita. Asi vaive vakabata matomu ameya weHarare pakasainwa chibvumirano chekuPomona, VaStewart Mutizwa veMDC-T vaudza Studio 7 kuti hapana chakaipa pane zviri kuitika kuPomona vachiti kambani yakatora nzvimbo iyi yeGeoPomona mubatanidzwa wekanzuru, hurumende nekambani yeGeogenix BV. Vabvumawo kuti mari dzave kunzi vanhu nemakambani abhadhare ndidzo dzavakabvumirana uye kambani iyi icharamba ichishanda kuPomona kunze kwekuti vamiswa nematare. VaMtizwa vaudza Studio 7 kuti pane vamwe vagari vakatoenda kumatare vachipikisa uye pari zvino chirongwa chavo chichaenderera mberi kunze kwekuti vamiswa nematare.  Pata vabvunza nezvekumira basa kwemakambani akaita seClean City, VaMtizwa vati ivo havangaregi kuita basa ravo nekuda kwekuti pane vamwe vari kuramba basa. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kumiriri wekambanani yeGeogenix muZimbabwe, VaDelish Nguwaya kana kugurukota rezvematunhu, VaJuly Moyo sezvo nharembozha dzavo dzange dzisiri kudairwa. VaMoyo vari kupomerwa mhosva yekumanikidza makanzura eMDC-T kunyora chibvumirano ichi pasingatevedzerwi mitemo. VaMtizwa vati kambani yeGeoPomona yave kutogadzira panzvimbo iyi uye vati kana ikange yave kushanda zvakanaka ichange yave kubika magetsi anoita 25 megawatts kubva pamarara anobva muguta. Asi zvchimwe chiri kurwadza vagari inyaya yekuti chibvumirano chekanzuru chekushanda nekambani yeGeorgenix chakaitwa pasingatevedzwe mutemo wemaTender sezvinodiwa pasi pemutemo wePublic Procurement and Disposal of Assets Act. No media source currently available
title: Kanzuru yeHarare Yotadza Kurasa Marara KuPomona Mushure Mehuori Hunonzi Hwakaitwa Pakutengesa Nzvimbo Iyi

text: Vagari vekwaMutare vari kutarisira zvizhinji kubva kuhurumende itsva ichange yavepo svondo rino zvichitevera kutoreswa mhiko kwemutungamiri mutsva, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa. Vagari vekwaMutare vanoti vanotarisira kuti zvinhu zvishanduke munyaya dzehupfumi, kugara kwevanhu murunyararo, kuva nehutano hwakanaka, kupedzwa kwehuori nezvimwe zvinovakoshera muhupenyu. Muzvare Jessie Nongerai, avo vanogadzira vanhu nzwara muguta, vanoti hurumende itsva inotarisirwa kuti igadzirise hupfumi hwenyika uhwo hwange hwave kumawere zvichitevera kutonga nedemo kwaVaMugabe kwemakore makumi matatu nemanomwe. VaEnock Panganai vanoti huwori hwange hwaparadza nyika hunofanirwa kupedzwa zvachose nehurumende itsva. Mumwe mugari wemuguta, VaJames Jera, vanoti vatungamiri havasungirwi kuti vagarise pachigaro sezvange zvaita VaMugabe. VaIshamael Gweshe vanoita basa rekutengesa michero nezvimwe zvirimwa muguta reMutare. VaGweshe vanoti vanoshuvira kuti hupfumi hwenyika hudzoke pamakare apo Zimbabwe yaive nemukurumbira muAfrica yose, mabasa achiwanikwa, mari ichibatika. Vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu uye vari munyori musangano revagari vemuguta reMutare Residents and Ratepayers Association, VaDavid Mutambirwa, vanoti hurumende ichavepo inofanirwa kupedza hurombo muvanhu nekusimudzira maindasitiri kuti kuve nemabasa pamwe nekusungisa vose vakuru vachabatwa nemhosva dzehuwori. Mutyairi wemotokari maMutare, VaNoel Tom, vaudza Studio 7 kuti havana zvakawanda zvavanoda kuti hurumende itsva ivaitire kunze kwekuti vechidiki vawanirwe mabasa, mari itoreke mumabhanga sakare, uye zvikoro zvinge zvichideredza mari inobhadharwa. Vagari ava vanoti itarisiro yavo yekuti zvinhu zvichange zvakanaka munyika sezvo vachange vari muhurumende vava neruzivo rwezvinhu zvinouraya hupfumi hwenyika. No media source currently available
title: Vanogara kwaMutare Voisa Tarisiro Huru Kuna VaMnangagwa

text: Zimbabwe ichiri kutatarika kuzadzikisa zvinotarisirwa pasi rose kumisa nyaya yekumbunyikidzwa kwevanhu vachiendeswa kwavasingadi kana kuti human trafficking. Svondo rapera pane mumwe murume wemuZimbabwe akabatwa kuBotswana aine vana vanomwe vaaida kuyedza kuendesa kuSouth Africa zvisiri pamutemo. Nyaya dzakadai ndidzo dzinonzi nenyanzvi dziri kupa kuti ongororo inoitwa nebazi rezvekudyidzaba nedzimwe nyika muAmerica restate Department riise Zimbabwe panyika dzinoda kutarisiswa kana kuti Tier 2 Watch List sezvo dzisiri kuzadzikisa zvinotarisirwa kuitwa kumisa dambudziko iri. Gwaro restate Department rinonzi 2021 Trafficking in Persons Report: Zimbabwe rinoti kunyangwe Zimbabwe iri kutatarika kuzadzikisa zvinotarisirwa mukumbunyikidzwa kwevanhu vachiendeswa kune dzimwe nzvimbo zvisiri pamutemo, iri kuyedza zvichitariswa pakutongwa kwemumwe munhu ndokunopika uye kubuda negwara rakajeka rekuti yopedza sei dambudziko iri. Gwaro iri rinoti Zimbabwe haisi kuchuchisa nyaya idzi kana kupawo masangano akazvimirira zvikwanisiro zvekuita basa. Masangano akazvimirira aya anoti akabatsira vanhu vanodarika mazana mana vainge vambunyikidzwa vachiendeswa kwavasingadi. Bazi remuAmerica iri rinoti Zimbabwe haisati yavandudzawo mutemo we2014 Trafficking in Person Act kunyangwe ichigara ichivimbisda kuita izvi. Pane imwe nyaya iri mumatare iri kuratidza kuti dambudziko iri riri kuramba ruchikura, Mapurisa emuZimbabwe, Botswana neSouth Africa ave kushanda ose kuti vakwanise kudzosera vana vanomwe vanonzi vaiendeswa kuSouth Africa vachidarika nemuBotswana zvisiri pamutemo nechimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe svondo rapera. Chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chiri muhusungwa ichi, VaEric Mpofu, avo vanobva kuPlumtree havana kupihwa mukana wekuti vabvise mari yechibatiso pavakamira pamberi pamejastiriti Muzvare Chandapiwa Molefi muFrancistown vachipomerwa mhosva dzekusabata vana zvakanaka uye kutakura vanhu zvisiri pamutemo kana kuti human trafficking. Vakasungwa musi wa 3 Zvita kuBluetown kuBotswana. Dare rakanzwa kuti VaMpofu, avo vane makore makumi maviri nemapfumbamwe, vakaedza kutiza apo vakamiswa nemapurusa emuFrancistown vachityaira mota ine manhamba ekuSouth Africa. Vachitaura mudare, muchuchisi wenyaya iyi, Muzvare Sesafeleng Dijeng vakati vana ava vanga vakahwandiswa kumashure kwemota vachiendeswa kuSouth Africa uko kunofungidzirwa kuti ndiko kunogara vabereki vavo. Muzvare Dijeng vakaudza dare kuti vana ava havana magwaro ekufambisa izvo zvinoratidza kuti vakajambiswa nepasingabvumidzwe apo vakapinda muBotswana. Muchuchisi akati kujambisa bhodha vana vadiki ava, avo vane makore ari pakati pemapfumbamwe negumi nemairi, kupinza hupenyu hwavo munjodzi huru izvo zviri kuita kuti mhosva yaVaMpofu ive yakakomba kwazvo. Vakakumbira dare kuti risape VaMpofu mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso sezvo vasina pekugara pakanyatsoti tsvikiti muBotswana uye vari kupomerwa mhosva huru. VaInnocent Saidi vanogara muguta reGaborone muBotswana vanoti tsika yekutakura vana vadiki zvisiri pamutemo itsika yakaipa zvikuru nokuti inovapinza munjodzi. Nyanzwi munyaya dzekodzero dzevana uye vari gweta rakazvimirira, VaRyan Muchengeti vaudza Studio7 kuti mamiriro ezvehupfumi ayo akaita manyama amire nerongo muZimbabwe ndiwo ari kuitawi kuti vanhu vapare mhosva dzakadai senzira yekutsvaga mari. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rehurumende panyaya iyi sezvo gurukota rinoona nezvemukati menyika, VaKazembe Kazembe vanga vasingadaire nharembozha yavo kusvika taenda pamhepo. Asi hurumende inoti iri kuita zvese zvainogona mukupedza kutakurwa kwevana zvisiri pamutemo kusanganisira kusunga uye kutonga vanofungidzirwa kuti vapara mhosva idzi pamwe chete nekudzidzisa vanoferefeta nyaya idzi. Zvinofungidzirwa kuti vame vanhukadzi nevana vanotakurwa zvisiri pamutemo vachiendeswa kunyika dzinoti Botswana, Mozambique, South Africa neZambia vanozosvika vachibatwa senhapwa vachimanikidzwa kuita zvebonde.
title: Zimbabwe Yotatarika Kugadzirisa Dambudziko reKumbunyikidzwa kweVanhu Vachiendeswa Kwavasingadi

text: Mapurisa neMuvhuro akavharisa mabiko eKisimusi anga akarongwa nemumiriri weHighfield West muparamende, VaHappymore Chidziva vebato reMDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa, ayo anga achifanirwa kuitirwa pamahofisi eZororo. VaChidziva vaudza Studio 7 kuti mapurisa ati vakanga vasina kupiwa mvumo nemapurisa yekuti vaunganidze vanhu. Asi ivo vanoti aya manyepo sezvo vakanga vachiita misangano nemapurisa epaSoutherton pamusoro pehurongwa hwavo uhwu. Vanoti vanga vachida kutorawo mukana wemabiko ekupera kwegore aya kuti vagovere zvekudya kuvagari vemudunhu ravano mirira, zvikuru vakwegura,nevanoshaya. Studio 7 yakundikana kuwana divi remapurisa panyaya iyi sezvo mutauriri wemapurisa, Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi, vati vanga vasingakwanise kutaura nesu panhare sezvo vanga vachityaira. VaChidizva vanoti pasvika mapurisa abva audza vanga vaungana kuti vabve vese panzvimbo iyi, uye chimwe chikafu change chabikwa chatozogoverwa kuvanhu vanga vaungana ava chimwe chikaraswa. Vanoti dambudziko guru ndere nyama yavarikushaya kuti voita seyi nayo sezvo vasina mafiriji anokwanisa kuchengetedza nyama yose iyi nekuda kwekushaya magetsi. VaChidziva vanoti kunyangwe vambomiswa kuita mabiko avo, vari kuronga kuti vaite mamwe mabiko akafanana naiwaya pazuva regoredzva. "Semumiriri wedunhu reHighfield West ndichaenderera mberi nemabiko aya sezvo ndichida kuti vanhu vemudunhu rangu vayanane nekupemberera goredzva," VaChidziva vanodaro. No media source currently available
title: Mapurisa Anovharisa Mabiko eKisimusi Akanga Arongwa neMumiriri weHighfield West, VaChidziva

text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vashora vamwe vevaimbova varwi muhondo yerusununguko vachiti vave kukara masimba. VaMugabe vakurudzira kuti vanhu vabatane mubato ravo reZanu PF iro raita zinyekenyeke. VaMugabe vataura mashoko aya pakuradzikwa kwegamba renyika Brigadier General James Murozvi. Vachitaura neChitatu pamarinda anovigwa magamba enyika paHeroes Acre muHarare, VaMugabe vashora vamwe vevakarwa muhondo yerusununguko vachiti vave kuda masimba zvakanyanyisa vakakurudzira kuti vanhu vese vakaenda kuhondo, vashande pamwe chete kuitira kuti hupenyu hweveruzhinji husimukire. Kunyange hazvo VaMugabe vasina wavadoma nezita, mashoko avo aya anouyawo apo vatungamiri vesangano reZimbabwe National Liberation War Veterans vakabvumirana kuti vachashanda zvakasimba kuti veruzhinji vasarudze mutungamiri wavanoda pasarudzo dzichaitwa gore rinouya. Vatungamiri vesangano revakwarwa muhondo yerusununguko vanoti VaChristopher Mutsvangwa naVaDouglas Mahiya avo vakadzingwa muZanu PF ndevamwe vevanga vari pataurwa mashoko aya. Zvichakadai, VaMugabe vakurudzira kuti vanhu vari mubato ravo reZanu PF vabatane sezvo mumusangano wavo mave kuitwa bvondawaponda matambiro ezvidhakwa nekuda kwezvikwata-zvikwata zvave mubato iri. Mashoko aya anouya apo murongi wemisangano muZanu PF, VaSaviour Kasukuwere, vari kurongerwa kudzingwa pachinzvimbo chavo vachinzi vari kuronga zvekutorera VaMugabe masimba. Nekune rumwe rutivi zvinonziwo pane chikwata chinotungamirirwa nemutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, chiri kuzvidaidza kuti Team Lacoste, icho chiri kukwidzana necheGeneration 40 kutora matomhu kubva kuna VaMugabe. VaMugabe vashamisa vanhu vakawanda mushure mekuuya kurufu urwu vakadimurirwa bvudzi zvavasati vamboita. Vakanangana nemushakabvu, VaMugabe vatsanangura VaMurozvi semunhu akazvipira kusungura nyika kubva kuhutongi hwevachena pamwe nekushandira nyika kudzamara vaenda kwamupfiganebwe. Mashoko aVaMugabe aya atsinhirwa naGeneral Douglas Nyikaramba. Ataura akamirira mhuri yemushakabvu, VaAgustine Mazuru, vaudza chita chevanhu vanga vari pakuradzikwa kwaVaMurozvi kuti mushakabvu munhu asiya gwanza richanetsa kuvhara mumhuri. Brigadier General Murozvi vakaberekwa musi wa 2 Chikumi muna 1956 vakasiya zvidzidzo zvehudzidzisi kuenda kuMozambique kunobatana nevamwe vaiva varwi muhondo yerusununguko. Hondo yapera, VaMurozvi vakapinda muchiuto vakaramba vachikwira nezvinzvimbo kudzamara vave Brigadier General. Pavazofa, VaMurozvi vange vave principal director mubazi rinowona nezvevakarwa muhondo yerusununguko. VaMurozvi, avo vakashaya musi wa6 Kubvumbi mushure mekurwara nechirwere cheshuga, vasiya mudzimai Retired Group Captain Joice Muronzvi, vanasikana vaviri, nevanakoma vatatu. No media source currently available
title: VaMugabe Vanoviga VaMurozvi Vachishora Vakarwira Rusununguko

text: Hukama hweZimbabwe neBritain hunonzi hahuchina kumira zvakanaka zvichitevera kushandiswa kwechisimba nemauto munguva yekuratidzira kwakaitika mwedzi wapera, izvo zvakasiya vanhu vanodarika gumi nevashanu vaurayiwa, vakawanda vakuvadzwa, uye mazana asungwa. Britain inonzi yakazivisa kuti haichatsigira Zimbabwe munyaya dzekumutsiridza hupfumi pamwewo nedanho rayo rekuti ibvumidzwe kudzokera mumubatanidzwa wenyika dzaive pasi pehutongi hweBritain, weCommonwealth. Nekuda kwekutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu uku Britain inonzi yave kufunga kutowedzera vamwe vanhu pane vakatemerwa zvirango. Gurukota rinoona nezveAfrica, Amai Harriet Baldwin, vanonzi vakazivisa kuti panofanirwa kunge paine zvinoonekwa panyaya yeZimbabwe pakubhara zvikwereti zvayo kumasangano ekunze anokweretesa mari. Amai Baldwin vanonzi vakati ivo pachezvavo vanoona zvakavaomera kuti vatsigire kudzoka kweZimbabwe mumubatanidzwa weCommonwealth zvichitevera kuurayiwa kwakaitwa vanhu nemauto muna Nyamavhuvhu gore rapera pamwe nemuna Ndira gore rino, uye kuenderera mberi kwekutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu. Vakatiwo muitiro wakadai haukodzeri kuitwa nenhengo yemubatanidzwa uyu, sezvo nyika dziri. Ukuwo, mutauriri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaGeorge Charamba, vachipindura mashoko aMai Baldwin, vakati Zimbabwe haisi kushaya hope nekuda kudzokera muCommonwealth. VaCharamba vakati kudzokera kwavo mumubatanidzwa uyu hakufanirwe kufadza divi rimwe chete. Zimbabwe yakanyorera ichikumbira kudzokera muCommonwealth gore rapera, uye sangano iri rakatumirawo vaongorori vesarudzo kuzotarisa sarudzo dzakaitwa gore rapera, izvo zvakaita kuti vakawanda vafunge kuti hukama hwemapoka maviri aya hwakanga hwave kudzokera pamakare. Vamwe vane maonero ekuti Zimbabwe yakasadzokera mugungano iri inenge yarasaikirwa nemukana wakakosha kwazvo. Asi vamwewo vakaita saVaGadzira Chirumhanzu, avo vanoongorora zvamatongerwo enyika vakarerekera kuZanu PF, vanoti Zimbabwe haifanirwe kunyengerera kudzokera muCommonwealth. Chizvarwa cheZimbabwe, Amai Theresa Majonhi, avo vanogara kuLondon, kuBritain, vanoti vanofunga kuti Zimbabwe inenge yarasikirwa nemukana wakakosha zvikuru wekuti inge ichidzokera musangano reCommonwealth. Amai Majonhi vanotiwo kupinda musangano iri kwaizopa vana veZimbabwe mikana yakawanda kwazvo inosanganisira kuwaniswa masikorashipi ekuti vaende kunodzidza muzvikoro zvenyika dziri mumubatanidzwa uyu. Vaive mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vakaburitsa Zimbabwe muCommonwealth muna 2003 mushure mekunge ivo nevamwe vavo vatemerwa zvirango zvichitevera sarudzo dzakaitwa muna 2002 idzo dzakakonzera mutauro. No media source currently available
title: Kutyorwa kweKodzero Munyika Kwoomesera Kudzoka kweZimbabwe muCommonwealth

text: Nhengo dzedare reparamende dzinobudirira mukurwisa kwadzo kuti makore emwanasikana anonzi abvuma kuita zvepabonde akwidzwe kubva pamakore gumi nemaviri kuenda pamakore gumi nematanhatu. Vadzidzi vepachikoro chepamusorosoro cheUniversity of Zimbabwe vari kuita zvidzidzo zvekurapa vanotarisa pasina muripo vane zvirwere zvisingatapuriranwe zvakaita seBP neshuga, izvo zvinonzi zviri kuuraya vanhu vakawanda muchinyararire. Sangano reZimbabwe Peace Project rinoti nyaya dzekushandiswa kwechikafu munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika dziri kuwanda munyika. Mukuenderera mberi tichitarisa mamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika, nhasi tiri kuenderera mberi tichikupai hurukuro yakaitwa naBlessing Zulu weStudio 7 nemutungamiri webato rinopikisa reRenewal Democrats of Zimbabwe, VaElton Mangoma. Muchirongwa cheLivetalk na 8:30 pm tiri kutarisa nezvekurudziro yenhengo dzeparamende yekuti makore ekuti mwana anzi abvuma kuita zvepabonde akwidzwe kubva pagumi nemaviri kuenda pagumi nematanhatu. Iyi ndiyo misoro yenhau dzedu dzanhasi...munotibata pa 909 am, 4930, kana pa 12080, ne 15460 Kilohertzs pa Shortwave kana paFacebook peji yedu yeVOAShona. No media source currently available
title: Misoro yeNhau, Chitatu Gumiguru 21 2015

text: Sangano reAfrican Capacity Building Foundation, kana kuti ACBF, nemusi weChipiri rakaburitsa gwaro ra2017 rinoongorora nyaya yezvehumhizha munyaya yebudiriro munyika dzemuAfrica. Asi gwaro iri riri kuburitsa pachena kuti nyika dzemuAfrica dziri kungotaura nezvekukosha kwehumhizha kana kuti science and techonology asi hadzisi kutevera zvadzinenge dzati dzichaita. Gwaro iri rakaparurwa muHarare nekune dzimwe nyika. Vachitaura pachiitiko ichi, munyori mubazi rezvedzidzo yepamusoro, VaMachivenyika Mapuranga, vakatenda kuti pachine zvakawanda zvinoda kuitwa munyaya dzehumhizha kuti Africa neZimbabwe dzibudirire. Mukuru we ACBF, Doctor Thomas Munthali, vanoti hapana kana budiriro ingaitwa muAfrica kana nyaya dzehumhizha dzisina kutambirwa. Vaimbova gurukota rinoona nezvehumhizha mukufambiswa kwemashoko, Muzvinafundo Heneri Dzinotyiwei, vatenda kuti muZimbabwe, sekune dzimwe nyika, ichokwadi kuti muromo hauzarirwe nerwizi. Muzvinafundo Dzinotyiwei vati hurumende iri kumboyedza hayo kuisa zvidzidzo zvehumhizha zvakaita chescience, technology, engineering and mathematics kana kuti Stem, asi hazvina kunyatsojeka. Mashoko aya atsinhirwawo nemukuru weProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, Doctor Takavafira Zhou, avo vati varairidzi vezvirongwa zvakaita seStem havasi kuwana dzidzo yakakwana. Dr Zhou vatendawo kuti hurumende haina zviga zvakajeka zvainoda kudzika pazvirongwa zvayo. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachidzidzisa paUniversity of Zimbabwe, Doctor Gift Mugano, vati ichokwadi kuti hurumende iri kutatarika pakushandisa humhizha mukufambiswa kwemashoko. Doctor Mugano vapa semuenzaniso chirongwa cheZimasset icho vati chinokurudzira humhizha asi hapana zvisungo zvakajeka. Doctor Mugano vatiwo nyaya yekusagadzirisa zvinhu munyaya dzehumhizha ndiyo inopa kuti Africa isarire kumashure segotsi zvichienzaniswa nenyika dzakaita seChina neAmerica. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi dzinoti Zimbabwe ichiri kutatarika kugadzirisa nyaya dzezvehupfumi uye zvirongwa zvayo hazvisi kufamba zvakanaka. Makambani akawanda ari kuvharwa ukowo vanhu vachitadza kutora mari dzavo mumabhanga. No media source currently available
title: Zimbabwe neDzimwe Nyika muAfrica Hadzibudirire Pasina Humhizha?

text: Chikwata cheZimbabwe chemaChevrons chakasvika neChipiri muIslamabad, muPakistan neChipiri chisina muraridzi wacho Lalchardt Rajput. Rajput arambidzwa kuenda kuPakistan nenyika yake India zvichitevera mitemo yekufamba kune dzimwe nyika yakadzikwa nehurumende yeIndia. Gwaro rabva kumutauriri weZimbabwe Cricket VaDarlington Majonga rinoti maChevrons asvika muIslamad vasina Rajput uyo asina kusimuka pamwe chete nechikwata chake. Izvi zvinotevera chikumbiro chakabva kumuzinda weIndia muHarare chichienda kuZimbabwe Cricket kuti Rajput asafambe kuenda kuPakistan zvichitevera mitemo yenyika yavo. VeZimbabwe Cricket vazivisa kuti panguva ino, maChevrons achange achirairidzwa naDouglas Hondo, uyo anove mutevedzeri waRajput. Zimbabwe irikutamba mitambo mitatu yezuva rimwe nemimwe mitatu yema T20. Munyori wezvemutambo wekiriketi VaEnock Muchinjo vanoti havasi kutarisira mashiripiti kubva kumaChevrons asi chakakosha ndechekunotamba mitambo iyi. MaChevrons akapedzisira kupinda munhandare munaKukadzi apo vakasangana neSri Lanka. Hurumende yeZimbabwe yakatendera chikwata ichi kushanya kuPakistan mushure mekunge vamborambidza Afghanistan kushanya muno nemhaka yeCovid 19. No media source currently available
title: India Yorambidza Murairidzi weZimbabwe Cricket Anova Chizvarwa cheNyika Iyi Kuenda neChikwata Chake kuPakistan

text: Kunyange hazvo hurumende ichiti iri kuedza kusimudzira mabasa ekurima munyika nekupa magwaro kana kuti mapemiti em99 year lease anoita kuti varimi vakwanise kukwereta mari yekurimisa kumabhanga, zvakabuda mumusangano wekufambiswa kwemashoko muchirongwa chehurumende che Zimbabwe Agenda for Sustainable Socio-Economic Transformation kana kuti Zim Asset zvinoratidza kuti hurumende ichiri kutatarika kuita izvi. Kushaya magwaro aya kunonzi kuri kudzorera kumashure nyaya yekusimudzira mabasa ekurima. Mumashoko avo pamusangano wainge wakarongwa nehofisi yemutungamiriri wenyika nedare remakurukota kuzeya chirongwa cheZim Asset, mumwe mukuku mubazi rezvekurima, VaCollin Kabudura, vakati kusvika pari zvino hurumende yapa ma99 year lease matatu chete kuvarimi vemapururazi makuru kana kuti A2 kunyange hazvo yange iine hurongwa hwekuti ingadai yapamazana naviri panguva ino. VaKabudura vakatiwo apo hurumende yange yakaronga kuti ingadai yapamapemiti churu nemazana mashanu kuvarimi vemumapurazi madiki kana kuti A1, kusvika pari zvino yapa mapemiti zana nemakumi maviri nerimwe chete. Hurumende haina mari yekutsigira varimi uye vanoti kushaikwa kwemapemiti aya nemalease kunoita kuti varimi vatadze kukwereta mari yekuita mabasa avo izvi zvave kuita kuti nyika ishaye chikafu chakakwana. Izvi zvinouya panguva iyo nyika yakatarisana nenzara inotyisa uye iri kushandisa mari inodarika mamiriyoni mazana mashanu kutenga chibage kubva kunyika dzakaita seSouth Africa, Zambia, Mexico neUkraine. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi, VaMasimba Manyanya, vanoti kunyange hazvo vanhu vakapihwa minda makore gumi nematanhatu apfuura havagoni kushandisa mari dzavo kusimudzira minda iyi sezvo vasina magwaro anoratidza kuti minda iyi ndeyavo. Vaimbove gurukota rezvemari, VaTendai Biti vanoti zviri pachena kuti hurumende haikoshesi mabasa ekurima uye ndosaka nyika ine nzara. Vanotiwo pane vanhu pamwe nemakambani akawanda anoda kurima asi haagoni kushandisa mari dzavo paminda inogona kutorwa nguva ipi zvayo. Svondo rapfuura mumiriri wesangano reEuropean Union muZimbabwe, VaPhilipe Van Damme, vakati Zimbabwe inogona kurima zvirimwa zvakawanda zvekutengesa kuEurope asi vakati iri kutadza kuita izvi nekuti vanhuwo zvavo nemakambani havadi kuita izvi pasina magwaro echibatiso. Gurukota rinoona nezvekurima, VaJoseph Made, vakaudza vekunze kuti vanofanira kushanda nezviripo vachiti nyaya yekuda kuita gakava nekutorwa kweminda yakapera kare uye hapana kudzokera kumashure. Zimbabwe iyo yaionekwa sedura renyika dzekuchamhembe kweAfrica yakatora minda kubva kuvachena muna 2000 asi zvinhu munyaya dzekurima hazvina kuzomira zvakanaka nekuda kwekushaya mari yekutenga zvekurimisa nekusanaya zvakanaka kwemvura. No media source currently available
title: Hurumende Yokundikana Kupa Varimi Zvibatiso

text: Zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka pamuganhu weZimbabwe neSouth Africa sezvo motokari nemabhazi zviri kupedza mazuva anosvika mashanu vari mumutsetse vakamirira kudhindhirwa magwaro avo ekufambisa. Izvi zvinonzi zvakazokonzera kushaya kwemumwe mudzimai ku Beitbridge ari mubhazi achienda kuHarare. Mudzimai uyu anonzi akatanga nekufenda asati azofa kunyangwe vannhu vainge vari mubhazi vakayedza kumubatsira. Vanhu vakawanda vanonzi vatarisana nedambudziko rekushaya mvura yekunwa uye kuBeitbridge kunonzi kuri kupisa zvakanyanya. Mutungamiri wenyika yeSouth Africa VaCyril Ramaphosa serimwe danho rekuyedza kudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19 vakamboti mabhodha akurumidze kuvharwa izvo zvopa kuti zvinhu zviite manyama amire nerongo apo vanhu vakawanda vari kudzokera kumusha kubva kuSouth Africa. Asi hurumende yeSouth Africa inonzi yatenderana neZimbabwe kuti vasavhare bhodha. Mukuru wesangano revanotenga nekutengesa zvinhu kunze kwenyika kana kuti International Cross Border Traders Association VaDennis Juru vanoti nyayawo yekuti pari kudiwa matsamba ekuti munhu akavhenekwa Covid-19 iri kupawo kuti zvinhu zvitonyanya kunonoka kufamba paBeitbridge. No media source currently available
title: Mumwe Mudzimai Ofira paBeitbride Apo Vanhu Vopedza Mazuva Vasati Vadhindirwa Magwaro eKufambisa

text: Vezvitoro vanoti kukwira kuri kuita mafuta edzimotokari pamwe nekushayikwa kwemari yekunze ndiko kuri kukonzera kukwira kwemitengo yezvinhu panguva iyo veruzhinji vachiti havana mari. Sachigaro wesangano rinomirira vezvitoro reRetailers Association of Zimbabwe, VaDenford Chimutashu, vanoti kukwira kwemafuta edzimotokari ndiko kuri kukonzera kuti mitengo yezvinhu ikwire muzvitoro. "Kushayikwa kwemari yekunze kuri kukonzera vezvitoro kuti vatenge mari iyi pamukoto zvavanoti zviri kudhurira vezvitoro pavanenge vachinohodha," vadaro VaChimutashu. Asi VaChimutashu vanoti pane zvimwewo zvinotengeswa zvakaita senyama zvavanoti hazvifaniri kukwidzwa mutengo zvakanyanya sezvo vasiri kuzvihodha kubva kunze kwenyika. Ongororo yaitwa neStudio 7 yaburitsa pachena kuti vezvitoro vakwidza zvinhu zvakawanda zvakaita semafuta ekubikisa, mupunga, nyama, sipo nezvimwe zvakadaro nemari inodarika zvikamu makumi mashanu kubva muzana. Zvichakadai, gurukota rinoona nezvekutengeserana , VaMike Bimha, vanoti hurumende iri kuedza nepose painogona kuti mitengo isarambe ichikwira zvikurusei panguva ino yezororo reKisimusi. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vakati hurumende yavo ichatora matanho akasimba ekugadzirisa zvose zviri kunetsa kusanganisira nyaya yekushayikwa kwemari yekunze kuitira kuti veruzhinji vasarambe vakaomerwa nehupenyu.
title: Kukwira kweMutengo weMafuta eKufambisa Kwokonzeresa Kukwira kweMitengo yeZvinhu?

text: Kanzuru yeguta reHarare yakazivisa neChina nezvemiripo mitsva inenge yave kutarisirwa kubhadharwa nevagari vachazenge vachishanyira makiriniki nezvipatara zvayo, iyo yakatarwa pachishandiswa mari yekuAmerica. Kanzuru yakazivisa kuburikidza nedandemutande re Twitter kuti mitengo mitsva iyi ichange yakatarwa mumadhora ekuAmerica asi munhu achibhadhara nemari yemunyika zvichienderana nekuti mutengo wedhora rekuAmerica uri pamarii pamusika wemari pazuva iroro. Munhu mukuru achaenda kuchipatara kana kukiriniki achange achitarisirwa kubhadhara mari yakaenzana nemadhora mashanu emari yekuAmerica, kuchitiwo mwana mudiki achibhadhara yakaenzana nemadhora matatu ekuAmerica. Madzimai anoshandisa zvipatara nemakiriniki pakusununguka vanenge vobhadhara mari inoenzana nemadhora makumi maviri nemashanu emari yekuAmerica. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kutaura nemutauriri weHarare, VaMichael Chideme, kana mukuru anoona nezvehutano mukanzuru iyi, Dr Prosper Chonzi, sezvo vange vasiri kubatika panharembozha dzavo Mukuru wesangano reCommunity Working Group on Health, VaItai Rusike, vanoti mari itsva idzi dzichaita kuti vanhu vakawanda vakundikane kuenda kunorapwa sezvo paine dambudziko rekuti vanhu havasi kutambira mihoro yavo ichifambirana nemari yekuAmerica iri kutarwa iyi. No media source currently available
title: Kanzuru yeHarare Yotara Mari Dzichabhadharwa neVarwere

text: Vagari vekwaChiadzwa vari kuchema-chema nekushanduka kwaita hupenyu hwavo izvo zvopa kuti tsika yehupfambi nemamwe mabasa erima zvitekeshere munharaunda iyi. Vamwe vana vane mukaka pamhuno vave kutizira vasati vabva zera. VaRueben Kusena mugari wekwaChiadzwa avo vakamirira kuzotamiswa chero nguva parizvino vanoti kubva pakavharwa makambani emangoda vazhinji vemunharaunda vave kuita mabhindauko akasiyana-siyana mamwe asina kunaka. VaKusena vanoti vari kubata mabasa akanaka vari kuita zvekuruka mabhasikiti netsero vachitengesa kuvanoshanya mumugwagwa weMasvingo neMutare. “Kubva pakavharwa minda yemangoda tave kuita zve-buying and selling nezvimwe zvakadaro daro asi vanhu vari kuyaura mazuva ano.” Mumwe ave kuruka mabhasikiti ndiAsk Chipomerwa uyo imboshanda mumunda wemangoda ari fitter and turner. Anoti vazhinji vavo vave kuruka mabhasikiti anozivikanwa nekuti madengu uye mameti anotsikiswa munhu opinda mumba. “Vamwe tave kuruka mabhasikiti, kana kugadzira marasha ekubikisa achitengeswa mumigwagwa asi hariziriro basa racho ratinotarisira sevanhu vaishanda muminda yemangoda aya.” VaCrispen Chandaengerwa vemumusha wekwaChishingwi kwaChiadzwa vanoti vana vazhinji vechidiki vane vabereki vaishanda muminda yemangoda vakashayirwa mari yechikoro vave kuita zvechipfambi kana kuwanikwa vasati vabva zera. “Ichocho ichokwadi nekuti vana vakawanda vave kusiya chikoro vachida kutanga misha yavo nekuda kwekuti pamwe pacho vanenge vaona sekunge vabereki vaomerwa nekugara navo pasina chouviri.” VaJobs Kanganweni venharaunda yeTonhorai avo vaishandawo pakambani yeAnjin makore apfuura vanoti vakawanda vave kupinda muminda vachida kutsvaga mangoda zviri kunze kwemutemo. “Kunetseka kwopa kuti vakawanda vapinde muminda yemangoda zviri kunze kwemutemo. Vagari kuno zvakare vari kunyunyuta nenyaya yekuti minda yavo yakatorwa pasina kana compensation yakabhadharwa nemakani aya.” Mbuya Abigail Munjoma avo vanogara kwaMuchena kwaChiadzwa vanochema nenyaya yemadzimai akawanikwa ave kusiya varume vachiita zvechipfambi vachizama kutsvaga kana kuwana chouviri. “Kana madzimai ari mumusha ave kusiya varume vavo vachibuda mumba vachienda kwavanoenda vachiti vari kunotsvaga mari kuti vararamise mhuri. Izvi zvinotirwadza zvikuru uye vapwere vari kuita zvakare zvimwe chetezvo, uku hapana chatiri kuwana kubva kune vakatora minda yedu.” Hurumende yeZimbabwe inoti iri kuita nepainogona napo kuedza kupa muripo unokodzera kuvagari venharaunda iyi vakarasikirwa neminda, zvipfuyo nezvimwewo asi izvi zvatora nguva refu zvisati zvazadzikiswa. Hurumende yakatorera marezinesi ekuchera mangoda makambani akawanda munzvimbo iyi ikaumba kambani inonzi Zimbabwe Diamond Consolidated Company. Asi kambani iyi iri kutatarika zvapa kuti vakawanda munzvimbo iyi vashaye chouviri. No media source currently available
title: Vagari vekwaChiyadzwa Vononga Svosve neMuromo Kunyangwe Vaine Minda yeMangoda Pedyo

text: Apo Zimbabwe Revenue Authority inoti nyika iri kurasikirwa nemabhiriyoni emadhora nekuda kwevanhu nemakambani asiri kubhadhara mitero, imwe nhengo yeparamende yeMDC-T inoti pane humbowo hunoratidza kuti bato reZanu PF rakapinza motokari nezvimwe zvekushandisa musarudzo zvinokosha mamiriyoni emadhora risina kubhadhara mitero. Nhengo yeNational Assembly, VaGodfrey Sithole veMDC-T, vati nyika inganzi iri kushaya mari sei kana paine vamwe vari kupinza zvinhu munyika vasiri kubhadhara mitero yeduty vakaita sebato reZanu PF. VaSithole vabvunza mubvunzo uyu pamusangano waitwa neZIMRA nenhengo dzeparamende uye vati mubvunnzo wavo wabva pakuti vakaudzwa nevamwe vashandi veZIMRA kuti motokari dzekushandiswa pasarudzo dzakatengwa neZanu PF hadzina kubhadhara mutero weduty. Asi mukuru weZIMRA, Amai Faith Mazani, vati vasingadi zvavo kutaura nezvemapato ezvematongerwo enyika, vanenge vachifungira kuti pane zvinhu zvapinda munyika zvisina kubhadhara mitero vakasununguka kuenda nehumbo kumahofisi avo. Munyori anoona nezvemutemo muZanu PF, VaPaul Mangwana, vaudza Studio 7 kuti bato ravo rakatevedza zvose zvinodiwa neZIMRA nemutemo parakatenga motokari dzaro. Mumiriri weBuhera South muNational Assembly, VaJoseph Chinotimba, vatiwo pane vamwe vanhu kusanganisira nhengo dzeparamende dzinoita kuti nyika irasikirwe namari nekusada kutaura mutengo chaiwo wezvinhu zvavanenge vatenga izvo zvinoita kuti vabhadhare mari shoma yemutero kana kutotdza zvachose.
