Amai Mazani vati vanobvumirana nemaonero aya uye vati zvakakosha kuti nhengo dzeparamende dzibhadharewo mitero pamwe nekubatsira ZIMRA kuita basa rayo kuti nyika iwane mari yekuitisa mabasa ebudiriro. Sachigaro webhodhi reZIMRA, Amai Willia Bonyongwe, vati ongororo yavakaita yakaratidza huwori hunotyisa uye ndosaka pakadzingwa vanhu mabasa. Vatiwo vakavandudza mashandiro avo, uye vari kutenga michina mitsva nekutora nzira dzinopedza huwori. Musangano wanhasi wange une chinangwa chekuvandudza hukama pakati peZIMRA nenhengo dzeparamende nekuti nhengo idzi dziwedzere ruzivo rwadzo panyaya dzemitero kuti dzigodzidzisa veruzhinji nezvekukosha kwekubhadhara mitero. No media source currently available
title: Zanu-PF Yopinza Zvinhu Munyika Isingabhadhare Mutero?

text: Munyika maita kukandirana makobvu nematete mushure mekunge rimwe gweta Doctor Alex Magaisa vaburitsa mazita evanhu vanonzi vakapihwa mazidzamatsama emari nebhanga guru renyika reRBZ kuti vatenge zvikwanisiro zvekurima. Mari yakashandiswa inonzi inosvika zviuru mamiriyoni mazana maviri kana kuti 200 million mumakore ekuma 2007 na 2008. Kunyangwe hazvo mumakore ose aya vaive gavhuna weRBZ VaGideon Gono vaibuda mumapepanhau akaita seHerald neNewsday vachiti ichi chaive chikwereti, asi neSvondo vange voimba rumwe rwiyo mubepanhau reSunday Mail vachiti ichi chaisava chikwereti asi vanhu ava vakangopihwa mari iyo yave kunzi veruzhinji vabhadhare kuburikidza nemutero mushure mekunge hurumende yatora chikwereti ichi. Vamwe vakawana mari iyi vanosanganisira mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vanonzi vakapihwa mari inodarika zviuru mazana mana kana kuti US$400,000. Hatina kukwanisa kubata mutauriri waVaMnangagwa VaGeorge Charamba kana munyori mukuru mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko VaNick Mangwana avo tatumira mashoko paWhatsApp avasina kupindura. Asi vachinyora padandemutande ravo reTwitter VaMangwana varatidza kusafara nekuti Doctor Magaisa vanenge vakatema vakarerekera rimwe divi sezvo vasina kuburitsa mamwe mazita. Asi VaMagaisa vakataura kuti vane zvimwe mugapu mavo zvavachapakura mazuva anotevera. Vanhu vakawanda vaburitswa mazita inhengo dzeZanu-PF vakawanda vari makurukota vamwe vaive makurukota munguva yevaive mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe. Vakuru vemakerereke vanowanzobuda vachitsigirawo bato reZanu-PF nevatongi vematare vakawanda varipowo pavanhu vakapihwa mari iyi. VaGono, VaTemba Mliswa nhengo yeNorton yakazvimira uye vanomiririra Makonde mudare reparamende VaKindness Paradza havanawo kupindura chikumbiro cheStudio 7 chekutaura navo nezvenyaya iyi sezvo vari kunzi vakapihwawo mari iyi. Mukuru anoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko muZanu-PF VaTafadzwa Mugwadi vavimbisa kutipa divi rebato ravo asi hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kwavari kusvika taenda pamhepo. Asi Studio 7 yabata VaKudakwashe Bhasikiti avo vati ichi chaive chikwereti uye vakachidzosera. No media source currently available Pandemutande reTwitter VaBhasikiti nevamwe vange vokandirana makobvu nematete vamwe vachiti ichi chaisava chikwereti zvakapa kuti vamwe vabve vadya magaka mambishi vachiti huori hwanyanya munyika. Vanokokera mabasa musangano reAnti-Corruption Trust of Southern Africa VaAlois Chaumba vanoti vanhu vose vakapihwa mari ava vanhu vanowana vaisada kana rubatsiro zvikuru mari iyi ichizobhadharwa nevarombo. No media source currently available
title: Vanhu Vokandirana Makobvu neMatete paMari Inonzi Yakapihwa Pachena VaMnangagwa neVamwe neRBZ

text: Vagari vemuChinhoyi vanoti havasi kufara nehuwandu hwemapurisa ari kufamba famba akapakatira zvombo muguta nemunzvimbo dzinogara veruzhinji. Vagari ava vanoti vanoona kufamba famba kwemapurisa senzira yekutyisidzira vanhu sezvo mapurisa achizivikanwa nekumbunyikidza kodzero dzevanhu zvikuru sei munguva yesarudzo. Mumwe mugari mumusha weveruzhinji weCold Stream, VaBenjamin Muneri, vanoti kufamba famba kwemapurisa izvo vanga vasingaite mucherechedzo wekuti munyika hamuna kugadzikana. VaMuneri vanoti kuwanikwa kwemapurisa panzvimbo dzose pasina zvavanenge vachiita zvine musoro idanho riri paviri, rekuti kunyange vari kuchengetedza runyararo munguva ino yekutsvaka rutsigiro rwemapato, nekune rumwe rutivi zvinoonekwa sekutyisidzira vagari. Mumwe mugari asiri kufara nehuwandu hwemapurisa muguta, nVaChamunorwa Pazvakavambwa, vanoti maitiro akadai anoratidza kuti mapurisa ane chinangwa chaari kuzviitira chisingazivikanwe. VaChamunorwa vanoti zvekufamba kwemapurisa vakangobata mboma mucherechedzo wekuti hutungamiri hwaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa hwakangofanana nehwevaimbove mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, avo vakabviswa pachigaro nemauto muna Mbudzi gore rapera. Mapurisa ari kuonekwawo achimhanya ari muzvikwata achiimba nguva dzemangwanani izvo vakawanda vanoti kuda kutyisidzira vagarii nguva yesarudzo. Mutauriri wemapurisa mudunhu reMashonaland West, VaClemence Mabgweazara, vanoti hapana chinoshamisa uye chekutya, sezvo mapurisa ari kuchengetedza runyararo munguva ino yesarudzo. Asi VaMabgweazara vadzambadzamba patavabvunza kuti sei mapurisa ari kumhanya mangwanani vachiimba munzvimbo dzinogara veruzhinji. No media source currently available
title: Vagari vemuChinhoyi Vonyunyuta neKuwanda kweMapurisa Akapakata

text: Apo veruzhinji munyika vari kuzeya zviri kuitika munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika mushure mekongiresi yeZanu PF, vechidiki vebato reMDC-T vanoti vanoshora zvikuru chimwe chezvisungo zvakabuda pamusangano uyu chekuti chirongwa cheNational Youth Service chidzorwe munyika. No media source currently available Vachitaura neStudio 7 muGweru mutauriri weboka revechidiki vebato reMDC-T, VaBrian Dube, vanoti bato ravo rinoshora uye rinopokana zvikuru nekurudziro yebato reZanu PF rekuti chirongwa cheNational Youth Service chidzoserwe munyika. Chirongwa ichi chinodzidzisa vechidiki vanenge vapedza chikoro zvidzidzo zvakasiyana-siyana kusanganisira zvekushanda nemaoko. Izvi zvakataurwa nemunyori wevechidiki mubato reZanu, VaAbsolom Sikhosana, avo vakati vechidiki vebato iri vanoda kuti chirongwa cheNational Youth Service chidzorwe nekukasika, izvo zvakazoita kuti chizoitwa chimwe chezvisungo zvakabuda. Asi VaDube vanoti chinhu chinoshamisa kuti bato reZanu PF rinoda kukoshesa chirongwa ichi nezvimwe izvo vanoti hazvibatsire kuti vechidiki vawane mari yedzidzo kana kuti vawane mabasa. Vanotiwo izvi hazviburitse nyika mumatambudziko ayakatarisana nawo. Asi mudzidzisi wezvebudiriro paZimbabwe Open University vachitaura semuongorori wezvematongerwo enyika akazvimirira ega, Va Didymus Dewa, vanoti havana chavanoona chakaipa pakuti chirongwa cheNational Youth Service chidzorwe asi vanoti chirongwa ichi chinofanirwa kudzidzisa vechidiki zvinhu zvine chekuita nebato rimwe chete rezvematongerwo enyika. VaDube vanoti vanoshorawo nyaya yakakurudzirwawo pakongiresi apa yekuti nhengo dzebato reZanu PF dzive idzo dzinopiwa mukana wekuwana mabasa mumakambani ehurumende. Vanoti nyaya yekuti vanhu vanopiwa mabasa nekuda kwekuti vabuda mumba maani ndiyo yauraya makambani ehurumende akawanda vakatiwo vanhu vanofanirwa kupiwa mabasa nekuda kweruzivo kana hunyanzvi hwavo kwete kuti vanotsigira bato ripi. Asi VaDewa vanoti sezvo Zanu PF riri bato riri kutonga, rinodawo kuti riitire vatsigiri varo zvakanaka. VaDube vatorawo mukana uyu kushora nyaya yekugoverwa kwemari yavati ishoma kuhomwe yevechidiki vari kuita zvidzidzo zvepamusoro soro vachiti chirongwa chePresidential Scholarship Scheme chinofanirwa kuvharwa mari inoshandiswa muchirongwa ichi yobatsira kuti vechidiki vawane dzidzo yepamusoro muno munyika. Chirongwa cheNational Youth Service chakatangwa mugore ra2001 chikazomiswa nekuda kwekushaikwa kwemari. Chirongwa ichi chaishorwa nevanhu vakawanda sezvo vechidiki vaipinda machiri avo vaideedzwa nezita remadunhurirwa rekuti maGreen Bomber vaionekwa sevanhu vaishandiswa nebato reZanu PF mukutyisidzira avo vaisatsigira bato iri.
title: MDC-T Inoti Kwete kuChirongwa cheNational Youth Service

text: Vamwe varimi kuMashonaland West vari kupinda mumishandirapamwe nevarimi vachena nenzira yekuedza kusimudzira goho uye kuti vawanewo chouviri sezvo vasina zvikwanisiro. Vaimbova mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vaiwanzotaura pamisangano kuti havaida kuti vachena vainge vatorerwa mapurazi vadzoke vachiita mishandirapamwe nevatema vainge vapihwa mapurazi. Asi VaMugabe vaitenedera hazvo zvimwe zvibvumirano nevachena vakaita saVaBilly Rautenbach veGreenfuel kuChisumbanje uye vamwe vachena uye vamwe vekuChina kuminda yakawanda yeARDA. Vanhu vekuChina vakawanda vari kurima fodya vachishanda nekambani inonzi Tianze. Asi hurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa yakabuda pachena musi wa 28 Chikumi gore rapera kuti yaitsigira kuitwa kwemishandirapamwe iyi. Varimi vachena vakawanda vari kuita mishandirapamwe munyika sezvakabuda muchiitiko chakaitwa pama purazi maviri anoti reSummer Hill neWamambo kuMhangura neMugovera. Asi gurukota rinoona nezvedunhu reMashonaland West Amai Mary Mliswa-Chikoka vachitaura pachiitiko ichi vakati zvibvumirano zvekurima nevarungu zvinofanira kunyoreranwa kumahofisi ebazi rezvekurima. Amai Mliswa-Chikoka vakati varimi vanoti mumiriri weMakonde mudare reparamende VaKindness Paradza, Muzvare Noma Mliswa pamwe nemakambani anoti Marvellous Stewart Farming-MSF neSansaveria vari kushanda zvakanaka pamwechete. Muzvare Noma Mliswa vanove mukoma waAmai Mliswa-Chikoka vanoti kushanda nevarungu hazvireve kuti mutengesi wechirongwa chekugoverwa kweivhu ku vanhu vatema sezvinofunga vakawanda. Vanotiwo vamwe varimi vakagariswa patsva vanongotaurisa vasina zvavanorima muminda. Mukuru wekambani iri kurima nevarimi ava VaBarry Stewart avo vakarima chibage nebhinzi vanoti vari kufara negoho ravo uye kukwanisa kuwanisa vanhu mabasa vanosvika mazana matatu. VaStewart vanoti havana hurongwa hwekuwedzera varimi vatema vavari kushanda navo sezvo zvinhu zvisina kumira zvakanaka munyaya dzezvehupfumi. VaParadza vanoti kuita mushandirapamwe nevarimi vechichena hazvireve kuti vatadza asi hurongwa hwehurumende hunoita kuti ivo vazosara vaine zvikwanisiro zvekurimisa kana mubatanidzwa uyu wapera mumakore mashanu ari kutevera. Ongororo yakaitwa neStudio 7 inoratidza kuti varimi vakawanda vari kurimirwa nevarimi vechichena ivo vachizopihwa zvikamu gumi kubva muzana pane zvinenge zvakohwewa pagore. Munyarikani mukuru pachiitiko ichi aive mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvekurima VaVangelis Haritatos vakati bazi razo rinocherechedza basa riri kuitwa nemadzimai mukurima vachiti vanofanirwa kuwaniswa minda yavo vega. No media source currently available
title: Varimi Vatema VekuMashonaland West Voita Mushandirapamwe neVachena

text: Vanhu vanobva kuZimbabwe vari kudzidza muzvikoro zvepamusoro soro muSouth Africa, vanoti mamiriro akaita zvinhu kumusha ari kuita kuti vafunge kaviri pakudzokera kumusha kana vachinge vapedza zvidzidzo zvavo. Vadzidzi vakawanda vanoti havana tarisiro yekudzokera kumusha kana vachinge vapedza zvidzidzo zvavo nekuda kwezvikonzero zvinosanganisira kusagadzikana kwehupfumi, izvo zviri kuita kuti munyika musave nemabasa, pamwe nenyaya dzezvematongewo enyika dziri kukonzera mhirizhonga. VaTrust Matsilele, avo vachangobva kupedza zvidzidzo zvepamusoro soro, vanoti havaone vachidzokera kundoshanda kumusha nekuda kwekuti hapana makambani angavape basa kuZimbabwe. Mumwe mudzidzi munyaya dzekutakurwa kwezvinhu, VaEddie Muchatuta, vanoti havasi kuzodzokera kumusha sezvo vave nemhuri yavo yakurera nekutora vari muSouth Africa, sezvo kumusha kusina kumira zvakanaka. Mumwe mudzidzi munyaya dzebudiriro, Muzvare Thobie Sibindi, vanoti vari kuronga kuti vandoshanda munyika dzemuAfrica, asi kwete muZimbabwe. Muzvare Loveness Gotora, avo vari kudzidzira kuve mukoti, vanotiwo dzambudziko guru richaita kuti vasadzokera kumusha inyaya dzezvematongerwe enyika nekushaikwa kwemabasa. Mudzidzisi paTswana University of Technology, Doctor Ricky Mukonza, vanoti vanowirirana nematanho ari kutorwa nevadzidzi ava, sezvo zvinhu zvisina kumira zvakanaka muZimbabwe. VaMukonza vanoti Zimbabwe iri kurasikirwa zvikuru nevanhu vane ruzivo rwunogona kushandiswa mukusimudzira nyika. Ongororo dzakaitwa dzinoratidza kuti kune zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinodarika zviuru makumi maviri zviri kudzidza muSouth Africa, uye vazhinji vazvo havasi kudzokera kuZimbabwe mushure mekupedza zvidzidzo zvavo. No media source currently available
title: Vari Kudzidza Kunze kweNyika Votya Kudzoka Kumusha

text: Gavhuna weReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, Doctor John Mangudya varamba kuti kutadza kupa makambani mari yekunze pamusika weRBZ Foreign Currency Auction nechimbi chimbi ndiko kuri kukudza musika wemukoto kana kuti "parallel market" vachiti makambani anotengesa kana kuitira hurumende basa ndiwo anotenga mari pamusika uyu. Vachitsangura mashandiro ari kuita musika weForeign Currency Auction System, kukomiti yeparamende inoona nezvebhajeti, VaMangudya vati nenyaya yekuti hurumende inonoka kubhadhara makambi anoitengesera zvinhu, anoisa mutero wakakura kana kuti Forward Pricing pachirungu. Vatiwo paanozobhadharwa anobva aenda pamusika wemukoto kunotenga mari yekunze achiti anenge achida kuchengetedza hupfumi hwavo sezvo dhora rekuAmerica rakadzikama mutengo pane remunyika. Vati nekuda kwaizvozvo hurumende inofanira kutarisisa matengero nenzira dzainoshandisa kubhadhara makambani aya. Vaenderera mberi vachitiwo kana veruzhinji vanoda kuchengeta mari yavo ari madhora ekuAmeria nekudaro ndivo vamwewo vari kuenda kuniotenga mari iyi pamukoto. Doctor Mangudya vati hazvigoni kuti makambani anenge akamirira kupihwa mari dzekuAmerica dzaanenge atenga paAuction aende pamusika mutema nekuti anobva atotorerwa madhora avo emunyika anenge ari mumabhanga. Asi mutungamiriri wesangano rinomirira vemabhizimisi reZimbabwe National Chamber of Commerce, VaMike Kamungeremu, vaudza komiti iyi kuti zviri kuitwa neRBZ zvekutadza kupa makambani mari paAuction nenguva zvauraya mabhizimisi akawanda uye ndizvo zvinoita kuti mamwe makambani apedzesera aenda kunotenga mari pamusika wemukoto izvo zvinozokwidza mitengo yezvinhu. Semuenzaniso vati pane mamwe makambani akamirira kupihwa mari yaakatenga paAuction muna Kukadzi gore rino. VaKamungeremu vatiwo vanoona sekuti mutengo wemari paAuction uri pasi pemutengo chaiwo wemari yekunze. Zvinofungidzirwa kuti RBZ ine chikwereti chemamiriyoni mazana matatu kune makambani akatenga mari pamusika wayo asi VaMangudya vati chikwereti chavanacho ndechemamiriyoni makumi manomwe nemashanu uye vavambisa kuti vachange vabhadhara mari iyi kupera kwemwedzi uno. Vabvumawo kuti pakakanganiswa vakati mune remangwana vachaona kuti izvi hazviitike zvakare. Svondo rapfuura paRBZ Auction, dhora rekuAmerica raitengwa nemaRTGS mazana matatu nemakumi masere uye pamusika mutema raitengwa nemari inodarika maRTGS mazana mashanu. Nhengo dzekomiti iyi dzakaita saVaEnergy Mutodi veZanu PF, VaRusty Markham naVaWillasa Madzimure veCitizens Coalition for Change varatidza kusafarawo nenyaya yekuti mari yemuno iri kuramba ichishaiwa simba uyewo nekuti hurumende iri kubhadharisa mimwe mitero nemari yekunze. Vatiwo izvi zvinoratidza kuti hurumende pachayo haina chivimbo nemari yayo vachiti mari yemuno yave pedyo kurambwa nevanhu nezvakaitika muna 2009. Asi VaMangudya vati ishuviro reRBZ kuti mitero yese ibhadharwe nemari yemuno. VaMangudya naVaKamungeremu vanobvumirana kuti Zimbabwe haina mari inokwana kuti ishandise madhora ekuAmerica. Vatiwo vari kuedza zvese zvavanokwanisa kugadzirisa zvinhu asi vakati chinonyanyonesta inyaya yekuti veruzhinji havachina chivimbo nemari yemuno. No media source currently available
title: VaMangudya Vonakurira Vamwe Nyoka Mhenyu paNyaya yeMari Iri Kutengeswa paMukoto

text: Vamwe vana muzvinabhizinesi vari kushora zvikuru hurumende nekubudisa mazita evanhu nemakambani anonzi akabudisa mari kunze kwenyika zvisiri pamutemo vachiti hurumende haina kuita tsvakiridzo yakakwana sezvo vamwe vane mazita akabudiswa vasina mhosva dzavakapara. Izvi zvabuda pamusangano wakokerwa neZimbabwe National Chamber of Commerce neChina muHarare vamwe vemabhizimusi vachiti vakasvibiswa mazita avo zvakanyanya nehurumende izvo zvokanganisa mabhizimusi avo. Mukuru weGlobal Solar LED Bulbs, VaJeffree Rugare, vati vakatoshamiswa vachiona kambani yavo yakanyorwa pavanhu vanonzi vakabuditsa mari asi ivo vachizvichenura panyaya iyi. VaRugare vaudza musangano uyu kuti chinonyanyovarwadza ndechekuti izvi zvakasvibisa kambani yavo kunyange hazvo vachiti hazvina chokwadi mukati. Mukuru weZNCC, VaChristopher Mugaga, vatiwo shuviro yavo ndeyekuti zvabuda mumusangano wavaita zvisvike kumutungamiri wenyika kuti azive kuti vamwe vevari kupomerwa kubudisa mari zvisiri pamutemo vakachena panyaya idzi. VaMugaga vatiwo mabhizimusi ari kunyunyutawo zvikuru achiti hurumende inenge iri kukoshesa mabhizimusi ekunze ichitsikirira vemabhizimusi emuZimbabwe. Mutevedzeri wegurukota rinoona nezvemari, VaTerence Mukupe,vati hurumende yakaita zvayaifunga kuti ndozvingabatsira nyika. VaMukupe vati vose vari kuti vakachena vanofanirwa kutora matanho ekuratidza humbowo hwekuti havana mhosva. Vachipindura kunyaya iri kupomerwa hurumende yaVaMnangagwa yekuti vanhu vakabudisa mari zhinji huye vachizivikanwa munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika havana kunyorwa mazita avo, VaMukupe vati vanhu vane ruzivo nezvevamwe vakabudisa mari ngavazivise hutungamiriri pamwe nemapurisa. Gweta rine mukurumbira munyika, VaTendai Biti, vatiwo mutemo yenyika haina kugadziriswa zvakakwana kuti ubate vanobudisa mari, uye vakurudzira kuti kunyatsonyorwa mutemo unobata vanobudisa mari. Vemabhizimusi vatiwo hapana tsananguro yakazara inoratidza kuti chinonzi externalization yemari chii huye chii chinonzi nehurumende “Illicit Financial Flows.” No media source currently available
title: Mamwe Makambani Ozorwa Mafuta eNguruve Yaasina Kudya paNyaya yeKuburitswa kweMari Kunze kweNyika

text: Zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinogara nekushanda kunze kwenyika zvinoti zvatotanga kutumira zvekudya nezvekushandisa zuva nezuva kumusha kuedza kubatsira hama neshamwari vave kutatarika kuti vakwanise kurarama zuva nezuva nekuda kwekukwira kwemitengo pamwe nekushaikwa kwezvinhu munyika. Mutungamiri wesangano revanorarama nekutengesa zvinhu kunze kwenyika, reInternational Cross Border Traders’ Association, VaDenis Juru, vanoti vanhu vakawanda muSouth Africa vave kutumira zvinhu zvakaita sechikafu nemari kumusha vachishandisa vemabhazi nevemichovha. VaJuru vanoti vave kuonawo zvakare kukwira kwehuwandu hwevanhu vari kuyambuka miganho yenyika zviri pamutemo kana zvisiri pamutemo vachipinda munyika dzakapoteredza Zimbabwe vachinotsvaga mabasa. Zvinhu zvakawanda munyika hazvichawanikwe muzvitoro uye mitengo yazvo yakwira zvakanyanya. Vezvitoro vari kupa zvikonzero zvekuti vari kunetseka kuwana mari yekunze yavanoda kuti vakwanise kutenga nekupinza zvavanotengesa munyika. No media source currently available
title: Vari Kunze Vowedzera Huwandu hweZvinhu Zvavanotumira Kubatsira Vari Kumusha

text: Vanhu vekuChipinge nenzvimbo dzakapoteredza dunhu iri vapindwa nekutya kukuru mangwanani eMugovera zvichitevera kundengendeka kwaitika munzvimbo iyi. Zvinonzi kundengendeka uku kwavhiringa dzimba dzakawanda, uye kwange kuine mutsindo we5.5 magnitude. Kundengendeka uku kunonzi kwanzwikwawo muHarare, Masvingo Mutare, kusanganisirawo nenzvimbo dzemu Mozambique. Mutauriri we Meteorological Service Department, VaRich Zinyemba, vanoti vachiri kuongorora kuti kundengendeka uku kwavhiringa zvakadii nzvimbo iyi. Asi mudzviti wedunhu reChipinge, VaWilliam Mashava, vaudza Studio 7 kuti havasati vanzwa kufa kana kukuvara kana kuparadzwa kwezvinhu. VaMashaya vanoti vaendesa mashoko kwese kwese kuti vanhu vakurumidze kuvaudza kana paine zvavhiringwa nekundengendeka uku. No media source currently available Mumwe wevagari venzvimbo iyi, VaLuke Mhlanga, avo vanogara mudunhu raIshe Musikavanhu vanoti vange vari mumunda patanga kundengendeka uku. Vanotiwo vabata muti senzira yekuti vasadonhe pasi pavanzwa kundengendeka uyu. No media source currently available
title: Kundengendeka Kunoparadza Misha kuChipinge

text: Kurwira masimba kuri muZanu PF konanga kuna Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, avo vava kupomerwa mhosva yekuzvidza mudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Grace Mugabe. Zvizvarwa zvekunze, kusanganisira zvemuZimbabwe zviri muSouth Africa, zvopomerwa mhosva dzehumhondi nehumbavha muSouth Africa, izvo zviri kupikiswa nevanorwira kodzero dzevanhu…. Wechidiki wemuZimbabwe, Stephen Vunganai, anosarudzwa kuva sachigaro wavana chipangamazano vechidiki muAfrica vachange vachikurukura kushanduka kwemamiriro ekunze kumusangano uchaitwa kuParis, France, mwedzi unouya. Tichakupai zvabuda mumitambo yeCastle Premier Soccer League nhasi. Muchirongwa cheLiveTalk tiri kutarisa matambudziko akatarisana nevarimi mugadziriro yavo yemwaka wekurima….. Iyi ndiyo misoro yenhau dzedu dzanhasi...munotibata pa 909 am, 4930, kana pa 13860, ne 15460 Kilohertzs pa Shortwave kana paFacebook page yedu yeVOAShona. No media source currently available
title: Misoro yenhau dzanhasi…Chitatu, Mbudzi, 18, 2015

text: Gweta rinoshanda muguta reOntario kuCanada, VaSilas Chekera, vanoti kana zviri mugwaro rinonzi rakaendeswa kumutungamiri wenyika zviri zvechokwadi kuti mukuru wevatongi vematare edzimhosva ari kupindira mukutongwa kwemhosva, panofanirwa kuumbwa komiti yavaongorori yakazvimirira kuitira kuti iferefete nyaya iyi zvakadzama. Kuridziro iyi inotevera danho rakatorwa nevatongi vematare edzimhosva avo vakasvitsa neChitatu gwaro ravo renyunyuto kuna VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vachida kuti zviri kuitwa naVaLuke Malaba, zvimiswe. VaChekera vanoti zvinobuda muongororo iyi zvinobatsira mukusimbaradza chimiro chematare mumaziso everuzhinji, ukuwo zvichiratidza zvinhu zvinofanirwa kugadziriswa mukufambiswa kwematare munyika kuitira kuti vanhu varambe vaine chivimbo nematare edzimhosva muZimbabwe. VaChekera vanoti chinhu chinokosha kuti vanhu vagare vachiziva kuti matare edzimhosva inzvimbo yavanogona kuenda kunobatsirwa pasina zvenatibgerwo enyika zvinopinzwa mukati. Vanoti pasi pemutemo, mutongi wedare redzimhosva anofanirwa kuita basa rake akasununguka pasina anomudza zvekuita. VaChekera vanoti hapafanirwe kumbove nenguva yekuti vanhu vaone sekuti matare edzimhosva anonzwa nyaya achipa mitongo inenge yabva kunze kwedare ravapinda. No media source currently available
title: Mamwe Magweta Okurudzira Kuumbwa kweKomiti Inoferefeta Zviri Kupomerwa VaMalaba

text: Bato reZanu PF rinoti riri kushanda zvikuru nehurumende mukushambadza mashoko pamusoro pedenda reCovid-19 pamwe nenhomba yekudzivirira denda iri, izvo zvarinoti zvave kuitawo kuti huwandu hwevanhu vave kubatwa pamwe nekufa nechirwere ichi hudzikire zvakanyanya. Mukuru anoona nezvekufambiswa kwemashoko muZanu PF, VaTafadzwa Mugwadi, vanoti bato ravo riri kushandisa madandemutande akaita seTwitter neFacebook uyewo dzinhepfenyuro dzakasiyanasiyana mukuendesa dzidziso kuvanhu. VaMugwadi vanotiwo havangati pane kushomeka kwevanhu vari kubaiwa nhomba yeSinopharm yekudzivirira Covid-19, vachiti mitemo inorambidza vanhu kuungana iri kuitawo kuti vanhu vakawanda vasaungana muri kubaiwa nhomba, uyewo kuti veruzhinji havasati vapiwa mukana wekuti vabaiwewo. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano dzinoti hurumende inofanirwa kusimudzira zvakadzama shambadzo nedzidziso pamusoro peCovid-19. Ngatinzweyi vachitaura naJonga Kandemiiri weStudio 7 uyo atanga nekuvabvunza kuti vanoti kudii panyaya yekuti ruzhinji harwusati rwave neruzivo rwakakwana pamusoro peCovid-19. No media source currently available
title: Zanu PF Inoti Iri Kushambadza Zvakakwana Hurongwa hweKubayiwa Nhomba yeCovid-19

text: Vamwe varaidzi varatidzira muHarare neChishanu vachiti vanoda kubhadharwa mari dzemihoro nemari yekunze sezvo vachiti vave kunhonga svosve nemuromo kubudikidza nekusamaira zvakanaka kwehupfumi. Vadzidzisi vari pasi pesangano reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, kana kuti PTUZ, varatidzira muHarare vachiti havasi kufara nemari yavari kutambiriswa nehurumende vachiti mari dzavo dzemihoro dzakafanana nemitero yembwa. Mumwe wevanga vachiratidzira ava, Amai Mikirita Mudangwe, vati vadzidzisi vave vanhu vave kushoreka zvasiyana nemakarekare pavairemekedzwa sezvo vachiti hupenyu hwavave kurarama hwave kuita kunge hwevanhu vasingashande. Amai Mudangwe vati sevadzidzisi havachadzidzisa nemwoyo wese sezvo vari kutambira mari isingakwanise kuraramisa mhuri dzavo. Zvataurwa naAmai Mudangwe zvatsinhirwa naAmai Portia Kaja avo vanove mumwe wevarairidzi varatidzira ava. Amai Kaja vati chimwe chiri kuvarwadza ndechekuti havachakwanise kurapwa kunyange hazvo vachibatirwa mari yekurapwa mwedzi wega-wega nevePublic Service Medical Aid Society, PSMAS. Munyori mukuru muPTUZ, VaRaymond Majongwe, vati varairidzi havasi kufarawo nemari yemutero wezvikamu zviviri kubva muzana uri kubatwa padhora rega-rega kubva pamadhora gumi zvichikwira wakaziviswa negurukota rezvemari, VaMthuli Ncube, masvondo mashoma adarika vachiti mutero uyu uri kuita kuti vadzidzisi vabva vaita nhamo inenge yefodya yechikwepa yekuti uku yakarumwa uku inotsva. Mushure mekusiya magwaro avo enyunyuto kuPSMAS, bazi rezvemari pamwe nebazi rinoona nezvevashandi, VaMajongwe vati vachatora matanho akaomarara kudzamara hurumende yavapa nzeve. Vatiwo vamwe vadzidzisi vatadza kunoratidzira nhasi sezvo hurumende ichinzi yanga yadaidzira misangano muzvikoro zvakawanda panguva yavanga vachifanira kutanga kuratidzira. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rePSMAS, VaNcube pamwe naAmai Sekai Nzenza vanova gurukota rezveshandi pamusoro pezvinyunyutozvevashandi izvi. Zvichakadai, vadzidzisi vekumaruwa vari pasi pesangano reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, kana kuti ARTUZ, vapinda muzuva rechipiri nhasi vachiramwa mabasa vachitiwo vanoda kuwedzerwa mari dzemihoro. Muutungamiri weARTUZ, VaObert Masaraure, vaudza Studio 7 kuti havasi kuzodzora tsvimbo kudzamara hurumende yateerera nhuna dzavo. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura negurukota rezvedzidzo, VaPaul Mavhima, pamwe negurukota rezvemari kuti tinzwe pamire hurumende panyaya iyi. Asi VaMavhima vakaudza vakuru vezvikoro kumusangano wakaitirwa kuVictoria Falls masvondo matatu adarika kuti homwe yehurumende yakabooka zvekuti hurumende haikwanise kuwedzera vadzidzisi mari pari zvino kudzamara hupfumi hwenyika hwatisimukirei. No media source currently available
title: PTUZ Inosvitsa Nyunyuto Yayo kuHurumende

text: Bato guru rinopikisa munyika reMDC Alliance, rinoti kusungwa kwakaitwa meya veguta reHarare, VaJacob Mafume, kune chekuita nezvematongerwo enyika, uye kuti hurumende yeZanu PF ishandise mukana uyu kupinza komisheni inotungamirira guta iri. VaMafume, vanove kanzura weWard 17, vakasungwa neChitatu vachipomerwa mhosva yekusashandisa hofisi yavo zvisizvo kuburikidza nekutengeswa kwenzvimbo yekuvakira dzimba mumusha weWestlea makare muHarare. Kusungwa kwaVaMafume kunouyawo mushure memasvondo matatu meya veChitungwiza, VaLovemore Maiko, vasungwawo vachipomerwa mhosva yekusashandisa hofisi yavo nemazvo. Muna Gumiguru, mapurisa akasunga makanzura eHarare anodarika makumi maviri achivapomera mhosva yekuita zvehuwori. VaMafume, avo vakagadzwa sameya muna Gunyana mushure mekudzingwa kwevaive meya, VaHerbert Gomba, nebato reMDC-T, vanotarisirwa kumiswa pmberi pedare neChishanu. Asi mutevedzeri wemutauriri vebato reMDC Alliance, VaClifford Hlatywayo, vanoti zvose zviri kuitika izvi zvekushungurudza makanzura avo pamwe nevamwe vakuru vebato zvakanangana nekuda kuparadza bato ravo. VaHlatywayo vanoti chiri kudiwa neZanu PF kuumbwa kwemakomisheni anenge achizotungamirira maguta nemadhorobha ari pasi pebato ravo nechinangwa chekuti Zanu PF ive nemasimba mumaguta, umo vanoti iri kutatarika kuwana rutsigiro. Asi nhengo yeZanu PF, VaGilbert Muponda, vanoti vanoshushikana nemafungiro ebato reMDC Alliance, iro ravanoti riri kumhanyira kumiririra vanhu vari kupomerwa mhosva nekungoti inhengo dzaro zvisineyi nekuti vanhu ava vanenge vakapara mhosva. VaMuponda vanoti bato rinopikisa iri rinofanirwa kusiya mutemo wotora gwara rawo, vari kupomerwa mhosva ava vomira pamberi pematare vochenurwa kana kuwanikwa nematare vaine mhosva. Vanoti hurumende haitarise munhu kumeso panyaya dzehuwori, sezvo kana nhengo dzeZanu PF kusanganisira makurukota vari kusungwawo vachimiswa pamberi pematare nenyaya dzehuwori. No media source currently available
title: MDC Alliance Inoti Kusungwa kwaMeya Mafume Kune Chekuita nezveMatongerwo eNyika

text: Mamwe emapato anopikisa hurumende yeZanu PF anoti haasi kufara nekukanganisa mashandiro emapurisa kunonzi kuri kuitwa nemutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaPhelekezela Mphoko, avo vanonzi vakafurufusha mapurisa pakamba yeBulawayo Central nezuro vachida kuti dzimwe nhengo dzeZanu PF dzakasungwa dziburitswe muhusungwa zvichitevera mhirizhonga yakaita mubato reZanu PF kuBulawayo kwakare pakupera nemusi weSvondo. Bepanhau reNewsday raburitsa mashoko ekuti VaMphoko vakasvika pakamba yeBulawayo Central apo pakachengetedzwa nhengo dzebato reZanu PF dzakasungwa mushure memhirizhonga inonzi yakaitika nemusi weSvondo pamahofisi ebato iri paDavis Hall muBulawayo makare. Zvinonzi nhengo dzeZanu PF dzakasungwa idzi dziri kuchikwata cheGeneration 40 icho chiri kukwikwidzana necheTeam Lacoste pamujawu wekuzotora matomhu kumutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, kana vachinge vabva pachigaro. Mhirizhonga yakaitika iyi inonzi yakasiya vanhu vaviri vakuvara zvakaipisisa uye inonzi yakakonzerwa nemakakatanwa ari muZanu PF panyaya yekuda kubvisa murongi wemisangano mubato iri, VaSaviour Kasukuwere, kuri kuitwa nevamwe vari mubato iri. VaKasukuwere vari kupomerwa mhosva yekuronga zvekubvisa VaMugabe pachigaro asi vari kuramba mhosva iyi vachiti vakarembera pabhachi raVaMugabe. VaMphoko vanonzi vakasvika pakamba yemapurisa yeBulawayo Central ndokufurufusha mukuru wemapurisa pakamba iyi vachida kuti vanhu ava vasunungurwe. Zvakaitwa naVaMphoko izvi zvashorwa neMDC inotungamirirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai. Munyori anowona nezvinoitika mukati menyika muMDC-T, Amai Lilian Timveos, vati zvakaitwa naVaMphoko izvi zvinoita kuti mapurisa asaite basa rawo akasununguka. Zvataurwa naAmai Timveos zvatsinhirwa naVaGift Nyandoro vanove mutauriri wevakafanobata chigaro chemutungamiri webato reNational People’s Party, Amai Joice Mujuru. VaNyandoro vati zvakaitwa naVaMphoko zvinotyora bumbiro remitemo yenyika iro rinoti mapazi ehurumende anofanira kushanda pasina kupindira kwehutungamiri hwenyika. Zvichakadai, Amai Timveos vati sebato, MDC-T ichakwidza nyaya iyi kumatare edzimhosva pamwe nekudare reparamende. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika uye vachishanda vakazvimirira, VaSydney Chisi, vanoti zvave pachena kuti hutungamiri hweZanu PF hauzofe hwakatevedzera mitemo yenyika uye mitemo iyi haizoshandiswa zvakaenzana pakati pevari muZanu PF nemapato anopikisa. Aka hakasi kekutanga kuti VaMphoko vaende kumapurisa vachida kuburitsa vasungwa. Gore rapera, VaMphoko vakaenda kukamba yeAvondale muHarare kwavanonzi vakaburitsisa vakuru-vakuru vekambani yehurumende inowona nezvemigwagwa ye Zimbabwe National Road Authority, kana kuti Zinara, avo vakange vasungiswa nekomisheni inorwisana nehuori yeZimbabwe Anti Corruption Commission vachipomerwa mhosva yehuori hwemari yaisvika miriyoni imwechete yemadhora. Nyaya iyi yakazongotsikwa-tsikwa ikapera. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kuna VaMphoko kana kuZanu PF kuti tinzwe divi ravo. No media source currently available
title: Mapato Anopikisa Oshora VaMphoko

text: Nhengo yebato reMDC inotungamirirwa naVaDouglas Mwonzora, VaNorest Marara, vakakwira kudare repamusoro reHigh Court nemusi weChina vachida kuti dare iri rinzwe nekukasika kupikisa kwavo kudomwa kwaVaMwonzora semunhu achamirira bato iri musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika. VaMarara vanoti vari kupikisa kudomwa kwakaitwa VaMwonzora neNational Council yebato ravo pasina akavapikisa mwedzi wapera pamberi pekongiresi yebato iri iyo iri kutarisirwa kuitwa mwedzi uno. Vanoti bumbiro remitemo yebato reMDC haina kuteverwa uye pakave nekutyisidzirwa kwevanhu vakaisarudza. No media source currently available Asi mutauriri waVaMwonzora, VaLloyd Damba, vanoti VaMarara munhu mutsva mubato reMDC nekudaro havazive mashandiro anoita bumbiro remitemo yebato. Vanoti havasi kuzoshaiswa hope nedanho raVaMarara iri vachiti vakagadzirira zvakasimba uye vakagadzirira kumisidzana navo kumatare. No media source currently available
title: Nhengo yeMDC, VaMarara, Vanoenda kuDare Vachipikisa Kudomwa kwaVaMwonzora seMunhu Achamirira Bato Iri muSarudzo Gore Rinouya

text: Dare revanhu vatatu, kana kuti Tribunal, rekutonga mutongi wedare repamusoro, Justice Erica Ndewere, rakatanga nezuro mangwanani kuzeya nyaya iyi. Dare iri riri kutungamirwa nevaimbove mutongi wedare repamusoro, Justice Simbi Mubako. Justice Ndewere vari kupomerwa mhosva yekukundikana kuita basa. Asi Amai Ndewere, avo vari kumiririrwa negweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu, Amai Beatrice Mtetwa, nezuro vakatanga nekupomera mukuru wevatongi vematare, Justice Luke Malaba, mhosva yekutyora kodzero dzavo mushure mekunge varamba kutevedzera zvavanoti zvaityora bumbiro remitemo renyika zvavainzi vaite naVaMalaba. Asi vachitaura mudare reparamende, gurukota rezvemutemo, VaZiyambi Ziyambi, vakaramba mashoko ekuti VaMalaba vari kupindira munyaya dzekutongwa kwenyaya munyika vachiti bumbiro remutemo rinoti matare akazvimirira. Mukuzeya nyaya iyi, Blessing Zulu weStudio 7 abata gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu vachitungamira sangano reHuman Rights Watch VaDewa Mavhinga kuti tinzwe nezvedare riri kutonga Amai Ndewere iri. No media source currently available
title: Dare raVaMubako Ronzwa Nyaya Iri Kupomerwa Amai Ndewere

text: Mukuru wesangano revatungamiri vemabhizimisi kana kuti CEO Africa Roundtable, VaOswell Binha, vanoti dambudziko rekushomeka kwemafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari rave kukanganisa zvakanyanya nyaya dzekuita mabhizimisi sezvo vave kupedza nguva yakawandisa vachitsvaga mafuta kumagaraji. Vedzimotokari vataura neStudio7 vati havasi kubvumidzwa kutenga mafuta edzimotokari akawanda panguva imwe chete. Vamwe vapomerawo vemagarajia nyaya yekuita zvehuori nekuda chiokomuhomwe. Gurukota rezvemhando dzemoto, Doctor Joram Gumbo, vanoti bazi ravo riri kutatarika kuwana mari yekunze kubva kubhanga guru renyika kuti vatenge mafuta aya. Gavhuna weRBZ, VaJohn Mangudya, vanotiwo mari yacho yawandirwa sezvo pachidawo kutengwa zvimwe zvakaita semishonga yemuzvipatara nezvimwe asi muhomwe yehurumende iri nhava izere mhepo.
title: Kushomeka KweMafuta eKufambisa Dzimotokari Kwokanganisa Nyaya dzezveHupfumi

text: Mumiriri weMakonde mudare reparamende uye vari nhengo yeZanu PF, VaKindness Paradza, vanoti sezvo nguva yezororo reKisimusi iri nguva yekupa, ivo vaita saizvozvo kuburikidza nekugovera mupunga kuvanhu vemudunhu ravo kuti vawane chekudya nemhuri dzavo pazororo. VaParadza vanoti kunyange hazvo zvinhu zvanga zvakaoma gore rino, ivo semumiriri wevanhu, vakaedza kuona kuti vawaka makirinika, zvikoro pamwe nezvibhorani mudunhu ravo kuitira kuti vanhu varerukirwe nehupenyu. Vanoti gore rinouya vanoona sekunge richange rakarerukira vanhu kana mvura yakanaya zvakanaka sezvavari kutarisira. VaParadza vanotiwo gore rinouya vachange vaine basa rekuita sezvo vatove nemari yebudiriro yematunhu, yeConstituency Development Fund (CDF). "Ndinenge ndichida kuti muMakonde muno umu tibudirire kuti tienzanewo nemamwe ma constituency ari kune dzimwe nzvimbo dzakabudirira," vanodaro VaParadza. VaParadza, avo vaimbove mutori wenhau, vanoti chinhu chikuru chavari kukurudzira mudunhu ravo gore rinouya kubatana. "Gore rino riri kuuya ndinoti kubatana muMakonde, ngatiwiriraneyi, ngatibatsiraneyi. Ma project akawanda anobatsira vechidiki atiinawo." No media source currently available
title: Mumiriri weMakonde, VaParadza Vanorangarira Vavanomirira paZuva reKisimusi

text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabevanovhura zviri pamutemo chikamu chechina cheparamende yechisere, panguva imwecheteyo nhengo dzeparamnende dzemapato anopikisa dzichinzi dziri kutumirwa mashoko erufu. Mutungamiri webato reZimbabwe People First Amai Joice Mujuru vanobvuma kubhadhara VaGuy Watson Smith, murumi wechichena avakatorera purazi rake reAlmein muna 2001. Nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika dzozeya nezvekuvhurwa kweparamende nemutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe. Vagari vekwaChiadzwa kuManicaland vochira hutano hwavo zvichitevera guruva rinonzi riri kumbumurwa mumisha yavo nekambani yeZimbabwe Consolidated Diamond Company. Muchirongwa che LiveTalk Women’s Roundtable nhasi na 8:00pm tiri kutarisa nezve chirongwa cheUnited Nations che He for She, icho chinokurudzira kuti pave nemikana yakaenzana pakati pevanhurume nevanhukadzi. Kana muchida kupinda muchirongwa ichi, kanawo kutumira mashoko kustudio7, shandisai whatsapp panhamba dzinoti 001 202 465 0318. Vanoda kuteerera studio7, tibateyi na 7pm pamasaisai anoti 909 am ne 4930 kilohertz pa shortwave. Musakanganwa kutifarira pafacebook peji redu nekudzvinya pakanzi like. No media source currently available
title: Misoro yeNhau, China, Gumiguru 06, 2016

text: Murairidzi wechikwata cheNgezi Platinum iyo yakashura mare nekurova FC Platinum 3-1 neMugovera VaTonderai Ndiraya vanoti chidokwadokwa chekuda kunotamba mumakwikwi emuAfrica ndizvo ndicho chakapa kuti vakomana vechikwata chavo vatambe nesimba vachibva vasimudza mukombe weChibuku Super Cup. Uyu ndiwo mukombe wekutanga wasimudzwa naVaNdiraya semurairidzi kubva zvavatanga basa iri mushure mekumbotambira chikwata chine mukurumbira munyika cheDynamos. VaNdiraya vanoti vari kunzwa kufara zvikuru nezvakaitwa nechikwata chavo. Sachigaro weNgezi Platinum Stars VaJeremiah Getiseni vanoti zvaitwa nechikwata chavo zvinhu zvinofadza mhuri yese yeNgezi. Mutambi weNgezi Platinum Stars Donald Teguru anoti ari kufara zvikuru sezvo kari kekutanga muhupenyu hwake kutora mukombe mukuru wakadai. VaNdiraya vanoti vakagara pasi vakatarisa matambiro eFC Platinum ndokuirongera kuti vangairove sei. Vanoti nyaya yekuda kupinda mumamwikwi eConfederation Cup yakaita kuti vatambi vavo vatambe zvine mutsindo. Mukutora mukombe uyu, Ngezi Platinum Stars yave chikwata chechitatu munhoroondo yenhabvu muZimbabwe kutora mukombe mukuru gore iro vapinda muPremier Soccer League. Zvimwe zvikwata zvakaita izvi iBlackpool iyo yakatora mukombe weZifa Cup muna 1994 neShabanie Mine iyo yakatora mukombe weBP League Cup muna 2011 vachingobva muDivision One. VeNgezi Platinum Stars vakatambidza mukombe pamwe nemari inoita iyo zviuru makumi manomwe nezvishanu zvemadhora FC Platinum yakatendwawo nemari inoita iyo zviuru makumi mashanu. Panguva imwecheteyo, chikwata chemaWarriors chakarova Zambia 1-0 mumutambo wehushamwari uyo wakatambwa muNational Sports Stadium mutambo weChibuku final uchangopera. Asi mutambo uyu wakakwezva vanhu vashoma shoma sezvo vatsigiri venhabvu vaingasvike chiuru chimwe chete ndivo vakakwanisa kuona Teenage Hadebe achikanda bhora mumambure. Murairidzi wemaWarriors Kalisto Pasuwa aishandisa mutambo uyu kuona vatambi vaangatore kuisa muchikwata chake chichaenda kuma2017 Africa Cup of Nation ayo achaitirwa muGabon muna Ndira. Mumwe mutambo wekuedzana masimba wemaWarriors uriko musi wa 14 Mbudzi apo varikutamba neTanzania. No media source currently available
title: VaTonderai Ndiraya neNgezi Platinum Vonanga kuMakwikwi eCAF Confederation Cup

text: Dare repamusoro soro re Constitutional Court mangwanani anhasi kuMashonganyika Building muHarare nenguva dza 9,30 riri kutarisirwa kupa mutongo waro panyaya yekuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika zvinokwanisa kuvhota here. Kunyangwe bumbiro remutemo richiti vanokwanisa kuvhota, hurumende iri kupa zvikonzero zvakasiyana siyana kuti sei isingakwanisike kuti vavhote kunyaya nyaya yemari. Nyaya iyi yange yambosendekwa parutivi musi wa 14 Kurume. Vakaendeswa kumatare negweta VaGabriel Shumba veZimbabwe Exiles Forum, vanosanganisa gurukota rezvemiteo, Zimbabwe Electoral Commission nevamwe. Gweta raVaShumba nevamwe vavo vaviri ndiVaThabani Mpofu vanova nhengo yeZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights. Sachigaro weZimbabwe Citizens’ Initiative, VaPromise Sande avo vari muFlorida, America vanoti ikodzero yezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvose zviri munyika kana kunze kuti zvivhote. Vati zvazvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze zviri kutumira mari yakawanda kuZimbabwe. No media source currently available
title: Dare rePamusoro Soro Ropa Nhasi Mutongo weKuti Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe Zviri Kunze Zvingavhote Here

text: Vanhu vanosvika makumi mapfumbamwe nevasere vafa kuChipinge neChimanimani uye kuMasvingo nekuda kwedutumupengo remafashamu emvura nemhepo kana kuti Tropical Cyclone Idai. Vanhu mazana maviri negumi nevanomwe havasi kuzivikanwa kuti vari kupi uye vamwe makumi mana nevaviri vakavharirwa pazvitsuwa. Munyori mukuru mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko VaNick Mangwana vanoti vanhu makumi masere nevanomwe kusvika parizvino. VaMangwana vanoti mvura inenge yambomira kunaya nekudaro vave kusimbisa kubatsira vanhu uye kubatsira mukuvigwa kwevanhu vakarasikirwa nehupenyu. Vatiwo kwave nemauto akawanda nemapurisa ari kubatsira vanhu. Varambawo mashoko ekuti hurumende yakanonoka kubatsira vanhu vachiti hapana ainge awona kuti dambudziko iri richakurai zvakadai. No media source currently available Mutori wenhau weStudio 7, Loirdham Moyo uyo akashanyira nzvimbo dzakawanda dzakawirwa nedambudziko iri kuChimanimani neChipinge. No media source currently available Munyori mukuru weUnited Nations VaAntónio Guterres nemusi weSvondo vakatumirawo mashoko enyaradzo kune vakashaikirwa nehama muZimbabwe. Vanoti vari kunzwa kusuwa kukuru nekurasikirwa kwehupenyu kwevanhu uye kuparadzwa kwemigwagwa nezvivakwa muZimbabwe. United Nations yakazivisawo kuti yave kubatsira Zimbabwe kuburikidza nemapazi ayo ari munyika. United Nations inoti vanhu miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana mashanu vakatarisana nedambudziko guru mu Mozambique, Malawi neZimbabwe nekuda kwedutumupengo iri.
title: Dutumupengo Idai Rouraya Vanhu Makumi Mapfumbamwe neVasere

text: Vanoita mabasa emaoko paGlenview Home Industry vanoti vasara vari pamhene uye vasina chekubata nekuda kwemoto wakapisa zvigadzirwa zvavo nemusi weChipiri. Pashanyirwa nzvimbo iyi neStudio 7 vazhinji vane zvinhu zvakatsva vange vachiratidza kushushukana zvikuru. Mumwe anotengesa zvinhu ati anoda kuzivikanwa nezita rekuti mai Phylis vati vasiiwa vasina chekubata sezvo vanga vachirarama nekuveza nekutengesa vari panzvimbo iyi. VaCharles Mherekiwa vanoti varasikirwa nemari inodarika zviuru makumi maviri nemapfumbamwe uye vanoti aka hakasi kekutanga vachirasikirwa nezvinhu pasina rubatsiro rwavanowana. Mumwe murume asina kuda kudomwa nezita rake audza Studio 7 kuti kutsva kuri kuita panzvimbo iyi kwavekuvatumawo kuti vanobvunzira kumaporofita pamwe nekudzin’anga. Murume uyu ati moto isinganzwisisiki kuti yatanga sei yawanda panzvimbo iyi. Zvinonzi chimwe chipandiko chenzvimbo iyi chakabvira zvakare mumwedzi waMbudzi gore rapera zvinhu zvakawanda zvikaparara. Zvabva Studio 7 panzvimbo iyi zvanga zvisati zvazivikanwa kuti chii chakakonzera moto asiwo kuchipanda chidiki chenzvimbo iyi chisina kutsva vanotengeserapo vanoti vakabirwa zvakanyanya muzhowezhowe yakaitika nezuro vanhu vachiedza kumhanya mhanya kuti vabudise midziyo yavo. Meya weguta reHarare VaHerbert Gomba nemamwe makanzura avo vashanyira nzvimbo iyi nhasi vachida kunzwisisa kuti chii chiri kukonzera moto iyi. No media source currently available
title: Vane Musika paGlenview Home Industry Votemwa Musoro neKutsva KweZvinhu Zvavo

text: Sachigaro wevechidiki mudunhu iri, VaRabson Manzunzu, vakatiwo vanhu vakaenda kumusangano weMDC vachapfurwa nepfuti. Vatungamirir veZanu PF kuGutu South pamwe chete naIshe Makore vanoti munhu achaonekwa achienda kumisangano ye MDC mudunhu iri achaurayiwa neZanu PF. Vagari vemu ward 27 ne 28 vakadaidzwa kumusangano musi weChipiri uyo vakaudzwa kuti vakaonekwa vachienda kumisangano yeMDC vachaurayiwa. Izvi zvinotevera musangano wakaitwa nemutungamiri weMDC, VaMorgan Tsvangirai, mudunhu iri nemusi weMugovera. Vatungamiri veZanu PF vakashandisa Mambo Makore, Va Jestias Muzenda, kuudza masabhuku anopfuura makumi matatu kuti vauye kumusangano nevanhu vavo vose. Pamusangano wakaitwa pa Chaitemura mu ward 27, paiimbwa nziyo nekuitwa ma sirogani eZanu PF, vanhu vachiudzwa kuti vachafa, uye vakaenda kumusangano we MDC wachinzi vachaurayiwa. Sachigaro we Zanu PF anoona nezvana mujibha nana chimbwido muzvimbo iyi, VaJeseph Musasiwa, avo vanozivikana nerekuti komuredhi Fodho, vakati pachafiwa nekudeuka kweropa kuvanhu vose vakaenda kumusangano waVaTsvangirai. Sachigaro wevechidiki mudunhu iri, VaRabson Manzunzu, vakatiwo vanhu vakaenda kumusangano weMDC vachapfurwa nepfuti. Vakatiwo vanhu vanobva pamusangano weZanu PF usati wapera, vacharangwawo zvakare. Vakati Zanu PF ichadzinga masabhuku ose anotsigira MDC uye vanoenda kumisangano yebato iri. Mambo Makore vakati vari kurwadzikana nevanhu vavo vakaenda kumusangano waVa Tsvangirai vakati havachabvumidzi misangano ye MDC mudunhu ravo. Ishe ava vakabuda pachena vachiti ndeve Zanu PF, nokudaro vanhu vavo vose vanofanira kuita zvinodiwa neZanu PF. Ishe Makore vakatiwo vachadzinga masabhuku pamwe chete nemakanzura eMDCT akasangana naVaTsvangirai vasina kuziviswa saMambo wedunhu iri. Ishe Makore vakapomera Va (first name) Tangemhare mhosva yekutema huni dzekubika doro remusangano uyu vachiti zvaisava pamutemo wavo. Asi VaTangamhare, avo vanovazve sachigaro weMDCT ku Gutu South, vakati Ishe Makore havana simba rekuvadzinga pamwe nekutyikidzira vatsigiri ve musangano wavo. Musangano uyu wakasiya vagari vazhinji vaine kutya sezvo wakavimbisa kudzoka kwe mhirizhonga yezvematongerwe enyika mudunhu iri. No media source currently available
title: Zanu PF Yotyisidzira neRufu Vakapinda Musangano Wakaitwa naVaTsvangirai kwaGutu

text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti munhu mumwe chete akafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 nemusi weMuvhuro zvasiya vafa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kupararira vave zviuru zvishanu nemazana matatu nemakumi matatu nemasere kana kuti 5 338. Vanhu mazana maviri nevatanhatu kana kuti 206 vakabatwa nechirwere ichi zvasiya vabatwa nacho vave zviuru mazana maviri nemakumi maviri nemapfumbamwe zvine mazamatanhatu nemakumi matanhatu nematanhatu kana kuti 229 666. Bazi rezvehutano rinotiwo vanhu vabayiwa nhomba yeCovid-19 kekutanga vave mamiriyoni mana, nemazana maviri nemakumi manomwe nemazana mana nemakumi masere nevatatu kana kuti 4 270 483. Vanhu vabayiwa nhomba kaviri vave mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru mazana maviri nemakumi mapfumbamwe nemapfumbamwe ane mazana matanhatu nemakumi maviri nemasere kana kuti 3 299 628. Vabayiwa nhomba katatu vave zviuru makumi mashanu nematanhatu zvine mazana mana nemakumi mashanu nevasere kana kuti 56 458. Hurunmende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi nhomba kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana kuti inyatsoshanda zvakanaka. Mukuru anoona nezvekudzivirirwa kwedenda iri munyika Dr Agnes Mahomva vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvakakosha kuti vanhu vabayiwe nhomba yeCovid-19 yavanoti yakazara mumatura. Vatiwo vanhu vanofara kutevedzera zvose zvinokurudzirwa kuti chirwere chisapararire zvakaita sekugeza maoko uye kugara vakatarangana.
title: Munhu Mumwe Chete Ofa neChirwere cheCovid-19 Hurumende Ichikurudzira Kubayiwa kweNhomba

text: Varimi vakawanda vanoti vari kutadza kutora mari dzavo mumabhangi izvo zvave kuita kuti vatadze kutenga mbeu kuti vadyare paine nguva sezvo mvura yoturuka. Varimi ava vaudza Studio 7 kuti vari kurara mumitsetse yemabhangi nevavariro yekutora mari yekutenga mbeu nefotoreza asi hapana chavari kuwana sezvo vemabhangi vachiti havana mari. Mumwe mugari wekuKenzamba kuMakonde VaFidelis Chako avo vave nemazuva matatu vachirara pamutsetse webhangi ravo rePOSB vanoti vakawana madhora makumi matatu chete kubvira musiwe Muvhuro. VaChako vanoti mari yavakawana yave kutoperera mukutenga zvekudya muChinhoyi sezvo vasina hama muguta iri. Vanoti kurima kunofambidzana nenguva uye vanotarisira kuti vangadai vatofamba nendima. Mumwe murimi wekuMhangura VaChristopher Pfende vanoti chinonyanya kurwadza inyaya yekuti vemabhangi havasi kuziva kuti mari vachaiwana riini. VaPfende vanoti vave nemazuva matatu vachirara mumutsetse webhangi kuti vawane mari yekutenga mbeu nefotireza. Varimi vari kuchema chemawo kuti mbeu yave kutengeswa nemutengo wakakwirira nekuda kwekuti mvura yaturuka. VaPfende vanotsanangura. Mumwe murimi anoti vave kuzvitengera mbeu yavo vega sezvo mbeu inobva kune mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe iri shoma zvakanyanya. Mutungamiri wenyika anopa vanhu mbeu asi munhu anopihwa 10 kgs chete nefotireza inokwanirana. Varimi vanoti kunyange hazvo vati nonokei kuisa mbeu pasi, vane tarisiro yekuti vachadyara nekukohwa zvekudya zvinovakwanira. VaTonderai Makaya vanoti mwaka wezhizha watanga zvakaipa kuvarimi sezvo vari kurasikirwa nenguva nekuti hapana munhu anoziva kuti mvura ichanaya kusvikira riini. Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyikaVaEmmerson Mngangagwa vane chirongwa chavoc checommand agriculture chavari kupa varimi mbeu nefotereza kuti nyika iumbiridze dura rechibage. Zimbabwe iyo yaizivikanwa sehurudza yemudunhu rekuchamhembe kweAfrica. Asi ikozvino yave kuonekwa senyope yakagarira badza. Vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni mana vanoda chikafu kusvika nyika yakohwa gore rinouya.
title: Varimi Votadza Kutenga Mbeu neKushaya Mari muMabhanga

text: Vadzidzi vanodarika mazana mashanu vari kuita zvidzidzo zvehudhokotera paUniversity of Zimbabwe, avo vakadzingwa neMuvhuro mudzimba dzepachikoro apa, vaendesa mukuru wechikoro ichi, VaLevy Nyagura, kumatare edzimhosva, vachida kuti vabvumidzwe kugara mudzimba dzavakadzingwa idzi. Dare repamusoro rati richanzwa nyaya iyi mangwana. Magwaro asvitswa mudare neChipiri zvechimbi chimbi aitwa nesangano remagweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu, eZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights, akamirira mumwe mudzidzi, Clifford Charera, anobva kwaRusape. Magweta aya ari kuda kuti nyaya iyi inzwikwe zvechimbi chimbi sezvo vadzidzi ava vasina pekugara. Vadzidzi ava vari kugara munzvimbo dzakasiyana-siyana, kusanganisira muchechi, vachibatsirwa nevane tsiye nyoro. Vadzidzi ava vati zvakaitwa nevakuru vepaUZ zvinobudisa pachena kuti havana hany’a nehupenyu hwevadzidzi sezvo vakapiwa nguva shoma shoma yekuti vabude mudzimba dzavo kusanganisira vadzidzi vanogara kunze kweHarare avo vasina kwekuenda. Vamwe vevadzidzi ava vari kunyora bvunzo mangwana. Mumwe wevadzidzi asina kuda kudomwa nezita audza Studio7 kuti vairatidzira zvine runyararo asi vakashamiswa netsamba yekudzingwa kwavo iyo inoti vakaratidzira zvine mhirizhonga. Mumwe mudzidzi ari kurara pane imwe chechi nevamwe vake vanodarika makumi mashanuaudza Studio 7 kuti vave kutobetserwa nevanetsiye nyoro. Mudzidzi uyu ashorawo zvikuru kudzingwa kwavo panguva dzemanheru. Mudzidzi uyu ati sevadzidzi vane kodzero yekuratidzira kana vane zvinyunyuto. Munyori muZimbabwe Students Representative Council, SRC, VaTafadzwa Ponello, vati vadzidzi vanga vakabhadhara mari dzekugara pachikoro vakatiwo kunyange vaedza kumbotaura nevakuru veUZ, hapana chabuda. Vaimbovemutevedzeri wemutungamiriri weSRC, VaZivai Mhetu, vakurudzira hurumende kuti ibatsire vadzidzi ava kuburikidza nekuvabhadharira mari iri kudiwa iyi. VaMhetu vati vadzidzi vazhinji vari kukundikana kuti vabhadhare mari dzechikoro. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kutaura negurukota rezvedzidzo yepamusoro, VaJonathan Moyo, kuti tinzwe pamire bazi ravo panyaya iyi. Asi sachigaro wekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvedzidzo yepamusoro, Doctor Peter Mataruse, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vashamiswa zvikuru nemaitiro evakuru vekuUniversity of Zimbabwe. VaMataruse vati vabereki vazhinji vari kutambura uye hazvina musoro kuti panguva iyo kuwana mari dzechikoro kuri kunetsa vabereki vakawanda, dzokwidziwa. VaMataruse vavimbisa kuti separamende vachange vatora matanho svondo rino risati rapera. No media source currently available
title: Dare Ronzwa neChitatu Nyaya yeVadzidzi Vakadzingwa Mudzimba neMuvhuro paUZ

text: Zimbabwe yacherechedza zuva revanhukadzi pasi rose, reInternational Women’s Day, vanhukadzi vazhinji vachichema-chema nekusazadzikiswa kwebumbiro remitemo munyaya dzekuenzaniswa kwemikana. Mumusangano warongwa neUN Women muHarare, madzimai ataura neStudio7 ati kunyange hazvo vafamba mukurwira kodzero dzavo, kusazadzikiswa kwebumbiro remitemo kunoratidza kuti pachine basa guru rekuti kodzero dzemadzimai dzicherechedzwe munyika. Nhengo yekomisheni inoona nezvekuenzaniswa kwemikana pakati pevanhukadzi nevanhurume, Dr Nyepudzai Mercy Nyangulu, vati vakatarisana nebasa guru rekuona kuti madzimai acherechedzwawo sevatungamiri. Amai Nyangulu vati kunyange hazvo bumbiro remitemo rakanaka, harisi kutevedzerwa. Muzvare Mary Tazvivinga vati vacherechedza zuva revanhukadzi vaine mufaro mukuru nekuda kwekuti madzimai emunyika ari kuratidza kuti ari kusimuka achirwira kuenzaniswa kwemikana. Muzvare Tazvivinga vatiwo semunhukadzi vanodawo kuti madzimai awaniswe mikana yakaenzana nevanhurume yekuwana ivhu pamwe nemari yekutanga mabhizimusi. Munyori mukuru mubato reMDC inotungamirirwa naVaWelshman Ncube, Amai Mirriam Mushayi, vakurudzira nyika kuti ikoshese madzimai. Mumwe mudzimai ari mune zvematongerwo enyika, Amai Priscilla Misihairambwi-Mushonga, vati vanoona sekuti madzimai haana kubatana pamwe chete, zvikuru madzimai echikuru nemadzimai echidiki. Amai Misihairambwi-Mushonga vatiwo chinovafadza pamhemberero dzegore rino inyaya dzesarudzo dzichaitwa. Vati shoko ravo guru nderekuti madzimai avhoterane pazvigaro gore rino. UN Women yapemberera zuva iri pasi pedindingira rekuti “Time is now:Rural and Urban activists transforming women’s lives.” No media source currently available
title: Zimbabwe Inocherechedza Zuva reMadzimai Madzimai Achichema neKusaenzaniswa kweMikana

text: Zimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, yakoka mapato matatu ane humiriri mudare reparamende anoti Zanu PF, MDC inotungamirwa naVaWelshman Ncube, neMDC inotungamirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai, kumusangano wekuzivisana pasvika hurongwa hwegadziriro yesarudzo dza 2018. Musangano uyu uchaitwa nemusi weChina muHarare. Munyori mukuru weMDC T, VaDouglas Mwonzora, vanoti ZEC yakoka vanyori vakuru vemapato matatu aya kuti vazeye nyaya dzinosanganisira dzekuti achatenga michina ichashandiswa pakuchengetwa kwemashoko evanhu vachanyoresa kuvhota ndiani, kudzidziswa kwevanhu maererano nekuvhota uye kwekuvhotera. VaMwonzora vanoti nyaya yekuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika zvibvumidzwe kuvhota musarudzo dzegore rinouya ndeimwe yavachakurukura pamusangano uyu. Musangano uyu uri kuitwa panguva iyo masangano akazvimirira pamwe nemapato ezvematongerwo enyika anopikisa ari kurwisa kuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze zvibvumidzwe kuvhota zviri munyika mazvigere. Masangano aya pamwe nemapato ezvematongerwo enyika ari kukurudzirawo vana veZimbabwe ava kuti kana varambidzwa kuvhota vari munyika dzavari vadzokere kumusha kunonyoresa kuvhota, uye vagozodzokerazve kunovhota, kunyange hazvo izvi zvichida mari yakawanda. No media source currently available
title: ZEC Yokoka Mapato Ane Humiriri Muparamende kuMusangano

text: Mubatanidzwa wemapato anopikisa wePeople’s Rainbow Coalition unotungamirwa naAmai Joyce Mujuru unoti wave kugadzirira kuparura gwaro rezvavanoda kuita vakakunda musarudzo kana kuti election manifesto mumatunhu ose munyika. Asi hurongwa uhu sematauriri emumwe mutauriri webato iri VaJeffreyson Chitando huchatanga kuDotiro, Mashonaland Central nemusi weMugovera. VaChitando vanoti vachazoendawo kuManicaland kwaRimbi kuChipinge, Mataga kuMidlands, Masvingo District, Muchakata, Lupani, Matabeleland North uye Bulawayo. No media source currently available
title: Amai Mujuru Voparura Gwaro Ravo reZvivimbiso zveSarudzo Kana kuti Election Manifesto neMugovera

text: Rimwe sangano rinomirira varimi, reZimbabwe Farmers Union, nemusi weChipiri rakarumbidza chirongwa cheCommand Agriculture, richiti chirongwa ichi chakaita kuti nyika iite goho rakanaka chose mwaka uno, asi rati rino shushikana kuti hapana hurongwa hwekuti chirongwa ichi chichenderera mberi kwenguva yakareba zvakadii. Mukuru weZFU, VaPaul Zakaria, vakaudza maseneta ari mukomiti yezviga zveUnited Nations zvakangangana nenyaya dzebudiriro kana kuti Sustainable Development Goals, kuti varimi vakawanda munyika vainge vaderedza mabasa ekurima nekuda kwekushaya mbeu nefotireza uye chirongwa ichi chakabatsira zvikuru nekuvapa zvikwanisiro izvi. Vati nekuda kwaizvozvo, nyika yakawana goho rakanaka zvikuru zvisati zvambotika kwemakore. VaZakaria vati nyika yakawana goho rino kwana vanhu vese nezvipfuyo pachitosara muraudziro. Vatiwo chimwe chinofadza inyaya yekuti vese vari kutengesa chibage chavo kuGrain Marketing Board vari kubhadharwa nenguva. VaZacharia vataura mashoko aya kunyangwe hazvo vamwe varimi kuMashonaland West vari kuti GMB iri kuramba kutambira chibage chavo vachiti hachina kuoma zvakanaka. VaZakaria vati chirongwa cheCommand Agriculture icho chinotsigira kurimwa kwechibage zvakanyanya chinofanira kutsigirawo kurimwa kwezvirimwa zvakaita sezviyo, mhunga nemapfunde zvikurusei munzvimbo dzakaoma dzakaita seMasvingo neMatabeleland South. Asi kunyange hazvo varumbidza chirongwa cheCommand Agriculture, VaZakaria vati vano shushikana nekuti hapana anoziva kuti hurumende icharamba ichitsigira chirongwa ichi kusvika rini. Uyewo vati chinodiwa kuti mabasa ekurima asimukire munyika kupa varimi mukana wekuti vakwanise kukwereta mari kumabhanga vachitsigira mabasa avo. Vati pari zvino magwaro ari kupihwa vanhu nehurumende, ema99 year Leases haasi kutambirwa sechibatiso nemabhanga izvi zvinoita kuti varimi vatadze kusimudzira mabasa avo. VaZakaria vange vakokwa nemasenta kuti vazotsanagura kuti nyaya yechikafu yakamira sei munyika uyewo vari kuita sei kuona kuti nyika yawana chikafu chakakwana.  Gore rega rega Zimbabwe inoda matani miriyoni nemazana mashanu kuti vanhu vese vawane chikafu asi gore rino nyika ichawana mamiriyioni maviri nemazana mana ezviuru ematani echibage. Hurumende iyo yaishandisa mazana matatu emamiroyoni emadhora kutenga chibage kubva kunze yakaparura chirongwa cheCommanda Agriculture senzira yekupedza nzara munyika pamwe nekuchentedza mari yekunze yaishandiswa kutenga chibage kubva kune dzimwe nyika. Hurumende yakashandisa mazana mashanu emamiriyoni emadhora kutsigira chirongwa ichi mwaka uno uyewo vanhu vese vakabatsirwa nembeu, fotireza nemishonga vanotarisirwa kudzorera mari. Chirongwa ichi chiri kutungamirirwa nemumwe wevatevedzeri vemutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa uye hatina kukwanisa kuvabata kana gurukota rezvekurima kuti tinzwe kuti hurumende icharamba ichitsigira chirongwa ichi kusvika rini.
title: ZFU Yopembedza Chirongwa cheCommand Agriculture

text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti vanhu gumi nevana vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 nemusi weChipiri zvasiya vafa nacho vave zviuru zvina nemazana manomwe nemakumi mashanu nemapfumbamwe kana kuti 4, 759. Vanhu zviuru zvina nemazana matatu nemakumi matanhatu nevanomwe kana kuti 4, 367 vakabatwa nechirwere ichi neChipiri zvasiya vabatwa nacho kubva zvachatanga kupararira gore rapera vave zana rezviuru nemakumi masere nemaviri ane makumi mashanu nevanomwe kana kuti 182 and 57. Bazi rezvehutano rinotiwo vanhu vabayiwa nhomba yeCovid-19 kekutanga vave mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi mapfumbamwe nemapfumbamwe zvine zana nemakuki manomwe kana kuti 3 99 170. Vanhu vabayiwa nhomba kaviri sezviri kukurudzirwa vave mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru gumi nevatu zvine mazana matatu nemakumi masere nevashanu kana kuti 3 013 385. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi nhomba mukupera kwemwedzi uno kuti inyatsoshande zvakanaka. Mukuru anoona nezvekudzivirira denda reCovid-19 munyika Dr Agnes Mahomva avo vanoti vanhu vanenge vanzi vagare pavo voga nekuda kwechirwere ichi vanofanira kuita saizvozvo kuti vasazoparadzire chirwere. Vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanhu vanofanira kubayiwa nhomba yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi.
title: Vanhu Gumi neVana Vofa neChirwere cheCovid-19 neMusi weChipiri

text: Mamwe masangano anorwira kodzero dzevanhu muZimbabwe anoti ave kuronga kukwirira mapurisa kumatare edzimhosva mushure mekushungurudzwa kwenhengo dzawo nemapurisa neMugovera dzichi cherechedza zuva rerudo reValentine’s Day. Masangano aya ari kushorawo zvikuru danho remapurisa rekuparadza kufora kwaakanga aronga uku achishandisa chisimba pamwe nekurova vamwe vanhu zvakaipisisa. Nhengo dzemasangano matatu anoti reZimbabwe Activists Alliance, Restoration of Human Rights (ROHR) ne Youth Advocacy for Reform and Democracy (YARD), dzinoti dzakafora dzichida kuratidza rudo rwadzo kunyika yeZimbabwe pasi pedingindira rinoti “I Love My Zimbabwe” uye dzinoti dzaida kunoisa maruva ekucherechedza zuva reValentine paparamende. Nhengo idzi dzinonzi dzakafora dzichibva mumugwagwa waSpeke Avenue dzichidzika naJason Moyo Avenue, dzichizopinda muna Nelson Mandela kuti dzizoguma dzave paparamende. Mutungamiri weZimbabwe Activists Alliance, Muzvare Tendai Lynette Mudehwe, vanoti ivo nevamwe vanoti VaMoses Mutyasira veROHR naVaLennon Manyengavana veYARD, vakarohwa zvakaipisisa zvakazoita kuti varapwe kuchipatara cheAvenues Clinic. "Taudza magweta edu eLawyers for Human Rights kuti atange hurongwa hwekuti titore matanho nekuti mapurisa anyanya kutishungurudza," Muzvare Mudehwe vanodaro. Muzvare Mudehwe vanoshora zvikuru danho remapurisa iri vachiti vanoshamisika zvikuru kuti mapurisa anovarambidza kuratidzira iro bumbiro remitemo richivapa mukana wekuita izvi. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kubata mapurisa kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi. No media source currently available
title: Mamwe Masangano Oronga Kukwirira Mapurisa kuMatare

text: Dare repamusoro ratura mutongo wekuti nyaya yakakwidzwa kudare neMDC inotungamirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai ichida kuti kunyoreswa kuri kuitwa vanhu sevavhoti kumbomiswa kudzamara komisheni inoona nezvesarudzo, yeZimbabwe Electoral Commssion, ZEC, yarongeka, haifanire kunzwikwa nechimbichimbi. Mutongi wedare repamusoro reHigh Court, VaDavison Moses Foroma, vati nyaya inofanira kunzwikwa hayo seimwewo nyaya zvayo. Gweta ranga rakamirira MDC-T panyaya iyi, VaEric Matinenga, vatsinhira zvaturwa nedare vakatizvave kuMDC-T kuti yotora danho ripi kubva pari zvino zvichienda mberi. Mudare, VaMatinenga vati kana ZEC ikabvumidzwa kuenderera mberi nekunyoresa vanhu sevavhoti pasina michina yekuchengetedza mashoko kana kuti ma servers zvinoita kuti pave nemukana wekuti sarudzo dzegore rinouya dzibirirwe. VaMatinenga vati bumbiro remitemo rinopa hurumende masimba ekuona kuti zvose zvinodiwa kuitwa kunyoreswa kwevanhu sevavhoti kusati kwatanga zvaitwa saka nokudaro ZEC inofanira kumbomisa kunyoresa vanhu yozoita izvi kana ichinge yarongeka. VaMatinenga vaudza dare kuti mutunagmiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vaifanira kutanga vatarisa kuti ZEC yarongeka here kuti inyorese vanhu sevavhoti vasati vatara mazuva achanyoreswa vanhu sevavhoti. Asi gweta ranga rakamirira VaMugabe panyaya iyi, Amai Olivia Zvedi, vati nyaya iyi haifanire kunzwikwa nechimbichimbi sezvo pasina chainoruza MDC-T kana kunyoreswa kuri kuitwa vanhu sevavhoti kukaramba kuchienderera mberi. Mutongi wedare abvumirana naAmai Zvedi kuti nyaya iyi inogona kuzounzwa zvayo kudare neimwe nguva sezvo ZEC yakabuda pachena kuti kunyoreswa kwevanhu kucharamba kuchienderera mberi kunyange mazuva akatarwa nemutungamiri wenyika adarika. No media source currently available
title: Dare Rinoti Nyaya yeMDC-T Haisi Ingatongwe Chimbichimbi

text: Vanoongorora nyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika vari kupesana maonero pamashoko emutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaConstantino Chiwenga, ekuti madzishe haafanire kushora mutungamiri wenyika vachiyambira madzishe aya kuti vanogona kutorerwa humambo. Izvi zvinotevera mashoko aIshe Murinye vekuMasvingo ekushora huori muhurumende vachiti hunogona kupa kuti mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vatadze kukunda musarudzo dza2023 kana kupidigurwa nemauto. Ishe Murinye vakaberekwa vachinzi Ephias Munodawafa uye vanozvitiwo inhengo yeZanu-PF. Asi VaChiwenga vakati Ishe Murinye vaongororwe nebazi rezvematunhu nekanzuru yemadzishe uye vakaonekwa vaine mhosva votorerwa matanho. Asi mutungamiri wedare remadzishe Ishe Fortune Charumbira, avo vari kunzi vaferefete Ishe Murinye vakaendeswawo kumatare edzimhosva neElection Resource Centre vachipomerwa mhosva yekutyora chikamu 281 (2) chebumbiro remutemo chekuti madzishe asatore mativi panyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika. Dare repamusoro rakapa mutongo wekuti Ishe Charumbiora vainge vatyora mutemo. Nhengo yeZanu-PF, VaGilbert Dzikiti, vanoti Ishe Murinye vainge voita zvematongerwo enyika nekushora hurumende parufu asi vachikwanisa kutaurirana nevatungamiri kuburikidza nedare remadzishe. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika vari mukuru wesangano reCentre for Natural Resource Governance, VaFarai Maguwu, vati VaChiwenga vanofanira kuziva kuti havasi pamusoro pemutemo uye madzishe akasungunuka kutaura zvaanofunga. No media source currently available
title: Nyanzvi Dzokakavadzana paNyaya yaIshe Murinye Vakatsiura Vatungamiri veNyika

text: Vatapi venhau munyika vanoti vanoshushikana chose kuti kunyange hazvo bumbiro remitemo richiva kodzero dzekushanda vakasununguka, pachine mitemo inovambunyikidza vatori mukuita basa ravo munyika. No media source currently available Vachitaura pamhembero dzeWorld Press Freedom Day dzange dzakarongwa nesangano reMedia Institute of Southern Africa -Zimbabwe, gweta zvakare vari nhengo yeZimbabwe Media Commission, VaChris Mhike, vati pachine mitemo yakawanda inokonzera kushungurudzwa kwevatapi venhau. Vatiwo kunyange hazvo bumbiro remitemo richiti nhenpfenyuro pamwe nemapepnhau, zvikuru sei ehurumende, zvonofanira kushanda zvakazvimirira, hurumende pamwe nevezvematongerwo enyika vari kupindira mumashandiro emakambani aya. Munyori mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Union of Journalists, VaFoster Dongozi, vanoti zvinosuwisawo kuti mapepanhau nemakambani enhau akawanda ari kuvhara nekuda kwekuoma kwaita zvinhu munyaya dzehupfumi munyika. Pane mapepanhau akati kuti anosanganisira The Mail, Southern Eye pamwe neGemazo akavhara mukati mumwedzi mishonana yapfuura uye asara acho ari kuderedza huwandu hwevashandi pamwe nekuderedza mihoro yavo. Zuva reWorld Press Freedom Day rinocherechedzwa pasi rese musi wa 3 Chivabvu senzira yekukurudzira kuti vatori venhau kuti vashande vasingambunyikidzwi. Zuva iri rakasvika nemusi weSvondo vazhinbji vasiri pamabasa izvo zvakazoita kuti richerechedzwe neMuvhuro muZimbabwe.
title: Vatori veNhau Vocherechedza World Press Freedom Vachigunun'una muZimbabwe

text: Kurambidzwa kwebato guru rinopikisa reMDC kuratidzira kuoma kwaita zvinhu munyika kwamutsa mutauro vamwe vachiti hurumende iri kutyora kodzero dzevanhu asi vamwewo vachirumbidza danho iri sezvo vachiti rakanangana nekuchetedza veruzhinji nemabhizimisi kubva kumhirizhonga. MDC yange iine hurongwa hwekuratidzira mumatunhu ese munyika, asi mapurisa akarambidza izvi achiti aityira kuti paizogona kuita mizhirizhonga sezvakaitika pakuratidzira kwemuna Nyamavhuvhu gore rapfuura pamwe naNdira gore rino pakaparadzwa zvinhu zvakawanda, pakakuvara nekuurawa vanhu vakawanda. Mutevedzeri wemutauriri webato reMDC, VaLuke Tamborinyoka, vanoti zviri kuitwa nemapurisa nehurumende zvinotyora bumbiro remitemo yenyika. Vanoti zviri pachena kuti mapurisa nemauto ari kutambura sevamwe vanhu uye kurambidza kuti varatidzira hachisi chido chavo. Asi mutungamiriri webato reLEAD, Amai Linda Masarira Kaingidza, vanoti vanoona sekuti zviri kuitwa nemapurisa zvinokonzerwa nevanhu vanotadza kuzvibata kana vanhu vachiratidzira. Vanoti vanhu vakashunguridzika zvikuru nemhirizhonga nekuurayiwa kwakaitwa vanhu gore rapfuura pamwe nekutanga kwegore rino. Mutevedzeri weMDC inotungamirirwa naMuzvare Thokozani Khupe, zvakare vari gweta, VaObert Gutu, vanoti vanotsigira bumbiro remitemo yenyika pakupa vanhu kodzero yekuratidzira murunyararo uye havabvumirani nemhirizhonga. VaGutu vanoti bato ravo rinopokana nevanhu vanoita mhirizhonga pakuratidzira. Mumwe mugari wemuHarare, VaEnergy Homwe, vanoti vanoona sekuti zviri kuitwa nemapurisa zvakanaka nekuti zvinovapa mukana wekuramba vachishanada pasina anovavhiringidza sezvinowanzoitika pese panoratidzira vanhu. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi, VaMasimba Kuchera, vanoti zviri kuitwa nemapurisa hazvipe hurumende chimiro chakanaka sezvo pange paine tariro kubva kune veruzhinji kuti hurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa nemapurisa avo, ichashanda nevanhu zvakanaka. Nyanzvi inoshanda neCentre for Languages and Communication Studies paChinhoyi University of Technology, Dr Ted Mungwari , vanobvumirana naVaKuchera vachiti pachinhambo chekurambidza vanhu kuratidzira, mapurisa anofanira kutsvaga nzira dzakanaka dzekushanda nevanhu, mapato ezvematongerwo enyika pamwe nemasangano anoshanda akazvimirira. VaMungwari vanoti zviri pachena kuti vanhu vari kutambura zvakanyanya uye hurumende inofanira kuita nhaurirano dzakajeka nemapato ese ari munyika kusanganisira MDC inotungamirirwa na Advocate Nelson Chamisa nedonzvo rekugadzirisa matambudziko akatarisana neZimbabwe. Murairiridzai wepaGreat Zimbabwe University, VaJoel Mkusha, vanotiwo mhirizhonga pakuratidzira haina kunaka uye vemapato ezvematongerwo enyika vanofanira kubatana voshanda pamwe mukusimudzira nyika. VaTamborinyoka vanoti kunyange hazvo MDC ichiremekedza SADC, havana kufara nedanho rayo rekupa VaMnangagwa chigaro chasachigaro webandiko resangano iri reOrgan on Politics, Defence and Security pamusangano wakatanga neChishanu kuTanzania apo mapurisa aizvindikita vanhu vairatidzira muHarare. VaKuchera vanoti hapana chinoshamisa pakunyarara kweSADC pamatambudziko akatarisana nevana veZimbabwe vachiti ndizvinoita sangano iri zvisinei kuti vanhu vari kutambura munyika ipi mudunhu rekuchamhembe kweAfrica. Nyika dzekumadokero dzakaita seAmerica, Canada nedzimwe dziri muEuropean dzakashora zviri kuitwa nemapurisa dzikakurudzira kuti aremekedza kodzero dzekusangana kana kuratidzira dzinopihwa vanhu nebumbiro remitemo yenyika. Asi munyori anoona nezvemitemo muZanu PF, VaMunyaradzi Paul Mangwana, vanoti mapurisa ane masimba ekumisa kuratidzira sezviri mumutemo wePublic Order and Security Act, POSA. Asi MDC inoti ichagara pasi yozeya matanho ekutora zvichitevera kurambidzwa kwayakaitwa kuratidzira mumaguta anoti Harare, Bulawayo, Gweru neMasvingo. MDC inoti chikamu chePOSA chakashandiswa nemapurisa kuiotira kuti bato iri risaratidzire, chinotyora bumbiro remitemo yenyika. Kunetsana uko kunoitika mushure mekunge mutemo wePOSA wavandudzwa nematare eNational Assembly ne Senate, pachidzikwa bhiri remutemo weMaintanance of Peace and Order, iro ramirira kusainwa nemutungamiri wenyika kuti richive mutemo unoshandiswa munyika. No media source currently available
title: Vanhu Vopesana Pane Zviri Kuitwa neMapurisa paKuratidzira kweMDC

text:
Vamwe vagari vekuBikita vari kuchema chema chema kuti havachina chekudya nekuda kwekuti makanzuru avo ari kumanikidza masangano anopa rubatsiro kubhadhara mari dzekuti vakwanise kushanda vachibatsira vanhu. Mumusangano wakaitwa mukupera kwaChivabvu, kanzuru yeBikita yakaita chisungo chekuti vemasangano akazvimirira oga vanoda kushandira mudunhu ravo vabhadhare mazana matatu emadhora ekuAmerica $300.Pamusoro pazvo, vozobhadhara madhora mazana maviri $200 ekunyorerana gwaro rekuwirirana pamashandiro kana kuti Memorendum of Understanding(MOU) kuti vatange basa. Mumwe mugari wekwaMukore, VaOscar Makova, vanoti izvi zvave kupa kuti mamwe masangano aregedze kushandira munzvimbo iyi.

Izvi zvatsinhirwa nemutauriri wesangano revagari reBikita Residents and Rate Payers Association (BIRRA), VaMark Mutengani avo vati kanzuru iri kukoshesa mari pane hupenyu hwevanhu.

Vemasangano akazvimirira vataura neStudio 7 vati muBikita mave kunetsakushandira nemutemo uyu uye vave kusarudza kushandira kune mamwe matunhu.

Vanoti kunze kwekubatsira nechikafu munguva dzenzara masangano avo anobetsera hurumende muzvirongwa zvebudiriro zvakafanana nekuvakira vagari zvikoro, makiriniki pamwe nekuchera zvibhorani kuti vanhu vagare zvakanaka pachena.
Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwebasa musangano reCommunity Tolerence and Reconciliation Development (COTRAD), VaZivanai Muzorodzi, vanoti zviri kuitwa nekanzuru iyi kutyora mutemo wenyika.

Munyori musangano rinomirira masangano akazvimirira muMasvingo, reNational Association of Non-Governmental Organisations (NANGO), Amai Lucia Masekesa vakurudzira kanzuru yeBikita kuti ibvise mutemo unoomesera masangano anobatsira veruzhinji pachena.

Asi sachigaro wekanzuru yeBikita, VaBenjamin Masakadza, vati vakaisamutemo uyu kuti kanzuru iwane mari dzemabhazi nechikafu chemakanzura pavanouya kuzonyorerana zvibvumirano izvi nevemasangano akazvimirira oga.

Mamwe masangano akazvimirira oga anobatsirawo vagari munguva dzenjodzi dzakaita semafashamu, madutu mupengo pamwe nepanenge popararira zvakanyanya zvirwere zvakaita
seCovid-19 nezvimwe. Vagari vekuBikita vataura neStudio 7 vati masangano anobatsira nechikafu akasauya mudunhu ravo vanogona kurasikirwa nehupenyu sezvo kuine nzara huru yakakonzerwa nemvura yakarambira mudega mwaka wadarika. Sangano reWorld Food Programme rinoti vanhu vanopfuura mamirioni mashanu vanoda rubatsiro rwechikafu munyika yese nekuda kwenzara. No media source currently available
title: Kanzuru yeBikita Yobhadharisa Masangano Anopa Rubatsiro Mari Zvosiya Vagari Vasina Chekudya

text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, neChitatu vari kutarisirwa kutaura kekutanga kudare reUnited Nations General Assembly, asi mashoko avo ari kutarisirwa kuti anenge akasiyana zvikuru neaive mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe avo vainge vaine mbiri yekutuka nyika dzekunze zvikuru America neBritain pamagungano aya. VaMnangagwa vari kutarisirwa kutaura kuti Zimbabwe pasi pehutungamiri hwavo yatora gwara itsva uye kuti vanoda kutanga kudyidzana nedzimwe nyika kwete kukandirana makobvu nematete nenyika dzakabudirira sezvaiitwa naVaMugabe. Asi VaMnangagwa vari kutarisirwa kukurudzira nyika dzakaita seAmerica nedziri musangano reEuropean Union kuti dzibvise zvirango zvakatemerwa ivo nevamwe vakuru vemuhurumende yavo. Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chiri muNew York VaStephen Vunganai vanotiwo havaone VaMnangagwa vachitaura sezvaiitwa naVaMugabe zvekurova bembera nekushora nyika dzakabudirira. Asi vamwe vakuru kubva kusangano reAfrican Union vataura neStudio 7 vanoti kubva zvakabviswa VaMugabe pachigaro, nyika dzakabudirira dzarasikirwa nezwi rakasimba raikurudzira kuvandudzwa kwedare reUnited Nations Security Council iro rine nyika shanu chete dzakabudirira. Asi AU yakatambira hayo kubviswa kwaVaMugabe pachigaro nemauto muna Mbudzi gore rapera. Kunyangwe VaMnangagwa vari kuti Zimbabwe yave kutora rimwe gwara munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika, vanopikisa vanoti hapana chanyanya kuchinja sezvo vanopikisa vari kuramba vachibatwa neseri kweruoko vachisungwa nekumbunyikidzwa. Mutauriri wemutungamiri weMDC VaNelson Chamisa, Doctor Nkululeko Sibanda vakaudza Studio 7 kuti bato ravo haricherechedze VaMnangagwa semunhu akakunda musarudzo. Chitatu mangwanani VaMnangagwa vari kutarisirwawo kupinda mumusangano wekudzivirira kuroodzwa kwevana vasati vabva zera. Mutungamiri wenyika yeZambia, VaEdgar Lungu vari kutarisirwawo kupinda mumusangano uyu pamwe nechizvarwa cheZimbabwe vari munyarikani weAfrican Union kana kuti Goodwill Ambassador, Amai Nyaradzai Gumbonzvanda avo vanoti Zimbabwe ichazeyiwa nezvayao pamusangano uyu. VaMnangagwa nhasi vari kupindawo mune mumwe wekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cherurindi kana kuti TB. Parizvino Zimbabwe iri kutatarika kuwana mapiritsi eTB zvotyirwa kuti zvichapa kuti denda iri ritonyanya kukomba. Chirwere cheTB chiri kuuraya vanhu vakawanda zvikuru vanorarama neHIV/AIDS. VaMnangagwa vari kutarisirwa kudzokera kuZimbabwe nemusi weChina. No media source currently available
title: VaMnangagwa Votarisirwa Kutaura Kekutanga kuUNGA

text: Madzimai anoti aneta nekusaenzaniswa kwemikana pakati pevanhurume nevanhukadzi kunyanya munyaya dzematongerwo enyika nekudaro achange achitora matanho akasiyana-siyana kuti varwire kuenzaniswa kwemikana iyi. Madzimaiatsidza kuti achange achitsigirana kuti madzimai akawanda akunde musarudzo kuitira kuti azadzikise zviri mubumbiro remitemo yenyika zvekuenzaniswa kwemikana pakati pevanhurume nevanhukadzi. Vachitaura pamusangano wekuparura hurongwahwematanho avachatora mukurwira kuenzaniswa kwemikana wavari kuti 50/50 Advocacy Campaign and Women’s Manifesto, mutevedzeri wasachigaro weZimbabwe Women’s Parliamentary Caucus, Amai Paurina Mpariwa-Gwanyanya, vati nekuda kwekuti vakadzi ndovakawanda pavanhu vachanovhota, vari kuzokuridzirana kuvhoterana. Amai Mpariwa vatiwo vachaumba homwe yekubatsira madzimai achange achitsvaga rutsigiro rwekupinda mune zvematongerwo enyika sezvo vachiti kushaya zvekutsvagisa rutsigiro zviri kudzorera madzimai kumashure. Mumwe mudzimai ari munezvematongerwo enyika, Amai Priscilla Misihairabwi Mushonga, vati vachashandisa matanho akasiyana siyana kusanganisira kuenda kumatare pamwe nekutaura nevakuru vemapato ezvematongerwo enyika mukurwisa kuti vakadzi vapiwe mikana yakaenzana nevanhurume sezvakatarwa nebumbiro remutemo wenyika. Madzimai aparurawo gwaro rehwaro hwezvavanozokwanisa kuitira vavhoti kuti vasimbise kuwana rutsigiro. Amai Mushonga varumbidza gwaro iri vachiti richabatsira madzimai kuti vazive zvekunotaura pavanenge vachitsvaka rutsigiro. Muzvare Maureen Kademaunga vesangano reHashtag SheVotes2018 vati vafadzwa zvikuru nehwaro hwaparurwa nhasi nekuti zvichabatsira madzimai akawanda kuti awane pekutangira mukutsvaga rutsigiro kunyanya avo vari kukwikwidza kekutanga. Madzimai ane huwandu hunosvuka pazvikamu makumi mashanu nezviviri kubva muzana. Sangano rinoona nezvesarudzo rinotiwo pavanhu vakanyoresa kuzovhota, madzimai ndiwo akawanda asi nguva zhinji varume ndivo vanokunda musarudzo.
title: Madzimai Okurudzirana Kuvhoterana Musarudzo

text: Bato reMDC inotungamirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai, rinoti rinokatyamadzwa zvikuru nedanho remutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, rekusarudza kuenda kumusangano weG20 uri kuitirwa kuAntalya kuTurkey iyo nyika isina mari. Mutauriri weMDC T, VaObert Gutu, vanoti kunyange hazvo VaMugabe vari ivo sachigaro weAfrican Union hazvirevi kuti kwese kwaitwa musangano vanosungirwa kunge variko. Nhepfenyuro yeZBC inoti VaMugabe, avo vakaenda nemudzimai wavo pamwe nevamwe vakuru muhurumende vakakokwa nemutungamiri weTurkey Recep Tayyip Erdogan sasachigaro weAfrican Union. Musangano weG20 uyu unobatanidza nyika makumi maviri dzine upfumi hwakasimba dzepasi rino kusanganisirawo South Africa, inove ndiyo chete nyika yemuAfrica iri mugungano iri. “Kune zvimwewo zvaunoti veduwe, maita zvenyu nekundikoka kwamaita asi iiih, iye zvino ndakabatikana.” VaGutu vanodaro. VaGutu vanoti kukokwa kwakaitwa VaMugabe uku havana kupiwa mari kana ndege yekushandisa asi kuti vakangonzi mouya muchishandisa mari yenyu. Dzimwe nyika dziri kugungano iri dzinosanganisira United States, Japan, Brazil, Canada, Australia pamwe nesangano reEuropean Union. Dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzematongerwo enyika dzinoti VaMugabe munhu akwegura anofanirwa kugara ari munyika achisiya vane dzinobuda ropa vachifambisa basa renyika. VaMugabe vari kusvitsa makore makumi mapfumbamwe nemaviri muna Kukadzi gore rinouya. Nyaya yehutano hwavo imwe yezvinhu zviri kukatyamadza vakawanda kuti seyi vari kuramba vari pachigaro pane kuti vaende kumudyandigere. No media source currently available
title: MDC T Yoshoropodza Kuenda kwaVaMugabe kuMusangano weG20

text: Ongororo yakaitwa nesangano reafrobarometer ichishanda nesangano reMass Public Opinion Institute kana kuti MPOI yemuZimbabwe inoratidza kuti vanhu vemunyika vanoda sarudzo dzakachena asi vari kutya mhirizhonga yezvematongerwo enyika. Vanhu vakawanda vanonzi vanototyawo kuti vangwarire kuti vavhotera ani nenyaya yemhirizhonga iyi. Vanhu vanodarika chiuru nemazana maviri ndivo vakabvunzwa paongororo iyi. Chipangamazano muMPOI, VaStephen Ndoma, vanoti ongororo yavo iri kuratidza kuti huwandu hwevanhu vemunyika vasisina chivimbo nesarudzo huri kuramba huchikura. No media source currently available Muna 2012 vanhu makumi masere nevanomwe kubva muzana vaiti vane chivimbo nesarudzo.
