Muna 2014 huwandu hwainge hwaderera kusvika pazvikamu makumi masere nezvishanu kubva muzana. Asi ikozvino hwasvika pazvikamu makumi manomwe nezvisere kubva muzana. Zvichakadaro, sangano reZimbabwe Peace Project, ZPP, rakurudzira mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, kuti pavanenge votenderera mumatunhu ose vachisangana nevechidiki vanofanirwa kuvakurudzira kuti vasaite mhirizhonga munguva yesarudzo. ZPP inoti iri kuona kuti munyika pari zvino hamuchina kugadzikana zvichionekwa nekurwisana kwevatsigiri vezvematongerwo enyika. Sangano iri rinoti izvi zvikasagadziriswa zvinosvika muna 2018 paine kurwisana. Mukuru weZPP, Muzvare Jestina Mukoko, vapa semuenzaniso kubayiwa nebanga kunonzi kwakaitwa mutsigiri weZanu-PF, VaAshley Mdutshwa, nevatsigiri veZanu-PF. No media source currently available Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa divi remapurisa panyaya iyi. Sangano reZPP rinoti rinovimba kuti vanhu havazomanikidzwa kuenda kumisangano yaVaMugabe iyi.
title: Afrobarometer Inoti Vanhu vemuZimbabwe Votyira Mhirizhonga Musarudzo dza2018

text: Kunyangwe hazvo nhasi Zimbabwe yange ichicherechedza zuva rekubatana kana kuti Unity Day, zviri kubuda pachena kuti kusawirirana kuri kuenderera mberi pakati pemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa nemutungamiri guru webato rinopikisa reMDC VaNelson Chamisa nezvenhaurirano. Vachitaura pazuva rekubatana nevamwe vatungamiri vemapato madiki anopikisa ari muPolad pamusangano waitirwa papurazi ravo kuKwekwe nhasi, VaMnangagwa vati vakaudza vaimbove mutungamiri wenyika yeSouth Africa VaThabo Mbeki avo vari kuratidza chido chekuda kuyananisa muZimbabwe kuti havasi kuzoita nhaurirano kunze kwePOLAD. No media source currently available VaMnangagwa vati mapato ezvematongerwo enyika anofanira kukoshesa nyaya yekubatana nerunyararo kuti hupfumi hwenyika hugadzikane. Imwe nhengo yePOLAD Muzvinafundo Lovemore Madhuku vanoti musangano wanhasi wafamba zvakanaka uye vanoti POLAD iri kubata basa kuyedza kugadzirisa matambudziko akatarisana nenyika. No media source currently available Asi mashoko aVaMnangagwa aya ari kuuya apo VaChamisa vazivisawo kuti havasi kuzopinda mugungano rePOLAD vachiti kuteya nzou neriva. VaChamisa vanoti kunyangwe vachida zvenhaurirano dzine mutongi gava asingateme akarerekera rimwe divi. VaChamisa vanoti vari kupedza nguva ino vachibatsira vanoshupika sezvavakaita kuBulawayo neChishanu. No media source currently available Zuva reUnity Day iri rakauya mushure mekunyoreranwa kwechibvumirano cherunyararo nekubatana kana kuti Unity Accord pakati peZanu-PF nePF Zapu musi wa 22 Zvita 1987. Vakanyorerana chibvumirano ichi vachakabvu Robert Mugabe naDoctor Joshua Nkomo. Izvi zvakatevera kuurayiwa kwevanhu vanofungidzirwa kuti vanosvika zviuru makumi maviri kuMatabeleland neMidlands munguva yeGukurahundi pachipomerwa mhosva mauto eFifth Brigade.
title: VaMnangagwa naVaChamisa Votatsurana paNyaya yePOLAD

text: Sangano revanofamba nemabhazi nemichovha, rePassengers Association of Zimbabwe, rinoti nhengo dzaro dziri kugutsikana nemamiriro ezvinhu munyaya dzekuwanikwa kwemafuta edzimotokari sezvo vafambi vasina kuwana dambudziko. Munyori anoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa musangano iri, vari zvakare vakafanobata chigaro chemutauriri, VaAndrew Chibanda, vanoti vemuchovha, zvikuru vermishikashika, vakanga vakwidzawo mari dzairipirwa nevafambi zvakapetwa kaviri asi mari idzi dzamuka dzakadzokera padzaive kare sezvo michovha yawanda nekuwanikwa kwemafuta uku. Asi sangano iri richiri kuchemawo nekushomeka kwemabhazi anotakura veruzhinji, richiti knyange hazvo kambani yeZUPCO iri kubatsirwa nezvitima kutakura vanhu, vari kudzimwe nzvimbo dzisina zvitima vari kumanikidzwa kufamba mitunhu kuenda kunokwira zvitima izvi, kana kuzosvika kudzimba kwadoka. Mafuta ekufambisa akamboshaikwa munyika mukupera kwesvondo zvakaita kuti mitsetse idzoke zvakare mumagaraji anotengesa mafuta aya. Asi hurumende yakavimbisa kuti dambudziko iri raizogadziriswa nekukasika, ichiti raive rakonzerwa nekukanganisika kwemichina inofambisa mafuta kubva kuMozambique. No media source currently available
title: Vanofamba neMabhazi neMichovha Vanonzi Vagutsikana neKuwanikwa kweMafuta eDzimotokari Munyika

text: Mapato anopikisa nemasangano akazvimirira ari kushora bato reZanu PF nekurudziro yaro yekuti mumiriri weAmerica muZimbabwe, VaBrian Nichols, vadzingwe munyika uye kukurudzira kwariri kuita kuti vatsigiri varo vaise mitemo mumaoko avo. America yabva yadaidza mumiriri weZimbabwe muAmerica, VaAmmon Mtembwa, kuti vatsanangure zviri kuitwa nebato ravo muZimbabwe. Mapato aya anoti atora danho rekushoropodza bato raVaEmmerson Mnangagwa sezvo asiri kufara nemashoko akataurwa nevakafanobata chigaro chemutauriri webato iri, VaPatrick Chinamasa, pamusangano wavakaita nemusi weMuvhuro. VaChinamasa vakakurudzira vatsigiri vavo kuti vazvidzivirire pose pavanenge vachirwiswa, uye vakatiwo Zimbabwe inogona kudzinga VaNichols munyika nekuti vari kupindira mune zvematongerwo enyika. Mumwe wevari kutungamira hurongwa hwekuratidzira kwemusi weChishanu uhwu, VaRody Takaruza, vaudza Studio7 kuti kuratidzira kwavari kuronga hakunei neAmerica nemumiriri wayo muZimbabwe, VaBrian Nichols, asi kuti veruzhinji havasi kufara nemafambisirwo ari kuitwa zvinhu nehurumende yaVaMnangagwa. Izvi zvatsinhirwa nemutevedzeri wemutauriri weMDC Alliance, VaClifford Hlatshwayo, avo vati Zanu PF yafanana nababa vanopomera muvakidzani wayo mhosva yekusafambisa zvinhu zvakanaka pamusha payo. Asi mutungamiri webato reLabour Economists and Afrikan Democrats, Muzvare Linda Masarira, vakurudzira mutungamiri weAmerica, VaDonald Trump, kuti vatsvage munhu anotsiva VaNichols. VaTakaruza vati VaMnangagwa vakatevedzera kurudziro yebato ravo yekuti vadzinge VaNichols muZimbabwe, zvichaita kuti hukama pakati peZimbabwe neAmerica huwedzere kushata. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura naVaNichols pamwe nemuzinda weAmerica kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi. Asi muzinda weAmerica uyu wakaburitsa mashoko paTwitter mazuva mashoma adarika uchiti kushevedzera kuratidzira murunyararo kana kuve nechekuita nekuratidzira murunyararo zvinhu zvinokoshesa kodzero dzevanhu sematarirwo adzakaitwa mubumbiro remitemo yenyika. Muzinda uyu wakabudawo pachena uchiti hauneyi nehurongwa hwekuratidzira kuri kuda kuitwa muZimbabwe, asi ukati Zimbabwe inofanirwa kuremekedza mitemo yayo sezvinodiwa nebumbiro remitemo yenyika. Hurumende yeZimbabwe yakambonetsana zvakare nevaimbova mumiriri weAmerica muZimbabwe, VaChristopher Dell naVaJames McGee, avo vaipomerwa mhosva imwechete seyave kupomerwa VaNichols. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika, VaClaris Madhuku, avo vanoshanda nesangano rePlatform for Youth Development in Zimbabwe, vati Zanu PF inoisa America pasiripo vachitiwo vamiriri vedzimwe nyika havafanire kuudzwa mashoko akaita seakataurwa naVaChinamasa vachiti vanochengetedzwa nechibvumirano cheVienna Convention. VaChinamasa vati tigovafonera asi pataenda pamhepo vanga vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. Asi mushandi mukuru anoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko muZanu PF, VaTafadzwa Mugwada, vati vanomira nemashoko akataurwa naVaChinamasa. Zvichakadai, mashoko aburitswa nemutauriri weboka revechidiki reMDC Alliance, VaStephen Chuma, anoti pane nhengo dzebato ravo nhatu dzinoti VaEmmanuel Mukwemu, Muzvare Petronella Mapaire naVaTrynos Hove dzakasungwa husiku hwanezuro dzichinzi dzanga dzichikurudzira kuti veruzhinji varatidzire neChishanu. Mutauriri wemapurisa, VaPaul Nyathi, vati vanga vasati vaziviswa nezvekusungwa kwevatatu ava. No media source currently available
title: Masangano neMapato Anopikisa Oyambira Zimbabwe Kuti Ibate America Zvine Hungwaru

text: No media source currently available Vechidiki vanga vachida kutora zvitupa kekutanga pamahofisi ekwamudzviti kuMasvingo vanoti vatadza kutora zvitupa sezvo vashandi vepamahofisi aya vanga vachiti vanoda mari. Vataura neStudio7 vati vashandi vehurumende vange vachida mari kuti vape vanhu zvitupa kunyange hazvo hurumende yakati vasina zvitupa vanofanirwa kuzvipihwa pachena kuitira kuti vakwanise kunyoresa kuvhota. Mumwe wevechidiki, VaPraise Maridza, vati vave nemazuva vachidzoswa nekuda kwenyaya yevashandi vari kuda chioko muhomwe. Muzvare Ellen Masara vati vashandi vepazvitupa vari kutoresa vanhu vashoma pazuva vasingapfuuri makumi mashanu vachiitira kuti vazhinji vasawane zvitupa zvekuzonyoresa kuvhota. Mukuru webazi rekutoresa vanhu zvitupa muMasvingo, Amai Stembeni Chitsa, varamba kutaura neStudio7 kuti vatipewo pfungwa dzavo pane nyaya iyi. Asi vamwe vagari vanoti kunyange hazvo vechidiki vari kunetseka, vanotarisira kuti panoparurwa chirongwa cheBlitz mudunhu ravo sangano reZEC rinenge ragadzirisa zvimhinga mupini zvose zviri kusangana nevamwe kune dzimwe nzvimbo Muzvare Eshter Chimanikire vanoti vakatomirira kunyoresa kuwadhi kwavo vasingatarisiri kunetseka. Vamwe vanoti havana ruzivo rwekuti chirongwa ichi chinotanga rini munzvimbo yavo sezvo ZEC isiri kushambadza kana kuisa ma ‘postor’ ekuzivisa vanhu. Asi VaZivanai Chikwanda vati havasi kufara nekugadzirira kwe ZEC. Zvichakadaro chirongwa chekunyoresa kuvhota muma ward chakaparurwa musi weChipiri muMasvingo mumatunhu matatu chete anoti Chiredzi yose, Mwenezi yose nedzimwe nzvimbo dze Chivi South. Chirongwa ichi chinopera munzvimbo idzi musi wa 25 Gumiguru. Asi muguta reMasvingo chirongwa ichi chinotanga musi 29 Gumiguru.
title: Vechidiki Votadza Kutora Zvitupa kuMasvingo

text: Zimbabwe nhasi yabatana nedzimwe nyika mukucherechedza mazuva gumi nematanhatu akanangana nekuchengetedza kodzero dzemadzimai nevanasikana zvikuru kubva kunyaya yemhirizhonga mudzimba kana kuti 16 Days of Activism Against Gender Based Violence. Uhu hurongwa hunoitwa gore negore kutanga musi wa25 Mbudzi kusvika musi wa 10 Zvita apo panobva patangawo kucherechedzwa zuva rekodzero dzevanhu kana kuti Human Rights Day. Hurongwa uhu hwakatangwa muna 1991 nesangano remadzimai reWomen’s Global Leadership Institute. Dingindira regore rino rakanangana nenyaya dzekubatwa chibharo kwemadzimai nevanasikana. Sachigaro weWomen's Coalition of Zimbabwe Amai Ronika Mumbire vati vane zvirongwa zvakawanda kucherechedza mazuva aya uye vachafora vachishora nyaya yemhirizhonga mudzimba. Masangano ari kucherechedza zuva iri atumira mashoko kuvatori venhau anosanganisira rePlatform for Youth Development rine hurongwa kuChipinge, bato remadzimai muMDC reWomens Assembly iro rati harisi kufara nenyaya yekuti hurumende haina kusunga mauto aipomerwa mhosva yekubata chibharo mamwe madzimai apo vanhu vairatidzira muna Ndira. Mapurisa panguva iyi akati ainge asina humbowo hwakakwana hwekuferefeta nyaya dzacho. Hatina kukwanisa kubata mutauriri wemapurisa Senior Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi. Munyori mukuru weUnited Nations VaAntonio Guterres vakurudzira vanhu pasi rose kuti vadzidziswe nezvekukosha kwekuchengetedzwa kwekodzero dzemadzimai nevanasikana. No media source currently available
title: Zimbabwe Yocherechedza Mazuva Gumi neMatanhatu eKuchengetedzwa kweKodzero dzeMadzimai

text: Bazi rezvehutano razivisa kuti vanhu makumi mashanu nevapfumbamwe (59) vakafa neCovid-19, vamwe mazana mapfumbamwe negumi nevaviri, (912) vachiwanikwa vaine chirwere ichi neSvondo. Izvi zvakasiya huwandu hwevanhu vafa neCovid-19 hwakwira kusvika pazviuru zviviri nezana nemakumi masere nevashanu, kana kuti 2 185. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi nyika yose hwakasvikawo pazviuru makumi matanhatu nezvinomwe nemazanaa manomwe ane makumi matanhatu nevashanu, kana kuti 67 765. Vanhu zviuru makumi mana nezvishanu nemazana matanhatu negumi nevanomwe, kana kuti 45 617, vakanga vapora kubva kuchirwere ichi. Vanhu zviuru mazana masere nemakumi mapfumbamwe nezvishanu nemazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi masere, kana kuti 895 980, vanonzi vakanga vabaiwa nhomba yekutanga inodzivirira COVID-19 nyika yose. Guta reBulawayo richishanda nebazi rezvehutano, rinonzi raizvisawo kuti vana vane makore gumi nemasere vave kukwanisa kunobaiwa nhomba senzira yekudzvirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Zvichakadaro, vaimbove meya weguta reHarare, VaBenard Manyenyeni, avo vakanga vapinda muchipatara neMugoivera pamwechete nemudzimai wavo Amai Francesca Manyenyeni nemushandi wavo, vabuda muchipatara mushure mekupora kubva kuCovid-19. Vatatu ava vanga vari muchipatara cheArundel Mediclinic muHarare, umo vanga variri kurapwa. Asi VaManyenyeni vanoti mudzimai wavo pamwe nemushandi wavo vambosara muchipatara umo vachiri kurapwa. Vanoti ivo nemudzimai wavo vakabatira chirwere ichi mushure mekuenda kurufu kwaMurehwa svondo rapera, uko vakasangana nemumwe akanga abvawo nacho kuSouth Africa auya kurufu urwu. VaManyenyeni vanoti pahutatu hwavo,ivo ndivo vanga vasina kunyanya kuvhiringidzwa neCovid-19 sezvo vakanga vabaiwa nhomba dzose dziri mbiri dzeSinopharm sezvinokurudzirwa. Vanoti mudzimai wavo, uyo vanoti ari kurwara zviri nani, akanga angobaiwa nhomba yekutanga chete yeAstra Zeneca, uye anga amirira kuzobaiwa nhomba yepiri kana nguva yacho yakwanaka. Asi vanoti mushandi wavo ndiye akabatikana nedenda iri zvakanyanya sezvo akaramba kubaiwa nhomba yekudzivirira Covid-19. VaManyenyeni vanoti kunyange hazvo kubaiwa nhomba iri sarudzo yedungamunhu, zvakakosha kuti vanhu vabaiwe kuitira kurerutsa dambudziko iri kana munhu achinge abatwa nedenda iri. Vanokurudzirawo veruzhinji kuti vatevere mitemo yekudzivirira kupararira kwedenda iri zvinosanganisira kugeza maoko, kupfeka ma mask uye kusaungana. VaManyenyeni vanotendawo hurumende nematanho airi kutora ekuedza kuti nyika iwane nhomba inoikwanira. No media source currently available
title: Vaimbove Meya veHarare, VaManyenyeni, Vanobuda muChipatara Mushure meKupona kuCovid-19

text: Sangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu pasi rose, reAmnesty International, riri kukurudzira hurumende ye South Africa kuti imbomira kudzosera zvizvarwa zvedzimwe nyika zvakasungwa kunyika iyi kudzamara vanhu ava vakwanisa kumiririrwa nemagweta sezvinodiwa nemitemo yenyika. No media source currently available Zvinonzi kune zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinokwana zana nemakumi manomwe zviri pakati pevanhu vakasungwa ava. Vachitaura ne Studio 7 vari ku Johannesburg ku South Africa neChishanu, mukuru we Amnesty International kuchamhembe kwe Africa, Va Deprose Muchena, vakurudzira hurumende yaVa Jacob Zuma kuti isadzinge vanhu vakasungwa nemapurisa pachirongwa chiri kudaidzwa kuti Operation Fiela icho chavafananidza ne Operation Murambatsvina yakamboitwa mu Zimbabwe muna 2005. Va Muchena vakurudzira hurumende ye South Africa kuti imise Operation Fiela vachiti iri kutyora kodzero dzevanhu. VaMuchena vanoti mapurisa ehurumende ye South Africa akapinda munzvimbo dzakaita se Methodist Church iri mu Johannesburg apo panogara vapoteri vazhinji pamwe nepa Fatties Mansions achishanda nemasoja vachiti vari kutsvaga mbavha asi vaine chinangwa chekusunga vapoteri ava. Zvizvarwa zve Zimbabwe zvizhinji zvakanotsvaga hupoteri ku South Africa pakatanga kuwona zvinhu munyika uye vamwe vevanhu ava vanonzi vari kugara zvisiri pamutemo. Amnesty International inoti kusungwa kwakaitwa vapoteri ava nehurumende ye South Africa kuwedzera peturu mumoto zvichitevera kurwiswa kwakaitwa zvizvarwa zvedzimwe nyika nezvizvarwa zve South Africa mwedzi wapera uko kwaidaidzwa kuti xenophobia. Zvichakadai, magweta ari kumirira vasungwa ava ataura neStudio7 anoti azopihwa mvumo yekuti awone vasungwa ava. Izvi zvatsinhirwawo negweta, uye vari mukuru weZimbabwe Exiles Forum, VaGabriel Shumba.
title: Amnesty International Yokurudzira South Africa Kuremekedza Mitemo

text: Sangano revanogaya upfu reGrain Millers Association of Zimbabwe rinoti mutengo wechingwa wadzika kutanga neChishanu kubva pamadhora makumi manomwe nemapfumbamwe kuenda pamadhora makumi matanhatu nematanhatu emari yemunyika parofu. Sachigaro veGrain Millers Association of Zimbabwe, VaTafadzwa Musarara, vakati izvi zviri kuenderana nemutengo wedhora rekuAmerica pamusika wemari weForeign Currency Auction System, wakaparurwa neReserve Bank of Zimbabwe masvondo maviri adarika. Vachitaura nemusi weChina kuvatori venhau, VaMusarara vakati vakaita musangano nagavhuna veReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, Doctor John Mangudya, nguva pfupi yadarika pavakawirirana kuti vanogaya upfu vawaniswe mari yekunze, izvo zvadzikisa mutengo wechingwa pamusika. VaMusarara vakati musangano wavo uyu wakauya mushure mekuparurwa kwemusika wemari yekunze nebhanga guru renyika. Nyanzvi mune zveupfumi, vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Prosper Chitambara, vanoti sezvakaziviswa nesangano revanogaya upfu, kuderera kwemutengo wegorosi kubva pamadhora zviuru zvitatu nezana nemakumi mashanu patsaga kuenda pamadhora zviuru zviviri nezana nemakumi matatu nemanomwe ndiko kwakonzerawo kuderera kwemutengo wechingwa. Asi vanoti kuderera kana kukwira kwemutengo wemari yekunze pamusika wemari ndiko kuchave nechekuita zvakanyanya nemutengo wechingwa muZimbabwe kusvika zvinhu zvagadzikana nekuti gorosi riri kutengwa kubva kunze. Doctor Chitambara vanoti kugadzirisa dambudziko iri kunge chete kana nyika yave kukwanisa kuzvirimira yoga gorosi rinokwanira nyika yose, kwete kana nyika ichiri kutenga gorosi kubva kunze kwenyika. No media source currently available
title: Mutengo weChingwa Unodzikiswa Kutanga Chishanu

text: No media source currently available Murwiri wekodzero uye ari mutungamiri wesangano re Zimbabwe Women In Politics Alliance, Muzvare Lynda Masarira, vaburitswa muchipatara neChipiri. Muzvare Masarira vakapinda muchipatara neMugovera mushure mekurohwa nemapurisa apo vange vachiratidzira pachipatara che Parirenyatwa vachishora mabiko akaitirwa mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, kuMatopo panguva iyo zvinhu zvisina kumira zvakanaka munyika. Muzvare Masarira vanoti vane hurungwa hwekukwidza nyaya yekushungurudzwa kwavakaitwa nemapurisa nekurohwa kumatare edzimhosva sezvo kodzero dzavo dzakatyorwa nemapurisa. Vanoti vari kutora danho iri kuitira kuti izvi zvisarambe zvichiitika kune vamwe veruzhinji munyika. Muzvare Masarira vanoti mapurisa ari kuramba achityora kodzero dzeveruzhinji zuva nezuva pasina ari kuzvimisa. "Ini ndiri kuronga kukwidza nyaya iyi kudare reConstitutional Court nekuti taneta nekumbunyikidzwa nemapurisa nekutyorerwa kodzero dzedu, nekuti bumbiro redu remitemo rinotibvumidza isu sezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe kuita zvimwe zvinhu zvatinoroverwa nemapurisa zuva ne zuva," Muzvare Masarira vaudza Studio 7.
title: Muzvare Lynda Masarira Vanobuditswa Muchipatara

text: Hurumende yeZimbabwe inoti yakagadzirira kubatsira zvaizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kutiza kubva kuUkraine asi zvizvarwa izvi zvave kuchema chema kuti rubatsiro rwacho rwunenge rwave kunonoka kuuya. Hondo iri kuenderera mberi kuUkraine uko kune zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvakawanda zviri kuzvikoro zvepamusoro. Nyika iyi iri kurwiswa neRussia. Zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvichiri muUkraine asi zvimwe zvakapotera kuPoland neRomania kuti zvidzoswe kumusha nehurumende. Zvimwe zvizvarwa izvi zvinoti hazvisati zvawana rubatsiro. Asi munyori mukuru mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko VaNick Mangwana vaudza Studio 7 kuti hurumende yakatumira nhumwa kuPoland kuti inobatsira zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvapinda muhupoteri izvi nemari dzematiketi endege ekuti dzidzokere kumusha. Mauto eRussia akawanda anonzi akananga kuguta guru renyika iyi reKyiv kunyangwe nyika mbiri idzi dzapinda muzuva repiri dzichiita nhaurirano. Nyika dzakawanda dziri kutemerawo russia zvirango zvehupfumi. European Union yati iri kuronga kupa hupoteri kumauto emuRussia anoda chero asina kupara mhosva dzehondo. No media source currently available
title: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe Zviri Kutiza KuUkraine Zvinoti Rubatsiro Rwuri Kunonoka, Asi Hurumende Ichiti Yakatuma Nhume

text: Sangano reNational Constitutional Assembly ronyunyuta nezviri kuitwa meZBC zvekuburitsa chete zviri kuitwa nemudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Grace Mugabe, mamwe mapato asingapihwe mikana yakaenzana sezvinodiwa nemitemo yenyika…. Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri muSouth Africa zvofarira danho raitwa nehurumende yenyika iyi rekuwedzera nguva yekuti vanhu vange vatora magwaro anovabvumidza kugara munyika iyi pasi pechirongwa cheZimbabwe Special Permit….. Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chiri kuNew Zealand chobatsira zvikoro nemabhuku panguva iyo zvinhu zvakaoma munyika…. Muchirongwa cheLiveTalk na 8:30pm tiri kutaura pamusoro perusara rwuri kuitwa neZBC iyo isiri kupa mamwe mapato ezvematongerwo nyika mukana wekuburitswa panhepfenyuro iyi sezvinodiwa nemitemo yenyika…. Iyi ndiyo misoro yenhau dzedu dzanhasi...munotibata pa 909 am, 4930, kana pa 13860, ne 15460 Kilohertzs pa Shortwave kana paFacebook page yedu yevoa Shona. No media source currently available
title: Misoro yeNhau, Chitatu, Mbudzi 25, 2015

text: Mubatanidzwa wemapato anopikisa weMDC Alliance uri kuita musangano kuEpworth paDomboramwari nemusi weSvondo kuyedza kutsvaga rutsigiro musarudzo dzinonzi nemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa dzinogona kuitwa mukati memwedzi mishanu. VaMorgan Tsvangirai ndivo vakasarudzwa kumiririra mubatanidzwa uyu musarudzo. Asi parizvino muMDC-T mune kusawirirana sezvo vamwe vari kuramba kuti vaba tane nemamwe mapato akaita sePDP neMDC inotungamirwa namuzvinafundo Welshman Ncube. Mumwe wevatevedzeri wemutungamiri weMDC VaNelson Chamisa avo vati hurongwa hwemusi weSvondo kutanga kuparura zvirongwa zvakadai kune mamwe matunhu munyika. Asi veAlliance vanoti mapurisa akavarambidza kuita musangano kuGlen View pasina chikonzero chakati tsvikiti. Hatina kukwanisa kubata mapurisa kuti tinzwe divi ravo. No media source currently available
title: MDC Alliance Yoita Musangano kuEpworth neMusi weSvondo

text: Zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kurarama neHIV/AIDS muBotswana zvinoti zviri kudawo kuti zvipihwe pachena mushonga unoderedza hukasha hweHIV/AIDS. Muongororo yakaitwa neStudio7 mumaguta eFrancistown neGaborone, ayo anogara vanhu vakawanda vekuZimbabwe, inoratidza kuti vanhu vakawanda vari kukumbira rubatsiro kuvakuru vemadhorobha aya. Meya weguta reGaborone, VaKagiso Thutwe, vanoti ichokwadi kuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe nezvimwe zvinobva kune dzimwe nyika, zviri kuda rubatsiro urwu. Izvi zvinotsigirwa nameya weFrancistown, Amai Sylvia Muzila, avo vanoti vanhu vakawanda vekune dzimwe nyika, kusanganisira Zimbabwe, vari kuuya kwavari vachikumbira kuti vapihwewo mishonga iyi pachena. Mumwe anorarama nekuita mabasa emaoko muGaborone, VaMoses Chamunorwa, vanoti vanhu vakawanda vari kuuya kuBotswana vaine shuviro yekuwana mishonga, sezvo muZimbabwe muri kuitwa huori pakupa vanhu mishonga iyi. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi reNational AIDS Council of Zimbabwe panyaya yehuori inonzi iri kuitika pakupihwa kwevanhu mishonga yema Antiretroviral Drugs, ARVs. Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe, Muzvare Celestine Mupandawana, vanoti Botswana inobata zvakanaka chose zvizvarwa zvayo zvinoda mishonga yema ARVs. Muzvare Mupandawana vanoti izvi ndizvo zviri kupa kuti vekunze vauye kuBotswana kuitira kuti vawane mishonga iyi. Asi chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chisina kuda kudomwa nezita nokuda kwekuti chinorarama neHIV/AIDS, chinoti dambudziko remari ndiro rinoita kuti vamwe vasakwanise kuenda kumusha kunopihwa mishonga iyi sezvo vanenge vakauya kuBotswana vari pama ARVs kare. Mumwe mugari, Muzvare Venencia Musavengana, vanoti zvimwe zvizvarwa zvenyika yechipikirwa zvava netsika isina kunaka yokungoda kukumbira zvese zvese pane kuti vanobatsirwe kumusha. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano, VaWiston Muzangwa, vanoti kusamira zvakanaka kwezvinhu kuZimbabwe ndiko kuri kukonzera kuti vamwe vaore moyo mukunotsvaga rubatsiro kumusha. Bazi re National AIDS Coordinating Agency rinoti pane vanhu vanosvika zviuru zvitanhatu nemazana mashanu vanobva kunze kweBotswana vari pamishonga yema ARVs, zvikamu makumi matanhatu nezviviri kubva muzana, vari vanhu vekuZimbabwe. Bazi iri rinoti zvizvarwa zveBotswana zvinosvika mazana matatu nemakumi mashanu ezviuru zviri kupihwa mishonga yemaARVs pachena. Pasi pemitemo yenyika, Botswana inopa chete mishonga iyi kuzvizvarwa zvayo, vanhu vekunze vakaroorwa kana kuroora chizvarwa cheBotswana, uye vanhu vari mumajeri. No media source currently available
title: Zvimwe Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe muBotswana Zvodawo Kupihwa Pachena Mishonga Inoderedza Hukasha hweHIV/AIDS.

text: Matare edzimhosva awana vaimbova gurukota rezvematunhu, VaSaviour Kasukuwere, vasina mhosva pamhosva yavanga vachipomerwa yekubuda munyika zvisiri pamutemo. Mutongi wedare ramejasitiriti, Amai Josephine Sande, vatura mutongo wekuti vaimbova gurukota rezvematunhu, VaSaviour Kasukuwere, avo vanga vachipomerwa mhosva yekubuda munyika zvisiri pamutemo, havana mhosva yavakapara. Mutongi wedare ati makasha embumburu dzakashandiswa dzakawanikwa kumba kwaVaKasukuwere pamwe nekuboorwa kwemadziro pamwe nekupwanyika kwakaitwa mahwindo emba yavo kwakakonzerwa nekuridzwa kwakaitwa pfuti munguva yeOperation Restore Legacy zvakazoita kuti vaimbova mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vasiye basa, zvinoratidza kuti hupenyu hwaVaKasukuwere hwakange hwave panjodzi. Mutongi wedare aenderera mberi achiti nehupfumi huna VaKasukuwere uye semunhu anofamba nepasipoti yevanhu vanoremekedzwa, kana kuti diplomatic passport, hazvaikodzera kuti VaKasukuwere vangobuda munyika zviri kunze kwemutemo pasina chikonzero chakati tsvikiti. VaKasukuwere vati vafara zvikuru nemutongo waturwa nedare. VaKasukuwere ndevamwe vemakurukota ehurumende akatiza munyika pakaitwa chirongwa che Operation Restore Legacy nemasoja achitungamirwa nemukuru wawo panguva iyi, VaConstantino Chiwenga, avo vakazoitwa mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika mushure mekunge VaMugabe vapidigurwa pachigaro. VaKasukuwere vakazodzoka munyika mwedzi wapera mushure mekupedza mwedzi mitanhatu vari kunze kwenyika kwavakaenda muhupoteri. No media source currently available
title: VaKasukuwere Vanowanikwa Vasina Mhosva

text: Nhengo dzebMDC-T dzinodarika zana dzaratidzira pamuzinda weGrain Marketing Board, GMB, kudunhu reMutasa kuManicaland dzichinyunyuta nekunyimwa kwadziri kuitwa chibage nefotoreza. Nhengo dzebMDC-T dzinodarika zana dzaratidzira pamuzinda weGrain Marketing Board, GMB, kudunhu reMutasa kuManicaland dzichinyunyuta nekunyimwa kwadziri kuitwa chibage nefotoreza. Nhengo idzi dziri kuti zvinhu izvi zviri kugeverwa chete kunhengo dzeZanu PF. Nhengo idzi dzaimba zvakadzama pamuzinda wedura reGMB dziine zvinyorwa zvekunyunyuta maringe nekushayiswa chibage kwavari kuitwa nevanenge vachichigovera kune vanokodzera. Mumwe wevanhu vange vari pamuzinda uyu vachiratidzira, Ambuya Esther Mukoyi, vanoti nguva zhinji vanoshayiswa zvinogoverwa izvi izvo zvinofanira kubatsira vakwegura vakaita savo, pamwechete nechirikadzi uye nherera asi izvi hazvisi kuitika. No media source currently available Ambuya ava vanoti kusafambiswa zvakanaka kwehurongwa hwekugoverwa kwechibage nefotoreza ndizvo zvavasimudza kubva kumba kwavo. Mumwe wevange vari pakuratidzira apo pange pazere mapurisa eZimbabwe Republic Police anodzivirira mhirizhonga, ndiAmai Violet Majo, avo vanoti varwadzikana nekushaiswa chikafu. Amai Majo vanoti vane humbowo hunoratidza kuti vakawanda vasingakodzeri ndivo vari kugara vachipihwa nekuda kwekuti inhengo dzeZanu PF. Amai Judith Chitiyo vange vari mukuratidzirawo kwanhasi vaine chinyorwa chakanzi; “No to unfair food distribution.” Amai ava vanoti mumiriri wehurumende mudunhu ravo haasi kufambisa zvakanaka hurongwa hwekugoverwa kwefotoreza, chibage nezvimwewo zvinotambiriswa vanonetseka. Mudzviti weMutasa, Va Tendai Kapenzi, varamba kutaura neStudio 7 vachiti titaure nemukuru wavo, provincial administrator wedunhu reManicaland, VaFungai Mbetsa. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura naVaMbetsa sezvo runhare rwavo rwange rusiri kusvika pavari. VaAlfred Muchena inhengo yerimwe sangano revarimi kuTsonzo avo vanotarisira kubatsirikana nefotoreza inogoverwa pachena iyi. Asi vanoti nguva zhinji vanonzwa kuti chikwata chavo chevarimi gumi nevashanu chakawana fotoreza iyi kunyangwe vanenge vasina kuitora. VaMuchena vanoti nyaya yehuwori inofanirwa kuguma pakuita mabasa ekubatsira vanoshaya. Kanzura wenharaunda iyi, iyo iri muWard 11, Amai Lilian Chadzingwa vebato reMDC, vanoti vanoshushikana zvakanyanya kwazvo nekutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu. Mumiriri weMutasa Central mudare reparamende, VaTrevor Saruwaka, vanoti nhengo dzebato ravo dzaona zvakakodzera kuti varatidzire senzira yekuendesa shoko kumusoro kuti zvinhu hazvisi kufamba zvakanaka. Vanoti vachasvitsa petisheni kuna VaKapenzi. Vanoti petisheni iyi inoda kuti vose vakavhoterwa zvigaro nevanhu vange vaine chekuita mukufambiswa kwezvekugoverwa kwezvinhu. PaGMB paswera pakavharwa sezvo vanhu vanga vachiratidzira vakaisa musasa pamusuwo wekupinda mumuzinda uyu. Mapurisa angangosvika gumi nemashanu ange ari kuona zvange zvichiitika ari chinhambwe ukuwo, vasori nematikitivha vange vari mukati mevanhu vachiona zvange zvichiitika izvi.
title: Nhengo dzeMDC-T Dzoratidzira paMutasa GMB Dzichiti Chibage Ngachipihwe Munhu Wese Pasina Rusarura

text: Mutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica VaDonald Trump nhasi vaparura hurongwa hwemamiriro akaita nyika yeAmerica kana kuti State of the Union Address mudare reCapitol, Washington DC. Aka ndekekutanga VaTrump vachitura mashoko akadai kunyika kubva zvavakatora mhiko gore rapera. VaTrump vakati vari kufara kuti hupfumi hwenyika yawo huri kufamba zvakanaka zvichiratidza kuti gwara rehupfumi ravakatora rekusimbisa kuti America pamberi kana kuti America First riri kushanda. VaTrump vati vanhu vakwanisa kuwanawo mabasa.  Panyaya yevapoteri vakauya muAmerica vari vadiki nevabereki vainge vasina mapepa, VaTrump vati vachayedza kushanda nedare reHouse of Assembly neSenate kuunza mutemo wekugadzirisa nyaya iyi. Vapoteri ava parizvino vari pasi pechirongwa chinombomira kuvadzinga muAmerica asi chave kusvika kwamvura yacheka makumbo chinonzi Deferred Action for Childhood Arrivals kana kuti DACA. Asi VaTrump vati vacharwisa vamwe vanoita zvehugehenga vanonzi MS13 avo vanopinda muAmerica zvisiri pamutemo vouraya vanhu. VaTrump vataurawo nenyaya iri kunetsa muAmerica yavari kuongororwa neimwe komiti yekuti mukukunda kwavakaita sarudzo vachinzi vaibatsirwa neRussia. Varamba nyaya yekuti vaibatsirwa vachiti vakangokunda Amai Hillary Clinton vemaDemocrats zvine mutsindo. VaTrump vatiwo vanoda kuti mapato ose emuAmerica aite mubatira pamwe chuma chemuzukuru, maDemocrats nemaRepublicans. VaTrump vatiwo hurumende yavo yakabudirira kurwisa nekukunda chikwata chinopfurikidza mwero cheISIS. Vachipindurawo mashoko aVaTrump aya, nhengo yedare reHouse of Assembly VaJoseph Kennedy the Third vataura vakamirira maDemocrats vati VaTrump vari kuunza kusabatana munyika nemitemo yavo. Amai Elizabeth Guzman vekudare reVirginia House of Delegates vataura vakamirira maDemocrats mururimi rweSpanish vati mitemo yaVaTrump inoomesera vapoteri vekune dzimwe nyika. Studio 7 yataura nezvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri muAmerica kuti tinzwe pfungwa dzavo. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi Dr Elliot Masocha vanodzidzisa nyaya dzezvehupfumi vanoti mitemo yaVaTrump inobatsira vapfumi vemuAmerica kunyanaya asi varombo vachinonga svosve nemuromo. Doctor Frenk Guni avo vari muno muWashington DC vatiwo zvataurwa naVaTrump zvekuti vachanyima mari yerubatsiro kunyika dzisingawirirane navo zvikuru panyaya yekudyidzana kwavo neIsrael zvinogona kukanganisa dzimwe nyika dzemuAfrica. VaZvidzai Ruzvidzo vanogara kuOhio vaudzawo Studio 7 kuti mitemo yaVaTrump ichaomesera zvizvarwa zvekune dzimwe nyika zvine mapepa sezvo zvinenge zvisingachabvumidzwe kuunza vabereki nedzimwe hama. Mutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica muna Ndira gore rega rega anotura mashoko emamiriro ezvinhu kana kuti State of the Union. No media source currently available
title: VaTrump Voparura Hurongwa hweMamiriro Akaita Zvinhu muAmerica

text: Masangano evarairidzi anoti reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe kana kuti PTUZ ne Amalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe kana kuti ARTUZ ari kushora zvikuru gurukota rezvevashandi VaPaul Mavima ekuti varairidzi vasiri kuenda kumabasa vachanyimwa mari yepamwedzi uye mabhonasi. Varairidzi vari kuramwa mabasa vachiti mari dzavo dzemihoro hadzikwane kuti vashande mazuva ose. VaMavima vanoti vePublic Service Commission vange vachinyora mazita evarairidzi vasiri kuenda kumabasa. Muzvinafundo Mavima vakataura mashoko aya kubepanhau reSunday News. Hatina kukwanisawo kunzwa kuna Muzvinafundo Mavima mbune sezvo vange vasati vapindura mubvunzo watavatumira apo taenda pamhepo. Asi Zimbabwe iri pakati pekuongororwa neAmerica nenyaya yekutyora kodzero dzevashandi zvichapa kuti ikabatwa nemhosva ibviswe panyika dzinokwanisa kutengesa zvinhu kuAmerica pasina muripo pasi pechibvumirano cheGeneralized System of Preferences kana kuti GSP. Mutungamiri wePTUZ Doctor Takavafira Zhou vati zviri kuitwa nehurumende zvinotyora bumburo remitemo nezvibvumirano zveUnited Nations. No media source currently available Mashoko aya atsinhirwa nemunyori mukuru weARTUZ VaRobson Chere vati vanogona kuendesa hurumende kumatare ikaramba yakatsika madziro panyaya iyi. VaChere vati havatarisire kuti hurumende iite izvi apo svondo rino vari kutarisira kuita hurukuro nevamwe kubva kuhofisi yemutungamiri wenyika nezvekuramwa mabasa kwavo nenyaya yemihoro yavari kutambiriswa. No media source currently available
title: Varairidzi Voshora Hurumende neKuda Kuvanyima Mari DzeMihoro neMabhonasi

text: Rimwe sangano rinomirira vashandi pasi rose, reInternational Trade Union Confederation, (ITUC) rinoti rinoshoropodza zvikuru danho riri kutorwa nemakanzuru emunyika rekubvisa vanotengesera mumigwagwa, zvichitevera kurudziro yemutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe. Nekuda kwechiitiko ichi, sangano iri svondo rapera rakanyorera VaMugabe tsamba richiratidza kunyunyuta kwaro uye kuvayeuchidza kuti kuita uku kutyora bumbiro remitemo yenyika pamwe nebumbiro repasi rose. Mutsamba yavo kuna VaMugabe, munyori mukuru weITUC, Amai Sharan Burrow, vakati sangano ravo rino kurudzira kuti hurumende imise kudzingwa kwevanhu mumigwagwa, uye kuti itore matanho ose anokodzera ekuona kuti vanhu vose ivava vawaniswa pekushandira. Mutewedzeri wechipiri wemunyori weZimbabwe Congress of Trade Union, ZCTU, VaThomas Masvingwe, vanoti sangano ravo rinotsigira chose kurudziro yeITUC iyi sezvo vashandi vazhinji vakarasikirwa nemabasa vave kurarama nekutengesa mumigwagwa. VaMasvingwe vanoti kunyange hazvo vasingatarisire kuti VaMugabe vangateerera zviri kukurudzirwa neITUC, danho irori rinogona kuitakuti VaMugabe vasazoremekedzwa nevamwe pasi rose. No media source currently available
title: ZCTU Inotsigira Kurudziro yeITUC Yekusashungurudza Vanotengesera Mumigwagwa

text: Vaimbova mutauriri weZanu-PF, VaRugare Gumbo, avo vakadzingwa vachinzi vanotsigira vaimbova mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Joice Mujuru, vanoti Amai Mujuru vakadzingwa neChina nekuti bato iri riri kutadza kugadzirisa mapazi aro epasi nekuti vanhu vakawanda vanotsigira Amai Mujuru. No media source currently available VaGumbo vanotiwo muZanu-PF hamuna munhu angamire musarudzo naAmai Mujuru muna 2018 akabudirira. Mutauriri weZanu-PF,VaSimon Khaya Moyo, vanoti Amai Mujuru vakadzingirwa nyaya yekuda kubvisa nechisimba mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, pamwe nekuita chirongwa chinonzi bhora musango chekuti vanhu vasavhotere Zanu-PF, kukurudzira zvikwata zvinorwisana mubato, huori nezvimwe. Asi Amai Mujuru vari kuramba mhosva dzose dzavari kupomerwa idzi uye havanawo kuendeswa kumatare ebato kuti vatongwe. Hatina kukwanisa kubata Amai Mujuru kuti tinzwe divi ravo. Amai Mujuru vakadzingwa semutevedzeri waVaMugabe muhurumende zvicitevera kongiresi yeZanu PF yakaitwa muna Zvita.
title: VaGumbo Votaura Zvichitevera Kudzingwa muZanu PF Kwakaitwa Amai Mujuru

text: Pave nemaonero akasiyanasiyana pamusoro pechirongwa chebazi rezvedzidzo yepasi chekuti vana vanofanirwa kuenda kufomu yekutanga vave kufanirwa kutsvaga nzvimbo yechikoro vachishandisa dandemutande, kana kuti indaneti. Pave nemaonero akasiyanasiyana pamusoro pechirongwa chebazi rezvedzidzo yepasi chekuti vana vanofanirwa kuenda kufomu yekutanga vave kufanirwa kutsvaga nzvimbo yechikoro vachishandisa dandemutande, kana kuti indaneti. Danho iri rinoreva kuti zvekufambira muzvikoro vachitsvaga nzvimbo dzevana vavo hazvichadikwi. Vamwe vabereki pamwe nemasangano anomirira varairidzi vari kushoropodza chirongwa che Electronic Minisrty Application Platform, kana kuti eMap ichi, icho chakaparurwa gore rino negurukota rezvedzidzo yepasi, VaLazarus Dokora, vachiti hachina kushambadzwa zvakakwana. Vari kushoropodza chirongwa ichi vanotiwo chinosiya kunze vana vari kumaruwa kusina mukana wekushandisa dandemutande. Asi vari kutsigira chirongwa ichi vanoti chinorerutsira vabereki nevana nekuti vanenge vasisapedzi nguva nemari vachipinda muzvikoro vachitsvaga nzvimbo. Vanoti chimwe chinobatsira pachirongwa ichi ndechekuti chinovhara huwori hunonzi hwanga huchiitwa nezvimwe zvikoro kuti mwana awane nzvimbo yeForm One. Chirongwa ichi chinopa mukana wekuti mwana atsvage nzvimbo kuzvikoro zvitatu zvaanoda. Pazvikoro zvitatu izvi, chimwe chete ndicho chinozomupindura chichimupa nzvimbo, zvichienderana nekuti zvikoro zvacho zvinenge zvichitarisireyi kubva kumwana. Asi mumazuva matatu adarika, zvinonzi dandemutande rekupinda muchirongwa ichi harisi kuwanikwa, izvo zvinonzi zviri kupa dambudziko kune vana nevabereki vanga vasati vanyoresa. Mutungamiri werimwe sangano revarairidzi, reZimbabwe Democratic Teachers Union, VaGeorge Mushipe, vanoti sangano ravo harina kupihwawo mukana wekuisawo pfungwa dzaro muhuruongwa uhwu. No media source currently available
title: Vabereki Vonetseka neChirongwa Chekunyoresa Vana Muzvikoro Vachishandisa Indaneti

text: Chikonzi chehurumende, deputy sheriff, chasecha neChina mahofisi ekambani yenhau yeThe Source chichitsvaga magwaro ayo chinoti akanikwa zviri kunze kwemutemo nevatori venhau vekambani. No media source currently available The Source yakaburitsa nyaya mbiri pamusoro pekambani yeEconet nebhanga reSteward masvondo mashona apfuura. Chikonzi chehurumende change chasecha chichibatsirwa nemagweta eEconet neSteward Bank, pamwe nemapurisa. Izvi zvaitika vatori venhau pamwe nevanorwira kodzero dzevanhu vakawanda vakatarisa. Izvi zvaitwa mushure mekunge Econet yapihwa mvumo yekuita izvi nedare reHigh Court musi wa 16 Kurume. Izvi zvaitikawo zuva rimwe chete mushure mekunge dare rambomira kupa mutongo pachikumbiro che The Source chekuti nyaya iyi inzwikwe mudare reConstitutional Court. Masangano evatori evanhau anoti ari kushushikana kuti vemakambani vave kubatana nehurumende mukushungurudza vatori venhau munyika. Munyori mukuru weZimbabwe Union of Journalists, Va Foster Dongozi, vanoti kuita kwakadai kunozvidza kodzero dzevatori venhau. Sachigaro wesangano reMedia Institute of Southern Africa – Zimbabwe, VaKumbirai Mafumba, vati vanosuwiswa zvikuru nechiitiko chanhasi. Gwete reThe Source, VaChris Mhike, vaudza Studio7 kuti kunyange hazvo Econet yange iine mvumo yekusecha mahofisi aya, vanoshushikana kuti kambani iyi nemapurisa vazopedzesera vave kuverenga dzimwe tsamba nezvimwe zvinhu zvange zvisinei neEconet kana Steward Bank. Steward Bank yakaenda kudare ichikumbira kuti dare rimise The Source kuburitsa nyaya dzine chekuita nemashandisirwo emari dzebhanga kuvakwereti vakaita samuzvinabhizimisi VaPhilip Chiyangwa, avo vane kambani ye Pinnacle Property Holdings, ine chikwereti kubhanga iri. The Source yakaburitsawo nyaya inoti hurumende yakakwereta mari inoita mamiriyoni makumi matatu emadhora kuEconet, iyo yakazopihwa hurumende kuburikidza nebhanga re Econet, re Steward. Banga re Steward riri pasi pekambani ye Econet Wireless Zimbabwe, inova kambani yamuzvinabhizinesi ane mukurumbira pasi rose, VaStrive Taputaira Masiyiwa. VaMhike vanoti Econet inoti nyaya iyi yakanyorwa pachishandiswa magwaro ainge abiwa. The Source isangano renhau dzakarerekera kumari nemabhizinesi. Zvichakadai, vatori venhau munyika varatidza kusafara nezvaitika uye vati vacharatidzira neChishanu pamuzinda wekambani iyi muHarare.
title: Chikonzi Chinosecha Mahofisi eThe Source muHarare

text: Mapurisa eZimbabwe Republic Police anoti vanhu vana vakawanikwa vakafa nezuro mumugwagwa weHarare Nyamapanda paSuswe Pass kuMudzi. Mumashoko kuvatori vanhau, mapurisa anoti ongororo yavakaita inoratidza kuti vanhu ava vanogona kunge vari zvizvarwa zvedzimwe nyika vainge vakavigwa mumotokari mushure mekupinzwa munyika zvisiri pamutemo vachibva vatadza kufema zvakapa kuti vafe. Mitumbi yavo yakabva yakandwa musango. Mapurisa anoti akumbira rubatsiro kubva kusangano remapurisa pasi rose reInterpol. Mapurisa anoti akasunga vamwe vanhu vaitengesa zvinodhaka zvisingabvumidzwe kana kuti cocaine nemusi weMuvhuro. Vakasungwa ava vanoti Honest Shumba, Allen Shuma nechimwe chizvarwa chekunze Stanley Eze. Vakasungwa kuzvimbo yekusanana kana kuti lodge muna David Morgan Crescent kuAvondale. Cocaine iyi yaive yemari inodarika mamiriyoni mashanu nezviuru mazana mashanu yemunyika kana kuti 5,8 million mumadhora emunyika.
title: Vanhu Vana Voonekwa Vakafa Musango kuMudzi

text: Vamwe vechidiki vaviri vange vari pachirongwa cheMandela Washington Fellowship vakaita hurukuro yeBudiriro mumatunhu nekodzero dzevanhu pamuzinda weAmerica muHarare nemusi weChipiri. Vaviri ava igweta muzvare Tariro Tandi naVaVivid Gwede vanoshanda nesangano reZimRights. ​VaGwede vanoti musangano wavo wakazeya mafambiro ari kuita nyaya dzinosanganisira dzekodzero dzevanhu, nyaya dzehutongo hwejekerere ne nyaya dzebudiriro. VaGwede vanoti vane zvizhinji zvavakadzidza kuAmerica pavakange vari pamusangano weMandela Washington Fellowship For Young African Leaders gore rino zvichavabatsira mukuyenzanisa mafambiro ari kuita zvinhu munyika nezviri kuitika munyika dzakabudirira. VaGwede nevamwe zvimwe zvizvarwa zvemuZimbabwe zvinosvika makumi matanhatu vakabatana nevamwe vechidiki vanosvika chiuru kubva kunyika dzemuAfrica kupinda muchirongwa ichi. "Nhasi tawana mukana wekuzeya nevechidiki vanobva kuzvikoro zvepamusoro nevamwewo pamusoro nyaya dzekumbunyikidzwa kwekodzero dzevanhu, budiriro ne hutongi hwejechetere," VaGwede vaudza Studio 7. Zvichakdaro, chirongwa chitsva che Mandela Washington Fellowship For Young African Leaders chiri kutarisirwa kuvhurwa kupera kwemwedzi uno uye vanoda kupinda machirongwa ichi vanokwanisa kunyorera kumuzinda weAmerica uri muHarare. No media source currently available
title: Vechidiki veYALI Voita Hurukuro yeKuzeya Nyaya Dzekuchengetedzwa Kwekodzero dzeVanhu neBudiriro

text: Sangano re Zimbabwe Election Support Network, ZESN, rinoti sarudzo dzekutsvaga mumiriri we Mutoko North muparamende dze by-election dzatanga nenguva uye zvikwanisiro zvese zvinoshandiswa pasarudzo zvanga zviripo. Asi mukuru wesangano iri, Amai Rindai Chipfunde-Vava vanoti sangano ravo rinoshushikana nehuwandu hwevanhu vabatsirwa kuvhota uyewo nekupindira kwemasabhuku, ayo anga achishanda akamirira bato reZanu PF sema election agent. Amai chipfunde-vava vanoti zvakadai izvi zvinogona kunge zvatadzisa vamwe vanhu kuenda kunovhota vakasununguka. Sarudzo dzekuMutoko North dzanga dziri dzekutsvaga anotora chonzvimbo chakasiiwa naAmai Mable Chinomona veZanu PF, avo vave mutungamiri wedare reseneti. Vakwikwidza musarudzo dzekuMutoko North ndaVaEdson Chigoma vebato reNCA, VaBoniface Mushore veMDC naAmai Rambidzai Nyabote veZanu PF. Zvabuda musarudzo zviri kutarisirwa kuzivikanwa mukubuda kwezuva nemusi weSvondo. No media source currently available
title: ZESN Inoti Paita Huwandu paVanhu Vabatsirwa kuVhota muSarudzo dze By-Election kuMukoto North

text:
Musangano webato reZapu wekusarudza vatungamiri vebato iri vatsva watanga muBulawayo nhasi vamwe vatungamiri vemapato anopikisa vange vari pamusangano uyu, pamwe nevatsigiri vebato vachiti zvakakosha kuti mapato anopikisa munyika abatane kuti akwanise kubvisa bato reZanu PF pakutungamira nyika. Musangano uyu watanga nguva dzemangwanani vatsigiri vebato iri vachiratidza kufara nechiitiko ichi.

Musangano uyu ndewechipiri kubvira pakamutsurudzwa bato reZapu mugore ra2008. Musangano wekutanga wekusarudza vatungamiri vebato iri wakaitwa muna 2010, uye musangano wanhasi wazoitwa nushure megore sezvo bato iri rakatadza kuita musangano uyu gore rakaperabnekuda kwekushaya mari. Vamwe vatsigiri vebato iri vange vari pamusangano uyu vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanotarisira kuti vatungamiri vachasarudzwa vachaita hurongwa hwemushandirapamwe nemanwe mapato anopikisa. Vati vanotarisirawo kuti bato iri richabatsira kuti kuzadzikiswa kwekuendeswa kwemasimba kumatunhu kuri mubumbiro remitemo yenyik kuzadzikiswe. Mumwe wevatsigiri ava ndevamwe vangozvidoma nezita rekuti Ambuya Kapuya vekuChitungwiza avo vati vanotarisira kuti bato reZapu richabatana nevamwe mukuedza kubvisa bato reZanu PF muhutogi, vachiti kutadza kutungamira nyika kwebato iri ndiko kuri kuita kuti veruzhinji vaomerwe nehupenyu.

Mashoko aya atsinhirwa navaGideon Sibanda mutauriri wesangano reiBhetshulikazulu avo vange varipowo pamusangano uyu.

VaSibanda vati vanotarisira kuti vatsigiri vebato reZapu vachapa vatungamiri vavo rutsigiro rwose kuti vabatane nemanwe mapato anopikisa mukuyedza kuburitsa nyika mumatambufziko ayiri.

Vatungamiri vemapato anopikisa ari pasi pemubatanidzwa unoziikanwa kunzi CODE kusanganisira vaSimba Makoni, vaWelshman Ncube pamee navaGodden Moyo vange varipowo pakutanga kwemusangano uyu.

Mumashoko avo erutsigiro vaMakoni avo vanove mutungamiri weCODE pari zvino, vati bato reZapu rine nhoroondo yakajeka sebato rekutanga kurwira rusununguko rwevanhu munyika.
Vatiwo kuuya kwavaita pamusangano weZapu uyu mucherechedzo weshiviro yavo yekuti mapato anopikisa ashande pamwe chete mukugadzirisa nyika.

Sarudzo dzemutungamiri webato iri pamwe nezvimwe zvigaro dzinotarisirwa kuitwa mangwana. VaDumiso Dabengwa avo vakamutsutudza bato iri vachitsutsumwa nekusabatwa zvakanaka kwenhengo dzeveZapu mumubatanidzwa wavo pasi peZanu PF ndivo mutungamiri webato iri pari zvino.

Hapana ati anyatsobuda pachena kuti achakwikwidza vaDabengwa asi vanoziva zviri kuituka vanoti munyori mukuru webato iri vaRalph Mguni, avo vanogara kuUnited Kingdom, vari kudawo chigaro chehutungamiri. Musangano uyu unotarisirwa kupera neChishanu. No media source currently available
title: ZAPU Yoparura Musangano Wayo weKongiresi kuBulawayo

text: Kanzuru yeHarare yambomisa vamwe vatungamiriri veZimbabwe Urban and Rural Council Workers Union vanove ana mukoti mukanzuru iyi basa. Vana mukoti vekanzuru yeHarare ava vari kupomerwa mhosva yekupesvedzera vamwe kuti vasaende kubasa mukuramwa mabasa kwakatanga musi wa 4 Mbudzi. Ikozvino vashandi vakawanda havasi kuenda kumabasa vachiti havana mari dzacho. Mumatsamba ekumiswa basa avawana, kanzuru inoti yavamisa basa kwemazuva makumi matatu asi vachiwana mihoro yavo kuti vaongorere kuti vane chekuita nekusauya kubasa kwavanamukoti vekanzuru ava. Mutungamiriri weZURCWU, VaSimbarashe Jame Tafirenyika vati vatambira kumiswa basa kwavo vachipomera kanzuru mhosva yekutyisidzira vanomirira kodzero dzevashandi. VaTafirenyika vati zvinovakatyamadza kuti vangapomerwa mhosva yekunyengera vamwe vashandi vachiti kusakwana kwemari dzemihoro ndokunosunda mushandi wega wega kuti ade kuwedzerwa mari. Mumwezve amiswa basa Amai Yeukai Nyamhunga vanova nyamukuta vaudza Studio 7 kuti mihoro yavo haina zvaichaita nekuda kwekukwira kuri kuita zvinhu zuva nezuva. Amai Nyamhunga vakurudzira kanzuru kuti iite hurukuro navo. Mabharani mukuru wekanzuru VaHosiah Chisango vaudza Studio 7 kuti vambomisa basa nhengo dzeZURCWU idzi vachiti vashandi ava havana kutevedzera nzira dzinotarisirwa pakuramwa mabasa. Kuramwa mabasa kwevakoti vekanzuru uku kwakauya panguva iyo vana chiremba kuzvipatara zvehurumende vasiri kuendewo kumabasa izvo nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano dzinoti kutyora kodzero dzevarwere zvakanyanya. Zvipatara zvekanzuru ndizvo zvinotanga kuonekwa varwere vasati vaenda kuzvipata zvikuru zvakaita seParirenyatwa neHarare Central. No media source currently available
title: Kanzuru yeHarare Yomisa Basa Vatungamiri veVashandi neNyaya yeKuramwa Mabasa KwavanaMukoti

text: Reserve Bank of Zimbabwe, RBZ, iri kuramba mashoko ekuti iri kudhinda mari muchivande zvinonzi zvatosvora International Monetary Fund, IMF. Mashoko aya ari mubepanhau reFinancial Times. Gavhuna weRBZ, Doctor John Mangudya, vanoti mashoko ari mubepanhau iri manyepo vachiti mari mumabhanga emunyika iri kutoita shoma zvinoratidza kuti hapana chiri kudhindwa. Vanoti akanyora anenge aida kusvibisa zita renyika. Mashoko aya ari kuuya apo nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinoti mashoko eIMF ekuti Zimbabwe yatora gwara risiriiro panyaya dzezvehupfumi munongedzo wekuti kugadzirisa nyaya dzezvehupfumi kuchatora makore akawanda. IMF inoti zvakawanda zvayainge yataurirana neZimbabwe kuti igadzirise hupfumi hwavo hazvisi kugadziriswa. Nyaya yehuori inonziwo iri kupa kuti zvirongwa zvakaita secommand agriculture zvigume zvanokorwa mari pasina chabuda kuminda. Vaimbova gurukota rezvemari, uye vari mutevedzeri wemutungamiri webato reMDC, VaTendai Biti, vanoti zvinhu zvainge zvisina kumira zvakanaka kuIMF pakaturwa gwaro iri. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi uye vari mukuru wesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Godfrey Kanyenze, vanotiwo vanowirirana neIMF kuti hupfumi hweZimbabwe huchanetsa kuti hukure gore rino sezvakataurwa nehurumende. Zimbabwe iri kutatarikawo kubhadhara zvikwereti zvayo kumabhanga akaita seIMF, African Development Bank, Paris Club nemamwe zvopa kuti kuikweretesa mari kunetse. Kana nyika dzakaita seChina dzinodyidzana neZimbabwe dzave kurambawo kuikeretesa mari nekuda kwekusashandisa mari zvakanka uye kusabhadhara zvikwereti. No media source currently available
title: RBZ Yoramba Kuti Iri Kudhinda Mari Muchivande Zvokanganisa Hupfumi

text: Gwaro idzva raburitswa nehurumende rinoti vanhu vari kufa zvakanyanya nechirwere cheCovid 19 vanhu vanenge vasina kubaiwa nhomba dzekudzivirira chirwere. Gwaro iri rinotiwo vana vadiki vave kunyanya kubatwawo nemhando yeDelta variant. Gwaro raburitswa nemukuru anoona nezvekurwisa chirwere cheCovid 19 muhofisi yemutungamiri wenyika, Doctor Agnes Mahomva, riri kudaidzwa kuti “Covid 19 Admissions and Community Deaths by Vaccination Status,” rinoti zvikamu makumi mapfumbamwe kubva muzana zvevanhu vari kupinzwa muchipatara vachirwara nechirwere cheCovid 19, vanhu vasina kubayiwa nhomba. Gwaro iri rinotiwo pavanhu mazana maviri nevanomwe vakaongororwa mushure mekufa nechirwere cheCovid 19, zvikamu makumi masere nezvisere nezvidimu zvipfumbamwe kubva muzana (88.9 percent) vanhu vakange vasina kubayiwa nhomba dzeCovid 19. Gwaro iri rinotiwo pavanhu ava zvikamu zvitatu nezvidimu zvina kubva muzana (3.4 percent) vanhu vakafa vabayiwa nhomba yekutanga chete, uye zvikamu zvina nezvidimu zvisere kubva muzana (4.8 percent) vakafawo nedenda reCovid 19 vabaiwa nhomba yepiri kana kuti second dose. Mugwaro ravo iri, Amai Mahomva vati havazivi kuti zvikamu zviviri nezvidimu zvipfumbamwe (2.9 percent) zvevanhu vavakaongorora ava vakafa vakabaiwa nhomba dzeCovid 19 here kana kuti kwete. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kubata Doctor Mahomva kuti tinzwe zvakawanda pamusoro pegwaro ravo. Asi zvichitevera kubuditswa kwegwaro iri, gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko uye vari mutauriri Cabinet Taskforce on Covid 19, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, vaudza Studio 7 kuti zviri pachena kuti kubayiwa nhomba kunodzivirira ndufu dzine chekuita nedenda iri vakakurudzira veruzhinji kuti vanobayiwa. Mugwaro ravo, Amai Mahomva vatiwo ongororo yavo yakabuditsa pachena kuti kutapuriranwa kwechirwere cheCovid 19 kuri kuita chamurambamhuru mumatunhu ose munyika. Vaimbove gurukota rezvehutano uye vari munyori anoona nezvehutano muMDC Alliance, Doctor Henry Madzorera, vati chave kudikanwa ndechekuti hurumende itore matanho akasimba ekuona kuti vanhu vese vabaiwa nekukasika kuitira kuti vazvidzivirire kudenda iri. Bazi rezvehutano rinoti pane vanhu makumi mapfumbamwe nemumwe chete vakafa nechirwere ichi nezuro, izvo zvasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vafa nechirwere cheCovid 19 pazviuru zviviri nemazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi matanhatu nemumwe chete, (2961). Vanhu zviuru zviviri nemazana maviri nemakumi matanhatu nevashanu, 2265, vakabatwa nechirwere ichi nezuro, izvo zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa neCovid-19 munyika yose pazviuru zvipfumbamwe nezvishanu zvine mazana matanhatu nemakumi masere nevatanhatu (95 686) uye vapora vasvika pazviuru makumi matanhatu nezviviri nemazana mapfumbabwe ane makumi masere nevatanhatu (62 986). Vanhu vabayiwa nhomba yekutanga vave miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana mana nemazana mapfumbabwe nevashanu (1 400 905) uye vabayiwa nhomba yechipiri vave zviuru mazana matanhatu zvine makumi manomwe nechimwe nezana makumi mashanu nevashanu (671 155). Huwandu uhwu hwunogona kukwira manheru nhasi pachaziviswa zvawanikwa muongororo yaitwa munyika yose. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana kuitira kuti chirwere ichi chisarambe chichipararira munyika. No media source currently available
title: Vanhu Vasina Kubayiwa Nhomba yeCovid-19 Vanonzi Ndivo Vari Kufa neChirwere Ichi Zvakanyanyisa

text: Mutungamiri webato guru rinopikisa reMDC Alliance VaNelson Chamisa vanoti havana chivimbo nesangano rinoona nezvesaruzdo munyika reZimbabwe Electoral Commission vachiti rinorerekera divi rimwe chete kunge gakandye. Asi mutauriri weZEC Amai Joyce Kazembe vanoti komisheni yavo yakazvimirira uye ichakoka MDC Alliance yaVaChamisa kumisangano yayo yepamwedzi. Pane mashoko ekuti ZEC yaimbenge yaramba kuti MDC Alliance isapinde mumisangano iyi ichiri harisi bato. Asi mushure memutauro wakanyanya munyika, ZEC inonzi yakazorova nhendeshure. VaChamisa vanoti mitemo yesarudzo inofanira kuvandudzwa sarudzo dzisati dzaitwa asi havasi kuzoregedza kupinda musarudzo dzacho. Vachitaura pane vamwe vakabauda mubato mavo nekutya kudzingwa mudare reparamende kana makanzuru, VaChamisa vanoti havasi kuzovatambira zvekare nekuti varatidza kuti vanoda kuguta kwavo chete. No media source currently available
title: VaChamisa Vanoti Havana Chivimbo neZEC

text: Mudzimai wevaive mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika VaSimon Muzenda, Amai Maud Muzenda vanonzi vashaya nhasi. Amai Muzenda vainge vari mukoti uye vasiya vana vanomwe. Mwana wavo, VaVitalis Muzenda vaudza Studio 7 kuti Amai Muzenda vashaikira kuchipatara cheAvenues Clinic muHarare masikati anhasi. VaVitalis Muzenda vati Amai Muzenda vakamboenda kunorapwa kuSouth Africa mwedzi mitatu yapfuura asi havana kuzombomzwa zvakanaka. Vanhu vanonzi vakaungana panhamba 43 Lewisam Avenue, Chisipiti muHarare. VaSimon Muzenda kana kuti "Doctor Mzee" vakashaya muna 2003 kuchipatara cheParirenyatwa muHarare uye vakaradzikwa kumarinda eHeroes Acre.
title: Amai Maud Muzenda, Mudzimai waVaSimon Muzenda Vanoshaya

text: Dzimwe nhengo dzebato reMDC-T inotungamirirwa naVaDouglas Mwonzora dzinoti dzanyora gwaro kudare reparamende, nekune mamwe mapazi ehurumende, pamwe chete nemapurisa vachiti nyaya yemari inoita mamiriyoni matanhatu emadhora ($6 million) inonzi yakatsakatika mubato iri inofanirwa kutaurwa nezvayo uye vanhu vane mari iyi vaidzore uye vasungwe. VaPatson Murimoga, avo vanoti vari kuita izvi nevamwe vavo vavasina kudoma, vanoti nyaya iyi inofanirwa kuongororwa uye hurumende inofanirwa kutora nyaya iyi nehuremu hwaiinaho. Vanoti kana pasina chaitwa nenyaya iyi, ivo nevamwe vavo vachaenda nenyaya iyi kumutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, avo vanoti vanoratidza kutonga nyaya dzehuori vasina kwavakarerekera. Tabata VaMurimoga kuti tinzwe nezvenyaya iyi uye kuti tinzwisise zvavari kuita pamusoro payo. No media source currently available Tatadza kubata VaMwonzora asi tabata mutauriri wavo, VaLloyd Damba, vakati izvi zvinobva kuvanhu vasina chimiro chekutaura pamusoro penyaya dzakadai. Vati mari dzose dzinoshandiswa nebato ravo dzinoburitswa mushure mekuongororwa nekupiwa mvumo nevanhu vazhinji mubato zvinotadzisa kuti mari ishandiswe neimwe nzira isina kubvumirwa. Vati kuti mari ibudiswe, pane vazhinji vanofanira kuisa ruoko rwavo pakupa mvumo. VaDamba vati vakaudza vanhu ava kuti vauye kuzotarisa vega mabhuku emari yebato iri asi havasi kuuya, vachienda kumapurisa nekuZimbabwe Anti-Corruption Commission kuti vasvibise zita rebato nevatungamiri varo.
title: Vamwe Mubato reMDC-T Vanoda Kuziva Zvakaitika paMari Inonzi Yakatsakatika.

text: Mumwe gadhi ari kuchengetedza munda wemangoda wekambani yehurumende yeZimbabwe Consolidated Diamond Company, anonzi akapfura nemusi weChitatu ndokuuraya varume vaviri pamwe nekukuwadza vamwe vanoda kusvika kumakumi mana vaichera mangoda panze pemunda wekambani yehurumende iyi. Mapurisa epakamba yeMutare Rural haana kuramba kana kubvuma kuti izvi zvakaitika, kunze kwekuti titaure nemutauriri wemapurisa Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi, avo vati vanga vasati vanzwa nezvenyaya iyi. Studio7 yakundikana kubata mutauriri weZimbabwe Consolidated Diamond Company, Va Sugar Chagonda, kuti tinzwe divi ravo. Asi mukuru wesangano reCentre for Natural Resource Governance, VaFarai Maguwu, vanoti sangano ravo rakatambira mashoko ekupfurwa kwevanhu uku, pamwe nekutaura nevamwe vakapona muchiitiko ichi. Nzvimbo iyi inonzi yachengetedzwa nemauto uye hapana ati aziva kuti vakapfurwa ndokufa ava vakaendeswa kupi. VaMaguwu vanoti vatozivisa Kimberley Process nezvekupfurwa nekuurayiwa kwevanhu uku. Kimberley Process inobatanidza masangano akazvimirira pamwe nedzihurumende mukudzivirira kutengeswa kwemangoda eropa. No media source currently available
title: Vanochera Mangoda Vanopfurwa kwaMarange

text:
Mutongi wedare repamusoro kuMasvingo, Justice Neville Wamambo,
varamba kutambira chikumbiro chakanzura weMDC Alliance kuMasvingo, VaGodfrey Kurauone, chekuti vabhadhariswa mari yechibatiso kutitira kuti vatongwe vachibva kumba pamhosva dzavari kupomerwa. Gweta reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights, VaMartin Mureri, vati VaKurauone, avo vanovazve murongi wemisangano yevechidiki muMDC Assembly, vadzoserwa kutirongo zvichitevera kunyimwa mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso.

VaMureri vati mutongi wedare aramba chikumbiro achiti VaKurauone vakapara mhosva yakafanana neimwe yavanayo iri mudare apo vakambopuwa mukana wekutongwa vachibva kumba. Vati vachataura naVaKurauone kuti vakumbire dare kuti ritange kutonga mhosva dzavo nechimbi chimbi. Mutauriri weMDC Alliance muMasvingo, VaDreck Charamba, vati havasi kufara nemutongo wapuhwa nedare. Mukuru musangano rekodzero devanhu reMen365, VaTatenda Baloyi, vatiwo
dare ratyora kodzero dzaVa Kurauone nekuvanyima mukana wekubhara mari chibatiso.

VaKuraone vanotarisirwa kudzoka mudare redzimhosva reMasvingo magistrate neChishanu, panyaya yavo yekutanga yekunyomba mutungamiriri
wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vachivapomera mhosva yekuwondonga nyika. VaKurone vakasungwa musi wa 31 July muMasvingo vachipomerwa mhosva
yekuratidzira uye kutuka VaMnangagwa. Mune imwewo nyaya, kanzuru yeguta reMasvingo inoti yaomerwa zvakare
nekuita mabasa ayo zvizere nenyaya yekushaikwa kwemafuta emotokari
izvo zvoita kuti itadze kutakura marara nemamwe mabasa akakosha. Meya weguta, VaCollen Maboke, vati kushaikwa kwemafuta kuri kukanganisa mabasa avo izvo zviri kupa kuti vagari vagare vachinyunyuta. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa musangano rinomirira vagari, reMasvingo United Residents and Rate Payers Alliance, Muzvare Rumbidzai Magurupira, vati kanzuru inofanira kuwona kuti yagadzirisa dambudziko rekufambiswa kwebasa ayo kuitira kuti vagary vasaomerwa nehupenyu. Vagari vakawanda vari kuchema chema zvikuru vachiti kusatakurwa kwemarara, kushaikwa kwemvura pamwe nekutadza kugadziriswa kwepombi dzesuweji dzinenge dzadhuuka kunogona kuwedzera kuparara kwezvirwere zvakawanda, kusanganisira chirwere che Covid-19 mudhorobha. No media source currently available
title: Nhengo yeMDC Alliance Inonyimwa Mukana weKubhadhara Mari yeChibatiso kuMasvingo

text: Gurukota rezvemari, Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube, svondo rapera neChishanu vakaburitsa gwaro remazano ehurumende yavo pahurongwa hwemari yebhajeti regore rinouya ra2021, re2021 Pre-Budget Strategy Paper 2020, iro rinotarisirwa kubatsira mukutsvagwa kwepfungwa dzeveruzhinji pamusoro pemashandisirwo emari nehurumende mugore rinouya ra2021. Gwaro iri rinovewo zvakare mucherechedzo wekupinda kwehurumende muchirongwa chekuvandudza hupfumi cheNational Development Strategy, icho chinobva muna 2021 kusvika muna 2025, chichitsiva chimwe cheTransitional Stabilisation Programme, (TSP), icho chiri kupera muna Zvita wegore rino. Pazuva rimwechete iri, komiti yeparamende inoona nezvebhajeti, mari nebudiriro yezvehupfumi, kana kuti Portfolio Committee on Budget, Finance and Economic Development, iyo iri kutungamira muhurongwa hwekunzwa pfungwa dzevanhu, yakapetawo hurongwa hwayo hwekunzwa pfungwa dzeveruzhinji nezvavanoda kuti zvinge zviri mubhajeti renyika richashandiswa nehurumende gore rinouya. Nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Proser Chitambara, vanoti zvanga zvichiitwa nekomiti yeparamende izvi zvakakosha zvakanyanya sezvo zvichitevedzera mutemo mukuona kuti munhu wese anzwikwa muzvirongwa zvose zvehurumende zvinovaka nyika. Doctor Chitambara vanoti zvakakoshawo zvikuru kuti muzvirongwa zvakaita sebhajeti renyika pave nekujeka kuitira kuti vanhu vazive zviri kutora nzvimbo. Izvi zvinotsigirwawo nemunyori mukuru wesangano rinomirira vashandi, reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, VaJaphet Moyo, avo vanoti nyika dzinobudirira dzose dzinotoshandisa zvinenge zvabuda muvanhu. Imwe nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi vachidzidzisa pa Durban University of Technology kuSouth Africa, Doctor Gift Mugano, vanoti vari kutarisira kuti bhajeti ra2021 iri richavandudza hupfumi hwenyika, asi vachiti kuti izvi zviitike hurumende inofanirwa kuramba vakamira nehurongwa ihwohwo kusvikira gore rapera, kwete kuzosiya hurongwa ihwohwo pakati pegore. VaMoyo vanowirirana nemashoko aDoctor Mugano aya vachitiwo kazhinji zvinenge zvabva muvanhu hazvisi izvo zvinozobuda zviri mubhajeti renyika pakupedzisira. VaMoyo vanotiwo Zimbabwe haisi nyika iri muhondo asi nguva zhinji bhajeti ravo rinopa mari yakawandisa kubazi rinoona nezvekudziviirirwa kwenyika richisiya mapazi akaita sehutano nedzidzo. Vamwe vevemabhizinisi madiki, veBulawayo Vendors and Traders Association, vatiwo hurumende inofanirwa kukoshesawo vemabhizimusi madiki mubhajeti rayo iri sezvo vaparadzirwa mabhizinesi avo neCovid-19 Sezvo hurongwa hwekuunganidza pfungwa dzevanhu hwakapera, iye zvino gurukota rezvemari Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube, ndivo vave nebasa rekukwenenzvera bhajeti ravo iri vasati varipira kudare reparamende. Kana rakapasiswa neparamende rinenge rotanga kushanda muna Ndira wegore rinouya. Zvimwe zviri mumazano akaparurwa nehurumende zvinosanganisirawo kukura nekugadzikana kwehupfumi, kuchengetedzwa kwechikafu, kuwanisa vanhu pekugara, hutano, kudyidzana nenyika dzekunze pamwe nekuzvitonga kwematunhu. Komiti yeparamende yakapeta hurongwa hwekunzwa pfungwa dzevanhu uhwu musi wa 16 Gumiguru, Chishanu chapfuura, mushure mekuparura hurongwa uhwu musi wa wa 12 Gumiguru mushure mekuita misangano neveruzhinji mumatunhu akasiyanasiyana emunyika. Zvikuru zvinonzi zvakanyanya kubuda mumisangano iyi zvinosanganisira kuti hurumende igadzirise nyaya yezvehutano, zvedzidzo pamwe nekudzikisa mitero inobhadhariswa veruzhinji. Sangano reTransparent International, iro riri kuteverawo zvakadzama hurongwa uhwu, rinoti bhajeti renyika rinofanirwa kuve nezvinotarisirwa neveruzhinji zvakasiyanasiyana, zvikuru varombo, madzimai, vana, vanorarama nehurema pamwe nevakwegura. Dingindira rebhajeti ra2021 rakanangana nekuvaka pamwe nekugadzika kwehupfumi mushure meCovid-19, kana kuti “Building Resilience and Economic Recovery Post COVID-19”.
title: Nyika Yogadzirira Kuparurwa kweBhajeti reGore Rinouya.

text:
Nyaya yekudzimwa dzimwa kwemagetsi nekambani yeZESA inonzi yave kukanganisa zvikuru zvinhu kune zvimwe zvipatara zvakaita seMasvingo uye kumaindustry nyika yose. Mumwe mugari wekuMasvingo, Amai Entrance Takaedza vanoti nekuda kwekunetsa kwemagetsi imba inochengeterwa vashakabvu vasati vatorwa nehama dzavo yave kubudisamweya unonhuwa zvakanyanya pachipatara cheMasvingo General Hospital. Mukoti wepachipatara ichi Muzvare Harina Mafura anoti dambudziko rawedzerwa nekuti magetsi esimba rezuva haasi kushanda zvakanaka zvokanganisa vanenge vachida kuvhiyiwa kana kuvhenekwa kana kuti maX ray. Mukuru mubazi rezvehutano mudunhu reMasvingo VaAmedus Shamu vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanoda nguva yekuona kuti vatatise kuti dzimwe mhando dzemagetsi dzavanoshandisa dzakaita sezuva kana kuti solar uye magenareta zviri kushanda zvakanaka here. Asi vanoshanda kuchipatara chikuru cheParirenyatwa muHarare vati havana havo dambudziko iri parizvino. Zvipatara handizvo chete zvasangana nedambudziko iri sezvo zvinhu zvisinawo kumira zvakanaka kumaindustry. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezve hupfumi VaNyasha Muchichwa vati nyaya yekushaikwa kwe magetsi yave kukanganisa hupfumi hwenyika zvakanyanya.

VaMuchichwa vatiwo magetsi ari kukanganisa zvidzidzo mune zvimwe zvikoro vachiti zvikaramba zvakadai zvinogona kukanganisa avo vakatarisana nekunyora mazamanishoni sema grade 7, form 4 nema form 6. Mumwe mugari wekuMucheke, muMasvingo VaTarisai Mangezi vanotiwo basa ravo riri kukanganiswa zvakanyanya nenyayayemagetsi. Amai Hilda Sibanda vati vari kupedza zuva rose vasina magetsi mudzimba zvopa kuti vatsvage dzimwe nzira dzekuti vakwanise kubika asi zvichidhura.

Sangano rinomiririra vagari reMasvingo United Residents and Rate Payers Alliance(MURRA), rinoti kuenda kwemagetsi kuri kuita kuti vagari vashaiwe mvura mudzimba sezvo ari kudzimwa kuchiteshichinopombwa mvura.

Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa muMURRA, Muzvare Rumbidzai Magurupira vanoti ZESA iri kutyora murawu wekudzima magetsi kunzvimbo dzakakosha sekumvura nechipatara.

Vanoona nezve kufambiswa kwemabasa musangano rinorwira kodzero dzeve chidiki muMasvingo re Community Tolerence and Reconciliation (COTRAD), VaZivanai Muzorodzi vati vechidiki vakawanda vanenge vachida kunyoresa kuvhota varikudzorerwa kudzimba vatadza kunyoresa kuvhota nedambudziko remagetsi Mahofisi akawanda emakanzuru nehurumende haanao basa raari kuita nekudakwekushaikwa kwmagetsi uku. Mutauriri weZESA munyika, Doctor George Manyaya, vati vangevasingakwanisi kutaura neStudio 7 panhare asi vatumira mashoko avo avakabudisa kuvatori venha Mumashoko aya, ZESA inoti kushaikwa kwemagetsi munyika kwakawedzera kutanga musi wa 24 mwedzi uno nenyaya yekufa kwemishina inogaya magetsi kuHwange nekuKariba uye kushaikwa kwemari yekutenga magetsi kubva kunze kwenyika. No media source currently available
title: Kudzimwa kweMagetsi Kwopa Kuti Mamochari Asashande Zvakanaka

text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, neChitatu vakapindawo mugakava rakasimudzwa nemutongo wedare reSupreme Court, wekuti makambani anogona kumisa vashandi mabasa mushure mekuvapa zviziviso zvemwedzi mitatu. Vachitaura kumusangano wevemabhizimusi madiki wakaitirwa muHarare VaMugabe vakati mutemo uyu unodzvinyirira vashandi, uye hurumende yavo iri kushanda kuti ikasike kuushandura kuitira kumisa kurasikirwa kwemabasa nevashandi. Nhengo yeZanu PF uye vachiongorora zvematongerwo enyika, VaGoodson Nguni, vanoti bato ravo pamwe nehurumende yavo zvichaona kuti mutemo uyu washandurwa sezviri kutaurwa nemutungamiri wenyika. Asi mutauriri webato rinopikisa reNational Constitutional Assembly, uye vachiongongorora zvematongerwo enyika, VaMaddock Chivasa, vanoti VaMugabe havafanirwi kuratidza kushamisika nemutemo uyu sezvo wagara uripo pasi pehurumende yavo. Makambani akawanda anonzi ari kushandisa mutongo wedare repamusorosoro iri kumisa vashandi, vazhinji vacho vachienda vasina cheuviri. Kusvika pazviri zvino, vashandi vanopfuura zviuru zvipfumbamwe vakatomiswa mabasa. Vamwe ndivo vave kuti iyo hurumende inenge ine pfungwawo yekutora mukana wekudimura vashandi vayo ichishandisawo mutongo iwoyu, sezvo mari yayo zhinji iri kuperera mumari dzemihoro. Izvi zvinotevera mashoko egurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, ekuti dare remakurukota rakatobvumirana kuti mari inoshandiswa nehurumende kubhadharra vashandi vayo idzikiswe kusvika pazvikamu makumi mana kubva muzana. Pari zvino mari yehurumende inosvika zvikamu makumi masere nezvitatu kubva muzana iri kuenda kumihoro yevashandi vehurumende. No media source currently available
title: VaMugabe Vovimbisa Kuvandudzwa kweMutemo weVashandi neVashandirwi

text: Vamwe vagari vemuguta reMutare kuManicaland vanoti vari kufara zvikuru nemashoko ekanzuru ekuvavakira chikoro chitsva mumusha wavanogara weHobhouse. Vabereki vanoti kuvakwa kwechikoro ichi kuchabatsira vana vavo vange vofamba mitunhu yakareba. Chikoro chitsva ichi chiri kutanga kuvakwa gore rino zvichitevera mitero yaibatirwa vagari nekanzuru inozivikanwa nekuti education levy. Vagari vaibatirwa dhora rimwe chete pamwedzi. Mitero iyi inobatsira nekuwedzera zvikoro zvekanzuru izvo zvange zvave zvishoma zvichipa vana vadiki kuti vafambe vachienda kuzvikoro zviri chinhambwe chiri kure. Pasi pemutemo weUrban Council’s Act pamisha inosvika mazana mashanu ega ega panosungirwa kunge paine chikoro chePrimary. Amai Gladys Matare vanoti vari kutambira nemufaro kuvakwa kwechikoro chitsva. “Ini ndiri kufara zvikuru vagari vekuno kuHobhouse nekuti tinenge tava nechikoro padhuze vachisafambi kuenda kure kucchikoro vana vedu vanenge vave nenguva yakawanda yekuitawo mamwe mabasa pasina kutyira kuti vachatorwa nenzizi kure kwava isienda uye kusangana nemabhinya.” Amai Nelia Mlambo vanoti chikoro chitsva chekanzuru ichi chichabatsira zvakanyanya. “Isu tiri kunzwa kufara maningi nekuti vana vedu vaibira nzizi zvichipa njodzi, saka nekuvapo kwechikoro ichi tinonzwa kurerukirwa samara sevabereki.” VaEdson Nyamana vaimbove kanzura weWard 17 iyo ichange yave nechikoro ichi vanoti kuvapo kwechikoro kuchapa zvakare kuti vabereki varerukirwe nekuchengetedza mari apo vana vaida mari yekufambisa vachiende kuzvikoro zviri kure. “Chinhu chatange takatarisira kumashure uku sezvo nharaunda yedu iri kungokura asi pasina mafacilities anoenderana nekukukura kwavapo. Zvikoro zviri kure zvekuti vamwe vana veGrade One vaitadza kufamba mitunhu iyi, parizvino tave kutotarisira kuti kanzuru irambe ichiwedzera zvimwe zvikoro.” VaNoel Nezomba mumwe mubereki wemumusha weHobhouse vanoti kanzuru inofanira kusimbisa kuvaka nzvimbo dzekutandarira. “Ini semubereku ndinoona zvakanaka zvikuru sezvo tirikuona musha wedu urri kungokura usina mamwe mapublic facilities atinenge tichida kushandisa. Tiri kuona kuti kanzuru iri kugona mukubata mabasa ayo kana ichiita saizvi.” VaJohn Nyamhoka ndivo kanzura weWard 17 umo muri kuzovakwa chikoro ichi. Kanzura Nyamhoka vaudza Studio 7 kuti kanzuru yatove nemari muhomwe. “Mari iripo so far muhomwe yekanzuru inosvika $120 000 kuti tiite channel towards kuvakiwa kwechikoro chitsva ichi. Chikoro ichichange chichizonzi Hobdale primary school icho chichazonge chiri muWard 17 muno.” Kanzuru yeMutare ine humwe hurongwa hwekuvaka chimwe chikoro zvakare mumusha weGreenside Extension zvichitevera huwandu wevanhu. Parizvino musha uyu une chikoro chimwe chete cheMutare Junior Primary School. No media source currently available
title: VaGari vekwaMutare Vofarira Chikoro Chitsva Chiri Kuda Kuvakwa neKanzuru Yavo

text: Sangano remu South Africa rinozviti Put South Africa First nhasi raratidzira pamuzinda webazi rinoona nezvemukati menyika iyi, uri muguta rePetoria, apo raendesa zvinyunyuto zvaro zvinosanganisira kurudziro yekuti bazi iri rinofanira kutorera zvizarwa zvekune dzimwe nyika zviri kugara sevapoteri, magwaro anozvibvumidza kugara munyika iyi. Nhengo dzesangano iri, dziri kupomera mhuri dzeZimbabwe, Lesotho neMozambique, mhosva yekutorero zvizvarwa zveSouth Africa mabasa, kupara dzimhosva pamwe nekusvipisa madhorobha emuSouth Africa, uyewo riri kukurudzira kuti vasiri zvizvarwa zveSouth Africa vanofanira kudzokera kunyika dzavo. Zvimwe zvinyunyuto zvesangano iri zvinosanganisira kurudziro yekuti vose varimuhupoteri neavo vachiri kutsvaga hupoteri munyika eSouth Africa vaiswe mumakamba. Mutauriri wesangno iri VaMario Khumalo vudza Studio 7 kuti vamwe vanhu vekunze vanoba, kuuraya vanhu pamwe nekukanganisawo hupfumi hwenyika. Chiitiko ichi, chasiya vagari vemuSouth Africa, vanobva kunyika idzi vasina mate mumukanwa, kusanganisira chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe, charamba kudomwa nezita, icho chaudza Studio 7 kuti chave nemakore gumi nemashanu chichigara muSouth Africa. Sachigaro wesangano reZimbabwe Exiles Forum, VaGabriel Shumba, vaudza Studio 7 kuti muitiro wesangano iri ndewe kuda kudyara ruvengo. VaShumba vaenderera mberi nekushora hurumende yeSouth Africa nekushaya hanya kwayo nechiitiko chakadai vakati izvi zvino wanzoitika kana nyika iyi yave kuda kuenda kusarudzo. Vaenderera mberi vachiti kana South Africa ichitadza kugadzirisa dambudziko iri, masangano akaita seSadc neAfrican Union ndiwo anofanira kuzeya kana kugadzirisa nyaya iyi. Studio 7 haina kuwana mhinduro kubva kumutauriri webazi rinoona nezvemukati menyika yeSouth Africa, VaDavid Hlabane, sezvo vanga vasingadavire mbozhanhare yavo. Hazvizivikanwe kuti South Africa ine zvizvarwa zvekune dzimwe nyika zvingani asi zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe munyika iyi zvinofungidzirwa kuti zvingangosvika kana kupfuura mamiriyoni matatu. Zvizvarwa izvi zviri munyika yeSouth Africa nekuda kwezvikonzero zvakasiyanasiyana zvinosanganisira mamiriro ezvematongerwe enyika pamwe nehupfumi muZimbabwe. No media source currently available
title: Sangano rePut South Africa First Rinoratidzira Richiti vekunze Vaburitswe MuSouth Africa

text: Bazi rezvemitemo muAmerica rinoti humbowo hwariri kuwana pamusoro pemhirizhonga yakatora nzvimbo paCapitol Hill, muWashington D.C. musi wa 6 Ndira, hunoratidza kuti vamwe vevanhu vakasungirwa nyaya iyi vanogona kupomerwa mhosva yekukonzera mhirizhonga nechinangwa chekubvisa pachigaro hurumende yakasarudzwa zviri pamutemo. Musi uyu, mhomho yevatsigiri vevaimbove mutungamiri wenyika, VaDonald Trump, vakapinda zvechisimba muparamende yeAmerica, yeCapitol Hill, vakapunza zvinhu, kusanganisa mahwindo, misuwo, macheya, matafura nezvimwe vachitsvaga vanhu vavaiti vakabatsira mukubira sarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika. Mhirizhonga iyi yakakonzera kufa kwevanhu vatanhatu. Bazi rinoona nezvemitemo rinoti rakatopomera mhosva vanhu vanopfuura mazana mana vavanoti vangangotongwa nemhosva yekuda kubvisa hurumende pachigaro zvechisimba vachishandisa zvombo, kana kuti ‘sedition’. Muchuchisi wehurumende, VaMichael Sherwin, vanoti humbowo huripo hunotsigira kupomera vanhu ava nemhosva iyi, vachiti mukufamba kwenguva humwe humbowo hucharatidza kuti izvi ndizvo zvaida kuitwa nevanhu ava. Asi vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika, VaCalvin Manduna, vanoti mu America hazvisi nyore kupomera munhu mhosva yekuda kubvisa hurumende pachigaro nechisimba. No media source currently available
title: America Inoti Vanhu Vakasungirwa Mhirizhonga paCapitol Hill Vanogona Kupomerwa Mhosva Yekuda Kukudubura Hurumende

text: Vaimbova mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Joice Mujuru, vatsigirwa nebato reDemocratic Assembly for Restoration and Empowerment, kana kuti DARE, kuti vave mutungamiri wemubatanidzwa wemapato anopikisa. Izvi zvabuda pamusangano waitirwa muHarare pakati pebato re National People's Party ne DARE, iro riri kutungamirwa naVa Gilbert Dzikiti. VaDzikiti vati bato ravo ratora danho rekuti ritsigire Amai Mujuru kuti vave mutungamiri wemubatanidzwa wemapato anopikisa uri kuda kuwumbwa kuti ukwikwidzane naVaMugabe neZanu PF musarudzo dzegore rinouya. Kunyange hazvo Amai Mujuru vakanyorerana chibvumirano chekushanda pamwechete nemutungamiri weMDC, VaMorgan Tsvangirai, nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika dzinoti zvave pachena kuti pangangoita mibatanidzwa miviri pamberi pesarudzo umwe uchange uchitungamirirwa naVaTsvangirai umwe naAmai Mujuru. Asi mutauriri weMDC-T, VaObert Gutu, vati sebato pachine nguva yekuti nhaurirano pakati pemapato dzimboenderera mberi. Imwe nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika uye vachishanda vakazvimirira, VaRashweat Mukundu, vanoti VaTsvangirai naAmai Mujuru vakabatana vane mukana wakakura kwazvo wekukunda Zanu PF musarudzo. Vati vakapinda musarudzo dzegore vari zvikwata zviviri zvinogona kuita kuti vapatsanure mavhoti zvinopa VaMugabe nebato ravo mukana wekudzokera mumasimba. Vachitaura pamusangano wavaita nevatori venhau pamuzinda webato ravo muHarare, Amai Mujuru, avo vari kufanotungamira bato reNational People’s Party, vati sarudzo dzekwaChiwundura hadzina kufambiswa zvakanaka sezvo vachiti sarudzo idzi dzakabiririrwa zvemhando yepamusoro-soro. Kunyange hazvo bato ravo risina kukwikwidza musarudzo idzi, Amai Mujuru vati humbowo hwakaburitswa nemasangano aiongorora sarudzo idzi hunoratidza kuti sarudzo idzi hadzina kufamba zvakanaka sedzemuna 2013. Amai Mujuru vati nepamusana pezvakaitika kuti Chiwundura zvekuti vavhoti vakange vakanyoreswa ruviri-ruviri, pane mukana wakakura chaizvo kuti sarudzo idzi dzakafambiswa mufambisirwo umwe newakaitwa sarudzo dzemuna 2013. Amai Mujuru, avo vaive mutevedzeri wemutungamiri pakaitwa sarudzo dzemuna 2013, vati hazvirambike kuti Nikuv yakashandiswa kubirira musarudzo. MDC inotungamirirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai inoti Zanu PF yakashandisa kambani yeNikuv iyi muna 2013 kubirira musarudzo zvakaita kuti VaTsvangirai vatadze kutora matomhu kubva kumutungamiri wenyika, Va Robert Mugabe. Zvichakadai, Va Gutu vati mashoko aAmai Mujuru aya anotsinhira zvavanogarotaura sebato kuti sarudzo dzapfuura dzakange dzine chikiribidi kunyange hazvo VaMugabe nebato ravo vachiti sarudzo idzi dzakanga dzakachena semukaka. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nemutauriri weZanu PF, VaSimon Khaya Moyo, pamwe nemutauriri weMDC inotungamirirwa naVaWelshman Ncube, VaKurauone Chihwayi, kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi.  No media source currently available
title: Amai Mujuru Votsigirwa neDARE Kuti Vatungamire Mubatanidzwa weMapato Anopikisa

text: Makurukota anoona nezvemukati menyika dzeSouth neZimbabwe, VaAaron Motsoaledi naVaKazembe Kazembe, neSvondo vakaita musangano pamuganho wenyika mbiri idzi weBeitbridge, wekuzeya nzira dzekugadzirisa nadzo matambudziko akatarisana nemuganhu mukuru uyu. Bazi remukati meSouth Africa rinoti nyaya dzakazeiwa pamusangano uyu dzino sanganisira huwori uyewo nzira dzingatorwa mukugadzirisa chipitipiti pamuganhu uyu panguva yezororo reKisimusi mwedzi unotevera. VaMotsoledi vakati nyika yavo neyeZimbabwe, dzakazeyawo nyaya yekushomeka kwevane ruzivo rwehutano pamuganhu apa, avo vachazoongorora kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid 19 kana vanhu voenda kana kubva kuzororo. Vakaenderera mberi vachiti, vachaita chirongwa chekuzivisa ruzhinji kuti hapana vanhu vachabvumidzwa kupinda muSouth Africa vachishandisa muganhu weBeitbridge kana vaine chirwere cheCovid-19. Asi sachigaro wesangano reZimbabwe Exiles Forum, VaGabriel Shumba vanoti musangano uyu hauna zvaunoreva sezvo makurukota aya asina kutaura pamusoro pekudhura kwemagwaro anoratidza kuti munhu avhenekwa Covid 19 uyewo nenyaya yema permit. Vanoti VaMotsoaledi naVaKazembe, vangadai vakatauriranawo pamusoro penyaya yekunetsa kunoita kuwana magwaro ekufambisa uyewo anobvumidza zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe kushanya, kushanda kana kugara muSouth Africa. Vanoti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvakawanda zvinopinda muSouth Africa nekuda kwenhamo naizvozvo zvinofanira kurerutsirwa panyaya iyi. Vaenderera mberi vachiti hurumende mbiri idzi, dzingadaiwo dzaka kurukura nyaya yeku shungurudzwa kuri kuitwa mhuri yeZimbabwe muSouth Africa nezvizvarwa zvenyika iyi. VaMotsoaledi vakazivisa kuti mapurisa, mauto, pamwe nevashandi vemubazi ravo vari kushanda vari pamuganho kudzorera zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe kumusha zvinenge zvapinda munyika mavo zvisina magwaro. Nemusi wechipiri mauto emuSouth Africa akadzora vanhu vaibva kuZimbabwe vanopfuura zana vakange vachiedza kupinda muSouth Africa zvisiri pamutemo. Kutanga kwegore rino, hurumende yeSouth Africa yakaisa fenzi pamuganho wayo neZimbabwe, kuitira kuti pasave neanopinda munyika iyi zvisiri pamutemo, uyewo kuedza kudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19.
