Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rehurumende yeZimbabwe panyaya iyi sezvo tatadza kubata Vakazembe kanawo vekumuzinda weZimbabwe muSouth Africa. Hurumende yeZimbabwe yakazivisa kuti ichavhura miganhu yayo, kusanganisira weBeitbridge, musi wa 01 Zvita, unove svondo rinouya, mushure mekuvharwa kwemwedzi yakawanda semamwe ematanho ekudzivirira kupararira kweCovid-19. No media source currently available
title: Zimbabwe neSouth Africa Dzinoita Musangano Wekutarisa Matambudziko ari paMuganhu weBeitbridge

text: Mutongi wedare repamusoro, Justice Mary Dube, nemusi weChipiri vakambosendeka parutivi kupa mutongo wavo panyaya yakakwidzwa kudare nameya weHarare, VaBernard Manyenyeni, vachipikisa kumbomiswa kwavo basa negurukota rezvematunhu, VaSaviour Kasukuwere. Mutongi wedare repamusoro, Justice Mary Dube, nemusi weChipiri vakambosendeka parutivi kupa mutongo wavo panyaya yakakwidzwa kudare nameya weHarare, VaBernard Manyenyeni, vachipikisa kumbomiswa kwavo basa negurukota rezvematunhu, VaSaviour Kasukuwere. VaManyenyeni vange vachimirirwa nemagweta eZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights, VaDavid Hofisi naVaDzimbambwe Chimbgwa. Musi wa 20 Kubvumbi vakasukuwere vakamisa VaManyenyeni basa vachiti vainge vatyora mutemo pakupa basa rekuva munyori weguta kuna VaJames Mushore. VaKasukuwere vanoti kusarudzwa kwaVaMushore kwaisava pamutemo weUrban Council Act uyo uri kunzi nemagweta aVaManyenyeni unotyora bumbiro remitemo yenyika. Kunetsana uku kwapa kuti kanzuru yeharare ive nevanyori vaviri panguva imwe chete-VaMushore naamai Josephine Ncube vakasarudzwa naVaKasukuwere kuti vafanobata matomu. Amai Ncube ndivo munyori wekanzuru, kana kuti chamber secretary. Mudare VaChimbgwa vati kubvisa meya pasi pebumbiro remitemo idzva kwave kuitwa nedare kana kuti tribunal. Munyori mukuru weMDC-T, VaDouglas Mwonzora vanoti vane tarisiro yekuti dare richatonga richitenderana nemagweta aVaKasukuwere. No media source currently available
title: Dare Rinosendeka Parutivi Mutongo Waro paNyaya yaVaManyenyeni naVaKasukuwere

text: Mhuri dzinosvika makumi matatu kuMasvingo dziri kutsutsumwa zvikuru nedanho rotorwa nebato riri kutonga reZanu-PF rekumbodzibvisa padzigere pedyo ne Show Ground. Vagari ava vanoti vakanzi vambobuda mudzimba dzavanogara mwedzi unouya kuitira kuti Zanu PF ichitanga kugadzirisa nzvimbo iyi isati yaita musangano wayo wepagore weconference ichiti iri kuitira kuchengetedza mutungamiriri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe pamwe nevamwe vakuru vehurumende. Mumwe ari kunzi ambobva ndiVaSteady Mujinga avo vanoti havana kwekuendesa mhuri yavo kwemwedzi wose sezvo vasina mari yekuroja. “Dzimba dzepano dzakatichipira isu tiri mavendor, zvino tambonzi timbobuda nekuti vakuru vari kuuya saka kwekuenda hatina saka tichatodzokere kunogara mumigwagwa.” Vamwe vari kumbotamiswa vanhu vanoshandira makambani anoratidzira zvinhu gore roga roga paShow Ground apa. Vamwe amai vati vanoda kudaidzwa kuti Mai Zviko vanoti vari kushushikana kuti vari kumbodzingwa apo mvura inenge yonaya. “Zvinoti shungurudza zvekuti timbobuda hatizivi kuti tichatandogarepi uye tichaendepi, nofunga tichatonogara mumugwagwa apo mvura yoda kutanga kunaya, musangano uyu wauya panguva isina kunaka.” Mumwe mugari wepanzvimbo iyi aramba kudomwa nezita nekutyira hupenyu hwake anoti anofunga kuti dzimba dzavo dzichange dzichigarwa nevatsigiri veZanu-PF vasingakwanise kunobhadhara mari dzemahotera. Ati zvekuti veZanu-PF vanoda kuchengetedza VaMugabe hazvina nematuro ose. “Isu hatina chekuita nenyaya dze security, hatisi threat. Dai vatotosiya nevana vedu vangoenderera mberi nemutambo wavo isu tichiita zvedu tiri pano.” Sachigaro we Zanu PF muMasvingo, VaAmasi Nenjani varamba kutaura neStudio 7 asi vakaudza vatori venhau kuti vakatoudza vagari ava kuti varongedze zvinhu zvavo vabve kuitira kuchengetedzwa kwehupenyu hwemutungamiriri wenyika nevamwe vatungamiriri veZanu PF. Zanu-PF inoti inotarisira vatsigiri vakawanda kuuya kumusangano uyu uye bato iri ratotanga kupemha mari kuvanhu nemamakambani ehurumende neakazvimirira.
title: Dzimwe Mhuri Dzotamiswa Misha kuMasvingo Mugadziriro yeMusangano weZanu-PF Conference

text: Zuva guru raPrince Harry vekuBritain naMuzvare Meghan Markle razosvika, apo vaviri ava varoorana neMugovera muguta reWindsor riri kunze kweLondon. Prince Charles, baba VaPrince Harry, ndivo vafamba nesvitsa vachinoipereka kumurume vayo. Merghan, uyo anove chizvarwa cheAmerica, uye aimboitawo zvemitambo yemafirimu, atenda kuti baba vake vanga vasingakwanise kuvepo pamuchato wake nekuda kwehutano hwavo husina kuita zvakanaka. Zviuru zvevanhu zvaungana muguta iri apo vaviri ava vanga vachibatanidzwa, zvichipa makomborero azvo, vamwe vachiedzawo kuona vachati ava.
title: Prince Harry naMuzvare Markle Vanochata

text: Vamwe vagari vemudunhu reMasvingo vari kuchema chema kuti hurumende yononoka kutumira mari yavakavimbisa kuti vawane raramo munguva yelockdown iyo yakawedzerwa nevhiki mbiri idzo dzave pedyo nekupera. Hurumende yakaparura chirongwa cheku batsira vanhu munyika mose nemari yekuti vararame kunyanya avo vairarama nekutengesa vasingasakwanisi kuita basa ravo nehurongwa hwayo hwkuti vanhu vagare mudzimba kuitira kudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere checoronavirus. Vachitaura neStudio7, vagari vazhinji vairarama nekutengesa vanoti vakanyoreswa mazita pakachikamu chekutanga chekunzi vagare mudzimba kwemavhiki matatu vachinzi vachapiwa mari inosvika madhora mazana maviri emabond pamunhu, asi hapana chavati vawana. Amai Sungano Zvarebwanashe, vanoti mazua ekugara mudzimba akatosvika pakuwedzerwa nemamamwe mavhiki maviri asi chabuda hapana. Amai Hilda Sibanda, vanotiwo nyaya yenzara yabata vagari vakawanda kunyanya vari pamudya ndigere nekudaro vanokurudzira hurumende kupa vanhu mari iyi nechimbichimbi. Vamwewo vanoti zvaiwana ngwarati pakunonoka kuuya kwemari iyi vachiti vainyora vaiita chizivano uye zvematongerwe enyika vachinyora vebato rimwe chete mamwe achisiiwa. VaLloyd Mufudze vekwaMupandawana kwaGutu, vari kupomera veZanu-PF mhosva yekunyoresana mazita vachisiya vemapato anopikisa nokudaro vanoti vanofara zvikuru kana mari iyi isirikuya. Mukuru webasa musangano rinomirira vanotengesa mumigwagwa re Vendors Initiative for Social and Economic Transformation (VISET), Va Wadzai Mangoma, vanoti hurumede inofanira kupa nhengo dzavo mari iyi nekukasika nekuti nguva yacho yarebesa. Mutauriri wekomiti ye Covid-19 Taskforce ,mudunhu reMasvingo, VaRodgers Irimayi, vanoti vanhu vakanyorwa zvakanaka pasina rusarura rwezve matongerwe enyika uye mari iyi yave pedyo nekuuya. Zvichakadaro vamwe vagari vemudhorobha reMasvingo vave kutyira kubata chirwere che covid-19 mushure mekupedza mazuva maviri vasina mvura mudzimba dzavo. Kudzivirira chirwere ichi vanhu vanokurudzirwa kugara vachigeza maoko nguva zhinji. Asi vagari venzvimbo dzakaita seku Runyararo West, KMP, Sisk, Rhodene nedzimwe vave vakabatira hura mumaoko sezvo vave kubuda panze pedzimba vachisangana neveruzhinji kuzvibhorani. Amai Sibanda vekuKMP vanoti vatarisana nematambudziko maviri ekushaiwa mari yechikafu pamwe nemvura iyo isiri kuuya. Meya weguta reMasvingo, Clr Collen Maboke, vati pane mapaipi akadhuuka kunopombwa mvura kudhamu reMtirikwi uye vashandi vavo vari mubishi kugadzirisa dambudziko iri. Asi vame vagari vanoti chero isiri nyaya yemazuva maviri aya mvura yavanowana pazuva ishoma nekuti inobuda kwe maawa mashoma pazuva izvo zvinoita kuti vasakwanise kudzivirira Covid-19 zvakazara. No media source currently available
title: Vanhu Vogunun'una Nekutadza Kupihwa Mari Dzekubatsirikana Dzakavimbiswa neHurumende

text: Vedzimotokari vamuka nhasi vachishamisika nekuona mutengo wemafuta ekufambisa wakwira zvakare kuenda pamadhora mashanu nemasendi mkumi maviri nematanhatu emaRTGS parita repeturu, kuchitiwo dhiziri richikwira kuenda pamadhora mashanu nemasendi manomwe parita iri mari yemaRTGS. Kukwira kwemitengo wemafuta uku kuitika masvondo mana abva kukwira zvakare nezvikamu zviri pakati pemakumi mana nezvitanhatu kubva muzana nemakumi mana nezvipfumbamwe kubva muzana. Vanotengesa mafuta vanonzi vapa zvikonzero zvekuti vakwidza mutengo nekuti mafuta anobva munzimbe kana kuti ethanol, ayo anosanganiswa nepeturu, akwidzwawo mutengo zvakanyanya kubva pamadhora maviri nemasendi makumi mapfumbamwe nemasere kuenda pamadhora mana nemasendi makumi matanhatu emaRTGS parita. Mutauriri wesangano revemabhazi anotakura vanhu, reChitungwiza Commuter Omnibus Operators Association, VaFarai Muza, vanoti kunyange hazvo mafuta akwira mutengo, havasi kuzokwidzawo mari dzinobhadharwa nevafambi, sezvo vanhu vakaremerwa nekuda kwekusakwidzwa kwemihoro yavo. No media source currently available
title: Mutengo weMafuta eDzimotokari Unokwira Zvakare

text:
Mhirizhonga yaitika nhasi kuHurungwe mudunhu reMashonaland West uko kuri kushanya mutungamiri webato rinopikisa reMDC Alliance, VaNelson Chamisa. VaChamisa vati vatambirwa zvakanaka kunzvimbo dzinoti St Boneface,
Nhari neBirimabwe asi pazoitika mhirizhonga pakupedzisira kuZvipani
neMagunje. VaChamisa vati nhengo dzeZanu PF dzanga dzakaisa matanda mumigwagwa pamwe dzichida kurova vanhu.

VaChamisa vati zvinoshamisa kuti mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson
Mnangagwa, vanoregedza mhirizhonga ichitwa nenhengo dzebato ravo. VaChamisa vati kana iri nyaya yezvirango yavari kuchema nayo, inyaya inoda kuti patauriranwe sezvo vati bato ravo richikwanisa kutaura nevakatemera zvirango kuti zvibviswe nekuti zvekutukana hazvishande.

Asi VaChamisa vati mhirizhonga haisi kuzovadzosera kumashure. Asi munyori anoona nezvekuchangetedzwa mubato reZanu PF mudunhu
reMashonaland West, VaTommy Mwanza, vati nhengo dzebato ravo hadziite mhirizhonga vachiti nhengo dzeMDC Alliance ndidzo dziri kupfeka nhumbi dzebato ravo dzichikonzera mhirizhonga senzira yekusvibisa zita rebato ravo.

Dzimwe nhengo dzebato reZanu PF dzaswera dzakagarira guyo sembwa
dzakamirira kuratidzira muBanket apo VaChamisa vanenge vachipfuura nemudhorobha iri. Nhengo idzi dzaswera dzichimbeya Mbeya pedyo nepanga paine mapurisa anga achitarisa motokari dzose dzanga dzichipfuura nemuBanket. Nhengo huru yeZanu PF muBanket, VaCrispen ‘Kadhoza’ Saidi, vati inhengo dzavo dziri kuda kuratidzira nyaya yezvirango kwete
kudzivirira VaChamisa. VaSaidi vati havasi kutziva kuti VaChamisa vane rwendo mudunhu
reMashonaland West uye bato ravo harineyi nerwendo rwaVaChamisa. Imwe nhengo yeMDC Alliance muChinhoyi, VaTendai Musonza, vati kuvharwa kuri kuitwa migwagwa nemapurisa pamwe nenhengo dzeZanu PF kunoratidza kupererwa.

VaChamisa vane hurongwa hwekufamba mumatunhu ose munyika
vachisangana nenhengo dzavo pamwe nevanhuwo zvavo vachiona mamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika. No media source currently available
title: VaChamisa Vanoti Mhirizhonga Haimisi Hurongwa Hwavo hweKupinda Muvanhu

text: Vechidiki kubva kumapato ezvematongerwo enyika vanoti vave kuzoshanda pamwe chete kupedza mhirizhonga munyika pamwe nekurwira kuti nyika iite sarudzo dzejekerere. Pavaita musangano nevatori venhau muHarare, vechidiki vazvipira kushanda pamwe chete vanosanganisira vebato reMDC T Chamisa, Khupe, MDC inotungamirirwa naVaWelshman Ncube, Zanu PF, ZAPU, Transform Zimbabwe neNational People’s Party. Vachitaura pamusangano uyu, munyori muboka revechidiki reMDC-T Chamisa, VaLovemore Chinoputsa, vati vechidiki vabatana pasi peJoint Youth Liason Committee chinangwa chavo hiri chekurwira sarudzo dzejekerere. VaChinoputsa vatiwo vechidiki vanga vari kungoshandiswa mumapato ezvematongerwo enyika pamwe nekurwisaniswa, asi pasina chauviri chavanowana. Vataura vakamirira sangano re Zimbabwe African People’s Union, VaFungai Mupanguri,vati sevechidiki vanoda kuvaka Zimbabwe itsva ine runyararo. VaIan Shona Hamandishe vebato reNational People’s Party vatiwo zvakakosha kuti vechidiki vabatane sezvo zvinhu zvavanoda zviri zvimwe chete. VaHamandishe vatiwo vanoona sekuti vakataura nenzwi rimwe sevechidiki, vanogona kunzwika. Vechidiki ava vanotiwo vari kutarisira kuramba vachibatana nemamwe mapato ezvematongerwo enyika. Kunyange hazvo bato reZanu PF ranga risina mumiririri paitwa musangano nevatori venhau, vechidiki vanga varipo ava vati bato iri ranga richiuya kunhauriranwa dzavaiita. Hatina kukwanisa kubata vechidiki muZanu PF kunzwa divi ravo panyaya iyi. No media source currently available
title: Vechidiki Vobatana Mukurwisa Mhirizhonga

text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vaita musangano nemamwe mapato ezvematoongerwo enyika wekutsvaga nzira dzekuti nhaurirano dzekugadzirisa nyika dzingafambesei. Vachivhura musangano uyu waitirwa kuState House, VaMnangagwa vati nhaurirano dzisati dzaitwa mapato ese akapinda musarudzo dzegore rapfuura anofanira kutambira zvakabuda musarudzo idzi pamwe nemutongo wakaitwa neConstitutional Court zvichitevera gakava rakamuka musarudzo idzi. VaMnangagwa vatiwo vanhu vemuZimbabwe vanofanira kuisa musoro pamwe voshanda mukunatsurudza hukama hweZimbabwe nedzimwe nyika. Vatiwo vanhu vese vemuZimbabwe zvisinei kuti ndevebato ripi, vanofanira kutaura nezwi rimwe pamusoro penyika yavo uye kuti zvirango zvehupfumi zvakatemerwa nyika, zvibviswe. Vatiwo zviri pachena kuti nyika haigoni kufambira mberi vanhu vachiyaura nenhamo uye zvakakosha kuti vanhu vashande pamwe mukusimudzira mabasa ehupfumi kuitira kuti nyika ive neremangwana rakajeka. Vaenderera mberi vachiti pane mitemo inofanira kusandurwa uyewo zvakakosha kuti bumbiro remitemo yenyika ritevedzwe. VaMnangagwa vati kana izvi zvikaitwa, havawoni chingatadzise nyika kuti ibudirire. VaMnangagwa vati vawona zvakakosha kutanga nhaurirano idzi nekuti zvakakosha kuti vanhu vemapato ese, vedzisvondo, masangano anoshanda kazvimirira nevanhuwo zvavo vane mazano anokwanissa kuti nyika ienderere mberi. Kunyange hazvo VaMnangagwa vange vakoka vese vakakwikwidza musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika, Studio 7 yawona vanhu gumi nevaviriri chete. Vamwe vakaita semutungamiri weMDC, VaNelson Chamisa, naAmai Joice Mujuru, havana kupinda mumusangano uyu vachida kuti nhaurirano idzi dzikokerwe nemunhu asina kupinda musarudzo uye asina divi raakarekera. VaMnangagwa vati vane muonero mumwe chetewo uye vakatembenge vadoma mukuru weimwe svondo kuti atungamire nhaurirano idzi asi vakazosiyana nepfungwa iyi mushure mekunge mukuru uyu atangawo kuita zvematongerwo enyika. Vamwe vapinda mumusangano wanhasi vanosanganisira, VaNkosana Moyo, VaLovemore Madhuku veNational Consituutional Assembly, Muzvare Thokozani Khupe VaMDC T, VaDaniel Shumba veUnited Democratic Movement, Brigadier Amrose Mutinhiri veNational Patriotic Front, VaNoah Manyika veBuild Zimbabwe, VaBrian Mteki naVaElton Mangoma. No media source currently available
title: VaMnangagwa Vanoda Kucherechedzwa Nhaurirano Dzisati Dzatanga

text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vanoti bato ravo harisi kuzowumba hurumende yemubatanidzwa nebato reMDC uye vati hurumende yavo yakazvipira kupedza damBudziko rekushayikwa kwemafuta edzimotokari pamwe nekukwira kuri kuita mitengo yezvinhu muzvitoro. Vachitaura nevatsigiri vavo pamuzinda webato ravo paZanu PF Headqurters pamberi pemusangano wekomiti yepamusorosoro mubato ravo yeCentral Committee, VaMnangagwa vati Zanu PF yakakunda zvine mutsindo musarudzo dzemusi wa30 Chikunguru kunyange hazvo vanga vachitobvunza mumwe wevatevedzeri vavo, VaConstantino Chiwenga, kuti vakakunda nemavhoti mangani musarudzo idzi. VaMnangagwa vati kubukiddza nekukunda kwavakaita musarudzo hapana chikonzero chekuti bato ravo riwumbe hurumende yemubatanidzwa neMDC. VaMnangagwa vadzokorodza izvi zvakare mumusangano weCentral Committee. Asi munyori mukuru muMDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa, VaDouglas Mwonzora, vati VaMnangagwa munhu ari kurotomoka vachiti sebato havana kumbobvira vati vanoda kuti pawumbwe hurumende yemubatanidzwa asi hurumende inombofano bata matomhu kwechinguvana kana kuti national transitional authority. Pakambowumbwa hurumende yemubatanidzwa muna 2009 pakati peZanu PF neMDC zvichitevera kusafambiswa zvakanaka kwakaknga kwaitwa sarudzo dzemuna 2008 idzo dzaive nemhirizhonga yakakonzera kufa kwenhengo dzeMDC dzinodarika mazana mana pamberi pesarudzo yechipiri yemutungamiri wenyika kana kuti presidential runoff zvichitevera kukundwa kwakanga kwaitwa vaimbova mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, nevaimbova mutungamiri weMDC, mushakabvu VaMorgan Tsvangirai musarudzo yekutanga yemutungamiri wenyika. VaMnangagwa vati vakapihwa masimba neveruzhinji ekutungamira nyika vakavimbisa kuti vachapedza dambudziko rekushayikwa kwemafuta edzimotokari pakupera kwemwedzi uno. Asi VaMwonzora vati veruzhinji vanotofanira kutenda maruva vadya chakata sezvo vachiti hurumende yeZanu PF haina chaichatarisiwa kuti ichagadzirisa. Panyaya yekukwira kuri kuramba kuchiita mitengo yezvinhu muzvitoro, mumwe wevatedzeri vaVaMnangagwa, VaConstantino Chiwenga, avo vari kutungamira bandiko rehurumende riri kuona nezvehupfumi hwenyika, vati sehurumende vachagara pasi nevemabhizimusi kuti vaone kuti chii chingaitwa kuti mitengo yezvinhu idzike vachiti hapana chikonzero chekuti varambe vachikwidza mitengo yezvinhu zuva nezuva. Izvi zvatsinhirwawo naVaMnangagwa avo vati vachashandisa musangano webato ravo wepagore uchaitirwa kuEsigodini kutsvaga nzira dzekugadzirisa nyaya yekukwira kwemitengo yezvinhu muzvitoro iyo iri kuramba ichiita chamurambamhuru pamwe nemamwe matambudziko akatarisana nenyika akafanana nekushaikwa kwemishonga muzvipatara. Asi vemabhizimusi pamwe nevanoita zvemishonga yemuzvipatara vanoti chiri kukonzera kuti zvinhu zvinetse munyika idambudziko rekushayikwa kwemari yekunze yavanoda kutenga zvinhu pamwe nemishonga kubva kunze kwenyika. No media source currently available
title: VaMnangagwa Vanoti Hapana Hurumende yeMubatanidzwa Inoitwa neZanu PF neMDC

text: Hurumende inoti ine tarisiro yekuti kuti hupfumi hwenyika huchakwira muna 2021 kunyangwe hazvo dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dziri kuyambira kuti zvinhu zvinogona kutonyanya kuipa. Gurukota rinoona nezvemari Muzvinafudo Mthuli Ncube uye gavhuna weReserve Bank Doctor John Mangudya vanoti vane tarisiro yekuti hupfumi hwenyika huchasimukira gore rino. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzine maonero akasiyana vakawanda vachiti vanotenda maruva vadya chakata. Mutungamiri wesangano reEmployers Confederation of Zimbabwe kana kuti EMCOZ Doctor Israel Murefu vanoti zvinokwanisika kuti hupfumi husimukire kana hurumende ikanyatsotevedzera gwara rayo rezvehupfumi rayakaparura kna kuti National Development Stratey 1 uye vachiti dhora remunyika ragadzikana zvapa kuti mitengo isangorambe ichiita chamurambamhuru. Asi vayambirawo kuti dambudziko rechirwere cheCovid-19 rinogona kukanganisa hupfumi hwenyika zvakanyanya nekuti chirwere ichi chadzoka zvine hukasha vachiti nhomba inofanira kukurumidzwa kupihwa vanhu nekuti vakawanda munyika havachatevedzeri kurudziro kubva kubazi rezvehutano. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe Doctor Prosper Chitambara vati pane zvakawanda zvinofanira kuti zviitike zvakafana nekunaya zvakanaka kwemvura nekuti kurima musimboti wehupfumi hwenyika. Asi vayambirawo kuti nyaya yedutumupengo remhepo nemafashamu emvura kana kuti Cyclone Chalane rinogona kukonzera matambudziko munyaya dzezvehupfumi. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi VaVcitor Bhoroma vatiwo pane zvakawanda zvinogona kupa kuti hupfumi hwenyika husimukire zvakafana nekuwanikwa kwemagetsi uye kushandiswa kwedhora rekuAmerica zvapa kuti hupfumi hugadzikana. Asi vatiwo hurumende inofanira kusaodhinda mari zvinozokanganisa hupfumi hwenyika. Vanoongorora nyaya dzezvehupfumi VaMasimba Kuchera vati hapana chiri kuratidza hacho kuti hupfumi huchakwirira sezvo makambani ari kutovhara nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Vamwe vanoti havo Zimbabwe ine mukana wakakura wekusumdzira hupfumi asi nyaya yekutonga nedemo uye huori ndizvo zvapa kuti nyika iite seyakageza negoka munyama zvinhu zvichiita madamburaka mutariko wekumahositeri. No media source currently available
title: Hurumende Yotarisira Kusimukira kweHupfumi Muna 2021 Vamwe Vachiti Mutora

text: America neMuvhuro yakacherechedza zuva revatungamiri venyika rePresidents' Day, zvisineyi kuti vaive vebato ripi. Nyanzvi mune zvamatongerwo enyika vachidzidzisa paAmherst College kuMassachusetts, muAmerica, Doctor Chipo Dendere, vanoti sezvo Zimbabwe yatovewo nevaimbove mutungamiri wenyika, zuva rakadai rinofanira kuvepo kuti mune ramangwana vanhu vakwanise kuwana zuva rekucherekedza zvakaitwa zvakanaka nevatungamiri vavo. “Sezvo tave nevaimbove mutungamiri wenyika, ndinofunga sezvakakosha kuti tifunge kuti tichazopembedza zvakanaka zvakaitwa naVaMugabe sei. Ndinoona sekuti ndizvo zvinoita ‘holiday’ iyi kuti ma Americans vanonzwisisa kuti vatungamiriri vavo venyika vaiita zvimwe zvinhu zvakashata zvakawanda, kunyanya mazuva ekutapa vanhu asi vane zuva rimwe chete ravanosarudza kurangarira zvakanaka zvavakaitirwa nevatungamiriri vavo vakasiyana siyana," Doctor Dendere vanodaro. Mutungamiri wenyika pari zvino muAmerica, VaDonald Trump, ndivo mutungamiri wechimakumi mana neshanu, mushure mekutora matomu kubva kunaVaBarrack Obama, avo vakave mutungamiri wechitema wekutanga kutonga America. No media source currently available
title: Mhuri yeAmerica Inocherechedza Vatungamiriri Venyika Vayo Vose

text: Mumwe mubatanidzwa wemasangano evashandi, weZimbabwe Federation of Trade Unions, ZFTU, uri kukurudzira hurumende pamwe nemakambani akazvimirira kuti vabhadhare vashandi vavo mari dzemabhonasi dziri mumadhora ekuAmerica uchiti kuvabhadhara nemadhora emunyika kuno ita kuti varasikirwe nehuremu hwemari dzavo. Munyori mukuru weZFTU, VaKennias Shamuyarira, vanoti nekuda kwekuderera kwesimba redhora remunyika richienzaniswa nedhora rekuAmerica, mushandi akatambiriswa bhonasi yake iri kumadhora emunyika haazooni kukosha kwedikita rake. VaShamuyarira vanoti nekuda kwaizvozvo pamwe nekutsemura mari yacho kuti ibhadharwe mukati memwedzi maviri kunoitwa nevamwe vashandirwi, bhonasi haichina chiremera sechayaive nacho makore ekare. Vashandi vakawanda vanonzi vari kutarisira kutambiriswa mabhonasi avo kutanga mwedzi uno, uye hurumende yakatozivisa kuti ichange ichibhadhara vashandi vayo mabhonasi avo, pamusoro pezvo vopiwa zvakare mazana maviri emadhora ekuAmerica sebhonasi inobva kumutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa. Vamwe vashandi vehurumende vari kutarisira kutanga kuwana mabhonasi avo svondo rino. No media source currently available
title: Hurumende, Makambani Akazvimirira, Vokurudzirwa Kubhadhara Vashandi Mari dzeMabhonasi Avo Ari muMadhora ekuAmerica

text: Gavhuna Kim Reynolds vekudunhu reIowa vakasarudzwa nebato rinopikisa remaRepublicans kupa divi ravo vati mutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica VaJoe Biden pamashoko avo kunyika pamamiriro akaita zvinhu kna kuti State of the Union vanoti vakundikana kugadzirisa hupfumi hwenyika sezvo zvinhu zviri kudhura. Vatiwo zviri kuitwa neRussia kuUkraine munongedzo wekuti VaBiden vari kutadza kutungamira zvopa kuti Russia iite madiro aJojina. Asi vati vanomira nezvizvarwa zveUkraine zviri kurwisa mauto ekuRussia. Amai Reynolds vatiwo havasi kufara nemadzidzisirwo ari kuitwa vana nhoroondo yenyika muzvikoro vachiti zvimwe zvinounza kuvengana. Mumashoko avo, VaBiden vataura nezve nyaya dzezvehupfumi kuchengetedzwa kwerunyararo munyika mavo uye hutano vachiti vari kubudirira kurwisa chirwere cheCovid-19. VaBiden vatiwo hurumende yavo ichatemera Russia zvirango zvakaomarara nekutanga kwayakaita hondo yekupamba Ukraine. No media source currently available
title: MaRepublicans Oshora Mashoko Aturwa naVaBiden kuNyika

text: Mutungamiri wesangano reConfederation of Zimbabwe Retailers VaDenford Mutashu vanoti gavhuna weReserve Bank of Zimbabwe Doctor John Mangudya vakavavimbisa kuti mutemo wechimbi chimbi weStatutory Instrument 127 uchabata chete avo vanoshandisa zvisizvo mari yepamusika weRBZ Foreign Currency Exchange Auction, vanotengesa mari pamukoto uye vasingaendese mari kumabhanga vachidzichengetera mudzimba. Musangano uyu wakaitwa neChitatu mushure mekunge VaMangudya vaburitsawo mazita emakambani gumi nemasere anonzi akashandisa mari yaakawana kuRBZ nemutengo uri pasi zvisizvo. Makambani aya ari kunzi abhadhare muripo. VaMangudya vaudza Studio 7 kuti ichokwadi kuti vakaita musangano nevemabhizimisi asi vakati vange vari mune mumwe mumusangano nekudaro vange vasina kusungunuka kutaura zvizhinji. Masangano akawanda emabhizimisi anosanganisira reZimbabwe National Chamber of Commerce, Confederation of Zimbabwe Industries, Employers Confederation of Zimbabwe nemamwe ari kushora mutemo uyu achiti uri kuvaomesera sezvo vasingakwanise kuwana mari pamusika wemari yekunze weRBZ sezvo iripo iri shoma. Vanoti vanotowana mari ichidhura pamukoto uye havangakwikwidzane nevari kuwana mari nemutengo uri pasi kuRBZ. Vamwe vakatoenda kumatare vachikwikwidza mutemo uyu. No media source currently available
title: VaMangudya Vanoti Mutemo weStatutory Instrument Wakanangana neNhubu Chete

text: Mutungamiri mutsva weAmerica, VaDonald Trump, vatanga svondo ravo rekutanga vari pabasa nyika zhinji dzemuAfrica dzinosanganisira Zimbabwe dzakamirira kuti dzinzwe hwaro hutsva hwa VaTrump pamusoro penyika dzekunze. Bato reZanu PF rinoti riri kutarisira kuti VaTrump vachabvisa zvirango zvehupfumi zvakatemerwa nyika ukuwo bato rinopikisa reMDC-T richiti havawoni izvi zvichiitika. VaTrump vange vakatarisirwa kuburitsa America kubva sangano rekutengeserana renyika gumi nembiri rePacific Rim, apo vari kutanga svondo ravo vari muhofisi. Mumwe murwiri wekodzero dzevanhu anoshanda nesangano re Institute of Young Women Development, Muzvare Glanis Changachirere, vanoti zviri kuitika muAmerica zvinoratidza kunaka kwehutongo hwejechetere uye veruzhinji vakamirira kuona kuti VaTrump vakarongereyi Africa. "Vazhinji vakamirira kuona hwaro hwa VaTrump paAfrica, zvikuru Zimbabwe. Asi zviri kunetsa sezvo mutungamiri mutsva ane shungu yekugadzirisa hupfumi hweAmerica. Zvichatora nguva kuti pazivikanwe kuti Africa ichadyidzana seyi hurumende itsva iyi," Muzvare Changachirere vaudza Studio7. No media source currently available
title: Africa Yotarisira Kuona Hurongwa hwaVaTrump

text: Komisheni yakagadzwa nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, kuti iongorore mhirizhonga yakaitika musi wa1 Nyamavhuvhu, yatanga kunzwa huchapupu kubva kuvanhu vanoti vakaona zvakaitika musi wakaitwa mhirizhonga iyi mushure mesarudzo dzemusi wa30 Chikunguru. Kunzwikwa kwezvakaitika pamhirizhonga kwatanga muHarare neChipiri kuchitungamirwa nevaimbova mutungamiri weSouth Africa, VaKgalema Mothlante. Vachitura mashoko avo vafakazi vasati vatanga kutura humbo hwavo kukomisheni iyi, VaMotlanthe, avo vanove sachigaro wekomisheni iyi, vati chavari kutsvaga ichokwadi chezvakaitika kuti chibude pachena. VaMotlanthe vachipedza kutaura vatori venhau vemasangano akazvimirira vanyunyuta kuna VaMothlante pavanzi vachibuda muhotera manga muchinzwikwa nyaya iyi kuitira kuti kusare vatori venhau veZBC chete. Mumwe wevatori venhau ava, Violet Gonda, uyo anoshanda akazvimirira audza VaMotlanthe kuti vatori venhau vese vanofanirwa kubatwa zvakafanana sezvo kunzwikwa kwenyaya iyi kuri kuitwa pajekerere. Mushure meizvi, vafakazi vapa humbowo hwavo kudare vanosanganisira Muzvare Patricia Ruzawi avo vaiva mumwe wevaongorori vesarudzo, VaWalter Mutanga, avo vanochengetedza pamuzinda webepanhau reHerald, naVa Peter Manowa, avo vati vanoshanda pamahofisi eZanu PF mupurovhinzi yeHarare vati mhirizhonga yakaitika musi uyu yakakonzerwa nevechidiki veMDC Alliance avo vavanoti vairatidzira mudhorobha. Muzvare Ruzawi vaudzawo komisheni iyi kuti dai hurumende yaona kuti mahofisi emapato ezvematongerwo enyika abviswa pakati pedhorobha kuitira kuti veruzhinji vasakuvare kana kufa kana vezvematongerwo enyika vachiita zvemhirizhonga. Mumwe wevapa hufakazi, VaLawson Nyanhanda, vatiwo vakamanikidzwa nemasoja kubuda mumotokari mavo vakashungurudzwa zvakaomarara ndipo pavanoti vakazototesa mabhurugwa avo vanzwa pfuti dzichirira. VaManowa vatiwo mapurisa akaridza pfuti pamahofisi eZanu PF ari muna Fourth Street kudzamara mabara apera mushure mekunge varatidziri veMDC Alliance ava vapisa motokari dzaiva pamahofisi ebato ravo, aya pamwe nekukanda matombo akasiya mahwindo emahofisi avo apwanyika. Mumwe wevakapfurwa pamhirizhonga yemusi uyu, VaAdrian Munjere, avo vanga varipowo nhasi vati vari kushushikana zvikuru nezvakaitika izvi. Kunzwikwa kwezvakaitika pamhirizhonga yemusi wa1 Nyamavhuvhu kwanzi naVaMotlanthe kuchaenderera mberi mangwana vafakazi vachipa humbowo hwavo kukokmisheni iyi. Pamhirizhonga iyi pakafa vanhu vatanhatu vanofungidzirwa kuti vakapfurwa nemasoja. Asi masangano akazvimirira anoti huwandu hwevanhu vakafa musi uyu hunodarika gumi sezvo vamwe vakafira munzira vachiendeswa kuzvipatara. VaMotlanthe vati vachapa gwaro rezvavachawana muongororo yavo kumutungamiri wenyika mushure memwedzi mitatu kubva musi wakagadzwa komisheni yavo. No media source currently available
title: Komisheni yaVaMotlanthe Yotanga Kunzwa Zvakaitika

text: Mumwe murimi wechichena wekuChipinge, VaRichard Le Vieux, avo vakashungurudzwa nekusungwa kutanga kwegore rino vachida kutorerwa purazi ravo, vaudza paramende kuti zvinhu zvagadzikana mushure mekupindira kwemutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, nedare ravo remakurukota. VaLe Vieux, veku Farfell Coffee Estate, vaudza komiti yeNational Assembly inoona nezvekurima kuti vakakatyamara mukutanga kwegore rino kuona vakuru vakuru vanoona nezvekurima mudunhu reManicaland vachiiuya nemwana wegurukota redunhu iri, Dr Ellen Gwaradzimba, VaRememberance Mudzana, vachiti vaifanira kushanda vese. Vati pavakapikisa izvi vakatanga kushungurudzwa nekusungwa vachiendeswa kumatare edzimhosva uye vati vakatozoyambirwa nevakuru vakuru vebato reZanu PF mudunhu iri kuti vakwidze nyaya yavo kumutungamiri wenyika sezvo zvaiitwa nebazi rekurima naVaMbudzana, zvainge zviri kunze kwemutemo. VaLe Vieux vati musi wa1 Chivabvu ivo nevamwe varimi vechichena muManicaland vakakokwa kumahofisi Amai Gwaradzimba uko vakasvikotukwa zvakasimba naAmai Gwaradzimba pamwe nekugurukota rezvekurima, VaPerence Shiri, vachinzi vaizorasikirwa nemapurazi avo zvachose kana vasingade kushanda nevarimi vavainge vapihwa nehurumende. Asi vati vakazofara chose apo vakanyorewa negurukota rinoona nezvedyidzana nekutengeserana nedzimwe nyika, VaSibusiso Moyo, vachiudzwa kuti VaMnangagwa nedare remakurukota vainge vaita chisungo chekuti vagare papuruzai ravo vachiita basa ravo semazuva ose. Gweta raVaLe Vieux, VaNorman Mugiya, vaudzawo komiti iyi kuti vakazowanawo imwe tsamba kubva kuna VaShiri vachitonzi vachapihwa 99 Year Lease. VaLe Vieux naVaMugiya vati kubvira pavakawana matsamba aya vave kuita basa ravo pasina anovavhirigidza uye vamirira 99 Year-Lease. VaLe Vieux vati Zimbabwe inofanira kusandura mashandiro ayo pazvinhu zvese kana ichida kusimudzira hupfumi. Vati zvinhu zvinodiwa kuti bhizinesi rifambe zvakaita semagetsi nemafuta emotoakri zviri kushaikwa munyika, zvinomesera vemabhizimisi. Vatiwo migwagwa kunzvimbo yavo yakaparara zvekuti vemakambani anotakura zvinhu vakawanda vave kuramba kutakurwa zvirimwa zvavo kuenda kunze kwenyika. Zvichakadai, VaMbudzana, avo vange vachifanira kupawo divi ravo kukomiti iyi inotungamirirwa naVaJustice Mayor Wadyajena, vaudza komiti iyi kuti vange vasingakwanise kuuya sezvo vange vari mumutsetse wemafuta emotokari. Komiti inoona nezvekupihwa kweminda kuManicaland, iyo inotungamirirwa naAmai Gwaradzimba, yazivisawo kuti yange isisakwanise kuzopa humbowo pamusoro penyaya iyi sezvo yange yakabatikana. Mune imwewo nyaya, nhengo neNational Assembly inomirira Kambuzuma, VaWillas Madzimure, vaisa chikumbiro kudare chekuti gurukota rinoona nezvemukati munyika, VaCain Mathema, kuti vaudza dare kuti murwiri wekodzero dzevanhu, VaItayi Dzamara, avo vakapedzesera kuonekwa muna Kurume muna 2015, vachiri vapenyu here kana kuti kwete. Vati izvi zvakakosha kuti mhuri yake ione zvaingaite kwete kuramba ichingotarisira kuti munhu mupenyu iye akatsakatika kare.
title: Zvinhu Zvogadzikana kuMapurazi Zvichitevera Kupindira kwaVaMnangagwa

text: Sangano reUNICEF raparura komiti yevechidiki yeZimbabwe Adolescents and Young People’s Advisory Committee iyo ine chinangwa chekuona kuti vechidiki vangaronge sei nekupinda muzvirongwa zvine chekuita nehupenhu hwavo. Mutevedzeri wemumiriri weUNICEF muZimbabwe Amai Zeinab Adam vati danho ravatora iri rakakosha pakupa vechidiki simba rekuti vazvitaurire nekuzvirongera zvavanoda pakurarama kwavo. Amai Adam vati vanofara chose kuti hurumende yeZimbabwe inoda chose kusimudzira vechidiki, vachiti chirongwa chaparurwa nhasi chiri kuitwa munyika zhinji pasi rese tenderere. Mumwe ari kutungamira chirongwa ichi muUNICEF Zimbabwe Amai Beula Senzanje vaudza Studio 7 kuti vechidiki vakawanda vari kurasikirwa nemikana nekuda kwekuti havana ruzivo rwezviri kuitika, uye kuti vabereki vavo kana kuti hama dzavo hadzivabatsiri pane zvavanenge vachida kuita. Vati chirongwa chavaparura nhasi chinoda kugadzirisa izvi. Nhengo dzekomiti yaparurwa nhasi, iyo ine vechidiki vanobva kumativi mana enyika kusanganisira makunzura nenhengo dzeparamende dzevechidiki, dzati dzinofara nezvaitika nhasi dzikati dzichashanda nesimba kugadzirisa zvinonetsa pane vechidiki. VaLincoln Tatenda Bitipiti ndemumwe apinda mukomiti yaparurwa nhasi iyi uye vanoti vachashanda nesimba kuona kuti vechidiki vabatsirwa. Mukuru wesangano rePlatform for Youth and and Community Development, VaClaris Madhuku, vati vanotambira chirongwa che UNICEF. UNICEF inoti vechidiki vanosangana nematambudziko nekuda kwezvikonzero zvakawanda zvinosanganisira kushaya ruzivo rwezviri kuitika munyika, kushaya mari nerutsigiuro kubva kuvabareki pamwe nemasangano anomirira vechidiki munyika. VaMadhuku vanoti ichi ichokwadi uye vari kuedza kugadzirisa dambudziko iri. Zimbabwe ndiyo yega muSADC ine chirongwa chaita sechaparurwa ichi.
title: UNICEF Inoparura Komiti yeVechidiki neChinangwa Chekuvabatsira Kupinda muZvirongwa Zvinovabatsira muHupenyu

text: Mutungamiri weMDC Alliance, VaNelson Chamisa, vanoti kana vakakunda musarudzo, makurukota avo haabvumirwi kubuda kunze kwenyika achinorapwa ikoko vachiti izvi zvichaita kuti vavandudze zvipatara munyika. Vachitaura pamusangano wekutsvaga rutsigiro paMuchakata Growth Point kuMasvingo Central, VaChamisa vatiwo havasi kuzobvumidza kuti makurukota avo aendesa vana vavo kunodzidza kuzvikoro zvepamsuro kunze kwenyika vachiti, zvose zvinofanirwa kuwanikwa muno. VaChamisa vati hurumende yavo ichavandudza zvipatara pamwe nezvikoro nezvimwe zviri kushaikwa munyika kuitira kuti vanhu vasatize nyika yavo vachindotsvaga kubatsirwa kunze. Vashoropodza hurumende iripo vachiti vakuru vayo vanorapwa kunze kwenyika uye vana vavo vanodzidza kunze nekuti vakawondonga zvipatara pamwe nedzidzo yemunyika. VaChamisa vati nyika yakaparadzwa nehuori, nokudaro hurumende yavo icharwisa huori, pamwe nekugadzirisa zvose zvinoda kugadziriswa kuitira kuti nyika ifambire mberi. Vachitaurawo pamusangano mumwe chetewo, mutungamiriri wevechidiki muMDCT, VaHappymore Chidziva, vakuurdzira vechidiki kuti vabude vakawanda kuitira kuti vavhotere VaChamisa. VaChamisa vanotarisirwa kuita mumwe musangano mangwana kuRutenga Growth Point uye kuChiredzi musi weSvondo. No media source currently available
title: VaChamisa Vanoti Makurukota Avo Haabvumidzwe Kurapwa Kunze kweNyika

text: Mutungmiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vanoti zvakakosha kuti makanzuru aite mabasa awo nemazvo kuitira kuti kusave nezvirwere zvakaita sekorera iyo yanetsa munyika. Vachitaura pakuvhura zviri pamutemo kwefekitori yeHamara Tomato Plant inogaya madomasi, VaMnangagwa vati vari kushushikana nekupararira kwezvirwere zvekorera netyphoid vakati hurumende iri kuita zvose zvainogona kubatsira kuti kutekeshera kwezvirwere izvi kupere. Vati ibasa remakanzuru emumaguta nemadhorobha akasiyana siyana kuti awanise vagari mvura yakachena pamwe nekurasa tsvina nekutakura marara nemazvo kuitira kuti zvirwere zvakadaro zvisarambe zvichiwanikwa. VaMnangagwa vadzokorodza chitsidzo chavakaita munguva pfupi yapfuura chekuti hurumende yavo ichaendesa masimba kumatunhu mushure mekuvandudzwa kwemitemo inobata nyaya iyi. Vati kana makanzuru ematunhu avepo zvakakosha kuti ashande zvakasimba mukusimudzira hupfumi hwematunhu aya izvo zvavati zvichaitawo kuti nyika isimukire. Hamara Tomato Plant yakaitwa nekambani yeTurning Matabeleland Green iyo inosanganisira mumwe murimi wechichena pamwe nevamwe vekereke. VaPeter Cunningham veTurning Matabeleland Green vati fekitori yeHamara Tomato Plant inokwanisa kugaya madomasi anopfuura matani zana nemakumi mashanu pazuva vachitiwo vanofara kuti fekitori iyi iri kubatsira kuwanisa vamwe varimi vekumamisha chouviri. Mushure mekuvhura Hamara Tomato Plant, VaMnangagwa vavhura zvakare chirongwa chedzimba dzeHopeville dziri kuvakwa neimwe kambani yeJR Goddard muBulawayo, VaMnangagwa vati zvinogona kuwonekwa sechinhu chisingakwanisike asi vati hurumende yavo yakazvipira kushanda kuti hupfumi hwenyika huve hwave pane chimwe chinhanho panozosvika gore ra2020. Vati zvirongwa zvakadai seHamara neHopeville zvinoenderana nedonzvo rehurmende yavo rekumutsurudza pamwe nekuvandudza hupfumi. Mutungamiri wenyika vati nyika haifanirwe kuve nezvirongwa zvinongonyorwa pasi chete zvisingazobatike vakadzokorodza yambiro yavo kuvashandi vehurumende kuti havafanirwe kuwanikwa vachivhiringidza zvirongwa zvehurumende. VaJames Goddard veJR Goddard Company iri kuvaka musha weHopeville vati vari kufara kukwanisa kuwana mukana wekubatsira hurumende muchinangwa chayo chekuwanisa vanhu dzimba. Dzimba dziri kuvakwa mumusha weHopeville dzinotangira zviuru makumi manomwe zvemadhora. No media source currently available
title: VaMnangagwa Vanovhura Fakitori Inogadzira Madomasi

text: Vamwe vashandi vemumigodhi vanoti vave kubatana nevarairidzi, nanachiremba nevamwe vashandi mukuchema nerekuti vatambiriswe mari dzavo dzemihoro nemari yekuAmerica. Vanoti mari dzavanotambira dzinofanira kuenzaniswa nedzinotambira vamwe vashandi vemumigodhi kune dzimwe nyika dzakakomberedza Zimbabwe. Vachitaura nebepanhau reNew Zimbabwe Dot Com munyori mukuru wesangano re Zimbabwe Diamond and Allied Minerals Workers Union VaJustice Chinhema vanoti vashandi vemumigodhi havasi kubhadharwa zvakanaka. Vanoti kunyangwe hazvo indasitiri yavo iri iyo inopinza mari yekunze, yakawanda kukunda dzimwe munyika, uye vachishanda zvakaomarara munzvimbo dzine njodzi, havawane muripo unoenderana nezvavanosangana nazvo. Hatina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvezvicherwa VaWalter Chidhakwa kuti tinzwe divi rehurumende. Asi mukuru wesangano reCentre for Natural Resources Governance VaFarai Maguwu vanoti vashandi vemumigodhi havasi kubatwa zvakanaka uye vanotyorerwa kodzero dzavo. No media source currently available
title: Vashandi veMumigodhi Vanoti Vanoda Kutambiriswa neMari dzekuAmerica

text: Sangano rinomiririra vadzidzisi, reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, PTUZ, rinoti vadzidzisi vakagadzirira kuratidzira kana kumbomira mabasa nekuti bhajeti rakabudiswa nehurumende rinovaratidza kuti hurumende haina basa nevadzidzisi uye haisi kuteerera zvavari kutaura. Mutungamiri wesangano iri, Doctor Takavafira Zhou, vati vadzidzisi vachasangana pamusoro penyaya iyi uye zviri kwavari kuti danho rotorwa nderipi. Doctor Zhou vati, “Zvinoda kubatana kwevarairidzi. Saka kana hurumende ichituma varairidzi kuti varamwe mabasa, vachasangana nazvo.” Vadzidzisi vanoti Zimbabwe iri kutadza kutevera zvakasungwa nedzimwe nyika maererano nekubatwa kwevadzidzisi naizvozvo inofanira kuita sezvakanyoreranwa muchibvumirano cheDakar Framework 2000 neMaputo Declaration. Zvibvumirano izvi zvinoti bazi rezvedzidzo rinofanira kupiwa zvidimbu makumi maviri nezviviri kubva muzana zvemari yebhajeti rese. No media source currently available
title: PTUZ Inoti Varairidzi Voronga Kuramwa Mabasa

text:
Nhengo gumi nembiri dzebato reCitizens Coalition for
Change-CCC dzanga dziri mudare redzimhosva dzakawanikwa dzisina mhosva nedare ramejasitireti neChishanu muChinhoyi. Nhengo idzi dzakasungwa mushure mekuungana pamahofisi adzo gore rapera dzichiri kubato reMDC Alliance dzichipomerwa mhosva yekutyora mutemo weCovid-19 unorambidza kuungana.

Asi nhengo idzi dzairamba mhosva iyi dzichiti dzainge dzaenda
kumahofisi adzo kuzonoronga nezverufu rweimwe nhengo yadzo yainge yashaya.

Vachipa mutongo wavo mutongi wedare Muzvare Tamara Chidindi
vakawirirana negweta renhengo idzi VaMurisi kuti mapurisa haana
kuyambira nhengo idzi kuti dzibve pamahofisi adzo dai vakafungidzira
kuti vainge vari pamusangano sezvinokurudzirwa nemutemo.

Mumwe wenhengo idzi uye vari sachigaro weCCC mudunhu reMashonaland West, VaRalph Magunje vanoti vanofara nekuchenurwa nematare sezvo vainge vasina mhosva.

VaMagunje vanoti ivo nevamwe vavo vainge vasina mhosva asi kungoti
hurumende iri kuitira hutsinye mapato anopikisa kuti vasasangane
nevanhu ichishandisa mutemo weCovid-19.

VaMagunje vanoti havasi kuzodzokera kumashure nekurwira shanduko munyika.

Mune imwe nyaya yanga iri mumatare edzimhosva, dare repamusoro reHigh Court rakabvuma kuti mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika VaConstantino
Chiwenga nevaive mudzimai wavo avari kunetsana naye Amai Marry Mubaiwa havachisina kuroorana sezvo vakapanana gupuro
muna 2019.

Vachipa mutongo wavo nemusi weChina, Justice Owen Tagu vakati gupuro remadhora
zana ekuAmerica rakapiwa Muzvare Mubaiwa rakadimura muchato wevaviri
ava zviri pamutemo patsika yechivanhu.

VaChiwenga naMuzvare Mubaiwa vane nyaya dziri pamberi pematare
dzinosanganisira dzekuti Muzvare Mubaiwa vaida kuuraya VaChiwenga apo
vairwara vari kunyika yeSouth Africa kwavairapwa.

VaTagu vakati dzimwe nyaya dzakaita sekuti pfuma ichagovanwa sei,
ndiyani achagara nevana pamwe nekuchengetwa kwavo zvichazobuda
pakutongwa kwenyaya iyi.

Asi gweta raMuzvare Mubayiwa, Amai Beatrice Mtetwa vakakwidza nyaya
yekuti Muzvare Mubayiwa havafanirwe kutombotongwa sezvo pasina mhosva yavakapara.

NeChishanu vanga vari kumatare edzimhosva zvakare pakanga pachifanirwa kupihwa mutongo wekuti Muzvare Mubaiwa vane mhosva here dzavanofanirwa kupindura mudare kana kuti kwete.

Asi patataura na Amai Mtetwa, vati vange vakamirira mutongi wedare kubva masikati kuti ature mutongo.

Rimwe gweta rakaramba kuzivikanwa nezita rinoti mutongo wegupuro hauneyi nedzimwe nyaya dzichapinda mudare dzakafanana nekugovanwa kwepfuma.

Nyaya yekurambana kwevaviri ava yaunza mutauro munyika vamwe vachiti
hazvipe chimiro chakanaka pavatungamiri venyika asi vamwe vachiti
nyaya dzerudo dzinonetsa sezvo vaviri vachizivana zvavakaitirana kwete
zvavanozotaura pachena. No media source currently available
title: Nhengo dzeCCC kuChinhoyi Dzinochenurwa neDare reDzimhosva

text: Mutungamiri webato reMDC, VaMorgan Tsvangirai, avo vari kutungamira zvakare mubatanidzwa wemapato anopikisa weMDC Alliance, vakatuma chikwata chakasimba kunotsvaga rutsigiro kunze kwenyika pamwe nekuti vekunze vazive chokwadi chiri kuitika muZimbabwe. Chikwata ichi chine nhengo ina dzinoti mutungamiri weimwe MDC, Professor Welshman Ncube, mutungamiri wePeople's Democratic Party, PDP, VaTendai Biti, mumwe wevatevedzeri vaVaTsvangirai, VaNelson Chamisa, pamwe nemutungamiri weTransform Zimbabwe, VaJacob Ngarivhume. Asi VaNcube vanonzi vazobatikana. Chikwata ichi chinonzi chiri kutarisirwawo kusangana nemutungamiri weAmerica, VaDonald Trump, uye kuendawo kune dzimwe nyika dzinosanganisira Ethiopia, neBritain. VaNgarivhume vanoti vakaona zvakakodzera kuti vazivisane nedzimwe nyika kuitira kuti dzinzwe pamire mapato anopikisa pane zviri kuitika muZimbabwe. "Tinoda kuti vekunze vanzwe patimire kuitira kuti kana votora matanho ave matanho anotorwa zvido zvevanopikisa zviripowo," vadaro VaNgarivhume. No media source currently available
title: MDC Alliance Yoita Hurukuro neVakuru Vakuru muAmerica
